sUtrasthAnam

AyuSkAmIyaH adhyAyaH

 athAta AyuSkAmIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smA~ahurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

atha namaskAraM kRtvA tantraM prastauti-athAta ityAdi|
atheti maGgalArthaH| ata iti namaskArAdAnantarye| AyuSkAmebhyo hita AyuSkAmIyaH|  AyuSkAmaCabdo~atrAstyadhyAya iti vA AyuSkAmIyaH| adhyAya iti viCiSTaprakaraNanAma| vyAkhyAsyAmo varNayiSyAmaH| iti ha smA~ahurityAdinA na svamanISAkAriteti dyotayati| iti hetinipAtasamudAyo~atItavastuviSayaH| AhuH sma bruvanti sma `laT sme' iti bhUte laT prayogaH| AtreyAdayo maharSayaH AdiCabdena bharadvAjAdInAM parigrahaH| mahAntaCca te RSayaCca maharSayaH| mahattvantu jJAnAdyatiCayayogAtpUjyatA|| 1||

 AyuHkAmayamAnena dharmArthasukhasAdhanam||2||  AyurvedopadeCeSu vidheyaH paramAdaraH||2||

kimAhuH? AyuHkAmayamAnenetyAdi| anenA~a~ayurvedatattvAdhigamArthaM CiSyagaNaM protsAhayati| AyuHkAmayamAnena yathocitaM jIvitaM nIrogamicchatA|  AyurvedopadeCeSu yairupAyairAyurveda upadiCyate teSu| paramAdaro vidheyaH kimbhUtamAyuH? dharmAdisAdhanam| na hi prAdhAnyena dharmAdayaH sAdhyante| anena sambandhAdIni apyuktAni bhavanti| atra  upAyopeyabhAvalakSaNaH sambandhaH| asya tantrasyA~a~ayurvedopadeCatvAdupAyatvam| tat sAdhyatvAdAyuSa upeyatvam| abhidheyamAyurvedaH| prayojanamAyuH dharmArthasukhAni ceti|

 AyurvedAmRtaM sArvaM brahmA buddhvA  sanAtanam||3||  dadau dakSAya so~aCvibhyAM tau Catakratave tataH||3||  dharmArthakAmamokSANAM vighnakAribhirAmayaiH||3||  nareSu pIDyamAneSu puraskRtya punarvasum||3||  dhanvantaribharadvAjanimikACyapakaCyapAH||3||  mahardhayo mahAtmAnastathA lambAyanAdayaH||3||  CatakratumupAjagmuH CaraNyamamareCvaram||3||  tAndRSTvaiva sahasrAkSo nijagAda yathAgamam||3||  AyuSaH pAlanaM vedamupavedamatharvaNaH||3||  kAyabAlagrahordhvAGgaCalyadaMSTrAjarAvRSaiH||3||  gatamaSTAGgatAM puNyaM bubudhe yaM pitAmahaH||3||

saMbandhAdInyuktvA AgamaCuddhiM darCayati- AyurvedAmRtamityAdinA| anena guruparamparAmapi darCayati| brahmA padmayonirAyurvedAmRtaM buddhvA dakSAya dadau| yathA~amRtena sakalarogaparikSayaH tathaiva AyurvedenetyataH sAdRCyam| sarvebhyo hitaM sArvam|  sanAtanamavinACi| sa dakSo~aCvibhyAM devabhiSagbhyAM dadau| tAvaCvinau Catakratave indrAya dadatuH| tato~anantaramAyurvedajJAnaparipUrNe Catakratau dharmAdicaturvargavighnakAribhirAmayaiH pIDyamAneSu satsu nareSu sakalajanarogopaCamahetormaharSayaH CatakratumupAjagmurupAviCan| yata eva CaraNyastataH| amarANAmICvaraM devanAyakam| mahatI RddhiryeSAM te maharddhayaH| maharSayo dhanvantariprabhRtayaH| na kevalaM dhanvantariprabhRtayaH yAvallambAyanAdayo~api| tAn dhanvantariprabhRtIn dRSTvaiva sahasrAkSo yathA~agamaM nijagAda AgamamanatikrAmaMstebhyaH kathayAJcakAra| kimityAha- AyuSaH pAlanaM jIvitasya rakSaNaM upavedamatharvaNaH atharvavedasyopavedam| kIdRCamAyurvedaM nijagAdetyAha- kAyeti| kAyAdibhiraSTAGgatAGgatam| yaM pitamaho bubudha iti saMbandhaH| kAyacikitsA  kAyaCabdenocyate| evaM bAlAdiSvapi yojyam| evamanyeSvapi| vRSaM vAjIkaraNam| yathAbhUtameva brahmaNA buddhaM tathAbhUtameva teSAM jJAnamityarthaH|| 3||

 gRhItvA te tamAmnAyaM prakACya ca parasparam||4||  AyayurmAnuSaM lokaM muditAH paramarSayaH||4||

te ca dhanvantariprabhRtayastamAmnAyaM CatakratuproktamAgamaM gRhItvA mayaivamajJAyi mayaivamajJAyIti parasparaM prakACya ca mAnuSaM lokamAyayuH prApuH| kimbhUtAH muditAH  sampannakAryatvAtsaharSAH|| 4||

 sthityarthamAyurvedasya te~atha tantrANi cakrire||5||  kRtvA~agniveCahArIta bheDamANDavyasuCrutAn||5||  karAlAdIMCca tacchiSyAn grAhayAmAsurAdRtAH||5||  svaM svaM tantraM tataste~api cakrustAni kRtAni ca||5||  gurun saMCrAvayAmAsuH sarSisaGghAnsumedhasaH||5||  taiH praCastAni tAnyeSAM pratiSThAM bhuvi lebhire||5||

Agatya ca mAnuSaM lokamAyurvedasya sthityarthamAyurvedo mAntardhAditi tantrANi cakrire akurvan| tatastAni tantrANi kRtvA AdRtAH sAdaraM punarvasudhanvantariprabhRtayo~agniveCAdikAn suCrutAn tAnadhigamayAmAsuH| na kevalamagniveCAdikAn yAvattat CiSyAn karAlAdInapi grAhayAmAsuH| te~apyagniveCAdayaH dhanvantariprabhRtibhyastAni tantrANi gRhItvA  svayaM tantraM cakruH| tataCca svayaMkRtAni tantrANi gurUn dhanvantariprabhRtIn saMCrAvayAmAsuH| kimbhUtAn gurUn? sarSisaGghAn samunisamUhAn| kimbhUtA agniveCAdayaH? sumedhasaH suprajJAH| tAni ca tantrANyeSAmagniveCAdInAm| tairdhanvantariprabhRtibhiH| praCastAni kRtapraCaMsAni| pratiSThAM supUjyAM sthitim| bhuvi manuSyaloke| lebhire prApuH|| 5||

 teSAmekaikamavyApi samastavyAdhisAdhane||6||  pratitantrAbhiyoge tu puruSAyuSasaMkSayaH||6||  bhavatyadhyayanenaiva yasmAtproktaH punaH punaH||6||  tantrakAraiH sa evA~arthaH kvacitkaCcidviCeSataH||6||  te~arthapratyAyana parA vacane yacca nAdRtAH||6||

ityanena granthasaMdarbheNA~agamaCuddhiM darCayitvA svayaM tantrakaraNe hetumAha-teSAmiti|  teSAmagniveCAdipraNItAnAM tantrANAmekaikaM tantraM samastavyAdhisAdhane sakalarogacikitsite~avyApi asampUrNam|  na hi suCrutapraNItA kvaciccikitsA~agniveCakRte tantre jJAte jJAtA bhavatyataH pratitantrAbhiyoge tvadhyayanamAtreNaiva puruSAyuSasaMkSayo  bhavati, na hi taduktavidhAnAnuSThAnasyA~ayurbhavatyataH yasmAt ca sukhagrahaNArthaM lokasyaika evArthastantrakAraiH punaHpunaH proktaH sa  evaikena proktaH sa evAnyena|  na kevalamevaM yAvat kvacicca tantre kaCcidartho viCeSataH anyena viCeSeNoktaH atastadvijJAnamatidurlabham| yacca yasmAcca te tantrakRto vivakSitArthapratyAyanaparatvAdvacane Cabde anAdRtA avahelAvantaH vacanasya svalpatvabahutvanirapekSAH arthAdareNa bahubhASiNa ityarthaH|| 6||

 sarvatantrANyataH prAyaH saMhRtyA~aSTAGgasaMgrahaH||7||  asthAnavistarAkSepapunaruktAdivarjitaH||7||  hetuliGgauSadhaskandhatrayamAtranibandhanaH||7||  vinigUDhArthatattvAnAM pradeCAnAM prakACakaH||7||  svAnyatantravirodhAnAM bhUyiSThaM vinivartakaH||7||  yugAnurUpasandarbho vibhAgena kariSyate||7||

ato~api hetoH sarvatantrANi saMhRtyA~aSTAGgasaMgrahaH kariSyata iti sambandhaH| kimbhUto~aSTAGgasaMgrahaH| asthAnavistarAdivarjitaH| ucite punaH sthAne vistarAdIni vidhIyanta eva| tathAhi RtusvarUpavarNane doSopakramaNe ca svasthAturahitatvAdvistaro~apyupayujyata eva| tathA garbhAvakrAntyaGgavibhAgAdiSu AkSepo~api dRCyate|  tathA~atiyogAdiprakaraNe punaruktamapIti| anye punarAhuH-
anyatra vaktavyamarthavastvanyatro~acyata ityasthAnaM tadvarjitaH| tathA vistarAkSepAbhyAM varjitaH nAtivistaro nAtisaMkSipta ityarthaH| sakRjjJApitasya vastunaH punarvacanaM punaruktistadvarjitaH| anyacca hetvAdiskandhatrayamAtranibandhanaH| hetU rogodbhavakAraNaM skandhaH samUhaH| hetuskandho mithyAhAravihArAdiH| liGgaM bhaviSyataH sataCca vyAdheCcihnabhUtam| yathA jvarasyAlasyAdiH| auSadhaskandho rogacikitsArthaM hitACanacUrNalehakvAthAdiH| samprApterhetuskandha evA~antarbhAvaH| upaCayaH punaH liGgaskandhe vA auSadhaskandhe vA~anupraviCati| evamanyadapyasminneva skandhatraye~antarbhAvyam| etAvanmAtramatra nibadhyata ityarthaH| mAtrACabdaH stokaparyAyaH anyatantreSu yathA bahuvaktavyatA na tathA~atra kintu kevalaM tAtparyavastugrahaNamiti mAtraCabdaprayogaH| anyacca kimbhUto~aSTAGgasaMgrahaH? anyatantreSu vinigUDhArthatatvA ye pradeCAsteSAM prakACakaH|
tathA carakamuninA SaSTikasya guNeSu "snigdho~aguruCce"ti
sandhAnake~akAraprayogaH kRta iti vAgbhaTena darCayatA laghuCabdaprayogaH kRtaH|  suCruto~apyAha "SaSTikaH pravarasteSAM kaSAyamadhuro laghu"riti| kRSNAtreyo~api "SaSTikaH sukara" ityAdi paThitvA laghavaH kaTupAkACcetyAha|  
kharanAdo~apyAha-`doSaghnaH SaSTiko laghu' riti| parACaro~api `rakto mahAn CakunAhRtaH SaSTika' ityAdi paThitvA laghavaH saMgrAhikA ityAha| carake~api paThyate `CAliSaSTikAdIni prakRtilaghUnyapi mAtrApekSINi bhavantI' ti| anyacca svatantravirodhAnAmanyatantravirodhAnAM ca bhUyiSThamatiCayena nivartakaH| svatantravirodho ya ekasminneva tantre~anyasthAnasthito grantho~anyasthAnasthitena virudhyate| yathA carake `caturviMCatirityetAH snehasya pravicAraNA' ityuktvA punarapyAha `evametACcatuSSaSTiH snehAnAM pravicAraNA' iti| tadvAgbhaTa ekIkurvannAha `yuktyAvacArayet sneha'mityAdi| bhakSyAdinopayujyamAna eva rasabhedena triSaSTidhA sneho bhavati ekaCca| iti catuSSaSTiH| etacca sammohanamAtranivRttaye uktaM na hi vastuto virodhaH sambhavati|
paratantravirodho yathA carakagranthena kRSNAtreyo viruddhaH| tathA carako himavatprabhavAnAM nadInAM pathyatvamicchati| kRSNAtreyasuCrutau tAsAmeva galagaNDAdikartRtvam| vAgbhaTastUpalAsphAlanetyAdinA virodhaM nivartayati| evamanyat granthagauravabhayAnna likhyate| vinivartako vinACakaH, arthAnAM subodhakatvAt| tathA yugAnurupasandarbhaH asmin kaliyuge pAThAvabodhadhAraNayogyagranthasambhAraH| vibhAgena CobhanairarthaprakaraNAdivicchedaiH|| 7||

 nityopayogi durbodhaM sarvAGgavyApi bhAvataH||8||  saMgRhItaM viCeSeNa yatra kAyacikitsitam||8||

tathA yatra cASTAGgasaMgrahe kAyacikitsitaM viCeSeNAtiCayena saMgRhItam| kimbhUtamityAha nityopayogi satataM CarIriNA upayujyate| duHkhena ca boddhuM Cakyata iti durbodham| na hi akRtaprayatnaH  tajjAnAtItyarthaH| tathA bhAvatastattvataH sarvAGgAnAM  vyApakam|  kAyacikitsAGgamekaM varjayitvA sapta sarvaCabdasaMgRhItAni| tathA ca bAlacikitsAyAM vakSyati kSIradoSajanitarogaprasaGge `yathA svaliGgAni'tyAdi| tathA UrdhvAGgaroga cikitsAyAM `sarvaroganidAnoktai'rityAdi| ata eva kAyacikitsitasya vyApakatvam| yataCca dravyarasAdimAtrACitAnnasvarupAdi parijJAnasnehAdyupayogAsaGgikarogacikitsAdisaptAnAmapyaGgAnA kAyacikitsitameva| asya ca granthasandarbhasya saMgrahasaMjJA~arthAnugatA tena kharanAdasaMhitAvaccarakAdinayavyAkhyAnatAtparyamatra viparItAvagamasambhAvanAbhayAnna kriyata iti|| 8||

 na mAtrAmAtramapyatra kiJcidAgamavarjitam||9||  te~arthAH sa granthabandhaCca saMkSepAya kramo~anyathA||9||

anantaragranthoktArthameva prakaTIkurvannAha- na mAtretyAdi| mAtrA~akSarakalA| akSarakalAmAtramapyatra na kiJcidAgamavarjitaM kathitamiti| ta evArthAH sa eva granthabandhaH| kevalaM saMkSepArthamanyaH krama ACritaH|| 9|| 

 vAyuH pittaM kaphaCceti trayo doSAH samAsataH||10||  pratyekaM te tridhA vRddhikSayasAmyavibhedataH||10||  utkRSTamadhyAlpatayA tridhA vRddhikSayAvapi||10||  vikRtA~avikRtA dehaM ghnanti te varttayanti  ca||10||

AyurvedAgamaCuddhiM darCayitvA Atmana AgamaparatantratAM cAnantaraM tantramArabhate| tantraM cAyuSaH pAlanam| AyurjIvitam| tacca  CarIrasambaddham| CarIraM ca doSadhAtumalasamudAyaH| teSAJca dhAtvAdInAM doSA eva pradhAnaM, yato doSebhya eva dhAtUnAM pravRttiH| tathA ca dhAtupoSAya rasasya vahanapAkasnehakAThinyAdidoSaprasAdalabhyameva| atasta eva pUrvamucyante- vAyurityAdi|  uddeCAdevAdhigate tritve punastrigrahaNaM niyamArtham| traya eva doSA na caturtho~asti|
yathA suCrutoktAviti niyamayati| samAsataH saMkSepataH na 
saMsargabhedAdivistareNa| vistaratastu bahavaH| dUSaNAtmakatvAddoSAH| te ca vAtAdayaH pratyekaM tridhA triprakArAH| kathaM triprakArA? ata Aha-pratyekaM vRddhikSayasAmyavibhedAt| vAyurvRddhaH vAyuH kSINaH vAyuH sama iti| evaM pittakaphayorapi vAcyam| teSAM ca prAkRtasvarupamapekSya vRddhyAdigatirvijJeyA| vRddhikSayAvapi punarutkRSTatvAdinA tridhaiva utkRSTA
vRddhirmadhyA vRddhiralpA vRddhirevaM kSaye~api vAcyam| sAmye tUtkarSAdyasambhavAnna bhedaH| te vAtAdayaH vikRtA~avikRtA dehaM ghnanti vartayanti ca| vikRtAH svarupAt calitAH CarIraM ghnanti nACayanti| avikRtAH svarupAdacalitAH CarIraM varttayanti|| 10||

ityanena granthasaMdarbheNA~agamaCuddhiM darCayitvA svayaM tantrakaraNe hetumAha-teSAmiti|  teSAmagniveCAdipraNItAnAM tantrANAmekaikaM tantraM samastavyAdhisAdhane sakalarogacikitsite~avyApi asampUrNam|  na hi suCrutapraNItA kvaciccikitsA~agniveCakRte tantre jJAte jJAtA bhavatyataH pratitantrAbhiyoge tvadhyayanamAtreNaiva puruSAyuSasaMkSayo  bhavati, na hi taduktavidhAnAnuSThAnasyA~ayurbhavatyataH yasmAt ca sukhagrahaNArthaM lokasyaika evArthastantrakAraiH punaHpunaH proktaH sa  evaikena proktaH sa evAnyena|  na kevalamevaM yAvat kvacicca tantre kaCcidartho viCeSataH anyena viCeSeNoktaH atastadvijJAnamatidurlabham| yacca yasmAcca te tantrakRto vivakSitArthapratyAyanaparatvAdvacane Cabde anAdRtA avahelAvantaH vacanasya svalpatvabahutvanirapekSAH arthAdareNa bahubhASiNa ityarthaH|| 6||

ato~api hetoH sarvatantrANi saMhRtyA~aSTAGgasaMgrahaH kariSyata iti sambandhaH| kimbhUto~aSTAGgasaMgrahaH| asthAnavistarAdivarjitaH| ucite punaH sthAne vistarAdIni vidhIyanta eva| tathAhi RtusvarUpavarNane doSopakramaNe ca svasthAturahitatvAdvistaro~apyupayujyata eva| tathA garbhAvakrAntyaGgavibhAgAdiSu AkSepo~api dRCyate|  tathA~atiyogAdiprakaraNe punaruktamapIti| anye punarAhuH-
anyatra vaktavyamarthavastvanyatro~acyata ityasthAnaM tadvarjitaH| tathA vistarAkSepAbhyAM varjitaH nAtivistaro nAtisaMkSipta ityarthaH| sakRjjJApitasya vastunaH punarvacanaM punaruktistadvarjitaH| anyacca hetvAdiskandhatrayamAtranibandhanaH| hetU rogodbhavakAraNaM skandhaH samUhaH| hetuskandho mithyAhAravihArAdiH| liGgaM bhaviSyataH sataCca vyAdheCcihnabhUtam| yathA jvarasyAlasyAdiH| auSadhaskandho rogacikitsArthaM hitACanacUrNalehakvAthAdiH| samprApterhetuskandha evA~antarbhAvaH| upaCayaH punaH liGgaskandhe vA auSadhaskandhe vA~anupraviCati| evamanyadapyasminneva skandhatraye~antarbhAvyam| etAvanmAtramatra nibadhyata ityarthaH| mAtrACabdaH stokaparyAyaH anyatantreSu yathA bahuvaktavyatA na tathA~atra kintu kevalaM tAtparyavastugrahaNamiti mAtraCabdaprayogaH| anyacca kimbhUto~aSTAGgasaMgrahaH? anyatantreSu vinigUDhArthatatvA ye pradeCAsteSAM prakACakaH|
tathA carakamuninA SaSTikasya guNeSu "snigdho~aguruCce"ti
sandhAnake~akAraprayogaH kRta iti vAgbhaTena darCayatA laghuCabdaprayogaH kRtaH|  suCruto~apyAha "SaSTikaH pravarasteSAM kaSAyamadhuro laghu"riti| kRSNAtreyo~api "SaSTikaH sukara" ityAdi paThitvA laghavaH kaTupAkACcetyAha|  
kharanAdo~apyAha-`doSaghnaH SaSTiko laghu' riti| parACaro~api `rakto mahAn CakunAhRtaH SaSTika' ityAdi paThitvA laghavaH saMgrAhikA ityAha| carake~api paThyate `CAliSaSTikAdIni prakRtilaghUnyapi mAtrApekSINi bhavantI' ti| anyacca svatantravirodhAnAmanyatantravirodhAnAM ca bhUyiSThamatiCayena nivartakaH| svatantravirodho ya ekasminneva tantre~anyasthAnasthito grantho~anyasthAnasthitena virudhyate| yathA carake `caturviMCatirityetAH snehasya pravicAraNA' ityuktvA punarapyAha `evametACcatuSSaSTiH snehAnAM pravicAraNA' iti| tadvAgbhaTa ekIkurvannAha `yuktyAvacArayet sneha'mityAdi| bhakSyAdinopayujyamAna eva rasabhedena triSaSTidhA sneho bhavati ekaCca| iti catuSSaSTiH| etacca sammohanamAtranivRttaye uktaM na hi vastuto virodhaH sambhavati|
paratantravirodho yathA carakagranthena kRSNAtreyo viruddhaH| tathA carako himavatprabhavAnAM nadInAM pathyatvamicchati| kRSNAtreyasuCrutau tAsAmeva galagaNDAdikartRtvam| vAgbhaTastUpalAsphAlanetyAdinA virodhaM nivartayati| evamanyat granthagauravabhayAnna likhyate| vinivartako vinACakaH, arthAnAM subodhakatvAt| tathA yugAnurupasandarbhaH asmin kaliyuge pAThAvabodhadhAraNayogyagranthasambhAraH| vibhAgena CobhanairarthaprakaraNAdivicchedaiH|| 7||

 nityopayogi durbodhaM sarvAGgavyApi bhAvataH||8||  saMgRhItaM viCeSeNa yatra kAyacikitsitam||8||

tathA yatra cASTAGgasaMgrahe kAyacikitsitaM viCeSeNAtiCayena saMgRhItam| kimbhUtamityAha nityopayogi satataM CarIriNA upayujyate| duHkhena ca boddhuM Cakyata iti durbodham| na hi akRtaprayatnaH  tajjAnAtItyarthaH| tathA bhAvatastattvataH sarvAGgAnAM  vyApakam|  kAyacikitsAGgamekaM varjayitvA sapta sarvaCabdasaMgRhItAni| tathA ca bAlacikitsAyAM vakSyati kSIradoSajanitarogaprasaGge `yathA svaliGgAni'tyAdi| tathA UrdhvAGgaroga cikitsAyAM `sarvaroganidAnoktai'rityAdi| ata eva kAyacikitsitasya vyApakatvam| yataCca dravyarasAdimAtrACitAnnasvarupAdi parijJAnasnehAdyupayogAsaGgikarogacikitsAdisaptAnAmapyaGgAnA kAyacikitsitameva| asya ca granthasandarbhasya saMgrahasaMjJA~arthAnugatA tena kharanAdasaMhitAvaccarakAdinayavyAkhyAnatAtparyamatra viparItAvagamasambhAvanAbhayAnna kriyata iti|| 8||

 na mAtrAmAtramapyatra kiJcidAgamavarjitam||9||  te~arthAH sa granthabandhaCca saMkSepAya kramo~anyathA||9||

anantaragranthoktArthameva prakaTIkurvannAha- na mAtretyAdi| mAtrA~akSarakalA| akSarakalAmAtramapyatra na kiJcidAgamavarjitaM kathitamiti| ta evArthAH sa eva granthabandhaH| kevalaM saMkSepArthamanyaH krama ACritaH|| 9|| 

 vAyuH pittaM kaphaCceti trayo doSAH samAsataH||10||  pratyekaM te tridhA vRddhikSayasAmyavibhedataH||10||  utkRSTamadhyAlpatayA tridhA vRddhikSayAvapi||10||  vikRtA~avikRtA dehaM ghnanti te varttayanti  ca||10||

AyurvedAgamaCuddhiM darCayitvA Atmana AgamaparatantratAM cAnantaraM tantramArabhate| tantraM cAyuSaH pAlanam| AyurjIvitam| tacca  CarIrasambaddham| CarIraM ca doSadhAtumalasamudAyaH| teSAJca dhAtvAdInAM doSA eva pradhAnaM, yato doSebhya eva dhAtUnAM pravRttiH| tathA ca dhAtupoSAya rasasya vahanapAkasnehakAThinyAdidoSaprasAdalabhyameva| atasta eva pUrvamucyante- vAyurityAdi|  uddeCAdevAdhigate tritve punastrigrahaNaM niyamArtham| traya eva doSA na caturtho~asti|

sUtrasthAnam

AyuSkAmIyaH adhyAyaH

 te vyApino~api hRnnAbhyoradhomadhyordhvasaMCrayAH||11||

nanu vAtAdayaH kiM niyatadeCA AhosvidvyApino~ata Aha-ta iti|

 vayohorAtribhuktAnAM te~antamadhyAdigAH kramAt||12||

na kevalaM CarIravyApinaH santo niyatadeCA yAvat sakalakAlavyApino~api niyatakAlAH| etatpradarCanArthamAha-vaya iti| antAdInAM  vAtAdibhiryathAsaGkhyaM saMbandhaH| vayasaH  puruSAyuSasya antaH paCcimo bhAgo vAyoH kopakAlaH| madhyabhAgaH pittasya| pUrvabhAgaH CleSmaNaH| ahno~apyevaM rAtreCca| bhuktaM nigIrNa AhAraH| tasyAnto jIrNaprAyAvasthA vAyoH kopakAlaH| madhyaM vidAhAvasthA pittasya| pUrvAvasthA bhuktamAtra evAnne CleSmaNaH|

 tairbhavedviSamastIkSNo mandaCcAgniH samaiH samaH||13||

taiCca vAtAdibhiH puruSasyAgniCcaturvidho bhavati| na hyekenApi doSeNa hInA vAtAdayaH CarIrajanane samarthAH| avaCyaM ca sarvaireva bhavitavyam|  yaCcaiSAmekavyapadeCaH sa utkarSakRtaH| vAtotkarSeNa viSamaH pittotkarSeNa tIkSNaH
kaphotkarSeNa mandaH samairhAnyutkarSavarjitaiH samaH| viSamAdInAM lakSaNaM CArIre vakSyate| yatra tu dvAvutkRSTau

 koSThaH krUro mRdurmadhyo madhyaH syAttaiH samairapi||14||

 CukrArtavasthairjanmAdau viSeNeva viSakRmeH||15||  taiCca tisraH prakRtayo hInamadhyottamAH pRthak||15||  samadhAtuH samastAsu CreSThA nindyA dvidoSajAH||15||

taiCca vAtAdibhiH prakRtayo bhavanti| prakRtiH CarIrasvarUpam| kimbhUtaiH vAtAdibhiH prakRtiH sampadyate, ata Aha- CukrArtavasthairityAdi| tathA ca vakSyati `CukrAsRggarbhiNIbhojye'tyAdi| janmAdau garbhAdhAnakAle 
piNDIbhUtaCukrArttavasthaiH| CukraM retaH ArtavaM CoNitam|

kITasyAnyamAraNasvabhAvenApi viSeNa prakRtiH svarupaM sampadyate| evaM puruSasya doSaiH prakRtiH sampadyate| anena dRSTAntenaitaddarCayati- vAtAdInAmupaghAtakatve~api CukrArttavasthAvasthAyAM prakRtiniSpAdanaM pratyanupahantRtvam| taiCca prakRtaya ityuktam| tAstu kiyantya ityAha-tisra iti| pRthagdoSaiH prakRtayastisro bhavanti| miCradoSANAM tUddeCakathane pRthaggrahaNaM liGgam|

dhAtuCabdo doSaparyAyaH, dhAraNAddhAtava iti|| 15||

 tatra rukSo laghuH CItaH kharaH sUkSmaCcalo~anilaH||16||  pittaM sasnehatIkSNoSNaM laghuH visraM saraM dravam||16||  snigdhaH CIto gururmandaH ClakSNo mRtsnaH sthiraH kaphaH||16||

doSANAM vAtAdInAM prakRtyAdikAraNatvamuktam| teSAM svarUpaM
na jJAtamatastadvijJAnArthamAha-tatreti| evaM hi svarUpe jJAte vAtAdihetukasya rogagrAmasya svakAraNadoSaviCeSaguNasamanvayenApratipadoktAvapi viCiSTadoSakAraNatvaM vRddhihAnikAraNasya ca doSANAM vastujAtasya yathAsvaM doSaiH

 saMsargaH sannipAtaCca taddvitrikSayakopataH||17||  tau SoDhA daCadhA coktAvutkarSAdivikalpanAt||17||

eSAM doSANAM miCrIbhUtAnAM tantravyavahArArthaM saMjJAdvayaM  cikIrSuridamAha-saMsarga iti| dvayostrayANAJca saMsargasannipAtau yathAsaGkhyam| dvau doSau miCrIbhUtau kSINau kupitau vA saMsargavAcyau| evaM trayo doSAH sannipAtavAcyAH| tau ca saMsargasannipAtau yathAsaGkhyena SoDhA
daCadhA coktau| SaDbhiH prakAraiH SoDhA daCabhiH daCadhA| katham? utkarSAdivikalpanAt| AdigrahaNena madhyahAnyoH 
parigrahaH| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-saMsarga utkarSAdinA vikalpitaH SoDhA bhavati| sannipAtaCca daCadhA| tatra saMsarga eko doSaH utkRSTena kopena kupitaH kSayeNa vA kSINaH dvitIyo madhyenAlpena ceti dvau bhedau| eko madhyena dvitIyo~alpeneti tRtIyaH| dvAvapyutkarSeNeti caturthaH| dvAvapi madhyeneti paJcamaH| dvAvalpeneti SaSThaH| iti saMsargaH sannipAte ekotkarSeNa dvayoH madhyatvenAlpatvena ceti dvau bhedau| eko madhyena dvitIyo~alpeneti tRtIyaH| dvayorutkarSeNaikasya madhyatvenAlpatvena ceti caturthaH paJcamaCca| dvau madhyAveko~alpa iti SaSThaH| sarva utkarSeNeti saptamaH| sarve madhyena iti aSTamaH| sarve alpeneti navamaH| eka utkarSeNa dvitIyo madhyena tRtIyo~alpeneti daCamaH| iti sannipAto daCadhA|| 17||

 rasAsRGmAMsamedosthimajjaCukrANi dhAtavaH||18||  sapta dUSyAH................................||18||

 rasAdistheSu doSeSu vyAdhayaH saMbhavanti ye||20||  tajjAnityupacAreNa tAnAhurghRtadAhavat||20||

sUtrasthAnam

 prINanaM jIvanaM lepaH sneho dhAraNapUraNe||21||  garbhotpAdaCca karmANi dhAtUnAM kramaCo viduH||21||  CarIraM dhArayantyete dhAtvAhArACca sarvadA||21||

eSAM ca dhAtUnAM saptAnAM yathAsaGkhyena prINanAdIni sapta karmANi| yAni kurvanto dehaM dhArayanti| prINanaM rasasya karma| prINanaM cittaprItiH| jIvanamasRjaH| jIvanam jIvitaM prANanamiti yAvat| tathA ca  raktamayamaSTabindukamojo nAma jIvAnAM grahaNadhAraNavivekakAryakaraM vakSyate| lepo mAMsasya| lepanaM asthyAdInAM lepaH| CarIrasneho medasaH| CarIradhAraNamasthnaH| anyathA niravalambanaM mAMsaM syAt| pUraNamasthno majjJaH karma| garbhotpAdaH Cukrasya| ete cAnantaroktA dhAtavaH CarIraM dhArayanti| dhAtvAhArACca-AhAro yathA jantUnAM vRddhikAraNaM tathaiva dhAtUnAM dhAtava eva vRddhikAraNam| pUrvaH pUrvo dhAturuttarasyottarasya AhAraH|| 21||

 vRddhiH samAnaiH sarveSAM viparItairviparyayaH||22||

doSAdInAM vRddhihAnikAraNavAdaprasaGgena sarvabhAvAnAmapi vRddhihAnikAraNamAhavRddhirityAdi| samAnaiH sadRCaiH sarveSAM vRddhiH| yo yo yena yAvatA cAMCena yasya samAnaH tenaiva tAvatA cAMCena sadRCena sa tasya vRddhikAraNam| yathA vAyoranyo vAyurdravyasvabhAvenaiva samAnaH| tasyaiva maricaM lAghavaraukSyaguNataH| tasyaiva saraNAdikA kriyA calanAdisAdharmyAt| evaM sarvabhAvAnAmapyUhyam| etatsamAnamasamAnaM ca sAmAnyaviCeSarUpaM gotvAdiviSayamapekSya vijJeyam| natu dravyatvasattAdimahAviSayaM sAmAnyam| tato vyavahArAsiddheH| tathA ca mahAsAmAnyApekSayA na kasyacidapi vastuno vastvantareNa samAnatvavyabhicAro na cAsamAnatvasambhavaH| yataCcaikasyaiva vastunaH kenacitsAdRCyamanyena vaiparItyamataH sakRdevobhayasya vRddhihAnilakSaNasya pravRttiH na virudhyate| yadyapi vastunaH yenaiva vastunoM~aCena sAdRCyaM tenaivAMCena vaiparItyamapi| tathApi tayorvastunorubhayarUpatvAdvRddhihAnilakSaNamubhayaM pratyekadaiva kAraNatvam| kathameko viruddhakAryakara iti cenna, viruddhayoH kAraNayorekasmindravye niveCAt| na hi viruddhayorjalatejasoratra dravye na sambhavaH, paJcabhUtAtmakatvAttasya| athaivamucyate-yathA surayA dravyatvena samAnasya stanyasya vRddhiH kriyate tathaiva kathamamlatvAduSNatvAcca viparItatve tasyaiva na kSaya ityetadapi na| tathAvidhasvabhAvatvAt| na hi svabhAvaH paryanuyoktavyaH| tathA ca vakSyati CAstrakAraH-
kaTupAkarasasnigdhagurutvaiH kaphavAtajit|
laCuno vAtakaphakRnna tu taireva yad guNaiH|| iti||
tacca tatraiva vyAkhyAtam| sAdRCyasAmAnyayoCcAtra na kaCcidviCeSaH, ekena rUpeNa vinA sAdRCyamapi na sambhavati| tathA sAmAnyasyApyarthakriyAsu vyaktyanuvidhAyitvAtsAmAnyaM vRddhikAraNamityukte~api na gosparCavadvyaktiviCeSAnapekSA| na hi sAmAnyamanAlambanavadvRddhihetutAM yAti| api tvACrayayormiCrIbhAvaviCeSeNeti|| 22||

 rasAH svAdvamlalavaNatiktoSaNakaSAyakAH||23||  SaD dravyamACritAste ca yathApUrvaM balAvahAH||23||

vAtAdInAmAdhyAtmikAnAM bAhyena dravyeNa sAdRCyam| dravyaJca mahAbhUtakAryaM rasavIryavipAkaprabhAvaiH kAryakaram| te ca rasAdayo~asminneva sUtrasthAne vakSyante| atra tvadhyAye tantrArthasUcanArthaM kiJciducyate-rasA ityAdi| svAdvAdayaH SaDrasAH| rasanendriyagrAhyatvAt rasAH dravyam nirviCeSaM paJcabhUtAtmakaM mUrtamACritAH| teSAJca yo yasmAt pUrvaH sa tasmAddehino balAvahaH svabhAvaviCeSAt|| 23|| 

 tatrAdyA mArutaM ghnanti trayastiktAdayaH kapham||24||  kaSAyatiktamadhurAH pittamanye tu kurvate||24||

eSAJca rasAnAM doSaviCeSapraCamanaprakopapraCamanavibhAgaM tatretyAdinA darCayati| anye tu kurvate ityetat  ghnantItyetacca mArutAdibhiH pratyekamabhisambadhyate| teSu raseSu madhye AdyAstrayaH svAdvamlalavaNA mArutamanilaM ghnanti| anye tu tiktoSaNakaSAyAH tameva cAnilaM kurvate| tiktAdayastrayaH tiktoSaNakaSAyAH kaphaM ghnanti| anye tu madhurAmlalavaNAH tameva kaphaM kurvate| kaSAyatiktamadhurAH pittaM ghnanti nACayanti| anye tvamlalavaNoSaNAH pittameva kurvate| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-madhuro vAtapittaghnaH CleSmakaraH| amlo vAtaM hanti kaphapitte tu janayati| lavaNo mArutaM hanti kaphapitte tu kurute| tiktaH kaphapitte nACayati vAtaM tu janayati| USaNaH kaphaM nACayati vAtapitte tu janayati| kaSAyaH kaphapitte hanti vAtaM karotIti|| 24||

 CamanaM kopanaM svasthahitaM dravyamiti tridhA||25||

eSAM ca rasAnAmACrayo dravyaM yadrasAdInanapekSya prabhAvAdeva kiJcit karoti| tat triprakAraM viCiSTaiH rasAdibhiryuktaM kupitAnAM vAtAdInAM CamanaM nACakaraM guDUcyAdi| anyairyuktaM kopanaM sAmyanACakaraM yavakAdi|  anyaiH svasthahitaM CAlyAdi| yanna kupitasya samIkaraNe samarthaM nApi samasya kopane kevalaM yathAsthitameva saMvAhayati| kecittu ekasyaiva dravyasya yogamAtrAkAlAdibhedAt trirUpatAmAhuH|| 25||

 uSNaCItaguNotkarSAttatra vIryaM dvidhA smRtam||26||

tatra dravye vIryaM dvividhaM uSNaCItaguNAdhikyAt| yadyapi sarvaM dravyaM paJcabhUtAtmakaM tathApyagnISomAtmakatvAt sarvabhAvAnAM  kiJciduSNaguNotkarSAt tanmukhenaiva kAryakAraNamuSNavIryamucyate| tadviparItaM CItavIryam| vIryaM CaktiH kAryakAraNahetuH|| 26||

 tridhA vipAko dravyasya svAdvamlakaTukAtmakaH||27||

vipAkastu tridhA| sarvadravyANAM vipAko jaTharAgnisambandhAt dravyasya svarUpAntara prAdurbhAvaH| tatra kiJcit svAduvipAkaM kiJcidamlavipAkam| kiJcit kaTuvipAkam|| 27|| 

 gurumanda- himasnigdha- ClakSNasAndra- mRdusthirAH||28||  guNAH sasUkSmaviCadA viMCatiH saviparyayAH||28||  indriyArthA vyavAyI ca vikASI cApare guNAH||28||  vyavAyI dehamakhilaM vyApya pAkAya kalpate||28||  vikASI vikaSandhAtUnsandhibandhAn vimuJcati||28||  saratIkSNaprakarSau tu kaiCcittau parikIrtitau||28||

tadeva ca dravyamACritA viMCatirguNA gurvAdayaH, saviparyayAH saviparItAH|  gururlaghurmandastIkSNaH, hima uSNaH, snigdhaH rUkSaH, ClakSNaH paruSaH, sAndraH dravaH, mRduH kaThinaH, sthiraCcalaH, sUkSmaH sthUlaH, viCadaH picchilaH| kharAdayastvetadbhedA eva yathAsambhavaM vyAkhyeyAH| etebhya anye guNA indriyArthAH CabdAdayaH| vyavAyI vikASI ca| indriyArthAnAM prasiddhatvAt lakSaNaM nocyate| sarvaM dehaM vyApya yat pAkaM yAti sa vyavAyI| vikASI dhAtUn vikaSan hiMsan sandhibandhAnupalepAdikAn muJcati nACayati| kaiCcidAcAryairvyavAyI sarasyaiva prakarSa iti parikalpitaH| vikASI tIkSNaprakarSaH|| 28||

 sattvaM rajastamaCceti trayaH proktA	 mahAguNAH||29||

sattvaM rajastamaCca tantre vyavahArArthe mahAguNaCabdena uktAH|| 29|| 

 kAlArthakarmaNAM yogo hInamithyAtimAtrakaH||30||  samyagyogaCca vijJeyo rogArogyaikakAraNam||30||

doSAdInAM sadRCena vRddhyA visadRCena ca hAnyA rogakAraNatvamuktam| kAlAdInAM tvatiyogAdayo doSavRddhikSayamukhenaiva  rogakAraNatvenocyante- kAleti| kAlaH CItoSNavarSalakSaNastrividho vakSyate| tasya svarUpahAnirhInayogaH| svarUpAtiCayo~atiyogaH| svarUpavaiparItyaM mithyAyogaH| arthAH indriyArthAH CabdAdayaH teSAmindriyeNAlpasaMyogaH saMyogAbhAvaCca hInayogaH| atyantasaMyogo~atiyogaH| paruSAnabhimatAdisvarUpasyArthajAtasya indriyeNa yogo mithyAyogaH| kAyavAGmanasAM kriyA karma| tasya hInA pravRttirhInayogaH| atipravRttiratiyogaH| vegodIraNAdimuttaratra vakSyamANaM mithyAyogaH| sarveSAM samA pravRttiH samayogaH| hInAdiyogastrayo rogakAraNam| samyagyogaH tvArogyakAraNam|

AyuSkAmIyaH adhyAyaH

 rogastu doSavaiSamyaM doSasAmyamarogatA||31||  nijAgantu vibhAgena rogACca dvividhA matAH||31||  teSAM kAyamanobhedAdadhiSThAnamapi dvidhA||31||  rajastamaCca manaso dvau ca doSAvudAhRtau||31||

rogArogye ke ucyete ityAha- roga iti| rogo vAtAdInAM viSamatA svarUpAccalanam|
saMprAptivaCena mukhyoktirhetutvenaupacArikI| viCiSTasaMprAptayo hi doSA eva rogAH tat kAryaM veti pakSadvayaN tena  vyAdhiviCeSamaniSpAdayadapi doSavaiSamyaM parigRhItaM bhavati| rogaviCeSANAM jvarAdInAM nAmAni| vAtAdInAM sAmyamarogatA| te ca rogA dvividhA nijAgantuvibhAgena| mithyAhAravihAreNa yo doSakopastatkRtA pIDA nijo rogaH| abhighAtAdinA doSakopa AgantU rogaH| teSAM rogAnAM kAyamanobhedena dvividhamadhiSThAnaM sthAnam| jvarAsrapittAdInAM kAyaH rAgadveSAdInAM manaH| nanu ca rogANAM vAtAdayaH kAraNatvenoktAH te ca kAyikAnAmeva sambhavanti na mAnasAnAmata Aha- rajastamaCceti| manaH CuddhaM satvam| rajaH tamasI doSau tasyopaplavAvavidyAsambhUtau|| 31||

 darCanasparCanapraCnaiH parIkSeta ca rogiNam||32||

rogo jJAtaH, rogopahataCarIrajJAnopAyamAha- darCaneti| darCanena dRSTyA varNasaMsthAnAdikam| sparCanena santApakAThinyotsedhAdikam| praCnena CUlArocakAdi| evaM rogopahataCarIraM darCanAdibhirjJAtavyam|| 32|| 

 rogaM nidAnaprAgrUpalakSaNopaCayAptibhiH||33||

sAmAnyena CarIrasya rogasambandhe jJAte rogaviCeSasyAdhigamopAyamAha- rogamiti| nidAnAdibhiH paJcabhirlakSaNaiH rogaM  parIkSeta| nidAnaM hetuH| evaMvidhamarthajAtamevaMvidhasya rogasya hetutvenopadiSTamevaMvidhaCcotpannaH| ato nidAnAt jJAyate rogaH| prAgrUpaM bhaviSyato vyAdheraprakACitadoSaviCeSAdhiSThAnasya lakSaNam| lakSaNamutpannasya cihnam| upaCayaH sukhAnubandhyAhArAdyupayogaH| evaMvidherAhArAdinA hyasya pIDA nAbhUdevaMvidhenAbhUdata upaCayAt jJAyate~ayaM roga iti| AptiH samAptiH| evaMduSTena evaMsthAnasthitena evamanugatenAnayA kalpanayA evaM mArgeNa doSeNeti parikalpanam| ata AptyA jJAyate~ayam roga iti|| 33||

 bhUmidehaprabhedena deCamAhuriha dvidhA||34||

upaCayAdiprasaGgena ca deCakAlAvapyupayujyete atastAvapi sUtrayati| ihAyurvedaCAstre AcAryA dviprakAraM deCamAhuH| bhUmibhedena dehabhedena ca| dehadeCaH CiraHpANyAdiH prasiddhaH|| 34|| 

 jAGgalaM vAtabhUyiSThamAnUpaM tu kapholbaNam||35||  sAdhAraNaM samamalaM tridhA bhUdeCamAdiCet||35||

bhUmideCa ucyate- jAGgalamityAdi| jAGgalo nAmAlpodaka taruparvatatvena vakSyamANalakSaNo vAtabhUyiSThaH  saJjAtauSadhikhagamRgapuruSAdiryo vAtapradhAnaH| AnUpastasmAdviparItalakSaNaH| sa kaphaprAyauSadhisalilaH ClIpadAdirogadaH| sAdhAraNaH ubhayalakSaNamadhyapatitaH, samamalaH samavAtAdidoSaH| evaM trividho bhUmideCaH|| 35||

 kSaNAdirvyAdhyavasthA ca kAlo bhaiSajyayogakRt||36||

kAlo dvividhaH kSaNAdirvyAdhyavasthA ca vyavahArArthaM tantre prayujyate| tatra kSaNAdiH prasiddhaH| vyAdhyavasthA ca purANanavatvAdikaM viCiSTalakSaNasaMyuktatvaM vyAdheH|  dvividho~api kAlo rogiNo bheSajasya sambandhaM karoti|  tathA ca vakSyati `pUrvAhNe vamanaM deyaM madhyAhne tu nirUhaNam' iti| tathA ca bastividhau `nivRttikAlaH paramastrayo yAmAH' ityAdi| tathA jvare `kaSAyapAnapathyAnnai'riti| `iti doSe vijite' ityAdi kuSThe|| 36||

 CodhanaM CamanaM ceti samasAdauSadhaM dvidhA||37||

kAlo bheSajayogakRdityuktam| bheSajamauSadham, ataH tadvijJAnArthamAha-Codhanamiti| yad dravyamadravyaM vA~abhayAtapAdikupitadoSavinACanArthamupayujyate tadauSadhamityucyate| saMkSepeNa  dvividhamauSadhaM CodhanaM CamanaJca| vistaratastu nirUhapAcanakvAthacUrNAdikaM bahuvidham| CodhanaM yat kupitAn doSAn niHsArya bahiH rogopaCamanaM karoti| CamanaM punaryat svasthAnasthitAnAmeva sAmyahetuH|| 37||

 SarIrajAnAM doSANAM krameNa paramauSadham||38||  bastirvireko vamanaM tathA tailaM ghRtaM madhu||38||  dhIdhairyAtmAdivijJAnaM manodoSauSadhaM param||38||

auSadhamuktaM, tasya viCeSataH prAdhAnyamucyate-CarIrajAnAmityAdi| CarIrajAnAM vAtAdInAM krameNa yathAsaGkhyena paramauSadhaM pradhAnauSadham| kimityAha-bastirityAdi| bastirgudapraNidheyaH snehakvAthAdirvAtasya paramauSadham| vireko mukhapItaM gudamArgeNA~antaHsthitasya doSasya nissAraNaM pittasya paramauSadham| vamanaM mukhena pItam, tenaiva doSasya nissAraNaM SleSmaNaH paramauSadhamiti CodhanarUpeNa doSANAmauSadham| tathaiva vAtAdiSu CamanasvarUpeNaitadAha-tatheti| tailaM vAtasya ghRtaM pittasya madhu CleSmaNaH| manodoSayo rajastamaso rogavighnakAridhIdhairyAdikaM paramauSadham| kAlaviCeSamACritya sarvatra sarvameva|| 38||

 tantrasyAsya paraM cAto vakSyate~adhyAyasaMgrahaH||39||

asya cASTAGgasaMgrahAbhidhAnasya tantrasya sukhasmaraNArthamadhyAyAnAM saMgraho vakSyate|| 39||

sUtrasthAnam

CiSyopanayanIyaH

 athA~ataH CiSyopanayanIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

tantrArthaM sarvaM pUrvasminnadhyAye sUtrayitvA evaMvidhaH CiSyaH tantraM CikSayitavya iti pradarCanArthamadhyAya Arabhyate- athAta iti| atheti sarvAdhyAyeSu maGgalArthaH| tathA ata ityAnantarye| `adhikRtya kRte grantha' iti  chapratyayaH|| 1||

 gurubhakto~abhiyukto~atiyukto dhIsmRtipATavaiH||2||  RjvAsyanAsAnayanastanusnigdhanakhacchaviH||2||  brahmacArI jitadvandvo dhIraH sucaritaH sthiraH||2||  SaNmAsAnuSitaH Caklo lajjACaucakulAnvitaH||2||  CiSyo~adhyApyo gato yAvadantaM tantrArthakarmaNAm||2||

gurubhaktatvAdiyuktaH CiSyo~adhyApyaH CikSayitavyaH|  AtantrArthakarmaNAmantagamanAt| tantrAntaH tantrapAThaniSpattiH| arthAntaH tantrAvabodhaH| karmAnto jJAtasya CAstrasya lakSye niyogaH| gurorupAdhyAyasya bhaktaH sevAtatparaH| abhiyuktaH CAstravijJAne yatnaparaH| tathA dhIsmRtipATavairatiyuktaH atiCayena yuktaH dhIrgrahaNaCaktiH smRtiH smaraNaM pATavamindriyasauSThavam| spaSTamukhaH spaSTanACaH spaSTanetraH| tanunakhaH snigdhanakhaH| tanutvak snigdhatvak| brahmacArI nirvyavAyaH| jitadvandvo nirdoSaH| dhIro vigatabhIH| sAdhuCIlaH saccaritaH| sthiraH acapalasvabhAvaH| SaNmAsAnupAdhyAyanikaTe uSitaH etAvatA hi sAdhvasAdhusvabhAvatAM CiSyasyopAdhyAyo~adhigacchati| CaklaH priyaMvadaH| lajjayAnvitaH Caucena ca CArIramAnasayA CuddhyA samanvitaH sukulInaH|| 2||

 nA~akAlavidyutstanite bhUkampe rAhudarCane||3||  paJcadaCyAmacandrAyAM parokSe vA guroH paThet||3||

sa ca CiSyaH akAlavidyudAdiSu na paThet| akAlavidyudyA varSAkAlAdanyasmin kAle dRSTA, tadvadakAlastanitam| stanitaM meghaCabdaH|  bhUkamparAhudarCane prasiddhe| acandrA paJcadaCI  amAvAsyA yA kuhUrityucyate| gurAvanavasthite na paThet| etAvatA hi duHCikSito bhavati|| 3||

 nAvicchhinnapadaM nAtimandaM nAtyuccanIcakaiH||4||

tathA avicchinnapadaM na paThet saMhitayA na paThet| tathA hi visandhyabhyAso bhavati| atimandamatistabdhaJca na paThet| iti
prayatnaviCeSaH| nAtyuccairnAtinIcaiCca iti svaraviCeSaH|| 4|| 

 hInAnyaveSa AcAryaM paryupAsIta rAjavat||5||  CayIta supta evAsminnuttiSThetAsya pUrvataH||5||  na brUyAtkevalaM nAma nA~asAdhvapi vinATayet||5||

anyaccedaM CiSyaH kuryAt|  rAjavannRpavaccAcAryaM paryupAsIta seveta| kimbhUtaH? hInAnyaveSaH prakaraNAdguruta eva hInaveSaH| guruveSAt svalpaveSaH, anyaveSaH visadRCaveSaH| tathA asmin gurau supta eva CayIta nAsupte svapyAt| asya ca guroH pUrvataH pUrvamuttiSThet asmin CayanAdanutthita evottiSThet| anyacca tasya guroH kevalaM pUjAvAcakopapadarahitaM nAma na kIrtayenna kevalaM nAma brUyAt| yAvadasAdhvapi na vinATayet gurukRtAM durIhAmupahAsapUrvakaM nAnukuryAdityarthaH|| 5||

 abhedyo~anuddhataH stabdhaH sUnRtaH priyadarCanaH||6||  bahuCrutaH kAlavedI jJAtagrantho~arthaCAstravit||6||  anAthAn rogiNo yaCca putravatsamupAcaret||6||  guruNA samanujJAtaH sa bhiSakchabdamaCnute||6||

sa ca CiSyaH abhedyatvAdiguNayogAdbhiSakchabdaH bhiSagiti nAma aCnute prApnoti| abhedyaH paraiH prativAditadhUrttAdibhiradhRSyaH| anuddhataH prasiddhaH| stabdhaH cirakArI| sUnRtaH  sukhopagamanIyaH| priyadarCanaH sumukhaH suveSaCca| bahuCrutaH prasiddhaH| kAlavedI rogiNo~anyasya cAvasthAsvabhAvaviCeSaM jAnAti| jJAtagranthaH abhyastaCAstraH| tathA CAstrArthajJaCcikitsitaCca| yaCca CiSyaH anAthAn svAmibAndhavAdyabhAvAnnirupAyAn vyAdhitAn| putrasnehena paripAlayet guruNA yogyatvAccikitsAkaraNe samanujJAtaH| sa bhiSakchabdamaCnute|| 6||

 yastu kevalaCAstrajJaH karmasvapariniSThitaH||7||  sa muhyatyAturaM prApya prApya bhIrurivAhavam||7||

yaH punaH kevalaCAstrajJaH karmasu cikitsiteSvapariniSThitaH avijJAtayAthAtaththaH sa AturaM prApya muhyati| yathA bhIrurAhavaM saMgrAmaM prApya muhyati| na hyAturasya  granthapadArthavAkyArthAvabodhAd rogopaCamaH|| 7||

 yaH punaH kurute karma dhArSTyAcchAstravivarjitaH||8||  sa satsu garhAmApnoti vadhaM carcchati rAjataH||8||

yaH punaH bhiSagAbhAsaH CAstrArthajJAnenaiva rahitaH dhArSTyAt cikitsAM karoti sa satsu sAdhuSu madhye garhAM prApnoti rAjataCca vadham| yataH sa rAjyakaNTakatvAdrAjJA vadhyaH AmnAtaH  CAstrAntare|| 8||

 hetau liGge praCamane rogANAmapunarbhave||9||  jJAnaM caturvidhaM yasya sa rAjArho bhiSaktamaH||9||

bhiSagdoSAnuktvA bhiSagguNAnAha-hetAvityAdi| catuHprakAraM yasya jJAnaM sa bhiSaktamo rAjArhaH| bhiSajaCcikitsAjJAna-yogAdatiCayaH| hetau nidAne, liGge lakSaNe| praCamane rogANAmapunarbhave naSTo rogo yathA na punarjAyata iti  jJAnacAturvidhyam|| 9||

 CastraM CAstrANi salilaM guNAdoSapravRttaye||10||  pAtrApekSINyataH prajJAM bAhuCrutyena bRMhayet||10||

anyat bhiSajA kiM kAryam? bAhuCrutyena  prabhUtaCAstraCravaNena prajJAM prajJAnaM bRMhayet| yato dRSTaM guNadoSakaraNaM bhAvAH pAtramapekSante| tathA ca CastraM Cauryayukte pAtre sthitaM kAryakaraM bhavati, bhIrau ca doSakaram| evaM CAstrasalile~api parikalpanIye| bAhuCrutyopabRMhitaprajJe sthitaM CAstraM CobhanatAM yAtItyarthaH|| 10||

sUtrasthAnam

CiSyopanayanIyaH

 athA~ataH CiSyopanayanIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

tantrArthaM sarvaM pUrvasminnadhyAye sUtrayitvA evaMvidhaH CiSyaH tantraM CikSayitavya iti pradarCanArthamadhyAya Arabhyate- athAta iti| atheti sarvAdhyAyeSu maGgalArthaH| tathA ata ityAnantarye| `adhikRtya kRte grantha' iti  chapratyayaH|| 1||

 gurubhakto~abhiyukto~atiyukto dhIsmRtipATavaiH||2||  RjvAsyanAsAnayanastanusnigdhanakhacchaviH||2||  brahmacArI jitadvandvo dhIraH sucaritaH sthiraH||2||  SaNmAsAnuSitaH Caklo lajjACaucakulAnvitaH||2||  CiSyo~adhyApyo gato yAvadantaM tantrArthakarmaNAm||2||

gurubhaktatvAdiyuktaH CiSyo~adhyApyaH CikSayitavyaH|  AtantrArthakarmaNAmantagamanAt| tantrAntaH tantrapAThaniSpattiH| arthAntaH tantrAvabodhaH| karmAnto jJAtasya CAstrasya lakSye niyogaH| gurorupAdhyAyasya bhaktaH sevAtatparaH| abhiyuktaH CAstravijJAne yatnaparaH| tathA dhIsmRtipATavairatiyuktaH atiCayena yuktaH dhIrgrahaNaCaktiH smRtiH smaraNaM pATavamindriyasauSThavam| spaSTamukhaH spaSTanACaH spaSTanetraH| tanunakhaH snigdhanakhaH| tanutvak snigdhatvak| brahmacArI nirvyavAyaH| jitadvandvo nirdoSaH| dhIro vigatabhIH| sAdhuCIlaH saccaritaH| sthiraH acapalasvabhAvaH| SaNmAsAnupAdhyAyanikaTe uSitaH etAvatA hi sAdhvasAdhusvabhAvatAM CiSyasyopAdhyAyo~adhigacchati| CaklaH priyaMvadaH| lajjayAnvitaH Caucena ca CArIramAnasayA CuddhyA samanvitaH sukulInaH|| 2||

 nA~akAlavidyutstanite bhUkampe rAhudarCane||3||  paJcadaCyAmacandrAyAM parokSe vA guroH paThet||3||

sa ca CiSyaH akAlavidyudAdiSu na paThet| akAlavidyudyA varSAkAlAdanyasmin kAle dRSTA, tadvadakAlastanitam| stanitaM meghaCabdaH|  bhUkamparAhudarCane prasiddhe| acandrA paJcadaCI  amAvAsyA yA kuhUrityucyate| gurAvanavasthite na paThet| etAvatA hi duHCikSito bhavati|| 3||

 nAvicchhinnapadaM nAtimandaM nAtyuccanIcakaiH||4||

tathA avicchinnapadaM na paThet saMhitayA na paThet| tathA hi visandhyabhyAso bhavati| atimandamatistabdhaJca na paThet| iti
prayatnaviCeSaH| nAtyuccairnAtinIcaiCca iti svaraviCeSaH|| 4|| 

 hInAnyaveSa AcAryaM paryupAsIta rAjavat||5||  CayIta supta evAsminnuttiSThetAsya pUrvataH||5||  na brUyAtkevalaM nAma nA~asAdhvapi vinATayet||5||

anyaccedaM CiSyaH kuryAt|  rAjavannRpavaccAcAryaM paryupAsIta seveta| kimbhUtaH? hInAnyaveSaH prakaraNAdguruta eva hInaveSaH| guruveSAt svalpaveSaH, anyaveSaH visadRCaveSaH| tathA asmin gurau supta eva CayIta nAsupte svapyAt| asya ca guroH pUrvataH pUrvamuttiSThet asmin CayanAdanutthita evottiSThet| anyacca tasya guroH kevalaM pUjAvAcakopapadarahitaM nAma na kIrtayenna kevalaM nAma brUyAt| yAvadasAdhvapi na vinATayet gurukRtAM durIhAmupahAsapUrvakaM nAnukuryAdityarthaH|| 5||

 abhedyo~anuddhataH stabdhaH sUnRtaH priyadarCanaH||6||  bahuCrutaH kAlavedI jJAtagrantho~arthaCAstravit||6||  anAthAn rogiNo yaCca putravatsamupAcaret||6||  guruNA samanujJAtaH sa bhiSakchabdamaCnute||6||

sa ca CiSyaH abhedyatvAdiguNayogAdbhiSakchabdaH bhiSagiti nAma aCnute prApnoti| abhedyaH paraiH prativAditadhUrttAdibhiradhRSyaH| anuddhataH prasiddhaH| stabdhaH cirakArI| sUnRtaH  sukhopagamanIyaH| priyadarCanaH sumukhaH suveSaCca| bahuCrutaH prasiddhaH| kAlavedI rogiNo~anyasya cAvasthAsvabhAvaviCeSaM jAnAti| jJAtagranthaH abhyastaCAstraH| tathA CAstrArthajJaCcikitsitaCca| yaCca CiSyaH anAthAn svAmibAndhavAdyabhAvAnnirupAyAn vyAdhitAn| putrasnehena paripAlayet guruNA yogyatvAccikitsAkaraNe samanujJAtaH| sa bhiSakchabdamaCnute|| 6||

 yastu kevalaCAstrajJaH karmasvapariniSThitaH||7||  sa muhyatyAturaM prApya prApya bhIrurivAhavam||7||

yaH punaH kevalaCAstrajJaH karmasu cikitsiteSvapariniSThitaH avijJAtayAthAtaththaH sa AturaM prApya muhyati| yathA bhIrurAhavaM saMgrAmaM prApya muhyati| na hyAturasya  granthapadArthavAkyArthAvabodhAd rogopaCamaH|| 7||

 yaH punaH kurute karma dhArSTyAcchAstravivarjitaH||8||  sa satsu garhAmApnoti vadhaM carcchati rAjataH||8||

yaH punaH bhiSagAbhAsaH CAstrArthajJAnenaiva rahitaH dhArSTyAt cikitsAM karoti sa satsu sAdhuSu madhye garhAM prApnoti rAjataCca vadham| yataH sa rAjyakaNTakatvAdrAjJA vadhyaH AmnAtaH  CAstrAntare|| 8||

 hetau liGge praCamane rogANAmapunarbhave||9||  jJAnaM caturvidhaM yasya sa rAjArho bhiSaktamaH||9||

bhiSagdoSAnuktvA bhiSagguNAnAha-hetAvityAdi| catuHprakAraM yasya jJAnaM sa bhiSaktamo rAjArhaH| bhiSajaCcikitsAjJAna-yogAdatiCayaH| hetau nidAne, liGge lakSaNe| praCamane rogANAmapunarbhave naSTo rogo yathA na punarjAyata iti  jJAnacAturvidhyam|| 9||

 CastraM CAstrANi salilaM guNAdoSapravRttaye||10||  pAtrApekSINyataH prajJAM bAhuCrutyena bRMhayet||10||

anyat bhiSajA kiM kAryam? bAhuCrutyena  prabhUtaCAstraCravaNena prajJAM prajJAnaM bRMhayet| yato dRSTaM guNadoSakaraNaM bhAvAH pAtramapekSante| tathA ca CastraM Cauryayukte pAtre sthitaM kAryakaraM bhavati, bhIrau ca doSakaram| evaM CAstrasalile~api parikalpanIye| bAhuCrutyopabRMhitaprajJe sthitaM CAstraM CobhanatAM yAtItyarthaH|| 10||

CiSyopanayanIyaH

 pradIpabhUtaM CAstraM hi darCanaM vipulA matiH||11||  tAbhyAmbhiSaksuyuktAbhyAJcikitsannAparAdhyati||11||

kimarthaM prajJAmupabRMhayedityata Aha-pradIpabhUtamityAdi| 
CAstrapradIpayoH sAdRCyam| vistIrNA matirdRSTyA samAnA| yathA pradIpopabRMhItA dRSTirbhAvagrahaNe samarthA bhavatyevaM CAstropabRMhitA vipulA matiCcikitsitayogyA| evaM hi cikitsAnnAparAdhavAn bhavati|| 11||

 AhUta eva yo yAti suveSaH sunimittataH||12||  gatvA~aturArthAdanyatra na nidhatte manaH kvacit||12||  vyAdhIn parIkSate samyaGnidAnAdiviCeSataH||12||  hrepaNIyAM ca tadvArttAM na prakACayate bahiH||12||  sahasA na ca tasyApi kriyAkAlamahApayan||12||  jAnAti copacarituM sa vaidyaH siddhimaCnute||12||

kimbhUtaCca vaidyaH siddhiM prApnotItyAha-AhUta iti| ya AhUta evaturagRhaM yAti| suveSaH dUtAdivijJAnIyoktakucelAdiveSarahitaH|  sunimittato yAti durnimittaM dRSTvA nayAtItyarthaH| gatvA cAturArthaM
varjayitvA~anyatra mano na nidhatte| AturArtho nidAnAdibhiH paMcabhiH viCeSairvyAdhiparIkSaNaM tadyogyA ca cikitsA| hrepaNIyAM gopyAM lajjAvahAM cAturavArtAM bahirjanasaMsadi na prakACayet| AturasyApi jhaTiti na prakACayet IdRCI tavopagatA pIDeti| evaM hyAturasya vyAdhisvarUpaM kathayato bhiSajaH kadAciccikitsAhAnirbhavati| kriyAkAlaM cikitsAkAlamatyajannupacarituM cikitsituM ca yo jAnAti cikitsAmArge spaSTavikalpayogyA buddhirityarthaH| evambhUto vaidyo rogopaCamalakSaNAM siddhiM prApnoti|

 nAvadItA~amiSaM strIbhyastadadhyakSe parAGmukhe||13||  tAbhiCca rahasi sthAnaM parihAsaM ca varjayet||13||

etat prasaGgenaiva vaidyenedamanuSTheyaM nedamanuSTheyamityAha-nAdadIteti| parastrIbhya AmiSamarthAdikaM nA~a~adadIta na gRhNIyAt|  `AmiSaM bhogyavastuni' iti koCaH| tadadhyakSe AmiSadAtRyoSidrakSAdhikRte parAGmukhe parokSe tAbhiH strIbhiCca rahasi ekAnte sthitiM parihAsaJca varjayet|| 13 ||

 ArttaM ca nRpasadvaidyairdviSTaM taddveSiNaM dviSam||14||  caNDaM CokAturaM bhIruM kRtaghnaM vaidyamAninam||14||  hInopakaraNaM vyagramavidheyaM gatAyuSam||14||

ArttaM rogiNaJcaivambhUtaM bhiSagvarjayet| kimbhUtam? nRpeNa rAjJA dviSTaM sadvaidyaiCca| athavA nRpeNa sadbhiCca vaidyaiCca| taddveSiNaM tAn nRpasadvaidyAn yo dveSTi tam| dviSaM CatruM ca na cikitset| caNDaM darpiNam| CokAturAdayaH  prasiddhAH| vaidyamAninaM avaidyo~api yo vaidyamAtmAnaM manyate svamatenauSadhaM karotItyarthaH| hInopakaraNaM hInacikitsAGgam| vyagraM kAryabahulam| avidheyaM bhiSajaH| gatAyuSaM riSTajJAnena|| 14||

 jijIviSurvyAdhito~api pUrvoktaguNavarjitAn||15||  kriyAvikriyiNo vaidyAn mRtyoragresarA hi te||15||

na kevalaM bhiSagevambhUtamAturaM varjayet yAvadAturo~api jIvitumicCuH pUrvoktavaidyaguNavarjitAn vaidyAMstyajet| kriyAvikrayiNaH paNyacikitsakAn| te hi mRtyoragresarAH purassarAH puruSAH, padAtayaH|| 15||

 bhiSagdravyANyupasthAtA rogI pAdacatuSTayam||16||  cikitsitasya nirdiSTaM pratyekaM taccaturguNam||16||

cikitsAyAH prakRtatvAt idamucyate-bhiSagityAdi| cikitsitasya rogopaCamalakSaNasya pAdacatuSTayamaGgacatuSTayamuktam| pratyekaM taccaturguNam| upasthAtA paricArakaH|| 16|| 

 dakSastIrthAttaCAstrArtho dRSTakarmA CucirbhiSak||17||

bhiSak vaidyaCcaturguNaH| dakSaCcaturaH| tIrthAttaCAstrArthaH upAdhyAyAt prAptaCAstrasvarUpaH| dRSTakarmA bahuCaCcikitsitarogaH| CuciH CarIreNa manasA vA|| 17|| 

 bahukalpaM bahuguNaM sampannaM yogyamauSadham||18||

auSadhamapi caturvidham| bahukalpaM bahavaH kalpAH svarasakvAthacUrNAdikAH kalpanA yasya na tu lavaNavadekakalpam| bahavo guNAH sattvAdayo yasya tadbahuguNam| sampannaM pAkasaMskArAdiyuktam| yogyaM rogasya rogiNaCca deCakAlAdyavasthApekSayA|| 18|| 

 anuraktaH CucirdakSo buddhimAn paricArakaH||19||

 yadvaidye viguNe pAdA guNavanto~apyanarthakAH||21||  sa pAdahInAnapyArttAn guNavAn yacca yApayet||21||  cikitsAyAstamevAtaH pradhAnaM kAraNaM viduH||21||

cikitsAyACca yadyapi kAraNaM catuSTayamuktaM tathApi vaidya 
eva pradhAnaM kAraNam| kutaH? Aha- yadvaidya iti|  yadyasmAdvaidye viguNe yathoktaguNarahite, CeSAstrayaH pAdAH guNavanto yathoktaguNA apyanarthakAH| ayamaparo hetuH- yacca yasmAt ca vaidyo guNavAn pAdahInAnapyArtAn yApayet maraNAdrakSati| ato~api tameva pradhAnam kAraNaM vidurvidvAMsaH||21||

 sAdhyo~asAdhya iti vyAdhirdvidhA tau tu punastridhA||22||  susAdhyaH kRcchrasAdhyaCca vyApyo yaCcAnupakramaH||22||

cikitsA prakRtA| sA ca vyAdhernACanam| ata ucyate, dvividho vyAdhiH sAdhyo~asAdhyaCca| sAdhyo dvividhaH sukhasAdhyaH kRcchhrasAdhyaCca| asAdhyo~api dvividhaH yApyaH anupakramaCceti|| 22|| 

 sarvauSadhakSame dehe yUnaH puMso jitAtmanaH||23||  amarmago~alpahetvagrarUparUpo~anupadravaH||23||  atulyadUSyadeCartuprakRtiH pAdasmpadi||23||  graheSvanuguNeSvekadoSamArgo navaH sukhaH||23||  sukhasAdhyaH sukhopAyaH kAlenAlpena sAdhyate||23||

sukhasAdhyAdikasya vyAdhicatuSTayasya lakSaNamucyate| sarvauSadhakSame dehe utpanno vyAdhiH sukhaH sukhasAdhyaH| yUnaH  taruNasya| puMsaH puruSasya| jitAtmano jitendriyasya geyaCabdAdInAmalolupasya deha utpannaH| anyacca kimbhUtaH? amarmagaH hRt kaNThAdipIDAkaraNe asamarthaH| svalpanidAnaH svalpapUrvarUpaH svalpalakSaNaCca susAdhyaH| tathopadravarahitaH utpanne vyAdhAvutpannaM           duHkhAnubandhivyAdhyantaramupadravaCabdenocyate| tathA atulyadUSyaH yasmin vyAdhau visadRCena doSeNa dUSito dUSyaH| yathA CleSmaNA CItena raktamuSNaM dUSitam| tathA atulyadeCo vyAdhiH, yathA AnUpadeCe pittasambhUtaH| atulyarturyathA Caradi kaphodbhavaH| atulyaprakRtiryathA pittaprakRteH CleSmasambhavaH| pAdasampadyaGgacatuSTayaparipUrNatve sati vyAdhiH sukhasAdhyaH| tathA graheSu anuguNeSu anukUlarACisthiteSu| tathaikena vAtAdInAmanyatamena doSeNa yo jAtaH tathA ekamArgaH antarmArga eva vA bahirmArga eva vA| etacca parastAdvakSyAmaH| tathA navaH| iti sukhasAdhyasya lakSaNamuktam| tasyaiva sukhasAdhyasya anvarthatA~apyucyate| sukhasAdhyo yaH sukhopAyaH svalpopAya ityalpena ca kAlena siddhyati|| 23||

 kRcchrairupAyaiH kRcchrastu mahadbhiCca cireNa vA||24||  asAdhyaliGgasaGkIrNastathA CastrAdisAdhanaH||24||

kRcchrasAdhyastu kRcchraiH suduSkarairupAyairmahadbhiH prabhUtaiCcireNa ca siddhyati| asAdhyaliGgAni yathAsvaM vakSyamANAni| taiH saGkIrNo miCritaH| tathA  CastrAdikaM sAdhanamupAyo yasya| AdigrahaNenAgnikSArAdInAM grahaNamiti kRcchrasAdhyalakSaNAni|| 24||

 CeSatvAdAyuSaH pathyairyApyaH prAyo viparyaye||25||  dattvA~alpaM sukhamalpena hetunA sa pratanyate||25||  yAti nACeSatAM rogaH karmajo niyatAyuSaH||25||  prapatanniva viSkambhairdhAryate~atrAturo  hitaiH||25||

yApya ucyate- CeSatvAdityAdi| bAhulyena viparyaye sAdhyalakSaNaviparItatve satyAyuSo jIvitasya CeSatvAdakSINatvAnmArayitumasamarthaH| pathyairAhAravihArairyApyaH| sa ca vyAdhiH  cikitsitenAlpaM sukhaM dattvA punaH so~alpenaiva hetunA pratanyate vistIryate| yataCca duSkRtakarmajo rogo niyatAyuSa utpanno na ca naCyati nApi mArayati| atra ca yApye vyAdhau Aturo hitairAhAravihArAdikairdhAryate, yathA- prapatan pipatiSuH kuDyAdirviSkambhaiH stambhairdhAryate| iti yApyalakSaNAni|| 25||

 paro~asAdhyaH kriyAH sarvAH pratyAkhyeyo~ativarttate||26||  tasmAdupekSya evAsau sthito~atyantaviparyaye||26||  bhramamohAratikaro dRSTiriSTo~akSanACanaH||26||

anupakramaNalakSaNAnyucyante| paraCcaiSAM CeSa asAdhyaH pratyAkhyeyaH san sarvAH kriyAH cikitsAH ativarttate kuNThayati|  tasmAtsukhasAdhyalakSaNebhyo~atyantaviparItatve sthita upekSaNIya eva| tathA bhramAdikaraH bhrama iva bhramaH cittasya bahusvarUpamavasthAnam| moho vai caitanyam| aratiH kutracidanavasthitiH| tathA~akSanACano darCanAdIndriyanACana| ityanukramalakSaNAni|

 vyAdhIn purA parIkSaivamArabheta tataH kriyAm||27||  svArthavidyAyaCohAnimanyathA dhruvamApnuyAt||27||

ityevamanantaroktaprakAreNa vyAdhIn purA~a~aturasaMyoga eva samIkSya tataH kriyAM cikitsAmArabheta| anyathaitadakurvan dhruvamavaCyaM svArthAdihAnimavApnuyAdaCnuvIta|| 27|| 

 sAdhyayorapi saMyogo balinoryAtyasAdhyatAm||28||  vidyAdasAdhyamevAtaH sAdhyAsAdhyasamAgamam||28||  nAsAdhyassAdhyatAM yAti sAdhyo yAti tvasAdhyatAm||28||

vedyasya parIkSaNIyaprasaGgaH idamapyAha- sAdhyayorityAdi| balinorbalayuktayoH sAdhyalakSaNayuktayoH saMyogo~apyasAdhyatAM yAti| ata eva saMyogAddhetoH  sAdhyAsAdhyasamAgamamapyasAdhyaM vidyAt| tathA yo~asAdhyo vyAdhiH sa na kadAcidapi sAdhyatAmeti| sAdhyaH punarasAdhyatAmeti|| 28||

 pAdApacArAddaivAcca yAntavasthAntaraM gadAH||29||

kathamityAha- pAdApacArAdityAdi| pAdApacAro yathoktAnAmaGgAnAmaparipUrNatvam| athavA sarva eva vyAdhayaH pAdanirapekSA eva daivAddhetoravasthAntaraM svarUpAdvilakSaNatAM yAnti| daivamanyajanmakRtaM karma|| 29|| 

 varamACIviSaviSaM dIptamagnimayo~api vA||30||  upayuJjIta na tvarttAdAmiSaM kRpaNAjjanAt||30||

dinacaryA

 athAto dinacaryAnAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

asmiMntre AyuSaH pAlanaM prakRtaM tacca dvividhaM svasthavRttamAturavRttaJca| maGgalyatvAt svalpavaktavyatvAt AturopayogitvAcca  svasthavRttamevAdAvucyate- athAto dinacaryAmityAdi| pratidinaM karttavyA caryA dinacaryA|| 1||

utthitaCca kiM kuryAdityAha- jAtavega ityAdi| mUtrapurISamudaGamukha uttarAM diCaM prekSamANa utsRjettyajet| kimbhUtaH? prAptavegaH nodIritavega iti| etAvatA hi vAtAdinAM kopo bhavati| niCi rAtrau dakSaNadigabhimukhaH mUtraCakRdutsRjet| kiM kRtvA  mUtrapurISamutsRjet? vAcaM niyamya kRtamaunaH| prayataH ananyakAryaH| saMvItAGgaH gRhItaparidhAnaH| avaguNThitaH anagnaCirAH| sthAnAt pracalitaM mUtraCakRtstokaM stokaM pravartayet prerayet| na tvatiyatnenAcalitamevodIrayet| nAmedhye atyantACucau sthAne| mArgaH rathyA| tatrApi                         notsRjet| na mRdi rACIbhUtAyAmapi| na bhasmani| na gosthAne, na AkIrNe janasaMsadi, na gomayasyopari, na puranikaTe, nAgninikaTe, na valmIkopari| mRdA pipIlikAdikRtaM sthANvAkAraM valmIkaCabdenocyate| nAtiramaNIye bhUmibhAge, na halalikhite, na kRtAdhvarAgnicaye, na vRkSasyAdha upari vA|  na ca nAryAbhimukhaM, pUjyo gurvAdiH| gavAdayaH prasiddhAH| na ca mahIM bhUmimatiraskRtya tRNAdibhiranavacchAdya| utsRjediti sarvatrAnuvartate| yadA tu svAmicorAdibhayaM, yadA vA CarIrACaktatA tadA kAmato yatheccham| tathA vegitaH prAptamUtrAdivego nAnyakAryo bhavet| anyakAryapratiSedhaprasaGgena Aha- sAdhyamapi rogamajitvA nAnyakAryo bhavediti| utsRSTavegaCca CaucaM yojayetkuryAt| kimbhUtaH kuryAdata Aha- niHCalyayA kASThAdiCalyarahitayA| aduSTayA yogyayA mRtpiNDayA parimRSTamalAyanaH sammArjitagudaH| kena CaucaM yojayedata Aha- abhyuddhRtAbhiradbhiH nadItaTAkAditaH kalaCapANyAdinA uddhRtAbhiH| na tu kaTImeva nadyAmavagAhya Caucayet| nACucinA kareNa mRtsahitAbhiradbhiH| kimbhUtaM CaucamityAha-lepagandhApahamiti| lepagandhApahaM malAyane lepagandhau, lepaCca gandhaCca yena naCyati| etena mRdaH apAM Caucasya ca mAnamuktaM bhavati| anutpatitabindubhiradbhiH yata utpatitA bindavo~aspRCyAH|| 3||

 spRSTvA dhAtUn malAnaCruvasAkeCanakhAMCcyutAn||4||  snAtvA bhoktumanA bhuktvA suptvA kSutvA surArccane||4||  rathyAmAkramya cA~acAmedupaviSTa udaGmukhaH||4||  prAGmukho vA viviktastho na bahirjAnu nAnyadRk||4||  ajalpannuttarAsaGgI svacchairaGguSThamUlagaiH||4||  noddhRtairnAnato nordhvaM nAgnipakvairna pUtibhiH||4||  na phenabudbudakSArairnaikahastArpitairjalaiH||4||  nArdraikapANirnnAmedhyahastapAdo na Cbdavat||4||

anyaccedaM kuryAt, AcAmet jalenopaspRCet| kiM kRtvA~a~aha- dhAtvAdikAn spRSTvA| kimbhUtAn CarIrAccalitAn| dhAtavaH raktAdayaH| malAH  mUtraCakRtkarNamalAdayaH| aCru dRCorjalam| apsadRCo medaso bhAgo vasA| tathA ca `CuddhamAMsasya yaH snehaH sA vasA parikIrtitA' iti carakaH| snAtvA ca AcAmet| bhoktumanAH bubhukSuH| bhuktvA ca, suptvA ca, kSuttvA ca kSavathuM kRtvA, surArcane devArcanArambhe, rathyAmAkramya mArgaM paribhramya, cakArAtprakRtaM CaucaM kRtvA| kimbhUtaH? pUrvAmuttarAM vA diCamIkSamANaH upaviSTaH| na bahirjAnu jAnubhyAM bahiH pANI akRtvA| nAnyadRk AcamanajalAdanyatra na dRSTiM kurvan| ajalpan kRtamaunaH| uttarAsaGgI gRhItoparivasanaH| kairAcamet? jalaiH| kimbhUtaiH? svacchaiH nirmalaiH, aGguSThamUlagaiH brAhmatIrthopaveCibhiH| noddhRtairAcAmet| kiM tarhi? avicchinnadhArayA dattaiH| nAnataH na namitAGgaH, nordhvaM utthito na| nAgnipakvaiH, na durgandhibhiH, na phenilaiH, nabudbudbhiH, na kSAraiH virasaiH, nApyekahastadattaiH| ArdraikapANirnAcAmet| yAvad dvAvapi pANI na prakSAlitau| nACucihastapAdaH| jalapAne CabdaM na kurvan|| 4|

 vaTAsanArkakhadirakaraJjakaravIrajam||5||  sarjArimedApAmArgamAlatIkakubhodbhavam||5||  kaSAyatiktakatukaM mUlamanyadapIdRCam||5||  vijJAtavRkSaM kSuNNAgramRjvagranthi subhUmijam||5||  kanInyagrasamasthaulyaMM sukUrccaM  dvAdaCAGgulam||5||  prAtarbhuktvA ca yatavAgbhakSayeddantadhAvanam||5||  vyApya trivargatritayakSaudrAktena ca gharSayet||5||  Canaistena tato dantAn dantamAMsAnyabAdhayan||5||

anyacca kiM kuryAt? kRtaCauco dantadhAvanakASThaM bhakSayet| kiM tat? vaTAdivRkSANAmanyatamasya mUlaM yat  kaSAyAdirasasaMyuktaM na tvanyarasaM vaTAdijaM mUlaM vaTAdimUlAdanyadapIdRCaM kaSAyAdirasasaMyuktaM 
mUlaM vA kASThaM vA sarvaM bhakSayet| vijJAtavRkSaM vRkSA hi mohanAdinAnACaktayo dRCyante| kSuNNAgramApothitAgram, RjuspaSTam,tathA granthirahitam, subhUmijaM CmaCAnAdyajAtam, sthUlatayA ca kanInikAprAntasamam, kanInikA kaniSThAGguliH, sukUrccaM  
aparuSakUrccam, parimANena dvAdaCAGgulam| dvau kAlau dantamAMsaM rakSan dantapavanaM bhakSayet| dinArambhe bhojanAnte ca| yatavAGmaunI| tato dantapavanaM malApanutyarthaM bhakSayitvA anantaraM CanaiH vyApyAdikSaudrAnvitaprAntena dantakASThena dantAn gharSayet| vyApyaM kuSTham| trivargatritayaM trikaTu triphalA trijAtakaM ca|| 5||

 likhedanusukhaM jihvAM jihvAnirlekhanena ca||6||  tathAsyamalavairasyagandhA jihvAsyadantajAH||6||  rucivaiCadyalaghutA na bhavanti bhavanti ca||6||

anu paCcAt tenaiva lekhanayogyakRtena dantapavanena jihvAM sukhaM likhet, jihvAnirlekhanena lohAdikRtena vA jihvAM sukhaM likhet| svalpamapi  mAMsamabAdhamAnastAM likhet| evaM hi dantapavanajihvAnirlekhanAbhyAmasya puMso malAdayo jihvAdijA na bhavanti| yathAsaGkhyaM vivikSitA rucyAdayo laghutAntACca bhavanti|| 6||

 nAdyAdajIrNavamathuCvAsakAsajvarArditI||7||  tRSNAsyapAkahRnnetraCiraHkarNAmayI ca tat||7||

tacca dantapavanamajIrNAdiyutaH puruSo nAdyAt| vamathuH chardiH, CvAsAdayo vakSyamANalakSaNAH| AmayaCabdena rogaparyAyeNa hRdAdInAM sambandhaH|| 7|| 

 naiva CleSmAtakAriSTabibhItadhavadhanvajAn||8||  bilvavaJjulanirguNDICigrutilvakatindukAn||8||  kovidAraCamIpIlupippaleGgudagulgulUn||8||  pAribhadrakamamlIkAmocakyau CAlmalIM CaNam||8||  svAdvamlalavaNaM CuSkaM suSiraM pUti picchilam||8||

CleSmAtakAdikaM dantapavanamavaCyameva nAdyAt| tathA prathamarasatrayayuktaM, durgandhipicchilaJca, CuSkaM nIrasaM, suSiramantaH CUnyam| CleSmAtakAdInAM CaNAntAnAM paryAyANi nocyante,  viCiSTadeCaprasiddhatvAt| yA cAtrAkAGkSA sA nighaNTujJAnAdeva naCyati|| 8||

dinacaryA

 athAto dinacaryAnAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

asmiMntre AyuSaH pAlanaM prakRtaM tacca dvividhaM svasthavRttamAturavRttaJca| maGgalyatvAt svalpavaktavyatvAt AturopayogitvAcca  svasthavRttamevAdAvucyate- athAto dinacaryAmityAdi| pratidinaM karttavyA caryA dinacaryA|| 1||

 brAhme muhUrta uttiSThejjIrNAjIrNaM nirUpayan||2||  rakSArthamAyuSaH svasthaH....................||2||

kiM tadityAha- brAhma iti| svastho nIrogaH| AyuSo yathopacitasya rakSArtham| brAhme muhUrte uttiSThet| muhUrto nADikAdvayam|  brahmaNo~ayaM brAhmaH| brahma jJAnantadarthamadhyayanAdyapi brahma tasya yogyo muhUrto brAhmaH brahmayogyaCca kAlo yogaCAstreSu niCAyAH paCcimo yAmo niCcitaH| tena niCAkSaye nidrAnACaprayuktatvAdutthAnasyAprAptasandhyAsaMsargo muhUrto~abhipretaH| sandhyAyAM svapnapratiSedhAt| yadyapi ca jyotiCCAstreSu sUryodayAtprabhRti SaDviMCo muhUrtto nADikASTakavyavahitadvitIyasUryodayo brAhma ityucyate tathApi nAsAvihAbhipretaH| annasya jaraNakAle jAgaraNaprasaGgAt| tasmAt sandhyAyAH pUrvo muhUrtto brahmopAsanayogyatvAt brAhmaH| abhyAsAdyapekSaM tatpUrvo~api vA| tasmin CayyAta uttiSThet| kecittu jyotiH CAstravidaH viriJcaprabhavaM muhUrttaM niCAntabhavamAhuH| kiM kurvannuttiSThet jIrNAjIrNaM nirUpayan hyastanamAhAraM mayA bhuktaM jIrNaM na veti vikalpayan| etAvatA hi kadAcit svapyAdajIrNIti nottiSThet| athavA SaDviMCa eva brAhmo muhUrttaH atra gRhyate| jIrNAjIrNaM nirUpayannityetacca doSaparihArAya bhaviSyati|| 2||

 ......................prAtaH siJcecca locane||11||  toyapUrNamukho grISmaCaradoH CItavAriNA||11||

pratidinaM prAtardinArambhe akSiNI siJcettoyapUrNamukhaH san| kena siJcet? CItavAriNA| kiM nityameva CItavAriNA? grISmaCaradoreva| anyasmin Rtau koSNavAriNA  ityarthAllabhyate|

 praNamya devAn vRddhAMCca maGgalASTaCataM Cubham||12||  CrRNvan kAJcanavinyastaM sarpiH paCyedanantaram||12||

idaJcAnantaraM kuryAt devAn vRddhAMCca praNamya maGgalASTaCataM CubhaM CrRNvan sauvarNabhANDasthaM ghRtamavAGmukhaH paCyet, maGgalASTaCataM dUtAdivijJAnIye (CA0a0-12) vakSyate|| 12|| 

 sauvIramaJjanaM nityaM hitamakSNostato bhajet||13||  locane tena bhavato manojJe sUkSmadarCane||13||  vyaktatrivarNe vimale susnigdhaghanapakSmaNI||13||

tataH sauvIramaJjanamakSibhyAM hitaM nityaM bhajet| tena cAJjanena locane netre, manojJe darCanIye bhavataH| sUkSmaJca rUpaM paCyataH| vyaktatrivarNatvAcca nirmale, raktaCuklakRSNaM varNatrayam| susnigdhAni sughanAni ca pakSmANi yayoste tathAvidhe|| 13|| 

 cakSustejomayaM tasya viCeSAcchleSmato bhayam||14||  yojayetsaptarAtre~asmAt srAvaNArthaM rasAJjanam||14||

tathA saptarAtrAntareNa cakSuSaH CleSmasrAvaNArthaM rasAJjanaM yojayet| kutaH? yataCcakSustejomayaM, cakSuSastejomayavyapadeCo bhUyasA| yataH paJcabhUtAtmakamindriyaM tasya ca vAtAdito  viCeSAcchleSmaNo viparItatvAdbhayamiti|| 14||

 aNutailaM tato nasyantato gaNDUSadhAraNam||15||  ghanonnataprasannatvak skandhagrIvAsyavakSasaH||15||  susnigdhavadanAH snigdhaniHsvanA vimalendriyAH||15||  nirvalIpalitavyaGgA bhaveyurnasyaCIlinaH||15||  oSThasphuTanapAruSyamukhaCoSadvijAmayAH||15||  na syuH svaropaghAtACca snehagaNDUSadhAraNAt||15||  khadirakSIrivRkSArimedAmbukavalagrahaH||15||  arocakAsyavairasyamalapUtiprasekajit||15||  sukhoSNodakagaNDUSairjAyate  vaktralAghavam||15||

anantaraM vakSyamANamaNutailaM nasyaM yojyam| anantaraM gaNDUSadhAraNam| nasyaCIlina eva bhavanti ghanonnataprasannAH tvagAdayaH yeSAM te  tathAvidhAH| ghanatvAdibhistvagAdInAM yathAsambhavaM sambandhaH| prasannatvacaH unnataskandhAH, ghanagrIvAH, prasannamukhAH, ghanavakSasaH, sugandhAsyAH, madhurasvarAH, valIpalitavyaGgarahitACca| valyastvaksaGkocaH, vyaGgAni mukhe CyAvAni maNDalAni| snehagaNDUSadhAraNAdoSThaphuTanAdayo na bhavanti| pAruSyamoSThayoreva, tathA AsyaCoSaH, dantarogaH, svarahAniCca| tathA arocakAdinACakAmena khadirAdyambukavalagrahaH kAryaH| tathA vaktralAghavakAmena uSNodakagaNDUSaH| kavalagaNDUSayorbhedo gaNDUSAdividhau vakSyate| prasekaH AsyasrAvaH|| 15||

 athAta RtucaryAM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 kAlo hi nAma bhagavAnanAdinidhano yathopacitakarmAnusArI yadanurodhAdAdityAdayaH khAdayaCca mahAbhUtaviCeSAstathA tathA vipariNamanto janmavatAM janmamaraNasyarturasavIryadoSadehabalavyApatsampadAJca kAraNatvaM pratyayatAM pratipadyante||2||

RtuH kAlavibhAgaH, ata ucyate- kAlo hIti| na vidyate Adinidhane prArambhaparisamAptI ca yasya sa tathAvidhaH| yathopacitakarmAnusArI sarvabhUtAni ca pUrvadehopacitakarmAnuguNyenAnusaratIti| upacitakarmAnuguNyena karmaphaleSu nimittakAraNatAM yAtItyarthaH| yadanurodhena yasya kAlasyAnurodhena nirvAheNAdityAdityAdayaH AkACAdayaCca paJcamahAbhUtaviCeSAH, tathA-tathA nAnAvidhaiH pramANajAtisaMsthAnavarNAdiviCeSaiH, pariNamanto janmavatAmbhUtAnAM janmano maraNasya ca pratyayatAM kAraNatAM, pratipadyante aGgIkurvanti| ekenA~adiCabdena grahanakSatrAdInAM grahaNam, dvitIyenAnalapavanAdInAM mahAbhUtAnAM tathA RtUnAM rasAdInAJca yathAsvaM vyApadaH sampadaCca| tatrAdityAdayaH pariNamanto yadanurodhAdyasya nirvAhAt, kAraNatAM pratipadyante sa kAlaH| tathAhi ta evAdityAdayaH pratApAdiparityAgasaGgrahAdinA RtuviCeSAn kurvantaH kAlAnurodhena dRCyante| kAlaviCeSeNa ca mahAbhUtAnAM kenacitpariNAmena kAlakRta eva| etena kAlasadbhAve pramANamapyuktam| yato yo~ayaM jagatkAraNAbhimateSvAdityakhAdiSu sadaiva pariniSThatAtmasvatiCayena kadAcit kasyacidbhAvasyAvirbhAvo, kadAcit kasyacittirobhAvo na ca teSAmevAdityAdInAmanyathAbhAvaH| tatrAvaCyaM nimittAntareNa bhavitavyam| evamanyathAnupapattyA yattannimittAntaramiti sa kAlaH iti|| 2|| 

 sa mAtrAkASThAkalAnADikAmuhUrtayAmAhorAtrapakSamAsartvayanavarSabhedena dvAdaCadhA vibhajyate||3||

 tayorAdAmAgneyam||5||  tasmin khalu kAlasvabhAvamArgaparigRhIto~atyarthoSNAgabhastijAlamaNDalo~arkaH tatsamparkAdvAyavaCca tIvrarUkSAH somajaM guNamupaCoSayanto jagataH snehamAdadAnA RtukrameNopajanitaraukSyA rUkSAn rasAMstiktakaSAyakaTukAnabhiprabalayanto nRNAM daurbalyamAvahanti||5||

CakRtaH purISasya rodhena piNDikodveSTAdayaH| udveSTanamivodveSTaH,piNDikayorudveSTaH piNDikodveSTaH| piNDiketi jaGghAkANDasya paCcime bhAge piNDAkRti kaThinaM mAMsam| tatra udveSTaneneva rugbhavatItyarthaH| sarve cehoktarogA vakSyamANalakSaNAH| viCA ca mArgasya nirodhAtpratihatanivRttasya vAyorUrdhvaM pravRttiH| jaThare samantAt cchedamiva parikartanam| hRdayasya ca bandhaH| pUrvoktAH vAtarodharogACca||4|| 

 aGga-bhaGgACmarI-basti-meDhra-vaMkSaNa-vedanAH||5||  mUtrasya rodhAtpUrve ca prAyo rogAstadauSadham||5||

mUtrasya rodhAdaGgabhaGgAdayaH| bhaGga iva sphoTanamiva bhaGgaH aGgabhaGgaH| bastyAdInAM vedanayA sambandhaH| pUrve ca vAtaCakRdrodhoktA rogACca| teSAM vAtAditrayarodhajAtAnAM rogANAM phalavartyAdi sAmAnyamauSadham||5|| 

 vartyabhyaGgAvagAhACca svedanaM bastikarma ca||6||  annaM pAnaM ca viDbhedi viDrodhottheSu yakSmasu||6||

vartiH tIkSNadravyakRtA gudapraNidheyA| avagAhaH vAtaharadravyasAdhite
drave droNIsthite magnadehasyAvasthAnam| bastikarma malapravRttaye nirUhayojanA vakSyamANA (sU0a028)|viDrodhottheSu viDbhedyannaM pAnaM viCeSeNa||6|| 

 mUtrajeSu tu pAne ca prAgbhaktaM Casyate ghRtam||7||  jIrNAntikaM cottamayA mAtrayA yojanAdvayam||7||  avapIDakametacca saMjJitaM..........................||7||

mUtrarodhajeSu tu viCeSeNa bhojanapUrvaM ghRtapAnaM jIrNAntikaM ca ghRtaM praCasyate| jIrNAntikaM yaddhyastane~anne jIrNe yujyate, uttamayA mAtrayA, ahorAtrajaraNalakSaNayA iti prAgbhaktasnehayojanA jIrNAntikasnehajojanA ca| ubhayamavapIDakamucyate| tena pradeCeSvavapIDakaCabdena idaM yojanAdvayaM vijJeyam||7|| 

 ..................................dhAraNAtpunaH||8||  udgArasyAruciH kampo vibandho hRdayorasoH||8||  AdhmAnakAsahidhmACca hidhmAvattatra bheSajam||8||

punaH CabdaH sAmAnyanirdiSTavAtaprakAroktaCiSTodgArAkhyavAtaparAmarCAya| udgArasya punardhAraNAdarucyAdayaH| uro vakSaH, hRdayaM tasyAdhastayorvibandhaH antastambha iva| vAyunA kupitena nAbheradhaH saCUlamApUra AdhmAnaH| eteSu rogeSu cikitsitasthAne vakSyamANA (a0-6) hidhmAcikitsA kAryA||8|| 

 CirortIndriyadaurbalyamanyAstambhArditaM kSuteH||9||  tIkSNadhUmAJjanAghrANanAmanArkavilokanaiH||9||  pravartayetkSutiM saktAM svedAbhyaGgau ca CIlayet||9||  yojyaM vAtaghnamannaM ca ghRtaM cauttarabhaktikam||9||

kSuteH kSavatho rodhAt CirortyAdirogotpattiH, indriyANAM darCanAdInAmaCaktatvaM svaviSayagrahaNe daurbalyam| atra tIkSNadhUmAdibhiH saktAmapravartamAnAM kSutiM pravartayet; tIkSNo dhUmo vakSyamANalakSaNaH (sU0a0-25) bhojanasya paCcAtkAlikameva ghRtaM  
yojyam||9|| 

 CoSAGgasAda-bAdhirya-sammoha- bhrama-hRdgadAH||10||  tRSNAyA nigrahAttatra CItaH sarvo vidhirhitaH||10||

tRSNAyA nigrahAdrodhAt CoSAdyudbhavaH| bAdhiryamaCrutiH| moha eva sammohaH| tatra tRDrodhe sarvo vidhiH snAnAnnapAnAdikaH
CItaH kAryaH||10||

sUtrasthAnam

dravadravyavijJAnIyaH

 athAto dravadravyavijJAnIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

svasthahitaprasaGgenAnnapAnamucyate| tatrAnnapAnAnAM  saMskArAdyupayogo
drave toyAdike sambhavati| atha prathamaM toyAdInyucyante-athAta ityAdi|| 1|| 

 jIvanaM tarpaNaM hrdyaM hlAdi buddhiprabodhanam||2||  tanvavyaktarasaM mRSTaM CItaM CucyamRtopamam||2||  sUryoddhRtaprabhuktattvAllaghu vAtakaphApaham||2||  CaityajIvanasaumyatvaiH pittaraktaviSArtijit||2||  gaGgAmbu nabhaso bhraSTaM spRSTaM tvarkendumArutaiH||2||  hitAhitatve tadbhUyo deCakAlAvapekSate||2||

jalasya ca prAdhAnyAdgre grahaNam| ata Aha - jIvanamityAdi| gaGgAmbu jIvanatvAdiguNayuktam| jIvanaM saumyadhAtuvRddhikaram| ojovRddhikaramityanye| tarpaNaM tRptikRt| hRdayasya priyaM hRdyam| hlAdi AhlAdakaram| buddheH prabodhanaM paTutvakaram| tanu svacchham| avyaktarasaM mAdhuryAdinA~aviviktam| mRSTaM svAdutvAdiguNayuktam| CItaM vIryeNa| agnyAtapAdyataptamanyodakebhyaH svabhAvena CItataram| Cuci pavitram| amRtopamaM prANasandhArakatvAt| sUryeNa raviNoddhRtya yato muktamataH kriyAyogAdAgatalAghavaM ca| vAtaCleSmaghnaM ca anyapAnIyApekSayA| CItatvAdinA ca pittAdivinACanam| kimbhUtaM gaGgAmbu nabhaso~antarikSrAt bhraSTaM patitam| tathA ravicandravAyubhiH patadeva spRSTam| evaM svarUpamapi gaGgAmbu pathyatve~apathyatve ca deCaM kAlaM cApekSate| evaMvidhe deCe ca yataH patitamata evaM guNaM evaM kAle~api| deCakAlau ca guNaviCeSeNa vakSyamANalakSaNau||2|| 

 yEnAbhivRSTamamalaM CAlyannaM rAjatasthitam||3||  aklinnamavivarNaM vA tatpEyaM gAGgamanyathA||3||  sAmudraM tanna pAtavyaM mAsAdACvayujAdvinA||3||

nanu gAGgAmbu na jJAyate| katamattadityata ucyate- yenAbhivRSTamiti| yenAmbunAbhivRSTaM sikta mamalaM nirmalaM CAlyannamaklinnamavivarNaM vA bhavati tadambu gAGgatvAtpeyam| veti samuccaye| etadviparyayeNa sAmudram| taccACvayujaM mAsaM varjayitvA anyasmin mAse na peyam|| 3|| 

 khAtadhautaCilApRSThavastrAdibhyaCcyutaM jalam||4||  hemamRnmayapAtrasthamavipannaM sadA pibet||4||

etaccAbhivRSTaM prathamaM khAtAdinopAyEna gRhyate| khAtAd gRhItam| dhautaCilApRSThAd gRhItam| dhautavastrAdibhyo vA cyutam| haime sauvarNe mRnmaye vA pAtre~avasthitamavikRtam| tatsadA pibet| khAto jalagrahaNArtho bhUkuNDikA|| 4|| 

 tadabhAve ca bhUmiSThamAntarikSAnukAri yat||5||

tadabhAve ca bhUmiSThaM peyam| yadguNaiH svacchatvAdibhirAntarikSamanukareti tatsadRCaM guNairityarthaH|| 5|| 

 Cvete kaSAyaM tatsvAdu kRSNe tiktaM ca pANDure||6||  nIle kaSAyamadhuraM deCe lavaNamUSare||6||  sakSAraM kapile miCraM miCre~athAmbuguNAdhike||6||  mdhuraM lavaNAmlaM tu bhavedbhUmiguNAdhike||6||  tejodhike tiktakaTu kaSAyaM pavanAdhike||6||  divyAnukAri tvavyaktarasatvAstvaguNAdhike||6||  CucipRthvasitaCvete deCe cArkAnilAhatam||6||

bhUmiSThamuktaM tasyaiva viCeSa  ucyate deCaviCeSeNa| Cvete mRdi pradeCe sthitamudakaM kaSAyarasataM yAti| evaM kRSNe madhuratAm| pANDure tiktatAm| nIle kaSAyamadhuratAm| USare c lAvaNyam| USaro yo dagdhamRdiva pradeCaH sa USaraH  syAt `USaraH kSAramRttikA'| kapile sakSAramudakaM bhavati| sakSAraM kSAratvaguNayuktaM, kSAro nAma rasaviCeSaH| kSAro~asaumyaH kaThinabhAvavaiparItyakRt| miCralakSaNe miCraguNaH| sarvaCca bhUpradeCaH paJcabhUtAtmakaH na sarvatra bhUtasAmyaM bhavati| ata ucyate ApyabhAgAdhike deCe madhuramudakaM bhavati| parthivaruNAdhike lavaNAmlam| tejobhAgAdhike tiktakaTukam| vAyubhAgAdhike kaSAyam| AkACaguNAdhike cAvyaktarasatvAdAntarikSasamaguNam| bhUtAdhikyaJca viCiSTamanenaiva madhuratvAdinA jJAyate| `guNaCabdaCca bhAgaparyAyaH'| saMkhyAyA guNasya samAne' ityAdinA (pA0sU0- 5.2.47) kACikA| vibhAgo guNa iti ca| yathA avyaktarasatvam| mUrtamahAbhUtasvalpatvAdidamapi divyasadRCaM Cucau vistINEM kRSNo CvetamRdi ca sthitamarkeNa vAyunA cAhatam|| 6|| 

 kaupasArasatATAkacauNDaprAstravaNodbhidam||7||  vApInadItoyamiti tatpunaH smRtamaSTadhA||7||  sakSAraM pittakRtkaupaM dIpanaM nAtivAtalam||7||  sArasaM svAdu laghu ca tATAkaM guru vAtalam||7||  cauNDaM tu pittalaM doSaharaM prAstravaNodakam||7||  audbhidaM svAdu pittaghnaM svAdu vApIjalaM laghu||7||  nAdeyaM vAtalaM rUkSaM kaTukaJca tadA~a~adiCet||7||  dhanvAnUpamahIdhrANAM sAmIpyAd  gurulAghavam||7||

tadbhUmiSThamadhASTabhiH prakAraiH smRtaM kaupatvAdibhiH| kUpe bhavaM kaupam| sarasi bhavaM sArasam| tathA tATAkam| cauNDaM parvatAdau pASANanimnasthitam| tATAkaJcAntarikSAtpatitvA bhUmau sthitam| prAstravaNaM parvatAtstrutam| audbhidaM bhUmAvudbhidya tatraiva tiSThati| 
vApI kUpavatsarvataH kRtasopAnapaMktiH| nadI prasiddhA| eteSAM krameNa guNanidarCanam| kaupaM kSAraguNayuktaM pittalaM  agnidIpanamalpavAtalaJca| sArasaM madhuraM laghu ca| tATAkaM guru vAtakaraJhca| cauNDaM pittalam| prAstravaNaM tridoSaharam| audbhidaM madhuraM pittaghnam| vApIjalaM madhuraM laghu ca| sAmAnyena vAtalaM rUkSaM kaTukaM ca nAdeyam| kaupAdInAM ca saptAnAM dhanvAdisAmIpyAd gurutvaM laghutvaJca vijJeyam| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-AnUpe yathoktalakSaNe sthitA kUpAdayo guravaH| dhanvani jAGgale deCe sthitA AnUpebhyo laghavo bahUdakasambandhAbhAvAt| tebhyo jAGgalebhyaH parvatasthAnAM kUpAdInAmatilaghutvamudakAnAmatyantAbhAvAdityatra cotsargApavAdopabRMhaNakalpanA ca svabuddhyA yojyA|| 7||

 paCcimodadhigAH CIghravahA yACcAmalodakAH||8||  pathyAH samAsAttA nadyo viparItAstato~anyathA||8||  upalAsphAlanAkSepavicchedaiH kheditodakAH||8||  himavanmalayodbhUtAH pathyAstA eva ca sthitAH||8||  kRmiClIpadahRtkaNThaCirorogAnprakurvate||8||  prAcyAvantyaparAntotthA durnAmAni mahendrajAH||8||  udaraClIpadAtaGkAn sahyavindhyabhavAH punaH||8||  kuSThapANDuCirorogAn doSaghnyaH pAriyAtrajAH||8||  balapauruSakAriNyaH  sAgarAmbhastridoSakRt||8||

nadya ucyante| samAsAtsaMkSepataH idamucyate- paCcimasamudragAH CIghravAhinyo nirmalapAnIyACca nadyaH pathyAH| etadviparItalakSaNA viparItA apathyAH| himavadudbhUtA malayodbhUtACca pASANakSuNNAH pathyAH| sthitAstA evApathyAH krimiClIpadAdikarACca| prAcyAdijAtA durnAmAni kurvate| prAcyA gauDAH| avantayo mAlavAH| aparAntAH koGkaNAH| mahendrajA udarAdikaM kurvate| sahyAdvindhyAcca jAtAH kuSThAdikaM kurvate| pAriyAtrajAstridoSaharA balyAH  pauruSakAriNyaH| pauruSaM vRSatvam| samudrajalaM tridoSakaram|| 8||

 kITAhimUtraviTkothatRNajAlotkarAvilam||9||  paGkapaGkajaCaivAlahaThaparNAdisaMstRtam||9||  sUryendupavanAdRSTaM juSTaM ca kSudrajantubhiH||9||  abhivRSTaM vivarNaJca kaluSaM sthUlaphenilam||9||  virasaM gandhavattaptaM dantagrahyatiCaityataH||9||  anArtavaM ca yaddivyamArtavaM prathamaJca yat||9||  lUtAditantuviNmUtraviSasaMCleSadUSitam||9||  tatkuryAtsnAnapAnAbhyAM  tRSNA~a~adhmAnodarajvarAn||9||  kAsAgnisAdAbhiSyandakaNDUgaNDAdikAnataH||9||  tadvarjayedabhAve vA toyasyAnyasya Casyate||9||  ghanavastraparistrAvaiH kSudrajantvabhirakSaNam||9||  vyApannasyAsya tapanamagnyarkAyasapiNDakaiH||9||  parNImUla-bisagranthimuktA-kataka-CaivalaiH||9||  vastragomedakAbhyAM vA kArayettatprasAdanam||9||  pATalA-karavIrAdi-kusumairgandha-nACanam||9||

kITamUtrAdiyuktaM jalaM snAnapAnAdinA tRSNAdIn kuryAt| kITAdInAM krimyAdInAm mUtreNa, viCA, kothena cAvilaM miCrIbhUtam| kotho mRtaCarIrakledaH| tRNasamUhena cAvilam| utkaro gRhAdimArjanarACiH| paGkAdibhiCca saMstRtaM gRhItaprastAram| haTho nirmUlodbhavastRNaviCeSaH| tathA sUryAdibhiradRSTam| tathA kSudrajantubhiH krimibhirjuSTaM sevitam| abhivRSTaM tatkAlapatitAnyavarSamiCrIbhUtam| tathA ghanam| tathA sthUlaphenilaM bRhatphenayuktam| virasaM durgandhi| atiCItaJca| divyam AntarikSam anArtavam anRtau patitam| RturdeCaviCeSeNa niyata eva| varSasya varSA eveti kecit| RtAvapi prathamapatitaM na peyam| lUtAdidUSitaM ca| etacca yatastRSNAdhmAnAdikAn kurute ato varjayet| sarve ceme rogA vakSyamANalakSaNAH| etaiCcopahitamanyajalAlAbhe kRtasaMskAraM Casyate| tameva ca saMskAraM darCayati dhanavastraparistrAvaNena kSudrajantvabhirakSaNaM kAryam| vyApannasya paicchilyAdiyuktasya agninA, sUryeNa, taptaCastrapiNDamajjanena vA tApanaM kAryam| parNImUlAdinA prasAdanaM nirmalIkaraNaM kAryam| parNImUlamerakAmUlam| erakA kACmIreSu `pittI' anyatra daNDerakapaTTerakabhedena prasiddhA| bisagranthinA, muktAbhiH, katakaphalena, Caivalena, vastrastrAveNa, gomedakena vA|  bisagranthistripAdikA| katakaM prasiddham| CaivalaM kaccham| gomedakamaGkolakaM maNiviCeSaCca| pATalAdipuCpaiH durgandhanaCanaM sampAdanIyam|| 9||

 pAnIyaM na tu pAnIyaM pAnIye~anyapradeCaje||10||  ajIrNe kvathitaM cAme pakve jIrNe~api netarat||10||  CIte vidhirayaM tapte tvajIrNe CiCiraM tyajet||10||

 tadabhAve ca bhUmiSThamAntarikSAnukAri yat||5||

bhUmiSThamuktaM tasyaiva viCeSa  ucyate deCaviCeSeNa| Cvete mRdi pradeCe sthitamudakaM kaSAyarasataM yAti| evaM kRSNe madhuratAm| pANDure tiktatAm| nIle kaSAyamadhuratAm| USare c lAvaNyam| USaro yo dagdhamRdiva pradeCaH sa USaraH  syAt `USaraH kSAramRttikA'| kapile sakSAramudakaM bhavati| sakSAraM kSAratvaguNayuktaM, kSAro nAma rasaviCeSaH| kSAro~asaumyaH kaThinabhAvavaiparItyakRt| miCralakSaNe miCraguNaH| sarvaCca bhUpradeCaH paJcabhUtAtmakaH na sarvatra bhUtasAmyaM bhavati| ata ucyate ApyabhAgAdhike deCe madhuramudakaM bhavati| parthivaruNAdhike lavaNAmlam| tejobhAgAdhike tiktakaTukam| vAyubhAgAdhike kaSAyam| AkACaguNAdhike cAvyaktarasatvAdAntarikSasamaguNam| bhUtAdhikyaJca viCiSTamanenaiva madhuratvAdinA jJAyate| `guNaCabdaCca bhAgaparyAyaH'| saMkhyAyA guNasya samAne' ityAdinA (pA0sU0- 5.2.47) kACikA| vibhAgo guNa iti ca| yathA avyaktarasatvam| mUrtamahAbhUtasvalpatvAdidamapi divyasadRCaM Cucau vistINEM kRSNo CvetamRdi ca sthitamarkeNa vAyunA cAhatam|| 6||

 pAnIyaM prANinAM prANA viCvameva ca tanmayam||11||  ato~atyantaniSedhena na kvacidvAri vAryate||11||  AsyaCoSAGgasAdAdyA mRtyurvA tadalAbhataH||11||  nahi toyAdvinA vRttiH svasthyasya vyAdhitasya ca||11||

AmaviSTabdhayoH pipAsArahito~apyupakArAyaiva ISaduSNA apaH pibet| AmaM CleSmaNopahatajaTharatvAdajIrNamannam| viSTabdhamapyevaM vAtAjIrNam| etau dvAvapyAmaviSTabdhau mAtrACItIye vakSyamANalakSaNau (sU0 a0-11) tayoCca tAvatIH apaH pibet yAvatyo~annaM kledayituM samarthAH| atikledena cAgninACabhayAt bahvyo na peyAH| kaphavAtAbhyAM jaThare vibaddhaM niCcalamapacyamAnamannaM  koSNatoyadravIkaraNAnmuktAmACayabandhanaM satkSiprameva pacyate| muktaM bandhanamAmACaye nibandhanaM yena sa tathA|| 15||

 anavasthitadoSAgnervyAdhikSINabalasya ca||16||  nalpamapyAmamudakaM hitaM taddhi tridoSakRt||16||  tejasaH pratipakSatvAnmandAgnirvarjayejjalam||16||  sarvameva tathA syandaplIhavidraddhigulminaH||16||  pANDUdarAtisArArCograhaNICoSaCophinaH||16||  kAmamalpamaCaktau tu peyamauSadhasaMskRtam||16||  Rte CarannidAghAbhyAmpibetsvastho~api cAlpaCaH||16||

anavasthitadoSasyAnavasthitAgneCca svalpamapyAmaM jalaM na pathyam| taddhyAmameSAM tridoSakaram| anavasthitAH svarUpAccalitA anekarUpACca doSA yasya sa tathAvidhaH| evamanavasthitAgnirapi| tathA vyAdhibhiH kSINaM balaM yasya tasyAmamudakaM tridoSakaram| tathA mandAgniH sarvameva jalaM kaupAdikamAmaM svalpaM, pakvaM bahu ca varjayet| tathAbhiSyandAdyArtaiCca sarvameva jalaM varjanIyam| abhiSyando nAma cakSUrogo vakSyamANaH (u0a0-18)| aCaktau tu vinA jalaM  prANasandhAraNAsAmarthye kadAcit peyama| tacca svalpam| kimbhUtamalpaM peyam?
