sUtrasthAnam

annarakSAvidhiH

 athAto~annarakSAvidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

annasya ca pAnasya ca svarUpamuktam| evaM vijJAtasvarUpaM pathyamapyannajAtaM pAnaM ca viSAdyupahataM rogAya maraNAya vA sampadyate| atastadrakSaNAyAdhyAyArambhaH|| 1||

 ICvarANAM vasumatAM viCeSeNa tu bhUbhujAM prAyeNa mitrebhyo~apyamitrA bhUyAMso bhavanti||2||  tatastatprayuktAH samAsannavartino~annapAnAdiSu viSaM prayacchanti||2||  striyaCca tatpraNidhiprayuktAH saubhAgyalobhena||2||

tena cAnnapAnarakSaNenAnyasya na tathA prayojanaM, yathA bhUbhRtaH| bahvapAyatvAt, bahUpajIvyatvAcca| tasmAdrAjA kulInatvAdiyuktaM prANAcAryaM bhiSajaM parigRhNIta svIkuryAt| kuta Aha-ICvarANAmityAdi| sarveSAmeveCvarANAM prabhaviSNUnAM vasumatAM dhaninAM ca viCeSeNa bhUbhRtAM rAjJAM na tAvanti mitrANi bhavanti yAvanto~amitrAH| tata iti| yato~amitrA bhUyAMso bhavantyatastatprayogAdamitraprayogAtsamAsannavartinaH paricArakA annapAnaCayanAdiSu viSaM prayacchanti| striyaCcAnnapAnAdiSu viSaM prayacchanti rAjJaH| kimbhUtAH? tatpraNidhiprayuktA amitracAracoditAH| kathaM dadati? saubhAgyalobhena| prAyeNa bhUbhRdyoSidbhyastacchatrucArAH pASaNDAdicchadmanaivaM bruvanti, yathA~anenauSadhena bhartre~annapAnAdiSu dattena saubhAgyaM bhavatIti|

 tasmAdrAjA kulInaM snigdhamAptamAstikamAryamAryaparigrahaM 
dakSaM dakSiNaM nibhRtaM CucimanuddhatamanalasamavyasaninamanahaMkRtamakopanamasAhasikaM vAkyArthAvabodhakuCalaM niSNAtamaSTAGge yathAmnAyamAyurvede suvihitayogakSemaM sannihitAgadAdiyogaM sAtmyajJaM ca prANAcAryaM parigRhNIyAt||3||

kimbhUtaM prANAcAryamAha- kulInaM utkRSTe kule jAtam| snigdhaM rAjJaH| AptamavisaMvAdivacanam| AstikamadRSTamastIti mAninam| dakSaM caturam| dakSiNaM rAjJo~anyeSAM ca maitrIparam| nibhRtaM rAjakaryeSu niCcalam| anuddhataM namram| analasamutthAnaCIlam| avyasaninaM aduHkhAbhibhUtam| anahaGkRtamanutsiktam| akopanasAhasikau prasiddhau| vAkyArthAvabodhe vAkyatAtparyAdhigame ca kuCalam| tathA niSNAtaM kuCalaM vAkyapAThAvabodhadhAraNAprayogairaSTAGgAyurvede| yathAmnAyamAgamAnatikrameNa| suSThu vihitau niSpAditau yogakSemau yena tathA| sannihitA nityanikaTasthA agadA viSUcikAdipraCamanAdayo yogA yasya| sAtmyajJaM sarvasya deCAdinA sAtmyaM jAnAtIti|| 3||

 tamarthamAnAbhyAM yathAkAlaM gurumiva CiSyaH, pitaramiva putraH pUjayet||4||  pratikUlamapi tadvacaH sAmprataM matamiti pratimanyeta||4||  na hi bhadro~api gajapatirniraGkuCaH ClAghanIyo janasya tasmAttadAyattamAhAravihAraM prati cAtmAnaM kuryAt||4||

taM ca prANAcAryaM rAjA arthena, mAnena satkAreNa ca pUjayet yathAkAlam| yathA guruM CiSyaH pUjayati, pitaraM ca yathA putra iti| pratikUlaM dviSTamapi tasya prANAcAryasya vacanaM sAmprataM yuktamiti manyeta| yasmAnna hi suCIlo~api gajapatirniraGkuCaH aGkuCarahito janasya ClAghanIyo bhavati| tasmAdrAjA prANAcAryAyattamAhAravihArAbhyAmAtmAnaM kuryAt| tatpratiSiddha AhAro vihAraCca na vidheyaH, tadaGgIkRtaCca vidheya ityarthaH| bhadra iti jAtyutkRSTo hastI tacchAstreSu prasiddhalakSaNaH|| 4||

 upAttamapi khalu jIvitamupAyabalena svayamadhitiSThati||5||

etena kiM prayojanamityAha-upAttamadRSTAdAgatamapi jIvitaM sApAyamupAyabalena svayamanAyAsenaiva CarIramadhitiSThati| eSa ca mahAnupAyo yadvaidyaparAyattatA|| 5||

 api ca bahuparigrahA narapatayaH||6||  santi cACukAriNaH CUlasaMnyAsAdayaH||6||  pratikSaNaM pratyavekSaNIyAvasthACca rogiNo viCeSeNa rAjAnaH||6||  te hi pramAdaparigatA duHkhAsahiSNavaCca svayamapyapathyarucayaH sannihitAhitapriyavacanaprAyaparicArakACca tasmAdbhiSajo rAjA rAjagRhAsanne niveCanaM kArayet||6||  tathAhi sarvopakaraNeSu nRpati CarIropayogiSvaparokSavRttirbhavati||6||

api ca na kevalamantaroktena prakAreNa prANAcAryaM parigRhNIta rAjA yAvadrAjagRhanikaTe bhiSajaH prANAcAryasya niveCanaM veCma kArayet| yato narapatayo bahuparigrahAH prabhUtaparivArAH| CUlAdayaCca vyAdhaya ACukAriNaH svamarthaM maraNamACu CIghraM kurvantItyACukAriNaH| sarve ca rogiNaH pratikSaNaM pratyavekSaNIyAvasthAH, viCeSeNa rAjAnaH| kiM te viCeSeNetyAha-te hi svAtantryAt pramAdaM kurvanti| rogauSadhAdiduHkhaM soDhuM na Caknuvanti| tathA svayaM svabhAvenaivApathyAbhilASiNaH| tebhyaCca prAyeNa nikaTavartino hitaM priyaM ca vadantIti| tasmAdrAjagRhanikaTavarttI bhiSak sarveSu rAjaCarIropakaraNeSu pratyakSavRttirbhavati| yevaM cAnnapAnAdikamupakaraNaM rakSituM CaknotIti|| 6||

 sa samyaksampannamannaM suparIkSitaM viCuddhamagnyAdiSu prAgupanItaM CikhinA dRSTamabhiprokSitaM prokSaNaiH puraHsthito rAjAnaM hastabaddhauSadhiratnaM bhojayet||7||

tatrAnnaM prAdhAnyAt prathamamucyate| sa ca bhiSak rAjJaH purataH sthito rAjAnamannaM bhojayet| kimbhUtamannaM? samyaksAdhvIbhiH sravaNabASpodgamanAdikriyAbhiH sampannam, suparIkSitaM vakSyamANena vidhinA, prathamaM cAgnimakSikAdibhyo dattaM, tathA saviSaM nirviSamiti parijJAnaM bhavati, CikhinA mayUreNa dRSTaM, prokSaNaiH suparNamantrodakAdibhiH prokSitaM siktam| tathA hi saviSamapi nirviSIbhavati| kimbhUtaM rAjAnaM haste baddhAnyauSadhAni ratnAni ca yena tam|| 7||

 bhuJjAnasya cAsya dundubhInagadapraliptAn vAdayet||8||

asya ca rAjJo bhuJjAnasya cAgadapraliptAn dundubhIn bherIrvAdayet|| 8||

 tatra saviSamannam srAvyamANamavisrAvyaM bhavati, cireNa pacyate, pakvaM ca sadyaH paryuSitamiva nirUSma stabdhaM ca jAyate,yathAsvaM varNagandharasairvyApadyate, praklidyate, candrakAcitaM ca bhavati||9||

suparIkSitamityuktaM sA ca parIkSyocyate-saviSamannamityAdi| saviSamannaM srAvyamANaM srAvayitumaCakyaM bhavati| cireNa ca pAkaM yAti| pakvamAtrameva paryuSitamiva gatAhorAtramivoSmarahitaM stabdhaM kaThinaM ca sampadyate| yathAsvaM yathAtmIyairvarNAdibhirnaCyati| kledaM ca yAti| candrakaiCca nAnAvidhairmaNDalaiH samantAccitaM bhavati||9||

 vyaJjanAnAmACu CuSkatvaM bhavati kvAthaH||10||  dhyAmatA CyAmatA hInAtiriktavikRtAnAM cAtracchAyAnAM darCanamadarCanameva vA, phenapaTalasImantordhvavividharAjitantubudbudhaprAdurbhAvo, viCeSeNa lavaNolbaNeSa phenamAlA||10||

annarakSAvidhiH

 athAto~annarakSAvidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

annasya ca pAnasya ca svarUpamuktam| evaM vijJAtasvarUpaM pathyamapyannajAtaM pAnaM ca viSAdyupahataM rogAya maraNAya vA sampadyate| atastadrakSaNAyAdhyAyArambhaH|| 1||

 ICvarANAM vasumatAM viCeSeNa tu bhUbhujAM prAyeNa mitrebhyo~apyamitrA bhUyAMso bhavanti||2||  tatastatprayuktAH samAsannavartino~annapAnAdiSu viSaM prayacchanti||2||  striyaCca tatpraNidhiprayuktAH saubhAgyalobhena||2||

tena cAnnapAnarakSaNenAnyasya na tathA prayojanaM, yathA bhUbhRtaH| bahvapAyatvAt, bahUpajIvyatvAcca| tasmAdrAjA kulInatvAdiyuktaM prANAcAryaM bhiSajaM parigRhNIta svIkuryAt| kuta Aha-ICvarANAmityAdi| sarveSAmeveCvarANAM prabhaviSNUnAM vasumatAM dhaninAM ca viCeSeNa bhUbhRtAM rAjJAM na tAvanti mitrANi bhavanti yAvanto~amitrAH| tata iti| yato~amitrA bhUyAMso bhavantyatastatprayogAdamitraprayogAtsamAsannavartinaH paricArakA annapAnaCayanAdiSu viSaM prayacchanti| striyaCcAnnapAnAdiSu viSaM prayacchanti rAjJaH| kimbhUtAH? tatpraNidhiprayuktA amitracAracoditAH| kathaM dadati? saubhAgyalobhena| prAyeNa bhUbhRdyoSidbhyastacchatrucArAH pASaNDAdicchadmanaivaM bruvanti, yathA~anenauSadhena bhartre~annapAnAdiSu dattena saubhAgyaM bhavatIti|

 tasmAdrAjA kulInaM snigdhamAptamAstikamAryamAryaparigrahaM

 tamarthamAnAbhyAM yathAkAlaM gurumiva CiSyaH, pitaramiva putraH pUjayet||4||  pratikUlamapi tadvacaH sAmprataM matamiti pratimanyeta||4||  na hi bhadro~api gajapatirniraGkuCaH ClAghanIyo janasya tasmAttadAyattamAhAravihAraM prati cAtmAnaM kuryAt||4||

taM ca prANAcAryaM rAjA arthena, mAnena satkAreNa ca pUjayet yathAkAlam| yathA guruM CiSyaH pUjayati, pitaraM ca yathA putra iti| pratikUlaM dviSTamapi tasya prANAcAryasya vacanaM sAmprataM yuktamiti manyeta| yasmAnna hi suCIlo~api gajapatirniraGkuCaH aGkuCarahito janasya ClAghanIyo bhavati| tasmAdrAjA prANAcAryAyattamAhAravihArAbhyAmAtmAnaM kuryAt| tatpratiSiddha AhAro vihAraCca na vidheyaH, tadaGgIkRtaCca vidheya ityarthaH| bhadra iti jAtyutkRSTo hastI tacchAstreSu prasiddhalakSaNaH|| 4||

 tataCchAyAyAM viCoSya sphaTikamuktApravAlakAlAnusAryapratIvApaM punarapi balimaGgalapUrvakamahatavAsasA kanyayAdRSadi peSayitvA suvarNarajatatAmraCaGkhaCailadviradaradanagavalaCrRGgavaiDUryasphaTikameSabhRGgyasanasArAnyatama--ghaTitAyAmaJjanikAyAM nidhApayet||80||

tataCchAyAyAM CoSayitvA dattasphaTikAdipratIvApaM punarapi pUrvoktena balimaGgalAdinA kanyayAdRSadi peSyaM pratIvApaM cUrNam| kimbhUtayA kanyayA? 
ahatAni CastrAdyapATitAni vAsAMsi yasyAH tathA tathaiva kanyayA kartRbhUtayA suvarNAdyanyatamaracitAyAmaJjananADyAM vaidyo nidhApayet sthApayet| gavalaM mAhiSaM CrRGgam|| 80||

 athA pUrvavatpunarapi kRtasvastyayanaM sAvitreNa karmaNA sarvavid dvijanmA vidhivattadabhisaMskuryAt||81||

 tataH paraM ca tAmeva dhAriNImanusmaran sAyamprAtaH pratyahametatparamaM pavitramArogyakaramUrjaskaraM sarvaviSaghnamaJjanamaCvibhyAmindrasya vRtravadhAbhyudyatasya prAkprakalpitam||82||  tasmAdetadrAjJAM rAjamahAmAtrANAM ca mahIM vijigISamANAnAM ca brAhmaNAnAM ca vedAdhyayanamanyadvA mahacchAstramavagAhamAnAnAM prasannamanA bhiSak prakalpayediti||82||

dhAriNI vidyA| rAjamAtrA anye vittasampannAH|| 82||

 bhavanti cAtra ClokA-

 bilvADhakIyavakSArapATalIbAhlikoSaguNAH||84||  CrIparNI sallakIyuktA niSkvAthaH prokSaNaH param||84||  saviSaM prokSitaM tena sadyo bhavati nirviSam||84||  yavasendhanapAnIyaCastraCayyAsanodakam||84||  kavacAbharaNacchatrabAlavyajanaveCma ca||84||

 CelupATalyativiSACigrugopIpunarnavam||85||  samaGgAvRSamUlAvakkapitthavRSaCoNitam||85||  sahadantaCaThaM tadvatprokSaNaM viSanACanam||85||

 lAkSApriyaGgumaJjiSThAsamaGgA~alahareNukAH||86||  yaSTyAhvamadhusaMyuktAH babhrupittena kalkitAH||86||  nikhaned goviSANasthAH saptarAtraM mahItale||86||  saMspuSTaM saviSaM tena sadyobhavati nirviSam||86||

tataH saptarAtrAdudhRtya maNiM gulikAM kRtvA hemnA suvarNena veSTayet| taM ca maNiM hastena dhArayet| tena hastasthitena maNinA spRSTaM sarvameva saviSaM nirviSatAM yAti|| 86||

 manohvA~alaCamIpuSpatvaGniCACvetasarSapAH||87||  kapitthakuSThamaJjiSThAH pittena ClakSNakalkitAH||87||  Cuno goH kapilAyACca saumyAkhyo~ayaM varo~agadaH||87||  viSajitparaM kAryo maNiratra ca pUrvavat||87||

manohvAdIni ca CunaH pittena gorvA kapilAyAH pittena ClakSNapiSTAni saumyanAmAgadaH pUrvayogAdatyarthaviSanACanaH|| 87||

 mUSikAjaruhA vA~api hastabaddhA viSApahAH||88||

mUSikAnAmauSadhiH| dravantIti kecit| ajaruhA plakSaruhA| viSabhuktasya hastabandhAnAd viSanACinI|| 88||

 hareNumAMsI maJjiSThA rajanI madhukaM madhu||89||  akSatvaksurasaM lAkSA CvapittaM pUrvavanmaNiH||89||  vAditrANi patAkACca piSTairebhiCca lekhitAH||89||  CrutvA dRSTvA samAghrAya sadyo bhavati nirviSam||89||

hareNvAdayaCca CvapittapiSTaiH maNiH pUrvavat| ebhiCcAnantaroktairagadairvAditrANi patAkA vaijayantyaCca yatpraliptaM tacchabdena tadgandhena tatsparCena ca viSabhukto nirviSatAM yAti|| 89||

 tryUSaNaM paJcalavaNaM maJjiSThAM rajanAdvayam||90||  sUkSmailAM trivRtAM patraM viDaGgAnIndravAruNIm||90||  madhukaM ceti sakSaudraM goviSANe nidhApayet||90||  tasmAduSNAmbunA mAtrAM prAgbhaktaM viniyojayet||90||  viSaM bhuktaM jarAM yAti nirviSe~api na doSakRt||90||

tryUSaNAdikaM piSTaM mAkSikayuktaM goCRGge sthApayet| tato mAtrAM stokaM bhojanAdau yojayet| tatsaMskRte koSThe viSaM bhuktaM jarAM yAti| indravAruNI gavAkSI| nanu svasthasya bhojanapUrvaM dattaM tadanu ca viSaM na bhuktamiti kadAciddoSakopAya bhavatItyAha- nirviSe~api na doSakRt|| 90||

 jatusarjarasoCIrasarSapApatravAlakaiH||91||  savellAruSkarapuraiH kusumairarjunasya ca||91||  dhUpo vAsagRhe hanti viSaM sthAvarajaGgamam||91||  na tatra kITAH saviSA nondurA na sarIsRpAH||91||  na kRtyAkArmaNAdyACca dhUpo~ayaM yatra dRCyate||91||

 viCAlAvyoSamaJjiSThAyaSTIlavaNapaJcakam||93||  dviniCApatravellailAtrivRccUrNaM samAkSikam||93||  goCrRGge nihitaM yojyaM snAnIye~ambhasi bhUpateH||93||  pUrvoktaM tryUSaNAdiJca snAnIye~ambhasi yojayet||93||

 kvAtho dhavArkakusumaCvetApAmArgasarSapaiH||94||  sadadhyAjyaH kRto yuktaiH katakAnAkulIdvayaiH||94||  kalko vA candanakSIripalACadrumavalkalaiH||94||  mUrvailAvAlusurasanAkulItaNDulIyakaiH||94||  kvAthaH sarvodakAryeSu kAkamAcIyutairhitaH||94||

athavA dhavAdibhiH katakAdiyuktaiH kRtaH kvAtho dadhighRtamiCraH snAnIye~ambhasi yojyaH candanadrumavalkalAdInAM vA kalkaH snAnAdijale yojyaH| drumaCabdasya candanakSIripalACaiH sambandhaH| eteSAM valkalaistvagbhirathavA sarveSUdakAryeSu snAnAdikeSveSAM candanAdInAM kAkamAcIsaMyuktAnAM kvAtho viSanACanaH| nAkulI sarpAkSI| elAvAlukaM vAlukam|| 94||

 rocanApatranaipAlIkuGkumaistilakAn bahUn||95||  viSairna bAdhyate syAcca nArInaranRpapriyaH||95||

 cUrNairharidrAmaJjiSThAkiNihIkaNanimbajaiH||96||  digdhaM nirviSatAmeti gAtramityAha gautamaH||96||

saviSaM gAtraM haridrAdInAM cUrNena digdhaM nirviSatAmetItyAha- gautamaH|| 96||

 nasyapAnAJjanAlepairyuJjyAtsaJjIvanAtmakAn||97||  agadAnviSabhuktasya tIkSNAni vamanAni ca||97||  pippalImadhukakSaudraCarkarekSurasaiH saha||97||  dviniCApatravellailAtrivRccUrNaM samAkSikam||97||  virecanaM sirAmokSaM prAptaM visrAvaNaM yadi||97||

saJjIvanAdIMCcAgadAn viSapratiSedhe vakSyamANAnnasyAdiSu yojayet| viSabhuktasya tIkSNAni vamanAni ca yojayet| viSapratiSedhoktaprakAreNa ca yadi raktavisrAvaNAvasaraH tataH sirAmokSo vidheyaH|| 97||

 hRdayAvaraNaM kAryaM prAgevAmitramadhyataH||98||  pibed ghRtamajeyAkhyamamRtaM vApyabhuktavAn||98||  sarpiH kSaudraM dadhikSIramantaH CItalaM jalam||98||

CatrumadhyasthitAya ca bhUbhRte pUrvameva hRdayarakSaNaM kAryam| tacca viSapratiSedhe vakSyate| tathA ca Catrumadhye viSapratiSedhe vakSyamANamajeyaM nAma ghRtaM bhojanapUrvaM peyam| viSapratiSedhe amRtaM nAma ghRtaM bhojanapUrvaM deyaM bhiSajA| antataH CItalaM jalaM sarpirAdyabhAve CItamapi jalaM peyamityarthaH|| 98||

 sitAmadhukapAlindI kalkavanmAMsamiSyate||99||  godhAhariNababhrUNAM sakaNACuNThipArSatam||99||  sanAgaraM sAtiviSaM CikhinaH sasitopalam||99||  suCItAH saghRtACcaiSAM yathAsvaM kalpitA rasAH||99||

sitAdikalkasaMyuktaM ca mAMsaM viSanACanAyeSyate| kasya mAMsamAha godhAdInAm| tathA pRSatasya mAMsaM CuNThIpippalIyuktam| tathA Cikhino mayUrasya mAMsaM nAgareNa vAtiviSayA vA CarkarayA vA yuktam| eSAM ca godhAdInAM mAMsena yathAsvaM yogyasayogyauSadhakalpitACca rasAH|| 99||

 viSapItAya dadyAcca CuddhAyordhvamadhastathA||100||  sUkSmaM tAmrarajaH kAle sakSaudraM hRdviCodhanam||100||

yena ca viSaM bhuktaM tasya kRtavamanavirecanasya kAle tadavasthAyogyaM sUkSmaM supiSTaM tAmracUrNaM mAkSikasaMyuktaM hRcchodhanAya dAtavyam|| 100||

 Cuddhe hRdi tataH CANaM hemacUrNasya dApayet||101||  na sajjate hemapAGge padmapatre~ambuvadviSam||101||  jAyate vipulaM cAyurgare~apyeSa vidhiH smRtaH||101||

evaM Cuddhe hRdi suvarNacUrNasya ca mAtrAM dApayet| tena kiM bhavatItyAha- hemapasya puruSasyAGge CarIre viSaM na sajjate na tiSThati| yathA padmapatre~ambu na sajjate| tasya ca vipulamAyurjAyate| eSa ca maulaviSavidhirgare~api vidheyaH karaNIyaH|| 101||

 itthaM garaviSAdibhyo rakSedvaidyo nareCvaram||102||  syAducCedastaducCedAtprajAnAM sarvakarmaNAm||102||  AjJAdhairyakSamAtyAgA mAnuSatve~ayamAnuSAH||102||  yadrAjJaH karmabhistasmAdArAdhyo~asAvatIndriyaiH||102||

itthamanantaroktena rakSaNaprakAreNa bhiSagvaidyo nareCvaraM viSagarAdibhyo rakSet| yatastasya nareCvarasya ucCede vinACe prajAsambandhinAM sarvakarmaNAmucCedaH| sa ca rAjA bhiSajAtIndriyairmAnasairyatnataH prajJAdibhiH karmabhirArAdhanIyaH, yena kupito doSaM na karoti| yato rAjJo mAnuSatve~api AjJAdayo~amAnuSA bhavanti| anyapuruSebhyaH sa eva Cakta ityarthaH| ayameva tadArAdhanopAya ucyate|| 102||

sUtrasthAnam

viruddhAnnavijJAnIyaH

 athAto viruddhAnnavijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

AhArasya prasaktatvAdviruddhasya ca tasya garasadRCatvAttatprasaGga evedamucyate- athAta iti|| 1||

 grAmyAnUpaudakapiCitAni, madhuguDatilapayomASamUlakabisairvirUDhadhAnyaiCca naikadhyamadyAt||2||

AnUpAnAM prANinAmaudakAnAM ca jalajAnAM piCitAni mAMsAni mAkSikAdibhiraikadhyaM saha nAdyAt| audakAnAmAnUpatve~api virodhaprAdhAnyAtpRthaggrahaNam| virUDhadhAnyamaGkuritAni sasyAni|| 2||

 viCeSataH payasA matsyAn||3||  ubhayaM hyetanmadhurasavipAkitvAdabhiSyandi, CItoSNavIryatvAtparasparaM viruddham||3||

payasA kSIreNa saha viCeSAnmatsyAnnAdyAt| etadubhayamabhiSyandi vIryaviruddhaM ca|| 3||

 teSvapi viCeSeNa cilicimaH||4||  sa punaH CakalI lohitanayanaH sarvato lohitarAjirlohitaprabhAkaraH prAyo bhUmau carati, so~atyabhiSyanditamatvAt sutarAM vyAdhInupajanayatyAmaviSaM ca||4||

teSvapi matsyeSu madhye viCeSeNa cilicimaH payasA saha viCeSeNa nAdyAt| sa punaCcilicimaH CakalyAkhyo lohitanetraH sarvataH CarIre lohitarAjiH CarIre ca lohitaCakalasadRCaH prAyaCca jalanikaTabhUmau carati| so~atyabhiSyanditamatvAt sutarAM vyAdhInupajanayati| abhiSyandi mAlinyena srotasAM srAvakam| AmaviSaM mAtrACitIye vakSyate|| 4||

 sarvaJcAmlaM dravamadravaM payasaikadhyaM viruddham||5||  tata uttaraM vA viruddhaM phalaJca kaGguvarakamakuSThakulatthamASaniSpAvACca||5||

sarvaM cAmlaM madyadhAnyAmlAdi payasA saha tataH payaso vA uttaraM viruddham| phalaM cAnyarasamapi payasA saha tato vA uttaraM viruddham| kaGgvAdayaCca payasA saha tato vA uttaraM viruddhAH|| 5||

 na mUlakAdirahitaM bhakSayitvA payaH sevyaM kuSThAbAdhabhayAt||6||

mUlakakuTherAdi haritakaM bhakSayitvA na payaH sevyaM, kuSThAbAdhabhayAt|| 6||

 pauSkaraM rauhiNIkaM jAtukaM vA CAkaM saha madhupayobhyAM nAbhyavaharet||7||  tAbhyAJca saha kapotAn sarSapatailabhRSTAn||7||

pauSkarAdiCAkaM kSIramAkSikAbhyAM miCrAbhyAM saha nAbhyavaharet| tathA sArSapatailena bhRSTAn kapotAMstAbhyAM madhukSIrAbhyAM saha nAbhyavaharet|| 7||

 tathA sarSapatailabhRSTAnAM matsyabadarANAM badarANi CvAvidvarAhamAMsaM caikadhyaM pittenAmamAMsAni||8||

tathA sArSapatailabhRSTAnAM matsyabadarANAM sambandhIni mAMsAni viruddhAni| badarANi CvAvinmAMsaM varAhamAMsena saha viruddham|| 8||

 dadhnA kukkuTaM pRSataM ca||9||  kusumbhaCAkenaurabhram||9||  sauvIrakeNa tilaCaSkulIH||9||  kSIreNa lavaNam||9||  mUlakena mASasUpam||9||  navanItena mUlaCAkam||9||  upodakAM maireyamArdvIkAbhyAm||9||  pIlUni karIraiH||9||  bisairvirUDhakAni||9||  dadhnA mASasUpena guDena madhunA ghRtena vA lakuca phalam||9||  dadhnA takreNa tAlaphalena vA kadalIphalam||9||  pippalImaricAbhyAM, madhunA guDena vA kAkamAcIM||9||

apakvAnyaparipUrNapAkAni mAMsAni pittena saha bhuktAni viruddhAni| 
dadhnA saha kukkuTo viruddhaH pRSataCca| 
kusumbhaCAkena aurabhraM mAMsaM viruddham, urabhro meSaH| 
tathA sauvIreNa kAJjikena saha tilaCaSkulI viruddhA|
kSIreNa saha lavaNaM viruddham| 
dadhyAdInAmanyatamena lakuca phalam|
punaCca dadhyAdInAmanyatamena kadalIphalam|
pippalImaricAbhyAM miCrAbhyAM kevalenaiva vA madhunAthavA guDena saha kAkamAcIM virodhAttyajet|| 9||

 tAmeva matsyapacane CRGgiverapacane vA bhAjane siddhAmanyatra vA siddhAM rAtrimuSitAm||10||

tathA tAmeva kAkamAcIM CRGgiverapacane bhAjane matsyapacane vA siddhAM pakvAM kevalAmapi nAbhyavaharet| anyasmin vA yathAruci bhAjane siddhAM niCAmuSitAM nAbhyavaharet|| 10||

 madyadadhimadhubhallAtakeSu coSNam||12||  takrasiddhakAsampillako viruddhaH||12||  aGgAraCUlyo bhAsaH||12||  surAkRsarApAyasACcaikadhyaM viruddhAH||12||  madhusarpirvasAtailodakAni samadhRtAni dviCastriCaH samastAni vA||12||  madhughRte bhinnAMCe divyodakAnupAne||12||  madhupuSkarabIjam||12||  padmottarikACAkaM CArkaro maireyo madhu ca sahopayuktaM sarve viruddham; vAtaM cAtikopayati||12||  hAridrakaH sarSapatailabhRSTo viruddhaH||12||  pittaM cAtikopayati||12||  pAyaso manthAnupAno viruddhaH||12||  CleSmANaM cAtikopayati||12||  upodakA tilakalkasiddhA heturatIsArasya||12||  balAkA vAruNyA kulmASaiCca viruddhA||12||  saiva varAhavasayA paribhRSTo sadyo vyApAdayati||12||  godhAlAvatittirimayUrakapiJjalACcairaNDadArvagnisiddhA eraNDatailasammUrcchitAH||12||  hArItamAMsaM haridraCUlakAvasakaM hAridrAgnipluSTaM ca||12||  tadeva bhasmapAMsuparidhvastaM sakSaudraM ca||12||  tathA matsyanistAlitasnehasAdhitAH pippalyaH||12||

madyAdiSUpayukteSu uSNaM sarvaM viruddham|
takreNa pakvaH kampillako viruddhaH|
aGgAreSu CUlena saMskRto bhAsaH pakSI viruddhaH|
surAdIMCca parasparaM saha nAbhyavaharet|
madhvAdInAM dvau dvau vA trIstrInvA samaghRtatvena samena parasparaM pramANena nAbhyavaharet| samastAni vA madhvAdIni samapramANAni nAbhyavaharet|
tathA viSadhRte api madhughRte divyodakAnupAne viruddhe| mAkSikaM padmabIjaM ca saha viruddham|
padmottarikACAdIni ca parasparaM viruddhAni, vAtakopanAni ca| padmottarikA kusumbhaH, CArkaramaireyau madyaviCeSau| ekaH CarkarayA kriyate| dvitIyaH kharjjUrAsavaH|
hAridraH sarSapatailabhRSTo viruddhaH| hAridro nAma bhUprasavaH kandarUpaH| sa caivaM pittakopanaH 
payasA saMskRta odano manthAnupAno viruddho~anilaCleSmakopanaCca|
upodakAM tilakalkena siddhAmatIsArahetutvAnnAbhyavaharet|
balAkA vAruNyA surayA saha viruddhA, kulmASo nAtisvinnAni sasyAni| saiva ca balAkA sUkaravasayA samantAt bahubhRSTA sadya eva mArayati|
godhAdayaCcairaNDadArvagnisiddhAstathA tenaivairaNDatailena saha mUrcchitA bahunA bhRSTA ityarthaH|
hArItasya pakSiviCeSasya mAMsaM haridrAdArusIsakAyAM CUle AsaktaM haridrAgnipakvaM ca viruddham| tathA tadeva hArItamAMsaM bhasmanA pAMsubhiCca dhvastaM sat samAkSikaM viruddham|
matsyanistAlanena snehena yena matsyA nistAlitAstena siddhAH pippalyo viruddhAH|| 12||

 CItoSNaM navapurANamAmapakvaJca naikamaikadhyamadyAt||13||

sAmAnyena sparCena vA vIryeNa vA CItamuSNaM ca saha nAdyAt| tathA navaM purANaM ca CAlidravyAdi saha nAdyAt| AmaM pakvaM cAhAradravyaM saha nAdyAt| CItamuSNenaiva| navaM purANenaivAmaM pakvernaiva| ityekaCabdArthaH| haritakaphalAdInAM tathAvidhopayogAdeva na virodhaH|| 13||

 salilAvagAhaH sahasoSNAbhitaptasya tvagdRSTyorupapAtAya||14||  tRSNAbhipravRddhaye ca||14||  tathaiva ca payaHpAnaM raktapittAya||14||

uSNenA~a~atapAgnyAdinA taptasya sahasA tatkAlameva salilAvagAho jalamajjanaM tvaco dRSTeCca nACanaM, tRSNAyACcAtivRddhiM karoti tathaivoSNAbhitaptasya sahasA payaHpAnaM raktapittAya|| 14||

 CarIreNAyastasya sahasA~abhyavahAraH chardiSe gulmAya vA||15||  vAcA tvAyastasya svarasAdAya||15||

CarIreNAyastasya utpannaCramasya bhojanaM chardiSe gulmAya vA| vAcA tUtpannaCramasya bhojanaM svarasAdAya bhavati|| 15||

 ityannapAnadravyavirodhaikadeCo bAhulyenopayogI kathitaH||16||  bheSajadravyANAntu yathopadeCameva prayoge nyAyyataraH||16||  tadvirodhaH punaratiprasaGgabhayAnnoktaH||16||  na ca tadvijJAnamekAntabhadrakam||16||

ityanena prakAreNAnnapAnadravyANAM virodhaikadeCaH kathitaH| yo bAhulyenopayujyate| anyatsvayamUhyam| bheSajadravyANAM guDUcyAdInAM vidyamAno~api virodho~atiprasaGgabhayonnoktaH| nanu cAjJAtavirodhAvirodhAnAM kathaM teSAM prayoga ityAha- yathopadeCameva teSAM prayogo nyAyyataraH| tenaitaduktaM bhavati| bheSajadravyANAM yatra svabuddhyA saMyogakalpanA kriyate tatra CAstrAnugamanena prayogo nyAyyatara iti| na ca tadvijJAnaM bheSajadravyavirodhavijJAnamekAntabhadrakaM na bhadrakamevetyarthaH| yatasteSAM virodhe jJAte saMyogakalpanAyAM svalpamatirbhiSak kadAcinmuhyati yato~avaCyaM kenacidaMCena kaCcit kenacidvirudhyate ataH| etacca budhyamAno bhiSak CAstrAnvayinamapyUhaM kartuM na Caknoti| yatra tu CAstraM bahu praviCati tathAvidha UhaH kArya eva| tasmAdyathopadeCameva prayogo nyAyyataraH| Uho yathACakti CAstrAnugamanena kAryaH|| 16||

 api ca-
utkleCya doSAnna haret dravyaM yattatsamAsataH||17||  viruddhaM taddhi dhAtUnAM pratyanIkatayA sthitam||17||

api ceti samuccaye| samAsataH saGkSepataH viruddhaM kimityAha| doSAnutkleCya svasthAnAtsaJcalayya yat dravyaM naharet tatraiva nACane bahirvA nirhartumaCaktaM tadviruddham| taddhi dravyaM rasAdInAM dhAtUnAM pratyanIkatayA pratipakSatvena sthitam|| 17||

 balinAM mithoguNAnAM viSamatayA 
samatayA~apyubhayathApi||18||  saMskArAdivaCena ca bhavati
nisargAdapi virodhaH||18||

tathA sarvaCca virodha evamevaM bhavati| kathamityAha- saMyogidravyaguNAnAM balinAmubhayatrApi balavatAM mithaH parasparaM viSamatvenAsAdRCatvena virodhaH| tathAnyatra balinAM sadRCAnAmapi virodhaH| kenacid guNena balinA sAdRCyAt kenacidasAdRCyAcca saMskArAdivaCena cAnyo~api virodho bhavati| AdigrahaNena saMyogadeCakAlAdInAM grahaNam| anyaCca nisargAtsvabhAvenaiva virodhaH|

 kSIraM kulatthaiH panasena matsyaiH 
taptaM dadhikSaudraghRte samAMCe||19||  vAryUSare rAtriSu saktAvaCca 
toyAntarAste yavakAstathA ca||19||

eteSAmeva krameNodAharaNamAha| kSIraM balinA madhuravipAkitvena yuktaM CItavIryatvena ca kulatthairamlavipAkairuSNavIryaiCca saha viruddhamityasadRCaguNenodAharaNam| tathA kSIraM madhurarasavipAkaM CItavIryaJca tadvidhenaiva panasena viruddhamiti sadRCaguNenodAharaNam| tathA kSIraM madhurarasavipAkaM ca matsyairmadhurarasavipAkairuSNavIryaiCca viruddhamityekadeCasAdRCyenaikadeCAsAdRCyena codAharaNam| taptaM dadhi viruddhamiti saMskArodAharaNam| kSaudraghRte samabhAge viruddhe iti mAtrodAharaNam| USare sthitaM vAri viruddhamiti deCodAharaNam| rAtrau saktavo viruddhA iti kAlodAharaNam| te ca saktovastoyAntaritA iti saMyogaviCeSodAharaNam| yavakAstu kevalA viruddhA iti svabhAvodAharaNam|| 19||

 kuCAgrIyadhiyAmetadudAharaNamAtrakam||20||  upanItamalaM vidvAn sarvatra kramate yataH||20||

kuCAgrIyadhiyAM tIkSNabuddhInAmetadanantaroktamudAharaNamAtramupanItam| yato vidvAn CAstrajJaH tIkSNabuddhiH sarvatra kramate, svabuddhyaiva sarvamavagacchatItyarthaH|| 20||

sUtrasthAnam

viruddhAnnavijJAnIyaH

 visphoTaCophamadavidradhigulmayakSmatejobalasmRtimatIndriyacittanACAn||21||  kuryAd viruddhamaCanaM jvaramasrapittamaSTau gadAMCca mahato viSavacca mRtyum||21||

viruddhamaCanaM visphoTAdIn kuryAt| matirbuddhirvikalpayogyA| cittaM cetanA| mahataCcASTau gadAn kuryAt| yathAyogaM kiJcidviruddhaM CUlaviSUcikAdIMstAtkAlikAn karoti| anyadabhyAsAdyapekSayA yakSmAdIn karoti| anyacca sadya eva viSavanmRtyuM karotIti bhiSajA parikalpanIyam| vAtavyAdhyaCmarIkuSTamehodarabhagandarAH| arCAMsi grahaNItyaSTau mahArogaH sudustarAH|

 teSvACu kuryAtsaMCuddhiM CamaM vA tadvirodhibhiH||22||  dravyaistaireva vA pUrvaM CarIrasyAbhisaMskRtim||22||

teSu ca viruddhACanajeSu visphoTAdiSu rogeSu saMCuddhiM, vamanavirecanAdikaM kuryAt| athavA tasya yathAsvaM rogakAraNasya viruddhACanasya sarverguNaiH viparItAni yAni dravyANi tairvisphoTAdInAM Camameva kuryAt| athavA deCaviCeSAdyapekSayA bhaviSadviruddhACanaCaGkAyAM taireva bhaviSyadviruddhACanaguNaviparItairdravyaiH CarIrasyAbhisaMskRtiM saMskArameva prathamaM kuryAt| yathAviruddhamapyannaM guNairviparItaguNaiH saMskArAddehe durbalaM sanna rogAya bhavatIti| etaccasmadguravo yathAprakrAntaCabdArthaparatantrAstaivereti ca tadviruddhAni parAmRCanto vamanAdivat pUrvaM dehasyAbhisaMskRterapivaidyavidheyatAmabhimanyamAnACcarakasya boddhAro vyAkhyAnamabhimanyante| bhaTTArakeNa tu `tathAvidhairvA dravyaiH pUrvamabhisaMskAraH CarIrasya' ityasya vAkyasya vyAdhyutpattyanaikAntikapradarCanaparatvamaGgIkRtya tathAvidhairiti ca viruddhasamAni parAmRCya viruddhaireva pUrvasaMskAro vyAdhyanutpattiheturiti sAtmyAhAraprAyatayA dvitIyo~api pakSo ya udbhAsitaH so~asmAbhirupekSita eva|| 22||

 vyAyAmasnigdhadIptAgnivayasthabalaCAlinAm||23||  virodhyapi na pIDAyai sAtmyamalpaM ca bhojanam||23||

vyAyAmetyAdinA sAtmyatvenaiva gatatvAt| tathA vyAyAmadiptagnyAdinAM viruddhamapi bhojanaM pIdAyai na bhavati| svalpakAlopayuktaM vyAyAmena snigdhena ca dIptAgnayo ye teSAm| anyeSAM vyAyAmIti pAThaH| teSAM vyAyAmavataH snigdhasya, dIptagneCca vayasthasya, pratyagravayasaH balaCAlino balena yaH ClAghate atibalasyetyarthaH| tathA viruddhamapannaM deCAbhyAsAdyapekSayA sAtmIbUtaM CarIre sukharaMpIDAyai na bhavati| alpaM ca bhojanaM viruddhaM pIDAyaina bhavati|| 23||

 doSAdivaiparItyena harate rogiNAM rujam||24||  ekadhyaM dadhidugdhAdiyojanA na virudhyate||24||  yogAdibhedAdyadyadvA pathyAnAmapyapathyatA||24||  tadbhedAntaratastadvadvirodho~api nivarttate||24||

nanu ca prAyeNa hi roge kvacidviruddhAnAmapi yathecchopayogAdroganivRttirdRCyate tatkathamityAha| doSAdInAM doSadUSyabalakAlAdInAM aMCasvarUpaviparItatvena rogiNo rujaM harati| ekadhyaM sahabhAvena dadhidugdhAdInAM yojanA na virudhyate| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-kadAcidviruddhasya prayujyamAnasya samudAyaguNairviparItA rogadoSagatiraMCAMCikayA bhavati| tatra rujAharatvaM dRSTam| viruddhamapyaviruddham| athavA yadvat pathyAnAmapi bhAvAnAM saMyogAdibhedenApathyatA dRCyate tadvattasya saMyogAdinA viruddhasya bhedAntareNAdhikasaMyogAdikRtena virodhanACaH| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-saMyogaviCeSAdyathA pathyAnAmapyapathyatA dRSTA tadvadviruddhAnAmapyanyasaMyogAdvirodho~api nirvatate na bhavatIti| tathA hitamapyapathyaM sAtmIbhUtaM ca dehe~abhyAsAdivaCAttatkAla eva ucitaM tadahitaphalatvAttyajet|| 24||

 pAdAMCena tyajetsAtmyamahitaM hitamAcaret||25||  ekAntaraM tataCcordhvaM dvyantaraM tryantaraM tathA||25||

hitaM cAsAtmIbhUtamapyAcaret| taccAhitaM sahasA tyaktaM hitaM ca sevitaM rogAya sampadyate| ata ucyate-pAdAMCeneti| pAdena caturthabhAgenApathyaM tyajet| aMCenaiva bhajet| aMCo bhAgaH| sa ca prakaraNAt pAdasyaiva vijJeyaH| tena pAdena vA pAdapAdena vA tyajedapathyaM tenaiva ca pathyaM bhajet|
kena krameNetyAha-ekAntaramityAdi| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-apathyAducitAdekaM pAdaM caturbhAgaM rogI, balAdyapekSayA pAdapAdaM vA prathamadivase tyajet| sa caturbhAgaH pathyAdanucitAt sevyaH, tato dvitIye~ahni sarvamevApathyaM tatastRtIye~ahni apathyasya traya eva bhAgAH pathyasyaiko bhAga ityekadivasAntaritaM caturthAdiSu divaseSvevameva vA| upayujyamAnacaturthabhAgasAtmIbhAvAt|
tataCcordhvaM dvyantaram| kimuktaM bhavati? caturthe bhAge pathyasya sAtmIbhUte apathyAducitAt dvitIyo bhAgastyAjyaH| tenArddhamapathyasyArddhaM pathyasya tasmin dine bhavati| dvitIye divase sAtmIbhUtacaturbhAga eva yojyaH| evaM tRtIye divase caturthe punararddhamAtramevaM dvidinAntaritam| evaM paJcamAdidivaseSvapi| A arddhasAtmIbhAvAt|
tatastryantaritam| sAtmIbhUte~arddhe tRtIyo bhAge~apathyAttyAjyaH, pathyAcca sevyaH| tasmindine pathyasya bhAgAstrayaH, apathyasyaiko bhAgaH| dvitIye divase sAtmIbhUtaM pathyApathyayorarddhamarddham| evaM tRtIye caturthe ca| paJcame punaCcaturtho bhAgo~apathyasya bhAgAstrayaH pathyasyeti tryantaritam| evaM SaSThAdiSu divaseSvA bhAgatrayasAtmIbhAvAt| tataH sarvameva pathyam| evamekadvitridinAni krameNAsAtmyaM sAMtmyenAntarayitavyam| 
(1) anye manyante-prathame divase bhAgaH pathyAtsevyaH| CeSamapathyam| dvitIye sarvamapathyam| tRtIye punareko bhAgaH| evaM bhAga ekAntaritaH| caturthe dvau| paJcame ekaH| SaSThe ca saptame punardvau dvAviti dvyantareNa| aSTame trayaH, navame dvau| daCame tadvadekAdaCe ca, dvAdaCe punastraya iti tryantaritaH| tatastrayodaCAt prabhRti sarvaM pathyameveti|
(2) anye punaranyathA varNayanti| yathA-anenaivaikAdinA sAtmyamasAtmyenAntarayitavyam| tatra vicAraNAdapathyaM sAtmyaM bhuJjAnaH pathyabhojanecchurekadivasamapathyasya bhAgatrayaM pathyasya caiko bhAgaH| dvitIye sarvamevApathyamityekAntaritam| tRtIye dvau pathyasya dvAvapyapathyasya, evaM caturthe~api| paJcame punarapathyasya bhAgatrayaM caturtho bhAgaH pathyasya, evaM dvyantaram| tataH SaSThe divase trInbhAgAn pathyasya ekamapathyasya| evaM saptame~aSTame ca| navame punardvau dvau bhAgau daCame caturtho~api pathyasya| tadvadekAdaCe dvAdaCe, trayodaCe| caturdaCe punastrayo bhAgAH pathyasya bhAgo~apathyasya| ataH paJcadaCAt prabhRti sarvaM pathyameva yojyam|
anayoreva ca pakSayoryujyamAnatvameva manyAmahe| tathA ca CAstrakRdbhireva Rtusandhau caturddaCadinamAnA kramasamAptiriSTA| 
anye punaranyathA varNayanti-prathame divase~apathyasya trInbhAgAn pathyasyaikam| dvitIye sarvamevApathyam| tRtIye pathyasya dvAvapathyasya ca dvau| caturthe pathyasyaiko bhAgaH, apathyasya bhAgAstrayaH| paJcame~apyevameva| SaSThe pathyasya trIn bhAgAnapathyasyaikam| saptame dvau dvau pathyApathyayorevamaSTame navame ca| daCamAdArabhya sarvameva pathyam|| 25||

 krameNAnena sAntyaktA doSAH saMvardhitA guNAH||26||  prabhavanti na pIDAyai prApnuvanti sthirAtmatAm||26||

ityanena krameNApathyadoSAstyaktAH pIDAyai na bhavanti| pathyaguNACca saMvarddhitAH sthirAtmatAM prApnuvanti|| 26||

 tritayaM caitadupastambhanamAhAraH svapno~abrahmacaryaM ca||27||  ebhiryuktiyuktairupAtabdhamupastambhaiH CarIraM balavarNopacayocitamanuvartate yAvadAyuH saMskAraH||27||  tatrA~a~ahAra ukto vakSyate ca||27||

etatprasaGga evedamucyate| etattrayamupastambho dhArakaM CarIrasya| kimityAha-AhAraH, svapnaH abrahmacaryaM ca| ebhirupastabdhaM dehaM CarIraM yuktyA anyUnAdhikatA~abhidhAnayA yuktaiH| prakarSayuktairbalAdibhiH samRddhamApUrvakarmasaMskAraparikSayAdAyuranuvarttate| tatrAhAraH pUrveSvadhyAyeSUktaH| uttare cAdhyAye jvarAdiSu ca vakSyate|| 27||

 lokAdisargaprabhavA tamomUlA tamomayI||28||  bAhulyAttamaso rAtrau nidrA prAyeNa jAyate||28||

kramaprAptaH svapna ucyate| lokAnAmAdisarge jagadutpAttikAle prabhavo yasyAH sA tathAvidhA| tamaH kAraNAnmUlaM yasyAH sA tamomUlA| tamomayI tamasa eva vikAraH|
tenaitaduktaM bhavati-sarvathA tamastasyAH kAraNamiti| ata eva sA rAtrau prAyeNotpadyate| tamaso nAma mahAguNasya bAhulyAt| sA ca nidrA rAtrau bhavati divA vA| kevalamanayA yuktyA jantUnAviCati|| 28||

 CleSmAvRteSu srotassu CramAduparateSu ca||29||  indriyeSu svakarmabhyo nidrA viCati dehinam||29||

kayetyAha-CleSmAvRteSvityAdi| AhArarasavaCAt CleSmaNA srotasvAvRteSu niruddheSvindriyeSu ca svasvaviSayagrahaNakAraNAcchramAduparateSu nivRtteSu dehinaM nidrA AviCati|| 29||

 sarvendriyavyuparatau mano~anuparataM yadA||30||  viSayebhyastadA svapnaM nAnArUpaM prapaCyati||30||

AviSTAyAM ca nidrAyAM indriyeSu ca viSayebhyo nivRtteSu mano yadA svakarmaNo na nivRttaM, tadA nAnArUpaM svapne prapaCyati dehI| yadA tu kAraNavaCena mano~api svakarmaNo nivRttaM bhavati, sA suSuptAvasthA| tasyAM na kiJcidapi paCyati|| 30||

sUtrasthAnam

viruddhAnnavijJAnIyaH

 nidrAyattaM sukhaM duHkhaM puSTiH kArCyaM balAbalam||31||  vRSatAM klIbatA jJAnamajJAnaM jIvitaM na ca||31||

tasyACca nidrAyAH sukhAdikamAyattam| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-samyak sevitA sukhapuSTibalavRSatvajJAnajIvitairyojayati naram| asamyak prayuktA tu duHkhakArCyAbalatvaklIbatAjJAnaiH yojayatItyarthaH| vRSataM strIgamanaCaktiH| jJAnaM vRddhiH|| 31||

 akAle~atiprasaGgAcca na ca nidrA niveSitA||32||  sukhAyuSI parAtkuryAtkAlarAtririvAparA||32||

etadevocyate-sA nidrA akAle vakSyamANe tadupayogapratiSiddhe kAle api svalpopasevitA, tathA kAle~apyatyantasevitA, sarvadA vA, naiva vA sevitA AyurjIvitaM parAkaroti nACayati| jIvite~api vyAdhyAdibhiH sukhaM parAkaroti| yathA parA dvitIyeva kAlarAtriH maraNaniCA sukhasyAyuSaCca nACanAtsAdRCyam|| 32||

 saiva yuktA punaryuGkte nidrAdehaM sukhAyuSA||33||  yogAbhiyogino buddhirnirmalA~atamasA yathA||33||

saiva nidrA yuktA samyak prayogeNa dehaM sukhenAyuSA ca yojayati| yathA yoge tattvajJAne~abhiyoginaH puruSasya nirmalA buddhiratamasA CuddhasvabhAvena sattvarUpeNa yojayati| athavA tamasA kAraNena nirmalA sukhAyuSA yojayatItyarthaH|| 33||

 rAtrau jAgaraNaM rUkSaM snigdhaM prasvapanaM divA||34||  arUkSamanabhiSyandi tvAsInapracalAyitam||34||

tasyACca nidrAyAH kAle prayoga uktaH, taM ca kAlaM darCayati-rAtrau jAgaraNaM nidrAyA asevA rUkSaM dehe rUkSANAM bhAvAnAM vRddhikaramityarthaH, evaM divA prasvapanaM snigdham| AsInapracalAyitaM na rUkSaM na cAbhiSyandi| AsInapracalAyitaM divA~apyupaviSTasya svalpA nidrA, abhiSyandi mAlinyena srotasAM srAvakaH|| 34||

 grISme vAyucayAdAnaraukSyarAtryalpabhAvataH||35||  divAsvapno hito~anyasmin kaphapittakaro hi saH||35||

grISme tu divAsvapnaM vihitam| yatastasmin kAle vAyoCcayo bhavati| AdAnaM ca paripuSTaM bhavatyato raukSyaM rAtryaCca nidrAsamAptyayogyAH svalpA bhavanti| divAsvapnaCca santarpakaH| grISmAdanyasmin kAle divAsvapnaH pittaCleSmakaraH|| 35||

 muktA~atibhASyayAnAdhvamadyastrIbhArakarmabhiH||36||  krodhaCokabhayaiH klAntAn CvAsahidhmAtisAriNaH||36||  vRddhabAlAbalakSINakSatatRTcchUlapIDitAn||36||  ajIrNyabhihatonmattAndivAsvapnocitAnapi||36||  dhAtusAmyaM tathA hyeSAM CleSmA cAGgAni puSyati||36||

eSAM hyatibhASyaklAntAdInAM divAsvapnena dhAtUnAM vAtAdInAM dehadhArakANAM sAmyamanyUnAdhikatA bhavati| CleSmA cAGgAni puSyati upacinotItyarthaH|| 36||

 bahumedaH kaphAH svapyuH snehanityACca nAhani||37||

bahumedaH CleSmaCarIrA apyatisnigdhAhArAdiCIlinaCca grISme~apyahani na svapyuH|| 37||

 viSArttaH kaNTharogI ca naiva jAtu niCAsvapi||38||

viSArttaH kaNTharogI ca niCAsvapi na jAtucit svapyAt|

 halImakaCirojADyastaimityagurugAtratAH||39||  jvarabhramamatibhraMCasrotorodhAgnimandatAH||39||  CophArocanahRllAsapInasArddhAvabhedakAH||39||  kaNDUrukkoThapiTakAkAsatandrAgalAmayAH||39||  viSavegapravRttiCca bhavedahitanidrayA||39||

ahitanidrAyA viruddhanidrAyAH sevanena halImakAdInAmudbhavaH| ime vakSyamANalakSaNAH| Ciraso jADyaM gurutvamindriyApATavaM ca| staimityaM gAtrANAM nirutsAhatvam| viSArtasya nidrayA viSavegapravRttiH|| 39||

 apacyamAno bAhulyAtsrotAMsyAvRNute kaphaH||40||  tataH srotassu ruddheSu jAyate gAtragauravam||40||  gurugAtrasya cAlasyamAlasyAdatinidratA||40||

atinidrAyAH kAraNamucyate| bAhulyAt kaphasyAgniH kaphaM paktuM na Caknoti| ataH so~acyamAnaH srotAMsyAvRNute sthagayati| tataH srotorodhAt gatragauravaM, gAtragauravAdAlasyamAlasyAdatinidrAtA|| 40||

sUtrasthAnam

viruddhAnnavijJAnIyaH

 virekaH kAyaCirasorvamanaM raktamokSaNam||41||  dhUmaH kSuttRDvyathAharSaCokamaithunabhIkrudhaH||41||  cintotkaNThA~asukhA CayyA sattvaudAryaM tamojayaH||41||  rUkSAnnaM cAhitAM nidrAM vArayanti prasaGginIm||41||

etAmatinidrAM prasaGginImanuSaktAM kAyavirekAdIni nACayanti| asukhA kaSTA| utkRSTasattvatvaM satvaudAryam|| 41||

 eta eva ca vijJeyA nidrAnACasya hetavaH||42||  kAlaCIlakSayo vyAdhirvRddhiCcAnilapittayoH||42||

etAnyeva ca virekAdIni samyaG nidrAyA api nACahetavaH| kAlaCca nidrAnACahetuH yena prabhAtAdau sA na bhavati| CIlamabhyAsaH tena yasya yasya yasmin kAle nidrAnivRttirabhyastA tasya tasya tasmin kAle sA bhavatIti| tathA kSayo dhAtUnAM nidrAnACakAraNam| vyAdhiCcAnyo jvarAdiH| vAtapittayoCca vRddhiH|

 nidrAnACAdaGgamarddaCirogauravajRmbhikAH||43||  jADyaglAnibhramApaktitandrArogACca vAtajAH||43||

tasyACca samyaG nidrAyA nACAdaGgamardAdyudbhavaH|| 43||

 kapho~alpo vAyunoddhUto dhamanIH sannirudhya tu||44||  kuryAtsaMjJApahAM tandrAM dAruNAM mohakAriNIm||44||  unmIlitavinirbhugne parivartitatArake||44||  bhavatastatra nayane srute lulitapakSmaNI||44||  arddhatrirAtrAtsA sAdhyA na sA sAdhyA tataH param||44||

kapho~alpaH ityAdi subodham|| 44||

 yathAkAlamato nidrAM rAtrau seveta sAtmyataH||45||

ataH kAraNAt kAlAnatikrameNa rAtrau nidrAM seveta yAdRCI sAtmyA|| 45||

 asAtmyAjjAgarAdardhaM prAtaH svapyAdabhuktavAn||46||

asAtmye jAgaraNe pravRtte prAtardivA~apyarddhaM jAgaraNasya svapyAt| tenaitaduktaM bhavati yasya rAtrau yAmadvayaM jAgaraNaM pravRttaM tena divA prabhAte yAma ekaH svaptavyaH abhuktavatA|| 46||

 CIlayenmandanidrastu kSIramikSurasaM rasAn||47||  AnUpaudakamAMsAnAM bhakSyAn gauDikapauSTikAn||47||  CAlInmadyAni mASAMCca kIlATAn mAhiSaM dadhi||47||  abhyaGgodvarttanasnAnamUrdhvaCravaNapUraNam||47||  cakSuSastarpaNaM lepaH Ciraso vadanasya ca||47||  pravAte surabhau deCe sukhAM CayyAM yathocite||47||  saMvAhanaM sparCasukhaM cittajJairanujIvibhiH||47||  sarpiH kSIrAnupAnaM ca jIvanIyaiH CRtaM pibet||47||  kAntAbAhulatACleSo nirvRttiH kRtakRtyatA||47||  mano~anukUlA viSayAH kAmaM nidrAsukhapradAH||47||

yastu virekAdikAraNena vAtakopena mandanidraH kSIrAdIn CIlayet| tathA~a~anUpAnAmaudakAdInAJca mAMsAnAM sambandhino rasAn bhakSyAMCca guDasaMskRtAn piSTaCAlikRtAMCca, tathA CAliyonIni madyAni| kimbhUtAni? madakAraNaCaktiyuktAni| anyeSAM CAlimadyAni mASAMCca iti pAThaH| mUrdhnaH CirasastarpaNaM snehapUraNam|
tacca vakSyate| Ciraso vadanasya ca susnigdhairlepaH| pravAte vAtasaMyoge deCe| saMvAhanaM mardanam| kimbhUtam? sparCasukhakaraM na pIDAkaramityarthaH| kena kAryam? cittajJairanujIvibhiH tathA jIvanIyaiH auSadhaiH CRtaM pakvaM sarpiH pibet| tadanu ca kSIraM kevalameva| kAntAbAhulatetyAdi subodham|| 47||

 brahmacaryaratergrAmyasukhaniH spRhacetasaH||48||  nidrA santoSatRptasya svaM kAlaM nAtivarttate||48||  etAnyeva ca bhUyiSThaM nidrAluH parivarjayet||48||

etAnyeva ca kSIrAdIni nidrAluH prasaktanidro bhUyiSThaM bAhulyena parivarjayet|| 48||

 kAlasvabhAvAmayacittadeha-
khedaiH kaphAgantutamobhavA ca||49||  nidrA bibharti prathamA CarIraM 
pApmA~antagA vyAdhinimittamanyAH||49||

kAlasvabhAvAdibhiH saptavidhA nidrA| tatra prathamA yA nidrA sA kAlasvabhAvaprabhavA CarIraM dhArayati| antagA tamobhavA pApmA duSTA| anyA CeSA yA Amayakhedena, cittakhedena, dehakhedena, cAmAdinA, CleSmaprabhavA, AgantunA CastraprahArAdinA jAtA| etAH vyAdhInAM nimittam|| 49||

 grAmyadharmapravRttau tu rajasvalAmaniSTAcArAmaCastAmatisthUlAmatikRCAM garbhiNIM sUtikAmanuttAnAM vikRtAGgAM gaNikAmaprajasaM duSTayonimanyayonimanyastriyaM viCeSAcca vayovarNavRddhAM sagotrAM gurumitrabandhubhRtyapatnIM varNinIM tathA caityacatvaracatuSpathopavanaCmaCAnAghAtasalilauSadhadvijagurusuranRpAlayeSvahani gosarge madhyandine~arddharAtrau parveSvanaGge pipAsurapraNItasaGkalpo vA na gacchet||50||

svapnamuktvA kramaprAptamabrahmacaryamucyate| abrahmacAryaM strIgamanam grAmyadharmapravRttiriti paryAyaH| tasyAM tu grAmyadharmapravRttau prakRtAyAM rajasvalAtvAdiyuktAM nArIM na gacchet| caityAdiSu pradeCeSu divasagosargAdiSu ca kAleSu anaGgaJca pipAsAdyavasthAsu ca| rajasvalA udakyA aniSThAM rUpAdinA apriyAM aniSTAcArA yA priyA~api taddviSTamAcarati| aCastAm hInAkRtijanmalakSaNAm| vikRtAGgAM kaubjavAmanatvAdijanmayuktAm| gaNikAM veCyAm| aprajasaM vandhyAm| yasyA vA prajA jAtA~api na jIvati| duSTaM vyAdhibhiryoniryasyAH| anyayonirvaDavAgardabhyAdiH anyastrI parastrI viCeSAcca vayovarNavRddhAM na gacchet| varNavRddhA jAtyadhikA| vayovRddhA prasiddhA| sagotrAmekagotrAM tathA gurvAdipatnIM ca viCeSAdvarjayet| caityaH prasiddhaH| grAmAdbahirmahAvRkSaCca caityaH| catvaraH tripatham| AghAtanaM sUnAdinigrahasthAnam| salilAdInAmAlayenACrayavAcinA sambandhaH| salilAlayo nadItaTAkAdiH| auSadhAlayaH tatsthAnaM parvataveSmAdiH yatra bahUnyauSadhAni bhavanti| gosargo rAtrikSayaH| parvadinaM caturthI, SaSThI, aSTamI amAvasyA ca| anaGgaM yonyAbhidhAnAdaGgAdanyat pANyUrvAdi| apraNItasaGkalpo anutpannatadicchaH|| 50||

sUtrasthAnam

viruddhAnnavijJAnIyaH

 na ca viparItavyavAye yojayet||51||

na viparItavyavAye ca striya kAJcana yojayet| viparItavyavAyaH striyAH puruSakarma|| 51||

 viCeSeNa cAtivyAyatAM garbhiNIM navaprasUtAmRtumatIM saMvRtayoniJca||52||

ativyAyatatvAdiyuktAM tu viCeSeNa na yojayet| atrAnRtumatyasaJjAtArttavA bAlA| RtumatImiti kecit paThanti| ativyAyatA mahAbhogaCarIrA|| 52||

 mUrddhAbhighAtaM ca pariharet||53||  na ca niSekAbhimukhaM CukraM dhArayediti||53||

maithune mUrdhnaH Ciraso~abhighAtaM tADanaM varjayet| tathA vRkSaHprabhRtInAM deCAdyapekSayA ca parigrahaH|| 53||

 manaHCarIrasthitimAtrameva vyavAyaM seveta||54||  na tatparaH syAditi||54||

yAvatA vyavAyena manasa autsukyaM CarIre ca CukrasrutyAdikaM na paCyati| tAvantameva vyavAyaM seveta| naiva maithunaparaH syAditi|| 54||

 bhavati cAtra ClekaH-
visrabdhahRSTo rahasi tatkAmastaruNaH pumAn||55||  samasthitAGgaH surabhirmuktamUtrAdiravyathaH||55||  nAnACito nAtyaCito vRSyANAM tarpitastryaham||55||  nArIM nArIrguNairyuktAM sahapUrNaguNAM vrajet||55||

bhavati cAtreti CailI| visrambhAdiyukto nArIM vrajet| visrabdhaH svasthAmanAH rahasyekAnte| tatkAmo gamyamAnayoSitkAmaH gamanadivasAt pUrvaM divasatrayaM vRSNairAhAraiH kRtatRptiH| kimbhUtAM nArIM nArIguNairvAjIkaraNAdhyAyotkairyuktAm| tatra hi `tasmAdyA yasya hRdayam' ityAdinA vakSyati| pUrvoktaiCca guNairvisrambhAdibhiH puruSoktaH| kevalaM liGgavaiparItyam|| 55||

 dvyahAdvasante tasyAnte pakSAttadvad ghanodaye||56||  seveta kAmataH kAmaM hemante CiCire balI||56||

vasante dvyahAnnArIM vrajet tasya vasantasyAnte grISme pakSAttadvat ghanodaye varSAsu hemante CiCire ca balI balavAn kAmato yathecCaM seveta|
Caradi tvanuktAvapi vasantasadRCabalAdimatvAd dvyahAdeva nArIM vrajet| tathA ca CrIvAgbhaTagrantha eva- `dvyahAvasantaCaradoH' iti|| 56||

 snAnAGgarAgavyajanendupAda-
mAMsAsavakSIrarasAn rasAlAm||57||  bhakSyAn sitADhyAn salilaM suSItaM 
seveta nidrAJca ratAntatAntaH||57||

ratAnte ca tAntaH klAntaH snAnAdIn seveta|| 57||

 strIsaMsargAddhi sadyaH syAtklIbatA balinAmapi||58||  evaM cApyAyate CIghraM teSAM CukraM ca dhAma ca||58||

kimarthametat kuryAdata Aha- strIsaMsargAditi| balinAmapi strIsaMsarge tatkAlaM klaibyamavaCyameva bhavati| anena tu snAnAdinA kRtena CIghrameva CukramApyAyate|| 58||

 duSTyAyurojaHCukrANAM kSayaM meDhrACrayAn gadAn||59||  vAyoH kopamadharmaM ca mUDhaH prApnotyato~anyathA||59||  uttAno vegarodhI vA vRddhimehACmaCarkarAH||59||  timirAdigadotpattirmUrddhAdyahananAd dhruvam||59||

ato yathoktAdvidhAnAdanyena nArIM gacCanmUDho dRSTyAdikSayaM meDhrarogAn vAtakopadharmaM ca prApnoti yathAsambhavam| tathA striyAH puruSAyite puruSa uttAno gacCan vAyorvaiparItyenACu CukranirgamanAd vRddhyAdIn prApnoti| yaCcAnyathApi CukravegarodhI so~api| vRddhirAntravRddhiH vakSomUrddhAdyAhananAttimirAdIn UrdhvajatrurogAnurasaH CUlAdIMCca prApnoti| dhruvamAvaCyake|| 59||

 bhramaklamorudaurbalyabaladhAtvindriyakSayaH||60||  aparvamaraNaM ca syAdviCeSeNAtimaithunAt||60||

atimaithunAt bhramAdyutpattiH| aparvamaraNamakAlamaraNam| viCeSeNorvorbalahAniH, Urudaurbalyam|| 60||

sUtrasthAnam

viruddhAnnavijJAnIyaH

 na conaH SoDaCAdvarSAt saptateH parato na ca||61||  AyuSkAmo naraH strIbhiH saMyogaM gantumarhati||61||

AyuryoH naraH kAmayate sa SoDaCAd varSAdadhaH saptaterUrdhvaM ca varSeSu strIbhiH saMsarge gantuM nArhati|| 61||

 atibAlo hyAsampUrNasarvadhAtuH striyaM vrajan||62||  upatapyeta sahasA taTAkamiva kAjalam||62||

yataH SoDaCAdUnavarSa atibAlaH asampUrNadhAtuH sahasA striyo gacCannupatapyeta yathA taTAkaM kAjalaM stokajalaM jhaTityeva sUryasantApAdi bhirupatapyate CuSyati tathA|| 62||

 CuSkaM rUkSaM yathA kASThaM jantujagdhaM vijarjaram||63||  spRSTamACu viCIryeta tathA vRddhaH striyaM vrajan||63||

saptaterUrdhvaM vRddhaH striyo vrajan ACu viCIryeta JaTiti naCyeta| yathA jantubhiH kRmibhirbhakSitaM kASThaM CuSkaM rUkSaM vijarjjaramatipurANatvAnnaSTasthairyaM spRSTaM naCyatIti|| 63||

 kAyasya tejaH paramaM hi CukramAhArasArAdapi sArabhUtam||64||  jitAtmanA tatparirakSaNIyaM tato vapuH santatirapyudArA||64||

evaM sthite jitAtmanA jitendriyeNa satA CukraM parirakSaNIyam| yataH kAyasya CarIrasya CukraM CreSThaM tejaH| kimbhUtam tat? AhArasya sArAdrasAkhyAdapi sArabhUtaM tasmAdrakSaNIyam| ataCca rakSaNIyam| yatastataH CukrAdrakSitAdvapuH CarIraM satejastvAdudAramutkRSTaM bhavati|| 64||

 apramato bhajedbhAvAMstadAtvasukhasaMjJakAn||65||  sukhodarkeSu sajjeta dehasyaitadalaM hitam||65||

idaM kartavyatAprasaGgenocyate| tadAtvasukhasajJakAn bhAvAnapramattaM bhajet| tadAtvasukhasaMjJakAn ye tadAtve dRSTaM eva tatkAlaM sukhaphalA yoSidAhAradayaste bhAvAH apramattAdinA satA sevyAH| yato dRSTAdRSTyorduHkhakarttRtvena na virudhyante ye tadAtvasukhAsteSAM vastuto duHkhAnAmeva sukhabuddhirlokasyeti jJApayati saMjJAgrahaNena| tathA sukhodarkeSu sadyo duHkhAdeSvapi adRSTasukhaphaleSu sajjeta tAtparyamACrayeta tapodAnAdiSu| etadubhayaM dehasya hitatve paryAptam|| 65||

 prajJAparAdho~asAtmyArthasaMyogaH kAlavaikRtam||66||  hite~api ratamAhAre yojayantyAmayairnaram||66||

tasmAt prajJAparAdhAdi naramAmayairvyAdhibhiryojayati| prajJAparAdho dinacaryoktAcAravyatikramaH| tathA~asAtmyairanucitaiH CabdAdibhiridriyArthaiH saMyogaH| kAlasya ca vikRtatvaM viSamatvaM vA| yathAprAptatvAdviparItasvarUpatvam| kimbhUtaM naramityAha- hite~apyAhAre ratamahitasya tvAhArasya rogakRttvaM sthimevetyapi CabdasyArthaH|| 66||

 nApathyasevanaM sadyaH prabAdhante tadA malAH||67||  prakopaM prativighnanti bhinnairdUSyAdibhiryadA||67||  na ca sarvopacAro~api sarvadA sarvadoSakRt||67||  na hi sarvANyapathyAni tulyadoSANi naiva ca||67||  sarve tulyabalA doSA na sarvANi vapUMSi ca||67||  vyAdhikCamatve CaktAni...................||67||

nanu caivaM hi dRSTaM yathA apathyaM sevitaM na ca roga utpannaH| tat kathamityucyate| apathyasevinaM puruSaM malA vAtAdayaH sadya eva tadA na bAdhante yadA bhinnairvisadRCairdUSyadeCAdibhiH prakope vighnanti| yathA pittakopakAraNe AnUpadeCe sevite jhaTiti vyAdhirnotpadyate| yadA tu dUSyAdInAM sAdRCyAt malAnAM kope vighno na bhavati tadAvaCyaM sadya eva bAdhante| ataCca sadyo na bAdhante malAH| yato na sarvApacAro~apathyasevanaM sarvadaiva sarvadoSakaraH| tenaitaduktaM bhavati- kiCcdapacAraH kadAciddoSaviCeSahetuH| dUSyAsAdRCyAt| yato na hi sarvANyapathyAni tulyadoSANi ekadoSahetUni| tathA hi - yenApathyaM CleSmakAraNaM sevitaM tasya tasminnAhArAdAvavaCyaM tadviparItadoSakAraNamapi sambhavati| yena sa na tathA kupyati| yataCca sarve doSA na sadRCabalAH| kaCciddhInabalo balAdhikena ruddhakopo na kupyati na ca sarvANi vapUMSi vyAdhikSamatve CaktAni| tenaitaduktaM bhavati- bahurapi doSaH kupito vyAdhikSame dehe na lakSyate| pIDAkaraNACaktatvAt|| 67||

 ....................yato~apathyaM tadeva tu||68||  gacCatyapathyatamatAM tulyadoSAdivarddhitam||68||

tathA tulyairdUSyAdibhirupabRMhitamapathyaM yato~apathyatamatAM gacCanti balAt| etaduktaM bhavati- visadRCairdUSyAdibhiryuktamapathyaM kadAciddoSakaraM na bhavati| tulyAH sadRCadUSyAdayaH| yathA CleSmaprakRtermandAgneralpabalasya svalpasattvasya snigdhAdisAtmyasya snigdhagurvAdiprakupitena kaphena vasante medaso dUSaNam| atraikadvitrANAM dUSyAdInAM sAdRCyAsAdRCyayoH kAryakarttRtve gurulAghavaM kalpanIyam|| 68||

 ta eva ca punardoSA hetubhirbahubhiCcitAH||69||  mithe viruddhA balino dIrghakAlAnubandhinaH||69||  sarve samaprakupitAH prApyAlpamapi kAraNam||69||  prANAyatanamACritya gambhIrAH sarvamArgagAH||69||  dehe~ahitocite te syuCcirAdapyACukAriNaH||69||

ta eva ca vAtAdayo doSA ye apathyahetavaste cirAdapi svalpamapi kAraNamAsAdyApathyocite dehe ACukAriNo vyAdhInAM mAraNAtmakena karmaNA bhavanti| kimbhUtAH? hetubhiH kAraNaiH CItagurvAdibhirbahubhiCcitAH saJcitA mithaH paraspareNa viruddhAstathA balavanto dIrghakAlAnubandhino bahukAlasthitAH sarve ca samamekakAlaM prakupitAH prANAyatanaM prANasthAnaM hRdayAdikamACritya prakupitA gambhIrA antassarAH sarvamArgagA aCeSasrotovyApinaH|| 69||

 ahitAnyapi cAnyeSAmabhyAsAdupaCerate||70||  doSACcaiSAM kSayaM yAnti karmavAtAtapAdibhiH||70||

anyeSAM cAhitAnyapi abhyAsAdupaCayavanti bhavanti| upaCayaH sAtmyaM dehasukhakarttRtvam| nanu ca tadahitaM vAtAdikopena kathaM rogaM na karoti? ucyate- teSAmahitocitAnAM doSAH karmabhirddhAvanalaGghanAdibhirvAtAtapAdibhiCca kSayamAyAnti| pratidinaM vRddhAH pratidinameva kSIyante|| 70||

sUtrasthAnam

viruddhAnnavijJAnIyaH

 bhinAhArAvayaHsAtmyaprakRtInAM samaM bhavet||71||  eko vikRvAyvAdiyugapatsevanAdgadaH||71||

nanu caivamanantaroktena prakAreNa bhinneSu bhinnabaleSu bhinnakAleSu ca doSadUSyAdiSu bahUnAmekarogotpattiH samakAlaM dRSTA tat kathamityucyate- bhinnAhAretyAdi| bhinnA visadRCA AhAradayo yeSAM te tathAvidhAH teSAM samamekakAlaM ya eko gadaH sa vikRtAnAM vAyvAdInAM sevanAt|| 71||

 vAtAdInAM tu vikRtirvikRtAdgrahacArataH||72||  bhaumAntarikSadivyebhya utpAtebhyaCca jAyate||72||

kathaM teSAM vAtAdInAM tathAvidhA vikRtirucyate| vikRtAt grahANAM rACigamanAt| bhaumAdibhyaCcotpAtebhyaH| bhUmau jAto bhaumaH| evaM divi svarge antarikSe ca|| 72||

 sambhavaH punareteSAM karmaNaH sAmudAyikAt||73||

eteSAM ca vikRtagrahacArabhaumotpAtAdInAM sAmudAyikAt pUrvakRtAtsamprati kRtAcca miCrIbhUtAt karmaNaH sambhavaH| pUrve kRtena tasmin kAle puruSasya prAptaphalena sAmpratikena ca pUjyapUjAvyatikrameNa ca|| 73||

 duSTo vAyurabhiSyandI stimito~atyUSNaCItalaH||74||  kuNDalI bhairavaravaH paruSo~anArttavo balI||74||  anyonyavyAhatagatiH pAMsubASpaviSAnvitaH||74||

nanu duSTAnAM vAtAdInAM doSakAraNatvamuktam| ke ca te iti na jJAyante| ato lakSaNArthamucyate| duSTo vAyurabhiSyandI mAlinyena srotasAM srAvakaH| stimitaH avegavAnatyuSNo bhavatyatiCIto vA kuNDalyAvarttavAn bhairavaravo bhISaNaCabdaH| paruSastathAnArttavaH ArtavAdviparItaH balI balavAn anyonyaM parasparaM digviCeSeNa vyAhatagatI ruddhamArgaH pAMsvAdyanvitaCceti duStavAtalakSaNam|| 74||

 rasavarNAdivikRtamapakrAntavihaGgamam||75||  ninditaprabhavaM toyamupakSINajalACayam||75||

toyaM duSTaM rasavikRtyAdiyuktaM ninditAt kustitAdyeCAdeH prabhavo yasya tanninditaprabhavaM athavA ninditAnAM krimyAdInAM prabhavo yataH sa ninditaprabhavaH|| 75||

 makSikAmUSikAvyAlabahUtpAtapradUSitaH||76||  deCo~apathyAnnabahulo naSTadharmamahauSadhiH||76||

deCo duSTo makSikAdapradUSito bhavati| atra ca bhUyiSThamapathyAnyannAni bhavanti|| 76||

 kAlaCca viparIto~atihInaliGgo yathAyatham||77||

kAlaCca duSTo yathAprAptartusvarUpavivakSayA viparItaliGgo~atiliGgo hInaliGgaCca|| 77||

 ete duSparihAratvAdahitAyottarottaram||78||

ete duSTA vAtAdayaH uttarottaramahitAH| yo yasmAduttaraH sa tasmAdahitaH| kathamAha- uttarottarameva duSparihAratvAdvAto~api duSparihAraH| so~api kadAcit parihartuM Cakyate veCmapraveCAdinA| tato~api jalaM duSparihAram| annapAnAdyupayogAt| tato~api deCo vinA deCAntaramupAyAbhAvAt| tato~api kAlaH anyadeCagamanAdyupAyAsambhavAt sarvagatvAt kAlasya|| 78||

 guNavadbhiSagAdInAM sambhave sambhavettu yaH||95||  mRtyuM taM kAlajaM prAhuritaraM tadviparyaye||95||  yathA rathe vAhyamAno nyAyena kramaCaH kSayam||95||  yAyAdAtmavatAmAyustathA~anyeSAM viparyayaH||95||  CucitailadaCo dIpaH kITavAtAdyapIDitaH||95||  dIptimAn vartate samyagyathaivAsnehasaMkSayAt||95||  sa evAto yathA ca syAdviparIto viparyaye||95||  hitAhitopacAreNa tathaiva puruSo dhruvam||95||

tathA Cuci nirmalaM tailaM daCA ca yasmin dIpe sa kITAdyapIDito yathaiva snehaparikSayo yAvat samyagdIptimAn vartate tadvaddhitopacAreNa puruSaH| etadviparyaye aCucitailadaCatve kITAdipIDitatve ca sa eva ca dIpo viparIto na dIptimAn snehe tiSThatyapi syAttathaiva puruSaH ahitopacAreNa dhruvamavaCyameva vijJeyaH| tenaitaduktaM bhavati- CucitailadaCaH kITAdyapIDitaCca dIpaH yathA dIptimAn vartate, snehakSayena tu kSayaM yAtyevaM puruSaH apramatto~apyAyuSaH kSayAt kSayaM yAti niyatAyurapi| tathA~akSINe snehe~api yathA dIpo vAtAdipIDitatvAt kSayaM yAti evamahitopacAreNApi puruSa AyuSyakSINe~api niyatAyurahitopacAreNa dhruvaM avaCyam|| 95||

 sarvamanyat parityajya CarIraM pAlayedataH||96||  tadabhAve hi bhAvAnAM sarvAbhAvaH CarIriNAm||96||  nagarI nagarasyeva rathasyeva rathI tathA||96||  svaCarIrasya medhAvI kRtyeSvavahito bhavet||96||

annapAnavidhiH

 athAto~annapAnavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

athAta ityAdi pUrvavat vyAkhyeyam||1||

 vidhivihitamannapAnamiSTendriyArthamAyatanamAyuSo bruvate||2||  yadAyattAni hyojastejodhAtvindriyabalatuSTipuSTipratibhArogyAdIni||2||  tadindhanA cAntarAgneH sthitiH||2||  agnimUlaM ca dehadhAraNamiti||2||

AyatanamACrayamAcAryA bruvate|
tathAvidhasyAhArasyAyattAnyojaHprabhRtIni| kAryakAraNabhAvAt| tadindhanA AhAra indhanaM yasyA antarAgnisthiteH sA tathAvidhA dehasya dhAraNe~agniH
prathamaM kAraNam||2||

 athAtmavAn svabhAva-saMyoga-saMskAra- mAtrA-deCa- kAlopayoga-vyavasthAH

hitamevAnurudhyeta||3||

athAnantaramannapAnasya vidhyupayogaprayojanamuktvA vidhirucyate| 
AtmavAn buddhimAn annasya svabhAvasaMyogAdIn sapta samyak sUkSmayA buddhyA 
samIkSya hitamevopayuktaM yatetAhitaM parityajet| 
kimbhUtAn sapta? Aha-svAsthyAsvAsthyaphalAnAmAhArakalpanAviCESANA-

 tatra svabhAvato divyodakaraktaCAliSaSTikamudgaiNalAvAdayo laghavaH, kSIrekSuvrIhimASAnUpAmiSAdayo gurava iti||4||  te khalvapi saMyogAdiviCeSairanyathAtvaM pratipadyante||4||

anne ca dravyANi saMyogaviCeSeNa hi vilakSaNakAryakarANi bhavanti| eSAM ca svabhAvasaMyogAdInAM lakSaNamucyate| tatra svabhAvo dravyasvarUpam| yathA divyodakAdInAM laghutvam kSIrAdInAM gurutvamiti|
tAni dravyANi saMyogAdiviCeSAtsvabhAvAdanyathAtvaM vaiparItyaM bhajante| etacca mAtrAdiprakaraNe savistaramuktam| kevalamatra lakSaNamucyate||4||

 tatra saMyogo nAma dvayorbahUnAM vA dravyANAM saMhatIbhAvaH||5||  sa viCeSamArabhate yannaikaikaCo dravyANi||5||

saMyogo~anekasya sAhityam| sa ca saMyogaH saMyogidravyakAryaviCiSTaM kAryamArabhate| yat kAryamekaikaM dravyaM kartumaCaktaM satyapi svakAryakartRtve||5||

 saMskArastu toyAgnisannikarSaCaucamanthanadeCakAlabhAvanAbhAjanAdibhirupajanyate||6||

saMskAro~asyaiva dravyasya jalAgnisannikarSAdibhirviCeSaprAptiH

 mAtrA punaH piNDaparimANataH samudAyena pratidravyApekSayA cAhArarACiH||7||

mAtrA dvidhA| ekA piNDaparimANena| yathAnnenAvicAritagurulAghavena kukSerdvau bhAgau pUrayitavyAviti| nAnAvidhadravyasamudAyena dvitIyA pratidravyApekSayA| yathA gurUNAM dravyANAmarddhatRptyA, laghUnAM ca nAtitRptatayA bhavati iti| dvividho~apyAhArarACirmAtrACabdavAcyaH||7||

 deCo dravyasyopayoktuCcotpattyavasthAne||8||  tatra punarupayoktA svasthAturatvataH prakRtibhedataCca parIkSyaH||8||

deCo dravyasyopayujyamAnasyotpattisthAnamutpannasya ca sthitisthAnamevamupayoktuCca puruSasya| tena kasmin kiGguNayukte deCe puruSo dravyaM vA jAtaM, kasmin vA sthitamiti vikalpayedityarthaH| tatra ca deCe tasya dravyasyopayoktA svastho vA syAdAturo vA kimprakRtiCceti parIkSyaH| etAvatA hi nAnAvidhaviCeSAvagatirbhavati||8||

 kAlastu RtuvyAdhyapekSo jIrNAjIrNalakSaNaCca||9||

kAlastu dvaividhyenAnnapAnopayogayogyatAM yAti| RtuvyAdhyapekSatvena jIrNAjIrNalakSaNatvena ca| tatra svasthasya RtvapekSayAsminnRtAvevamAhArapAnamAmnAtamityAturasya tu vyAdhyapekSayAsmin vyAdhAvasyAmavasthAyAmidaM yojyamiti| yathA jvare- `kSIrocitasya' ityAdi| athavA~a~aturasyApi RtvapekSA vidyata eva| tathAhi- Caradi CleSmaje~api vyAdhau tadviparItAnyapi atyarthatIkSNoSNAni dAtuM na pAryante| ubhayasya svasthasyAturasya ca jIrNAjIrNalakSaNaH||9||

 ajIrNe~api pUrvasyAhArasyApariNato rasa uttareNopasaMsRjyamAnaH sarvAn doSAn prakopayatyACu||10||

etaducyate-ajIrNasya tu dvaividhyamannatvenAhArasAratvena ca| anne tvajIrNe bhojanecchA~api na bhavati| AhArasAre tvajIrNa uttareNAdyatanena rasena miCrIbhUte vAtAdInAmupalepena mArgarodhAdinA prakopaH CIghrameva||10||

 mAtrACI syAt||2||  mAtrA punaragnibalAhAradravyApekSiNI||2||

mAtrACI syAdityAdinA prastutapradarCanam| sA ca mAtrA agnerbalamAhAradravyANAJca tadanurUpaM gurutvaM laghutvaM cApekSya bhavatItyagnerAhArasya ca parasparayogyatvamityarthaH|| 2||

 kukSerapratipIDanamAhAreNa, hRdayasyAsaMrodhaH, pArCvayoravipATanamanatigauravamudarasya, prINanamindriyANAM, kSutpipAsoparatiH, sthAnAsanaCayanagamanocchvAsapraCvAsabhASyasaGkathAsu sukhAnuvRttiH, sAyaM prAtaCca sukhena pariNamanam, balavarNopacayakaratvaJceti mAtrAyA lakSaNam||3||

nanu mAtraiva na jJAtA ato mAtrAlakSaNamucyate| AhAreNa kukSerapIDanam hRdayasya cAsaMrodhaH| pArCvayoCcAnnabhareNa pATanamiva pATanam| tasyAbhAvaH avipATanam| udarasya cAnatigurutvam| indriyANAM cakSurAdInAM prINanaM santarpaNam| kSuttRSoCca nACanam| sthAnAsanAdiSu sukhAnuvRttiH| ucchvAsapraCvAsau CvAsasyAntarbahirnayanam| sAyantanasya ca bhojanasya prAtaH sukhena pariNAmaH prAtastanasya ca sAyam| balAdyupacakartRtvaM cAhArasyeti mAtrAlakSaNam|| 3||

 tribhAgasauhityaM vA gurUNAmupadiCyate||4||  laghUnAmapi nAtisauhityam||4||  anilAnalaguNabahulAni hi laghUni tulyaguNatvAdagnisandhukSaNAnyavidhinA cAlpadoSANi||4||  itarANi tu pRthivIsalilaguNabahulAnyasAmAnyAdviparItAnyanyatra vyAyAmAgnibalAt||4||

yasminnAhAre yasmAnena bhujyamAne CarIrasyaivaMrUpatA bhavati, sA mAtreti piNDaparimANena| pratidravyApekSayA tUcyate, gurUNAmAhAradravyANAM svabhAvasaMskArAdyapekSayA puruSabalApekSayA vA tribhAgatRptirarddhatRptirvA|
laghUnAJca nAtitRptiH|
yato laghUni vAyvagnibhAgAdhikyenotpadyante| atastatsvabhAvenAgnisAdRCyAdagnivRddhikarANyevaM cAvidhinA yathoktakramAdInAmabhAvAdevApi svalpadoSakartRtvaM laghUnAm|
itarANi gurUNi pArthivApyaguNabhUyastvAdagnervaiparItyAnnACahetavaH| vyAyAmAgnibalAdanyatra vyAyAmakAraNaM hi yadagnibalaM tatra gurUNyapyadoSakarANi| eSA mAtrA|| 4||

 amAtrA punaraCanasya hInatA~a~adhikyaM ca||5||  tatra hInamAtramaCanaM balavarNopacayamanobuddhIndriyopaghAtakaraM vibandhakRdavRSyamanAyuSyamanaujasyaM sAravidhmApanamalakSmIjananamaCIteCca vAtavikArANAmAyatanam||5||  atimAtraM punaH sarvadoSaprakopanamAhuH||5||

amAtrA punaryathoktAyA hInatvamAdhikyaM vA| 
tatra hInamAtramAhAraM balavarNanACAdIn karoti| sArasya balasya vidhmApanaM nACanam|
yathoktAdatimAtraM punardoSAn prapIDayan kukSimApUrya tiSThati|| 5||

 tena hi prapIDyamAnA vAtAdayo yugapatprakupitAH kukSyaikadeCasthAstadevAparipakvamAviCya viSTambhayanto~alasakamabhinirvartayanti||6||  sahasA vAdharottarAbhyAM mArgAbhyAM pracyAvayanto viSUcikAm||6||

tataste doSAH tena ruddhamArgAstamevAhAramapakvamAviCya dvidhA kurvanti| kadAcittadannaM viSTabhyAsate|
athavAnnaM pakvApakvaM bahiH prerayanti| yadA tu viSTabhyAsate tadA~alasakanAmAnaM rogamabhinirvartayanti| yadA prerayanti tadA viSUcikAm|| 6||

 api ca-
prayAti nordhvaM nAdhastAdAhAro na ca pacyate||7||  AmACaye~alasIbhUtastena so~alasakaH smRtaH||7||

etadeva prayAti nordhvamityAdinA savistaramucyate|| 7||

 vividhairvedanodbhedairvAyvAdibhRCakopataH||8||  sUcIbhiriva gAtrANi vidhyatIti viSUcikA||8||

vAyvAdInAmatyarthakopAnnAnAvidhairvedanAnAmudbhedaiH sUcIbhiriva gAtrANi yadasau vidhyati ato viSUcikocyate|| 8||

 tatra vAtaH CUlAnAhAGgamardamukhaCoSapralApakampamUrcchAbhramajRmbhodve-STanAkSipraveCaCirohRdayAtiruksirAkuJcanastambhanAni karoti||9||

tatra viSUcikAkAraNatve yadA vAto~adhiko bhavati tadA CUlAdyutpattiM karoti| aGgAnAM rajjvAdyudveSTanamivodveSTanam|| 9||

pittaM vRddhaM jvarAdIn| pralayo mUrcchAprAyaH|| 10||

 AmadoSeSu tvannakAle jIrNAhAraM doSopaliptAmACayaM stimitagurukoSThamanannAphilASiNamaphisamIkSya pAyayeddoSaCeSapAcanArthamauSadhaM vahni saMdhukSaNArthaJca||32||

CeSeSu tvAmadoSeSu jIrNe hyAhAre doSopaliptAmACayaM puruSaM tathA stimitaH acalo guruCca koSTho yasya taM tathAhAre ca nirabhilASiNaM evaMvidhAvasthAyuktamAmadoSiNamavekSyAhArasya jIrNatvAtkAlavaCAddoSeSu kiJcitopakveSvapi doSaCeSasya pAcanArthamagnisandhukSaNArthaM ca kiJcidevaGguNamauSadhaM pAyayet||32||

 ajIrNAhAraM punarna pAyayet||33||  yata AmadoSadurbalo hyagniryugapadAmadoSamauSadhamAhArajAtaM cACaktaH paktum||33||  api caiCAM viphramo~atiphalatvAduparatAnalaphalamAturaM sahasaivAtipAtayet||33||

ajIrNAhArAya na deyamauSadham| yata AmadoSakRtabhalahAniragnirvAtAdikamapakvaM doSaM prayujyamAnamauSadhamAhAraJcAjIrNaM paktumaCaktaH| api ceti pAdasamuccaye| eSAmAmAdInAM bhibhramo duSTotkarSiNI sAmagrI atibhalatvAnnaSTAnalabhalamAturaM sahasaivAtipAtayet CIghrameva mArayedityarthaH||33||

 AmadoSajAnAM punarvikArANAmapatarpaNenaivopaCamo phavati||1||

tathA madhyadoSo nAtivRddho laGghanenopavAsena pAcanena ca kvAthAdinA CoSaM yAti| yathA madhyaH salilACayo nAtibahujalo vAtAtapAbhyAM pAMsubhasmAvakiraNena CoSamApadyate| tadvan madhyo~api doSaH| laGghanasya vAtAtapAbhyAM sAdRCyam| pAcanasya pAMsubhasmAvakiraNena||37||

 bahudoSANAM punardoSAvasecanameva kAryam||38||  na hyasrAvite palvalodakaughe CAlyAdipuSTirbhavati||38||

 tasmAtsantarpaNanimittAnAM nAntareNApatarpaNamasti CAntiH||39||  apatarpaNanimittAnAJca nAntareNa santarpaNamiti||39||

 evamanyeSAmapi vyAdhInAM yathAsvaM nidAnaviparItamauSadhamavacArayet||40||

 dvividhamauSadham- UrjaskaraM rogaghnaJca||2||  ubhayamapi cobhayAtmakam||2||  bAhulyena tu nirdeCaH||2||  tatrorjaraskaraM dvividhaM rasAyanaM vAjIkaraNaJca||2||  rogaghnamapi dvividham- rogasya praCamanamapunarbhavakaraJca||2||

sarvaM CarIraviSayaM vastu dvividhamauSadhamanauSadhaM ca| tatra auSadhaM pathyamanauSadhaM ca CarIrasyApathyam| tatrauSadhaM prAdhAnyAdAdAvucyate| anauSadhaM vakSyAmaH sarvamauSadhaM CarIrahitaM dvividham| UrjaskaraM rogaghnaJca| UrjaskaraM yatsvasthasyApi balavarNAdyupacayaM karoti| rogaghnaM vyAdhinACanam| ubhayamapi dvayamapi punardravyAtmakamUrjjaskare~api dhAtusAmyakaraNaCaktatvAt vyAdhyupaCamaH sambhavati| vyAdhyupaCame tu varNabalAdyupacayaH spaSTa eva| tasmAd dvayamapi dravyAtmakaM tatrApi yadyatra pradhAnaM tena vyapadeCe UrjaskaraM rogaghnaM ceti| tatrorjaskaraM dvividhaM- rasAyanavAjIkaraNabhedena| rogaghnamapi dvividham- vyAdheH sthitasya nACanaM naSTasya ca punarutpattirakSaNam| anenA~api prakAreNa dvividhaM rogaghnam||2||

 punaCca dvividhaM dravyamadravyaJca||3||  tatra dravyaM trividhaM- bhaumamaudbhidaM jaGgamamiti||3||  teSu vakSyamANaM hemAdilavaNAntaM prAyeNa bhaumam||3||  audbhidaM punarvanaspativAnaspatyavIrudauSadhibhedena caturvidhaM bhavati||3||  tatra phalino vanaspatiH, puSpaphalavAn vAnaspatyaH, vallIgulmaM vIrut, phalapAkAntACcauSadhya iti||3||  jaGgamodbhavaM madhughRtAdi jaGgamadravyamAhuH||3||  adravyaM punarupavAsAnilAtapacchAyAmantrasAntvadAna-bhayottrAsasaMkSobhaNaharSaNa- bhartsanahasanaswvapnajAgaraNasaMvAhanAdIni||3||

dravyamadravyaM ca| dravyaM mUrttaM sakalendriyaviSayaM ca| ato~anyadadravyam| etacca dvayamapi rogasya praCamane punarbhavarakSaNe va samarthaM bhavati| tatra bhaumAdibhedena trividhaM dravyamihAdhyAye vakSyamANam| suvarNAdilavaNAntaM bAhulyena bhaumam| audbhidaM vanaspatyAdibhedena caturvidham| tatra phalino vanaspatiH| phalinaCabdaH phalavati vartate| phalabarhAbhyAminajitInacpratyAyantaH| puSpaprAdhAnyena phalavAn vAnaspatyaH| vallI santAnavatI latAgulmaM ca| hrasvaM bhUmilagnaM bahusUkSmaCAkhaM ca vIrucchabdenocyate| phalapAke~antaH parNAdivinACalakSaNo yAsAM tA auSadhyaH| jaGgamaprANiyonitvAnmadhughRtamUtrAdi jaGgamamucyate| adravyaM punarupavAsAdi| anilasyAsakalendriyagrAhyatvAdamUrttatvAccAdravyatvamatraiva vyavahArArtham| bAhyasya saMvAhanamaGgamardanam| ete copavAsAdayo~asmin tantre yathApradeCaM rogaghnatvenoktAH||3||

 punarapi ca trividhaM daivavyapACrayaM yuktivyapACrayaM sattvAvajayaCceti||4||  tatra daivavyapACrayaM mantrauSadhimaNimaGgalabalyupahArahomaniyamaprAyaCcittopa-vAsasvastyanapraNidhAnagamanAdi||4||  yuktivyapACrayamAhArauSadhayojanAdi||4||  sattvAvajayaH punarahitAn manonigrahaH||4||

ityauSadhasyorjaskaratvarogaghnatvAbhyAM dvaividhyamuktvA tasyaiva daivavyapACrayatvAdinA taividhyamucyate| tatra daivavyapACrayaM yat pApasyopaghAtakatvenaiva jaTharAgnisaMyogena vinA dhAtusAmyakaraM mantrauSadhyAdi| atrauSadhInAM dhAraNamevAbhipretam| balerupahAro devAdiSu| niyamo varjyavarjanam| prAyaCcittaM vratAdi| upavAsaH prasiddhaH pApahartRtve| svastyayanaM vedoktaM karma| yuktivyapACrayaM tu jATharAgnisaMyogamAtrAdiviCeSeNa dhAtusAmyakaraM taccAhArasyauSadhasya ca yojanam| sattvAvajayaH sattvasya manaso~avajayaH| ahitAdviSayAnnigraho nivAraNam||4||

 punarapi ca trividham||5||  apakarSaNaM prakRtivighAto nidAnatyAgaCca||5||  te punarapakarSaNAdayo dvividhAH bAhyAbhyantarabhedena||5||  tatra bAhyamapakarSaNaM granthyarbudopapakSmakrimiCalyAdiSu CastrahastayantrAdibhiH||5||  AbhyantaraM punarvamanavirecanAdibhiH||5||  prakRtivighAtaH saMCamanam||5||  tadbAhyamabhyaGgasvedapradehapariSekopamardanAdi||5||  AbhyantaraM yadantaramanupraviCyAvikSobhayaddoSAn Camayati||5||  nidAnatyAgo yathAdoSaM CItoSNACanavyAyAmAdInAM varjanaM  snigdharUkSAdyanabhyavahAraCca||5||  tatra CastrAdisAdhye bheSajamanukramate na tu bheSajasAdhye CastrAdi||5||

ityauSadhasya daivavyapACrayatvAdinA traividhyamuktvA apakarSaNAdibhedena tasyaiva traividhyamucyate| tAni cApakarSaNAdIni pratyekaM bAhyAbhyantarabhedena dvividhAni| tatra granthydInAM CastrAdibhirapakarSaNaM bAhyamapakarSaNam| vamanavirecanAdinAntaHsthitasya doSasyApakarSaNamAbhyantaram| prakRtivighAto duSTasya doSAderdehasthasya CamanaM sAmyakaram| bahiHprayogeNa doSaCamanamabhyaGgAdi bAhyaH prakRtivighAtaH| yad dravyamantarmahAsrotaH praviCya doSAnakSobhayacchamayati tadAbhyantaraH prakRtivighAtaH| etacca pAcanadIpanAdinA saptavidhaM vakSyAmaH| nidAnatyAgo yathAdoSaM CItAdiguNAnAmAhArAdInAM varjanam| vyAyAmAdivarjanaM yathAdoSameva| yathA CleSmaNi tatsadRCaguNAnAmAhAravihArAdInAM tyAgaH| evaM vAtapittayorapi| prasaGgAdAha-bAhyApakarSaNena CastrAdinA sAdhye granthyAdau vyAdhau bheSajamauSadhamAntarApakarSaNam| prakRtivighAto nidAnatyAgaCcopayujyate| na tu yathoktabheSajasAdhye grahaNIrogAdau CastrAdi bAhyamapakarSaNamanukramate| sopayogaM  na bhavatIti sambandhaH||5||

 punarapi trividhaM hetuviparItaM vyAdhiviparItamubhayArthakAri ca||6||  tatra hetuviparItaM gurusnigdhaCItAdije vyAdhau laghurUkSoSNAdi tathetarasminnitarat||6||  vyAdhiviparItaM dvau mUlopakramau laGghanabRMhaNe||6||  paJcakarmANi vamanAdIni sadhUmadhUpAJjanAdIni ca||6||  tathA vimlApanopanAhanapATanAdIni||6||  yacca doSaCamanatve satyapi jvare viCeSato hitaM mustAparpaTakaM yavAgvaCca pramehe rajanI yavAnnaM cetyAdi||6||  raktapitte cordhvage virecanamadhoge vamanam||6||

ityapakarSaNAdibhedenauSadhasya traividhyamuktvA tasyaiva hetuviparItatvAdinA traividhyamucyate| tatra hetuviparItaM yat vyAdhiviCeSAvivakSAyAM vyAdhijanakadoSakAraNaviparItaguNam| yathA gurvAdiguNayuktadravyaje vyAdhau laghvAdiguNamauSadham| tathetarasmin laghvAdije itarat gurvAdi| vyAdhiviparItaM tu yatra hetuviCeSavivakSA nACrIyate kevalaM yathopadeCaM svaviSayavyAdhiviCeSeNopayujyate| yathA dvau mUlopakramau| laGghanaM bRMhaNaM ca| paJcakarmANi vamanAdIni krameNa dhUmAdIni ca| CastrAdi sAdhyAnAM ca gulmAdInAM vyAdhiviparItaM vimlApanAdi| vimlApanaM vilayanamupanAhaH piNDabandhaH| 
na kevalametAvadeva vyAdhiviparItalakSaNaM yAvadidamapi| yacceti samuccaye| yad dravyaM satyapi vyAdhyArambhakadoSaCamanatve na tajjeSu sarvavyAdhiSu tathA pathyam| yathaikasminneva vyAdhau dRSTAnto mustAparpaTakaM yadyapi pittaCleSmaghnaM na tathA gulmAdiSu pittaCleSmajeSu hitaM yathA jvara iti| evaM yavAgvAdyapi yathAyathaM buddhyA vikalpya vAcyam||6||

 ubhayArthakAri punardaivavyapACrayamauSadham||7||  tathA chardyAM chardanamatisAre virecanaM, madAtyaye madyapAnaM, tutthadagdhe~agnipratapanaM, pitte~antarnnigUDhe vimArgage vA svedaH kaTvamlalavaNatIkSNoSNAbhyavahAraCca bahiH pravarttanAya svamArgApAdanAya ca||7||  CleSmaNi cAntarnigUDhe stabdhe bahiH CItopacArastatpIDitasyoSmaNo~antaHpraveCena kapho vilayatAmupayAti||7||  evaMvidhaM hyaviparItameva sadbheSajaM hetuvyAdhiviparItamarthaM karoti||7||

ubhayArthakAri yadubhayasya hetuviparItasya vyAdhiviparItasya ca sambandhinamarthaM rogopaCamalakSaNametadguNamapi karoti| tacca daivavyapACrayaM maNimantrAdikRtam| tathA rogasvabhAvAdiviparItasvarUpamapi yadrogopaCamanaM karoti tadubhayArthakAri| yathA chardyAM tatsvarUpameva vamanamevamapi svabuddhyA vikalpyam| pitte vAntarnigUDhe svedaH Casyate| aviparIto~api pittAt kaTvAdirasAbhyavahAraCceti yathAsaGkhyena prayojanamantarnigUDhe bahiH pravarttanAya vimArgage svamArgApAdanAyAtra tu svedasya pittasyAtiCayaprApterauSadhatvaM na tu CleSmAdipratibandhakanACanena svedasyeti kAmalAdau dRCyate| CleSmaNi cAntarnigUDha iti hemante~agnibalavattvayuktyA jJAyate| evamanena prakAreNa rogAdaviparItamapi viparItArthaM rogasya nACanaM karotIti||7||

 anauSadhaM punardvividhaM bAdhanamanubAdhanaJca||8||  tatra sadyaH prANaharaM bAdhanam||8||  kAlAntareNAnubAdhanam iti||8||

bahubhirbhedairauSadhamuktvA~anauSadhamucyate| tacca dvividham ityAdi subodham||8||

 paraM cAto rasavIryAdibhedena yathAsthUlamauSadhaikadeCa upadiCyate||9||

ataH paraM pradhAnadravyANAM rasAdibhedaiH svarUpamucyate| anyeSAM rasAdyanumANAdrasabhedIyAdau vakSyAmaH||9||

 suvarNaM bRMhaNaM snigdhaM madhuraM rasapAkayoH||10||  viSadoSaharaM CItaM sakaSAyaM rasAyanam||10||

sarvaM CarIraviSayaM vastu dvividhamauSadhamanauSadhaM ca| tatra auSadhaM pathyamanauSadhaM ca CarIrasyApathyam| tatrauSadhaM prAdhAnyAdAdAvucyate| anauSadhaM vakSyAmaH sarvamauSadhaM CarIrahitaM dvividham| UrjaskaraM rogaghnaJca| UrjaskaraM yatsvasthasyApi balavarNAdyupacayaM karoti| rogaghnaM vyAdhinACanam| ubhayamapi dvayamapi punardravyAtmakamUrjjaskare~api dhAtusAmyakaraNaCaktatvAt vyAdhyupaCamaH sambhavati| vyAdhyupaCame tu varNabalAdyupacayaH spaSTa eva| tasmAd dvayamapi dravyAtmakaM tatrApi yadyatra pradhAnaM tena vyapadeCe UrjaskaraM rogaghnaM ceti| tatrorjaskaraM dvividhaM- rasAyanavAjIkaraNabhedena| rogaghnamapi dvividham- vyAdheH sthitasya nACanaM naSTasya ca punarutpattirakSaNam| anenA~api prakAreNa dvividhaM rogaghnam||2||

 punaCca dvividhaM dravyamadravyaJca||3||  tatra dravyaM trividhaM- bhaumamaudbhidaM jaGgamamiti||3||  teSu vakSyamANaM hemAdilavaNAntaM prAyeNa bhaumam||3||  audbhidaM punarvanaspativAnaspatyavIrudauSadhibhedena caturvidhaM bhavati||3||  tatra phalino vanaspatiH, puSpaphalavAn vAnaspatyaH, vallIgulmaM vIrut, phalapAkAntACcauSadhya iti||3||  jaGgamodbhavaM madhughRtAdi jaGgamadravyamAhuH||3||  adravyaM punarupavAsAnilAtapacchAyAmantrasAntvadAna-bhayottrAsasaMkSobhaNaharSaNa- bhartsanahasanaswvapnajAgaraNasaMvAhanAdIni||3||

dravyamadravyaM ca| dravyaM mUrttaM sakalendriyaviSayaM ca| ato~anyadadravyam| etacca dvayamapi rogasya praCamane punarbhavarakSaNe va samarthaM bhavati| tatra bhaumAdibhedena trividhaM dravyamihAdhyAye vakSyamANam| suvarNAdilavaNAntaM bAhulyena bhaumam| audbhidaM vanaspatyAdibhedena caturvidham| tatra phalino vanaspatiH| phalinaCabdaH phalavati vartate| phalabarhAbhyAminajitInacpratyAyantaH| puSpaprAdhAnyena phalavAn vAnaspatyaH| vallI santAnavatI latAgulmaM ca| hrasvaM bhUmilagnaM bahusUkSmaCAkhaM ca vIrucchabdenocyate| phalapAke~antaH parNAdivinACalakSaNo yAsAM tA auSadhyaH| jaGgamaprANiyonitvAnmadhughRtamUtrAdi jaGgamamucyate| adravyaM punarupavAsAdi| anilasyAsakalendriyagrAhyatvAdamUrttatvAccAdravyatvamatraiva vyavahArArtham| bAhyasya saMvAhanamaGgamardanam| ete copavAsAdayo~asmin tantre yathApradeCaM rogaghnatvenoktAH||3||

 punarapi ca trividhaM daivavyapACrayaM yuktivyapACrayaM sattvAvajayaCceti||4||  tatra daivavyapACrayaM mantrauSadhimaNimaGgalabalyupahArahomaniyamaprAyaCcittopa-vAsasvastyanapraNidhAnagamanAdi||4||  yuktivyapACrayamAhArauSadhayojanAdi||4||  sattvAvajayaH punarahitAn manonigrahaH||4||

ityauSadhasyorjaskaratvarogaghnatvAbhyAM dvaividhyamuktvA tasyaiva daivavyapACrayatvAdinA taividhyamucyate| tatra daivavyapACrayaM yat pApasyopaghAtakatvenaiva jaTharAgnisaMyogena vinA dhAtusAmyakaraM mantrauSadhyAdi| atrauSadhInAM dhAraNamevAbhipretam| balerupahAro devAdiSu| niyamo varjyavarjanam| prAyaCcittaM vratAdi| upavAsaH prasiddhaH pApahartRtve| svastyayanaM vedoktaM karma| yuktivyapACrayaM tu jATharAgnisaMyogamAtrAdiviCeSeNa dhAtusAmyakaraM taccAhArasyauSadhasya ca yojanam| sattvAvajayaH sattvasya manaso~avajayaH| ahitAdviSayAnnigraho nivAraNam||4||

 punarapi ca trividham||5||  apakarSaNaM prakRtivighAto nidAnatyAgaCca||5||  te punarapakarSaNAdayo dvividhAH bAhyAbhyantarabhedena||5||  tatra bAhyamapakarSaNaM granthyarbudopapakSmakrimiCalyAdiSu CastrahastayantrAdibhiH||5||  AbhyantaraM punarvamanavirecanAdibhiH||5||  prakRtivighAtaH saMCamanam||5||  tadbAhyamabhyaGgasvedapradehapariSekopamardanAdi||5||  AbhyantaraM yadantaramanupraviCyAvikSobhayaddoSAn Camayati||5||  nidAnatyAgo yathAdoSaM CItoSNACanavyAyAmAdInAM varjanaM  snigdharUkSAdyanabhyavahAraCca||5||  tatra CastrAdisAdhye bheSajamanukramate na tu bheSajasAdhye CastrAdi||5||

ityauSadhasya daivavyapACrayatvAdinA traividhyamuktvA apakarSaNAdibhedena tasyaiva traividhyamucyate| tAni cApakarSaNAdIni pratyekaM bAhyAbhyantarabhedena dvividhAni| tatra granthydInAM CastrAdibhirapakarSaNaM bAhyamapakarSaNam| vamanavirecanAdinAntaHsthitasya doSasyApakarSaNamAbhyantaram| prakRtivighAto duSTasya doSAderdehasthasya CamanaM sAmyakaram| bahiHprayogeNa doSaCamanamabhyaGgAdi bAhyaH prakRtivighAtaH| yad dravyamantarmahAsrotaH praviCya doSAnakSobhayacchamayati tadAbhyantaraH prakRtivighAtaH| etacca pAcanadIpanAdinA saptavidhaM vakSyAmaH| nidAnatyAgo yathAdoSaM CItAdiguNAnAmAhArAdInAM varjanam| vyAyAmAdivarjanaM yathAdoSameva| yathA CleSmaNi tatsadRCaguNAnAmAhAravihArAdInAM tyAgaH| evaM vAtapittayorapi| prasaGgAdAha-bAhyApakarSaNena CastrAdinA sAdhye granthyAdau vyAdhau bheSajamauSadhamAntarApakarSaNam| prakRtivighAto nidAnatyAgaCcopayujyate| na tu yathoktabheSajasAdhye grahaNIrogAdau CastrAdi bAhyamapakarSaNamanukramate| sopayogaM  na bhavatIti sambandhaH||5||

 punarapi trividhaM hetuviparItaM vyAdhiviparItamubhayArthakAri ca||6||  tatra hetuviparItaM gurusnigdhaCItAdije vyAdhau laghurUkSoSNAdi tathetarasminnitarat||6||  vyAdhiviparItaM dvau mUlopakramau laGghanabRMhaNe||6||  paJcakarmANi vamanAdIni sadhUmadhUpAJjanAdIni ca||6||  tathA vimlApanopanAhanapATanAdIni||6||  yacca doSaCamanatve satyapi jvare viCeSato hitaM mustAparpaTakaM yavAgvaCca pramehe rajanI yavAnnaM cetyAdi||6||  raktapitte cordhvage virecanamadhoge vamanam||6||

ityapakarSaNAdibhedenauSadhasya traividhyamuktvA tasyaiva hetuviparItatvAdinA traividhyamucyate| tatra hetuviparItaM yat vyAdhiviCeSAvivakSAyAM vyAdhijanakadoSakAraNaviparItaguNam| yathA gurvAdiguNayuktadravyaje vyAdhau laghvAdiguNamauSadham| tathetarasmin laghvAdije itarat gurvAdi| vyAdhiviparItaM tu yatra hetuviCeSavivakSA nACrIyate kevalaM yathopadeCaM svaviSayavyAdhiviCeSeNopayujyate| yathA dvau mUlopakramau| laGghanaM bRMhaNaM ca| paJcakarmANi vamanAdIni krameNa dhUmAdIni ca| CastrAdi sAdhyAnAM ca gulmAdInAM vyAdhiviparItaM vimlApanAdi| vimlApanaM vilayanamupanAhaH piNDabandhaH|

 ubhayArthakAri punardaivavyapACrayamauSadham||7||  tathA chardyAM chardanamatisAre virecanaM, madAtyaye madyapAnaM, tutthadagdhe~agnipratapanaM, pitte~antarnnigUDhe vimArgage vA svedaH kaTvamlalavaNatIkSNoSNAbhyavahAraCca bahiH pravarttanAya svamArgApAdanAya ca||7||  CleSmaNi cAntarnigUDhe stabdhe bahiH CItopacArastatpIDitasyoSmaNo~antaHpraveCena kapho vilayatAmupayAti||7||  evaMvidhaM hyaviparItameva sadbheSajaM hetuvyAdhiviparItamarthaM karoti||7||

 AnantyAdauSadhAnAmAmayAnAM cAnantA eva kaSAyAH||2||  CakyaM hi buddhimadbhiH svAduCItasnigdhAdIn jIvantyAdiSu sAdhAraNAn guNAnAlocya kSIrekSudrAkSA~akSoDavidArIkandAdiSvapi tadguNeSu jIvanIyAditvamavadhArayitum||2||  yathoktAnusaraNameva tu Creyo mandabuddheriti||2||  vyastACca te catvAri CatAni paJcACadadhikAni tadabhidhAnAnyeva||2||  ye tu sutarAmupayogavantaH prakarSavarttino vA te jIvanIyAdisaMjJAH||2||  pratyekaM daCakaSAyasaMyogAt paJcacatvAriMCanmahAkaSAyA vakSyante||2||  tatpratipattyarthameva mandabuddhInAm||2||  buddhimatAmudAharaNamAtrapradarCanArtham||2||

 yadyapi tAni tAnyeva dravyANIti dravyasaGkaraH kaSAyeSu tathApi na saMjJAvirodhaH||3||  ekasyApi bahukAryanirvartanAt||3||

yadyapi caikaM dravyamaneke mahAkaSAye dRCyate tathApi saMjJAvirodho na bhavati yataH kAryabhedAt saMjJAbhedaH| yathaiko devadattaH pAkaM kurvan pAcaka ityucyate lavanaM ca lAvaka iti| tadvadekamapi dravyaM kAryabhedAt saMjJAbhedaM gacchati||3||

 tatra lavaNavarjyA rasAH kalpanAyAM kaSAyA ityucyante||4||  tadyonitvAt||4||

 athAto dravyAdivijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

pUrveSu adhyAyeSu rasAdiviCeSairdravyakAryasvarUpamuktaM, te ca dravyarasAdayo na jJAtAH, atastadvijJAnArthamadhyAyArambhaH| tatra rasAdInAmACrayatvena prAdhAnyAd dravyamevAdAvucyate| rasasya tu bahuvaktavyatvAdasminnadhyAye kiJcit sUtraNam| dvitIye tu nirNayaH| vIryAdInAM tvatraiva|| 1||

 iha hi dravyaM paJcamahAbhUtAtmakam||2||  tasyAdhiSThAnaM pRthivI, yonirudakaM, khAnilAnalasamavAyAnnirvRttiviCeSau||2||  utkarSeNa tu vyapadeCaH||2||  tasmAdbhUtasamavAyAmbhavAnnaikarasaM dravyam||2||  tataCca naikadoSA vyAdhayaH||2||
