tu CUnyAtmano~api guNACrayatvAt pRthivyAdivadeva bhUtatvaM dravyArambhakatvaM ca vijJeyam| tathA ca nabhobhAgAdhike dravye~avayavanibiDabhAvAdyabhAvena 
svarUpamajahadeva nabhaHkAraNatAM yAti| eSAM ca bhUtAnAM parasparavailakSaNyaM bhAvahetutvaM paJcasaGkhyAvattvaM ca bhAvasvarUpAnvayavyatirekasamadhigamyam| nanu pRthivyAdayaH kena prakAreNa 
kAraNatAM tatra gacchantItyAha-tasya dravyasyAdhiSThAnamACrayaH pRthivI| sA hi guDUcyAderAhArAdyupayogino dravyasyopalambhena pradhAnaM kAraNam| tasya ca guDUcyAdeH sarvasyaiva dravyasyAmbu yoniH| 
yu miCraNe dhAtuH tasminyoniriti rUpaM bhavati| kAraNaM svabhAvasambandhaheturityarthaH| nabhovAyvanalAnAM samavAyAt pRthivyudakAbhyAmavinAbhAvavRttitvAttasya dravyasya nirvRttiviCeSau bhavataH| 
nirvRttirniSpattirAtmalAbhaH| viCeSo dravyAntareNAsAdRCyam| tathA ca 
saMsthAnaviCeSalAbhAyAvayavavyUhane nabhaHkAraNatAM yAti| kAThinyAdike vAyuH| 
tejaHprasAdalabhyACcAGkurAdyavasthAviCeSAH| tenaitaduktaM bhavati- paJcAnAmeva bhUtAnAM saMyogAt sarvadravyANAmAhArAdyupayoginAM sambhavaH| 
teSAmeva bhUtAnAmekAditAratamyAdisaMyogaviCeSeNa dravyANAM parasparavyAvRttiH| yaCca pArthivaM dravyamApyamityAdivyapadeCaH sa bhUyasA 
prabhUtena mahAbhUtena janyate| tena paJcasu madhye yadadhikaM tadIyaM vyapadeCaM prApnotItyarthaH| evaM sarvasya dravyasya paJcabhUtAtmakatvAt  
sarvarasatvam| yato yeyaM SaTsaGkhyA parasparavilakSaNA rasAnAM niSpattiH 
sA mahAbhUtAnAM viCeSakRtA| tathA ca bhUjalayorityAdinA vakSyati| 
yaCca sarvasya dravyasyApi SaDrasatve~api mAdhuryAdivyapadeCaH sa bhUyasAM bhUtena kriyate| evaM yataH sarvasya dravyasya na sarvarasatvaM tatastena
dravyeNa janitatvAtsarvarogANAmapitridoSajatvam| yasmAdrogANAM doSAH kAraNaM
teSAM ca rasAste ca rasAH sarva evaikasmin dravye sthitAH dravyasya rasajanakabhUtaniSpAditatvAt| ata eva saMsargasannipAtabhedAnAmAnantyam| 
yattu katipayAnAM bhedAnAM nidAnAdiSu kIrtanaM tadanyApekSayA prAdhAnyAccikitsAsukhapradarCanAya| yA tu rogANAmekadoSoktiH  sA satiCayaprAdhAnyahetukA| tathA caikadoSAbhimateSvapi rogeSu vivakSitadoSapratIkAropayogyasadhAraNaM taddoSaviparItaguNamekaM 
dravyaM duSprApamiti sthitam| naikadoSA rogA iti| atha caivaM vyAkhyAyate dravyANAM paJcabhUtAtmakatve sati viCeSavyapadeCo yato bhUyasA prabhUtena bhavati| tata eva hetornaikarasaM dravyaM na sadRCarasaM bhinnarasamityarthaH| bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAddhetoryadekarasatvaM sarvasya prAptaM tat pratiSiddhyate| anyathA yadi viCeSavyapadeCavadbhinnarasatvamapi na syAttataH sarvasya dravyasya paJcabhUtAtmakatvAt sAdRCyAdekarasatvameva syAt| tataCca sarvANi dravyANi madhurAdyanyatamarasAni syuH| tasmAnnaikarasaM dravyam| ata eva heto rogA api doSasya vyavadhAnena dravyahetutvAd dravyaviCeSavadbhinnarasavacca te~api naikadoSAH| anyathA jvarANAmanyeSAM dravyahetutvasAmAnyAtsadRCadoSAparaparyAyamekadoSatvaM syAt|| 2||

 tatra vyakto rasaH||3||  anurasastu rasenAbhibhUtatvAdavyakto vyakto vA kiJcidante||3||

tatra ca dravya rasanendriyagrAhyo vyaktaH sphuTo rasaCabdenoktaH| yaCca raso yasmin dravye~anurasatvenoktaH sa pradhAnarasenAbhibhUtatvAdavyakta eva tiSThati| pradhAnarasavijAtIyakAryakatRtvAttasya sadbhAvo~anumIyate| AgamAcca| athavA yo rasaH pradhAnarasasyAnte kiJcidvyakto~apyupalabhyate so~anurasaH|| 3||

 rasasya tu chedanopaCamane dve karmaNI||4||  hitAhitau prabhAvau||4||

tatra ya AcAryAH chedanopaCamanahitAhitAnAM caturNAM rasatvamicchanti tAn pratyAtreyamatAnusAreNedamucyate| rasasya chedanopaCamane karmaNI tasyaiva hitAhitau prabhAvau| prabhAvo rasAdivilakSaNA CaktiH na tu teSAM rasatvamiti| tena chedanopaCamanayorbhAve lyuDiti chedanaM doSAdInAM bhAgaCaH karaNam| upaCamanaM tu doSANAmanutkleCena samIkaraNam| hitaM yat prabhAvAdeva CarIrasya pathyam| viparItamahitam|| 4||

 tadACrayeSu ca dravyasaMjJakeSu pRthivyAdiSu guNAH prakRtivikRtivicAradeCakAlavaCAdgurvAdayo raseSu sAhacaryAdupacaryante||5||

teSAM ca rasAdInAmACrayabhUteSu pRthivyAdiSu paJcasu dravyasaMjJakeSu kAryadravyAvasthAyAM ye guNA gurvAdayo gurusnehoSNasUkSmalaghvAdayaH te dravyaguNAH santo raseSu guNatvenopacArAducyante| upacArasya bahuhetudarCanAya sAhacaryaM viCeSaNm| nanu kathaM te dravyasyetyACaGkyAha- prakRtyetyAdi| kvacit prakRtyavasthAyAM na santo~api nAnAvidhakriyAsAdhyayA vikRtyA janyante| kecittu vicArAdibhiH| vicAro viCiSTamAtrAdikaH saMyogaH| deCo dvividha uktaH| tadvaCAd gurvAdiguNayogo dravyasya| dehadeCavaCAt sakthimAMsAdguruskandha ityAdi| bhUmideCavaCAdanyathA jAGgale anyathAnUpa iti| evaM kAle~api| tena yatrA~api vikRtyAdivaCAdrasAnAM sambhavaH tatrApi ye rasaguNAste dravyasyaiva vijJeyAH| eSA ca prakRtyAdivaCAd gurvAdikalpanA rasACrayasya dravyasyaiva guNACrayAt sambhavati; na rasasya| tasya tu sAhacaryAdupacaryate|| 5||

 tatra dravyaM gurukaThinaviCadamandrasAndrasthUlasthiragandhaguNabahulaM pArthivaM upacayagauravasaGghAtasthairyakaram||6||  dravasnigdhaCItagurumandrasAndrasaramRdupicchilarasaguNabahulamaudakamupakledasnehabandhaviSyandamArdavaprahlAdakaram||6||  tIkSNoSNarUkSasUkSmalaghuviCadarUpaguNabahulamAgneyaM dAhapAkaprakACaprabhAvarNakaram||6||  rUkSasUkSmalaghuviCadavikASivyavAyiCItakharasparCaguNabahulaM vAyavyaM raukSyalAghavavaiCadyaglAnivicArakaram||6||  sUkSmalaghuviCadaClakSNavyavAyiviviktaCabdaguNabahulamAkACAtmakaM sauSiryalAghavakaram||6||

tatra pArthivaM dravyaM gurutvAdiguNayuktaM gandhaguNena cAdhikamupayuktaM ca deha upacayAdikaram| upacayo mahattvam| saGghAtaH kAThinyam| sthairyaM dArDhyam| audakaM dravyaM dravatvAdiguNayuktaM rasaguNAdhikaM ca| dehe copakledAdikaram| viSyandaH srotasAM srAvaH| prahlAdo hRtpuSTiH| AgneyaM tIkSNatvAdiguNayuktaM rUpaguNabahulaM ca dehe ca dAhAdikarama\\\\\\\\ vAyavyaM rUkSatvAdiguNayuktaM sparCaguNabahulaM ca| dehe ca raukSyAdikaM karoti| vicAro dhAtuvahanam| nAbhasaM sUkSmatvAdiguNayuktaM CabdaguNAdhikaM ca| dehe ca sauSiryalAghavakaram|| 6||

 itthaJca nAnauSadhabhUtaM jagati kiJcid dravyamasti vividhArthaprayogavaCAt||7||

itthamevaM sthite jagati tad dravyaM nAsti yadauSadhatvena nopayujyate| kutaH? nAnAvidhArthaprayogavaCAt| arthaH prayojanaM, prayoga upayogaH| tenaitaduktaM bhavati- vicitrito bhAvaH svabhAvastena yadyatrApathyaM tattatraiva prayojanAntareNa pathyam| tathA yat pAne~apathyaM tadabhyaGge pathyam| evaM mAtrAdiviCeSo vikalpanIyaH| tena bhasmapAMsvAdInAmapi prayojanavaCenauSadhatvam|| 7||

 tatrAgnimArutAtmakaM prAyeNordhvabhAgikam||8||  tayorhi lAghavAdUrdhvagatitvAccAgneH plavanatvAcca mArutasya||8||  bhUmyaudakAtmakaM tu prAyeNAdhobhAgikam||8||  tayorhi gauravAnnimnagatvAcca toyasya||8||  vyAmiCrAtmakamubhayatobhAgam||8||  CamanaM tu doSaviparItaguNamuktaM prAk||8||  tatsaGkare ca yato bAhulyena kAryakartRtvaM bhavati yadevAdhikaM tadeva tatkAryakaramiti vyapadeCaH||8||  tathA~anilAtmakaM grAhi||8||  analAtmakaM dIpanapAcanam||8||  ubhayAtmakaM lekhanam||8||  bhUmyudakAtmakaM bRMhaNam||8||

tasya ca dravasya ye CodhanaCamanagrAhidIpanatvAdayo viCeSAste~apyekAdimahAbhUtotkarSApakarSakRtA eveti pradarCanArthamAha- tatretyAdi| UrdhvabhAgikaM yasyAtiCayo vamanaM tadagnimArutAtmakam; agnimArutayorlaghutvAdagnerUrdhvagamanasambhavAdvAyoCca plavanatvAt| pRthivyudakAtmakamadhobhAgikaM yasyAtiCayo virecanam| pRthivyudakayorgurutvAdadhogamanaM toyasya nimnagatvAdapi| vyAmiCrabhUtacatuSTayAdhikyenobhayAtmakaM vamanavirecanam| 
CamanaM yaduktabhUtAdhikyarahitaM nAdho gacchati nApyUrdhvameti kevalaM doSaviparItaguNameva tacca prakRtivighAtatvena pUrvamuktam| tenaitaduktam- CamanatvaM doSaguNavaiparItyApekSayA sarvasmin dravye sambhvati| na tvevaM Codhanatvam| tasya viCiSTabhUtAdhikyahetutvAt| yatra tvekasminneva dravye UrdhvagatvAdhogatvaCamanatvAnAM sambhavaH tatra yato bAhulyena kAryakartRtvaM bhavati tato yadevAdhikaM tadeva kAryakaramiti vyapadeCa ityarthaH| anyat subodham|| 8||

 tatra kaTvamlalavaNA vIryeNa yathottaramuSNAH||9||  tiktakaSAyamadhurAH CItAH||9||

tatra rasAnAM guNaniyamaH kaTvamlalavaNA vIryeNa yathottaramuSNAH| CItAH 
CeSAH||9||

 tiktakaTukaSAyA rUkSA baddhaviNmUtramArutAH||10||  lavaNAmlamadhurAH snigdhA sRSTaviNmUtramArutAH||10||  lavaNakaSAyamadhurA guravaH||10||  tadvadamlakaTukatiktA laghavaH||10||

tiktakaTukaSAyA rUkSA baddhaviNmUtrAmArutACca| CeSA laghavaH
tathottaramiti sarvatrAbhisambadhyate| pUrvAduttaro yathoktaguNAdhika ityarthaH||10||

sUtrasthAnam

dravyAdivijJAnIyaH

 athAto dravyAdivijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

pUrveSu adhyAyeSu rasAdiviCeSairdravyakAryasvarUpamuktaM, te ca dravyarasAdayo na jJAtAH, atastadvijJAnArthamadhyAyArambhaH| tatra rasAdInAmACrayatvena prAdhAnyAd dravyamevAdAvucyate| rasasya tu bahuvaktavyatvAdasminnadhyAye kiJcit sUtraNam| dvitIye tu nirNayaH| vIryAdInAM tvatraiva|| 1||

 iha hi dravyaM paJcamahAbhUtAtmakam||2||  tasyAdhiSThAnaM pRthivI, yonirudakaM, khAnilAnalasamavAyAnnirvRttiviCeSau||2||  utkarSeNa tu vyapadeCaH||2||  tasmAdbhUtasamavAyAmbhavAnnaikarasaM dravyam||2||  tataCca naikadoSA vyAdhayaH||2||

 anye tu gurvAdInAmagnISomAtmakatvAdAdAnavisargavibhAgena kAlasya coSNaCItAtmakatvAd dvividhamevAmananti||14||  evaM

nanu ca yatra dravyACritAnAM rasavIryaguNavipAkaprabhAvAnAM virodhaH tatra teSAM kAryaniSpAdane samaCaktitvaM  na vetyACaGkAnivRttyarthamAha- yadyad dravya iti| rasAdInAM rasavIryaguNavipAkaprabhAvAnAM yadraso vA vIryaM vA vipAko guNaH prabhAvo vA balavattvena vijAtIyAdhikyena vartate tattat
kAraNatvaM kAryasAdhakatvaM pratipadyate| kiM kRtvA? itarAn dravyACritAn
hInAnabhibhUya viphalIkRtya| yatra tu dravye rasAdidrAvako viruddhAnAM guNAnAM gurvAdInAmeva saMyogo na tu rasAdayo~apekSyante| tatra kathaM kAryakartRtvamiti pRSTa Aha- viruddhetyAdi| athavA rasAdikalpanAviCeSeNaiva yatra viruddhaguNopanipAtaH tatra kathaM kAryakAraNatvamityAha-viruddhetyAdi| tatra bhUyasA prabhUtena guNenAlpaM 
jIyate niSphalIkriyate| dvividhaCca virodhaH-svarUpataH kAryataCca|  svarUpavirodho yathA gurulaghvoH CItoSNayoCca| kAryavirodho yathA gururUkSayoruSNasnigdhayoCca|  tathA hi guruH CleSmavRddhikaraH rUkSaCca gurorviruddhaH kAryeNa CleSmavRddhyAkhyena viruddhyate| evamuSNasya CleSmahantRtvaM snigdhasya CleSmakartRtvena| iha cobhayorapi 
virodhayorgrahaNam| ekatr dravye svarUpakAryaviruddhayorbhAva AgamalabdhaH paJcabhUtAtmakatvAd dravyasyopapadyate||21||

 rasaM vipAkastau vIryaM prabhAvastAnyapohati||22||  balasAmye rasAdInAmiti naisargikaM balam||22||

nanu yadyad dravye rasAdInAM balavattattat kAryakaraNaCaktamityuktam|

kAryakaraNe kuNThayati| tau rasavipAkau karmaNI vIryaM kartR apohati| 
tAni rasavipAkavIryANi prabhAvo vakSyamANaH apohatItyetadrasAdInAM  balasAmye naisargikaM svAbhAvikaM balam| tenaitaduktaM bhavati- rasAdInAM samabalAnAmapi tathAvidho balasvabhAvo yat pUrvasya balamuttarasya balena
samenApyabhibhUyate| rasabalaM vipAkabalena samenApi svabhAvAdevAbhibhUyate| evaM rasavipAkayorbalaM vIryabalena| rasavipAkavIryabalaM prabhAvabaleneti| tena rasAdInAM viSamatve~api svabhAvabalamapekSyAdhikasya sAmarthyaM vijJeyam||22||

 viruddhA api cAnyonyaM rasAdyAH kAryasAdhane||23||  nAvaCyaM syurvighAtAya guNadoSA mitho yathA||23||

nanu yatra rasAdInAmanyatamasya kAryamitarasya kAryeNa viruddhyate tatra kasya kAryakartRtvaM bhavati? yadi tu prabhUtasya svabhAvabalavataCcetyucyate|
tatrAlpo~alpabalaCca kiJcit kartuM Cakto na vetyevaM pRSTa idamAha- viruddhA
ityAdi| rasAdyA rasavIryavipAkaguNaprabhAvA anyonyaM parasparaM viruddhA api na nACAya bhavanti kAryasAdhanakAle| dRSTAnto-guNadoSA mitho yatheti|
guNAH sattvarajastamAMsi parasparaM puruSAdyabhidhAnakAryasAdhane viruddhA api yathA vighAtAya na bhavanti| doSACca vAtapittakaphAviruddhA api deharogAdisAdhane yathA mitho vighAtAya na bhavanti| tadvadrasAdayo~api||23||

 rasavIryaprabhRtayo bhUtotkarSApakarSataH||24||  ekarUpA virUpA vA dravyaM samadhiCerate||24||  mAdhuryaCaityapaicchilyasnehagauravamandatAH||24||  sahavRttyA sthitAH kSIre na tvAnUpaudakAmiSe||24||

nanu dravye rasAdInAM parasparasamaviSamatayA kAryakaratvamuktaM tasyACca rasAdisamaviSamatAyAH kAraNaM na jJAyate| ata ucyate-rasavIryetyAdi|

 madhuraskandhanirdiSTaghRtatailaguDAdiSu||27||  guNAsvAdAdibhedena rasaSaTkaM na yujyate||27||  astu bhedAdasaGkhyatvamaikyaM vA svAdalakSaNAt||27||  bhUtotkarSApakarSeNa bhedo yo~alpena kalpyate||27||  saGkIrNAtva phale cAsau tulyatvAnna vivakSyate||27||  gurvAdInAM viCeSe~api svajAteranatikramAt||27||  saGkhyAbhedo yathA nAsti rasAnAmapi sa kramaH||27||  dRSTaM mukhopalepAdi yatsarveSu ghRtAdiSu||27||  na ca taddADimAdyeSu SaDevAto rasAH smRtAH||27||  AnantyaikatvayoCca syAnna vicitrArthatantraNam||27||

nanu rasAnAM madhurAditvena SaTsaGkhyAniyama uktaH; sa na yujyate kevalamekarasatvamanekarasatvaM vA| tatrAnekarasatve kAraNaM vakSyamANamadhurAdiskandhanirdiSTAnAM ghRtatailaguDadrAkSACarkarAmadhumadhukAdInAM guNasvAdAdibhedaH| tathA hi tvayA ye madhuratvena nirdiSTA guDadrAkSAdaya AsvAdanena te na parasparasadRCAH na ca gurutvAdinA guNena| na cAmlAdiyuktA iti vaktuM yujyate| ato jJAyate anye viCiSTA eva ta iti pratirasaskandhamAnantyam| rasaikatve kAraNaM jihvendriyAsvAdanasAmAnyam| tatra pratividhIyate bhUtotkarSApakarSeNetyAdi| tatra prathamaM guNabhedadUSaNaM parihriyate|
yo~ayamalpena bhUtAnAmutkarSeNApakarSeNa madhurANAM guNabhedaH sa saGkIrNatvAt phale ca sadRCatvAt sannapi na vivakSyate| AsvAdabhedAdAnantyaM parihriyate| gurvAdInAmityAdi| gurvAdInAM guNAnAM
yadyapi pratidravyaM vailakSyaNyamasti tathApi gurutvAdijAtyanatikramAt

rasAnatikramya jAtyantaraM saMbhavati| ataH SaDeva rasAH nonAdhikAH| 
yadi sadevAnantyamaikyaM vA yathoktaprakAreNa tantravyavahAre gRhyate tato vicitrasya rasapRSThabhAvino vaktavyasyAnekasya tantraNasya CAstre prayogo na syAt| ata Anantyena rasAnAM tatsvarUpatantraNasyApyAnantyAdavaktavyatA| ekarasatve ca viCeSasyAnuktatvAt svarUpatantreNApi na yujyata iti| rasA upasaMhRtAH||27||

 gurvAdyA vIryamucyante Caktimanto~anyathA guNAH||28||  parasAmarthyahInatvAd guNA evetare guNAH||28||

vIryamupasaMhriyate-gurvAdyA ityAdi| pUrvoktA gurvAdyA aSTau yadotkRSTaCaktayaH santo dravyaM samadhiCerate tadA vIryaCabdavAcyAH| yadA tUtkRSTaCaktiyuktA na bhavanti sAmAnyaguNA eva| ye ca gurvAdiviCiSTA 
dvAdaCaguNAH te svabhAvenaiva parasAmarthyahInA utkRSTaCaktirahitAste~api 
sAmAnyaguNaCabdavAcyAH| te na kadAcidapi vIryAkhyAM labhanta iti 
vIryamupasaMhRtam||28||

 yathArasaM jaguH pAkAn SaT kecittadasAmpratam||29||  yatsvAdurvrIhiramlatvaM na cAmlamapi dADimam||29||  yAti tailaM ca kaTutAM kaTukApi na pippalI||29||  yathArasatve pAkAnAM na syAdevaM viparyayaH||29||  yasmAt dRSTo yavaH svAdurgururapyanilapradaH||29||  dIpanaM CItamapyAjyaM vasoSNApyagnisAdinI||29||  kaTupAko~api pittaghno mudgo mASastu pittalaH||29||  svAdupAko~api calakRtsnigdhoSNaM guru phANitam||29||  rasaH svAduryathA caitattathAnyeSvapi dRCyate||29||  vAtalaM kaphapittaghnamamlamapyakSikIphalam||29||  kurute dadhi gurveva vahniM pArAvataM na tu||29||  kapitthaM dADimaM sAmlaM grAhi nAmalakIphalam||29||  kaSAyA grAhiNI CItA dhAtakI na harItakI||29||  apradhAnAH pRthak tasmAdrasAdyAH saMCritAstu te||29||

vipAka upasaMhriyate-yathArasamityAdi| kecidAcAryA rasAnatikrameNa pAkaSaTkaM jaguravadan| yathArasamiti yathAvidho rasaH svarUpeNa tathAvidha eva tasya vipAkaH tena madhurasya madhuro vipAkaH amlo~amlasya
paTurlavaNasya tiktastiktasya kaTuH kaToH kaSAyaH kaSAyasyeti| taccAcArya-
matamasAmpratamayuktamiti| kutaH? vyabhicArAt| etadevodAharaNena darCayati-
yatsvAdvityAdi| yadi hi rasasadRCaH sarvasya vipAkaH syAt tata evaM viparyayo na syAt| te ca rasAdayo dravyAt pRthagbhAvena kAryakaratvena vikalpyamAnA apradhAnA yataste sthitA api yasmin dravye na taddravye tatsadRCameva kAryaM kurvanti| etadeva yasmAd dRSTa ityAdinidarCanena darCayati| evaM yathA madhurarase viparyayo dRSTastathAnyeSvapi raseSu 
dRCyata ityapradhAnAH rasAdyAH|

 prabhAvaCca yato dravye dravyaM CreSThamato matam||30||

dravyaM tu CreSThamityAcAryANAM mataM, yataste  rasAdyA rasavIryavipAkAH prabhAvaCca dravyasaMCritAH tatparatantrA ityarthaH||30||

sUtrasthAnam

rasabhedIyaH

 athAto rasabhedIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

pUrvasminnadhyAye dravyavIryavipAkaprabhAvA nirNItAH| rasastu bahuvaktavyatvAt punaratrocyate|| 1||

 rasaH khalvApyaH prAgavyaktaCca||2||  sa SaDRtukatvAt kAlasya mahAbhUtaguNairUnAtiriktaiH saMsRSTo viSamaM vidagdhaH SoDhA pRthagvipariNamate madhurAdibhedena||2||

rasaH khalvApyaH yo~ayaM jihvendriyagrAhyaH, so~abAkhyAn mahAbhUtAt sampadyate| sa ca rasaH prAk prathamamanAsAditAnyamahAbhUtAnurAgo~avyakta eva svarUpeNa| tato mahAbhUtAnAM pRthivyAdInAM guNaiH pArthivAdibhiH paJcabhiH kaiCcidadhikaiH saMspRSTastaiCca guNairviSamamUnAdhikyAdiniyamena vidagdhaH pariNatyA gRhItamahAbhUtaguNAnurAga eka eva rasaH pRthaDmadhurAmlAdibhedena SaDbhirvikArairvipariNamate|| 2||

 tatra bhUjalayorbAhulyAnmadhuro rasaH||3||  bhUtejasoramlaH jalatejasorlavaNaH||3||  vAyvAkACayostiktaH||3||  vAyutejasoH kaTukaH||3||  vAyUrvyoH kaSAyaH||3||

kathaM mahAbhUtAnAmUnAdhikyamucyate| kAlasya saMvatsarAkhyasya SaDRtukatvAdrasasyApi SaDbhedatvaM tathA ca CiCire vAvyAkACayorAdhikyAdrasasya tiktatA| vasante vAyupRthivyoH kaSAyatA| grISme~agnivAyvoH kaTukatA| varSAsvagnipRthivyoramlatA| CaradyagnyudakayorlavaNatA| hemante pRthivyudakayormadhurateti| pradhAnyAd vyapadeCaH tenAnyartUdbhavAnAmapi rasAnAM yathoktamahAbhUtadvayAdhikyameva kAraNaM vijJeyam|| 3||

 teSAM svAdurAsvAdyamAno mukhamupalimpatIndriyANi prasAdayati||4||  dehaM prahlAdayati||4||  SaTpadapilIlikAdInAmapISTatamaH||4||  amlastu jihvAmudvejayatyuraH kaNThaM vidahati||4||  mukhaM srAvayatyakSibhruvaM saGkocayati daCanAn harSayati romANi ca||4||  lavaNo mukhaM viSyandayati kaNThakapolaM vidahati annaM prarocayati||4||  tikto viCadayati vadanaM viCodhayati kaNThaM pratihanti rasAnAm||4||  kaTuko bhRCamudvejayati jihvAgraM cimicimAyati kaNThakapolaM srAvayati mukhAkSinAsikaM vidahati deham||4||  kaSAyastu jaDayati jihvAM badhnAti kaNThaM pIDayati hRdayam||4||

nanu kena rUpeNa rasaviCeSo vijJAyate? ata Aha-teSAmityAdi| teSAM rasAnAM madhye yo raso mukhalepAdikaraH sa svAduriti vijJeyaH| AsvAdyamAno jihvayA saMyogaM nIyamAnaH| AsvAdyamAna itisarvarasAnAM yojyaH| prahlAdanaH ACvAsakaraH| amlaraso jihvodvejanAdisvarUpaH urasi kaNThe ca vidAhaM karoti| lavaNo mukhamantarviSyandayati srAvayati kaNThe kapolayoCca vidAhaM karoti anne ca rucimutpAdayati| tikto mukhavaiCadyAdikaraNasvarUpaH| vaiCadyaM paicchilyanACaH| kaNThaM copalepanACanena Codhayati rasanamindriyaM pratihanti anyarasagrahaNaCaktiM
nACayati ityarthaH| kaTuka AsvAdyamAno bhRCamatyarthamudvejayati jihvAgraM|
udvegaM karotItyarthaH| kaNThe kapolayoCca taikSNyAccimicimAyanamagni
jvAlAsaMsparCAdiva karoti mukhAdikaM visrAvayati sakale ca CarIre vidAhaM karoti| kaSAyo jihvAM jaDayati rasanAdikriyAsu mandIkaroti|
kaNThabandhaM CvAsAdInAmayathApravRttimiva karoti||4||

 tatra madhuro raso janmaprabRti sAtmyAtsarvadhAtuvivardhana AyuSyo 
bAlavRddhakSatakSINabalavarNendriyatvakkeCakaNThahitaH prINano bRMhaNo
jIvanastarpaNaH sthairyasandhAnastanyakarovAtapittaviSadAhamUrcchAtRSNA
praCamanaH snigdhaH CIto mRdurguruCca||5||  evaGguNo~api sa sadAtyupayujyamAnaH
sthaulyAgnisAdagurutAlasakAtinidrAH||5||  CvAsapramehagalarogavisaMjJatAsya
mAdhuryalocanagalArbudagaNDamAlAH||5||  chardyudardamUrdharukkAsapInasakrimIn||5||  ClIpadajvarodaraSThIvanAni cAvahet||5||

iti rasAnAM svarUpamuktvA tatra madhuretyAdinA karma nirdiCati| tatra teSu raseSu madhye madhura upayukto dhAtUnAM rasAdInAM saptAnAM vRddhikaraH| kutaH AjanmasAtmyAt janmanaH prabhRti dehasya satmyAdityarthaH| bAlabhAva eva kSIrAdinA madhureNa dehavRttiH puruSasya| hita iti bAlAdibhiH sambadhyate| prINanastuSTikaraH| jIvana ojasyaH| evaGguNo~api 
madhuro rasaH sadaivAtyupayujyamAnaH sthaulyAdIn rogAn kurute| yadA tvatimAtratvena rahitaH sadopayujyate tadA sukhakara eva| sthaulyAdayo rogAH
kecidvakSyamANalakSaNAH| arbudaCabdasya locanagalAbhyAM sambandhaH||5||

 amlo~anilabarhaNo~anulomanaH koSThavidAhI raktapittakRduSNavIryaH CItasparCo bodhayatIndriyANi rocanaH pAcano dIpano bRMhaNastarpaNaH prINanaH kledano vyavAyI laghuH snigdho hRdyaCca||6||  janayati CithilatvaM sevitaH so~atidehe 
kaphavilayanakaNDUpANDutAraktadRgvighAtAn||6||  kSatavihitavisarpaM raktapittaM pipAsAM
Cvayathumapi kRCAnAM taijasatvAt bhramaJca||6||

amlo~anilanibarhaNatvAdiyuktaH sa cAtisevito dehe CaithilyAdIn janayati||6||

 lavaNaH stambhabandhasaGghAtavidhmApanaH sarvarasapratyanIko dIpano rocanaH pAcanaH kledanaH CoSaNaH snehanaH svedanaH bhedanaCchedanaH saro vyavAyI vikASI harati pavanaM viSyandayati kaphaM viCodhayati srotAMsi
nAtiguruH snigdhatIkSoSNaCca||7||  khalatipalitatRSNAtApamUrcchAvisarpa-
CvayathukiTibhakoThAkSeparodhAsrapittam||7||  kSataviSamadavRddhiM vAtaraktaM karoti 
kSapayati balamojaH so~ati vA sevanena||7||

lavaNarasaH stambhAdInAM vidhmApano vinACakaraH| stambho~aGgadoSAdeH bandhaH tasyaiva mArgarodhaH saGghAto bhAvAnAM nibiDatvam| pratipakSo 
vighAtitvAt| viSyandayati srAvayati| nAtigururnAtisnigdhaCca| so~atisevitaH khalatyAdIn karoti balAdIMCca kSapayati||7||

 tiktaH svayamarociSNuraruciviSakRmimUrcchotkledajvaradAhatRTkuSThakaNDUharaH
kledamedovasAmajjaviNmUtrapittaCleSmopaCoSaNo dIpanaH pAcano lekhanaH
stanyakaNThaviCodhano medhyo nAtirUkSaH CIto laghuCca||8||  dhAtubalakSayamUrcchAglAnibhramavAtarogaparuSatvam||8||  kharaviCadaraukSyabhAvaiH so~atisamAsevitaH kuryAt||8||

tikto rasaH svayaM puruSasyArocanaCIlaH| aruciM cAhAradravyaviSayAn
nACayati| viSAdIMCca| dehe ca kledAdInAmupaCoSaNaH| so~atisevito
dhAtukSayAdIn karoti kharatvAdvaiCadyAdraukSyAcca|

 kaTuko~alasakaCvayathUdardasthaulyAbhiSyandakRmivaktrarogaviSakuSTha
kaNDUprasAdhano vraNAvasAdanaH snehakledaCoSaNo rocanaH pAcano dIpano
lekhanaH CodhanaH CoSayatyannaM sphuTayatIndriyANi bhinatti CoNitasaGghAtaM chinatti bandhAn vivRNoti srotAMsi kSapayati CleSmANaM
laghurUkSatIkSoSNaCca||9||  kurute~atiniSevitaH sa tRSNAM madamUrcchAvamimohadehasAdAn||9||  balaCukragalopa
CoSakampabhramatApaglapanAtikarCanAni||9||  karacaraNapArCvapRSThaprabhRtiSvanilasya kopamatitIvram||9||  saGkocatodabhedaiH vAyvagniguNAdhikatvena||9||

kaTuko~alasakaCvayathUdardasthaulyAbhiSyandakRmivaktrarogaviSakuSTha
kaNDUprasAdhano vraNAvasAdanaH snehakledaCoSaNo rocanaH pAcano dIpano
lekhanaH CodhanaH CoSayatyannaM sphuTayatIndriyANi bhinatti CoNitasaGghAtaM chinatti bandhAn vivRNoti srotAMsi kSapayati CleSmANaM
laghurUkSatIkSoSNaCca| 
kurute~atiniSevitaH sa tRSNAM madamUrcchAvamimohadehasAdAn| balaCukragalopa
CoSakampabhramatApaglapanAtikarCanAni|| 
karacaraNapArCvapRSThaprabhRtiSvanilasya kopam karoti|
kimbhUtaM saGkocAdibhistIvraM dussahametacca tRSNAdikaM vAyvagniguNAdhikyena hetunA karoti| hetukIrtanaM deCAdivaCAddhetorUnAdhikyena tatkAryasyApi tathAbhAvasUcanAyAnyatra
ca taddhetusadbhAve tathaiveti pradarCanAya ca||9||

 kaSAyo balAsaM sapittaM saraktaM
nihantyACu badhnAti varcotirUkSaH||10||  gurustvaksavarNatvakRt kledaCoSI
himaH prINano ropaNo lekhanaCca||10||  atyabhyAsAtmo~api CukroparodhaM
tRSNAdhmAnastambhaviSTambhakArCyam||10||  srotobandhaM vAtaviNmUtrasaGgaM
pakSAghAtAkSepakAdIMCca kuryAt||10||

kaSAyaH balAsaM CleSmANaM sapittaM saraktaM cACu nihanti| varcaH 
purISaM badhnAti ruNaddhi| so~apyatyabhyAsAt CukropaghAtAdIn kuryAt||10||

nanu doSAdInAM vRddhikSayayorlakSaNaM cikitsA coktA kAraNaM noktamatastatpratipAdanArthamAha- dhAtava ityAdi| dhAtuCabdena dehadhAraNasAmAnyAt sarve doSAdaya ucyante| tena dhAtavaH CArIrAH CarIrasthAH samAnairjAtyA sadRCairAhArairvihAraiCca vRddhimApnuvanti| athavA samAnaguNabhUyiSTairvihAraiCca vRddhimApnuvanti| athavA samAnaguNabhUyiSTairjAtivisadRCairapi bAhulyena sadRCaguNairityarthaH| evaM dhAtavo jAtiviparItairviparItaguNabhUyiSThairvA hrAsaM prApnuvanti| tathA hItyAdinA tantrakAra evodAharaNapUrvakaM darCayati| dehe CarIre ye mAMsakaphAdyA guravo dhAtavaH te tathAvidhairgurubhireva| bAhyairupacIyante| viparItaistu laghubhiH pRthaktvakAribhirvijAtIyairapacIyante| pRthaktvaM tajjAtyaparipoSaH| evaM laghudhAtUnAmapi vAtAdInAM vAcyam| tasmAdyata evamata eva na tathAnye bhAvA mAMsasya vRddhikAraNaM yathA mAMsaM yathaH sarveNa prakAreNa tayoreva sAdRCyam| evaM sarvadhAtUnAM vAcyam| yatra tvanantaroktaM samAnaM dhAtorna sannihitam, sannihitamapi kenaciddhetunA vAbhyavahartuM na pAryate, tatrAnyaprakRtInAM jAtyA samAnAnAM samAnaguNabhUyiSThAnAmAhAravihArANAM nAnAvidhAnAmabhyavahAro vidheyaH| nanu kathaM sannihitAnAmabhyavaharaNamaCakyata Aha-viruddhatvAt, ghRNitvAdaruceCca| viruddhatvaM vivikSidhAtuvijAtIyadhAtuvRddhidvAreNa dehe~apathyatvaM dhAtusAmAnye~api| ghRNitvamAhAraviSeSajugupsAvatvam| aruciryatra na kiJcidrocate| na ca jugupsA vidyate| evaM tatra dhAtuvijAtIyasya sadRCaguNasya tvabhyavahAraH CreyAn| tadyathetyudAharaNenaitadeva sphuTayati|

 karmApi yadyasya dhAtoH samAnakriyatayA vRddhikaraM tasya tasya vRddhimabhilaSatA tattadAsevyam||15||  tathaiva cAtulyakriyatayA hrAsakaraM tadarthineti||15||  api ca - viCeSato raktavRddhijAn raktanirharaNaprasAdanakAyavirecanena||15||  mAMsavRddhijAn saMCodhanaCastrakSArAgnikarmabhiH||15||  medojAn sthaulyakArCyakriyAkrameNa||15||  raktakSayajAn mAMsarasamadyakSIraiH||15||  asthikSayajAn bastibhistiktopahitaiH kSIrastibhiCca||15||  CakRdvRddhijAnatIsAravidhAnena||15||  CakRtkSayajAn mehakRcchracikitsayA||15||  svedakSyajAnabhyaGgavyAyAmamadyasvapnanivAtaCaraNAsvedairiti||15||

 yadyapyannapAcakAgniparAyattavRddhikSayA dhAtvagnayaH, tathApyAhAradravyaCaktivaCAdya evAnyatamo dhAtvagnirmandI bhavati sa eva svasya dhAtoH kSapaNACaktatvAt vRddhimeva janayati| evaM tIkSNo~agniH svasya dhAtoH kSayam|

kiM CRNomIti CiSyeNa pRSTa Aha - pAraMparyetyAdi| dAvAgneH sambandhinI CikhA pAraMparye~apyavyucchinnavanadAhapravRtte~api yathA tattadviCiSTamindhanaM prApya vRddhiM kSayaM ca yAti| tathaiva dhAtuparamparA dhAtusamUhaH| ko~asya bhASitasyArthaH? ucyate| dAvAgniryadyapi sakalaM vanaM dahati tathApi tatsambandhinI CikhA jvAlA yadA mahad vRkSAdIndhanamACliSyati| tadA sA jvAlA vRddhiM yAti| yadA tu svalpamindhanaM prApnoti tadA sA jvAlA kSayaM yAti| evaM dhAtu paramparApi| tasya indhanamAhArasAraH| yatra tu dhAtvagnimAndyAdakSapanAtsa AhArasAraH santataM srotaHpravAhAnanupraveCena vRddho bhavati tatra sa dhAturvRddhiM yAti evaM kSaye~api vikalpya vAcyam 
	dhAtuvRddhikSayakAraNenedamucyate  - dravyamityAdi sarvaM dravyaM bAhyamAbhyantareNa tulyaM sat bhRCamACu ca vRddhyai jAyate bhruCamatyarthamACu CIghrameva viCiSTaM visadRCaM kSayAya jAyate kuta Aha-pratyAtmabIjaniyatatvAt pratisvarUpaM niyatakAraNatvAdityarthaH tathA hi mAMsameva yathA mAMsakAraNaM na tathAnyat idamapi dhAtuvRddhikSayakAraNamucyate||16||

 pUrvo dhAtuH paraM kuryAdvRddhaH kSINaCca tadvidhamI||17||

pUrvamityAdi yo dhAturyasmAt pUrvaH sa vRddhaH san paramanantaraM tathAvidhamAtmasadRCaM vRddhameva kuryAdityarthaH evaM pUrvaM kAraNAntareNa kSIyaM uttaraM tathAvidhaM kSINameva karoti yato dhAtvAhArA hi dhAtava ityuktam iti doSAdInAM vRddhikSayakAraNamuktam|

te ca doCAdayo duSTArogakaraNatameva yAntItyucyate- doSA duSTA ityAdi| doSA vAtAdayo duSTA dhAtUn rasAdIn dUSayanti|  te tu doSAH kathaM duSyantItyAha-rasairmadhurAdibhiryuktairityarthaH|ubhaye doSACca dhAtavaCca duSTA malAn dUSayanti| te ca malA duSTA malAyanAni malamArgAn dUSayanti| kAni tAnItyAha-adho dve ityAdi| adho dve gudameDhre| Cirasi sapta| dvau karNauI dvau nAsApuTau| dve akSiNI| AsyaM ceti| yathA svedavahAni sakalaromakUpAni iti malAnAM CakRdAdInAmayanAni margAH|  ataH kAraNAdyAto duSTadoSadUSitamalAnAmACrayabhUtAni malAyanAnyatasteSu yathAsvaM gadAH syuH| ya eva malo duSTastadayanasyaiva rogotpattirityarthaH||18||

 CleSmA tvaci sthitaH kuryAtstambhaM  CvetAvabhAsatAm||21||  paNDvAmayaM CoNitago mAMsasaMstho~arbudApacIH||21||  ArdracarmAvanaddhAbhagAtratAM cAtigauravam||21||  medogaH sthUlatAM mehamasthnAM stabdhatvamasthigaH||21||  majjagaH CuklanetratvaM CukrasthaH CukrasaJcayam||21||  vibandhaM gauravaM cAti sirAsthaH stabdhagAtratAm||21||  snAyugaH sandhi CUlatvaM koSThago jaTharonnatim||21||  arocakAvipAkau ca tAMstAMCca kaphasaMbhavAn||21||

anantaraM CleSmaNo rogakartRtvamACrayaviCeSeNAha- CleSmA tvacityAdi| CvetAvabhAsatA CvetavarNa darCitvam| medasi sthitaH sthaulyaM pramehaM ca karoti| asthigataH svACrayANAmasthnAM stabdhatvaM karoti| CukrasthitaH Cukrasya saJcayaM dhAraNena bahutvaM karoti| vibandho bahiSpravRttiH| nirodhaH Cukrasya| tasyaivAtigurutvaM ca karoti| koSThago jaTharonnatyAdIn karotiI tAMstAn kaphajAn CleCmajvaraCleSmagulma kAmalAdIn sarvAn CleSmodbhavAn gadAn karoti||21||

 viNmUtrayoH sACrayayostatra tatropadekSyate
upatApopaghAtau tu svACrayendriyagAmalAH||22||

viCi purISe mUtre ca tayoCcACraye sthitA doSA yat kurvanti tattasya tatra
mUtrAghAtAtisArAdAvupadekSyate ete ca malA vAtadayo yadA indriyaM prApnuvanti tadA tasya malopataptasyendriyasya 
cakSurAderya ACrayaH akSyAdistatra svACraye upatApaM vopaghAtaM vA kurvanti svalpatvAdupatApamAdhikyAdupaghAtamiti malAnAmACrayabhedene 
roga-kartRtvam||22||

 vyAyAmAdUSmaNastaikSNyAdahitAcaraNAdapi
koSThAcchAkhAsthimarmANi drutatvAnmArutasya ca
doSA yAnti tathA tebhyaH srotomukhaviCodhanAtI
vRddhyAbhiSyandanAtpAkAtkoSThaM vAyoCca nigrahAt||23||

nanu doSANAM sakalaCarIravyApitve~api koSThAkhyaH pradhAna ACrayo 
yatastatra bAhulyena tiSThanti evaM ca sati kathaM teSAM 
raktAdyACrayeNena rogakartRtvamityAha-vyAyAmetyAdi vyAyAmAdibhiH
kAraNairdoSAH koSThaM muktvA CAkhAdIni yAnti CAkhA bhiSakCAstraprasiddhA 
raktAdayo  dhAtavastvakca asthnAM marmANyasthimarmAMNi tatra vyAyAmena
CithilIbhUteSusrotassu vAyau preraka udIrNe tatpreritA doSAH koSThaM muktvA
CAkhAdIni yAntiI tathA USmaNo~agnestaikSNyAt parityaktanibiDabhAvA vilinA iva 
sarvato~abhisaranti evamahitasyAhArAderAcaraNAdapi CAkhAdIni yAnti doSasya 
koSThAkhyasthAnabhraMCakaraNasvarUpApathyasevanAditiI mArutasya vAyoCca kAraNAntareNa 
svabhAvenaiva vA drutatvAtI vAyoCca vAyvantarapreraNaM dRSTatvAnnAsambaddhamI nanu tatra
CAkhAdau sthitAnAM yadA koSThAnayanaprayojanaM tadA kathamAgacchantItyAha-tathA tebhyaH ityAdi
tebhyaH CAkhAdibhyaH koSThaM doSA yAntI sambandhaH srotomukhAnAM CuddhyA doSA
koSThaM yAnti tathA vRddhyA varddhanena yo~abhiSyandaH srAvaH CAkhAdibhyaH koSTho
CAkhAdisthA doSAH pAkAtparityaktasandhAnAH koSThaM yAnti prerakasya
vAyornigrAhAdAdhikyanACAt|| 23||

 tatrasthACca vilamberan bhUyo hetupratIkSiNaH||24||

te ca doSAstatrasthAH koSThasthA hetupratIkSiNaH svayaM vilamberan
rogAnna kurvantItyarthaHI tenaitaduktaM bhavati-ye bahavaH svarUpeNaiva
te na sadRCaM deCakAlAdihetumapekSanteI api tu svayameva rogaM 
kurvantyeva|| 24||

 te kAlAdibalaM labdhvA kupyantyanyACrayeSvapi||25||

ye ca hetupratIkSiNaH santo vilambitAste bhUyaH samAnAtkAlAdito
balaM labdhvA kupyantyACrayeCvapItyapiCabdAt svACraye~api| tatra vAyuh kadAcit sve yathokte sthAne kupyati| kadAcicchleSmaNaH pittasya sthAne vA evaM pittaCleSanorapi vAcyam||25||

 tatrAnyasthAnasaMstheSu tadIyAmabaleSu tu||26||  kuryAccikitsAM svAmeva balenAnyAbhibhAviSu||26||  AgantuM CamayeddoSaM sthAninaM pratikRtya vA||26||

tatra tu yA cikitsA tAmAha- tatrAnyasthAnasaMstheSvityAdi| svasthAnasthAnAJcikitsA spaSTaiva| parasthAna gatAnAM dvaividhyaM| sthAninamapekSyA~a~agantorbalavatvamabalavatvaJca| tatrAgantuSvabaleSu tadIyA cikitsA| tadIyetyanenAnyaCabdopalakSitaH sthAn| parAmRSate| 
yadA tvAgantavo balenAnyaM  sthAninamabhibhavanti,tadA teSvAgantuSu svAmeva cikitsAM kuryAt| yadA tu dvayoH sthAnina 
AgantoCca samatvaM tadA prathamaM sthAniniM pratikRtya paJcAdAgantuM Camayet| 
balAbalAnapekSayA vA iti|| 26||

 tejo yatsarvadhAtUnAmojastat paramucyate||27||  mRdu somAtmakaM CuddhaM raktamISatsapItakam||27||  yatsAramAdau garbhasya yacca garbharasAdrasaH||27||  saMvartamAnaM hRdayaM samACrayati yatpurA||27||  yaccharIrarasasnehaH prANo yatra pratiSThitaH||27||  yasyA nACAnnanACo~asti prINitA yena dehinaH||27||  hRdayasthamapi vyApi tat paraM jIvatAspadam||27||

doSANAM prAkRtaM vaikRtaM ca svarUpamuktamI te ca doSAH samA
apyojasA vihinaM dehaM saMvAhayitumaCaktAH;ata ojasaH svarUpaM pAlanaM
cocyate-teja ityAdiI sarvadhAtUnAM yattejastat pradhAnaM paramojaH 
CabdenocyateI aSTabindukamityarthaHI tacca mRdvatIkSNaguNamI
somAtmakaM saumyasvarUpamI CuddhamanupahatamISadraktaM stokalohitaM
sapItakaM caI yad garbhasyAdau sAraM sAramiva sAraM na hi tena vinA 
CukraCoNite jIvAnupraveCaHI yacca garbharasAdrasaH garbhasya yo~asau 
rasaH prathamo dhAtuH tasmAdapi sAraH prasAdabhUtamI saMvartamAnaM 
yacca purA dhAtordehe pravartamAnaM prathamaM hRdayamACrayati, paCcAt 
kramAd dehavyAptiM ca karotiI yacca CarIrasastasya sasneho yatra prANo
vyApako~api pratiSThito baddhaHI yasya tvaSTabindvAkhyasyAnACAddehasya 
nACo nAstiI yena ca hRdayasthena  dehino vividhAH prANinaH 
prINitAstarpitAH yacca hRdayasthamapi vyApi tadojo~anyebhyo jIvitAspadebhyaH 
CiraHprabhRtibhyaH paraM pradhAnaM jIvitAspadam|| 27||

 ojaH kSIyate kopakSuddhyAnaCokaCramAdibhiH||28||

taccojaH kopakSudAdibhirasaumyaiH kSIyate|| 28||

 bibheti durbalo~abhIkSNaM dhyAyAti vyathitendriyaH||29||  duCcchAyo durmano rukSo bhavet kSAmaCca tatkSate \\\\\\\jIvanEyauSadhakSIrarasAdyAstatra bhESajam||29||  ojovRddhau hi dehasya tuSTipuSTibalodayaH||30||

tatkSaye ca dehI bibheti| akAraNAd daurbalyAdiyuktiCca bhavet| abhIkSNamatyarthaM dhyAyAti dhyAnaparo bhavatItyarthaH| vyathitendriyo~aCaktendriyah| duScchAyo duSTakAntiH| tatraujaHkSaye bhaiSajyamauSadhaM jIvaniyauSadhasiddhakSIramAMsarasAdyAH|AdigRhaNena nAnAvidhAbhyavahAryaparigrahaH ||29|| 

evaMvidhena ca bheSajena ojovRddhau satyAM ca dehasya CarIrasya
tuSTyAdyudbhavaH| tuSTirmanaHparitoSaH| puSTiraGgAnAM paripoSa iti|


 yadannaM dveSTi yadApi prArthayetAvirodhi tu||31||  tattattyajan samaCnaMCca tau tau vRddhikSayau jayet||31||  kurvate~abhiruciM doSA viparItasamAnayoH||31||  vRddhAH kSINACca bhUyiSThaM lakSayantyabudhA na tat||31||

ojosaCcikitsAprasaGgena sarveSAM doSAdInAM sAmAnyarUpeNa

sUtrasthAnam

doSabhedIyaH

 athAto doSaphedIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

pUrveNAdhyAyena doSAdInAM prAkRtaM vaikRtaM ca svarUpamuktam|
atra tu teSAmeva sthAnakriyAvasthAdiviSeSabhedaparijJAnArthamadhyAyArambhaH|
athAto doSabhedIyamadhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH| atra ca 
yadyapyanyadapyucyate, yathApi prAdhAnyAddoSaireva vyapadeSaH|| 1||

 vAyvAkASadhAtuphyAM vAyuH||2||  AgneyaM pittam||2||  amphaHpRthivIphyAM SleSmA||2||

vAyunA mahAbhUtasvarUpeNAkASadhAtumiSritena SarIrasya vAyoH
sambhavaH| dhAtugrahaNaM SaktisvarUpapradarSanArtham| anyathA amUrtAnmUrtasambhavo viruddhaH|
pittamAgneyam| ambhasA pRthivImiSritena SleSmA niSpadyate|| 2||

 tatra pakvASayaH kaTiH sakthinI pAdAvasthi SrotraM sparSanaJca 
vAtasthAnAni||3||  atra ca pakvASayo viSeSeNa||3||  nAphirAmASayaH svedo lasikA rudhiraM cakSuH sparSanaM ca pittasthAnAni||3||  atra nAphirviSeSeNa||3||  uraH kaNThaH SiraH kloma
parvANyAmASayo raso medo GrANaM rasanaM ca SleSmasthAnAni||3||  atrApyuroviSeSeNa||3||

tatra pakvASayAdIni vAtasya sthAnAni| pakvASayaM nAbheradhaH|
SeSaM prasiddham| SrotraM SravaNendriyAdhiSThAnam| sparSanaM tvak|
eSu ca madhye viSeSeNa pakvASayaH sthAnam| nAbhiprabhRtIni pittasthAnAni| 
lasikA jalasadRSastvaciH snehaH| uraHkaNThAdIni SleSmasthAnAni| 
klema SArIrake vakSyamANam|| 3||

 itthamadhomadhyordhvasanniveSinA doSatrayeNa SarIramAgAramiva
sthUNAtritayena sthirIkRtam||4||  ataSca doSA dehasya 
sthirIkaraNAt sthUNA ityucyante||4||

evamanena prakAreNedaM sthAnatrayasanniveSinA doSatrayeNa sthUNAsadRSena 
SarIramagArasadRSaM dhAryate| a eva doSA AcAryaiH sthUNASabhdenocyante|
sthUNA agAradhAraNastambhA ucyante|| 4||

 dhAraNAd dhAtavaH||5||  malinIkaraNAdAhAramalatvAcca malAH||5||  dUSaNasvaphAvatvAdUSaNasvaphAvatvAddoSA iti||5||

SeSamanvarthakathanaM subodham|| 5||

 ta ete pratyekaM paJcadhA bhidyante||6||  tadyathA-prANodAnavyAnasamAnApAnabhedairvAyuH||6||  tatra prANo mUrdhnyavasthitaH kaNThoraCcaro 
buddhIndriyahRdayamanodhamanIdhAraNaSThIvanakSavathUdgArapraCvAsocchvAsAnnapraveCAdikriyaH||6||  udAna urasyavasthitaH kaNThanAsikAnAbhicaro vAkpravRttiprayatnorjAbalavarNa
srotaHprINanadhIdhRtismRtimanobodhanAdikriyaH||6||  vyAno 
hRdyavasthitaH kRtsnadehacaraH CIghrataragatirgatiprasAraNA
kuJcanotkSepAvakSepanimeSonmeSajRmbhaNAnnAsvAdanasroto
viCodhanasvedAsRksrAvaNAdikriyo yonau ca CukrapratipAdano
vibhajya cAnnasya kiTTAtsAraM tena kramACo dhAtUMstarpayati||6||  samAno~antaragnisamIpasthastatsandhukSaNaH pakvA
mACayadoSamalaCukrArtavAmbuvahaH srotovicArI tadavala
mbanAnnadhAraNapAcanavivecankiTTA~adhonayanAdikriyaH||6||  apAnastvapAnasthito bastiCroNimeDhravRSaNavaGkSaNorucaro 
viNmUtraCukrArtavagarbhaniSkramanAdikriya iti||6||

te caite doSAH pratyekaM paJcAbhiH prakArairbhidyante| viSiSTa
sthAnASrayeNa kriyAbhedAt| yathaiko~api devadatto yAM yAM kriyAM
karoti tadanurUpamevAnekaM pAcakalAvakAdinAma labhate| tadyathetyAdinA
tAneva paJca bhedAn darSayati| tatra prANo mUrdhni Sirasi sthitaH|
prAdAnyena kaNThamuraScarati| bhuddhyAdyAdhArabhUtam| dhamanyaH SarIrake vakSyante|
SThIvanaM muKasrAvotsAraNam| praSvAsaH SvAsapreraNamucCvAso~antaHpraveSanam|
annasya praveSo~annapraveSaH| udAnaH prAdhAnyenorasi sthitaH 
nAsikAditritayaM carati| vAkpravRttyAdikriyaH| prayatnaH kAryeSu
padArthagrahaNAdiSUdyamaH| srotasAM prINanaM tarpaNaM srotaHprINanam|
dhIprabhRtInAM vibhodhanena sambhandhaH| AdigrahaNena sarvaM teSAmeva
saMvAhanaparipoSAdikaM gRhyate| vyAnaH prAdhAnyena hRdyavasthitaH 
kRtsnaM niravaSeSaM dehaM carati prANAdyapekSayA SIGrataragatiH|
gatyAdayaSca sarvAH kriyAstadAyattAH| gatirdeSAntaraprAptiH| prasAraNamaGgAnAM
dIrGIkaraNam| AkuJcanaM teSAmeva saGkocaH| utkSepo~aGgasya 
UrdhvaM nayanam| avakSepo~adhaH| nimeSo~akSNaH puTAbhyAM
pidhAnam| unmeSastasyaiva vikAsaH| jRmbhaNaM gAtravinAmaH| annA
svAdanmiSTAnigrahaH| sa eva vyAno yoSicCarIrasthaH puMsA
siktaM SukraM yoniM pratipAdayati| antaryoniM nayatItyarthaH| sa 
eva ca vyAno~annasya sambhandhi sAraM  kiTTAdvibhajya pRthakkRtya
tenAnnasAreNa dhAtUn rasAdIstaparyati| samAnaH prAdhAnyenAntarA
gnisamIpe tiSThati| tasya cAntarAgneH sandhukSaka uddIpakaH|
antarAgneH sthAnamAmASayapakvASayayormadhyaM nAbherardhAGgulamAtreNa
vAme pArSve| sa ca samAnaH pakvASaye doSamalAdivaH| srotassu
ca vicarati| tadavalambhanAdikriyaSca| teSAmanantaroktAnAM srotasAma
valambhanaM dhAraNaM kriyA yasyeti| annasyApakvasyAmASayadhAraNa
mannadhAraNam| pAcanamannasyaiva| vivecanaM saMhatasyAnnasya pAkAya
vibhajanam| apAnastu prAdhAnyenApAne kaTeradhastiSThati| bhastyA
dipradeSacaraH| viNmUtrAdiniSkramaNakriyaSca| tanniSkramaNe kriyA
preraNamAdigrahaNena viDdhAraNAdiparigrahaH| iti vAyubhedAH paJca|| 6||

 pAcakaraJjakasAdhakAlocakaphrAjakatvaphedaiH pittam||7||  tatra
yadAmASayapakvASayamadhyasthaM paJcamahAphUtAtmakatve~api
tejoguNotkarSAt kSapitasomaguNaM tataSca tyaktadravasvaphAvaM
sahakArikAraNairvAyukledAdiphiranugrAhAd dahanapacanA-
dikriyayA laphdhAgniSaphdaM pittamannaM pacati, sArakittau
viphajati SeSANi ca pittasthAnAni tatrasthamevAnugRhNAti
tatpAcakamityucyate||7||  AmASayasthantu rasasya raJjanAdra
Jjakam||7||  dRSTisthaM rUpAlocanAdAlocakam||7||  tvak
sthaM tvaco phrAjanAt phrAjakam||7||  tadaphyaGgapariSekAlepA
dIn pAcayati CAyASca prakASayati||7||

ataH paraM pAcakAdayaH paJca pittabhedA ucyate| tatra teSu paJcasu
madhye pittasya paJcabhUtAtmakatve~apyAgneyaguNotkarSAt kSapita
somaguNamAmASayapakvASayamadhyasthaM kSapitasomaguNatvAcca tyakta
dravasvabhAvaM sahakArikAraNaiH pacanakriyAM prati savyApArairvAyu
kledAdibhiranugrahAdupakArAdyA dahanapAcanAdikA kriyA tasya,
tayApi labhdhAgniSabhdaM yat pittaM tat pAcakamityucyate| tadatraM
pacati tatsAratvaM kiTTatvaM cAnnasya sampAdayati| SoSANi pitta
sthAnAni dhAtvAdInyanugRhNAti svasthAnasthitameva teSUpakarotI
tyarthaH| yattu pittamAmASayasthitaM tadrasAKyasya dhAto raktabhAvotpattau
raJjanA-drAganiSpAdanAdraJjakaSabhdenocyate| yattu hRdayasthaM bhuddhyAdibhiH
kAraNabhUtairabhiprethamarthaM bhAhyaM grahaNasmaraNAdirUpeNa sAdhayati tatsA
dhakam| dRSTisthamantastArakasthitaM tu rUpasyAlocanAt tadAyatta
rUpagrahaNaSaktitvAdAlocakaSaktitvena Alocakamucyate| tvaksthaM
ca tvaco bhrAjanAt dIptimattAkaraNAd bhrAjakaSabhdenocyate|
tadbhrAjakamabhyaGgAdIn pAcayati| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-na hyapakvaM
dravyaM svaM kAryaM karoti| dRSyante ca abhyaGgAdiprayoktAnyauSadhAdIni
rAgakAThinyAdIni nASayanti tAni tvaksthena pittena pacyanta
iti| tadeva bhrAjakaM yAScCAyAH kAntayo vakSyamANAH paJca
nAbhasAdyAstAH prakASayati prakaTayatIti paJca pittabhedAH|| 7||

 avalamphakakledakaphodhakatarpakaSleSakatvaphedaiH SleSmA||8||  sa tUrasthaH svavIryenA trikasyAnnavIryeNa ca saha hRdaya
syaca SeSANAM ca SleSmasthAnAnAM tatrastha evodakakarma
NAvalambanAdavalambaka ityucyate||8||  AmASayastthito~annasaGGAtasya 
kledanAtkledakaH||8||  rasanAsthaH sampragrasabodhanAt bodhakaH||8||  SirasthaScakSurAdIndriyatarpaNAttarpakaH||8||  parvastho~asthisandhiSleSaNAt SleSaka iti||8||

avalambhakAdayaH paJca SleSmabhedAH| sa tu SleSmA urasthaH
satrikasya bhAhugrIvAMsayogasya hRdayasya codakakarmaNA tarpaNapUra
NAdyAKyenAvalambhanAdavalambhakaSabhdenocyate sa trikasya svavIryeNa
prabhAvenaivAvalambhanaM karoti| hRdayasya punarannaprabhAvasahitena svabhAvena|
tenaitaduktaM bhavati-hRdayasyAvalambhane~annabhalamapekSate|
svalpayA~apyannahAnyA hRdayAvalambhanaM kartuM na SknotItyarthaH| SeSANAM
kaNThAdInaM SleSmasthAnAnAmavalambhanAdavalambhakaH| sa eva SleSmA
AmASayastho~annasaGghAtasya kledanAt kledasaMjJaH| rasanAstho
jihvAsthaH samyak sPuTaM rasabhodhanAdbhodhakasaMjJaH| Sirastha indriyANAM
tarpaNAttarpakaH| parvastho~asthisandhisthaH dvayorasthnoH sandhiSle
SNAScaCleSakasaMjJaH||8||

 evamamiSu sthAneSu phUyiSThamavikRtAH sakalaSarIravyA
pino~api vAtapittaSleSmANo vartante||9||

ityevamanena prakAreNAmISu sthAneSu avikRtA vAtAdayo vartante
sakalaSarIravyApino~apyatra sAtiSayAH||9||

 teSAM vRddhiheturvakSyate nidAneSu||10||

jvaranidAnAdiSu vakSyate||10||

 tatra vAtavikArAH||15||  tadyathA-naKaphedo viphAdikA phAdaSUlaM phAdaphraMSaH

eSu ca vikAreSu madhye kecid glAniraukSyapAruSyAdayo loke
prasiddhAH| kecit pakSavadhAkSepakAdayaH svatantraprasiddhAH| kecit

na tu naJAbhisambhaddhA pittabhavA| tatra bhahvapi bhuJjAno~atre
jIryamANe~ajIryamANe vA tRpyati| nidrArtasya jAgrata evetyarthaH|

srAvaH| keSAJcidAcAryANAM matam, yathA SItena yo vepathuH kampaH sa
udardaSabhdavAcyaH| anye punarAcAryAH SItapAnIyetyAdinA lakSaNenodardamAhuH|

prAyobhavA vikArAH||18||

 mahAvikArAstu yathAsvamevo dekSyante||19||  kSudravikArAH

bhavati||19||

imAnyeva doSANAmAtmaliGgAni sakalaSarIravyApInyavya
phicArINi ca||20||  tathA karmANyupakramaSca||20||  tatrAtmaliGgAnyAyuSkAmIye 
nirdiSTAni||20||

sarveSu tUkteSu doSajeSu vikAreSvAnantyAdanukteSu ca imAnyevAgre
uddiSyamAnAni vikArArambhakadoSANAmAtmaliGgAni svarUpalakSaNAni|
kimbhUtAni Aha-sakalaSarIravyApIni| tenaitaduktaM bhavati| sarvasyaiva
vakArasyArambhakadoSasvarUpalakSaNena vinA sambhavo na bhavati|
tathA vyabhicArINi ca vikAraM na vyabhicarantItyarthaH| anenaitaduktaM
bhavati yad vAtAvikAreSu vAtasya svarUpalakSaNAnyeva bhavantItyevaM
pittaSleSmavikAreSvapi vAcyam| nAnyadoSajeSu vikAreSvanyadoSajAni
lakSaNAni bhavantItyarthaH| na kevalamAtmalakSaNAni yAvat karmANyapi
doSajAni sAmAnyena vikAreSvevAnusyUtAnyupakramaSca tathaiva| tenaitaduktaM
bhavati| yatra vikArasAmAnye vAyusvarUpalakSaNaM vAyukarmANi ca dRSyante sa
vikAro vAtajo jJeyaH| tatra vAtopakrama eva kArya ityuktyA~anuktavikAro
sAmAnyena| evaM pittakaPayorapi vAcyam| tatra vAtAdInAmAtmaliGgAni
AyuSkAmIyA~adhyAye tatra rUkSetyAdinA nirdiSTAni| karmANi 
doSANAmasAdhAraNyena sraMsavyAsetyAdinA darSayati||20||

sUtrasthAnam

doSopakramaNIyaH

 athAto doSopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

pUrve&dhyAye vikRtAn doSAnASvevopakrametetyuktaM tamevopakramaM rogaviSeSAnapekSayA sAmAnyarUpeNaivAsminnndhyAye darSayati-athAta ityAdi||1||

 vAtasyopakramaH snehaH svedo mRdUni snigdhoSNamadhurAmlalavaNAni saMSodhanAnyaphyavahAryANi cAphyaGgapUrvamupanAhanopaveSTanonmardanapariSekAvagAhasaMvAhanapIDanAni vitrAsanavidhmApanavismaraNAni surAsavavidhAnaM snehAScAnekayonayo dIpanIyapAcanIyavAtaharavirecanIyadravyopahitAstathA SatapAkasahasrapAkAH sarvaSaH prayogArthA phastayo phastiniyamo viSeSatastailaM mAMsarasonuvAsanAni suKaSIlatA strIsamparkavarjyaSca haimanto vidhiH||2||

tatra vAtasyopakramaH snehasvedau Sodhanaprayojane tu saMSodhanAnyauSadhAni | kimbhUtAnyAha- mRdUnyatIkSNAni snigdhAdiguNasaMyuktAni abhyavahAryANi ca| ca SabhdAnmRdvAdiguNayuktAnyevAhAradravyANi| tathopanAhAdIni pIDitAntAnyabhyaGgapUrvakamevAGgeSu kAryANi|upanAhaH snigdhoSNavAtaharakRtaH piNDabhandhaH | upaveSTanaM vastrarajvAdinA | unmardanaM pANyAdibhiH| avagAho vAtaharadravyapUrNadronyAM majjanam| saMvAhanaM mRdusuKaM pANimardanam| tathA vitrAsanAdIni| vitrAsanaM bhayaGkarairJaTiti trAsanam| vismaraNaM vAtavegodbhUtasya sambhAdhasya| surAyA Asavasya ca vidhAnam| vidhAna Sabhdena mAMsApUpasaMyogAdiSAstroktaM vidhAnaM darSayati| snehA anekayonayaH sthAvarajaGgamajAH | tathA dIpanIyAdibhiH sahitAH siddhASca taiH SatapAkasahasrapAkagrahaNena snehAnAM yathASkyaM punaH punardravyeNa pAkaH pradarSitaH| prAyogika bhalastayo vakSyamANalakSaNAH | bhastAvanupayujyamAne&pi bhastiniyamo bhastividhyukta AcAraH| sarvebhyo&pi viSeSAttailAdi prAdhAnyenAvaSyaM yojyamityarthaH| suKaSIlatA sauKyavRttitvaM haimanta RtucaryAyAM hemantoktaH| iti vAtasyopakramaH||2||

pittasyocyate| sarpiSpAnamabhyAsena| bhaviSyat saMSodhanAya ca sarpiSaiva snehanam na tailAdinA| tathA~adhomArgeNaiva doSaharaNaM virecanameva,na vamanamityarthaH| madhurAdiguNayuktAnAmauSadhAnAmabhyavahAryANAM copayogaH| tathA mRdvAdiguNayuktAnAM gandhAnAmupasevanam| mRduratIkSNaH| candanAdiSItadravyaprabhAvatvAt gandhaH SItaH| athavA gandhAnAmiti gandhadravyANAm| sarvatra caivaM gandhaSabhdena gandhadravyANAM vyavahAraH| paramaSiSirasurabhiNi jale majjanam| paramaSabhdo~atyartha paryAyaH| tathorasA vakSasA taralAvalInAM srajAM ca dhAraNam| Avalya AbharaNaguNAH| taralairupalakSitA AvalyastaralAvalyaH| taraloharamadhyamaNiH| muktAdibhirmaNiratnaiH kAntatarAstaralAvalyastathoktAH|srajo mAlAstASca kimbhUtAstAmarasAdibhirnAnAvarNaiH svacCagandhavArINi| agryacandanAdibhiH sugandhIni SItAni ca svacCagandhavArINi tathoktAni | taiH sakalAdibhiragryacandanaM haricandanam| kAleyacandanaM raktacandanam| kamalaM padmam| kumudaM Svetasarojam| kuvalayaM nIlotpalam| kavATo dvAracCAdana paTaH| vAtayanaM gavAkSaH | harmyaM gRham | tathA SRtisuKatvAdiyuktAnAM gItAdInAM SravaNam| ayantraNatvadiguNayuktaiH suhRdbhiH sahAsanam| priyANAmapatyakAnAM ca sadayaM kRtvA~a~aSleSaH kimbhUtAnAmanRtavacanavirahasvabhAvenaiva surabhitamivavadanakuDmalaM yeSAmityarthaH| kuDmalaM mukulam| atispaSTaM na vadantIti nAtispaSTAbhidhayinaH| anupacAreNa svabhAvenaiva madhuraH komalaScollApa Alapo yeSAM te tathoktAH| nirdayamaGganAbhirASleSa iti sambhandhaH| kimbhUtAbhistanUni mRdUni surabhINica vasanAni vAsAMsi yAsAM tAbhiH tatha mallikAmukulasadRSamuktaPalabhUyiSThAlaGkArAbhiH| tathA sahacArIninAdasaJjalpenopajanitamautsukyaM yasya kalahaMsasya tenAnunAditaM yannUpurayo raSanAkalApasya ca SiJjitaM tadanugamanena sammugdhamasPuTopalakSyamANaM mugdhasnigdhamaprauDhaM mRduvacanaM yAsAM tAbhiH|tathA nijajaGanavannibhiDaM yat kucayugalaM tatsambhandhI yolaGkArabhArastadvahanena yo~asau SramaSvasanastena kampitAni madhyamukulitAni locanotpalAni yAsAM tAbhiH|   tathA kiJcidvigalitaM navayauvanaM yAsAM tAbhiH | tathA priyaGgasaGgamAtrAdyo~atimAtraH suKastasyAsvAdane ekAgracittatayA yo~asau visraMsyamAnaH sthAnAt bhraSyamAna aMSukastenaikakAlopajAtairvRIDAvailakSyAdibhiryAni srastAni SithilAni svinnAni cAGgAni tairdravIkRto himaH SIto~aGgarAgo yAsAM tAbhiH| tathA sparSanena sakaladehaprahlAdakAriNIbhirdarSanena hRdayaprahlAdakAriNIbhiH| tathA vilAsavatIbhiH | tathA tanubhirapyaGgairanaGgasya bhalaM caturaGgamivodvahantIbhiH anaGgabhalaM kamasya sakalajayasampAdanI senA | caturaGgahastyaSvarathapadAtisaGkulaM tathA bhavanatalasalilapulinAni krIDAjalASayataTAnItyarthaH | kimbhUtAnyAha- sakalarajanIkarasya karanikarAvakiraNena SiSiratarANi | tathA dhArAgRhaM atisitAbhiH sikatAbhirupAstRtatalamanekairyantraiH pravRttivimalasaliladhAraM ca| tathA kAyamAnam | kimbhUtaM sAgarAnukArI yastoyASayaH tasyopatIre yaH suniviSTaH kusumitabhahuviTapAnAM pRthutaGgAnAM vividhAnAM taTaruhANAM tarUNAM nivahaH tacCAyayopasaJCanne dhavalAnAM raktAnAJca nIrajAnAM rajasA vyAptasamastajale vipule sikatile pradeSa upakalpitam| tathA dolAyamAnAnAM gaNatithAnAM bhahuprakArANAM dRtikalaSAnAM saraNenakarakasravantya udakapravAhaH tenAhitamRtsaurabho bhUtalaikadeSo yasmin | saraNaM pAtaH | karakastuSAraH| tathA pralambhamAnairAmrajambhvAdikisalayAdibhiH pratyuptAH parikalitAH paTAlikAH paTakuTyo yasmin| tathA muhurmuhuH pratikSaNaM puruSayatnapreritAnAM GaTAnAM muKodgIrNaScandanenAnuviddhA avalagnAH santaH patitaSeSA muktAPalAyamAnA jalalavA yasmin| tathA uCrAyavistAravanto niSiddhA dUrapravisRtAH SItavAtapraveSA vAtAyanAdayo yatra | tathAtyarthasantatAmbhunaH SItaSIkarAbhiSekeNa pratihatAH santApAdayo yasmin| tathAtiSayaprAptaM rAmaNIyakaM ramyatvaM yasmin | himAcalena spardhate SaityaM yasmin yathoktena CAyAmbhuSaityAdinA varSAkAlalIlAM viDambhayantIti | tathA guhapuSkariNyaH kimbhUtA praPullAnAM padmAdInAM parAgarAgeNAnuraJjitAnAM jalacaravihagagaNAnAM ninAdena ramyAH | tathopavanAni kimbhUtAni madhupAnalobhena nilIyamAnenAlikulena calitAllAtapratAnAnnipatitakusumanicayena SayyAracanAyAM savyAparo mRdupavano yeSu| iti pittopakramaH | viSeSastu GRtAdiH pittopakramaH| divasvapnaH pittaSleSmakaratvAdahitaH||3||

 SleSmaNaH punarvidhivihitAni tIkSAni saMSodhanAni rUkSaprAyANyaphyavahAryANi kaTutiktakaSAyopahitAni tIkSNAni dIrGakAlasthitAni hRdyAni madyAni dhAvanalanmardanasnAnocCAdanAni||4||  viSeSataH kSaudraM yUSo vamanAni sarvaSaScopavAsaH sadhUmagaDUSaH suKapratiSedhaH suKArthameva vAsantiko vidhiriti||4||

SleSmaNaH upakramaH SAstroktavidhinA vihitAni tIkSNAni saMSodhanAni vamanavirecanAni | vidhigrahaNamutkeSarakSaNArtham| AhAradravyANi ca rUkSabhUyiSThAni kaTvAdirasamiSrANi | madyAni tIkSNAdi guNayuktAni| dhAvanAdyASca kriyAH| dhAvanaM drutagamanam|  laGGanaGgamanam| plavanaM padbhyAmutplavanam| niyuddhaM bhAhuyuddhaM yuddhaM kASThAdibhiH| vyavAyaH strIgamanam| vyAyAmo vAhanAdi SarIrAyasajananaM karma| tathArUkSANi rUkSadravyakRtAnyaGgAnAmunmardanAdIni| viSeSato madhvAdInyupakramaH| sarvaSovamanAni sarvANItyarthaH suKakAraNasyAsevA suKapratiSedhaH| sa ca sukhArthaM doSopaSamAyetyarthaH||4||

 bhavanti cAtra-
upakramaH pRthagdoSAn yo~ayamuddiCya kIrtitaH||5||  saMsargasannipAteSu taM yathAsvaM vikalpayet||5||  graiSmaH phrAyo marutphitte vasantaH kaphamArute||5||  maruto yogavAhitvAt kaphaphitte tu SAradaH||5||

bhavanti cAtreti padyArambhe samuccayatIti| doSAn pRthaguddiSya yo~ayamupakramaH kIrtitaH sa eva saMsargeSu sannipAteSu ca yathAsvaM kAryaH pravRddhadoSAnusaraNeneti yathAsvaSabhdArthaH| na kevalametadyAvadidamapi| marutpitte vAtapitte graiSmo vidhiH SItapadhAnaH kAryaH| kaPmArute vasanto vidhi rUkSapradhAnaH kAryaH| nanu graiSmavAsantikayoH kathaM saMsargasya vAtaSamakAraNatvaM SItAdisAdRSyAdAha- maruto yogavAhitvAdvAyuryogavAhI| yenaiva saMyujyate tenaivaikayogakSemo bhavatItyarthaH| tena pittena sahitasya vAyoH pittacikitsA | kaPena sahitasya kaPacikitseti| atra svabhAvo hetuH| kaPapitte tu SArado vidhiriti sambhandhaH||5||

 yojyaH paTvamlamadhurA vAyau kruddho rasAH kramAt||6||  pitte tiktastataH svAduH kaSAyaSca raso hitaH||6||  kaTukaH phrAk tatastiktaH kaSAyo~ante kaphAmaye||6||

tathA kruddhe vAyavAdau lavaNo raso yojyaH| paScAdamlaH| tato madhuraH| evaM krameNaiva pitte tiktAdayaH| kaPe kaTukAdayaH | yuktiScAtra mandabhuddhisammohabhayAnnocyate||6||

 cayaprakopapraSamA vAyorgrISmAdiSu triSu||7||  varSAdiSu tu pittasya SleSmaNaH SiSirAdiSu||7||  cIyate laGu rUkSAphiroSadIphiH samIraNaH||7||  tadvidhastadvidhe dehe kAlasyauSNyAnna kupayti||7||  adphiramlavipAkAphiroSadhIphiSca tAdRSam||7||  pittaM yAti cayaM kopaM na tu kAlasya SaityataH||7||  cIyate snigdhaSItAphirudakauSadhIphiH kaphaH||7||  tulye~api kAle dehe ca skannatvAnna prakupyati||7||  iti kAlasvaphAvo~ayam..........................||7||

eSAM ca doSANAmAhArAdyanapekSayA kAlasvabhAvenaiva cayAdaya ucyante| tatra vAyorgrISmAdiSu triSvRtuSu krameN cayAdayo bhavanti| grISme vAtavRddhikAraNabhahutvAcCItarahitatvenAparipUrNatvAcca vAtasya caya eva bhavati| varSAsu tu SItapUraNAdauSNyAbhAvAdvAyuH kupyatyeva| saradi tu vaiparItyAt kAlasya praSAmyati| evaM pittakaPayorapi RtuSu krameNaiva cayAdayo vAcyAH| grISmavarSASiSireSu vAtAdayaScayameva yAnti| nanu kupyantItyatra tantrakAraH svayameva hetuM vakti-cIyata ityAdi| grISme laGutvAdrUkSatvAccauSadhInAM samIraNo vAyuH svarUpeNa tadvidha auSadhIsadRSo laGurUkSa adAnatvAcca  tadvidhe laGurUkSe dehe cIyata eva| na tu kupyati, kAlasyoSNatvAt| varSAsvadbhirauSadhIbhiScAmlavipAkAbhistAdRSamamlaM pittaM cayameva yAti| natu kopam| kAlasya Saityena pittavaiparItyAt| SiSire snigdhaSItenodakena oSadhIbhiSca kAle~api kaPena sadRSe visargatvAddehe~api snigdhaSIte kaPaH Sitatvena skannatvAt styAnatvAnna kupyati| cayameva yAti| ityAhArAdinirapekSaH kAlasvabhAvaH||7||

 ................................AhArAdivaSAt punaH||8||  cayAdIn yAnti sadyo~api doSAH kAle~api vA na tu||8||

AhArAdivaSat yathAyathaM vAtAdayaScayaM vA kopaM vA SamaM vA sadya eva prApnuvanti| pUrvokte vA kAle na prApnuvanti| yathA varSAsvapi vAtaviparItAhArAdisevanena vAyurna kupyati | SItAdi sevanAttu grISme kupyati| evaM sarvatrohyam||8||

 vyApnoti sahasA dehamapAdatalamastakam||9||  nivartate tu kupito malo~alpAlvaM jalauGavat||9||

ayaM ca saJcito malo vAtAdidoSaH kupitaH san sahasA kSiprataramevApAdatalamastakaM dehaM vyApnoti| kopAttu yadA nivartate tadAlpAlpam| atra dRSTAnto jalauGaH| yathA jalauGo JaTityAkrAmati| Akramya ca kAraNAntareNa kSIyamANaH krameNa kSayaM yAti | tadvat kupito doSa iti||9||

 caya eva jayeddoSaM kupitaM tvavirodhayan||10||  sarvakopo balIyAMsaM SeSadoSAvirodhataH||10||  kramAnmarutphittakaphAn sarvatra sadRSe bale||10||  vAtAdInAM yathA pUrvaM yataH svAphAvikaM phalam||10||  Uce parASaro~apyarthamamumeva pramANayan||10||  yathopanyAsataH prAptamAdau doSaphiSagjitam||10||  netRphaGgena dRSTo hi samaM sainyaparAjayaH||10||

sarvaM ca doSaM caya eva caya kAlaeva jayet| yadA tu cayakAla upekSitaH san kupitastadA~avirodhayan akupitena doSAntareNetyarthAllabhyate| tena kupitastathA jetavyaH yathA tadviparItairAhArAdibhiH sadRSatvAddoSAntaraM na kupyatIti|
yadA tu sarve doSA asAmyena yugapatkupitAstadA bhalIyAMsamadhikakupitaM jayet| SeSayostvalpakupitayoravirodhena| yada tu sarve sAmyena kupitAstadA marutpittakaPAn kramAjjayet| Adau vAyurjetavyaH| tataH pittaM | tataH kaPa iti| kutaH yato vAtAdInAM yathApUrvaM svAbhAvikaM bhalam| svabhAvenaiva kaPAt pittaM bhalavat| tato vAyuriti|
parASaro~apyRSiramumevAsmaduktamarthaM pramANayan dRDhIkurvan yathoktopanyAsena vAtAdikrameNa doSANAM bhiSagjitamauSadhaM prAptamityUce vakti sma| dRSTAntarUpeN ca hetuM vakti| netRbhaGgena samaM nAyakavinASenaikakAlaM sainyaparAjayo dRSTaH| vAyuSca netRsthAnIyaH tadAyattatvAcCArIrANAm doSadhAtvAdInAm| pittakaPau sainyasthAnIyau| sthAnAntaragamanAdiSu vAyuparAyatvAt| tena vAyAvAdau pradhAne nASite pittakaPanASaH sukara iti||10||

sUtrasthAnam

doSopakramaNIyaH

 athAto doSopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 vAtasyopakramaH snehaH svedo mRdUni snigdhoSNamadhurAmlalavaNAni saMSodhanAnyaphyavahAryANi cAphyaGgapUrvamupanAhanopaveSTanonmardanapariSekAvagAhasaMvAhanapIDanAni vitrAsanavidhmApanavismaraNAni surAsavavidhAnaM snehAScAnekayonayo dIpanIyapAcanIyavAtaharavirecanIyadravyopahitAstathA SatapAkasahasrapAkAH sarvaSaH prayogArthA phastayo phastiniyamo viSeSatastailaM mAMsarasonuvAsanAni suKaSIlatA strIsamparkavarjyaSca haimanto vidhiH||2||

 SleSmaNaH punarvidhivihitAni tIkSAni saMSodhanAni rUkSaprAyANyaphyavahAryANi kaTutiktakaSAyopahitAni tIkSNAni dIrGakAlasthitAni hRdyAni madyAni dhAvanalanmardanasnAnocCAdanAni||4||  viSeSataH kSaudraM yUSo vamanAni sarvaSaScopavAsaH sadhUmagaDUSaH suKapratiSedhaH suKArthameva vAsantiko vidhiriti||4||

SleSmaNaH upakramaH SAstroktavidhinA vihitAni tIkSNAni saMSodhanAni vamanavirecanAni | vidhigrahaNamutkeSarakSaNArtham| AhAradravyANi ca rUkSabhUyiSThAni kaTvAdirasamiSrANi | madyAni tIkSNAdi guNayuktAni| dhAvanAdyASca kriyAH| dhAvanaM drutagamanam|  laGGanaGgamanam| plavanaM padbhyAmutplavanam| niyuddhaM bhAhuyuddhaM yuddhaM kASThAdibhiH| vyavAyaH strIgamanam| vyAyAmo vAhanAdi SarIrAyasajananaM karma| tathArUkSANi rUkSadravyakRtAnyaGgAnAmunmardanAdIni| viSeSato madhvAdInyupakramaH| sarvaSovamanAni sarvANItyarthaH suKakAraNasyAsevA suKapratiSedhaH| sa ca sukhArthaM doSopaSamAyetyarthaH||4||

 bhavanti cAtra-
upakramaH pRthagdoSAn yo~ayamuddiCya kIrtitaH||5||  saMsargasannipAteSu taM yathAsvaM vikalpayet||5||  graiSmaH phrAyo marutphitte vasantaH kaphamArute||5||  maruto yogavAhitvAt kaphaphitte tu SAradaH||5||

bhavanti cAtreti padyArambhe samuccayatIti| doSAn pRthaguddiSya yo~ayamupakramaH kIrtitaH sa eva saMsargeSu sannipAteSu ca yathAsvaM kAryaH pravRddhadoSAnusaraNeneti yathAsvaSabhdArthaH| na kevalametadyAvadidamapi| marutpitte vAtapitte graiSmo vidhiH SItapadhAnaH kAryaH| kaPmArute vasanto vidhi rUkSapradhAnaH kAryaH| nanu graiSmavAsantikayoH kathaM saMsargasya vAtaSamakAraNatvaM SItAdisAdRSyAdAha- maruto yogavAhitvAdvAyuryogavAhI| yenaiva saMyujyate tenaivaikayogakSemo bhavatItyarthaH| tena pittena sahitasya vAyoH pittacikitsA | kaPena sahitasya kaPacikitseti| atra svabhAvo hetuH| kaPapitte tu SArado vidhiriti sambhandhaH||5||

 yojyaH paTvamlamadhurA vAyau kruddho rasAH kramAt||6||  pitte tiktastataH svAduH kaSAyaSca raso hitaH||6||  kaTukaH phrAk tatastiktaH kaSAyo~ante kaphAmaye||6||

tathA kruddhe vAyavAdau lavaNo raso yojyaH| paScAdamlaH| tato madhuraH| evaM krameNaiva pitte tiktAdayaH| kaPe kaTukAdayaH | yuktiScAtra mandabhuddhisammohabhayAnnocyate||6||

 cayaprakopapraSamA vAyorgrISmAdiSu triSu||7||  varSAdiSu tu pittasya SleSmaNaH SiSirAdiSu||7||  cIyate laGu rUkSAphiroSadIphiH samIraNaH||7||  tadvidhastadvidhe dehe kAlasyauSNyAnna kupayti||7||  adphiramlavipAkAphiroSadhIphiSca tAdRSam||7||  pittaM yAti cayaM kopaM na tu kAlasya SaityataH||7||  cIyate snigdhaSItAphirudakauSadhIphiH kaphaH||7||  tulye~api kAle dehe ca skannatvAnna prakupyati||7||  iti kAlasvaphAvo~ayam..........................||7||

eSAM ca doSANAmAhArAdyanapekSayA kAlasvabhAvenaiva cayAdaya ucyante| tatra vAyorgrISmAdiSu triSvRtuSu krameN cayAdayo bhavanti| grISme vAtavRddhikAraNabhahutvAcCItarahitatvenAparipUrNatvAcca vAtasya caya eva bhavati| varSAsu tu SItapUraNAdauSNyAbhAvAdvAyuH kupyatyeva| saradi tu vaiparItyAt kAlasya praSAmyati| evaM pittakaPayorapi RtuSu krameNaiva cayAdayo vAcyAH| grISmavarSASiSireSu vAtAdayaScayameva yAnti| nanu kupyantItyatra tantrakAraH svayameva hetuM vakti-cIyata ityAdi| grISme laGutvAdrUkSatvAccauSadhInAM samIraNo vAyuH svarUpeNa tadvidha auSadhIsadRSo laGurUkSa adAnatvAcca  tadvidhe laGurUkSe dehe cIyata eva| na tu kupyati, kAlasyoSNatvAt| varSAsvadbhirauSadhIbhiScAmlavipAkAbhistAdRSamamlaM pittaM cayameva yAti| natu kopam| kAlasya Saityena pittavaiparItyAt| SiSire snigdhaSItenodakena oSadhIbhiSca kAle~api kaPena sadRSe visargatvAddehe~api snigdhaSIte kaPaH Sitatvena skannatvAt styAnatvAnna kupyati| cayameva yAti| ityAhArAdinirapekSaH kAlasvabhAvaH||7||

 ................................AhArAdivaSAt punaH||8||  cayAdIn yAnti sadyo~api doSAH kAle~api vA na tu||8||

AhArAdivaSat yathAyathaM vAtAdayaScayaM vA kopaM vA SamaM vA sadya eva prApnuvanti| pUrvokte vA kAle na prApnuvanti| yathA varSAsvapi vAtaviparItAhArAdisevanena vAyurna kupyati | SItAdi sevanAttu grISme kupyati| evaM sarvatrohyam||8||

 vyApnoti sahasA dehamapAdatalamastakam||9||  nivartate tu kupito malo~alpAlvaM jalauGavat||9||

ayaM ca saJcito malo vAtAdidoSaH kupitaH san sahasA kSiprataramevApAdatalamastakaM dehaM vyApnoti| kopAttu yadA nivartate tadAlpAlpam| atra dRSTAnto jalauGaH| yathA jalauGo JaTityAkrAmati| Akramya ca kAraNAntareNa kSIyamANaH krameNa kSayaM yAti | tadvat kupito doSa iti||9||

 caya eva jayeddoSaM kupitaM tvavirodhayan||10||  sarvakopo balIyAMsaM SeSadoSAvirodhataH||10||  kramAnmarutphittakaphAn sarvatra sadRSe bale||10||  vAtAdInAM yathA pUrvaM yataH svAphAvikaM phalam||10||  Uce parASaro~apyarthamamumeva pramANayan||10||  yathopanyAsataH prAptamAdau doSaphiSagjitam||10||  netRphaGgena dRSTo hi samaM sainyaparAjayaH||10||

sarvaM ca doSaM caya eva caya kAlaeva jayet| yadA tu cayakAla upekSitaH san kupitastadA~avirodhayan akupitena doSAntareNetyarthAllabhyate| tena kupitastathA jetavyaH yathA tadviparItairAhArAdibhiH sadRSatvAddoSAntaraM na kupyatIti|
yadA tu sarve doSA asAmyena yugapatkupitAstadA bhalIyAMsamadhikakupitaM jayet| SeSayostvalpakupitayoravirodhena| yada tu sarve sAmyena kupitAstadA marutpittakaPAn kramAjjayet| Adau vAyurjetavyaH| tataH pittaM | tataH kaPa iti| kutaH yato vAtAdInAM yathApUrvaM svAbhAvikaM bhalam| svabhAvenaiva kaPAt pittaM bhalavat| tato vAyuriti|
parASaro~apyRSiramumevAsmaduktamarthaM pramANayan dRDhIkurvan yathoktopanyAsena vAtAdikrameNa doSANAM bhiSagjitamauSadhaM prAptamityUce vakti sma| dRSTAntarUpeN ca hetuM vakti| netRbhaGgena samaM nAyakavinASenaikakAlaM sainyaparAjayo dRSTaH| vAyuSca netRsthAnIyaH tadAyattatvAcCArIrANAm doSadhAtvAdInAm| pittakaPau sainyasthAnIyau| sthAnAntaragamanAdiSu vAyuparAyatvAt| tena vAyAvAdau pradhAne nASite pittakaPanASaH sukara iti||10||

doSopakramaNIyaH

 sthAnataH kecidicCanti prAktAvacCleSmaNo vadham||11||  Sirasyurasi kaNThe ca pralipte~annaruciH kutaH||11||  tadaphAve kathaM phojyapAnadravyAvacAraNam||11||  asatyaphyavahAre ca kuto doSavinigrahaH||11||  tasmAdAdau kapho GAtyaH kAyadvArArgalo hi saH||11||  madhyasthAyi yataH pittamASukAri ca cintyate||11||  ato vAtasaKasyAsya kuryAttadanu nigraham||11||

kecit punarAcAryAH SarIrasthAnAnukrameNa prathamaM SleSmaNo vadhaM nASamicCanti sthAnAnukramAttataH pittasya tato vAyuriti| asmiMScArthe yuktiH kA? Aha- SirasItyAdi| Sirasi vakSasi kaNThe ca vRddhena sannipAtakupitena SleSmaNA pralipte sati kuto~annaruceH sambhavaH| rucyabhAve ca bhojyAdInAmavacAraNaM katham| na sajjata ityarthaH| asati ca bhojyAbhyavahAre doSasya nASayitavyasya kSayaM kartuM na pAryate| ata AdAveva kaPo ghAtyaH| yasmAt kaPaH pravRddhaH kAyadvArasya mahAsrotomukhasyArgala ivArgalo bhandha ityarthaH| tataH kaPe naSTe vAtasaKaM pittam| tatrApi pittasyaivAdau nigrahaM kuryAt| yataH pittaM dehasya madhye pradhAne bhAge tiSThati| ASu ca svaM karma rogAKyaM karoti| pitte jite vAyurjetavyaH ityanuktamapi bhalAllabhate||11||

 ata eva ca phittAdiH kaphAnto~anyai kramaH smRtaH||12||  suSrutaSca na sarvatra matametat bravIti tu||12||  jayejjvare~atisAre ca kramAtphittakaphAnilAn||12||  prAyeNa tApAtmatayA jvare tejo viSiSyate||12||  viSaSca saraNaM pittastathA ca mRdukoSThatA||12||  tasya cA~anubalaH SleSmA gauravA~apaktijADyakRt||12||  vAyuSca vardhate~avaSyaM yAtyahassu tayoH kSaye||12||  jvarAtisArayostasmAdeSa doSajaye kRtaH||12||

athavA pittasya vAtasaKasya nigrahaM kuryAditi vAyoryogavAhitvAt pittaikakAlameva cikitsAM kuryAt| anyaiScAcAryairata eva pittasya madhyasthAyitvAdASukAritvAcca hetoH pittAdi kaPAntaH sannipAte krama ASritaH| kAye vicArAdikSamatvAt pittAnantaryeNa vAyoScikitsA |
etacca yaH pittAdiH kaPAnte doSajayakramastat suSrutasya matameva na tu sarvatra| kathametadvijJAyata ityAha- bhravItitu suSrutaH| kimityAha- jayeditAdi| anena SlokatrayeNa suSrutamataM suyuktikaM paThati| jvare~atisAre cA~adau pittaM jayet| tataH kaPam| tato~anilamiti| kathamevamityAha- prAyeNetyAdi| sarvo jvaraH santApasvarUpatvAt pittakAryaH| evamatisAro~api viTsaraNamRdukoSThasvarUpatvAt pittakArya eva| ato jvarAtisArayorevAdau pittaM jayet| pitte ca jite tadubhayAGgabhUtAnAM gauravAdInAM kAraNaM SleSmA jeyaH| tayoH pittaSleSmaNoH kSINayostatkSayaprabhAvAdevAhassu yAtyavaSyaM vAyuvRddhiM yAtyatassa jeyaH| ataH kAraNAt suSrutena doSajaye eSa pittadirvAtAntaH kramaH ASritaH||12||

 kaphaphittAnilAnanye kramAdAhustayoraphi||13||  yasmAdAmASayotkleSAdphUyiSThaM tatsamudphavaH||13||  krameNAdyena tatrApi pravRddhAn svASraye sthitAn||13||  svASrayeSu praduSTAnAM sthitaiva  hyASukAritA||13||

nanu ca sarvarogastridoSaja ityuktaM te doSAH parasparaviruddhAH| atha kathamekaH kruddho dvayorviruddhayoH satoH SamaM na yAti | tathA parasparaviruddhAH santaH kathaM rogAKyamekaM kAryaM janayituM samarthA bhavanti| ata uttaradvayamAha- kruddhamityAdi| dvividhaH sannipAtaH| viSamadoSaH samadoSaSca| tatra viSamadoSe ekaM kruddhaM jetuM SeSAvabhalatvAdubhAvapi nAlamaparyAptau | same~api doSAH sannipAte parasparaM jetuM nAlam| kutaH doSAtmakatvAt| doSANAM hi duSTIkaraNa svabhAvAt | na tu parasparopaSamaH| anyaccAsAdhAraNo doSANAM guNaH prAyeNa durlabhaH,yenaviparItatvAt doSo~anyaM na Samayati| etadevAha-SItadravetyAdi| SItAdayo hi guNAH doSANAM tulyAH sadRSA dRSTAH | tathA ca vAtaSleSmANau SItau pittaSleSmANau dravau| ataH SIto guNo yathA vAtasya hetuH SleSmaNo~api| evamamlo lavaNaSca | kaTurvAtapittayoH| AdigrahaNAllaGu vAtapittayoH| evamanyadapyUhyam| tasmAddoSAH parasparaguNasAdRSyenAvaiparItyAdanyo~anyaM parasparaM na jayanti| sannipAte samaM kupyantItyarthaH| iti doSAH parasparaM jetuM nAlam||16||

nanu cA~amaM kimucyata?  pheSajamavacArayan prAgeva tAvedamAturaM parIkSeta||2||  kasmi-

mavikRtisamavetAnAM nAnAtmakAnAM paraspareNopagRhI-

praphAvAnumAnena samudAyapraphAvatatvamadhyavasituM Cakyam||2||  tathAvidhe hi samudAye samudAyapraphAvamevopalaphya vyA-
dhyauSadhapraphAvatattvamavagacCet||2||

tatra bheSajAvacaraNaprasaGge kasmin deCe jAta ityAdinA prathamamAturaM parIkSeta|  etacca prAyobhavatvena parIkSeta|  anyathA sarvasyApi AhArAdeH sarvatra sambhavAdanavasthAprasaGgaH|  bhaktiH sAtatyAnuSThAnam|  subhodham|  evaM hi doSakAraNaM jJAtvA svakAraNapratipakSamauSadhamupayujyamAnamACu siddhaye sampadyate|  tatra lakSaNAni yathA vAtasya rUkSatvAdIni|  karma CvAsocCvAsAdi|  tatra madhurAmlalavaNAH|  kaTutiktakaSAyACca yathAsaGKyena parasparapratipakSAH|  anantaroktena prakAreNa parIkSite paCcAnmRdvAdibhedena vyAdhimupalabheta|  kathamekarUpatayA vyAdhihetoH kutra kIdRCena mRdvAdinA vibhAgena nidAnamAsevitamiti|  tatra mRduCaktinA nidAnena mRdurvyAdhirbhavati|  evaM madhyaCaktinA madhyaH|  adhikenA~adhika iti|  tathA doSANAM vAtAdInAM pRthagbhUtAnAM miCrANAM vA nAnAvidhenAMCAMCabhalaviCeSeNa vyAdhInAM bhalAbhalaviCeSaH|  yadi doSA bhalavatvena kalpitAH tataH tatkAryamapi vyAdhirbhalavAniti vijJeyaH|  tathA teSvabhaleSu svalpabhalaH|  tatra sarve rogAH pUrvaM tridoSajA uktAH|  tadupakramaNAni ca bheSajAni sarvarasAni|  tathAvidheSvanekadoSAtmakeCu vyAdhiSvanekaraseSu ca bheSajeSu parasparaM rasadoSAMCaprabhAvamabhisamIkSya vyAdherauSadhasya ca prabhAvamadhyavasyet|  tenaitaduktaM bhavati|  vyAdherdoSabhalaM bheSajasya ca doSopaCamanasamarthamanyatamarasAdiprabhAvamabhisamIkSya kena rasAdyaMCakena  kasmin doSAMCe asmin vyAdhAvidaM bheSajamiti kRtvA vyAdherbheSajasya ca upakramyopakramAKyaM tatvamadhyavasyet|  na caiSAmaMCAMCavikalpanA sarvasmin vyAdhau sarvasmiMCca bheSaje vijJeyA|  kuta etadAha-na hItyAdi|  yasmAd vikRtyA vaiSamyeNa ca saMyuktAnAM nAnArUpANAM parasparopagRhItAnAM paraspareNa kRtapAratantryANAM paraspareNa caivopahatAnAmApAditavikRtInAmanyaiCca deCakAlAdivikalpanairvikalpitAnAM bhAvAnAmavayavaprabhAvatatvenaiva samudAyaprabhAvatatvamadhyavasituM na Cakyate|  dravyasya saMyogasaMskArakAlAdibhirvikRterdUrIkRtasvarUpatvAt|  tasmAttathAvidhe yathoktalakSaNe samudAyaprabhAvatvamupalabhya vyAdhyauSadhayoH prabhAvatattvamavagacCet|  yatra tUktalakSaNaviparIto bhAvAnAM samudAyastatrAvayavaprabhAvata evAdhyavasituM yuktaH|  saMyogAdiviCeSe~api tathAvidhayA dravyasvarUpaguNairdavIyastvasampAdinyA vikRterabhAvAditi|| 2||

 tathA kasya dhAmA~adhiSThAya vyAdhirayamavasthita iti
nirUpayet||3||  pravisRto hi doSaH svamevasthAnamAtaGkA-
yAdhitiSThan||3||  mUrddhAdIn vA dustaro phavati||3||  tataCca sthAna-
viCeSeNa pheSajaviCeSaH paryeSitavyaH||3||

tathedamapi nirUpayet|  kasya doSasya dhAma sthAnamadhiSThAyA~ayaM kupitovasthitaCceti|  yataH sarvo doSaH kadAcit svameva sthAnamAtaGkAyA~adhitiSThan rogaM kartumACrito dustaro bhavati|  kadAcit mUrdhAdInadhitiSThan dustaro bhavatIti sambhandhaH|  mUrdhAdigrahaNaMparasthAnopalakSaNArtham|  tato~anantaraM sthAnaviCeSApekSayA bheSajaviCeSo bhoddhavyaH|  yadbhi bheSajaM sthAnaviCeSasthe doSe hitaM na tadanyasthAnasthe|

 tataCcaivamAlocayet-kasyA~ayamauSadhasya vyAdhirAturo
vA yogyaH||4||  kiyato vA||4||  doSAnurUpo hi phaiSajyavIrya-
pramANavikalpo vyAdhivyAdhitaphalApekSo phavati||4||

evaM doSabheSajayoH sAmye jJAte kasya bheSajasya kimpramANasyA~ayaM vyAdhirAturo vA yogya ityAlocayet|  yasmAd doSAnurUpaH san bheSajaCaktimAtrAvikalpo vyAdhervyAdhitasya ca bhalamapekSate|  anyathA doSAnurUpamapi bheSajamaviSaye yuktamanarthAyaiva sampadyate|

 sahasA~atibalAni saMCodhanauSadhAnyAgneyavAyavyAnyati-
saumyAnyatimAtrANi vA tathA~agnikSAraCastrakarmANyalpa-
sattvamAturamalpabalaM vAtipAtayeyuH||3||  saMCamanAni tu vyA-
dhibalAdadhikAni tamupaCamayya vyAdhiM, vyAdhikSapitadehe
CIGramanyamAvahanti||3||  CarIrabalAdhikAni glAnimUrcCA-
madamohabalakSayAnagnibalAdadhikAni glAnimagnisAdaCca||3||

tamevA~aviSayaM darCayati-sahasetyAdi|  dvividhAni hyauSadhAni CodhanAni CamanAni ca|  tatra CodhanAni dvividhAni|  asaumyAni saumyAni ca|  tatrAsaumyAnyAgneyavAyavyAni|  saumyAni cA~apyanAbhasapArthivAni|  tatrAgneyavAyavyAni saMCodhanauSadhAnyalpabhalamalpasattvaJcAturannACayeyuH|  kimbhUtAni sahasA~atiprayuktAni atibhalAnyatiCaktIni|  evamatisaumyAnyapi sahasA mAtrAdhikyena prayuktAni tathAvidhamAturaM nACayeyuH|  tathAgnyAdIni kimbhUtAni sahasAtiprayuktAni|  tathA saMCamanAnyapyauSadhAni vyAdhibhalAdhikabhalAni taM prayogakAraNaM vyAdhimupaCamayya tatkSapite dehe CIGramevA~anyattadviparItaM vyAdhimAvahanti|  bhalaCabhda ubhayatrA~api CaktivAcakaH|  tAnyeva CarIrabhalAdadhikAni glAnimUrcCAdInAvahanti|  tAnyevA~agnibhalAdadhikAni atimAtratvAt glAnimagnisAdaJcAvahantIti|  vyAdhyAturAgnibhalAdadhikAnyuktAni|| 5||

 api ca-atisthUlo~atikRCo durphalo durphaddhamAMsaCo-
NitAsthyaGgavAyavo~alpAgniralpAhAro~asAtmyAhAro~apa-
citaH sArarahito vA vyAdhiphalameva tAvadasamarthaH soDhuM
kiM punastathAvidho pheSajamevaM vegam||6||  tasmAttAdRCamavi-

rviCeSAdaphalAH||6||  tA hyanavasthitamRduviklavahRdayAH prAyaH
sukumArAH parAyattACca||6||  tato~api viCeSeNa CiCavaH||6||

asmin svalapabhalavyAdhyAturA~atibhalabheSajaprasaGge~api ceti samuccinoti-atisthUla ityAdi|  atisthaulyAdyanyatamayuktaH puruSo vyAdhereva bhalaM soDhumaCaktaH|  kiM punastadupamardakAribheSajavegam|  tasmAdatisthaulyAdiyuktamaviSAdakaratvAdiguNayuktairauSadhairupAcaret|  durbhaddhAnyasthirapracayAni mAMsAdIni yasya|  durbhalo hInabhalaH sArarahito~adRDhaH|  uttaramatturaM gurubhistIkSNaiH|  prathamamatimRdubheSajaM yojyam|  tataH krameNa tIkSNAdikamityarthaH|  vibhramo doSAdInAM kSobhaH|  atisthaulyAdiyuktaM mRdvAdibhirupAcaret|  viCeSato~abhalAH striyo mRdubhiraviSAdakAribhirauSadhairupAcaret|  tA hyabhalAH pelavabhIruhRdayAH sukumArAH parAyattasthitayaCca bhavanti|  abhalAbhyo viCeSataH CiCava evaMvidhA bhavanti|  atastAn viCeSata upAcaret|| 6||

 tathA phalavati vyAdhyAture~alpaphalamalpaM vA pheSajama-
kiJcitkaramphUya eva doSamuktleCya vyAdhimudIrayet||7||

anantaramatibhale vyAdhAvAture ca svalpabhalaM yadauSadhaM karoti taducyate-bhalavatItyAdi|  bhalavati vyAdhAvAture ca svalpaCakti svalpamAtraM vA bheSajaM prayuktaM kArye na kiJcitkaraM sat bhUyo~atyarthaM doSamutkleCya vyAdhimudIrayet|| 7||

 yogyamapi cauSadhamevaM parIkSeta-idamevaM rasavIryavipA
kamevaM guNamevaM dravyamevaM karmaivaM praphAvamasmindeCe jAta
masmin RtAvevaM gRhItamevaM nihitamevaM vihitamevaM niSiddha-

evamantaroktena parIkSAkalApena parIkSitaM yogyamapyauSadhaM punaH rasavIryAdibhiH parIkSeta|  subhodham|| 8||

 sUkSmANi hi doSauSadhadUSyadeCakAlabalAnalAhArarasasA-
tmyasattvaprakRtivayasAmavasthAntarANi||9||  yAnyanAloci-

mapi cikitsakamAkulIkuryaH||9||  kimpunaralpabuddhim||9||  tasmAdaphIkSNaCaH CAstrArthakarmAnuCIlanena saMskurvIta
prajJAm||9||  api ca-santi vyAdhayo ye CAstra utsargA-
pavAdairupakramaM prati nirdiSTAH||9||  tatra prAjJA eva doSAdi-
gurulAGavena samyagadhyavasyedanyataraniSThAyAm||9||

kuta evamityAha-sUkSmANItyAdi|  doSauSadhAdInAmavasthAntarANi sUkSmANi durlakSyANi yAnyanAlocyamAnAnyavikalpyamAnAnyAturaM nihanyuH|  AlocyamAnAnyapi vipulabhuddhiM vistIrNabhuddhimapi cikitsakamAkulIkuryuH|  kiM punaralpabhuddhim|  tasmAdabhIkSNamatyarthaM CAstrArthasya karmaNaCcikitsAKyasyAnuCIlanenAbhyAsenAtmanaH prajJAM saMskurvIta|  yathaivaMvidhe cikitsAkalpe yogyo bhavati|  api ceti prastAvasamuccaye-santi tathAvidhA vyAdhayo ye CAstra upakramaM prati cikitsAsampAdanAyotsargairapavAdaiCca nirdiSTAtatra tathAvidhe utsargApavAdasaGkule viSaye anyataraniSThAyAmekaniCcayAya prAjJa eva doSadUSyAdigurulAGavena hetubhUtenAdhyavasyet|| 9||

 kAlaCca pheSajasya yogyatAmAdadhAti||10||  sa tu kSaNalava-
muhUrtAdiphedenAturAvasthayA ca dvidhoktaH prAk||10||  api ca

yorvRSTiCItayoCcA~antare sAdhAraNau vasanta jaladAtyayau||10||  grISmavarSakAlayostu prArampho vRSTeH prAvRDiti vika-

rnnivRttiritareSvayogA~atiyogaphayAt||10||  sAdhAraNA hi manda-
CItoSNavarSatayA suKatvAt phavantyavikalpakAH CarIrau-
SadhAnAM viparItAstvitare||10||

na kevalaM vyAdhyAturabhalameva bheSajAyogyatAmApAdayati yAvat kAlo~api bheSajayogyatAmutpAdayati|  sa  ca kAlaH pUrvaM dvividhaH uktaH kSaNAdirvyAdhyavasthA ca kAlo bheSajayogakRditi|  tatra yaH kSaNadiH sa CItAdilakSaNabhedAttrividhaH|  tatra CItoSNayorantareNa madhya sAdhAraNo vasantaH|  vRSTiCItayormadhye sAdhAraNo jaladAtyayaH|  grISmavarSakAlayostvantare yo vRSTeH prArambhaH sa nAtyuSNaCItaH sAdhAraNaH prAvRTCabhdenocyate|  tatra yaducyate kAlo bheSajayogyatAmApAdayatIti taducyate|  teSu sAdhAraNeSu triSu vasantaCaratprAvRDAKyeSvahassu vamanAdInAM pravRttiH|  itareSu CItoSNavarSAKyeSvayogAtiyogabhayAnnivRttirvamanAdInAm|  kuta evamityAha-sAdhAraNA ityAdi|  hi Cabhdo yasmAdarthe|  yasmAtsAdhAraNA mandaCItAditvena suKena hetunA CarIrasyauSadhAnAJcA~avikalpakA avyApAdakA bhavanti|  itare asAdhAraNAH CItAdayo~ati viparItAstIkSNaCItAditvena duHKatvAcCarIrasyauSadhAnAJca vyApAdakA bhavantItyarthaH|| 10||

 CodhanaM CamaJceti dvidhA tatrApi laGghanam||5||

tatra laGghanaM CodhanaCamanabhedena dvividham|  CodhanaM CamanaJca|

 yadIrayedbahirdoSAn paJcadhA CodhanaJca tat||6||  nirUho vamanaM kAyaCiroreko~asravisrutiH||6||

kimucyata ityAha-yadIrayedityAdinA|  paJcadhA paJcabhirvamanAdibhiH prakArairyadauSadhamantaCCarIrasthAn doSAn vAtAdIn bhahirIrayet tacCodhanam|  nirUha ityAdinA paJcaprakArAn darCayati|  niruddho gudapraNidheyamauSadhaM kvAthasnehAdi|  vamanaM, kAyavirekaCiCarovirekaH|  asravisrutiriti|| 6||

 na Codhayati yaddoSAn samAnnodIrayatyapi||7||  samIkaroti viSamAn CamanaM tacca saptadhA||7||  pAcanaM dIpanaM kSuttRDvyAyAmAtapamArutAH||7||  bRMhaNaM Camanantveva vAyoH pittAnilasya ca||7||

CamanaM punaryadauSadhamanantaroktena prakAreNa doSAnnACayati|  samAMCca doSAnnodIrayati notkleCayati|  viSamAn pravRddhAn samIkaroti svarUpeNa sthApayati|  tacCamanam|  viSamaCabhdaH samAn nodIrayatyapIti vAkyasAmArthyAd vRddhAveva vartate|  tacca CamanaM saptabhiH prakAraiH pAcanatvAdibhirbhavati|  pAcanatvAdInAM doSaCamanatvamuktam|  tacca vAyau vAtapitte cAsaumyatvAnna sambhavatItyAha bhRMhaNamityAdi|  yadyapi CamanaM laGGanaM tathApi vAyau vAtapitte ca bhRMhaNameva yathoktalakSaNaM Camanam|  pittasya tu kevalasyAsvarUpatvAllaGGanameva Camanam|  vAtaCleSmaNostu vAyoH CaityAdyogavAhitvAcca laGGanameva kaPe~api ca|  subhodham|| 7||

 phRMhayedvyAdhiphaiSajyamadyastrICokakarCitAn||8||  phArAdhvoraHkSatakSINarUkSadurphalavAtalAn||8||  garphiNIsUtikAphAlavRddhAn grISme~aparAnapi||8||  mAMsakSIrasitAsarpirmadhurasnigdhaphastiphiH||8||  svapnaCayyAsuKAphyaGgasnAnanirvRtiharSaNaiH||8||

nanu ca kva bhRMhaNaM vidheyaM kva vA laGGanamityAha-bhRMhayedityAdi|  vyAdhyAdikarCitAn bhRMhayet|  kSINaCabhdasya bhArAdibhiH sambhandhaH|  tathA grISme aparAn sarvAnityarthaH|  kena bhRMhayedityAha-mAMsetyAdi|  iti bhRMhaNIyAni|| 8||

 mehAmadoSAtisnigdhajvarorustamphakuSThinaH||9||  visarpavidradhiplIhaCiraH kaNThAkSirogiNaH||9||  sthUlAMCca laGGayennityaM CiCire tvaparAnapi||9||

mehAdIn laGGayediti sambhandhaH|  nityameva na tu kadAcit|  CiCire tvaparAnapi la~GGayet|  CleSmacayabhayAt|  aparAniti vyAdhitAnAM grahaNam|  anyathA svasthavRtte CiCire hemantavidhissaviCeSai rnirdiSTaH|| 9||

 tatra saMCodhanaiH sthaulyabalaphittakaphAdhikAn||10||  AmadoSajvaracCardiratIsArahRdAmayaiH||10||  viphandhagauravodgArahRllAsAdiphirAturAn||10||  madhyasthaulyAdikAn prAyaH pUrvaM pAcanadIpanaiH||10||  ephirevAmayairArtAn hInasthaulyaphalAdikAn||10||  kSuttRSNAnigrahairdoSaistvArtAn madhyabalairdRDhAn||10||  samIraNAtapAyAsaiH kimutA~alpabalairnarAn||10||

kena laGghanena tAn laGghayediti Aha-tatretyAdi|  AmadoSAdibhirvyAdhibhirAturAn sthaulyAdibhiH sthUlatvAdibhirguNairadhikAn utkRSTasthaulyabalAdikAn sataH pUrvaM prathamaM pAcanairdIpanaiCca laGghayet|  tato yathArheNa laGghanena prAyograhaNaM doSabalAdyapekSayA niyamasyAsarvaviSayatvapradarCanArtham|  tathA ebhirevAmadoSAdibhirAmayairArtAn hInasthaulyabalAdikAn sataH kSuttRSNAnigrahairlaGghayet|  tathA sarvavyAdhitAn madhyabalairapi doSairvAtAdibhirArtAn samIraNAdibhirlaGghayet|  kimutAlpabalairdoSairArtAn|| 10||

dvividhopakramaNIyaH

 athAto dvividhopakramaNIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhuratreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

pUrve~adhyAye vyAdhinirGAtanamuktam|  atra tu tasyaiva dvaividhyapradarCanArthamadhyAyArambhaH-athAta ityAdi|| 1||

 upakramyasya hi dvitvAd dvidhaivopakramo mataH||2||  ekaH santarpaNastatra dvitIyaCcApatarpaNaH||2||  bRMhaNo laGghanaCceti tatparyAyAvudAhRtau||2||

upakramaCcikitseti paryAyau|  dvividha evopakramaH|  kutaH ?  upakramasya vyAdhitasya santarpyApatarpyAbhedAd dvaividhyAt|| 2||

 na bRMhayellaGghanIyAn bRMhyAMstu mRdu laGghayet||11||  yuktyA vA deCakAlAdibalatastAnapAcaret||11||

tatrAtibhRMhaNena ye jAyante~atisthaulyAdayaH te prAk pUrvaM rogAnutpAdanIye saMCodhanabheSajadveSodbhavatvenAtisthaulyAgnisadanetyAdinodAhRtAH|  yattvasminnevAdhyAye vakSyanta ityuktaM taccikitsAnurodhAt|  tatrAtisthaulyaprAdhAnyAdatra gurvAdItyAdinA hetusvarUpakathanaM kriyate|  tatrAnnarasaH sthaulyamupAnayet kuryAt|  kiGkurvannAha-dhAtUn raktAdIn ClathIkurvannibhiDabhAvamApAdayan|  kimbhUto rasaH gurvAdibhissaumyaissAtmyairvRddhena saMlInena ca CleSmaNAmiCrassaMlIno~anutkliSTarUpaH|  ata evAmaH aparipUrNapAkaH tataCcA~atisthaulyAdatikSudAdigadgadatvAntaM bhavet|  tasmiMCcAtisthaulye medovRddhikAraNairAhArAdibhiryadi medaso~anyadhAtvapekSayA~atiCayena puSTirbhavati tato medo~atipuSTito hetorvAyoCCAKAsaJcaraNAya srotomuKeSu medasA ruddheSu satsu vAyuranyatrAgacCan koSTha eva caran tatrasthamevAgni yataH prajvalayatyato hetoH sthUleSu puruSeSu kSuttRSau adhikaM stau bhavataH|  tau ca mahAsrotasthitAvagnyanilau sthUlaM dahataH|  yathA koTaraM tarumagnyanilau dahatastadvaditi|  tatra ca sthUle svedabhUritA bhavati|  kuta Aha-medasaH svedavAhisirAmUlabhAvAdviSyandanAcCleSmayogAcca|  viSyandanaM srutisvarUpatvam|  nanu coktaM sthUlasya medo~atipuSTiM yAtIti|  tat kathamityAha-koSTha evetyAdi|  asya sthUlasya medaHkAraNaiH svaCaktyA samRddhena upalepAtmakena medasA ruddheSu rasavahasrotassu pratyahamannarase koSTha eva vipakve sati yatassa rasassarvadhAtuSvaprAptavRttirbhavati|  gurumadhurAdibhiCca medassAdRCyaM bhajate|  ato~asya puruSasya meda eva pracIyate tena rasena|  tathA tasmAnmedasaCCeSo~api raso raktAdidhAtupaJcakapuSTaye svalpatvAnnAlaM na paryAptaH|  nanu ca kathaM rasaraktAbhyAmapravRddhAbhyAM medaso vRddhiH ?  kathaJca medasi vRddhe~asthyAdIni vRddhinnayAntIti ?  yata uktaM pUrvo dhAtuH paraM kuryAd vRddhaH kSINaCca tadvidhamiti|  tathA dhAtvAhArACca dhAtava iti|  tasmAdyAvatsarve dhAtavo na kSINA vRddhA vA tAvadekasya vRddhikSayau durupapAdakAvityatrocyate|  na hyeSa eva pakSaH yat pUrvadhAtUpamardenAnena paradhAtusambhavaH anyadhAtUdbhavaH|  api tu yugapadannarasena sakaladhAtUnAM paripoSo~api|  tantrAntare vakSyate|  tatraiva yathoktaM vijJAsyate|  bhavatu nAmaivam|  yatra tu krameNa pUrvadhAtUpamardanenAnyadhAtUdbhavastatra kevalasya medasaH kathaM vRddhiratrApyucyate|  na hi kevalameva medaCcIyate|  apitu raktAdayo~api cIyanta eva|  medaH punaH pUrvakAraNaCaktyatiCayena vRddhaM sat punaranyadhAtvapekSayA sutarAM vardhata iti|  etadevAha-tulye~apItyAdi|  atastena dhAtUnAmasamatvena kAraNena medaH sthUlasya CvAsAdIn janayati|  atisthUlaH kIdRCa ucyata ityAha-athathopacayetyAdi|  upacayenAvayavasaMhananena sadRCa utsAho yasya sa yathopacayotsAhaH|  na yathopacayotsAhaH ayathopacayotsAhaH|  aGgairmahAn utsAhena tu stoka ityarthaH|  calAH sPigAdayo yasya sa tathAvidhaH  tAdRCaH puruSo~atisthUlaH smRtaH|| 14||
