sUtrasthAnam

svedavidhiH

 athAtaH svedavidhirnAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

CodhanaprasaGge sneha upayujyate|  tena ca snigdhe dehe doSANAM mArdavAya svedasya prasaGgAttatparijJAnArthamadhyAya Arabhyate-athAta ityAdi|| 1||

 caturvidho~agnisvedo phavati tApopanAhadravoSma phedena||2||

tatra svedo~agnikRto~anagnikRtaCca|  tatrAgnikRtastApAdibhedena caturvidho bhavati|| 2||

 tatra tAphasvedaH phANikAMsyaphAlavAlukAvastraGaTikAdiphiH
sAkSAdagninA ca phrayoktavyaH||3||

tatra tApasvedo~agnitaptaiH pANyAdibhiH sAkSAdavyavadhAnenAgninA vA prayoktavyaH|  kAMsyaH kAMsyamayaH  paTTaH|  PAlaH CastrapaTTaH|  bhAlukAH sikatAH|  GaTikAgnitaptA gulmAdyucCedayojyA|  iti tApasvedaH|| 3||

 upanAhasvedastu sarvagandhadhAnyasarSapakiNvavacAdevadArurA-
snairaNDamUlamadhukaCatAhvAsurAkiTTAdivAtaharadravyacUrNairya-
vagodhUmaCakalairAnUpAsRkpittaCiraH pAdAmiSaveCavAraiCca||4||  tathA CleSmasaMsRSTe vAyau surasAdiphiH||4||  pittasaMsRSTe ca
padmakAdiphiH||4||  pRthak sahitairvA kSIraCuktadhAnyAmlala-
vaNamastupragADhaiH susnigdhaiH suKoSNaiH sAlvalAphidhAnai-
stairphahuCaH pradihyoSNavIryApUtimRduromacarmaphistada phAve Gana-
vAtaharapatrAvikakauCeyairupanaddhamaGgamahaHsthitaM vidAhapari-
hArArthaM niCi muJcet||4||  divA niCi baddham||4||  doSakAla-
balavaCena vA||4||

upanAhasvedaH punaH sarvagandhAdyaiH|  upanAha uSNApiNDabhandhaH|  gandhAH kuSThAdayaH|  dhAnyAnyuSNavIryANI tilAdIni|  kiNvaM prasiddham|  surAkiTTaM jagalaH|  anyeSA vAtaharANAM dravyANAM CodhanAdipaThitAnAM cUrNaiH|  yavagodhUmaCakalairityaClakSNapiSTairityarthaH|  tathAnUpodbhavairasRkpittaiH|  CiraHprabhRtibhiH mAMsaiH|  veCavAraiCca|  veCavAraH sUkSmacCinnaM mAMsam|  tathA CleSmasaMyukte vAyau surasAdibhirupanAhaH|  tathA pittasaMsRSTe vAyau padmakAdibhireva sAlvalAbhidhAnairauSadhaiH|  punaH punaraGgaM CarIraM pradihya carmabhirbhaddhaM vidAhaparihAraRthamahorAtramadhye dvau vArau muJcet|  kimbhUtaiH sAlvalAbhidhAnairAha-pRthagbhUtaiH sahitairvA|  kSIrAdipragADhaiH|  pragADho GanapiSTaH|  tathA susnigdhaiH snehamiCratvAt|  suKoSNaiCca|  evambhUtaiH sAlvalAdibhirbhahuCo~anekavAramaGgaM pradihyAlipya|  evaMvidhAni padmakAdInyeva sAlvalAbhidhAnAni|  carmabhiH kimbhUtairuSNavIryairapUtibhiradurgandhairmRduromabhiCca|  tadabhAve tathAvidhacarmAbhAve GanapiSTAnAM nibhiDAnAM vAtaharAnAM dravyANAM mAtrayA saMyuktaiH patraiH|  kauCeyairupanaddhamaGgaM kasmin kAle muJcet Aha-ahaHsthitamaGgalagnaM niCi muJcet|  niCi sthitaM divA muJcet|  deCakAladyapekSya yathA vidAho notpadyate tathA athavA muJcet|  ityupanAhasvedaH|| 4||

 dravasvedastu dvividhaH||5||  pariSeko~avagACca||5||  tatra Cigru-
varaNAmrAtakamUlakasarSapasurasArjakavAsAvaMCACmantakA-
CokaCirISArkakaraJjairaNDamAlatIpatra phaGgapUtIkadaCamU-
lAdivAtaharairdravyairmastusalilasurAkSIraCuktAdiphirkva-
thitaiH pUrvoktaiCca yathAdoSaM pRthaksahitairvA kumphIrvarSa-
likA praNAlIrvA pUrayitvA vAtaharasiddhasnehAphyaktamana-
phyaktaM vopaviSTaM kiliJje vA CayAnamekAGge sarvAGge vA
vastrAvacCanne pariSecayet tairevAdphi pUrNe mahati kaTAhe
kuNDe droNyAM vA~avagAhayet||5||

dravasvedaH pariSekAvagAhabhedena dvividhaH|  tatra pariSekaH CigrvAdivAtaharairmastusalilAdidravadravyakvathitaiH|  tathA na kevalaM CigrvAdibhiH yAvat pUrvauktairupanAhasvedapaThitaiH sarvagandhAdibhiretaiCca sarvairyathAdoSaM doSaviCeSApekSayA kadAcit pRthagbhUtaiH|  kadAcid viSayaviCeSeNa dvitrAdisahitaiH sarvairvA|  teSAM kvAthaiH kumbhAdyanyatamaM pUrayitvA svedyaM prayojanApekSayA ekAGge CarIraikadeCe sarvAGge vA vastreNAvacCAdite|  tena tathAvidhena kvAthena pariSecayet|  kimbhUtaM svedyam?  vAtaharadravyasiddhena snehenAbhyaktaM doSAdyapekSayAnabhyaktaM vA tathA Asana upaviSTam|  kiliJje vA CayAnam|  kumbhIH sthAlIH|  varSalikA AdhUtAH|  praNAlikA UrdhvatAviCiSTaM bhANDam|  kiliJjaM tRNairbhaddhA Cayyeti pariSekaH|  avagAhaH punastaireva pariSekakvAthaiH pUrNe kaTAhe kArya ityubhayathA dravasvedaH|| 5||

 USmasvedaH punaraSTadhA phidyate-piNDaH saMstaro nADI
GanACma kumphI kUpaH kuTI jentAkaCca||6||

USmasvedaH punarvakSyamANapiNDAdibhedenASTavidhaH|  USmA vASpaH|

 tatra mRtkapAlapASANaloSTalohapiNDAnagnivarNAn sandaMCena
gRhItvAmphasyamle vA nimmajjayet||7||  tairArdrAvikavastreNa 
veSTitaiH CleSmamedophUyiSThaM sarujamaGgaM granthimadvA svedayet||7||  pAMsusikatAgavAdipurISadhAnyabusapulAkapalalairvA-
~amlotkvathitaiH pUrvavadveSTitaiH gavAdiCakRtArdreNa piNDI-
kRtenopanAhadravyotkArikAkRsaramAMsapiNDairvA vAtaroge-

tatra mRtkapAlapASANAdInagnivarNAn sandaMCenAdAyAyaskArataptapiNDagrahaNayantreNa gRhItvA svedyadoSAdyapekSayAmbhasyamle vA kAJjikaCuktAdau nimajjayet|  atha tairnimajjanajAtabhASpairArdreNa  dhAnyAmlAdisiktenAvikavastreNorNapaTTena samantAdveSTitairaGgaM dehaM sarujaM rujAyuktaM granthimadvA svedayogyaM svedayet|  CleSmamedobhUyiSThamaGgaM sarujaM granthimadvA pAMsvAdibhiramlotkvathitaiH piNDIbhUtaiH pUrvavadevArdrAvikavastraveSTitaiH svedayet|  athavA tathAvidhamaGgaM gavACvAdiCakRtArdreNACuSkeNa svedayediti sambhandhaH|  vAtarogeCu va punarupanAhotkArikAdibhiH svedayet|  vikalpaH pUrvApekSaH|  gavAdikarISaM gavACvAdiCakRt|  pulAkAKyadhAnyaviCeSasya palAlaH kakSaM kevalena vA gavAdyanyatamena CakRtA|  AdigrahaNenACvagardabhahastyAdInAM grahaNam|  upanAhadravyotkArikAH pUrvoktAH mAMsaveCavArAdikRtA iti piNDasvedaH prathamastasyaiva ca piNDasvedasya saGkara ityAKyA|  AKyA nAma|| 7||

 yathArhasvedadravyANi pihitamuKAyAM kumphyAM samyagupasvedya
nivAtaCaraNaCayanasthe kiliJje prastIryAvikakauCeya-
vAtaharapatrAnyatamottarapracCade rauravAjinaprAvArAdiSvava-
cCannaM svedayediti saMstarasvedaH||8||

saMstara ucyate|  doSAdyapekSayA yathArhaM svedadravyANyeraNDamUlAdIni mAMsAdIni ca pihitamuKAyAM sthagitamuKAyAM nirvivara muKAyAM uKAyAM sthAlyAM svedayet|  svedasya ca nirvAte CaraNe gRhe CayanaM kalpayet|  tasya Cayanasyopari kiliJjaH tAnyuKAsvinnAnyauSadhAni prastAryANi|  teSAM coparyAvikAdInAmanyatamena uttarapracCadaM kalpanIyam|  evaM saMstRte kiliJje sthitaM svedyaM kauCeyAdibhiH CobhanaM kRttvoparyavacCannaM svedayet|  AvikamUrNAkRtam|  kauCeyaM paTTam|  vAtaharANAmeraNDAdInAM patrANi tathoktAni|  rauravaM paTTaviCeSaH|  iti saMstarasvedo dvitIya|  saMstaraNarUpeNa svedanAt|| 8||

 pUrvavadevopasvedyoKAmuKe~anyAmuKAM nADIM mUlacCidrapra-
mANApARCvacCidrAmupasandhAyAvalipya ca pArCvacCidrasthayA
nADyA CareSikAvaMCadalakiliJjakaraJjapatrAnyatamakRtayA 
gajAgrahastasaMsthAnayA vyAmadIrGayA~adhyarddhavyAmadIrGayA vA
svAyAmacaturphAgASTaphAgapariNAhamUlAgrasrotasA sarvato

jugAmI vihatacaNDavegastvacamividahan suKaM svedayatIti
nADIsvedaH||9||

nADIsveda ucyate|  pUrvavat saMstarasvedavadupasvedyadravadravyapUrNAyA uKAyA muKe~anyAM dvitIyAmuKAmupasandhAya tasyAH pArCvacCidrasthayA nADyA saJcAriNaM bhASpamupaharet|  sa bhASpaH suKaM svedayediti sambhandhaH|  tenaitaduktaM bhavati-vAtaharadravadravyapUrNAmekAmuKAM kArayet|  tasyA adho~agniM prajvAlayet|  tasyA uKAyA upari dvitIyoKA kalpanIyA|  tasyACcoparibhavAyA adhaH CidrANi dvitIyoKAto vASpasaJcaraNAya kAryANi|  uKayoCca sandhiH CAlipiSTAdinA lepyaH|  tasyACcoparisthitAyA uKAyAH pArCve dvitIyaM vakSyamANanADImUlapramANacCidraM kArayet|  tathA CareSikAdisaMstaraNaracitA dairghyeNa kevalavyAmadIrGA sArdhavyAmadIrGA vA nADI kAryA|  tasyACca nADyAH svadIrGacaturbhAgapramANa vRttatayA mUle~antaH-srotaH kAryam|  sA ca nADI yathAkrameNa gajAgrahastasadRCI kAryA|  yathA svayAmAdaSTabhAgavRttaM agrasrotaH tasyA bhavati|  mUlasrotaso~ardhapariNAhamagrasrotaH ityarthaH|  gajAgrahastasadRCamuKA nADI vartulatvAdaGganAM naiva bhASpAyate|  tathAvidhA nADI uparitanoKApArCvacCidre niveCyA|  tasyACcoKAyAH pihitamuKatvAnnADImuKa evoSmA bhavati|  tasyA nADyA ISikAdyudbhavatvAdyAni CidrANi tairbhASpanirgamaparihArAya sarvato vAtaharadravyapatrairveSTanam|  sA ca nADI dvau vArau trIn vA vArAn vinamitA karabhagrIvAnukAreNa kuTilIkRtA kAryA|  tayaivambhUtayA nADyA suKopaviSTasya puruSasya svedayogye~aGge svabhyaktaprAvRtte vASpamupaharet|  tathAvidho vASpo hyanRjugAmitvAdvihatacaNDavegatvAttvacamavidahan suKaM svedayatIti nADIsvedastRtIyaH|| 9||

 puruSAyAmamAtramadhikaM vA ghanaM samaM ca CilAtalaM bhUpradeCaM
vA vAtaharadArudIptenAgninA sarvatastApayitvA~agnimapo-

ghanACmasveda ucyate-puruSetyAdi|  puruSAyAmamAtraM sArdhastatrayamAtramato~api vA kiJcidadhikapramANaM CilAtalaM ghanamabhaGguraM samamanimnotratamevaMvidhaM vA pramANaguNAbhyAM bhUpradeCaM sarvatodikkamuparyadhaCca vAtaharadArvagninA pratApya agnimanantaramapohyAnyataH kRtvA tattaptaM CilAtalaM bhUpradeCaM vA uSNodakenAmlAdibhiCca kAJjikamUtrAdibhirabhiSicya yathoktapracchade pUrvoktavAtaharapatrapracchade saMstarasvedoktaprakAreNa svedayediti ghanACmasvedaCcaturthaH|| 10||

 athAtaH svedavidhirnAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

CodhanaprasaGge sneha upayujyate|  tena ca snigdhe dehe doSANAM mArdavAya svedasya prasaGgAttatparijJAnArthamadhyAya Arabhyate-athAta ityAdi|| 1||

 caturvidho~agnisvedo phavati tApopanAhadravoSma phedena||2||

 kleCayanti ciraM te hi hanyurvainamanirhRtAH||50||

durbhalaH san pUrvaM CuddhaH tathAlpadoSastathA kRCaH tathA mRdvAdiviCeSeNAparijJAtakoSThaH sa mRdvalpaM cauSadhaM pibhet|  yatastadauSadhaM prayojanApekSAyAmasakRdanekavAraM pItaM varam|  na tvanyathA sakRt saMCayAvahaM pItaM varamatiyogabhayAt|  tathA durbhalasya calAn doSAn bhahUn prabhUtAn sataH stokaM kRtvA mRdubhirdravyairharet punaH
punaH|  tAMstu durbhalasya calAn doSAn alpAn sataH anirhRtAneva CamanaiH Camayet|  yataste doSA bhahavaH pracalitA enamAturamanirhRtAH santaCciraM vyAdhibhiH kleCayanti|  hanyureva vA|

dvitIyamaNutailamathavetyAdInA |  candanAdIni samAnyekIkRtya paricCidya tataH CataguNe divyajale kvAthayet yAvat kvAtho daCabhAgaCeSaH |  tataCca kvAthAddaCAMCAH samAH kAryAH |  tatraikenAMCena samaM tailaM tenaiva saha pacet tatpakvaM punardvitIyena pacet |  tat punastRtIyena yAvannava pAkAH |  daCame tu pAke tailatulyamAjaM payo deyametad dvitIyamaNutailam |  subhodhamanyat ||11||

 anasyArhAstu phuktaphaktasnehamadyagaratoyapItapAtukAma-

anasyArhA ityAdi |  bhuktabhaktAdayo~asya nasyasyAnarhAH |  snAtukAmaCabhdena nasye datte snAnapratiSedhamAha |  tadvat pAtukAmaCabhdena |  kRtaM vamanAdi yasmin taddivasam durdine na kasyacid nasyaM yojyam |  durdina iti yadyapi sAmAnyenoktaM tathApyakAladurdina iti vijJeyam |  CIte varSAsu ca kAlaniyamasya vakSyamANatvAt |  sUtikAyAH srutaraktoktAn doSAN kSAmatArucyAdIn || 12 ||

 teSu yathAsvamAyatanaM doSodrekaM cApekSya snehasvedaCiro-

teSAM ca nasyarogANAM yathAsvaM yathAtmIyamAyatanaM nidAnadoSAdikaM cApekSya snehAdInAcaret |  viCeSeNa tu garbhiNItyAdi subhodham || 13 ||

 marCapramANaM tu pradeCinyaGgulIparvadvayAnnimagnoddhRtAdyAvatpa-

marCapramANaM daCa snehabindava uttamamAtrA |  aSTau madhyamA |  SaT kanIyasI |  binduriti kimucyata ityAha-pradeCinItyAdi |  subodham |  kvAthAdInAmaSTau SaT catvAraCca bindavo yathAsaGKyena uttamamadhyamakanIyasyo mAtrAH |  pradhamanasya cUrNasya mAtrA SaDaGguladvimuKayA nADyA nAsAyAM vaidyamuKAnilapreritaM cUrNaM yAvat kaNThapradeCaM prApnoti |  doSapAratantryeNa punaHpunaryojanam || 14 ||

 atha nasyArhaM naramavyAhatavegaM dhautAntarbahirmuKaM snigdha-
svinnaCirasaM nAtikSudhitaM prAyogikadhUmapAnaviCuddhasrotasaM
svAstIrNanivAtaCayanasthamuttAnaCirSamISadunnatapAdaM prasA-

nAsApuTaM paryAyeNa pidhAyetarasmin nAsAsrotasi dakSiNa-
hastena pranADyA picunA vAnavacCinnamAsiJcet||15||

atha nasyetyAdi subhodham |  prAyogiko dhUmo vakSyamANalakSaNaH |  tena viCuddhiH srotasAm |  pradeyAdauSadhAnmAtrAbhedenoktAt tribhAgamuSNAmbhuprataptaM kuryAt |  tato dvitIyo bhAgaH, tatastRtIyaH |  anyathA CItIbhavati | paryAyeNeti |  yadA vAmaM pihitaM tadA dakSiNe yadA dakSiNaM pihitaM tadA vAma iti |  itarasminnityapihite |  picuH kArpAsastokaH || 15 ||

 vAtaphittakaphAmayeCu krameNApharAhNamadhyAhnaphUrvAhNeSu||16||  lA-
lAsrAvasuptapralApadantakaTakaTAyanakrathanakRcCronmIlana-

~aparAhNe varSAsvAdityadarCane paJcakarmANyAcarato basti-

vAtAdiSu yathAsaGKyenAparAhNAdiSu kAleSu nasyamAcaret |  lAlAsrAvAdiSu rAtrau |  svasthavRtte tu CIte hemantaCiCirayormadhyAhna eva |  Caradi vasante ca pUrvAhNa eva |  grISme~aparAhNe sAyaGkAle |  varSAsu tu yadaivAdityadarCanam |  paJcakarmAGgatve bastyuttarakAlameva || 16 ||

 na ca nasye niSicyamAne kopahAsyavyAhAraspandanocCiGKa-

 dattamAtre tu nasye karNalalATakeCaphUmigaNDamanyAska-

dhUmapAnavidhiH

 athAto dhUmapAnavidhiM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

uttamAGgAd doSanirharaNaprasaGgena dhUmasyApi tadguNatvAttadvidhAnapradarCanArthamadhyAya 
Arabhyate-atha ityAdi|| 1||

 dhUmo hi Ciro~akSikarNaCUlAphiSyandagauravArdhAvaphedaka-
phInasakAsaCvAsAsyavairasyaphrasekavaisvaryaphUtiGrANamuKahidhmA
galarogadantaCUladaurphalyArucihanumanyAgrahakRmikaNDU-
phANDutvakkeCadoSakSavathunACaphAhulyatandrAtinidrAkrathanAdi
jatrUrdhvagatavAtakaphavyAdhiphraCamAya phrayujyate||2||  tathA
CiraHkapAlendriyamanobRMhaNAya prasAdanAya ca||2||

dhUmo hi CiraHCUlAdInAM vAtakaPajAnAmUrdhvajatrurogANAM praCamAya prayujya iti sambhandhaH|  pUtiCabhdasya GrANamuKAbhyAM sambhandhaH|  grahaCabhdasya hanumanyAbhyAm|  kSavathuCabhdasya nACabhAhulyAbhyAm|  krathanaM suptasya nAsACabhdaH|  tathA CiraHprabhRtInAM bhRMhaNAya prasAdanAya ca tatra CiraHkapAlayorbhRMhaNAya|  indriyANAM manasaCca prasAdanAya ca|| 2||

 CItadravyanirvRtto~apyagnisaMyogAduSNatayA pittaraktavi-
ruddhaH||3||

sarvaCca dhUmaH pittarogeSu raktarogeSu ca viruddhaH|| 3||

 sa trividho phavati-Camano phRMhaNaH CodhanaCca||4||  tathA
kAsaGno vAmano vraNadhUpanaCca||4||  tatra CamanaH prAyogiko
madhyama iti paryAyaH||4||  bRMhaNaH snehano mRduriti||4||  Codhano
virecanastIkSNa iti ca||4||

tatra CamanAdibhedena dhUmasyaikaM traividhyam|  kAsaGnAdibhedena dvitIyam|| 4||

 adhUmArhastu viriktadattaphastirAtrijAgaritAphihataCiroma
dhudadhidugdhamadyasnehayavAgUviSapItamatsyACitapANDuroga
pramehodarAdhmAnordhvavAtatimirarohiNikAraktapittino~atyu
SNe~anye~api ca||5||  eSAM hi phramajvaraCiro~aphitApendri
yopaGAtatAluCoSapAkadhUmAyanacCardimUrcCAraktapittA
rditAni mRtyuM vA dhUmo janayati||5||  atimAtraCcAnyeSA
mapi||5||

viriktadattabhastyAdayo dhUmaM nArhanti|  eSAM svalpo~api dhUmo bhramAdIn janayati|  anyeSAmapyatiyogena bhramAdIn janayati|| 5||

 tatra vAtakaphAnyatarasaMsRSTaM phittamuphalakSya yathAsvaM sarphiH
kaSAyaphAnanasyAsyAlephanAJjanaphariSekAn snigdharUkSa
CItAn phrayuJjIta||6||  etena sarvadhUmopaGAtapratikArA vyA
KyAtaH||6||

eSu ca bhramAdiSu sarvathA pittakopaH|  tacca pittaM vAyunA kaPena vA saMsRSTamupalakSya yathAyogaM sarpiSpAnAdInyupayuJjIta|  anena ye kecana dhUmahetukA upaGAtA vyAdhayasteSAm pratIkArA vyAKyAtAH pittaprAdhAnyAditi bhAvaH|| 6||

 viCeSatastu sarvasrotogate dhUme tIvratarA vedanA phavantyU
SAdhmAnanetrarogaCvAsakAsapInasAGgasvarasAdAmlakAH||7||  tatraGRtakSIrekSurasadrAkSACarkaropayogastadvidhaireva vamanam||7||  kAtutiktairapi ca nasyagaNDUSAH||7||

viCeSataH sarvasrotogate dhUma USAdayo bhavanti|  teSu USAdhmAnAdiSu GRtAdyupayogaH tadvidhaireveti GRtAdisadRCaguNairvamanaviSayeSu vamanam|  teSvevoSAdiSu kaTutiktaiCca nasyagaNDUSAH|  svedAratimAn dAha USaH|| 7||

 pAnakAlAstvaSTau prayogikasya niCAmUtraCakRddantadhAvana
svedanasyAhAraCastrakarmAntAH||8||  ekAdaCa mRdoH||8||  kSutavya
vAyahasitacirAsitajRmphitamutraCakRddantadhAvanatarpaNapuTa
pAkaCastrakarmAntAH||8||  paJca tIkSNasya nasyAJjanaCarditasnA
nAhassvapnAntAH||8||  eSu hi kAleSu vAtakaphotkleCo
phavati||8||

niCAntAdyA aSTau kAlAH prAyogikadhUmasya antaCabhdaH sarvairabhisambhadhyate|  kSutAntAdaya ekAdaCa kAlA mRdordhUmasya|  nasyAntAdayaH paJca kAlAstIkSNasya|  eSu hi nasyAntAdiSu kAleSu vAtakaPayorutkleSo bhavati|| 8||

 netraM tu phastinetradravyaphavaM gopucCAkAramagramUlayoH kani
SThakAGguSThapariNAhaM rAjamASavAhidhUmavartipraveCacCidramRju
trikoCaM ClakSNaM CithilaCalAkAgarphaM CamanAdiSu kramA
dAturAGgulamAnena catvAriMCaddvAttriMCaccaturviMCatyaGgulaM
kuryAt||9||  kAsaGne vamane ca daCAGgulam||9||  vraNadhUpanArthe
~aSTAGgulaM kalAyaparimaNDalaM kulatthavAhi srota iti||9||  evaM hi dhUmo dUrAt pravRtto netrasya parvacCedAdUrdhvaM tanutayA
ca CanaiH CliSyanna phAdhako phavati||9||

atra ca dhUme netraM bhastinetradravyavat suvarNAdimayamityarthaH|  agre kaniSThakAgrapariNAhaM mUle~aGguSThAgrapariNAhamagre rAjamASapraveCacCidraM mUle dhUmavartipraveCacCidram|  trikoCaM yasya vaMCasyAntaH stokastokena trINi sUkSmaCidrANi vibhandhAni bhavanti|  tairhi pratihato dhUmaH CanaiH CiraH praviCan suKakaro bhavati|  tasya ca netrasyAntaCCithilA CalAkA dhAryA|  yathA pAMsvAdi na praviCati|  dhUmapAnakAle 
tvapaneyeti|  subhodham|| 9||

 kAsAghnAdiSu tu netrAbhAve devanalavaMCairaNDAdonAmanyatamAM
nADIM yojayet||10||

atra ca dhUme netraM bhastinetradravyavat suvarNAdimayamityarthaH|  agre kaniSThakAgrapariNAhaM mUle~aGguSThAgrapariNAhamagre rAjamASapraveCacCidraM mUle dhUmavartipraveCacCidram|  trikoCaM yasya vaMCasyAntaH stokastokena trINi sUkSmaCidrANi vibhandhAni bhavanti|  tairhi pratihato dhUmaH CanaiH CiraH praviCan suKakaro bhavati|  tasya ca netrasyAntaCCithilA CalAkA dhAryA|  yathA pAMsvAdi na praviCati|  dhUmapAnakAle 
tvapaneyeti|  subhodham|| 9||

 kAsAghnAdiSu tu netrAbhAve devanalavaMCairaNDAdonAmanyatamAM
nADIM yojayet||10||

kAsaghnAdiSu netrAbhAve nalavaMCAdyanyatamAM nADIM yojayet||10||

gaNDUSAdividhiH

 athAto gaNDUSAdividhimadhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

UrdhvAGgaprasaGgena gaNDUSAdividhAnAyAdhyAya Arabhyate-athAta ityAdi|| 1||

 caturvidho phavati gaNDUSaH-snaihikaH CamanaH Codhano
ropaNaCca||2||  teSAmAdyAstrayaH krameNa vAtaphittakaphAmaya-
GnAH||2||  ropaNastvAsyavraNaghnaH CamanaH stamphanaH prasAdano
nirvApaNa iti paryAyAH||2||

snaihikAdibhedena caturvidho gaNDUCo muKadhAryadravaH|  tatra snaihiko vAte pitte CamanaH CodhanaH kaPe AsyavraNeSu ropaNaH|| 2||

 tatra svAdvamlalavaNoSNairauSadhaiH siddho yukto vA nAtyuSNaH
sneho mAMsarasastilakalkodakaM kSIraM vA snaihikaH||3||  tiktakaCAyamadhuraCItaiH paTolAriSTajamphvAmramAlatIpalla
votpalamadhukakvAthasitodakakSaudrakSIrekSurasaghRtAdiphiH
CamanaH||3||  kaTvamlalavaNoSNaiH CirovirecanadravyaiH Cukta
madyadhAnyAmlamUtrAnyatamakalkitAloDitaiH CodhanaH||3||  ropa
Nastu kaSAyamadhuraCItai-ryathAsvaM copadiSTaH||3||

tatra snaihikaH svAdvamlAdibhirdravyairbhavati|  CamanastiktAdibhiH|  CodhanaH kaTvAdibhiH|  ropaNaH kaSAyAdibhiryathAsveSu prakaraNeSu copadiSTaridravyairgaNDUSo bhavati||3||

 dhAnyAmlamAsyavairasyamaladaurgandhyanACanam||4||  tadevAlavaNaM CItaM muKaCoSaharaM param||4||  ACu kSArAmphugaNDUSo phinatti CleSmaNaCcayam||4||

api ceti samuccaye|  dantaharSAdiSu tilakalkodakaM tailaM vA mAMsaraso~athava gaNDUSadhAraNe nityaM hitaH|  subodhamanyat|| 4||

 atha nivAte sAtape suKopaviSTastanmanAH svinnamRditagalakapolalalATadeCo varamadhyAvarAM kramAdvaktrArdhatriphAgacaturphAgapUraNIM dravamAtrAM kalkaM vA kolapramANaM kiJcidunnamitAsyo~anaphyavaharan dhArayet||5||  kavale tu paryAyeNa kapolau kaNThaM ca saJcArayet||5||  ayameva ca kavalagaNDUSayorviCeSaH||5||  muKe saJcAryate yA tu sA mAtrA kavalaH smRtaH||5||  asaJcArA tu yA mAtrA sa gaNDUSaH prakIrtitaH||5||  punaCcAsya svedamardanAnyAcaret||5||  evamutkliSTaH kapho vaktraM phratiphadyate||5||  tAvacca dhAryo yAvat kaphaphUrNakapholatA
sravadGrANanetratA pheSajasya vAnuphahatiH kaphena||5||  evaM trIn paJca sapta vA gaNDUSAn dhArayet||5||  yAvadvA samyagdhUmapItaliGgotpattiH||5||

tasya gaNDUSasya mAtrArdhamuKapUraNI varA CreSThA|  tribhAgamuKapUraNI madhyA|  caturbhAgamuKapUraNI avarA|  iti dravamAnam|  kalkasya kolamAtrA|  kolaM tolakam|  bhadaramAtrameva vA ayamevAsaJcArasaJcArakRto gaNDUSakavalayorviCeSo~anyatsadRCam|  muKetyAdi subhodham|| 5||

 tasya svAsthyena yogaM jADyarasAjJAnAruciprasekopalepairayogam, muKaCoSapAkaklamArucihRdayadravasvarasAdakarNanAdairatiyogamupalakSayet||6||  teSAM yathAsvaM pratikurvIta||6||

tatra ca dhUmavat samyagyogalakSaNam| jADyAdInyayogAtiyogalakSaNamiti| eSu jAdyAdiSvAtmIyAM cikitsAM kuryAt|| 6||

 pratisAraNaM tu trividham||7||  gaNDUSoditAnAM dravyANAM rasakriyA kalkaCcarNUCca||7||  tadaphiSyandAdhimanthagalaCuNDikAdiSu yuktyA prayojyam||7||  atipratisAraNAdUSAploSadAhakledaCoSAdayo phavanti||7||

gaNDUSoktAnAM dravyANAM rasakriyAkalkacUrNaistrividhaM pratisAraNamucyate|  tacca pratisAraNamabhiSyandAdhimanthagalaCuNDikAdiSu yathoyogamupayojyam|  pratisAraNAtiyogAdUSAdayo bhavanti|  svedAratimAn dAha USaH|| 7||

 muKAlepo~api trividho doSaGno viSaghno varNyaCca||8||  tripramANaCcaturphAgatriphAgArdhAGgulotsedhaH||8||  na cAliptamuKo~atiphASyahAsyakrodhaCokarodanaKAdanAgyAtapadivAsvapnAn seveta||8||  kaNDUtvakCoSapInasadRSTyupaGAta phayAt||8||  na ca CuSyannupekSitavyaH||8||  CuSko hi CaviM dUSayati||8||  tamArdrayitvApanayet||8||  AlopAnte ca muKamaphyajyAt||8||

doSaghnAdibhedena trividho muKAlepaH|  tasya ca dvividhaM pramANam|  aGgulacaturbhAgotsedho~aGguladvibhAgotsedho~ardhAGgulotsedhaCca|  utsedho Ganatvam|  AliptamuKastatkAlamatibhASyAdIn na seveta|  kaNDvAdirogabhayAt|  subhodham|| 8||

 na tu yojyo rAtrijAgaritAjIrNadattanasyArucihanugrahapratiCyAyinAm||9||  samyakprayuktaCcAkAlavalIpalitatimiravyaGgatilakAdIn praCamayati||9||  svasthasya tu dRpTibalaM puNDarIkakAntavaktratAJca karoti||9||

na tu muKAlepo rAtraijAgaritAdiSu yojyaH|  sa ca samyakprayuktaH san akAlapalitAdIn nACayati|| 9||

 mUrdhatailaM punaCcaturdhA phidyate-aphyaGgaH pariSekaH picurphastiriti||10||  yathottaraM te balinaH||10||  tatrAphyaGgo rUkSakaNDUmalAdiSu prayujyate||10||  pariSekatvarU~MSikACirastodadAhapAkavraNeSu||10||  keCaCAtasphuTanadhUphananetrastampheSu phicuH||10||  bastistu prasuptyarditarAtrijAgaritanAsAsyaCoSatimiravAksaGgeSu cAtidAruNeSu||10||  teSvaphyaGgAdayaH prasiddhasvarUpAH||10||

Cirasi yattailaM dIyate tanmUrdhatailamucyate|  tasyAbhyaGgAdibhedena caturvidhatvam|  picuH kArpAsamayaH|| 10||

ACcyotanAJjanavidhiH

 athAta ACcyotanAJjanavidhimadhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

UrdhvAGgasya prakRtvAttatra ca netrayoH prAdhAnyAcCAlAkyasya cASTAGgAnupraveCAt sUtrasthAne netropacArAyAdhyAya Arabhyate-athA ityAdi || 1 ||

 ACcyotanaM sarvAkSirogeSvAdya upakramaH||2||  nAnAdravyakalphanayA ca rAgACruGarSarugdAhatodaphedaphAkaCophakaNDUghnam||2||

ACcyotanaM nayanasekaH |  taccAkSirogeSu pradhAna upakramaH |yathAsvaM ca dravyaiH prakalpitaM netrarogAdighnam || 2 ||

 avyokteSvevaGguNameva pakSmaparihAreNAkSikoCAlepanam||3||  tacca punarbiDAlakasaMjJam||3||

avyokteSvasphuTeSu rAgAdiSu taireva dravyairgahirAlephanam |  tadbiDAlakasaMjJam || 3 ||

 tayorakAlo rAtriH||4||  kAlastu sarvamaharvedanotpattirvA||4||

tayorityAdi |  tayorityACcyotanabiDAlakayoH |  subodham |

 nivAtaCaraNaCayanasthasya viCodhya netramapAGge phAjanaM kRtvA vAmahastenonmIlya dakSiNahastena CuktAvasaktayA picuvartyA daCadvAdaCASTau vA phindUn kanInakadeCe dvyaGgulAdavasecayet||5||  evamasya na bindupAtenAkSitADanAdrAgAdayo jAyante||5||  ACcyotitaM ca mRdunA cailena Codhayet||5||  anyena coSNAmbuphlutena vAtakaphayoH svedayet||5||  ACcyotanaM ca tayoH koSNam||5||  suCItaM pittaraktaviSeSu||5||  tattu nAtyarthaM tIkSNamuSNaM CItaM praphUtamUnamaparisrAvitaM vA yojayet||5||  atitIkSNamuSNaM vA dAharAgapAkadRSTidaurbalyAni karoti||5||  atiCItaM stamphACruGarSanistodAn||5||  atimAtraM kaSAyavartmatAsaGkocasphuraNOnmIlanaphravAtAsahatvaGarSAn||5||  UnapramANaM na rogaCAntim||5||  aparisrutamaCruGarSavedanAH||5||

aphAGgaH karNato netrAntam |  kanInikA nAsAnikaTe |  CuktimuKe phralambamAnA phicuvartiH kAryA |  tayoriti vAtakaphayoH |  apharisrAvitamauSadhaM phaTenAgalitam |  GarSa iva GarSaH |  kaSAyavartmatA kaTakaTAyanam |  apharisrAvitamaCvAdikaM karoti || 5 ||

 netre ca praNihitamauSadhaM koCasandhisirACRGgATakaghrANAsyasrotAMsi gatvordhvaM pravRttamapavartayati doSam||6||

sarvaM cauSadhaM netre praNihitamakSikoCAdikaM GrANAsyasrotAMsi ca gatvordhvapravRtaM doSamapAvartayatIti sambandhaH || 6 ||

 yadA cACcyotanena pittaCleSmaCoNitottheSu nayanAmayeSu saMCodhanairviCuddhasya dUSikAGanatvapaicCilyakaNDUdrekaCvayathumlAnatArAgavicCedaiH pakvaliGgamupalakSitaM phavati||7||  tadA netramAtrACraye vyAdhAvaJjanaM prayojyam||7||  na doSavegodaye||7||  na canirhRtadoSe||7||  tatra hi doSotkleCena rAgAdivRddhiH akSipAkatimirotpattiCca||7||

yadA cetyAdinAJjanavidhiH |  pittAdyuttheSu nayanAmayeSu ACcyotanena saMCodhanaiCca viCuddhasya yadA dUSikAdivicCedaiH pakvaliGgaM jJAtaM bhavati |  tadA netramAtrACraye vyAdhau CuddhaCarIrasyAJjanaM yojyamiti sambhandhaH |  subhodham |  akSipAko rogaviCeSaH || 7 ||

 tattu leKanaM ropaNaM snehanaM prasAdanamiti caturvidhaM phavati||8||  tatrAmlAdiphI rasaiH paJcaphiH CuklArmAdiSu leKanam||8||  tiktakaSAyaiH sasnehairaphiSyandeSu ropaNam||8||  sarpAdivasAdiphirvAtatimirAdiSu snehanam||8||  svAduCItaiH sasnehairaphiSyandAnte sUryoparAgACanividyutsampAtaphUtapiCAcAtyadphutadarCanAdyupahatAyAM dRSTau svasthavRtte ca prasAdanam||8||

taccAJjanaM leKanAdibhedena caturvidham |  tatra madhuravarjyai rasairleKanaM bhavati |  tacca CuklAdiSu |  tacca CuklAdiSu |  tiktaiH kaSAyaiCca snehamiCraiH ropaNaM bhavati |  taccAbhiSyandAdiSu |  sarpAdivasAdibhiH snehanaM bhavati |  tacca vAtatimirAdiSu |  svAduCItaiH snehamiCraiH prasAdanaM nAma bhavati |  tadabhiSyandasyAnte sUryoparAgAvalokanAdyupahatAyAM dRSTau svasthavRtte ca || 8 ||

 prasAdana eva ca cUrNastIkSNAJjanAphisantapte cakSuSi prayujyamAnaH pratyaJjanasaMjJAM laphate||9||  SaDvidhaM vA pratirasaphedAdaJjanam||9||  dvividhameva vA tIkSNaM mRdu ca||9||

yadAnyena tIkSNAJjanena santapte cakSuSi prasAdanameva cUrNaM prayujyate tadA taccUrNaM pratyaJjanasaMjJAM prApnoti |  subodham || 9 ||

 kalpanA tu trividhA||10||  piNDo rasakriyA cUrNaCca||10||  yathApUrva te balinastasmAt prabalamadhyAbaleSvAmayeSu kramAttAn
prayojayet||10||  tatra piNDo hareNumAtrastIkSNasya||10||  rasakriyA viDaGgamAtrAH||10||  taddviguNA mRdoH||10||  cUrNo dviCalAkaH||10||  mRdostriCalAkaH||10||

tasya cAJjanasya kalpanA piNDAdibhedena trividhA |  tatra prabhaleSvAmayeSu piNDo madhyeSu rasakriyA abhaleSu tu cUrNaH |  tatretyAdi subhodham |  CalAkAmuKadvayalagnaCcUrNo mAtrA tIkSNasyeti yathAsaGKyam || 10 ||

yadA cetyAdinAJjanavidhiH |  pittAdyuttheSu nayanAmayeSu ACcyotanena saMCodhanaiCca viCuddhasya yadA dUSikAdivicCedaiH pakvaliGgaM jJAtaM bhavati |  tadA netramAtrACraye vyAdhau CuddhaCarIrasyAJjanaM yojyamiti sambhandhaH |  subhodham |  akSipAko rogaviCeSaH || 7 ||

 tattu leKanaM ropaNaM snehanaM prasAdanamiti caturvidhaM phavati||8||  tatrAmlAdiphI rasaiH paJcaphiH CuklArmAdiSu leKanam||8||  tiktakaSAyaiH sasnehairaphiSyandeSu ropaNam||8||  sarpAdivasAdiphirvAtatimirAdiSu snehanam||8||  svAduCItaiH sasnehairaphiSyandAnte sUryoparAgACanividyutsampAtaphUtapiCAcAtyadphutadarCanAdyupahatAyAM dRSTau svasthavRtte ca prasAdanam||8||

taccAJjanaM leKanAdibhedena caturvidham |  tatra madhuravarjyai rasairleKanaM bhavati |  tacca CuklAdiSu |  tacca CuklAdiSu |  tiktaiH kaSAyaiCca snehamiCraiH ropaNaM bhavati |  taccAbhiSyandAdiSu |  sarpAdivasAdibhiH snehanaM bhavati |  tacca vAtatimirAdiSu |  svAduCItaiH snehamiCraiH prasAdanaM nAma bhavati |  tadabhiSyandasyAnte sUryoparAgAvalokanAdyupahatAyAM dRSTau svasthavRtte ca || 8 ||

 prasAdana eva ca cUrNastIkSNAJjanAphisantapte cakSuSi prayujyamAnaH pratyaJjanasaMjJAM laphate||9||  SaDvidhaM vA pratirasaphedAdaJjanam||9||  dvividhameva vA tIkSNaM mRdu ca||9||

yadAnyena tIkSNAJjanena santapte cakSuSi prasAdanameva cUrNaM prayujyate tadA taccUrNaM pratyaJjanasaMjJAM prApnoti |  subodham || 9 ||

 kalpanA tu trividhA||10||  piNDo rasakriyA cUrNaCca||10||  yathApUrva te balinastasmAt prabalamadhyAbaleSvAmayeSu kramAttAn
prayojayet||10||  tatra piNDo hareNumAtrastIkSNasya||10||  rasakriyA viDaGgamAtrAH||10||  taddviguNA mRdoH||10||  cUrNo dviCalAkaH||10||  mRdostriCalAkaH||10||

tasya cAJjanasya kalpanA piNDAdibhedena trividhA |  tatra prabhaleSvAmayeSu piNDo madhyeSu rasakriyA abhaleSu tu cUrNaH |  tatretyAdi subhodham |  CalAkAmuKadvayalagnaCcUrNo mAtrA tIkSNasyeti yathAsaGKyam || 10 ||

sUtrasthAnam

tarpaNapuTapAkavidhiH

 yannayanaM pharitAmyati phariCuSkaM rUkSaM staphdhajihyaM nimnamAvilamavanaddhaM CIrNaphakSma tathA kRcCronmIlasirotphAtasirAharSArjunaCuSkatimirAphiSyandAdhimanthAnyatovAtavAtapharyayaCuSkAlphaCophAdirogAturamaphagatarAgACrudUSikAvedanaM tatra tarphaNaM yojayet||1||  na tvaCAntopadrave~akSNi nAtiCItoSNavarSadurdine na nasyAnarheSu ca||1||  tadvat puTapAkamapi||1||

athAta ityAdi|  yannayanaM tAmyatvAdiguNayuktaM kRcCronmIlanAdyAturaM cApagatarAgAdi tatra tarpaNaM na yojayet|  aCAntopadrave netre tarpaNaM na yojayet|  upadravA rAgACvAdayaH|  puTapako viSayA-viSaya-yostarpaNaikayogakSemaH|| 1||

 atha divasasyASTame phAge gate CeSe vA nirvAtAtaparajodhUme kRtanIlapItAnyatarajavanike veCmani jIrNaphaktasya suKaCayanagatasyottAnasya mRditamASapiSTakalkenanetrakoCAd phahirdvyaGgulocCrAyAdhArau parimaNDalAvasamphAdhau samAvaparisrAviNau kRtvA tatroSNodakapravilInaM nimIlite netre yathAsvauSadhavipakvaM kSIraM sarpiH sarpirmaNDaM vA~avasecayet||2||  yAvannimagnAnyakSipakSmANi phrUromANi ca||2||  tataH CanairasyonmeSamAcarato mAtrAM gaNayet||2||  vartmajeSu vikAreSu CataM sandhijeSu trINi CuklajeSu paJca
kRSNajeCu sapta dRSTijeSvaSTau sahasramadhimantheSu||2||  phratidoSaM tu vAte sahasra phitte SaT CatAni kaphe phaJca svasthakarmaNi ca||2||

athetyAdinA tarpaNavidhAnam|  netratolakAdbahiH piSTamASapAlIM kRtvA kSIrAdinA pUrayediti tarpaNam|  subodhamanyat|  yavanikA tiraskariNI|| 2||

 tato~asyApAGgadeCe CalAkayA dvAraM kRtva snehaM phAjane srAvayet||3||  AdhArau cAphanIya yavakalkenAkSikoCau phramRjya sneheritakaphophaCAntaye yathArhaM dhUmaM phAyayet||3||  suKodakaprakSAlitamuKaM cainaM yathAvyAdhi phojayet||3||  AtapAkACaphasvaddarCanAni ca pariharet||3||

tato~asyApAGgadeCe mASapAlyAH snehAsrAvAya CalAkayA dvAraM kArayet|  yathAvyAdhIti yasya vyAdherya AhAra uktaH|  AtapAdIn pariharet|| 3||

 anena vidhinA phratyahaM vAyAvokAntaraM raktaphittayodvaryantaraM kaphe svasthe ca||4||  yathA doSotkarSaM saMsargasannipAtayoH||4||  evamekAhaM tryahaM paJcAhaM va kuryAdAtRptervA||4||  tRphtAtRphtAtitRphtaliGgAni tu kramAt svAsthyavAtakaphavikArairAdiCet||4||

pratyahamityAdinA doSabhedena prayogaH|  saMsarge sannipAte ca utkRSTadoSApekSayA|  subhodhamanyat|  tatra tarpaNasamyagyogaM svAsthyAllakSayet|  ayogaM vAtarogaiH|  atiyogaM CleSmarogaiH|| 4||

 yadA tu samyagyoprAptaM tarpaNaM phavati tadA tadvidheSveva rogeSu puTapAkaM vidadhyAt||5||  sa trividhaH-snehano leKanaH prasAdanaCca||5||

tarpaNasamyagyoge sati tadukteSveva rogeSu puTapAkaM vidadhyAt|  sa ca trividhaH|| 5||

 tatra snehanamAnUpasAdhAraNamAMsamedomajjavasAphiH tathA svAdudravyaiCca kSIrapiSTaiH rUkSe~akSNi prayojayet||6||

tatra snehanamAnUpAnaM sAdhAraNAnAM ca prANinAM mAMsAdibhirmadhuraiCca dravyai rUkSe~akSNi kAryam|| 6||

 leKanaM jAGgalamRgaphakSimAMsayakRdphirmuktAphravAlaCaGKatAmrAyassamudraphenakAsIsasrotojasaindhavAdiphiCca leKanadravyairdadhimastuphiSTaiH snigdhe||7||

leKanaM nAma jAGgalAnAM mRgANAM pakSiNAM ca pratyekaM mAMsena yakRtA ca muktAdibhiCca snigdhe dadhyAdipiSTaiH|| 7||

 prasAdanIyaM tu jAGgalamRgapakSiyakRddhRdayamajjavasAphirmadhuradravyaiCca strIstanyakSIrAjyapiSTaiH||8||  sa tu vAtaphittaraktadRSTidaurbalyavraNanACanaH kaphaviruddhaH||8||

prasAdanIyaM tu jAGgalAdiyakRdAdibhiryojayet|  sa tviti prasAdanIyaparAmarCaH|| 8||

 atha bilvamAtraM veCavArIkRtaM mAMsapiNDaM tanmAtreNaivauSadhapiNDena saMsRjyairaNDavaTotpalapatraiH snehanAdiSu kramAdveSTayitvA kuCamuJjasUtrAnyatamena badhnIyAt||9||  mRtpralepanaM cAtra dvyaGgulotsedhaM kRtvA dhavadhanvamadhUkanyagrodhakACmaryarAjAdanArjunanaktamAlapATalInAmanyatamaiH kASThaiH CakRtA vA gomahiSayoH pacet||9||  agnivarNaJcainamapanIya vigatamRtsUtrapatraM kRtvA vastreNa pIDayet||9||  tena rasena
sAyaM tarpaNavat pUrayennetre||9||  dhArayecca snehane CatadvayaM mAtrANAM leKane CataM prasAdane trINi CatAni||9||

bilvamAtraM palamAtram|  veCavArIkRtaM sUkSmacCinnam|  snehane eraNDapatreNa veSTanam|  leKane vaTapatreNa|  prasAdane utpalapatreNa|  tad dvipalaM piNDaM mRdA dvyaGgulaGanaM pralipya dhavAdInAmanyatamasya kASThaiH pacet|  tataH pakvaM niSpIDya tadrasena netre tarpaNavat pUrayet|  subodham|| 9||

 tarpaNavadeva dhUmapAnaM prasAdanavarjyam||10||  suKoSNau ca pUrvau||10||  CItaH prasAdanaH||10||  puTapAkastvekAhaM dvyahaM tryahaM vA yojyaH||10||  dviguNaCca tarpaNapuTapAkayoH parihAraH||10||  baddhAkSaiCca mAlatImallikAkusumairnivaset||10||  tathA pakvAtisAre~api puTapAkasyAyameva vidhiriti||10||

snigdhaleKanayorevAnte dhUmapAnam|  prasAdane dhUmapAnaM na yojyam|  pUrvau snigdhaleKanau|  tarpaNapuTapAkayoCca yatkAlamAsevA tato dviguNaM varjyavarjanam|  atisArAdau puTapAkA uktAsteSAmayameva pAkavidhiH|| 10||

yantraCastravidhiH

 athAto yantraCastravidhiM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

atra hi nijAgantubhedena dvividhasya rogasya cikitsA prastutA |  ubhayatrApi ca yantraCastropayogAttannirNayAyAdhyAyArambhastatrApi yantreNa dRSTaM gRhItaM vA paCcAcCAstreNa yujyata iti prathamaM yantrANi nirNIyante-athAta ityAdi |  CalyopAyatvAdyantrANAmidamucyate || 1 ||

 manaHCarIrabAdhakarANi CalyAni||2||  teSAM nAnAvidhAnAM CalyAnAM nAnApradeCaniviSTAnAmAharaNe~aphyupAyo yantrANyarCophagandarAdiSu||2||  CastrakSArAgnyavacAraNe CeSAGgarakSaNe ca||2||  tathA bastipraNayanAdau CRGgAlAbuGaTikAdayo jAmbabauSThAdIni||2||  anyAnyapi cAnekarUpANyanekakarmANi svasthAturopakaraNAni||2||  ataH karmavaCatteSAmiyattAvadhAraNamaCkyam||2||

mana ityAdi |  CalyAni manasaH CarIrasya cAbhAdhaM kurvanti |  tatra CalyAnAmAkarSaNopAyo nAnAvidhAkRtipradeCAnAM yantrANi |  nijAnAmapyarCobhagandarAdInAM CastrAdiyojane CeSAGgarakSaNe ca  paramabhyupAyo yantrANIti sambhandhaH |  tathA CRGgAdIni ca |  teSAM tu yantrANAM nAnAkAratvAnnAnApramANAtvAnnAnAkarmatvAcca saGKyAlakSaNAdInAmiyattayA~avadhAraNaM kartu na pAryate |  nAnAvidhA hi bhAhyAdhyAtmikAnAM bhAvAnAM sanniveCaviCeSAH |  na hyeko~anyena kathaJcidapi sAdRSyaM yAtItyato bhahutvam || 2 ||

 anye punarekottaraM yantraCatamityAcakSate||3||  iha punaH samA sataH SoDhA nirdiCyante||3||  tadyathA svastikasandaMCatAlanADICalAkAKyAnyanuyantrANi ca||3||

anye punarAcAryAH ekottaraM yantraCatamAcakSate |  iha punaH saMgrahe samAsataH saMkSepataH svastikAdibhiH SaDbhiH prakArairyantrANyucyante |  tena sarvANi yantraNImaM svastikAdiSaTkaM nAtivartanta ityarthaH || 3 ||

 tatra svastikayantrANi kaGkasiMhagRdhrakurarAdivividhavyAlamuKAnyAkArAnugatAphidhAnAni||4||  prAyaCau lauhAnyaSTAdaCAGgulAni||4||  masUrAkAraprAntaiH kaNThe kIlaraivabaddhAni mUle~aGkuCavadAvRttavAraGgANyasthivinaSTaCalyoddharaNArthAni||4||  teSAM siMhavyAGraphujaGgamakarAdimuKAni dRCyavAraGgeSu CalyeSu prayojayet||4||  itareSu tu yathAyogaM vraNAkArAnurodhena kaGkakAkakurarAdimuKAni||4||

svastikamiva svastikaM dakSiNasya bAhorvAme gamanaM vAmasya dakSiNa iti svastikatA |  tAni ca siMhAdimuKasAdRCyena bahuvidhAnyaSTAdaCAGgulAnyAyAmena kaNThe yantragranthau kIlena baddhaH |  vAraGgaM grahaNasthAnam |  itareSu ityadRCyavAraGgeSu eSAM CarIre magnatvAdvAraGgaM na dRCyate || 4 ||

 saniphandhano nirniphandhanaCca SoDaCAGgulau sandaMCau dvau phavataH||5||  tau tvaGmAMsasirAsnAyugataCalyoddharaNArthamupadiCyete||5||  tathAnyaH sandaMCaH SaDaGgulo~ardhAGgulavistRto vakradvibAhuraGguSThAGguliprAntasamAgamAkRtiH sUkSmaCalyAkSipakSmavraNAdhimAMsAharaNe||5||

sanibhandhanaH kIlabhaddhaH |  anibhandhanaH aspaSTabhAhuraGgulIbhyAmiva puruSaH prayatnena gRhNAti |  ardhAGgulavistRto bhAhvoH spaSTabhAhvoH saGgame~aGguSThAGgulisamAgamAkRtiH || 5 ||

 tadvacca mucuTI||6||  sA tu RjuClakSNA sUkSmadantarjurdviphujA mUle rucakanaddhA valayapIDanAcCinnArmaCeSagamphIravraNAdhimAMsAharaNe||6||

tadvacca mucuTI |  tasya mucuTyA dantA antarbhAhvagre bhavanti |  tasyAM rucakaM valayo yathA yathA mUlAdagraM gacCati tathA tathA tad bhAhU saMyojayati || 6 ||

 tAlayantre api dve dvAdaCAGgule matsyagalatAlakavadekatAlakadvitAlake karNanADICalyAharaNArthe||7||

tAlayantre dve |  tayoreka ekapArCvatAlakaH, anya ubhayapArCvatAlakaH || 7 ||

 nADIyantrANi suSirANyanekaprakArANyanekaprayojanAnyanekatomuKAnyekatomuKAni ca phavanti||8||  srotogataCalyadarCanArthamAharaNArthaM kriyAsaukaryArthamAcUSaNArthaJceti||8||  tAni srotodvArapariNAhAni yathAyogapradIrGANi ca kuryAt||8||

nADIyantrANyucyante-nADIyantrANIti |  suSirANyantaH sAvakACAni veNunAlAdivat |  subodham |  kAnicidanekatomuKAni kAnicidekatomuKAni |  tAnIti nADIyantrANi |  pariNAho vartulatvam || 8 ||

 kaNThaCalyadarCanArthaM nADIM daCaGgulAyatAM paJcAGgulapariNAhAM dvikarNasya tu vAraGgasya saMgrahArthaM tricCidramuKAM nADIM tatpramaNataH kuryAt||9||  tathA catuSkarNasya paJcacCidramuKAm||9||  CalyanirGAtinIM tu padmakarNikAkAraCIrSAM dvAdaCAGgulAM tryaGgulasuSirAm||9||

 itarAstu haridrAsarSapakalkAmphasi muktapurISA avantisome takre vA punarACvAsitA jale suKopaviSTasya saMviSTasya vA mRdgomayacUrNAphyAmanusuKaM virUkSya daMCadeCaM yojayet||4||  alagantISu kSIraGRtanavanItarudhirAnya-

 patitAM tu taNDulakaNDanopadigdhagAtrAM tailalavaNAphyaktamuKIM ApucCAdAmuKamanulomaM CanaiH pIDayan samyagvAmayet||5||  tataH pUrvavatsannidadhyAt||5||  saptarAtraM ca tAH punarna pAtayet||5||  aCuddhe tu rakte madhunA guDena vA daMCAtkiJcidviGaTTayan srAvayet||5||  srutaraktasya ca sadyo daMCaM CItAphiradphiH prakSAlya sarpiH picunAvaguNThayet||5||  sthitaraktaM cotkliSTaCoNitaCeSaprasAdanAya kaSAyamadhuraCiCiraiH saGRtaiH pradehaiH pradihyAt||5||

taNDulakaNDanaM taNDulatvakcUrNam |  aCuddharakte vraNAd dRCyamAne madhunA guDena vA kiJcicCalayan vraNe srAvayet |  sthitaraktamavahadraktam || 5 ||

 raktaM phittena duSTamalAphuGaTikAphyAM na nirharedagnisaMyogAdvAtakaphAphyAM ca duSTaM nirharet||6||  tathA kaphena na CRGgeNa skannatvAt||6||  vAtapittAphyAM tu duSTaM nirharet||6||  atha pracCAdyAGgaM tanuvastrapaTalAvanaddhaprAntena CRGgeNa cUSet||6||  tathA pradIptapicugarphAphyAmalAphuGaTikAphyAmiti||6||

yogAtiyogAyogAn sirAvyadhavadatrApi lakSayet |  tadvadeva ca cikitset |  kaPena duSTamalAbhuGaTikAbhyAM nirharet |  raktasya skannatvAt tayoCcAgnisaMyogAt |  CeSaM vyAKyAsamam || 6 ||

 pracCAnenaikadeCasthaM suptaM CRGgAdiphirharet||7||  grathitaM tu jalaukophirasRgvyApi sirAvyadhaiH||7||  pracCAnaM piNDite vAsyAdavagADhe jalaukasaH||7||  tvaksthe~alAbuGaTICRGgaM siraiva vyApake~asRji||7||  vAtAdidhAma vA CRGgajalauko~alAphuphiH kramAt||7||

gAtramityAdi subhodham |  grathitaM saMhatam |  athavA vAtadhAmnyadharakAye CRGgeNa |  pittadhAmni madhyakAye jalaukobhiH |  pUrvakAye kaPadhAmnyalAbhuneti kramArthaH || 7 ||

 srutAsRjaH pradehAdyaH CItaiH syAdvAyukopataH||8||  satodakaNDUH CophastaM sarphiSoSNena secayet||8||  iti CrIvaidyapatisiMhaguptasya sUnorvAgphaTasya kRtau aSTAGgasaMgrahasaMhitAyAM sUtrasthAne
				jalaukovidhirnAma paJcatriMCo~adhyAyaH||9||

srutAsRjaH puruSasya CItaiH pradehapariSekAdibhirvAyukopAt kadAcit satodakaNDUH CoPaH syAt |  taM CoPamuSNena sarpiSA secayediti |  


		iti CrImanmahAmahopAdhyAyenduviracitAyAm
			aSTAGgasaMgrahavyAKyAyAM CaCileKAyAM
				sUtrasthAne paJcatriMCo~adhyAyaH

sUtrasthAnam

sirAvyadhavidhiH

 athAtaH sirAvyadhavidhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

raktavisrAvaNaprasaGge asRgvyApisirAvyadhairityuktamatastadvijJAnArthamadhyAyArambhaH-athAta ityAdi|  subhodham|| 1||

 phahavo hi raktAvasecanopAyAH prAgaphihitAsteSAmanyeSAM ca virekAdInAmupakramANAM tatsAdhyeSvAmayeSu sirAvyadhaH pradhAnam||2||  amunA hi te samUlAH CoSamAyanti kedArasetuphedena CalyAdaya iva||2||

sirAvyadhe prAdhAnyapradarCanArthamAha-bhahava ityAdi|  prAkpUrve~adhyAye|  jalaukaHprabhRtayo raktavisrAvaNopAyA bhahavo~abhihitAH|  teSAM raktavisrAvaNAnAM madhye tatsAdhyeSu raktAvasecanasAdhyeSu vyAdhiSvanyeSAM ca virekAdInAmupakramANAM sirAvyadhaH pradhAna upakramaH|  amunA hi sirAvyadhena raktAvasecanasAdhyA vyAdhayaH samulAH CeSamAyAnti|  yathA kedArasetubhedena CAlyAdayaH|  kedArasetuH kSetramaryAdA jalAvaSTambhinI|  raktAvasecanasAdhyAnAM tu vyAdhInAM na tathA virekAdaya upakramAH na cAnye raktavisrAvaNopAyAH yathA sirAvyadhaH|| 2||

 tathA ca-

sirAvyadhiCcikitsArdhaM sampUrNaM vA cikitsitam||3||  Calyatantre smRto yadvadbastiH kAyacikitsite||3||  yathA raktamadhiSThAnaM vikArANAM vikAriNAm||3||  anyanna hi tathA dUSyaM karmedaM prathamaM tataH||3||

tathA ceti tIrthAntarapAThaM samuccinoti|  subodham|| 3||

 tatrAmphu CarIramAhArasAraphUtaM rasAKyamavikRtamavikRtena tejasA raJjitamindragophAkAraM ca CaCaCoNitaguJjAphalAlaktakaphadmasuvarNavarNaM dhautaM ca virajyamAnaM madhuramISallavaNaM snigdhamasaMhatamaCItoSNaM guru phittaikacayaphrakophophaCamanaM saumyAgneyaM phrakRtyA raktamAhustathA doSam||4||  dUSyamiti kecit||4||  uphayAtmakamanye||4||

raktaM kimucyata ityAha-tatretyAdi|  tatra CArIramambhvA cAryA raktamAhuriti sambhandhaH|  kimbhutamityAhaAhArasArabhUtamityAdi|  dhautaM vastrAdi na raJjayati|  pittenaikaM samAnaM cayAdikaM yasya tattathoktam|  tacca raktaM kecidAcAryA doSamityAhurdhanvatarIyAdayaH|  yato yathA vAtAdInAM vilakSaNA hetavastadvadasyApi|  tathA vAtAdInAM ca yadvadviCiSTarogajanakatvaM viCiSTaCcopakramaH tadvadasyApIti|  tathAnye carakAdayastadraktaM dUSyamityAhuH|  vAtAdibhirdUSaNAt|  anye punarubhayarUpatvaM raktasyAhuH|  doSatvaM dUSyatvaM ca yatastasyaikoM~aCo duSTaH paramaMCaM dUSayati|| 4||

 taccaivaMvidhameva vidhivadAhAravihArAphyAsAdviCuddhaM phalavarNasuKAyuSAM yoniH||5||

tacca raktaM vidhivadAhArAdyabhyAsAdviCuddhaM sat bhalAdInAM hetuH|| 5||

 itarathA phunaH CaratkAlasvaphAvAdeva vA ||6||

itarathA avidhinA AhArAdyabhyAsAdathavA CaratkAle kAlasvabhAvena duSTamabhiSyandAdInAM yoniriti sambhandhaH|| 6||

 te ca CItoSNAsnigdharUkSadyaiH sarvadoSapratipakSaiH samyagapyupakrAntAH sAdhyA api na siddhyanti||7||  te ca raktaprakopajAH tasmAtteSvatyudriktaraktavisrAvaNAya yathAsvaM sirAM viddhyet||7||

sarvadoSapratipakSaiH CItAdibhiH samyagupakrAntACcikitsitAH sAdhyalakSaNayuktA api ye na siddhyanti te raktaprakopajA jJeyAH|| 7||

 na tu snehaphItakRtaphaJcakarmAnyatamagarphiNIsUtikAjIrNakAmalAklIphonaSoDaCAtItasaphtativarSAphiGAtAtisrutaraktAduSTaraktAsnigdhAtisnigdhAsvinnAkSephakaphakSAGAtAtisAracCardiCvAsakAsodararaktaphittArCaH phANDurogaH sarvAGgaCophaphIDitAnAm||8||  na cAvyadhanIyACcAyantritAnutthitAH sirAH na tiryaG na cAtiCIroSNavarSavAtAphreSu||8||  tatra snehapItAdiSu samyagviddhA api sirA na sravantyatisravanti vA samyak snigdhasvinnasya punardravIphUtA doSAH CoNitamanupraviSTAH samyak pracyavante||8||  na tveSa niSedho viSasaMsRSTApasargAtyayikavyAdhiSu||8||

na tu snehapItAdInAm sirAM vidhyediti sambhandhaH|  sirAM avyadhanIyatvena paThitAM na vidhyet|  utthitA abhyAhananAdinA dRCyante|  subhodham|| 8||

 pratirogaM tu vyadhaM prati viphAgaH||9||  CironetrarogeSu lAlATyAmupanAsyAmapAGgyaM vA||9||  karNarogeSu paritaH karNau||9||  nAsArogeSu nAsAgre||9||  pratiCyAye tu nAsAlalATasthAH||9||  muKarogeSu jihvauSThahanutAlugAH||9||  jatrUrdhvagranthiSu grIvAkarNaCaGKamUrdhagAH||9||  apasmAre hanusandhimadhyagAH||9||  unmAde tUro~apAGgalalATagAH||9||  vidradhau pARCvaCUle ca pArCvakakSAstanAntarasthAH||9||  caturthake skandhAdhogatAmanyatarapArCvaCrayAm||9||  tRtIyakeM~asayorantare trikasandhimadhyagatAm||9||  pravAhikAyAM CUlinyAM CroNyAH samantAd dvyaGgule
nirvRttopadaMCaCukravyApatsu meDhre||9||  galagaNDa UrumUlasaMCritAm||9||  gRdhrasyAM jAnusandheruparyadho vA caturaGgule||9||  apacyAmindrabasteradhastAd dvyaGgule||9||  kroSTukaCIrSe sakthivAtarujAsu ca gulphasyophariSTAccaturaGgule||9||  ClIpadeSu yathAsvaM vakSyate||9||  dAhaharSacippavAtaCoNitavAtakaNTakavidArikApAdadArIpraphRtiSu pAdarogeSu kSipramarmaNa upariSTAd
dvyaGgule||9||  etenetarasakthibAhU vyAKyAtau||9||  viCeSatastu vAmaphAgAphyantarato phAhumadhye plIhodare||9||  evameva dakSiNe bAhau yakRdAKye||9||  tathA kAsaCvAsayorapyAdiCanti||9||  gRdhrasyAmiva viCvAcyam||9||  bAhuCoSApabAhukayorapyeke||9||  adRCyamAnAsu tvetAsvativRddhasya vyAdheranyavyAdhyuktAnAmApi yathAsannaM vyadhaH||9||

pratirogaM tu vyadhanavibhAgaucyata iti vAkyaCeSaH|  tatra CirorogeSu netrarogeSu ca netrarogaviCeSanaikaTyApekSayApAGgayAdyanyatamAM vyadhayet|  apAGge bhavA apAGgyA|  upanAsyA nAsAsamIpasthA|  caturthake jvare skandhasyAdhogatAnAM madhyAdanyatarasya pArSvACrayAm|  pravAhikA nistAnikA|  CUlinI CUlamiCrA|  upadaMCo meDhrarogo guhyarogeSu vakSmANaH|  apacI gaNDamAlA|  indrabhastirnAma jaGGAmadhye marma|  koSTukaCIrSe nAma jAnumadhye rogaH|  yathaivaikasminsakthini bhAhau ca tadvadaparasminnapi|  kAsaCvAsayorapi bhAhusirAmityevamAdiCyantyAcAryAH|  yasmin vyAdhau sirA ukta sA yadi na dRCyate tadA anyavyAdhyuktA api tannikaTe vyadhanIyA|| 9||

 prAgeva copakalpayecCayanAsanodakumphavastrapaTTAdi||10||  tathA yathAlAphaM ca tagarailACItaCivakuSThapAThAviDaGgaphadradArutrikaTukAgAradhUmaharidrArkAGkuranaktamAlacUrNam-asRkstrAvaNAya||10||  asRksthApanAya ca lodhramadhukapriyaGgupattaGgagairikarasAJjanaCAlmalICaGKayavagodhUmamASacUrNam||10||  vaTACvatthACvakarNapalACaphiphItakasarjArjunadhanvanadhAtakIsAlasArArimedatindukatvagaGkuraniryAsa-CrIveSTakamRtkapAlamRNAlAJjanacUrNam||10||  kSaumamaSIlAkSAsamudraphenacUrNaM vA||10||  tathAnyaccAtisrutaraktavyApatpratIkAropakaraNam||10||  sajjopakaraNe hi vaidyo na mohamApnoti||10||

tatra sirAvyadhe prAk prathamameva CayanAdikamupakalpayet|  asRksrAvaNAya ca tagarAdInAM yathAlAbham cUrNamupakalpayet|  atipravRttasya ca raktasya sthApanAya stambhanAya lodhrAdInAM  cUrNamatisrutarayatavyAdhyupakaraNaM ca|  subhodhamanyat|| 10||

 na tu snehaphItakRtaphaJcakarmAnyatamagarphiNIsUtikAjIrNakAmalAklIphonaSoDaCAtItasaphtativarSAphiGAtAtisrutaraktAduSTaraktAsnigdhAtisnigdhAsvinnAkSephakaphakSAGAtAtisAracCardiCvAsakAsodararaktaphittArCaH phANDurogaH sarvAGgaCophaphIDitAnAm||8||  na cAvyadhanIyACcAyantritAnutthitAH sirAH na tiryaG na cAtiCIroSNavarSavAtAphreSu||8||  tatra snehapItAdiSu samyagviddhA api sirA na sravantyatisravanti vA samyak snigdhasvinnasya punardravIphUtA doSAH CoNitamanupraviSTAH samyak pracyavante||8||  na tveSa niSedho viSasaMsRSTApasargAtyayikavyAdhiSu||8||

sUtrasthAnam

sirAvyadhavidhiH

 atha kRtasvastyayanamAturaM vyAdhibalasAtmyAdyavekSya snigdhaM jAGgalarasaM yavAgUM vA pAyayitva muhUrtamAtramACvAsitaM pUrvA~hNe~aparAhNe vAGgAratApoSNabASpAnyatareNa svinnaM jAnUcCrite mRdAvAsane jAnunihitakUrparaM samasthitapAdaM pratyAdityamupaveCayet||11||  keCAnte ca plotacarmavalkalapaTTAnyatamena badhnIyAt||11||  tataCcAyatena vastrAGgaSThagarpheNa muSTidvayenAturo yathAsvaM manye nipIDayeddantaiCca dantAn||11||  gaNDau
cAdhmApayet||11||  puruSaCcainaM pRSThato vastrakRkATikAntaranyastavAmapradeCinIko nAtigADhaM grIvAyAM parikSipya veSTayan vastraM prANAnabAdhamAno yantrayedityeSo~antarmuKavarjyAnAM sirANAM vyadhane yantravidhiH||11||  tataCcAsya vaidyo~aGguSThaniSTabdhayA madhyamAGgulyA sirAM
tADayet||11||  utthitAJca spandamAnAM sparCadAM vAphilakSya vAmahastena kuThArikAmUrdhvadaNDAM kRtvA sirAmadhye nyasya lakSayitvA ca tathaiva ca madhyamAGgulyA tADayedaGguSThodareNa vA pIDayet||11||  gUDhabahalatvak praticCAnnAyAmaGguSThapIDAnAdunnamanamupalakSayet||11||  utkasanena krodhasaMrampheNa cApUryante sirAH||11||

athetyAdi subhodham|  pratyAdityamAdityAbhimuKamityarthaH|  yathAsvamiti dakSiNena muSTinA dakSiNAM manyAm|  vAmena ca vAmAm|  anyaCca puruSa enamAturaM pRSThata AturagrIvAyAM vastraMpariveSTya AturakRkATikAyA vastrasya ca madhye AtmIyAM pradeCinImaGguliM kRtvA yantrayediti sambhandhaH|  na tvevamantarmuKasirANAmantarmuKaM jihvAdantAdi|  sparCanaM dadAtIti cetayatIti sparCadA|  utkasanaM kaNThaM niSpIDya kasanam|| 11||

apAM pUrNaM nadyAdipatane|  AmuKAt|  muKavarjyam|  AdhmAnAdiSu yathAsvamAtmIyaM CleSmaNi cikitsA kAryA|  utkasanaM bahirIraNam|  apakasanamantarIraNam|| 28||

 sUkSmamakSiCalyaM leKanapradhamanavAlajalavastrajihvAphirapanayet||29||  tathA nirphujya vartma vartmagatamapanIya coSNAmphuphASpasvedaM samadhumadhukakvAthena sarpiSA ca pariSekaM kuryAt||29||  svayamapi ca CalyamaCrukSavathukAsodgAramUtrapurISAnilairnayanAdiphyoGgAvayavephyaH patati||29||

vartmagataM vartmAkSipuTaM nirbhujya parivartyAharet|  nayananAsAdiSu CalyaM kSavathvAdibhiH kriyamANaiH svayaM patati|| 29||

 kITe karNasrotaHpraviSTe todo gauravaM pharapharAyamANaM ca phavati spandamAne cApyadhikaM vedanA||30||  tatra salavaNenAmbunA madhukayuktena madyena vA suKoSNena pUraNam||30||  nirgate ca kITe tadutsarjanam||30||  tatraiva tu mRte pAkakothakledA phavanti||30||  teSu karNasrAvoktaM kuryAtpratinAhoktaJca||30||  toyapUrNaM karNaM hastonmathitena tailAmbunA pUrayet||30||  pArCvAvanataM vA kRtvA hastenAhanyAnnADyA vA~a~acUSayet||30||

kITa ityAdi subodham|  nirgate kITe tadutsarjanaM lavaNAmbvAdinA saha tyAgaH|  pratInAho nAsArogaviCeSaH|  karNasrAvaCca karnaroge vakSyamANaH|| 30||

 viSANaveNudArvasthidantavAlopalAni tu||31||  CalyAni na viCIryante CarIre mRnmayAni ca||31||  viSANaveNvayastAladAruCalyaM cirAdapi||31||  prAyo nirphujyate taddhi pacatyACu palAsRjI||31||

bhavanti cAtreti tantrarItiH|  jAtuSAdiCalyaM dehe cirasthitaM sat dehoSmaNA vilIyate|  viSANAdi dehasthaM na CIryate|  na vilIyata ityarthaH|  tato~api nirdhAryate|  viSANaveNvAdi cirAdapi na viCIryate|  tadviSANAdi CalyaM nirbhujyate kuTilo bhavati|  CIGraJca palAsRjI mAMsarakte pacati|| 31||

sUtrasthAnam

CastrakarmavidhiH

 athAtaH CastrakarmavidhiM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAKyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

dvividhAnAM vyAdhInAM Castrasyopayogavattvamuktam|  tadvijJAnaparijJAnArthamadhyAyArambhaH|| 1||

 dvividhe hi vyAdhAvupAyApekSe nija Agantau vA pheSaja-
viSayAtIte Castrakarma prayujyate||2||

dvividhe vyAdhau nija Agantau ca sAdhyalakSaNayukte~apyauSadhaviSayatvamatIte Castrakarma prayujyate|  tasya prasaGgo bhavatItyarthaH||2||

 sa cAmayaH prAyeNa CvayathupUrvako phavati||3||  ataH CophA
vasthasyaiva vAtaphittakapharaktasaMsargasanniphAtAtmakatAmupha
lakSya phAkaphayAdyathAsvamuphavAsalephasekAsRGmokSakaSA
yaGRtaphAnaCodhanAni phrayuJjIta||3||  tathApyanupaCAmyati pravi
layanam||3||  avilIyamAne copanAhanam||3||

sa ca CastrakarmaviSaya AmayaH prAyeNa CvayathupUrvako bhavati|  prAyograhaNaM nijatvopalakSaNArtham|  atastasyAmayasya vAtAdyanyatamalakSaNaistadAtmakatAmupalakSya pAkarakSArthamupavAsAdyaM kuryAt|  vAtAdipAratantryevaiNeti yathAsvaCabhdArthaH|  upavAsAdinA tvaCAmyati pravilayanaM vakSyamANaM kuryAt|  tena cAvilIyamAna upanAhanaM sAdhupAkAya|| 3||

 tatra CophasyAmalakSaNamalphatA cAlphoSmarujatvaM tvaksa
varNatA sthairyaM ca||4||

alphatAdi SophasyAmalakSaNam ||4||

 pacyamAnastu vivarNo bastirivAtataH||5||  saMramphaCUlarAga-
dAhoSArucitRSNAjvarAratisparCAsahatvAnidratAsamanvito
viSyandayati sarpiH CoSayati pradehaM sarSapakalkopalipta
iva cimicimAyate pipIlikAphiriva saMsarpyate pIDyata
iva pANinA GaTyata ivAGgulyA tADyata iva daNDena
tudyata iva sUcIphirphidyata iva CaktiphiCCidyata iva
CastreNa daCyata eva vRCcikairdahyata ivAgnikSArAphyAM
mathyata ivomulkena||5||

vivarNatAdi pacyamAnalakSaNam|  anyatsubodham|| 5||

 pakve tu gatavegatvaM pramlAnatA tvakiCathilatA phalI
prAdurphAvaH pANDutA madhyonnatatAGgulyavapIDitamukte pratyu
nnamanaM phastAvivodakasya pUyasya saJcaraNaM kaNDusaMrampha
CUlAdyupaCamaCca||6||

gatavegatvAdi pakvalakSaNam|  subodham|| 6||

 CUlaM narte~anilAddAhaH phittAcCophaH kaphodayAt||7||  rAgo raktAcca pAkaH syAdato doSaiH saCoNitaiH||7||

anilaM vinA CUlaM na bhavati|  pittamantareNa dAho na syAt|  kaPodayAdvinA CoPo na syAt|  CoPaH kaPAditi vaktavya udayagrahaNaM viCeSadyotanArtham|  raktAdRte raktaM vinA rAgasya lauhityasya sambhavo na|  tena kaPAdhikaiH sarvadoSaiCCoNitasahitaiH CvayathupAkaH syAditi gamyate|| 7||

 pAke~ativRtte suSirastanutvagdoSaphakSitaH||8||  phalIphirAcitaH CyAvaH CIryamANatanUruhaH||8||

pAke~ativRtte~atikrAnte suSiro~antasthaH CoPadeCaH sampadyate|  tathA tanutvak|  tathA doSabhakSitaH|  doSaCabhdeneha pUya ucyate|  tena bhakSitatvAt suSiratvaM tanutvaktvaM cAsya|  tathA valIbhirAcito vyAptaH|  tathA CyAmavarNaH tathA CIryamANatanUruhaH patadromA|| 8||

 kaphajeSu tu CopheSu keSucidgamphIratvAdraktameva vipha
cyate||9||  tataCcAspaSTaM pakvaliGgaM phavati||9||  yatra hi tvaksA
varNyaM CItaCophatAlpharujatACmavacca GanatA, na tatra moha
mupheyAttaM raktaphAkamityAcakSate||9||

kaPaje CoPe gambhIraM pAkaM raktaM prApnoti|  tasmiMCca pakve pakvaliGgAnyalpAni bhavanti tvaksAvarNyAdi ca|| 9||

 athainaM samyakphakvamavadhArya phIruvRddhaphAladurphalaklI
phakSINagarphiNIviSArditaCastrakSAmeSu phAkoddhatadoSeSu ca 
phiNDiteSu sandhimarmACriteSvalpheSu vA CopheSu tIkSNoSNa
dravyairdAraNaM kurvIta||10||  itareSu pATanam||10||

athainaM raktapAkAKyaM CoPaM samyak pakvaM viditvA bhIrvAdiSu ca tIkSNoSNadravyairvraNapratiSedhe vakSyamANaiCcitrakAdibhirdAraNaM kuryAt|  CastreNa vyadhanaM na kuryAt|  itareSu caitadviparIteSu pATanaM dIrGacCedaH||10||

shArIrasthAnam

 athAtaH putrakAmIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

putrakAmIyaH

athetyAdi ca pUrvadvyAkhyeyam| putraM kAmayanta iti putrakAmAH, tebhyo hitaH putrakAmIyaH, tat prAptyupAyapradarCakatvenA~a~adhyAyaH putrakAmIyaH, taM vyAkhyAsyAmaH|| 1||

 atha khalu pumAnekaviMCativarSaH kanyAmatulyagotrAM tulyAbhijanAmasaJcArirogakulaprasUtAM rUpaCIlalakSaNasampannAmanUnAmavinaSTadantauSThakarNanAsAnakhakeCastanIM mRdumarogaprakRtimakapilAmapiGgalAmahInAdhikAGgIM dvAdaCavarSadeCIyAmamarabhujagasaridacalavRkSapakSinakSatrAntyapreSyabhISaNakanAmAnyanudvahantImanaghAmanindyAmAnindyena vidhinodvahet||2||

putrakAmIyaH

atheti maGgale| ekaviMCativarSaH pumAn kanyAmanindyenAlokadviSTena vidhinodvahet svIkuryAditi sambhandhaH| kimbhhUtAM kanyAmityAha-- atulyagotrAmityAdi| tulyaCabhdo~atraikaCabhdasya sAdhAraNasyArthe  vartate|  gotraJca vasiSThAdiRSinAmapUrvakaM lokaCAstre ca prasiddham| abhhijanaH kulam| atra tulyaCabhdaH sadRCaparyAyaH| sAdRCyaM cAtra vittavRttadibhhiH prakRtatvAt tulyArthatve pumAn pratyavamRCyate| tathA yasmin kule saJcArI rogaH kuSThapaiGgalyAdiH nAsti, tatra yA prasUtA tAM tathA sAtiCayaiH rUpAdibhhiH sampannAm| lakSaNAni CubhhAni loke CAstre ca prasiddhAni| nAjAtAni nApi bhhUtvA vinaSTAni dantAdIni yasyAH sA tathoktA| mRduH komalA CarIreNa svabhhAvena ca| tathArogA prakRtiH svabhhAvo yasyAH sA, tathAvidhAm| kapilA pItalohitA| piGgalA aruNalohitA, tAm| yasyACcAGgAni bhAhunayanAGguliprabhhRtIni anyAGgApekSayA nApyUnAni nApyadhikAni tathA ISadasamAptA dvAdaCavarSA dvAdaCavayAMsi yasyAstAm| tathA amarAdinAmarahitAM CacIsahasrAkSyumAlakSmIprabhRtInyamaranAmAni| godhAtakSakIprabhhRtIni dAganAmAni| gaGgAyamunAsarasvatIprabhhRtIni sarinnAmAni| merumalayavindhyaprabhhRtInycalanAmAni| madhUki(li)kAbhadarICamIprabhhRtIni vRkSanAmAni| haMsIbhalAkAcakorIkokilAprabhhRtIni pakSinAmAni| rohiNIrevatImaghAprabhhRtIni nakSatranAmAni| antyA rajakacaNDAlAdAyaH, teSAM pratideCe prasiddhyA yAni nAmAni tadvarjitAm| evaM preSyA dAsaCilpinaH| satyapi yathoktAvirodhe kAcit bhhISaNaM nAmAkomalamasthyAvalyAdi bhibhharti tAmapi| anindyAmanyenApi kenacillokadviSTena prakAreNAgarhaNIyAm|| 2||

 tasyAM SoDaCavarSAyAM paJcaviMCativarSaH puruSaH putrArthaM prayateta||3||  tadA hi tau prAptavIryau vIryAnvitamapatyaM janayataH||3||

putrakAmIyaH

tasyAmanantaroktAyAmaGganAyAM kAlen SoDaCavarSAyAM sa pumAn paJcaviMCativarSo vakSyamANena vidhinA putrArthaM prayateta| yatastau dampatI tadeti SoDaCe paJcaviMCe ca varSe labdhAtmavIryAtiCayau santau vIryavantaM balArogyAdisampannaM putraM janayataH|| 3||

 UnapaJcaviMCativarSeNonaSoDaCavarSAyAmAhito garbhaH kukSistha eva vinACamApnuyAdalpAyurbalArogyavibhavo vA syAdvikalendriyo vA RtAvAdye ca rAtritraye tathA duSTe CukrArtava iti||4||

putrakAmIyaH

UnaSoDaCavarSAyA vA Ahito garbha UnapaJcaviMCativarSeNa vApyAhitaH kAraNasAmagryanapekSayA kadAcinmAtRkukSAveva naCyati kadAcid vikalendriyo vA bhavati| indriyeNaikena dvAbhyAM vA hIno bhavatItyarthaH| na kevalaM dampatyorUnavarSatayA garbhasyaivaMvidhatA, yAvat pUrNayorapi mAtApitrormAturAdye puSpadarCanAdArabhya Rtau rAtritraye AhAravihArAdinA vAtAdiduSTe CukrArtave caivaMvidhataiva|| 4||

 tatrAhArasya samyakpariNatasya kramAnmajjAjamanuprAptasya sAraH CukrasaMjJAM labhate||5||

putrakAmIyaH

CukrArtavaM kimucyate kathaM ca tad garbhajanmAdyupakaroti upaghAtaCca tasya kathaM bhavatItyAha-- tatrAhArasyetyAdi| AhArasya caturvidhasya samyak yathAvat pariNatasya jaTharAgni dhAtvagniparipAkaparamparAvaCAccakramAnmajjAnaM majjasvabhAvaM prAptasya yaH sAraH saH CukrasaMjJAM labhate|| 5||

 tattu kSIra iva sarpirikSurasa iva guDaH CarIre CukradharAM kalAmACrityAsrutaM sarvAGgavyApitayA sthitam||6||  viCeSataCca majjamuSkastaneSu||6||

putrakAmIyaH

tacca CukraM (vyApakamapi majjaprabhRtiSu viCeSataH sthitaM) CarIre yA CukradharA nAma kalA vakSyamANalakSaNA tAmACrityAsrutaM sat sarvAGgavyApitvena sthitaM bhavati| dRSTAnto yathA- kSIre sarpirghRtam| yathA cekSurase guDaH| vyApyasthitamapi tadavasthAyAM na dRCyate| kriyAsaMskArAdivaCAcca paCcAdabhivyajyate| tathaiva CarIre Cukramiti dRSTAntaH| kSIrAdau ca sarpirAderastitvamanumAnalabdhaM yadiha samutpadyate| tanna cet| kathaM sikatAbhyo lokastailaM na gRhNIyAt| athavA kAryakAraNamAtro vA dRSTAntaH|| 6||

 harSodIritaM tu saGghaTTanena hRdayAveCAt piNDIbhUtamaGgAdaGgAt pravartate||7||

putrakAmIyaH

tacca CukraM sarvAGgavyApi sa aGganAsaMyoge harSeNodIritaM preritamaGgAdaGgAdbahiH pravartate|| 7||

 tat saumyaM snigdhaM guru CuklaM madhugandhi madhuraM picchilaM bahu bahalaM ghRtatailakSaudrAnyatamavarNaM ca CukraM garbhAdhAnayogyaM bhavati||8||

putrakAmIyaH

kimbhUtaM ? saGghaTTanena vegAveCena hRdayAveCAtpiNDIbhUtamekatvaM yAtaM vAtAdibhiranupahataM saumyasnigdhAdiguNayuktaM sadgarbhAdhAnayogyaM bhavati| saumyaM somaguNabhUyiSThaM madhugandhi mAkSikagandhi vahalaM nAtighanam| tathA ghRtavarNaM tailavarNaM vA| kSaudravarNM vA kSaudraM ca kapilaM vidyAt| etadviparItaM garbhAdhAnAyogyam| iti Cukrasya svarUpamuktam|| 8||

 tathA raktameva ca strINAM mAse mAse garbhakoSThamanuprApya tryahaM pravartamAnamArtavamityAhuH||9||

putrakAmIyaH

ArtavasyAtrocyate-- tathA raktamityAdi| raktameva sarvasya dhAtutvena jAyate| tadevaM viCiSTaM sad ArtavamityA~a~acAryyA AhuH| kimbhUtaM ? mAse mAse tryahaM bahiH pravartamAnam| kiM kRtvA ? garbhakoSThaM yoSito garbhasthAnaM sarvataH CarIrAt prApya| bahiH pravartamAnatvaM tasyopalakSaNam| na tu tadevArtavaM yat pravartata eva kevalam| Rtau bhavatItyArtavam| RtuCca niSiktasya bIjasya phalaprasavAnuguNaH kAlaH| tasmiMCcartau prathamaM tryahaM bahirduSTamavaCyaM pravartate|| 9||

 atiprasaGgenAnRtAvRtau vA tadevAsRgdaraM pradaraM vyApadaM ca raktayonisaMjJAM labhate||10||  tatsAdhane raktapittacikitsitaM guhyarogapratiSedhaM cekSeta||10||

putrakAmIyaH

tadevAtiprasaGgenartakAla eva pravartamAnamanRtau vAtiprasaGgena pravartamAnamasramasRgdarAdi saMjJAM labhate| etallakSaNaM cottaratra vakSyate| Rtostu lakSaNaM kSAmaprasannavadanAmityatraiva vakSyate| tatsAdhana iti| tatsAdhane~atiprasaktaraktacikitsitAya raktapittacikitsitaM guhyarogapratiSedhaM cekSeta| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-- tathAvidhasya nidAnAdivaCAt kadAci raktapittatA bhavati, kadAcid yonirogoktAnyatamaprakAratA| ataeva ca teSAM viCeSe viCeSAccikitsitamuktamiti|| 10||

shArIrasthAnam

 athAtaH putrakAmIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

putrakAmIyaH

athetyAdi ca pUrvadvyAkhyeyam| putraM kAmayanta iti putrakAmAH, tebhyo hitaH putrakAmIyaH, tat prAptyupAyapradarCakatvenA~a~adhyAyaH putrakAmIyaH, taM vyAkhyAsyAmaH|| 1||

 atha khalu pumAnekaviMCativarSaH kanyAmatulyagotrAM tulyAbhijanAmasaJcArirogakulaprasUtAM rUpaCIlalakSaNasampannAmanUnAmavinaSTadantauSThakarNanAsAnakhakeCastanIM mRdumarogaprakRtimakapilAmapiGgalAmahInAdhikAGgIM dvAdaCavarSadeCIyAmamarabhujagasaridacalavRkSapakSinakSatrAntyapreSyabhISaNakanAmAnyanudvahantImanaghAmanindyAmAnindyena vidhinodvahet||2||

putrakAmIyaH

atheti maGgale| ekaviMCativarSaH pumAn kanyAmanindyenAlokadviSTena vidhinodvahet svIkuryAditi sambhandhaH| kimbhhUtAM kanyAmityAha-- atulyagotrAmityAdi| tulyaCabhdo~atraikaCabhdasya sAdhAraNasyArthe  vartate|  gotraJca vasiSThAdiRSinAmapUrvakaM lokaCAstre ca prasiddham| abhhijanaH kulam| atra tulyaCabhdaH sadRCaparyAyaH| sAdRCyaM cAtra vittavRttadibhhiH prakRtatvAt tulyArthatve pumAn pratyavamRCyate| tathA yasmin kule saJcArI rogaH kuSThapaiGgalyAdiH nAsti, tatra yA prasUtA tAM tathA sAtiCayaiH rUpAdibhhiH sampannAm| lakSaNAni CubhhAni loke CAstre ca prasiddhAni| nAjAtAni nApi bhhUtvA vinaSTAni dantAdIni yasyAH sA tathoktA| mRduH komalA CarIreNa svabhhAvena ca| tathArogA prakRtiH svabhhAvo yasyAH sA, tathAvidhAm| kapilA pItalohitA| piGgalA aruNalohitA, tAm| yasyACcAGgAni bhAhunayanAGguliprabhhRtIni anyAGgApekSayA nApyUnAni nApyadhikAni tathA ISadasamAptA dvAdaCavarSA dvAdaCavayAMsi yasyAstAm| tathA amarAdinAmarahitAM CacIsahasrAkSyumAlakSmIprabhRtInyamaranAmAni| godhAtakSakIprabhhRtIni dAganAmAni| gaGgAyamunAsarasvatIprabhhRtIni sarinnAmAni| merumalayavindhyaprabhhRtInycalanAmAni| madhUki(li)kAbhadarICamIprabhhRtIni vRkSanAmAni| haMsIbhalAkAcakorIkokilAprabhhRtIni pakSinAmAni| rohiNIrevatImaghAprabhhRtIni nakSatranAmAni| antyA rajakacaNDAlAdAyaH, teSAM pratideCe prasiddhyA yAni nAmAni tadvarjitAm| evaM preSyA dAsaCilpinaH| satyapi yathoktAvirodhe kAcit bhhISaNaM nAmAkomalamasthyAvalyAdi bhibhharti tAmapi| anindyAmanyenApi kenacillokadviSTena prakAreNAgarhaNIyAm|| 2||

 tasyAM SoDaCavarSAyAM paJcaviMCativarSaH puruSaH putrArthaM prayateta||3||  tadA hi tau prAptavIryau vIryAnvitamapatyaM janayataH||3||

putrakAmIyaH

tasyAmanantaroktAyAmaGganAyAM kAlen SoDaCavarSAyAM sa pumAn paJcaviMCativarSo vakSyamANena vidhinA putrArthaM prayateta| yatastau dampatI tadeti SoDaCe paJcaviMCe ca varSe labdhAtmavIryAtiCayau santau vIryavantaM balArogyAdisampannaM putraM janayataH|| 3||

 UnapaJcaviMCativarSeNonaSoDaCavarSAyAmAhito garbhaH kukSistha eva vinACamApnuyAdalpAyurbalArogyavibhavo vA syAdvikalendriyo vA RtAvAdye ca rAtritraye tathA duSTe CukrArtava iti||4||

putrakAmIyaH

UnaSoDaCavarSAyA vA Ahito garbha UnapaJcaviMCativarSeNa vApyAhitaH kAraNasAmagryanapekSayA kadAcinmAtRkukSAveva naCyati kadAcid vikalendriyo vA bhavati| indriyeNaikena dvAbhyAM vA hIno bhavatItyarthaH| na kevalaM dampatyorUnavarSatayA garbhasyaivaMvidhatA, yAvat pUrNayorapi mAtApitrormAturAdye puSpadarCanAdArabhya Rtau rAtritraye AhAravihArAdinA vAtAdiduSTe CukrArtave caivaMvidhataiva|| 4||

 tatrAhArasya samyakpariNatasya kramAnmajjAjamanuprAptasya sAraH CukrasaMjJAM labhate||5||

putrakAmIyaH

CukrArtavaM kimucyate kathaM ca tad garbhajanmAdyupakaroti upaghAtaCca tasya kathaM bhavatItyAha-- tatrAhArasyetyAdi| AhArasya caturvidhasya samyak yathAvat pariNatasya jaTharAgni dhAtvagniparipAkaparamparAvaCAccakramAnmajjAnaM majjasvabhAvaM prAptasya yaH sAraH saH CukrasaMjJAM labhate|| 5||

 tattu kSIra iva sarpirikSurasa iva guDaH CarIre CukradharAM kalAmACrityAsrutaM sarvAGgavyApitayA sthitam||6||  viCeSataCca majjamuSkastaneSu||6||

putrakAmIyaH

tacca CukraM (vyApakamapi majjaprabhRtiSu viCeSataH sthitaM) CarIre yA CukradharA nAma kalA vakSyamANalakSaNA tAmACrityAsrutaM sat sarvAGgavyApitvena sthitaM bhavati| dRSTAnto yathA- kSIre sarpirghRtam| yathA cekSurase guDaH| vyApyasthitamapi tadavasthAyAM na dRCyate| kriyAsaMskArAdivaCAcca paCcAdabhivyajyate| tathaiva CarIre Cukramiti dRSTAntaH| kSIrAdau ca sarpirAderastitvamanumAnalabdhaM yadiha samutpadyate| tanna cet| kathaM sikatAbhyo lokastailaM na gRhNIyAt| athavA kAryakAraNamAtro vA dRSTAntaH|| 6||

 harSodIritaM tu saGghaTTanena hRdayAveCAt piNDIbhUtamaGgAdaGgAt pravartate||7||

putrakAmIyaH

tacca CukraM sarvAGgavyApi sa aGganAsaMyoge harSeNodIritaM preritamaGgAdaGgAdbahiH pravartate|| 7||

 tat saumyaM snigdhaM guru CuklaM madhugandhi madhuraM picchilaM bahu bahalaM ghRtatailakSaudrAnyatamavarNaM ca CukraM garbhAdhAnayogyaM bhavati||8||

kimbhUtaM ? saGghaTTanena vegAveCena hRdayAveCAtpiNDIbhUtamekatvaM yAtaM vAtAdibhiranupahataM saumyasnigdhAdiguNayuktaM sadgarbhAdhAnayogyaM bhavati| saumyaM somaguNabhUyiSThaM madhugandhi mAkSikagandhi vahalaM nAtighanam| tathA ghRtavarNaM tailavarNaM vA| kSaudravarNM vA kSaudraM ca kapilaM vidyAt| etadviparItaM garbhAdhAnAyogyam| iti Cukrasya svarUpamuktam|| 8||

 vAtakaphAvRtamArgANAJcApravartamAnaM pittalairupAcaret||11||

putrakAmIyaH

tathA tadevArtavaM kadAcit prApte~api kAle vAtaCleSmaNA AvRtaraktamArgANAM yoSitAM naiva pravartate, tathAvidhamapravartamAnaM pittalairAhArAdibhirUpAcaret|| 11||

 taddhi varddhamAnamantarvartamAnaM saCukramaCukraM vA jIvarahitaM vAtalAnyAsevamAnAyA yoSito garbhaliGgAni darCayad gulmIbhavati||12||  tatra gulmacikitsitamIkSeta||12||

putrakAmIyaH

yatastadraktaM bahirapravartamAnamantarmahAsrotasi niSiktaCukrasahitaM kevalameva vA vardhate| tadvardhamAnaM yA vAtalAnyA~a~ahArAdInyAsevate tasyA garbhaliGgAni stanyadarCanAdIni prakaTayad gulmIbhavati| tadevaM gulmatvaM prApnoti| tatrArakSayA gulmIbhUte cikitsAyai gulmacikitsitamIkSeta| tatra hi raktagulmasya pRthak cikitsitamuktam| evaM raktagulmAdInAM kadAcid raktayonitA bhavati|| 12||

 kadAcidvA garbha iva vAtodaraM bhavati tadvAtopaCamanairupaCAmyati||13||

putrakAmIyaH

kadAcidvA gulmatvena vinA raktagulmalakSaNairvakSyamANairvirahitaM garbha- sAdRCyamAtreNaiva vAtodarAkhyAM prApnoti| tadvAto praCamahetubhiH CAmyati|| 13||

 tadeva kadAcid ArtavaM saumyairbRMhaNAtmabhirAhAravihAraiH stambhitamanupadravamevodaraM garbhAdhiSThitamiva vardhayati||14||  yena tAmagarbhAM garbhiNImAhurmUDhAH||14||

putrakAmIyaH

kadAcidvA saumyAdibhI ruddhaM sadanupadravaM pIDAdikam akurvad udaraM vardhayati| yena hetunA mUDhA yAthAtathyaparijJAnabahiSkRtAH agarbhAmeva yoSitaM garbhiNImAhuH|| 14||

 tato virItairyadRcchayA vA pravRtte rakte garbhaCarIramapaCyanto bhUtahRtamityajJA bruvate||15||

putrakAmIyaH

tato~anantaraM saumyAdihetuviparItaiH kAkatAlIyena sAdhubhiSajA vA prayuktaiH svayamevauSadhanirapekSayA vA pravRtte rakte garbhaM durbuddhikalpitaM pratyakSeNApaCyanto bhUtairAhRtamiti vadantyajJA evaM teSAmajJatvam|| 15||

 yasmAt sambhavatyojaso~apaharaNaM rakSobhirna tu CarIrApaharaNamaniSTatvAdaCaktervA||16||  icchACaktyorhi pravRtterupalabdhiH na ca dRCyate kasyacidamAnuSairdehAprahAraH||16||

putrakAmIyaH

rakSobhirojaso~apaharaNaM sambhAvyate na tu CarIropaharaNam| nanu kathaM na sambhAvyata ityAha-- aniSTatvAt| athavA~aCaktitaH| Cakto~api kadAcidaniSTena pravartate, iSTe~api vA aCaktyA na pravartate| etaduktamicchACaktyorhi pravRtterupalabdhiriti| na cetyAdi, tarhyevaM kadAcid dRSTaM ydamAnuSaiH rakSobhiH kasyaciddehopahAraH kRta iti|| 16||

 yadi ca dRSTamapi samullaGghya kecidatiCaktiyuktA garbhasya CarIrAkSepe pravartante tadA kathamiva prAptAvasarAstajjananImupekSeran||17||

putrakAmIyaH

atha kaCcidevaM brUyAt yathApUrvaM na dRSTamadhunA tu dRCyate tadarthamAha-- yadi cetyAdi| yadi hi CaktyatiCayayuktA mAturapi CarIrAharaNe samarthA adRSTe~api dehApahAre pravarteran kimiti sAtiCayasvArthasampAdanaM sthUlasthUlaM tanmAtRCarIramupekSante| ato~anumAnAt jJAyate CarIrApaharaNaM bhUtAnAmaniSTamaCaktatA vA tatreti| etaccAcAryasyAsambhavamAtrapradarCanamiti kRtvA gRhyate| anyathA CarIravadojasi paryanuyuktaH kimuttaraM dAsyati|| 17||

 ArtavaM punaH CaCarudhiralAkSArasopamaM dhautaJca virajyamAnaM CuddhamAhuH||18||

putrakAmIyaH

taccAnantaroktamArtavaM CaCarudhirAdisadRCaM sad AcAryyAH CuddhamityAhuH| taddhi garbhAdhanayogyaM bhavati| dhautaM sadvastrAdvivirajyamAnamapasaracc|| 18||

 yathA ca bAlasya jIrNasya vA taroH puSpaphalaM puSpaphalasya vA tadvidhasya gandho nopalabhyate tathaiva nonaSoDaCAtItasaptativarSasya puMsaH CukraromAdayo yoSitaCconadvAdaCAtItapaJcACadvarSAyA rajastanyAdaya iti||19||

putrakAmIyaH

prastutaCukraM tathA romAdaya UnaSoDaCavarSasya puMso nopalabhyate| yathA bAlasya taroH puSpaphalam| yathA vA tadvidhasya bAlasyaiva puSpaphalasya gandhaH| astyapi sattayA vyaktabhAvo nopalabhyate| deCakAlavaCAttu vyaktaM bhavatyetat| atItasaptativarSasyApi puMsaH CukrAdayo nopalabhyante| yathA jIrNasya taroH puSpphalaM, tadvidhasya vA puSpaphalasya gandho~atijIrNasya iti| anenaiva krameNa yoSita ArtavastanyAdInAM vAcyam| AdiCabdena romAdInAM parigrahaH|

 atha CuddhaCukrArtavamarogaM mitho~anuraktaM mithunamupasnehyavidhivat saMCodhyAsthApanAnuvAsanAbhyAmupAcaret||20||  viCeSatastu ghRtakSIravadbhirmadhurauSadhasaMskAraiH puruSam, tailena nArIM pittalaiCca mAMsaiH||20||  evaM hi samAnaguNatayA CukrArtavamApyAyate||20||

putrakAmIyaH

athetyAdi subodham| praCasteSu tithimuhUrtanakSatreSu sadapatyalAbhAya mithunamupasnehyArtavAmyarNe kAle CuddhaCukrArtavatvAdiyuktaM mithunaM jAyApatI AsthApanAnuvAsanAbhyAmupAcarediti sambandhaH| kiM kRtvA ?

	Aha, pUrvamupasnehya paCcAcchAstroktena vidhAnena saMCodhyeti| puruSaM tu viCeSAd ghRtAdibhirupAcaret| madhuraskandhanirdiSTairauSadhAnnasaMskAraiCcopAcaredupacaryamANasya bahudivasopayogena yaCCarIre~atiCayaH sa madhurauSadhasaMskAraH| nArIM tu viCeSeNa tailAdibhiH| pittalAni mAMsAni AnUpasattvajAni tAni kaphapittalAni bhavantyeva| evaM hi ghRtAdyupacAreNa puMsaH CukramApyAyate sadRCguNatvAt| tathA tailAdyupayogena raktamApyAyate|| 20||

 vAtapittaCleSmakuNapagandhigranthipUyakSINamUtrapurISaretAMsi tvabIjAni bhavanti||21||

 tatrAdyAMstrIn CukrArttavadoSAn yathAsvaM doSasAdhanena sAdhayet||24||  guhyayonirogapratiSedhena cobhayAn||24||

 api ca-- vAtike CukradoSe vasukasaindhavaphalAmlasiddhaM yavakSArapratIvApaM sarpiSpAnam||25||  bilvavidArIsiddhaM kSIrayuktamAsthApanam||25||  madhukabhadradArusiddhaM tailamanuvAsanaM kSIrakulIrarasasiddhaM tailamuttarabastiH||25||

api ceti viCeSasamuccayAya| vasukAdisiddhaM sarpiryavakSArapratIvApaM vAtike CukradoSe| pratIvApo yaH siddhe cUrNatvena dIyate| mAtrA cAsya doSAdyapekSayA| vasukaM romakam| saindhavaM mANimantham| phalAmlamamladADimAdiphalam| sakSIraM kvAthakalpanayA siddhaM vilvAdikvAthamAsthApanam| tatraivAnuvAsanayogyatAyAM madhukAdisiddhaM tailam| tatraiva kSIrakulIrarasAbhyAM siddhaM tailamuttarabastiH| kulIro jalajaprANiviCeSaH karkaTAkhyaH| teSAM samabhAgatvam|| 25||

 paittike kANDekSuCvadaMSTrAguDUcIsiddhaM mUrvAmadhUkapratIvApaM sarpiSpAnam||26||  trivRccUrNaH saghRto virekaH||26||  payasyACrIparNIsiddhaM kSIrayuktamAsthApanam||26||  madhukamudgaparNIsiddhaM tailamanuvAsanamuttarabastiCca||26||

 karmAnte ca pumAn mAsaM brahmacArI sarpiHkSIrAbhyAM CalyodanamabhiprACya nAtyA~a~aCitaH sukhI sragvI sumanAH prINItAGgaH Cuklanivasano mauhUrtikAnumate rAtribhAge kalyANAni cintayAstadabhikAmaH svAstIrNaM CayanaM dakSiNena pAdena prAgArohet||52||  tadvidhaiva ca pramadA karCitAGgI tailamASottarAhArA, pUrvaM vAmapAdena puruSasya dakSiNataH CayyAmadhirohet||52||

 tatrA~atyACitA, kSudhitA, pipAsitA, bhItA, vimanAH, CokArttA, kruddhA~atimedurA~anyakAmA~avyavAyakAmA vA na garbhaM dhatte, viguNaM vA||55||  tathA puruSo~api||55||  na cAsau adhastiSThet||55||  tathA hi strIceSTaH pumAJjAyate, puMCceSTA vA strI||55||

atha yatyoktena lakSaNena labdhagarbhAM viditvA kukSigauravAdilakSaNAdgarbhavyaktIbhAvAt| pUrvasminneva dine puSyanakSatravati putrArthinyAM bhiSak puMsavanAni yogAni prayuJjIta vakSyamaNAni yaiH pumAMsaM sUyeta| prathame~ahni kecit puMsavanamicchanti| tatrApyayugmadinaM vibhAgayugmeSu dineSviti kecit pravadanti| kecittantrakArAH pratyahaM puMsavanamicchanti| garbhalakSaNAt pUrvaM pratidinameveti kecit| kecittu dvAdaCarAtrasyaiva yugmadineSviti viCeSaM nikSipanti| yugmadinAni dvitIyacaturthAdIni|| 57||

 tadyathA-- lakSmaNA-vaTaCrRGga-sahadevA-viCva-devAnAma-nyatamAM kSIre~abhiSutya trICcaturo vA bindUn dakSiNe nAsApuTe svayamAsiJcet picunA||58||  vAme tu duhitRkAmA||58||  na caitAn niSThIvet||58||  tathA puSyoddhRtAyAH CvetabRhatyA mUlakalkAdrasaM nAvayet||58||  tadvaccotpalapatraM kumudapatraM lakSmaNAmUlaM vaTaCRGgANi cASTau ca nAvayet||58||  Cukla-mAlyAmbaradharA ca nArI puSyoddhRtAyA lakSmaNAyA mUlakalkamudumbaramAtraM payasA pibet putrasyotpAdanAya sthitaye ca||58||  tadvadgauradaNDamapAmArgaM jIvakarSabhakau CaGkhapuSpImadhyadaNDAM sahacaraM nagnajitamagnijihvAmaSTau vA vaTaCrRGgAni||58||  CAlipiSTasya ca pacyamAnasyoSmANamAghrAya tadrasaM dehalyAM sthitA pUrvavannAvayet||58||  yaccAnyadapi brAhmaNA vRddhastriyo vA brUyustacca kuryAt||58||

putrakAmIyaH

tadyatheti puMsavanapradarCanaparam| lakSmaNAdInAmanyatamaM yathAlAbhaM kSIreNAbhiSutya vastrAntargataM garbhavRddhyarthaM ca japan pavitrAn mantrAn vAmahastena dakSiNanAsApuTe siJcet anenaiva vidhinA duhitRkAmA vAme nAsApuTe siJceta| tAMCca bindUn na niSThIvet| mukhena nodgiredevetyarthaH| duhitRkAmeti prAsaGgikam| tathaiva vAmadakSiNabhedena pariSecanAt puMstriyau bhavataH| vAme duhitA dakSiNe pumAn| evaM puSyoddhRtAyAH CvetabRhatyAH kalkAn suClakSNapiSTAdayo rasasya nAvayet| tadvadeva vAmadakSiNabhedena rasavidhAnenotpalapatrAdInAmanyatamaM nAvayet| tathaivASTau vaTaCrRGgAni| CrRGgaM prathamodbhinnaM patrAGkuram| CuklamAlyAdikA nArI puSyoddhRtAyA lakSmaNAyA mUlakalkamudumbaraphalamAtraM payasA pibet putrasyotpAdanAya sthitaye ca| nAsayA vA garbhiNyA mukhena vA pItamiti| kecit tatkAlamapi pIto vyaktasyApi putrasya paristhApanaM rakSAbhidhAnAM sthitiM karoti| udumbaraM nAma phalaviCeSaH| kSIraM ca pAnAyAloDanopayogi| sarvApi tadvallakSmaNA vidhAnena gauradaNDAdInyapi pibet| saMkhyAyAmaniyamaH| tena yathAsambhavam ekaM, dve, trINi| CAlipiSTasya vA piNDIkRtasyAgninA pacyamAnasyoSmANamAghrAya tata eva pIDitaM sA yoSit dvAradehalyaM dvAraCAkhAdhAre sthitA dakSiNe nAsApuTe svayaM siJcediti puMsavanAni| tathAnyadapi yatkiJcid vRddhastriyo brAhmaNACca brUyustat sarvaM yoSit kuryAt| vRddhastrIgrahaNaM garbhiNyAM heyopAdeyatatphalAnAmanubhavAbhyAsena parijJAnaviCeSapradarCanArthaM, na tu sAmAnyena vRddhastrIvacanasyAnuSTheyatvam| tathaiva brAhmaNavacanaM CrautasmArttavidhAnopalakSaNArtham|| 58||

 tataH prajAsthApanAkhyA daCauSadhIH CirasA dakSiNena ca pANinA dhArayet||7||  etAbhiCca siddhaM payo ghRtaM vA pibet||7||  etAbhireva puSye-puSye snAyAt||7||  sadA ca samAlabheta||7||  tathA sarvAsAM jIvanIyAnAmauSadhInAM sadopayogastairvidhAnaiH||7||  iti garbhasthApanAni||7||  saumyAkRtivacanopacAraceSTACca priyahitAnuvartinaH paricArakAstathA bharteti||7||

shArIrasthAnam

 tatra Cukre Cukle ghRtamaNDAbhe vA garbhasya gauratvam||61||  tailAbhe kRSNatvam||61||  madhvAbhe CyAmatvam||61||  tathA kSIrAdimadhurANAmupayogAt mAturudakavihArAcca gauratA||61||  tilAnnavidAhinAM kRSNatA||61||  vyAmiCrANAM CyAmatA||61||  deCakulAnuvRttitaCca varNabhedaH||61||  tathA tejodhAtorudakA~a~akACadhAtusamparkAdgauratA, bhUvAyusamparkAt kRSNatA, sarvadhAtusAmye CyAmatA||61||

putrakAmIyaH

anantaraM garbhasya varNaviCeSahetupradarCanaM karoti-- tatra CukretyAdi| CukraM viCinaSTi-- puruSAhArAdihetunA CukrasyAnekaCo dRSTena varNena bhaviSyatastadgarbhasya varNaviCeSaniyama ucyate| etena varNaviCeSasya piturAyattattvaM darCitam| mAtA~apyantarvatnI satI yadA saumyAnyAsevate tadA garbhasya gauratA| udakavihAraH jalakrIDA| AgneyaistilAdibhiH kRSNatA| vidAhinaH sarve dravyato guNataH karmataCca| tenoSaradeCAdhivAso~api gRhItaH| miCrANAM sevanAt CyAvatvam| evaM sthitideCakulAnuvRttyApi varNabhedo bhavati| yathA-- auttarApathikAnAM gauratA, dAkSiNAtyAnAmAndhradraviDapADyAdInAM kRSNatA| madhyadeCe CyAvattvamityevamAdi| tathA kule~api jAtyA CilpyAdibhedabhinne kvacidgauratvaM, kvacitkRSNatvaM, kvacicchyAvatvaM ceti| na kevalametadeva varNaviCeSakAraNaM yAvadgarbhArambhakagRhA bhUtAdhikyamapi| etaddarCayati-- tathetyAdi| tejodadhAnorvarNaviCeSakarttRtve sati prAdhAnyAd varNasaMgraheSvAdhikyenaivAnvayitvam| teSAM cAhAravihAradeCakulAdibhUtAdhikyAnAM parasparanAnAvidhabhedabhinnAnAM miCrIbhAvena varNAnAM mAnam| iti garbhasya varNaviCeSatAkarA bhAvA uktAH|| 61||

 gate purANe rajasi nave~avasthite Cuddhe garbhasyACaye mArge ca bIjAtmanA CukramavikRtamavikRtena vAyunA preritamanyaiCca mahAbhUtairanugatamArttavenAbhimUrcchitamanvakSameva rAgAdikleCavaCAnuvartinA svakarmacoditena manojavena jIvenAbhisaMsRSTaM garbhACayamupayAti||2||

 tatra prathame mAse kalalaM jAyate||12||  dvitIye ghanaH peCyarbudaM vA||12||  tebhyaH kramAt puMstrInapuMsakAni||12||  tRtIye paJcadhA prarohati||12||  tadyathA-- sakthinI, bAhU, CiraCca||12||  sakthyAdi prarohaikakAlameva ca sarvamaGgA~a~avayavondriyANi yugapat sambhavantyanyatra janmottarakAlajebhyo dantAdibhyaH||12||  krameNa tu sphuTIbhavanti||12||  eSA prakRtiH||12||  vikRtirato~anyathA||12||

 yathAsvaM ca garbhasya puMstrInapuMsakAnyatamaliGgAnurUpA bhAvA manasi CarIre ca santiSThante||13||  vaiCeSikaliGgasaGkare tu yato bhUyastvaM tato~antarA bhAvAH||13||

 tadyathA- klaibyaM bhIrutvamavaiCAradyaM moho~anavasthAnamadhoguruvamasaMhAnaM CaithilyaM mArddavaM garbhACayabIjabhAgastathAyuktACcApare strIkarA bhAvAH||14||  tato viparItAH puMskarAH||14||  saGkIrNA napuMsakakarAH||14||
