 mAtRjaM hyasya hRdayaM tadrasahAriNIbhirdhamanIbhirmAtRhRdayenAbhisambaddhaM bhavati||16||  tasmAttayostAbhiH CraddhA sampadyate||16||  tathA ca dvihRdayAM nArIM daurhRdinImityAcakSate||16||

garbhAvakrAntiH

asminneva ca kAle nArI daurhRdinI bhavati | daurhRdinI dvihRdayA kathamityAha- mAtRjamityAdi | asya garbhasya mAtRjaM hRdayaM bhavati | mAturbIjabhAgena mRdunA ArttavAkhyena jAyate | tacca garbhahRdayaM rasavAhIbhirnADIbhirmAtRhRdayena sambaddhaM bhavati | tena garbhasyecchayA mAtA vyApyate mAtuCca garbha iti | ato mAtA dvihRdayA tRtIyamAsyucyate || 16 ||

 anye tu pakSatrayAt prabhRtyApaJcamAt mAsAt daurhRdakAlamAhuH||17||

garbhAvakrAntiH

anye punarAcAryyA garbhagrahaNAdgate pakSatraye yAvaccaturtho mAso niSpannastAvaddaurhRdakAlamAhuH || 17 ||

 prArthanAyAJca tIvrAyAM kAmamahitamapyasyai hitopasahitaM dadyAt||18||

garbhAvakrAntiH

asmiMCca daurhRde garbhiNyAH prArthanAyAM nAnAvidhe AhAre pathye yadi prArthanA bhavati tattadAnImeva dadyAt | ahite punaryadi prArthanA bhavati tato~anyena hitenopahitaM miCraM tattasyai pradadyAt || 18 ||

 daurhRdavimAnanAddhi vAyuH prakupito~antaHCarIramanucaran garbhasya vinACaM vairUpyaM vA kuryyAt||19||

garbhAvakrAntiH

anyathA daurhRdasya vimAnanAt prArthanAbhaGgAdasaumyatvAdvAyuH kupito~antaHCarIraM paribhraman garbhasya vinACaM karoti vairUpyaM vA karoti || 19 ||

 labdhadaurhRdA tu vIryyavantaJcirAyuSaJca putraM prasUte||20||

garbhAvakrAntiH

yadA punardaurhRde prArthitaM labhate tadA sA labdhadaurhRdA vIryyavantaM cirAyuSaM ca putraM sUte || 20 ||

 caturthe~aGgapratyaGgavibhAgaH pravyakto garbhaCca sthiro bhavati||21||

garbhAvakrAntiH

caturthe mAsi sarvAvayavAnAM sphuTatA, vyaktiH sthairyyaJca garbhasya bhavati || 21 ||

shArIrasthAnam

 paJcame manaH pratibuddhataraM bhavati mAMsaCoNitopacayaCca||22||

garbhAvakrAntiH

anyat subodham || 22 ||

 SaSThe keCaromanakhAsthisnAyvAdInyabhivyaktAni balavarNopacayaCca||23||  saptame sarvAGgasampUrNatA||23||

garbhAvakrAntiH

sugamam || 23 ||

 aSTame garbhaCca mAtRto garbhataCca mAtA rasahAriNIbhirvAhinIbhirmuhurojaH parasparamAdadAte||24||  tasmAttadA garbhiNI muhurmuditA bhavati muhurglAnA tathA garbhaH||24||

garbhAvakrAntiH

aSTame mAsi tAbhirubhayalagnAbhI rasavahAbhirnADIbhirojaH pratikSaNaM dvayoH CarIrayoH prabhAvAdvAtavaCAcca saJcarati | yatra ca tadojastiSThati tatra CarIre harSo bhavatyanyatra glAniH || 24 ||

 evaM garbhasya janma vyApattimattadA bhavatyojaso~anavasthitatvAt||25||  tathA hyasya niSkramaNonmukhasya parivarttanAdInyanubhavata evaujasA viyogaH||25||  yadyapi ca kiJcitkAlamasyocchvasanaM syAttacchinnasyevAGgasyaujaH saMskArAnuvRttikRtam||25||  jananyAstu sthiraujaskatayaikadeCena rase saMkrAnte glAnireveti||25||

garbhAvakrAntiH

tatra mAtRCarIraM gate ojasi yadi garbhaM prasUte tadA sa jAto vinaCyati | yattu kiJcit svalpamevojo bhavati tanniSkramaNakleCena kSayaM yAti | yattu kiJcitkAlamucchvasanaM bhavati tadojaH saMskArAt | yathA chitrasyAGgasya calanam | yadA garbhaCarIraM prApte ojasi garbho niSkrAmati tadA ojasaH sadbhAvAt jAto jIvatyatra mAtA yataH sthiraujaskA bhavatyataH sA kevalaM glAnA bhavati, na tu vipadyate | tasyAstu sambandhina ojasastokamAtraM garbhaCarIraM saMkrAmati || 25 ||

 anye punarAhuH||26||  naiRtabhAgatvAttatra garbhasya maraNam||26||

garbhAvakrAntiH

anye punarAcAryyAH suCrutAdayastatrASTame mAse nair-RtabhAgatvAt bhUtAvasaratvAt tasya kAlasya garbhasya maraNamAhuH | na tvojaso~anavasthAnAt || 26 ||

 tasmAt prasavapratiSedhArthaM strI snAtA, CucirbrahmacAriNI, devatArAdhanamaparA syAt||27||  mAMsaudanabaliM cAtra nirvapeta||27||

garbhAvakrAntiH

tasmAnnair-RtabhAgatvAttasya kAlasya pratiSedhArthaM bhUyo me prasavo na bhUyAditi kRtvA garbhiNI strI snAnAdiyuktA satI devArAdhanaparA syAt | teSAJca nair-RtAnAM mAMsodanAdikaM balipalalapiSTAdikaM nirvapet || 27 ||

 tasminnekadivasAtikrAntep prasavakAlamAhurAsaMvatsarAt||28||  ataH paraM vikArI bhavati||28||

garbhAvakrAntiH

asmiMstvaSTame mAse ekadivasAtikrAntep prasavakAlamAhuH | ekadivasamatikrAnto yaH sa tathoktaH | yAvadgarbhagrahaNAt saMvatsaraM tAvannavamAnmAsAt prabhRti caturmAsaM prasavakAlamAhuH | saMvatsarAt pare ca trayodaCAdiSu mAseSu antaHsthito garbho vikAritvaM bhajate || 28 ||

 garbhastu mAtuH pRSThAbhimukho lalATe kRtAJjaliH saGkucitAGgo garbhakoSThe dakSiNapArCvamACrityAvatiSThate pumAn, vAmaM strI, madhyaM napuMsakam||29||

garbhAvakrAntiH

sa ca garbho yAvat jaThare tiSThati tAvadevaM tiSThati, evaJca niSkrAmatIti pradarCanArthamAha-- garbhastvityAdi | sarvo garbho mAtR-pRSThAbhimukho lalATe kRtAJjalistiSThati saGkucitairaGgaiH | sa ca yadA puMvyaJjanastadA garbhakoSThasya dakSiNaM pArCvamACritya tiSThati | strIvyaJjano vAmaM madhyaM napuMsakamiti | subodhamanyat || 29 ||

 tatra sthitaCca garbho mAtari svapatnyAM svapiti prabuddhAyAM prabuddhyate||30||  paratantravRtteCca garbhasya||30||  niSekAt prabhRti garbhACayopasnehopasvedau vartanam||30||

garbhAvakrAntiH

paratantravRttairmAtRparAyattavRttitvAt | dvau tu garbhACayasambandhinAvupasnehopasvedau vartanam | upasnehaH snigdhatvam | upasveda utkledaH | tau cAhArAyattau | subodhamanyat || 30 ||

 tato vyaktIbhavadaGgapratyaGgasyA~asya nAbhyAM pratibaddhA nADI nADyAmaparA tasyAM mAtRhRdayam||31||  tato mAtRhRdayAdAhAraraso dhamanIbhiH syandamAno~aparAmupaiti||31||  tataH kramAnnAbhim||31||  tataCca sapunargarbhasya pakvACaye svakAyAgninA pacyamAnaH prasAdabAhulyAddhAtvAdipuSTikaraH sampadyate||31||  tathA romakUpairupasneho rasa eva ca payobhUtaH||31||

garbhAvakrAntiH

tasya ca garbhasya krameNa vyaktIbhavadaGgapratyaGgasya satastanmAturAhArasAro rasAkhyo dhAtuH puSTikaraH sampadyate | kathamityAha-- nAbhyAmiti | garbhasya nAbhyAM pratisambaddhA nADI bhavati, tasyAM nADyAM pratibaddhA pUrvoktAparA tasyAM pratibaddhaM mAtRhRdayam | tatra mAtuH sambandhyAhArarasastaddhRdayalagnA dhamanIH prApnoti | tAbhirdhamanIbhiH sruto~aparAM prApnoti | tato nAbhipratibaddhanADIkrameNa nAbhimanuprApto garbhasya kAyAgnisthAnamanuprAptastena kAyAgninA pacyamAnaH sasAraH svalpop prasAdabAhulyAddhetordhAtupuSTikaraH sampadyate | asya hyAhAraH saro bhavati | garbhaCarIraM tu sarva eva sAraH prApnotIti prasAdabAhulyam | tathA garbhACayasyApi snehogarbhasya romakUpaiH praviSTo dhAtuH puSTikaraH sampadyate | tathA garbhasya jAtasyApi sa eva mAturAhArarasaH payobhUto dhAtupuSTikaraH sampadyate || 31 ||

shArIrasthAnam

putrakAmIyaH

 athAtaH putrakAmIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

athetyAdi ca pUrvadvyAkhyeyam| putraM kAmayanta iti putrakAmAH, tebhyo hitaH putrakAmIyaH, tat prAptyupAyapradarCakatvenA~a~adhyAyaH putrakAmIyaH, taM vyAkhyAsyAmaH|| 1||

 atha khalu pumAnekaviMCativarSaH kanyAmatulyagotrAM tulyAbhijanAmasaJcArirogakulaprasUtAM rUpaCIlalakSaNasampannAmanUnAmavinaSTadantauSThakarNanAsAnakhakeCastanIM mRdumarogaprakRtimakapilAmapiGgalAmahInAdhikAGgIM dvAdaCavarSadeCIyAmamarabhujagasaridacalavRkSapakSinakSatrAntyapreSyabhISaNakanAmAnyanudvahantImanaghAmanindyAmAnindyena vidhinodvahet||2||

atheti maGgale| ekaviMCativarSaH pumAn kanyAmanindyenAlokadviSTena vidhinodvahet svIkuryAditi sambhandhaH| kimbhhUtAM kanyAmityAha-- atulyagotrAmityAdi| tulyaCabhdo~atraikaCabhdasya sAdhAraNasyArthe  vartate|  gotraJca vasiSThAdiRSinAmapUrvakaM lokaCAstre ca prasiddham| abhhijanaH kulam| atra tulyaCabhdaH sadRCaparyAyaH| sAdRCyaM cAtra vittavRttadibhhiH prakRtatvAt tulyArthatve pumAn pratyavamRCyate| tathA yasmin kule saJcArI rogaH kuSThapaiGgalyAdiH nAsti, tatra yA prasUtA tAM tathA sAtiCayaiH rUpAdibhhiH sampannAm| lakSaNAni CubhhAni loke CAstre ca prasiddhAni| nAjAtAni nApi bhhUtvA vinaSTAni dantAdIni yasyAH sA tathoktA| mRduH komalA CarIreNa svabhhAvena ca| tathArogA prakRtiH svabhhAvo yasyAH sA, tathAvidhAm| kapilA pItalohitA| piGgalA aruNalohitA, tAm| yasyACcAGgAni bhAhunayanAGguliprabhhRtIni anyAGgApekSayA nApyUnAni nApyadhikAni tathA ISadasamAptA dvAdaCavarSA dvAdaCavayAMsi yasyAstAm| tathA amarAdinAmarahitAM CacIsahasrAkSyumAlakSmIprabhRtInyamaranAmAni| godhAtakSakIprabhhRtIni dAganAmAni| gaGgAyamunAsarasvatIprabhhRtIni sarinnAmAni| merumalayavindhyaprabhhRtInycalanAmAni| madhUki(li)kAbhadarICamIprabhhRtIni vRkSanAmAni| haMsIbhalAkAcakorIkokilAprabhhRtIni pakSinAmAni| rohiNIrevatImaghAprabhhRtIni nakSatranAmAni| antyA rajakacaNDAlAdAyaH, teSAM pratideCe prasiddhyA yAni nAmAni tadvarjitAm| evaM preSyA dAsaCilpinaH| satyapi yathoktAvirodhe kAcit bhhISaNaM nAmAkomalamasthyAvalyAdi bhibhharti tAmapi| anindyAmanyenApi kenacillokadviSTena prakAreNAgarhaNIyAm|| 2||

 tasyAM SoDaCavarSAyAM paJcaviMCativarSaH puruSaH putrArthaM prayateta||3||  tadA hi tau prAptavIryau vIryAnvitamapatyaM janayataH||3||

tasyAmanantaroktAyAmaGganAyAM kAlen SoDaCavarSAyAM sa pumAn paJcaviMCativarSo vakSyamANena vidhinA putrArthaM prayateta| yatastau dampatI tadeti SoDaCe paJcaviMCe ca varSe labdhAtmavIryAtiCayau santau vIryavantaM balArogyAdisampannaM putraM janayataH|| 3||

 UnapaJcaviMCativarSeNonaSoDaCavarSAyAmAhito garbhaH kukSistha eva vinACamApnuyAdalpAyurbalArogyavibhavo vA syAdvikalendriyo vA RtAvAdye ca rAtritraye tathA duSTe CukrArtava iti||4||

UnaSoDaCavarSAyA vA Ahito garbha UnapaJcaviMCativarSeNa vApyAhitaH kAraNasAmagryanapekSayA kadAcinmAtRkukSAveva naCyati kadAcid vikalendriyo vA bhavati| indriyeNaikena dvAbhyAM vA hIno bhavatItyarthaH| na kevalaM dampatyorUnavarSatayA garbhasyaivaMvidhatA, yAvat pUrNayorapi mAtApitrormAturAdye puSpadarCanAdArabhya Rtau rAtritraye AhAravihArAdinA vAtAdiduSTe CukrArtave caivaMvidhataiva|| 4||

 tatrAhArasya samyakpariNatasya kramAnmajjAjamanuprAptasya sAraH CukrasaMjJAM labhate||5||

CukrArtavaM kimucyate kathaM ca tad garbhajanmAdyupakaroti upaghAtaCca tasya kathaM bhavatItyAha-- tatrAhArasyetyAdi| AhArasya caturvidhasya samyak yathAvat pariNatasya jaTharAgni dhAtvagniparipAkaparamparAvaCAccakramAnmajjAnaM majjasvabhAvaM prAptasya yaH sAraH saH CukrasaMjJAM labhate|| 5||

 tattu kSIra iva sarpirikSurasa iva guDaH CarIre CukradharAM kalAmACrityAsrutaM sarvAGgavyApitayA sthitam||6||  viCeSataCca majjamuSkastaneSu||6||

tacca CukraM (vyApakamapi majjaprabhRtiSu viCeSataH sthitaM) CarIre yA CukradharA nAma kalA vakSyamANalakSaNA tAmACrityAsrutaM sat sarvAGgavyApitvena sthitaM bhavati| dRSTAnto yathA- kSIre sarpirghRtam| yathA cekSurase guDaH| vyApyasthitamapi tadavasthAyAM na dRCyate| kriyAsaMskArAdivaCAcca paCcAdabhivyajyate| tathaiva CarIre Cukramiti dRSTAntaH| kSIrAdau ca sarpirAderastitvamanumAnalabdhaM yadiha samutpadyate| tanna cet| kathaM sikatAbhyo lokastailaM na gRhNIyAt| athavA kAryakAraNamAtro vA dRSTAntaH|| 6||

 harSodIritaM tu saGghaTTanena hRdayAveCAt piNDIbhUtamaGgAdaGgAt pravartate||7||

tacca CukraM sarvAGgavyApi sa aGganAsaMyoge harSeNodIritaM preritamaGgAdaGgAdbahiH pravartate|| 7||

 tat saumyaM snigdhaM guru CuklaM madhugandhi madhuraM picchilaM bahu bahalaM ghRtatailakSaudrAnyatamavarNaM ca CukraM garbhAdhAnayogyaM bhavati||8||

kimbhUtaM ? saGghaTTanena vegAveCena hRdayAveCAtpiNDIbhUtamekatvaM yAtaM vAtAdibhiranupahataM saumyasnigdhAdiguNayuktaM sadgarbhAdhAnayogyaM bhavati| saumyaM somaguNabhUyiSThaM madhugandhi mAkSikagandhi vahalaM nAtighanam| tathA ghRtavarNaM tailavarNaM vA| kSaudravarNM vA kSaudraM ca kapilaM vidyAt| etadviparItaM garbhAdhAnAyogyam| iti Cukrasya svarUpamuktam|| 8||

 tathA raktameva ca strINAM mAse mAse garbhakoSThamanuprApya tryahaM pravartamAnamArtavamityAhuH||9||

ArtavasyAtrocyate-- tathA raktamityAdi| raktameva sarvasya dhAtutvena jAyate| tadevaM viCiSTaM sad ArtavamityA~a~acAryyA AhuH| kimbhUtaM ? mAse mAse tryahaM bahiH pravartamAnam| kiM kRtvA ? garbhakoSThaM yoSito garbhasthAnaM sarvataH CarIrAt prApya| bahiH pravartamAnatvaM tasyopalakSaNam| na tu tadevArtavaM yat pravartata eva kevalam| Rtau bhavatItyArtavam| RtuCca niSiktasya bIjasya phalaprasavAnuguNaH kAlaH| tasmiMCcartau prathamaM tryahaM bahirduSTamavaCyaM pravartate|| 9||

 atiprasaGgenAnRtAvRtau vA tadevAsRgdaraM pradaraM vyApadaM ca raktayonisaMjJAM labhate||10||  tatsAdhane raktapittacikitsitaM guhyarogapratiSedhaM cekSeta||10||

tadevAtiprasaGgenartakAla eva pravartamAnamanRtau vAtiprasaGgena pravartamAnamasramasRgdarAdi saMjJAM labhate| etallakSaNaM cottaratra vakSyate| Rtostu lakSaNaM kSAmaprasannavadanAmityatraiva vakSyate| tatsAdhana iti| tatsAdhane~atiprasaktaraktacikitsitAya raktapittacikitsitaM guhyarogapratiSedhaM cekSeta| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-- tathAvidhasya nidAnAdivaCAt kadAci raktapittatA bhavati, kadAcid yonirogoktAnyatamaprakAratA| ataeva ca teSAM viCeSe viCeSAccikitsitamuktamiti|| 10||

shArIrasthAnam

putrakAmIyaH

 athAtaH putrakAmIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

athetyAdi ca pUrvadvyAkhyeyam| putraM kAmayanta iti putrakAmAH, tebhyo hitaH putrakAmIyaH, tat prAptyupAyapradarCakatvenA~a~adhyAyaH putrakAmIyaH, taM vyAkhyAsyAmaH|| 1||

 atha khalu pumAnekaviMCativarSaH kanyAmatulyagotrAM tulyAbhijanAmasaJcArirogakulaprasUtAM rUpaCIlalakSaNasampannAmanUnAmavinaSTadantauSThakarNanAsAnakhakeCastanIM mRdumarogaprakRtimakapilAmapiGgalAmahInAdhikAGgIM dvAdaCavarSadeCIyAmamarabhujagasaridacalavRkSapakSinakSatrAntyapreSyabhISaNakanAmAnyanudvahantImanaghAmanindyAmAnindyena vidhinodvahet||2||

 tasyAM SoDaCavarSAyAM paJcaviMCativarSaH puruSaH putrArthaM prayateta||3||  tadA hi tau prAptavIryau vIryAnvitamapatyaM janayataH||3||

tasyAmanantaroktAyAmaGganAyAM kAlen SoDaCavarSAyAM sa pumAn paJcaviMCativarSo vakSyamANena vidhinA putrArthaM prayateta| yatastau dampatI tadeti SoDaCe paJcaviMCe ca varSe labdhAtmavIryAtiCayau santau vIryavantaM balArogyAdisampannaM putraM janayataH|| 3||

 UnapaJcaviMCativarSeNonaSoDaCavarSAyAmAhito garbhaH kukSistha eva vinACamApnuyAdalpAyurbalArogyavibhavo vA syAdvikalendriyo vA RtAvAdye ca rAtritraye tathA duSTe CukrArtava iti||4||

UnaSoDaCavarSAyA vA Ahito garbha UnapaJcaviMCativarSeNa vApyAhitaH kAraNasAmagryanapekSayA kadAcinmAtRkukSAveva naCyati kadAcid vikalendriyo vA bhavati| indriyeNaikena dvAbhyAM vA hIno bhavatItyarthaH| na kevalaM dampatyorUnavarSatayA garbhasyaivaMvidhatA, yAvat pUrNayorapi mAtApitrormAturAdye puSpadarCanAdArabhya Rtau rAtritraye AhAravihArAdinA vAtAdiduSTe CukrArtave caivaMvidhataiva|| 4||

 tatrAhArasya samyakpariNatasya kramAnmajjAjamanuprAptasya sAraH CukrasaMjJAM labhate||5||

CukrArtavaM kimucyate kathaM ca tad garbhajanmAdyupakaroti upaghAtaCca tasya kathaM bhavatItyAha-- tatrAhArasyetyAdi| AhArasya caturvidhasya samyak yathAvat pariNatasya jaTharAgni dhAtvagniparipAkaparamparAvaCAccakramAnmajjAnaM majjasvabhAvaM prAptasya yaH sAraH saH CukrasaMjJAM labhate|| 5||

 tattu kSIra iva sarpirikSurasa iva guDaH CarIre CukradharAM kalAmACrityAsrutaM sarvAGgavyApitayA sthitam||6||  viCeSataCca majjamuSkastaneSu||6||

tacca CukraM (vyApakamapi majjaprabhRtiSu viCeSataH sthitaM) CarIre yA CukradharA nAma kalA vakSyamANalakSaNA tAmACrityAsrutaM sat sarvAGgavyApitvena sthitaM bhavati| dRSTAnto yathA- kSIre sarpirghRtam| yathA cekSurase guDaH| vyApyasthitamapi tadavasthAyAM na dRCyate| kriyAsaMskArAdivaCAcca paCcAdabhivyajyate| tathaiva CarIre Cukramiti dRSTAntaH| kSIrAdau ca sarpirAderastitvamanumAnalabdhaM yadiha samutpadyate| tanna cet| kathaM sikatAbhyo lokastailaM na gRhNIyAt| athavA kAryakAraNamAtro vA dRSTAntaH|| 6||

 harSodIritaM tu saGghaTTanena hRdayAveCAt piNDIbhUtamaGgAdaGgAt pravartate||7||

tacca CukraM sarvAGgavyApi sa aGganAsaMyoge harSeNodIritaM preritamaGgAdaGgAdbahiH pravartate|| 7||

 tat saumyaM snigdhaM guru CuklaM madhugandhi madhuraM picchilaM bahu bahalaM ghRtatailakSaudrAnyatamavarNaM ca CukraM garbhAdhAnayogyaM bhavati||8||

kimbhUtaM ? saGghaTTanena vegAveCena hRdayAveCAtpiNDIbhUtamekatvaM yAtaM vAtAdibhiranupahataM saumyasnigdhAdiguNayuktaM sadgarbhAdhAnayogyaM bhavati| saumyaM somaguNabhUyiSThaM madhugandhi mAkSikagandhi vahalaM nAtighanam| tathA ghRtavarNaM tailavarNaM vA| kSaudravarNM vA kSaudraM ca kapilaM vidyAt| etadviparItaM garbhAdhAnAyogyam| iti Cukrasya svarUpamuktam|| 8||

 tathA raktameva ca strINAM mAse mAse garbhakoSThamanuprApya tryahaM pravartamAnamArtavamityAhuH||9||

ArtavasyAtrocyate-- tathA raktamityAdi| raktameva sarvasya dhAtutvena jAyate| tadevaM viCiSTaM sad ArtavamityA~a~acAryyA AhuH| kimbhUtaM ? mAse mAse tryahaM bahiH pravartamAnam| kiM kRtvA ? garbhakoSThaM yoSito garbhasthAnaM sarvataH CarIrAt prApya| bahiH pravartamAnatvaM tasyopalakSaNam| na tu tadevArtavaM yat pravartata eva kevalam| Rtau bhavatItyArtavam| RtuCca niSiktasya bIjasya phalaprasavAnuguNaH kAlaH| tasmiMCcartau prathamaM tryahaM bahirduSTamavaCyaM pravartate|| 9||

 atiprasaGgenAnRtAvRtau vA tadevAsRgdaraM pradaraM vyApadaM ca raktayonisaMjJAM labhate||10||  tatsAdhane raktapittacikitsitaM guhyarogapratiSedhaM cekSeta||10||

tadevAtiprasaGgenartakAla eva pravartamAnamanRtau vAtiprasaGgena pravartamAnamasramasRgdarAdi saMjJAM labhate| etallakSaNaM cottaratra vakSyate| Rtostu lakSaNaM kSAmaprasannavadanAmityatraiva vakSyate| tatsAdhana iti| tatsAdhane~atiprasaktaraktacikitsitAya raktapittacikitsitaM guhyarogapratiSedhaM cekSeta| tenaitaduktaM bhavati-- tathAvidhasya nidAnAdivaCAt kadAci raktapittatA bhavati, kadAcid yonirogoktAnyatamaprakAratA| ataeva ca teSAM viCeSe viCeSAccikitsitamuktamiti|| 10||

shArIrasthAnam

putrakAmIyaH

 vAtakaphAvRtamArgANAJcApravartamAnaM pittalairupAcaret||11||

tathA tadevArtavaM kadAcit prApte~api kAle vAtaCleSmaNA AvRtaraktamArgANAM yoSitAM naiva pravartate, tathAvidhamapravartamAnaM pittalairAhArAdibhirUpAcaret|| 11||

 taddhi varddhamAnamantarvartamAnaM saCukramaCukraM vA jIvarahitaM vAtalAnyAsevamAnAyA yoSito garbhaliGgAni darCayad gulmIbhavati||12||  tatra gulmacikitsitamIkSeta||12||

yatastadraktaM bahirapravartamAnamantarmahAsrotasi niSiktaCukrasahitaM kevalameva vA vardhate| tadvardhamAnaM yA vAtalAnyA~a~ahArAdInyAsevate tasyA garbhaliGgAni stanyadarCanAdIni prakaTayad gulmIbhavati| tadevaM gulmatvaM prApnoti| tatrArakSayA gulmIbhUte cikitsAyai gulmacikitsitamIkSeta| tatra hi raktagulmasya pRthak cikitsitamuktam| evaM raktagulmAdInAM kadAcid raktayonitA bhavati|| 12||

kadAcidvA gulmatvena vinA raktagulmalakSaNairvakSyamANairvirahitaM garbha- sAdRCyamAtreNaiva vAtodarAkhyAM prApnoti| tadvAto praCamahetubhiH CAmyati|| 13||

kadAcidvA saumyAdibhI ruddhaM sadanupadravaM pIDAdikam akurvad udaraM vardhayati| yena hetunA mUDhA yAthAtathyaparijJAnabahiSkRtAH agarbhAmeva yoSitaM garbhiNImAhuH|| 14||

 tato virItairyadRcchayA vA pravRtte rakte garbhaCarIramapaCyanto bhUtahRtamityajJA bruvate||15||

tato~anantaraM saumyAdihetuviparItaiH kAkatAlIyena sAdhubhiSajA vA prayuktaiH svayamevauSadhanirapekSayA vA pravRtte rakte garbhaM durbuddhikalpitaM pratyakSeNApaCyanto bhUtairAhRtamiti vadantyajJA evaM teSAmajJatvam|| 15||

 yasmAt sambhavatyojaso~apaharaNaM rakSobhirna tu CarIrApaharaNamaniSTatvAdaCaktervA||16||  icchACaktyorhi pravRtterupalabdhiH na ca dRCyate kasyacidamAnuSairdehAprahAraH||16||

rakSobhirojaso~apaharaNaM sambhAvyate na tu CarIropaharaNam| nanu kathaM na sambhAvyata ityAha-- aniSTatvAt| athavA~aCaktitaH| Cakto~api kadAcidaniSTena pravartate, iSTe~api vA aCaktyA na pravartate| etaduktamicchACaktyorhi pravRtterupalabdhiriti| na cetyAdi, tarhyevaM kadAcid dRSTaM ydamAnuSaiH rakSobhiH kasyaciddehopahAraH kRta iti|| 16||

 yadi ca dRSTamapi samullaGghya kecidatiCaktiyuktA garbhasya CarIrAkSepe pravartante tadA kathamiva prAptAvasarAstajjananImupekSeran||17||

atha kaCcidevaM brUyAt yathApUrvaM na dRSTamadhunA tu dRCyate tadarthamAha-- yadi cetyAdi| yadi hi CaktyatiCayayuktA mAturapi CarIrAharaNe samarthA adRSTe~api dehApahAre pravarteran kimiti sAtiCayasvArthasampAdanaM sthUlasthUlaM tanmAtRCarIramupekSante| ato~anumAnAt jJAyate CarIrApaharaNaM bhUtAnAmaniSTamaCaktatA vA tatreti| etaccAcAryasyAsambhavamAtrapradarCanamiti kRtvA gRhyate| anyathA CarIravadojasi paryanuyuktaH kimuttaraM dAsyati|| 17||

 ArtavaM punaH CaCarudhiralAkSArasopamaM dhautaJca virajyamAnaM CuddhamAhuH||18||

taccAnantaroktamArtavaM CaCarudhirAdisadRCaM sad AcAryyAH CuddhamityAhuH| taddhi garbhAdhanayogyaM bhavati| dhautaM sadvastrAdvivirajyamAnamapasaracc|| 18||

 yathA ca bAlasya jIrNasya vA taroH puSpaphalaM puSpaphalasya vA tadvidhasya gandho nopalabhyate tathaiva nonaSoDaCAtItasaptativarSasya puMsaH CukraromAdayo yoSitaCconadvAdaCAtItapaJcACadvarSAyA rajastanyAdaya iti||19||

prastutaCukraM tathA romAdaya UnaSoDaCavarSasya puMso nopalabhyate| yathA bAlasya taroH puSpaphalam| yathA vA tadvidhasya bAlasyaiva puSpaphalasya gandhaH| astyapi sattayA vyaktabhAvo nopalabhyate| deCakAlavaCAttu vyaktaM bhavatyetat| atItasaptativarSasyApi puMsaH CukrAdayo nopalabhyante| yathA jIrNasya taroH puSpphalaM, tadvidhasya vA puSpaphalasya gandho~atijIrNasya iti| anenaiva krameNa yoSita ArtavastanyAdInAM vAcyam| AdiCabdena romAdInAM parigrahaH|

 atha CuddhaCukrArtavamarogaM mitho~anuraktaM mithunamupasnehyavidhivat saMCodhyAsthApanAnuvAsanAbhyAmupAcaret||20||  viCeSatastu ghRtakSIravadbhirmadhurauSadhasaMskAraiH puruSam, tailena nArIM pittalaiCca mAMsaiH||20||  evaM hi samAnaguNatayA CukrArtavamApyAyate||20||

athetyAdi subodham| praCasteSu tithimuhUrtanakSatreSu sadapatyalAbhAya mithunamupasnehyArtavAmyarNe kAle CuddhaCukrArtavatvAdiyuktaM mithunaM jAyApatI AsthApanAnuvAsanAbhyAmupAcarediti sambandhaH| kiM kRtvA ?

	Aha, pUrvamupasnehya paCcAcchAstroktena vidhAnena saMCodhyeti| puruSaM tu viCeSAd ghRtAdibhirupAcaret| madhuraskandhanirdiSTairauSadhAnnasaMskAraiCcopAcaredupacaryamANasya bahudivasopayogena yaCCarIre~atiCayaH sa madhurauSadhasaMskAraH| nArIM tu viCeSeNa tailAdibhiH| pittalAni mAMsAni AnUpasattvajAni tAni kaphapittalAni bhavantyeva| evaM hi ghRtAdyupacAreNa puMsaH CukramApyAyate sadRCguNatvAt| tathA tailAdyupayogena raktamApyAyate|| 20||

shArIrasthAnam

putrakAmIyaH

 vAtapittaCleSmakuNapagandhigranthipUyakSINamUtrapurISaretAMsi tvabIjAni bhavanti||21||

tatra yAnyaCuddhAni AhArAdihetukavAtAdidoSAdretAMsi tAnyabIjAni bhavanti garbhAya na bhavantItyarthaH|| 21||

 tatra tanu rUkSaM phenilamaruNamalpaM vicchinnaM sarujaM cirAcca niSicyate vAtena||22||  kiJcit pItamapicchilamAnIlaM vA dahadiva pravartate pittena||22||  majjosaMsRSTaM prabhUtaM vibaddhaM cAmbhasi ca kiJcinmajjati CleSmaNA||22||  kuNapagandhyanalpaM raktena||22||  granthibhUtaM vAtaCleSmabhyAm||22||  pUti pUyanibhaM pittaCleSmabhyAm||22||  kSINaM vAtapittAbhyAm||22||  taduktaM sasAdhanaM prAk||22||  mUtrapurISagandhi sannipAtena||22||

tatra tasmin ityAdinA vAtAdiduSTasya Cukrasya lakSaNaM cikitsitaM ca doSakrameNocyate| subodhamanyat| vAtapittAbhyAM CukrakSayaH kriyate, tacca kSINaM CukraM prAg doSAdivijJAnIye sacikitsitamuktam|| 22||

 Artavamapi Cukravad doSairupasRSTamabIjameva||23||  tasya liGgaM nAma ca pUrvavat||23||  teSu kuNapagranthipUyakSINaretAMsi kRcchrasAdhyAni||23||  mUtrapurISaCukrArtavaM tvasAdhyaM kuNapagranthipUyArtavaM ca||23||

na kevalaM vAtAdiduSTaM CukramabIjaM bhavati yAvat tenaiva krameNa taireva duSTamArtavamapyabIjaM bhavati| tasya cA~a~arttavasya duSTasya Cukravadeva krameNa lakSaNaM nAma ca vijAnIyAt| teSu duSTeSu CukrArttaveSu madhye kuNapAdiretAMsi kRcCrasAdhyAni| mUtrapurISaCukrArttavAnyasAdhyAni| tAni prajotpAdane na samarthAnyeva bhavanti| kuNapagranthyAdi duSTamArttavaM ca| CeSaM sarvaM sAdhyam|| 23||

 tatrAdyAMstrIn CukrArttavadoSAn yathAsvaM doSasAdhanena sAdhayet||24||  guhyayonirogapratiSedhena cobhayAn||24||

tatra sAdhyeSu vAtAdibhistrIn CukradoSAMstaireva trInArttavadoSAn svahetudoSacikitsayopakramet| guhyarogapratiSedhoktavidhAnena ca|| 24||

 api ca-- vAtike CukradoSe vasukasaindhavaphalAmlasiddhaM yavakSArapratIvApaM sarpiSpAnam||25||  bilvavidArIsiddhaM kSIrayuktamAsthApanam||25||  madhukabhadradArusiddhaM tailamanuvAsanaM kSIrakulIrarasasiddhaM tailamuttarabastiH||25||

api ceti viCeSasamuccayAya| vasukAdisiddhaM sarpiryavakSArapratIvApaM vAtike CukradoSe| pratIvApo yaH siddhe cUrNatvena dIyate| mAtrA cAsya doSAdyapekSayA| vasukaM romakam| saindhavaM mANimantham| phalAmlamamladADimAdiphalam| sakSIraM kvAthakalpanayA siddhaM vilvAdikvAthamAsthApanam| tatraivAnuvAsanayogyatAyAM madhukAdisiddhaM tailam| tatraiva kSIrakulIrarasAbhyAM siddhaM tailamuttarabastiH| kulIro jalajaprANiviCeSaH karkaTAkhyaH| teSAM samabhAgatvam|| 25||

 paittike kANDekSuCvadaMSTrAguDUcIsiddhaM mUrvAmadhUkapratIvApaM sarpiSpAnam||26||  trivRccUrNaH saghRto virekaH||26||  payasyACrIparNIsiddhaM kSIrayuktamAsthApanam||26||  madhukamudgaparNIsiddhaM tailamanuvAsanamuttarabastiCca||26||

paittike subodham| payasyayA CrIparNyA ca siddhena kSIreNAsthApanam| madhukamudgaparNIsiddhaM tailamanuvAsanamuttarabastiCca|| 26||

 ClaiSmike pASANabhedA~aCmantakA~a~amalakakvAthasiddhaM pippalImadhukacUrNapratIvApaM sarpiSpAnam||27||  madanaphalakaSAyo vamanam||27||  dantIviDaGgacUrNastailalIDho virekaH||27||  rAjavRkSamadanaphalakaSAyapragADhamA~a~asthApanam||27||  madhukapippalIsiddhaM tailamanuvAsanamuttarabastiCca||27||

ClaiSmike pASAnabhedAdi siddhaM sarpiSpAnam | madanaphalakaSAyeNa vamanam |dantyAdi cUrNena virekaH |rAjavRkSAdikaSAyapragADhamAsthApanam |pragADhaM bhUyiSThaM ghanam | madhukAdi siddhaM tailamanuvAsanamuttarabastiCca|

 vAtaje puSpadoSe bhArGgImadhukabhadradArusiddhaM sarpiSpAnam||28||  kACmaryyakSudrasahAsiddhaM vA kSIram||28||  madhukaCRgAlavinnAkalkaM payassarpissahitaM priyaGgutilakalkaM vA yonau dhArayet||28||  saralamudgaparNIkaSAyaH prakSAlanam||28||

vAtaje puSpadoSe| puSpadoSaH ArttavadoSaH| madhukAdisiddhaM parasparasamAbhyAM payaHsarpibhyAM sammiCrya yathAyogam| kalkaM pAnIyapiSTadravyANAm etat pAnameva| tilapriyaGgvoH kalkaM yonau dhArayet| veti samuccaye| prakSAlanaM prakaraNAdyoneH|| 28||

 pittaje kAkolIdvayavidArImUlakvAthamutpalapadmakakvAthaM madhUkapuSpakACmaryyaphalakvAthaM vA saCarkaraM pibet||29||  CvetacandanakvAthaM vA sakSaudram||29||  dhavadhAtakIkalkaM vA ghRtena vA madhukamadhurasAmRdvIkAkalkam||29||  CamyAkagavAkSIkSIraM virekaH||29||  candanapayasyAkalkaM yonau dhArayet||29||  gaurikAriSTakaSAyaH prakSAlanam||29||

pittaje kAkolyAdInAM kvAthatrayaM saCarkaraM doSAdyapekSayA vikalpena yojyam| sarpirmadhubhyAM saMyuktamanupAnamathavA CvetacandanakvAthaM sakSaudram| madhukAdikalkaH saghRtaH| sarvatra doSAdyapekSayA vikalpaH| CamyAkAdibhivirekaCcandanAdikalkaM yonau dhArayet| gairikAdikaSAyaM prakSAlanam|| 29||

 ClaiSmike kuTajakaTukACvagandhAkvAthaM pibet||30||  samAkSikaM vA kSIrivRkSapravAlakvAtham||30||  eteSAmeva vA cUrNaM madhughRtAbhyAM lihyAt||30||  madanaphalakaSAyeNa vamanam||30||  tatkalkameva ca yonau dhArayet||30||  lodhratindukakaSAyaH prakSAlanaM bastameSamUtraM vA||30||

putrakAmIyaH

 kuNaparetasi dhAtakIpuSpakhadirArjunadADimaiH siddhamasanAdibhirvA sarpiH pAyayet||31||

 tatha granthyArttave pAThAtrikaNTakavRkSakakvAtham||35||

subodham|| 35||

 kuNapapUyArttave candanakvAthaM pibet||36||  triphalAkalkakvAthau cAtra dhAraNAcamane||36||

 sarveSu ca CukrArttavadoSeSu strIpuMsau snehAdikarmabhirviCeSeNa cottarabastibhiH punaH punarupAcaret||37||  yathAsvaM ca yonau kalkaiH picubhiCca||37||  ityevaM viCuddhaCukrArttavau pUrvoktaM vidhimAsevetAm||37||

snehAdIni karmANi dhUmAntAni| sarveSu CukrArttavadoSeSu yaduktaM, taiH snehAdibhirupAcaret| yathAsvamiti| yatra yadauSadhaM tatra tadeva kalkena picunA deyaM yonAviti| pUrvoktaM vidhiM ghRtakSIratailamAMsAdikam|| 37||

 mAsenopacitaM raktaM dhamanIbhyAmRtau punaH||41||  ISatkRSNaM vigandhaM ca vAyuryonimukhAnnudet||41||

 tataH puSpadarCani prathamadivasAtprabhRti brahmacAriNI, snAnAdyalaGkArarahitA, darbhasaMstaraCAyinI trirAtramAsIta||42||  parNaCarAvakaratalAnyatamena yAvakaM payasA siddhamalpaM karCanArtham aCnIyAt||42||  tIkSNoSNA~amlalavaNAni ca varjayet||42||

etAsu yathoktAsu putraduhitRrAtriSu yA rAtriryasya uttarA sA tataH putrasya duhiturvA AyurAdInAM hetuH| tenA~aSTamyA rAtrerdaCamI jyeSThA tato~api dvAdaCI| evaM paJcamyAstato~api saptamI| ato~anantaraM trodaCyAdiSu rAtriSu yathottarameva putrasyAyurAdInAM hrAsaH, daCamyAdiSu ca duhituH|| 47||

 tatra yugmAsu rAtriSvalpIbhavatyArttavamayugmAsvApyAyyate||48||  tasmAttAsu kramAt putrasya duhituCca janma||48||  ataeva cAnuparatArttavadarCanAM putrArthI viprakRSTeSvapyahastu nopeyAt||48||

yugmAsu ca samAsu dvitIyAcaturthyAdiSu rAtriSu samadoSabalAderyathoktavayaso mithunasya garbhArambhakaCukraraktApekSayA atrA~a~adyarAtryapekSaya vA~alpIbhavati raktam, atastAsu Cukrasya bAhulyAt pumAn jAyate kAraNasyAnatikramaNAt kAryasya| evamayugmAsu prathamatRtIyAdiSu dRSTArttavasya svabhAvena bahutvAcchukrasyAlpatvAd duhitRjanma| ataeva raktasyAlpatvAddhetoryataH putrasya janma, tataH putrArthaM puruSo~anuparatArttavadarCanAM paridRCyamAnArttavAM viprakRSTadarCanAdayugmeSvahaHsu striyaM nopeyAt| Arttave dRCyamAne aSTamyAdirAtriSvapi putrArthI nopeyAdityarthaH|| 48||

 yadi tvAhAranurodhAdayugmAsu CukrasyAdhikatA ca nyUnatA syAttataH pumAn stryAkRtirdurbalo hInAGgo vA jAyate||49||  strI ca puruSAkRtirdurbalA hInAGgI vA||49||

AhArAdiviCeSavaCAcca yadyayugmAsu CukrabAhulyaM yugmAsvA~a~arttavabAhulyaM bhavati tadA saMyogAt pumAn stryAkRtitvAdiyuktaH strI ca puruSAkRtitvAdiyuktA jAyate|| 49||

 ekAdaCItrayodaCyostu napuMsakaM syAt||50||

 athopAdhyAyaH putrIyaM vidhAnamAcaret||51||  CUdrAyAstu mantravarjitam||51||  yAdRCaM ca putramACAsIta tadrUpavarNacaritAJjanapadAnanucintayeti strI vAcyA ca||51||  tajjanapadAhAravihAropacAraparicchadAMCcAnuvidadhIt||51||

atheti maGgale| upAdhyAyaH putrIyavidhAnaM vidhimAcaret kurvIta| CUdrAyAstu matravarjitaM vidhAnamAcaret| strI yAdRCaM putramACAsItAbhilaSet, tadrUpAdimato janapadAnanucintayeti vAcyA ca| sA ca strI majjanapadAhArAdIMCcAnuvidadhIta kurvIta|| 51||

 karmAnte ca pumAn mAsaM brahmacArI sarpiHkSIrAbhyAM CalyodanamabhiprACya nAtyA~a~aCitaH sukhI sragvI sumanAH prINItAGgaH Cuklanivasano mauhUrtikAnumate rAtribhAge kalyANAni cintayAstadabhikAmaH svAstIrNaM CayanaM dakSiNena pAdena prAgArohet||52||  tadvidhaiva ca pramadA karCitAGgI tailamASottarAhArA, pUrvaM vAmapAdena puruSasya dakSiNataH CayyAmadhirohet||52||

karmAnte putrIyavidhyanuSThAnAvasAne pumAn mAsaM brahmacArI AjyakSIrAbhyA CAlyannaM bhuktvA nAtyACita ityAdikaH san mauhUrtikAnumate rAtrabhAge kalyANani cintayatastasyAmabhikAmaH dakSiNena pAdena strItaH prAk svAstIrNaM CayanamArohet| pramadApi tadvidhaiva puruSaviCeSaNaviCiSTaiva pUrvoktayavAnnabhojanena karCitAGgI tailamASottarAhArA pUrvaM vAmena pAdena tasya puruSasya dakSiNataH CayyAmArohet|| 52||

 tatra mantraM prayuJjIta-- 'Ayurasi, sarvataH pratiSThAsi, dhAtA tvA dadhAtu, vidhAtA tvA dadhAtu, brahmavarcasA bhava iti||53||  brahmA bRhaspatirviSNuH somasUryastathA~aCvinau||53||  bhago~atha mitrAvaruNau vIraM dadhatu me sutam||53||

tatra mantramiti| mantrArtha UhyaH|| 53||

 tataH parasparaM sAmabhirabhisAntvya saharSamanukUlaM saMviCetAm||54||  paryApte cainAM CItodakena sahasA pariSiJcet||54||

tata iti| CayyArohaNA~anantaraM tau parasparaM sAmabhiH sAntvayitvA saharSamanukUlaM ca saMviCeSatAm| paryyApteti| paryApte vyavAye~avasite satyenAM striyaM sahasA CItodakena pariSiJcet|| 54||

 tatrA~atyACitA, kSudhitA, pipAsitA, bhItA, vimanAH, CokArttA, kruddhA~atimedurA~anyakAmA~avyavAyakAmA vA na garbhaM dhatte, viguNaM vA||55||  tathA puruSo~api||55||  na cAsau adhastiSThet||55||  tathA hi strIceSTaH pumAJjAyate, puMCceSTA vA strI||55||

atha striyA uktaprakAravaiparItye doSamAha-- tatreti| tatra vyavAye strI atyACitatvAdiyuktA garbhaM na dhatte, viguNaM vA garbhaM dhatte| tathA puruSo~apItyanenA~atyACitatvAdikaM puruSeNApi varjanIyamityuktam| puMso viCeSamAha-- na ceti| asau puruSo nA~adhastiSThet, tatra doSamAha-- tathAhIti| tathA sati strIceSTaH pumAJjAyate| strI ca puMCceSTA jAyate|| 55||

 na ca nyubjAM vA seveta||56||  nyubjAyAM vAto balavAn sa yoniM pIDayati||56||  dakSiNapArCvagatAyAH CleSmA pIDitaCcyutaH pidadhAti garbhACayam||56||  vAmapArCvagatAyAstadvat pittaM vidahati raktaCukre||56||  tasmAduttAnaM bIjaM gRhNIyAt||56||  tathA hi yathAsthAnameva tiSThanti doSAH||56||

tasmiMCca kAle nyubjAM pArCvagatAM kA na seveta uttAnAmeva seveteti yAvat| nyubjA adhomukhI| puruSasyA~adhaHsthitAvapi dakSiNapArCvagAyA dakSiNapArCvasya CleSmACrayatvaM pittasya vAmapArCvACrayatvAcchleSmA pIDitaH svasthAnAccyutaH pittena saha garbhACayaM vidadhati, tathaiva vAmapArCvagatAyAstadvatpittaM vidahati|| 56||

 labdhagarbhAM cainAM viditvA, prAgvyaktIbhAvAdgarbhasya puSye puMsavanAni prayuJjIta||57||  dvAdaCarAtramityanye||57||  tatrApi yugmadineSviti kecit||57||  pratyahamityapare||57||

atha yatyoktena lakSaNena labdhagarbhAM viditvA kukSigauravAdilakSaNAdgarbhavyaktIbhAvAt| pUrvasminneva dine puSyanakSatravati putrArthinyAM bhiSak puMsavanAni yogAni prayuJjIta vakSyamaNAni yaiH pumAMsaM sUyeta| prathame~ahni kecit puMsavanamicchanti| tatrApyayugmadinaM vibhAgayugmeSu dineSviti kecit pravadanti| kecittantrakArAH pratyahaM puMsavanamicchanti| garbhalakSaNAt pUrvaM pratidinameveti kecit| kecittu dvAdaCarAtrasyaiva yugmadineSviti viCeSaM nikSipanti| yugmadinAni dvitIyacaturthAdIni|| 57||

 tadyathA-- lakSmaNA-vaTaCrRGga-sahadevA-viCva-devAnAma-nyatamAM kSIre~abhiSutya trICcaturo vA bindUn dakSiNe nAsApuTe svayamAsiJcet picunA||58||  vAme tu duhitRkAmA||58||  na caitAn niSThIvet||58||  tathA puSyoddhRtAyAH CvetabRhatyA mUlakalkAdrasaM nAvayet||58||  tadvaccotpalapatraM kumudapatraM lakSmaNAmUlaM vaTaCRGgANi cASTau ca nAvayet||58||  Cukla-mAlyAmbaradharA ca nArI puSyoddhRtAyA lakSmaNAyA mUlakalkamudumbaramAtraM payasA pibet putrasyotpAdanAya sthitaye ca||58||  tadvadgauradaNDamapAmArgaM jIvakarSabhakau CaGkhapuSpImadhyadaNDAM sahacaraM nagnajitamagnijihvAmaSTau vA vaTaCrRGgAni||58||  CAlipiSTasya ca pacyamAnasyoSmANamAghrAya tadrasaM dehalyAM sthitA pUrvavannAvayet||58||  yaccAnyadapi brAhmaNA vRddhastriyo vA brUyustacca kuryAt||58||

tadyatheti puMsavanapradarCanaparam| lakSmaNAdInAmanyatamaM yathAlAbhaM kSIreNAbhiSutya vastrAntargataM garbhavRddhyarthaM ca japan pavitrAn mantrAn vAmahastena dakSiNanAsApuTe siJcet anenaiva vidhinA duhitRkAmA vAme nAsApuTe siJceta| tAMCca bindUn na niSThIvet| mukhena nodgiredevetyarthaH| duhitRkAmeti prAsaGgikam| tathaiva vAmadakSiNabhedena pariSecanAt puMstriyau bhavataH| vAme duhitA dakSiNe pumAn| evaM puSyoddhRtAyAH CvetabRhatyAH kalkAn suClakSNapiSTAdayo rasasya nAvayet| tadvadeva vAmadakSiNabhedena rasavidhAnenotpalapatrAdInAmanyatamaM nAvayet| tathaivASTau vaTaCrRGgAni| CrRGgaM prathamodbhinnaM patrAGkuram| CuklamAlyAdikA nArI puSyoddhRtAyA lakSmaNAyA mUlakalkamudumbaraphalamAtraM payasA pibet putrasyotpAdanAya sthitaye ca| nAsayA vA garbhiNyA mukhena vA pItamiti| kecit tatkAlamapi pIto vyaktasyApi putrasya paristhApanaM rakSAbhidhAnAM sthitiM karoti| udumbaraM nAma phalaviCeSaH| kSIraM ca pAnAyAloDanopayogi| sarvApi tadvallakSmaNA vidhAnena gauradaNDAdInyapi pibet| saMkhyAyAmaniyamaH| tena yathAsambhavam ekaM, dve, trINi| CAlipiSTasya vA piNDIkRtasyAgninA pacyamAnasyoSmANamAghrAya tata eva pIDitaM sA yoSit dvAradehalyaM dvAraCAkhAdhAre sthitA dakSiNe nAsApuTe svayaM siJcediti puMsavanAni| tathAnyadapi yatkiJcid vRddhastriyo brAhmaNACca brUyustat sarvaM yoSit kuryAt| vRddhastrIgrahaNaM garbhiNyAM heyopAdeyatatphalAnAmanubhavAbhyAsena parijJAnaviCeSapradarCanArthaM, na tu sAmAnyena vRddhastrIvacanasyAnuSTheyatvam| tathaiva brAhmaNavacanaM CrautasmArttavidhAnopalakSaNArtham|| 58||

 tataH prajAsthApanAkhyA daCauSadhIH CirasA dakSiNena ca pANinA dhArayet||7||  etAbhiCca siddhaM payo ghRtaM vA pibet||7||  etAbhireva puSye-puSye snAyAt||7||  sadA ca samAlabheta||7||  tathA sarvAsAM jIvanIyAnAmauSadhInAM sadopayogastairvidhAnaiH||7||  iti garbhasthApanAni||7||  saumyAkRtivacanopacAraceSTACca priyahitAnuvartinaH paricArakAstathA bharteti||7||

tato~anantaramaindrIbrAhmItyAdinA daCauSadhIH prajAsthApanAkhyA garbhiNI CirasA dhArayet tathA dakSiNena ca pANinA| tathAtAbhiH prajAsthApanAkhyAbhiryathAsvavidhAnena siddhaM payo ghRtaM vA pibet| subodham| taistairvidhAnairvidhAraNasnAnAdibhiriti| garbhasthApanAniyairgarbho na sravati| 

tathA saumyAkRtyAdiyuktAH paricArakA bhartA ca garbhasthApanam| saumyA AkRtyAdayaCceSTAntA yeSAnte tathoktAH priyACca te| te kriyACceSTAstathA hitACcAnuvartinaCca te tathoktAH|| 59||

 punaCcainAM mAsAdupeyAt||60||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhAvakrAntiH

 athAto garbhAvakrAntiM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtredayAdayo maharSayaH||1||

athAta ityAdi| atra garbhaCabdena manassaMygAccetanenAtmanAdhiSThitAnAM mahAbhUtAnAM vikAraviCeSa ucyate| tasyAvakramaNaM prAptiH svarUpalAbho yasminnadhyAye nirNIyate so~apyupacArAttacchebdenocyate|

 gate purANe rajasi nave~avasthite Cuddhe garbhasyACaye mArge ca bIjAtmanA CukramavikRtamavikRtena vAyunA preritamanyaiCca mahAbhUtairanugatamArttavenAbhimUrcchitamanvakSameva rAgAdikleCavaCAnuvartinA svakarmacoditena manojavena jIvenAbhisaMsRSTaM garbhACayamupayAti||2||

sA ca garbhasyAvakrAntiH gate purANa ityAdinA prastUyate| purANe~atIte karmataH saJcite rajasi duSTarakte gate vAyunA strIdehAdbahiH prerite RtorAdyadinatrayaM paCcAnnave sAmpratikamAsabhave~avasthite ArttavasaMjJe labdhapratiSThe sati Cuddhe ca garbhasyACaye doSAnupahate mArge ca Cuddhe yenAnupahataM CukraM kSetraM prApnoti| Cuddha rati rajasA sambadhyate| garbhACayamArgAbhyAM ca| CuddhiCca svAbhAvikyaupAdhikI ca| aupAdhikI dravyasaMskArakRtA| bIjAtmanA garbhakAraNamahAbhUtasvabhAvena aGgAdaGgAt preritamanyaiCca sUkSmasvarUpairmanaH sahacAribhistanmAtrAkhyairmahAbhUtairanugataM strIkSetraprAptyA karmavaCAdArttavena miCrIbhUtamanvakSaM miCrIbhAvAhInakAlameva rAgAdInAM vaCe yo~anuvarttate tathAvidhena manojavena jIvenAbhisaMsRSTaM prAptasaMyogaM gArbhACayaM CukramupayAti| rAgadveSAvidyAsmitAbhiniveCAH kleCAH| ete paJca mithyAjJAnAni| na pramANaM na cApramANaM viparyayamAtramiti kRtvA avidyA mUlaM kleCAnAM CeSANAm| sukhAnuCAyI rAgaH| tatprabheda eva dveSaH krodhaH| asmitA~abhiniveCau mohaCabdenoktau| tatra avidyA yA anitye pRthivyAdau nityabuddhiH| bIjagarbhavAsAdinA aCucau strICarIrAdau CucibuddhiH| duHkhe ca pariNAmatApAdibhirUpabhogasukhe sukhabuddhiH| anAtmani ca bAhyopakaraNabhAveSu CarIre cAtmabuddhiriti| Atmano buddheCcAbhedagraha asmitA| anubhUtasukhasya tatsmRtyA tatkAraNaprAptau gRddhI rAgaH| anubhUtaduHkhasya tadgrathaneSu tAtkAlikI jighAMsA dveSa iti kleCAH| avidyA cA~a~anAdiH| eSAM kleCAnAM vaCamanuvartate yo jIva AtmA sa tathoktaH CubhA~aCubhAni karmANi tAni cA~a~atmanaH| kleCamUlatvAt karmaNAm| amUni ca karmANi pacyamAnAni vipAkena sukhAsukhalakSaNena punaravidyAmeva puSNanti, ato~avicchinnena pravAheNa karmaphalAnurUpeSu yonyantareSvAtmano manaHprabhRtibhiH saMyogAnnityasyApi janmaCabdenocyate| manojavenetyAtmano niSkriyatvAnmanasA yuktasya kriyAvattvamiva darCayati| evambhUtaM CukraM garbhACayamupayAti|| 2||

 kAryANAM kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAt tatsvabhAvatAM pratipadyate||3||

tacca CukraM kAryyANAM kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAddhetostatsvabhAvatAM kAraNasAdRCyaM pratipadyate| kAryaM hi kAraNasya svarUpAnugacCati| tathA ca tilebhyastilA eva jAyante na mASAH| kAraNaM ca yad garbhasya mAtRpitRmahAbhUtadeCakAlagarbhACayamAtrAhAravihArAdikam| tasya kAraNasya svarUpAnugamanAd garbhasya tadAkRtyAdimataCca sambhavaH| ata eva kAraNavaCAdAkRtyAdivailakSaNyam|| 3||

 tata eva ca Cukrasya bAhulyAt pumAn Arttavasya bAhulyAt strI, tayoH sAmye napuMsakam||4||

ata eva ca kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAdeva puMskAraNasya Cukrasya bAhulyAt pumAn jAyate, raktasya tu yoSit | kAraNayoH sAmye napuMsakamiti || 4 ||

 CukrArttave~anilena khaNDaCo bhinne yathAvibhAgamapatyAnAmutpattiH||5||

miCrIbhUtaCca CukrArttavaM svaviCiSTahetuko~anilo yadA khaNDaCaH karoti, tadA bahUnAmapyapatyAnAM sambhavaH || 5 ||

 vikRte viyonyAkRtInAJca||6||

yadA tvanilo vA~anyo vA doSaH CukrArttavaM kenacit prakAreNa vikaroti, tadA vikRtayonInAM vikRtAkRtInAJca garbhANAM sambhavaH | vikRtayonayo ye yoSitaH puMsA saMsRSTAyAH mRgameSamArjArAdayo jAyante~ato vikRtAkRtayaH kANapaGgvAdayaH || 6 ||

 atha nAryyAH sadyogRhItagarbhAyACca liGgaM yonyA bIjagrahaNaM tRptirgarimA sphuraNaM CukrArttavayoranubandhaCca tathA praharSo hRllAsastandrA~aGgasAdaH praseko hRdayavyathA glAniH pipAsA ca||7||

atheti prastAve | yonyA bIjagrahaNAdikaM sadyogarbhAyAstatkAlaprAptagarbhAyA nAryyA lakSaNam | yonyA bIjasya Cukrasya grahaNaM prasravAbhAvaH | tRptiH prAptagarbhApekSayA ratAvanabhilASitA, CarIraprINanaM vA | gurutvamaGgasya tasyaiva sphuraNaM cAlanam | ananubandhanam garbhavidAraNAdinA pratibandhaH | hRdutkleCayuktaH praseka eva hRllAsaH || 7 ||

 krameNa tu vyaktagarbhAyAH kukSimAtragauravaM kSAmanetrasvaratA yoniromasaMlulanaM nidrA jRmbhaNaM mUrcchA chardiraruciH pAdaCopho~amle~abhilASasteSu teSu ca uccAvaceSu bhAveSviti||8||

kAlakrameNa vyaktagarbhAyAH krameNaiva kukSigAtrAdigauravAdilakSaNam | krameNeti | 

yathA-yathA pravardhate tathA-tathA kukSigauravAdayo bhavanti | kSAmaCabdo netrasvarAbhyAM ca sambadhyate | yoniromNIJca saMlulanaM calanam | yoniromNAM vA saMlulanaM vyAlolatA | teSu teSvanukteSvapi svakalpiteSu nAnAvidheSUccAvaceSvaniyateSu bhAveSvAhAravihArAdyupayogiSvabhilASa iti vyaktagarbhAyA liGgam | vyaktaH sphuTo nAtisampUrNo garbho yasyAH || 8 ||

 tasyACca rajovAhinAM srotasAM vartmAnyuparudhyante garbheNa||9||  tasmAt tataH paramArttavaM na dRCyate||9||  tatastadadhaH pratihatamaparamaparaM copacIyamAnamaparetyAhuH, jarAyurityanye||9||  sthite rakte romarAjiH prAdurbhavati||9||

tasyACca vyaktagarbhAyA rajovahAni srotAMsi yaiH srotobhirmalabhUtaM raktamRtukAlaM bahirvahati teSAM vartmAni mArgANi mukhAni garbheNa naikAhAdAcchAdyante | tasmAt kAraNAt tataH garbhasya vyaktIbhAvAt paramArttavaM na pravarttate | yattu kadAcid dRCyate tadvaikRtam | tadaiva cArttavamadho gamane garbheNa pratihatamAhArapariNAmAcca pratidinamupacIyamAnaM garbhasyACaya evAparA garbhaCayyA~a~akhyA sampadyata iti kecidAhuH | anye punarAcAryyAstadArttavaM jarAyubhAvena pariNamatItyAhuH | tasminneva rakte sthite koSTha etAvaruddhe striyA nAbheradho romarAjiH pradurbhavati | tena romarAjyAstadeva jarAyoH sambandhi kAraNamuktam || 9 ||

 jarAyuCeSaM cordhvamasRkpratipadyate||10||  tasmAt pInakapolapayodharatA kRSNauSThacUcukatvaJca||10||

taddyArttavaM bahu jarAyubhAvena pratighAtAdUrdhvaM pratipannaM kapolayoH payodharayoCca pInatvaM sthaulyaM karotyoSThayoCcUcukayoCca stanamukhAkhyayoriti | tataCcordhvapratipannAdratatAdyat stanaprAptaM tattatsthAnasthitena CleSmaNA Cvetena kRtoparAgaM stanyatAM yAti || 10 ||
