 athAto garbhAvakrAntiM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtredayAdayo maharSayaH||1||

athAta ityAdi| atra garbhaCabdena manassaMygAccetanenAtmanAdhiSThitAnAM mahAbhUtAnAM vikAraviCeSa ucyate| tasyAvakramaNaM prAptiH svarUpalAbho yasminnadhyAye nirNIyate so~apyupacArAttacchebdenocyate|

 gate purANe rajasi nave~avasthite Cuddhe garbhasyACaye mArge ca bIjAtmanA CukramavikRtamavikRtena vAyunA preritamanyaiCca mahAbhUtairanugatamArttavenAbhimUrcchitamanvakSameva rAgAdikleCavaCAnuvartinA svakarmacoditena manojavena jIvenAbhisaMsRSTaM garbhACayamupayAti||2||

sA ca garbhasyAvakrAntiH gate purANa ityAdinA prastUyate| purANe~atIte karmataH saJcite rajasi duSTarakte gate vAyunA strIdehAdbahiH prerite RtorAdyadinatrayaM paCcAnnave sAmpratikamAsabhave~avasthite ArttavasaMjJe labdhapratiSThe sati Cuddhe ca garbhasyACaye doSAnupahate mArge ca Cuddhe yenAnupahataM CukraM kSetraM prApnoti| Cuddha rati rajasA sambadhyate| garbhACayamArgAbhyAM ca| CuddhiCca svAbhAvikyaupAdhikI ca| aupAdhikI dravyasaMskArakRtA| bIjAtmanA garbhakAraNamahAbhUtasvabhAvena aGgAdaGgAt preritamanyaiCca sUkSmasvarUpairmanaH sahacAribhistanmAtrAkhyairmahAbhUtairanugataM strIkSetraprAptyA karmavaCAdArttavena miCrIbhUtamanvakSaM miCrIbhAvAhInakAlameva rAgAdInAM vaCe yo~anuvarttate tathAvidhena manojavena jIvenAbhisaMsRSTaM prAptasaMyogaM gArbhACayaM CukramupayAti| rAgadveSAvidyAsmitAbhiniveCAH kleCAH| ete paJca mithyAjJAnAni| na pramANaM na cApramANaM viparyayamAtramiti kRtvA avidyA mUlaM kleCAnAM CeSANAm| sukhAnuCAyI rAgaH| tatprabheda eva dveSaH krodhaH| asmitA~abhiniveCau mohaCabdenoktau| tatra avidyA yA anitye pRthivyAdau nityabuddhiH| bIjagarbhavAsAdinA aCucau strICarIrAdau CucibuddhiH| duHkhe ca pariNAmatApAdibhirUpabhogasukhe sukhabuddhiH| anAtmani ca bAhyopakaraNabhAveSu CarIre cAtmabuddhiriti| Atmano buddheCcAbhedagraha asmitA| anubhUtasukhasya tatsmRtyA tatkAraNaprAptau gRddhI rAgaH| anubhUtaduHkhasya tadgrathaneSu tAtkAlikI jighAMsA dveSa iti kleCAH| avidyA cA~a~anAdiH| eSAM kleCAnAM vaCamanuvartate yo jIva AtmA sa tathoktaH CubhA~aCubhAni karmANi tAni cA~a~atmanaH| kleCamUlatvAt karmaNAm| amUni ca karmANi pacyamAnAni vipAkena sukhAsukhalakSaNena punaravidyAmeva puSNanti, ato~avicchinnena pravAheNa karmaphalAnurUpeSu yonyantareSvAtmano manaHprabhRtibhiH saMyogAnnityasyApi janmaCabdenocyate| manojavenetyAtmano niSkriyatvAnmanasA yuktasya kriyAvattvamiva darCayati| evambhUtaM CukraM garbhACayamupayAti|| 2||

 kAryANAM kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAt tatsvabhAvatAM pratipadyate||3||

tacca CukraM kAryyANAM kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAddhetostatsvabhAvatAM kAraNasAdRCyaM pratipadyate| kAryaM hi kAraNasya svarUpAnugacCati| tathA ca tilebhyastilA eva jAyante na mASAH| kAraNaM ca yad garbhasya mAtRpitRmahAbhUtadeCakAlagarbhACayamAtrAhAravihArAdikam| tasya kAraNasya svarUpAnugamanAd garbhasya tadAkRtyAdimataCca sambhavaH| ata eva kAraNavaCAdAkRtyAdivailakSaNyam|| 3||

 tata eva ca Cukrasya bAhulyAt pumAn Arttavasya bAhulyAt strI, tayoH sAmye napuMsakam||4||

ata eva ca kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAdeva puMskAraNasya Cukrasya bAhulyAt pumAn jAyate, raktasya tu yoSit | kAraNayoH sAmye napuMsakamiti || 4 ||

 CukrArttave~anilena khaNDaCo bhinne yathAvibhAgamapatyAnAmutpattiH||5||

miCrIbhUtaCca CukrArttavaM svaviCiSTahetuko~anilo yadA khaNDaCaH karoti, tadA bahUnAmapyapatyAnAM sambhavaH || 5 ||

 vikRte viyonyAkRtInAJca||6||

yadA tvanilo vA~anyo vA doSaH CukrArttavaM kenacit prakAreNa vikaroti, tadA vikRtayonInAM vikRtAkRtInAJca garbhANAM sambhavaH | vikRtayonayo ye yoSitaH puMsA saMsRSTAyAH mRgameSamArjArAdayo jAyante~ato vikRtAkRtayaH kANapaGgvAdayaH || 6 ||

 atha nAryyAH sadyogRhItagarbhAyACca liGgaM yonyA bIjagrahaNaM tRptirgarimA sphuraNaM CukrArttavayoranubandhaCca tathA praharSo hRllAsastandrA~aGgasAdaH praseko hRdayavyathA glAniH pipAsA ca||7||

atheti prastAve | yonyA bIjagrahaNAdikaM sadyogarbhAyAstatkAlaprAptagarbhAyA nAryyA lakSaNam | yonyA bIjasya Cukrasya grahaNaM prasravAbhAvaH | tRptiH prAptagarbhApekSayA ratAvanabhilASitA, CarIraprINanaM vA | gurutvamaGgasya tasyaiva sphuraNaM cAlanam | ananubandhanam garbhavidAraNAdinA pratibandhaH | hRdutkleCayuktaH praseka eva hRllAsaH || 7 ||

 krameNa tu vyaktagarbhAyAH kukSimAtragauravaM kSAmanetrasvaratA yoniromasaMlulanaM nidrA jRmbhaNaM mUrcchA chardiraruciH pAdaCopho~amle~abhilASasteSu teSu ca uccAvaceSu bhAveSviti||8||

kAlakrameNa vyaktagarbhAyAH krameNaiva kukSigAtrAdigauravAdilakSaNam | krameNeti | 

yathA-yathA pravardhate tathA-tathA kukSigauravAdayo bhavanti | kSAmaCabdo netrasvarAbhyAM ca sambadhyate | yoniromNIJca saMlulanaM calanam | yoniromNAM vA saMlulanaM vyAlolatA | teSu teSvanukteSvapi svakalpiteSu nAnAvidheSUccAvaceSvaniyateSu bhAveSvAhAravihArAdyupayogiSvabhilASa iti vyaktagarbhAyA liGgam | vyaktaH sphuTo nAtisampUrNo garbho yasyAH || 8 ||

 tasyACca rajovAhinAM srotasAM vartmAnyuparudhyante garbheNa||9||  tasmAt tataH paramArttavaM na dRCyate||9||  tatastadadhaH pratihatamaparamaparaM copacIyamAnamaparetyAhuH, jarAyurityanye||9||  sthite rakte romarAjiH prAdurbhavati||9||

tasyACca vyaktagarbhAyA rajovahAni srotAMsi yaiH srotobhirmalabhUtaM raktamRtukAlaM bahirvahati teSAM vartmAni mArgANi mukhAni garbheNa naikAhAdAcchAdyante | tasmAt kAraNAt tataH garbhasya vyaktIbhAvAt paramArttavaM na pravarttate | yattu kadAcid dRCyate tadvaikRtam | tadaiva cArttavamadho gamane garbheNa pratihatamAhArapariNAmAcca pratidinamupacIyamAnaM garbhasyACaya evAparA garbhaCayyA~a~akhyA sampadyata iti kecidAhuH | anye punarAcAryyAstadArttavaM jarAyubhAvena pariNamatItyAhuH | tasminneva rakte sthite koSTha etAvaruddhe striyA nAbheradho romarAjiH pradurbhavati | tena romarAjyAstadeva jarAyoH sambandhi kAraNamuktam || 9 ||

 jarAyuCeSaM cordhvamasRkpratipadyate||10||  tasmAt pInakapolapayodharatA kRSNauSThacUcukatvaJca||10||

taddyArttavaM bahu jarAyubhAvena pratighAtAdUrdhvaM pratipannaM kapolayoH payodharayoCca pInatvaM sthaulyaM karotyoSThayoCcUcukayoCca stanamukhAkhyayoriti | tataCcordhvapratipannAdratatAdyat stanaprAptaM tattatsthAnasthitena CleSmaNA Cvetena kRtoparAgaM stanyatAM yAti || 10 ||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhAvakrAntiH

 stanACrayameva ca kaphoparaJjitaM stanyatAmupagataM prasUtAyAM punarAhArarasenApyAyate||11||

yattat stanyatAM yAtaM prasUtAyA AhArarasenApi avidagdhena prabhAvAdApyAyate AsaMskArakSayAdyena prasUtAyA bhAvi stanyaM niyatakAlaM bhavati || 11 ||

 tatra prathame mAse kalalaM jAyate||12||  dvitIye ghanaH peCyarbudaM vA||12||  tebhyaH kramAt puMstrInapuMsakAni||12||  tRtIye paJcadhA prarohati||12||  tadyathA-- sakthinI, bAhU, CiraCca||12||  sakthyAdi prarohaikakAlameva ca sarvamaGgA~a~avayavondriyANi yugapat sambhavantyanyatra janmottarakAlajebhyo dantAdibhyaH||12||  krameNa tu sphuTIbhavanti||12||  eSA prakRtiH||12||  vikRtirato~anyathA||12||

ato~anantaraM garbhasyA~a~aprasavamavasthAdikaM pradarCyate | tatra prathame mAse kalalaM krameNa bhavati | kalale gRhItakAThinyam | dvitIye tu mAse kAThinyakrameNa yadA pumAn sampadyate tadA ghano bhavati | ghano nAtidIrghaparivRtto mAMsaprAyaH | yadA tu strI sampadyate tadA peCI caturasrA bhavati | yadA tu napuMsakaM tadArbudaM parivRttaM bhavati | tRtIye tu mAse ghanaH peCI vArbudaM vA sAmAnyena garbhaH paJcadhA prarohati | adhikaraNavicAle ca iti 'dhA' pratyayaH | dve sakthinI, dvau bAhU, CiraCca paJcamaH | sakthyAdiprarohasamAnakAlameva sarvAGgA~a~avayavAnAmindriyANAM ca sambhavaH | aGgaM CarIraM tasyA~a~avayavA aGgAvayavAH | sarve ca te~aGgAvayavAstathoktAH | ekakAlaCabdena bAhvAdisamAnakAlatvamucyate | yugapacchabdena parasparaikakAlatvam | janmottarakAlabhAvinAM romadantAdInAmaGgAvayavatvena tatkAlAsambhavatrirdhAraNam | te hi dantAdayo jAtasya jAyanta iti | tAni cA~a~avayavendriyANi daCasu mAseSu garbhasya sphuTIbhavanti | eSA prakRtirato~anyathA vikRtirjJeyA | tenaitaduktaM bhavati- upaghAtakAdyabhAva eSa sambhavakramaH | yadA tu lakSyeNopaghAtakAraNaprAptistadA tadAnurUpyeNaiva vilakSaNA vikRtiH | yathoktakramavaiparItye vikRtirucyata ityanyathArthaH || 12 ||

 yathAsvaM ca garbhasya puMstrInapuMsakAnyatamaliGgAnurUpA bhAvA manasi CarIre ca santiSThante||13||  vaiCeSikaliGgasaGkare tu yato bhUyastvaM tato~antarA bhAvAH||13||

nanu dvitIye ghanaH peCyarbudaM vA puMstrInapuMsakAkhyaM jAyata iti tatra heturna jJAyate | kena hetunA sadRCairapi karacaraNAdibhiraGgAvayavaiH stryAdikRto garbhasya viCeSo bhavatItyata Aha- yathAsvamityAdi | yathAsvaM pratyAtma | garbhasyAnyatamaliGgasyAnurUpAbhAvAH manasi CarIre ca santiSThante | tenaitaduktaM bhavati- garbhasya sambhavamata eva svakarmahetukA bhIrutvAdayo manasyadhogurutvAdayaCca CarIre santiSThante | ye strInapuMsakahetavasta eva klaibyAdhogurutvAdayaH stryAkhyaM viCeSamArabhante | aklaibyAdhogurutvAdayaH pumAkhyamubhayasamatvena napuMsakamiti | atasteSAM vaiCeSikaguNatvam | atasteSAJca vaiCeSikANAM liGgAnAM klaibyabhIrutvAdInAM strIpuMsakAraNAnAM saGkare miCrIbhAve yato bhUyastvameSAmeva vaiCeSikANAM prabhUtatvaM tato~anyatarA bhAvAstaireva bhUyobhirantatasya striyA puruSasya vA bhAvaH | ubhayeSAmapi bhUyastve napuMsakasyeti || 13 ||

 tadyathA- klaibyaM bhIrutvamavaiCAradyaM moho~anavasthAnamadhoguruvamasaMhAnaM CaithilyaM mArddavaM garbhACayabIjabhAgastathAyuktACcApare strIkarA bhAvAH||14||  tato viparItAH puMskarAH||14||  saGkIrNA napuMsakakarAH||14||

nanu ke te bhAvAH stryAdyanyatamaliGgArUpA ityAha- tadyathetyAdi | klaibyAdayo manodharmAH | adhogurutvAdayaCca CarIradharmAH | strIkarA bhAvAH karmahetukAH ye te stryAkhyaM viCeSamabhinirvarttayanti | tulyeSvapi karaNAdiSu klaibyaM nistejatvAt | buddheravaiCAradyaM maugdhyam | moho~asamyagjJAnam | anavasthAnaM calacittatvam | iti manaH saMCrayAH strIkarA bhAvAH | adhogurutvaM paCcimakAyabhAgagauravam | asaMhananaM mAMsAsthisandhyAdInAmAsthitiniviSTatvam | CaithilyamanibiDAvayavadehatvam | mArdavaM CithilasyApi vastrAderdRCyate | garbhACayakAraNo bIjabhAgo mAtRsaMbhavo yenotpadyamAne strICarIre garbhACayAkhyo~antaravayavaH sampadyate | tathAyuktAH strIsambhAvino~apare yonistanAdibIjabhAgAH | stanAdInAmuttarakAlabhavitvasya samartho bIjabhAgo yogyakAlapratIkSo~adRCyamAno~apyasattvena na vijJeya iti CArIrAH striyAH strIkarAbhAvAH | eta eva manaHCarIrACrayA bhAvA yathAkramaM vaiparItye puMstvena vyAkhyeyAH | saGkIrNAH sAmyen miCrIbhUtA napuMsakakarA ityAdi || 14 ||

 tadA cAsya vedanA pravyaktA bhavati||15||  tataCca tatprabhRti spandate~abhilASaM paJcendriyArtheSu karoti||15||

asya ca garbhasya tadA tRtIye mAse vedanA cetanA pravyaktA sphuTA bhavati | tato~anntarameva svecchayA spandate | indriyArtheSu abhilASaM karoti || 15 ||

 mAtRjaM hyasya hRdayaM tadrasahAriNIbhirdhamanIbhirmAtRhRdayenAbhisambaddhaM bhavati||16||  tasmAttayostAbhiH CraddhA sampadyate||16||  tathA ca dvihRdayAM nArIM daurhRdinImityAcakSate||16||

asminneva ca kAle nArI daurhRdinI bhavati | daurhRdinI dvihRdayA kathamityAha- mAtRjamityAdi | asya garbhasya mAtRjaM hRdayaM bhavati | mAturbIjabhAgena mRdunA ArttavAkhyena jAyate | tacca garbhahRdayaM rasavAhIbhirnADIbhirmAtRhRdayena sambaddhaM bhavati | tena garbhasyecchayA mAtA vyApyate mAtuCca garbha iti | ato mAtA dvihRdayA tRtIyamAsyucyate || 16 ||

 anye tu pakSatrayAt prabhRtyApaJcamAt mAsAt daurhRdakAlamAhuH||17||

anye punarAcAryyA garbhagrahaNAdgate pakSatraye yAvaccaturtho mAso niSpannastAvaddaurhRdakAlamAhuH || 17 ||

 prArthanAyAJca tIvrAyAM kAmamahitamapyasyai hitopasahitaM dadyAt||18||

asmiMCca daurhRde garbhiNyAH prArthanAyAM nAnAvidhe AhAre pathye yadi prArthanA bhavati tattadAnImeva dadyAt | ahite punaryadi prArthanA bhavati tato~anyena hitenopahitaM miCraM tattasyai pradadyAt || 18 ||

 daurhRdavimAnanAddhi vAyuH prakupito~antaHCarIramanucaran garbhasya vinACaM vairUpyaM vA kuryyAt||19||

anyathA daurhRdasya vimAnanAt prArthanAbhaGgAdasaumyatvAdvAyuH kupito~antaHCarIraM paribhraman garbhasya vinACaM karoti vairUpyaM vA karoti || 19 ||

 labdhadaurhRdA tu vIryyavantaJcirAyuSaJca putraM prasUte||20||

yadA punardaurhRde prArthitaM labhate tadA sA labdhadaurhRdA vIryyavantaM cirAyuSaM ca putraM sUte || 20 ||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhAvakrAntiH

 caturthe~aGgapratyaGgavibhAgaH pravyakto garbhaCca sthiro bhavati||21||

caturthe mAsi sarvAvayavAnAM sphuTatA, vyaktiH sthairyyaJca garbhasya bhavati || 21 ||

 paJcame manaH pratibuddhataraM bhavati mAMsaCoNitopacayaCca||22||

anyat subodham || 22 ||

 SaSThe keCaromanakhAsthisnAyvAdInyabhivyaktAni balavarNopacayaCca||23||  saptame sarvAGgasampUrNatA||23||

sugamam || 23 ||

 aSTame garbhaCca mAtRto garbhataCca mAtA rasahAriNIbhirvAhinIbhirmuhurojaH parasparamAdadAte||24||  tasmAttadA garbhiNI muhurmuditA bhavati muhurglAnA tathA garbhaH||24||

aSTame mAsi tAbhirubhayalagnAbhI rasavahAbhirnADIbhirojaH pratikSaNaM dvayoH CarIrayoH prabhAvAdvAtavaCAcca saJcarati | yatra ca tadojastiSThati tatra CarIre harSo bhavatyanyatra glAniH || 24 ||

 evaM garbhasya janma vyApattimattadA bhavatyojaso~anavasthitatvAt||25||  tathA hyasya niSkramaNonmukhasya parivarttanAdInyanubhavata evaujasA viyogaH||25||  yadyapi ca kiJcitkAlamasyocchvasanaM syAttacchinnasyevAGgasyaujaH saMskArAnuvRttikRtam||25||  jananyAstu sthiraujaskatayaikadeCena rase saMkrAnte glAnireveti||25||

tatra mAtRCarIraM gate ojasi yadi garbhaM prasUte tadA sa jAto vinaCyati | yattu kiJcit svalpamevojo bhavati tanniSkramaNakleCena kSayaM yAti | yattu kiJcitkAlamucchvasanaM bhavati tadojaH saMskArAt | yathA chitrasyAGgasya calanam | yadA garbhaCarIraM prApte ojasi garbho niSkrAmati tadA ojasaH sadbhAvAt jAto jIvatyatra mAtA yataH sthiraujaskA bhavatyataH sA kevalaM glAnA bhavati, na tu vipadyate | tasyAstu sambandhina ojasastokamAtraM garbhaCarIraM saMkrAmati || 25 ||

 anye punarAhuH||26||  naiRtabhAgatvAttatra garbhasya maraNam||26||

anye punarAcAryyAH suCrutAdayastatrASTame mAse nair-RtabhAgatvAt bhUtAvasaratvAt tasya kAlasya garbhasya maraNamAhuH | na tvojaso~anavasthAnAt || 26 ||

 tasmAt prasavapratiSedhArthaM strI snAtA, CucirbrahmacAriNI, devatArAdhanamaparA syAt||27||  mAMsaudanabaliM cAtra nirvapeta||27||

tasmAnnair-RtabhAgatvAttasya kAlasya pratiSedhArthaM bhUyo me prasavo na bhUyAditi kRtvA garbhiNI strI snAnAdiyuktA satI devArAdhanaparA syAt | teSAJca nair-RtAnAM mAMsodanAdikaM balipalalapiSTAdikaM nirvapet || 27 ||

 tasminnekadivasAtikrAntep prasavakAlamAhurAsaMvatsarAt||28||  ataH paraM vikArI bhavati||28||

asmiMstvaSTame mAse ekadivasAtikrAntep prasavakAlamAhuH | ekadivasamatikrAnto yaH sa tathoktaH | yAvadgarbhagrahaNAt saMvatsaraM tAvannavamAnmAsAt prabhRti caturmAsaM prasavakAlamAhuH | saMvatsarAt pare ca trayodaCAdiSu mAseSu antaHsthito garbho vikAritvaM bhajate || 28 ||

 garbhastu mAtuH pRSThAbhimukho lalATe kRtAJjaliH saGkucitAGgo garbhakoSThe dakSiNapArCvamACrityAvatiSThate pumAn, vAmaM strI, madhyaM napuMsakam||29||

sa ca garbho yAvat jaThare tiSThati tAvadevaM tiSThati, evaJca niSkrAmatIti pradarCanArthamAha-- garbhastvityAdi | sarvo garbho mAtR-pRSThAbhimukho lalATe kRtAJjalistiSThati saGkucitairaGgaiH | sa ca yadA puMvyaJjanastadA garbhakoSThasya dakSiNaM pArCvamACritya tiSThati | strIvyaJjano vAmaM madhyaM napuMsakamiti | subodhamanyat || 29 ||

 tatra sthitaCca garbho mAtari svapatnyAM svapiti prabuddhAyAM prabuddhyate||30||  paratantravRtteCca garbhasya||30||  niSekAt prabhRti garbhACayopasnehopasvedau vartanam||30||

paratantravRttairmAtRparAyattavRttitvAt | dvau tu garbhACayasambandhinAvupasnehopasvedau vartanam | upasnehaH snigdhatvam | upasveda utkledaH | tau cAhArAyattau | subodhamanyat || 30 ||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhAvakrAntiH

 tato vyaktIbhavadaGgapratyaGgasyA~asya nAbhyAM pratibaddhA nADI nADyAmaparA tasyAM mAtRhRdayam||31||  tato mAtRhRdayAdAhAraraso dhamanIbhiH syandamAno~aparAmupaiti||31||  tataH kramAnnAbhim||31||  tataCca sapunargarbhasya pakvACaye svakAyAgninA pacyamAnaH prasAdabAhulyAddhAtvAdipuSTikaraH sampadyate||31||  tathA romakUpairupasneho rasa eva ca payobhUtaH||31||

tasya ca garbhasya krameNa vyaktIbhavadaGgapratyaGgasya satastanmAturAhArasAro rasAkhyo dhAtuH puSTikaraH sampadyate | kathamityAha-- nAbhyAmiti | garbhasya nAbhyAM pratisambaddhA nADI bhavati, tasyAM nADyAM pratibaddhA pUrvoktAparA tasyAM pratibaddhaM mAtRhRdayam | tatra mAtuH sambandhyAhArarasastaddhRdayalagnA dhamanIH prApnoti | tAbhirdhamanIbhiH sruto~aparAM prApnoti | tato nAbhipratibaddhanADIkrameNa nAbhimanuprApto garbhasya kAyAgnisthAnamanuprAptastena kAyAgninA pacyamAnaH sasAraH svalpop prasAdabAhulyAddhetordhAtupuSTikaraH sampadyate | asya hyAhAraH saro bhavati | garbhaCarIraM tu sarva eva sAraH prApnotIti prasAdabAhulyam | tathA garbhACayasyApi snehogarbhasya romakUpaiH praviSTo dhAtuH puSTikaraH sampadyate | tathA garbhasya jAtasyApi sa eva mAturAhArarasaH payobhUto dhAtupuSTikaraH sampadyate || 31 ||

 ajAtasya sAkSAdannapAnAnupraveCAdamalatvAcca rasasya garbhasya sthUlamalAsambhavaH||32||

garbhasya tu jaTharasthasya sthUlAnAM malAnAM mUtrapurISAdInAmasambhavaH sAkSAdannapAnAnanupraveCAddhetoH | yaCca praviCati rasaH so~amalaH prasAdarUpatvAdityarthaH || 32 ||

 evaM jaTharastho garbho janmakAle tu prasUtimArutayogAt parivRttyA~avAkCirA niSkrAmatyanu cAparA cyutA mAtRhRdayAt||33||  eSA prakRtiH||33||  vikRtirato~anthA||33||

evamanantaroktena prakAreNa jaTharastho garbhaH prasUtivaCAt pRSThAbhimukhatvAt parivRtya nAbhyAbhimukho bhUtvA~avAkCirA niSkrAmati AvAkCirA adhomukhaH | anu ca garbhe niSkrAnte aparA niSkrAmati | eSA anantaroktA prakRtiH ato yathoktAdanyathA vikRtiH tenaitaduktaM bhavati-- yathA garbhasambhavAdanantaramAprasavaM yathoktAkAratvena garbhasya sthAnaM prakRtirucyate | ato vaiparItyAd vikRtiratastatra yadvidheyaM tadvakSyAmaH || 33 ||

 tatra yA dakSiNaM pAdaM pUrvamabhisarati dakSiNaCca bAhurbalavAMstena ceSTate tatstane ca prAk payo dRCyate~abhyunnatadakSiNakukSiH parimaNDalagarbhA punnAmadarCanasparCApraCnadaurhRdAbhiratA punnAmadheyAMCca svapnAt paCyati prasannamukhavarNA tIkSNakSudUrdhvaromarAjiH puruSAnabhilASiNI ca sA putraM prasUte||34||  tadviparyyaye kanyAm||34||  saGkare ca napuMsakam||34||  praCnakAle nArI yalliGgamaGgaM bAhyadravyaM vA parAmRCati talliGgamasyA garbhamAdiCet||34||

anantaraM puMstrInapuMsakAnAM garbhasthAnAM puMsavanAdiphalajJAnAya bhiSajaCca pratipattaye krameNa lakSaNamucyate- tatra yA dakSiNamityAdi | yA strI dakSiNaM pAdaM pUrvamabhisaratyabhisaraNakAle sA putraM sUta iti sambandhaH | tadityanena sarvatra dakSiNaCabdasya parAmarCaH | parimaNDalaH sarvataH samaH | pu@mlliGganAmno bhAvAt jhaTiti svapne paCyati | punnAmabhireva yatkiJcit pRcchati | punnAmni daurhRde~abhilASaM karoti | mukhavarNayoH prasannatvaM bubhukSAyAstIkSNatvam | romarAjyA nAbheradhobhavAyA UrdhvatvamUrdhvAbhimukhatvam | garbhiNI satI puruSagamanAya nAbhilaSatIti | etadvaiparItye na duhitaraM prasUta iti vyAkhyeyam | tatra dakSiNaCabdasthAne vAmaCabdaprayogaH | punnAmasthAne strICabdaprayogaH | parimaNDalasthAne dIrghaCabdanyAsaH | tIkSNe mandaCabdaH | UrdhvasthAne adhaHCabdaH | puruSAnabhilASaCabde hitatvamityevamAdi sarvaM yojyam | ubhayaliGgasaGkare miCrIbhAve napuMsako vijJeyaH | viruddhayormiCrIbhAvetUbhayacchAyAgrahaNena tayoCca kramayaugapadyam | yathAsambhavaM vyAkhyeyam | praCnakAle yasmin kAle bhiSajo garbhaprasavAya kaCcit pRcchati kiMliGgo garbhaH prasoSyat iti | subodhamanyat || 34 ||

 yadA tUnmArgago vAtogarbhasya rasavAhInI srotAMsi CoSayati tadA vAtarogI hInAGgo vA jAyate||35||  bahUni vA varSANyudare tiSThati||35||

yadA tvityAdinA vegadhAraNena vAtakopAt paripoSakarasakSayAddoSasambhavadarCanaM garbhaCarIre bhavatItyucyate | vAyurunmArgagaH svamArgaM tyaktvA~anyamArgato garbhasya rasavAhisrotAMsi CoSayati tadA taiH CuSyadbhiH CarIre raso na vahatyato vAtarogI hInAGgo vA jAyate aparipUrNatvAd bahUn varSAnudare tiSThati || 35 ||

 yada strIpuMsayoH samamevArtho niSpadyate||36||  bIjaM vA tayoH samAMCaM sammukhaM ca||36||  yadA ca bIjaM bhAge duSyati tadA dviprakRtidviritA napuMsakaM bhavati||36||

yadA tu ratikAle strIpuMsayoH samamekakAlamartho ratisamAptilakSaNo niSpadyate | anayoH strIpuMsayoH sambandhi bIjaM vA samabhAgaM bhavati sammukhaM caikyarUpeNa | yadA ca tasmin strIbhUtaM bIjaM garbhasya bIjArambhake bhAge duSyati yenaikarUpatA puMviCeSeNa yoSidviCeSeNa vA garbhabIjasya na sampadyate tasmiMstrIpuruSabIjabhAge kenApi doSakopakAraNena duSTe dviH prakRtireko~apyubhayasvarUpo dviretA napuMsako bhavati | strIkAryyamapi stokaM sAdhayati puMskAryyamapi na pumAnityarthaH || 36 ||

 yadA strI prathamaM kRtArthA bhavati, tataH puruSeNa paCcAt CukramutsRSTaM harSAnavasthitacetasaH striyA vAto viguNIkaroti||37||  puMstvavAhIni srotAMsi copahanti tadA vAtendriyaM bhavati||37||  tanmaithune vAtamevotsRjati||37||

yadA tu strI ratau puMsaH pUrvaM kRtArthA samprAptaratyavasAnA bhavati, tato~asyAH striyAH paCcAt puMsA CukramutsRSTaM bhavati | ratikAlabhUtena harSeNAnavasthitacetasaH satyA ata eva kAraNAdvAto duSTaH tacchukraM paCcAdutsRSTaM viguNIkaroti | garbhaCukrabIjabhAge vikRtimApAdayatyasya garbhasya ca sa vAtaH pustvavahAni CukravahAni srotAMsi copahanti | tadA jAto napuMsako vAtendriyo nAmnA bhavati | sa striyA saGgato CukravanmeDhreNa vAtamevotsRjati || 37 ||

 yadA tu kArtsnyena nopahantyanupaghnanneva vA srotomukhaM pidhatte tadA saMskAravAhyaM bhavati||38||  tatra saMskAro vAjIkarA bastayo~abhyavahAraCcetoharSaNAni ca||38||  tAni hi Cukre balamAdadhAnAni srotAMsyasyApyAyayantIti ca||38||

yadA tvanantaroktaM CukraM vAto duSTaH kArtsnyena nopahanti | kiJcidupahantyanupaghnan vA srotomukhaM pidhatta eva na CoSayati tadA saMskAravAhyo nAmnA napuMsako bhavati | saMskAreNa vAjIkaraNAdinA strIgamanAya saMbAhyata ityarthaH || 38 ||

 yadApabIjo~apabalaH pumAnudvegaH strIdveSayukto~anyakAmo vA nAryyA vyavAyapratighAtaM karoti tadvidhA vA nArI puMsaH||39||  tadA~a~asekyaM nAma bhavati||39||  tacchukrAsvAdAd dhvajocchrAyaM labhate||39||

yadA~alpabIjatvAdiyuktaH pumAMstriyA vyavAyapratighAtaM ratyavasAnavinACaM karoti tadA~a~asekyo nAma napuMsako bhavati | sa svamanyabhavaM vA CukraM mukhe AsicyAsvAdanAd dhvajasya meDhrasyocchrAyaM labhate | yadi vAlpabIjatvAdiyuktA strI puMso vyavAyapratighAtaM karoti tadA~apyA~a~asekyo bhavati || 39 ||

 yadA punarubhAvapi bhavataH strIpuMsau tadvidhau tadA vakradhvajo bhavati||40||  tasya naiva dhvajaH stabhyate||40||

yadA tUbhAvapi strIpuMsAvalpabIjatvAdiyuktau bhavataH parasparaJca vyavAyapratighAtaM kurutastadA vakradhvajo nAma napuMsako bhavati | yo vakreNaiva dhvajena vartate na tvasya mehanaM stabhyate iti || 40 ||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhAvakrAntiH

 yadA pUtiyonyAH striyA garbho bhavati, tadA saugandhikAkhyaM sa yonidhvajagandhena balaM labhate||41||

yadA pUtiyonyabhidhAnayonivyApatsaMyuktAyAH striyA garbho bhavati, tadA sa garbhaH saugandhikAkhyo napuMsako bhavati | sa svalabdhena dhvajagandhena yonigandhena vA strIgamane balaM labhate || 41 ||

 yadA tvIrSyAbhibhUtau mandaharSau saMsRjyete taderSyA ratisaMjJam||42||  tasya paraM mithunIbhUtaM dRSTvA maithunapravRttirbhavati||42||

yadA punardvAvapi strIpuMsau parasparamIrSyayA balavatyAbhibhUtau saMsRjyete taderSyAratirnAmnA napuMsako bhavati | sa parasya maithunaM dRSTvA tadIrSyA maithune pravRttiM labhate || 42 ||

 yadA puruSasya garbhasya vAyvAgnidoSAd vRSaNanACastadA vAtaSaNDakAkhyaM bhavati||43||  etAH karmavaicitryAdaSTau SaNDayonayo~asaGkIrNAH kathitAH||43||

yadA garbhasya sambhavakAle vAyunA USmaNA ca vRSaNanACaH kriyate tadA vAtaSaNDakAkhyaM napuMsakaM bhavati | vAtena SaNDako vAtaSaNDakaH | etA aSTau SaNDAnAM yonayo~asaGkIrNAH pRthagbhUtAH SaNDabhUtA ityarthaH | AsAM ca CukrANAM karmaNAM pUrvajanmakRtA tAM vaicitryAt sambhava iti || 43 ||

 yadA tu striyAH CoNitagarbhACayau doSAH kiJcit pradUSayanti tadA yo garbho bhavati, tasya garbhasya yasya yasya mAtRjasyAvayavasya bIje bIjAMCe vA doSaH prakopamApadyate taM tamavayavaM vikRtirAviCati||44||

anantaraM strIpuruSagarbhAvasthAyAM bIjadoSAdye viCeSA bhavanti te yadA tvityAdinocyante | yadA tu striyA mAtuH CoNitaM bIjopayogi garbhACayaM vA doSA vAtAdayaH svakAraNairduSTA dUSayanti tadA te sAkalyena vA dUSayanti aMCena vA | yadA tu sAkalyena dUSayanti tadA garbhasya sambhava eva na bhavati | yadA punaH kiJciddUSayanti tadA CoNitakAraNasya strIgarbhasya viCiSTeSvavayaveSu garbhACayAdiSu ye kAraNabIjabhUtA bIjAMCAsteSAmaMCAnAM kadAcit sAkalyena dUSaNaM kurvanti bhAgena vA | tenobhayarUpeNa bIjAMCadUSaNena strIgarbhasya vikRtirutpadyate | evamuktamanena | yathA CoNitagarbhACayayorduSTayoH strIgarbhasya yo mAtRjo~avayavaH CoNitakAraNo garbhACayaraktAdistasyAvayavasya yo bIjAMCo mAtRCoNitabhAgastasya yasmin yasminnaMCe vA doSo vAtAdiH prakopamApadyate taM taM CoNitakAraNamavayavaM garbhACayAdyaM dUSaNAnurUpeNa vikRtirbhaviSyadgarbhagrahaNa AviCati | etadeva yadA hItyAdinA vibhAgena darCayati || 44 ||

 yadA hyasyAH CoNitAkhye bIje garbhACayasthe nirvartakaM bIjaM praduSyati tadA vandhyAM janayati||45||

strIgarbhe garbhACaye nirvartake striyAH CoNitAkhye bIjabhAge sAkalyena duSTe vandhyA strI jAyate || 45 ||

 yadA tasyAvayavastadA pUtiprajAm||46||  tasyA jAtaM jAtaM mriyate||46||

yadA tvasAkalyena tadA pUtiprajA jAyate | tasyA jAtaM jAtaM mriyate | liGgaviCeSeNa napuMsakam | pUtiH klinnA kSINAprajA yasyAH sA tathoktA || 46 ||

 yadA punaH so~avayavaH strIkarANAM ca CarIrasaMCrayANAmadhogurutvAdInAM nirvartakA ye bIjAMCAsteSAmekadeCaH||47||  tadA stryAkRtiprAyAmastriyaM vArtAM nAma janayati||47||  tAM strIvyApadamAcakSate||47||

yadA punaH so~avayava anantaroktabIjabhAgAvayavaH pUrvoktAnAM cAdhogurutvAdInAM bhAvAnAM ye nirvartakAbhAvAsteSAM ya ekadeCastaduSTyA mAtA vArtA nAma striyaM janayati | yA stryAkRtibAhulyAt strI, strIkAryyAkaraNAccAstrI | tasyACca strIvyApaditi nAma || 47 ||

 evameva puMso yadA CukrAkhye bIje bIjaM praduSyatItyAdi yojayedvandhyaM pUtiprajaM tathA puruSAkRtiprAyamapuruSaM tRNamukhinaM nAma janayatItyena mAtRjAnAM pitRjAnAM cAvayavAnAM vikRtirvyAkhyAtA||48||

evameva yathA striyAH CoNitAkhye bIje garbhACayasya nirvartakaM bIjamityuktaM tathaiva ca puMsaH CukrACayanirvartakaM praduSyatItyAdi yojyam | tena vandhyAvadvandhyo yo garbhastaM janayati | pUtiprajAvat pUtiprajo yasmAjjAtaMjAtaM priyate | vArtAvattRNamukhI | yaH puruSAkRtiprAyatvAt puruSakAryAkaraNAccApuruSa iti | etena mAtRpitRjA~avayavadoSA vyAkhyAtAH || 48 ||

 anena sAtmyajAnAM rasajAnAM sattvajAnAM cAvayavAnAM vikRtirvyAkhyAtA bhavati||49||  yasya-yasyAGgAvayavasya bIje bIjAMCe vA upataptirbhavati tasya-tasyAGgAvayavasya vikRtirupajAyate||49||  nopajAyate~anutApAt||49||

anena sAtmyarasasattvajAnAmavayavAnAM doSavikRtirvyakhyAtA bhavati | kAraNasAmAnyAt sAtmyajAnAmAyurArogyAdInAmaGgavibhAge vakSyamANAnAM rasajAnAJca kRtsnadehasambhavAdInAm | sattvajAnAM CaucAdInAmadravyANAmupacaryyate | tenaitaduktam bhavati-- rasasya nAnAvidhayA duSTyA tatkAryyANAmapi garbhe tadanuguNaiva vikRtirbhavati | evaM sAtmyAsAtmyayorapi vAcyam | api ca bIjabhAgopatApAd garbhAvayavAnAM vikRtirbhavati | etadAha- yasya yasyetyAdi | subodham || 49 ||

 yadA ca labdhagarbhA~anvakSameva vAtalAnyAsevate tadA~asyA vAyuH prakupitaH CarIramanusarpan garbhACaye~avatiSThamAno garbhasya jaDa-badhira-mUka-minmiNa-gadgad-khaJja-kubja-vAmana-hInAGgAdhikAGgatvAnyanyaM vA vAtavikAraM karoti||50||

labdhagarbhA vA~anvakSaM nirantaraM yadA vAtalAnyA~a~asevate tadA~asyA vAyuH prakupitaH CarIropasarpaNena garbhACayAnuprapto garbhasya jaDabadhiratvAdInanyAMCca yathA hetuvAtavikArAn karotyevaM pittalAnyAsevamAnAyA pittaM khalatyAdIni CleSmA kuSThAdIni | trivargasannipAto miCrAnanantaroktAn vAtapittakaphajAn | jaDaH stokaCrutiH badhiro~aCrutiH | mUko vAgrahitaH | minmiNo~anunAsikabhASI | gadgado ghargharasvaraH | khaJjaH ekapAt | tathA hInAGgo~adhikAGgo vA || 50 ||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhAvakrAntiH

 tathA vAyuvat pittamapi khalita-palita-CmaCru-hInatA-tvaG-nakha-keCa-paiGgalyAdIni||51||

khalitanirlomaCirastvam | palitaM Cvetalomatvam | CmaCruhInatA niHCmaCrutvam | tvagAdInAM paiGgalyena sambandhaH | AdigrahaNena pittavikArANAM sambandhaH || 51 ||

 CleSmA tu kuSThakilAsasadantattvAdIni||52||  trivargo miCrAn vikArAn||52||

sadantatvaM garbha eva dantajanma | AdigrahaNena CleSmavikArANAM grahaNam || 52 ||

 api ca-- dRSTibhAgamapratipannaM tejo jAtyandhatvam||53||  tadeva vAtAnugataM vikRtarUkSAruNAkSam||53||  pittAnugataM piGgAkSam||53||  CleSmAnugataM CuklAkSam||53||  raktAnugataM raktAkSam iti||53||

api ceti vikRtiprasaGgasamuccaye | garbhasya dRSTibhAgaM yadi tejo na pratipadyate dRSTAdRSTAt kAraNAttadA jAtyandho jAtaye | tadeva tejo vAtAnugataM dRSTibhAgaM pratipannaM vikRtarUkSAruNAkSaM janayati | pittAdau tejo~anuvartate | anyat subodham || 53 ||

 garbhasamAnayogakSemA hi garbhiNI bhavati||54||  tasmAdviCeSatastAM priyahitAbhyAM garbhopaghAtakarebhyo rakSet||54||

prastutasya garbhasya vikRtiryathA na bhavati tathocyate | garbhasamAnayogakSemA hi yato garbhiNI bhavati tatastAM priyahitaiH karaNabhUtairvakSyamANebhyo garbhavighAtakarebhyo bhAvebhyo rakSet || 54 ||

 yathA-yathA ca garbho vRddhimApnoti tathA-tathA bhArAhArAnAdAnAdAhArarasApahArAcca striyA balakSayaH||55||

yathAkramaM ca garbhiNyA garbhabhAreNA~a~ahArAnAdAnAt garbheNa cAhArarasApahArAd balakSayo bhavatyayo balaM pAlayediti tAtparyyArthaH | anyat subodham || 55 ||

 tatreme garbhopaghAtakarAH||56||  tadyathA-- vyavAyavyAyAmakarCanAbhighAtAtimAtrasaMkSobhiyAnayAnarAtrijAgaraNadivAsvapnavegavidhAraNAjIrNAtapAgnikrodhaCokabhayotrAsopravAsotkaTakaviSamakaThinAsanaCvabhrakUpapAtApriyAvalokanaCravaNAdayaH||56||  samAsataH sarvamatigurUSNatIkSNarUkSamannapAnaM dAruNACca ceSTAH||56||

yAnaCabdena vAhanAbhidheyena saha saMkSobhiCabdasya samAsaM kRtvA tena saha kriyAvacanasya yAnaCabdasya samAsaH | AsanaCabda utkaTakAdibhiH prapAtaCabdaH CvabhrakUpAbhyAm | apriyaCabdo~avalokanaCravaNAbhyAm | AdiCabdena sarveSAM mithyAyogAdInAM grahaNam | samAsataH saMkSepeNocyate | atigurutIkSNatvAdiyuktamannapAnaM dAruNACca duHkhACceSTA garbhopaghAtakarAH || 56 ||

 tathA-- devatArakSo~anupacayaparirakSaNArthaM na raktAni vAsAMsi dhArayenna yAnamadhirohenna madyamAsamaCnIyAt||57||  yaccAnyadapi vRddhastriyo brUyuH||57||  pratatottAnaCayinyAH punargarbhasya nAbhyACrayA nADI kaNThamanuveSTya vyApattiM karoti||57||  vivRtaCayA naktacAriNI conmattaM janayati||57||  kalahaCIlApasmariNam||57||  vyavAyaCIlAdurvapuSamahnIkaM straiNaM vA||57||  CokanityA bhIrumapacitamalpAyuSaM vA||57||  abhidhyayinI paropatApinamIrSyAluM straiNaM vA||57||  stenA tvAyAsabahulamabhidrohiNamakarmaCIlaM vA||57||  amarSaNA caNDamaupadhikaM vA||57||  svapnaCIlA nidrAlumabudhamalpAgniM vA||57||  madyanityA tRSNAlumalpasmRtimanavasthitaM vA||57||  godhAmAMsanityACmariNaM CanairmehinaM vA||57||  varAhamAMsanityA raktAkSaM krathanamatiparuSaromANaM vA||57||  matsyamAMsanityA ciranimeSaM stabdhAkSaM vA||57||  madhuranityA pramehiNaM mUkamatisthUlaM vA||57||  amlanityA raktapittinaM tvagakSirogiNaM vA||57||  lavaNanityA CIghravalIpalitaM khalitakaM vA||57||  tiktanityA CoSiNamabalamapacitaM vA||57||  kaTukanityA durbalamalpaCukramanapatyaM vA||57||  kaSAyanityA CyAmamAnAhinamudAvartinaM vA||57||  yacca yasya vyAdhernidAnaM tattadA~a~asevamAnAntarvatnI strI tadvikArabahulamapatyaM janayati||57||  etena pitRjA api CukradoSA vyAkhyAtAH||57||

tathA garbhopaghAtarakSaNArthaJca devatAdyanupaghAtAya ca lohitavAsodhAraNAdInna kuryyAt | subodham | vivRtAnanA yA Cete sA tathoktA | naktaM yA bahiH paribhramati sA tathA | durvapuSamalasaprAyam | straiNaM strIpriyam | bhIruM bhayaCIlam | apacitaM svalpabhogaCarIram | abhidhyAyinI nAnAcintACIlA | stenA cauryyaparA | aupadhikaH kapaTajIvI | tRSNAluH pipAsAsvabhAvaH | anavasthito vyAkSiptacittaH | krathano yaH supto nAsayA CabdaM karoti | raktapittI yasya prAyeNa raktapittamutpadyate | subodham | yadvikArakAraNAni garbhiNyA~a~asevate sA tadvikAramaivApatyaM prasUte | yAvanmAtRdoSAdgarbhavikRtistAvat pitRdoSAcchukradoSAdgarbhavikRtiH tAvat pitRdoSAt CukradoSAd garbhavikRtirityapi vyAkhyAtaM kAraNasAmAnyAt || 57 ||

 tasmAt prajAsampadamicchantau sAdhvAtmAnamupAcaretAm||58||  viCeSeNa nArI||58||  vyAdhIMCcAsyA mRdumadhuraCiCirasukhairauSadhAhAravihArairupAcaret||58||  na cAsyA vamanAdIni prayojayet||58||  na raktAvasecanam||58||  kevalaM tvaSTamamAsamupAdAyAsthApanamanuvAsanaM vA||58||  vamanAdisAdhyeSu punarvikAreSu mRdubhistadarthakAribhirvopakramet pUrNamiva tailapAtramasaMkSobhayadgarbhiNImupAcarediti||58||

upasaMharannAha-- tasmAdityAdi | prajAsampadamicchantau mAtApitarau sAdhu kRtvA AtmAnamupAcaretAm | nArI tu viCeSataH sAdhvAtmAnamupAcaret | garbhasya hi tatra yasmAt sambandhaH | tasmAcca nAryyA garbhiNyA mRdAdiguNairAhArAdibhirvyAdhInupAcaret | vamanAdIni karmANyasyA vyAdhivaCAt prasaktAnyapi na prayojayet | kevalamaSTamamAsaprathamadivasAdArabhyAprasavAddoSAdyapekSayA AsthApanamanuvAsanaM vA prayojayet | vamanAdisAdhyeSu garbhiNyA vikAreSu kuSThAdiSu mRdubhirvamanAdibhirgarbhiNImupakrameta | vamanAdIni karmaNyasyA vyAdhivaCAt prasaktAnyapi na prayojayet | kevalamaSTamamAsaprathamadivasAdArabhyAprasavAddoSAdyapekSayA AsthApanamanuvAsanaM vA prayojayet | vamanAdisAdhyeSu garbhiNyA vikAreSu kuSThAdiSu mRdubhirvamanAdibhirgarbhiNImupakrameta | chardyatIsArAdiSu tadarthakAribhiH | vyAdheH svarUpaM kurvan vyAdhyupaCamamarthaM yat karoti tat tadarthakAri | yathA parNaM tailena pAtraM calanAdikriyAsvasaMkSobhayaMstadadhyupacArAstadvadgarbhiNImapi bhiSag vyAdhiSUtpanneSu asaMkSobhayannupacarediti || 58 || bhavanti cAtreti tantrarItiH |

 bhavanti cAtra--
ityanAtyayike vyAdhau vidhirAtyayike punaH||59||  tIkSNairapi kriyAyogaiH striyaM yatnena pAlayet||59||

bhavanti cAtreti tantrarItiH | ityanantaroktavidhiranAtyayike svalpe vyAdhAvuktaH | Atyayike punaH CIghraM mahAdoSakAriNi vyAdhau tIkSNairapi nAnAvidhairyathAyogaM kriyAyogaiH striyaM yatnena pAlayet | garbhanirapekSamevetyarthaH || 59 ||

 strI hi mUlamapatyAnAM strI hi rakSati rakSitA||60||  sarvACramANAM prathamaM gRhasthatvamaninditam||60||

yasmAdapatyAnAM mUlakAraNaM strI tasmAt pAlayet | ataCca tAM yatnena pAlayedyataH sA rakSitA satI puMso gRhasthatvaM gRhitvaM rakSati | kimbhUtamityAha-- sarvACramANAmityAdi | sarveSAM brahmacaryyAdInAmACramANAM prathamaM pradhAnam || 60 ||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhopacaraNIyaH

 AthAto garbhopacaraNIyaM CArIramadhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

pUrvayoradhyAyayorgarbhhasya sambhhavasthitikramuktva tasyaiva cAnupaGAtAya paripUrNatvAya sukhaprasavAya copacAra ucyate|  garbhhasyAtra garbhiNIparAyattatvAcca tasyA evAnuSTheyaM vidhAnam|| 1||

 prathame mAsi garbhiNi kSIramanupasaMskRtaM mAtrAvacchItaM
kAlekAle pibet||2||  tasminnapi cAdyaM dvAdaCarAtraM kSIrodbhavaM
sarpiH CAliparNIpalACAbhyAM CRtaM kanakarajatakvathitam
CItodakAnupAnaM pibet||2||  svAdu CItaM dravaprAyasAtmyaJca
sAyamprAtarAhArayet||2||  na cAbhyaGgodvartanAni seveta||2||  yatho-
ktAni ca doSakarANi parihared ApaJcamAt mAsAd
viCeSeNa||2||

tatra prathame mAsi garbhiNyasaMskRtaM kSIraM pibet|  mAtrAvadyatnenAdhikyarakSayA kAle kAle~annasya dvayorapi kAlayoH|  ataevAjIrNAdiparihArAya mAtrAvaditi|  tasminnapi tatrApi prathamaM dvAdaCarAtraM kSIrodbhavaM ghRtaM pibet|  kSIrapAnApavAdatvena|  kimbhUtaM kSIrodbhavamAha-CAliparNipalACAbhyAM snehapAkaparibhASayA CRtam|  sauvarNe rAjate vA kvathitaM CItodakAnupAnaJca|  sA ca garbhiNI svAdvAdiprAyamAhAraM pratidinamubhayakAlamAhArayet|  niSekAt prabhRtyabhyaGgAdIn pUrvoktAMCca garbhopaghAtakarAn vyavAyAdIn varjayet|  yAvat paJcamo mAsastAvadevaM viCeSeNa kuryAt|  tadA hi garbhasyA~asthiratvAt jhaTiti bAdhAbhayam|| 2||

 dvitIye madhurauSadhasiddhaM payaH pibet||3||

dvitIye mAsi madhurairdrAkSAmadhukAdibhi siddhaM payaH pibet|| 3||

 tRtIye tadeva sarpirmadhubhyAm||4||

tRtIye tadeva madhurauSadhasiddhaM sarpirmadhubhyAM saMyuktaM pibet|| 4||

 caturthe~akSamAtranavanItayuktam||5||

caturthe tu tadeva navanItasyAkSamAtreNa yuktam|| 5||

 paJcame kSIrasarpiH||6||

paJcame kSIroddhRtaM sarpiH||6||

 SaSThe tadeva madhurauSadhasiddhaM saptame ca||7||

SaSThe madhurauSadhaiH siddhaM tadeva kSIrasarpiH ca|| 7||

 tasmiMstu garbhasya keCotpattyA mAturvidAho bhavatIti stri-yo bhASante||8||  neti bhagavAnAtreyaH||8||  garbhotpIDanAttu doSA
hRdayaM prApya vidahanti tataH kaNDUrjAyate kaNDvA ki-
kkisam||8||

tasmin saptame mAsi mAturvidAho bhavati|  sa tu keCotpattikAryyamiti striyo bhASante|  tathA neti bhagavAnAtreyaH|  sa caivamAha-garbhotpIDanAddoSA vAtAdayo garbhiNIhRdayaM prAptAH kaNDUH kurvanti|  kaNDvA anantaraM kikkisam|  rekhAsvarUpastvakasaGkocaH kikkisam|

 tatra kolodakena navanItasya madhurauSadhasiddhasya pANi-
talamAtramasyai dadyAt||9||  candanamRNAlakalkaiCca stanodaraM
mRdnIyAt||9||  CirISadhAtakIsarSapamadhukacUrNairvA||9||  kuTajArjakabIjamustaharidrAkalkairvA||9||  nimbakolasurasamaJjiSThA-
kalkairvA||9||  CaCahariNapRSatarudhirayuktayA vA triphalayA||9||  karavIrakaraJjapatrakalkasiddhena ca tailenAbhyaGgaH||9||  pariSekaH punarmAlatImadhukasiddhenAmbhasa||9||  kaNDUyanaM varjayet||9||  tvagbhedavairupyaparihArArthaM snAnodvartanaM ca CIlayet||9||  madhuraM cAhAramalpamalpasnehalavaNamalpodakAnupAnaM bhuJjIta||9||

tatra kaNDUkikkisayoratraivAsyai garbhiNyai badarodakena saMyuktaM pANitalaM navanItasya deyamabhyavahArAya|  pANitalaM karSaH|  candanmRNAlakalkena stanodarasya mardanam|  prakRtyAdiviCeSApekSayA CirISAdicUrNairvA|  kuTajArjakAdikalkairvA|  cUrNaH CuSkapiSTaH|  kalko jalapiSTaH nimbAdikalkairvA CaCAdyanyatamarudhiramiCrayA vA triphalayA|  doSAdiviCeSApekSayA stanodaraM mRdnIyAditi sambandhaH|  subodham|  pariSekaH stanodarasya tvagbhedasya virUpatvasya parihArArthaM ca stanodarasya ca kaNDUyanaM varjayet| tatparihArArthameva ca snAnamudvartanaM ca CIlayet|  alpatvAdiyuktamAhAraM bhuJjIta|| 9||

 aSTame kSIrayavAgUM sarpiSmatIM pibet||10||  neti khaNDakApyaHgarbhasya paiGgalyA bAdhabhayAt||10||  astu paiGgalyA bAdhastathApyevaM kurvIta||10||  nIrujaM balavarNasattvasaMhananasampadupetaM
jJAtInAmagragaNyamapatyaM janayatIti bhagavAnAtreyaH||10||  badarodakena palalapayodadhimastutailalavaNaphalaghRtayuktenAsthApayet||10||  purANaviDviCuddhyarthaM madhukAdimadhurauSadhasiddhena ca tailenAnuvAsayedanulomanAya vAyoH anulome
hi mArute sA sukhamanupadravA prasUte||10||  garbhiNIM tu nyubjAmAsthApayedanuvAsayedvA||10||  tathA~asyA vivRtamArgatayA samyagauSadhanamanupraviCati||10||  tata UrdhvaM snigdhAbhiryavAgUbhi-
rjAGgalarasaiCcopAcaredAprasavakAlAditi bhagavAn dhanva-
ntariH||10||

aSTame mAse ghRtamiCrAM kSIrayavAgUM pibedityAtreyaH|  tAM na pibet garbhasya paiGgalyabhayAditi khaNDakApyaH tat pratyAhAtreyaH aGgIkriyatAM paiGgalyam|  garbhiNyA nIruktvalAbhAdgarbhasya ca balAdiyuktasya lAbhAt|  sarpiSmatyA kSIrayavAgvA|  saMhananamavayavanibandhatvaM badarodakenAsthApanaparibhASayA palalAdiyuktenAsthApayet|  purANaM saJcitaM purISaM CodhayitvA tadarthamevAnuvAsayet madhukAdisiddhatailena|  evaM purANAyA viCaH CodhanAdanulomo vAyuH prasUtaye sukho bhavatIti|  sarvasya ca vAmapArCvasthasyAsthApanAnuvAsana vidhAne garbhiNyA nyubjatvapavAdaH|  nyubjA jAnubhyAmadhomukhI bhUmau sthitA|  tathA hi jaTharasya lambatvAdvastermArgo vivRto bhavati|  tato~aSTamAnmAsAdUrdhvamAprasavAt snigdhAbhiryavAgUbhirupAcaret|  jAGgalarasaiCcopacarediti dhanvantariH|  carakasya tu jAGgalarasAnabhidhAnam|| 10||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhopacaraNIyaH

 navame tu tata evAnuvAsanatailAt picuM yonau praNayed
garbhamArgACayayoH snehanArthamiti||11||

navame mAse tata evAnantaroktAnmadhurauSadhasiddhAdanuvAsanatailAt picuM yonau dhArayet|  tena hi garbhaprasUtimArge garbhACaye ca snehaH sampadyate|| 11||

 anena prathamamAsAdArabhya krameNa garbhiNyA prasavakAle
garbhadhAriNIkukSikaTIpArCvapRSThaM mRdu bhavati||12||  vAyuCcAnulomaH sampadyate||12||  mUtrapurISaM ca prakRtibhUtaM jarAyuCca mArgaM 
pratipadyate||12||  putraM ceSTaM kalyamAyuSvantaM sukhinaM sukhena kAle
balavatI prasUte||12||

etacca sarvaM mAsavidhAnaM garbhiNyAH garbhadhAriNIkukSyAdimRdutvalAbhAya bhavatIti subodham|| 12||

 bilvakArpAsIpapphaNApAtalIpicumardAgnimanthamAMsIvardhamAnakapatrabhaGgakvAthena CItena sarvagandhodakena vA garbhiNyAH pratyahaM snAnamupadiCet||13||

bilvAdInAM kvAthena garbhiNyAH pratyahaM snAnamupadiCet|  sarvagandhodakena vA|  patrAdbhaGgAni patrabhaGgAni|| 13||

 prAk caivAsyA navamAnmAsAdaprahRtAsthiCarkarAkapAle
praCaste deCe vAstuvidyApraCastaM sarvarttusukhamukhahRtasarvo-
pakaraNaM sannihitajvalanaM prAgdvAramudaGdvAraM vA sUtikAgAraM
kArayet||14||

asyACca garbhiNyAH navamamAsAt prabhRtyapahRtAsthItyAdiyuktaM sUtikAgAraM kArayedyatra sUtikA satI vasati|  CItAtapAdyabhAvena sarvarttusukham|| 14||

 tatrAnukUleSu nakSatrAdiSu puNyAhaCabdena gobrAhmaNavRddhA-
nntvA~a~avartamAnA pradakSiNaM praviCya bahuCaH prasUtAbhira-
nuraktAbhiraviSAdAbhiH kleCakSamAbhiH parivRtA sva-
styayanaparAnulomanairAhAravihArairanulomitavAtamUtrapurISA
prasavakAlamudIkSeta||15||  svalpe~api ca viNmUtrapurISA prasava-
kAlamudIkSeta||15||  svalpe~api ca viNmUtravibandhe phalavartIH
praNidadyAt||15||

tatrA~a~agAre~anukUlanakSatragrahatithimuhUrtAdiSu puNyAhaCabdena gavAdInanuvarttamAnA praviCyAnekavAraprasUtAbhiH parivRtA satI svastyayanaparatvAdiyuktA prasavakAlamudIkSeta pratipAlayeta|  subodham|| 15||

 tatrAsannaprasavAyAH klamo glAnirmuktabandhane ivA-
kSiNI niSThIvikA mUtrapurISabAhulyaM CithilakukSi-
tA~adhogurutvamannAnabhilASo vedanodarahRdayakaTIbasti-
vaGkSaNeSu todabhedaCUlasphuraNasravaNAni ca yonyau bhavanti||16||  tadanantaramAvInAM prAdurbhAvo garbhodakapravAhaCca||16||

klamAdikamAsannaprasavakAle lakSaNam|  udarAdInAM vedanayA sambandhaH|  todAdIni yonyAm|  anantaramAvInAM sUtivedanAparyyAyANAM prAdurbhAvaH|  anantaraM garbhodakasya|| 16||

 athainAmupasthitagarbhAM kRtakautukamaGgalAM punnAmaphalahastAM
svabhyaktAmuSNodakapariSiktAM saghRtAM yavAgUM pAyayet||17||

athAnantaramenAM garbhiNIM nikaTIbhUtagarbhetyAdiyuktAmuSNodakena pariSiktAM satIM yavAgUM saghRtAM pAyayet|| 17||

 tataH suraktArSabhacarmapracchade mRduni bhUmiCayane CayAnA-
muttAnAmAbhugnasakthipRSThAmahatavAsaso~aCaGkanIyAH priya-
darCanAH pariNatavayasaH prajananakuCalAH pragalbhaH kRtta-
nakhAH striyaH sUtikAM sUnRtAbhirvANIbhirACvAsayantyaH
paryupAsIran||18||

tataH suraktena RSabhacarmaNA kRtapracchade mRduni kArpAsAdikRte Cayane CayAnAmuttAnAmahatavAsastvAdiyuktA yoSitaH sunRtAbhirACvAsayantyaH paryyupAsIranniti sambandhaH|  AbhugnasakthiM saGkucitajAnum|  prajanane garbhaniSkAsane kuCalAstathoktAH|  sUnRtAH priyavAcaH|| 18||

 athAsyai dadyAt kuSThailAlAGgalIvacAcavyacitrakaciri-
bilvacUrNamupAghrAtuM muhurmuhuH||19||  tathA bhUrjapatraCiMCapAsarjarasAnyatamadhUmamantarAntarA ca||19||  pArCvapRSThakaTIsakthideCAn koSNena tailenAbhyajyAnusukhamasyA mRdnIyAt||19||  evamavAk parivarttate garbhaH||19||

anantaramasyai kuSThAdicarNamupAghrAtuM dadyAnmuhurmuhuH|  tathaiva bhUrjAdyanyatamadhUmapupAghrAtuM dadyAditi sambandhaH|  antarAntarA cetyAvIprAdurbhAvamanudhUmAdiprasaGge|  pArCvAdideCAnISaduSNena tailenAbhyajya yathAsukhaM mRdnIyAditi sambandhaH|  evamanena yavAgUpAnAdinAjaTharastho garbhastasmin kAle sukhenAvAkparivarttate, adhomukhatAM yAtItyarthaH|| 19||

 tasya lakSaNamvimucya hRdayamudaramAviCati||20||  bastiCiro~avagRhNAti tvarayantyenAmAvyaH||20||

sa cAvAGmukho garbho hRdayamokSaNAdinA lakSaNena jJAyate|  mAturhRdayadeCaM parityajya yadA tu jaTharamAviCati garbho bastiCiraH AkhyaM vakSyamANapradeCanAbheradho gRhNAti|  AvyaCcainAM garbhiNIM nirantaraprAdurbhAvena tvarayanti tadA parivRttamadhyavasyet|| 20||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhopacaraNIyaH

 na cedevaM parivarttate tato muhurmuhurjRmbhaNaM caGkramaNaJca
kArayativyAnanantaroktaM vidhim||21||

evaM na parivarttate cejjRmbhaNAdikaM ca vakSyamANaM kArayitavyam|  anantaroktaJca vidhiM dhUmAghrANAdikaM punaH punaCca|| 21||

 anye tu musalena ulUkhalaM dhAnyapUrNamAhananIyamityAhuH||22||

kecidAcARyyA garbhaparivarttanArthaM dhAnyapUrNamulUkhalaM garbhiNyA musalenAvahananIyamiti|| 22||

 tattu na samyak||23||  dAruNavyAyAmavarjanaM hi garbhiNyAH satatamudapadiCyate||23||  viCeSataCca prasavakAle||23||  pracalitasarvadhAtudoSAyAH saukumAryyatvAnnAryyA musalavyAyAmenerito
vAyurantaraM labdhvA prANAn hiMsyAditi||23||

tadAtreyapramukhA necchanti|  yatastathAvidhAyAmatisukumArAyAmavasthAyAmevaMvidhenopacAreNAvahananavyAyAmena prabalIbhUto vAyurantaraM hRdayaM labdhvA prANAn hiMsyAditi|| 23||

 atha parivRttagarbhAM paryyaGkamenAmAropya kuCalA strI pAdato~asyA niSaNNAyA yonimanulomamanusukhamabhyajya sphijau
pAdAbhyAM pIDayet||24||  yoniJca punaH punaH prasAdhayet||24||  brUyAcca, subhage! CanaiH CanaiH pravAhayasva||24||  suprasannastemukhavarNaH putraM janayiSyatIti||24||

tato~anantaroktenArvAkparivRttagarbhalakSaNena parivRttagarbhAM viditvA paryyaGkamAropya pAdayo niSaNNA strI yoniprasAdhanAdikaM garbhiNyACca kuryyAt| prasAdhanaM garbhaniSkramaNayogyatAkaraNam||24||

 anyA tu vAmakarNe~asyA mantramimaM japetkSitirjalaM viyattejo vAyurviSNuH prajApratiH||25||  sagarbhAM tvAM sadA pAtu vaiCalyaM vA dadhAtvapi||25||  prasUSva tvamavikliSTamavikliSTA CubhAnane||25||  kArtikeyadyutiM putraM kArtikeyAdirakSitam||25||  iti||25||  tathA-
ihAmRtaJca somaCca citrabhAnuCca bhAmini||25||  uccaiHCravACca turago mandire nivasantu te||25||  idamamRtamapAM samuddhRtaM vaitavalaghu garbhamimaM pramuJcatu strI||25||  tadanalapavanArkavAsavAste saha lavaNAmbudharairdiCantu
CAntimiti||25||

dvitIyA ca vAme karNe mantraM vakSyamANaM paThet|  subodhamanyat|  kSitirjalAdikaM diCantu CAntimityantaM ClokacatuSTayaM mantrAH|

 tathA parA~anuCiSyAdanAgatAyAM vedanAyAM mA pravAhiSThAH||26||  akAlapravAhaNaM hi viNmUtrAdivegAnAmivodIraNamanartha-
karamahitaJca garbhasya CvAsakAsaCeSakubjatAdikA-
ritvAt||26||  tathA teSAmeva vidhAraNamiva vedanAyAmapravA-
haNamupaghAtAya||26||  tato yathoktaM kuruSva||26||

shArIrasthAnam

garbhavyApadaH

 athAto garbhavyApadaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

atha prakaraNAyAtagarbhavyApaccikitsitapradarCanArthamadhyAyArambhaH|| 1||

 strI cedApannagarbhA parihAryyANyAseveta||2||  tataCca yasyAH
bastipArCvaCroNiyonimukheSu CUlaM puSpadarCanaM ca syAt
tAM mRdusukhaCiCirAstaraNaCayanasthAmISadavanataCirasaM
CItapradehapariSekAdibhirupAcaret||2||

ApannagarbhA samprAptagarbhA strI parihAryyANyAseveta cet tataCca yadyasyAH CUlaM puSpadarCanaM ca syAt tatastAM mRdutvAdiguNayuktaCayanasthAM CItaiH pradehAbhirupAcaret|| 2||

 tadyathA-sahasradhautena sarpiSA~adhonAbheH sarvataH pradihyAt||3||  madhukasiddhasarpiSA suCItena picumAplAvya yonisamIpe
sthApayet||3||  gavyena payasA madhukAmbunA nyagrodhAdikaSAyeNa
va pariSecayet||3||  paripItatatsvarasAni ca tailAni yonau
nidhApayet||3||  tacchRGgasiddhasya vA kSIrasarpiSaH picum||3||

 atisravati tu rakte tata eva akSamAtraM prACayet||4||  keva
lAdeva vA kSIrasarpiSaH||4||  padmotpalakumudakiJjalkaM ca 
samadhuCarkaraM lehayet||4||  dhAtakIgairikisarjarasAJjanacUrNaM vA madhunA||4||  nyagrodhA
ditvakpravAlakalkaM vA||4||  CaCaiNahariNarudhiraM vA sakSaudraM
pAyayet||4||  RddhividArIjIvantIrvA payasA||4||  nIlotpala
sitApakvaloSThacandanAdi vA||4||  taNDulAmbuvAsArasAnya
tareNa||4||  gandhapriyaGgusitotpalaCAlUkodumbaraCalATunya
grodhaCRGgAni vA~a~ajena payasA||4||  kaCerukamRNAlakaCRGgATakakACmaryaparuSakadrAkSAsAri
vAprapauNDarIkAnantotpalakadambabIjakvAthena vA Carka
rAmadhumadhureNa CAlicUrNam||4||  jIvanIyaCRtaM vA kSIram||4||  balAtibalACAliSaSTikekSumUlakAkolICRtena payasA
samadhuCarkareNa raktaCAlyodanaM suCItaM bhojayet||4||  CIta
vIryyajAGgalarasena vA||4||  raktapittakriyACca CodhanavarjyAH
prayuJjIta||4||  saumyACca mano~anukUlAH kathAH||4||

rakte tvatisravati tata eva nyagrodhAdisiddhAt kSIrasarpiSo~akSamAtraM prACayet|  kevalAdeva vA kSIrasarpiSo~akSamAtraM na tu nyagrodhAdiCRGgasiddhAt kSIrasarpiSaH|  padmAdikiJjalkaM ca madhuCarkarAbhyAM yuktaM lehayet|  
	madhunA vA dhAtakyAdicUrNam|  madhunaiva nyagrodhAditvacAM CRGgANAM ca kalkam|  sakSaudraM va CaCAdyanyatamarudhiram| RddhyAdikaM ca payasa nIlotpalAdIni taNDalAmbuvAsArasayoranyatareNa|  pakvo mRlloSThastathoktaH|  Ajena payasa gandhapriyaGvAdIni|
	kaCerukAdInAM kaSAyeNa mAdhuryyasampAdanamAtrAbhyAM CarkarAmadhubhyAM miCreNa CAlicUrNaM pAyayet|  jIvanIyauSadhaCRtaM kSIraM vA pAyayet|  balAtibalAdiCRtakSIreNa madhuCarkarAsaMyuktena suCItaM raktaCAlyodanaM bhojayet|  CItavIryyANAM ca jAGgalAnAM rasena vA suCItaM raktaCAlyodanaM bhojayet|  CodhanavarjyACca sarvA raktapittoktAH kriyAH yathAvasaraM kurvIta|| 4||

 adRSTaCoNitAM tu madhukapayasyAsuradArubhiH siddhaM payaH
pAyayet||5||  tAmravalyaCmantakaCatAvarIpayasyAbhirvA||5||  vidAryyAdigaNena vA||5||  CvadaMSTrAsvarasakSIrasiddhaM vA sarpiH||5||  palANDurasasiddhaM vA sakSaudram||5||

yadA tu CoNitadarCanaM vinaiva bastyAdau CUlaM kevalaM bhavati|  garbhiNyAstathA tAM madhukAdisiddhaM payaH pAyayet|  tAmravalyAdisiddhaM vA payaH|  vidAryyAdigaNasiddhaM vA|  CvadaMSTrAsvarasakSIrAbhyAM vA siddhaM sarpiH pAyayet|  palANDurasasiddhaM vA kSaudrayuktaM sarpiH|| 5||

 asampUrNatrimAsAyAstu puSpadarCane garbhaH prAyo na tiSTha
tyasaJjAtasAratvAt||6||

prathamAnmAsAdArabhya mAsatrayaM puSpadarCane samyak cikitsito~api garbhaH koSThe na tiSThatyasaJjAtasAratvAt|  sravatyevetyarthaH|  tena prathamamAsatrayaM puSpadarCane prAyo garbhaCcikitsayApi koSThe na tiSThati|  mAsatrayAdUrdhvamapi caturthAdiSvapi mAseSvakAThinyAt||6||

 AmAnvaye cordhvamapi viruddhopakramatvAt||7||  tatra rUkSaCI
tAni prayuJjIta||7||

AmAnvaye puSpadarCane viruddhopakramatvAdgarbhaH koSThe na tiSThati|  Ame hyuSNatIkSNAdikA kriyA|  sA tu garbhe viparItA|  ato viruddhopakramatvam|  yatra caturthAdiSvapi mAseSvAmAnvayo nAsti, tatra puSpadarCane~api garbho vidhArayituM suCakyate|  tatra tvAmAnvaye rUkSaCItAnyauSadhAni prayuJjIta|| 7||

 tadyathA-prAgupavAsaM tato durAlabhAmRtoCIraparpaTaka
ghanacandanAtiviSAbalAkaTvaGgadhAnyAkakvAthapAnam||8||  tRNadhAnyaCAliSaSTikapeyAmaCanaM ca mudgAdiyUSaiH||8||  jite
tvAme snigdhaCItAni pUrvavat||8||

tadyathetyAdinA teSAmevopayogaviCeSaM darCayati|  auSadhAt pUrvamupavAsaH durAlabhAdikvAthasya pAnam|  tRNadhAnyAdipeyA mudgAdiyUSaiCcACanaM prayuJjIteti sambadhyate|  evamAme jite prathamapuSpadarCanavat snigdhAdInyupayuJjIta|| 8||

 Amagarbhe tu patite madyAnAmanyatamaM sAmarthyataH pAyayet||9||  garbhakoSThaviCuddhyarthamartivismaraNArthaJca||9||  amadyapAM pAca
nIyadravyopahitAbhiH snehalavaNavarjyAbhiH satilAbhi
ruddAlakAdiyavAgUbhirupAcared yAvanto mAsAstAvantya
hAnIti||9||  tataH prINanairbalAnurakSibhirasnehairAhArairAdoSadhAtukleda
CuddheH||9||  AmagarbhaCeSeNa hi punaH punarakuCalamanuSajyeta||9||  tasmAt tIkSNairanavaCeSayannupAcaret||9||  tataH paraM snehapAnai
rbastibhirAhAraiCca dIpanIyapAcanIyajIvanIyabRMhaNIya
madhuravAtaharairiti||9||

AmagarbhapAte madyAnAmanyatamaM garbhiNIM pAyayet|  prayojananirdeCastadguNamanyat pradarCayitum|  amadyapA yA kenacit kAraNena madyaM na pibati tAM pAcanIyadravyasammiCrAbhirasnehalavaNAbhiH satilAbhiH tuNadhAnyayavAgUbhirupAcaret|  yAvat saGkhye mAsi garbha pAtastAvat saGkhyAnyahAni ayaM kramaH| tato~anantaramevAdoSAdiCuddheH prINanAdiguNairAhArairupAcaret|  kuta ityAha-AmagarbhaCeSeNetyAdi|  tadanu ca snehapAnairbastibhistathA dIpanIyAdiyuktairAhArairiti|| 9||

 yasyAH punarmahati jAtasAre garbhe varjyAnAmavarjanAt puSpa
darCanaM syAdanyadvA yonisravaNam||10||  tasyAstannimittaM vAyuH
prakupitaH pittaCleSmANau parigRhya garbhasya rasavahAM nADIM
pratipIDyAvatiSThate||10||  tato nADyAM doSaiH kulyAyAmiva
vahanAdgarbho vRddhimanApnuvannupaviCatyupaCuSyati vA||10||

mahati jAtasAre varjyAvarjanAdyonirArttavamanyadvA kiJcit sravati|  tasyA yonisrutinimittaM vAyuH kupitaH san pittaCleSmANau parigRhya yA tu nADI mAturAhArasAraM rasaM garbhasya vahati tAM nADIM pratipIDya tiSThati|  tatastayA tadvRddhayA nADyA kulyayeva tRNAdicchannayA kedAro garbho vRddhimaprApnuvannupaviCatyupaCuSyati vA|| 10||

dIni tvasya pratyaGgAni||2||

aGgaM CarIram|  tasya SaT CiraHprabhRtInyaGgAnyavayavAH|  antarAdhiH AjatrorAkaTeH|  pratyaGgamavayavasyApyavayavaH|  netrakarNAdIni CirasaH|  nAbhihRdayAdInyantarAdheH|  prANiskandhAdIni bAhvoH|  pAdajaGghAdIni sakthnoH|| 2||

 mahAguNamayebhyaCca khapavanatejojalabhUmyAkhyebhyo mahA
bhUtebhyaCcetanAdhiSThitebhyo~abhinirvRttiraGgasya||3||

tasya cAGgasya khAdibhyo mahAbhUtebhyo~abhinirvRttiH|  kimbhUtebhyaCcetanenAtmanA~adhiSThitebhyaH|  tAni ca kimbhUtAni?  mahAguNamayAni| sattvAdaya eva bhUtabhAvena pariNatA AtmAdhiSThitACca|| 3||

 bhUtAnAmeva ca dRSTAdRSTavividhakarmavaCAdanekarUpAt sanni
veCaSadAkRtipramANasnehadIptisvarAdInAM sArupyamasA
rUpyaM vA sUkSmasthUlatAratamyabhedabhinnamatibahuprakAraM niSpa
dyate||4||

tatra CarIre tathA teSAmeva mahAbhUtAnAM sanniveCaviCeSAt prakRtipramANAdInAM sAdruCyamasAdRCyaM ca bahuprakAraM niSpadyate|  kimbhUtAt sanniveCaviCeSAt ?  dRSTAdRSTanAnAvidhakarmavaCenAnekarUpAt|  dRSTaM karma mAtRpitRbhyAM snehakRtamAhArAdi|  adRSTamanyajanmakRtam|  CarIrANAM kimbhUtaM sArUpyamasArUpyaJcAha-sUkSmAditAratamyabhedabhinnamata eva ca bahuprakAram|| 4||

 tatra sattbahulamAkaCam||5||

tatretyAdinA pratyekamapi mahAbhUtasya triguNatve viCeSakathanam|

 teSAmapratighAtaCcalatvamauSNyaM dravatA kAThinyamiti kramA
lliGgAni||6||

teSAM mahAbhUtAnAM paJcAnAM sadbhAve apratighAtAdikrameNa liGgam|

 viCeSataCca CrotrAdiSvindriyeSvavasthAnam||7||

teSAM ca mahAbhUtAnAM CabdAdibhirguNaiH krameNaiva ekaikapravRddhairanvayaH|  tena CabdaguNamAkACam|  CabdasparCaguNaH pavanaH|  CabdasparCarupaguNaM tejaH|  CabdasparCarUparasaguNaM jalam|  CabdAdipaJcaguNA pRthivI|| 7||

 CabdasparCarUparasagandhairekaikapravRddhairanvayaH||8||

teSAM ca mahAbhUtAnAM CabdAdibhirguNaiH krameNaiva ekaikapravRddhairanvayaH|  tena CabdaguNamAkACam|  CabdasparCaguNaH pavanaH| CabdasparCarUpaguNaM tejaH|  CabdasparCarUparasaguNaM jalam|  CabdAdipaJcaguNA pRthivI|| 8||

 tatrA~a~akACajAni CrotraM CabdaH sarvastrotAMsi vivi
ktatA||9||

tatra CarIra AkACajAni CrotrAdIni|  Crotramindriyam|  tathA CabdaH|  AkACabhAvAcchabdabhAvaH|  viviktatA CArIrANAM bhAvAnAM vibhAgaH|| 9||

 vAyavIyAni sparCanaM sparCaH praCvAsocchvAsAdipari
spandanAni lAghavaM ca||10||

vAyavIyAni sparCanAdIni|  sparCanamindriyam|  sparCo~anyasparCanaviSayaH|  evaM rUpAdInAmapi vAcyam|| 10||

aGgavibhAgaH

 athAto~aGgavibhAgaM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

samprasUte garbhe~aGgAsthisirAmarmaparijJAnArthamadhyAyArambhaH|  tatrACrayatvAdaGgavibhAgaH prathamamucyate kAraNopacArAdadhyAyasya nAma|| 1||

 sakalamapi CarIramaGgamityucyate||2||  tatra punaH SaDaGgam||2||  Cire~antarAdhirdvau bAhU sakthinI ca||2||  netranAbhipANipAdA
dIni tvasya pratyaGgAni||2||

aGgaM CarIram|  tasya SaT CiraHprabhRtInyaGgAnyavayavAH|  antarAdhiH AjatrorAkaTeH|  pratyaGgamavayavasyApyavayavaH|  netrakarNAdIni CirasaH|  nAbhihRdayAdInyantarAdheH|  prANiskandhAdIni bAhvoH|  pAdajaGghAdIni sakthnoH|| 2||

shArIrasthAnam

aGgavibhAgaH

 AgneyAni darCanaM rUpaM pittamUSmA paktiH santApo medhA
varNo bhAstejaH CauryyaJca||11||

AgneyAni darCanAdIni|  darCanaM cakSurindriyam|  pittaM doSaH| uSmA agniH|  paktistatkriyA|  bhA kAntiH|  tejaH prasiddham||11||

 AmbhasAni rasanaM rasaH svedakledavasA~asRkaCukra
mUtrAdidravasamUhaH CaityaM snehaCca||12||

AmbhasAni dehe rasanAdayaH|  eko rasaCabdo rasaviSayatvajJApanArthaH|  dvitIyo dhAtuviCeSagrahaNArthaH|| 12||

 pArthIvAni ghrANaM gandhaH keCanakhAsthyAdimUrtasamUho dhairyya-
sthairyyaJca||13||

pArthivAni ghrANAdIni|  iti dehe paJcamahAbhUtakArye cetanaCcApyAyAtyavahitamanasApi parIkSyamANo na kiJcillabhyate|| 13||

 teCu mAtRjAni mRdUni tvagraktamAMsamedomajjanAbhihRdayAmA
CayagarbhACayayakRtplIhAklomAntragudAdIni||14||

mAtRjAnIti teSu ca mahAbhUtakAryeSu madhye kiJcidgarbhasya mAtRjam|  kiJcit pitRjam|  kiJciccetanajam|  cetana AtmA|  tataH saMkrAntamityarthaH|  tvagAdInyanyAni mRdUni garbhasya mAtRjAni vidyAt|  garbhACayaH strIgarbhasyaiva|| 14||

 pitRjAni sthirANi keCanakhAsthiCukrasirAsnAyvA
dIni||15||

keCAdInyanyAni ca sthirANi pitRjAni|| 15||

 AtmajAni nAnAyoniSUtpittirmanaCcetanendriyANi prANA
pAnau dhAraNamAkRtisvaravarNaviCeSAH kAmakrodhalobha
bhayaharSadharmaCIlatAsmRtibuddhIcchAdveSaprayatnAhaGkAra
sukhaduHkhAyurAtmajJAnAni ca||16||

AtmajAni punarnAnAvidhayonyutpatyAdIni|  AtmanA hyavadAtAnavadAtakarmakAraNabhUtena yoniSu mRgasarIsRpAdiSUtpadyate; ataH saMskAreNa niHCreyasAya|  tathA manaH Atmajam|  taddhi na kutaCcidAgacchatyAtmanA nityasambandhitvAt|  indriyANi tvAtmakRtAnyeva|  cetanendriyANi paJca buddhIndriyANi CrotrAdIni|  prANApAnau cAtmajau|  tAbhyAmeva hyAtmakAraNAbhyAM jIvyate|  sAdhAraNamavayavAnAM dhAraNamutsAhena dehAvaSTambhaH|  AkRtyAdInAM nAnAvidhA viCeSAH AkRtiH saMsthAnam|  tasyAM hi bhUtAni samavAyikAraNam|  AtmA tvasamavAyikAraNam|  kAmAdayaH sarva eva vijJAnadharmA AtmabhavAH|  tathA sukhAdayo~apyAtmanaH karmaphalatvAt|| 16||

 sAtmyajAnyAyurArogyamanAlAsyalolupatvamindriyaprasA
dasvaravarNaujaH sampatpraCastatA praharSabhUyastvaM medhAbalaM
ca||17||

sAtmyajAni yAni dehino garbhAt prabhRti sAtmyasevina eva bhavanti|  svarAdInAM sampatparipUrNatvam|  praCastatA praCasyatvam|| 17||

 rasajAni kRtsnasya dehasya sambhavo vRttirvRddhistRpti-
ralaulyaM puSTirutsAhaCca||18||

rasajAni yAni rasebhyaH pariNatebhyaH sampadyante|  dehasya sambhavo mAtRjaThare|  vRttirvRddhistatraiva|  jAtasya ca|| 18||

 CuddhasattvajAni CaucamAstikatvaM, kRtajJatA, dAkSiNyaM,
vyavasAyaH, CauryyaM, gAmbhiryaM buddhirmedhA, smRtiH Cukla
vartmarucirbhaktirabhiSaGgAbhAvastamoguNo viparyayaCca||19||

CuddhasattvajAni yAni ca vastUni rajastamobhyAmanapahatena Cuddhena sattvena bhavanti|  asti paraloka iti vijJAnaM yasyA~asAvAstikastasya bhAvaH Astikatvam|  buddhirgrahaNaCaktiH|  medhA prajJA|  bhaktirdevatAdi viSaye|  abhiSaGgaH samparityAgACaktatA tasyA~abhAvaH krodhAdyanabhibhava iti yAvat|  tamoguNAnAM vakSyamANAnAmajJAnaviSAdAdInAM vaiparItyamiti sattvajAni|| 19||

 rAjasAni durupacAratA~anAryaM CauryyaM mAtsaryamamita
bhASitvamahaGkAro lolupatvaM dambho mAnaH krodho harSaH
kAmaCca||20||

rAjasAni tAmasAni ca rajastamobhyAmupahatena sattvenaiva bhavanti|  durupacAraH yasya paricArakAdibhirduHkhena cittaM grahItuM pAryyate tasya bhAvaH|  anAryaM CauryaM viSayakAlAdinA anucitam|  ucitaM CauryyaM sAttvikatvameva|  lolupo viSayakautukI tasya bhAvaH||20||

shArIrasthAnam

aGgavibhAgaH

 tAmasAnyajJAnaM viSAdaH pramAdo nidrA~a~alasyaM kSuttRSNA
Coko mAtsaryaM vipratipattiH parAtisandhAnaM sattvaguNa-
vaiparItyaM ca||21||

ajJAnAdIni tAmasAni|  ajJAnaM mithyAjJAnam|  vipratipattirvirodho~anyena|  parAtisandhAnaM parapakSapratibandhaH|  sattvajAnAM CaucAstikatvAdInAM vaiparItyam|| 21||

 tatra sattvaM manastasyopaplavo rajastamaCca ityevambhUtAtmakaM
dehamAhuH||22||

sattvaM kimucyata ityAha-tatretyAdi|  sattvaM manaH iti paryyAyau|  tasya sattvasya rajastamaCcopaplavau|  
	ityanena prakAreNa pRthivyAdivikArasamudAyAtmakaM dehamAhurAcAryyAH|  tenaitat sthitamasmin darCane-AtmA nityaH avikAraH na jAyate na ca vinaCyati|  sattvAdisaMyogAttu jAtAdivyapadeCaM labhate|  saMyogaCca tasyAvidyAsvabhAvakRtaH|  avidyAkSayAdhyavalIne saMyoge CuddhaH san mukta ityucyate|  ekena hyanvayinA kartrA vinA bAlatvAdInAM smRtyAdinA phalAbhisandhAnena kAryyA~apravRtterdehAdikAryyasya ca sambhavaH|  sa ca svatantro~apyAtmanaiva tatkarma karoti|  yasya bandho vA mokSo vA phalamaCnute, tasya ca svakarmaNa eva karaNAt kAraNAt saMyogastadvinACau bandhamokSau|  na hyAtmanA kartrA vinA CarIrasya sambhavaH|  tathA ca bhagavAn carakaH:-
	mRddaNDacakraiCca kRtaM kumbhakArAdRte ghaTam|
	kRtaM mRttRNakASThaiCca gRhakArAdvinA gRham|
	yo vadetsa vadeddehaM sambhUyakaraNaiH kRtam| iti|
	tasmAdAtmA cetanaH kAraNaM nityaH|  acetanAni tu mahAbhUtAni anityAni pratikSaNapradhvaMsIni|  teSAM hi nityatve bhAvAnAM vRddhyAdyasambhavaH|  na hi tadekaM vastu tathA cAnyathA ca bhavitumarhati|  dRCyate ca|  tasmAdanityAni bhUtAni|  tadadhiSThitAni puruSAkhyAM labhante|  evamAtmano~anAdiH saMyogaH puruSasaMyogibhiranyonyasApekSairbhavati|  tasmAt sthitamevambhUtAtmakaM dehamAhuriti||22||

 tasya punaH pravibhAgaH-tvacaH kalA doSA dhAtavo
malA buddhIndriyANi tadadhiSThitAni karmendriyANyatI
ndriyamACayAH prANAyatanAni kaNDarAjAlAni kUrcAra
jjvassIvanyo~asthisaGghAtAH sImantA asthInyasthi
sandhayaH snAyUni peCyaH sirA dhamanyaH srotAMsyUSmANo
marmaNi keCaCmaCrulomAni prakRtivikRtibhedACca||23||

sa ca dehastvagAdibhirapoddhAreNa pravibhajyate|  subodham|| 23||

 tatrA~asRjaH pacyamAnasya kSIrasyeva santAnikAH SaT tvaco
bhavanti||24||

tatra dehe SaT tvaco raktAt svoSmaNA pacyamAnAtkSIrajAlikAvat bhavanti|  tAstu kadalIdalavadantare krameNa vartante|  tAsAM tvacAM prasAdAdraktasya prasAdaH|  tvaco hi raktasya prasannatAM janayanti|  ghanIbhAvasyAlpIbhAvApAdanAcca|| 24||

 dvitIyA~asRgdharA||26||

dvitIyayA ruddhantvasram|  tena raktaM na bahiH syandate|  sA~asRgdharA nAma ityAdi subodham|| 26||

 tRtIyA sidhmakilAsAdhiSThAnA||27||

yadACritya yasya bhAvastasya tadadhiSThAnam|  sidhma kuSThaviCeSaH|  kilAsaM Cvitram|| 27||

 SaSThI tu prANadhara||28||  yasyAM chinnAyAM tAmyatyandhamiva ca 
tamaH praviCati yAM cAdhiSThAyArUMSi jAyante||28||  parvasu
kRSNaraktAni sthUlamUlAni duCcikitsyatamAni||28||

SaSThI sarvasAmantarmAMsalagnA|  sA prANAnantaravaruddhyA~avatatyAvatiSThati|  tadadhiSThAnAni hi viCeSeNa kRSNaraktAnyarUMSi||28||

 tatra prathamA bhAsinI nAma yA varNAnAmavabhAsinI khAdInAM
ca paJcAnAM chAyAnAM sA vrIheraSTAdaCabhAgapramANA||29||

anye tvAcAryyA bhAsinyAdibhedena saptasaMjJAstvaco vadanti|  subodham|  paJca chAyA vakSyamANAH|| 29||

 yastu dhAtvACayAntareSu kledo~avatiSThate sa yathA sva
mUSmabhirvipakvaH snAyuCleSmajarAyucchannaH kASTha iva
sAro dhAtusAraCeSo rasaCeSolpatvAt kalAsaMjJaH||30||

uktAstvacaH kalA ucyante-yastvityAdi|  dhAtUnAM raktAdInAmACayA yAni srotAMsi teCAM dvayordhAtvACayayormadhye yaH kledaH sa svena-svena dhAtUSmaNA pakvaH CleSmAdichannaH san kalAkhyA labhate|  kASThasAravat yathA kASThe~antaHsAro vibhajyate, tathA CarIre kalAH|  tACca svasthAnamajahatyaH CarIraM vyApnuvanti|  sa tu kledo dhAtusAraCeSo na pUrvadhAtutAM nApyuttaradhAtutAM prApnotyataH svalpatvAt kalAsaMjJaH, AsAM tu kramo dhAtukramasambhavaviCeSAt|  viCiSTakAryatA tu svabhAvAt|| 30||

 tAsAM prathamA mAMsadharA nAma||31||  yasyAM mAMse sirAsnAyu
dhamanIsrotasAM bhUmAviva paGkodakena bisamRNAlAnAM pratA
nAni bhavanti||31||

tathAhi-prathamA rasaviCeSajA~api mAMsadhara|  yasyAM bhUmyAmivAdhiSThAya mAMse kardamasadRCe sirAdInAM pratAnAni mRNAlaprakhyAni bhavanti|| 31||

shArIrasthAnam

aGgavibhAgaH

 dvitIyA raktadhara nAma mAMsasyAbhyantaratastasyAM CoNitaM
viCeSataCca sirAplIhayakRtsu bhavati||32||  mAMsAcca kSatAt
kSatajaM vRkSAdiva kSIriNaH kSIraM pravarttate||32||

dvitIyAyAM CoNitaM bhavati|  viCeSato yakRdAdiSveva tasyAM kalAyAM CoNitaM bhavati prabhAvAcca mAMsAt kSatAt bahiH CoNitaM pravarttate|  na hi tayA vinA mAMse raktaM bhavati|  dRSTAntaH sphuTapratipattyarthaH|| 32||

 tRtIyA medodharA nAma||33||  medo hi tasyAmudare~aNvasthiSu
ca saraktaM bhavati||33||  tadeva ca Cirasi kapAlapraticchannaM
mastiSkAkhyaM mastuluGgAkhyaM ca sthUlAsthiSu ca majjA||33||

 caturthI CleSmadharA nAma||34||  tatsthena hi CleSmaNA CleSitAH

subodham|  akSACcakranAbhayaH|  sopAGgaH sAbhyaGgAH|| 34||

 paJcamI purISadharA nAma||35||  sA hyantrAmapakvACayACritA

 SaSThI pittadhara nAma pakvAmACamadhyasthA||36||  sA hyanta
ragneradhiSThAnatayA~a~amACayAt pakvACayonmukhamannaM balena
vidhArya pittatejasa CoSayati pacati pakvaJca vimuJcati||36||  doSAdhiSThitA tu daurbalyAdAmamevAtato~asAvannasya graha
NAt punargrahaNIsaMjJA||36||  balaM ca tasyAH pittamevAgnyabhi

yati||36||

SaSThI pakvAmACayayormadhye sthitA AmACayAt pakvACayonmukhamannaM balena vidhAryya pacati|  pittatejasA karaNabhUtena|  saiva vAtAdidoSAdhiSThAnena daurbalyAdAmameva vimuJcati yadevAgnerdhAraNaM tadeva tasyA upastambhanam|  yadevAgnerupabRMhaNaM tadevAsyA upabRHhaNamityekayogakSemA|| 36||

 saptamI CukradharA nAma dvyaGgule dakSiNe pArCve basti-
dvArasyAdho mUtramArgamACritA sakalaCarIravyApinI CukraM
pravartayati||37||

saptamI bastidvArasya dvyaGgulamatikramya dakSiNe pArCve mUtramArgamACritya varttate|| 37||

 doSA dhAtavo malACca prAguditAH||38||

doSAdayaH prAk sUtrasthAna uktAH|| 38||

 paJca buddhIndriyANi-CrotraM sparCanaM darCanaM rasanaM ghrANaJca||39||

 teSAM sabhAgatayA kramAdviSayaH CabdasparCarUparasagandhAH||40||

teSAmindriyANAM sabhAgatayA indriyasya viCeSeNaikabhUtAdhikyakAraNatvena sAdRCyAt|  yathA cakSustaijasaM taijasameva rUpaM gRhNAti|  CrotraM nAbhasaM Cabdo~api nAbhasaH|| 40||

 paJca buddhIndriyAdhiSThAnAni-karNau tvagakSiNI jihvA
nAsike ca||41||

indriyAdhiSThAnAni CarIrAvayavAH|| 41||

shArIrasthAnam

aGgavibhAgaH

 paJca karmedriyANi vAkpAyUpasthapANipAdasaMjJakAni||42||

karmendriyANi paJca-vAgekaM, dvitIyaM gudaM, tRtIyaM meDhram, caturthaM pANI, paJcamaM pAdau|| 42||

 tAnyapi ca vacanotsargaharSAdAnagamanArthAni||43||

vAgAdInAM krameNa vacanAdi karma|  harSagrahaNamupalakSaNam|  tathA copasthaM yathA harSArthaM tathA mUtrotsargArthamapi|  harSaCabdena CukraM lakSyate|| 43||

 atIndriyantu manaH sarvArthairanvayAt tadyogena paJcendriyA

dravAstu bhavantIti CeSaH|  te codakamUtrAdayaH|  tatrodakaM dehe yat karttRkarmabhUtamatiyogena cyavamAnaM purISamanubadhnAti|  tatprasAdAddhyatIsAre vegAnAM gatasaGkhyatvam|  tathAtiyogena cyavamAnaM mUtrapramehe|  raktapitte ca rudhiramiti|  anyAMCca CarIre dhAtUn pittaCleSmAdInatiyogena pravartamAnAnanubadhnAti|  tadudakamiti sambandhaH|  subodham|| 90||

 tasyAdyasya cAhArasArasya rasAkhyasya raktasya CakRtaH
CleSmaNaH pittasya mUtrasya vasAyAH medaso majjJaCca
svena svenAJjalipramANena yathApUrvamekAdisaGkhyApravRddhiH||91||

tasyetyudakasya rasAkhyasyAdyAhArasArasya ca raktAdInAM ca majjAntAnAmaSTAnAM svenasvenAJjalipramANena yathApUrvamekAdisaGkhyApravRddhirvijJeyA|  svenasvenetyaJjalipramANekAntyasyainAJjalitvam|  tatpUrvANAM krameNaikaikAJjalivRddhiH|  majjA eko~aJjaliH dvyaJjalirmedaH|  vasA tryaJjali|  yAvadudakasya daCAJjalayo dehe|| 91||

shArIrasthAnam

sirAvibhAgaH

 athAtaH sirAvibhAgamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

pUrvAdhyAye CarIrAvayavabhede svalpavyaktatvAt sirAdirnirNItaCeSastatrApi sirANAM prAdhAnyAnnirNayArthamadhyAyArambhaH|| 1||

 daCamUlasirA hRdayapratibaddhAH sarvAGgapratyaGgeSvojo nayanti||2||  tatpratibaddhA hi CarIraceSTA||2||

daCamulasirA ityAdi|  mUlasirAH pradhAnasirAH|  tato hi sarvAH sirAH bhavanti|  tA aGgeSu pratyaGgeSu caujo nayanti|| 2||

 tAstu dvyaGgulamaGgulamardhAGgulaM yavaM yavArdhaJca gatvA druma-
patrasevanIpratAvanadbhidyamAnAH saptaCatAni bhavanti||3||

tAH prabhidyamAnAH drumapatrarekhApratAnavat saptaCatAni sirANAM bhavanti|  tenaiduktaM bhavati-tA hRdayapratibaddhA daCa sirA hRdayAdvyaGgulaM gatvA prathamaM pratAnaM muJcanti|  tata aGgulaM gatvA dvitIyam|  tata ardhamaGgulaM gatvA tRtIyam|  tato yavaM gatvA caturtham|  tato~api yavArdhaM gatvA paJcamamiti|  tato na bhidyante|  sarveSu caivaM bhidyamAnA iti yojyaM yAvadbhedo~asti|  saptaCatAni pratAnAnAM dIrghANAM bhavanti|| 3||

 tAsAM catuHCatI CAkAsu||4||  tatra SoDaCAbyadhanIyAH||4||

tAbhyaCcatvAri CatAni catasRSu CAkhAsu|  tatreti catuCCatyAM SoDaCA vyadhanIyAH|| 4||

 SaTtriMCaM CatamantarAdhau||5||  tatra dvAtriMCat||5||

antarAdhau tu SaTtriMCat Catam|  tatra dvAtriMCadavyadhanIyA iti sambandhaH|| 5||

 tAsAmekaikasmin sakthni Catam||6||  tatra na vidhyejjA
landharAm||6||  tisraCcAbhyantaragatAH||6||

tatra SoDaCa CAkhAsu catasRSvavadhanIyA uktAstatraikA pUrvoktajAlandharA tisraCcAbhyantarasamACrayA avedhyAH|| 6||

 catvAriMCadvakSasi||7||  tAsAM dve hRdaye||7||  dve ca stanamulastana
rohiteSu||7||  ekaikApastambhApAleSviti||7||  tACcaturdaCa||7||

AgrIvAmulAdA~a~acorusandherantarAdhiH|  tatra SaTtriMCacchataM sirANAm|  tadyathA-dvAtriMCat CroNyAm|  pArCvayordvayoH SoDaCa|

pRSThe caturviMCatiH|  urasi catvAriMCat|  iti SaTtriMCacchatamantarAdhau sirANAm|  'tatra dvAtriMCadavyadhanIyAH' iti yaduktaM tatpradarCyate-aSTau CroNyAm|  vaGkSaNa ubhayatra catasraH|  kaTIkataruNAkhyayormarmaNoCcatasra ityaSTau|  pArCvayordvau|  dvayoH pArCvayorekaikAmUrdhvagAm|  pRSThe catasraH|  pRSThavaMCasyaikasmin pArCve UrdhvagAminyau dve|  aparasmiMCca dve iti|  jaThare catasraH romarAjyAH pArCvayordvayordve-dve iti|  urasi caturdaCa|  tatra dve hRdaye|  dve-dve dvayoH stanamulayoH|  iti catasraH|  stanarohitayoCcatasraH|  apastambhayorekaikA|  tathA~a~apAlApayorapi|  evaM dvAtriMCadantarAdhAvavyadhanIyAH|| 7||

 dvAdaCa mUrdhani||8||  tAsAmutkSepayordve||8||  sImanteSvekaikAme
kAmadhipatAvityaSTau CastreNa pariharet||8||  tathAkSudrikAH
kuTilAH saGkIrNAH granthitAH sandhiSu cACastrakRtyAH||8||

catuSSTyadhikaM CatamurdhvaM Cirasi sirANAmiti yaduktaM tadvibhajate-grIvAyAM caturviMCatiH hanvordvayoH SoDaCa|  SoDaCa jihvAyAm|  nAsAyAM caturviMCatiH netrayoH SaTpaJcACat|  lalATe SaSTirnAsAnetrACritAstAbhyo~ananyA ato na gaNyante|  karNayordvayoH SoDaCa sirAstA eva CaGkhACirtA atastatrasthA na gaNyante|  murdhni dvAdaCeti catuSSaSTyadhikaM Catam|  atra 'paJcACadavyadhanIyAH' iti yaduktaM taducyate-grIvAyAM SoDaCa|  catusro marmasaMjJAH|  dve nIle dve manye iti catasraH|  aSTau marmasaMjJAH mAtRkA iti vakSyamANAH|  

	dve dvayoH kRkATikayoH|  dve ca vidhurayoriti SoDaCa|  hanvordvayoH|  dve hanusandhibandhanakarmaNI|  jihvAyAM catasraH|  dve rasabodhane jihvAyA adhastayA dve vAkpravarttinyau iti catasraH nAsAyAM tisro yatra dve gandhavedinyAvekA ca tAlunIti tisraH|  netrayoH SaT|  nimeSe dve|  unmeSe dve|  apAGgayordve iti SaT|  lalAte sapta|  keCAntagACcatasraH|  AvarttakAkhyayormarmaNordve|  ekA ca bhrUmadhyabhave sthapanyAkhyamarmaNi iti sapta|  karNayoCcatasraH|  dve CabdavAhinyau|  CaGkhayostatsandhigate dve iti catasraH|  keCAnte~aSTau|  dvayo rutkSepayordve|  sImanteSu paJca|  adhipatau romAvattamarmaNyekA ityaSTau|  evaM Cirasi paJcACadavedhyAH|  kevalametA evAvedhyAH|  yAvat kSudrikAH atisUkSmAH|  kuTilA anRjugAminyaH|  saGkIrNAH bahubhiranabhivyaktAH grathitAH saGkocena granthirUpAH|  tathA sandhiSu kUrparAdiSvACirtAH|| 8||

 tAsAM yathAsvaM turyAMCavibhAgena paJcasaptatyadhikaM Cata-
manilaraktaM vahati||9||  eSa vibhAgaH pittaCleSmaCuddharakte-
Svapi||9||  sthitA hyevaM dehamanugRhNanti doSAH||9||  vyatyayena tu
pIDayanti||9||

tAsAM ca saptAnAM CatAnAM yathAsvaM CaGkhAdigatasirANAM caturthena vibhAgena pratyekaM paJcasaptatyadhikaM vAtAdimiCraM raktaM CuddhaM ca vahati|  tena paJcasaptatyadhikaM CataM sirANAM vAtaraktaM vahati|  tadvat pittaraktam, CleSmaraktam, CuddharaktaJca|  evamanena sirAvahananiyamena vyavasthitA doSAH CarIramanugRhNanti|  etadviparyyaye pIDayanti|| 9||

 samAgUDhAH snigdhAH rohiNyaH Cuddharaktamiti||10||

nanu kathametad jJAyata imAH sirA idaM vahantItyAha-tatretyAdi|  subodham|  kSaNena pUrNAH AdhmAtAH kSaNena ca riktAH kSipraM CIghrameva vahanti sravanti|  saMsarge kiM lakSaNa-mityAha-atra tu yadi doSAntareNa saMsRSTo bhavati tadA yathAsvaM lakSaNAnAM saGkaro vijJeyaH|  rohiNyo lohitAH|  iti sirA uktAH|| 10||

 dhamanyastu caturviMCatiH||11||

yathA ArAmo jalahAriNIbhiH kedAraH kulyAbhirApyAyyate tadvattAbhirnAbhipratibaddhAbhiH kAya ApyAyyate|  cakrasya nAbhirakSaH|  ArAstannibaddhAni kASThAni subodham|| 12||

 tAsAM khalu dhamanInAM daCordhvaM prasRtA daCAdhaCcatasrasti-
ryyak||14||  tatastAbhiryathAsvamaGgAvayavA dhAryyante ApayAyyante ca||14||

 tAsAmUrdhvagA hRdayamabhiprapannAH pratyekaM tridhA jAyante||15||  tatastriMCato madhye dve dve vAtapittakapharaktarasAn vahataH||15||  aSTAbhiH CabdarUparasagandhA gRhyante||15||  dvAbhyAM dvAbhyAM bhASate

tACca daCa hRdayaM prApya pratyekaM tridhA bhinnAH triMCat sampannAH|  tasyACca triMCato dve-dve vAtAdIn paJca vahataH|  evaM tA daCa|  CabdAdImCcaturaH|  aSTAbhiH puruSo gRhNite|  tAbhirha cittasthAnaM CabdAdIni yAnti|  bhASaNAdikriyAcatuSTayaM dvAbhyAM dvAbhyAM karoti|  evaM tA aSTau|  ghoSaH Cabdo vyaktaH|  dve aCruvahataH|  dve ca stanACrite nAryyAH stanyaM vahataH|  narasya tu ta eva Cukram|  evaM triMCat|| 15||

 adhogamAH pakvACayasthA evaM tridhA jAyante||16||  tatra daCAdyAH

 vyadhe tu srotasAM bhramamohakampapralApAdhmAnaCUlA~aruci-
tRTchardijvarAtirudhirasrutimUtrapurISarodhA maraNaJca||27||

 tataCcaivaM viklinnaM AhAre paJca paJcAtmakA mahAbhUtA-

 evaJca pakvAdAhArAdvividhauSadhagarbhAdiva snehAdacchaH sAra-

annamalasya ghanAcchabhedena dvaividhyam|  lasIkA jalasadRCI|  vasA svacchasnehaH|  karNAdiSaTkasya malaCabdena sambandhaH|  karNAdiSu malo dRCyata eva|  prajananaM mehanam|  sandhayo~asthibhAgAH pUrvamuktAH|  akSyAdeH sneho malaH|| 45||

 evaM ca kRtvA~annamayA eva dehe sarve bhAvAH||48||  tenaiva

bhAjanaM vA bhavati||48||

tasmAt sarve CArIrA bhAvA annamayAH|  tenaiva cAnnenAvicchinnapravAheNa idamanantaroktena krameNa CarIraM vipariNamati|  adhyAtmetyAtmani bahirvahirbhAge|  CarIrayantrakaM yApyata iti sambandhaH|  kimbhUtamityAha-svAsthyena balopacayena ca yuktam|  etacca yAvatkarmopAdAnamAha|  taddhetukakarmaparikSayAt|  anyathetyAdi subodham|  iti kramadhAtuvAdaH|| 48||

 anye tu varNayanti-abhyavahRtamAtrasyAhA~a~arasya kaNTha-
nADIpraluThitasya mahAnimnamavatIrNasya yo ya evAMCaH
kAyAgninA~avalIDhaH pAkamupanIyate tasya tasyaiva prasA-

iti||49||

	kathamityAha-abhyavahRtamAtrasyetyAdi|  ya evAhArabhagaH koSThaprAptisamanantaramagninA sambadhyate tasyaiva tena pakvasyayo~annasAraH sa tadaiva sarvadhAtusrotassvanugacchati|  kevalaM tvayaM viCeSaH|  vivRtamukheSu asaMvRteCu srotassu sArasambhavadeCAsanneSu ca prathamamanveti bhUyAMCcAnveti|  itareSu saMvRttamukheSu  dUreSu ca viparyyayeNa|  svalpaCcireNa cetyarthaH|  evamasmin pakSe kevala-

 bAhyenApi ca jvAlAGgArAtmakenAgninA naikAkAraH sarvadA
pAko bhavati||50||  kimutAntarACrayeNoSNAtmanA samenApi||50||  tasmAt taM prayatnato rakSet||50||

agnistviti|  balabhedeneti agnicAtruvidhyakAraNam|  tatretyAdinA~asyAgnicatuSTayasya lakSaNamucyate|  samo nityadharmA iti ca sarvatrAnnarakSAmAtrACItyAdyuktaprakAreNa|  udaragauravAdInyAmaliGgAnyAdigrahaNenAnyAni ca|  bAhyonApItyAdinA jATharasyAgneH prayatnaparirakSaNIyatvaM darCayati|| 50||

 athAto marmavibhAgaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||
