bastiralpamAMsaCoNitaH kaTyA madhye pRSThato vakro dhanurvat|  ekato dvAro mukhaM sa cAsyaikaH adhomukhaCca|  tatrApi bastau viddhe maraNaM bhavatyaCmarI vraNAdRte|  tatrApyamaCmarIvraNe dvAbhyAM mArgAbhyAM viddhe bastI maraNameva|  aCmarIvraNe~apyekato viddhe bastau mUtrasrAvI vraNo bhavati|  subodham|| 19||

 pakvAmACayamadhye nAbhiH tatrApi sadyomaraNam||20||

na kevalaM bastireva viddhaH sadyoghno yAvannAbhirapItyapiCabdasyArthaH|| 20||

shArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH

 koSThavakSasoH stanayoCca madhye sattvarajastamo~adhiSThA
namAmACayadvAraM hRdayam||21||  tatrApi sadyo maraNam||21||

koSThavakSasoH stanayoCca madhye sthitaM sattvarajastamasAmadhiSThAnamAmACayadvAraM tu hRdayam|  tatrApi viddhasya sadyo maraNam||21||

 stanayoradhastAd dvyaGgulamubhayataH stanamUle tayoH kaphapUrNakoSThasya maraNam||22||

tayoriti|  stanamUlayorviddhayoH|| 22||

 stanacUcukayorUrdhvaM dvyaGgulamubhayataH stanarohite||23||  tayoH CoNitapurNakoSThasya maraNam||23||

cUcukau stanamukhau CyAmau|| 23||

 ubhayatroraso nADyau vAtavahe apastambhau||24||  tayoH CoNitapUrNakoSThatayA kAsaCvAsAbhyAM ca maraNam||24||

urasi ubhayato dve vAtavahe nADyau apastambhau nAmnA marmaNI||24||

 aMsakUTayoradhaH pArCvayorupari bhAgayorapAlApau||25||  tayoH pUyatvamApannena raktena maraNam||25||

aMsapArCvAntarayormadhye kiJcit pArCvabhAge apAlApau|  tayormadhye viddhayorna sadyo maraNam|  apitu pUyatvamApanne rakte|| 25||

 pRSThavaMCamubhayataH pratiCroNIkarNAvasthinI kaTIkataruNe||26||  tayoH CoNitakSayAt pANDurvivarNo hInarupo
mriyate||26||

pRSThavaMCamubhayataH pRSThavaMCasya dvayoH pArCvayorye pratiCroNI karNAvasthinI sthitAH te kaTIkataruNe marmaNI CroNyAH karNAkRtitvAt CroNIkarNau|| 26||

 pArCvayorjaghanabahirbhAge pRSThavaMCamubhayataH kukundarau||27||  tayoH sparCAjJAnamadhaH kAye ceSTAnACaCca||27||

pRSThavaMCasya pARCvayormarmaNI kukundarau tau ca jaghanAdbahiH|  kaTyAH paCcimo bhAgo jaghanam|| 27||

 CoNIkarNayoruparyyACayAcchAdanau pArCvAntarapratibaddhau
nitambau||28||  tayoradhaH kAye Copho daurbalyaM maraNaJca||28||

pRSThavaMCasya dvayoH pArCvayoH CroNIkarNayorupari pArCvAntaramadhye pratibaddhau pakvACayasya chAdane nitambamarmaNI|| 28||

 adhaH pArCvAntarapratibaddhau jaghanapArCvamadhye tiryyagUrdhvaM ca pArCvasandhI||29||  tayoH CoNitapUrNakoSThatayA maraNam||29||

pArCvAntarapratibaddhau|  savyapArCvasthaH savye pratibaddhaH|  apasavyaCcApasavye|  tatra cAdha tiryyakca pratibaddhau pARCvasandhI|  te ca jaghanapArCvayormadhye bhavataH|| 29||

 adhaH pARCvAntarapratibaddhau jaghanapArCvamadhye tiryyagUrdhvaM ca pArCvasandhI||30||  tayoH CoNitapUrNakoSThatayA maraNam||30||

pRSThavaMCasya dvayoH pUrvoktayoH stanamUlayorArjavena tiryyak spaSTadiggrahaNena bRhatyau marmaNI|| 30||

shArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH

 pRSThavaMCamubhayato bAhumUlasambaddhe aMsaphalake||31||  tayorbAhusvApaCoSau||31||

aMsaphalake pRSThavaMCasya dvayoH pArCvayorbAhumUle ca pratibaddhe|  tayorvyadha iti sarvatra sambandhaH|| 31||

 grIvAbAhuCiromadhyeM~asapIThaskandhabandhanAvaMsau||32||  tayoH stambdhabAhutA||32||

aMsau grIvAdimadhyagau skandhayoH aMsapI ThayoCca bandhArthau|  evaM gudo bastirnAbhirhRdayaM dve stanamUle dve stanarohite dvAvapastambhau dvAvapAlApau dve kaTIkataruNe dve kukundare dvau nitambe dvau pArCvasandhI dve bRhatyau dve aMsaphalake dvAvaMsAviti SaDviMCatirmarmANyantarAdhau|| 32||

 kaNThanADImubhayataCcatasro dhamanyaH||33||  tAsAM dve nIle, dve manye||33||  tAsu mUkatA, svaravaikRtyaM, rasAgrAhitA vA
bhavati||33||

Urdhvamucyate|  kaNThanADyAmekasmin|  pArCve ekA nIlA nAma sirA|  ekA manyA|  tathaiva dvitIye|  tAsAM vyadhe mUkatvAdikaM bhavati|| 33||

 grIvAyAmubhayataH pRthak catasraH sirA mAtRkAstAsu sadyo maraNam||34||

grIvAyAM dvayoH pArCvayoraSTau sirA mAtRkAhvayAH|| 34||

 CirogrIvayoH sandhAne kRkATike||35||  tayoCcalamUrdhatA||35||

ubhayapArCve Ciraso grIvAyACca sandhAne kRkATike marmaNI|  tatra viddhasya calaCIrSatA|| 35||

 karNapRSThayoradhaHsaMCrite vidhure||36||  tayorbAdhiryam||36||

karNayoradho vidhure|| 36||

 ghrANamArgamubhayataH CrotramArgapratibaddhAvabhyantarataH phaNau||37||  tayorgandhAjJAnam||37||

ghrANasrotasordvayoH pArCvayorantaH Cirasi galapradeCe phaNau nAmnA marmaNI|  tau ca CrotrasrotaH pratibaddhau tayorvyadhe gandhAjJAnam|| 37||

 bhruvoH pucchAntayoradho~akSNorbAhyato~apAGgau||38||  tayorAndhyam||38||

bhruvoH sambandhinoH pucchAntayorbAhyAntarayoradha akSNoCca bahirapAGgau marmaNI|| 38||

 bhruvoH pucchAntayoruparyanukarNaM lalATe CaGkhau||39||  tayoH sadyo maraNam||39||

lalATe bhruvoH pucchAntayorupari karNamanu karNaM prati CaGkhau nAma marmaNI|  tayorvyadhe sadyo maraNam|| 39||

 bhruvorupari nimnayorAvarttau tayorAndhyaM dRSTyupaghAto vA||40||

bhruvorupari nimnayoH pradeCayorAvarttau nAmnA dve marmaNI|  tayorvyadhe Andhyam|  adarCanam athavopaghAtamAtraM dRSTervA|| 40||

shArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH

 CaGkhayorupari keCAnte utkSepau||41||  tayoH saCalyaH pAkAt patitaCalyo vA jIvennoddhRtaCalyaH||41||

CaGkhayorupari keCAvasAnamaryyAde utkSepo marmaNI|  tayorviddhaH san saCalyo jIvati|  pAkAdvA svayaMpatite jIvati|  uddhRtaCalyo na jIvet|| 41||

 bhruvormadhye sthapanI||42||  tatrotkSepavat||42||

bhruvormadhye nAma sthapanI marma|  tatrotkSepavat saCalyI jIvet|  pAkAt patitaCalyo vA|  tatra ca uddhRtaCalyo na jIvet|| 42||

 paJca sandhayaH Cirasi||43||  tiryyagUrdhvaM ca sImantAnAm||43||  teSUnmAdabhramacittanACairmaraNam||43||

paJca Cirasi kapAlAnAM sandhayaH paJca marmANi|  tatra daau lalATaparCvayoH keCAntAvasthitau dvau kRkATikApArCvayorUrdhvagau sandhI|  tayorupari tiryyagRjusandhiH sImantAsteSu viddheSUnmAdAdibhirmaraNam|| 43||

 jihvAghrANAkSiCrotratarpaNInAM sirANAM tAluni sannipAtaH||44||  tAsAM mukhAni catvAri CRGgATakasaMjJAni||44||  teSu sadyomaraNam||44||

jihvAdisantarpaNInAM sirANAM tAluni sannipAto bhavati|  tAsAM yAni bahvInAmapi catvAri mukhAni tAni CRGgATakAkhyAni marmANi|  teSAM vyadhe sadyomaraNam|| 44||

 mastakAbhyantara upariSTAtsirAsandhisannipAto romAvarttaH so~adhipatirnAma||45||  tatrApi sadyomaraNaM bhavatIti||45||

antarmastakaM sarvordhvasirAsandhInAM saGgamo nAmAvartto nAma marma|  sa evAdhipAkhyaH|  evaM dve nIle dve manye aSTau mAtRkAH dve kRkATike dve vidhure dvau phaNau dvAvapAGgau dvau CaGkhau dvAvAvarttau dvAvutkSepau ekA sthapanI paJca sImantACcatvAri CRGgATakAnyeko~adhipatiparyyAya Avartta ityetAni saptatriMCacchirasi marmANi||45||

 sAmAnyalakSaNaM punarmarmaNAM pIDite rujotpattirviSamaM ca spandanam||46||

marmaNAM nAma sthAnaJca jJAtam|  lakSaNaM tu na jJAtam|  atastadvijJAnArthamucyatesAmAnyenetyAdi|  sarvamarmaNAmidaM lakSaNamityarthaH|  viSamamanekarUpam|| 46||

 sAmAnyenaiva ca -

dehaprasuptirgurutA sammohaH CItakAmitA||47||  svedo mUrcchA vamiH CvAso marmaviddhasya lakSaNam||47||

sAmAnyenanaiva cetasya dehaprasuptirityAdinA sambandhaH| prsuptichedAdyanabodhaH| sammoho mUrcA||47||

 api ca-maraNakAritvAnmarma||48||

api ceti samuccaye|  maraNakAritvAnmarmeti nirvacanam|| 48||

 tatpunarmAMsasirAsnAyvasthisandhisannipAtaH||49||  tena tasmin pIDyamAne viCeSataH prANabAdhaH||49||  bAhulyena tu nirdeCaH||49||  tasmAnmAMsAdyACrayato marmANi paJcadhA bhidyante||49||

tat punarmarma mAMsAdisannipAtasteSAM miCrIbhAve naikatrAvasthAnaM tena hetunA tasmin pIDite~adhikaM prANAnAmAbAdho bhavati|  mAMsAdInAM paJcAnAM yadyapi miCrIbhAvena sarva marma bhavati|  tathApi yo~ayaM mAMsamarma sirAmarma ityAdi vyapadeCaH sa bAhulyakRta eva|  yatra mAMsasya bAhulyaM tatra mAMsena vyapadeCaH|  yatra sirANAM tatra sirAbhiH|  evamanyatrApi vAcyam|  evaM mAMsAdibhedena paJcadhA marmANi|| 49||

 tadyathA talahRdayendrabastigudastanarohitAnyekAdaCa mAMsamarmANi||50||

tatraikAdaCa mAMsamarmANi; tadyathA-caturSu karacaraNeSu catvAri talahRdayAni|  catvArIndrabastayaH|  eko gudo dve stanarohita iti|| 50||

shArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH

 urvIlohitAkhyanAbhihRdayastanamUlApastambhApAlApapArCvasandhibRhatInIlAmanyAmAtRkAphaNApAGgasthapanICRGgATakAnyekacatvAriMCatsirAmarmANi||51||

ekacatvAriMCat sirAmarmANi|  tadyathA-catasra urvyaCcatvAri lohitAkSANi|  ekA nAbhirekaM hRdayam|  dve stanamUle|  dvAvapastambhau|  dvAvapAlApI| dvau pArCvasandhI|  dve bRhatyau|  dve nIle|  dve manye|  aSTau mAtRkAH|  dvau phaNau|  dvau apAGgau|  ekA sthapanI|  catvAri CRGgATakAni iti|| 51||

 kSiprakUrcakUrcaCiroviTapakakSAdharANi bastyaMsavidhurotkSepAH saptaviMCatiH snAvamarmANi||52||

saptaviMCatiH snAvamarmANi|  tadyathA-karacaraNeSu catvAri kSiprANi|  catvAraH kUrcA|  catvAri kUrcaCirAMsi|  dve viTape|  dvau kakSyAdharau|  catvAryyANayaH|  eko bastiH|  dvAvaMsau|  dve vidhure|  dvAvutkSepAviti|| 52||

 kaTIkataruNanitambAMsaphalakaCaGkhAstvaSTAvasthimarmANi||53||

aSTAvasthi marmANi|  tadyathA-dve kaTIkataruNe|  dvau nitambau|  dvAvaMsaphalakau|  dvau CaGkhAviti|| 53||

 gulphamaNibandhajAnukUrparakukundarakRkATikAvartasImantAdhipatayo viMCatiH sandhimarmANi||54||

viMCatiH sandhimarmANi|  tadyathA-dbau gulphau|  dvau maNibandhau| dve jAnunI| dve kUrpare|  dvau kukundarau|  dve kRkATike|  dvau Avartau|  paJca sImantAH|  eka adhipatiH|| 54||

 punaCca paJcadhA||55||

tAni ca mAMsAdibhedena paJcadhoktAni|  punaranyena prakAreNa sadyaH prANaharatvAdinA paJcadhocyante
	1. kAnicit sadyaH prANaharANi|
	2. kAnicit kAlAntaraprANaharANi|
	3. anyAni viCalyaghnAni|
	4. anyAni vaikalyakarANi|
	5. anyAni rujAkarANi|

	iti paJcaprakArAH|| 55||

 gudabastinAbhihRdayamAtRkACaGkhaCRGgATakAdhipataya ekonaviMCatiH sadyaH prANaharANyAgneyatvAt||56||  teSAM saptarAtrAbhyantaraM kalaH||56||

tatra sadyaH prANaharANi gudabastinAbhihRdayAni catvAri|  aSTau mAtRkAH|  dbau CaGkhau|  catvAri CRGgATakAni|  eko~adhipatiH|  ityekonaviMCatiH|  AghneyatvamACu maraNahetuH|  saptarAtrAbhyantaraM prathamadivasAditi|| 56||

 talahRdayakSiprendrabastivakSomarmakaTIkataruNanitambapArCvasandhibRhatIsImantAstrayastriCatkAlAntaraprANaharANi||57||  saumyAgneyatvAtteSAM pakSAbhyantaraM kAlaH||57||  teSvapi tu kSiprANi kadAcidACu||57||

trayastriMCanmarmANi saumyAgneyatvAt kAlAntareNa vilambitaM prANaharANi|  pakSAbhyantare vA praharAdivaCAdaniyamaH|  tadyathA-catvAri talahRdayAni|  catvAri kSiprANi|  catvAraHindrabastayaH|  aSTau vakSomarmANi stanamUlastanarohitApastambhApAlApAkhyAni|  dve kaTIkataruNe|  dvau nitambau|  dvau pArCvasandhI|  dve bRhatyau|  paJca sImantAH|  iti trayastriMCat|  teSvapi madhye kSiprANi sadyaH prANaharANyapi bhavanti|| 57||

 utkSepau sthapanI ca trINi viCalyaghnAni vAyavyatvAt||58||  CalyamukhAvaruddho hi yAvadatra vAyusthiSThati tAvajjIvati||58||

trINi viCalyaghnAni|  tAni vAyavyAni CalyaM AkRSTe vAyorvraNena nirgamanAnna jIvatyata eva viCalyaM ghnanti, na tu saCalyam|  tatra dvAvutkSepAvekAsthapanIti trINi|| 58||

 kUrcajAnukUrparANyurvIlohitAkhyaviTapakakSAdharakukundarAMsaphalakanIlAmanyAkRkATikAvidhuraphaNApAGgAvarttACcatuCcatvAriMCadvaikalyakarANi saumyatvAt||59||  somo hi sthairyaCaityAbhyAM prANAn dhArayati||59||  tAnyapi ca kadAcidabhihatAni mArayanti||59||

catuCcatvAriMCadvikalatvaM kurvanti|  saumyatvAnna mArayanti|  tatra catvAri kUrcAni|  dve jAnunI|  dvau kUrparau|  catasraH ANayaH|  catasra urvyaH|  catvAri lohitAkSANi|  dvau viTapau|  dvau kakSAdharau|  dvau kukundarau|  dvAvaMsau|  dvAvaMsaphalakau|  dve nIle|  dve manye|  dve kRkATike|  dve vidhure|  dvau phaNau|  dvAvapAGgau|  dvAvAvarttAviti|  etAni catuCcatvAriMCat kadAcinmArayantyapyatighAtAt|| 59||

 kUrcaCirogulphamaNibandhAstvaSTau rujAkarANyagnivAyusomaguNabAhulyAt||60||  agnivAyU hi viCeSeNa rujAkarau||60||  somastu prANAnavalambata ityuktam||60||

aSTau marmANi rujAkarANi somAgnivAyvAtmakatvAt|  catvAri kUrcaCirAMsi dvau gulphau dvau maNibandhAvityaSTau|| 60||

shArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH

 anye tvAhuH-mAMsAdInAM paJcAnAmapi vivRddhAnAM samavAyAt sadyaHprANaharANi||61||  ekaikahInAnAmalpAnAM ca
kramAditarANi svabhAvata eva ca||61||

anye tvAcAryyA AgneyatvaM hetuM parityajya sadyaHprANaharatve pUrvoktamAMsAdipaJcakasyAnUnAdhikabhAvena vivRddhasya hetutvaM vadanti|  yadA gudAdInAmekonaviMCatermAMsAdInAM samAnAdhikAnAM sannipAtastadA sadyaH prANaharatvamityarthaH|  AdiCabdenAsthisnAyusirAsandhInAM grahaNam|  itarANi kAlAntaraprANaharAdIni catvAryekaikena hInAnAM mAMsAdInAM svalpAnAM ca sannipAtAdbhavantIti|  tena mAMsAdInAmanyatamenaikena hInAnAM kAlAntaraprANaharANi|  dvihInAnAM viCalyaghnAni|  trihInAnAM vaikalyajananAni|  ekasyaiva sadbhAvAdrujAkarANi|  suCrutaH paThati dvayoH saGghAtAdIni, tanna budhyAmahe|| 61||

 anye vadanti-pratiniyatakarmANi candrasUryAyaskAntopalAnAmivAmbuvahnikAlalohasaMCleSAstathA ca chinneSu
bahumarmasvapi pANipAdeSu svabhAvata eva na mRtyuH||62||

anye tvAcAryyA na saumyAgneyatvAdikaM hetuM vadanti|  nApi viCiSTasya mAMsAdeH sannipAtam|  api tu svabhAvameva hetutvenoddiCanti|  tathA candrakAntAdInAmambujanmAdau tathA bahumarmACraye pANipAde chinne~api mRtyurna bhavatItyatrApi svabhAva eva hetuH||62||

 apare punaratrApi hetumAhuH-pANipAdacchede hi sirAH saGkocamAyAnti||63||  tato~alpAsRkpravRtterjIvitam||63||  marmavyadhe
tvatiraktasrutito vAyuvaikRtena ca maraNam||63||  tasmAt marmAbhihatasya tadaGgamACu sandhideCAcchedanIyam||63||  atihatAnAM tu marmaNAM yathAsvaM pUrvaM pUrvaM ca karma I Sadante vA hatAnAmuttarottarameva||63||

apare ityAdi subodham|  tasmAnmarmaNyabhihatasya tadaGgaM tasmin marmACritaM tat sandhideCAcchedanIyam|  sandhau chinne saGkucitAH sirA raktaM na muJcantyo jIvitaM na tyajet|  teSAM ca marmaNAM sadyaH prANaharaNAdikaM paJcavidhaM karmoktam|  tatrAtihatAnAM marmaNAmAtmIyaM karma pUrvaM-pUrvaM ca bhavati|  etaduktaM bhavatigudAdInAmabhihatAnAM svakIyaM sadyaH prANaharaNameva|  teSAM ca pUrvAsambhavaH|  talahRdayAdInAmabhihatAnAM svaM karma kAlAntaraprANaharatvam|  kadAcittu pUrvamapi sadyaH prANaharatvaM bhavati|  utkSepAdInAM svaM karma viCalyaghnatvam|  na tu pUrvaM sambhavati|  athavA kAlAntaraprANaharaNamapi|  kUrcAdInAmabhihatAnAM svaM karma vaikalyakaraNam|  kadAcittu pUrvamapi bhavati kAlAntaraprANaharatvam|  viCalyahananaM pUrvamapi na sambhavatyasambhavAt|  kUrcaCiraHprabhRtInAM cAbhihatAnAM svaM karma rujAkaraNam|  kadAcittu pUrvamapi bhavati|  vaikalyakaraNamityuktamabhihatAnAM yathAsvaM pUrvaM-pUrvaM ca karma|  yadA tu tAni marmANi ISatkoNe stokenAbhighAtenAbhihatAni bhavantyante vA paryyante vAbhihatAni bhavanti tadA teSAmuttarameva|  tena sadyaH prANaharANAmISadante vAbhihatAnAmuttaraM karma kAlAntaraprANaharaNam|  

	kAlAntaraprANaharANAmISadante vA~abhihatAnAmanantaramuttaraM karma vaikalyakaraNam|  viCalyaghnatvaM na sambhavatyanantaramapi|  viCalyaghnAnAmante veSadvAbhihatAnAmuttaraM vaikalyakaraNaM karma bhavati|  vaikalyakarANAmISadante cAbhihatAnAmuttaraM karma rujAkaraNamityuktaM yathottarameveti|| 63||

 punaCca paJcadhA bhidyante||64||

tAnyeva marmANyevaM mAnabhedena paJcavidhAni|| 64||

 tadyathA-urvyaH kUrcaCirAMsiviTape kakSAdhare ca dvAdaCa svAGgulonmitAni||65||

urvyAdIni dvAdaCa marmavataH svAGgulamAnAni|  catvAri catvAri dve dve iti dvAdaCa|| 65||

 gulphau maNibandhau stanamUle ca SaT dvyaGgulAni||66||

gulphAdIni SaD dvyaGgulAni|  dve dve dve iti SaT|| 66||

 jAnunI kUrpare ca catvAri tryaGgulAni||67||

jAnadvayaM kUrparadvayaM ceti catvAri tryaGgulAni|| 67||

 kUrcA gudo bastirnAbhirhRdayaM nIle manye mAtRkAH sImantAH
CRGgATakAni caikonatriMCat pANitalasammitAni||68||

kUrcAdInyekonatriMCat svahastalapramANAni|| 68||

 CeSANi SaT paJcACadaGguladalapramANAni||69||

CeSANi SaT paJcACadaGguladalapramANAni|  aGguladalamardhAGgulam|  tathA ca dhanvantariH paThati'CeSANi cAGgulamitArdhasamAni dehe' iti|| 69||

 anye punarAhuH-vrIhipramANAni kSiprANi||70||  kalAyapramANAH stanarohitotkSepAH tathA~anye tila-
pramANAnyapi marmANIcchanti||70||

kecinmatena tilapramANAni marmANIti kathanam|  svadhIgamyaM CeSam|| 70||

shArIrasthAnam

prakRutibhedIyaH

 athAtaH prakRtibhedIyaM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

CarIravicAraNaM prakRtaM tasya cA~avayaparicchedaH kRtaH|  samprati doSAdibhedena prakRtipradarCanaRthamadhyAyArambhaH|| 1||

 sapta prakRtayo doSaiH pRthak saMsargeNa sAmyena ca bhavanti||2||

sarvaprakRtibhyo doSaprakRtInAM prAdhAnyAt tA evAdAvucyante-sapta prakRtaya ityAdi|  vAtAdibhiH pRthak tisraH|  saMsargeNa tisraH|  sannipAtenaikA|| 2||

	athetyAdi pUrvavadvyAkhyeyam|  vikRtirmaraNaM janmAntaraprAdurbhAvaH, parAsutA, dehAntaragamanam, paJcatvam, adarCanam, anto, vinACaH iti paryyAyAH|  athavA vikRtiH svabhAvavarNAdyanyathAbhAvaH|  tasya vijJAnamadhikRtya kRtastathoktaH|| 1||

dehe prakRtivarNAH||3||  tadbedAMCca padmagaurAdayaH||3||

maGgulyAdlInAmakasmAddhrasvatvaM maraNAyetyevamAdyaptyuktaM bhavati|

dRSTisukhA||7||  ambhasaH vaiDUryyendranIlavimalA ghanA susnigdhA

 sapta prabhAH-raktA pItA pANDurA sitA~asitA CyAvA

jvara ityAdi subodham|  gambhIro~antarvegaH|  dIrgharAtriko bahukAlaprarUDhaH|  aparAhne CleSmakAsasamanvita ityanena sambandhaH|  sajan saGgacchan|  vAsaso~araJjanaM dhautasyApi vruddhaM gatavayaskaM karma|  raktapittaM karttR nihanti tathA pANDvAdiyuktaM karma|  kAsaCvAsau jvarAdiyuktam|  sahA~asraviDbhyAM varttata iti sA~asraviT|  tathA pUyAdimatI|  anuSaGgiNI ciraprasaktA|  anyenak rogeNa jvarAdinA kSapitam|  mecakamanekavarNam|  mastuluGgaM kapAlamajjA|  veCvAraH kuTTitaM mAMsam|  karbuto varNaviCeSaH|  CIrNapAyubalitvAdiyuktamatIsAro nihanti|  CIrNAH pAyurvalayaCca yasya tam|  muktanAlaM srastagudabandham|  saha tRDAdibhirvarttata iti sa tathokto~atisAraH|  pravAhikA nistAnikA|| 3||

 tandrAdAhArucicchardimUrcchAdhmAnAtisAravAn||4||  anekopadravayutaH pAdAbhyAM prasRto naram||4||  nArIM CophomukhAddhanti kukSiguhyAdubhAvapi||4||  rAjIcitaH sravaMCchardijvaraCvAsAtisAraNim||4||  jvarAtisArau CophAnteCvayathurvA tayoH kSaye||4||  durbalasya viCeSeNa jAyante~antAya dehinaH||4||  Cvayathuryasya pAdasthaH parisraste ca piNDike||4||  sIdataH sakthinI caiva taM bhiSak parivarjayet||4||

tRDAdibhiryuktaM meho hanti|  mAMsakotho mAMsakledaH|  piTakAH CarAvikAdyA marmAdigAH|  hRdgudasya prAdhAnyAtpRthaggrahaNam|  mandotsAhaM pramehiNaM ca tAH Gnanti|  tACca piTakAH mAMsakothAdibhiH kAraNaiH sarvaM viCeSAnapekSayA Gnanti|  marmaNAM hRdayakaNThAdInAM samantato yAstAstathoktAH|  jaTharamudaramapi mUtrasaGGAdibhiH kAraNabhUtairhanti|  durbhalatvAdiyuktaM ca puruSaM hanti|  upasthaM meDhram|  virecanahRtA~anAhaM santaM punaH punarAnahyantam|  pAdAbhyAM prathamaM prasRtaH CvayathuH pumAMsaM hanti|  muKAt prasRto nArIM hanti, na tu puruSam|  kukSiguhyAbhyAM prasRteH ubhayaM hanti, puruSamapi nArImapi|  rAjIbhiCcitaH CvayathustathAsravan CArdyAdiyuktaM hanti|  CoPasyAnte CoPe nivRtte jvarAtisArau|  jvarAtisArayorvA kSaye CoPaH|  evaM vidhA jvarAtisAraCoPAH sarvasyAntAya jAyante|  durbhalasya puMso viCeSeNAntAya jAyante|  anto maraNam|| 4||

 vAtASThIlA~atisaMvRddhA tiSThanti dAruNA hRdi||5||  tRSNayA~anuparItasya sadyo muSNAti jIvitam||5||

yasya deho na tathA CuSyati yathA hastapAdaM sa paJcatAM maraNAkhyAM mAsAdyAti|  paJcabhUtAnAM pRthagbhAvaH paJcatA|  udarItyAdau mAsAt sa na jIvati ityanuvarttate|  visarpa ityAdau hantIti sthitam|  tRDvantamatIsAriNaJca kuSThaM hanti|  madamUrchAye vakSyete|  CirograhAdimat vAtAsraM hanti|  sarvAmayACca jvarAdayaH CirorogAdibhiH kAraNabhutairhanti|  kSINasvaradhAtutvAdiyuktaM vAtavyAdhirAkSipakAdiH|  vAtavyAdhinA apasmArAdibhiCcA~a~arttAn svalpe~api vikAre kSINadehAn sato varjayet|  subodham|  tRSNayA pari samantAdito vyAptaH parItaH tasya muSNAtIti vAtASThIletyanena sambadhyate|  aSThIleva prastaramayI vAyunA vAtASThIlA|| 5||

 CaithilyaM piNDike vAyurnItvA nAsAJca jihyatAm||6||  kSINasyA~a~ayamya manye vA sadyo muSNAti jIvitam||6||  nAbhIgudAntaraM gatvA vaMkSaNau vA samACrayan||6||  gRhItvA pAyuhRdaye kSINadehasya vA balI||6||  malAn vastiCironAbhiM vibadhya janayanujam||6||  kurvan vaMkSaNayoH CUlaM tRSNAM bhinnapurISatAm||6||  CvAsaM vA janayan vAyurgRhItvA gudavaMkSaNau||6||  vitatya parCukAgrANi gRhItvoraCca mArutaH||6||  stimitasyAtatAkSasya sadyo muSNAti jIvitam||6||  sahasA jvarasantApastRSNAmUrcchabalakSayaH||6||  viCleSaNaJca sandhInAM mumUrCorupajAyate||6||

nAsA jihyA saGkuciteva|  nAbhItyAdau vAyuridamidaM kRtvA sadyojIvitaM muSNAti|  nAbhIgudasyAntaraM madhyaM gatvA rujAM janayan|  athavA vaMkSaNau samACrayan|  athavA balI kSINadehasya pAyuhRdaye gRhItvA malAdIn vibadhya rujAM janayan sadyo muSNAti jIvitam|  malAdoSAH CakRdAdayaCca|  athavA gudavaMkSaNaM gRhItvA pAyuvaMkSaNayoH CUlaM tRSNAM bhinnapurISatAM ca kurvan|  CvAsaM vA janayan|  athavA mArutaH pArCvakAsthInAmagrANi vitatya vyApyoraCca gRhItvA stimitasyAtatAkSasya puruSasya sadyo muSNAti jIvitam|  jvarasantApAdi sahasA mumUrSorevopajAyate nA~anyasya|| 6||

 gosarge vadanAdyasya svedaH pracyavate bhRCam||7||  lepajvaropataptasya durlabhaM tasya jivitam||7||

gosarge yasmin kAle gAvo bhavanAnnissaranti|  rAtryanta iti yAvat|  lepo mukhasyopalepaH|| 7||

 pravAlagulikAbhAsA yasya gAtre masUrikAH||8||  utpadyACu vinaCyanti na cirAtsa vinaCyati||8||

pravAlagulikA vidrumagulikAstA iva bhAsante|  masUrikA masUrAkRtisaGghAtAH|| 8||

 masUravidalaprakhyAstathA vidrumasannibhAH||9||  antarvakrAH kiNAbhACca visphoTA dehanACanAH||9||

masUravidalaM masUradalam|  antarvakrAH madhyanimnAM kiNAH karAdau vraNagranthiH|  visphoTo granthiH|| 9||

 kAmilAkSNormukhaM purNaM CaGkhayormuktamAMsatA||10||  santrAsaCcoSNatAGge ca yasya taM parivarjayet||10||

akSNoH kAmiletyAdikaM yasya taM parivarjayet|| 10||

shArIrasthAnam

vikRutavyAdhivijJAnIyaH

 athAto vikRtivyAdhivijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

ceSTAdInAM svarUpaM darCayitvA vyAdhInAM mAraNAtmakAnAM lakSaNaparijJAnArthamadhyAyArambhaH|| 1||

 yasya kSINasya tRSNAbhivRddhirhRdi CUlaJca||2||  tathA hidhmA
raktAtisArau vA~a~adhmAnAtisArau vA||2||  bhRCaM satRSNau sa 
parAsuriti||2||

yasya sarvairityAdeH sa parAsurityanena sambandhaH|  yathAsvaM hetvAdibhiratimAtrairiti|  jvaro hetvAdibhiH paripUrNastathA raktapittAdiSvapi vAcyam|  kSINasya sataH kSut bahunApyannena na CAmyati|  tRDvA bahunA pAnena|  saphenamasRkSThIvanavat mukhAt prasicyate|  uraso vA CUlamityanuvarttate|  CleSmA prasicyata ityanena ca sambadhyate|  grIvAvamarddAdigudapAkAntaM yugapad varttate|  CakRdbhedAntaM vastuyugapat|  parikArtikAdyatimAtragudagrahAntaM vastu pakvACayasya chedanamiva yA vedanA sa parikartikA|  saMjJAM hatvA acetanaM kRtva|  ghurghurakamavyaktaCabdaviCeSam|| 2||

 aCmarI CUnavRSaNaM baddhamutraM rujArditam||3||

dUtAdivijJAnIyaH

 athAto dUtAdivijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

dUtAdivijJAnIyamapi AyuSa idantAparijJAnArthamupayujyata iti  tadarthamadhyAyArambhaH|  subodham|| 1||

 athAto dUtAdivijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

dUtAdivijJAnIyamapi AyuSa idantAparijJAnArthamupayujyata iti  tadarthamadhyAyArambhaH|  subodham|| 1||

 nirdiSTaM riSTamAturACrayam||2||  dUtasyApi tu jAtiveSabhASAceSTitadeCakAlA vaidyasya ca tassaGgalpaprasthAnaprayANapraveCA grahacAro~apUrvasambhavaH svapnadarCanAni ca rogiNaH
CubhACubhaM sUcayanti||2||

nirdiSTamityAdinA CAstrakAraH svayamadhyAyaprayojanaM kathayati|  dUtajAtyAdayo~api rogiNaH CubhACubhaM sUcayantIti sambandhaH|  jAtiH brAhmaNAdikA|  bhASA vacanam|  ceSTitaM kriyA|  deCaH uSNaCItAdiko vikArasamAnAsamAnastadvat kAlo~api ca|  vaidyasya ca tatsaGgame yaH saGkalpastaditi dUtasya vyapadeCaH|  prasthAnaM svaveCmano nirgamanam|  prayANaM pathi|  praveCaH AturaveCmani|  grahANAM cAro rACigamanam|  apUrvasambhavo vaidyAturasaGgame prathamamayatnenotpattirabhUtapUrvasya CubhACubhasUcakasya|| 2||

 vikAratulyaguNe ca deCe kAle vA dUto vaidyamupasarpan aCubhaH||3||

AturAdityAderdUto vaidyamupasarpanna Cubha iti sambandhaH AturavarNAduttamo varNou yasya dUtasya|  yathA CUdrasya brAhmaNAdInAM trayANAmanyatamo dUtaH|  vaiCyasya brAhmaNakSatriyAbhyAmanyatarastathA kSatriyasya brAhmaNa iti|  anyACramo bhinnACramaH|  catvAra ACramAH|  brahmacArI gRhastho yatirvAnaprasthaH iti|  pASaNDA liGginaH SaNDaH klIbaH|  strIdUtaH|  aneko yugapad bahavo dUtAH jIrNAdivasanaH|  vivarNo viCiSTavarNaH viklavo bhIruH|  niSThuro rUkSaH|  amaGgalAdyabhidhAyI|  dUrAdAhvayamAno vaidyam|  tRNAdi spRk|  anAmikAGguliH kaniSThAyAH pUrvA|  mArjanI CodhanI|  bhagnacyutou tathAvidhou bhANDou|  tathA kASThAdidharaH|  pAdAbhyaM bhuvanatalpAdIni muJcan|  athavA pakvaM phalAni gRhItvA dUto vaidyamupasarpannaCubhaH|  tadvidhamanyat klinnadurgandhAdi|| 3||

 tadyathA-ghRtodakAdidravasamIpasthamatiCItastabdhAH pratyu-
Sasi CleSmAmaye~aCubhaH||4||  pittAmaye tu CubhaH||4||  tathA setu-
bhaGge chardimehAtisArAdiSvaCubhaH||4||  setubandhe tu CubhaH||4||

vikArAtulyaguNou deCakAlou tadyathetyAdinA darCayati|  CleSmAmayeSu ghRtodakAdi samIpasthaM vaidyaM dUta upasarpannaCubhaH|  pittAmayeSu CubhaH|  chardyAdiSu setubhaGge aCubhaH|  setubandhe CubhaH|  deCA uktAH|

 tathA madhyAhnobhayasandhyArdharAtricaturthISaSThInavamIparvadineSu
grahoparAgotpAtadarCanabharaNIkRttikArdrA~a~aCleSAmaghAmUla-
pUrvAsucACubhaH||5||

tathetyAdinA kAla ucyate|  ubhayasandhyA pUrvA cAparA ca|  nakSatraM mahArogadeCAntaravivakSayA|| 5||

 yaCcha vaidyaM suptaM nagnaJca bhUmou CayAnamabhyaktaM muktakeCaM
dakSiNAbhimukhaM viklavaM chindantaM bhindantamagnipitR-
kAryyapravaNamaCastaM cintayantaM kathayantaM vopatiSThati||6||

yaCcha dUtaH suptAdikaM vaidyamupatiSThati taM dUtaM vaidyo nAnuyAyAt|

 yo vA diCaM yAmyAM pratikRtAJjalirviSamaikapAdasthaH||7||

yo vA ityAdi bhiSagviCeSaNam|  viSayo bhUmAvasamyak sthita ekapAdastena tiSThati yaH|| 7||

 yasmin vyAdhitACrayaM kathayati dUte bhiSagaCubhamindri-
yArthamupalakSayet saGkalpayedvA taM ca nAnuyAyAt||8||

yasmin vyAdhitACrayamAturamuddiCya dUte kathayatyaCubhamindriyArthaM CabdasparCAdikaM bhiSaganubhavati vA saGkalpayati vA|  taM dUtaM nAyuyAyAt|| 8||

 ato~anyathA punaH karuNApeCalena manasA saumanasyavatA mAtApitRsamenAturasyAtyantamArogyamACaMsamAnena
prayAtavyam||9||

ato yathoktAdAturAdvarNottama ityAdi darCitAdvaiparItye karuNApeCalatvAdiyuktena bhiSajA AturaM draSTuM prayAtavyam|| 9||

 athAtaH sarvaroganidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

sUtrasthAne svasthavRttamuktam| AturavRttaM tu bahvabhidheyatvAt sUtritam| tasya cA~a~aturavRttasya svasthavRttasya ca CarIraparAyattatvAt dvitIyasthAne janmanaH prabhRti CarIraM nirNItam| samprati tu vyAdhinirNayasyAvasaraH| teSAJca vyAdhInAM nirNaye~ayaM kramaH| prathamaM teSAM kAraNaM pradarCayitavyam| tadanulakSaNAni| etAvatAcA~a~adhigatasvarUpANAM yathAsvaM pratIkAraH| ato nidAnalakSaNaparijJAnArthaM tRtIyasthAnasyArambhaH|  
	
	cikitsitaM tu bahuvaktavyatvAccaturthe vakSyate| nidAnapradhAnatvAt sthAnasya nidAnavyapadeCaH| nidAnaJca dvividham| kiJcit sakalarogAnuyAtam| kiJcidviCiSTarogACrayam| tattu pratyadhyAyaM nirdekSyate sakalarogavyApakanidAnaparijJAnArthaM prathamo~adhyAya Arabhyate| 
	athetyAdi pUrvavadvayAkhyeyam| rogA jvarAdayo~anuktAH nidAnaM kAraNam| tacca dvividham| kiJcit purA kalpe asatAm rogANAM svarUpapratilambhahetuH| kiJcit dRSTAdRSTACubhakarmakRtAM CarIre tatsambhavanimittam|| 1||

 iha kRtayuge vigatarAgadveSAdidvandvA jitalo bhakrodhaCrama klamAlasyabhayA niSparigrahAH puruCHA babhUvuH||2||  teSAM puNyabalena pRthivyAdInAM sarvaguNasamudAyAdacintyarasavIryyA disamuditAni sasyAnyoSadhayaCcAsan||2||  te tAni jitendrayatvAt kAle mAtrayA copayuJjAnAH satyArjavAnRCaMsyAdiguNayogAcca surasadRCatejaso rupAkRtipramANaprasAdopacayasaMhananasatvasArasampannA dIrghAyuSo nIrujCca babhUvuH||2||

ihetyAdi| iha manuSyaloke| kRtayuge vigatA rAgadveSAdayo dvandvAH kleCA yeSAM tathoktAH| jitAni lobhaCramAdIni yeniSparigrahAH svacchandacAriNaH|  tathAvidhAH puruSA babhUvuH| teSAmiti| prathamayugee teSAM puruSANAM  puNyabalena pRthivyAdInAM sarvaguNa samudAyAddhetoracintyAnyatarkyANyatiCayitAni rasAdIni yeSAM sasyAdInAm| te puruSAstAni sasyAdInyoSadhICcopayuJjAnAsta dAsatyAdiguNayogAcca surasamAnatejaso rUpAdisampannA nIrujo dIrghAyuSaCca babhUvuH| prasAdo nirmalatvam| upacayo mahatvam saMhananaM kAThinyam| sArANi tvagraktAdInyuktAni|| 2||

 bhraCyati tu kRtayuge yugasvabhAvAt krameNa parihIya mANasarvaguNeSu pRthivyAdiSu CarIreSu ca dharmAtikramA puruSeSvavaCyambhAvino  nirapekSarUkSAbhirupekSitA devatA bhirjvarAdayaH prAdurabhUvanniti sarvarogANAM sAmAnyataH sambhavaH||3||

purA kalpe ca dvividho rogANAM sambhavahetuH sAmAnyaviCeSabhedena tayoH pUrvaM sAmAnyenocyate - bhraCyatIti| tataH kRtayuge bhraCyati puruSeSu jvarAdayaH prAdurabhUvan| kathamityA~a~aha-pRthivyAdiSu yugasvabhAvAt bhraCyamAnasarvaguNeSu| CarIreSu ca bhraCyamAnasarvaguNeSu kimbhUtA jvarAdayaH ? Aha-dharmAtikramAnnirapekSAbhI rUkSAbhiCca niHsnehAbhirdevatAbhirupekSitA avihitapratikriyA avaCyambhAvina iti sAmAnyena sarvarogANAmutpattiH|| 3||

 iha kRtayuge vigatarAgadveSAdidvandvA jitalo bhakrodhaCrama klamAlasyabhayA niSparigrahAH puruCHA babhUvuH||2||  teSAM puNyabalena pRthivyAdInAM sarvaguNasamudAyAdacintyarasavIryyA disamuditAni sasyAnyoSadhayaCcAsan||2||  te tAni jitendrayatvAt kAle mAtrayA copayuJjAnAH satyArjavAnRCaMsyAdiguNayogAcca surasadRCatejaso rupAkRtipramANaprasAdopacayasaMhananasatvasArasampannA dIrghAyuSo nIrujCca babhUvuH||2||

ihetyAdi| iha manuSyaloke| kRtayuge vigatA rAgadveSAdayo dvandvAH kleCA yeSAM tathoktAH| jitAni lobhaCramAdIni yeniSparigrahAH svacchandacAriNaH|  tathAvidhAH puruSA babhUvuH| teSAmiti| prathamayugee teSAM puruSANAM  puNyabalena pRthivyAdInAM sarvaguNa samudAyAddhetoracintyAnyatarkyANyatiCayitAni rasAdIni yeSAM sasyAdInAm| te puruSAstAni sasyAdInyoSadhICcopayuJjAnAsta dAsatyAdiguNayogAcca surasamAnatejaso rUpAdisampannA nIrujo dIrghAyuSaCca babhUvuH| prasAdo nirmalatvam| upacayo mahatvam saMhananaM kAThinyam| sArANi tvagraktAdInyuktAni|| 2||

 athAtaH sarvaroganidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

sUtrasthAne svasthavRttamuktam| AturavRttaM tu bahvabhidheyatvAt sUtritam| tasya cA~a~aturavRttasya svasthavRttasya ca CarIraparAyattatvAt dvitIyasthAne janmanaH prabhRti CarIraM nirNItam| samprati tu vyAdhinirNayasyAvasaraH| teSAJca vyAdhInAM nirNaye~ayaM kramaH| prathamaM teSAM kAraNaM pradarCayitavyam| tadanulakSaNAni| etAvatAcA~a~adhigatasvarUpANAM yathAsvaM pratIkAraH| ato nidAnalakSaNaparijJAnArthaM tRtIyasthAnasyArambhaH|  
	
	cikitsitaM tu bahuvaktavyatvAccaturthe vakSyate| nidAnapradhAnatvAt sthAnasya nidAnavyapadeCaH| nidAnaJca dvividham| kiJcit sakalarogAnuyAtam| kiJcidviCiSTarogACrayam| tattu pratyadhyAyaM nirdekSyate sakalarogavyApakanidAnaparijJAnArthaM prathamo~adhyAya Arabhyate| 
	athetyAdi pUrvavadvayAkhyeyam| rogA jvarAdayo~anuktAH nidAnaM kAraNam| tacca dvividham| kiJcit purA kalpe asatAm rogANAM svarUpapratilambhahetuH| kiJcit dRSTAdRSTACubhakarmakRtAM CarIre tatsambhavanimittam|| 1||

 iha kRtayuge vigatarAgadveSAdidvandvA jitalo bhakrodhaCrama klamAlasyabhayA niSparigrahAH puruCHA babhUvuH||2||  teSAM puNyabalena pRthivyAdInAM sarvaguNasamudAyAdacintyarasavIryyA disamuditAni sasyAnyoSadhayaCcAsan||2||  te tAni jitendrayatvAt kAle mAtrayA copayuJjAnAH satyArjavAnRCaMsyAdiguNayogAcca surasadRCatejaso rupAkRtipramANaprasAdopacayasaMhananasatvasArasampannA dIrghAyuSo nIrujCca babhUvuH||2||

ihetyAdi| iha manuSyaloke| kRtayuge vigatA rAgadveSAdayo dvandvAH kleCA yeSAM tathoktAH| jitAni lobhaCramAdIni yeniSparigrahAH svacchandacAriNaH|  tathAvidhAH puruSA babhUvuH| teSAmiti| prathamayugee teSAM puruSANAM  puNyabalena pRthivyAdInAM sarvaguNa samudAyAddhetoracintyAnyatarkyANyatiCayitAni rasAdIni yeSAM sasyAdInAm| te puruSAstAni sasyAdInyoSadhICcopayuJjAnAsta dAsatyAdiguNayogAcca surasamAnatejaso rUpAdisampannA nIrujo dIrghAyuSaCca babhUvuH| prasAdo nirmalatvam| upacayo mahatvam saMhananaM kAThinyam| sArANi tvagraktAdInyuktAni|| 2||

 bhraCyati tu kRtayuge yugasvabhAvAt krameNa parihIya mANasarvaguNeSu pRthivyAdiSu CarIreSu ca dharmAtikramA puruSeSvavaCyambhAvino  nirapekSarUkSAbhirupekSitA devatA bhirjvarAdayaH prAdurabhUvanniti sarvarogANAM sAmAnyataH sambhavaH||3||

purA kalpe ca dvividho rogANAM sambhavahetuH sAmAnyaviCeSabhedena tayoH pUrvaM sAmAnyenocyate - bhraCyatIti| tataH kRtayuge bhraCyati puruSeSu jvarAdayaH prAdurabhUvan| kathamityA~a~aha-pRthivyAdiSu yugasvabhAvAt bhraCyamAnasarvaguNeSu| CarIreSu ca bhraCyamAnasarvaguNeSu kimbhUtA jvarAdayaH ? Aha-dharmAtikramAnnirapekSAbhI rUkSAbhiCca niHsnehAbhirdevatAbhirupekSitA avihitapratikriyA avaCyambhAvina iti sAmAnyena sarvarogANAmutpattiH|| 3||

 iha kRtayuge vigatarAgadveSAdidvandvA jitalo bhakrodhaCrama klamAlasyabhayA niSparigrahAH puruCHA babhUvuH||2||  teSAM puNyabalena pRthivyAdInAM sarvaguNasamudAyAdacintyarasavIryyA disamuditAni sasyAnyoSadhayaCcAsan||2||  te tAni jitendrayatvAt kAle mAtrayA copayuJjAnAH satyArjavAnRCaMsyAdiguNayogAcca surasadRCatejaso rupAkRtipramANaprasAdopacayasaMhananasatvasArasampannA dIrghAyuSo nIrujCca babhUvuH||2||

ihetyAdi| iha manuSyaloke| kRtayuge vigatA rAgadveSAdayo dvandvAH kleCA yeSAM tathoktAH| jitAni lobhaCramAdIni yeniSparigrahAH svacchandacAriNaH|  tathAvidhAH puruSA babhUvuH| teSAmiti| prathamayugee teSAM puruSANAM  puNyabalena pRthivyAdInAM sarvaguNa samudAyAddhetoracintyAnyatarkyANyatiCayitAni rasAdIni yeSAM sasyAdInAm| te puruSAstAni sasyAdInyoSadhICcopayuJjAnAsta dAsatyAdiguNayogAcca surasamAnatejaso rUpAdisampannA nIrujo dIrghAyuSaCca babhUvuH| prasAdo nirmalatvam| upacayo mahatvam saMhananaM kAThinyam| sArANi tvagraktAdInyuktAni|| 2||

	upaCayalakSaNAdviparItalakSaNo~anupaCayaH|  anupaCayena ca vyAdheH svarUpaviCeSaH paricchidyate|  anena copaCayAkhyena sukhAnubandhena deCakAlAvapi vyAkhyAtou|  tenaitaduktaM bhavati-yasya vyAdhi viCeSasya yo deCaH kAlo vA sukhAnubandhahetuH sa tasya sAtmyamiti jJeyaH|  tena cAnUpAdibhedabhinnena CItAdiviCeSaviCiSTena ca sAdhAraNadoSaviCeSanimittayA vyAdhiviCeSanimittatayA ca rogasya svarUpaviCeSaH paricchidyate|  sarvaCchAyamupaCayo bhiSakparIkSAkAlAt pUrvamayatnenaiva sampanno vaidyaparIkSAyAM vikAraviCeSAdhigateH kAraNasAmagrImanupraviCAti|  athavA gUDhaliGgaM AbAdhe ACaGkitA~a~amaya parihAreNa, yatnenApyupaCayAnupaCayahetvAhArAdikaM prayuktaM tattu karmaniSNAtasya bhiSajo~avadhAraNeyattAmAvoDhumalam|  evametatridAnAdicatuSTayaM rogaviCeSAvacchedAya paryAptam|| 14||

atha kadAcinnidAnAdIni sAdhAraNatvAd vyAmohAdanyato~api vA nimittAdAtaGkasya svarUpamasamarthAni pradarCayituM tataH samprAptyA vyAdhiviCeSaM bhiSagavagacchet|  atha kA punariyaM samprAptirnAma bhavatIti ?  yA hi janAnAM paddhatiriva gadAnAM nidAnAdibhiradhigatAnAmapi sarveNa prakAreNa svarUpaniHCeSanirAkAGkSatAmAvahati|  iyamucyate-evaM duSTo doSa ityAdinA|  evamityanena prakAreNa|  prakAraCchAhitaveCeSasevanAdbahurUpaH|  tathA ca tadevaikaM dravyaM tameva caikaM svakAryyabhUtamanyatamaM doSaM, prakRtyAdInAM nAnAvidhaviCeSApekSyA kadAcillAghavena kopayati, kadAcidroukSyeNa|  kadAcitkAThinyena|  kadAcidajIrNena|  kadAciddoSAntaraprakopreNa|  kadAcicchaityena|  kadAcidanyena vA yathAsambhavaM guNaviCeSeNeti |  tathA kiJcid dravyamUrdhvabhAgikaM bhavati tadanyathA doSaM kopayati|  kiJcidadhobhAgikaM tadanyathA|  anyadubhayabhAgikaM tadrUpAntareNa|  etasmmAcca kAryyaviCeSAdevaMduSTo doSa iti jJAyate| na hi maricasya roukSyeNa yo duSTo vAyuryaCca tasyaiva lAghavena tAvekarUpou bhavitumarhataH|   raukSyeNa hi kupito roukSyamevAtmaguNamuopabRMhayaMstadanuguNAnyeva kAryyANi kAThinyopaCoSaNAdIni kurute| lAghavena ca kupitaH pavano rUpamanuvardhayan lAghavAdInyeva pradarCayati| evaM sarvamapyUhyam| sammohabhayAdvistareNa na pratanyate|  tathA ca idameva tAvad dRCyatAm| iha hi prabhaJjanaprakopakAraNaM tiktakaTukakaSAyarUkSalaghuCItaviSTambhivirUDhakatRNadhAnyAdibahuvidhaM nirdiSTam| yatra yastiktarasena dravyeNa kopaH sa eva kiM kaTukenAnyena vA virUDhakAdinA bhavati| dravyANAmanekakAraNArabdhatvAt| tathA yo~api paTolAt kopaH sa eva na trAyantIvAlakAdipratyayatAmupayAti| na caivamekaM dravyamekasyaiva doSasyAyatanaM bhavati| yatastad dravyAmanucitena mAtrAdiviCeSeNa prayuktaM sadyathoktena guNena kiJcit kopayati| tathA guNAntareNa sadRCena vilakSaNena vA| prabhAvAdirbhirvA| tameva doSAntaramevA vA prakopayituM kiM bandhuvargeNa kAritaCapatham| tenaikasminnapi doSe kupite  vyAdhikAriNI cAnyodoSahetvAdyapekSaM kadAcinmAtrayA tasya vyAdheH samuttAnatAmaprApto~api vikAraviCeSamApanno bhavatyeva| tathA na tantreSu dRCyate| jvaracikitsite tAvat-

nidAnasthAnam

jvaranidAnam

 athAto jvaranidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

sarvarogANAM sAmAnyena nidAnamuktvA jvarAdiviCeSeNocyate| tatrApi jvarasya prAdhAnyAt pUrvamadhyAya Arabhyate| yadyapi prAgrUpasamprAptyAdikamucyate, tathApi nidAnena prAdhAnyAdvayapadeCaH|| 1||

 aSTAbhiH kAraNairjvaraH saJjAyate||2||  manuSyANAM pRthagdoSaiH saMsRSTaiH sannipAtitairAgantunA ca||2||

evaM jvarasyASTau kAraNAni| AgantukAraNasya yadyapi bahuvidhatvaM tathApyAnyatantraprasiddhasaGkhayAburodhenoktamaviCeSeNa| tatra prathamameva tAvaddoSajA niCcIyante| paCcAdA~a~agantukAraNam|| 2||

 tatra yathoktaiH prakopanaviCeSaiH prakupitA doSAH praviCyAmACayamUSmaNA miCrIbhUyA ~a~a mamanugamya rasasvedavAhIni strotAMsi vidhAya pittaM tu dravatvAttaptamiva jalamanalamupahatya sarve~api ca doSAH paktAraM svasthAnAd bahirnirasya saha tena sakalamapi CarIramabhisarpantastatsamparkAllabdhabalena svenoSmaNA  nitarAM dehoSmANamedhayanto ~antasstrotomukhapidhAnAt stambhamAdadhAnA bahirapi svedamapaharantaH sarvendriyANi copatApayanto jvaramabhinirvarttayanti||3||

tatra yathoktairityAderdoSA jvaramabhinirvartayantIti sambandhaH| yathoktaiH prakopananidAnaistiktakaTvAdibhiH USmANA AmACayasthenA~agnyabhidhAnena| pittasyAyaM viCeSaH| yaduSNamapi dravatcAdanalasya jATharasyopahananaM jalamivoSNam| CeSaM sarvadoSasAdhAraNam| doSANAM sa USmA yena pacyate| tathA ca doSadhAtuSu svalpA analabhAgAH pradarCitAH| atra ca pratirogamadhyAyeSu yat pRthaGnidAnakIrttanaM tadvayAdheH svarUpAdhigamanAya cikitsAkAle hetuviparItouSadhaparijJAnArthaM ca| samprApterapi kIrttanaM vyAdhiparijJAnAya| cikitsAkAle~api tathA tathAvidhasamprAptyanyathAkaraNena tatsamprAptikasya rogasya vinACo bhavatIti pratibodhanAya ca| tathA ca vipulamativaidyou~apacArasvarUpaviCeSAt tatkAryaviCeSAddoSakAryyaviCeSebhyaCca doSANAM samprAptou jJAtAyAM gUDhaliGgasyApi vyAdheH svarUpamadhigacchatyeva| tathA pratirogapradarCitAyAH samprApteH svAdhyAyoktaccikitsitAt prakArAntareNApi yato vinACaH karttuM pAryyate tato~avaCyameva rogopaCamaH| sarvasyAmapi cikitsAyAM samprAptivinACanameva pradhAnaM prayojanam| tathA jvaracikitsate  AmACayastho hatvagniM sAmo mArgAn pidhAya yat| vidadhAti jvaraM doSastasmAtkurvIta laGghanam| iti|| 3||

 tasyemAni pUrvarUpANi mukhavairasyamannAnabhilASo guru-
gAtratvamAlasyamalpaprANatA gatiskhalanaM nidrAdhikyamara-
tirasUyA hitopadeCeSu pradveSo bAleSu madhureSu ca bhakSNye-
SvamlalavaNakaTukAbhinandanamavipAko~aGgamardaCcakSuSo-
rAkulatvaM sACrutA jRmbhA vinAmaH klamo romaharSaH CabdA-
nalAmbuCItavAtazacchAyAtapeSvakasmAdicchAdveSou ca||4||  tada-
nantaraM vyaktibhAvo jvarasyeti||4||

mukhavairasyAdIni jvarasya pUrvarUpANyuktAni| aviCiSTadoSairyadyApi jvarayati, tathApi bhaviSyatpratItirdoSAnurodhenaivA~asfuTatvamalpatvaJca vijJeyam|  tathAhi gurugAtratvaM bhaviSyati kafajvare| evaM sarvatra kalpyam|  etAnyapi vyAdhiviCeSaparijJAnAyopayujyante  cikitsAyai ca| tathA druSTamAtra eva pUrvarupe tena nidAnaviCeSeNa ca rogasya svarUpaM paricchinnaM bhavati| tadA tasminkAla upakrAnto rogaH kSipratarameva praCamamApadyate| kadAcid dRSTe pUrvarUpe viCiSTadoSatA rogasyAnidhigatA bhavati| tatra sakalarogasAdhAraNarogaviCeSamAtrACrayaNenaiva cikitsA prayuktA kiMsukhAya na sampadyate ? etadena hRdi kRtvA bhaTTAraharicandreNa vA CabdasyAniirdiSTasyAprAdhAnyaM pradarCayituM laghvaCanamapatarpaNaM vetyatra jvarapUrvarUpekSulaghvaCanasya prAdhAnyaM laGghanasyApradhAnyaM vyAkhyAtam| tacca bhiSakCAstraniSNAtA nAGgIkurvanti| yato na pUrvapadarCanamAtreNaiva bhiSak cikitsAyAM pravarttate| apitu nidAnAdi kiJcijjAnAtyeva| tataCca yena snigdhagurvAdikaM kafakAraNamupayuktaM tasyApatarpaNaM tyaktvA laghvaCanaM pradhAnaM na bhavatIti| bhaTTArakeNa tu pUrvarUpeSu sakaladoSasAdhAraNatvAt laghvaCanasya prAdhAnyamuktam| alpaprANatA ceSTAsvaCaktatvam| aratirna kvacidavasthiti| asUyA parasya doSAviSkaraNam|  hitopadeSAdiSu pradveSaH|  annAdyanabhinandamavipAko~annAdInAm| AkulatvaM sACrutA ca cakSuSoreva| jRmbhA sanmukhavikAso gAtravinAmaH| CabdAdiSvakAraNenaivecchAtathaiva punardveSaH| tadanantaraM prAgrUpANAmanantaraM krameNa jvarasya vyaktIbhAvo bhavati|| 4||

 bhavati cAtra----

AgamApagamakSobhamRdutA vedanoSmaNAm||5||  vaiSamyaM tatra gAtrAGge tAstAH syurdedanACcalAH||5||  pAdayoH suptatA stambhaH piNDikodveSTenaM klamaH||5||  viCleSa iva sandhInAM sAda UrvoH kaTIgrahaH||5||  pRSThaM kSodamivApnoti niSpIDyata ivodaram||5||  bhidyanta iva cAsthIni pArCvagAni viCeSataH||5||  hRdayasya grahastodaH prAjaneneva vakSasaH||5||  skandhayormathanaM bAhvorbhedaH pIDanamaMsayoH||5||  aCaktirbhakSaNe hanvorjRmbhaNaM karNayoH svanaH||5||  nistodaH CaGkhayormUrdhni vedanA virasAsyatA||5||  kaSAyAsyatvamathavA malAnAmapravarttanam||5||  rUkSAruNatvagAsyAkSinakhamUtrapurISatA||5||  prasekArocakACraddhA~avipikAsvedajAgarAH||5||  kaNThauSThaCoSastRTCuSkou chardikAsau viSAditA||5||  harSo romAGgadanteSu vepathuH kSavathorgrahaH||5||  bhramaH pralApo gharmekSA vinAmaCcAnilajvare||5||

bhavati cAtreti tantrArItiH| AgamApagametyAdyanilajvarasya rUpaM bhavatIti sambandhaH| vedanAnAmUSmaNAM ca vAtavaCAt kadAcidAgamo bhavati kadAcidapagamaH| anityasadbhAvo vA| kadAcitkSobhobhavati| kadAcinmrudutvam| athavA vedanAdInAM dehadeCaviCeSataH kAlaviCeSataCca vaiSamyamanekarUpatvaM bhavati| tatra-tatra ca vAyvACraye~aGge tAstA vAyukAraNA vedanACcalAH syuH| subodham| prAjanaM pratodaH Cirasi adhikaM vedanA| Asya virasatvaM viCeSAnAkhyeyaduSTarasatvam| malAH mUtraCakRtsvedAdayaH| tvagAdInAM rUkSAruNatA| kAsacchardiSoH CuSkatvaM kaphAdInAmapravRttiH| vAtajvare~avaCyaM kSavathorgrahaH| sarvasya ca rUpakIrttanaM vyAdhisvarUpaviCeSa parijJAnAya pRthak cikitsitapratividhAnAya ca|| 5||

 yugapadvayAptiraGgAnAmpralApaH kaTuvaktratA||6||  nAsAsyapAkaH CItecchA bhramo mUrcchA mado~aratiH||6||  viTstrasaM pittavamanaM raktaSThIvanamamlakaH||6||  raktakoThodgamaH pItaharitatvaM tvagAdiSu||6||  svedo niHCvAsavaigandhyamatitRSNA ca pittaje||6||

yugapajjvaravyAptyAdi pittajaM bhavatIti sambandhaH| raktAnAM koThonAM sotsedhAnAM maNDalAnAmudgamaH|| 6||

 viCeSAdarucirjADyaM strotorodho~alpavegatA||7||  praseko mukhamAdhuryaM hRllepaCvAsapInasAH||7||  hRllAsaCchadanaM kAsaH stambhaH CvaityaM tvagAdiSu||7||  aGgeSu CItapiTakAstandrodardaH kafodbhave||7||

sAtiCayA arucirjADyAdayo rogAH kaphajvare bhavantIti| alpavegatA jvarasya| hRdayotkleCayuktaH prasekaH| chardanaM yathAsambhavaM kaphAdInAm|| 7||

 kAle yathAsvaM sarveSAM pravRttirvRddhireva vA||8||  nidAnoktAnupaCayo viparItopaCAyitA||8||

sarveSAM vAtApittakaphajvarANAM yathAsvaM kAle grISmAparAhnavarSACaranmadhyandinaCiCiravasantAdike pravRttirathavA vRddhirbhavati| idamapi rUpaM yathA nidAnatvenoktAnAM vAtajvare tiktAdInAM pittajvare kaTvAdInAM kaphajvare madhurAdInAM cAnupaCayo~asukhAvahatvaM yathAsvaM viparItAnAM copaCayatvaM sukhAnubandhitvamiti|| 8||

 yathAsvaM liGgasaMsarge jvaraH saMsargajo~api ca||9||

pRthagdoSANAM jvaraNAM liGgamuktvA miCradoSajAnAmucyate----yathAsvamiti| yathAsvaM liGgamuktvA sati tAvat jvarastatsaMsargajo viCeSaH|
	tena vAtapittajvaraliGgamiCrIbhAve vAtapittajvare vijJeyaH| vAtakaphajvaraliGgasaMsarge vAtakaphajvaraCca| evaM pittakaphe~apIti yathAsvaMCabdArthaH| api ceti samuccaye|| 9||

 Ciro~artimUrcchAbhidadAhamehA-
kaNThAsyaCoSA~aratiparvabhedAH||10||  unnidratA tRDbhramaromaharSAH
jRmbhA~ativAktvaM ca calAtsapittAt||10||

 athAto raktapittakAsanidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

jvarasantApAdraktapittamityuktamataH kSiprakAritvAcca jvarAnantaryeNa raktapittAnirNayAdhyAyArambhaH| raktapittavacca kAsasyApi yataH kSiprakAritvamataH so~apyasminnevAdhyAye nirNIyate-athAta iti|| 1||

tacca raktapittaM kAraNaviCeSAdyadordhvagaM pravarttate tadA yathAbalaMnAsAdibhiH pravarttate| yadA tvadhastAt tadA meDhrAdibhiH| sarvatra ca romakUpairapi| samastaiH pravartate|| 6||

 UrdhvaM sAdhyaM kafAdyasmAttadvirecanasAdhanam||7||  bahvouSadhaJca pittasya vireko hi varouSadham||7||  anubandhI kafo yaCca tatra tasyApi CuddhikRt||7||  kaSAyAH svAdavo~apyasya viCuddhaCleSmaNo hitAH||7||  kimuH tiktAH kaSAyAH vA ye nisargAtkafApahAH||7||

tayoCcordhvAdhogayorUrdhvaM pravRtaM sAdhyam| yasmAttadUrdhvagataM kafAdhhetorbhavati| raktapitte ca rogasvabhAvAviCeSAddoSasya Codhanena viparItanayanAya yadUrdhvage virecanaM tat pittasya tAvadvarouSadham| yaCca tatrAnubandhI kafastasyApi virekaH CuddhikRt| raktapitte ca viCuddhaCleSmaNo~asya puruSasya madhurAH kaSAyAH kvAthAdayaH kafAdaviparItAH api rogasvabhAvAddhitAH| kiM punastiktakAH kaSAyAH ye kafApahasvabhAvAH| taccordhvagaM bahvouSadham| viCiSTAnAM kafadhnAnAmapi pathyatvAt| atastata sAdhyam|| 7||

 adho yApyaM calAdyasmAttapracchardasAdhanam||8||  svalpouSadhaM ca pittasya vamanaM na varouSadham||8||  anubandhI calo yaCca CAntaye~api na tasya tat||8||  kaSAyACca hitAstasya madhurA eva kevalam||8||

 kaphamArutasaMsRSTamasAdhyabhayAyanam||9||  aCakyaprAtilomyatvAda bhAvAdauSadhasya ca||9||  na hi saMCodhanaM kiJcidastyasya pratilomanam||9||  CodhanaM pratilomaM ca raktapitte bhiSagjitam||9||  evamevopaCamanaM sarvaConAsya vidyate||9||  saMsRSTeSu hi sarvajicchimanaM hitam||9||

 athAtaH CvAsahidhmAnidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

kAsopekSayA CvAsasya sambhavAttadekarUpatvAcca hidhmAyAH tayornirNayAyaikAdhyAyArambhaH| athetyAdi sarveSvadhyAyeSu pUrvavadvyAkhyeyam|| 1||

CvAsaH kAsasya vRddhayA bhavet| adhikIbhUtaH kAsa eva kAraNaM CvAsasya| rogasya ca rogaH kAraNaM bhavatItyuktaM prAk| athavA pUrvaM doSakopanaiH kAsasya hetutvenoktaiH CvAso bhavati| tAni ca kaSAyavijjalAsAtmyAdIni ( a. saM. ni. - 122 ) athavA pUrvANi doSakopanAni sarvam rogaM nidAnapaThitAni tiktakaTukAdIni ( a. saM. ni. - 26 )| tairyathAsambhavamAmAdibhirapi CvAso bhavatyatihimAmbvataiH| iti CvAsasya nidAnAni|| 2||

 pratilomaM sirA gacchannudIryya pavanaH kapham||6||  parigRhya CirogrIvamuraH pACvai ca pIDayan||6||  kAsa ghurghurakaM mohamaruciM pInasaM tRSam||6||  karoti tIvravegaJca CvAsaM prANopatApinam||6||  pratAmyettasya vegena niSThyUtAnte kSaNaM sukhI||6||  kRcchrAcchayAnaH Cvasiti niSaNNaH svAsthyamRcchati||6||  ucchritAkSo lalATena svidyatA bhRCamarttimAn||6||  viCuSkAsyo muhuH CvAsI kAMkSatyuSNaM savepathuH||6||  meghAmbuCItaprAgvAtaiH CleSmalaiCca vivarddhate||6||  sa yApyastamakaH sAdhyo navo vA balino bavet||6||

pavanaH pratilomaM viparItaM kRtvA sirAM gacchaMstena gamanena kaphamudIryya CirogrIvAM ca parigRhya pArCvamuraCca pIDayan kAsAdikaM tavravegaM prANopatApinaM CvAsaJca karoti| tasya ca tathAvidhasya CvAsasya vegena puruSaH pratAmyet| niSThyUtAnte ca kSaNaM sukhI bhavati| CayyAyAM sthitaCca kRcchreNa Cvasiti bhityAdou niSaNNaH svAsthyamRcchati| subodham| sa ca CvAso meghAmbvAdibhiH  CleSmalaiCcAhArairvivarddhate| evambhUtaH CvAso yApyo bhavet| nAmnA ca tamakaH| athavA balinaH puruSasya navaH san sAdhyo bhavet|| 6||

 jvaramUrcchAyutaH CItaiH CAmyet pratamakastu saH||7||

evarUpaM eva CvAso jvaramUrcchAyuto bhavati| CItaiCcAhArAdibhiH CAmyet| sa tamakaviCeSaH pratamakasaMjJitaH|| 7||

 chinnA cchvasiti vichchinnaM marmacchedarUjArdataH||8||  sasvedamUrcchaH sAnAho bastidAhanirodhavAn||8||  adhodRgviplutAkSaCca muhyan raktaikalocanaH||8||  CuSkAsyaH pralapandIno naSTacchAyo vicetanaH||8||

 mahatA-mahatA dIno nAdena Cvasiti krathan||9||  uddhUyamAnaH saMrabdho mattarSabha ivAniCam||9||  praNaSTajJAnavijJAno vibhrAntanayanAnanaH||9||  vakSaH samAkSipanbaddhamUtravarcA viCIrNavAk||9||  CuSkavaTho muhurmuhyan karNaCaGkhaCiro~atiruk||9||

 dIrghamUrdhvaM CvasityUrdhvAnna ca pratyAharatyadhaH||10||  CleSmAvRtamukhastrotA kruddhagandhavahArditaH||10||  UrdhvadRgvIkSate bhrAntamakSiNI paritaH kSipan||10||  marmasu chidyamAneSu paridevI niruddhavAk||10||

rAjayakSmAdinidAnam adhyAyaH

 athAto rAjayakSmAdinidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

dhAtukSayahetutvasAmAnyAnmahA-rogatvAdvinACavahatvAcca hidhmACvAsAnantaraM rAjayakSmanirNayAyA~adhyAyArambhaH|| 1||

rAjayakSmA rAjavadanekarogeNAnugato bhavati| tasmi@mCcaiva kRtasaMCraye bahUpadravajanma bhavatItyarthaH| tathA bahavo rogAH purogamanaCIlA yasya sa tathoktaH| anenaitaduktam-utpitso rAjayakSmaNaH prathamameva pInasaCvAsAdibahurogajanma bhavati iti| eteSAJca rogANAM svaparivArasaMyutAnAmapyetadaGgatvaM vijJeyam| rAjayakSmAdayaCcatvAraH paryyAryAH|| 2||

 nakSatrANAM dvijAnAM ca rAjJo~abhUdayaM purA||3||  yacca rAjA ca yakSmA ca rAjayakSmA tato mataH||3||  dehauSadhakSayakRteH kSayastatsambhAvAcca saH||3||  rasAdiCoSaNAcchoSo rogarAT teSu rAjanAt||3||

teca nakSatrANamityAdinA nirucyante~arthAvabodhanAya tena rAyakSmeti tatpuruSaH karmadhArayo vA| dehauSadhakSayafalahetutvAdvA dhAtukSayahetutvAdakSayaH| dhAtuCoSaNAcchoSaH| teSu rogeSu madhye rAjanAd rogarAT|| 3||

bhaviSyatastasya rAjayakSmaNaH pratiCyAyAdIni pUrvarUpANi| sthAlyAdau CucAvapyaCucirbuddhiH| pANyoravekSA nirhetukA| tathA kAye baibhatsyadarCanAm| mUrdhnaH Ciraso vastrAdinA pracchAdanam| svapne pataGgAdyAbhibhavo bhavet| keCAdirACyadhirohaNam| CUnyagrAmAdidarCanaM ca| pataGgo~agniH|| 6||

 pInasaCvAsakAsAMsamUrdhasvararujo~aruciH||7||  UrdhvaviTstraMsasaMCoSAvadhaCchardistu koSThage||7||  tiryyaksthe pArCvarugdoSe sandhige bhavati jvaraH||7||  rUpANyekAdaCaitAni jAyante rAjayakSmiNaH||7||

 athAto mUtrAghAtanidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhuratreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

adhogadoSahetutvasAmAnyAnmUtrakRcchraprameha-nirNayAyA~adhyAyArambhaH|| 1||

 viMCatirmUtrAghAtA bhavanti||2||  tadyathA vAtApittakafasanni-
pAtakRcchrANi||2||  vAtapittaCleSmaCukrACmaryyaH||2||  vAta-
bastyaSThIlAkuNDalikAmUtrAtItajaTharotsaGgagranthiCukra-
viDvighAtoSNavAtamUtrakSayAvasAdACceti||2||

viMCatyAM rogeSu mUtramAhanyate| ataste mUtrAghAtAH| te ca krameNAtrocyante| tatra catvAri kRcchraNi pRthagdoSasannipAtodbhavAni| catastro~aCmaryyaH pRthagdoSA CukrajAH|| 2||

 tatra vAtabastyAdayo nava vAtolbaNAH||3||

vAtabastyAdayo viDvighAtAntA nava vAtolbaNAH|| 3||

 tato dvau vAtapittolbaNau||4||

tato~anantaraM dvAvuSNavAtamUtrakSayau vAtapittolbaNau|| 4||

 antyaH kaphapittolbaNaH||5||

antyo mUtrAvasAdaH kaphapittolbaNaH| sarvatrolbaNaCabdo doSAntarasadbhAvapratipattyarthaH|| 5||

 sarveSAM punarmUtrarogANAmadhiSThinaM bastiH||6||  sa marmasvaphihitaH 
prAk||6||  sa cA~adhomukho~api mUtravahAsu nADISu 
sUkSmamuKasahasraniSyandena mUtrAKyenAvirataM navo GaTa ivApsu
nimagnamukho~api pArCvephyo~amphasA pUryyate||6||  taireva 
ca strotophirvAtAdayo~api duSTAH praviCya phastiM yathA-
svamAghAtAn pramehA~MSca janayanti||6||

sarveSAmityAdinA mUtrAghAtAnAM prasaGgena pramehANAM cASrayaH samprAptiScocyate| bhastirmarmasu 'mUtrACayo dhanurvakra " ityAdinAbhihitaH prAk CArIre ( a0 saM0 CA0- 381 ) adhomukhe~api navaghaTe pArCvebhyo jalapraveCo dRSTaH| taireva strotobhiryairmUtraM praviCati bhastau|| 6||

 tatrAlpaCo muhurmuhurbastimeDhravaMkSaNeSu tIvraCUlaH kRcchrA-
nmUtrayati vAtakRcchre||7||

tatrAlpaCa ityAdi vAtakRcchralakSaNam|| 7||

 sadAhaM sarujaM raktaM pItaM kRSNaM vA pittakRcchre||8||

sadAhamityAdi pitte|| 8||

bastItyAdi kaphe|| 9||

mUtrAghAtanidAnam  adhyAyaH

 yadA tu vAyurbastimukhamAvRtya sapittaM sakafaM saCakraM
vA mUtraM pariCoSayati tadA krameNa goriva pittAdrocanA 
maNIkasyeva svachAdapi jalAt paGkastadvadaCmaryyabhinirvarttate||11||  sarvA ca sA CleSmACrayA||11||

sarvasyA asmaryyA jvarAdIni pUrvarUpAni||12||

asyetyaCmarImataH| CakRdupaghAtAnmUtrA~apravRttirdRSTaiva|| 13||

 tatra vAyunA bastisevanImehaneSu tIvravedanArditodantAn
khAdati||14||  nAbhiM prapIDayati||14||  meDhraM mRdnAti||14||  muhurmuhuvepathu-

kaNTakAcitA bhavati||14||

 pittena pacyamAna iva dahyate bastiH||15||  aCmarI ca raktA

pittenenyAdipittACmaryyAH|| 15||

pramehanidAnAdhyAyaH

 atha pramehanidAnaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

uktamadhyAyArambhaprayojanam|| 1||

 viMCatiH pramehA bhavanti||2||  tadyAthA-kafAdudakekSusAndra-
surApiSTaCukrAsikatACItaCanairlAlApramehA daCa||2||  pittA-
tkSArakAlanIlahAridramAJciSThaCoNitamehAH SaT||2||  vAtA-
dvasAmajjahastimadhumehACcatvAraH iti||2||

viMCatiH pramehAH| sarveSAJcA pramehANAM CleSmAhetuH| sarve ca rogasvabhAvAnnAvotpannAH CleSmapramehA bhavanti| ataH kafAdikrameNa nirdiCyante| daCodakamehAdayaH kafAdbhavanti| SaTkSArAdayaH pittAt| vasAdayaCcatvAro vAtAditi|| 2||

 teSAM yatkiJcidAhAravihArajAtaM CleSmamedomUtrajananaM sa 
hetuH||3||

teSAmityAdinA pramehANAM nidAnamucyate||3||

 tatra vAtapittamedaH kledamAMsaCukrasairanvito bastigataH
CleSmA pramehAJjanayati||4||  taiH kaphaCoNitAbhyAM ca yuktaM 
pittam||4||  tairvasAlasIkAmaJjaujobhiCca vAyuH||4||

tatretyAdinA samprAptiH| svahetudUSitaH CleSmA prAdhAnyena yadA pramehAn janayati ( karoti ) tadA vAtAdibhiranvitaH san bastimanveti| yadA pittaM tadA taiH pUrvoktairvAtAdibhI rasAntaiH pUrvoktaiH kafaCoNitapittAntairvasAdibhiCcAnvitaH|| 4||

 trayANAmapi doSANAM CleSmaprameheSu prAkprakopamApadyate||5||  CleSmAdhiSThAnatvAnmUtrasya||5||  tad vRddhermeda eva ca tena prathamaM 
dUSyate~atyantasabhAgatvAt||5||  tadanantaraM dehakledAdayaH||5||  tataH 
CleSmAdikSaye pittaM prabalIbhavacchoNitamapi dUSayati||5||  tat kSaye~api vAyurvasAdIn dhAtUn CarIrasya paramasArabhUtAn
bastimAkRSya mUtreNa saha visRjati||5||

sarvameheSu ca rogasvabhAvacchleSmAprakopamApadyate| pittaje~api prathamamalpaM kupitaH CleSmA svamalpaM liGgaM darCayet| kiJcit kAlaM CleSmaprameho bhUtvA kAlavaCAt kafAdau kSINe pittamehatAM  pratipadyate| tatrApi raktapravRteH| kAlena raktakSayAdadvAyurvasAdIn dehasya sArabhUtAnA~a~akRSyAnte vAtapramehAn karoti| evaMkrameNa doSANAM kAraNatvaM prathamameva vAtapittaprAdhAnyenotpanne~api falataH kiJcit kafAnvayatvam| sabhAgatvaM sadRCatvam|| 5||

 tasmAt kafapittavAtajAH krameNa sAdhyayApyAsAdhyAH||6||  tathA pittajAH saMsRSTadoSamedaH sthAnatvAd viruddhopakrama-
tvAcca||6||  vAtajaH punaH kSINeSu dhAtuSu mahAtyayatayA
viruddhopakramatvAcca||6||  medasi tu nAtiduSTe pittajA api
sAdhyatAM gaccheyuH||6||

tatra kafajAH pramehA sAdhyAH| tasmAdityuktAdrUpAt| pittapramehe tu kafA~anantaraje prathamameva pittaprAdhAnyenotpanne tathetyAdyuktAddhetoryApyatvam| tatrApi medasi nA~atiduSTe sAdhyatvameva| vAtapramehANAM dhAtukSayaM vinA~anutpattairavaCyaM sarvapramehANAmantarbhAvaH| yathoktAcca hetorasAdhyatvam|| 6||

 dhAtusamparkAtpunaH sarvameheSu mUtramAvilaM bhUri ca bhavati||7||

yato dhAtusamparkaH sarveSu tadAvilamUtratvAdisAdhAraNaM liGgam||7||

 doSANAM dUSyANAM cotkRSTApakRSTasaMyogena mUtravarNarasa-
sparCagandhaviCeSAdvarNAnAmiva CuklakRSNAdInAM Cabala-
kalmASAdayaH pramehANAM prabhedA bhavanti||8||

doSANAM ca nAnAvidhAt saMyogAnnAnAvidhavarNetpattiH|| 8||

 teSAM pUrvarUpANyativRddhirnakhadInAm||9||  jaTilIbhAvaCca keCA-
nAm||9||  mAdhuryyamAsyasya||9||  tAlukaNThaCoSaH pipAsA malA-
dhikyaM bahiH kAye kAyacchidreSu||9||  pANipAdadAho~ati-
mAdhuryyAt pipIlikopasarpaNam||9||  vistragandhatA ca mUtra-
CarIrayoH||9||  CuklatA ca mUtre||9||  CvAsanidrAtandrAlasyaprakarSaCca||9||

nakhavRddhAdIni sarvapramehANAM pUrvarUpANi| malaM prasiddhaM bahiHkAyabhavam|| 9||

 tatra CItaM CvatemagandhamacchamudakamivodakamehI mehati||1||

 athAto jwaracikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 AmACayastho hatvA~agniM sAmo mArgAnpidhAya yat||2||  vidadhAti jwaraM doSastasmAt kurvIta laGghanam||2||  prAgrUpeSu jvarAdau vA balam yatnena pAlayan||2||  balAdhiSThAnamArogyamArogyArthaH kriyAkramaH||2||

AmACayastha ityAdinA prakRtArthaprastAvanA| yadyasmAdAmACayasthatvAdirUpo doSoH duSTo vAtAdirjvaraM vidadhAti tasmAjjvare prathamaM laGghanaM kurvIteti sambandhaH|
yadyapi laGghanaM dvAdaCasu paribhASitaM laGghanabRMhaNIye~atra punarupavAse vartate| kutaH? teSAmavasthAvaCAt prayogaH iti jejjaTaH| hetunirdeCenaitat pradarCyate yeSu jvareSvevaMrupatasamprAptestatraiva laGghanaM vidheyaM nA~anyatra| tathA ca vakSyati - `CuddhavAtakSayAgantujIrNajvariSu laGghanaM| neSyata' iti| atra ca laGghana Cabdena na vamanAdikam sarvaM laGghanamucyate; kintu upavAsa eva| nanu tallaGghanaM kasyAmavasthAyAM kurvItetyAha-prAgrUpeSvityAdi| jwarasya pUrvarUpadarCana eva laGghanaM kurvIta| yadA tu prAgrUpadarCanakAle nidAnasya sAdhAraNatwAdaparijJAnAdvA laGghanaviSayatA ACaGkyate tadA jwarAdAvapi yojyam| jwarasyAdirjwarAdiH, jwaro prArambha ityuktaM prAgrUpeSu jwarAdau veti|  anye punarevaM varNayanti jwarasya prAgrUpeSu laGghanamavaCyaM kurvIta jwarAdau jwaravyaktatA prAdurbhAve vA laGghanaM kurvIta ;tena CuddhavAtAdiviSaye vyakte jware laGghanaM na vidheyam| balaM yatnena pAlayannityanenaitaducyate- tAvallaGghanaM kurvIta yAvatA balahAnirna bhavati| tena laGghitaliGaprAdurbhAve~api balapAlanAnurodhena laGghanAdviramet| balAdhiSThAdinamityAdinA balapAlane heturucyate||2||

 laGghanaiH kSapite doSe dIpte~apnau lAghave sati||3||  swAsthyaM kSutRDRciH paktirbalamojaCca jAyate||3||

            saMCodhanAsravisrAvasnehayojanalaGghanaiH| 
            yAtyagnirmandatA...............|| iti|
            tatra ca bhaNyate-swAsthaM rogAbhAvaH| paktirannAdInAM pAkaH||3||

 tatrotkRSTe samutkliSTe kaphaprAye calemale||4||  sahRllAsaprasekAnnadweSakAsaviSUcike||4||  sadyobhuktasya saJjAte jwara sAme viCeSataH||4||  vamanaM vamanArhasya CastaM kuryAttadanyathA||4||  CwAsAtIsArasammohahRdrogaviSamajwarAn||4||

nanu kiM sarvatra niyamena sarvameva laGghanaM vidheyamAhosvit kenacidviCeSeNetyAha -tatretyAdi| utkRSTaH prabhUtaH| samutkliSTaH sthAnAtsamantAccalitaH| kaphaprAyaH CleSmapradhAnaH| calo naikatra sthitiCIlaH| saha hRllAsAdibhirvartate yo malaH tathAvidhe male doSe vamanArhasya sato jwaritasya vamanameva CastaM nAtyalaGghanamiti sambandhaH|sadyobhuktasya twaSTavidhe~api jware saJjAte vamanameva Casyate|AgantAvapi bhojanasyAjAraNAdinA doSAnubandharakSaNArthaH| sAme tu jware sadyobhuktasya saJjAte viCeSato vamanam| vamanArhagrahaNena pratiSiddhavamanAnAM garbhiNyAdInAM vamanaviSaye~api jware vamanaM pratiSiddhyate| tacca vamanamanyathA utkliSTatvAdilakSaNaviparIte male prayuktaM CwAsAdIn jwaritasya kuryAt| anutkliSTasyotkleCena vAyormArgarodhAcchvAsaH| ISadutkliSTsya syandanenAgninACAdatIsAraH| upaCuSke doSe auSadhasya taikSNyAtsammohaH| tathAvidha evordhvanayanAd hRdrogaH| doSasya swalpatwAt bahiranirharaNAddUradUratarasrotaH pUraNena vA yathAhetuH satatakAdiko viSamajvaraH||4||

 tatrotkRSTe samutkliSTe kaphaprAye calemale||4||  sahRllAsaprasekAnnadweSakAsaviSUcike||4||  sadyobhuktasya saJjAte jwara sAme viCeSataH||4||  vamanaM vamanArhasya CastaM kuryAttadanyathA||4||  CwAsAtIsArasammohahRdrogaviSamajwarAn||4||

 pippalIbhiryutAM gAlAM kaliGgairmadhukena vA||5||  pItvoSNatoyena vamenmadhvambulavaNAmbu vA||5||

 kRte~akRte vA vamane jvarI kuryAdviCoSaNam||7||  doSANAm samudIrNAnAM pAcanAya CamAya ca||7||

anantaroktaprakAreNa kRte vamane viCoSaNamupAsAdinA kuryAnnatu samygyoge~apyavaCyaM tadahareva vamanavidhipradarCitaprakAreNa peyAM seveta| tathA yatrApi vamanasyAviSayatwAdviSaye~api vA nimittAntarAdvamanaM na kRtaM tatrApi viCoSaNaM kuryAt| doSANAmityAdinA yathoktopaCoSaNaprayojanapradarCanam||7||

 tRSNagalpAlpamuSNAmbu pibedvAtakaphajvare||9||  tatkaphaM vilayaM nItvA tRSNAmACu nivartayet||9||  udIrya cAgniM srotAMsi mRdUkRtya viCodhayet||9||  lInapittAnilasvedaCakRnmUtrAnulomanam||9||  nidrAjADyAruciharaM prANAnAmavalambanam||9||

tasmiMCca laGghane kriyamANe tRSNAgatimAtrAM tRSNAmanubhavanneva vAtakaphajvare dvandvasamuttha eva netyAha| vAte CleSmaNi vA kavoSNaM jalaM hitam| tayoH samuditayorapyuSNamavirodhIti ca| taccoSNAmbu pItaM mArgAvarakaM kaphaM vilayaM nItvA tRSNAM  nivartayet| tathA lInAnAmanutkliSTarUpANAmapi pittAdInAmanulomanaM mArgaprerakaM nidrAdiharaM ca| nidrA hyasvAsthyahetukA gRhItA| prANAnAmavalambanamambusantarpaNasvabhAvatvAt| evaM yathoktaviSaye uSNAmbunA eva prayogaH||9||

 athAto jwaracikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 AmACayastho hatvA~agniM sAmo mArgAnpidhAya yat||2||  vidadhAti jwaraM doSastasmAt kurvIta laGghanam||2||  prAgrUpeSu jvarAdau vA balam yatnena pAlayan||2||  balAdhiSThAnamArogyamArogyArthaH kriyAkramaH||2||

sa ca kaSAyastiktarasaH pitte viCeSeNa yojyaH| viCeSagrahaNAt kaphe~api yojyA iti labhyate| kaTukaCca kapha eva yojyaH| sa ca kaSAyaH kaSAyo rasena pittaCleSmaharo~api navajvare na Casyate|tatrA hi navajvare kaSAyo malAnAM stambhAt bahirgamanapAcanAbhAvena tiryaggamanavimArgagamanAbhyAM yathAsaMprAptiviSayajvarAnarucyAdInapi karoti| kaSAyarasastambhitA malAH na cyavante nApyantaH pacyante; pratyuta tiryaksrotassu viparItaM vA mArgeSu gamanAt jvaraM vardhayanti| baddhAmAditvAcca kaSAyo yathAsamprAptiCUlAdikAryapi bhavatIti tiryaggamanena vimArgagamanena ca viSamajvarasya svarUpaM pradarCitaM bhavati| navatAyAM tvatItAyAM harItakyAdeH prayogo dRSTaH;,evaM SaDahAdauSadhayojanam||24||

 mustayA parpaTaM yuktaM CuNThyA duHsparCayApi vA||28||  pAkyaM CItakaSAyaM vA pAThoCIraM savAlakam||28||  pibettadvacca bhUnimbaguDUcImustanAgaram||28||  yathAyogyamime yojyAH kaSAyA doSapAcanAH||28||  jvarArocakatRSNA~a~asyavairasyApaktinACanAH||28||  pAThendrayavabhUnimbamustaparpaTakA mRtA||28||  jayantyAmamatIsAraM jvaraM ca samahauSadhAH||28||

 durAlabhA~amRtAmustAnAgaraM vAtaje jvare||29||  athavA pippalImUlaguDUcIviCvabheSajam||29||  kanIyaH paJcamUlaM ca pitte kSaudrasamanvitAH||29||  kaliGgamustakaTukA mustAparpaTakaM tathA||29||  sadhanvayAsabhUnimbaM vatsakAdyo gaNaH kaphe||29||  athavA vRSagAGgeyICRGgaveradurAlabhAH||29||  rugvibandhAnilaCleSmayukte dIpanapAcanam||29||  abhayApippalImUlaCamyAkakaTukAghanam||29||

 kaphajetiviSoCIrapaTolamaricakSapAH||33||  samUrvendrayavadvIpikuSThanimbavacAguDAH||33||  saptacchadAmRtAnimbasphUrjAtaM mAkSikAnvitam||33||  niCAtrikaTukaM tiktAnAgapuSpakaliGgakAH||33||  sArivAtiviSAkuSThaduHsparCAmustagugguluH||33||  parUSaM triphalA tiktA bIjaM vRSakajaM ghanam||33||  nAgaratriphalAmustAmUrvApAThAH samAkSikAH||33||

 dehadhAtvabalatvena jvaro jIrNo~anuvartate||2||

dehadhAtvityAdinA prayukte~api viSaye laGghanakrame jvaro~anuvRtterheturucyate| dehasyAbalatvaM dhAtUnAM cAparipoSo jvarAnuvRttihEtuH| tasyAJca jIrNatAyAM prathamaM kaSAyapAnaM paCcAtsarpirupakSiptaM pUrvAdhyAye| tasyaivAtra viCeSeNa viSayapradarCanaM kriyate||2||

 rUkSaM hi tejo jvarakRttejasA rUkSitasya ca||3||  vamanasvedakAlAmbukaSAyalaghubhojanaiH||3||  yaH syAdatibalo dhAtuH sahacArI sadAgatiH||3||  tasya saMCamanaM sarpirdIptasyevAmbuveCmanaH||3||  vAtapittajitAmagryaM saMskAramanurudhyate||3||  sutarAM taddhyato dadyAdyathAsvauSadhasAdhitam||3||

 viparItaM jvaroSmANaM jayet pittaM ca CaityataH||4||  snehAdvAtaM ghRtaM tulyaM yogasaMskArataH kapham||4||  pUrve kaSAyAH saghRtAH sarve yojyA yathAmalam||4||  triphalApicumandatvaGmadhukaM bRhatIdvayam||4||  samasUradalaM kvAthaH saghRto jvarakAsahA||4||

tacca siddhaM sarpistrayANAmapi doSANAM pathyAmiti pradarCanArthamAha- viparItamityAdi| jvaroSmANaM pittaM ca viparItaM CaityAjjayet| vAtaM tu viparItaM snehAjjAyet| kaphaM punastulyamapi tannACakadravyasaMyogasaMskArAbhyAM jayet|

 vAsAguDUcItriphalAtrAyamANAyavAsakAt||6||  kvAthe kSIre ca vipacejjvaraghnam kalkitairghRtam||6||  pippalImustamRdvIkAcandanotpalanAgaraiH||6||

raktapittacikitsitam adhyAyaH

 athAto raktapittacikitsitaM  vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

atha kramaprAptasya raktapittasya cikitsAM darSayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 UrdhvagaM balino~avegamekadoSAnugaM navam||2||  raktapittaM sukhe kAle sAdhayennirupadravam||2||  adhogaM yApayedraktaM yaccadoSadvayAnugam||2||  CAntaM CAntaM punaH kupyanmArgAnmArgAntaraJca yat||2||  atipravRttaM mandAgnestidoSaM dvipathaM tyajet||2||

UrdhvagamityAdiviSiSTaM raktapittaM sAdhayet cikitset| adhogamityAdiyuktaJca yApayet| yad vrajan atipravRttatvAdiyuktantu tyajet cikitsedityarthaH| suKaH kAlo dvividho~apyabhibhataH| upadravAH vikRtavyAdhivijJAnIye pradarSitAH||2||

 jJAtvA nidAnamayanaM malAvanubalau balam||3||  deSakAlAdyavasthAJca raktapitte prayojayet||3||  laGghanaM bRMhaNaM cAdau SodhanaM SamanaM tathA||3||

sAdhye ca raktaphitte nidAnAdikaM jJAtvA tadAnuguNyena kadAcidAdAveva laGghanaM yojayet| kadAcit bRMhaNamiti| tathA kadAcicCodhanaM kadAcicCamanam| anubalau malau vAtakaphau||3||

 santarpaNotthaM balino bahudoSasya sAdhayet||4||  UrdhvabhAgaM virekeNa vamanena tvadhogatam||4||  CamanairbRMhaNaiCcAnyallaGghyabRMhyAnavekSya ca||4||

CodhanAdeH sAmAnyenoktatvAt saMtarpaNotthamityAdinA viCeSa ucyate| `tu'CabdAt santarpaNotthatvAdiyuktamevAdhobhAgaM vamanena| anyadityapatarpaNotthaM abalasyAlpadoSasya ca yadraktapittaM tacchamanaiRbRMhaNaiCca sAdhayet| laGghyabRMhyAnavekSya ca raktapittaM sAdhayediti| anenaitaduktaM vyAdhikarCitAdayo bRMhyatvena ye pUrvamuktAsteSAM santarpaNotthatvAdiyuktam Codhanena tathA sAdhayedyathA bRMhatvAt laGghanaM na doSAya bhavati| tathA ye~api mehyAdayo laGghyatvena paThitAsteSAmapatarpaNotthatvAdityuktaM tathAvidhAbhyAM CamanabRMhaNAbhyAM sAdhayedyathAvidhAbhyAM laGghyasya bAdhA na sampadyata iti||4||

 UrdhvaM pravRtte Samanau rasau tiktakaSAyakau||5||  upavAsaSca niSSuNThISaDaGgodakapAyinaH||5||  adhoge raktapitte tu bRMhaNo madhuro rasaH||5||

UrdhvaM pravRtta ityAdinA CamanabRhaNayormArgaviCeSeNa viSayapradarCanam| SaDaGgaM ghanadisAdhitamudakaM jvarapaThitam| madhuro raso nAnAvidhayA bhakSyAdikalpanayA||5||

 Urdhvage tarpaNaM yojyaM peyApUrvamadhogate||6||

Urdhvage yadA~annaM prayujyate tadA prathamaM tarpaNaM lAjasaktavaH| adhoge tu peyA prayojyA||6||

 aCnato balino~aCuddhaM na dhAryaM taddhi rogakRt||7||  dhArayedanyathA CIghramagnivacchIghrakAri tat||7||

aCuddhaM raktamaCnatoH balinaCca pravRttaM naiva dhAryaM stambhanAdinA tadvidhAritaM rogakRdbhavati| anyathA punaryadbhojanarahitasyAbalasya ca pravRttaM CuddhaJca tacchIghraM dhArayet| yatastadraktapittAmagnivacchIghrakAri raktakSayAcchIghraM mArayatItyarthaH||7||

 trivRtAtriphalAdhAtrItrAyantyAragvadhAphayAH||8||  gavAkSIkSurasakSIradrAkSAkSodrAsitotkaTAH||8||  yathAsvaM kalpavihitA virekArthaM prayojayet||8||  trivRcCyAmAkaSAyeNa kalkena ca saSarkaram||8||  sAdhayedvidhivallehaM lihyAt pANitalaM tataH||8||  triphalAtrivRtASyAmAphiphphalISarkarAmadhu||8||  modakaH sannipAtordhvaraktapittajvarapahaH||8||  trivRtsamasitA tadvat pippalIpAdasaMyutA||8||

trivRttAdayo~abhayAntAH pRthakkalpoktena vidhanena yathAsvaM viSayeSu gavAkSIkSurasAdibhiryathAyogamekadvitrairutkaTA virekArthaM raktapitte prayojayet| trivRtaH CAmAyaSca kvAthaM SarkarAJca vipAcya tatraiva ca lehatvApAdanayogyaM trivRcCyAmAkalkaM datvA lehaM sAdhayet| triPaladibhhiH samaiH SarkarayA pittajayAyAdhikayA mAkSikeNa kRto modakaH sannipAtamUrdhvapravRttaM raktM SoPaM jvaraM cApahanti| trivRtaScaturguNena bhAgena pippalI| tadvaditi modakaH| sannipAtAdiharaH| mAkSikamanuktamapi tadvadgrahaNena modakatvAllabhyate| iti virecanAni raktapitte||8||

 vamanaM phalasaMyuktaM tarphaNaM sasitA madhu||9||  sasitaM vA jalaM kSaudrayuktaM vA madhukodakam||9||  phalendrayavagAGgeyImadhukaM vA samAkSikam||9||  kSIraM vA rasamikSorvA ...................||9||

nidAnoktakramasyACrayaNAt prathamaM kevaletyAdinA vAtakAsacikitsocyate|  snehaiH ghRtAdibhiryathAyogyam|  vAtaghnAni CodhanAdigaNapaThitAni bhadradArUnatakuSThAdIni|  peyAdibhiravagAhAntairghRtAdirayogAt snigdhaiH|  abhyaGgasyAviSayapradarCanArthaM viCeSaNam|  viDbaddhA kaThinA|  vAto vibaddha asamyagvAhI|  ghRtairevaurdhvabhaktikaiH kSIrairiti sAmAnyena|  sapittaM sakaphaM cetyanilajakAsaviCeSaNam||

rAsnAdInAM dvAdaCapalANi kulatthAdInAM pratyekamaSTau palAni AjamAMsasya palAni paJcACaditi pAnIyapalaCatapaJcakena sadvAdaCapalena sAdhayet|  teneti siddhena sAdhitaprayogAt mAMsavat mAMsapAkAvidhirasya siddhatA|  carake tu paThitaM-pAdaCeSeNa tena ceti|  jIvanIyA uktAH|  taiH palAMCaiH samena kSIreNa yuktaM ghRtADhakaM pacet|  samIkSyeti bRMhaNIyatvaM samyagvikalya sarvAGgarogA nAnAvidhA vAtavyAdhayaH|  UrdhvaM pravRtto~anila UrdhvAnilaH|  sahaCabdena tAvapi jayedityuktam|| 6||

 vidAryAdigaNakvAthakalkasiddhaM ca kAsajit||7||

 athAtaH kSatakSayakAsacikitsitaM  vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 urasyantaHkSate sadyo lAkSAM kSaudrayutAn pibet||2||  kSIreNa SAlIn jIrNo~adyAt kSIreNaiva saSarkarAn||2||  pArSvabastisarukcAlpapittAgnistAM surAyutAm||2||  phinnaviTtu samustAtiviSApAThAM savatsakAm||2||

antaHkSataSabdena nidAnoktaM smArayati| tasmin lAkSAkSaudrakSIre jIrNe saSarkarAJCAlInaM kSIreNa vAdyAt tAmiti lAkSAm| samustAdikAM lAkSAmeva savatsakAm||2||

 lAkSA sarpirmadhUcCiSTaM jIvanIyagaNaM sitA||3||  tvakkSIrI samitaM kSIre paktvA dIptAnalaH pibet||3||

 ikSvAlikAbisagranthipadmakesaracandanaiH||4||  SRtaM payo madhuyutaM sandhAnArthaM pibet kSatI||4||

kSate~antarurasi puruSaH sandhAnArthamikSvAlikAdibhiH kSIraM  madhuyuktaM pibhet||4||

 yavAnAM cUrNamAmAnAM kSIrasiddhaM ghRtAnvitam||5||  jvaradAhe sitAkSaudrasaktUn vA payasA pibet||5||

yavacUrNaM kSIreNa tathA sAdhyate yathA peyAprAyo bhavati| AmAnAmityanagnispRSTAnAM yavAnAm| taccUrNaM sajvaradAhe kSate| athavA sitAdIn  payasA pibhet||5||

 kAsavAMstu pibetsarpirmadhurauSadhasAdhitam||6||  guDodakaM vA kvathitaM sakSaudramaricaM himam||6||  cUrNamAmalakAnAM vA kSIre pakvaM ghRtAnvitam||6||  rasAyanavidhAnena pippalIrvA prayojayet||6||

kAsAvAniti prakaraNAt kSatakAsavAn| madhurauSadhAni rasabhedIyokto madhuraskandhaH| subhodham| AmalakacUrNasyaiva prayogaH| pippalInAM rasAyanavidhistatraiva vakSyate||6||

 kAsI parvAsthiCUlI ca lihyAtsaghRtamAkSikAH||7||  madhUkamadhukadrAkSA tvakkSIrIpippalIbalAH||7||

parvAsthiCUlasaMyuktaH kAsI madhUkAdikaM saghRtamAkSikaM lihyAt||7||

 trijAtamardhakarSACaM pippalyardhapalaM sitA||8||  drAkSA madhUkaM kharjUraM palAMCaM ClakSNacUrNitam||8||  madhunA gulikA ghnanti tA vRSyAH pittaCoNitam||8||  kAsaCvAsArucicchardimUrchAhidhmAmadabhramAn||8||  kSatakSayasvarabhraMCaplIhaCoSADhyamArutAn||8||  raktaniSThIvahRtpArCvarukpipAsAjvarAnapi||8||

trijAtakAdyA gulikA subodhinI| iyaJcailAdyeti prasiddhA| ADhyamAruto vAtavyAdhAvuktaH||8||

 rakte~ativRddhe cchAgaM vA jAGgalaM vA pibedasRk||9||  varSAbhUCarkarAraktaCAlitaNDulajaM rajaH||9||  raktaSThIvI pibetsiddhaM drAkSArasapayoghRtaiH||9||  madhUkamadhukakSIrasiddhaM vA taNDulIyakam||9||  `||10||

rakte~ativRddhe bhahiH pravartamAne| jAGgalajIvaprabhAvatvAjjAGgalam| varSAbhvAdInAM cUrNaM drAkSArasAdibhiH siddhaM raktaSThIvI pibhet| siddhamagnisaMyogena| subhodham||9||

 yathAsvaM mArgavisRte rakte kuryAcca pheSajam||10||

asmiMScoraHkSate kadAcidatipravRddhaM raktamadho nAsikayA vApi pravartate| tatra rakte yathAsvaM raktapittavadapi bheSajaM kuryAt||10||

madhuyaSTyA aSTau palAni| kvAthakalpanayA kvAthayet| tasmin kvAthe SaNNavatipalamAne ghRtAn prasthaM pacet| tasmin ghRtaprasthe CIte ca kSaudrasyASTapalaiH CarkarayACcASTapalaM vimiCrayet| asya ca ghRtasya saktubhiH samairupayogaH||21||

 dhAtrIphalaM vidArIkSujIvanIyarasAt ghRtAt||22||  gavyAjayoCca payasoH prasthaM prasthaM vipAcayet||22||  siddhaCIte sitAkSaudradviprasthaM vinayettataH||22||  yakSmApasmArapittAsRkkAsamehakSayApaham||22||  vayasthApanamAyuSyaM mAMsaCukrabalapradam||22||

dhAtrIphalarasAdInAM saptAnAM pRthakprasthamAnatvam| tasmin prasthasaptake siddhena ghRtapAkena pUtena vastrasrutena CarkarayAH prasthaM SoDaCapalAni kSaudrasya ca prasthaM dvAtriMCat palAni| vinayet prakSipedyakSmAdiharametat ghRtamiti vijJeyam| vayasthApanatvAdiyuktaM ca| vayasthApanaM jarAnACanAt||22||

 ghRtaM tu pitte~abhyadhike lihyAdvAte~adhike pibet||23||  lIDhaM nirvApayet pittamalpatvAddhanti nAnalam||23||  AkrAmatyanilaM pItamUSmANaM niruNaddhi ca||23||

pittAdhike sarvaM ghRtameva lihyAt| yatastallIDhaM sthairyAcchaityAcca pittaM nirvApayet| nayedalpatvAccAgnernACaM na karoti vAte tvadhike taM vilInaM pibet| yataH pItaM vyApteranilamAkrAmati| tatsaMyogena prasarantamUSmANaM niruNaddhi||23||

 kSamakSINakRCAGgAnAmetAnyeva ghRtAni tu||24||  tvakkSIrIpippalIlAjacUrNaiH styAnAni yojayet||24||

etAnyeva cAnantaroktAni ghRtAni kSAmAdyaGgAnAM tvakkSIryAdi cUrNaiH saha styAnAnyavilInAni yojayet||24||

 sarpirguDAn samadhvaMSAn kRtvA dadyAtpayo~anu ca||25||  retovIryaM balaM puSTiM tairASutaramApnuyAt||25||

cUrNasaMyuktaiH styAnaiCca ghRtairmAkSikabhAgamiCraiH sarpirguDAn ghRtapiNDakAn kRtvA tAneva yojayet| anu ca payo dadyAtpAnAya| taiH sarpirguDaiH puruSe retovIryAdikamACutaramApnuyAt||25||

 balAvidArIhrasvaM ca paJcamUlaM punarnavam||26||  paJcANAM kSIrivRkSANAM CuGgA muSTyaMCakAstathA||26||  eSAM kaSAye dvikSAre vidAryA jarasAMCake||26||  jIvanIyaiH pacet piSTairakSamAtrairghRtADhakam||26||  sitApalAni pUte ca CIte dvAtriMCadAvapet||26||  godhUmapippalIvAMCI cUrNaM CRGgATakasya ca||26||  samAdhikaM kauDavikaM tatsarvaM khajamUrcchitam||26||  styAnaM sarpiguDAn kRtvA bhUrjapatreNa veSTayet||26||  tAJjagdhvA pAlikAn kSIraM madyaM tvanu pibetkaphe||26||  CoSe kAse kSate kSINe CramastrIbhArakarSite||26||  raktaniSThIvane tApe pInase corasi sthite||26||  CastAH pArCvaCiraHCUle bhede ca svaravarNayoH||26||

balAvidAryAdIni pRthag hrasvapaJcamUlaM punarnavaM ca paJcAnAM kSIrivRkSANAM CuGgAnItyetatpalikam| pAnIyapalaCatadvayaM sASTapalaM kvathitaCiSTAM dvipaJcACatpalAni| tataH kaSAyAt dviguNaM kSIram| kevalAyA vidAryAH kvAtha AjamAMsarasaCca balAdikvAthasamau| jIvanIyAni kArSikANi| godhUmacUrNAdikaM kuDavamAnam| kuDavaCcatvAri palAni| mAkSikasya kuDavo~aSTau palAni| khajo manthanopakaraNam| tAn sarpirguDAn pratidinaM palikAJjagdhvA sarvaH kaCcit kSIramanupibet| kaphe~adhikaM madyaM nAnAvidhaM kaphaharamanupibet| tApapInasayoruromUlAyorUraHsthitatvam| pInaso nAsAsrAvaH||26||

 saCarkarACRtekSIra ghRtatailADhakatraye||27||  cUrNIkRtAH kSipetpaktvA sAndre daCapalAH pRthak||27||  drAkSAtmaguptAvarSAbhUsamaGgAbhIrupippalIH||27||  tadvadvidAryAmalake prasthArdhaM viCvabheSajam||27||  yaSTyAhvasauvarcalayordvipalaM maricasya ca||27||  kSAmaH kSINaH kSataH CuSyaMstan khAdetpAlikairguDaiH||27||  tathA sadyo rasAdInAM vRddhyA puSTiM samuCnate||27||

kSIraghRtatailAnAmADhakatrayamekIkRtya stokayA CarkarayA saMyojya pacedAsAndrIbhAvAt| tasmiMCca CarkarApAke pakve sAndre  drAkSAdyAmalakAntAni pRthagdaCapalAni kSipet| CuNThyA aSTau palAni| yaSTyAhvasauvarcalayordvipalamekasya palam| mAricasya tu dvipalam| rasAdInAM dhAtUnAM vRddhyA sambandhaH||27||

 gokSIrArdhADhakaM sarpiH prasthamikSurasADhakam||28||  rasAdvidAryAH kuDavaM rasAt prasthaM ca taittirAt||28||  dadyAtsidhyati tasmiMstu piSTAnikSurasairimAn||28||  madhUkapuSpaM kuDavaM kuDavaM ca priyAlataH||28||  paladvayaM tavakSIryAH kharjUrANi ca viMCatiH||28||  pRthagvibhitakAnmajjaH pippalyACca caturthikAm||28||  triMCatpalAni khaNDAcca madhukAtpANimAnikAn||28||  tathArdhapalikAnyatra jIvanIyAni dApayet||28||  siddhe dvikuDave kSaudrAcchIte datvA ca modakAn||28||  kArayenmaricAjAjIpalacUrNAvacUrNitAn||28||  vAtAsRkpittarogeSu kSatakAsakSayeSu ca||28||  kSINaujaH svaraCukleSu yonidoSeSu saMsrave||28||  mRtaprajAsu vandhyAsu hitaM garbhasya ca srutau||28||

gokSIrArdhADhakamityAdi subodham| kuDavAdau SuSkameyeSvidaM mAnaM dviguNaM taddravArdrayoriti sarvatra
smartavyam| madhUkaphuSphAdInAmikSurasaH pheSaNe yavAnuphayujyate| KarjUrANi phalasaGKyayA| caturthikA phalam| phANimAnikA aSTau phalAni| mAricAjAjyormiSrayoH phalam||28||

 bItatvagasthikUSmANDatulAM svinnAM punaH pacet||29||  ghaTTayan sarpiSaH prasthe kSaudravarNe~atra ca kSipet||29||  khaNDAcchataM kaNACuNThyordvipalaM jIrakAdapi||29||  trijAtadhAnyamaricaM pRthagardhapalAMCakam||29||  khajenAmathya ca sthApyaM tallihanyupayojitam||29||  kAsahidhmAjvaraCvAsaraktapittakSatakSayAn||29||  uraH sandhAnajananaM medhAsmRtibalapradam||29||  aCrvibhyAnnirmitaM hRdyaM kUSmANDakarasAyanam||29||

pRthaggrahaNAttrijAtakasya pratidravyaM dvikArSikatvaM ghRtAdhikatvAnmadhunaH SoDaCa palAni||29||

 piphennAgaphalAmUlasyArdhakarSAphivardhitAm||30||  palaM kSIrayutaM mAsaM kSIravRttiranannaphuk||30||  eSa prayogaH puSTyAyurbalavarNakaraH param||30||  maNDUkaparNyAH kalpo~ayaM yaSTyA viSvauSadhasya ca||30||

ardhakarSAbhivardhatAmiti| prathame~ahanyardhakarSaH| dvitIye karSaH| tRtIye sArdhakarSaH| caturthe dvau karSau| paJcame~ardhonatritayaH| SaSThe trayaH| saptame~ardhonacatvAraH| aSTame tu palam| SeSANi dvAviMSatidinAni palam| nAgabhalAmUlavanmaNDUkaparNyA api vRddhiH| kSIramAnaM vRddhiviSayakalpam| tadvanmadhuyaSTyAH tadvacCRGgaverasyamaNDUkaparNI bhrahmasuvarcalA||30||

 daCamUlaM svayaGguptAM CaGkhapuSpIM CaThI balAm||35||  hastipippalyapAmArgapippalImUlacitrakAn||35||  bhArGgI puSkaramUlaM ca dvipalAMCAnyavADhakam||35||  harItakICataM caikaM jalapaJcADhake pacet||35||  yavasvede kaSAyaM taM pUtaM taccAbhayACatam||35||  pacedguDatulAM datvA kuDavaM ca pRthagghRtAt||35||  tailAtsapippalIcUrNAtsiddhaCIte ca mAkSikAt||35||  lehAd dve cAbhaye nityamataH khAdedrasAyanAt||35||  paJcakAsAn kSayaM CvAsaM sahidhmaM viSamajvaram||35||  mehagulmagrahaNyarCohRdrogArucipInasAn||35||  agastyavihitaM dhanyamidaM CreSTaM rasAyanam||35||

daCamUletyAdinA agastyalehaH| subodham|atra jalasyADhakamaSTAviMCatyadhikaM palaCatam| ghRtatailamAkSikANAM kuDavAnyaSTapalAni| pippalIcUNasya kuDavaM catuSpalam| harItakIphalAnAM kvAthaCulkAduddhRtAnAM vigatAsthInAM yathoktasnehabhRSTAnAM tenaiva saha guDakvAthaprakSepaH| vRddhAnAM prAyo leheSu cyavanaprACavadvyavahAraH| rasAyanaM leha eva| taditi rasAyana parAmarCaH||35||

 daCamUlAM balAM mUrvAM haridre pippalIdvayam||36||  pAThACvagandhApAmArgasvaguptAtiviSAmRtAH||36||  bAlabilvaM trivRddantImUlaM patraJca citrakAt||36||  payasyAM kuTajaM hiMsrAM puSpaM sAraJca bIjakAt||36||  bolasthavirabhallAtavikaGkataCatAvarIH||36||  pUtIkaraJjaCamyAkacandralekhAsahAcaram||36||  saubhAJjanakanimbatvagikSuraM ca palAMCakam||36||  pathyAsahasrAM saCataM yavAnAM cA Dhakadvayam||36||  pacedaSTaguNe toye yavasvede~avatArayet||36||  pUte kSipetsapathye ca tatra jIrNaguDAttulAm||36||  tailAjyadhAtrIrasataH prasthaM prasthaM tataH punaH||36||  adhiCrayenmRdAvagnau darvIlepe~avatArya ca||36||  CIte prasthadvayaM kSaudrAtpippalIkuDavaM kSipet||36||  cUrNIkRtAttrijAtAcca tripalaM nikanettataH||36||  dhAnye purANakumbhasthaM mAMsaM khAdecca pUrvavat||36||  rasAyanaM vasiSThoktametatpUrvaguNAdhikam||36||  svasthAnaM niSparIhAraM sarvartuSu cadAsyate||36||

daCamUlabalAdikaM vasiSThamuniproktaM rasAyanaM subodham| daCamUlaM pRthagdravyaM palAMCikam| dantyA mUlam| citrakasya patram| payasyA kSIrikA| kuTajaM vatsakam| hiMsrA mAMsI| bIjakamasanam| bolasthaviraM bolavRkSaH| kulahalamalambuso bhUkadambakaH| CakadeCe muNDiketi prasiddhA| candralekhA bAkucI| dvicatvAriMCadauSadhapalAni yavAnAmaSTAviMCatyadhikaM palaCatam| harItakIphalAnAM caikAdaCaCatAni| sarvamekIkRtya tattulAyA paricchidya tato~aSTaguNena toyena pacet| pUtaM CuklarahitaM srutatvAt| pathyAH CuklAduddhRtyAnasthibharjitAH pUrvavat kvAthe prakSepyAH| tataH pakvaM dhAnyarACau nikhanet| mAsaM dhAnye sthitiH| pUrvavat guNA AgastyoktAH||36||

 pAlikaM saindhavaM SuNThI dve ca sauvarcalAtpale||37||  kuDavAMSAni vRkSAmlaM dADimaM patramArjakAt||37||  ekaikAmaricAjAjyordhAnyaka dve caturthike||37||  SarkarAyAH palAnyatra daSa dve ca pradApayet||37||  kRtva cUrNamato mAtrAmannapAneSu dApayet||37||  rucyaM taddIpanaM balyaM pArSvArtiSvAsakAsanut||37||

ekAmityAdau SoDaSikA karSaH| ajAjyA dvau karSau| ajamodasya dvau karSau| tAbhyAmityajAjIdIpyakAbhyAM dviguNaM dADimaM tadvat tintiNIkam| evamaSTau karSA dADimasyASTau tintiNIkasya| palaM sauvarcalasya| SuNThyAH karSaH paJcapalAni dadhitthamajjaH| dadhitthaM kapittham| SarkarAyAH SoDaSapalAni rAjayakSmacikitsitaM raktapittacikitsitaM ca vikalpyoraHkSate yojyam||38||

evemanantaroktena bhRMhaNena krameNa kSatadoSe nivRtte bhRMhaNenaiva kaPe vRddha urasi Sirasi ca kaPAnubhandhena yasya kAsino mahatI rugbhavati sa nA puruSa imAn vakSamANAn dhUmAn pibhet||39||

 athAto SvAsahidhmAcikitsitaM   vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

nidAnasthAnapradarSitaprakAreNa SvAse hidhmAmAM ca yato hetvadikaM samAnamataH sAdhanamapi samAnameva veditavyam||2||

 .......................tadArttaJca pUrvaM svedairupAcaret||3||  snigdhairlavaNatailAktaM srotassu granthitaH kaphaH||3||  tairlIno~api vilIno~asya koSTaM prAptaH sunirharaH||3||  phavadraveSu mRdutvaM ca mArute cAnulomatA||3||

 svinnaM ca phojayedannaM snigdhamAnUpajai rasaiH||4||  dadhyuttareNa vA.................................||4||

bhalina ityAdi subhodham| Urdhvamiti vamanena| adha iti virecanena| payasetyAdinA vamediti sambhaddhyate| kSIreNa vA madhureNa mAMsarasen vA palayuktena| trivRttAdIn pRthagbhUtAn SarkarAdInAmanyatamena saha virecanaM dadyAt| tarpaNaM saktavaH| athavA trivRtAdIn drAkSAdInAmanyatamasya rasena yutAn||2||
