SuddhakoSThasyetyAdi subodham| samAsthitaM saMvatsaroSitam| kAkAdikaM hRdyopasaMhitam| tathA carakaH -`kAkAMstittiriSabdena matsyaSabdena coragAn| dadyAnmatsyAntraSabdena pRthaggaNDUpadAnapI' tyevamAdi| jJAnamityAdi CadmopasaMhitatve hetuH||3||

 mRgAdyAH phittakaphayoH phavane phrasahAdayaH||4||  veSavArIkRtAH pathyA rasAdiSu ca kalpitAH||4||  phRSTAH sarSapatailena sarpiSA vA yathAyatham||4||  rasikA mRdavaH snigdhAH paTudravyAphisaMskRtAH||4||  hitA maudgakakaulatthAstadvadyUSASca sAdhitAH||4||  sapippalIkaM sayavaM sakulatthaM sanAgaram||4||  sadADimaM sAmalakaM snigdhamAjaM rasaM pibet||4||  tena SaD vinivartante vikArAH pInasAdayaH||4||

mRgAdyAH mRgaviSkirapratudabileCayAH| CeSAH prasahAdayaH| veCavArIkRtA ityAdi sarveSAM viCeSaNam| rasikAdayaH sarve AhAraprakArAH| rasikA rasavanto bhRSTA bharjitAH| sapippalIkAdi subodham|

 koladAdimaniryAsapiSTayAsthivihInayA||5||  drAkSayA svacCadhAnyAmbuplutAloDitakalkayA||5||  kAryaH sauvarcalavyoSapatrailAdIpyakAnvitaH||5||  samAkSikaH sakarpUraH salavaGga sakesaraH||5||  candrakAnto yathAryAKyaH SoSahAgnirucipradaH||5||

svacCadhAnyAmlenApluta AloDitaJca kalko yasyA drAkSayAstathA candrakAnto nAma||5||

 SuktAmladhAtrIsvarasairdrAkSAyAH kalkitaM palam||6||  guDaSarkarasaMyuktaM yuktaM SlakSNaiSca kArSikaiH||6||  vRkSAmladhAnyadramilIrAjikAdADimoSaNaiH||6||  palena nAgapuSpasya kiJcitsauvarcalena ca||6||  sasevyapatratvaktoyasurasArasamUrcCitaH||6||  phUriphUstRNako rogaH kaNThyo rucyaH samAkSikaH||6||

subodhaH||6||

 pibecca sutarAM madyaM jIrNaM srotoviSodhanam||7||  pittAdiSu viSeSeNa madhvariSTAcCavAruNIH||7||  siddhaM vA paJcamUlena tAmalakyAthavA jalam||7||  parNinIphiScatasRphirdhAnyanAgarakeNa vA||7||  kalkayeccAnukUlo~asya tenAnnaM Suci yatnavAn||7||

paJcamUlena tAmalakyA vA siddhaM jalaM pibhet| teneti paJcamUlAdyambhasA||7||

 daCamUlena payasA siddhaM mAMsarasena vA||8||  balAgarbhaM ghRtaM yojyaM kravyAnmAMsarasenavA||8||  sakSaudraM payasA siddhaM sarpirdaCaguNena vA||8||

daCamUlena payasA mAMsarasena ca balAgarbhaM ghRtam| athavA kravyAdAnAM mAMsarasena| sarpiSo daCaguNena ca payasA siddhaM ghRtaM sakSaudraM yojyam||8||

 jIvantIM madhukaM drAkSAM phalAni kuTajasya ca||9||  puSkarAhvaM CaThIM kRSNAM vyAghrIM gokSurakaM balAm||9||  nIlotpalaM tAmalakIM trAyamANAM durAlabhAm||9||  kalkIkRtya ghRtaM pakvaM rogarAjaharaM param||9||

jIvantyAdye jalaM snehasamam| snehAccaturguNaM jalamityaruNadattaH||9||

 durAlabhAM gokSurakaM catasraH parNinIrbalAm||10||  bhAgAn palonmitAn kRtvA palaM parpaTakasya ca||10||  paceddaCaguNe toye daCabhAgAvaCeSite||10||  pUte tasmin ghRtaprasthaM kSIradviguNitaM pacet||10||  garbhaM datvA CaThIkRSNAbhUnimbotpalasArivAH||10||  trAyantIM pauSkaraM mUlaM sahapatraphalAM phalam||10||  kuTajAcca jayettaddhi CiraHparCvAMsavedanAm||10||  tRSNAM chardyamatIsAraM kAsadAhabhramajvarAn||10||

madAtyayacikitsitam

 athAto madAtyayacikitsitaM  vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

kramaprAptaM madAtyayaM nirNetumadhyAya AraByate||1||

 yaM doSamadhikaM paSyettasyAdau pratikArayet||2||  kaphasthAnAnuphUrvyA vA tulyadoSaM madAtyaye||2||  pittamArutaparyantaH prAyeNahi madAtyayaH||2||

sarvasya madAtyayasya tridoSajatvAducyate -yaM doSamityAdi| yatra punarna kasyacidAdhikyaM sarve samAH tatra kaPasthAnAnupUrvyA| Adau kaPaH paScAt pittaM tato vAyuH| asmin krame yuktiH -pittamArutetyAdi| sarvasmin madAtyaye kAlakrameNa pittamArutAvAdhikIbhavataH| prathamaM tu kaPasyaivAdhikyam||2||

 hInamithyAtipItena yo vyAdhirupajAyate||3||  samapItena tenaiva sa madyenopaSAmyati||3||

sAmyAddhInapItena vA viparItapItena vA~atipItena vA madyena yo vyAdhirupajAyate sa tenaiva sAtmena pItenopaSAmyati||3||

 madyasya viSasAdRSyAdviSaM tUtkarSavRttiphiH||4||  tIkSNAdiphirguNaiyogAdviSAntaramapekSate||4||

kathaM yenaiva roga utpannastenaiva CAmyatItyAha - madyasya viSasAdRCyAt| yathA viSaM tIkSNAdiguNayutaM tIkSNAdiguNayutena viSeNaiva CAmyati tadvanmadyamapi madyena| madyatvaM viSasya viCeSaH| yadviSamutkRSTaistIkSNAdibhiryogAdviSAntaraM vijAtIyaM viSamapekSate| madyaM punaH svalpatvAttIkSNAdInAM sajAtIyenaivopaCAmyati||4||

 tIkSNoSNenAtimAtreNa pItenAnnavidAhinA||5||  madyenAnnarasakledo vidagdhaH kSAratAM gataH||5||  yAn kuryAnmadatRNmohajvarAntardAhavibhramAn||5||  madyotkliSTena doSeNa ruddhaH srotassu mArutaH||5||  sutIvrA vedanA yACca CirasyasthiSu sandhiSu||5||  jIrNAmamadyadoSasya prakAMkSAlAghave sati||5||  yaugikaM vidhivadyuktaM madyameva nihanti tAn||5||

svabhAvata eva tIkSNAdiguNavatA madyenAtimAtrapItenAnnaraso vidagdhaH kSAraguNaH san yAn madAdIn kuryAt tAn madAdIn kAla upayuktaM viCiSTamadyameva nACayati| tathA madyotkliSTena doSeNa CleSmaNA srotaHsu mAruto ruddhaH san CiraHprabhRtiSu yACca vedanAH kuryAttA api madyameva nihanti| kasmin kAla ityAha - jIrNAmamadyadoSasya| AmA abhinavA madyavikArA AmamadyadoSAH| jIrNA AmadoSA yasya| tathA prakAMkSAyAM madyaviSayAyAM lAghave tanutve sati prayuktam| kimbhUtaM madyaM nihantItyAha- yaugikaM vidhivadyuktaM ca| doSAdyapekSayA yadAturasya yogamarhati tadyaugikam| vidhistvasminnevAdhyAye vakSyate||5||

 kSAro hi yAti mAdhuryaM CIghramamlopasaMhitaH||6||  madyamamleSu ca CreSThaM doSaviSyandanAdalam||6||  tIkSNoSNAdyaiH purA proktairdIpanAdyaistathA guNaiH||6||  sAtmyatvAcca tadevAsya dhAtusAmyakaraM param||6||

madyodbhavAnAM madyenaiva CAnteH prakArAntareNa yuktirucyate- kSAro hItyAdi| prathamena madyenAnnarase kSAratAM gate rogA utpadyante| kSAra-CcAmlopasaMhitaH san mAdhuryaM CIghraM yAti| amleSu ca madyaM CreSTha-matastadeva vikAranACanam| tathA tIkSNoSNAdyaiH purA nidAnasthAna-proktaiH dIpanAdyaiCca doSANAM viSyandanAt srAvaNAttadeva pathyam| asya ca puruSasya sAtmyatvAddhetostadeva paraM dhAtusAmyakaram||6||

 saptAhamaSTarAtraM vA kuryAtpAnAtyayauSadham||7||  jIryatyetAvata pAnaM kAlena vipathASritam||7||

yacca madAtyayoddeCe auSadhamuktaM tat saptAhamaSTarAtraM vA kuryAt| etAvatA hi kAlena vimArgasthaM madyaM jIryati||7||

 paraM tato~anubadhnAti yo rogastasya bheSajam||8||  yathAyathaM prayuJjIta kRtapAnAtyayauSadham||8||

tata UrdhvaM ya eva rogaH kRtapAnAtyayauSadhamAturamanubadhnAti tasyaiva bheSajaM kuryAt| yathAyathamiti doSAdyapekSayA svasya prakaraNe vihitam||8|| 

 tatra vAtolbaNe madye dadyAtpiSTakRtaM yutam||9||  bIjapUrakavRkSAmlakoladADimadIpyakaiH||9||  yavAnIhapuSAjAjI vyoSatrilavaNArdrakaiH||9||  CUlyairmAMsairharitakaiH snehavadbhiCca saktubhiH||9||  uSNasnigdhAmlalavaNA medyamAMsarasA hitAH||9||  AmrAmrAtakapeCIbhiH saMskRtA rAgaSADavAH||9||  godhUmamASavikRtIrmRducitrA mukhapriyAH||9||  ArdrikArdrakakulmASaCuktamAMsAdigarbhiNIH||9||  surabhirlavaNA CItA nigadA vAcchavAruNI||9||  svaraso dADimAtkvAthaH paJcamUlAtkanIyasaH||9||  CuNThIdhAnyAttathAmastuCuktAmbhocchAmlakAJjikam||9||  abhyaGgodvartanasnAnamuSNaM prAvaraNaM ghanam||9||  ghanaCcAgurujo dhUpaH paGkaCcAgurukuGkumAt||9||  kucoruCroNiCAlinyo yauvanoSNAGgayaSTayaH||9||  harSeNAliGgane yuktAH priyAH saMvAhaneSu ca||9||

tatretyAdinA pAnAtyayauSadhaM pradarCyate| CAlipiSTaM madyaM bIjapUrakAdibhiryathAyogaM yuktaM madAtyaye vAtolbaNe dadyAt| tatra coSNAdiguNA mAMsarasAH hitAH| subodham| peCyaH khaNDAH| mRdvAdiguNayuktA godhUmamASavikRtIH citrA bhakSyAdinAnekaprakArAH| tathA ArdrikAdimiCrA vikRtIH| kulmASo~ardhasvinnAni sasyAni| garbhiNIrantarAntarA yuktAH| acchavAruNI surabhitvAdiguNayuktA hitA| subodham| CuNThIdhAnyAt kvAthaH| dhUpo ghanaH prabhUtaH| paGkaH kardamaH| priyaCca hitAH| kIdRgbhUtAH kucAdibhI ramaNiyatvena yAH ClAghyante| yACca yauvanoSNAGgayaSTayo harSeNa prItyA AliGgane saMvAhaneSu ca yuktAH anurUpAH||9||

 pittolbaNe bahujalaM CArkaraM madhu vA yutam||10||  rasairdADimakharjUrabhavyadrAkSAparUSajaiH||10||  suCItaM sasitA saktu yojyaM tAdRkca pAnakam||10||  svAduvargakaSAyairvA yuktaM madyaM samAkSikam||10||  CAliSaSTikamaCnIyAcchaCAjaiNakapiJjalaiH||10||  satInamudgAmalakapaTolIdADimairapi||10||

ACvinamityAdestAM surAM vidhinA pibedityanena sambandhaH| evamitihAseSu CrUyate yathA kila surayA aCvibhyAM svatejo dattam| sarasvatyA ca balam| indreNa vIryam| viSNunA prabhAvaH| yA ca surA makaraketoH kAmasyAstraM; balasya ca halabhRto yA puruSArthaH| yA ca sautrAmaNyAdhvare dvijamukhe brAhmaNapratyakSamagnau hUyate| yA ca mahodadheH sarvauSadhisampUrNAt surAsurairmathyamAnAt CyrAdibhiH sahotpannA| yA ca madhvAdibhirbahubhI rUpairmadaCaktimanujjhanti sthitA| yAM cAsvAdya vilAsinyaH katraryo vilAsinIti nAma
yathArthaM bibhrati| surayA vilAsasyAgamanAt| yAM surAM pItvA kulAGganApi lajjAdimatvAdalalitApi 
munerabhyastadhairyasyApi kvApi ceto nayatyanaGgena kAmenAliGgitairaGgaiH
karaNabhUtaiH| yA ca surA ekaM mAninImanaH prasAdya dvayorapi 
mAninIvallabhayornivRtiM kurute| atiniveDamAnAvaSTambhaparavaCApyAsvAditakAdambarIrasA mAnaM
pRSThataH kRtvA avadhIritapUrvamapi prayAMsaM prArthayituM yatate| yatra 
caivamutprekSyate yasyAH surAyA ye taraGgabhAsaiva bhrukuTI tayA tarjanena
sakhIva sakhyA vallabhAvadhIraNAnutApabhiyeva mAninyA mAnamavadhIrya manaH
prasAdayati| tayA ca prasannamanasA dvitIyo mAninyA mAnamavadhIrya manaH
prasAdayati| tayA ca prasannamanasA dvitIyo nirvRtimAsAdayati| tadidaM surAyA mahat
kauCalam| yadekatra prasAdamApAdyAnyatra nirvRtimApnoti| yAM ca surAmAsvAdya yuddhe
puruSastRNavadasUn prANAMstyajanti| kimbhUte yuddhe Aha-yathetyAdi| yathAkAmaM
yathecchaM yA bhaTAnAmavAptistayA parihRSTo~apsarogaNo yasminyuddhe|
iti citrAvasvasthAsu priyAmanukaroti yeti vakSyamANatvAtsarvatrApItaHprabhRti priyAyAH
surAyACca CleSaH| tathA ca yenaiva priyA AsvAditA bhavati sa evApsaroviSaye~atiCayaM
paCyaMstallAbhopAye yuddhe tRNavadasUMstyajati| yAM surAM bahudhA
madhvAdinA bahuvigrahAM ciraM CIlayitvApi puruSo nityaM tAm apUrvamiva sevate|
sadaivAbhinavAmevAtipriyatvAjjAnAtItyarthaH| priyapi bahudhA 
ratiprayogairbahuvigrahAnekaCaH kRtapraNayakalahApi nityaM harSAtivegenAbhinaveva
sevyate| yAJca surAM dRSTvA CokAdibhirnAbhibhUyate| priyAmapi
dRSTvA CokAdibhirnAbhibhUyate| darCanAbhibhavayoH CokAdaya evaM
karttRtvena nIyante yena samAnakarttRkatvaM bhavati| tatsannidhAne
CokAdayo na bhavantIti tAtparyam| yasyACca surAyA vanA goSThyAdikaM na Cobhate|
priyayA vA vinA na Cobhate| yayA ca surayA viyuktastAM smRtvA~a~atmAnAM 
Cocate priyayA viyuktaCca Coyate| yA surA aprasannApi ghanApi prItyai
bhavati| prasannA ca svarga eva| priyApyakRtaprasAdApi prItyai bhavati| prasannA punaH svarga eva| 
yathA ca surayA hRdayasthitayA pItayA puruSa indramapi duHsthaM manyate AtmAnameva sustham|
tadvat priyayApi hRdayasthitayA manasi gRhItayA| yA ca surA anirdeCya sukhAsvAdA sukhamAsvAdaCca
yasyAH parasya nirdeSTumidantayA na pAryate| priyA~apyevam| yA ca surA paraM svasaMvedyaiva|
priyApi tadvat| ityevamanantaroktaprakAreNa citrAsu vichitrAsvavasthAsu yA surA 
priyAmanukaroti tAM surAM vidhinA pibediti surayAH pratyavamarCaH| yasya hi surA priyA
tasya pItamAtrAyAmeva tasyAM vallabhApi nitarAM vallabhAtvaM yAti| prItyAdiCabdaiCca
yA devAdibhiH stutA| tAM surAM madyapAnapravRttau satyAM pibedvakSyamANena vidhinA; 
na tu yatheccham||39||

 samphavanti na te rogA medAnilakaphodphavAH||40||  vidhiyuktAdRte madyAdye na siddhyanti dAruNAH||40||

kiM tayA surayA vidhinA pItayA bhavatItyAha-sambhavantItyAdi|
ye rogA medoprabhRtijA dAruNAste vidhiyuktAnmadyAdRte
dravyAntareNa na siddhyanti| vidhiyuktena madyenaiva siddhyanti|
te rogA vidhiviparItayA surayA na sambhavanti na jAyante||40||

 asti dehasya sA~avasthA yasyAM pAnaM nivAryate||41||  anyatra madyAnnigadAdvividhauSadhasamphRtAn||41||

tacca madyamevaM pibhediti pradarSanArthamAha-snAta ityAdi|
sarvasya parigrahasya yathAsvaM vRttiM vidhAya, na tu bhRtyAderasaMvibhajya|

 pItvaivaM caSakatrayaM parijanaM sammAnya sarvaM tato||45||  gatvAhAraphuvaM puraH suphiSajo phuJjIta phUyo~atra ca||45||  mAMsApUpaghRtArdrakAdiharitairyuktaM sasauvarcalaiH||45||  dvistrirvA niSi cAlpameva vanitAsaMvalganArthaM pibet||45||

rahasyekAnte dayitAmaGke utsaGge kRtvA yadA sIdhorvAramekaM

 itthaM yuktyA pibanmadyaM na trivargAdvihIyate||47||  asArasaMsArasuKaM paramaM cAdhigacCati||47||  ESvaryasyopaphogo~ayaM spRhaNIyaH surairapi||47||  anyathA hi vipatsu syAtpaScAttApendhanaM dhanam||47||  upaphogena rahito phogavAniti nindyate||47||  nirmito~atikadaryo~ayaM vidhinA nidhipAvakaH||47||  tsmAdvyavasthayA pAnaM pAnasya satataM hitam||47||  jitvA viSayalubdhAnAmindriyANAM svatantratAm||47||  vidhirvasumatAmeSa phaviSyadvasavastu ye||47||  yathopapattitairmadyaM pAtavyaM mAtrayA hitam||47||

 athAto~arCasAM cikitsitaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 athAto grahaNIdoSacikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

yathAsvamajIrNAnusArata iti|  kaphavAtapitteSvAmaviSTabdhavidagdhAkhyatrividhAjIrNAnusArata iti yathAsvaCabdasyArthaH|  upa-krameta cikitseta|| 2||

 AmapAcanArthaM pibenmustAtiviSAviCvabheSajakvAtham||3||  taccUrNaM vA sukhodakena tena vA CuNThIm||3||  tadvadvacAdivargaM

 sapravAhe vA varcasi cUrNIkRtAn biDlavaNayuktAn

CUlavadadhojaTharavRddhiranugranthirityaruNadattaH|  bilvAdIn dADimAmbhasA sabiDlavaNAn sapravAhe purISe sakaphe vA varcasi|  alasakamadhikRtya sUtrasthAnoktaM hiGgvAdimatimAtra AmaCUle|  chardyAdiSu maricAdInuSNAmbhasA|

	Ame pittaCleSmasaMyukte pravartamAne kaTukAdIni kvathitAni cUrNitAni vA|| 4||

 bhojanakAle ca paJcakolaparigRhItaM paTulaghudIpanIyaM

api ceti samuccaye|  dIpanatvAdiyogAdvyAdhau pathyam|  madhurapAkitvAdinA doSANAm|  vikASi medaHprabhRtInAM karCanaCIlam|  udare ye takraprayogA arCassu ca tAnsarvAn grahaNidoSe~api prayojayet|| 7||

udAvartAttu mande~agnau nirUhA snehAH bastayaCca yojyAH|  annavidhiH peyAdikramaH|  sarpireveti kevalasya nirauSadhasya sarpiSaH prayogapradarCanam|  adhvAdibhirmande yavAgvA ghRtaM pAyayet|  taccAnnena tatkAlopayuktenAvapIDitaM sadbalyatvAdiguNaM bhavati|| 25||

 dIrghakAlaprasaGgAttu kSAmakSINakRCAn narAn||26||  prasahAnAM rasaiH sAmlairbhojayet piCitACinAm||26||  laghUSNakaTuCodhitvairdIpayantyACu te~analam||26||  mAMsopacitamAMsatvAt paraM ca balavardhanAH||26||

dIrghakAlaprasaGgAt bahukAlaM vyAdhyantarasya prasaktatvAt mande~agnau tata eva kSAmatvAdiyuktAn narAn piCitACano ye prasahAH teSAM rasairbhojayet|  te piCitACinaH prasahA laghutvAdibhirguNairACvanalaM dIpayanti|  teSAM prasahAnAM yanmAMsaM tadanyena mAMsena yata upacitaM bhavatyataste paraM balavardhanAH|| 26||

 snehAsavasurAriSTAcUrNakvAthahitACanaiH||27||  samyakprayuktairdehasya balamagneCca varddhate||27||  dIpto yathaiva sthAsnuCca bAhyo~agniH sAradArubhiH||27||  sasnehairjAyate tadvadAhAraiH koSThago~analaH||27||

snehAdayaH pathyA api grahaNIdoSe mAtrAdiviCeSavaCAdasamyakprayuktA rogAyaiva bhavantIti pradarCanArthamAha-yathA bAhyo~agniH sAradArubhirdIpanaCIlaH sthiraCca jAyate tadvadAntaro~agniH sasnehairAhArairjAyate|| 27||

mUtrAghAtacikitsitam

 athAto mUtrAghAtacikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

kramaprAptasya mUtrAghAtasya cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 vAtAnmUtrakRcchre vAtaharatailAbhyaktagAtrasyAdhonAbheH sarva
maGgaM piNDena sekAvagAhaiCca vAtaghnaiH kambhIsvedena ca 
svedayet||2||  daCamUlabalairaNDamUlapunarnavACatAvarIvRCcIvapattUrapASA

pibet||2||

vAtamUtrakRcchre vAtaharadravyasiddhena tailenAbhyaktagAtrasya nAbheradhaH
sarvamaGgaM CarIraM vAtaharadravyakRtaireva piNDasvedAdibhiH svedayet| 

	daCamUlAdInAM kvAthena tailAccaturguNena sarpirAdinA ca miCrIbhUtena tailasamena ca daCamUlAdInyeva ca garbhe kalkaparibhASayA yuktyA ca lavaNapaJcakaM datvA sAdhitaM tailaM pAnAya dadyAt|  etAnyeva daCamUlAnyauSadhAni tailAdiyuktAnyannAdike kalpayet|  phalaCabdena sneho viCiSyate|  snehAnAmanekayonitvAt|  yadvA yebhyastailamutpadyate tAni tailaphalAnItyarthaH|  amlAni dADimAdIni|  sauvarcalenADhyA prabhUtasauvarcalA prasannA peyA|| 2||

 pittaje CItasekAvagAhapradehAn prayuJjIta||3||  tRNapaJcamUla
CvadaMSTrAbhIruvidArIkaCerukakvAthaM CItaM samadhuCarkaraM
pibet||3||  tadvacca kANDekSurakamUlam||3||  kamalotpalavidArI
CRGgATakAni vA||3||  drAkSArasena vA trapusakusumbhorvArU
bIjavRSakakuGkumakalkaM sarvamUtrAghAtaghnam||3||  madhukadArvyu
rvArUbIjAni vA taNDuladhAvanena||3||  samAkSikAM vA dArvI
mAmalakarasena||3||  mRdvIkAkalkaM vA paryuSitAmbhasA||3||

pittaje CItAn sekAdIn prayuJjIta|  tRNapaJcamUlAdikasya kvAthaM samAkSikaM saCarkaraM pibet|  kaCerUkaM prasiddhaM madhyadeCe|  kANDekSurakamUlaM vA tadvat|  kamalAdIni vA tadvaditi samadhuCarkarANi|  kANDekSurakaM prasiddham|  trapusAdikalko drAkSArasena sarvamUtrAghAtaghnaH|  trapusAdInAM trayANAM bIjam|  urvArUH karkaTikA|  madhukAdIni taNDulAmbunA|  dArvI samAkSikA Amalakarasena|  drAkSAkalkaM paryuSitodakena|  paryuSitaM yatkvathitaM sadrAtristhitam||3||

 kaphaje yathAsvaM svedo vamanaM kaTutIkSNoSNakSAramanna
pAnaM yavAnnaM takraM ca||4||  pibecca madyena sUkSmailAmAmalakarasena
vA madhuyutAM vA kadalIrasena kaiDaryakarasena vA||4||  CIti
vArakabIjaM vA takreNa||4||  pravAlacUrNaM vA taNDulAmbunA||4||  dhavakuTajakaraJjAmRtAkebukailAragvadhasapracchadakvAthaM vA 
CItaM sakSaudram||4||  tatsiddhAM vA yavAgUm||4||  kaNTakAri
kAsvarasaM vA samAkSikam||4||  vyoSailAgokSurakasArasA
sthIni vA madhumUtrayuktAni||4||  pATalIkSAraM vA bahukRtvaH
parisrutaM tailayuktam||4||  tilapATalIpARribhadrayAvaCUka
kSArodakAnuviddhAM vA tvageloSakacUrNayuktAM prasannAm||4||  tilAdInAM vA pRthakkSAraM guDopadaMCamaCnIyAt||4||  tIkSNo

kaphaje mUtrAghAte yathAsvaM doSAdyapekSayA svedavamanAdikaM hitam|  sUkSmailA madyena vAmalakarasena vA|  athavA madhuyuktAM sUkSmailAM kadalIrasakaiDaryarasayoranyateraNa|  subodham|  CItIvArakaM kuruNTakam|  dhavAdInAM kvAthaH CItaH san samAkSika upayojyaH|  athavA tatsiddhAM dhavAdikvAthasiddhAM yavAgUM CItAM samAkSikAM ca|  sArasAsthi sarasibhavaprANinAmasthi|  pATalyAH bhasmanA bahukRtvaH srutamudakaM nAtighAnAccha tailasaMyuktaM hitam|  tilAdikSAreNAnubiddhAM saMskRtAM tvagAdicUrNayuktAM surAm|  upadaMCo yamupadaCyAnnaM bhujyate|| 4||

 sannipAtAtmake vAtAdInAM sthAnAnupUrvyA yathAsannaM prati
kurvIta||5||  yatholbaNaM vA sarveSu samasthiteSu vA samasitaM
yavakSAraM bhakSayet||5||  api ca 

elACmabhedakaCilAjatupiplInAM
cUrNAni taNDulajalAluDitAni pItvA||5||  tadvadguDena sahitAnyupayujya mAsa
mAsannamRtyurapi jIvati mUtrakRcchrI||5||  elopakulyAmadhukACmabhedakauntICvadaMSTrAvRSakorupUgaiH||5||  kvAthaM pibeccharkarayAvagADhaM kRcchre sadAhe saruje vibandhe||5||  harItakIgokSurarAjavRkSapASANAbhiddhanvayavAsakAnAm||5||  kvAthaM pibedaCmajatupradhAnaM saCarkare sACmarimUtrakRcchre||5||

sannipAtAtmake mUtrAghAte ya evaM doSa Asanno bastau tasyaiva prathamaM pratikurvIta|  athavA ya evAdhikaH|  sarveSviti mUtrAghAteSu|  api ceti samuccaye|  elAdInAM cUrNAni taNDulajalena guDena ca mAsamupayujya mUtrakRcchrI AsannamRtyurapi jIvati|  punarelAdInAM kvAthaH CarkarayAvagADho ghanaH|  harItakyAdInAM kvAtho~aCmajatupradhAno yaH CilAjatuno loDanAyopakaroti|| 5||

midamevAcaret||6||

aCmaryAM navotthitAyAM vAtabastyAdikeSu ca nidAnasthAnapradarCiteSvabhinavotthiteSvidamevAnantaroktaM cikitsitaM doSAnatikrameNAcaret|| 6||

pASANabhedAdInAM kvAthenoSakAdigaNagarbheNa ca vipakvaM ghRtaM vAtACmayrAM bhedanam|  vasukaM bukaH|  kACmIre musUraH|  vasiraH pArvateyaH|  aCmantaka indrakaH|  sa eva mAluparNaH|  kapotapaGkA brahmasuvarcalA|  kacchuraM tunikaM raGgadravyam|  gundhustRNaviCeSaH|  bhallUkaH sallako phalgurvRttako jambuko nataH|  CAkavRkSasya phalAni|  katakavRkSasya ca|  ebhiriti pASANabhedAdibhiH|  subodham|  

	siMhyAdInAM kalko~amlena dadhnA pItaH saptAhamaCmarIM hanti|  siMhI kaNTakArikA|  vyAghrI nidigdhikA|  ikSuraka ikSuviCeSaH|  UrUbUka eraNDaH|  CigrukalkAdibhiCca siddho yUSo~aCmarIM bhinattIti sambandhaH|| 7||

CmarIM bhinatti||8||  pUrvavacca kaSAyAdInebhiH kalpayet||8||

vIratarAdigaNagundrAdInAM kvAthe trapusabIjAdipratIvApaM ghRtam|  gundretkaTe vIratarAditvena datte api punardIyate|  gundrA gucchapuSpikA nAma|  itkaTaH CaraviCeSaH prasiddhaH|  pattUro matsyAkSakaH|  matsyAkSakastu pattUro pattunaH priya ityapi|  vArAhI gRSTiH|  viSvaksenA kArA|  vArAhI gRSTikAkArA|  ebhiriti vIratarAdibhiH kaCAyAdIn kalpayet|  pUrvavaditi vAtACmarIvat|  pittACmaryAmapi|| 8||

tacCidraM markoTakairdaMCayet||31||  lagneSu ca Cirassu kAyamapana
yet||31||  tato madhuGRtAphyAmaphyajyAntrANi yathAsthAnaM sthApa
yitvA phAhyaM vraNamudarasya sIvyet||31||  yaSTImadhukamiCrayA ca 
kRSNamRdA vraNamaphilipya phadhnIyAt||31||  atha nivAtamAgaraM
praveCya kSIravRttiM snehadroNyAM vAsayet||31||

evamityuktakriyayA siddhau triSu bhaddhAdyudareSu pRthagvidhakriyopayogAya CastramavacArayet AturasuhRtprakACanamaCmarIvat|  nAbhedadho~adharabhAge nAbhitaCcatvAryaGgulAni parityajya caturaGgulamAtraM pATayet|  tena cAntrANi tathA parIkSYANi yathA sanniveCaM na tyajanti|  gudabhandhahetumAntrasya pratirodhakaM bhAlAdikamapaharet|  parisrAsaviNIti Cidrodare|  tacCidraM markoTairvaidyo daMCayet|  subhodham|  kSIreNaiva vRttiryasya tam|| 31||

cikitsAsthAnam

Cvayathucikitsitam

 athAtaH CvayathucikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

kramaprAptasya CvayathoCcikitsitaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 CvayathuSu doSajeCu sarveSu sarvasareSvAmAnubaddheCu laGghana
pAcanaCodhanAnyAdau yojayet||2||  snehajeSu virUkSNAnyauCa
dhAni virUkSaNottheSu snehanAni||2||

CvayathuSu doSajeSviti nijeCu sarvasareSviti dehavyApiSu|  subodham|| 2||

 tatrAmajeCu laGghitavato laghvannamaCitasya bhadradArunAgara
maricaprativiSAviDaGgendrayavAnuSNAmbunA||3||  nAgaradevadArupa
thyAvarSAbhvo vA||3||  paJca kolakAjAjInidigdhikAmustapA
ThArajanIrvA||3||  mUtravarti vA navAyasaM vA||3||

bhadradArvAdinuSNAmbunA|  tenaiva nAgarAdIni vA paJcakolAdIni vA|  mUtravartirudaroktA|  navAyasacUrNastriphalAdiH pANDurogoktaH|| 3||

 gurubhinnapurISastu takraM savyoSasauvarcalakSaudram||4||  guDaharI

takIM vA CIlayet||4||

CIlayediti cirakAlamabhyaset|| 4||

 itarastrivRtyUSaNakaTurohiNyayaCcUrNAni triphalAkvAthena||5||  vyoSayavakSArAyorajAMsi vA||5||  bibhItakakalkaM vA taNDu
lAmbunA||5||  gugguluM vA gomUtreNa||5||  harItakIM vA||5||  tulyaguDAM
vA CuNThIM punarnavakaSAyAnupAnAm||5||  ArdrakaM vA tulyaguDa
mardhapalAbhivRddhaM paJcapalaprakarSaM prayuJjIta||5||  mAsamayaM prayogaH
CophaCoSArSaH CvAsakAsaprasekapInasAlasakAgnisAdagu
lmodarapramehapANDukAmilAmanovikArAnapaharati||5||  Ardraka
rasaM vA CAlikSIrAhAraH pibet||5||

itara iti laghubaddhapurISaH trivRdAdIni triphalAkvAthena|  vyoSAdIni vA|  vibhItakakalkaM taNDulAmbunA|  gugguluM gomUtreNa harItakIM vA|  punarnavakaSAyamanupAnaM yasyAstulyaguDAyAH CuNThyAstAm|  ayamiti miCrayorardhapalAbhivRddhyA paJcapalaprakarSe mAsaM prayogaH|  paJcapalAni saguDasya sataH|  manovikArA ye kecana santarpaNotthA manovahastoroduSTiprabhavAH|  subodham|| 5||

 nivRttAmadoSaH CRtAni payAMsi sarpISi ca||6||  trikaTukai raNDaCyAmAmUlaiH siddhaM kSIram||6||  mahauSadhamuruGgImUlAbhyAM
vA||6||  varSAbhUmayUrakapaJcakolairvA||6||  kumbhanikumbhavyoSA
gnikairvA||6||  karabhIkSIravRttirvA syAt||6||  gomUtraM mahiSImUtraM
vA sakSIraM kSIrACanaH pibet||6||

ebhistIkSNairnivRttAmadoSaH CRtAnItyauSadhaiH payAMsi sarpISi ca pibediti sambandhaH|  trikaTukamahauSadhavarSAbhUkumbhAdIni catvAri kSIrANi|  CyAvamUlaM trivRnmUlam|  mahauSadhaM CuNThI|  muruGgImUlaM mUrvAmUlam|  varSAbhU punarnavA|  mayUramapAmArgaH|  kumbhanikumbhau dantIdravAntyau|  agnikaCcitrakaH|  subodham|| 6||

 dADimayavAnIyavAnakadhanikApAThAmlavetasamaricapaJcakola
bilvaphalayAvaCUkAnakSamAtrAn salilADhake vipAcya
tatkaSAyeNa ghRtaprasthaM sAdhayecchophArCogulmamehAgnisAda
haram||7||  arCovihitavidhinA citrakadadhno navanItamAdadIta||7||  taccitrakamUlagarbhaM sacitrakakalkatakrasiddhaM samAnaM pUrveNa||7||

yathAdoSocchrAyaM ca dhAnvantaraM kalyANakaM paJcagavyaM tiktaM mahAtiktamudaroktAni vA tilvakacaturthAni ghRtAni pAyayet|

	dADimAdyamapi ghRtaM subodham|  citrakacUrNena saha jAtAddadhno mathitAdyannavanItaM taccitrakamUlacUrNagarbhaM citrakakalkasahoSitena takreNa saha siddhaM pUrveNa dADimAdinA samAnam|

	yathAdoSocchrAyamityucchritadoSAnuguNyena dhAnvantarAdInAmanyatamaM ghRtaM pAyayet|  dhAnvantaraM pramehoktam|  kalyANakamunmAdoktam|  paJcagavyamapasmAroktam|  tiktamahAtikte kuSThe|| 7||

 daCamUlakvAthakaMse pathyACataM guDatulonmiCramadhiCrayet||8||  lehIbhUte tatra trikaTukatrijAtakayavakSAracUrNaM prakSipetkSo
drArdhaprasthaM ca||8||  etA daCamUlaharItakyo~atipravRddhamapi
CvayathumudarArocakAvipAkapANDurogagulmamehaCvAsakAsa
kArCyAmavAtAmlapittamUtraCukradoSAMCca nighnanti||8||

dACamUlike daCamUlapalAni dvAtriMCattataH SoDaCaguNaM jalaM sadvAdaCAni paJcapalaCatAni catvAri kaMsAni bhavanti|  kvathitaCeSaH kaMsamaSTAviMCadadhikaM palaCatam|  daCamUlena saha harItakInAM kvAthanamanasthInAM ca punarguDena saha kaSAye prakSepaH|  AgastyavadavicchinnapAramparyeNa lehIbhUte trikaTukAdicUrNaM tathA kSipedyathA lehatA na  naCyati|| 8||

 CaThIpuSkaramUlakAravIcitrakAjAjIjIvantIbilvamadhya
yavakSAravRkSAmlairdaCamUlena ca parigRhItAni ghRtatailabhRSTani
peyAdInyannAnyalpasnehalavaNAnyupakalpayet||9||

CaThyAdibhiH kvAthAdiprayuktaiH parigRhItani saMskAreNAtmIkRtani ghRtena tailena va bhRSTAnyalpasnehAdIni peyAyUSAdInyannAni kalpayet|| 9||

 sparCasukhAMCcAbhyaGgapradehasekAn||10||  CaileyasthauNeyakaCrIveSTa
kAgarudevadAruhareNukAkuSThadhyAmakapadmakamAMsImAgadhikAVva
nyadhAnyatAlIsapatrakacaturjAtakapalACAmbudAmbupriyaGgu
spRkkAnakhaiH ClakSNapiSTaistailamabhyaGgaM pacet||10||  taiCca pradehaM
kuryAt||10||  sarSapasauvarcalasaindhavaCArGgASThAbhiCca||10||  keva
lairvAkSamajjAbhiH||10||  viCeSataCcaikAGgajeSupunarnavahiMsrAkoCAtakIkaravIra
kiMCukAtiviSArdhivRddhimUCikaparNIhastikarNanalikAnA
kulAsthUlakAkAdanIsAlatriphalAdevadArulodhratAlaparNI
daCapatrikAjayantIbhiH pralepaH||10||  mUlakatoyena kavoSNena vRkSakArkanaktamAlanimba
varSAbhUkvAthena vA snAnam||10||

sparCasukhAMCcAbhyaGgAdIn CaileyakAdibhistailamabhyaGgArthaM pacet|  taireva ca jalipiSTaiH pradehaM kuryAt|  CaileyaM CilApuSpam|  (ni) sthauNeyaM CukabarhAkhyaM kanIyaM tailapItakam|  CrIveSTako vAyasiko dadhiCyAvaCca CabditaH||  dhyAmakaM romikam|  ambudaM mustam|  ambu vAlakam|  (ni) 'areNukA rAjaputrI carmANi kapilA dvijA|  kapilolA pANDupatrI smRta kauntI hareNukA|  spRhAspRgbrAhmaNI devIM mAlAlAkAyikAguruH||"  sarSapAdibhirapi tailaprabhedaCca|

	viCeSata ityanenaitat pradarCyate|  yathA-sarvAGgajavihitamapyekAGgaje Cvayathau yadyapi hitaM tathApi punarnavAdikaM viCeSeNa|  hiMsrA mAMsI|  (ni) 'dhAmArgavaH koCaphalA rAjakoCAtakI tathA|  kaTukoCAtakI jJeyA jAlinI kRtavedhanam||"  kiMCukaH palACavRkSaH|  RddhiH pItapuSpA|  lohitapuSpA prasiddhA|  vRddhirlakSmIH|  mUSikaparNI vRSakarNI|  hastikarNaH raktairaNDaH|  (ni) 'nalikA vidrumalatA kapotacaraNA nalI|" nAkulI sarpasugandhA|  sthUlakAkAdanI sthUlakAkanAsAkhyA|  guJjAbhihitA|  tAlaparNI tAlI|  daCapatrikA viCAlA|  (ni) 'jayantyAvartikApatrA jayanAmAsurAjitA|'

	mUlakakvathitoSNodakena snAnam|  vRkSakAdikvathitena vA|  vRkSakaH kuTajaH|  naktamAla AragvadhaH|  iti samAnyena Cvayathau||10||

cikitsAsthAnam

visarpacikitsitam

 athAtaH visarpacikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharCayaH||1||

kramaprAptasya visarpasya cikitsaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 purvarUpeSveva sarvavisarpANAM laGghanaM rUkSaNaM sirAmokSaNa
mullekhanaM virecanaJca kuryAt||2||  na tu kadAcidapi snehanam||2||

visarpANAmACu bAdhAvahatvAt pUrvarUpadarCana eva laGghanAdikaM kuryAt|  rUkSaM yatkiJcit|  ullekhanaM vamanam|| 2||

 nirAmeSu kSINakapheSu ca CItavIryANi sarpISi tikta
katrAyamANAghRtAdIni pAne dadyAt||3||  tatra madanendrayavapaTola
picumandamadhukekSurasAn vamane~avacArayet||3||  drAkSAtrivRttri
phalAtrAyamANA virecane||3||  mustadevadArukuSThaCatAhvAvArAhIdhAnyAkakRSNagandhAvaM
CArtagalAn lepasekeSvanilaje hrasvavaDhravallIkaNTaka
paJcamUlAni ca||3||  nirAme kSINakaphe ca tiktakAdIni CItavIryANi ghRtAni
kvAthAdinA dadyAt||3||  visarpe ca yadA vamanaM tadA madanA
dibhireva||3||  virecanaM drAkSAdibhiH||3||

mustAdIni lepe seke ca|  (ni) 'gRSTirviSvaksenakAntA vArAhI varamAlikA|'  kRSNagandhA CobhAJjanaH|  ArtagalaH sahacaro nIlaH|  hintAla iti kecit|  anilaje hrasvapaJcamUlam|  vaDhrapaJcamUlaM kaNTakapaJcamUlaM ca lepasekeCu|  caCabdo~anile mustAdisamuccayAya||3||

 pitte tu kamalotpalaCaivAlapaGkadUrvAmRNAlaCRGgATaka
kaCerukaCarkarAhrIberakucandanamuktAmaNigairikapayasyA
prapauNDarIkamadhupadmaghRtakSIrANi nyagodhAdi ca||4||

pitte kamalAdi nyagrodhAdi ca lepasekeSu|  paGkakardamaH prasiddhaH|  amRNAlamuCIraM mRNAlaM visAGkuraM vA|  hrIberaM vAlakam|  payasyA kSIrikA|| 4||

 CleSmaNyajagandhACvagandhAsaralakAlaikaiSikAgarucoca
rAsnAvacACItaCivendravallIgomUtrANi varaNAdi ca||5||

CleSmaNi visarpe ajagandhAdIni varaNAdigaNaM ca|  saralaM devadArusamaM pIDAkhyam|  kAlA maJjiSThA|  ekaiSikA mAMsI|  CItaCivo misiH|  indravallI CAkaviCeSaH|| 5||

 saMsarge yathAdoSabalaM vikalpayet||6||

etadeva pRthagdoSacikitsitaM doSabalAnuguNyena vikalpayet|  saMsargo yatra doSayormiCrIbhAvamAtram|  na tvagnivisarpAdiprAdurbhAvaH yasmAd dvandvajeSviti punarvakSyati|  tatrAgnivisarpAdayo~abhimatAH|  anyathA viCeSeNetyAdinA nirdhAraNaM na yujyate|| 6||

 tatra kaphasthAnACrite sAme pittasthAnagate ca rakSA viCItAH
pralepapariSekAH||7||  pitte tanavaH suCItAH saghRtA vastrAntaritAH kSaNe kSaNe
cApanIyAnye prayojyAH||7||

tatra kaphasthAnACrite sAme visarpe pittasthAnagate vA sAme visarpe rUkSA viCItACca pralepAdyA hitAH|  viCItA iti sparCe~ambuvat CItAnAM pratiSedhaH|  uSNapratiSedho visarpatvAdeva|  tenAnuSNACItatvamabhimatam|

	pitte~adhike yadA lepAdayo yujyante tadA tanava ityAdikAH| vastrAntaritA ilyaGge vastraM datvA vastrAntarito lepaH CIto laghuCca|  USmANaJca na nigRhNAtItyavagantavyam|  anye prayojyAH pUrvadattAMstyaktvA|| 7||

 dvandvajeSu yathAyathaM doSAMCcikitset||8||  viCeSeNAgnivisarpe
mahAtiktakaM pibet||8||  granthivisarpe raktapittasaMsargamavekSya
prAghlaGghanAdIni virecanAntAni CamanAni ca yojayet||8||  tato vAtaCleSmaharaM karma||8||

dvandvajeSu doSAnuguNyena cikitset|  subodham|  granthivisarpe prAglaGghanAdIni visarpapUrvarUpoktAni yojayet|  teCu yojiteSu vAtaCleSmaghnaM karma|| 8||

 CUle ca tadA snigdhAmloSNAbhirutkArikAbhirgranthInAmupa
nAhanam||9||  vAtakaphavisarpoktaiCca lepastaireva vA siddhena
tailena toyena vA pariSekaH||9||  limpedvA CuSkamUlakasya

CUle granthInAmutkArikAbandhaH|  utkArikA piSTapiNDI|  upanAho bandhaH|  tairiti vAtaCleSmoktaiH|  subodham|  vijayAdInAM vA kalkena|  vijayA harItakI|| 9||

 dantIcitrakamUlatvakkAsIsArkasnuhIkSIrabhallAtakAsthi

cikitsAsthAnam

visarpacikitsitam

 athAtaH visarpacikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharCayaH||1||

kramaprAptasya visarpasya cikitsaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 purvarUpeSveva sarvavisarpANAM laGghanaM rUkSaNaM sirAmokSaNa
mullekhanaM virecanaJca kuryAt||2||  na tu kadAcidapi snehanam||2||

visarpANAmACu bAdhAvahatvAt pUrvarUpadarCana eva laGghanAdikaM kuryAt|  rUkSaM yatkiJcit|  ullekhanaM vamanam|| 2||

 nirAmeSu kSINakapheSu ca CItavIryANi sarpISi tikta
katrAyamANAghRtAdIni pAne dadyAt||3||  tatra madanendrayavapaTola
picumandamadhukekSurasAn vamane~avacArayet||3||  drAkSAtrivRttri
phalAtrAyamANA virecane||3||  mustadevadArukuSThaCatAhvAvArAhIdhAnyAkakRSNagandhAvaM
CArtagalAn lepasekeSvanilaje hrasvavaDhravallIkaNTaka
paJcamUlAni ca||3||  nirAme kSINakaphe ca tiktakAdIni CItavIryANi ghRtAni
kvAthAdinA dadyAt||3||  visarpe ca yadA vamanaM tadA madanA
dibhireva||3||  virecanaM drAkSAdibhiH||3||

mustAdIni lepe seke ca|  (ni) 'gRSTirviSvaksenakAntA vArAhI varamAlikA|'  kRSNagandhA CobhAJjanaH|  ArtagalaH sahacaro nIlaH|  hintAla iti kecit|  anilaje hrasvapaJcamUlam|  vaDhrapaJcamUlaM kaNTakapaJcamUlaM ca lepasekeCu|  caCabdo~anile mustAdisamuccayAya||3||

 pitte tu kamalotpalaCaivAlapaGkadUrvAmRNAlaCRGgATaka
kaCerukaCarkarAhrIberakucandanamuktAmaNigairikapayasyA
prapauNDarIkamadhupadmaghRtakSIrANi nyagodhAdi ca||4||

pitte kamalAdi nyagrodhAdi ca lepasekeSu|  paGkakardamaH prasiddhaH|  amRNAlamuCIraM mRNAlaM visAGkuraM vA|  hrIberaM vAlakam|  payasyA kSIrikA|| 4||

 CleSmaNyajagandhACvagandhAsaralakAlaikaiSikAgarucoca
rAsnAvacACItaCivendravallIgomUtrANi varaNAdi ca||5||

CleSmaNi visarpe ajagandhAdIni varaNAdigaNaM ca|  saralaM devadArusamaM pIDAkhyam|  kAlA maJjiSThA|  ekaiSikA mAMsI|  CItaCivo misiH|  indravallI CAkaviCeSaH|| 5||

 saMsarge yathAdoSabalaM vikalpayet||6||

etadeva pRthagdoSacikitsitaM doSabalAnuguNyena vikalpayet|  saMsargo yatra doSayormiCrIbhAvamAtram|  na tvagnivisarpAdiprAdurbhAvaH yasmAd dvandvajeSviti punarvakSyati|  tatrAgnivisarpAdayo~abhimatAH|  anyathA viCeSeNetyAdinA nirdhAraNaM na yujyate|| 6||

 tatra kaphasthAnACrite sAme pittasthAnagate ca rakSA viCItAH
pralepapariSekAH||7||  pitte tanavaH suCItAH saghRtA vastrAntaritAH kSaNe kSaNe
cApanIyAnye prayojyAH||7||

tatra kaphasthAnACrite sAme visarpe pittasthAnagate vA sAme visarpe rUkSA viCItACca pralepAdyA hitAH|  viCItA iti sparCe~ambuvat CItAnAM pratiSedhaH|  uSNapratiSedho visarpatvAdeva|  tenAnuSNACItatvamabhimatam|

	pitte~adhike yadA lepAdayo yujyante tadA tanava ityAdikAH| vastrAntaritA ilyaGge vastraM datvA vastrAntarito lepaH CIto laghuCca|  USmANaJca na nigRhNAtItyavagantavyam|  anye prayojyAH pUrvadattAMstyaktvA|| 7||

 dvandvajeSu yathAyathaM doSAMCcikitset||8||  viCeSeNAgnivisarpe
mahAtiktakaM pibet||8||  granthivisarpe raktapittasaMsargamavekSya
prAghlaGghanAdIni virecanAntAni CamanAni ca yojayet||8||  tato vAtaCleSmaharaM karma||8||

dvandvajeSu doSAnuguNyena cikitset|  subodham|  granthivisarpe prAglaGghanAdIni visarpapUrvarUpoktAni yojayet|  teCu yojiteSu vAtaCleSmaghnaM karma|| 8||

 CUle ca tadA snigdhAmloSNAbhirutkArikAbhirgranthInAmupa

 athAtaH kuSThacikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

saptacchadAdInAmauSadhAnAmekatriMCataM garbhaM snehAccaturthAMCena|  snehAdeva dviguNamAmalakarasam|  ghRtaM mahAtiktakaM nAmnA tiktAdadhikaguNam|  saptacchado gucchapuSpaH prasiddhaH|  pippalIdvayaM pippalI hastipippalI ca|  rajInadvayaM piNDaharidrA dArvI ca|  dve sArive vallIsArivA kASThasArivA ca|  viCAlA gavAkSI|  kuTajabIjamindrayavam|  bhUnimbaM kirAtatiktakam|  guggulunA nimbAdibhiCca yatsaMsAdhyate tat guggulupaJcatiktakaM vAtavyAdhau vakSyate||6||

 kaphottare sAlapriyAlaCamyAkAriSTasaptaparNacitraka
maricavacAkuSThaiH sAdhitam||2||  athavA bRhatIdvayakAka
mAcICukanAsAkvAthe maricaviDaGgaCigrujAtIdevadAru
kSavakaharidrAbhayAkalkena vAjimUtreNa ca siddhaM sarpiH||2||

kaphottare ca sAlAdibhiH sAdhitaM ghRtaM snehanAya Casyate|  athavA bRhatyAdikvAthe na snehasamenACvamUtreNa ca snehasamena sAdhyate maricAdigarbham|  bRhatIdvayaM sthUlA sUkSmA ca|  CukanAsA tu haritA saralasnehadArujam|  jAtipuSpamudvegajananam|  maricaM tIkSNam|  kSavakaH kSudvibodhanam|| 7||

 sarveSu ca bhallAtakatuvarakasiddhArthakAnyatamatailam||8||  bhallAtakapathyAkRmighnasiddhaM vA haviH||8||

 tataH snigdhasya yathAdoSaM yathAsannaM ca saMCodhanAni prayu
JjIta||9||  sirAM ca balApekSI vidhyedekAM dve tisraCcatasraH 
paJca vA||9||  antarAntarA ca punaH punaH snehaM pibet||9||  durbalaM hi CUnyakoSThaM kuSThinaM vAyurabhibhavati||9||  vamane

 paTolaviCAlayormUlaM triphalA ca pRthak tribhAgona

 eDagajakuSThasaindhavasiddhArthaviDaGgakAJjikairliptam||68||  kRmipAmAsidhmadadrumaNDalakuSThaM CamaM yAti||68||

eDagajAdibhirliptaM kRmyAdikaM CamaM yAti|| 68||

 lAkSAvyoSaM prapunnATaJca bIjaM CrIveSTAH kuSThasiddhArthakACca||69||  takronmiCraH syAddharidrA ca lepodadruSUkto mUlakotthaJca bIjam||69||

lAkSAdibhirharidrAntairdadruSu takronmiCro lepaH syAt|  mUlakotthaM ca bIjaM kevalaM dadruSu lepe uktam|  prapunnATabIjaM cakramardaH|  CrIveSTako vAyasako dadhiCyAvaCca CabditaH|| 69||

 dUrvAbhayAsaindhavacakramardakuTherakAH kAJjikatakrapiSTAH||70||  tribhiH pralepairapi baddhamUlAM dadruJca kaNDUJca vinACayanti||70||

dUrvAdayaH kAJjikatakrapiSTAstribhirlepaiH baddhamUlAmapi dadruM kaNDUM ca nACayati|| 70||

cikitsAsthAnam

CvitrakRumicikitsitam

 athAtaH CvitrakRmicikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

kramaprAptasya Cvitrasya kRmINAJca krameNa cikitsitaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 kuSThAdapi bIbhatsaM yacchIghrataraJca yAtyasAdhyatvam||2||  CvitramatastacchAntyai yateta dIpte yathA bhavane||2||

Cvitre CIghrameva CAntyarthaM yateta dIptagRhavat|  yataH CvitraM kuSThAdapi bIbhatsaM jugupsitam|| 2||

 madayantyAH savAyasyAH surabhyAragvadhasya ca||3||  CataM palAnAM pratyekaM varAyAstvADhakatrayam||3||  vyAghrIvahnikapotAvatsakakhadirArkamUladantyaindrya||3||  saniCAdvayA daCapalA kvAthe~amISAM kSipetpiSTvA||3||  bIjaM karaJjeGgudaCigrunimbA-
nnIlIM sanIlotpalacandralekhAm||3||  CyAmAM kirAtaM kaTukatrayaM ca 
paJcADhakaM tatra ca paJcagavyAt||3||  CamayatyacireNa ghRtaM mRduhutavahasAdhitaM mahAnIlam||3||  na kilAsameva kevalamapacIkRmikAsakuSThamabhyastam||3||  unmAdApasmArAvarCovidradhiCirorogAn||3||  savisarpaCoSapavanavyAdhInviSamajvarAnhanyAt||3||

madayantyAdinA snehanArthaM ghRtamucyate|  madayantI dhAtakI|  vAyasI kAkanAsA|  surabhirgandhasurA|  AragvadhaH CamyAkaH|  vyAghrI nidigdhikA|  vahniCcitrakaH|  kapotA kAkamAcI|  aindrI indravAruNI|  karaJjAdinAM caturNAM bIjam|  CyAmA trivRt|  

	paJcagavyAni gomayasvarasaH mUtraM kSIraM dadhi ghRtamityetAni|  etanmahAnIlaM nAma ghRtaM mRdunA hutavihenA~agninA sAdhitamacireNa kilAsaM Cvitrameva na Camayati; api tvapacyAdikamapi CIghraM Camayati|| 3||

 saMCodhanaM viCeSAt pItasnehasya yojayadenu ca||4||  CvitraM sraMsanamagryaM malayUrasa iSyate saguDaH||4||  taM pItvA~abhyaktatanuryathAbalaM sUryapAdasantApam||4||  seveta viriktaCca tryahaM tryahaM pipAsuH pibetpeyAm||4||

anu cAnantaraM pItasnehasya saMCodhanameva viCiSyate viCiSTaM bhAvati nAnyat kiJcit|  tatrApi Cvitre~agryaM pradhAnaM sraMsanaM virecanamiSyate|  kimAha-saguDo malayUrasaH|  malayUH somarAjiH|  abhyakto ravikarasantApaM ca yathAbalaM niSevamANo~anena viriktastryahaM pipAsustRSNAvAn yadA bhavati tadA peyAM pibet|  evaM tryahaM virecanam|  tRSite peyA nAnyat kiJcit|| 4||

 Cvitre~aGge ye sphoTA jAyante kaNTakena tAn bhindyAt||5||  sphoTeSu nissRteSu prAtaH prAtaH pibet pakSam||5||  malayUmaCanaM priyaGguM CatapuSpAM cAmbhasA samutkvAthya||5||  pAlACaM vA kSAraM yathAbalaM phANitopetam||5||

Cvitre~aGge ye sphoTA jAyante uktena sraMsanavidhinA subodham|  pAlACaM kSAraM phANitena kSudraguDena yuktaM yathAbalamiti balApekSatvAdaniyatamAtramapi|| 5||

 vituSAvalgujabIjAccUrNaM govAribhAvitAdbahuCaH||6||  mUlakvAthena pibetkalitarukRtamAlamadanaphalgUnAm||6||  pIte kilAsI tilatailadigdho
dine dine syAdravipAdasevI||6||  jIrNe ca takrAplutakodravACI
sphoTodbhavAyaiSa vidhistrirAtram||6||

vituSetyAdinA sphoTodbhavAya vidhiH|  avalguja somarAjiH|  tadbIjaM bahukRtvA~anekavAraM gomUtreNa bhAvitaM kalitarvAdInAM mUlakvAthena vidhiH|  tasmiMCca pIte sati kilAsI CvitrI ravipAdasevI tilatailena digdha upaliptaH syAt|  kalitarurbibhItakaH|  kRtamAlo naktamAlaH|  madanaphalaM prasiddham|  phalguH kAkodumbarikA||6||

 viddhvA~anyedyuH sphoTakAn kaNTakaistAn
bastAmbhobhirghRSTayA CuktavarttyA||7||  limpet kAmaM lepanAdvedanAyAM
lepo yojyaH CaGkhanAbhirjalena||7||

anena sphoTakAnanyedyuH kaNTakairbhitvA bastAmbhobhiH chagalamUtrairghRSTayA CuktavartyA kAmaM bhRCaM limpet|  CuktavartirvyoSAdibhirvakSyamANA subodham|| 7||

 vyoSasarSapaniCAgRhadhUmaiH yavaCUkapaTucitrayuktaiH||8||  kolatulyagulikArdhaviSAMCA CvitrakuSThaCamano varalepaH||8||

vyoSAdInAM bhAgo viSasya cArdhabhAgayukto~anena badaratulyA gulikA kriyate|  eSA gulikA varalepaH CvitrANAM kuSThAnAM ca Camane|| 8||

 gavyaM mUtraM citrakavyoSayuktaM
sarpiH kumbhe saMsthitaM kSaudramiCram||9||  pakSAdUrdhvaM CvitriNA||9||  peyametat 
kAryaM cAsmai kuSThadRSTaM vidhAnam||9||

gavyamityAdi subodham|  asmai CvitriNe kuSThoktaM vidhAnaM kAryam|  kuSThaCvitrANAmekarUpatvAt|| 9||

 mArkavamathavA khAdedbhRSTaM tailena lohapAtrastham||10||  bIjakaCRtaM ca dugdhaM tadanu pibecchivatranACAya||10||

athavA mArkavaM bhRGgarajo lohapAtrasthaM tailena bhRSTaM khAdet|  paCcAcca bIjakaCRtaM dugdhaM CvitranACanaM pibet|  bIjakaH asanaH||10||

 pUtIkArkavyAdhighAtasnuhInAM
mUtraiH piSTAH pallavA jAtijACca||11||  ghnantyAlepAcchivatradurnAmadadrUn
pAmAkoThAn duSTanADIvraNAMCca||11||

pUtIkAdInAM jAtyantAnAM pallavA gavAdimUtraiH piSTA AlepAt CvitrAdIn ghnanti|  pUtIkaH karaJjaH|  vyAdhighAta AragvadhaH|  snuhI sudhA|| 11||

 dvaipyaM dagdhaM carma mAtaGgajaM vA||12||  Cvitre lepastailayukto variSThaH||12||  pUtIkITo rAjavRkSodbhavena
kSAreNAktaH Cvitrameko~api hanti||12||

dvIpinaH hastinaH vA carma dagdhaM tailena yuktam|  Cvitre lepo variSThaH CreSThaH|  pUtIkITaH karkaTIkAravallIvaddurgandhI kRmiviCeSaH prasiddhaH|  rAjavRkSa AragvadhaH|| 12||

 rAtrau gomUtre vAsitAn jarjarAGgA
nahnicchAyAM CoSayet sphoTahetUn||13||  evaM vArAMstrIn bhAvayecchlakSNapiSTaiH
snuhyAH kSIreNa CvitranACAya lepaH||13||  akSatailadrutAlepaH kRSNasarpodbhavA maSI||13||  CikhipittaM tathA dagdhaM hrIberaM vA tadAplutam||13||

rAtrAvityAdi subodham|  sphoTaheturbhallAtakaH|  tathetyakSatailadrutam|  akSaM vibhItakam|  tadAplutaM CikhipittAplutam|  hrIberaM vAlakam|  CikhI mayUraH|| 13||

 upoSitAyAnnakAlAMstrIn CvetakRkavAkave||14||  yaSTyAhvakuSThaiDagajabIjacUrNaM ghRtAnvitam||14||  dadyAttasya purISeNa CvitramuddAlya lepayet||14||  mAsaM hantyACu tacchritraM viCeSAdguhyasaMCrayam||14||

upoSitatyAdi|  CvetakRkavakave CuklakukkuTAya trInannakAlAnupoSitAya sArdhadinaM yathaucityena vA trInannakAlAnanAhArabhayena yaSTyAhvAdicUrNaM bhojanAya dadyAt|  asya CvetakRkavAkoH purISeNa CastrAdinoddAlya CvitrI lepayet|  tadACu CvitraM hanti|  guhyasaMCrayaM meDhragataM viCeSAddhanti|| 14||

 lepaH paTuvellaCilA kAsIsaM rocanA kanakapuSpI||15||  gopittayuktamathavA capalAJjanayugmaloharajaH||15||

paTvAdibhirlepaH CvitraM hanti|  athavA capalAdikaM gopittayuktaM lepaH|  capalA pippalI|  aJjanayugmaM srotojaM sauvIraM ca|  loharajaH CastracUrNam|| 15||

 kAkodumbarikA vA sAvalgujacitrakA sagomUtrA||16||  kadalIkSArayutaM vA kharAsthi dagdhaM sagorudhiram||16||

athavA kAkodumbarikAlepaH|  kimbhUtA sAvalgujacitrakA sagomUtrA ca|  kAkodumbarikA phalguH|  avalgujaH somarAjiH|  athavA dagdhaM kharAsthilepaH|  kimbhUtaM kadalIkSARreNa yuktaM sagorudhiraJca||16||

 siddhArthakabRhatyau karaJjakoCAtakIphalaM guJjA||18||  CaukanAsA sagavAkSI svarNakSIrI nikumbhaCca||18||  lAGgalikI hayamArastilvakabhallAtakACvamUtrI ca||18||  mustAsnuhI sahiMsrA suvarNaCakalA phalopetA||18||  mUlakabIjaM vyoSaM pIluviDaGgAni karNikAraCca||18||  picumandajAtIkisalayabAkucikAtutthakuSThAni||18||  kaTurohiNImanohvAtriphalA ca sukalkitA gavAM mUtre||18||  gajahayakharamUtrANAM pAtratritayaM snugarkadugdhAbhyAm||18||  dvau kuDavAviha dadyAt sarSapatailAcca cAturthyAm||18||  darvIlepaM siddhA rasakriyA mUtrikA nAma||18||  CvitraM ghRSTaM liptaM trInAlepAMstayA na laGhghayati||18||  maCatilakacarmakIlagranthArbudasarvakuSThaghnI||18||

siddhArthaketyAdinA mUtrikA nAma rasakriyA|  bRhatyau sthUlA sUkSmA ca|  karaJjasya koCAtakyACca phalam|  koCAtakI kRtavedhanI|  guJjAraktikA kAkanandikA ca|  CukanAsA tuhinakA saralA snehadArukA|  nikumbho dantIphalAnyeva|  lAGgalikI viCalyA garbhapAtanI ca|  hayamAraH karavIraH|  tilvakaH paTTikAlodhraH|  aCvamUtrI sallakI|  snuhI sudhA|  hiMsrA mAMsI|  hareNukA reNupuSpaM suvarNaCakalA ca|  sA phalopetA phalayuktA|  karNikAra AragvadhaH|  bAkucikA somarAjiH|  siddhArthakAdInAM triphalAntAnAM sarveSAM gomUtreNa kalkIkaraNam|  dvau kuDavau snugarkadugdhAbhyAm|  sarSapatailAcca cAturthI palam|  darvIlepamiti kriyAviCeSaNam|  CvitraM ghRSTaM sat tayA rasakriyayA liptaM trInAlepAn na laGghayati trayANAmavacArataH CamaM yAtItyarthaH|  tilakAH kRSNatilatulyAni maNDalAni|  tAnyevonnatAni maCakAH|  carmakIlamarConidAna uktam|| 18||

 kuDavo~avalgujabIjAddharitAlacaturthabhAgasammiCraH||19||  mUtreNa gavAM piSTaH savarNakaraNaH paraM Cvitre||19||

 bhallAtakadvIpisudhArkamUla

 CuddhyA CoNitamokSairvirUkSaNairbhakSaNaiCca saktUnAm||22||  CvitraM kasyacideva praCAmyati kSINapApasya||22||

CuddhyAdibhiravaCyaM CvitraM praCAmyati|  kiM sarvasya, na; api tu kasyacideva kSINapApasya|  akSINapApasya na kathaJcidapi CamaM yAti|  iti CvitracikitsA|| 22||

 snigdhasvinne guDakSIramatsyAdyaiH kRmiNodare||23||  utkleCitakrimikaphe CarvarIM tAM sukhoSite||23||  surasAdigaNaM mUtre kvAthayitvA~ardhavAriNi||23||  taM kaSAyaM kaNAgAlAkRmijitkalkayojitam||23||  satailasvarjikAkSAraM yuJjyAdbastiM tato~ahani||23||

snigdha ityAdinA kRmicikitsA|  prathamameva snehasvedau|  taiH snigdhasvinna Ature|  krimayo vidyante yasminniti pAmAdipAThAnna|  tasmin guDAdibhirutkleCatau krimikaphau yasya|  tAM ca CarvarIM guDAdyupayogarAtriM sukhoSite sukhena supte|  dvitIye~ahanyardhodake gomUtre surasAdigaNaM kvAthayitvA taM kaSAyaM kaNAdikalkasaMyojitaM tailAdiyuktaM ca bastiM yuJjyAt|| 23||

 tasminneva nirUDhaM taM pAyayeta virecanam||24||  trivRtkalkaM phaNakaNAkaSAyAluDitaM tataH||24||  UrdhvAdhaH Codhite kuryAtpaJcakolayutaM kramam||24||

tatasstasminnevAhani yasmin bastiH prayuktastasmin nirUDhamAturaM virecanaM pAyayet|  kimityAha-trivRtkalkaM phalAdikaSAyAluDitam|  atra hi virecanaCabdena doSarecanAdvamanamapyucyate|  phalaM madanaphalam|  kaNA pippalI|  tata iti trivRtprayogAdvamanavirecanAbhyAM UrdhvAdhaH Codhite kramaM peyAdikaM paJcakolayuktaM kuryAt|| 24||

 kaTutiktakaSAyANAM kaSAyaiH pariSecanam||25||  kAle viDaGgatailena tatastamanuvAsayet||25||

kaTvAdirasAnAM ca dravyANAM kaSAyaiH kvAthaiH pariSecanaJca kuryAt|  tatastaM krimiNodaraM kAle yogye viDaGgatailenAnuvAsayet|| 25||

 CiroroganiSedhoktamAcarenmUrdhakeSvanu||26||  udriktatiktakaTukamalpasnehaJca bhojanam||26||

mUrdhageSu CirogateSu krimiSu CirorogapratiSedhAdhyAyoktaM hitam|  paCcAccodriktatiktakaTvAdibhirbhojanamAcaret svalpasneham|| 26||

 viDaGgakRSNAmaricapippalImUlaCigrubhiH||27||  pibetsasvarjikAkSArairyavAgUM takrasAdhitAm||27||  rasaM CirISakiNihIpAribhadrakakebukAt||27||  palACabIjapattUrapUtIkAdvA pRthak pibet||27||  sakSaudraM surasAdIn vA lihyAtkSaudrayutAn pRthak||27||

tathA takreNa sAdhitAM yavAgUM viDaGgAdicUrNena saha pibet|  athavA CirISAdeH pRthak pratyekasya rasaM pibet|  kiNihI apAmArgaH|  pAribhadrako mandAraH|  pattUro matsyAkSakaH|  pUtIkaH karaJjaH|  kimbhUtaM CirISAdirasamAha-sakSaudram|  athavA surasAdin surasAdigaNa eva paThitAn pRthak pratyekaM kSaudrayutAn lihyAt||27||

 CatakRtvo~aCvaviTcUrNaM viDaGgakvAthabhAvitam||28||  kRmimAnmadhunA lihyAt bhAvitaM vA varArasaiH||28||  CirogateSu krimiSu cUrNaM pradhamanaM ca tat||28||

tathACvapurISacUrNaM CatakRtvaH bahUn vArAn viDaGgakvAthena bhAvitaM krimimAn puruSo madhunA lihyAt|  athavA aCvaviTcUrNaM varArasaistriphalAkvathairbhAvitaM krimimAnmadhunA lihyAt|  tacca cUrNaM bhAvitACvaviCaH CirogateSu krimiSu nAsayA pradhamanaM yojyam|  subodham||28||

 AkhukarNIkisalayaiH supiSTaiH piSTamACritaiH||29||  paktvA pUpalikAM khAdeddhAnyAmlaM ca pibedanu||29||  sapaJcakolalavaNamasAndraM takrameva vA||29||  nIpamArkavanirguNDIpallaveSvapyayaM vidhiH||29||

piSTena CAlipiSTena miCritairAkhukarNyAH kisalayaiH supiSTaiH pUpalikAM paktvA khAdet|  anu dhAnyAmlaJca pibet|  kisalayamabhinavodbhinnaM pallavam|  kimbhUtaM dhAnyAmlamAha-sapaJcakolAdikam|  athavA asAndraM tanu svacchaM takrameva kevalamanu pibet|  ayaM ca vidhirAkhukarNIkisalayavat nIpAdipallaveSvapi pRthagvidheyaH|  nIpo dhUlIkadambaH|  mArkavo bhRGgarAjaH|  nirguNDI sinduvArakaH||29||

 viDaGgacUrNamiCrairvA piSTairbhakSyAn prakalpayet||30||  viDaGgataNDulairyuktamardhAMCairAtapi sthitam||30||  dinamAruSkaraM tailaM pAne bastau ca yojayet||30||  surAhvasaralasnehaM pRthagevaM ca kalpayet||30||

athavA piSTaiH CAlipiSTairviDaGgacUrNamiCrairnAnAvidhaM bhakSyaM kalpayet|  athavAruSkaraM bhallAtakajaM tailaM pAne bastau ca kalpayet|  kimbhUtamAha-tailasyArddhAMrCairviDaGgabIjairyuktaM sakalaM ca dinamAtape sthitam|  surAhvasya devadAruNaH saralasya pIDAkhyAyAH devadArusamAyAH sambandhI snehaH pRthagevamAruSkaratailavidhAnenArdhAMCaviDaGgacUrNayutaM sakalaM dinaM cAtapasthitaM pAne bastau ca kalpayet|| 30||

 athAtaH vAtavyAdhicikitsitaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

kramaprAptAnAM vAtavyAdhInAM cikitsitaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 sarveSu kevalAnilavikAreSvantarbahiH snehasvedau sAlva-

prINanAni cAnnAni||2||  taireva ca mAMsairmahAsnehasaMsRSTaistada-

kolakulatthAmarataruyavamisimASAtasIvacAkuSTham||2||  rAsnAtailaphalAni ca vAtajidutkArikAmloSNA||2||  viDAlanakuloSTrasRgAlAdicarmaphirphandhaH||2||  snigdhA bastayo
nAvanAni ca prayojyAni||2||  doSopakramaNIyaM cekSeta||2||

kevalenAnyadoSAsaMsRSTena vAtena ye vikArA vyAdhayaH teSAM sarveSvityAdinA cikitsocyate|  sAlvala iti padmakAdisvedanAma|  tenApanAhaH|  nivAtaM sthAnam|  prAvaraNAni ca nivAtAnIti sambhadhyate|  daCamUlAdikaM grAmyAnUpaudakaCiraHpiCitarasAnAM viCeSaNam|  mahA-sneha iti snehacatuSTayasyAKyA|  tena pragADhAstadbhUyiSThAH|  snigdhA iti prANisvabhAvAt|  CuNThIpippalIbhyAM tIkSNAH|  audakAnAmAnUpatve~api pRthakkaraNena teSAM pracurasevyatvaM dyotayati|  taireva mAMsairgramyAdirmahAsnehasaMsRSTaistadaktAnAM mahAsnehAbhyaktagAtrANAM vAtArtAnAM piNDAdisvedAH|

	api ceti padyasamuccayAya|  kolAdinotkArikA vidheyA|  utkArikA svinnapiNDI|  amaratarurdevadAruH|  misiH CatapuSpA|  tailaPalAni sarvANi yebhyastailamutpadyate|| 2||

 snigdhasvinnasya hi todabhedAyAmaCUlAdayo vAtavikAraH
CIghramupaCAmyanti||3||  snehaCca dhAtUn puSNAti balaM ca dehe
janayati||3||  tasmAt punaH punaH snehasvedau CIlayet||3||  tanmRdU
kRte ca koSThe nAvatiSThantyanilAmayAH||3||

punaH punaH snehasvedaCIlane snigdhasvinnetyAdinA heturucyate|  snehaCcetyAdinA snehasya viCeSaH| tAbhyAM snehasvedAbhyAM mRdUkRte koSThe anilAmayA vAtavyAdhayo dehe na tiSThanti koSThamUlatvAddoSaguNAnAmiti kevalA vAtavyAdhicikitsA|| 3||

 yati tu sadoSatvAnna nivartante tataH sarvaCarIrage~api vAyau
viCeSaH pakvACayACrite mRdusnehavirecanaM tilvakasarpiH
sAtalAGRtameraNDatailaM vA kSIreNa dadyAt||4||  evaM hi viCuddha-
srotaso~anAvRtaH pavano vicarannACu CAntimeti||4||  api
ca-

snigdhAmlalavaNoSNAdyairAhArairhi malaCcitaH||4||  sroto baddhvA~anilaM rundhyAttasmAttamanulomayet||4||

yadi punaranantaroktena karmaNA na nivartante vyAdhayaH sadoSatvAddoSAntarasaMsargAddhetostataH sarvaCarIragate~api doSAntarasaMsRSTe vAyau snehavirecanaM dadyAt|  pakvACayACrite viCeSeNa snehavirecanaM dadyAt|  tilvakasarpirAdInAM kSIreNa prayogo virecanAya|  evaM ca snehavirecanena viCuddhasrotasaH puMso~anAvRto vAyuCcaran CIGramevopaCAntimeti|  vAyoCca sadoSasya kopa uktaH|  

	api cetyAdinA yatra vAyoH kope nijaM kAraNaM nAsti kevalaM snigdhAdibhirAhAraiCcito malaH pittaCleSmAKyaH srotobhandhaM kRtvAnilaM vAtaM ruNaddhi|  tatrA~apyanulomanamucyate|| 4||

 atha durphale virecye nirUhaM pAcanIyadIpanIyadravyayukta-
mevaMvidhaM ca phojyam||5||  phojyayuktaM vA sraMsanamavacArayet||5||  viCuddhasya ca samiddhe~agnAvasakRt snehasvedau svAdvamla-
lavaNaM cAnnapAnam||5||  evamapyanivRttAvavapIDakasnehAn
bastikarma ca prayojayet||5||

atheti gadyArambhe CailI|  yo vAtAmayI durbhalaH krUrakoSThAditvAcca virecanaM nArhati tasmai pAcanIyadIpanIyadravyayuktaM nirUhaM bhojanaM na dadyAt|  athavA sraMsanaM virecanamAhAreNa yuktamavacArayet|  viCuddhasya doSApanayanena peyAdikrameNa cAgnau samiddhe asakRt snehasvedAvavacArayet|  svAdvAdikaM cAnnapAnam|  subhodham|  avapIDakasneha iti rogAnutpAdanIye yojanAdvayamuktam|  sarvavAtavikArANAM sAmAnyaM vidhAnametat viCeSaCruteHiti jejjaTaH|  ayaM hi vidhiH sarvavAtaCamanaH|| 5||

 AmACayagate kRtavamanasya SaDdharaNaM cUrNaM parataCca yathArhaM
snehAdIn||6||  nAphideCamACrite philvaCalATuphiH siddhAn matsyAn
aCeSakoSThACrite punararCograhaNIvihitamAmamalapAcanaM kSAro-

 hRdayasthe aMCumatyA CRtaM payaH||7||

aMCumatI sAlaparNI|| 7||

 CrotrAdigate CirAgate ca viCeSeNa snaihikaM nasyaM dhUmaM
CirobastimardanAlepAnAnyathAsvaJca srotasAM prINanam||9||

CrotrAdisrotogate tathordhvaCirogate ca snaihikaM sUtroktaM nasyaM dhUmaM ca viCeSeNa prayuJjIta|  srotasAM karNAdInAM prINanaM snehatarpaNam|  karNagate karNatarpaNam|  nAsAgate tu nAsAyAmityevamAdi yathAsvaCabdArthaH|| 8||

medaso~ativRddhyA kaPasya vAtivRddhyA yo mArgarodhaH srotaH pidhAnaM tato hetoranile kupite prathamaM snehanabhRMhaNaM na Castam|  tatrADhyavAtavidhAnaM kRtvA vAtaCoNitoktaM bheSajaM snehanaM raktaprasAdanaM ca kuryAt|| 17||

 gamphIre raktamAkrAntaM syAccedvAtena varjayet||18||

gambhIre vAtaCoNite vAtena yadi raktamAkrAntaM bhavati tadvAtaCoNitaM kevalavAtaM varjayet|| 18||

 raktapittAtivRddhyA tu pAkamACu nigacCati||19||  phinnaM sravati tadraktaM vidagdhaM pUyameva vA||19||  tayoCcikitsAM vraNavadphedaCodhanaropaNIm||19||  kuryAdupadravANAJca tasmAttasmAccikitsitAt||19||

yatra tu raktapittayorativRddhastayA CoNitamACu pAkaM gacCati|  tato yatnenAyatnena va tadvAtaCoNitaM bhinnaM vidagdhaM pAkAbhimuKaM raktaM sravati pUyameva vA sravati tayorvidagdharaktapUyayoH bhedAdibhirvraNavaccikitsAM kuryAt|  upadravANAM mohamUrcCAdInAM tattaccikitsitAccikitsitam kuryAt|| 19||

 prANAdikope yugapadyathoddiSTaM yathAmayam||20||  yathAsannaJca phaiSajyaM vikalpyaM syAdyathAphalam||20||

nidAnAnukrameNa prANAdInAm cikitsitamAha-yatra yugapatprANAdInAM kopastatra yathoddiSTamuddiCya vAtavyAdhicikitsAsannamiti prANAdInAmanyatamamAsannamanatikramya|  yasminneva gade ya eva prANAdInAmanyatama Asannastameva cikitsedityarthaH|  yathAbhalamityanyatamasya bhalinaH pUrvaM pratIkAraM kuryAditi|  evamatra bhaiSajyaM vikalpyam|| 20||

doSetyAdi|  doSadUSyabalakAlaprakRtikoSThAdivaCAdeSAM madanaphalAdInAmetat kalpanAnAM ca saMyogasaMskArAdikRtAn prAdhAnyam|  tenaitaduktaM bhavati-na hyeSAmekaviSayatvena prAdhAnyamapi tu viSayabhedena|  yataH kvacideva sA vilakSaNA doSANAM sAmagrI|  yasyAM madanameva kAryakarttRtvamAsAdayati, na tu tathA jImUtakAdIni|  anyasyAM jImUtaka eva, na tu madadanAdIni|  sarvatraivaM vAcyaM doSAdyapekSayeti|  api prAdhAnye etadvarjitAnAM tathA CaktyabhAvAnna prAdhAnyaM eSAM prAdhAnyamityuktaM na hyakalpanAnAM prayoga upapadyata iti|  yadyapi kalpanAnAmeva suprayoga ukto bhavati tathApi tAsAM pRthak prAdhAnyametadarthamucyate yadvAstavena rUpeNaiSAM prAdhAnyaM tanna kayApi vidhikalpanayA~apahurttu Cakyate|  anyAni hi dravyANi saMyogasaMskArAdibhiranyathAbhUtAni dRSTAni|  madanAdInAM punardoSAdyapekSayA prayuktAnAM na kathaJcidapi pradhAnatvahAniriti|| 3||

adhyAyakrameNa vamanaM pUrvamucyate|| 1||

kalpasthAnam

 atikSudhitenA~atimRdukoSThenA~alpaCleSmaNA durvamena hIna-
mAtramatimAtraM tIkSNamatiCItamajIrNe vA pItaM vamanamadho-
gacchati||2||  tatrepsitA~anavAptirdoSotkleCaCca||2||  taM punarACu
snehayitvA yaugakairmAtrAkAlAdyapekSaM vAmayet||2||  vyApa-tkarANi ca pUrvoktamatikramaM smaran pariharet||2||

atikSudhitatvAdiyuktena pItaM vamanamadho gacchati|  naiva vAmayatItyarthaH|  yenaiva vA hInamAtratvAdiyuktaM pItamadhogacchati|  tatrA~adhogate vamana Ipsitasya charditarogopaCamanasyA~anavAptirdoSotkleCaCca|  vyApatkarANi ca pariharet|| 2||

vyApat sAdhanaJca||3||  tata UrdhvamapyuttiSThati hRdyalehavaTaka-
varjyamauSadhaM na tRtIyamavacArayet||3||

vamanavirecanavyApatsiddhiH

ajIrNanastathA bahuCleSmaNo virecanamUrdhvaM vrajati|  mukhena gacchati|  atitIkSNamatyUSNamatilavaNamahadyamatiprabhUtaM ca pItamUrdhvaM gacchati|  tatra tasminnnUrdhvaM vrajati|  pUrvoditA vyApattathaiva siddhiH|  pUrvoditameva sAdhanam|  punaH snigdhasya pUrvasyA~atikramasya smarato vyApatkaraNaM pariharata auSadhayojanam|  tataH iti|  punaryukte virecanaM UrdhvamuttiSThati mukhena gacchati tRtIyaM virecanaM nA~avacArayet|  hRdyAdiguNamauSadhaM varjayitvA|  tathAvidhaM hi tRtIyamavacArayedityarthaH||3||

 krUrakoSThasyA~atitIkSNA~agneralpamalpavIryaM vA bheSajamUrdhvabhAgikamadhobhAgikaM vA bhaktavadupaiti pAkam||4||  tatra samudIrNA doSA yathAkAlamanirhniyamANA vibhramaM kurvanti||4||  taM snigdhakoSThamanalpamamandaM cauSadhaM pAyayet||4||

vamanavirecanavyApatsiddhiH

krUrakoSThatvAdiyuktasyA~alpaCaktirvA vamanaM virecanamapyakRtvaiveSTaM kAryaM bhaktavat pAkamupaiti|  pAkena cauSadhasya saJcitA  doSA anirhniyamANA vibhramaM kurvanti|  yasmAdapakvaM vamanaM doSAn pacyamAnaM virecanaM narharet, na tu tat pakvamiti|  taM pakvauSadhaM snigdhakoSThaM kRtvA bahutIkSNaM cauSadhaM pAyayet|| 4||

 kaSAyamalpamapratyagraM rUkSaM vA bheSajamasnigdhasvinnena vA
pItaM CItopacAreNa vA stabdhaM doSavigrathitamayogI bhavati||5||  tatra vamane bhUyo vAmayet||5||  virecane snigdhasvinnaM purarvireca-
yet||5||  utkliSTabhUridoSaM vA tRtIye~ahani||5||  ubhayoCca saMCo-
dhanayorlavaNatailAbhyaktaM piNDaprastarAbhyAM svedayet||5||

vamanavirecanavyApatsiddhiH

kaCAyAdiguNaM vA bheSajamasnigdhAdikena vA pItaM svayaM stabdhatvAt doSAvaSTabdhatvAccA~ayogAya sampadyate|  kaSAyaM kaSAyarasaprAyam|  apratyagramasampannam|  tatraivamayogIbhUte vamane punarvAmayet virecayet|  ubhayorapi vamanavirecanayorevamayogIbhUtayostailAbhyaktasya sUtroditAbhyAM piNDaprastarAbhyAM svedaM vidadhyAt|| 5||

 snigdhasvinnasya ca vamanamakRtvA virecanaM pItavataH sAma-
sya vA mRdu vA viriktasyAdhobhAge~atyarthagurustabdho-
daratA CUlovAtamUtrapurISasaGaCca bhavati||6||  tamapyayoginaM

dArupippalIsiddhena tailenAnuvAsya vAtaharaiCca snehairUpa-

snigdhasvinnasya vamanamakRtvaiva virecane upayukte sAme vopayukte mRdvauSadhe vopayukte tasya viriktasya sato~adhobhAge~atyarthaM gurutvAdikaM bhavati|  tasminnayogini samUtraistIkSNairA~a~asthApanAdikA cikitsA|  subodham|| 6||

 kapholbaNasyAtisnigdhasya gurukoSThasya mandAgnervA mRdu-

saCoSAnnAdimate vA CodhanArthaM CItaM rUkSaM vA dattaM bhRCamAdhmAnaM karoti|  tatra ca malasaGgAddhetorudare samunnaddhatAdikaM bhavati|  saCeSAnno~ajIrNI|  udAvartta arConidAna uktaH|  samunnAhaH sarvatobandhaH|  subodham|  nistoda iva nistodaH|  tathAvidhamudAvarttaharAdibhirupacaret|| 8||

 kSAmeNAlpabalena mRdukoSThAgninA rUkSeNA~asnigdhena vA||9||  svinnena sAmena vA balavadauSadhamupayuktaM sapittamanilaM

kSAmatvAdiyuktena yattIkSNAdiyuktamauSadhamupayuktaM tat sapittamanilaM pradUSya parikarttikAmApAdayati|  samantAcchedanamiva jaThare parikarttikA|  subodham|

 pItauSadhasya bheSajodgAracchardyAdInAM nigrahAdvAtAdayaH kupitA hRdayamupasRtya hRdgrahaM ghoramAvahanti||12||  tataH pradhAnamarmopatApAdvedanAbhiratyarthamA~a~aturaH pIDyate||12||  mohahidhmAkAsalAlApArCvaCUlayuto vepathumAn naSTasaMjJo dantAn kaTakaTAyatyuddRttAkSo jihvAM khAdati||12||  taM hRdayopasaraNamA~a~ahuH||12||  tasmai bhiSak CIghramamuhyannabhyaGgapUrvaM dhAnyasvedena parisvedya tIkSNamavapIDaM dadyAt||12||  yaSTImadhukamiCreNa taNDulAmbunA vamanam||12||  kaTubhirvA kaphottarAya||12||  tato doSaCeSaM

taditi dantyA dravantyACca mUlasya parigrahaH|  daCamUlasya kvAthena ca dantIdravantImUlakalkaM datvA yad ghRtaM siddhaM tadvisarpAdIn jayet|  alajI pramehoktA piTakA| kakSyAnAma granthiruttare vakSyate| anenaiva vidhinA tailaM pakvaM gulmAdIn jayet|  anenaiva vidhinA mahAsnehaH snehacatuSTayaM pakvaM CakRt saGgAdIn jayet|| 29||

 dantyA rase~ajaCRGgyACca guDakSaudraghRtAnvitaH||30||  lehaH siddho virekArthe dAhasantApamehanut||30||  vAtatarSe jvare paitte syAtsa evA~ajagandhayA||30||  dantIdravantyormUlAni paceddhAtrIrase tataH||30||  trInaMCAn phANitAddvau ca bhRSTastaile ghRte~athavA||30||  CyAmAdikalkayukto~ayaM lehaH siddhaM virecanam||30||  pathyAkSadaCamUlAnAM tadvallehAH pRthagrasaiH||30||

dantyA mUlasya parigrahaH|  dantICRGgayoH kvAthe guDAdikaM datvA lehaH siddho virekArthe dAhAdinucca bhavati|  sa eva dantIleho~ajagandhayA saMyukto vAtatarSe paitte ca jvare syAt siddha iti sambadhyate|  

	dhAtryA Amalakasya rase siddhayoryugapaddantIdravantIkUlayostrInaMCAn samAstrayo bhAgAH|  dbau bhAgau phANitasya|  kSudraguDasyetyekataH paJcakadoSAdyapekSayA tailena vA ghRtena vA bhRSTamubhayathA~api CyAmAdigaNakalkena saMyojya leho virecanaM siddham|  dhAtrIphalarasavacanenaiva prakAreNa pRthaggharItakyAdInAmapi rasairlehya bhavanti|| 30||

aCvArohakAdayaH kSIre siddhAH kSaudrAdiyuktAH CodhanakriyA~atiyoge bastayaH syuH|  nyagrodhAdyaiCcaturbhiH nyagrodhapippalasadAphalalodhraistenaiva vidhinA kSIrasAdhanena kSaudrAdiyogena cA~aparo bastiH CodhanA~atiyoge|  aCvAvaroho~aCvakarNo~aCvagandhA ca|  rAjakaCerUko mustakaH|| 16||

 bRhatIkSIrakAkolI pRCniparNI CatAvarI||17||  kACmaryabadarImUrvAstathoCIrapriyaGgavaH||17||  jIvAdAne CRtau kSIre dvau GRtAJjanasaMyutau||17||  phastI pradeyau phiSajA CItau samadhuCarkarau||17||  go~avyajAmahiSIkSIrairjIvanIyayutairapi||17||  CaCaiNadakSamArjAramahiSAvyajaCoNitaiH||17||  sadyaskairmRditairbastirjIvAdAne praCasyate||17||

jIvAdAne dbau bastI kSIre CRtau ghRtAJjanasaMyutau CItau mAkSikaCarkarAbhyAM yuktau deyau|  eko bRMhatyAdibhirdvitIyaH kACmaryAdibhiH|  go~avyajAdikSIrairjIvanIyagaNayuktairayamapi bastirjIvAdAne iti  yogApravRttajIvarakte|| 17||

 athemAn sukumArANAM nirUhAn snehAnAn mRdUn||18||  karmaNA viplutAnAM ca vakSyAmi prasRtaiH pRthak||18||  kSIrAd dvau prasRtau kAryau madhutailaghRtAt trayaH||18||  khajena mathito bastirvAtaghno balavarNakRt||18||

 paTolanimbapUtIkarAsnAsaptacchadA~ambhasaH||20||  prasRtaH pRthagAjyAcca bastiH sarSapakalkavAn||20||  sapaJcatikto~abhiSyandakRmikuSThapramehahA||20||

 tIkSNatvaM mUtrabilvAgnilavaNakSArasarSapaiH||26||  prAptakAlaM vidhAtavyaM kSIrAjyAdyaistu mArdavam||26||

tIkSNatvamityAdi|  prAptakAlaM taikSNyaM mRdormUtrAdibhirvidheyam|  tIkSNasya ca prAptakAlamupayojimArdavaM kSIrAdibhirmadhurairvidheyam|  na kevalaM caita eva bastayo yAvadidamapi boddhvyam|| 26||

 balakAladoSarogaprakRtIH pravibhajya yojito bastiH||27||  svaiH svairauSadhavargaiH svAn svAn rogAn nivarttayati||27||

prAtivyAdhi-doSAdibhide ya auSadhavargA uktAH tairvargerbalAdikaM pravibhajya buddhyA vikalpya bastiryojitaH svAn svAn yogyauSadhavargaviSayAn bastisAdhyAn rogAn nivarttayati|| 27||

 uSNArttAnAM CItAcchItArttAnAM tathA sukhoSNAMCca||28||  tadyogyauSadhayuktAn bastIn santarkya yuJjIta||28||

uSNenauCadhAdinA ArttAnAM CItAn bastInAturayogyauSadhayuktAt santarkya vikalpya yuJjIta|  CItArttAnAM ca tadvat sukhoSNAMstadyogyauSadhayuktAn yuJjIta|| 28||

 bastInna bRMhaNIyAn dadyAdvyAdhiSu viCodhanIyeSu||29||  medAsvino viCodhyA ye ca narAH kuSThamehArttAH||29||

siddhabastikalpaH

 athAtaH siddhabastikalpaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurA~a~atreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

siddhabastIn prAdhAnyAt pRthagdarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 madhutaile same  karSaH saindhavAd dvipicurmisaH||3||  eraNDamUlakvAthena nirUho mAdhutailikaH||3||  rasAyanaM pramehA~arCaH kRmigulmA~antravRddhinut||3||  sayaSTimadhukaCcaiSa cakSuSyo raktapittajit||3||

madhvityAdinA bastaya ucyante|  madhutaile same sUtroktaprakAreNa|  saindhavAt karSaH|  misiH CatapuSpA|  tasyA dvipicurdvikarSaH|  ityetaderaNDamUlakvAthena nirUhaH saMjJayA mAdhutailikaH|  subodham|  

	eSa evA~anantarokto mAdhutailiko madhuyaSTyA yuktaCcakSuSyo raktapittajicca bhavati || 3||

 yApano ghanakalkena madhutailarasAjyavAn||4||  pAyujAnUrUbRSaNabastimehanaCUlajit||4||  prasRtAMCairghRtakSaudravasA tailaiH prakalpayet||4||  yApanaM saindhavArdhAkSahapuSA~ardhapalAnvitam||4||

ghanasya mustasya kalkena yukto nirUho madhvAdibhiCca yApanA~a~akhyo bhavati|  sa tu pAyvAdiCUlajit|  dvitIyaM yApanaM ghRtAdibhiH|  pratyekaM prasrutAM~aCaiH|  saindhavasyA~ardhakarSeNa hapuSA~ardhapalenA~anvitaM prakalpayet|| 4||

 eraNDamUlaniSkvAtho madhutailaM sasaindhavam||5||  eSa yuktaratho bastiH savacApippalIphalaH||5||

ereNDetyAdinA vacAditrayayukto bastirnAmnA yuktarathaH|| 5||

 sakvAtho madhuSaDgranthA CatAhvA hiGgusaindhavaH||6||  suradAru ca rAsnA ca bastirdoSaharaH CivaH||6||

sakvAtha eraNDamUlakvAtho madhvAdiyukto bastiH|  CivaH CreSThaH SaDgranthA vacA|| 6||

 paJcamUlasya niSkvAthastailaM mAgadhikA madhu||7||  sasaindhavaH samadhukaH siddhabastiriti smRtaH||7||

siddhabastiriti nAmnA smRta ArcAryaiH paJcamUlAdiClokena||7||

 dvipaJcamUlatriphalAphalabilvAni pAcayet||8||  gomUtre tena piSTaiCca pAThAtoyadavatsakaiH||8||  saphalaiH kSaudratailAbhyAM kSAreNa lavaNena ca||8||  yukto bastiH kaphavyAdhipANDurogaviSUciSu||8||  CukrA~anilavibandheSu bastyATope ca pUjitaH||8||

dipaJcamUlAdIni gomUtre pAcayet|  tena pakvena bastiH|  piSTaiH pAThAdibhiryutaH kSaudrAdibhiCca|  kaphavyAdhyAdiSu pUjitaH|  dve paJcamUle prathame vilbAdirbRhatyAdiCca|  phalaM madanaphalam|| 8||

 mustApAThA~amRtairaNDabalArAsnApunarnavam||9||  maJjiSThA~a~aragvadhoCIratrAyamANA~akSarohiNIH||9||  kanIyaH paJcamUlaJca pAlikaM madanA~aSTakam||9||  jalADhake pacettacca pAdaCeSaM parisrutam||9||  kSIradviprasthasaMyuktaM kSIraCeSaM punaH pacet||9||  sapAdajAGgalarasaH sasarpirmadhusaindhavaH||9||  piSTairyaSTImisiCyAmAkaliGgakarasAJjanaiH||9||  bastiH sukhoSNo mAMsAgnibalaCukravivarddhanaH||9||  vAtA~asRGmohamehA~arCogulmaviNmUtrasaMgraham||9||  viSamajvaravIsarpavardhmA~a~adhmAnapravAhikAH||9||  vaGkSaNorUkaTIkukSimanyACrotraCirorujaH||9||  hanyAdasRgdaronmAdaCophakAsA~aCmakuNDalAn||9||  cakSuSyaH putrado rAjA yApanAnAM rasAyanam||9||

mustAdiko bastiH subodhaH|  saha pAdena caturbhAgena jAGgalarasena vartata iti tathoktaH |  eSa ca mustAdiH yApanAnAM rAjA tadguNe sA~atiCaya ityarthaH|  rasAyanaphalatvAd rasAyanam|| 9||

 pRthak palAMCaM vipacet paJcamUlamagokSuram||10||  kSIrADhake caturthasthaM piSTairyaSTyAdibhiryutam||10||  kSaudratailA~ajyasindhUtthayuktaM bastiH supUjitaH||10||  viCeSAd bAlavRddhastrIsukumArasukAtmanAm||10||  tadvat sahAcarabalAsArivAdarbhasAdhitam||10||  kSIraM bastisthA~abhIrU guDUcIbRhatIdvayaiH||10||  siddhaM payo mAgadhikAyaSTImadhukakalkavat||10||

agokSuraM paJcamUlaM catvAri dravyANi|  caturthasthaM pAdaCeSaM kvathitam|  eSa bastiH sarvahito~api bAlAdiSu viCeSAt pUjitaH|  agokSure gokSurarahitam|  yaSTyAdInyanantaraM bastipaThitAni|  yaSTimityAdIni|  sahAcarAdisiddhaM kSIram|  tadvaditi pUrvavat|  kalkAdiyuktaM tat pUrvasminneva viSaye|  abhIrvAdisiddhaM payo mAgadhikAdikalkavat tathA pUrvaguNa ityarthaH|| 10||

 paJcamUlaM bRhatyAdi pratidravyaM palonmitam||11||  dvipalaM CAligodhUmayavamASaM sayaSTikam||11||  taiH siddhaM chAgalaM kSIraM kukkuTANDarasaH sitA||11||  sA~a~ajyakSaudradvilavaNastairbastiH CukrakRt param||11||  kalpo~ayaM CikhigonardamatsyAdyaNDaraseSvapi||11||  rasaH kulIramAMsasya caTakA~aNDarasAnvitaH||11||  saCarkarAghRtamadhurbastrirvRSyatamo mataH||11||  bastasUkarajairmuSkaiH kulIracaTakA~a~amiSaiH||11||  siddhaM payobastaCukramuccaTekSurakaM madhu||11||  tairghRtADhyo~alpalavaNo bastirvRSyatamaH param||11||  siddhena payasA bhojyamAtmaguptoccaTekSuraiH||11||  ato daCadaCA~ahena yastu bastIn niSevate||11||  vAjIva puSTaH sa vRSo gacchati pramadACatam||11||  ete mAkSikasaMyuktAH kurvantyatiVvRSaM naram||11||  nA~atiyogaM na cA~ayogaM stambhinaste ca kurvate||11||

bRhatyAdipaJcamUlAdinA siddhaM chAgalaM kSIraM kukkuTANDarasAdinA yukto bastiH paraM CukrakRt|  asminneva ca bastau kukkuTarasa sthAne CikhyAdInAmanyatamasyA~aNDarasayogAttrayo bastayo bhaveyuH|  aNDeSu ca raso~antarbhavati|

	kulIramAMsasya rasaH caTakANDarasena yuktaH saCarkarAdiCca bastirvRSyatamaH|  kulIro matsyaH karkaTAkhyaH| 

	bastamuSkAdinA siddhaM payobastaCukrAdinA yuktaM ghRtADhyo~alpalavaNaCca bastirvRSyatamaH|  paramatyartham|  bastaH chagalaH|  muSko bRSaNaH| (ni) 'uccaTA somavallI ca pracalA taralA tathA|  mahauSadhI sarvagamA vRddhidA vardhitA purA||' ikSurakaM gokSurakaH|  eSu ca vRSyabastiSu dIyamAneSvAtmaguptAdibhiH siddhena payasA bhojyam|

	ato vRSyAdikAddaCAhena pratidisamekopayogena daCa bastIn yo niSevate sa vRSo~akSINaCukro vAjivacca puSTaH pramadACataM gacchati|  ete vRSyA bastayo mAkSikayuktA ativRSaM naraM kurvanti|

	ete cA~atiyogaM na kurvate|  AhitACca nA~ayogaM kurvate|| 11||

 nirUhA lekhanAH prAyo bRMhaNAH snehabastayaH||12||  yApaneSUbhayaM tasmAnneSTaM teSvanuvAsanam||12||

sarvabastiSu sAmAnyenA~antarA~antarA~anuvAsanamuktaM 'nirUhAnmaruto bhayam' ityAdinA|  tat pratiSedhArthamAha-nirUhA ityAdi|  ye nirUhAste prAyeNaikAntalekhanAH|  ye ca snehabastayaste prAyeNaikAntabRMhaNAH|  taccobhayamapi lekhanatvaM bRMhaNatvaM ca yato yApaneSvatasteSvanuvAsanaM neSyate kAraNA~abhAvAt|  tasminnirUhA apyete bRMhaNatvenA~anuvAsanaM nA~apekSata iti|| 12||

 mRdutvAnna nivarttante yasya tvete prayojitAH||13||  samUtrairbastibhistIkSNairA~a~asthApyaH kSiprameva saH||13||  Copha~agninACapANDutvaCUlA~arCaHparikarttikAH||13||  syurjvarACcA~atisArACca yApanAtyarthasevanAt||13||  ariSTakSAraCIdhvAdyaistatreSTA dIpanI kriyA||13||  yuktya tasmAnniSeveta yApanAnna prasaGgataH||13||

ete ca yApanAH svabhAvAdeva mRdutvAddhetoryadi kasyacinnapratyA~a~agacchanti tataH so~antarbastiH kSiprameva tIkSNairbastibhiH samUtrairA~a~asthApyaH|

	yApanAnAmatyarthasevanAcchophAdayaH syuH|  teSu ca CophAdiSvariSTAdibhirdIpanI kriyeSTA|  tasmAduktAddhetoryApanAn yuktyA sukhasaMvAhanalakSaNayA seveta|  na tvatiprasaGgataH|| 13||

 mRdvalpauSadhasaMyogAt pAdahInapramANataH||14||  alpakAlopayogAcca teSu niSparihAratA||14||  dravyeSu yApanIyeSu siddhAn snehAn pRthakpRthak||14||  bastIn sarveSu vA yuJjyAt parihAravivarjitAn||14||

teSu ca yApaneSvanena prakAreNa niSparihAratA sukhopAyogyatvaM bhavati|  kenetyA~a~aha-mRdvityAdi|  mRduno~alpamAnasya cauSadhasya saMyogAt|  tathA sUtre yatra-yatra yat pramANamuktaM tatra-tatra yApAnAnAM  pAdahInaM pramANam|  tato~alpaJca kAlamupayogAditi|

	athavA sarveSu viCeSeNa puruSeSu pRthag yApanIyadravyAsiddhAn snehAn niSparihArAn yuJjyAt|| 14||

kalpasthAnam

bastivyApatsiddhiH

 athAto bastivyApatsiddhiM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurA~a~anneyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

bastInAM kalpanAM pradarCayitvA teSAmevopayoge vyApadastata sAdhanaJca pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 vibandhagauravA~a~adhmAnaCirorugvAhanordhvagAH||2||  kukSiCUlA~aGgarughidhmAhRtpIDAkarttanasravAH||2||  ayogAdatiyogAcca basteH syuH SaDApadaH||2||

basterayogAdvibandhAdayaH SaDA~a~apado vyAdhayaH syuH|  tasyaivA~atiyogAt kukSiCUlAdayaH SaDA~a~apadaH syuH|  etACcApadaH pradhAnAH kIrttitAH|  etadanuyAyinAM hi pRthagatraiva vakSyamANatvAt|  vAhanaM pravAhikA|  UrdhvagA~a~akhyA vyApadyatra bastirmukhanAsikAnniretIti|  karttanaM nAbhyAdInAM karttanamiva|  sravo~asRgAdiparisravaH|| 2||

 asnigdhasvinnadehasya gurukoSThasya yojitaH||3||  CIto~alpasnehalavaNadravyamAtro ghano~api vA||3||  bastiH saMkSobhya taM doSaM durbalatvAdanirharan||3||  karoti vAtaviNmUtravibandhamatidAruNam||3||  nAbhibastirujAM dAhaM hRllepaM CvayathuM gude||3||  kaNDUM gaNDAni vaivarNyamaratiM vahnimArdavam||3||  kvAthadvayaM prAgvihitaM madhye doSe~atisAriNi||3||  uSNasya tasmAdekasya tatra pAnaM praCasyate||3||  phalavarttyastathA svedAH kAlaM jJAtvA virecanam||3||  bilvamUlatrivRddAruyavakolakulatthavAn||3||  surAviNmUtravAn bastiH saprAkyeSyastamAnayet||3||

asnigdhetyAdinA pracchAdyaM sarSapaiH Cira ityavamantena granthena SaNNAmayogA~a~apadAM krameNa hetvAdikamucyate|  bastiratyuSNetyAdi CreSThaM bhiSagjitamityevamantenA~atiyogApadAm|  

	tatrA~asnigdhAdiguNasya puMsaH CItAdiguNo bastirdoSaM saMkSobhya durbalatvAcchItavIryatvAttaM kSubdhadoSamanirharan vAtAdInAM vibandhamatidAruNaM karoti nAbhidAhAdikaJca|  alpadravyamAtraH snehAmla mUtrAdivarjitaH|

	prakcikitsite madhyadoSe~atisAriNi kvAthadvayaM vihitaM pramathyAkhyaM mAgadhikAdInAM jalajaladAdInAJca|  tasmAt kvAthadvayAddoSAdyapekSayaikasya kvAthasya tatrAyogasya SaDvidhatvAnnAbhiCUlAdike pAnaM praCasyate|  phalavarttyAdikaM ca praCasyate|  kAlaM jJAtvAM virecanayogye virecanaM hitam|  

	bilvamUlAdimAn bastiH prAkyeSyairvAnyAdibhirvastikalpoktairyuktastamayoginaM bastimAnayet|  viT ca mUtraJca prANinAmeva|  iti vibandha uktaH|| 3||

 saCeSAme nirUheNa mRdunA doSa IritaH||4||  mUrcchayatyanilaM mArgaM ruNaddhyagniN hinasti ca||4||  gauravaklamahacchuladAhasammohaveSTanam||4||  tataH kuryAdupacarettaM rUkSasvedapAcanaiH||4||  pippalIkattRNoCIradAramUrvACRtaM jalam||4||  pibetsauvarcalonmiCraM dIpanaM hRdviCodhanam||4||  vacAnAgaraCuNThyorvA dadhimaNDena mUrcchitAH||4||  peyAH prasannayA vA syurariSTenA~asavena vA||4||  dArutrikaTukaM pathyAM palACaM citrakaM CaThIm||4||  piSTvA kuSThaJca mUtreNa pibetkSArAMCca dIpanAn||4||  bastimasya vidadhyAcca samUtraM dACamUlikam||4||

saCeSAmetyAdinA gauravamucyate|  saCeSAme~anutpannanirAmake puruSe mRdunA nirUheNa doSa Irito~anilaM vAyuM mUrcchayati jvalayati|  mARgaJca ruNaddhi|  agniJca hinasti|  tato~anantaraM gauravAdikaM  kuryAt|  tamAturaM rUkSAdibhirupacaret|

	tatra ca pippalyAdibhiH CRtaM jalaM sauvarcalonmiCraM pibet|  taddhi dIpanaM CodhanaJca|  athavA vacAdayo dadhimaNDena mastunA mUrcchitA AloDitAH prasannayA vA peyAH syuH|  Asavena vA~ariSTena vA  peyAH syuH|  

	dArvAdikaM ca mutreNa piSTaM pibet|  cikitsitoktAMCca dIpanAn kSArAn pibet|  asya cA~ayogino daCamUlanirvRttaM bastiM samUtraM vidadhyAt|  ityuktaM gauravam|| 4||

 yukto~alpavIryyo doSADhye rUkSe krUrA~a~aCaye~athavA||5||  bastirdoSAvRto ruddhamArgo rundhyAt samIraNam||5||  savimArgo~anilaH kuryAdA~a~adhmAnaM marmapIDanam||5||  vidAhaM gudakoSThasya muSkavaMkSaNavedanAm||5||  ruNaddhi hRdayaM CUlairitaCcetaCca dhAvati||5||  svabhyaktasvinnagAtrasya tatra vartti prayojayet||5||  bilvAdiCca nirUhaH syAt pIlusarSapamUnnavAn||5||  saralA~amaradArubhyAM sAdhitaM cA~anuvAsanam||5||

yukta ityAdinA~a~adhmAnamucyate|  doSA~a~aDhyAdike puruSe~alpavIryo bastiryukto doSairAvRtatvAdruddhamArgaH san samIraNaM vAtaM rundhyAt|  so~anilaH samIraNO ruddhamArgatvAd vimArgaga AdhmanAdIn kuryAt|  itaCcetaCca koSThe~anile dhAvati|

	tatrA~ayoge svabhyaktisvinnagAtrasya varti prayojayet|  bastikalpoktaCca bilvAdinirUhaH|  pIlvAdimAMstatra syAt|  saraladevadArubhyAM sAdhitamanuvAsanaM syAt|  arthAttailam|  ityuktamAdhmAnam||
 5||

 bahudoSe~abale krUrakoSThe bastistanurmRduH||6||  CIto~alpaCcAvRto doSaiH pratihanti samIraNam||6||  UrdhvaM so~anusaran dehaM kuryAdvAyuH Cirorujam||6||  grIvAstambhaM pratiCyAyaM bAdhiryaM dRSTivibhramam||6||  tamuSNatailalavaNapradigdhaM svinnamarditam||6||  tIkSNairdhUmaiH pradhamanairnasyairA~a~asyavirecanaiH||6||  virekairbastibhiCcACu yojayedAnulomikaiH||6||

bahudoSetyAdinA Cirorugucyate|  bahudoSabalarahitAdike tanutvAdiguNe bastiyukto doSairAvRtvAt samIraNasya vegapratighAtaM karoti|  sa pratihato vAyurUrdhvaM dehamanusaraJchirorugAdIn kuryAt|  dRSTivibhramo dRSTivikAraH|  

	tamAturamuSNatailalavaNAbhyAM pradigdhaM paCcAtsvinnaM paCcAcca marditaM tIkSNairAnulomikaiCca dhUmAdibhiryojayet|  ityuktA Ciroruk|| 6||

 snigdhasvinne mahAdoSe bastirmRdvalpabheSajaH||7||  utkleCyA~alpaM hareddoSaM janayecca pravAhikAm||7||  CophaM bastAvapAne ca sadanaM corujaGhayoH||7||  vibanddhamAruto janturabhIkSNaM saH pravAhate||7||  svedAbhyaGganirUhAMCca CodhanIyAnulomikAn||7||  vidadhyAllaGghayitvA ca vRttiM tasya viriktavat||7||

snigdhasvinnetyAdinA pravAhaNamucyate|  mahAdoSe~atisnigdhe~atisvinne ca yo bastiralpaCaktitaralpamAnaCca sa doSamutkleCyA~alpaM haret|  pravAhikAM janayecca|  pravAhikAyA lakSaNamuktam|  bastiCophAdikaM ca jAyeta|  sa ca janturvibaddhamArutatvAdatyarthaM pravAhate nistanati|  

	tasyA~atiyoginaH svedAdIn vidadhyAt|  tasya ca laGhgayitvA viriktavat peyAdikena vRttiM vidadhyAt|  ityuktaM vAhanam|| 7||

 kurvato vegasaMrodhaM pIDito vA~atimAtrayA||8||  asnigdhalavaNoSNpo vA bastiralpo~alpabheSajaH||8||  mRdurvA mArutenordhvaM vikSipto mukhanAsikAt||8||  nireti mUrcchAhRllAsatRDdAhAdIn pravarttayan||8||

kurvata ityAdinordhvaga ucyate|  vegasaMrodhaM puruSasyA~asnighdhatvAdiguNo bastirmArutenordhvaM vikSipto mukhanAsikAnnireti|  mUrcchadIn pravarttayan atimAtrayA vA praNIyamAnaH pIDitaH|| 8||

 mUrcchAvikAraM dRSTvA~a~asya siJcecchItAmbunA mukham||9||  vIjedAklamanACAcca prANAyAmaM ca kArayet||9||

asya tvA~a~aturasya mUrcchAvikAraM dRSTvA jhaTiti CItAmbunA mukhaM siJcet|  evaM hi bastirUrdhvaM na yAti|  yAvaccaklamanACastAvadvyajanairvIjet|  tataCca prANAyAmaM CvAsarodhaM kArayet|| 10||

 pRSThapArCvodaraM mRdyAt karairuSNairadhomukham||11||  keCeSUtkSipya dhunvIta bhAyayedvyAladaMSTribhiH||11||  CastrolkArAjapuruSairbastireti tathA hyadhaH||11||

uSNaiCca karairadhomukhamAturasya pRSThAdikaM mRdyAt|  taJca keCeSUtkSipya dhunvIta|  vyAlAdibhiCca bhAyayet|  tathA hyUrdhvaM pravarttamAno bastiradha evaiti|| 11||
