 bahudoSe~abale krUrakoSThe bastistanurmRduH||6||  CIto~alpaCcAvRto doSaiH pratihanti samIraNam||6||  UrdhvaM so~anusaran dehaM kuryAdvAyuH Cirorujam||6||  grIvAstambhaM pratiCyAyaM bAdhiryaM dRSTivibhramam||6||  tamuSNatailalavaNapradigdhaM svinnamarditam||6||  tIkSNairdhUmaiH pradhamanairnasyairA~a~asyavirecanaiH||6||  virekairbastibhiCcACu yojayedAnulomikaiH||6||

bahudoSetyAdinA Cirorugucyate|  bahudoSabalarahitAdike tanutvAdiguNe bastiyukto doSairAvRtvAt samIraNasya vegapratighAtaM karoti|  sa pratihato vAyurUrdhvaM dehamanusaraJchirorugAdIn kuryAt|  dRSTivibhramo dRSTivikAraH|  

	tamAturamuSNatailalavaNAbhyAM pradigdhaM paCcAtsvinnaM paCcAcca marditaM tIkSNairAnulomikaiCca dhUmAdibhiryojayet|  ityuktA Ciroruk|| 6||

 snigdhasvinne mahAdoSe bastirmRdvalpabheSajaH||7||  utkleCyA~alpaM hareddoSaM janayecca pravAhikAm||7||  CophaM bastAvapAne ca sadanaM corujaGhayoH||7||  vibanddhamAruto janturabhIkSNaM saH pravAhate||7||  svedAbhyaGganirUhAMCca CodhanIyAnulomikAn||7||  vidadhyAllaGghayitvA ca vRttiM tasya viriktavat||7||

snigdhasvinnetyAdinA pravAhaNamucyate|  mahAdoSe~atisnigdhe~atisvinne ca yo bastiralpaCaktitaralpamAnaCca sa doSamutkleCyA~alpaM haret|  pravAhikAM janayecca|  pravAhikAyA lakSaNamuktam|  bastiCophAdikaM ca jAyeta|  sa ca janturvibaddhamArutatvAdatyarthaM pravAhate nistanati|  

	tasyA~atiyoginaH svedAdIn vidadhyAt|  tasya ca laGhgayitvA viriktavat peyAdikena vRttiM vidadhyAt|  ityuktaM vAhanam|| 7||

 kurvato vegasaMrodhaM pIDito vA~atimAtrayA||8||  asnigdhalavaNoSNpo vA bastiralpo~alpabheSajaH||8||  mRdurvA mArutenordhvaM vikSipto mukhanAsikAt||8||  nireti mUrcchAhRllAsatRDdAhAdIn pravarttayan||8||

kurvata ityAdinordhvaga ucyate|  vegasaMrodhaM puruSasyA~asnighdhatvAdiguNo bastirmArutenordhvaM vikSipto mukhanAsikAnnireti|  mUrcchadIn pravarttayan atimAtrayA vA praNIyamAnaH pIDitaH|| 8||

 mUrcchAvikAraM dRSTvA~a~asya siJcecchItAmbunA mukham||9||  vIjedAklamanACAcca prANAyAmaM ca kArayet||9||

asya tvA~a~aturasya mUrcchAvikAraM dRSTvA jhaTiti CItAmbunA mukhaM siJcet|  evaM hi bastirUrdhvaM na yAti|  yAvaccaklamanACastAvadvyajanairvIjet|  tataCca prANAyAmaM CvAsarodhaM kArayet|| 10||

 pRSThapArCvodaraM mRdyAt karairuSNairadhomukham||11||  keCeSUtkSipya dhunvIta bhAyayedvyAladaMSTribhiH||11||  CastrolkArAjapuruSairbastireti tathA hyadhaH||11||

uSNaiCca karairadhomukhamAturasya pRSThAdikaM mRdyAt|  taJca keCeSUtkSipya dhunvIta|  vyAlAdibhiCca bhAyayet|  tathA hyUrdhvaM pravarttamAno bastiradha evaiti|| 11||

kalpasthAnam

bastivyApatsiddhiH

 pANivastrairgalApIDaM kuryAnna mriyate yathA||12||  prANodAnanirodhAddhi suprasiddhatarAyanaH||12||  apAnaH pavano bastiM tamACvevApakarSati||12||

tasya ca maraNaM rakSan pANyAdibhirgalApIDaM kuryAt|  evaM hi prANasyodAnasya ca noridhAdapAnaH suprasiddhataramArgaH san taM bastimACvevA~apakarSati|| 12||

 kuSThakamukakalkaM ca pAyayedamlasaMyutam||13||  auSNyAttaikSNyAtsaratvAcca bastiM so~asyAnulomayet||13||  gomUtreNa trivRtpathyAkalkaM vA~adho~anulomanam||13||

taJca kuSThakramukayoH kalkamamlena kAJjikAdinA pAyayet|  kramukaM lodhram|  sa kalko~asyA~a~aturasyauSNyAdinA bastimUrdhvaM pravarttamAnamadho~anulomayet|  athavA trivRtpathyAkalkaM gomUtreNa pAyayet||13||

 pakvACayasthite svinne nirUho dACamUlikaH||14||  yavakolakulatthaiCca vidheyo mUtrasAdhitaiH||14||  bastirgomUtrasiddhairvA sA~amRtAvaMCapallavaiH||14||  pUtAkaraJjatvakpatraCaThIdevAhvarohiSaiH||14||  satailaguDasindhUttho virekauSadhakalkavAn||14||

pakvACayasthe basthau svinne puruSo dACamUliko nirUho vidheyaH|  yavAdibhiCca mUtrasAdhitairbastirvidheyaH|  athavA pUtIkaraJjAdibhiramRtAvaMCapallavAbhyAM yuktaH satailAdiko virecanadravyakalkavAn bastirvidheyaH|| 14||

 bilvAdipaJcamUlena siddho bastiruraHsthite||15||  Cirasthe nAvanaM dhUmaH pracchAdyaM sarSapaiH CiraH||15||

uraHsthite bastau bilvAdipaJcamUlena siddho bastirvidheyaH|  CiraHprApte bastau nAvanAdikam|  ityuktAH SaDyogApadaH|| 15||

 bastiratyuSNatIkSNAmlaghano~atisveditasya vA||16||  alpadoSe mRdau koSThe prayukto vA punaH punaH||16||  atiyogatvamApannaH kukSiCUlakaro bhavet||16||  virecanAtiyogena sa tulyAkRtisAdhanaH||16||  pRCniparNI sthirAM padmaM kACmaryaM madhukotpale||16||  piSTvA drAkSAM madhUkaM ca kSIre taNDuladhAvane||16||  drAkSAyaH pakvaloSTasya prasAde madhukasya vA||16||  vinIya saghRtaM bastiM yuJjyAddAhe~atiyogaje||16||

bastirityAdinA~atiyogApada ucyante|  uSNAdiguNavAn bastiH prayukto~arisveditasya vA prayuktaH alpadoSAdike vA punaH punaH prayukto~atiyogamApannaH san kukSirujAkaro bhavet|  so~atiyogo virecanA~atiyogena tulyalakSaNastulyasAdhanaCca|  

	bastyatiyogajadAhe pRCniparNyAdikaM piSTvA kSIrAdInAmanyatamaM vinIya nikSipya saghRtaM bastiM yuJjyAt|  ityukraM kukSiCUlam|| 16||

 snehasvedairasampAdya gurutIkSNo~atimAtrakaH||17||  duHsthitAya praNihito bastirduHCodhitAya vA||17||  atipravRtto marutaM kopayet sa vimArgagaH||17||  karotyaGgarujAM jRmbhAM stambhaM bhedaJca parvaNAm||17||  taM tailalavaNA~abhyaktaM sveditaM prastarAdibhiH||17||  bilvakolayavairaNDavarSAbhUbRhatIdvayaiH||17||  sakulatthaiH CRtaM mastu phalasauvIrakAnvitaiH||17||  AsthApayetsasindhUtthairjAGgalairA~a~aCitaM rasaiH||17||  tailenA~anilajid dravyavipakvenA~anuvAsayet||17||

snehetyAdinA~aGgurugucyate|  snehasvedAbhyAM asampAdyA~aniSpannaM kRtvA gurvAdiko bastiratiyogaM pravRttaH san marutaM kopayet|  sakupito marudvimArgagataH sannaGgarujAdikaM karoti|  anyasmai duHCodhitAya vA|

	tamatiyoginaM tailalavaNAbhyAmabhyaktaM prastarAdibhiCca svedavidhyuktaiH sveditaM bilvAdibhirmastvAdyanvitaiH CRtaiH sasindhUtthaiCcA~a~asthApayet|  anu ca jAGgalai rasairaCitaM bhojitaM vAtaharadravya siddhena tailenA~anuvAsayet|  ityuktA~aGgaruk|| 17 ||

 mRdukoSThe~abale bastiratitIkSNO~atinirharan||18||  kuryAddhidhmAM hitaM tatra hidhmAghnaM bRMhaNaJca yat||18||  balAbRhatyAdivarAkACmaryaphalasaindhavaiH||18||  saprasannAranAlAmlaistailaM paktvA~anuvAsayet||18||  uSNAmbunA~akSaM pippalyA dadyAllavaNasaMyutam||18||  dhUmaleharasakSIrasvedAMCcAnnaM ca vAtajit||18||

mRdukoSTha ityAdinA hidhmocyate|  mRdukoSThabalarahitAdike~atitIkSNo bastiratinirharan doSaM hidhmAM kuryAt|  tatra hidhmAcikitsitamanyad bRMhaNaM ca hitam|  

	tato balAbRhatyAdibhiH prasannAdibhiCca tailaM paktvA~anuvAsayet|  bRhatyAdilaghupaJcamUlam|  AranAlA~amlamamlA~a~aranAlam|  akSaM karSaM pippalyAH|  lavaNena yuktamuSNAmbunA dadyAt|   dhUmAdiMCca vAtanudannaM ca dadyAt|  ityuktA hidhmA|| 18||

 atitIkSNaH savAto vA na vA samyakprapIDitaH||19||  ghaTTayoddRdayaM bastistatra kACakuCotkaTaiH||19||  syAt sAmlavaNaskandhakarIrabadarInalaiH||19||  CRtairbastirhitaH siddho vAtaghnaiCcA~anuvAsanam||19||

atitIkSNa ityAdinA hRtpIDocyate|  atitIkSNAdiguNo basti-rhRdayaM ghaTTayet|  savAto vA bastiryo niHCeSapIDitaH sa ca|  tatra hRdayaghaTTane~amlaskandhalavaNaskandhAdibhiH kAsAdibhiCca syAt|  ityuktA hRtpIDA|| 19||

 mRdukoSThAlpadoSasya rUkSatIkSNA~atimAtrakaH||20||  hRtvA bastirmalAJchIghraM vAtapitte prakopayet||20||  nAbhibastigudAMste hi kRntato~asya muhurmuhuH||20||  vivarNA~alpA~alpamutthAnaM bastirnilekhanAdbhavet||20||  svAduCItauSadhaistatra payasyekSvAdibhiH CRtaH||20||  yaSTyAhvatilakalkena bastiH syAtkSIrabhojinaH||20||  sasarjarasayaSTyAhvaM jiGgiNIkardamAJjanam||20||  vinIyaH dugdhe bastiH syAdvayaktAmlarasabhojinaH||20||  picchilaCca hito bastiH snehaCca madhuraiH CRtaH||20||

mRdukoSTha ityAdinA parikarttanamucyate|  mRdukoSThatvAdiyuktasya rUkSAdiguNo bastirmalAn hRtvA CIghraM vAtapitte prakopayet|  asya cA~a~aturasya te vAtapitte nAbhyAdIn muhurmuhuH kRntataH|  basteCca mUtrAdhArasya nirlekhanAd vivarNAdiguNamutthAnaM bhavet|

	tatra payasyAdibhiH svAduCItaiH CRto yaSTyA~a~ahvatilayoH kalkena yukto bastiH kSIrabhojinaH puruSasya syAt|  jiGgiNyAdikaM sasarjarasAdi dugdhe vinIya bastiH syAt|  AmlotkaTaM mAMsarasaM yo bhuMkto tasya picchilo bastikalpokto bastiCca hitaH|  madhuraiCca CRtaH sneho~anuvAsane hitaH|  ityuktaM karttanam|| 20||

 bastiH kSArAmlatIkSNoSNalavaNaH paittikasya vA||21||  gudaM likhan dahan kSiNvan karotyasraparisravam||21||  sa vidagdhaM sravatyasraM varNaiH pittaM ca bhUribhiH||21||  bahuCaCcA~atiyogena mohaM gacchati cA~asakRt||21||  tatrA~a~adraiH CAlmalIpatraiH kSuNNairAjaM payaH CRtam||21||  pUtaM ghRtAnvitaM bastiM dadyAdanyAMCca picchilAn||21||  vaTAdipallaveSvevaM kalpo yavatileSu ca||21||  suvarcalopodakayoH kacchudAre ca Casyate||21||  gude ca CItamadhurAn kuryAt sekapralepanAn||21||  raktapittAtisAraghnI kriyA cA~atra praCasyate||21||  dAhAdiSu trivRtkalkaM mRdvIkAvAriNA pibet||21||  taddhi pittaCakRdvAtAn hatvA dAhAdikAJjayet||21||  viCuddhaCca pibecchItAM yavAgUM CarkarAyutAm||21||  yuJjyAdvA~ativiriktasya kSINaviTkasya bhojanam||21||  mASayUSeNa kulmaSAn pAnaM dadhyathavA surAm||21||

bastirityAdinA parisrava ucyate|  athavA paittikasya kSArAdiguNo bastirgudadAhAdikaM kurvannasraparisravaM karoti|  sa parisravavAn vidagdhamasRg bahubhirvaNaiH sravati|  pittaCca tathAvidhamanekavarNaM sravatya-tiyogena|  asakRccA~asau mohaM gacchati|

	tatrA~a~adraiH CAlmalIpatraiH CRtaM payaH pUtaM ghRtAnvitaM ca bastiM dadyAt|  anyAMCca pUrvoktAn picchilAn bastIn dadyAt|  eSa ca CAlmalIpatrakalpo vaTAdipallaveSu yavatilAnAM pallaveSvapISTaH suvarcalAdInAM ca Casyate| 

	gude ca CItAdiguNAn sekAn pralepAMCca kuryAt|  atra ca raktapittaghnI kriyA Casyate raktA~atisAraghnI ca| 

	dAhAdiSu drAkSamRditavAriNA trivRtkalkaM pibet|  tat trivRtkalkayuktaM mRdvIkAvAri pittAdIn hatvA dAhAdikAn jayet|  

	tena ca viCuddho yavAgUM CarkarAyutAM pibet|  athavA yo~ativiriktatayA kSINaviTkastasya mASaYUSeNa bhojanaM yuJjyAt|  kulmASAn vA yuJjyAt|  kulmASaH svinnasasyam|  pAnaM tu dadhi vA surAM vA yuJjyAt|  ityuktAH SaDatiyogA~a~apadaH|| 21||

kalpasthAnam

snehAdivyApatsiddhiH

 athAtaH snehAdivyApatsiddhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurA~a~atreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

AsthApanAnAM vyApadastatsAdhanaM coktvA kramaprAptAnAM snehAdi bastInAmasamyagyoge vyApadaH sAdhanaJca pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 snehabastau marutapittakaphA~atyA~a~aCaviDAvRte||2||  Abhukte CNunapAyvA~a~amadatte~aSTau vyApadaH smRtAH||2||

snehabastau marudAdipaJcakAvRte abhuktAditrayadatte cetyaSTadhA snehabastervyApadaH| atyA~a~aCo~atibhojanam||2||

 CIte~alpo vA~adhike vAte pitte~atyuSNaH kaphe mRduH||3||  atibhukte gururvarcaH saJcaye~alpabalastathA||3||  dattastairAvRtaH sneho nA~a~ayAtyabhibhavAdapi||3||

CIta ityAdinA krameNA~a~avaraNA ucyante|  vAte~adhike CIto~alpo vA datto vAtenA~a~avRtatvAnnAyAti|  pitte~adhike~atyuSNo dattaH pittAvRtatvAnnAyAti|  kaphe~adhike mRduH snehabastiH kaphAvRtatvAnnAyAti|  atibhukte guruH snehabastirannA~a~avRtatvAnnAyAti|  varcaH saJcaye~albalaH snehabastirviDAvRtatvAnnAyAti|  samyakprayukto~api ca snehabastirmarutAdiSvadhikeSu prayuktastairabhibhUtatvAnnAyAti||3||

 stambhorusadanAdhmAnajvaraCUlAGgamardanaiH||4||  pARCvarugveSTanairvidyAdvAyunA snehamAvRtam||4||  snighdAmlalavaNoSNaistaM rAsnApItadrutailikaiH||4||  sauvIrakasurAkolakulatthayavasAdhitaiH||4||  nirUhairnirharet samyaksamUtraiH pAJcamUlikaiH||4||  tAbhyAmeva ca tailAbhyAM sAyaM bhukte~anuvAsayet||4||

stambhAdikaM vAtAvRtasnehalakSaNam|  taM snehaM snigdhAdiguNaiH  pAJcamUlikairnirharet|  rAsnAtailAdiyuktaiCca|  pItadruH saralaH|  kolaM badaram|  tAbhyAmeva tailAbhyAM rAsnApItadrutailAbhyAM bhukte bhojane kRte~anuvAsayet|| 4||

 tRDdAharAgasammohavaivarNyatamakajvaraiH||5||  vidyAtpittAvRtaM svAdu tiktaistaM bastibhirharet||5||

tRDAdipittAvRtalakSaNam|  taM snehaM svAdvAdiguNairbastibhirharet||5||

 tandrACItajvarAlasyaprasekArucigauravaiH||6||  samUrcchAglAnibhirvidyAcchleSmaNA snehamAvmRtam||6||  kaSAyatiktakaTukaiH surAmUtropasAdhitaiH||6||  phalatailayutaiH sAmlairbastibhistaM vinirharet||6||

tandrAdikaM CleSmAvRtalakSaNam|  taM snehaM kaSAyAdiguNairbastibhirharet|| 6||

 chardimUrchAruciglAniCUlanidrAGgamardanaiH||7||  AmaliGgaiH sadAhaistaM vidyAdatyaCanAvRtam||7||  kaTUnAM lavaNAnAJca kvAthaiCcUrNaiCca pAcanam||7||  mRdurvirekaH sarvaM ca tatrA~a~amavihitaM hitam||7||

chardyAdikamatyaCanAvRtalakSaNam|  AmaliGgAni srotorodhAdIni sUtroktAni|  tatra kaTvAdiguNAnAM dravyANAM kvAthairCcUrNaiCca pAcanam|  mRduvirekaCca Casyate|  sarvamA~a~amavihitamAmAtisAradyuktam|| 7||

 viNmUtrA~anilasaGgArttigurutvAdhmAnahRdgrahaiH||8||  snehaM viDAvRtaM jJAtvA snehasvedaiH sabastibhiH||8||  CyAmAbilvAdisiddhaiCca nirUhaiH sA~anuvAsanaiH||8||  nirhared vidhinA samyagudAvarttahareNa ca||8||

viTsaGgAdinA viDAvRtalakSaNam|  taM snehaM snehasvedAdibhirnirharedAvartoktena ca vidhinA samyagyojanayA nirharet|  ityA~a~avaraNA uktAH|| 8||

 abhukte CUnapAyorvA peyamAtrA~aCitasya vA||9||  gude praNihitaH sneho vegAddhAvatyanAvRtaH||9||  UrdhvakAyaM tataH kaNThAdUrdhvebhyaH khebhya etyapi||9||  mUtraCyAmAtrivRtsiddho yavakolakulatthavAn||9||  tatsiddhatailo deyaH syAnnirUhaH sA~anuvAsanaH||9||  kaNThAdA~a~agacchataH stambhakaNThagrahavirecanaiH||9||  chardighnIbhiH kriyAbhiCca tasya kuryAnnivarttanam||9||

abhukte dattaH snehaH peyamAtreNaiva bhuktasya vA dattaH CUnapAyorvA praNihito vegAdUrdhvakAyaM dhAvatyannAdyA~a~avarakA~abhAvAt|  tataH kaNThAdUrdhvebhyaH khebhyo nAsAdibhya etyA~a~agacchati|

	tatra mUtrAdisiddho nirUho yavAdimAMCca tatsiddhena mRtrAdisiddhena tailena yukto deyaH syAt|  tasya cordhvapravRttasya snehasya kaNThAdA~a~agacchato nivarttanamadhonayanaM stambhAdibhiH kiryAt|| 9||

 nA~apakvaM praNayet snehaM gudaM sa hyupalimpati||10||  tataH kuryAtsaruGmohakaNDUCophAn kriyA~atra ca||10||  tIkSNo bastistathA tailamarkapatrarase CRtam||10||

Amadatta ucyate|  apakvaM snehaM pAyau na praNayet|  sa hyapakvaH praNihita AtmanA gudamupalimpati|  sa cAmadatto rugAdIn kuryAt|  atra ca kiryA cikitsA bhavati|  kimityAha-tIkSNa ityAdi|  subodham|  ityuktA aSTau vyApadaH|| 10||

	etadeva ca vikalpya kvAthaCeSagrahaNam|  yAvatodakena dravyANAM muktarasatA ACaGkyate tAvadA~a~asecanam|  adhiCrayaNaM cullyAmA~a~aropaNam|  AsanaviCeSo~anyacittatApaparihArAya|  parita ityekadeCa auSadhasya dAhabhayAt|  avatAraNaM cullIto bhUmau|  yathArhasparthaM doSAdyapekSayoSNaM vA CItaM vA|

	kSIrAdItyAdi subodham|  tadupadeCa iti kSIradadhimastumUtrAdyupadeCe tadauSadhaM vArikvAthapUrvakamanupadagdhaM kvAthayet|  stokena tu vAriNA prathamaM kvAthayet|  tatastenaivodakena saha kSIrAdibhiH kvAtheyedityarthaH|  etacca niryUheSveva sAdhyeSu vijJeyam|  na tu snehapAkeSvapi|  tathA ca SaTpalAdiSu yatra kSIrAdikaM dravaM paThitaM tatroktasyaiva dravasya prayogamabhimanyante, na tu jaladAnamaGgIkurvanti|  kecittu yatra snehAccaturguNaM dviguNaM vA triguNaM vA,  tatra caturguNatvApAdanAya dravaM snehAccaturguNamityanayA paribhASayA paThitaCeSaM jalamevecchantIti|| 9||

 CItasalilAplutastu niCAparyuSitapUtaH CItaH||10||  uSNA-
mbhasi kSuNNAbhiSutapUtaH phANTaH||10||

kalpasthAnam

bheSajakalpaH

 athAto bheSajakalpaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurA~a~atreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

kalpanAprasaGgasAmAnyena bheSajAnAM kalpanAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 jAGgale sAdhAraNe vA deCe yathAkAlaM CiCirAtapapavana-

lAGgalA~agraH|| 2||

 viCeSatastvaCmavatI sthiro gurvI CyAmA kRSNA sthUla-

aCmavatItyAdinA pArthivAdiviCeSaNa bhUmiparIkSA|  sA~aCmatvAdiguNA bhUmiH|  svaguNabhUyiSThA pArthivaguNA~adhiketyarthaH|  tatra hi yajjAyate tat pArthivaguNA~adhikaM bhavati|  evaM sarvatra|  snigdhAdiguNA~abubhUyiSThA|  nAnAvarNAdiguNA~agniguNabhUyiSThA|  rUkSAdikA~anilabhUyiSThA|  rAsabho gardabhaH|  koTaro vRkSAntargarttaprAyam|  alparasaH prarohe yasyAH|  CvabhravatyAdikA~a~akACabhUyiSThA|  tatrA~ambvityAdi subodham|  evamityuktena prakAreNa bhUmiviCeSaiH|| 3||

 tatra yAni kAlajAnyupagatasampUrNapramANarasavIryagandha-
nikAlAtapAgnisalilapavanaCastrajantubhiranupahatagandhava-

mUlAni CiCire vA CIrNaprarUDhaparNAnAm||4||  Caradi tvakka-
ndakSIrANi||4||  hemante sArANi||4||  yathartu puSpaphalam||4||  anye punarAhuH saumyAnyauSadhAni saumyeSvRtuSvAgneyAnya-
gneyeSu||4||  evamavyApannAnyApUrNatararasavIryANi ca bhavanti||4||

tatretyAdinA bheSajasvarUpam|  yAni sve kAle jAtAni|  upagatAni sampUrNAni pramANAdIni yeSAm|  kAlAdibhiranupahatAni gandhAdIni yeSAm|  avagADhaM dUrapraviSTaM mUlaM yeSAm|  kSetram udIcyAM diCi sthitAni|  teSAM kAlajAdiguNasampannAnAM CAkhAdikamupayogi navaM varSAsu vasante vA grAhyam|

	grISme CiCire vA mUlAni|  tAni tu pUrveSu parNeSu CIrNESu naveSu vA prarUDheSu|  tvagAdIni Caradi|  sArANi hemante|  puSpaphalantu yathAsvamRtuSu|

	anya ityAdi subodham|  madhuratiktakaSAyANi saumyAni|  CeSANyAgneyAni|  varSACaraddhemantAH saumyAH|  CeSAsraya AgneyyAH|

 atha maGgalAcAraH kalyANavRttaH CuciH CuklavAsAH

prAGmukha udaGmukho vA gRhNIyAt||5||  gRhItvA cA~anurUpa-

	tAnItyAdi subodham|  sakSIrANAmaprAptAvanatikrAntavatsarANi|  pippalyAdIni purANAni|

	bASkayaNI ciraprasUtA|  tasyAH sambandhi kSIraM grAhyam|  viNmUtraM tacceti kSIraM nIrujAM prANinAM grAhyam|  dhAtvAdikaM vayasvinAM balavatAM ca sambandhigrAhyam|  dhAtavo mAMsAdayaH picchaM barhasaMhatiH|  AdigrahaNena keCalomacarmanakhAdigrahaNam|| 5||

 paJcavidhastu bheSajAnAM kaSAya kalpaH||6||  niryAsaH kalko

sarveSAJca bheSajAnAM niryAsAdibhedena paJcavidhaH kaSAyakalpo bhavati| ta iti pANTAcchIto balavAn|  CItAcchRtaH|  CRtAt kalkaH|  kalkAnniryAsa iti|| 6||

 tatra sadyaH samuddhataprakSAlitakSuNNasya tAntavaniSpIDi-

 upaladaCanAdipiSTastu kalkaH||8||  CuSkapiSTaH sUkSmatAnta-

sAdhayet||9||  avatArya ca parisrutaM yathArhasparCaM prayuJjIta||9||  kSIrAdisahitaJca dravyaM na samyaGmuktarasaM bhavatIti vAri-

kvAtho niryUha ityeko~arthaH|  tatretyAdinA niryUhasya pAkavidhiH  bhedyAni tumbAdIni|  yAni cchinnAni pAkaM na sahante|  chedyAni kaThinAni CAkhAdIni|  aNuriti sUkSmo bhAgaH|  tasya vIpsAyAM Cas|  kAnicidauSadhAni vAsAkUSmANDasuvarcalAprabhRtAni svabhAvAtpAnIyaM gRhNanti|  anyAni neti vikalpyodakasyA~avasecanam|

	etadeva ca vikalpya kvAthaCeSagrahaNam|  yAvatodakena dravyANAM muktarasatA ACaGkyate tAvadA~a~asecanam|  adhiCrayaNaM cullyAmA~a~aropaNam|  AsanaviCeSo~anyacittatApaparihArAya|  parita ityekadeCa auSadhasya dAhabhayAt|  avatAraNaM cullIto bhUmau|  yathArhasparthaM doSAdyapekSayoSNaM vA CItaM vA|

 uttarasthAnam

bAlopacaraNIyaH

 athAto bAlopacaraNIyanAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

athetyAdi pUrvavadvyAkhyeyamiti hetyAdi ca|  bAlopacaraNamadhikRtya kRto~adhyAyo bAlopacaraNIyaH, taM vyAkhyAsyAmaH|| 1||

 atha khalu jAtamAtrameva bAlamulbAt saindhavasarpiSA mArjayet||2||

athetyAnantarye| 'khalu' Cabda idAnImarthe|  jAtamAtraM tatkAla eva bAlamulbAt veSTito jAyate yena garbhaH sa ulbastasmAt saindhavayuktena sarpiSA mArjayecchodhayet||2||

 tato~asyAtiprabalamohajvaraparItasarvagAtrasya kroCitumapi
rujAnurUpasamarthasyAnavasthitACeSadehadhAtorasambhAvya yauvanAdyavasthasya krakacasparCamiva karavasanaCayanasaMsargamanyamAnasyAvikalpitamaGgAni vikSiptaH punariva maraNamanubhavato lIyamAnasaMjJasyAtisambAdhayonipuTAvapIDitaprANapratyAnayanAya balAtailena pariSekaM kuryAt||3||  karNa
mUle cACmanoH saGghaTTanam||3||

tato~anantaramasya bAlasyAtisambAdhenAtisaGkaTena yonipuTena prasUtikAle~avapIDitAnAM prANAnAM pratyAnayanAya balAtailena CarIroktena pariSekaM kuryAt|  kimbhUtasyetyAha-atiprabaletyAdi|  atiprabalena mohajvareNa parItAni samantAdvyAptAni sarvagAtrANi yasya|  janmamaraNayorhi mohajvarAveCaH prAguktaH|  tathA prasUtikleCarujAnurUpaM tAM pratikarttuM kroCitumapyakSamasyACaktasya|  tathA anavasthitA agRhItasvarUpA aCeSA dehadhAtavo yasya|  dhAtavo vAtAdirasAdimUtrAdayaH|  tathA asambhAvyA yauvanAdyavasthA yasya|  anyakarAdisaMsargaJca krakacasparCamiva manyamAnasya|  krakacaM karapatram|  tathAvikalpitaM rujAprayuktatvenaivAGgAni vikSiptaH|  tathAnyajanmani maraNamanubhUya prasUtikAle rujayA punariva maraNamanubhavato lIyamAnasaMjJasya mUDhacetanasya|  karNamUle karNasamIpe cAsya bAlasyACmanoH pASANayoH saGghaTTanaM parasparAbhighAtaM kuryAt|  etacca prasUtikAlasaJjAtamohapraCamArtham|| 3||

 yadi vA~aceSTa eva syAttataH kRSNakapAlikayA CUrpeNa cainamaphiniSpunIyAt||4||  dakSiNakarNamUle ca mantramasyoccArayet _

aGgAdaGgatsamphavasi hRdayAdaphijAyase||4||  AtmA vai putranAmAsi sa jIva CaradAM Catam||4||  CatAyuH CatavarSo~asi dIrGamAyuravApnuhi||4||  nakSatrANi diCo rAtrirahaCcatvAphirakSatu||4||

atrAntare ca yadyaceSTa eva syAttataH kRSNayA dhUmakajjalena mRditamadhyayA kapAlikayA CUrpeNa cAbhinisPuraNAya yateta|  yato~atiprabhAvAttaM bhodhayati|  asya ca bhAlasya dakSiNakarNamUle aGgAdaGgAdityAdi ClokadvayaM mantramuccArayet|  mantravyAKyAnasya yat prayojanaM tatsubhodham|| 4||

 pratyAgataprANasya ca prakRtiphUtasya nAphinAlaM nAlAphiphandhanAccaturaGgulasyordhvaM kSoumasUtreNa phaddhvA tIkSNena CastreNa vardhayet||5||  grIvAyAM cainamAsajjet||5||  nAphiJca kuSThatailena secayet||5||

tataH prakRtibhUtasya svasthasya ca nAlAbhibhandhanAnrAbhinAlasya yatra jaThare nibhandhanaM bhavati, tasmAccaturaGgulAdUrdhvaM kSoumasUtreNa bhaddhvA sUtrabhandhAdUrdhvaM CastreNa nAbhinAlasya vardhanaM CedanaM kuryAt|  enamiti CinnaCiSTaM nAbhinAlaM bhAlasya grIvAyAM sUtreNAsajjayellambhatvaparihArAya|  kuSThena yuktaM siddhaM vA tailaM kuSThatailaM tena nAbhiM secayet|| 5||

 tataH kSIrivRkSakaSAyeNa sarvagandhodakena vA saptatapanIyarajatanirvApaNakavoSNena kapitthapatrakaSAyeNa vA tadvidhena snApayet||6||

tato~anantaraM taM bAlaM kSIrivRkSANAM vaTAdInAM kaSAyeNa taptAnAM tapanIyarajatAnAM nirvApaNena tatra tApopaCamenoSNIkRtena snApayediti|  athavA sarvagandhadravyodakena tapanIyAditaptena|  athavA kapitthapatrANAM kaSAyeNa tadvidheneti tapanIyAdikavoSNena|  tapanIyaM suvarNam|  rajataM rupyam|| 6||

 tato~asya supariliKitanaKayA suprakSAlitopavAnayA kArpAsapicvavaguNThitayA dakSiNapradeCinyA jihvouSThakaNThamanusuKaM pramujyAt||7||  tAluM connAmya snehapicunopariSTAdavaguNThayet||7||

tataH snAnAdanantaramasya bAlasya supariliKitanaKatvAdiyuktyA dakSiNakarapradeCinyA jihvouSThakaNThaM sAdhu satriveCAya pramRjyAt|  supariliKitaM pArUSyAdinACAya CastreNa kRttaM naKaM yasyAH|  pUrvaM suprakSalitA paCcAdupavanopaCuSkA suprakSAlitopavAnA|  kArpAsamayaH picuH kArpAsaKaNDaH|  tenAvaguNThitayA mArdavAya veSTitayA|  pradeCinyaGguSThAt dvitIyA|  tathAvidhayaiva ca tathA tAlUnnAmya snehayuktena kArpAsapicunopariSTAcCirasyavaguNThayedAcCAdayet|| 7||

 tataCcaindrIbrAhmICaGkhapuSpIvacAkalkaM madhughRtopetaM hareNumAtram kuCAgrAbhimantritaM sauvarNenACvatthapatreNa medhAyurbalajananaM prACayet||8||  tadvad brAhmIbalAnantACatAvaryanyatamacUrNaM vA||8||

anantaramaindryAdInAM kalkaM hareNumAtramAnaM madhughRtAbhyAM yuktaM kuCAgreNa darbhAgreNa medhAdijananena vaidikena mantreNAbhimantritaM suvarNavikAreNACvatthapatreNa karaNena prACayettaM medhAdijananam|  endrI indrANI|  brAhmI brahmasuvarcalA|  CaGkhapuSpI kACmIreSu vIraTI|  hareNavaH satInAH|  aCvatthapatrAkRtitvAtsouvarNamaCvatthapatram|  tadvadaindryAdikalkavidhinAnena brAhmyAdInAmanyatamasya vA cUrNaM prACayet|  anantA dUrvA|| 8||

 tataH saindhavopahitena sarpiSA garbhodakAni vAmayet||9||  tathAsyoraH kaNThaviCuddhyA lAghavamabhilASaCca jAyate||9||

tataH prACAdanantaramasmai saindhavena yuktaM sarpirgarbhodakavamanAya dadyAt|  tayeti vamanenAsya bAlasyoraHkaNThasya viCuddhyA lAghavAdikaM jAyate|| 9||

 athAsya jAtakarma prAjApatyena vidhinA kuryAt||10||

athAnantaramasya bAlasya prAjApatyena brAhmeNa vaidikena vidhinA jAtakarma kuryAt|| 10||

 yadi vA~aceSTa eva syAttataH kRSNakapAlikayA CUrpeNa cainamaphiniSpunIyAt||4||  dakSiNakarNamUle ca mantramasyoccArayet _

aGgAdaGgatsamphavasi hRdayAdaphijAyase||4||  AtmA vai putranAmAsi sa jIva CaradAM Catam||4||  CatAyuH CatavarSo~asi dIrGamAyuravApnuhi||4||  nakSatrANi diCo rAtrirahaCcatvAphirakSatu||4||

atrAntare ca yadyaceSTa eva syAttataH kRSNayA dhUmakajjalena mRditamadhyayA kapAlikayA CUrpeNa cAbhinisPuraNAya yateta|  yato~atiprabhAvAttaM bhodhayati|  asya ca bhAlasya dakSiNakarNamUle aGgAdaGgAdityAdi ClokadvayaM mantramuccArayet|  mantravyAKyAnasya yat prayojanaM tatsubhodham|| 4||

 pratyAgataprANasya ca prakRtiphUtasya nAphinAlaM nAlAphiphandhanAccaturaGgulasyordhvaM kSoumasUtreNa phaddhvA tIkSNena CastreNa vardhayet||5||  grIvAyAM cainamAsajjet||5||  nAphiJca kuSThatailena secayet||5||

tataH prakRtibhUtasya svasthasya ca nAlAbhibhandhanAnrAbhinAlasya yatra jaThare nibhandhanaM bhavati, tasmAccaturaGgulAdUrdhvaM kSoumasUtreNa bhaddhvA sUtrabhandhAdUrdhvaM CastreNa nAbhinAlasya vardhanaM CedanaM kuryAt|  enamiti CinnaCiSTaM nAbhinAlaM bhAlasya grIvAyAM sUtreNAsajjayellambhatvaparihArAya|  kuSThena yuktaM siddhaM vA tailaM kuSThatailaM tena nAbhiM secayet|| 5||

 tataH kSIrivRkSakaSAyeNa sarvagandhodakena vA saptatapanIyarajatanirvApaNakavoSNena kapitthapatrakaSAyeNa vA tadvidhena snApayet||6||

tato~anantaraM taM bAlaM kSIrivRkSANAM vaTAdInAM kaSAyeNa taptAnAM tapanIyarajatAnAM nirvApaNena tatra tApopaCamenoSNIkRtena snApayediti|  athavA sarvagandhadravyodakena tapanIyAditaptena|  athavA kapitthapatrANAM kaSAyeNa tadvidheneti tapanIyAdikavoSNena|  tapanIyaM suvarNam|  rajataM rupyam|| 6||

 tato~asya supariliKitanaKayA suprakSAlitopavAnayA kArpAsapicvavaguNThitayA dakSiNapradeCinyA jihvouSThakaNThamanusuKaM pramujyAt||7||  tAluM connAmya snehapicunopariSTAdavaguNThayet||7||

tataH snAnAdanantaramasya bAlasya supariliKitanaKatvAdiyuktyA dakSiNakarapradeCinyA jihvouSThakaNThaM sAdhu satriveCAya pramRjyAt|  supariliKitaM pArUSyAdinACAya CastreNa kRttaM naKaM yasyAH|  pUrvaM suprakSalitA paCcAdupavanopaCuSkA suprakSAlitopavAnA|  kArpAsamayaH picuH kArpAsaKaNDaH|  tenAvaguNThitayA mArdavAya veSTitayA|  pradeCinyaGguSThAt dvitIyA|  tathAvidhayaiva ca tathA tAlUnnAmya snehayuktena kArpAsapicunopariSTAcCirasyavaguNThayedAcCAdayet|| 7||

 tataCcaindrIbrAhmICaGkhapuSpIvacAkalkaM madhughRtopetaM hareNumAtram kuCAgrAbhimantritaM sauvarNenACvatthapatreNa medhAyurbalajananaM prACayet||8||  tadvad brAhmIbalAnantACatAvaryanyatamacUrNaM vA||8||

anantaramaindryAdInAM kalkaM hareNumAtramAnaM madhughRtAbhyAM yuktaM kuCAgreNa darbhAgreNa medhAdijananena vaidikena mantreNAbhimantritaM suvarNavikAreNACvatthapatreNa karaNena prACayettaM medhAdijananam|  endrI indrANI|  brAhmI brahmasuvarcalA|  CaGkhapuSpI kACmIreSu vIraTI|  hareNavaH satInAH|  aCvatthapatrAkRtitvAtsouvarNamaCvatthapatram|  tadvadaindryAdikalkavidhinAnena brAhmyAdInAmanyatamasya vA cUrNaM prACayet|  anantA dUrvA|| 8||

 tataH saindhavopahitena sarpiSA garbhodakAni vAmayet||9||  tathAsyoraH kaNThaviCuddhyA lAghavamabhilASaCca jAyate||9||

tataH prACAdanantaramasmai saindhavena yuktaM sarpirgarbhodakavamanAya dadyAt|  tayeti vamanenAsya bAlasyoraHkaNThasya viCuddhyA lAghavAdikaM jAyate|| 9||

 athAsya jAtakarma prAjApatyena vidhinA kuryAt||10||

athAnantaramasya bAlasya prAjApatyena brAhmeNa vaidikena vidhinA jAtakarma kuryAt|| 10||

uttarasthAnam

bAlopacaraNIyaH

sirANAM hRdayasthAnAM vivRtatvAtprasUtitaH||11||  tRtIye~ahni caturthe vA strINAM stanyaM pravartate||11||

strINAM sUtAnAM prasUtitaH prasavAttRtIye caturthe vAhni stanyaM pravartate|  yatastadA hRdayasthAH sirAH sarvA vivRtA bhavantiH, garbhiNyAstu saMvRtAH|  yata evamato yAvatsyanyaM tAvadayaM kramaH|| 11||

 tasmAtprathame~ahanyanantA miCrite madhusarpiSI mantrapUte trikAlaM prACayet||12||  dvitIye lakSmaNAsiddhaM sarpistRtIye ca||12||

prathame~ahanyanantayA dUrvayA miCrite madhusarpiSI|  anantAmiCraNaM medhApuSTyAdIJjanayedevaM vaidikena mantreNa pUte ahani trIn kAlAn prACayet|  dvitIye~ahni lakSmNAsiddhaM sarpistrikAlam|  tathaiva tRtIye||12||

 tataH prAGnivAritastanyasya svapANitalasammitaM sarpirdvikAlaM dApayedanantaraM ca stanyamiSTitaH||13||

tato~anantaraM caturthe stanyapAnAt prAGnivAritastanyasya yatnena rakSitastanyapAnasya dvikAlaM prAtarmadhyAhne ca svapANital
asammitaM bAlasya karatalameyaM sarpirdApayet|  anantaraM tatkAla eveSTato yathecCaM stanyaM dApayet|| 13||

 aharahaCcAsya CrotraCRGgATakaM snehAplutena plotena pracCAdayet||14||

asya ca bAlasyAharahaH pratidinaM CrotraCRGgATakaM karNapathaM snehAplutena snehamagnena plotena cailaKaNDena pracCAdayet|| 14||

 prAkCirasaM cainaM kSoumanicaye saMveCayeducCIrSake cAsyAphimantritamudakumphaM sthApayet dvArapakSayoCca||15||

kSaumANAM vastrANAM nicaye prAkCirasamenaM bAlaM saMveCayecca|  saMveCanaM CayyAyAM sthApanam|  subodham|  ucchIrSakaH CayyAyAH CirobhAgaH|  dvArapakSo dvArapArCvaH|| 15||

 AdArIvidArIphadarIKadiranimphapIluparUSakaCAKAphirenaM vIjayet||16||  tAphiSca samantataH sUtikAgAraM pariVvArayet||16||  sarSapAtasIkaNakaNikACcAntarbahiH prakiret||16||  sAyaM prAtaCca balim||16||

enaM bAlamAdAryAdInAM CAkhAbhirvIjanaM kArayet| (ni) AdArI kAkahantAlI toyA khadiravalyapi|  vIjanaM vyajanavAtena pavanam|  tAbhiCcAdAryAdiCAkhAbhiH sUtikAgAraM samantataH sarvatodikkaM parivArayet|  sUtikAgArasyAntarbahiCca sarSapAdikaNikA vikiredvikSipet|  sAyaM prAtaCca baliM bhUtopahAramantarbahiH prakiret||16||

 vraNoktaiCca guggulvAdiphirdhUpaM kurvIta||17||  tathA brAhmaNo~atharvavedaviddaCAhaM CAntikarma kuryAt||17||  mAyUrIM mahAmAyUrImAryAratnaketudhAriNIM cophayakAlaM vAcayet||17||

varNoktA guggulvAdayaH sUtrasthAne Castrakarmavidhou guggulvagurusarjarasavacAgourasarSapetyAdinA paThitAH|  subodham|  dve vidye ekA laghumAyUrI saptaCatI|  dvitIyA mahAmAyUrI catuHsahasrI|  AryACabdaH prajAvAcI|  ratnaketunAmnA viCiSTA dhAriNIti saugatAdInAM yA prasiddhA|| 17||

 hiGguvacAturuSkarakSoghnaiH poTalikAmuttaradehalyAmAsajjet||18||  kumArasya ca saha mAtrA kANThe ucchIrSake ca||18||  tadvadAryAparNaCabarImAryAparAjitAM ca gorocanAbhilikhitAm||18||  dvAre ca dehalImanutiryaGmusalaM nidhApayet||18||  kaNakaNDakatindukendhanAgniM naktaM divaJca jAgRyAt||18||  tathAnuraktAH striyaH suhRdaCca||18||  prahRSTajanasampUrNaJca tadveCma kAryam||18||

poTalikA prasevikA|  uttaradehalI dvAraCAKayoruparyAsaktaM kASTham|  kumArasya bhalasya kaNThe ucCIrSake ca hiGgvAdipoTalikAmAsajjet|  tanmAtuCca tathaiveti sahArthaH|  AryAparNaCabharIvidyA AryAparAjitA iti mUlamantreNa gorocanayA bhUrjAdipatraliKitA tasya kaNThe ucCIrSake cAsajjet|  

	dehalImanu dehalyanusAreNa dvAre tiryaGmusalaM nidhApayet|  dehalI dvAraCAKayorAdhArakASTham|  yasya cAgneH kaNAdikamindhanaM tamagniM naktandivaM ca jAgRyAt niryANAdrakSet|  kaNaM KaNDataNDulAH|  kaNDakaM taNDulakSodanacUrNam|  tathAnuraktAH striyo jAgRyuH suhRdaCca|  subhodham|| 18||

 athAsya samAnavarNA madhyamavayAH CuciralolupA nibhRtAnAturA jIvadvatsA vatsalA dakSiNA brahmacAriNyavyaGgA bahukSIrA CuklAmbarAcArA dIrghahrasvAdidehadoSASTakarahitA alambordhvacUcukAtipInahInastanadoSamuktA yuktacUcukA dhAtrI syAttasya eva stanyaM pibeta||19||

atha bAlasya savarNatvAdiyuktA dhAtrI syAt|  varNo brAhmaNAdiH|  madhyaM vayastAruNyAdvardhvam|  dAruvAhiH paThati|  taruNI syAdavatsalA|  kleCaM na sahate vRddhA stanyaM cAsyA na puSTikRditi|  lolupA AhArapAnagRdhnuH nibhRtA avyagrA|  anAturA vyAdhirahitA|  vatsalA apatyavatsalA|  dakSiNA anukUlA|  brahmacAriNI niSiddhapuMsaM yogA|  avyaGgA sampUrNAGgA|  AcArasya Cuklatvamaninditatvam|  aSTau dehadoSAH atidIratvamatihrasvatvamatilomatvamalomatvamatiCuklatvamatikRSNatvamatikArCyamatisthUlatvaJca|  alambacUcukA anUrdhvAbhimukhacUcukA ca|  atipInahInAbhyAM stanadoSAbhyAM muktA|  yuktaM pramANAnadhikaM cUcukaM yasyAH sA tathoktA|  cUcukaM stanAgram|  tasyA yathoktAyA eva dhAtryAH stanyaM pibet|  evakAragrahaNametadguNamiCrIbhAvapratiSedhAya|| 19||

 taccodakapAtre duhyamAnamekatAM yadudakena saha gacCati vakSyamANadoSarahitaJca tacCuddhamArogyabalajananam||20||

tacceti stanyamudakapUrNe pAtre duhyamAnamudakena saha yadekatAmavibhaktavRttitvaM gacCati|  bhAlAmayapratiSedhe vakSyamANouH stanyadoSaiH rahitaM tacCuddhamArogyAdijananaM ca bhoddhavyam|| 20||

uttarasthAnam

bAlopacaraNIyaH

 atha dhAtrI snAtA~anuliptA nityamahatavAsAH sumanAH prajAsthApanauSadhIH CirasA bibhrANA prAGmUkhI stanaM prAgdakSiNaM dhautamISatparisrutaM pAyayet||21||

athetyAdinA dhAtryAH prathamaM stanapAnavidhAnam|  sumanAH sucittA prajAsthApanIyAnyauSadhAni endrIdUrvAdIni mahAkaSAyasaMgrahoktAni|  ISatparisrutaM stokakRSTastanyaM stanaM bAlaM dhAtrI pAyayet|| 21||

 nAnAstanyasya hyasAtmyatvAnnAnAvidhA vyApado phavanti||22||  aparisrute cAtistanyapUrNastanapAnenotsnehanAt kAsaCvAsajvaracCardiSAM samphavaH||22||

nAnetyAdinAnekastanyapAnapratiSedhaprayojanam|  atistanyapUrNastanapAnena bhAlasyotsnehanAt kAsAdisambhavaH|  utsnehanaM tat snehasyAntargamanam|| 22||

 rUkSAnnapAnakarCanakrodhaCokakAmAdibhiH stanyanACaH||23||  stanyajananAni tu madyAni sIdhuvarjyAnyAnUpamAMsAni dravAH svAdvamlalavaNaprAyACcAhArAH kSIriNyaCcauSadhayaH kSIrapAnamanAyAsaH saumanasyaM ca||23||

rUkSAnnapAnAdinA striyAH stanyanACo bhavati|  madyAdIni stanya jananAni bhavanti|  subhodham|| 23||

 na tu kSudhitaCokArtaCrAntakruddhapraduSTadhAtugarbhiNIviruddhAhArabhuktAnAM stanyaM pAyayennAjIrNauSadhaJca bAlamiti||24||

kSudhitAdInAM saptAnAM sambandhi stanyaM na pAyayet|  yasya ca bAlasya mahAmantraprayuktamauSadhaM na jIrNaM taM nirdoSamapi stanyaM na pAyayet|| 24||

 phavati cAtra-

SaSThIM niCAM viCeSeNa kRtarakSAphalikriyAH||25||  jAgRyurbAndhavAstasya dadhataH paramAM mudam||25||

yadyapi sarvaM daCAhaM rakSAdikamuktaM tathApi viCeSeNa SaSThIM niCAM tasya bAlasya bAndhavAH kRtarakSAbalikriyAH paramaM ca harSaM dadhato jAgRyuH|| 25||

 daCame dvAdaCe vAhni gotrAcAraiH CubhaiH Cubhe||26||  sUtA snAnotsavaM kuryAtpitA~apatyasya nAma ca||26||  dine Catatame vAkhyAM pUrNe saMvatsare~athavA||26||  vibhrato~aGgairmanohvAlarocanAgurucandanam||26||  pUjyaM tripuruSAnUkamAdau ghoSavadakSaram||26||  avRddhaM kRtamUSmAntamanarAtipratiSThitam||26||  nakSatradevatAyuktaM tadeva tu na kevalam||26||  maGgalyamantarantasthaM na duSTaM na ca taddhitam||26||  puMso visarjanIyAntaM samavarNaM striyAH punaH||26||  viSamAkSaramakrUraM vispaSTArthaM manoramam||26||  sukhodyaM dIrghavarNAntamACIrvAdAbhidhAnavat||26||

tato daCame dvAdaCe vA~ahani Cubhe praCaste CubhaiH svagotrAcAraiH sUtA AtmanaH snAnotsavaM kuryAt|  tadaiva ca pitA apatyasya nAma kuryAt|  athavA janmadinAcchatatame dine AkhyaM nAma kuryAt|  pUrNe vA saMvatsare AkhyAM kuryAt|  kimbhUtasya bAlasyetyAha-
 
mano-hlAditilakAnaGgairvibhrato dhArayataH|  alaM haritAlam|  kimbhUtaM nAma ityAha-pUjyamityAdi|  pUjyamutkRSTatvaM prasiddhyA|  tripuruSAnUkaM pitRpitAmahaprapitAmahAnukArikam|  ata UrdhvaM svakulyAnAmapi nAma na kAryam|  tathAvidhaM ca nAma kuryAdyasminnAmni Adou ghoSavadakSaraM varNo vidyate|  tatra vargANAM tRtIyacaturthAH, antaHsthAH, hakArAnusvArou, yamou, tRtIyacaturthou, nAsikyACcasaMvRtakaNThA nAdAnupradAnA ghoSavantaCca|  vargANAM tRtIyA gajaDadabAH caturthA ghajhaDhadhabhAH antaHsthAH yaralavAH anusvAro nAmAyogavAhaH anuktA evehAyogavAhAH yathA visarjanIyajihvAmUlIyAdayaH tRtIyaCcaturthaCca yamaH yamA uccAraNa evopalabhyante yathA yajJaCabde nAsikAviCeSaH iha nityanAsikyA Da-Ja-Na-na-mAH|  ghoSavatvamevaiSAM varNaguNAnAmasmAkamupayogi|  avRddhaM yasmin nAmnyAdivarNe vRddhisaMjJA na vidyate|  vRddhiriti saMjJA AkAraikAroukArANAm|  kRtamiti kRtpratyayAntam|  kRdatiGiti tiGvarjitaH pratyayaH kRtsaMjJo bhavati|  tibAdayo mahiGantAstiGaH|  USmAntaM yasmin nAmnyUSmAkSaramante vidyate|  USmANaH CaSasahAH|  yacca bAlakulyAnAmarAtinA pratiSThitanna bhavati|  bAlasya nakSatradevatAyuktam|  nakSatrANAM devatA bhavanti|  tadyathA-aCvinyA aCvinou|  bharaNyA yamaH|  kRttikAnAmagniH|  rohiNyAH prajApatiH|  mRgaCirasAM mRgAGkaH|  ArdrAyA rudraH|  punarvasUnAmaditiH|  puSyasya bRhaspatiH|  ACleSAyAH sarpAH|  maghAnAM pitaraH|  pUrvaphalgunInAM bhagaH|  uttaraphalgunInAmaryamA|  hastasya maitraH|  citrAyAstvaSTA|  svAtyA vAyuH|  viCAkhAyA indrAgnI|  anurAdhAyAH maitraH|  jyeSThAyA indraH|  mUlasya nirRtiH|  pUrvASADhAyA ApaH|  uttarASADhAyA viCvedevAH|  CravaNasya viSNuH|  dhaniSThAyA vasavaH|  CatabhiSajo varuNaH|  pUrvAbhAdrapadAnAmajaikapAt|  uttarAbhAdrapadAnAmahirbudhniH|  revatyAH pUSA|  etA nakSatradevatA yAdRCyastAbhiryuktaM nAma kArayet|  tadeveti|  na kevalaM tadeva pUrvoktalakSaNameva kintu maGgalyatvAdiviCiSTamapi|  antarmadhye antaHsthA yaralavA  yasmiMstat|  na duSTamiti|  duSTaM nAma na kuryAt|  na ca taddhitamiti|  taddhitaM taddhitAdhikAravihitapratyayAntam|  

	tacca nAmAkSaraM visarjanIyAntaM ca puMso vidheyam|  samAkSaraM yasya nAmnaH samasaGkhyAnyakSarANi bhavanti|  striyAH punarnAma tat kuryAd yad viSamAkSaraM viSamasaGkhyAnyakSarANi vidyante yasmiMstadevam|  akrUraM suspaSTArthaM manoramaJca|  sukhodyaM yadAnAyasena vaktuM Cakyate|  dIrgho varNasaMyoga ante yasya|  ACIrvAdasyAbhidhAnaM vidyate yasmin tat|  yasminnabhyuccAryamANe ACIrvAdaH kRto bhavati|| 26||


 tataH prakRtiphedoktarUpairAyuH parIkSaNam||27||  prAgudakCirasaH kuryAdphAlasya jJAnavAnphiSak||27||

tatonAmno~anantaraM prakRtibhedAdhyAyoktai rUpairlakSaNairAyuSo mAnasya parIkSaNaM kuryAdyastu jJAnavAn vaidyaH sa bhAlasya prAgudakCirasaH||27||

 praCastavAstuCaraNaM sajjopakaraNaM Cuci||28||  nirvAtaM ca pravAtaM ca vRddhastrIvaidyasevitam||28||  nirmatkuNAkhumaCakamatamaskaM ca Casyate||28||  CucidhautopavAnAni nirvalIni mRdUni ca||28||  CayyAstaraNavAsAMsi rakSoghnairdhUpitAni ca||28||

sa tu idamidaM kuryAtkimityAha-

praCastavAstutvAdiyuktaM CaraNaM veCma kuryAt|  upakaraNaM yatkiJcidaupayikaM tatsarvaM sajjaM yatra|  nirvAtamevaikadeCe ekadeCe pravAtam|  vRddhastrIbhirvRddhavaidyaiCca sevitam|  CucyAdiguNAni ca CayyAdIni kuryAt|  upavAnamupaCuSkam|  valayaH saGkocAH|  AstaraNaM CayyAcchAdanapaTaH|  tAni CayyAdIni rakSghnaiH sarSapavacAdibhirdhUpitAni Casyante|| 28||

 kAko~aviCastaH CastaCca dhUpane trivRtAnvitaH||29||  vacAjyakuSThaCrIveSTasarSapairdhUpayet sadA||29||

aviCasto~ahiMsitaH svayaM mRtaH kAkastrivRtAnvitaH satrivRtaH sa dhUpane Casyate|  sadA ca vacAdibhirdhUpayet|| 29||

 bodhayetsahasA suptaM no na cainaM samutkSipet||30||  tathA hyasya samuttrAso vegarodhaCca jAyate||30||

enaM ca bAlaM suptaM sahasA na bodhayet|  na cainaM suptaM CayyAtaH samutkSipet|  tathAhi sahasA bodhanenotkSepeNa cAsya bAlasya vegarodha uttrAsaCca jAyate|| 30||

uttarasthAnam

bAlopacaraNIyaH

 mAkSikAmalakavyoSabRhatImUlasaindhavaiH||31||  lAlopanodarucyarthaM muKamantaHparAmRCet||31||

mAkSikAdibhirliptayAGgulyAntarmuKaM bhAlasya parAmRCet|  tathA hi lAlApanuttI ruciCca bhavati|| 31||

 jIvatKaDgAdiCRGgeSu samAsaktAJCuphAn maNIn||32||  dhArayed daCa caindryAdIJjIvakarSaphakAvapi||32||  AyurmedhAsmRtisvAsthyakarIM rakSophirakSaNIm||32||  hastAphyAM grIvayA mUrdhnA viSeSAnsatataM vacAm||32||

jIvataH khaDgAdergRhItaM yacchRGgaM tatrAsaktA  nibaddhA ye CubhAmaNayaH tAn bAlaM dhArayet|  aindryAdIMCca daCa dhArayet|  tathA jIvakarSabhakAvapi|  aindrI brAhmI CatavIryA sahasravIryA sumedhA kanyA CivA~ariSTA vATyapuSpI viSvakseneti daCa|  hastAdikena viCeSAt satataM vacAM dhArayet|  AyurityAdi vacACeSaNama|| 32||

 stanyadoSAdgadAstasya yathoktaM tat pibedyataH||33||  pInA~atikandharAstamphaM kuryAdUrdhvAkSamUrdhvagaH||33||  ucCvAsarodhAllambo~atistano jIvitasaMCayam||33||  na garphiNyAH piphetstanyaM pArigarphikakRddhi tat||33||

sa ca bhAlo~anantaroktaguNameva sadA stanyaM pibhedyataH stanyadoSAt gadA bhavanti|  atipInaH stano yaH pratiSiddhaH sa kandharAstambhaM bhAlasya kuryAt|  UrdhvagatacUkukaH stano bhAlamUrdhvAkSaM kuryAt|  atilambhastana ucCvAsarodhAt jIvitasaMCayaM kuryAt|  garbhiNyAH stanyaM pArigarbhikaM karoti|  pArigarbhikaM garbhiNIstanyapAnajaM bhAlAmaye vakSyate|| 33||

 stanyAphAve payaCCAgaM gavyaM vA tadguNaM piphet||34||  mUlaiH siddhaM phRhatyAdyaiH sthirAphyAM vA sitAyutam||34||

stanyAbhAve strIstanyAbhAve tadguNamiti pUrvoktasya strIstanyasya sarvairAkArAdibhirguNaiH sadRCam|  tacca gavyaM chAgaM vA bRhatyAdyairmUlairlaghunA paJcamUlena siddham|  sthirAbhyAM vA siddhamubhayamapi sitAyutam|| 34||

 caturthe sUtikAgArAdagniskandapurogamAn||35||  mAse niSkrAmayeddevAn namaskarttu svalaMkRtAm||35||

taJca bAlaM janmanaCcaturthe mAse sUtikAgArAt svalaMkRtaM niSkrAmayedagniskandapurogamAn devAn namaskartum|  karoti kiryAkarmApekSayA|  karmaNi dvitIyA|| 35||

 paJcame mAsi puNye~ahni dharaNyAmupaveCayet||36||  dvikiSkumAtraM liptAyAM baliM datvA caturdiCam||36||  dharaNyaCeSaphUtAnAM mAtA tvamasi kAmadhuk||36||  ajarA cAprameyA ca sarvaphUtanamaskRtA||36||  carAcarANAM  lokAnAM pratiSThAsyavyayAsi ca||36||  kumAraM pAhi mAteva brahmA tadanumanyatAm||36||  svAheti mantreNAnena pratyahaM ca tataH param||36||  sACrayaM sAvalambaM ca kaTyAdIn mardayedanu||36||

tataH paJcame mAse puNye~ahani bhAlaM dharaNyAmupaveCayet|  kiSkudvayamAtraliptAyAM dharaNyAM dharaNItyAdinA svAhAntena mantreNa karaNabhUtena caturdiCaM bhaliM datvopaveCayet|  kiSkuhasto na vitastiH|

	pAThavipratipattinivRttaye mantravyAKyAnam|  he dharaNi! aCeSANAM bhUtAnAM tvamasi kAmadhuGmAtA|  kAmaM duhyata iti kAmadhuk|  na jIryata ityajarA tvamasi|  tathA pramAtumaCakyAprameyA|  sarvaiCca bhUtairnamaskRtA|  carA bhUtA jaGgamAH acarA sthAvarAsteSAM sarveSAM tvamasi pratiSThA|  na vyeti nAnA na gacCatItyavyayA nirvikArA cainaM kumAraM pAhi|  yathA mAtA putraM pAti|  tacca kumArapAlanaM bhavatyA bhrahmAnumanyatAm|  evaM prathamamupaveCayet|  tataH paraM pratyahaM sACrayaM sAvalambhaM copaveCayet|  ACraya Asanam|  avalambhaM pAtarakSaNam|  upaveCanAdanu ca bhAlasya kaTyUrujAnvAdIn mardayet|| 36||

 SaSThe~annaprACanaM mAsi kramAttacca prayojayet||37||  cirAnniSevamANo~annaM bAlo nAturyamaCnute||37||  phajedyathA yathA cAnnaM stanyaM tyAjyaM tathA tathA||37||

SaSThe mAsyannaprACanaM kuryAt|  tacca krameNa stokAbhyAsena prayojayet|  kramAdityatraiva hetuH cirAdityAdi|  sa ca bhAlo yathA yathA vRddhyA~annaM bhajettathA tathA~apacayena stanyaM tyajet|| 37||

 SaTsaptASTamamAseSu nIrujasya Cubhe~ahani||38||  karNau himAgame viddhyeddhAtryaGkasthasya sAntvayan||38||  prAgdakSiNaM kumArasya bhiSagvAmaM tu yoSitaH||38||  dakSiNena dadhat sUcIM pAlImanyena pANinA||38||  madhyataH karNapIThasya kiddigaNDACayaM prati||38||  jarAyumAtrapracchanne raviraCmyavabhAsite||38||  ghRtasya niCcalaM samyagalaktakarasAGkite||38||  vidhyeddaivakRte chidre sakRdevarju lAghavAt||38||  nordhvaM na pArCvato nAdhaH sirAstatra hi saMCritAH||38||  kAlikAmarmarIraktAstadvyadhAdrAgarugjvarAH||38||  saCophadAhasaMrambhamanyAstambhApatAnakAH||38||  teSAM yathAmayaM kuryAdvibhajyACu cikitsitam||38||  sthAnavyadhAnna rudhiraM na rugrAgAdisambhavaH||38||  snehAktaM sUcyanusyUtaM sUtraM cAnu nidhApayet||38||  Amatailena siJcecca bahalAM tadvadArayA||38||  viddhyetpAlIM hitabhujaH saJcAryAtha sthavIyasI||38||  vartistryahAttato rUDhaM vardhayeta CanaiH CanaiH||38||  sveditodvartitaM karNamabhyaktaM bRMhaNaiH punaH||38||  nAjIrNe na malodreke na cAtyuSNe~api vardhayet||38||  sadA ca yuJjyAdabhyaGgAn karNapAlIgadoditAn||38||  puSTinIruktvajananAniti saMvardhite dRDhe||38||  kaladhautAvabaddhAni karNe ratnAni  nikSipet||38||  bhindyAdavRddhau strINAntu pAlImantarapAGgataH||38||  naiva cApAGgayorbAhyAM vyApadaH syustato dhruvAH||38||  jihvasUcIvyadhAdvartigADhatvAdathavA malaiH||38||  jAte mahati saMrambhe vartimACvapanIya tat||38||  yavairaNDajaTAyaSTImaJjiSThAjyaiH pralepayet||38||  surUDhaM ca punarviddhayettvarayA tu vivardhanAt||38||  chidyeta pAlI Cuddhasya CuddhAstrAM sandadhIta tAm||38||  karNAmayaniSedhoktasandhAnavidhinA bhiSak||38||

tataH SaSThAdyanyatame mAse bAlasya nIrujasya sato himAgame CItakAle~ahani dhAtryaGkasthasya sAntvayan bhiSakkarNau viddhyet|  kumArasya prAk pUrvaM dakSiNaM karNa viddhyettato vAmam|  yoSitaH pragvAmaM viddhyettato dakSiNam|  yaCca viddhyetsa dakSiNena pANinA sUcIM dadhAdviddhyet|  anyena vAmena pAlIM dadhat|  pAlI karNaCuSkulI|  

	kasmin pradeCe karNa viddhyedata Aha-madhyata ityAdi|  karNapIThasya karNAdhobhAgasya madhyato madhye kiJcicca gaNDACayamanusaran daivakRte chidre viddhyet|  jarAyumAtretyAdi|  daivakRtacchidraviCeSaNaM tatparijJAnahetuH|  jarAyuH sUtaCalkaH|  tanmAtreNa tanunA channe raviraCmibhiravabhAsite Alokite tasminnalaktakarasena yAvakenAGkite cihnite viddhyet|  sUcyabhighAtena ca sakRdekenaiva vAreNa viddhyet Rju ca lAghavAcca|  daivacchidrAdUrdhvamupari|  pArCvata adhaCca na viddhyet|  

	kuta ityAha-sirA ityAdi|  UrdhvaM kAlikA nAma sirA sthitA|  pArCvato marmarI|  adho raktA|  etAH CabdAnugatArthAH|  tAsAM vyAdhAdrAgAdyudbhavaH|  teSAM ca rAgAdInAM yathAsvaM rogaM vibhajya bhedairvikalpyACu cikitsitaM kuryAt|  sthAnavyadhAt punaH rudhirAdInAmasambhavaH|  

	vyadhAdanantaraM sUcyanusyUtaM mUlabhAge lagnaM snehenAktaM sUtraM karNe nidhApayet|  anu ca karNamAmatailena siJcediti sAmAnyam|  viCeSa ucyate|  bahalAM pAlIM ghanAM tadvatsUcIvyadhanaprakAreNAsyA viddhyaddhitabhujaH sato bAlasya|  evamubhayathA vedhaH|  dvividhe~api vedhetryahAt karNe sthavIyasI varttiH saJcAryA|  tata UrdhvaM vigataCalyakSataM karNacchidraM CanaiH Canairvardhayet|  taJca karNaM sveditodvartitaM santaM vardhayet|  udvartanena snehaprayoga uktaH|  punaCcodvartanAt bRMhaNaiH snehairabhyaktaM santaM vardhayet|  

	ajIrNe taM na vardhayedvardhanAya kriyAM na kuryAt|  malodreke doSodreke sati na vardhayet|  atyuSNe deCe kAle vA na vardhayet|  tasmiMCca karNe vakSyamANaiH karNapAlIvyAdhyuktasnehairabhyaGgaM kuryAt|  puSTItyAdyabhyaGgaviCeSaNam|  ityanena prakAreNa saMvardhite dRDhe ca sati kaladhautena suvarNenAvabaddhAni ratnAni nikSipet|  

	strINAM yadi karNo na vardhate tato~antarapAGgataH pAlIM bhindyAt punarvardhayet|  apAGgayorbAhyA kRkATikA tato naiva pAlIM bhindyAt|  tato bAhyapAlicchedAd dhruvA sthirA vyApadaH syuH|  

jihvasUcIvyadhAdinA mahati saMrambhe kope jAte ACu vartimapanIya yavAdibhiH pralepayet|  tajjihvasUcIviddhaM lepena ca surUDhaM punarvidhyet|  

	tvarayA vivardhanAt kadAcit pAlI chidyeta|  tAM chinnAM pAlI Cuddhasya kRtaCodhanasya CuddhAstrAM srAvitaduSTaraktAM sandadhIta|  kathamityAha-karNAmayaniSedhAdhyAyoktena sandhAnavidhinA bhiSak sandadhIta|| 38||

 varSaM svavasaterbAhyaM kumArasya na darCayet||39||  dIpamAtapamagniM ca rUpamanyacca phAsuram||39||

varSamityAdi subodham|  dIpAdikamapi na darCayet|| 39||

 athaitaM jAtadaCanaM kramaCo~apanayet stanAt||40||  pUrvoktaM yojayet kSIramannaJca laghu bRMhaNam||40||

atha varSAdanantaraM jAtadaCanaM bAlaM kramaCaH stanAdapanayet|  kSIraM ca pUrvoktamihaiva paJcamUlaCRtaM yaduktaM tadyojayedannaM laghu bRMhaNaM ca  || 40||

uttarasthAnam

bAlopacaraNIyaH

 kuryAdapastanaM snehasaMkrAntyA stanalepanaiH||41||  phIphatsairyA vakAsekakRtrimakSatadarCanaiH||41||

atre ca prayujyamAne~apastanaM kuryAt|  kenetyAha-stane snehasaMkrAntyA tathA lepanairbhIbhatsaistathA yAvakAsekenAlaktasekena stane raktabhuddhijanakena kRtrimANAM ca sindUrAdikRtAnAM stane kSatAnAM vraNAnAM darCanena ca|| 41||

 priyAlamajjamadhukamadhulAjasitopalaiH||42||  apastanyasya saMyojyaH prINano modakaH CiCoH||42||  dIpano phAlaphilvailACarkarAlAjasaktuphiH||42||  saMgrAhI dhAtakIpuSpaCarkarAlAjatarpaNaiH||42||

acirAdapastanyasya bhAlasya priyAlamajjAdibhiH modakaH prINanaH saMyojyaH|  tathA bhAlabhilvAdibhiH dIpanaH|  dhAtakIpuSpAdibhiH saMgrahaNaH|| 42||

 phuphukSA cet praphalatAmapastanyasya gacCati||43||  atyagnijiddhitaM tasya vidhAnaM pArigarphikam||43||

apastanyasya ca yadi bhubhukSA prabhalatAM gacCati, tato~asyAtyagnividhAnaM pArigarbhikaM ca hitam|  pArigarbhiko nAma rogo bhAlasya mAturgarbhiNyAH stanyaM pibhato~apyapibhato~api bhAlAmayapratiSedhe vakSyate|| 43||

 abhiyuktaH sadAcAro nAtisthUlo na lolupaH||44||  kumAradhAraH karttavyastatrAdyo bAlacittavit||44||  adhArmikaM durAcAraH sthUlo vikaTagAminam||44||  karoti lolupo bAlaM ghasmaratvena rogiNam||44||

abhiyuktatvAdiyuktaH pumAn kumAradhAraH kAryaH|  subodham|  sa ca ghasmaratvenAdanaCIlatvena hetunA rogiNaM bAlaM karoti|| 44||

 rogAMCcAsya jayetsaumyairbheSajairaviSAdakaiH||45||  anyatrAtyayikAdvyAdhevirekaM sutarAM tyajet||45||

asya ca bAlasya sarvAn rogAn saumyaireva bheSajairjayedviSAdakavarjitaiH|  kuSThAdiSvapi vyAdhiSu viSAdakaM tIkSNaM pariharedityarthaH|  bAlasya virekaM sutarAM tyajet|  etatkiM sarvatra, netyAha|  AtyayikAn kuSThAdivyadheranyatra|  Atyayike tu vyAdhau virecanaM yojyameva|  bAlasya ca tIkSNaM virekaM pariharedityarthaH|| 45||

 trAsayennAvidheyaM ca trastaM gRhNanti hi grahAH||46||  vastrapAtAtparasparCAtpAlayellaGGanAcca tam||46||

avidheyaM ca bAlaM trAsayennApi tu soumyena vidheyaM kuryAt|  yatastaM bAlaM skandAdayo grahA gRhNanti|  vastrapAtAdikAcca vaidyo bAlaM pAlayet|  vastrapAto muKAdiSu vastrapatanam|| 46||

 krIDAbhUmiH samA kAryA niCCastropalaCarkarA||47||  velloSaNakaNAmbhobhiH siktA nimbodakena vA||47||  jAtuSaM ghoSaviccitramatrAMsa ramaNaM bRhat||47||  atIkSNAgraM gavACvAdimaGgalyamatha vA phalam||47||

bhAlasya krIDAbhUmirnimnonnatarahitA CastrAdivivarjitA ca kAryA|  subhodham|| 47||

 CaktimantaM yathAvarNaM vidyAmadhyApayettataH||48||  anuCiSyAtsadA cainaM dharmAya vinayAya ca||48||  yathA nendriyaduSTACvairhniyate yauvanAgame||48||

tato~anantaraM vidyAgrahaNaCaktimantaM bAlaM vidyAmadhyApayet|  enaM ca bAlaM dharmArthaM vinayArthaM ca sadA~anuCiSyAcchikSayet|  tathA cAnuCiSyAd yathA duSTairavidheyairindriyairevACvairyauvanAgame na hriyate na paratantrIkriyate|| 48||

 abhyaGgodvartanaM snAnaM pratyahaM ca samAcaret||49||  sahadevAsthirAkauntIkumudotpalacandanaiH||49||  bRhatIphalatakkArIsarSapAkuSThasaindhavaiH||49||  aCvagandhAbalairaNDatilApAmArgataNDulaiH||49||  sAtmaguptAphalaistailaM sAjakSIraM vipAcitam||49||  rakSoghnaH puStido~abhyaGgastadvadudvartanaM ca taiH||49||  dadhimAkSikasaMyuktaistriguNIkRtacikkasaiH||49||  mUrvAmUladvirajanIyavaiCcodvartanaM hitam||49||  kulatthacUrNamekaM vA vAjigandhArajo~api vA||49||  snAne sarvauSadhIkalko jIvanIyAmbu ceSyate||49||

bAlasya cAbhyaGgAdikaM pratyahaM samAcaret|  sahadevAdibhirajAkSIrayuktaM tailaM pAcitaM rakSoghnatvAdiguNo~abhyaGgo bhavati|  sahadevA balA|  sthirA sAlaparNI|  kauntI hareNukA|  bRhatyAH phalaM tathoktam|  taiH sahadevAdidabhirudvartanaM tadvaditi rakSoghnaM puSTikRcca|  kimbhUtaiH sahadevAdidabhirudvartanamityAha-dadhimAkSikayuktaistriguNIkRtacikkasaiCca|  ISat bhRSTAnAM yavAnAM cUrNaM cikkasam|  

	mUrvAdibhirdvitIyamudvartanam|  athavaikaM kevalameva kulatthacUrNamudvartanam|  vAjigandhAyA aCvagandhAyA rajaCcUrNaMvA kevalam|  bAlasya ca snAne prasiddhAnAM sarvauSadhInAM kalka iSyate jIvanIyaCRtaM jalaM ca|| 49||

 AragvadhAdiniryUhe CRtaM CItavasantayoH||50||  vatsakAdipratIvApaM kumAraM prACayed ghRtam||50||  grISme vAtAtapasvedairbAlaH klAmyatyato himam||50||  prAtareva pibed dugdhaM jIvanIyagaNaiH CRtam||50||  sitAghRtADhyAn saktUMCca lihyAnna tveva pItakam||50||  nAtyambupAyI lihyAdvA ghRtasAtmyo ghRtaM CRtam||50||  kAkolICarkarAmedAtugAyaSTyAhvajIvakaiH||50||  kuTannaTena mUrdhAnaM lippedanyaCca CItalaiH||50||  rAsnAsaralavarSAbhUhiGgusaindhavadArubhiH||50||  sarpirvidAryAdijale sAdhitaM lehayecchiCum||50||  prapaNDarIkaM madhukaM sUpyaparNyau durAlabhA||50||  priyAlamajjAkAkolIvidArIkaTphalAmRtAH||50||  drAkSAjaCRGgI dugdhIkA kSIraCuklA hayAhvayA||50||  CRGgImadhukakusumamedarSabhakajIvakam||50||  ebhiH kSIraghRtaM siddhaM lihyAdbAlo ghanAtyaye||50||

CItavasantayoCcAragvadhAdigaNakvAthe vatsakAdipratIvApaM ghRtaM CRtaM pAyayet|  grISme ca vAtAdibhirbAlo yataH klAmyatyato jIvanIyagaNaiH CRtaM dugdhaM prAtareva pibet|  sitayA ghRtena cADhyAn saktUn lihyAt|  pItakaM na tveva pibediti sambadhyate|  pItako manthaH|  

	athavA grISme yo RtasAtmyo bAlaH so~atyambupAnaM pariharan kAkolyAdibhirjIvakAntaiH CRtaM ghRtaM lihyAt|  bAlasya ca mUrdhAnaM grISme kuTannaTena plavena limpet|  anyaiCca CItalaiCcandanAdibhiH |

	vidAryAdibhiH kvAthe rAsnAdibhirghRtaM sAdhitaM CiCuM lehayet|  saralaM pIDAkhyam|  varSAbhUH punarnavA|  

	kSIrodbhavaM ghRtaM prapauNDarIdakAdibhiH siddhaM ghanAtyaye|  Caradi bAlo lihyAt|  dugdhikA kSIrikA|  kSIraCuklA kSIrakAkolI|  hayAhvayA aCvagandhA|| 50||

uttarasthAnam

bAlAmayapratiSedhaH

 athAto bAlAmayapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

athetyAdi pUrvavat|  bAlAnAmAmayasya pratiSedhaCcikitsA so~asminnucyata iti bAlAmayapratiSedhaH|| 1||

 trividho hi bAlaH prAguktastatra kSIrapasya kSIramaduSTaM prayuJjIta||2||  annAdasya hitamannam||2||  uphayavRtteruphayam||2||

prAk bhAlopacaraNIye~adhyAye trividhaH kSIrAnnobhayavRttitvena bhAla uktaH|  subhodham|  duSTaM kSIraM vakSyamANalakSaNaM bhavati|  ahitamannaM sUtre pradarCitam|  kSIraM duSTamityatra hetuH|| 2||

 kSIraM hi yathoktairdoSakopanairAhAravihArairdhAtryA vyApannaM
vividhAmayodayAya bAlasya prakalpate||3||

kSIraM dhAtryA vyApannaM tadupayogino bAlasya vividhAnAmAmayAnAmudayAya kalpate|  kena vyApannamityAha|  yathoktaiH sUtre pradarCitairAhArairvihAraiCca|| 3||

 tatra CyAvAruNavarNaM tiktakaSAyAnurasaM viCadaM rUkSamalakSyagandhaM phenilamatRptikaramAdhmAnamUtravarcovibandhakRt karCanamsu visarpati vicchinnaJca plavate vAtaduSTam||4||  kRSNanIlatAmrAvabhAsaM tiktAmlakaTukAnurasaM kuNaparudhiragandhi bhRCoSNamapsu pItarAjimadvidAhakaraJca pittaduSTam||4||  atyarthaCuklamadhuraM lavaNAnurasaM ghRtatailavasAmajjagandhi picchilaM bahalaM tantumadgurusalile~avasIdati nidrAbahulaJcaCleSmaduSTam||4||

tatra vAtaduSTaM CyAvAdilakSaNam|  tiktakaSAyAvanurasau yasya tat|  anurasakathanaM mAdhuryasya pradhAnasnigdhatvAt|  alakSyagandhamavyaktagandham|  apsu visarpati vyApnoti|  apsu ca vicchinnaM sat plavate|  

	kRSNAdilakSaNaM pittaduSTam|  kuNapaM klinnam|  atyarthaCuklAdilakSaNaM CleSmaduSTam|  bahalaM ghanam|  nidrAbahulamupayoginaH|| 4||

 tadupayujyamAnaM yathAsvaliGgAn vyAdhInabhinirvartayati||5||

taditi vAtAdiduSTaM kSIraM yathAsvaliGgAn vyAdhInupajanayati|  liGgaM lakSaNam|  vAtena duSTaM kSIraM vAtaliGgAn vyAdhInabhivardhayati|  pittaduSTaM pittaliGgAnevaM kaphe~apIti yathAsvaMCabdARthaH|| 5||

 sa yaM pradeCamabhIkSNaM spRCati sparCaM ca na kSamate tatra rujamupalakSayet||6||  nimIlitAkSatayA mUrdhni rujam||6||  jihvauSThadaMCaCvAsamuSTibandhordhvekSaNairhRdaye||6||  viNmUtrasaGgacchardyAdhmAnAntrakUjanastanadaMCaveSTanapRSThavinamanajaTharonnamanairjaThare||6||  mUtrasaGgatRNmUrcchotrAsadigvIkSaNakhallIhastapAdastambhakubjIbhavanakeCaluJjanairbastau guhyo ca||6||  sarvatra ca svabhAvAtiriktarodanena mukhavikUNanena ca||6||

sa iti bAlaH yaM CarIrapradeCamabhIkSNaM paunaHpunyena spRCati anyasparCanaM ca na kSamate na sahate tatrAsya rujaM bhiSagupalakSayet|

	nimIlitAkSatayA~asya bAlasya mUrdhni Cirasi rujamupalakSayet|  jihvAdaMCAdibhirUrdhvanirIkSaNAntairhRdaye rujamupalakSayet|  daMCo daMCanam|  viNmUtrasaGgAdibhirjaThare|  stane daMCanam stanadaMCaH|  veSTanamaGgamoTanikA|  mUtrasaGgAdibhirbastau guhye ca rujamupalakSayet|  svabhAvAdatiriktarodanAdi sarvasminpradeCe rujAyAH sAmAnyalakSaNam|| 6||

 atha yathAmayaM yathAdoSaM ca dhAtryAH CamanaCodhanAni prayuJjIta||7||

athetyAdinA cikitsA|  bAlAmayapratiSedheSu dhAtryAH CamanAni CodhanAni ca yathopayogaM yuJjIta|  yathArogamiti rogaM rogasvabhAvAnatikrameNa|  yathAdoSamiti taddhetuvAtAdyanatikrameNa|| 7||

 tatra vAtadUSite stanye devarArusaralakaTurohiNIvacAkuSThapAThAbhArGgIMmAgadhikAvRCcikAlIcitrakAjamodaCuNThImarIcAnAM kvAthaM daCamUlakvAthaM vA trirAtraM pAyayitvA vAtavyAdhivihitAnAM sarpiSAmanyatamaM nigadaM madirAnupAnaM dadyAdvAtaharadravyasiddhaM vA||10||  tataH snigdhAM mRdu virecya bastikarmaNopacaret||10||  vAtaghnaiCcAbhyaGgasvedopadehonmardanaiH||10||  saralarAsnAjamodAdevadArucUrNaM sarpiSA bAlamavalehayet||10||  evaMvidhaireva ca vipakvaM saCarkaraM sarpiH||10||  api ca tiktAnurasaM stanyaM mudgamASapalACACyAM kAkolIyugalena ca Codhayet||10||  priyAGgudhAtakOpuSpapadmakadevadArukSaudrairvA||10||  kaSAyAnurasaM hiGgusaindhavavatA ghRtena||10||  phenilaM vicchinnaM plavamAnaJca bilvAgnimanthaCRtena payasA haviSA ca||10||  sUpyaparNI kAkolIbRhatyavalgujaphalairvA||10||

tatreti nirdhAraNe|  vAtadUSite stanye dhAtrI devadArvAdikvAthaM daCamUlAdikvAthaM vA trirAtraM pAyayet|  tato~anantaraM vAtavyAdhivihitAnAM sarpiSAmanyatamaM CodhanAdigaNoktavAtaharadravyasiddhaM vA sarpirmadirAnupAnaM dadyAt|  nigadaM nirdoSam|  evaM snigdhAM dhAtrIM mRdu virecya bastikarmaNA yathAprAptenopAcaret|  vAtaghnadravyakRtatvAcca vAtaghnairabhyaGgAdibhirupAcaret|  tatra ca vAtadUSite saralAdicUrNaM sarpiSA vaidyo bAlamavalehayet|  evaMvidhaiH pakvaM siddhaM sarpiH saCarkaram|  

	api ceti samuccaye|  tiktAnurasaM stanyaM mudgAdibhiH priyaGgvAdibhirvA Codhayet|  kaSAyAnurasaM tu hiGgusaindhavayuktena ghRtena Codhayet|  phenilaM vicchinnaM plavamAnaM ca bilvAdiCRtena payasA haviSA ca Codhayet|  ubhayamapyubhayena|  sUrpaparNyAdibhirvaitadubhayaM Codhayet|  iti vAtaduSTe|| 8||

 pitte~amRtApaTolapatrasArivACatAvarInimbacandanakvAthaM dhAtrI bAlaCca pibet||9||  triphalAbhUnimbakaTukAmustakvAthaM vA||9||  jIvakarSabhakadvikAkolImadhukakaTphalakarkaTaCRGgIkvAthaM vA||9||  sakSaudraM paTolAdipadmakAdiM vA||9||  sArivAdiM nyagrodhAdiM vA||9||  ebhireva ca dravyaiH sarpiSi pittaghnAni ca virecanAni CItAMCcAbhyaGgapradehasekAn kuryAt||9||  api-ca tAmrAvabhAsaM payo hRdayamudveSTayati||9||  tatpriyaGgumustACAbaralodhraiH Codhayet||9||  amlAnurasamamlapittakaram||9||  tat drAkSAmadhukapayasyACrIparNIbhiH||9||  kaTukAnurasaM chardyatIsArakAsaCvAsakaram||9||  tat kAkolIvidArIbhyAM madhuparNyA ca||9||  bhRCoSNamanAmadAhajvarakaraM virecanaM ca taccandanotpalakamalaiH||9||

pitte pittaduSTe stanye amRtAdInAM kvAthaM dhAtrI pibet bAlaCca|  triphalAdikvAthaM vA tau pibetAm|  jIvakAdikvAthaM vA|  paTolAdyanyatamakvAthaM sakSaudraM tau pibetAm|  ebhireva ca yathAyogaM pRthak kvAthoktairdravyaiH sarpISi kuryAt|  kalpoktAni pittahantRNi virecanAni ca|  CItAMCcAbhyaGgAdIMCca|  

	api ceti samuccaye|  tAmrAvabhAsaguNaM stanyam bAlasya hRdayodveSTanaM karoti|  tat kSIraM priyaGgvAdibhirnirdoSaM kuryAt|  amlAnurasaM stanyaM bAlasyAmlapittakaraM bhavati|  tat kSIraM drAkSAdibhiH Codhayet|  kaTukAnurasaM stanyaM chardyAdikaraM bhavati|  tat kSIraM kAkolIvidArIbhyAM CodhayenmadhuparNyA ca|  madhuparNI jIvantI|  bhRCoSNaM stanyaM bAlasyAnAmAdikaraM bhavati|  tatstanyaM candanAdibhiH Codhayet|  anAmo nAma rogo raktakaphodbhavo vakSyate|  iti pittaduSTe||9||

 kaphe tu saindhavaphiphphalIyuktaM sarphirbAlaM phAyayet||10||  saindhavamadhukasaMsRSTaM vA madanapuSpakalkena ca sakSaudreNa stanaM bAlasya coSThamAlimpet||10||  tena suKaM vamati||10||  dhAtrIM tu tIkSNairvAmayet||10||  tataH kRtasaMsarjanAM paJcamUlaGanavacAtiviSAkvAthaM pAyayet||10||  tagarasuradArusurendrayavapRthvIkAvRCcikAlIkvAthaM vA||10||  AragvadhAdiM mustAdiM vA||10||  rUkSoSNAMCca nasyadhUmagaNDUSapariSekAn CIlayet||10||  aviruddhaMcAnnapAnaM yojayet||10||  api ca-lavaNAnurasaM visarpakoThakaNDUkaram||10||  tat picumandapaTolIkSIrIvRkSaiH Codhayet||10||  tantumaddaurbalyaCvAsakAsakaram||10||  tat pippalInAgaracUrNena samadhuGRtena||10||  gurusadanAtmakaM pratiCyAyasiGGANakakSIrAlasakakaram||10||  tat pAThAvyoSakalkena paJcakolacUrNena vA kSaudraGRtAplutena||10||  doSopakramaNIyaM cekSeta||10||

kaPe kaPaduSTe stanye punaH saindhavapippalIbhyAM yuktaM sarpirbhAlaM pAyayet|  saindhavAdisaMsRSTaM vA vamanAyetyarthAdgamyate|  madanapuSpANAM ca kalkena kSaudrayuktena dhAtryAH stanau bhAlasya coSThAvAlimpet|  tena hyAlepanena bhAlaH suKaM vamati|  dhAtrI tu tIkSNairyathAyogyaM vamanairvAmayet|  tato vamane kRte kRtasaMsarjanAM vihitapeyAdikramAM dhAtrIM paJcamUlAdikvAthaM tagarAdikvAthaM vA pAyayet|  indrayava eva surendrayavaH|  pRthvIkA hiGgupatrikA|  mustAdigaNamAragvadhAdigaNaM vA pAyayet|  prakaraNAt kvathitam|  rUkSoSNadravyaiH kRtatvAd rUkSoSNAn nasyAdIn CIlayet|  annapAnaM cAviruddhaM yojayedarthAcCleSmaNIti| 

api ceti samuccaye|  lavaNAnurasaM stanyaM bhAlasya visarpAdikaraM bhavati|  koThAH sotsedhAni raktamaNDalAni|  tat kSIraM picumandAdibhiH Codhayet|  picumando nimbhaH|  tantumatkSIraM daurbhalyAdikaraM bhavati|  tatkSIraM pippalInAgaracUrNena madhuGRtAbhyAM yuktena Codhayet|  guru tu kSIraM sadanAtmakaM sAdakarasvabhAvaM pratiCyAyAdikaraM ca|  siGGANakaM nAsAsrAvaH|  kSIrAlasakaM vakSyamANalakSaNam|  tat guru kSIraM pAThAdikalkena Codhayet|  paJcakolasya cUrNena vA kSaudraGRtAplutena|  iti kaPaduSTe|  

	eSu ca vAtAdiduSTeSu stanyeSu doSopakramaNiyaM cekSeta|  taduktena prakAreNa saMyojanAdinA pRthak saMsRSTAnAM ca doSANaM cikitsA bhavatItyarthaH|| 10||

uttarasthAnam

bAlAmayapratiSedhaH

 athAto bAlAmayapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

athetyAdi pUrvavat|  bAlAnAmAmayasya pratiSedhaCcikitsA so~asminnucyata iti bAlAmayapratiSedhaH|| 1||

 trividho hi bAlaH prAguktastatra kSIrapasya kSIramaduSTaM prayuJjIta||2||  annAdasya hitamannam||2||  uphayavRtteruphayam||2||

prAk bhAlopacaraNIye~adhyAye trividhaH kSIrAnnobhayavRttitvena bhAla uktaH|  subhodham|  duSTaM kSIraM vakSyamANalakSaNaM bhavati|  ahitamannaM sUtre pradarCitam|  kSIraM duSTamityatra hetuH|| 2||

 kSIraM hi yathoktairdoSakopanairAhAravihArairdhAtryA vyApannaM
vividhAmayodayAya bAlasya prakalpate||3||

kSIraM dhAtryA vyApannaM tadupayogino bAlasya vividhAnAmAmayAnAmudayAya kalpate|  kena vyApannamityAha|  yathoktaiH sUtre pradarCitairAhArairvihAraiCca|| 3||

 tatra CyAvAruNavarNaM tiktakaSAyAnurasaM viCadaM rUkSamalakSyagandhaM phenilamatRptikaramAdhmAnamUtravarcovibandhakRt karCanamsu visarpati vicchinnaJca plavate vAtaduSTam||4||  kRSNanIlatAmrAvabhAsaM tiktAmlakaTukAnurasaM kuNaparudhiragandhi bhRCoSNamapsu pItarAjimadvidAhakaraJca pittaduSTam||4||  atyarthaCuklamadhuraM lavaNAnurasaM ghRtatailavasAmajjagandhi picchilaM bahalaM tantumadgurusalile~avasIdati nidrAbahulaJcaCleSmaduSTam||4||

tatra vAtaduSTaM CyAvAdilakSaNam|  tiktakaSAyAvanurasau yasya tat|  anurasakathanaM mAdhuryasya pradhAnasnigdhatvAt|  alakSyagandhamavyaktagandham|  apsu visarpati vyApnoti|  apsu ca vicchinnaM sat plavate|  

	kRSNAdilakSaNaM pittaduSTam|  kuNapaM klinnam|  atyarthaCuklAdilakSaNaM CleSmaduSTam|  bahalaM ghanam|  nidrAbahulamupayoginaH|| 4||

 tadupayujyamAnaM yathAsvaliGgAn vyAdhInabhinirvartayati||5||

taditi vAtAdiduSTaM kSIraM yathAsvaliGgAn vyAdhInupajanayati|  liGgaM lakSaNam|  vAtena duSTaM kSIraM vAtaliGgAn vyAdhInabhivardhayati|  pittaduSTaM pittaliGgAnevaM kaphe~apIti yathAsvaMCabdARthaH|| 5||

 sa yaM pradeCamabhIkSNaM spRCati sparCaM ca na kSamate tatra rujamupalakSayet||6||  nimIlitAkSatayA mUrdhni rujam||6||  jihvauSThadaMCaCvAsamuSTibandhordhvekSaNairhRdaye||6||  viNmUtrasaGgacchardyAdhmAnAntrakUjanastanadaMCaveSTanapRSThavinamanajaTharonnamanairjaThare||6||  mUtrasaGgatRNmUrcchotrAsadigvIkSaNakhallIhastapAdastambhakubjIbhavanakeCaluJjanairbastau guhyo ca||6||  sarvatra ca svabhAvAtiriktarodanena mukhavikUNanena ca||6||

sa iti bAlaH yaM CarIrapradeCamabhIkSNaM paunaHpunyena spRCati anyasparCanaM ca na kSamate na sahate tatrAsya rujaM bhiSagupalakSayet|

	nimIlitAkSatayA~asya bAlasya mUrdhni Cirasi rujamupalakSayet|  jihvAdaMCAdibhirUrdhvanirIkSaNAntairhRdaye rujamupalakSayet|  daMCo daMCanam|  viNmUtrasaGgAdibhirjaThare|  stane daMCanam stanadaMCaH|  veSTanamaGgamoTanikA|  mUtrasaGgAdibhirbastau guhye ca rujamupalakSayet|  svabhAvAdatiriktarodanAdi sarvasminpradeCe rujAyAH sAmAnyalakSaNam|| 6||

 atha yathAmayaM yathAdoSaM ca dhAtryAH CamanaCodhanAni prayuJjIta||7||

athetyAdinA cikitsA|  bAlAmayapratiSedheSu dhAtryAH CamanAni CodhanAni ca yathopayogaM yuJjIta|  yathArogamiti rogaM rogasvabhAvAnatikrameNa|  yathAdoSamiti taddhetuvAtAdyanatikrameNa|| 7||

 tatra vAtadUSite stanye devarArusaralakaTurohiNIvacAkuSThapAThAbhArGgIMmAgadhikAvRCcikAlIcitrakAjamodaCuNThImarIcAnAM kvAthaM daCamUlakvAthaM vA trirAtraM pAyayitvA vAtavyAdhivihitAnAM sarpiSAmanyatamaM nigadaM madirAnupAnaM dadyAdvAtaharadravyasiddhaM vA||10||  tataH snigdhAM mRdu virecya bastikarmaNopacaret||10||  vAtaghnaiCcAbhyaGgasvedopadehonmardanaiH||10||  saralarAsnAjamodAdevadArucUrNaM sarpiSA bAlamavalehayet||10||  evaMvidhaireva ca vipakvaM saCarkaraM sarpiH||10||  api ca tiktAnurasaM stanyaM mudgamASapalACACyAM kAkolIyugalena ca Codhayet||10||  priyAGgudhAtakOpuSpapadmakadevadArukSaudrairvA||10||  kaSAyAnurasaM hiGgusaindhavavatA ghRtena||10||  phenilaM vicchinnaM plavamAnaJca bilvAgnimanthaCRtena payasA haviSA ca||10||  sUpyaparNI kAkolIbRhatyavalgujaphalairvA||10||

tatreti nirdhAraNe|  vAtadUSite stanye dhAtrI devadArvAdikvAthaM daCamUlAdikvAthaM vA trirAtraM pAyayet|  tato~anantaraM vAtavyAdhivihitAnAM sarpiSAmanyatamaM CodhanAdigaNoktavAtaharadravyasiddhaM vA sarpirmadirAnupAnaM dadyAt|  nigadaM nirdoSam|  evaM snigdhAM dhAtrIM mRdu virecya bastikarmaNA yathAprAptenopAcaret|  vAtaghnadravyakRtatvAcca vAtaghnairabhyaGgAdibhirupAcaret|  tatra ca vAtadUSite saralAdicUrNaM sarpiSA vaidyo bAlamavalehayet|  evaMvidhaiH pakvaM siddhaM sarpiH saCarkaram|  

	api ceti samuccaye|  tiktAnurasaM stanyaM mudgAdibhiH priyaGgvAdibhirvA Codhayet|  kaSAyAnurasaM tu hiGgusaindhavayuktena ghRtena Codhayet|  phenilaM vicchinnaM plavamAnaM ca bilvAdiCRtena payasA haviSA ca Codhayet|  ubhayamapyubhayena|  sUrpaparNyAdibhirvaitadubhayaM Codhayet|  iti vAtaduSTe|| 8||

 pitte~amRtApaTolapatrasArivACatAvarInimbacandanakvAthaM dhAtrI bAlaCca pibet||9||  triphalAbhUnimbakaTukAmustakvAthaM vA||9||  jIvakarSabhakadvikAkolImadhukakaTphalakarkaTaCRGgIkvAthaM vA||9||  sakSaudraM paTolAdipadmakAdiM vA||9||  sArivAdiM nyagrodhAdiM vA||9||  ebhireva ca dravyaiH sarpiSi pittaghnAni ca virecanAni CItAMCcAbhyaGgapradehasekAn kuryAt||9||  api-ca tAmrAvabhAsaM payo hRdayamudveSTayati||9||  tatpriyaGgumustACAbaralodhraiH Codhayet||9||  amlAnurasamamlapittakaram||9||  tat drAkSAmadhukapayasyACrIparNIbhiH||9||  kaTukAnurasaM chardyatIsArakAsaCvAsakaram||9||  tat kAkolIvidArIbhyAM madhuparNyA ca||9||  bhRCoSNamanAmadAhajvarakaraM virecanaM ca taccandanotpalakamalaiH||9||

pitte pittaduSTe stanye amRtAdInAM kvAthaM dhAtrI pibet bAlaCca|  triphalAdikvAthaM vA tau pibetAm|  jIvakAdikvAthaM vA|  paTolAdyanyatamakvAthaM sakSaudraM tau pibetAm|  ebhireva ca yathAyogaM pRthak kvAthoktairdravyaiH sarpISi kuryAt|  kalpoktAni pittahantRNi virecanAni ca|  CItAMCcAbhyaGgAdIMCca|  

	api ceti samuccaye|  tAmrAvabhAsaguNaM stanyam bAlasya hRdayodveSTanaM karoti|  tat kSIraM priyaGgvAdibhirnirdoSaM kuryAt|  amlAnurasaM stanyaM bAlasyAmlapittakaraM bhavati|  tat kSIraM drAkSAdibhiH Codhayet|  kaTukAnurasaM stanyaM chardyAdikaraM bhavati|  tat kSIraM kAkolIvidArIbhyAM CodhayenmadhuparNyA ca|  madhuparNI jIvantI|  bhRCoSNaM stanyaM bAlasyAnAmAdikaraM bhavati|  tatstanyaM candanAdibhiH Codhayet|  anAmo nAma rogo raktakaphodbhavo vakSyate|  iti pittaduSTe||9||

 kaphe tu saindhavaphiphphalIyuktaM sarphirbAlaM phAyayet||10||  saindhavamadhukasaMsRSTaM vA madanapuSpakalkena ca sakSaudreNa stanaM bAlasya coSThamAlimpet||10||  tena suKaM vamati||10||  dhAtrIM tu tIkSNairvAmayet||10||  tataH kRtasaMsarjanAM paJcamUlaGanavacAtiviSAkvAthaM pAyayet||10||  tagarasuradArusurendrayavapRthvIkAvRCcikAlIkvAthaM vA||10||  AragvadhAdiM mustAdiM vA||10||  rUkSoSNAMCca nasyadhUmagaNDUSapariSekAn CIlayet||10||  aviruddhaMcAnnapAnaM yojayet||10||  api ca-lavaNAnurasaM visarpakoThakaNDUkaram||10||  tat picumandapaTolIkSIrIvRkSaiH Codhayet||10||  tantumaddaurbalyaCvAsakAsakaram||10||  tat pippalInAgaracUrNena samadhuGRtena||10||  gurusadanAtmakaM pratiCyAyasiGGANakakSIrAlasakakaram||10||  tat pAThAvyoSakalkena paJcakolacUrNena vA kSaudraGRtAplutena||10||  doSopakramaNIyaM cekSeta||10||

kaPe kaPaduSTe stanye punaH saindhavapippalIbhyAM yuktaM sarpirbhAlaM pAyayet|  saindhavAdisaMsRSTaM vA vamanAyetyarthAdgamyate|  madanapuSpANAM ca kalkena kSaudrayuktena dhAtryAH stanau bhAlasya coSThAvAlimpet|  tena hyAlepanena bhAlaH suKaM vamati|  dhAtrI tu tIkSNairyathAyogyaM vamanairvAmayet|  tato vamane kRte kRtasaMsarjanAM vihitapeyAdikramAM dhAtrIM paJcamUlAdikvAthaM tagarAdikvAthaM vA pAyayet|  indrayava eva surendrayavaH|  pRthvIkA hiGgupatrikA|  mustAdigaNamAragvadhAdigaNaM vA pAyayet|  prakaraNAt kvathitam|  rUkSoSNadravyaiH kRtatvAd rUkSoSNAn nasyAdIn CIlayet|  annapAnaM cAviruddhaM yojayedarthAcCleSmaNIti|

	eSu ca vAtAdiduSTeSu stanyeSu doSopakramaNiyaM cekSeta|  taduktena prakAreNa saMyojanAdinA pRthak saMsRSTAnAM ca doSANaM cikitsA bhavatItyarthaH|| 10||

uttarasthAnam

bAlAmayapratiSedhaH

 yadA punardhAtrI sannipAtaprakopanAnyAseveta tadA~asyAstrayo malA yugapadvakSo~abhiprapannAH kSIravahA rasAyanIH samanusRtya saGkIrNaliGgaM stanyamAvahanti||11||  taccedavijJAnAt satatamapratyavekSaNAt pramAdAdvA mAtuH kumAraH pibati||11||  tataH sa tena salilopamamacchaM vicchinnamAmaM durgandhi nAnAvarNavedanaM phenilamatisAryate||11||  pItaCvetamUtratAviSTambhatRSNAjvaracchardivijRmbhikACuSkodgArArucibhramAGgabhaGgavikSepakUjanaghRANAkSimukhapAkadRSTyupaplavasvarasAdAdayaCcAsya prAdurbhavanti||11||  taM kSIrAlasakamatyayaM cAcakSate||11||

yadA tu dhAtrI sannipAtaprakopanAnyAhArAdInyAsevate tadAsyA dhAtryA yugapattrayo malA vAtapittaCleSmANo vakSa uro~abhiprapannAH prAptAH kSIravahA rasAyanIH samantAdanusRtya saGkIrNaliGgaM miCratridoSalakSaNayuktaM stanyamAvahanti kurvanti|  tat kSIramavijJAnAdvaidyasyApratyavekSaNAnmAturvA pramAdAdavahelAparatvAdyadi kumAraH pibati tataH sa tena sannipAtakSIreNa pItena salilopamatvAdiyuktaM malamatisAryate|  bAlasya pItaCvetamUtratAdayaCca sannipAtarogAH prAdurbhavanti|  asyeti kumArasya tamevaM lakSaNaM rogaviCeSaM kSIrAlasakamiti nAmnAtyayamiti cAcAryA AcakSate|| 11||

 tatra dhAtrIM bAlaJca pUrvamevACu vAmayet||12||  vihitasaMsargayoCca mustApAThAtiviSAkuSThakaTukAnAM kvAthaM pAnAya dadyAt||12||  rAsnAjamodApriyaGgubhadradArUNAM vA||12||  pAThAtejovatIpunarnavavRCcikAlInAM vA||12||  bhUnimbAmRtAkuTajaphalasArivANAM vA||12||  vacAharidrAdigaNayorvA||12||  pAThAdimahAkaSAyasya vA||12||  jambvAmratindukakapitthapatrANAM vA||12||  bilvabhaGgasya vA||12||  anubandhe ca yathAvyAdhiM pratikurvIta||12||

tatra pUrvameva prathamamevACu dhAtrIM bAlaM ca vAmayet|  vihitasaMsargayoH kRtapeyAdikramayordhAtrIbAlayordoSAdyapekSayA mustAdikvAthaM vA rAsnAdikvAthaM vA pAThAdikvAthaM vA bhUnimbAdikvAthaM vA, vacAharidrAdigaNakvAthaM vA, pAThAdimahAkaSAyakvAthaM vA, jambvAdikvAthaM vA, bilvabhaGgasya vA kvAthaM pAnAya dadyAt|  anubandhe tvanivRttau kSIrAlasakasya yathAvyAdhyutkRSTavyAdhyanatikrameNa yathAsvaM pratIkAraM kuryAt|| 12||

 dantodbhedaCca sarvarogAyatanam||13||  viCeSeNa tu tanmUlA jvaraCirobhitApatRSNAbhramAbhiSyandakukUNakapothakIvamathukAsaCvAsAtIsAravisarpAH||13||

rogacikitsAprasaGgenocyate|  dantAnAmudbhedo bAlasya sarvarogANAmAyatanaM kAraNam|  jvarAdayastu viCeSeNa tanmUlA dantodbhedahetukAH|  Ciro~abhitApaH CirorogeSu vakSyamANalakSaNaH|  abhiSyando nAma sarvAkSirogaH|  kukUNakapothakyau vartmarogeSu vakSyete||13||

 sa dIrghAyuSo~aSTamAnmAsAt parato vA pravartate||14||  itareSAM tu caturthAt||14||  te hyatibAlye dantotpAdavedanayA nipIDitA na samyak sampUrNadhAtubalA bhavanti||14||

sa dantodbhedo dIrghAyuSo bAlasya yena bahukAlaM jIvitavyaM tasya janmano~aSTamAnmAsAtparato vA yathAdairghyaM navamAdiSu pravartate|  itareSAM tu hrasvAyuSAM bAlAnAM caturthAnmAsAt pravartate|  hyalpAyuSo~atibAlye dantotpAdavedanayA~atipIDitAH santaH samyak sampUrNadhAtubalA na bhavanti|| 14||

 tatrA~asthimajjAnau dantotpattihetU||15||  tadA ca tayorasampUrNavIryatvAt punaH kAlAntareNa dantAnAM patanamApUryamANadhAtutvAcca punarutthAnamata eva ca vRddhAnAM na punardantotpattiH||15||

tatraivaM sthita idaM vijJeyam|  asthimajjJordhAtvordantotpattihetutvam|  tadA cAtibAlye tayorasthimajjJorasampUrNavIryatvAt punaH kAlAntareNa dantAnAM patanaM bhavati|  patiteSu ca prathamadanteSupunarApUryamANadhAtutvAdyathAvIryaM dantAnAmabhinavAnAmutthAnam|  ata evA~asthimajjaparipUrNatvAddhetorvRddhAnAM dantotpattirna bhavati|  teSAM hi yato dhAtusampUrNatvaM bhavatIrtyarthaH|| 15||

 balAnnipatitAnAM tu sahasA tadadhiSThAnagatadhAtubIjabhraMCAt santativyucchedAcchoNitAtipravRttyA~abhighAtAcca nissAritatvAt sirANAM punaranutpAdaH||16||  etena rogacyutA api prAyaCo vyAkhyAtAH||16||

balAdyatnenA~abhighAtAdinA nipatitAnAM dantAnAM punarutpAdo na bhavati|  kuta ityAha-sahasetyAdi|  tadadhiSThAne dantAdhiSThAne gato yo dantapoSako dhAtustadeva bIjaM tasya sahasA jhaTiti bhraMCAnnACAt|  tathAvichinnapravAheNa yA dantapoSikA dhAtuvahanasantatistasyA apyucchedAnnACAt tathA tatpAte sarvasantarpakasya CoNitasyAtipravRttyA hetubhUtayA abhighAtAcca yat sirANAM nissAritatvaM tata iti hetavo yatnapatitAnAM dantAnAM sahasA dhAtubIjabhraMCe|  tathaiva yato rogacyutAnAM yuktiratastatrApi punarutpattisantativyucchedAdikaM ca sarvaM pUrvavadvAcyam|  prAyograhaNaM svalpena prakAreNa cyutAnAM punarutpattipradarCanArtham|| 16||

 tau tu dhAtU kAlakrameNa pacyamAnau yadA dantACayamanuprapadyete tadA~asya kiJcidutsedhanordhvAdhodantamAMsasaGghaTTanAdaGgaharSo jAyate||17||  tadgatena ca CleSmaNA kaNDUstayA cUcukaM daCyate||17||  yadyadAlabhate tattadAsyamAnayati||17||  mArutaCcAsya dantamUleSu mUrcchati||17||  tataH sa kaphAnuviddho~asthimajjasthitaH sarvato visaran saha pittena malAMCca dUSayan vividhAnyathoditAnupadravAnabhinirvartayati||17||

tAvityAdinA bAlasya dantajanmani krama ucyate|  tAvasthimajjAnau dhAtU kAlakrameNa pacyamAnau yadA dantACayamanuprapadyete tadA bAlasya taddhetuko dantamAMsajo yaH kaCcidutsedho bhavati|  tenotsedhenordhvAdha ubhayordantamAMsayorekatra sparCena saGghaTTanenAGgaharSo jAyate|  tena CItArta iva bAlo lakSyate|  tadgatena ca dantamAMsagatena CleSmaNA tatra kaNDUrjAyate|  tayA ca dantamAMsakaNDUvA bAlena dhAtryAH stanacUcukaM daCyate|  yacca kiJcidAlabhate bAlastattadAsyaM mukhakuharamAnayati|  tadA~asya bAlasya dantamUleSu mAruto~antarvAyurmUrcchati samucchrAyavAn bhavati|  tato hetoH sa mArutaH kaphenAnuviddho~asthimajjJorAsthitaH pittena saha sarvataH CarIre visaran paribhraman dhAtUn rasAdIn malAMCca dUSayan vividhAnanekaprakArAn yathoditAn jvarAdikAnupadravAnabhinirvartayati|| 17||

 yadA punardantamAMsACrayo kevalo vikRtaH prabalo~anilaH vA~asthimajjAnau CoSayati tadA dvijAnAmasambhava eveti||18||

yadA punardantamAMsACrayo vAyuH kevala eva vA pittayukto vAsthimajjAnau CoSayati tadA bAlasya dvijAnAM dantAnAmasambhava eva bhavati|  gatAnugatikA| 

	hanumUlagato vAyurdantadeCAn viCoSayet|  
	
	yadA CiCoH prakupito nottiSThanti tato dvijAH||

	rUkSACino vAtikasya cAlayatyanilaH sirAH|

	hanvACrayAH prasuptasya dantaiH CabdaM karotyataH||

	iti suCrutaH|| 18||

 bhavanti cAtra ----

pRSThabhaGge biDAlAnAM barhiNAM ca Cikhodgame||19||  dantodbhede ca bAlAnAM na hi kiJcinna dUyate||19||

 yathAdoSaM yathArogaM yathodrekaM yathAbalam||20||  vibhajya deCakAlAdIMstatra yojyaM bhiSagjitam||20||  ta eva doSA dUSyACca jvarAdyA vyAdhayaCca yat||20||  atastadeva bhaiSajyaM mAtrA tvasya kanIyasI||20||  saukumAryAlpakAyatvAtsarvAnnAnupasevanAt||20||  snigdhA eva sadA bAlA ghRtakSIraniSevaNAt||20||  sadyastAn vamanaM tasmAt pAyayenmatimAnmRdu||20||  bastiM sAdhye virekeNa marCena pratimarCanam||20||  yuJjyAdvirecanAdIMstu dhAtryA eva yathocitAn||20||

tatra sAmAnyena vyAdhiSu yathAdoSaM doSasvarUpAnatikrameNa yathArogamiti rogasvarUpAnatikrameyA|  yathodrekamiti doSAdInAmudrekamanatikrAman|  deCAdIMCca vibhajya vikalpya bhiSagjitaM cikitsitaM yojyam|  

	yadyasmAt ya eva puMso doSA vAtAdayasta eva bAlasya|  ya eva ca samprAptiviCiSTA jvarAdayasta eva yat bAlasyAtaH pUrvoktameva sarvaM bheSajam|  kevalamasya bAlasya mAtrA auSadhasya kanIyasI|  kanIyasyA hetuH saukumAryAdiH|  sukumAro~alpaCarIraH sarvAnnAbhuk ca mahatIM madhyamAM ca mAtrAM soDhumaCakto bhavati|  

	sarveSu rogeSu matimAn bhiSaG mRdu vamanaM sadyo rogodbhavasamanantaraM bAlaM pAyayet|  yato bAlAH sadaiva ghRtakSIraniSevaNAt snigdhA bhavanti|  atastAn vamanaM pAyayet| 

	virekeNa sAdhye vyAdhau bAlasya bastiM yuJjyAnna tu virekam|  marCena sAdhye pratimarCanaM yuJjyAt|  virecanAdIMstu yathocitAn vyAdhyanuguNAn dhAtryA eva yuJjyAt|| 20||

uttarasthAnam

 mUrvAvyoSavarAkolajambUtvagdArUsarSapAH||21||  sapAThA madhunA lIDhAH stanyadoSaharAH param||21||  ikSumUlakaCervAkhyayaSTyAhvaistanu Cuddhyati||21||  sAndraM tu kSaudrakACmaryaguDUcItaNDulAmbubhiH||21||  CRtairvA surasaCvetasarSapAbRhatIdvayaiH||21||  grathitaM padmakoCIraphalinICvetacandanaiH||21||

 dantapAlIM samadhunA cUrNena pratisArayet||22||  pipplyA dhAtakIpuSpadhAtrIphalakRtena vA||22||  vAdhrINasakapotottharajastadvacca yojitam||22||  lAvatittiravallUrarajaH puSparasadrutam||22||  drutaM karoti bAlAnAM dantakesaravanmukham||22||  vacAdvibRhatIpAThAkaTukAtiviSAdhanaiH||22||  madhuraiCca ghRtaM siddhaM siddhaM daCanajanmani||22||

iti stanyadoSANAM sAdhanamuktvA kramaprAptAnAM dantodbhavarogANAmucyate-dantapAlImityAdi|  pippalyACcUrNena samadhunA dantapAlIM pratisArayet|  dhAtakIpuSpadhAtrIphalAbhyAM kRtena vA cUrNena samadhunA dantapAlIM pratisArayet|  vAdhrINasakapotayo rajo mAMsacUrNaM tadvaditiCabdAt madhunA yojitaM pratisAraNaM bhavati|  vAdhrINasaM jAhakaM manyate|  lAvatittirINAM vallUrasya CuSkamAMsasya rajaCcUrNa puSparasena kSaudreNa drutAmAloDitaM prakaraNAddantapAlIpratisAreNa bAlAnAM mukhaM drutaM CIghraM dantakesaravat karoti|  dantA eva kesarANi tAni vidyante yasmin|  kesaraCabdena mukhasya padmatvaM rUpitam|  vacAdibhirmadhuravargayuktaiH siddhaM ghRtaM daCanajanmani siddhamapratihatam|  iti dantodbhava uktaH|| 22||

 bhadradAru ghanaM yaSTI samaGgA sasitopalA||23||  vAtajvaraparItAGgaH pibedantarapAnakam||23||  surAhvaghanayaSTyAhvapayasyAMCumatIdvayam||23||  nAgaraM maricaM bhArGgI vRCcikAlI CatAvarI||23||  ghRtaM tatkvAthadugdhAbhyAM siddhaM hantyanilajvaram||23||  bAlasya pAnAbhyaGgAbhyAmebhiCconmardanaM hitam||23||  haridrAkuSThaSaDgranthaCatapuSpAhareNubhiH||23||  bhArGgyailAsuSavIrAsnAvarSAbhUnatasarSapaiH||23||  akSAMCaiH sAmbusauvIrairmastupiSTairmarujjvare||23||  tailaprasthaM surAmaNDatulyamabhyaJjanaM pacet||23||

ataH krameNa jvarAdiSu bAlasya viCeSeNocyate|  vAtajvareNa parItAGgo bAlo bhadradArvAdikamantarapAnakaM pibet|  pAnamevAntarapAnakam|  samaGgA maJjiSThA|  

	surAhvAdInAM kvAthena dugdhena ca siddhaM ghRtaM pAnenAbhyaGgena ca bAlasyanilajvaraM hanti|  surAhvaM devadAru|  payasyA kSIrikA| (ni) 'nakrAhidaMSTrikA kAlIM vRCcikAlyuSTradhUmakaH|' ebhireva ca surAhvAdibhirbAlasya vAtajvare aGgonmardanaM hitam|

 lAjanIlotpalakaNAmadhukAJjanaCarkaram||24||  pittajvaramatIsAraM madhulIDhaM nivartayet||24||  lAjadvipippalIkvAthaH CarkarAmadhusaMyutaH||24||  pIto jvaramatIsAraM tRSNAM chardiM ca nACayet||24||  AmAtisAre rakte ca kalkitAM jagapippalIm||24||  pAyayeccharkaropetAM cUrNaM vA devadArujam||24||

 kuryAt kukUNapothakyoryathoktaM svaM svamauSadham||26||  manaHCilACaGkhanAbhiH pippalyo madhuyaSTikA||26||  kSaudreNa ghRSTA gulikA CiCoH sarvAkSirogajit||26||  pippalItaNDulairmudgaiH sumanaH korakairyavaiH||26||  nIlotpalasya patraiCca CreSThA vartiH CatonmitaiH||26||

kukUNapothakyorvartmaroge vakSyamANayorbAlasya tatroktameva svaM svamauSadhaM kuryAt|  manaHCilAdibhirguTikAJjanena CiCoH sarvAnakSirogAn jayati|  pippalItaNDulAdInAM paJcAnAM pratyekaM Catena kRtA vartiH CreSThA prakaraNAdakSirogeSu|| 26||

priyaGgvAdInAM cUrNaH samAkSikastaNDulavAriNA pItastRSNAdIn hanti|  paTolAdikaM mAkSikaghRtAbhyAM lIDhaM jvarAdikaM vakSyamANaCca mAtRkAdoSAnanyAMCcaivaMprakArAn rogAn hanyAt|  iti pittAnvaya uktam|| 27||

 madhukavyoSaSaDgranthAgranthikAspRSTarodikAH||28||  kSIriNAJca pravAlAni pAThA ca vipaced ghRtam||28||  tatpItaM samadhu CleSmajvaraghnaM dIpanaM param||28||  rAsnailAnatatarkArImadhuCigrusurAhvayaiH||28||  sabilvakuSThavaraNareNUkAmisibhiH kRtaH||28||  CleSmajvaraharo lepastailamabhyaJjanaM ca taiH||28||  maNDalAni tu sAjyena gajamUtreNa lepayet||28||

 rajanIdArUsaralaCreyasIbRhatIdvayam||29||  pRCniparNI CatAhvA ca lIDhaM mAkSikasarpiSA||29||  grahaNIdIpanaM CreSThaM mArutasyAnulomanam||29||  atIsArajvaraCvAsakAmalApANDukAsajit||29||  bAlasya sarvarogeSu pUjitaM balavarNadam||29||

 samaGgAdhAtakIlodhrakuTannaTabalAdvayaiH||31||  mahAsahAkSudrasahAmudgabilvaCalATubhiH||31||  sakArpAsIphalaistoye sadhitaiH sAdhitaM ghRtam||31||  kSAramastuyutaM hanti CIghraM dantodbhavodbhavAn||31||  vividhAnAmayAnetadvRddhakACyapanirmitam||31||
