 saindhavavyoSaCArGgeSThApAThAgirikadambakAn||35||  CuSyato madhusarpirbhyAmarucyAdiSu yojayet||35||  aCokarohiNIyuktaM paJcakolaM ca cUrNitam||35||  badarIdhAtakIdhAtrIcUrNaM vA sarpiSA drutam||35||  aCvaliNDarasakSaudrayuktAM vA madhuyaSTikAm||35||  dvivArtAkIphalarasaM kevalaM vACvaviDrasam||35||  madhunA vA dhanavyoSapAThAmUrvACatAvarI||35||  sapayasyA pRthakparNI ghRtaM vA mAkSikAnvitam||35||  sthirAmarataruvyoSadvipunarnavasAdhitam||35||  sthirAvacAdvibRhatIkAkolIpippalInataiH||35||  niculotpalavarSAbhUbhArGgImustaiCca kArSikaiH||35||  siddhaM prasthArdhamAjyasya srotasAM CodhanaM param||35||  siMhyaCvagandhAsurasakaNAgarbhaM ca tadguNam||35||  yaSTyAhvapippalIlodhrapadmakotpalacandanaiH||35||  tAlIsasArivAbhyAJca sAdhitaM CoSajiddhRtam||35||  rAsnAmadhUlikAbhArGgIpippalIdevadArubhiH||35||  aCvagandhAdvikAkolICRGgyarSabhakajIvakaiH||35||  sUpyaparNIviDaGgaiCca kalkitaiH sAdhitaM ghRtam||35||  CaCottamAGganiryUhe CuSyataH puSTikRt param||35||  vacAvayasthAtagarakAyasthAcorakaiH CRtam||35||  bastamUtrasurAbhyAM ca tailamabhyaJjane hitam||35||  dve bale tumburucchallI vacA girikadambakaH||35||  surApiSTaH pradehaH syAdadhaH kAye viCuSya tAm||35||  siMhaskandIsiMhavallIkaramardItrikaNTakaiH||35||  bhaGgaiH kvAthaH kumArANAM CuSyatAM pariSecanam||35||  sACokarohiNIM kRSNAM madhvAjyena lihaJjayet||35||  CiCuH CoSaM CarIrasya sasitacchAgadugdhabhuk||35||

CuSyato bAlasyAnantarokteSvarucyAdiSu saindhavAdikamanekaprakAreNa yojayet|  girikadambako bhUkadambakaH|  aCokarohiNyA kaTurohiNyA yuktaM paJcakolaM ca cUrNitaM CuSyato~arucyAdiSu yojayet|  badaryAdicUrNaM vA sarpiSA drutam|  

	athavA madhuyaSTikAmaCvapurISarasamadhubhyAM yuktAM yojayet|  athavA kevalamaCvaviDrasaM dvivArtAkIphalarasayutaM yojayet|  dvivArtAkI dvibRhatI|  athavA payasyApRthakparNIbhyAM yuktaM ghanAdikaM madhunA|  payasyA kSIrikA|  pRthakparNI pRCniparNI|  athavA sthirAdisAdhitaM ghRtaM mAkSikAnvitaM yojayet|

 bRhatIphalamUlatvakpippalIgranthikaiH kRtaH||37||  tavakSIrIyutaiH kvAtho madhunA hanti CIlitaH||37||  chardimUrcchAjvaraCvAsakAsAtIsArapInasAn||37||  paJcakoladvivARrtAkImUlabhArGgItugAhvayAH||37||  kSaudrAjyalIDhAH CvasanakAsapInasarukcchardiH||37||  CyAmAtimuktAtakkArIkusumakvAthasAdhitam||37||  yaSTigarbhaM dhRtaM tRSNAhidhmACvAsAsrapittanut||37||

 pItaM pItaM vamati yaH stanyaM taM madhusarpiSA||38||  dvivArtAkIphalarasaM paJcakolaM ca lehayet||38||  pippalIpaJcalavaNaM kRmijit pAribhadrakam||38||  tadvallihyAttathA vyoSaM maSI vA romacarmaNAm||38||  lAbhataH CalyakaCvAviTgodharSyaCikhijanmanAm||38||  khadirArjunatAlIsakuSThacandanaje rase||38||  sakSIraM sAdhitaM sarpirvamathuM viniyacchati||38||  kSIrIpravAlamadhukadarbhamUlavisotpalaiH||38||  tRSNAdAhajvaraharaH kaSAyaH sasitAmadhuH||38||  CarkarAdADimakaNAnAgakesarajIvakam||38||  lihan kumAraH kSaudreNa tRTcchardibhyAM vimucyate||38||  lAjaiH sacandanoCIrayaSTImadhukapadmakaiH||38||  lipto dhautaH stanaH pIto bhramatRDdAhamohahA||38||

yo bAlaH pItaM pItaM ca stanyaM vamati taM bAlaM vaidyo dvivArtAkIphalAnAM rasaM paJcakolayuktaM madhusarSiSA lehayet|  tathA pippalyAdikaM tadvaditi madhusarpiSA lehayet|  pAribhadrako nimbaH|  tathA vyoSamapi madhusarpiSA lihyAt|  athavA yathAlAbhaM CalyakAdijanmanAM romNAM carmaNAM ca maSI madhusarpiSA lihyAt|

	khadirAdInAM rase kvAthe sakSIraM sarpiH sAdhitaM bAlasya vamathuM chardiM viniyacchati nACayati|  kSIrIpravAlAdInAM kvAthaH CarkarayA madhunA ca yukto bAlasya tRSNAdiharaH|  kSIriNo vaTAdayaH teSAM pravAlA aGkurAH|  CarkarAdikaM kSaudreNa lihan kumArastRTcchardibhyAM vimucyate|  

	lAjaiCcandanAdiyuktairdhAtryAH stano liptaH kAlAtikrameNa dhautaH pIto bAlasya tRTbhramAdihA bhavati|| 38||

 asnehalavaNaM pItvA saMskRtaM lAvajaM rasam||39||  saCarkaraM vijayate bAlo laGghanajAn gadAn||39||

snehalavaNAbhyAM vinA yaH saMskRto lAvamAMsarasaH taM saCarkaraM  pItvA bAlo laGghanajAn gadAn kArCyabhramAdIn vijayate parAjayate|| 39||

 visarpastu CiCoH prANanACanaH bastiCIrSajaH||40||  padmavarNo mahApadmanAmA doSatrayodbhavaH||40||  CAkhAbhyAM hRdayaM yAti hRdayAdvA gudaM vrajet||40||

tridoSakopAcchiCorbastau vA Cirasi vA padmavarNo visarpo bhavati|  tasya ca mahApadma iti nAma|  sa ca CiCoH prANanACanaH|  tasya cikitsA na vidyata ityarthaH|  yaCcAnyo~api visarpaH CAkhAbhyo hRdayaM vrajet hRdayAdvA gudaM so~api prANanACanaH|| 40||

uttarasthAnam

bAlAmayapratiSedhaH

 sadanto jAyate yastu dantAH prAgyasya cottarAH||41||  kurvIta tasminnutpAte CAntiM taM ca dvijAtaye||41||  dadyAt sadakSiNaM bAlaM naigameSaM ca pUjayet||41||  vatsasya madhulAjAnAmApUryaprAGmukho mukham||41||  cumbetkumArastrIn vArAn prAyaCcittamidaM param||41||  nAvamArohayet bAlaM snAtaM skandhaM gajasya vA||41||  bhojayet brAhmaNAMCcAtra pAyasaM madhusarpiSA||41||

yastu bAlaH sadanto jAtadanta eva jAyate|  yasya bAlasyottarA uparibhavAH dantAH prAgjAyante tasmiMstathAvidha utpAte vaidyaH sarvarakSArthaM CAntiM homAdinA kuryAt|  taJca bAlaM dvijAtaye brAhmaNAya dakSiNayA saha dadyAt|  naigameSaM ca nAmnA vakSayamANaM graha viCeSaM vaidyaH pUjayet|

 mAtuH kumAro garbhiNyAH stanyaM prAyo~apibannapi||42||  kAsAgninasAdavamathutandrAkArCyArucibhramaiH||42||  yujyate koSThavRddhyA ca tamAhuH pArigarbhikam||42||  rogaM paribhavAkhyaM ca yuJjyAttatrAgnidIpanam||42||  pippalIpippalImUlakaTukAdevadArubhiH||42||  kSAradvayaviDAjAjIbilvamadhyAgnidIpyakaiH||42||  dadhisauvIrakasurAmaNDaiCca vipaced ghRtam||42||  hanti prayuktaM tatkAle rogAn pAribhavACrayAn||42||

mAturgarbhiNyAH kumAraH prAyeNa stanyamapiban api apiCabdAt pibannapi kAsAdibhiryujyate|  taM caivaMrUpaM rogaviCeSamAcAryAH pArigarbhikamityAhuH|  tatra pArigarbhike sarvaM kiJcidagnadIpanaM yuJjyAt|

	pippalyAdibhirghRtaM pacet tad ghRtaM kAle vyAdheH snehayogye prayuktaM paribhavACrayAn kAsAdirogAn hanti|  sauvIrakaM kAJjikam||42||

 annenopahitaM stanyaM pibato vihitAn param||43||  imAneva gadAn kuryAt kuryAtteSvetadeva ca||43||  pItaM pItaM ca yaH stanyaM savAtamatisAryate||43||  tasyApyetatparaM pathyaM dIpanaM balavarNakRt||43||  atyudriktakSudhaM bAlaM paribhUtaM lehayet||43||  vidArIyavagodhUmakaNAcUrNaM ghRtAplutam||43||  pAyayedanu ca kSIraM CRtaM samadhuCarkaram||43||  akSamajjAdvikAkolIyaSTImadhukamoraTaH||43||  Crapayet kSIramAjyaM vA bIjairikSurakasya ca||43||  tatprayojyaM guru snigdhaM yaccAtyagnau pureritam||43||  CvavAyasabiDAlAnAmucchiSTena jalena ca||43||  snApayettaM na cedevaM kSuttasya praCamaM vrajet||43||  kSIrIpAdapamUlasthaM vidhinA snApitaM tataH||43||  vastraratnAdyalaGkAraiH kumAraM bhUSayet sitaiH||43||  vRkSaM cAnu tataH kuryAdbhUSaNavyatyayaM tayoH||43||  etadAyuHpradaM dhanyaM snapanaM sarvarogajit||43||  jaTIbhUtakacAkSyAdipakSmANamatilolupam||43||  gomUtragandhiM snapayettIrthe gavyaCakRdrasaiH||43||  vacApuSpaCilAkuSThavayasthAhiGgukaTphalaiH||43||  sabastamUtramadiraistailamabhyaJjanaM pacet||43||  vAlAvidArItrikaTukuSThoCIrakucandanaiH||43||  siddhaM pItaM havirhanti taM vikAramaCeSataH||43||

vihitAt saguNAt stanyAtparaM pratiSiddhaM stanyamannenopahitaM pibato bAlasya tatstanyaM imAneva pArigarbhikoktAn gadAn kuryAt|  teSAM ca vaidya etadeva cikitsitaM kuryAt|  yaCca bAlaH pItaH pItaM stanyamatisAryate tasyApyetatpArigarbhikoktaM pataM pathyam|  taddhi dIpanaM balavarNakRcca|  

	paribhUtaH paribhavAkhyarogayukto bAlo yadyatyudriktakSudhAvAn bhavati tatastaM vidAryAdicUrNaM ghRtAplutaM lehayet|  guru snigdhaM ceti yaduktamatyagnau tadapyatikSudhAyAM Casyate|  taM ca bAlaM CvAdyucchiSTena jalena snApayet|  

	evamanantaroktena tasya bAlasyAtikSudyadi na praCamaM vrajettataH kSIrIpAdapasya vaTAdermUle sthitaM vakSyamANena vidhinA bAlaM snApayet|  anu ca sitaiH CuklairvastrAdibhirbAlaM bhUSayet|  tatastatkSIrivRkSaM tadvadeva bhUSayet|  tato~anantaraM tayorvRkSabAlayorbhUSaNavyatyayaM kuryAt|  vRkSabhUSaNairbAlaM bhUSayet bAlabhUSaNaiCca vRkSamityarthaH|  etadvidhAnamAyuHpradAdiguNam| 

	jaTIbhUtakacatvAdiyuktaM bAlaM tIrthe gavyaCakRdrasaiH snapayet|  jaTIbhUtAH ekatvaM prAptAH kacA akSyAdipakSmANi ca yasya bAlasya sa tathoktastam|  pakSmANi lomAni|  atilolupa AhArAdigRdhnuH|

	vacAdibhirbAlasyAbhyaJjanaM tailaM pacet|  balAdibhiH siddhaM haviH pItaM jaTIbhUtAdivikAramaCeSato hanti|| 43||

 CiraH pRSThaM tato muSkau tataH pAdau ca yo rujet||44||  hastAbhyAmutthito vAyuH sa parvAnuplavaH smRtaH||44||  gaurIvacAsadApuSpIhayagandhAkaTutrayaiH||44||  sakaTphaladvivArtAkIvayasthAhiGgurohiSaiH||44||  vastamUtrasurAyuktaiH sAdhitaM tasya yojayet||44||  tailamabhyaJjane CeSaM vAtavyAdhivadAcaret||44||

yo vAyurbAlasya hastAbhyAmutthitaH CiraHprabhRtyuktakrameNa rujet sa rogaH parvAnuplava iti nAmnA AcAryairuktaH|  tasya parvAnuplAvinaH gauryAdibhiH sAdhitaM tailamabhyaJjane yojayet|  CeSaM cikitsitaM vAtavyAdhivadAcaret|| 44||

 tAlumAMse kaphaH kruddhaH kurute tAlukaNTakam||45||  tena tAlupradeCasya nimnatA mUrdhni jAyate||45||  tAlupAtaH stanadveSaH kRcchrAtpAnaM CakRd dravam||45||  tRDAsyakaNDvakSirujA grIvAdurdharatA vamiH||45||  tatrotkSipya yavakSArakSaudrAbhyAM pratisArayet||45||  tAlu tadvat kaNACuNThIgoCakRdrasasaindhavaiH||45||  CRGgiveraniCA kuSThaM kalkitaM vaTapallavaiH||45||  baddhvA goCakRtA liptaM kukUle svedayettataH||45||  rasena limpettAlvAsyaM netre ca pariSecayet||45||  harItakIvacAkuSThakalkaM mAkSikasaMyutam||45||  pItvA kumAraH stanyena mucyate tAlukaNTakAt||45||

bAlasya tAlumUle kaphaH kruddhaH tAlukaNTakaM kurute|  tena rogeNa bAlasya mUrdhni Cirasi tAlupradeCasya nimnatA jAyate|  tAlupAtAdikamapi jAyate|  grIvAyA duHkhena dhAryatvaM grIvAdurdharatA|

	tatra tAlukaNTake tAlvaGgulyotkSipya tadaiva yavakSArakSaudrAbhyAM pratisArayet tadvaditi utkSipya kaNAdibhiH pratisArayet|  

	CRGgiverAdi kalkIkRtaM vaTapallavairbaddhvA gomayena liptaM kukUle cUrNAgnau svedayet|  tasmAt svinnAdrasena tAlukaNTakinastAlvAsyaM lepayet netre ca secayet|  harItakyAdikalkaM mAkSikayuktaM stanyena pItvA kumArakastAlukaNTakAnmucyate|| 45||

 mastuluGgakSayAdyasya vAyustAlvasthi nAmayet||46||  tasya tRDdainyayuktasya sarpirmadhurakaiH CRtam||46||  pAnAbhyaJjanayoryojyamudvegaCca himAmbunA||46||

svahetoH kupitovAyuryasya bAlasya mastuluGgAkhyasya majjAviCeSasya kSayAddhetostAlvasthi nAmayet|  tasya bAlasya taddhetubhyAM tRDdainyAbhyAM yuktasya ca madhurakaiH CRtaM sarpiH pAne~abhyaJjane ca yojyam|  asya himAmbunA vyaJjanAdiyuktenodvegaCca yojyaH|  tathA hi mastuluGgo vardhate|| 46||

 malopalepAt svedAdvA gude raktakaphodbhavaH||47||  tAmro vraNo~antaH kaNDUmAJjAyate bhUryupadravaH||47||  kecittaM mAtRkAdoSaM vadantyante tu pautanam||47||  pRSThArurgudakuTTaM ca kecicca tamanAmakam||47||  tatra dhAtryAH payaH CodhyaM pittaCleSmaharauSadhaiH||47||  sitaCItaM ca CItAmbuyuktamantarapAnakam||47||  sakSaudratArkSyaCailena vraNaM tena ca lepayet||47||  triphalAbadarIplakSatvakkvAthapariSecitam||47||  kAsIsarocanAtutthamanohvAlarasAJjanaH||47||  lepayedamlapiSTairvA cUrNitairvAvacUrNayet||47||  suClakSNairathavA yaSTICaGkhasauvIrakAJjanaiH||47||  CArivACaGkhanAbhibhyAmasanasya tvacAtha vA||47||  rAgakaNDUtkaTe kuryAdraktasrAvaM jalaukasA||47||  sarvaM ca pittavraNajicchasyate gudakuTTake||47||  anAmasthaulyapittAsrakaNDUgaNDagalAmaye||47||  udarAtyunnatau ceStaM tArkSyamantarapAnakam||47||

bAhyamalopalepAt svedAdvA gude raktaCleSmakopena tAmratvAdiyukto vraNo jAyate|  bhUryupadravo bahUpadravaH|  kecidAcAryAstaM rogaM mAtRkAdoSaM vadanti|  anye tvAcAryAH pautanaM pUtanAkhyagrahajanitaM vadanti|  tathAnye pRSThAruranye gudakuTTamanye anAmakaM vadanti|

	tatreti tasmin rogaviCeSe dhAtryAH payaH pittaCleSmaharairauSadhaiH Codhyam|  tathA bAlasya sitaCItaM CvetacandanaM CItAmbunA yuktamantarapAnakaM vidheyam|  tena ca sitaCItena Cvetacandanena kSaudratArkSyaCailAbhyAM yuktena gudavraNaM lepayet|  kimbhUtamityAha-triphalAdikvAthena pariSecitam|  athavA kAsIsAdibhiCcUrNitaiH suClakSNairavacUrNayet|  atha vA yaSTyAdibhiH suClakSNairvraNamavacUrNayet|  CArivACaGkhanAbhibhyAM vA~avacUrNayet|  kevalayA vAsanatvacA|

	athavA tasmin roge rAgakaNDUbhyAmutkaTe jalUkAbhI raktasrAvaM kuryAt|  athavA gudakuTTake sarvamAhArAdikaM pittavraNajicchasyate|  prasaGgenocyate|  anAmAdike tArkSyaCailamantarapAnakamiSTam|  anAmA gudakuTTakaH|| 47||

 gRhNAni sUtikAgAre na stanaM cetspRCettataH||48||  pathyAdhAtrIphalakaNairjihvAM saghRtamAkSikaiH||48||

yaCca bAlo~acirajAtatvAt sUtikAgAra eva sthitaH stanaM na gRhNati tasya pathyAdibhiH saghRtamAkSikaiH jihvAM spRCet|| 48||

 pradIptAGgArarajasA praCAntenA~avacUrNayet||50||  paJcame~ahnyapatannAlaM lepayedvA guDAmbhasA||50||  sAndreNa bhUmau ghRSTena.....................||50||

uttarasthAnam

bAlagrahavijJAnIyaH

 purA guhasya rakSArthaM nirmitAH CUlapANinA||2||  manuSyavigrahAH paJca sapta strIvigrahA grahAH||2||  skando viCAkho meSAsyaH CvagrahaH pitRsaMjJitaH||2||  CakuniH pUtanA CItapUtanA~adRSTipUtanA||2||  mukhamaNDitikA tadvadrevatI CuSkarevatI||2||

prathamameva tAvat grahANAM sambhava ucyate|  purA pUrvamatIte kasmiMCcita kAlAMCe guhasya bhagavataH kumArasya rakSArthaM CUlapANinA bhagavatA CambhunA paJca grahAH manuSyavigrahAH puruSaCarIrAH skandAdayaH sapta ca strIvigrahAH CakunyAdayo nirmitAH|| 2||

 te kAmarUpiNaH skandamupaceruH samAhitAH||3||  skandasya bAladhAratvAtteSAM skando~agraNIrabhUt||3||  skande~atha yauvanaM prApte senApatyaM ca tAn grahAn||3||  raudrAn rudro~anujagrAha prahvAn vRttyabhilASiNaH||3||  na tithiSvapyatithayo devatAH pitaro~api vA||3||  yeSu veCmasu pUjyante nivRttAcAravartmasu||3||  haradhvaM teSu bAlAnAmArogyaM dhAriCarma ca||3||

te grahAH sarve kAmarUpiNo yathecchAkRtayaH skandaM kumAramupacerupacaritavantaH|  samAhitA yatnavantaH skandasya kumArasya|  teSAM madhye skandAkhyagraho~agraNIH pradhAno~abhUt bAladhAratvAddhetoH|  sa hi kumArasya bAladhAratve bhagavatA niyuktaH|  atha kAlena skande yauvanaM prApte senApatyaM ca prApte tAn raudrAn grahAn rudro~anujagrAha|  prahvAn jAnubhyAmavanatAn|  vRttyabhilASiNo jIvikAkAmAn|  kathamanujagrAhetyAha-na tithiSvapItyAdi|  bho grahAH evaMvidheSu veCmasvACrayatAM bAlAnAmArogyaM dhAri jIvitaM Carma ca haradhvam|  kimbhUteSvityAha-yeSu veCmasu tithiSvapi parvasvapya tithyAdayo na pUjyante|  nivRttamAcAravartma yebhyasteSu|  vartmA mArgam|  subodham|  bhinne bhagne kAMsye pAtre yeSu veCmasu bhujyate te tathoktAsteSu|| 3||

 CUlineti niyuktAste balipUjAbhikAGkSiNaH||4||  kruddhAn bhItAn vimanasaH CUnyasthAnaikacAriNaH||4||  paropabhuktakusumavastrAbharaNadhAriNaH||4||  bAlAn kaCmaladhAtrIkAn sandhyAsu rudato~aCucIn||4||  RkSolUkabiDAlAdirUpairanyaistathAdbhutaiH||4||  santrAsayantaH CayitAn kadAcijjAgrato~api vA||4||  prAyaH parvasu gRhNanti grahACchidraprahAriNaH||4||  AviCantaCca lakSyante kevalaM CAstracakSuSA||4||  Cuddhena dehaM bAlAnAM gandharvA iva yoSitAm||4||

ityanena prakAreNa CUlinA bhagavatA te grahA niyuktAH santo balipUjAbhikAkSiNaCca kruddhAdiguNAn bAlAn hanti|  vimanaso duCcittAn|  CUnye tiSThantIti CUnyasthAstAn|  ekacAriNo ye sarvatrAsahAyACcarAnti|  pareNAnyenopabhuktAn kusumAdIn dhArayantIti tathoktAstAn|  kaCmalA durAcArA dhAtrIM yeSAM te tathoktAstAn|  kathaM gRhNantItyAha-adbhutairACcaryaiH|  RkSAdiprANirUpairbAlAJchayitAn jAgrato~api vA santrAsayantaH|  kadA gRhNantItyAha|  prAyaH parvasvaSTamyAdiSu|  te ca grahACchidraprahAriNaCchidre randhre praharanti|

	te ca grahA apratyakSatvAcchAstreNaiva cakSuSA AviCanto bAlAnAM dehe lakSyante|  kimbhUtena CAstracakSuSA Aha-Cuddhena nirmalena|  dRSTAnto yathA yoSitAM dehaM gandharvA AviCante|  CAstracakSuSaiva lakSyante|  na tu mAMsagolakena|  gandharvAveCaH pratyakSaphalatvena siddhatvAd dRSTAntaH|| 4||

 teSAM grahiSyatAM rUpaM pratataM rodanaM jvaraH||5||

teSAM ca grahANAM grahiSyatAM grahaNaM kariSyatAM pratataM rodanaM jvaraCca sAmAnyena pUrvarUpam|| 5||

 sAmAnyaM rUpamutrAsajRmbhAbhrUkSepadInatAH||6||  phenasrAvordhvaduSTyoSThadantadaMCaprajAgarAH||6||  rodanaM kUjanaM stanyavidveSaH svaravaikRtam||6||  nakhairakasmAtparitaH svadhAtryaGgavilekhanam||6||

utrAsAdikaM svadhAtryaGgavilekhanAntaM sarvagrahANAmAviSTAnAM sAmAnyaM lakSaNam|  phenasrAvo mukhAt|  oSThayordantAnAM ca daMCo daMCanam|  akasmAditikAraNaM vinA|| 6||

 tatraikanayanasrAvI Ciro vikSipate muhuH||7||  hataikapakSaH stabdhAGgaH sasvedo natakandharaH||7||  dantakhAdI stanadveSI trasyan roditi visvaram||7||  vakravaktro vaman lAlAM bhRCamUrdhvaM nirIkSate||7||  vasAsragandhirudvigno baddhamuSTiCakRcchiCuH||7||  calitaikAkSigaNDabhrUH saMraktobhayalocanaH||7||  skandArttastena vaikalyaM maraNaM vA bhaved dhruvam||7||

tatretyAdinA skandAdiviCeSeNa lakSaNam|  ekanayanasrAvItyAdiyuktaH CiCuH skandArtto bhavati|  tena skandena bAlasya dhruvamavaCyaM vaikalyaM maraNaM vA bhavet|  baddhaCabdo muSTiCakRdbhyAM sambadhyate|  calitamekamakSyAdikaM yasya|| 7||

 saMjJAnACo muhuH keCaluJcanaM kandharAnatiH||8||  vanamya jRmbhamANasya CakRnmUtrapravartanam||8||  stanasvajihvAsandaMCasaMrambhajvarajAgarAH||8||  pUyaCoNitagandhaCca skandApasmAralakSaNam||8||

saMjJAnACAdi CoNitagandhAntaM skandApasmArasya viCAkhasya lakSaNam|  keCaluJcanaM keCApanayanam|  kandharA grIvA tasyA AnatiH|  UrdhvamIkSaNamUrdhvekSA|  hastAdInAM nartanam|  daMCo daCanam||8||

 AdhmAnaM pANipAdasya spandanaM phenanirvamiH||9||  tRNmuSTibandhAtIsArasvaradainyavivarNatAH||9||  kUjanaM stananaM chardiH kAsahidhmAprajAgarAH||9||  oSThadaMCAMsasaGkocastambhabastAbhagandhatAH||9||  UrdhvaM nirIkSya hasanaM madhye vinamanaM jvaraH||9||  mUrchaikanetraCophaCca naigameSagrahAkRtiH||9||

bAlagrahavijJAnIyaH

 purA guhasya rakSArthaM nirmitAH CUlapANinA||2||  manuSyavigrahAH paJca sapta strIvigrahA grahAH||2||  skando viCAkho meSAsyaH CvagrahaH pitRsaMjJitaH||2||  CakuniH pUtanA CItapUtanA~adRSTipUtanA||2||  mukhamaNDitikA tadvadrevatI CuSkarevatI||2||

prathamameva tAvat grahANAM sambhava ucyate|  purA pUrvamatIte kasmiMCcita kAlAMCe guhasya bhagavataH kumArasya rakSArthaM CUlapANinA bhagavatA CambhunA paJca grahAH manuSyavigrahAH puruSaCarIrAH skandAdayaH sapta ca strIvigrahAH CakunyAdayo nirmitAH|| 2||

 te kAmarUpiNaH skandamupaceruH samAhitAH||3||  skandasya bAladhAratvAtteSAM skando~agraNIrabhUt||3||  skande~atha yauvanaM prApte senApatyaM ca tAn grahAn||3||  raudrAn rudro~anujagrAha prahvAn vRttyabhilASiNaH||3||  na tithiSvapyatithayo devatAH pitaro~api vA||3||  yeSu veCmasu pUjyante nivRttAcAravartmasu||3||  haradhvaM teSu bAlAnAmArogyaM dhAriCarma ca||3||

te grahAH sarve kAmarUpiNo yathecchAkRtayaH skandaM kumAramupacerupacaritavantaH|  samAhitA yatnavantaH skandasya kumArasya|  teSAM madhye skandAkhyagraho~agraNIH pradhAno~abhUt bAladhAratvAddhetoH|  sa hi kumArasya bAladhAratve bhagavatA niyuktaH|  atha kAlena skande yauvanaM prApte senApatyaM ca prApte tAn raudrAn grahAn rudro~anujagrAha|  prahvAn jAnubhyAmavanatAn|  vRttyabhilASiNo jIvikAkAmAn|  kathamanujagrAhetyAha-na tithiSvapItyAdi|  bho grahAH evaMvidheSu veCmasvACrayatAM bAlAnAmArogyaM dhAri jIvitaM Carma ca haradhvam|  kimbhUteSvityAha-yeSu veCmasu tithiSvapi parvasvapya tithyAdayo na pUjyante|  nivRttamAcAravartma yebhyasteSu|  vartmA mArgam|  subodham|  bhinne bhagne kAMsye pAtre yeSu veCmasu bhujyate te tathoktAsteSu|| 3||

 CUlineti niyuktAste balipUjAbhikAGkSiNaH||4||  kruddhAn bhItAn vimanasaH CUnyasthAnaikacAriNaH||4||  paropabhuktakusumavastrAbharaNadhAriNaH||4||  bAlAn kaCmaladhAtrIkAn sandhyAsu rudato~aCucIn||4||  RkSolUkabiDAlAdirUpairanyaistathAdbhutaiH||4||  santrAsayantaH CayitAn kadAcijjAgrato~api vA||4||  prAyaH parvasu gRhNanti grahACchidraprahAriNaH||4||  AviCantaCca lakSyante kevalaM CAstracakSuSA||4||  Cuddhena dehaM bAlAnAM gandharvA iva yoSitAm||4||

ityanena prakAreNa CUlinA bhagavatA te grahA niyuktAH santo balipUjAbhikAkSiNaCca kruddhAdiguNAn bAlAn hanti|  vimanaso duCcittAn|  CUnye tiSThantIti CUnyasthAstAn|  ekacAriNo ye sarvatrAsahAyACcarAnti|  pareNAnyenopabhuktAn kusumAdIn dhArayantIti tathoktAstAn|  kaCmalA durAcArA dhAtrIM yeSAM te tathoktAstAn|  kathaM gRhNantItyAha-adbhutairACcaryaiH|  RkSAdiprANirUpairbAlAJchayitAn jAgrato~api vA santrAsayantaH|  kadA gRhNantItyAha|  prAyaH parvasvaSTamyAdiSu|  te ca grahACchidraprahAriNaCchidre randhre praharanti|

	te ca grahA apratyakSatvAcchAstreNaiva cakSuSA AviCanto bAlAnAM dehe lakSyante|  kimbhUtena CAstracakSuSA Aha-Cuddhena nirmalena|  dRSTAnto yathA yoSitAM dehaM gandharvA AviCante|  CAstracakSuSaiva lakSyante|  na tu mAMsagolakena|  gandharvAveCaH pratyakSaphalatvena siddhatvAd dRSTAntaH|| 4||

 teSAM grahiSyatAM rUpaM pratataM rodanaM jvaraH||5||

 sAmAnyaM rUpamutrAsajRmbhAbhrUkSepadInatAH||6||  phenasrAvordhvaduSTyoSThadantadaMCaprajAgarAH||6||  rodanaM kUjanaM stanyavidveSaH svaravaikRtam||6||  nakhairakasmAtparitaH svadhAtryaGgavilekhanam||6||

 tatraikanayanasrAvI Ciro vikSipate muhuH||7||  hataikapakSaH stabdhAGgaH sasvedo natakandharaH||7||  dantakhAdI stanadveSI trasyan roditi visvaram||7||  vakravaktro vaman lAlAM bhRCamUrdhvaM nirIkSate||7||  vasAsragandhirudvigno baddhamuSTiCakRcchiCuH||7||  calitaikAkSigaNDabhrUH saMraktobhayalocanaH||7||  skandArttastena vaikalyaM maraNaM vA bhaved dhruvam||7||

tatretyAdinA skandAdiviCeSeNa lakSaNam|  ekanayanasrAvItyAdiyuktaH CiCuH skandArtto bhavati|  tena skandena bAlasya dhruvamavaCyaM vaikalyaM maraNaM vA bhavet|  baddhaCabdo muSTiCakRdbhyAM sambadhyate|  calitamekamakSyAdikaM yasya|| 7||

 saMjJAnACo muhuH keCaluJcanaM kandharAnatiH||8||  vanamya jRmbhamANasya CakRnmUtrapravartanam||8||  stanasvajihvAsandaMCasaMrambhajvarajAgarAH||8||  pUyaCoNitagandhaCca skandApasmAralakSaNam||8||

 AdhmAnaM pANipAdasya spandanaM phenanirvamiH||9||  tRNmuSTibandhAtIsArasvaradainyavivarNatAH||9||  kUjanaM stananaM chardiH kAsahidhmAprajAgarAH||9||  oSThadaMCAMsasaGkocastambhabastAbhagandhatAH||9||  UrdhvaM nirIkSya hasanaM madhye vinamanaM jvaraH||9||  mUrchaikanetraCophaCca naigameSagrahAkRtiH||9||

bAlagrahapratiSedhaH

 graheSu sAdhyeSu CiCuM vivikte CaraNe sthitam||2||  trirahnA muSTasaMsikte sadA sannihitAnale||2||  vikIrNabhUtikusumabIjapatrAnnasarSape||2||  rakSoghnatailajvalitapradIpahatapApmani||2||  vyavAyamadyapiCitanivRttaparicArake||2||  purANasarpiSAbhyaktaM pariSiktaM sukhAmbunA||2||  sAdhitena balAnimbavaijayantInRpadrumaiH||2||  pAribhadrakakaTvaGgajambUvaraNakattRNaiH||2||  kapotavaGkApAmArgapATalImadhuCigrubhiH||2||  kAkajaGghAmahACvetAkapitthakSIripAdapaiH||2||  sakadambakaraJcaiCca dhUpaM snAtasya cAcaret||2||  dvIpivyAghrAhisiMharkSacarmabhirghRtamiCritaiH||2||

sAdhyeSu graheSu na tu duHsAdhyeSu CiCumevaM kuryAt|  ahnA dinena trIn vArAn yadA mRSTaM saMsiktaM ca tasmin|  vivikte janAdirahite|  CaraNe gRhe sthitaM kuryAt|  sadA sannihito~analo yasmin|  tathA vikIrNaM vikSiptaM bhUtyAdikaM yasmin|  bhUtirbhasma|  rakSoghnaistailairye jvalitA pradIpAstairhataH pApmA yatra|  vyavAyAdito nivRttAH paricArikA yatra|  vyavAyo maithunam|  purANasarpiSA~abhyaktaM sukhAmbunoSNodakena|  pariSiktaM snAtam|  

	kuryAditi kiryApadamatra labhyate|  atha vA snAtasya cAcaredityanenaiva cakAreNa yathAkathaM cidAcaredityetat kriyApadaM boddhavyam|  kimbhUtena sukhAmbunA Aha-balAdibhiH kadambAntaiH sAdhitena|  vaijayantyagnimanthaH|  

	nRpadruma AragvadhaH|  pAribhadrakaH kaNTakakiMCukaH kaTvaGgaH syonAkaH|  kattRNaM bhUtIkam|  kapotapaGkA suvarcalA|  kAkajaGghA lomaCapAdikA|  mahACvetA nIlapuSpI girikarNikA|  kSIripAdapA vaTAdayaH|  snAtasya ca dvIpyAdicarmabhirghRtamiCritairdhUpamAcaret|| 2||

 pUtIdaCAGgasiddhArthavacAbhallAtadIpyakaiH||3||  sakuSThaiH saghRtairdhUpaH sarvagrahavimokSaNaH||3||  sarSapAnimbapatrANi mUlamaCvakhurAdvacA||3||  bhUrjapatraM ghRtaM dhUpaH sarvagrahanibarhaNaH||3||

pUtyAdibhirdhUpaH sarvagrahavimokSaNaH|  sarSapAdibhirdhUpaH sarvagrahanibarhaNaH|  aCvakhurA girikarNI tato mUlam|| 3||

 anantAmrAsthitagaraM maricaM madhuro gaNaH||4||  sRgAlavinnA mustA ca kalkitaistairghRtaM pacet||4||  daCamUlarasakSIrayuktaM tad grahajit param||4||

anantAdibhiH kalkitairdaCamUlakvAthena kSIreNa ca ghRtaM pAcayet|  tatparaM grahajit| anantA yavAsakaH|  sRgAlavinnA pRCniparNI|| 4||

 rAsnAdvyaMCumatI vaDhrapaJcamUlabalAghanAt||5||  kvAthe sarpiH pacetpiSTaiH CArivAvyoSacitrakaiH||5||  pAThAviDaGgamadhukapayasyAhiGgudArubhiH||5||  sagranthikaiH sendrayavaiH CiCostatsatataM hitam||5||  sarvarogagrahaharaM dIpanaM balavarNadam||5||

rAsnAdikaSAye CArivAdibhiH piSTaiH sarpirvipAcayet|  tataH subodham|  vaDhrapaJcamUlaM mahatpaJcamUlam|| 5||

 sArivAsurAbhirbrAhmICaGkhinIkuSThasarSapaiH||6||  vacACvagandhAsurasAyuktaiH sarpirvipAcayet||6||  tannACayed grahAn sarvAn pAnenAbhyaJjanena ca||6||  yojayed bhUtavidyAyAM yAnyuktAni ghRtAni ca||6||

sArivAdibhiH sarpirvipAcayet|  tat pAnenAbhyaJjanena ca sarvAn grahAn nACayet|  yAni ca ghRtAni vakSyamANAyAM bhUtavidyAyAmuktAni tAnyapi yojayet|| 6||

 hastamAtraM Cucau deCe gomayenopalepayet||7||  tatrAkSatAnAJcokSANAM sthApyaM pAtraM sadakSiNam||7||  nirdhUmaCcAnalastoyaM gugguluH sarpirAhutiH||7||  CuklaM puSpaM balirdhUpo dUrvA CvetACca sarSapAH||7||  prAGmukho~atha CucirvaidyastrivarNAmathavA sitAm||7||  upaviSTaH pratisarAM gRhItvA veSTayettayA||7||  bhUrje rocanayA vidyAM likhitAmaparAjitAm||7||  vidhinA sAdhitAM bhUtaiH sarvairapyaparAjitAm||7||  lakSmaNAdiparIvArAM nityAnusmRsevitAm||7||  lakSmaNAsahadevAkhyAnAgadantIkaTambharA||7||  markaTI karkaTI lambA bRhatI kaNTakArikA||7||  kharanAsA mRgorvArurmahACvetA CatAvarI||7||  udaGmukhasya bAlasya badhnIyAttAM tato gale||7||  tadabhAve dRDhaM kSaumasUtraM mantramidaM japan||7||

hastamAtramityAdinA pratisarAbandhanopakaraNavidhAnaM subodham|  cokSANAM nirmalAnAm|  atha prAGmukho vaidyastrivarNAM sitaraktapItAM sitAmeva vA pratisarAM kArpAsasUtraveNikAM gRhItvA bhUrjalikhitAmaparAjitAkhyAM vidyAM lakSmaNAddyauSadhiparivArAM nityaM ca svAnusmRtyA vaidyena sevitAM tayA pratisarayA veSTayet|  kimbhUtAmaparAjitAM sarvairapi bhUtairna parAjitAm|  kAstA lakSmaNAdaya ityAha|  (ni) 'lakSmaNA putranananI raktabinducchadA tathA|' sahadevA balA|  nAgadantI hastidantI|  kaTambharA girikarNI|  markaTI kapikacchUH|  svanAmikA ca karkaTI bilvAdiH lambA kaTukAlAbunI|  kharanAsAbhram|  mRgorvArurgavAkSI|  

	mahACvetA nIlapuSpI girikarNikA|  tato~anantaraM tAM veSTitAM badhnAmItyAdimantraM japan vaidya udIcyabhimukhasya bAlasya gale badhnIyAt|  tasyA aparAjitAyA abhAve dRDhaM kSaumasUtraM badhnIyAt|
anye tu kSaumasUtrasyaiva mantraM vadanti|| 7||

 badhnAmyahaM pratisarAM namaskRtvA svayambhuve||8||  bAlAnAM rakSaNArthAya CivAM pUrvarSinirmitAm||8||  indro~anumanyatAM tubhyaM ye ca tasyAnucAriNaH||8||  vajrACanidharA bhUtA meghavRndAnusAriNaH||8||  airAvataskandhagataM ye~anuyAnti purandaram||8||  yamo vaivasvato rAjA ye ca tasyAnucAriNaH||8||  meSasUkarasiMhoSTrakharavAjisamAnanAH||8||  kAlA kAlAyasaiH pACaiH stabdhAkSA bhrukuTImukhAH||8||  CaktimudgarahastACca khaDgapACadharACca ye||8||  pACabhRdvaruNo rAjA toyabhUH sAgarAlayaH||8||  CAradAbhraghanAkArA ye ca tasyAnucAriNaH||8||  mahormimantaM vegena kSobhayanti saritpatim||8||  dhanAdhipo vaiCravaNaH sarvayakSAdhipo vibhuH||8||  nAnAkArACca ye bhUtAstasyaivAnucarAH sadA||8||  AdityA vasavo rudrA marutaCcACvinAvapi||8||  ete sarve~anumanyantAmimAM pratisarakriyAm||8||  dIrghamAyurarogaM ca tava dAsyanti svasti te||8||  svasti te bhagavAn brahmA svasti nAradaparvatau||8||  svasti vedACca yajJACca agnISomau ca svasti te||8||  svasti te CrIrdhRtiH kIrtirlakSmIrmedhAkSamAdyutiH||8||  svasti tuSTiCca puSTiCca vapurhrIrbuddhireva ca||8||  svasti rudro viCAkhaCca skandaH CaktidharaCca te||8||  svasti dhAtA vidhAtA ca suparNaCca mahAbalaH||8||  svasti devACca yakSACca mA ca te pApamAgatam||8||  durvyAhRtAni duHsvapnaM manasA cintitAni ca||8||  duSTAdInAM bhayakRto vAcaH pratihatA mayA||8||  rakSA pratisarA tubhyaM baddheyaM pApaghAtinI||8||  nirvRtastvaM nirudvego jIva varSaCataM sukhI||8||

badhnAmItyAdibhiCcaturdaCabhiH Clokairmantro nigadavyAkhyAtaH kiJcit pradarCyate|  svayambhuve brahmaNe namaskRtvA pratisarAM badhnAmi bAlAnAM rakSaNAya|  kimbhUtAmAha CivAM CreyaskarIM pUrvarSinirmitAm|  he bAla! tubhyaM pratisarAmindro~anumanyatAmaGgIkarotu|  vajrACanidharatvAdiguNACca tasyendrasyAnucAriNo ye bhUtA airAvataskandhagataM purandaramindramanuyAnti|  yamo~anumanyatAM ye ca tadanucarA meSAdyAnanAH kRSNAdirUpACca|  vAruNo~anumanyatAM tadanucarACca|  sAgara Alayo yasya|  mahormItyAdi varuNAnucaraviCeSaNam|  dhanAdhipaCca tadanucarACca|  AdityACca|  

	iti sarve imAM pratisarakriyAmanumanya-tAm|  tava CiCoste dIrghamAyurarogaM ca dAsyanti|  ravastItyAdyACIH padam|  te CiCoH pApaM durvyAhRtAdikaM ca mAgamat|  

	duSTAdInAM vAco bhayaGkarA mayA pratihatAH|  iyaM ca pApaghAtinI rakSA pratisarA tava baddhA|  anayA ca tvaM nirvRto nirudvegaCca sukhI varSaCataM jIva|| 8||

 apUpapUpasaMyAvasvastikAlopikAdayaH||9||  pAyaso miCrakaH siddho guDapUro haridrakaH||9||  kRsaro yAvakaH kSaudraM palalaM lavaNaM haviH||9||  dadhikulmASaniSpAvo rakto bhUtaudanaH payaH||9||  pakvAmamAMsarudhiramatsyasaktusurAsavAH||9||  gandhaM mAlyaM phalaM hema dhUpaH sapurakunduruH||9||  surasArjakanirguNDIkusumaM ca sapallavam||9||  baliH suCastairdeyaH syAdbhavanasya caturdiCam||9||  catuSkacaityatripathadevAyatanagopure||9||  rekhAvRkSodapAne ca sandhyayordIpavAn niCi||9||

skandagrahe guggulvAdibhiH ClakSNapiSTaiH pradehaH| elavAlUkaM mAlUkam| CrIveSTakaM dhUpadravyam| girikadambako bhUkadambakaH bhUkadambakaH| vAtaharavRkSANAM bhadradArvAdInAM patrakvAthena koSNena pariSekaH|  teSAmeva ca vAtaharavRkSANAm mUlakvAthe sarvagandhadyAvApatattailaM vipakvamabhyaGgaH|  AvApaH kalkaH|  sarvANi gandhadravyANi yathA lAbham|  kaiDaryaM surabhipatram||2(1)||

 bRhatIdvayadvipunarnavareNukopakulyAmustakhadiravacACaGkhanAbhisaralasarpasugandhAsurAhvakalkavipakvaM vA||2||  (2)||2||

 raktamAlyAnulepavasrapatAkAmaNibIjairvividhaiCca bhakSyaiH

 tatra ca rAtrAvigniM jvAlayitvA mantramimaM paThan madhusarpiSA

 viCAkhe skandagrahokto vacAkuSThAnvitaH pradeho golomIbilvaCirISamustasurasAdikvAthena pariSekaH||3||  sarpasugandhAdevadArukuSThamustAkalkena sagomUtrabastamUtreNa

	kSIrivRkSANAM kvAthena jIvanIyagaNaM garbhaM datvA sakSIraM siddhaM sarpiHpAnam|  jIvakAdibhirvA siddhaM sarpiH pAnam|  kSIriNI kSIrikA|  aMCumatIdvayaM pRCniparNI sAlaparNI ca|  vidAryAdibhirvA siddhaM sarpiH pAnam|  

	gudhrapurISAdibhighRrtAktairdhUpaH kAryaH|  keCA manuSyasya|  anantAdIni ca pUrvoktAni skandagrahoktAni somavallyAdIni ca pUrvavaditi sUtreNa baddhvA kaNThena CirasA vA dhArayet|  

	pakvAmamAMsAdiyukto vaTavRkSe baliCcatuSpathe snAnam|  skandAparamAra ityAdiClokena mantraH|  iti viCAkhe|| 3||

 naigameSe viCAkhoktaH pradeho~agnimanthavaruNanalarohiSapUtIkapAribhadrakaiH pariSeko dhAnyamlena sabIjena guggulu
aCvagandhAsarSapoCIraCvetAkuSThaCatAhvAvipakvaM tailamabhyaGgaH||4||  daCamUlakvAthe madhuraskandhagarbhaM sakSIraM sarpiHpAnam||4||  sarpagandhAbastanakharomabhirdhUpaH||4||  sarpagandhAbastagandhAtumbI-

ajAnanaCcalAkSibhrUH kAmarUpI mahAyaCAH||4||  bAlaM bAlahito devo naigameSo~abhirakSatu||4||  svAhA||4||

naigameSo meSAsya iti paryAyau|  tasmin viCAkhokto vacAkuSThAnvito guggulvAdipradehaH|  agnimanthAdibhiH pariSekaH|  rohiSaH plIhaghnaH|  pAribhadrako nimbataruH|  dhAnyAmlAdibhiH pakvaM tailamabhyaGgaH|  dhAnyAmlasya bIjamadho~avasthitaM tena saha|  CvetA kaTabhI|  CatAhvA CatapuSpA|

	vicitramAlyAdibhirmahApathe rAjamArge kSIridrume vA baliH|  nadItIre snAnam|  mantraCcAjAnana iti ClokaH|  iti meSAsye||4||

 Cvagrahe gavAkSIbrahmadattAbRhatIdvayaCArivAhnIverakuSThabhUmi-

Cvagrahe gavAkSyAdibhiH pradehaH|  brahmadattA|  hrIberaM vAlakam|  bhUmikadambakam girikadambakam|  surasasya maJjarI tathoktA|  mayUrapurISAdibhirlepaH|  bilvAdipatrakvAthaH pariSekaH|  naktamAlaH karaJjaH| araluko mayUrajaGghaH|

	vayasthAdikalkena kSIreNa ca siddhaM tailamabhyaGgaH|  tathaiva ca vayasthAdikalkakSIrAbhyAM ghRtaM pAnam|  vayasthA Amalakam|  payasyA kSIrikA|  sahadevA balA|  CuSkANAM matsyAnAM cUrNo gobastamUtrAbhyAM bhAvito niCIthey~ardharAtre dhUpaH|  

	vacAdikaM dhArayet|  vayasthA Amalakam|  brAhmI prasiddhA| jaTilA mAMsI|  golomI dUrvA|  lambA kaTukAlAbunI pUtanA harItakI|  keCI gandhamAMsI|  keSAJcicchatAvarI|  ekaiSIkA trivRnmayUraCikhA ca|

 pitRgrahe pUrvoktaH pradeho vacAvayasthAjIvantIdhAtakI-

	daCamUlakvAthe triphalAdInAM kalkena sakSIraM pakvaM sarpiH pAnam|  payasyA kSIrikA|  devadArvAdibhirvA sakSIraM pakvaM sarpiH pAnam|

	gRdhrAdilomAni ghRtAktAni gRdhrAdInAM purISaM vA suptajane ghanAyAM rAtrau dhUpaH|  athavA vacAdibhiH pradehapaThitairdhUpaH|  pUrvoktaH Cvagrahokto vA mUtrabhAvitamatsyacUrNo dhUpaH|  pUrvoktA eva lakSmyAdyA dhArayet|  

	kumArasya pitrA vRkSamUle surAdiyuktaH svarNamayena cAkSiyugena yukto baliH svayaM nirvApaNIyo nivedanIyaH|  kSIrivRkSasya samIpe snAnam|  yaH pitetyAdinA Clokana mantraH|  iti pitRgrahe|

 CakunyAM madhukahrIveroCIraCArivApadmakotpalamaJji-

 andhapUtanAyAM sarvagandhaiH saCirovaktrasya pradehaH||10||  varuNAsphotapAribhadrakavRkSAdanInAgabalAgairikaCatAvarIbhiH

	hRasvapaJcamUlena sUtroktena madhuravargeNa ca siddhaM ghRtaM madhuCarkarAbhyAM prayogakAle yuktaM prACaH|  pAThAdicUrNo vA madhusarpirbhyAM prACaH|  bhasmaCabdasya pAThAdibhiH sambandhaH|  ketakasUcI prasiddhA|  athavA RkSaromamaSIpAThAdInAM cUrNo madhughRtAbhyAM prACaH|  athavA mUrvAdInAM cUrNo devadArubhasmanA yukto madhughRtAbhyAM prACaH|  girikadambakaM bhUkadambakam|  athavaika evACokarohiNyAH kaTukarohiNyACcUrNaH|  ebhireva ca mUrvAdibhirvipakvamAjaM ghRtaM vA kSIraM vA pibet|

 revatyAM sarvagandhaiH kulatthamASacUrNena ca pradehaH||12||  aCvaga-

uttarasthAnam

bhUtavijJAnIyaH

 athAto bhUtavijJAnIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

athAta ityAdi pUrvavat|| 1||

 aSTAdaCa bhUtAdhipatayaH||2||  tadyathA-surAsuragandharvAraga
yakSabrahmarAkSasarAkSasapiCAcapretakUSmANDakAkhordamauki
raNavetAlapitaraH RSiguruvRddhasiddhACca||2||  te punaH pRthak
koTiparivArAH||2||  teSAmapi pratyekamaparisaGkhyeyaH pari
vAra ityananto bhUtalokaH||2||

yathA~aSTAdaCabhUtAdhipatayo bhavanti|  tadyathetyAdinA tathA darCayati|  te ca surAdayaH pRthak pratyekaM koTiparivArAH teSAmapi parivArANAM pratyekamaparisaGkhyeyaH parivAra ityanena prakAreNAnto bhUtalokaH|| 2||

 sarve~api ca prAyeNAhArakAmA niCA~ardhavicAriNo bhayA
nakA mAMsAsRgvasACinaH||3||

sarve~api bhUtalokA AhArakAminaH santo niCA~ardhavicAriNo bhavanti|  bhayAnakA bhayaGkarA mAMsAdyACinaCca|| 3||

 api ca surAsurAdisaMvAsasaMsargAttacchIlAcArakarmatayA
ca tatsaMjJAM labhante||4||

api ceti samuccaye|  ya ete~asmAbhiH surAdayaH pradarCitAH na te purandarabalicitrarathavAsukidhanadaprabhRtayo jJeyA api tvanya eva|  teSAM tu surAdInAM saMvAsasaMsargAttatsadRCaCIlAditayA ca surAdisaMjJAM labhante|| 4||

 teSAM punaranupraveCe kAraNaM sadyaH pUrvakRto vA viCeSeNa
prajJAparAdhaH||5||  tena hi kAmakrodhalobhamohAdijanitena praluptadharmo bhinna
vratAcAraCauco malImasaH pUjyAnatikrAmannAtmAnamupahanti||5||  tatastamAtmahanamavatAragaveSiNo devAdigrahA apyanughnanti||5||  tadvadunmAdApasmAropaplutacittaM tathA jvarAdyAmayopahatamapi||5||  viCeSataCca vraNinaH pUyAsRksnehagandhena||5||

teSAM tu dehAnupraveCe puMsAM prajJhAparAdho viCeSataH kAraNam|  kiMbhUtaH prajJAparAdha Aha|  sadyaH kRto vA pUrvajanmakRto vA|  sa ca sUtra uktaH|  

	tena hi prajJAparAdhanakAmAdijanitena luptadharmatvAdiyukta AtmAnamuhanti|  bhinnaCabdasya naSTaparyAyasya CaucAntena sambandhaH|

	taM tathAvidhamAtmanaiva hatAtmAnamavatAragaveSiNaCchidrAnveSiNo devAdigrahA apyanu paCcAt ghnanti|  tadvadevonmAdenApasmAreNa vopaplutacittaM devAdayo~anughnanti|  vraNinaCca puruSAN pUyAdigandhena hetunA viCeSato~anughnanti||5||

 evaMvidhAMstu puruSaneSvAghAtakAleSvabhigacchanti||6||  tadyathA-pApasya karmaNaH samArambhe||6||  pUrvakRtasya vA pariNAmakAle||6||  ekasya vA CUnyagRhanivAse||6||  catuSpathAdhiSThAne va||6||  sandhyAvelAyAmaprayatabhAve vA pakSasandhiSu
yA mithunIbhAve||6||  rajasvalAbhigamane vA||6||  viguNe vAdhyA
panahomabalimaGgalaprayoge||6||  niyamabrahmacaryavratabhaGge vA||6||  mahAhave vA||6||  deCapurakulavinACe vA||6||  mahAgrahopagamane
vA||6||  striyA vA prajananakAle||6||  vividhabhUtACucisaMsparCe
vA||6||  vamanavirecanarudhirasrAve vA||6||  aCuceraprayatasya vA 
caityadevAyatanAbhigamane vA||6||  mAMsamadhuguDAtilamadyocchiSTe
vA||6||  digvAsasi vA||6||  niCi nagaracatuSpathopavanaCmaCA
nAbhigamane vA||6||  dvijagurusurayatipUjyavyatikrame vA||6||

evaMvidhAn pUrvoktaprakArAn puruSAMstu eSu vakSyamANeSvAghAtakAleSu chidreSu devAdayo~abhigamanaM kurvanti|

	keSvityAha-tadyathetyAdi|  pApaM karma hiMsAdiH|  aprayatabhAvo~aCucitvam|  pakSasandhayo~aSTamIcaturdaCyamAvAsyAH|  mithunIbhAvo yoSitA ratiH|  athavAdhyApanAdInAM prayoNe viguNe CAstraniSiddhe|  athavA niyamAdibhaGge|  CAstrato niyamaH smRtaH|  mahAhavo mahAn saMgrAmaH|  deCavinACe vA puravinACe vA kulavinACe vA|  mahAgrahasya rAhorupagamane vA|  striyAH prajananakAlaH prasUtikAlaH|  athavA vividhAnAM bhUtAnAmaCucInAM saMsparCe vA|  vamanAdInAM prayoge vA|  aCuceraprayatasya vA sataCcaityAdyabhigamane vA|  mAMsAdyucchiSTe vA|  digvAsasi nagne|  niCi vA nagarAdyabhigamane|  dvijAdInAM pUjyAnAM vyatikrame vA|| 6||

 tatrAvalokayanto janayanti manovikAraM surAsuragrahAH||7||  spRCanto gandharvAH||7||  samAviCanto bhujagAH||7||  yakSACcAtmagandhamAghrApayantaH||7||  rAkSasA vAhayanto~adhiruhya||7||  tathaiva piCAcAdyAH||7||  darCayantaH pitaro~abhiCapanta RSiguru
vRddhasiddhAH||7||

tatretyAdinA yo graho yena prakAreNa manovikAraM janayatIti pradarCyate|  subodham|  rAkSasA adhiruhya vAhayantastathaiva piCAcAdyA api|  pitaro darCayantaH|  RCyAdayastvabhiCApaM kurvantaH|  api  ca| AdUSayantaH puruSasya dehaM devAdayaH svaistu guNaprabhAvaiH|  viCantyadRCyAstarasA yathaiva chAyAtapau darpaNasUryakAntau|| 7||

 tatra CIlavantaM cokSAcAraM CuklAmbaradharaM tapaHsvA
dhyAyaparaM prAyaH Cuklapratipadi trayodaCyAM caturdaCyAM
paurNamAsyAM vA devA gRhNanti||8||  krodhanaM kadaryamAtmasambhAvinaM
kularUpagarvitaM kRSNadvAdaCyAM kRSNatrayodaCyAM sandhya
yoCcAsurAH||8||  priyanRttagItavAditragandhamAlyAmbaraM paradAra

ca gandharvAH||8||  svapnaCIlaM capalamanimittakrodhanamarthasiddhaM
brAhmaNaM prAyaH paJcamyAM sandhyayormadhyAhne ca nAgAH||8||  sattvabalarUpagAndharvadhanaCauryayuktaM mAlyAnulepanahA
syapriyamativyAkaraNaM prAyaH CuklasaptamyAmekAdaCyAJca 
yakSAH||8||  svAdhyAyatapovratacaryAdevayatigurupUjArataM bhraSTaCaucaM vA

paruSabhASiNaM bahvACinaM ca kRSNanavamIdvAdaCyorniCi ca

piCAcAdayaH||8||  mAtApitRguruvRddhasiddhAcAryopasevinaM prAyo daCamyAmamA
vAsyAM ca pitaraH||8||  tadvidhameva ca prAyaH SaSThyAM navamyAM
ca guruvRddhasiddhAH||8||  tathaiva ca snAnaCuciviviktasevinaM
dharmaCAstraCrutikAvyakuCalamRSayaH||8||

tatra CIlavatvAdiguNaM prAyaH CuklapratipadAdiSu devA gRhNanti|  krodhanAdikaM kRSNadvAdaCyAdiSvasurAH|  priyanRttagItAdikaM caturthyAdiSu gandharvAH|  svapnaCIlAdikaM paJcamyAdiSu nAgAH|  nyasyArthesiddho~arthasiddhaH|  sattvAdiyuktaM mAlyAdipriyaM ca vAcamatikramyacarati yastaM CuklasaptamyAdiSu yakSAH|

	svAdhyAyAdirataM brAhmaNamabrAhmaNaM vA brahmavAdinaM vedapAThaCIlaM devAgArAdipriyaM skhalitabrahmacaryaM ca CuklapaJcamyAdiSu brahmarAkSasAH|

	hInasattvAdikaM dvitIyAdiSu rAkSasapiCAcAdayaH|  tatra viCeSaH kalipriyAdikaM kRSNanavamyadiSu rAkSasAH| 

	AtmaClAghipravRttinaM caturdaCyAM piCAcAdayaH|  kUTasAkSyamasatyasAkSyam| 

	mAtrAdyupasevinaM pitaro daCamyAdike|  tadvidhameva ca mAtrAdyupasevinaM SaSThyAdike gurvAdayaH|  tathaiva ceti SaSThyAM navamyAM ca snAnAdisevinaM dharmaCAstrAdikuCalaM carSayaH|| 8||

 teSAM tu grahISyatAM pUrvArUpANi bhavanti||9||  tadyathA-deva
gobrAhmaNatapasvinAM hiMsArucitvaM nRCaMsAbhiprAyatA kopa
natvamaratirojovarNacchAyAbalavapuSAM copataptiH svapne devAdibhirbhartsanaM pravarttanaM ca||9||

teSAM tu sarveSAM surAdInAM grahISyatAM grahaNaM kariSyatAM pUrvarUpANi bhavanti|  kAnItyAha-tadyathetyAdi|  upatapterojovarNAdibhiH sambandhaH| svapne devAdibhirbhartsanaM santarjanam| pravartanaM ca yathokteSu vyApAreSu|| 9||

 tatra saumyadRSTiM gambhIramapradhRSyamakopanaM CucimanidraM bhoja
nAnAbhilASiNamalpasvedamUtrapurISavAcaM saMskRtavAdinaM devadvijagurubhaktaM CuklamAlyAmbarasaritpulinaCailocca

pradAtAraM CubhagandhaM varcasvinaM phullapadmopamamukhaM devagraheNa
gRhItaM vidyAt||10||  tatrApi govRSamiva nadantaM dIptamukhanayanamAdIptena svareNa

tatretyAdinA surAdinAmaSTAdaCAnAmaviSTAnAM krameNa lakSaNam|  tatra saumyadRSTyAdikaM devagraheNa gRhItaM vidyAt|  gambhIram|  yasya prabhAvAdAkAre krodhaCokabhayAdayaH bhAvasthA nopalakSyante tadgAmbhIryamiti smRtamiti|  tena yuktam|  svedAdivAgantAnAmalpaCabdena sambandhaH|  bhaktaCabdasya devAdibhiH|  priyaCabdasya mAlyAdibhiH| varcasvI tejasvI|  

tatrApItyAdinA ICvarAkhyasya devaviCeSasya lakSaNam|  govRSo madotkaTo gauH|  AdIptaH svara ojasvI|  medhastanitAdi vAcA visRjantamindrAkhyena devena gRhItaM vidyAt|  vAcaiva dhanAni prayacchantaM dhanadena gRhItaM vidyAt|  varuNAkhyena devena gRhItaH  surAdigandho bhavati|  kASThAdikaJca sarvam pACaM manyate|  iti devAnAM lakSaNam|| 10||

 hiGuvyoSAlanaimAlIlaCunArkajaTAjaTAH||3||  ajalomI sagolomI bhUtakeCI vacA latA||3||  kukkuTIsarpagandhAkhyA tilAH kANavikANake||3||  vajraproktA vayasthA ca CRGgI mohanavatyapi||3||  srotojAJjanarakSoghnaM rakSoghnaM cAnyadauSadham||3||  kharACvaCvAviDuSTrarkSagodhAnakulaCalyakAt||3||  dvIpimArjAragosiMhavyAghrasAmudrasatvataH||3||  carmapittadvijanakhA varge~asmin sAdhayed ghRtam||3||  purANAmathavA tailaM navaM tatpAnanasyayoH||3||  abhyaGge ca prayoktavyameSAM cUrNaM ca dhUpane||3||  ebhiCca gulikAM yuJjyAdaJjane sAvapIDane||3||  pralepe kalkameteSAM kvAthaM ca pariSecane||3||  prayogo~ayaM grahonmAdAnsAspasmArAn CamaM nayet||3||

hiGgvAdau varge purANaM ghRtaM siddhaM navaM tailaM vA pAnanasyayorabhyaGge ca prayoktavyam|  naipAlI manaHCilA|  arkajaTA arkamUlam|  jaTA mAMsI|  ajalomI meSavilocanA|  golomI dUrvA|  bhUtakeCI CuklA nirguNDI|  latA CatapuSpA|  kukkuTI rasAyanoktalakSaNA|  sarpagandhA gandhanAkulI|  kANA kAkolI|  vikANA kSIrakAkolI|  vajraproktA sudhA|  vayasthAM  Amalakam|  CRGgI karkaTaCRGgI|  mohanavallI brAhmI CirISaCca|  rakSoghnaM sarSapam|  anyadrakSoghnamauSadhaM vacAdi yathAlAbham|  kharAdInAM trayodaCAnAM sAmudrANAM ca sattvAnAM prANinAM yathAlAbhaM carmAdikam|  eSAmityebhiriti ca hiGgvAdInAM parAmarCaH|  avapIDanaM kalkAdinasyam|  subodham||3||

 CirISapuSpaM laCunaM CuNThIM siddhArthakaM vacAm||6||  maJjiSThAM dve niCe kRSNAM bastamUtreNa peSayet||6||  chAyACuSkA kRtA vartiH matsyapittadrutAJjanam||6||

 naktamAlaphalaM vyoSaM bilvasyonAkayorjaTA||7||  haridre ca kRtA vartiH pUrvavannayanAJjanam||7||  vayasthAhiGgukaTukASaDgranthAsaindhavaM tathA||7||

 siddhArthakavacAhiGgupriyaGgurajanIdvayam||8||  maJjiSThACvetakaTabhVIvarACvetAdrikarNikA||8||  nimbasya patraM bIjaM tu naktamAlaCirISayoH||8||  surAhvaM tryUSaNaM sarpirgomUtre taiCcaturguNe||8||  siddhaM siddhArthakaM nAma pAne nasye ca yojitam||8||  grahAnsarvAnnihantyACu viCeSAdAsurAn grahAn||8||  kRtyAlakSmIviSonmAdajvarApasmArapApmajit||8||  ebhirevauSadhairbastavAriNA kalpito~agadaH||8||  pAnanasyAJjanAlepasnAnodgharRSaNayojitaH||8||  guNaiH pUrvavaduddiSTo rAjadvAre ca siddhikRt||8||

siddhArthakAdibhiH kalkIkRtaiCcaturguNe gomUtre siddhaM sarpirnAmnA siddhArthakam|  grahAn sarvAn surAdIn nihanti|  AsurAn grahAn viCeSAnnihanti|  kRtyAdighnaJca|  kRtyA AbhicAradevatA|  

	ebhiriti siddhArthakAdibhirvastamUtreNAgadaH pAnAdiyojito guNaiH pUrvavat|  subodham|| 8||

 siddhArthakavyoSavacACvagandhA

 natamadhukakaraJjalAkSApaTolIsamaGgAvacA

 surarSiguruvRddhephyaH siddhephyaCca surAlaye||15||  diCyuttarasyAM tatrApi devAyopaharet balim||15||  paCcimAyAM yathAkAlaM daityaphUtAya catvare||15||  gandharvAya gavAM mArge savastrApharaNaM phalim||15||  pitRnAgagrahe nadyAM nAgephyaH pUrvadakSiNe||15||  yakSAya yakSAyatane saritorvA samAgame||15||  catuSpathe rAkSasayorphImeSu gahaneSu vA||15||  rakSasAM dakSiNasyAM tu pUrvasyAM brahmarakSasAm||15||  CUnyAlaye piCAcAya paCcimAM diCamAsthite||15||

	pitRgrahe nAgagrahe ca nadyAM bhaliH|  nAgAnAM viCeSamAha-

 daitye balirbahuphalaH soCIrakamalotpalaH||18||

bahaphalAdiyukto daitye baliH| iti daitye|| 18||

	(CvetapatramityAdi|  CItenAnuSNena jalena piSTaM CvetapatrAdikaM nAvanAJjanayornAvane~aJjane ca hitaM nAgagrahavimokSaNamityarthaH|  CvetapatraM (velliyila) Cvetapadmamiti kecit|  nAgaM nakham|  sarSapaM hrasvasarSapam|  napuMsakamanapuMsakenaikavaccAnyatarasyAmiti hitaCabdasya klIbatvamekatvaM ca|  iti kairalI vyAkhyA|| 19||

 yakSANAM kSIradadhyAjyamiCrakaudanagugguluH||20||  devadArutpalaM padmamuCIraM vastrakAJcanam||20||  hiraNyaM ca baliryojyo mUtrAjyakSIramekataH||20||  siddhaM samonmitaM pAnanAvanAbhyaJjane hitam||20||  harItakI haridre dve laCuno maricaM vacA||20||  nimbapatraJca bastAmbukalkitaM nAvanAJjanam||20||

	harItakyAdikaM bastamUtreNa kalkitaM nAvanamaJjanaM ca nAvanAJjanaviSaye hitam|  iti yakSANAm||20||

 brahmarakSo baliH siddhaM yavAnAM pUrNamADhakam||21||  toyasya kumbhaH palalaM chatraM vastraM vilepanam||21||  gAyatrIviMCatipalakvAthe~ardhapalikaiH pacet||21||  tryUSaNatriphalAhiGguSaDgranthAmisisarSapaiH||21||  gomUtre triguNe pAnanasyAbhyaGgeSu taddhitam||21||

uttarasthAnam

unmAdapratiSedhaH

 athAta unmAdapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

bhUtasamAnahetutvAdibhiCcittopaplavasAmAnyAccikitsAsAmAnyAcca bhUticikitsAyA anantara evonmAdApasmArayornirNayastatra prathamamunmAdaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 SaDunmAdA bhavanti-vAtapittakaphasannipAtAdhiviSanimittAH||2||  tatronmAdo nAma ya unmArgagaiH CArIramAnasairdoSairmanaso madaH||2||

vAtAdibhedena SaDunmAdAH|  Adhayo mAnasA vyAdhayo maunavicAraharSadayAH|  tatra CArIrairvAtAdibhirmAnasAbhyAM ca rajastamobhyAM manaso yo madaH sa unmAda ityunmAdasya nirvacanam||2||

 teSAM punarunmArgagatve hetuH CamalaM vikRtopahitamahitamanu
citamannapAnavidhinirapekSamAhArajAtamatyupakSINadehAnAM
vyavAyavyAdhivegasamudgame viSamaCarIraceSTopasevA deva
dvijagurUllaGghanaM vA rAgadveSajanitAbhirAdhibhirmanovighAto
viSopaviSagaropayogo vA||3||

teSAmiti CArIramAnasAnAM doSANAmunmArgagamane tu CamalAdikaM hetuH|  CamalaM pApam|  vikRtopahitamityAdyAhArajAtasya viCeSaNam|  vikRtenopahitaM kRtamahitamapathyam|  anucitamanabhyastam|  viSameNa CArIreNAGgena yA ceSTA tasyAH sevA|  devAdInAmullaGghanaM vA|  rAga-janitA Adhayo dayitAdivirahAdayaH|  dveSajanitA bhayAdayaH|  tairAdhibhirmanovighAtaH|  viSaM mahAviSam|  upaviSaM svalpaCaktiviSam|  garo-~anekasaMyogajanitaM viSam|| 3||

 ebhirhInasattvasya manasyupahate buddhau pracalitAyAmatyu
dIrNatvAddoSAH prakupitA hRdayamupasRtya manovahAni srotAM
syAvRtya janayantyunmAdam||4||

ebhirityanantaroktairhetubhiH|  hInasattvasyetyAdi subodham||4||

 tatra CirasaH CUnyatA cakSuSorasvasthatvaM svanaH karNayo-
rucchvAsAdhikyamAsyasaMsravaNammannAnabhilASo~arocako-
~avipAko hRdayagraho~asthAne dhyAnAyAsasammohodvegAH satataM
romaharSo jvaro~abhIkSNamunmattacittatvamudarditvamarditAkR-
tikaraNaM vyAdheH svapne ca darCanamabhIkSNaM bhrAntacittaca-
litAnavasthitAnAmapraCastAnAM rUpANAM tilapIDAkavacca-
krAdhirohaNaM vAtakuNDalikAbhirunmathanaM nimajjanaM kaluSANAmbhasAmAvarteSu cakSuSoCcApasarpaNamiti 
doSanimittAnAmunmAdAnAM pUrvarUpANi||5||  tato~anantaramunmAdAbhinirvRttireva||5||

tatretyAdinA vAtAdidoSanimittAnAmunmAdAnAM pUrvarUpANi|

asthAne~aprasaGge dhyAnAdayaH|  udardo doSAdivijJAnIyoktalakSaNaH|  vyAdheH svapne darCanaM dehasya|  bhrAntAdiguNAnAJca rUpANAM darCanam|  kvaccikrAdhirUDhaistilAH pIDyante yathAsmAddeCe|  vAtakuNDalikA AvartavAtAH|  tataH pUrvebhyo~anantaramunmAdo~avaCyamabhinirvartata ityevaCabdArthaH||5||

 sAmAnyaliGgaM manobuddhismRtyAdisampramoSaH||6||  tataCca deho 
hatasArathiriva ratho~akarNadhAra iva cApsu plavaH sukha
duHkhAcAradharmAdharmapraluptokasmAd bhramati||6||

manaH sampramoSAdikamutpannAnAmunmAdAnAM doSajAnAM sAmAnyaliGgam|  tataCceti manaHprabhRtInAM sampramoSe|  karNadhAraH plavavAhakaH|  plavaCca nAvAdiH||6||

 tatra vAtAdasthAnasmitahasitanRttagItavAditravAgaGgavikSepa
vAgbhedabhrUvikSeparodanakroCanAsphoTanAni paryaTanamajasra
mAsyAt phenAgamo yAnamayAnairalaGkaraNamanalaGkArikarikairdra
vyairlobho~abhyavahAryeSu labdheSu cAvamAnastIvraM mAtsaryaM
kArCyaM pAruSyamutpiNDitAruNAkSatA jIrNe~anne cAtibalavatvam||7||

tatretyAdinA viCeSaliGgAni|  atibalavatvAntaM vAtaja unmAde lakSaNam||7||

 pittAt krodhaH santarjanamakasmAnmuSTiloSTakASThaCastrai
rabhidravaNaM nagnatA pracchAyaCiCirAbhiratirudakAbhilASaH
santApaH pItAvasraMsanamanimittamanalajvalanopaCaGkAhni
tArakAdarCanaM tAmraharitahAridrasaMrabdhAkSatvaM ca||8||

pittAdunmAde saMrabdhAkSatvAntaM liGgam|  prakRSTA chAyA yatra deCe sa pracchAyaH|  pItAvasraMsanaM pItasya guNena bhraMCaH||8||

 kaphAdalpavAkceSTAhAratvamarocako vamathuruSNasevA
lAlAsiGghANakasravaNaM rahaHkAmatA strIpriyatvaM nidrA
bIbhatsatvaM CaucadveSaH CvayathurAsye CuklastimitamalA
vilAkSatA bhukte rAtrau ca balavatvamiti||9||

rAtribalavatvAntaM kaphAdunmAde lakSaNam||9||

 bhavati cAtra ----

sarvAyatanasaMsthAnasannipAte tadAtmakam||10||  unmAdaM dAruNaM vidyAttaM bhiSak parivarjayet||10||

gatAnugatikA|  sarveSAmAyatanAnAM doSonmAdakAraNAnAM sannipAte saMsthAnAnAJca sarvonmAdaliGgAnAM sannipAte miCrIbhUtatve tadAtmakamunmAdaM vidyAt|  taM dAruNaM sAnnipAtikaM vaidyaH parivarjayeda sAdhyatvAt||10||

ebhirityanantaroktairhetubhiH|  hInasattvasyetyAdi subodham||4||

 tatra CirasaH CUnyatA cakSuSorasvasthatvaM svanaH karNayo-
rucchvAsAdhikyamAsyasaMsravaNammannAnabhilASo~arocako-
~avipAko hRdayagraho~asthAne dhyAnAyAsasammohodvegAH satataM

krAdhirohaNaM vAtakuNDalikAbhirunmathanaM nimajjanaM kaluSANAmbhasAmAvarteSu cakSuSoCcApasarpaNamiti 
doSanimittAnAmunmAdAnAM pUrvarUpANi||5||  tato~anantaramunmAdAbhinirvRttireva||5||

tatretyAdinA vAtAdidoSanimittAnAmunmAdAnAM pUrvarUpANi|

 sAmAnyaliGgaM manobuddhismRtyAdisampramoSaH||6||  tataCca deho 
hatasArathiriva ratho~akarNadhAra iva cApsu plavaH sukha
duHkhAcAradharmAdharmapraluptokasmAd bhramati||6||

manaH sampramoSAdikamutpannAnAmunmAdAnAM doSajAnAM sAmAnyaliGgam|  tataCceti manaHprabhRtInAM sampramoSe|  karNadhAraH plavavAhakaH|  plavaCca nAvAdiH||6||

 tatra vAtAdasthAnasmitahasitanRttagItavAditravAgaGgavikSepa

tatretyAdinA viCeSaliGgAni|  atibalavatvAntaM vAtaja unmAde lakSaNam||7||

 pittAt krodhaH santarjanamakasmAnmuSTiloSTakASThaCastrai

tArakAdarCanaM tAmraharitahAridrasaMrabdhAkSatvaM ca||8||

pittAdunmAde saMrabdhAkSatvAntaM liGgam|  prakRSTA chAyA yatra deCe sa pracchAyaH|  pItAvasraMsanaM pItasya guNena bhraMCaH||8||

 kaphAdalpavAkceSTAhAratvamarocako vamathuruSNasevA

rAtribalavatvAntaM kaphAdunmAde lakSaNam||9||

 bhavati cAtra ----

 laCunAnAM CataM triMCadabhayAtryUSaNAt palam||21||  gavyacarmamaSIprastho dvayADhakaM  kSIramUtrayoH||21||  purANasarpiSaH prasthamebhiH siddhaM prayojayet||21||  hiGgucUrNapalaM CIte datvA ca madhumAnikAm||21||  taddoSAgantusambhUtAnunmAdanviSamajvarAn||21||  apasmArAMCca hantyACu pAnAbhyaJjananAvanaiH||21||

uttarasthAnam

apasmArapratiSedhaH

 athAto~apasmArapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

unmAdAnantaramapasmAre pUrvamuktaM prayojanaM tadvijJAnArthamadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 smRtyApAyo hyapasmAraH sa dhIsattvAbhisaMplavAt||2||  jAyate~abhihate citte cintACokabhayAdibhiH||2||  unmAdavat prakupitaiCcittadehagatairmalaiH||2||  sate sattve hRdi vyApte saMjJAvAhiSu kheSu ca||2||  tamo viCan mUDhamatirbIbhatsAH kurute kriyAH||2||  dantAn khAdan vaman phenaM hastau pAdau ca vikSipan||2||  paCyannasanti rUpANi praskhalan patati kSitau||2||  vijihyAkSibhruvo doSavege~atIte vibudhyate||2||  kAlAntareNa sa punaCcaivameva viceSTate||2||  apasmAraCcaturbhedo vAtAdyairnicayena ca||2||

apasmAro hi smRtyapAyaH smRtyapagama ucyate|  sa cApasmAro dhiyo buddheH sattvasya dhairyasya cAbhisaMplavAd vinACAjjAyate|  kathamityAha|  cintAdibhiCcitte~abhihate unmAdoktaprakAreNa prakupitaiCcittadehagatairmalai rajastamovAtAdibhiH sattve hate hRdi ca vyApte saMjJAvAhiSu ca srotaHsu vyApteSvevaM sati puruSo mUDhamatistamo viCan vIbhatsAH kriyAH kurute|  dantakhAdanAdi kurvan kSitau patati|  tato doSANaM vege~atIte vijihmAkSibhruvo vibudhyate|  subodham|  nicayaH sannipAtaH|| 2||

 rUpamutpatsyamAne~asmin hRtkampaH snUnyatA bhramaH||3||  tamaso darCanaM dhyAnaM bhrUvyudAso~akSivaikRtam||3||  aCabdaCravaNaM svedo lAlAsiGghANakasrutiH||3||  avipAko~arucirmUrcchA kukSyATopo balakSayaH||3||  nidrAnACo~aGgamardastRT svapne gAnaM sanartanam||3||  pAnaM tailasya madyasya tayoreva ca mehanam||3||

asminnapasmAra utpatsyamAne bhaviSyati hRtkampAdikaM rUpam|  siGghANakasrutiH nAsAsrAvaH|  tayoriti tailamadyayormehanam|  iti sAmAnyena pUrvarUpam||3||

 tatra vAtAt sphuratsakthiH phratataM ca muhurmuhuH||4||  apasmarati saMjJAM ca laphate visvaraM rudan||4||  utphiNDitAkSaH Cvasiti phenaM vamati kamphate||4||  Avidhyati Ciro dantAn daCatyAdhmAtakandharaH||4||  parito vikSipatyaGgaM viSamaM vinatAGguliH||4||  rUkSaCyAvAruNAkSitvaGnaKAsyaH kRSNamIkSate||4||  capalaM paruSaM rUpaM virUpaM vikRtAnanam||4||

tatretyAdi vikRtAnanAntaM vAtApasmAralakSaNam|  pratataM santataM muhurmuhuH pratikSaNamapasmarati saMjJAM ca labhate|  visvaraM rudan CabhdaM kurvan Cira Avidhyati bhityAdAvAviddhaM karoti|  AdhmAtA samantAd dhmAtA kandharA grIvA yasya|  rUkSatvAdiyuktamakSyAdikaM yasya|  sarvaM ca rUpaM kRSNaM capalAdiguNamIkSate paCyati||4||

 apasmarati pittena muhuH saMjJAM ca vindati||5||  pItaphenAkSivaktratvagAsphAlayati medinIm||5||  bhairavAdIptaruSitarUpadarCI tRSAnvitaH||5||

	puSyanakSatre kAkolyAdikaM bastamUtreNa peSayet|  piSTaistairapasmAriNaM dihyaddhUpayecca|  hiGguCivATikA hiGgupatrikA|  kaiDaryaH pUtikaraJjaH||27||

 gopucchalomabhirdagdhairathavA bastaromabhiH||28||  kharAsthibhirhastinakhaistadvadvA mUtrakalkitaiH||28||  udvartanaM sadA kuryAcchRtaiCca pariSecanam||28||

gopucchalomabhirdagdhairmUtrakalkitaiCcodvartanaM sadA kuryAt|  athavA bastaromabhirdagdhairmUtrakalkitaiCcodvartanamathavA kharAsthibhirhastinakhaistadvaditi dugdhairanu ca mUtrakalkitairjale CRtairgopucchalomAdibhiH pariSecanaM ca kuryAt||28||

 AbhiH kriyAbhiH siddhAbhirhRdayaM sampramucyate||29||  srotAMsi cAsya Cuddhyanti smRtiM saMjJAJca vindati||29||

AbhiranantaroktAbhiH kriyAbhiH siddhAbhirasandigdhakAryakaraNasvabhAvAbhirasyApasmAriNo hRdayaM samyak pramucyate srotAMsi Cuddhyanti ca| saH smRtiM saMjJAM ca vindati labhate||29||

 bhUtAnubandhe~apasmAre doSaliGgAdhikAkRtau||30||  yuJjyAdyathAsvaM bhUtoktAM kriyAM daivavyapACrayAm||30||

vartmarogavijJAnIyaH

 athAto vartmarogavijJAnIyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 .................. calastatra prApya vartmACrayAH sirAH||3||  suptotthitasya kurute vartmastambhaM savedanam||3||  pAMsupUrNAbhanetratvaM kRcchronmIlanamaCru ca||3||  vimardanAtsyAcca CamaH kRcchronmIlaM vadanti tam||3||

tatraivaMsthite calo vAyuH pradhAno vartmACrayAH sirAH prApya suptotthitasya tatkAlatyaktanidrasya puMso vartmastambhAdikaM kurute|  tasya ca rogasya vimardanAcchamaH syAt|  taM rogaviCeSamAcAryA nAmnA kRcchronmIlamiti vadanti||3||

yattu vartma vAyunA nimIlyate na kadAcidunmIlyate tadvartma nAmnA vAtahatamucyate|  kimbhUtaM vartmAha|  vimuktasandhi visrastabandhanam|  niCcheSTaM hInaM ca||5||

 kRSNAH pittena bahvyo~antavartma kumbhIkabIjavat||6||  AdhmAyante punarbhinnAH piTikAH kumbhisaMjJakAH||6||

antarvatma vartmano~antarbhAge pittena kRSNAH piTikA bhavanti|  yA bhinnAH kumbhIkabIjavat kumudataNDulavat punarAdhmAyante paripUrvante|  tAH piTakAH kumbhinAmnyaH||6||

 sadAhakledanistodaM raktAbhaM sparCanAkSamam||7||  pittena jAyate vartma pittotkliSTamuCanti tat||7||

pittena sadAhAdiguNaM vartma jAyate bhavati|  tadvartma nAmnA pittotkliSTamuCanti||7||

 karoti kaNDUM dAhaM ca pittaM pakSmAntamACritam||8||  pakSmaNAM CatanaM cAnu pakSmaCAtaM vadanti tam||8||

pakSmAntamACritaM pittaM kaNDUvAdikaM karoti taM rogamAcAryA nAmnA pakSmaCAtamiti vadanti||8||

 pothakyaH piTakAH CvetAH sarSapAbhA ghanAH kaphAt||9||  CophopadeharukkaNDUpicchilAsrasamanvitAH||9||

 kaphotkliSTaM bhavedvartma stambhakledopadehavat||10||

stambhAdimadvartma bhavet kaphAditi prakaraNAt|  tadvartma nAmnA kaphotkliSTamityucyate||10||

 athAto vartmarogapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

uktakrameNaiva vartmarogapratiSedhAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAtumArabhate||1||

 kRcchrabodhe purANaM ghRtaM drAkSAkalkakvAthasiddhaM Carka
rAvacUrNitaM rAtrau pAyayet||2||  snigdhAMCca nasyadhUmAJjanatarpa
NapuTapAkAn prayojayet vAtaharadravyakalpitAMCca vastIn kSIrasvinnaireraNDapallavaiH svedaM ca vartmanAm||2||

kRcchrabodhAkhye vartmaroge prarANaM drAkSAyAH kvAthena tasyA eva ca kalkena siddhaM CakrarayAvacUrNitaM bhiSagAturaM rAtrau pAyayet|  atra ca snigdhAn nasyAdIn vAtaharadravyasiddhAn bastIn kSIrasvinnaireraNDapallavaivartmanAM svedaJca prayojayet||2||

 evamaCAntau mudgamAtrAntaraiH padairagninA tvagdAhaM bindu
bhirAcaret||3||

evaM kRte~apyaCAntau satyAmagninA bindurbhirmudgamAtrAntaraiH padaistvagdAhamAcaret|  bindubhiriti tvagdAhakaraNe CarAdInAM mukhasparCena vartmanorbindvAkRtirdAho yojyo mudgamAtrairvyavahitaiH padairiti pradarCitam||3|| 

 kumbhIkApiTakAsu vartma likhitvA saindhavenAnuprati
sArya paTolAmalakamadhukakvAthena secayed ghRtena ca||4||

nimiSavAtahatau varjayedityuktam|  kumbhIkAkhyAsu piTakAsu vartma likhitvA sUkSmAbhI rekhAbhiH samaM vidArya paCcAtsaindhavena pratisAraNaM paTolAdikvAthena ghRtena ca sekaM ca||4||

 pittaraktotkliSTayormadhurauSadhasiddhena sarpiSA snigdhasya

kalkena||5||  triphalAkvAthayuktena vA brAhmIcUrNena||5||  canda
noCIramadhukamRdvIkApunarnavabRhatImalasiddhaM tailaM nAvayet||5||  likhite ca vartmani srutarakte yaSTyAhvaniryUheNa prakSAlanam||5||  candanaCRtaM payaH pariSekaH||5||  CItasnigdhACca CirovaktralepaH||5||

pittotkliSTe raktotkliSTe ca CirovaktralepAntaM yathAyogaM kAryam|  lAghavAya kramabhaGgaH|| 5||

 pakSmaCAte romakUpAn sUcyagreNa kuTTayojjalaukobhirvA
grAhayet||6||  payasekSurasena vA vamanam||6||  svAduCItaskandha sAdhitaM sarpirnAvanam||6||  kAkajaGghAM rohitamatsyamAMsaM ca
kAkaCoNitabhavitamantardhUmaM dagdhaM cUrNAJjanaM kuryAt||6||  saJcUrNya puSpakAsIsaM bhAvayet surasArasaiH||6||  tAmre daCAhaM paramaM pakSmaCAte tadaJjanam||6||

pakSmaCAte vyAkhyAsamam|  sUcyagraM sUciprAntaM tenAghAtaiH kuTTayat cyutAnAM romNAM suSirANi tudet|  payasekSurasena vA vamanamityatra vamanadravyayuktenetayarthAt gamyate|  svAduCItaskandhaH CatAvarIjIvantyAdiH|  

	(saJcUrNyeti|  puSpakAsIsaM tatsaMjJamauSadhaM saJcUrNya cUrNayitvA surasArasaiH surasAyAstulasyAH svarasaiH saha tAmre tAmrabhAjane daCAhaM daCa divasAn daCAhamityasyAtyantasaMyoge dvitIyA|  bhavayet mardayet|  puSpakAsIsaM putraJcArIti bhASAyAm|  tat pakSmaCAte paramaM CreSThamaJjanam )
||6||

 pothakIrvilikhya CuNThIsaindhavamAgadhikAcUrNaiH pratisArya prakSAlya coSNAmbhasA khadirasArADhakICigrupatraka
SAyeNa secayet||7||  tataCcAmrajambUpravAlakvAthenA~aCcyotanam||7||  triphalAkhadirasArodakena vA madhusaMyuktena||7||  viDa
GgalAkSAdArvItvaggairikAlamanohvAcUrNaH kSaudrAnvito~aJjanam||7||

pothakIrvilikhyetyAdi|  khadirasAraH khadirakASThaM|  ADhakI tuvarI|  AmraH sahakAraH|  jambUH prasiddhastayoH pravAlAnAm kvAthena|  madhuyuktena triphalAdikvAthena vACcyotanam|  viDaGgAdicUrNaH kSaudrAnvito~aJjanam||7||

 evamapyanupaCame jalaukaso yojayet||8||  punaH punarvA lekhayet||8||  pariSekaJca triphalAmadhukadviharidrAkaSAyeNa madhuyuktena kuryAt||8||  mustaCarkarAkapitthapatrAmbunA vA||8||

evaM kRte~apyanupaCame aCAntau jalaukasau yojayet tAbhirduSTaraktamahaparedityarthaH|  madhuyuktena triphalAdikaSAyeNa pariSekaM kuryAt|  dviharidrA piNDaharidrA dAruharidrA ca|  mustAdyambunA vA pariSekaM kuryAt|  kapittho dadhitthaH||8||

 kaphotkliSTaM vartma likhitvA saindhavakAsIsapippalIma
naCCilArasAJjanacUrNairmadhumadbhiH pratisArayet||9||  kaphaghnAni
ca vamanadhUmanAvanAJjanAnyAhAravidhiCca vartmopaklede
kAsIsalavaNasumanomukularasAJjanairvarttiraJjanam||9||

kaphotkliSTaM iti cUrNairiti bahuvacanamavivakSitam|  vartmopakledaH kaphotkliSTa eva vijJeyaH||9||

 lagaNaM kaphotkliSTavat sAdhayet||10||  aCAmyatyagninA dAho
vamanaM virecanaM ca||10||  pippalImadhukanimbajyotiSmatIdeva
dAruviDaGgapriyaGgutriphalAkuSThaCatAhvAsaindhavaiH siddhaM tailaM

uttarasthAnam

sandhisitAsitarogavijJAnIyaH

 athAtaH sandhisitAsitarogavijJAnIyanAmAdhyAyaM 
vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

kramaprAptAnAM vartmasandhyAdInAM rogeSu hetvAdikaM pradarCayituM stokaprameyatvAdeka evA~adhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 vAyuH kruddhaH sirAH prApya jalAbhaM jalavAhinIH||2||  aCruM srAvayate vartmaCuklasandheH kanInakAt||2||  tena netramarugrAgaCophaM syAt sa jalAsravaH||2||

svahetubhiH kruddho vAyurhetuviCeSAdeva netre jalavAhinIH sirAH prApya kanInakAnnAsAnikaTAnnetrAntAcchuklavartmanoH sandheraCruM srAvayate|  tena cACrusravaNena netraM rugAdirahitaM syAt|  sa rogaviCeSo nAmnA jalAsravaH||2||

 kaphAtkaphasrave CvetaM picchilaM bahalaM sravet||3||

kaphAsravAkhye roge kaphAddhetoH CvetAdiguNamaCru sravet|  bahalaM ghanam||3||

 kaphena CophastIkSNAgraH kSArabudbudakopamaH||4||  pRthumUlaCcalaH snigdhaH savarNo mRdupicchilaH||4||  mahAnapAkaH kaNDUmAnupanAhaH sa nIrujaH||4||

kaphena tIkSNAgrAdiguNaH Copho bhavati sa nAmnopanAhaH|  tIkSNAgro niCitamukhaH|  kSArabudbudAH pacyamAne kSAre~agnisaMyogAdutpadyante||4||

 raktAdraktAsrave tAmraM bahUSNaM cACru saMsravet||5||

raktAsravanAmni roge raktAddhetostAmrAdisvarUpamaCru sravet||5||

 vartmasandhyACrayA Cukle piTakA dAhaCUlinI||6||  tAmrA mudgopamA bhinnA raktaM sravati parvaNI||6||

tata eva ratkAcchukle bhAge vartmasandhyACrayAM tanmUlA dAhAdiguNA piTakA bhavati|  sA ca bhinnA raktameva sravati|  sA nAmnA parvaNItyucyate||6||

 pUyAsrAve malAH sAsrA vartmasandheH kanInakAt||7||  srAvayanti muhuH pUyaM sAsRk tvaGmAMsapAkataH||7||

pUyAsrAvanAmni roge malA vAtAdayo~asramiCrAH kanInakAdvartmasandhestvaGmAMsapAkena sAsRk pUyaM srAvayanti||7||

 pUyAlaso vraNaH sUkSmaH CophasaMrambhapUrvakaH||8||  kanInasandhAvAdhmAyI pUyAsrAvI savedanaH||8||

kanInake vartmasandhau CophasaMrambhapUrvakaH sUkSmo yo vraNa AdhmAyitvAdiguNaH sa pUyAlasanAmA rogaH Adau CophasaMrambho tataH svayaM bhinno vraNa iti pUrvaCabdArthaH||8||

 kanInasyAntaralajI Copho ruktodadAhavAn||9||

kanIne vartmasandhAvantarbhAge yo rujAdimAn CophaH sa nAmnA~alajI||9||

 apAGge vA kanIne vA kaNDUSApakSmapoTavAn||10||  pUyasrAvI kRmigranthiH granthiH kRmiyuto~artimAn||10||

netrasyApAGge vA kanIne va kaNDvAdimAn pUyAsrAvI kRmiyuktaCcArtimAMCca yo granthiH sa nAmnA kRmigranthiH|  iti nava rogAH vartmaCuklasandhijAH||10||

ukteSu sandhisitAsitarogeSu krameNa cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|  sandhirogeSvAsrAvAMstyajedityuktam|  upanAhAdInAM cikitsocyate||1||

	tato lekhanAdanantaraM ca saindhavAdibhiH pratisArayet|  pUrvavadityarbudavat||2||

 parvaNImuttarasandhitribhAge baDiCenAvalambya vRddhipatre-

pUyAlase sirAM CironetravikAreSu lalATetyuktAM vidhyet|  upanAhayet badhnIyAt|  akSipAke sarvagAkSiroge yaduktaM tadIkSeta prayogAya|  alajI varjayedityuktam||4||

 kRmigranthiM karISeNa svinnaM bhitvA vilikhya ca kAsIsasaindhavatriphalAmAkSikaiH pratisArayet||5||

kRmigranthyAkhyaM karISeNa CuSkagomayena poTTalIkRtagomayacUrNenetyarthaH|  svinnaM sat bhitvA  vilikhya kAsIsAdibhiH pratisArayediti sandhirogeSu||5||

 CuktitakAM pittAbhiSyandavat sAdhayet||6||

CuktakAkhyaM pittabhiSyandAkhyasarvagAkSirogavat sAdhayet cikitset| armaNAM pRthagvakSyate||6||

 balAsagrathitaM piSTakaM ca sirAvyadhavarjaM kaphAbhiSyandavat||7||  viCeSatastilanAlAn yavanAlAn vA haritaCalAkAna-
rdhamAsamajAkSIreNa bhavayitvA CoSayitvA ca dAhayet||7||  tatastadbhasma kSArakalpena parisrAvyAdarvIlepAdvipacet||7||  rasakriyeyaM valAsagrathitaCophopadehaharA||7||  ayameva ca
kalpaH phaNijjArjakAsphotabilvakapitthanirguNDye-
raNDakumudotpalajAtIkusumeSu pRthak kAryaH||7||  saindhavAlamaricakaTphalaCaGkhasamudraphenairvartiH piSTake~aJjanam||7||  CuNThICigruphalapippalIsaindhavacUrNo bIjapUrakara
sApluto~aJjanaM piSTakamapaharati||7||  tadvattrikaTukakaTphala-

haritAlasaindhavaCuNThIdevarArupunarnavairviDAlakaH||7||

balAsagrathitapiSTakayoH sirAvyadhaM varjayitvA kaphAbhiSyandAkhyasarvagAkSirogavaccikitsitam|  

	viCeSata iti haritA varNena pakvatvAcchalAkA yeSAM nAlAnAm|  kSArakalpaH kSAraparisrAvaNaprakAraH|  rasakriyA~aJjanAya|  ayameva tilanAlakalpastatprakAraH phaNijjakAdikusumeSvapi pRthak pratyekaM kAryaH|

	piSTakAkhye saindhavAdibhirvartiraJjanam|  mAtuluGgarasAloDitaH CuNThyAdicUrNo~aJjanaM piSTakAmapahanti|  tadvaditi bIjapUrarasApluta strikaTukAdicUrNo balAsagrathitaM piSTakamapIti ca CabdArthaH|  

	bRhatIphalamityAdi vyAkhyAsamam|  pippalItaNDulAH pippalIphalAnI|  taistaNDulairiti bRhatIphalaparihArAya|  haritAlAdibhiratyarthaCophe viDAlakaH kAryaH|  viDAlakaityakSNorbahirlepasyAkhyA|| 7||

 sirotpAtaharSajAlArjuneSu raktAbhiSyandavatpratikuryAt||8||  viCeSeNa sirAharSe svarNagairiko madhuyukto~aJjanam||8||  stanyAnvitaM vA kAsIsaM kSaudre drutaM vA kAsIsasaindhavamarjune mAtuluGgarasena saCarkareNACcyotanaM mastunA vA||8||  CaGkhanAbhirmAkSikeNa yuktA sitayA vA samudraphenako~aJjanam||8||  sphaTikakuGkumaCaGkhanAbhimadhuyaSTikA vA kSaudrArdrAstadvadvA rasAJjanaM kAsIsaM vA||8||

sirotpAta ityAdi vyAKyAsamam|  raktAbhiSyandanAmA sarvagAkSirogaH|  kAsIsaM vA stanyAnvitamarjune viCeSeNeti sambhadhyate|  mastunA vA saCarkareNACcyotanamiti ca|

	madhunA yuktA CaGKanAbhirvA samudraPenako vA sitayA yukto~aJjanamarjune|  sPaTikAdi vA kSaudreNArdramaJjanam|  tadvaditi kSaudrAdrAM rasAJjanaM kAsIsaM vA~aJjanam|| 8||

 arma tu paJcavidhamapi yattanuraktaM dhUmAvilaM dadhinibhaM vA tacchuklavat kAyaCirovirekalekhanAJjanairupAcaret||9||

sarvaM cArmaM tanutvAdiguNamatraiva vakSyamANaCuklavat kAyavirekAdibhirupAcaret||9||

 athetarasmin snigdhasyAturasya peyA vilepijAGgalarasA-
nyatamACitasya kRtasvastyayanasya sukhaCayanagalasyo-
ttAnadehasya kiJcidavAkCirasaH sukhoSNAmbuplutatAnta-
basvinnanayanasya saindhavena sabIjapUrakarasenAJjayitvAGgaSThakena nimIlitamakSivimRndrIyAdAbalAsagrathitarUpo-
tpatteH||10||  itthaJca saMroSitAkSasya pracalite~armAdhimAMsake
niCcalaM paricArakaH Ciro dhArayet||10||  anyaCca vAmadakSiNAnyatarapArCve~anukUlaM sthito dRDha-
vastragarbhAbhyAmaGguSThAbhyAM vartmanI nikSipet||10||  atha vaidyaH 
kanInakAt pravRddhermaNyapAGgamIkSamANasya yatra yatra valI

	anyaCceti paricArako vAme vA dakSiNe pArCve anukUlaM sthito dRDhasya vastrasya garbhe~antaryAvaGguSThau tAbhyAM vartmanI nikSipet sudRDhaM gRhNIyAt|  nAtyAyataM baDiCena mucuTyA vA gRhItvA|  mucuTI CastravidhAvuktA|  AcchedAyatamAnayet|  upanIya kiJcidAtmAnamAnIya| vyAkhyAsamam|| 10||

saghRtairbadarIpatrairdhUpitamaJjanam||26||  CaGkho nistuSACca harita

ebhiH sampraharSeNaiH rAgAdyudbhave sandhAvAkhyAni yuJjIta|  tAni ucyante|  tAmre CaGkhaM nArIkSIraghRSTaM ghRtasahitairyavaiH CamIpatraiCca dhUpitaM sandhAvaH|  suvarNAdikaM pRthak tadvaditi tAmre stanyena ghRSTaM ghRtayuktairvadarIpatraidhUpitaM sadaJjanam|  CaGkhvAdikA vartirmadhuyukto~athavA cUrNo mAkSikayukto~aJjanaM bibhItakaphalAsthimajjA vA madhunAJjanaM CuklagharSaNam||26||

 masUrA nistuSAH stanyapiSTAstaruNadarbhAGkurA ghRtamAjaM
gokSIraM CaraCcAyase tAmreNa ghRSTaM pratyaJjanaM vedanAghnam||27||  yavagodhUmajIvanIyamAMsIcUrNena saghrutaCarkarotkArikA
svedopanAhe praNItA vedanAmapanayati CuklaM cotsAdayati||27||  tadvadAnUpamAMsaveCavAro vasApayaH sarpirvimiCraH siddhaH||27||

nistuSamasurAdInyAyase bhANDe tAmreNa ghRSTAni pratyaJjanaM vedanAghnaM bhavati|  yavAdInAM cUrNena ghRtaCarkarAbhyAM saha kRtotkArikA svedArthamupanAhe bandhe praNItA vedanAmapanayati CuklaM cotsAdayati|  AnUpaveCavAro vasAdibhirmiCraH siddhastadvaditi svedopanAhotkArikAyaM praNIta ityAdi pUrvavat|| 27||

 athaivamupanAhapracalitasya aJjanam||28||  gokharACvoSTradantAH
samudraphenaH CaGkhaCcArjunakaSAyapiSTA vartirlekhanI||28||  samudraphenaCaGkhakharaparaCukAsthikharanAgACvagobAlAstinduka-
kaSAyapiSTA vA||28||

athAnantaramevamityuktena prakAreNopanAhena pracalitasya doSasyAJjanaM yojyam|  kimityAha-godantAdikamarjunakaSAyapiSTA lekhanI vartiH samudraphenAdikaM vA tindukakaSAyapiSTA vartiH||28||

 pratyaJjanaJca taruNabadarakhadiratindukAsthnAmantardhUmadagdhAnAM
cUrNam||29||  utsannaM vA saCalyaM vA CuklaM bAlAdibhirlikhet 
puTapAkena vA||29||  balAsagrathitoktakSArarasakriyayA vA||29||

lekhanAJjane datte yanmRdvaJjanamuktaM tat pratyaJjanam|  tadatra taruNa badarAdyasthnAmantardhUmadagdhAnAM cUrNam|  utsannaM saCalyaM vA CuklaM bAlena CastreNa vA tIkSNAgreNa likhet|  subodham|  puTapAko lekhanaH sUtroktaH||29||

 sirACukle tvadRSTighne taruNe vraNaCuklavat kuryAt||30||  aJjanaM cAsya prapauNDarIkamadhukahadrAloharajo~aJja-
nabRhatIkSIrakAkolIrajApayaH piSTa yavairghRtayuktairA-
malakIpatraiCca paryAyeNa dhUpitA vartiH||30||  apraCAntameva marmavatsAdhayet||30||  samAkSikaM tu rasAJjanaM
pratisAraNam||30||  sakSame divase kukkuTANDakapAlaspha
TikacandanamanaCCilAlauraCvavarAhadaCanaiCca vartiM kRtvA~aJjayet||30||  udadhikaphaCaGkhacandanairajApayaH piSTairvartirmadhughRSTA
pratyaJjanaM sirACuklajit||30||  anupaCame paCyati cAture
kiJcididamevAsakRt kurvIta||30||

adRSTighne sirACukle yena dRSTirna vyAptA|  vraNaCuklaH kSataCuklaH| (atrAsAdhyeSvajakAsirACuklapAkAtyayaCukleSu madhyagatasya sirACuklasyAdRSTighnAvasthAyAM cikitsatoktyA adRSTighnayorajakApAkAtyayaCuklayorapyeSaiva kriyAM kartavyeti sUcitam)|  

	asya ca sirACuklavataH prapauNDarIkAdIrajAkSIrapiSTa ghrutayuktairyavairAmalakIpatraiCca paryAyeNa parivRtyA dhUpitA vartiraJjanaM bhavati|

	evamuktenApraCAntaM sirACuklamarmoktaprakAreNa CastreNa sAdhayet|  pratisAraNaM CastrakarmaNaH paCcAt|  saptame divase CastrakarmaNAH|  vyAkhyAsamam|  udadhikaphaH samudraphenaH|  yadA tvevamanupaCamaH paCyati ca kiJcidrUpamAture tadedamevAnantaroktaM vidhAnamasakRt punaH punaH kurvIta|| 30||

uttarasthAnam

dRuSTirogavijJAnIyaH

 athAto dRSTirogavijJAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

kramaprAptAnAM dRSTirogANAM hetvAdikaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate| 
dRSTibhAgapaTlatvagviSavyAptyA doSasya rogaviCeSapradarCanaM kriyate||1||

 sirAnusAriNi male prathamaM paTalaM Crite||2||  avyaktamIkSate rUpaM vyaktamapyanimittataH||2||

sirAnusAriNItyAdi| malovAtAdibhiH kRto doSaviCeSaH| sirAnusAriNi sirAbhiH koSThAt dRSTimanusarati tasmiMstathAvidhemale prathamAbhyantaraM na tu bAhyaM paTalamACrite sati puruSo vyaktamapi rUpaM kalaCAdinimittAbhAve~apyavyaktaM paCyati|(nanu kathaM vraNaCukle bAhyaM paTalaM prathamapaTalamityuktvA atrAbhyantaraM paTalaM prathamapaTamityucyate| atra brUmaH- paTalasya tvagviCeSatvAd vraNaCuklasya bAhyAt paTalAdArabhya krameNAbhyantarayordvitIyatRtIyapaTalayorAveCAcca vraCukle bAhyaM paTalaM prathamapaTamityuktam| atra punaH sirAnusAriNi mala ityuktvA abhyantarasthAnAM sirANAM bahirmukhatvAt bahirnigacchato malasya prathamAbhyantarapaTalasaMCrayatvAccAbhyantarapaTameva prathamapaTalam| niminApyuktam- 
		yadA doSAH prakupitAH prApya rUpavahe sire|
		dRSTerabhyantarAttu paTalaM samabhidrutAH||
		apidhAnAdvivRddhACca nIrujatvAdupekSitAH|
		dRCoH paTalamACritya netramadhyAnusAriNaH||
		ekaikamanupadyante paryAyAt paTalAntaram|
		CanairanusRtACcaiva puSyanti sthiratAM gatAH||
		oSadhIrasavIryANAM mArgamAvRtya netrayoH|| iti|

	 bAhyameva paTalaM prathamapaTalamiti kecit| tadayuktam; timirakAle dRSTimaNDalasya rAgAdyabhAvAt| kAcatAM prApte rAgAdidarCanAcca sarvathA timiraroge AbhyantaraM paTalameva prathamapaTalamiti vyavasthitam| dRSTimaNDalasaMsthAnantu CAstramatamanusRtya kiJcidbrUmaH| dRSTeCcatvAri paTalAni santi| jyotirmayI dRSTisteSu paTaleSu vyAptA~apyAbhyantare medomaye paTala eva tiSThatItyavagantavyam| uktaCca catuSSaSTau-

		sirAguNo~atra prathame dvitIye kaNDarAguNaH|
		medoguNastRtIye syAd dRSTirmedaH pratiSThitA||
		tataH paraM bhavetkAlaM tataH kAlAtparaM kaphaH|
		nivartate sirAgraistu tatra khalvasthibandhanam|
		yAvadAhRdayAdbaddhvA yAvatpAdatalAditi||

	 nanu evamAbhyantare paTale dRSTau sthitAyAM dvitIyapaTalastha eva male doSAvadAcchAditatvAlliGganACanaM bhavitavyam| ucyate teja-ssambhavAyA jyotirmayyA dRSTerjyotiSAM sAkalyena sannidhAnAdAbhyantare paTale malasya balahAnirbhavati| tasmAd dvitIyapaTalasthasyApi malasya tejaHsAnnidhyenAlpabalatvAd dRSTestirodhAne~api liGganACakaraNe na Caktirbhavati| yathA paTAntarito~api dIpassannidhau ghaTapaTAdIn padArthAnavadyotayati tathA doSAntaritApi dRSTirdoSasyAlpabalatvAt rUpAvadyotinI bhavati| uktaJca-

	yathA paTenAntikasaMsthitena tirohitA dIpaCikhA pradIptA|
	tathA malenAntaritA~api dRSTiH prakACayedrUpamadUrasaMstham|| iti|

	evaM paTalAntareSu dRSTerviprakRSTatayA krameNa pravRddhaM malaM caturthaM paTalamACritya liGganACAya bhavati|| 2||

 prApte dvitIyaM paTalamabhUtamapi paCyati||3||  bhUtaM tu yatnAdAsannaM dUre sUkSmaJca nekSate||3||  dUrAntikasthaM rUpaJca viparyAsena manyate||3||  doSe maNDalasaMsthAne maNDalAnIva paCyati||3||  dvidhaikaM dRSTimadhyasthe bahudhA bahudhAsthite||3||  dRSTerabhyantaragate hrasvavaDhraviparyayam||3||  nAntikasthamadhaHsaMsthe dUragaM noparisthite||3||  pArCve paCyenna pArCvasthe timirAkhyo~ayamAmayaH||3||

yadA tu dvitIyamapi paTalaM prApto doSo bhavati tadA abhUtamapyapadapi rUpaM paCyati| bhUtaM sadrUpaM yatnAt paCyatyAsannaJca paCyati| yattu bhUtaM dUre sUkSmaM vA tanna paCyatyeva| dUrasthamantike samIpe manyate| antikasthaM dUra iti viparyAsaH| tatra tu yadA maNDalasaMsthAnopalayA kRtyA doSo bhavati tadA~agre maNDalAnIva paCyati| dRSTimadhyasthe rekhA kRtAvekaM rUpaM dvidhA paCyati| bahubhiH prakAraiH sthitairdoSairbahudhArUpaM paCyati| yadA tu dRSTerabhyantare madhye doSo bhavati tadA vaDhraM rUpaM hrasvaM paCyati| yadAtu dRSTerupari doSo bhavati tadA dUrasthanna paCyati| yadA tu dRSTipArCve doSo vartate tadA pArCvasthitaM rUpaM na paCyedayamanekaprakAra AmayaH AkhyayA timiraH|| 3||

 prApnoti kAcatAM doSe tRtIyapaTalACrite||4||  tenorddhvamIkSate nAdhastanu cailAvRtopamam||4||  yathA varNaJca rajyeta dRSTirhIyeta ca kramAt||4||

yadA tu tRtIyamapi paTalaM doSo vyApnoti tadA tadeva timirAkhyaM kAcatAM yAti| tena kAcena tu nara UrdhvasthitaM rUpamIkSate paCyati| nAdhaH sthitam| yacca paCcati tattanucailAvRtopamaM paCyati| dRSTeCca yathA yathA varNo rajyeta tathA tathA darCanaCaktirhIyeta iti kramArthaH|| 4||

 tathA~apyupekSamANasya caturthaM paTalaM gataH||5||  liGganACaM malaH kurvaJchAdayeddRSTimaNDalam||5||

tathAbhUto~api doSa upekSayA caturthaM paTalaM prApto liGganACAkhyaM rogaM kurvan dRSTimaNDalamaCeSamAcchAdayet| iti sAmAnyena timirAdInAM rUpam||5||

 tatra vAtena timire vyAviddhamiva paCyati||6||  calAvilAruNAbhAsaM prasannaJcekSate muhuH||6||  jAlAni keCAn maCakAn raCmIMCcopekSite~atra ca||6||  kAcIbhUte dRgaruNA paCyatyAsyamanAsikam||6||  candradIpAdyanekatvaM vakramRjvapi manyate||6||  vRddhaH kAco dRCaM kuryAdrajo dhUmAvRtAmiva||6||  spaSTAruNAbhAM vistIrNAM sUkSmAM vA hatadarCanAm||6||  saliGganACo vAte tu saGkocayati dRksirAH||6||  dRGmaNDalaM viCatyantargambhIrA dRrasau smRtA||6||

tatretyAdinA vAtAdibhedenocyate| vyAviddhamAkulam| calAbhAsamasthiram| AvilamasphuTam| raCmyantaM muhurIkSate paCyati| tatra vAtatimira upekSite vAtakAcatvaM prApte dRgaruNavarNA bhavatyAturaCca svamAsyamanAsikaM paCyati| sa eva vAtakAco vRddho dRCaM dRSTimaNDalaM rajaseva dhUmeneva cAvRtaM kuryAt| spaSTamaruNamAbhAti yasyA dRCaH sa vAtaliGganACo bhavati| tatraiva vAtaliGganACe dRksirA vAtena saGkocayati| dRGmaNDalamantarviCatyasau dRGnAmnA gambhIrA| gambhIrAvagADharUpA| iti vAtikatimirAdilakSaNam|| 6||

 pittaje timire vidyutkhadyotadIpitam||7||  CikhitittiripatrAbhaM prAyo nIlaJca paCyati||7||  kAce dRkkAMsyanIlAbhA tAdRgeva ca paCyati||7||  arkendupariveSAgnimarIcIndradhanUMSi ca||7||  bRGhganIlA nirAlokA dRksnigdhA liGganACataH||7||  dRSTiH pittena hrasvAkhyA sA hrasvAhrasvadarCinI||7||  bhavet pittavidagdhAkyA pItA pItAbhadarCanA||7||

pittaje timire sadasadvA rUpaM vidyuddIpitatvAdiyuktaM paCyati| khadyoto bhAsvAn kITaH| tasminnupekSayA kAcIbhUte kAMsyanIlAbhA dRgbhavati| tAdRgeva ca rUpaM paCyatyarkendupariveSAdikaM vA~asadeva paCyati| pariveSo maNDalamagnimarIcyo raCmayaH| tasmin pittakAca upekSite liGganACIbhUte dRgbhRGgavadbhramaravannIlA snigdhA ca bhavati| tatraiva dRSTiryA mahadapi rUpaM hrasvaM paCyati sA nAmnA hrasvA bhavati| tatraiva pItavarNena dRSTiH pItAbharUpadarCanA ca nAmnA pittavidagdhA bhavati| iti paittikAnAM timirAdInAM lakSaNam|| 7||

 kaphena timire prAyaH snigdhaM CvetaJca paCyati||8||  CaGkhendukundakusumaiH kumudairiva cAcitam||8||  kAce tu niSprabhendvarkapradIpAdyairivAcitam||8||  sitAbhAsA ca dRSTiH syAlliGganACe tu dRCyate||8||  mUrttaH kapho dRSTigataH snigdho darCananACanaH||8||  bindurjalasyeva calaH padminIpuTasaMCritaH||8||  uSNe saGkocamAyAti chAyAyAM parisarpati||8||  CaGkhakundendukumudasphaTikopamaCuklimA||8||

kphena timire prAyaH sarvaM snigdhaM CvetaCca paCyati| CaGkhAdibhiriva cAcitaM rUpaM paCyati| tasminnevopekSayA kaphakAcIbhUte niSprabhA dRgindvAdyairAcitamiva rUpaM paCyati| tatra ca sitAbhAsA dRSTiH syAt| tasmiMstUpekSayA kaphaliGganACIbhUte mUrtta eva kaphaH snigdhatvAdiguNo dRSTigato lakSyate| sa tathAvidho dRSTikapha uSNe Atape saGkocamAyAti chAyAyAntu CaGkhAdyupamaCuklimA parisarpati vistIryate| iti kaphajatimirAdInAM rUpam|| 8||

 raktena timire raktaM tamobhUtaJcu paCyati||9||  kAcena raktA kRSNA vA dRSTistAdRkca paCyati||9||  liGganACe~api dRk tAdRGniSprabhA hatadarCanA||9||

raktena timire| subodham| tasminnevopekSayA raktakAcIbhUte raktA vA kRSNA vA dRSTiH syAt| tAdRgeva raktaM kRSNaM vA paCyati| tadupekSayA raktaliGganACe dRk tAMdRgiti kAcasamA raktA kRSNA vA||9||

 saMsargasannipAteSu vidyAt saGkIrNalakSaNAn||10||  timirAdInakasmAcca taiH syAdvyaktAkulekSaNaH||10||  timire CeSayordRSTau citrau rAgaH prajAyate||10||

saMsargeSu triSu sannipAte caikasminnuktalakSaNasaGkIrNAnyathA saMsargaM timirAdIn vidyAt|saMsargasannipAtayoCcaikatvAdvivakSitabhedatvam| tena saMsargajaM timiraM saMsargajaH kAcaH saMsargajo liGganACaH| tathA sannipAtajaM timiraM sannipAtajaH kAcaH sannipAtajo liGganACaH| taiCca saMsargasannipAtaistimire akasmAdakAraNaM kadAcid vyaktekSaNaH puruSaH syAt kadAcidAkulekSaNaH| CeSayoH kAcaliGganACayostairdRSTau citro~anekaprakAro rAgo jAyate| (nanvevaM saMsarganAnAtve vivakSite nirdiSTassaptaviMCatirityuktiragre~anupapannetyata Aha-saMsargeti| ayaM bhAvaH-yathA sannipAtAnAM nAnAtve~api sannipAtatvenaikatvaM tathA saMsargANAmapi saMsargatvenaikatvaM vivakSitam| evacca timirAdInAM vivakSitavibhAgaH saGgacchata iti||10||

 tathA~apyupekSamANasya caturthaM paTalaM gataH||5||  liGganACaM malaH kurvaJchAdayeddRSTimaNDalam||5||
