 tatra vAtena timire vyAviddhamiva paCyati||6||  calAvilAruNAbhAsaM prasannaJcekSate muhuH||6||  jAlAni keCAn maCakAn raCmIMCcopekSite~atra ca||6||  kAcIbhUte dRgaruNA paCyatyAsyamanAsikam||6||  candradIpAdyanekatvaM vakramRjvapi manyate||6||  vRddhaH kAco dRCaM kuryAdrajo dhUmAvRtAmiva||6||  spaSTAruNAbhAM vistIrNAM sUkSmAM vA hatadarCanAm||6||  saliGganACo vAte tu saGkocayati dRksirAH||6||  dRGmaNDalaM viCatyantargambhIrA dRrasau smRtA||6||

tatretyAdinA vAtAdibhedenocyate| vyAviddhamAkulam| calAbhAsamasthiram| AvilamasphuTam| raCmyantaM muhurIkSate paCyati| tatra vAtatimira upekSite vAtakAcatvaM prApte dRgaruNavarNA bhavatyAturaCca svamAsyamanAsikaM paCyati| sa eva vAtakAco vRddho dRCaM dRSTimaNDalaM rajaseva dhUmeneva cAvRtaM kuryAt| spaSTamaruNamAbhAti yasyA dRCaH sa vAtaliGganACo bhavati| tatraiva vAtaliGganACe dRksirA vAtena saGkocayati| dRGmaNDalamantarviCatyasau dRGnAmnA gambhIrA| gambhIrAvagADharUpA| iti vAtikatimirAdilakSaNam|| 6||

 pittaje timire vidyutkhadyotadIpitam||7||  CikhitittiripatrAbhaM prAyo nIlaJca paCyati||7||  kAce dRkkAMsyanIlAbhA tAdRgeva ca paCyati||7||  arkendupariveSAgnimarIcIndradhanUMSi ca||7||  bRGhganIlA nirAlokA dRksnigdhA liGganACataH||7||  dRSTiH pittena hrasvAkhyA sA hrasvAhrasvadarCinI||7||  bhavet pittavidagdhAkyA pItA pItAbhadarCanA||7||

pittaje timire sadasadvA rUpaM vidyuddIpitatvAdiyuktaM paCyati| khadyoto bhAsvAn kITaH| tasminnupekSayA kAcIbhUte kAMsyanIlAbhA dRgbhavati| tAdRgeva ca rUpaM paCyatyarkendupariveSAdikaM vA~asadeva paCyati| pariveSo maNDalamagnimarIcyo raCmayaH| tasmin pittakAca upekSite liGganACIbhUte dRgbhRGgavadbhramaravannIlA snigdhA ca bhavati| tatraiva dRSTiryA mahadapi rUpaM hrasvaM paCyati sA nAmnA hrasvA bhavati| tatraiva pItavarNena dRSTiH pItAbharUpadarCanA ca nAmnA pittavidagdhA bhavati| iti paittikAnAM timirAdInAM lakSaNam|| 7||

 kaphena timire prAyaH snigdhaM CvetaJca paCyati||8||  CaGkhendukundakusumaiH kumudairiva cAcitam||8||  kAce tu niSprabhendvarkapradIpAdyairivAcitam||8||  sitAbhAsA ca dRSTiH syAlliGganACe tu dRCyate||8||  mUrttaH kapho dRSTigataH snigdho darCananACanaH||8||  bindurjalasyeva calaH padminIpuTasaMCritaH||8||  uSNe saGkocamAyAti chAyAyAM parisarpati||8||  CaGkhakundendukumudasphaTikopamaCuklimA||8||

kphena timire prAyaH sarvaM snigdhaM CvetaCca paCyati| CaGkhAdibhiriva cAcitaM rUpaM paCyati| tasminnevopekSayA kaphakAcIbhUte niSprabhA dRgindvAdyairAcitamiva rUpaM paCyati| tatra ca sitAbhAsA dRSTiH syAt| tasmiMstUpekSayA kaphaliGganACIbhUte mUrtta eva kaphaH snigdhatvAdiguNo dRSTigato lakSyate| sa tathAvidho dRSTikapha uSNe Atape saGkocamAyAti chAyAyAntu CaGkhAdyupamaCuklimA parisarpati vistIryate| iti kaphajatimirAdInAM rUpam|| 8||

 raktena timire raktaM tamobhUtaJcu paCyati||9||  kAcena raktA kRSNA vA dRSTistAdRkca paCyati||9||  liGganACe~api dRk tAdRGniSprabhA hatadarCanA||9||

raktena timire| subodham| tasminnevopekSayA raktakAcIbhUte raktA vA kRSNA vA dRSTiH syAt| tAdRgeva raktaM kRSNaM vA paCyati| tadupekSayA raktaliGganACe dRk tAMdRgiti kAcasamA raktA kRSNA vA||9||

 saMsargasannipAteSu vidyAt saGkIrNalakSaNAn||10||  timirAdInakasmAcca taiH syAdvyaktAkulekSaNaH||10||  timire CeSayordRSTau citrau rAgaH prajAyate||10||

saMsargeSu triSu sannipAte caikasminnuktalakSaNasaGkIrNAnyathA saMsargaM timirAdIn vidyAt|saMsargasannipAtayoCcaikatvAdvivakSitabhedatvam| tena saMsargajaM timiraM saMsargajaH kAcaH saMsargajo liGganACaH| tathA sannipAtajaM timiraM sannipAtajaH kAcaH sannipAtajo liGganACaH| taiCca saMsargasannipAtaistimire akasmAdakAraNaM kadAcid vyaktekSaNaH puruSaH syAt kadAcidAkulekSaNaH| CeSayoH kAcaliGganACayostairdRSTau citro~anekaprakAro rAgo jAyate| (nanvevaM saMsarganAnAtve vivakSite nirdiSTassaptaviMCatirityuktiragre~anupapannetyata Aha-saMsargeti| ayaM bhAvaH-yathA sannipAtAnAM nAnAtve~api sannipAtatvenaikatvaM tathA saMsargANAmapi saMsargatvenaikatvaM vivakSitam| evacca timirAdInAM vivakSitavibhAgaH saGgacchata iti||10||

uttarasthAnam

timirapratiSedhaH

 athAtastimirapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

timirasya kAcAdihetutvena prAdhAnyAt pRthak prathamaM cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate
||1||

 timiraM kAcatAM yAti kAco~apyAndhyamupekSayA||2||  netrarogeSvato ghoraM timiraM sAdhayedrutam||2||

sarveSu netrarogeSu yato ghoraM timiramatastaM drutaM CIghraM sAdhayet| ghoratve hetustimiramithyAdikam|| 2||

 tulAM paceta jIvantyA droNe~apAM pAdaCeSite||3||  tatkvAthe dviguNakSIraM ghrutaprasthaM vipAcayet||3||  prapauNDarIkakAkolIpippalIlodhrasaindhavaiH||3||  CatAhvAmadhukadrAkSAsitAdAruphalatrayaiH||3||  kArSikairniCi tatpItaM timirApaharaM param||3||

jIvantyAdyaM ghRtaM vyAkhyAsamam| (timirAdInAM lekhanAJjanAdisAdhyatvAllekhanasya dRgbalahAnikaratvAtpUrvaM dRgvalAdhAnakAraNaM ghRtapAnaM prastauti )| jIvantyAstulAM palaCatamapAM droNe catuSSaSTikuDavapramite~ambhasi paceta Crapayet| pAdaCeSite SoDaCakuDavAvaCiSTe tatkvAthe jIvantIkaSAye dviguNakSIramaSTakuDavapramitapayaHsaMyutaM ghRtaprasthaM kArSikaiH karSapramANaiH prapauNDarIkAdibhirvipAcayet sAdhayet| tad ghRtaM niCi svapnakAle pItaM sevitaM paramatiCayena timirApaharaM timiraghnam|| 3||

 drAkSAcandanamaJjiSThakAkolIdvayajIvakaiH||4||  sitACatAvarImedApuNDrAhvamadhukotpalaiH||4||  paccejjIrNaghRtaprasthaM samakSIraM picUnmitaiH||4||  hanti tacchuklatimiraraktarAjICirorujaH||4||

drAkSAdyaM ghRtaM subodham| ( samakSIraM ghRtatulyena kSIreNa yuktaM jIrNaghRtasya purANaghRtasya prasthaM kuDavacatuSTayaM picUnmitaiH karSapramANaiH kalkitairdrAkSAdibhiH pacet| pakvaM tad ghRtaM kAcAdIn hanti| raktarAjI sirotpAtaH| yasya vyAdheryadviCeSalakSaNaM tadeva tasya vyAdheH saMjJAntaratvena pariNamati| dhUmadarCanena vinA dhUmarasyAbhAvAddhUmaro dhUmadarCItyucyate| dhanvantariNA tu dhUmaracikitsAyAmuktam-'ghRtaM pibeddhUmadarCI narastu kuryAdvidhiM pittaharaM ca sarvam|' iti| tathA raktarAjyA vinA sirotpAtasyAsambhavAdraktarAjItyucyate sirotpAtaH| CaGkhavaddhavalatvAcchaGkhaCuklam| pAkAtyayahetutvAt pAkAtyayaCuklam| ityevamAdayaH saMjJAviCeSA bahavo dRCyante )|| 4||

 paTolanimbakaTukAdArvIsevyavarAvRSam||5||  sadhanvayAsatrAyantIparpaTaM pAlikaM pRthak||5||  prasthamAmalakAnAM ca kvAthayedarmaNe~ambhasaH||5||  tadADhake~ardhapalikaiH piSTaiH prasthaM ghRtAtpacet||5||  mustabhUnimbayaSTyAhvakuTajodIvyacandanaiH||5||  savyoSacavyaistatsarpirghrANakarNAkSirogajit||5||  vidradhijvaraduSTArurvisarpApacikuSThanut||5||  viCeSAcchuklatimiranaktAndhyoSNAmladAhahRt||5||

paTolAdye ghRte sAmAnyaparibhASaNaM smartavyam| duSTArUMSi parvaNyudIrNamUlAH piTikAH| apacirgaNDamAlA| naktAndhyaM
doSAndhyam| uSNaCabdenoSNavidagdhocyate| amlaCabdenAmlavidagdhA| sakalanetrAvayaja USmA dAhaH| ( pRthak pAlikaM pratyekaM palapramANaM dhanvayAsAdisahitaM paTolAdikamAmalakAnAM prasthaM cAmbhasa sarmaNe jaladroNe kvAthayedvipAcayet| tadADhake SoDaCakuDavAvaCiSTe tasmin kvAthe piSTaiH kRtapeSaNairardhapalikairardhapalapramANairvyoSacavyasahitairmustAdibhiH kalkaiH saha ghRtaprasthaM pacet| pakvaM tatsarpiH sevyamAnaM ghrANAdirogajidbhavati| ghrANAdInAM rogaCabdena pratyekaM sambandhaH| duSTArurduSTavraNaH| AmalakasyobhayatrokterubhayatrApyuktapramANaM grAhyam )|| 5||

 triphalA~aSTapalaM kvAthyaM pAdaCeSaM jalADhake||6||  tena tulyapayaskena triphalApalakalkavAn||6||  ardhaprasthe ghRtAtsiddhaH sitayA mAkSikeNa vA||6||  yuktaM pibettattimiri tadyuktaM vA varArasam||6||

triphalASTapalamityAdinA traiphalaM ghRtaM subodham| taditi ghRtam| varArasastriphalAkaSAyaH| triphalAyAH pratyekaM viMCatikANAdhikamardhAdhikapaladvayam| jalADhake SoDaCakuDavapramite jale pAdaCeSaM prasthAvaCeSaM kvAthyam| tulyakSIreNa tena kvAthena palapramANatriphalAkalkayukto ghRtAdardhaprasthaH siddhaH kRtapAkasaMskAraH kArya iti CeSaH| timirI timirarogayuktaH puruSaH| sitAmAkSikAnyataropetaM tad ghRtaM tadyuktaM tena ghRtena yuktaM varArasaM triphalAkaSAyaM vA pibet|| 6||

 yaSTImadhudvikAkolIvyAghrIkRSNAmRtotpalaiH||7||  pAlikaiH sasitAdrAkSairghRtaprasthaM pacet samaiH||7||  ajAkSIravarAvAsAmArkavasvarasaiH pRthak||7||  mahAtraiphalamityetata paraM dRSTivikArajit||7||

yaSTImadhvityAdinA mahAtraiphalaM ghRtam| atrA~ajAkSIrAdInAM paJcAvadhyadhotbhavatvAnmiCrANAmasnehasamatve prApte pRthaksamairityuktam| ( pAlikaiH palapramANaiH sasitAdrAkSaiH sitAdrAkSopetairyaSTImadhvAdibhiH kalkaiH| yaSTImadhuryaSTimadhukam| pRthak pratyekaM samaistulyaiH prasthonmitairityarthaH| ajAkSIreNa varAvAsAmArkavANAM pRthak svarasaiCca ghRtaprasthaM prasthonmitaM ghRtaM pacet| mahAtraiphalamiti prasiddhametadevaM pakvaM ghRtaM paramatiCayena dRSTivikArajit dRSTyA~a~aCrayAMstimirAdivikArAn jayati )|| 7||

 traiphalenAtha haviSA lihAnastriphalAM niCi||8||  yaSTImadhukasaMyuktAM madhunA ca pariplutAm||8||  mAsamekaM hitAhAraH pibannAmalkodakam||8||  sauparNaM labhate cakSurityAha bhagavAn nimiH||8||

traiphalena ghRtena triphalAyA lehaH subodhaH|sauparNaM cakSurvainateyasambandhi| ( atha ghRtapAnAdanantaram| atha Cabdattimire ghRtapAnAnantaramevAnyat sarvaM karma kartavyamiti ca sUcitam| mAsAmAgrahaNAyaikaM mAsamityuktam| hitAhAraH pathyACI| AmalakodakamAmalakasiddhamudakaM pAnIyArthe piban yaSTImadhukasaMyuktAM yaSTyAhvopetAM madhunA mAkSikeNa pariplutAM siktAm| caCabdaH samuccaye| triphalAM traiphalena triphalAsiddhena haviSA ghRtena saha niCi rAtrau lihAnaH sauparNaM suparNasambandhi| suparNo garuDaH| cakSurnetraM labhata ityevaM bhagavAnaiCvaryAdiSaDaguNaparipUrNo nimirnAma maharSirAha| atra sauparNamiti mukhyArthabAdhAtsuparNasya cakSuriva cakSurlabhata ityarthaH )||8||

 gavyaM ghRtaM loharajobhAjane bAdare sthitam||9||  triphalAcUrNasahitaM pItaM timiranACanam||9||  purANaM ca sitAbhIruyaSTImadhukacUrNavat||9||  niSiktamagnivarNairvA jIrNaM sarpirayoguDaiH||9||  hemarUpyAyasaiCcUrNairyuktAM vA triphalAM pRthak||9||  ghRtakSaudrAnvitAmadyAtkevalAM vA vicUrNitAm||9||  tApyAyastriphalAcUrNaM madhujIrNaghRtadrutam||9||  lohapAtre sthitaM mAMsaM mASarACau ca bhakSayet||9||  saktUn vAdyAtsasarpiSkAM triphalAcUrNasaMyutAn||9||  bhuJjIta vA susiddhena sUpenAmalakaiH saha||9||  prAtarbhaktasya vA pUrvamadyAtpathyAM pRthakpRthak||9||  mRdvIkACarkarAkSaudraiH satataM timirAturaH||9||

badarakASThamaye pAtre CastracUrNayutaM gavyaM ghRtamAsaMskArasthitamanudya triphalAcUrNena yuktaM pItaM timirasya nACanaM bhavati| purANaM ghRtaM ca sitAdiyuktaM pItaM timiranACanam| abhIruH CatAvarI| athavA jIrNaM sarpiH purANaM ghRtamayoguDaiH CastrapiNDaistaptatvAdagnivaNairniSiktamAplutaM pItam|

	 pRthag hemAdiyuktAM triphalAM ghRtakSaudrAnvitAmadyA| kevalAmeva vA triphalAm| kevalaCabdena hemAdisaMyogapratiSedhakenAnugAminorghRtakSaudrayoH prayoge prApte vicUrNitAmityucyate| kecit ghRtakSaudramicchanti|

	 tApyAdicUrNaM madhujIrNaghRtAbhyAM drutamAloDitaM mAsaM lauhapAtre mASarACau sthitaM bhakSayet| saktUnityAdi athavA yavasaktUn sarpiSA triphalAcUrNena ca saMyutAnadyAt| vyAkhyAsamam|

	 pathyAM harItakIM mRdvIkayA vA CarkarayA vA kSaudreNa veti pRthag vikalpArtham|| 9||

 kvAthosanAt bhRGgarasastailaM kAlatilodbhavam||10||  lohapAtre tadekatra sAdhitaM nAvanaM hitam||10||

asanakvAthAdikaM lohapAtre sAdhitaM nAvanam| asanaM bIjakam| bhRGgo mArkavaH|| 10||

uttarasthAnam

 athAtastimirapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

jIvantyAdyaM ghRtaM vyAkhyAsamam| (timirAdInAM lekhanAJjanAdisAdhyatvAllekhanasya dRgbalahAnikaratvAtpUrvaM dRgvalAdhAnakAraNaM ghRtapAnaM prastauti )| jIvantyAstulAM palaCatamapAM droNe catuSSaSTikuDavapramite~ambhasi paceta Crapayet| pAdaCeSite SoDaCakuDavAvaCiSTe tatkvAthe jIvantIkaSAye dviguNakSIramaSTakuDavapramitapayaHsaMyutaM ghRtaprasthaM kArSikaiH karSapramANaiH prapauNDarIkAdibhirvipAcayet sAdhayet| tad ghRtaM niCi svapnakAle pItaM sevitaM paramatiCayena timirApaharaM timiraghnam|| 3||

 drAkSAcandanamaJjiSThakAkolIdvayajIvakaiH||4||  sitACatAvarImedApuNDrAhvamadhukotpalaiH||4||  paccejjIrNaghRtaprasthaM samakSIraM picUnmitaiH||4||  hanti tacchuklatimiraraktarAjICirorujaH||4||

drAkSAdyaM ghRtaM subodham| ( samakSIraM ghRtatulyena kSIreNa yuktaM jIrNaghRtasya purANaghRtasya prasthaM kuDavacatuSTayaM picUnmitaiH karSapramANaiH kalkitairdrAkSAdibhiH pacet| pakvaM tad ghRtaM kAcAdIn hanti| raktarAjI sirotpAtaH| yasya vyAdheryadviCeSalakSaNaM tadeva tasya vyAdheH saMjJAntaratvena pariNamati| dhUmadarCanena vinA dhUmarasyAbhAvAddhUmaro dhUmadarCItyucyate| dhanvantariNA tu dhUmaracikitsAyAmuktam-'ghRtaM pibeddhUmadarCI narastu kuryAdvidhiM pittaharaM ca sarvam|' iti| tathA raktarAjyA vinA sirotpAtasyAsambhavAdraktarAjItyucyate sirotpAtaH| CaGkhavaddhavalatvAcchaGkhaCuklam| pAkAtyayahetutvAt pAkAtyayaCuklam| ityevamAdayaH saMjJAviCeSA bahavo dRCyante )|| 4||

 paTolanimbakaTukAdArvIsevyavarAvRSam||5||  sadhanvayAsatrAyantIparpaTaM pAlikaM pRthak||5||  prasthamAmalakAnAM ca kvAthayedarmaNe~ambhasaH||5||  tadADhake~ardhapalikaiH piSTaiH prasthaM ghRtAtpacet||5||  mustabhUnimbayaSTyAhvakuTajodIvyacandanaiH||5||  savyoSacavyaistatsarpirghrANakarNAkSirogajit||5||  vidradhijvaraduSTArurvisarpApacikuSThanut||5||  viCeSAcchuklatimiranaktAndhyoSNAmladAhahRt||5||

paTolAdye ghRte sAmAnyaparibhASaNaM smartavyam| duSTArUMSi parvaNyudIrNamUlAH piTikAH| apacirgaNDamAlA| naktAndhyaM
doSAndhyam| uSNaCabdenoSNavidagdhocyate| amlaCabdenAmlavidagdhA| sakalanetrAvayaja USmA dAhaH| ( pRthak pAlikaM pratyekaM palapramANaM dhanvayAsAdisahitaM paTolAdikamAmalakAnAM prasthaM cAmbhasa sarmaNe jaladroNe kvAthayedvipAcayet| tadADhake SoDaCakuDavAvaCiSTe tasmin kvAthe piSTaiH kRtapeSaNairardhapalikairardhapalapramANairvyoSacavyasahitairmustAdibhiH kalkaiH saha ghRtaprasthaM pacet| pakvaM tatsarpiH sevyamAnaM ghrANAdirogajidbhavati| ghrANAdInAM rogaCabdena pratyekaM sambandhaH| duSTArurduSTavraNaH| AmalakasyobhayatrokterubhayatrApyuktapramANaM grAhyam )|| 5||

triphalASTapalamityAdinA traiphalaM ghRtaM subodham| taditi ghRtam| varArasastriphalAkaSAyaH| triphalAyAH pratyekaM viMCatikANAdhikamardhAdhikapaladvayam| jalADhake SoDaCakuDavapramite jale pAdaCeSaM prasthAvaCeSaM kvAthyam| tulyakSIreNa tena kvAthena palapramANatriphalAkalkayukto ghRtAdardhaprasthaH siddhaH kRtapAkasaMskAraH kArya iti CeSaH| timirI timirarogayuktaH puruSaH| sitAmAkSikAnyataropetaM tad ghRtaM tadyuktaM tena ghRtena yuktaM varArasaM triphalAkaSAyaM vA pibet|| 6||

 yaSTImadhudvikAkolIvyAghrIkRSNAmRtotpalaiH||7||  pAlikaiH sasitAdrAkSairghRtaprasthaM pacet samaiH||7||  ajAkSIravarAvAsAmArkavasvarasaiH pRthak||7||  mahAtraiphalamityetata paraM dRSTivikArajit||7||

yaSTImadhvityAdinA mahAtraiphalaM ghRtam| atrA~ajAkSIrAdInAM paJcAvadhyadhotbhavatvAnmiCrANAmasnehasamatve prApte pRthaksamairityuktam| ( pAlikaiH palapramANaiH sasitAdrAkSaiH sitAdrAkSopetairyaSTImadhvAdibhiH kalkaiH| yaSTImadhuryaSTimadhukam| pRthak pratyekaM samaistulyaiH prasthonmitairityarthaH| ajAkSIreNa varAvAsAmArkavANAM pRthak svarasaiCca ghRtaprasthaM prasthonmitaM ghRtaM pacet| mahAtraiphalamiti prasiddhametadevaM pakvaM ghRtaM paramatiCayena dRSTivikArajit dRSTyA~a~aCrayAMstimirAdivikArAn jayati )|| 7||

 traiphalenAtha haviSA lihAnastriphalAM niCi||8||  yaSTImadhukasaMyuktAM madhunA ca pariplutAm||8||  mAsamekaM hitAhAraH pibannAmalkodakam||8||  sauparNaM labhate cakSurityAha bhagavAn nimiH||8||

traiphalena ghRtena triphalAyA lehaH subodhaH|sauparNaM cakSurvainateyasambandhi| ( atha ghRtapAnAdanantaram| atha Cabdattimire ghRtapAnAnantaramevAnyat sarvaM karma kartavyamiti ca sUcitam| mAsAmAgrahaNAyaikaM mAsamityuktam| hitAhAraH pathyACI| AmalakodakamAmalakasiddhamudakaM pAnIyArthe piban yaSTImadhukasaMyuktAM yaSTyAhvopetAM madhunA mAkSikeNa pariplutAM siktAm| caCabdaH samuccaye| triphalAM traiphalena triphalAsiddhena haviSA ghRtena saha niCi rAtrau lihAnaH sauparNaM suparNasambandhi| suparNo garuDaH| cakSurnetraM labhata ityevaM bhagavAnaiCvaryAdiSaDaguNaparipUrNo nimirnAma maharSirAha| atra sauparNamiti mukhyArthabAdhAtsuparNasya cakSuriva cakSurlabhata ityarthaH )||8||

athetyAdinA liGganACe sastrakarmavidhAnam| rasena mAMsarasena prINitaM tarpitaM nasyAdinottamAGgaM yasya sa tathoktaH| upakaraNAni tadupayogIni| videhAdhipatirjanako rAjA| pratyAdityamAdityAbhimukham| AstaraNena kuthAdinA labdhamArdavA yA bhUmistasyAM prasAritacaraNayugmo yo~asaGkucitajAnUpaviSTaH| kSititalagatau samatalau dvau pANI yasya| hastasyAntarbhAgastalaH| itaradyat prayujyamAnakarma IkSaNaM tasmAd dvitIyam| IkSaNaM netram| yaccopaviSTena prasAritamAtureNa jAnuyugmaM tanmadhye kRtvA karmayogyanaikaTyena karmasaukaryApekSaM yojyam| mukhavASpo vaidyamukhodbhavaH| savyo vAmaH| pradeCinyaGguSThanikaTAGgulI| sahajanmani sandhau svAbhAvike chidre| iti dakSiNahastena vyadhaH savyanetre| evameva hastakarmavaiparItyenAturasya dakSiNaM netraM vidhyet|| 7||

sarvagAkSirogavijJAnIyaH

 athAtaH sarvAkSirogavijJAnIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

netrasyA~avayavavibhAgena roganirNayaM kRtvA rogANAM vyApinAM hetvAdikaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 vAtena netre~abhiSyaNNe nAsAnAho~alpaCophatA||2||  CaGkhAkSibhrUlalATAsyatodasphuraNabhedanam||2||  CuSkAlpA dUSikA CItamalpaM cACru calA rujaH||2||  nimiSonmeSaNaM kRcchrAjjantUnAmiva sarpaNam||2||  akSyAdhmAtamivAbhAti sUkSmaiCCalyairivAcitam||2||  snigdhoSNaiCcopaCamanam.......................||2||

vAtena netre~abhiSyaNNe ArdrIbhUte nAsAnAhAdikaM bhavati| subodham| upaCamanaM svAsthyalAbhaH| eSa rogo~abhiSyanda ucyate|

 .....................so~abhiSyanda upekSitaH||3||  adhimantho bhavettatra karNayornadanaM bhramaH||3||  araNyeva ca mathyante lalATAkSibhruvAdayaH||3||

eSa copekSitaH san vAtenaivAdhimantho bhavet| tatra vAtAdhimanthe karNanAdAdikaM liGgam| araNI yAjJikAnAM gharSaNenAgnyutpAdane manthanakASTham||3||

 hatAdhimanthaH so~api syAtpramAdAttena vedanAH||4||  anekarUpA jAyante vraNo dRSTau ca dRSTihA||4||

sa cAdhimanthaH pramAdAdapacArAddhatAdhimanthAkhyaH syAt| tena ca hatAdhimanthenAnekarUpA vedanA rujo jAyante| dRSTimaNDale ca darCanahA vraNo jAyate||4||

 manyAkSiCaGkhato vAyuranyato vA pravartayet||5||  vyathAM tIvrAmapaicchilyarAgaCophaM vilocanam||5||  saGkocayati paryaCru so~anyato vAtasaMjJitaH||5||

yadA tu svanimittAt kupito vAyurmanyAdito~anyato vA tannikaTAdaGgAt pUrvAttIvrAM vyathAM pravartayet| paicchilyAdirahitaM netraM sACru saGkocayati| tadA sa rogo nAmnA anyatovAtaH||5||

 tadvajjihyaM bhavennetramUnaM vA vAtaparyaye||6||

vAtaparyayAkhye roge tadvaditi pUrvavanmanyArujAdikena netraM jihyaM kuTilaM citranyastamiva bhavatyUnaM vA pramANena bhavati
||6||

 dAho dhUmAyanaM CophaH syAvatA vartmanorbahiH||7||  ataHkledo~aCru pItoSNaM rAgaH pItAbhadarCanam||7||  kSArokSitakSatAkSitvaM pittAbhiSyandalakSaNam||7||

dAhAdikaM pittAbhiSyandalakSaNam| dhUmapraveCa iva dhUmAyanam| kSAreNokSito yo vraNastattulyavraNAkSitA bhavati||7||

 jvaladaGgArakIrNAbhaM yakRtpiNDasamaprabham||8||  adhimanye bhavennetram.......................||8||

asminnupekSayA pittAdhimanthIbhUte jvaladaGgArakIrNAbhanetratvAdikaM liGgam||8||

 ........................syande tu kaphasambhave||9||  jADyaM Copho mahAn kaNDUrnidrAnnAnabhinandanam||9||  sAndrasnigdhabahuCvetapicchAvad dUSikA~aCrutA||9||

kaphe~abhiSyande jADyAdikaM liGgam| anabhinandanamannasya| sAndrAdiguNavad dUSikA sAndrAdiguNavadaCrutA ca||9||

 adhimanthe nataM kRSNamunnataM CuklamaNDalam||10||  praseko nAsikAdhmAnaM pAMsupUrNamivekSaNam||10||

asminnevopekSayA kaphAdhimanthIbhUte kRSNaM natatvAdilakSaNam||10||

uttarasthAnam

uttarasthAnam

abhiSyandapratiSedhaH

 athAto~abhiSyandapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

uktebhyaH sarvAkSirogebhyo~abhiSyandasya prAdhAnyAtpRthakcikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 atha khalu sarvAkSirogANAM pUrvarUpa eva CirovirekakavaladhUmopavAsAnAsevetAnyatra mArutodrekAt||2||

athetyAdinA sAmAnyena sarvakSirogANAmabhiSyandAdhimanthAdInAM cikitsA| sarvAkSirogANAM pUrvarUpadaRsana eva CirovirekAdikaM kuryAt| kiM sarvatra ? api tu mArutodrekAdanyatra||2||

 sarvatra tu candanamaricapatrailAsvarNagairikatagararasAJjanalavaNayaSTyAhvairviDAlakaM kuryAt||3||

sarvatra candanAdinA viDAlako bahirlepo hitaH| navatAyAmaJjanapratiSedhAt||3||

 tathA dArvitutthaharItakIbhirvAtapitte||4||  kaphe tu harItakInAgararasAJjanasvarNagairikaiH||4||  api ca kuSThamisipippalIcandanotpalairviDAlako vedanAghnaH||4||  mustAgarucandanaiH kSaudrayutaiH CUladAharAgaghnaH||4||  saindhavAgarutrijAtakatrikaTukasvarNagairikakuSThatagaraCaileyakaiH CUlaCvayathudAharAganut||4||

dArvyAdibhirviDAlako vAtapitte yojyaH| harItakyAdibhiH kaphe| 
	
api ceti sAdhAraNasamuccayAya| kuSThamustAsaindhavAdayastrayo viDAlakAH subodhAH| misiH CatapuSpA|| 4||

 CigruphalamanohvACAbaralodhraiH kramAccaturguNapravRddhaiH ClakSNarajobhiH sUkSmatAntavasthairnayanamavacUrNayet||5||  CvetalodhratvacaM bahirvilikhitAM nimbapatrakalkena pradigdhAM puTapAke vipakvAmardhapalonmitAM maricacatuSTayayuktAM ClakSNarajIkRtAM vastrabaddhAmakSNayavakiret||5||  etadavaguNThanaM CUladAhACruCvayathukaNDUSApAkakledopadehaharam||5||  tayaiva ca poTTalikayA~a~aCcyotanakAle~avantisomAplutayA~a~aCcyotayet||5||  pUrvavadvA lodhravalkalakalkamupaskRtaM tanmAtrameva maricadvayena manaCCilApAdenASTAMCakaiCca yaSTImadhukaCatapuSpAJjanairyuktaM prakalpayet||5||  api ca-

	AraNyACchagaNarase paTAvabaddhAH
	susvinnA nakhavituSIkRtAH kulAtthAH||5||  taccUrNaM sakRdavacUrNanAnniCIthe
	netrANAM vidhamati sadya eva kopam||5||

CigruphalAdicUrNaM vastrabaddhaM netrAvacUrNanaM kuryAt| Cigruphalebhyastu tulayAvacchinnebhyaCcaturguNA manaCCilA| tataCcaturguNaH CAbaralodhra iti kramArthaH|

	 lodhratvaco yathoktavidhinA pakvAyA ardhapalaM catvAri maricaphalAnItyetacchlakSNacUrNaM vastreNa baddhvA~akSiNyavakiret| avaguNThanamAcchAdanacUrNamakSNaH|

	 tayaiva ca poTTalikayA~avantisome kAJjike AplutayA ACcyotanakAla ityabhinave kAle eSveva rogeSvACcyotanam|

	 athavA lodhrasya valkalaM tvak pUrvavadupaskRtaM bahirlekhanaM kRtvA nimbapatrakalkalepanAdanantaraM puTapAkena svinnam| tanmAtramityardhapalonmitam|

	 maricaphaladvayena manaCCilAyACca pAdenArdhakarSeNa yaSTyAdibhiCcASTAMCakaiH pratyekaM CANapramANairyuktam| pUrvavaditi cUrNamavakiraNe ACcyotane ca prakalpayet|

	 api ceti samuccaye| AraNyAH kulatthA akSibheSajAkhyAH paTe baddhAH chagaNarase gomayasya rase susvinnA anu ca nakhairvituSIkRtA ye teSAM cUrNaM niCIthe rAtrau sakRdekavAramevA~avacUrNanAdavakiraNAt sadya eva netrANAM kopamabhiSyandaM vidhamati nACayati||5||

 atha dAruharidrApalamudakArdhaprasthenASTAMCaCeSitaM kvathitaM mAkSikayuktamACcyotanaM kurvIta||6||  evaM cAnupaCame vAtAbhiSyandinamAdAveva jAGgalarasairbhojayitvA daCamUlarAsnAtriphalAkvAthena jIvanIyakalkena ca payoyutaM siddhamitaradvA purANasarpiH pAyayet||6||  ACcyotanaJjAsyairaNDamUlapallavaiH CrRtamajAkSIraM kuryAt||6||  sAlaparNIpRCniparNIdvibRhatImadhukorupUgairvA||6||  tadvattagarahrIberaCArGgoSThodumbaramadhukapippalIbRhatIdvayairaNDamUlairvA||6||  aMCumatIdvayabRhatIkaNTakArikAbhirvA tAntavAvaddhAbhiH surAmadyadhAnyAmlAnyatamAplutAbhirAnUpamAMsAmlakvAthena vA||6||

athetyabhinavatve gate haridretyAdinA~aCcyotanaM subodham|

	 evaM kRte yadyakSirogasyopaCamo na bhavati tata idamidaM kuryAt| subodham|

	 daCamUlAdikvAthena jIvanIyakalkena ca kSIrayutaM purANasarpiH siddhaM vA~asiddhameva vA kSIradaCamUlAdikvAthe jIvanIyakalkayutaM purANaM ghRtaM pAyayet| kecittvitaraditi kevalaM purANaghRtamAhuH|

	 ACcyotanamityAdi subodham| athavA sAlaparNyAdibhiH siddhamajAkSIramACcyotanaM kuryAditi sambandhaH| urupUga eraNDaH| tagarAdibhireraNDamUlAntaistadvaditi CrRtamajAkSIramACcyotanam|

	 athavAMCumatIdvayAdibhistAntave vastre avabuddhAbhiH surAdyanyatamAplutAbhirACcyotanam|

	 athavAMCumatIdvayAdibhistAntavabaddhAbhirAnUpamAMsAnAmamlAnAM ca dADimAdInAM kvAthenAplutAbhirACcyotanam|| 6||

 taireva ca mAMsairveCavArIkRtasvinnairmahAsnehavadbhiryavacUrNalavaNapragADhAmutkArikAM kRtvA lalATagaNDAdIn svedayet||7||

athavA tairevetyAnUpairmAMsairveCavArIkRtaiH kuTTitairanu ca svinaiH snehactuSTayuktaiCca yavacUrNalavaNAbhyAM pragADhAmApAditapiNDIbhAvAmutkArikAM kRtvA lalATAdIn svedayet||7||

 athavA rAsnAbhIrudaCamUlabalAkolakulatthayavAnAmajAkSIrasvinnAnAM vASpeNa||8||  rAsnAdibhireva siddhaM tailaM sarpirvA nAvanam||8||  evaM vidhaireva nADIsvedaM kuryAt||8||

athavA rAsnAdInAmajAkSIrasvinnAnAM vASpeNa lAlATAdIn svedayet| subodham| evaMvidhairiti rAsnAdisamAnaguNaiH||8||

 saralasurabhighanadevadAruhiMsrAkaraJjaphalabilvasarSapaiCca sabhRSTatilaiH payasA piSTaiH sukhoSNairmukhAlepo~akSivedanAstambhaprasAdanaH||9||

saralAdibhirbhRSTatilayuktaiH paCcAcca payasA piSTaiH sukhoSNairmukhAlepo~akSivedanAdiCamanaH||9||

 evamasyAnupaCAntarujaH sirAM mokSayet||10||  snehasvedaviSyandaM hi vAtaduSTamasRGnirhriyamANaM nAnilaprakopAya||10||  punaCca snigdhAya tilvakena saMskRtaM saMyuktaM vA tilvakakaSAyAnupAnaM sarpirvirecanaM dadyAt||10||  CuddhaM ca vAtapratiCyAyavadAsthApayedanuvAsayecca||10||

evamityAdi subodham| snehetyAdi sirAmokSahetuH| punarityasre nirhRte| tilvakaM paTTikAlodhram|| 10||

uttarasthAnam

abhiSyandapratiSedhaH

 atha tilAn nistuSAn bilvaphalakvAthena bhAvayenniCi divA CoSayedevaM paJcAham||11||  tebhyastailaM gRhItvA varAhamedoyuktaM bilvamUlamadhuyaSTikAkalkena payasA ca pacet||11||  tena nasyaM CirobastiM ca kuryAt||11||  sarvagandhaniryUheNa vA madhukagarbhaM sakSIraM tailam||11||  snehikaJca dhUmaM pibet||11||

athAnuvAsamAdanantaram| tilAnityAdi subodham| CirobastiH sUtroktalakSaNaH|

	 athavA sarvagandhadravyANAM niryUheNa kvAthena madhuyaSTIgarbhaM sakSIraM tailaM siddhaM nasyaM CirobastiCca kuryAditi sambandhaH| snehiko dhUmaH CodhanAdigaNasaMgrahe agaruguggulvAdinA sUtroktaH|| 11||

uttarasthAnam

akSipAkapillapratiSedhaH

 athAta akSipAkapillapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

abhiSyandasya tadekayogakSemasya cAdhimanthasya cikitsAmuktvA akSipAkAnAM pillAnAM ca sAdhanaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arambhyate-athAta ityAdi| pillA uktebhyaH eva vartmAdirogebhyaH kecit| te cehaiva vakSyante||1||

 CuSkAkSipAke vAtAbhiSyandavihitaM sarpiH pibet||2||  kulIrarasakSIrasiddhaM vA||2||  dArvIprapauNDarIkayoH kvAtha ACcyotanamakSipAkaghnam||2||  maJjiSThAmadhukkAlAnusArIsArivAlodhralAkSAprapauNDarIkANAmakSipAkaraktarAjIghnam||2||  mRdvIkAcandanakalkastaNDulAmbuparisruto madhumAnaCrudAhaharaH||2||  aNutailaM nasyam||2||  CArivAvidArIbalAmadhukotpaladrAkSATarUSakajIvakacandanairjAGgalarasakSIropetaM tailaM sAdhitaM nAvanAt sarvordhvajatrujAn gadAn vAtapittottarAn nihanti||2||  snigdhACcAtra tarpaNapuTapAkAH||2||  vAtapittAnyatarodrekataCca yathAsvamabhiSyandavidhiH||2||  AdarCamaNDale ghRtAktakeCAn ghRSTvAntardhUmaM dahetsA maSIghRtapiSTA~ayasabhAjanasthitA~akSipAkamaJjanAdapaharati||2||  maJjiSThAphalatrikakaTaGkaTerIniSkvAthe lohasroto~aJjanacUrNamApiNDIbhAvAt pacet||2||  etaccUrNAJjanamabhayaM dAhoSAkarAgACruharam||2||  tAmrarajassairyakapuSpapuNDrAhvamadhukakAlAnusArICArivAH chAgena payasA piSTAH piNDAJjanam||2||  AnUpavasA CuNThIsaindhavacUrNAnvitA snehAJjanam||2||  evamapyaCAntau madhukasiddhaH CatAhvAcUrNayukto ghRtamaNDastathA payo vA bastiH||2||

vAtAbhiSyandavihitaM sarpirdaCamUlAdikaM kulIramAMsarasakSIrAbhyAM siddhaM vA sarpiH pibet|

	 dArvyAdi subodham| maJjiSThAdInAM kvAtha ACcyotanamiti sambadhyate| kAlAnusArI kAleyakaH| kAraNDaka AmlAyanaH| subodham|

	 aNutailaM nasyavidhyuktam| CArivAditailaM nAvanAdvAtapittAdhikAn sarvAnUrdhvajatrujAn gadAn nihanti nACayati|

	 atretyakSipAke vAtapittayoranyatarasyodrekAddhetoryathAsvamudriktadoSAnatikrameNAbhiSyandokto vidhiH|

	 AdarCamaNDale malinitakeCamapyaJjanam| subodham|

	 maJjiSThAdikvAthapakvagulikA cUrNIkRtAJjanaM nAmnAbhayaM dAhAdiharam|

	 tAmracUrNAdikaM piNDAJjanaM subodham| sairyakasya sahacarasya puSpamAmlAyanasyeti kecit|
	
	 AnUpavasetyAdi subodham| tathA paya iti ghRtamaNDavanmadhukasiddhaM CatAhvAcUrNayuktaM ca||2||

 saCophAlpaCophayostu snigdhasvinnasyAnu sirAM vidhyet||3||  drAkSAbhayAkvAthastrivRtkalkavAn saghRto virekaH||3||  viriktasya yathAdoSodayamAsthApanam||3||  tataH piNDasvinnaCirasaH sarSapatailena saindhavayutena vA sarpiSA phaNijjakayuktena vA aNutailena CirovirekaH viriktaCiraso~anuvAsanaM kSIrasarpiSA dhUmapAnaM ca||3||  CironetraM cAsya suniSaNNakapattUrairaNDapatraiH kSIrAMbusvinnaiH saMsvedayet||3||  ghRtabhRSTaM lodhracUrNaM sUkSmavAsasthamuSNodakavimRditamACcyotanam||3||  CuSkAkSipAkoktaM ca vedanAghnam||3||

saCophAkhye~alpaCophAkhye ca snigdhasvinnasya sataH sirAM vidhyet|

	 drAkSAharItakIkvAthena trivRtkalkaghRtayuktena viriktasya doSodayAnatikrameNAsthApanam|

	 tata ityAsthApanAdanantaraM piNDasvedaH sUtroktasena svinnaCirasaH sarSapatailena CirovirekaH sarpiSA vA saindhavayutenANutailena vA phaNijjakacUrNayutena| phaNijjako maruvakaH| tataH kSIrasarpiSA~anuvAsanam| dhUmapAnaM doSAdyapekSam|

	 asya cAkSipAkavataH CironetraM ca suniSaNNakAdipatraiH kSIrAmbusvinnaiH svedayet| suniSaNNakanAmAnUpe bhavati| kACmIreSu sulyeti prasiddhaH| pattUro jale bhavati nAmnA matsyAkSakaH|

	 ghRtabhRSTamityAdinACcyotanaM subodham| CuSkAkSipAkoktaM vedanAghnamACcyotanamiti sambadhyate| tacca lodhrakoraNDapuSpakRtaH kvAthaH|| 3||

 evamaCAntavedanaM sandhAvairupakramet||4||  CaCaCiraHkapAlaM saindhavaM kAMsye stanyaghRSTaM sandhAvo vedanAghnaH||4||  tadvattAmraM ca lohe gomUtraghRSTaM ghRtadhUpitam||4||  CigrupallavarasaCca tAmraghRSTo ghRtadhUpitaH||4||  CaGkhatAmre stanyena ghRSTaM ghRtAbhyaktayavaCamIpatradhUpitaM gharSavedanAghnam||4||  udumbaraphalaM lohe stanyaghRSTaM ghRtAbhyaktaCamIpatradhUpitaM CUlarAgACrugharSaghnam||4||  dadhisaraHpippalIsaindhavayuktastAmre ghRSTaCCophagharSACruvedanAghnaH||4||  mRtkapAlaM kAMsye tilodakaghRSTaM ghRtAktanimbapatra-dhUpitaM CophakaNDUgharSACruCUlarAgaghnam||4||  sandhAvAJjitaM cAkSi stanyenAnusiJcet||4||  triparaJca tairnnAJjayet||4||

sandhAvairityanantaraM vakSyamANaiH sandhAvanAmabhiraJjanaiCcopakrameta| 

	 CaCasya CiraHkapAlaM saindhavena saha kAMsyapAtre stanyena ghRSTaM vedanAghnaM sandhAvaH| lohapAtre gomUtraghRSTaM tAmraM ghRtadhUpitaM sandhAvaH|

	 CigrupallavarasastAmraghRSTo ghRtadhUpitaCca sandhAvaH| tadvallohapAtre ghruSTaM tAmraM ghRtadhUpitaM sandhAvaH|

	 udumbaraphalamityAdinA CUlAdighnassandhAvaH| dadhisarAdikaH sandhAvaH CophAdiharaH|

	 mRnmayaM pakvakapAlaM kAMsyabhAjane tilodakena ghRSTaM ghRtAktanimbapatradhUpitaM CophAdighnaH sandhAvaH|

	 ebhyo~anyatamena sandhAvenAJjitamakSi stanyena siJcet| tairiti sandhAvaiH tristribhyo vArebhyaH paramUrdhvaM netraM nAJjayet|| 4||

 madhukabRhatItvaktAmrarajAMsyajAkSIrapiSTAni CamyAmalakapatrairghRtAplutaiH anekaCo dhUpitAni piNDAJjanaM CophavedanAghnam||5||  tAlIsapatrapippalIloharajo~aJjanakAsIsatagarajAtImukulasaindhavairgomUtrapiSTaistAmramAliptaM saptarAtraM sthApayitvA punastadvadeva piSTairguTikAH kAryAstAH stanyaghRSTAH stambhaCvayathuharSagharSACrukaNDUghnyaH||5||  abaddhAsthisahakAramAMsaM vigatatvacaM samatAmracUrNamISatsaindhavopetaM gavyena dadhnA piSTvA tAmramAlepayet||5||  CuSkaM CuSkaM tathaiva ca piSTvA punarlepayet||5||  etatsaptabhiH saptAhaiH piNDAJjanaM kRtaM sarvAkSikACrugharSaCopharAgavartmopacayaghnam||5||  aCmantakAmlavetasaparUSakakoladADimaiH kRtA rasakriyA saCophAlpaCophapUyAlasAn nACayati||5||  itthamapi CophAnuvRttau punarasrAvasekaH CirovirekaCca||5||

athAnantaramaJjanAni bhavanti| madhukAdinA piNDAJjanaM CophAdighnaM bhavati|

	 tAlIsapatrAdinA guTikAH stambhAdighnyaH tadvadeveti gomUtreNa| aJjanakAle stanyena gupikodgharSaNam|

	 sahakAramAmraphalamabaddhAsthyatibAlam| tasya sahakArasya mAMsaM tvaco~antarbhAgam| saptAhena saptAhenoparyupari lepaH| aCmantakAdinA rasakriyA| aCmantaka indrakaH| subodham|| 5||

 amloSitaM pittAbhiSyandavadupAcaret||6||  pillalasAdhanaM cekSeta||6||

amloSite pittAbhiSyandavadupacAraH| pillasAdhanaM cAtraiva vakSyamANamIkSetAmloSitopacAraNAya| ityuktA akSipAkAH||6||

 pittakapharaktanicayotkliSTavartmapothakIbisAkyakukUNakapakSmoparodhapUyAlasaCuSkAkSipAkAlpaCophAmloSitA vAtavarjyACca syandAdhimanthA ityaSTAdaCa dIrghakAlAnubandhino rogAH pillasaMjJAH||7||

pittotkliSTavartma, kaphotkliSTavartma, raktotkliSTavartma, nicayotkliSTavartma, pothakIbisAkhyo bisavartma, kukUNakaH, pakSmoparodhaH, pUyAlasaH, CuSkAkSipAkaH, alpaCophaH, amloSitaH, vAtavarjyAH syandACcAdhimanthACca pittasyandaH, kaphasyandaH, raktasyandaH, pitAdhimanthaH kaphAdhimanthaH, raktAdhimanthaCca ityaSTAdaCa rogA dIrghakAlAnuvarttinaH santaH pillasaMjJAM labhante||7||

 eSAM kriyA yathAsvamupadiSTaiva punaCca pillI bhUtAnAM sAmAnyenopadiCyate||8||

eSAM pillasaMjJitAnAM pittotkliSTavartmAdInAM kriyA cikitsA yathAsvamadhyAyeSUktaiva||8||

 atha pillAkSirogiNaM snehayitvA vAmayet||9||  kRtakramasya sirAvyadhastato virekaH||9||  kRtavirekasya vartmanI likhet||9||  sakRllekhanAdaCuddhau punarlekhayejjalaukobhiCca grAhayet||9||  priyaGgulodhrapadmakesaracandanamadhukakalkena samAkSikeNa biDAlakaH||9||  tuvarikAphalatrikarocanAkvAthena madhumatA sAyaM prAtaH sadA prakSAlanamaJjanAnte ca kaSAyavRkSapallavakaSAyeNa||9||  taireva ca patrairuSNapriyatAyAmntarAntarA svedaH||9||  tutthakapalaM viMCatiCca CvetamaricAni dhAnyAmlapiSTAni tatpalaistriMCatA tAmrapAtre samAloDitAni bahuvarSANAmapi pillAnAM paramamACcyotanam||9||  aJjanaM cAsyAmradhAtakIpuSpatilaparNIkalkena ca varttiH||9||  harItakyADhakICcASTaguNe~ambhasyaSTabhAgAvaCeSaM kvAthayet||9||  punaCca parisrAvyAdarvIpralopAdrasakriyeyaM pillAkSiropaNI||9||  palACaCAkhAsvarase kvAthyamAne bRhatyuCIrarajo dadyAt||9||  tad ghanIbhUtaM CItamaJjanam||9||  surasArasapiSTairvA vacAladevadArubhiH||9||  gopittapiSTAbhyAM vA vyoSarasAJjanAbhyAm||9||  haritAlasauvIrakAJjanasamAMCaM vA tAmracUrNamaJjanam||9||  paripelavakAsIsaharidrAdvayasarSapapriyaGgutagarapippalIkalkena tAmrabhAjanamantarlepayitvA sauvIrakakumbhe~adhomukhaM saptAhaM vAsayet tato guTikACcUrNaM vA kuryAt||9||  tutthagairikacUrNaM chagalIpayaHpiSTaM guTikA pratyaJjanam||9||  cUrNa eva vA divyodakabhAvitaH||9||  sa eva vA tadApluto netrACcyotanamiti||9||  bhavati cAtra-

	vartmAvalekhaM bahuCastadvacchoNitamokSaNam||9||  punaH punarvirekaM ca pillarogAturo bhajet||9||

pillIbhUtAnAM tu dIrghakAlAnuvarttinAM sAmAnyena kriyA sAdhAraNI cikitsocyate| athetyAdi subodham| vamanAdanukRtakramasya vihitapeyAdikramasya sirAvyadhaH|

	 priyaGgvAdinA biDAlako bahirlepaH| tuvarikAdikvAthena mAkSikavatA sAyaM prAtaCca prakSAlanam| aJjanAnte ca kaSAyavRkSANAmanantaroktAnAM tuvarikAdInAM pallavakaSAyeNa prakSAlanam|

	 uSNapriyatAyAmuSNAbhilASe taireva kaSAyavRkSapatrairantarAntarA kadAcit svedaH|

	 tutthakapAlamityAdi subodham| tatpalairiti dhAnyAmlapalaiH|

	 asya ca pillAkSirogiNa AmrAdikalkena varttiraJjanam| harItakyAdinA rasakriyA subodhA| palACetyAdinA loho~aJjanam| vacAdibhiH, surasAyA rasena piSTairaJjanam| surasA pUrvA| goH pittena piSTAbhyAM vyoSarasAJjanAbhyAM vAJjanam|

	 haritAlAdikaM bhAgastAmraM bhAga iti cUrNAJjanam| paripelavAdinA guTikAthavA cUrNAJjanam| sauvIrakaM satuSayavajAtaM kAJjikam|

	 tutthAdikaM pratyaJjanam| athavaiSa tutthagairikayoCcUrNo divyodakabhAvito~aJjanam| sa eva vA divyodakabhAvitutthAdicUrNo divyodakenApluta ACcyotanam|

	 bahuCo vartmAvalekhAdikaM pillarogeNAturo bhajet||9||

 pUyAlase tvaSAnte~ante dAhaH sUkSmaSalAkayA||10||

pUyAlase tu pillIbhUte aSAnte sarvakriyANAmante~avasAne SalAkayA dAho vidheyaH||10||

uttarasthAnam

akSipAkapillapratiSedhaH

 athAta akSipAkapillapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

abhiSyandasya tadekayogakSemasya cAdhimanthasya cikitsAmuktvA akSipAkAnAM pillAnAM ca sAdhanaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arambhyate-athAta ityAdi| pillA uktebhyaH eva vartmAdirogebhyaH kecit| te cehaiva vakSyante||1||

 CuSkAkSipAke vAtAbhiSyandavihitaM sarpiH pibet||2||  kulIrarasakSIrasiddhaM vA||2||  dArvIprapauNDarIkayoH kvAtha ACcyotanamakSipAkaghnam||2||  maJjiSThAmadhukkAlAnusArIsArivAlodhralAkSAprapauNDarIkANAmakSipAkaraktarAjIghnam||2||  mRdvIkAcandanakalkastaNDulAmbuparisruto madhumAnaCrudAhaharaH||2||  aNutailaM nasyam||2||  CArivAvidArIbalAmadhukotpaladrAkSATarUSakajIvakacandanairjAGgalarasakSIropetaM tailaM sAdhitaM nAvanAt sarvordhvajatrujAn gadAn vAtapittottarAn nihanti||2||  snigdhACcAtra tarpaNapuTapAkAH||2||  vAtapittAnyatarodrekataCca yathAsvamabhiSyandavidhiH||2||  AdarCamaNDale ghRtAktakeCAn ghRSTvAntardhUmaM dahetsA maSIghRtapiSTA~ayasabhAjanasthitA~akSipAkamaJjanAdapaharati||2||  maJjiSThAphalatrikakaTaGkaTerIniSkvAthe lohasroto~aJjanacUrNamApiNDIbhAvAt pacet||2||  etaccUrNAJjanamabhayaM dAhoSAkarAgACruharam||2||  tAmrarajassairyakapuSpapuNDrAhvamadhukakAlAnusArICArivAH chAgena payasA piSTAH piNDAJjanam||2||  AnUpavasA CuNThIsaindhavacUrNAnvitA snehAJjanam||2||  evamapyaCAntau madhukasiddhaH CatAhvAcUrNayukto ghRtamaNDastathA payo vA bastiH||2||

vAtAbhiSyandavihitaM sarpirdaCamUlAdikaM kulIramAMsarasakSIrAbhyAM siddhaM vA sarpiH pibet|

	 dArvyAdi subodham| maJjiSThAdInAM kvAtha ACcyotanamiti sambadhyate| kAlAnusArI kAleyakaH| kAraNDaka AmlAyanaH| subodham|

	 aNutailaM nasyavidhyuktam| CArivAditailaM nAvanAdvAtapittAdhikAn sarvAnUrdhvajatrujAn gadAn nihanti nACayati|

	 atretyakSipAke vAtapittayoranyatarasyodrekAddhetoryathAsvamudriktadoSAnatikrameNAbhiSyandokto vidhiH|

	 AdarCamaNDale malinitakeCamapyaJjanam| subodham|

	 maJjiSThAdikvAthapakvagulikA cUrNIkRtAJjanaM nAmnAbhayaM dAhAdiharam|

	 tAmracUrNAdikaM piNDAJjanaM subodham| sairyakasya sahacarasya puSpamAmlAyanasyeti kecit|
	
	 AnUpavasetyAdi subodham| tathA paya iti ghRtamaNDavanmadhukasiddhaM CatAhvAcUrNayuktaM ca||2||

 saCophAlpaCophayostu snigdhasvinnasyAnu sirAM vidhyet||3||  drAkSAbhayAkvAthastrivRtkalkavAn saghRto virekaH||3||  viriktasya yathAdoSodayamAsthApanam||3||  tataH piNDasvinnaCirasaH sarSapatailena saindhavayutena vA sarpiSA phaNijjakayuktena vA aNutailena CirovirekaH viriktaCiraso~anuvAsanaM kSIrasarpiSA dhUmapAnaM ca||3||  CironetraM cAsya suniSaNNakapattUrairaNDapatraiH kSIrAMbusvinnaiH saMsvedayet||3||  ghRtabhRSTaM lodhracUrNaM sUkSmavAsasthamuSNodakavimRditamACcyotanam||3||  CuSkAkSipAkoktaM ca vedanAghnam||3||

saCophAkhye~alpaCophAkhye ca snigdhasvinnasya sataH sirAM vidhyet|

	 drAkSAharItakIkvAthena trivRtkalkaghRtayuktena viriktasya doSodayAnatikrameNAsthApanam|

	 tata ityAsthApanAdanantaraM piNDasvedaH sUtroktasena svinnaCirasaH sarSapatailena CirovirekaH sarpiSA vA saindhavayutenANutailena vA phaNijjakacUrNayutena| phaNijjako maruvakaH| tataH kSIrasarpiSA~anuvAsanam| dhUmapAnaM doSAdyapekSam|

	 asya cAkSipAkavataH CironetraM ca suniSaNNakAdipatraiH kSIrAmbusvinnaiH svedayet| suniSaNNakanAmAnUpe bhavati| kACmIreSu sulyeti prasiddhaH| pattUro jale bhavati nAmnA matsyAkSakaH|

	 ghRtabhRSTamityAdinACcyotanaM subodham| CuSkAkSipAkoktaM vedanAghnamACcyotanamiti sambadhyate| tacca lodhrakoraNDapuSpakRtaH kvAthaH|| 3||

karNarogavijJAnIyaH

 athAtaH karNarogavijJAnIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

netrarogANAM nirNayaM kRtvordvAGgacikitsAprasaGgena karNarogANAM hetvAdikaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 pratiCyAyajalakrIDAkarNakaNDUyanairmarut||2||  mithyAyogena Cabdasya kupito~anyaiCca kopanaiH||2||  prApya CrotrasirAH kuryAcchUlaM srotasi vegavat||2||  ardhAvabhedakaM stambhaM CiCirAnAbhinandanam||2||  cirAcca pAkaH pakvantu lasIkAmalpaCaH sravet||2||  CrotaM CUnyamakasmAcca syAt saJcAravicAravat||2||

pratiCyAyAdibhirhetubhiranyaiCca nidAnoktairmarudvAyuH kupitaH Crotrasrotasi vegavacchUlamardhAvabhedakAdikaJca kurute| pratiCyAyo nAsArogeSu vakSyate| ardhAvabhedakaH CirorogeSu| CiCirAnAbhinandanaM CItadveSaH| cirAcca pAkaH Crotre syAt| pakvaM ca CrotramakasmAdvinAkAraNaM saJcAravicAravat syAt| kSaNaM saMvRtamAbhAti kSaNaM vivRtamityarthaH| iti vAtakarNarogaH||2||

 CUlaM pittAtsadAhoSA CItecchA CvayathuM jvaram||3||  ACupAkaM prapakvaM ca sapItalasikAsrutiH||3||  sA lasIkA spRCedyadyattattatpAkamupaiti ca||3||

pittAt svahetutaH kupitAcchrotrasrotasi dohAdiyuktaM CUlaM syAditi sambandhaH| ACupAkAdikaM cArthAcchrotraviCeSaNaM boddhavyam| subodham| iti pittakarNarogaliGgam||3||

 kaphAcchirohanugrIvAgauravaM mandatA rujaH||4||  kaNDUCvayathuruSNocchA pAkAcchrvetaghanasrutiH||4||

kaphAditi| prakaraNAtkarNaroge CirogauravAdikaM liGgam||4||

 karoti CravaNe CUlamabhighAtAdidUSitam||5||  raktaM pittasamAnArti kiJcidvAdhikalakSaNam||5||

abhighAtAdinA raktasya kopastena dUSitaM raktaM CravaNe karNe CUlaM karoti| tacca raktakarNarogaM pittakarNarogasamAnaliGgaM bhavati| tato~api pittAt kiJcidadhikalakSaNamiti raktakarNarogaH||5||

 CUlaM samuditairdoSaiH saCophajvaratIvraruk||6||  paryAyAduSNaCItecchaM jAyete CrutijADyavat||6||  pakvaM sitAsitAraktaghanapUyapravAhi ca||6||

samuditaiH sannipatitairdoSairvAtAdibhiH CophAdiyuktaM CUlaM Crotre jAyate| paryAyeNa nirantarAvRttyA uSNocchA CItecchA ca yasmin CUle tatparyAyAduSNaCIteccham| paryAyAdeva CrutijADyavat| tacca CrotraM pakvaM sitAsitAdiguNapUyapravAhi bhavatIti sannipAtakarNarogaH||6||

 CabdavAhisirAsaMsthe CrRNoti pavane muhuH||7||  nAdAnakasmAdvidhAn karNanAdaM vadanti tam||7||

CabdavahAsu sirAsu kAraNaviCeSavaCAt sthite pavane puruSo muhuH pratikSaNamakasmAt kAraNaM vinA vividhAnasato nAdAn CrRNoti| taM karNarogaM karNanAdamityAcAryA vadanti||7||

 CleSmaNAnugato vAyurnAdo vA samupekSitaH||8||  uccaiH kRcchrAcchutiM kuryAdbadhiratvaM krameNa ca||8||

CleSmaNA vAyuranugata uccaiH kRcchrAcca CrutiM kuryAt| athavA karNanAdAkhyo roga upekSitaH sannevaM kuryAt| ubhayatrApi krameNa badhiratvamayaM rogaH saptamaH||8||

 vAtena CoSitaH CleSmA sroto limpettato bhavet||9||  ruggauravaM vidhAnaM ca saH pratInAhasaMjJitaH||9||

kAraNaviCeSavaCAdvAtena CleSmA CoSitaH san karNasroto limpettataH srotolepAt karNe rugAdikaM bhavet| sa evambhUto rogaH saMjJayA pratInAhaH||9||

 kaNDUCophau kaphAcchrotre sthirau tatsaMjJayA smRtau||10||

kaphAddhetoryau Crotre sthirau kaNDUCophau tau tatsaMjJayA kaNDUCophAviti nAmnA smRtAvAcAryaiH| ekaH kaNDUH dvitIyaH CophaH||10||

 kapho vidagdhaH pittena sarujaM nIrujaM tathA||11||  dhanapUtibahukledaM kurute pUtikarNakam||11||

pittena kartrA kapho vidagdhaH vidAhAvasthAM nItaH pUtikarNAkhyaM rogaM kurute| kimbhUtamityAha| sarujaM vA nIrujaM vA ubhayathApi ghanapUti bahukledam||11||

 vAtAdidUSitaM CrotaM mAMsAsRkledajA rujam||12||  khAdanto jantavaH kuryastIvrAM sa krimikarNakaH||12||

jantavaH krimayaH khAdanto bhakSayantaH prakaraNAt karNaM tatraiva sambhavAttIvrAM rujaM kuryuH| sa rogo nAmnA krimikarNakaH| kimbhUtA jantava Aha-vAtAdibhiH svakAraNakupitairdUSite ye CrotrasambandhinI mAMsAsRjI tayorvikledastajjAH||12||

 CrotrakaNDUyanAjjAte kSate syAt pUrvalakSaNaH||13||  vidradhiH pUrvavaccAnyaH Copho~arCorbudamIritam||13||  teSu ruk pUtikarNatvaM badhiratvaM krameNa ca||13||

Crotasya kaNDUyanena kSate vraNe jAte sati pUrvalakSaNastIvrarUgrupo vidradhyAkhyo rogaH syAt| anyaCca vidradhiH pUrvavannidAnoktavidradhihetunA bhavatyeSa ca vidradhereva bhedAntaraM tena saMkhyAyAM na praviCati| CophaCca yaH karNe sa nAmnA ekArCa IritaH dvitIyo~arbudaM evametau dvau rogAvekIkRtya pUrvaiH saha paJcadaCa tu bhavanti| teSu cAnAntarokteSu vidradhyarCo~arbudeSu krameNa yathAsaGkhyaM rugAditrayaM jAyate| badhiratvaM ca jAyate ( iti ca pAThaH )||13||

 garbhe~anilAt saGkucitA CaSkulI kUcikarNakaH||14||

uttarasthAnam

karNarogapratiSedhaH

 athAtaH karNarogapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

uktakrameNa karNarogANAM cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 vAtaje karNaCUle rAtrau rAtrau rasabhojanottaraM vAtaharadravyasiddhaM sarpiH pibenniranno vA payo~anupAnam||2||

rasabhojanottaraM rasabhojanasya paCcAt| athavA niranna eva payo~anupAnaM vAtaharadravyasiddhaM sarpiH pibet||2||

 tato daCamUlasiddhe chAge payasi goCrRGganihito~agnivarNAn pASANAn sandaCena gRhItvA~avapet||3||  tenoSmaNA nADIsvedena ca svabhyaktaM svedayet||3||  bilvayavakolakulatthamASArkaCigrupatrairvA sAnUpamAMsaiH kvAthitaiH||3||

tata iti sarpiSpAnAdanantaraM daCamUletyAdinA karNasvedaH| athavA bilvAdipatrairAnUpamAMsayuktaiH kvathitaiH svedayet||3||

 svinnaM ca pUrayet kuSThArAsnAmadhukavaMCAvalekhaCuNThICikhicandrakamASasaralapayovipakvena tailena||4||  jIvakamadhukakuSThamaNDUkIdevadArumahauSadhakalkASTaguNakSIrasiddhena vA||4||  mayUranAlakulatthAgarumASadevadArukalkakSAraCuktAmlasAdhitAbhyAM vA tailavasAbhyAm||4||  madhukakSIrakAkolImASaCatAvarIkalkasarvagandhodakakSIravipakvayA vA varAhavasayA||4||  rAsnAmadhukakAkolIdevadArukalkapayovipAcitayA vA CiMCumAravasayA||4||  mAMsIkuSThAmedAsaralasurabhimadhukakSIravipakvayA vA godhAvasayA||4||  jIvakaCatAhvAmadhukamAMsIkSIrasiddhAM kukkuTamayUra-vasAM karNapUraNanasyAbhyaGgeSu vidadhyAt||4||  madhukakSIrakAkolIkalkena caturguNaCigruhrasvapaJcamUlakairaNDapatrarasamaSTaguNakSIrasAdhitaM tailaM vA||4||  ghRtatailavasAbhyaktAni taruNAnyaCvatthapatrANi puTapAkasvinnAni prapIDya tadrasena karNaM pUrayet||4||  tadvacca tailalavaNAbhyaktAnyarkorupUgamUlakAralukabilvamahAvRkSAnyatamapatrANi||4||  mahApaJcamUlasaralAgarudevadArvyanyatamakASThamaSTAdaCAGgulaM tribhAge kSaumeNAveSTya tailena siktvAgre pradIpayet||4||  tato dahyamAnAdyaH snehaH patati sadyaH karNarujamapaharati||4||

evaJca svinnaM karNaM kuSThAdivipakvena tailena pUrayet| jIvakAdisiddhena tailena vA|

	 mayUranAlAdisAdhitAbhyAM tailavasAbhyAM vA madhukAdivipakvayA varAhavasayA vA karNaM pUrayet|

	 rAsnAdivipAcitayA CiMCumAravasayA vA| CiMCumAro nAma jalajaH prANiviCeSaH| mAMsyAdivipakvayA godhAvasayA vA karNaM pUrayediti sambandhaH| surabhirmurA|

	 jIvakAdisiddhAM kukkuTamayUrayorvasAM karNapUraNAdiSu vidadhyAt| madhukAdisAdhitaM vA tailaM karNapUraNAdiSu| CigrvAdipatrarasastailAccaturguNaH| kSIramaSTaguNam| hrasvaM bRhatyAdipaJcamUlam|

	 taruNAnyaciraprarUDhAnyaCvatthapatrANi ghRtAdyabhyaktAni tadvaditi puTapAkasvinnAni prapIDya tadrasena karNaM pUrayet|

	 arkAdInAmanyatamasya patrANi tailalavaNAbhyaktAni tadvaditi puTapAkasvinnAni prapIDya tadrasena karNaM pUrayet|

	 mahApaJcamUlAdyanyatamakASThasnehagrahaNavidhAnaM subodham| saH snehaH karNapUraNena sadya eva karNarujamapaharati||4||

 madhUcchiSTakaiDaryamadhuCigruphalavacAyavanaladailAguggulubhiH ClakSNapiSTaiH kSaumavastraM dhUmavarttipramANapariNAhaM lepayettataH sUtreNAveSTya DuNDukanAlena dhUmaM pAtuM dadyAt||5||  DuNDukanAlameva vAnena kalkenAbhyajya viCoSayitvA dhUmaM vidadhyAt||5||

madhUcchiSTAdibhiH ClakSNayiSTaiH sUtroktadhUmavarttipramANaM pariNAhe kSaumaM lepayet| tatastatkSaumaM varttyAkRtya sUtreNAveSTya DuNDukasya syonAkasya nAlena dhUmaM pAtumAturAya dadyAt|

	 athavA kevalameva DuNDukanAlamanena madhUcchiSTAdikalkenAbhyajya CoSayitvA dhUmaM pAtuM vidadhyAt|| 5||

 CreyasIdevadArukAkolIkuSThaniculabIjaiH kSIrapiSTaistilayutaiH karNaM bahirlepayet||6||  sarvadhAnyasnehagokSIrasiddhAmutkArikAmeraNDapatrAvacchAdite karNe svedArthaM praNayet||6||  punaH punaCca nADIsvedAn piNDasvedaCca||6||  vAtavyAdhipratiCyAyArditavidhAnaJca sanirUhAnuvAsanaM kuryAt||6||

CreyasyAdibhistilayuktaiH karNalepaH| Creyaso hastipippalI| subodham||6||

 parihAryANi ca pariharedviCeSataH pravAtaM CitAmbupAnaM CiraHsnAnaM ca||7||

pariharyANi vAtakopanAni pariharet| pravAtAdIni viCeSeNa| prakRSTo vAtaH pravAtaH| iti vAtaje karNaroge||7||

 pittaje tu CUle prAtaH prAtaH CarkarAyutaM sarpiH pAyayet||8||  tataH snigdhaM virecayet||8||  drAkSAmadhukasiddhaM stanyaM karNapUraNaM prayuJjIta||8||  mAkSikaM vA||8||  madhukapadmakakalkastanyasiddhaM vA sarpiH||8||  sitAmadhukakharjUramRdvIkAbhirvA sakSIrekSurasaM priyAlakatailaM pAcitamabhyaGganasyakarNapUraNaiH CUladAhaghnam||8||  madhukakuDavaM SoDaCaguNenAmbhasA~aSTAvaCeSaM sAdhayitvA tena tailArddhakuDavamaSTaguNakSIraM yaSTImadhukoCIrasArivAkAkolIjIvakAnantAmRNAlamaJjiSThA lodhracandanabisagarbhaM pacet||8||  tacca pUrvavat praNayet||8||  eSAmeva ca kalkena saghRtena karNaM parito lepayet||8||  svedayecca||8||  tathA kSIrasarpirnasyaM Ciro~abhyaGgaCca||8||  evamapyanupaCame tu punarvirekaH||8||

pittaje karNaCUle prAtaH prAtaH CarkarayA yutaM sarpirAsnigdhatvalAbhAt pAyayet| subodham| mAkSikaM veti kevalam| sitAdibhiH priyAlakatailaM pAcitamabhyaGgAdibhiH CuladAhaghnam|

	 madhukAdinA tailaM pUrvavat praNayedityabhyaGgAdiSu| tenetyaSTabhAgaCeSeNa yaSTImadhukAdigarbheNa| anantA dUrvA|

	 eSAmityanantaroktAnAM yaSTImadhukAdInAm| kSIrasarpiryatkSIraM mathitvA gRhyate| subodham| iti pittaje karNaroge||8||

 kaphaje pippalIvipakvaM ghRtamathavA sakSaudraM pAyayitvA taM vAmayet||9||  tatastIkSNaM dhUmaM pAyayet||9||  karNaJcAsya pUrayet saraladevadAruhiMsrApaTolapatrasurasasiddhena tailena||9||  devadArupippalImAlatIpatrakvAthakalkasiddhena vA||9||  lodhrakhadirasAramanaCCilAdviharidrAkuSThatriphalailAkvAthakalkasiddhena vA||9||  rasAJjanamArkavavaijayantICigrulaCunArdrakamaruGgImUlakadalInAM vA pRthak samastAnAM vA rasena madhunA vA rakSoghnatailena vA||9||  tathA CUlaCophagauravANi praCAmyanti||9||  dhAnyAmlakvathitadCamUlabASpeNa nADIsvedamAcaret||9||  svinnaM kuCAmratrivRnnaladaCuNThImustasAdhitena tailena pUrayet||9||  kaphaghnAMCca gaNDUSAn dhArayet||9||

kaphaje karNaCUle pippalIvipakvamapakvameva vA sakSaudraM sarpiH pAyayitvA tamAturaM vAmayet| tIkSNo dhUmaH sUtroktaH|

	 asya ca CleSmakarNarogiNaH saralAdisiddhena vA devadArvAdisiddhena vA lodhrAdisiddhena vA tailena karNaM pUrayet|aralAdikalkapAkam| CeSayoryeSAmeva kvAthasteSAmeva ca kalkena| rasAJjanAdInAM pRthagbhUtAnAM vA miCrIbhUtAnAM vA rasena karNaM pUrayet| mArkavo bhRGgarAjaH| vaijayantyatimuktakaH| muruGgI madhusravA| athavA kevalenaiva madhunA| athavA rakSaughnatailena sarSapatailena| tatheti karNapUraNakriyayA CUlAdIni CAmyanti|

	 nADIsvedaH subodhaH| svinnaM karNaM kuCAmrAdisiddhena tailena pUrayet| kuCAmraH kSudrAmraH| kaphAghnAn kaphaghnadravyakRtAn gaNDUSAn dhArayecca| iti kaphaje karNaroge|| 9||

 raktaje paittikavat siddhiH sirAvyaCca||10||

raktaje karNaroge paittikakarNarogavat siCcikitsA| atra tu sirAvyadhA~adhikaH||10||

athetyAdinA chinnapAlIsandhAnavidhAnam| atheti maGgale| rogataH karNaM chinnaM svasthameva vA saMgrAmAdau balAt chinnamubhayamapyanusandadhyAt| tasmin vicchede doSasaMsthAnaviCeSavaCAt prahArAdigativiCeSavaCAccAnekaprakAro ghaTanIyaH sandhiH sambhavati| sarvaH sarvaiH prakArairdarCayitumaCakyaH||30||

uttarasthAnam

karNarogapratiSedhaH

 samAsatastu paJcadaCa karNasandhayaH prAyo nAmAnugatasaMsthAnaviCeSatayA sambhavanti||31||  tadyathA-

1.  pRthulAyatasamobhayapAlICcakranemiH||31||  2.  vRttAyatamobhayapAlirutpalabhedakaH||31||  3.  abhyantaradIrghapAliH kavATaH||31||  4.  viparItorddhvakavATaH||31||  5.  hrasvavRttasamobhayapAlirvallUrakaH||31||  6.  aNusthUlasamaviSamapAlirvyAyojimaH||31||  7.  bAhyapAlirgaNDAdhAraH||31||  8.  ato viparItastvAsaGgimaH||31||  9.  apAlirAhAryaH; sa eva mAMsalapITho nirbedhimaH||31||  10.  CuSkaCuSkalirutsannapAliH||31||  11.  tarAlpapAliH saGkSiptaH||31||  12.  anadhiSThAnapAliH paryantayoCca kSINamAMso hInaH||31||  13.  tanuviSamapAlirvalliH||31||  14.  grathitanirmAMsastabdhasirAvRtasUkSmapAliryaSTI||31||  15.  nirmAMsasaMkSiptAgrA~aCoNitapAliH kAkauSTha iti||31||

samAsatastu chinnakarNasandhayaH paJcadaCa vaidyaghaTanIyAH sambhavanti| katamityAha-prAyo bAhulyena svanAmArthAnugatasaMsthAnaviCeSatayA (svanAmAnugatasthAnaviCeSatayA) saMsthAnamAkRtiH sthAnaM pradeCaH| prAyograhaNaM vyAbhicArasUcanArtham|

	 tathetyAdinA ta eva sandhayaH paJcadaCocyante| karNe tAvadekA pAlI bhavati| sA chinnA satI dve sampadyate| ekA gaNDalagnA| dvitIyA CuSkalyavabaddhA| evaM sthite ekaH sandhiCcakranominAmA bhavati| tasya lakSaNaM pRthule cAyate same nimnonnatarahite pAlI yasya sandheH sa tathoktaH| rathacakre hi nemyAkhyaM bAhyavRddhikASThamevaMrUpameva bhavati|

	 dvitIyo hyutpalabhedAkhyaH tasya lakSaNaM vRtte parivartule Ayate dIrghe same nimnonnatarahite pAlI yasya| vRtte hi bhagnamutpalamAkRtyaivaM bhavati|

	 tRtIyaH sandhiH kavATAkhyaH| tasya lakSaNamabhyantarA gaNDanibaddhA pAlI CaSkulI bAhyApAlyapekSayA dIrghA yasya sa tathoktaH| atra nAmAnugatatve prAyograhaNam|

	 caturthorddhvakavATAkhyaH| tasya lakSaNaM kavATaliGgavaiparItyam| atra hi bAhyA CuSkalyavabaddhA pAlI dIrghA bhavati| kavATe dvArapakSau|

	 paJcamo vallUrAkhyaH; tasya lakSaNamubhe api pAlI hrasve stokalambe vRtte vartule parasparaM ca same| vallUrAkhyAM hi CuSyanmAMsapeCyAH| vyAdhAGganAsvevaMvidhA eva dRCyate|

	 SaSTho vyAyojimAkhyaH| tasya lakSaNaM ekApAlyaNurnAtighanA| dvitIyA sthUlAtIvaghanA ca| ekA samA nimnonnatarahitA| dvitIyA tadviparItA yasya sa tathoktaH| asyArthe prAyograhaNam|

	 saptamo gaNDAdhArAkhyaH| tasya lakSaNaM bAhyaCuSkalyACrayA ekaiva pAlirgaNDamUlachinnatvAdyanyatarasya hi bandhe gaNDa evAdhAro dvitIyapAlyabhAvAt|

	 aSTama AsaGgimAkhyaH| tasya lakSaNaM gaNDAdhAravaiparItyam| atra hi CuSkulImUle chinnatvAdeva gaNDalagnA pAlI bhavati| atrApi prAyograhaNam|

	 navama AhAryAkhyaH| tasya lakSaNaM na vidyate kadAcidapi pAliryasya so~apAlirbhavati| AhArya apUrvapAlyupAyatvAt| sa evAhAryo mAMsalena karNapIThena nirvedhima ucyate| ataevAsau sandhyuttaraH yo hi vedhamarhati|

	 daCamaH CuSkaCaSkulyAkhyaH| tallakSaNaM sarvasarvikayA pAlyucchedaH| CaSkulI CuSkaivaMrUpaiva bhavati|

	 ekAdaCaH saGkSiptapAliH| tallakSaNamitareti| notsannapAlirapi tvalpapAliH|

	 dvAdaCo hInAkhyaH| tallakSaNaM pAlIsthAnayoH kSINamAMso~ataeva cAnadhiSThAnapAliranyapAlyA api tatra saMCrayo na vidyate sa bhavati hInaH|

	 trayodaCo vallAkhyaH| tallakSaNaM tu tanuviSame kvacinnimne kvacidunnate pAlyau yasya| vallirapyevaMrUpaiva bhavati|

	 caturdaCo yaSTAkhyaH| tallakSaNaM grathitA granthimatI nirmAMsA stabdhA niCcalA sirAbhirAvRtA sUkSmA~atitanvI pAlI yasya sa tathoktaH| yaSTirapyevaMrUpA bhavati|

	 paJcadaCaH kAkauSThAkSyaH| tallakSaNaM nirmAMse~alpaprAnte CoNitarahite pAlI yasya sa tathoktaH| kAkasya caJcupuTAvapyevaMrUpAveva bhavataH| ityuktAH paJcadaCa sandhayaH|| 31||

 eSAmAdyA daCa sidhyanti; na tvitare||32||

eSAM CuSkaCaSkulyantA daCa sAdhyA| itare paJca saMkSiptAdayo~asAdhyAH||32||

 tatra bAhyAyAM pAlyAM dIrghAyAmAbhyantaraH sandhiH||33||  tathetarAyAM bAhyaH||33||  samaH samayoCca||33||  aNvAdiviSamayostu parasparaviparyayau||33||

tatraiteSu madhye bAhyA CaSkulyACrayA pAlI dIrghA bhavati tadA~asyA AbhyantaraH sandhiH| dvitIyayA saMyoge tacchidramArgeNa kartavyam| yadA tu gaNDACrayA dIrghA tadA~asyA bAhyaH sandhAnamabhimukhasandhiH| samayoCca pAlyorbAhyA eva|

	 ye tu pAlI aNvAdiviCeSeNa viSame bhinnasvarUpe tayoH pAlyoH parasparaviparyayeNa sandhiH| yatraikA aNuraparA sthUlA ekA samA~aparA nimnA tatrANoH sandhiH tathA nimnA kartavyA yathA sthUlA cANurbhavatyaNuCca sthUletyekIbhUtA samA bhavatyevaM samaviSayayorapi viparyayo vAcyaH|| 33||

 yA tvekaiva pAlI sthUlA pRthvI sthirA ca syAt tAM dvidhA pATayitvopari chitvA sandadhyAt||34||

dvidhA pATitAyAH pAlyAH ekaiko bhAgo mUle chitvA CUnye pAlImUle yojyaH| tato dvipAli sandadhyAt||34||

 guNDotkRttena vA saCoNitena sAnubandhena mAMsena pAlIM kalpayet||35||  yasya pAlIdvayamapi nAsti tasyApyeSa eva vidhiH||35||  athavA samAnavayodoSAdeH saJcArya karNapIThaM samaM madhye niveCya varddhayet||35||

sahAnubandhena jIvatsaMskAreNa vartata iti tathoktaH| subodham||35||

 sandhAnavidhiH punarAture grathitakeCAnte bandhanamupadhArite chedyabhedyalekhyairupapannairupapAdya karNaCoNitamavekSeta duSTamaduSTaM veti||36||  tato vAtaduSTe dhAnyAmloSNodakAbhyAM pittaduSTe kSIraCItodakAbhyAM CleSmaduSTe vAruNIsalilAbhyAM prakSAlya punaCcAvalikhyAnunnatamahInaviSamaM sandhiM niveCya tato madhughRtAbhyAmabhyajya picuplotayoranyatareNAvaguNaThya sUtreNa nAtigADhamaCithilaM ca baddhvA sirAvyadhoktena kapAlasya vA cUrNenAvakIryAcArikamupadiCet||36||  sandhimACliSyantaM kSaumasUtreNa sIvyeta||36||  atikSINapAlikaM vA CoNitAktena picunA veSTayet||36||  vraNavaccainamupAcaret||36||  tryahAccaturahAdvA salilena pariSicya picuM sUtraM cApanayet||36||

Atura ityAdinA karNasandhAnavidhirbhavati| upadhArite niCcitayogye bandhe karNasya chedyAdyupapAdanamasthAne viSaye karttuM na yAti| duSTAduSTaCoNitalakSaNaM sirAvyadha uktam|

	 tata ityAdi subodham| picuH kArpAsaculukam| plotaM vastram| sirAvyadhokteneti cUrNena sambadhyate| AcArikaM vraNinamanuSTheyam|

	 yadi ca karNasandhiH CleSaM na gRhNAti tataH kSaumasUtreNa sIvyet||36||

 na cACuddharaktamatipravRttaraktaM kSINaraktaM vA karNaM sandadhyAt||37||

tasyetyaCuddharaktaasya vAtipravRttasya vA kSINaraktasya vA na sandadhyAt||37||

 tasya hi svayamapi sandhirviCliSyate AdhmAyate CyAvatAmupaiti pacyate CuSyati cirAdrohati rUDho~apyAbharaNaM na kSamate||38||  saCophakaNDUsantApo grathimAMCca bhavati||38||  tatra ca yathAsvaM pratikurvIta||38||  duSTarakte ca raktamavasecayet||38||  kSINaraktaM snehapAnanasyamAMsarasACanAbhyaGgairbRMhayet||38||

tasya hItyAdi subodham| tatretyAdhmAnapAkAdau yathAsvamiti svacikitsitAnatikrameNa||38||

 sarvatra caivamapi sopadravasandhau sandhiM vimucya pUrvApacAropasthApitasmRtiH samyak sandadhIteti||39||

evacca vidhIyamAne~api yadi sopadrava eva sandhirbhavati tatastaM vimucya pUrvopadravahetUnAM smaraNaM punastathAbhAvapratiSedhAya kRtvA samyak sandadhIta||39||

 bhavati cAtra ----

	na karNe CopharAgAdiyukte sandhAnamAcaret||40||  na ghasmarasya nAyuSNe nAviCuddhatanorapi||40||

gatAnugatikA| CophAdiyukte karNe sandhAnaM nAcaret| ghasmarasyAtyAdanaCIlasya| atyuSNa iti deCe kAle ca| aCuddhatanorakRtavamanAdikasya||40||

uttarasthAnam

nAsArogavijJAnIyaH

 athAto nAsArogavijJAnIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

UrdhvAGgaprasanGgena nAsArogANAM hetvAdikaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 avaCyAyAnilarajobhASyAtisvapnajAgaraiH||2||  nIcAtyuccopadhAnena pItenAnyena vAriNA||2||  atyambupAnaramaNacchardibASpagrahAdibhiH||2||  krRddhA vAtolbaNA doSA nAsAyAM styAnatAGgatAH||2||  janayanti pratiCyAyaM vardhamAnaM kSayapradam||2||

avaCyAyAdibhirhetubhirvAtolbaNAstrayo doSA nAsAyAM kupitAstatraiva styAnatAM saMhatatvaM prAptAH pratiCyAyAkhyaM rogaM janayanti| sa ca vardhamAna upekSayA kSayaM dadAti| avaCyAyaH pradoSe jalaM CItamantarikSAt patat| rajaH kSitirajo dhUliH| atiCabdaH svapnajAgarAbhyAM sambadhyate| upadhAnaCabdaH CayyAyAH CironiSyandanaparyAyo nIcAtyuccAbhyAm| anyena vijAtIyena vAriNA pItenArthAdanyasmin pIte| atyambupAnenAtyamburamaNena chardibASpagrahAdibhiCca| AdigrahaNena vegarodhAdInAM grahaNam||2||

 tatra vAtAtpratiCyAye mukhaCoSo bhRCaM kSavaH||3||  ghrANoparodhanistodadntaCaGkhaCirovyathAH||3||  kITakA iva sarpanti manyate parito bhruvau||3||  svarasAdaCcirAtpAkaH CiCirAcchakaphasrutiH||3||

tatretyAdinA~adhikadoSaviCeSavaCena pratiCyAyAdInAM lakSaNamucyate| mukhaCoSAdiCiCirAcchAphasrutyantaM vAtapratiCyAyalakSaNam| pratiCyAyAnAM pAka ihaiva vakSyamANalakSaNaH||3||

 pittAttRSNAjvaraghrANapiTakAsambhavabhramAH||4||  nAsAgrapAko rUkSoSNatAmrapItakaphasrutiH||4||

tRSNAdikaM rUkSAdiguNakaphasrutyantaM pittAtpratiCyAye bhavati||4||

 kaphAtkAso ruciH CvAso vamathurgAtragauravam||5||  mAdhuryaM vadane kaNDUH snigdhaCuklakaphasrutiH||5||

kAsAdisnigdhAdisrutyantaM kaphAt pratiCyAye||5||

 sarvajo lakSaNaiH sarvairakasmAddhaddhiCAntimAn||6||

yastu sarvadoSajaH pratiCyAyaH sarvairanantaroktairvAtAdipratiCyAyalakSaNairyukto bhavati| sa cA~akasmAdaheturhAnyA vRddhyA ca yukto bhavati||6||

 duSTa nAsAsirAH prApya pratiCyAYaM karotyasRk||7||  urasaH suptatA tAmranetratvaM CvAsapUtitA||7||  kaNDUH CrotrAkSinAsAsu pittoktaM cAtra lakSaNam||7||

asRgraktaM vAtAdidUSaNairduSTaM nAsAsirAH prApya pratiCyAyaM karoti| atra ca raktapratiCyAye urasaH suptatAdi pittapratiCyAyoktaM lakSaNam||7||

 sarva eva pratiCyAyA duSTatAM yAntyupekSitAH||8||  yathoktopadravAdhikyAtsa sarvendriyatApanaH||8||  sAgnisAdajvaraCvAsakAsoraHpArCvavedanaH||8||  kupyatyakasmAdbahuCo mukhadaurgandhyaCoSakRt||8||  nAsikAkledasaMCoSaCuddhirodhakaro muhuH||8||  pUyopamAsitA raktagrathitaCleSmasaMsrutiH||8||  mUrcchanti cAtra kRmayo dIrghasnigdhasitANavaH||8||

sarva evAnantaroktAH pratiCyAyA upekSitAH santo duSTapratiCyAyatAm yAnti| sa ca duSTapratiCyAyo yathoktAnAmupadravANAM mukhaCoSAdInAM prarUSatvenAdhikyAt sarvendriyANAM tApana upatApakaro bhavati| agnisAdAdiyutaCca| sa ca duSTapratiCyAyo~akasmAdivAtiCayena kupyati mukhadaurgandhyAdikRcca bhavati| muhuH pratikSaNaM nAsikAyAH kledaCca CoSaCca CuddhiCca rodhaM karoti pUyopamAdiguNaCleSmasaMsrutiCca bhavati| atra ca duSTapratiCyAye kaphasrutau dIrghAdirUpAH kRmayo mUrcchanti samucchrAyaM labhante aNavo laghupramANAH||8||

 pakvaliGgAni teSvaGgalAghavaM kSavathoH CamaH||9||  CleSmA sucikkaNaH pIto jJAnaM ca rasagandhayoH||9||

teSu ca sarveSu pratiCyAyeSu pakveSvaGgalAghavAdikaM liGgam||9||

 tIkSNAghrANopayogArkaraCmisUtratRNAdibhiH||10||  vAtakopibhiranyairvA nAsikAtaruNAsthani||10||  vighaTTite~anilaH kruddho ruddhaH CrRGgATakaM vrajan||10||  nivRttaH kurute~atyarthaM kSavathuM sa bhRCakSavaH||10||

tIkSNAghrANAdibhirnAsikAyAstaruNAsthani mRdvasthani vighaTTite kSuNNe satyanilaH kruddho yadi kenaciddhetunA ruddho bhavati tadA sa ruddhaH san bahiH pratinivRttyAntaH CrRGgATakAkhyaM nAsAsroto vrajanneva nivRttaH sannatyarthaM kSavathuH kurute| sa rogo nAmnA bhRCakSavaH| upayogaCabdastIkSNena sambadhyate| AdiCabda evaJjAtIyagrahaNArthaH||10||

 samUlaM dantamACritya doSairulbaNamArutaiH||23||  CoSite majjJi suSire dante~annamalapUrite||23||  pUtitvAtkRmayaH sUkSmA jAyante jAyate tataH||23||  ahetutIvrArttiCamaH sasaMrambho sitaCcalaH||23||  pralUnaH pUyaraktasrutsa coktaH kRmidantakaH||23||

ulbaNamArutairmArutAdhikaistribhirdoSaiH samUlaM mUlasaMhitaM dantamACritya tanmajjani CoSite ata eva cAntardante suSire~annamalapUrite sati tena malena pUtitvAt sUkSmAH kRmayo jAyante| tataCcAhetvakAraNameva tIvrArttirjAyate| akAraNameva tasyAH CamaCca| sasaMrambha ityAdi prakaraNAd dantaH| pralUn uddhUtaH| chinna ityarthaH| saH rogaH kRmidantAkhya uktaH| iti dante daCa rogAH||23||

 CleSmaraktena pUtIni vahantyasramahetukam||24||  CIryante dantamAMsAni mRduklinnAsitAni ca||24||  CitAdo~asau..................................||24||

CleSmaraktena hetunA pUtIni durgandhinI dantamAMsAnyahetukamevAsraM vahanti| mRdvAdiguNayuktAni ca bhavanti Ciryante cAsau rogaH CItAdaH||24||

 .............upakuCaH pAkaH pittAsRgudbhavaH||25||  dantamAMsAni dahyante raktAnyutsedhavantyataH||25||  kaNDUmanti sravantyasramAdhmAyante~asRji sthite||25||  calA mandarujo dantAH pUtivaktraM ca jAyate||25||

pittAsRgudbhavo yo dantamAMsAnAM pAkaH sa nAmnopakuCaH| tatra dantamAMsAnAM dAho raktatvagutsedhaCca bhavati| ataCcotsedhAt dantamAMsAni kaNDUmantyasraM ca sravanti| asRji rakte sthite ruddhe AdhmAyante paripUryante daCanACca calA mandarujaCca bhavanti vaktraM ca pUti jAyate||25||

 dantayostriSu vA Copho badarAsthinibho ghanaH||26||  kaphAsrAttIvrarukCIghraM pacyate dantapuppuTaH||26||

dantayoriti dvayostriSu vA danteSu mUloSviti prakaraNAt| kaphAsrAddhetorbadarAsthinibho ghanastIvraruk ca Copho bhavati| sa ca CIghraM pacyate| sa nAmnA dantapuppuTaH||26||

 dantamAMse malaiH sAsrairbAhyantaH CvayathurguruH||27||  sarugdAhaH sravedbhinnaH pUyAsraM dantavidradhiH||27||

sAsraiH saraktairvAtAdibhistribhirdoSairdantamAMse antarbahiCca guruH sarugdAhaCca Cvayathurbhavati| sa ca bhinnaH pUyAsraM sravet| sa rogo nAmnA dantAvidradhiH||27||

 CvayathurdantamUleSu rujAvAn raktapittajaH||28||  lAlAsrAvI sa suSiro dantamAMsapraCAtanaH||28||

 sa sannipAtajvaravAn sapUyarudhirasrutiH||29||  mahAsuSira ityukto viCIrNadvijabandhanaH||29||

mukharogavijJAnIyaH

 ghRSTeSu dantamAMseSu saMrambho jAyate mahAn||31||  yasmiMCcalanti dantACca sa vidarbho~abhighAtajaH||31||

sa vidarbho nAmAbhighAtajo rogo bhavati| yo yena kenacit ghRSTeSu dantamAMseSu mahAn saMrambho jAyate| yasmin dantACcAcalACcalanti||31||

 dantamAMsACritAn rogAn yaH sAdhyAnapyupekSate||33||  antastasyAsravan doSaH sUkSmAM saJjanayedgatim||33||  pUyaM muhuH sA sravati tvaGmAMsAsthiprabhedinI||33||  tAH punaH paJca vijJeyA lakSaNaiH svairyathoditaiH||33||

yaH puruSaH sAdhyAnapi dantamAMsACritAn rogAnupekSate tasyAntarasravan gRhNan doSAH sUkSmAM gatiM nADIM saJjanayet| sA ca nADI tvagAdibhedinI muhuH pUyaM sravati| (yaH puruSaH sAdhyAn sAdhayitavyAn CItAdAdInupekSate na sAdhayati api CabdAnna kevalamanyarogopekSayA doSadibhiH svayamapi jAyata iti sUcitam| tasyAntaHsthito doSaH asravan srotorodhAdanirgacchan| doSaCabdena pUyaM gRhyate)|

	 tAH punarnADyaH paJca vijJeyAH| kathamityAha-svairnADIvijJAnanirdiSTaiH pRthagdoSasannipAtaCalyabhedena vAtAt sarugityAdibhirlakSaNairyathoditaiH| evaM dantamUle trayodaCa rogAH||33||

 CAkapatrakharA srastA sphuTitA vAtadUSitA||34||  jihvA pittAtsadAhoSA raktairmAsAGkuraiCcitA||34||  CAlmalIkaNTakAbhaistu kaphena bahalA guruH||34||

vAtadUSitA jihvA CAkatarupatravat kharA srastA ca nibandhanAt bhavati sphuTitA ca| pittAddhetordAhAdiyuktA jihvA bhavati| kaphena hetunA dUSitA jihvA tu CAlmalIkaNTakAbhairmAMsAGkuraiCcitA vyAptA bahalA guruCca bhavati||34||

 kaphapittAdadhaH Copho jihvAstambhakRdunnataH||35||  matsyagandhirbhavet pakvaH so~alaso mAMsaCAtanaH||35||

jihvAyA adhobhAge kaphapittAcchopho jihvAstambhakRdunnataCca bhavati sa ca pakvaH san matsyagandhirbhavenmAMsaCAtanaCca| sa rogaM nAmnA~alasaH||35||

 prabandhane~adho jihvAyAH Copho jihvAgrasannibhaH||36||  sAGkuraH kaphapittAsrairlAloSAstambhavAn kharaH||36||  adhijihvAH sarukkaNDUrvAkyAhAravighAtakRt||36||

jihvAyA adhobhAge prabandhane mUle jihvAgrasannibhaH sAGkuraCca saH CophaH kaphAdibhirlAlAdiyuktaH kharaH kharasparCo rugAdikRcca bhavati sa rogo nAmnA adhijihvaH| vighAtaCabdaH vAkyAhArAbhyAM sambadhyate||36||

 tAdRgevopajihvAstu jihvAyA upari sthitaH||37||

tAdRgevaivaMlakSaNa eva jihvAyA upai sthitaH Copha upajihvAkhyo rogaH| iti jihvAyAM SaT||37||

 tAlumAMse~alinAd duSTe piTakAH sarujAH kharAH||38||  bahvyo ghanAsrAvayutAstAstAlupiTakAH smRtAH||38||

anilAttAlumAMse duSTe sarujatvAdiguNA yAH piTakA bhavanti tA nAmnA tAlupiTakAH smRtAH||38||

 tAlamUle kaphAtsAsrAnmatsyabastinibho mRduH||38||  pralambaH picchilaH Copho nAsayAhAramIrayan||38||  kaNThoparodhatRTkAsavamikRd galaCuNDikA||38||

sAsrAt kaphAttAlumUle yaH Copho bhavati| kimbhUta ityAha-matsyabastinibhatvAdisvarUpaH| matsyabastiH CiklamatsyeSu madhye dRCyate| sa Copho bhujyamAnamAhAraM nAsarayen prerayan kaNThoparodhAdikRd bhavati| sa rogo nAmnA galaCuNDikA||38||

 tAlumadhye niruGmAMsaM saMhataM tAlusaMhatiH||39||

tAlumadhye rujayA vinA yanmAMsaM saMhataM bhavati sa rogastAlusaMhatirnAmnA| saMhatamekatra puJjIbhUtam||39||

 padmAkRtistAlumadhye raktAcchvayathurarbudam||40||

raktAddhetostAlumadhye yaH padmAkRtiH CvayathuH sa nAmnA~arbudaM bhavati||40||

uttarasthAnam

mukharogavijJAnIyaH

 kacchapaH kacchapAkAraCciravRddhiH kaphAdaruk||41||

tatraiva tAlumadhye kaphAddhetoCciravRddhI rujArahitaCca yaH kacchapAkAraH CvayathuH sa nAmnA kacchapaH||41||

 kolAphaH SleSmamedophyAM puppuTo nIrujaH sthiraH||42||

tatraiva SleSmamedobhyAM bhadarasadRSaH sthiro nIrujaSca yaH SvayathuH sa nAmnA puppuTaH|| 42||

 pittena pAkaH pAkAKyaH pUyAsrAvI mahArujaH||43||

pittena tAlumadhye pUyAsrAvI mahArujaSca yaH pAkaH sa rogo nAmnA pAkaH|| 43||

 vAtapittajvarAyAsaistAluSoSastadAhvayaH||44||

vAtapittAdibhistAluni SoSo bhavati sa rogastadAhvayastAluSoSanAmetyarthaH| ityaSTau tAlurogAH|| 44||

 jihvAprabandhajAH kaNThe dAruNA mArgarodhinaH||45||  mAMsAGkurAH SIGracayA rohiNI SIGrakAriNI||45||  kaNThAsyaSoSakRdvAtAtsA hanuHSrotrarukkarI||45||  pittAjjvaroSAtRNmohakaNThadhUmAyanAnvitA||45||  kSiprajA kSiprapAkAtirAgiNI sparSanAsahA||45||  kaphena phicCilA phANDurasRjA sphoTakAcitA||45||  taptAGgAraniphA karNarukkarI pittajAkRtiH||45||  gamphIrapAkA nicayAt sarvaliGgasamanvitA||45||

kaNThe kaNThasyAntarbhAge jihvAprabhandhane jihvAmUle jAtA ye dAruNAdiguNA mAMsAGkurAste rohiNI nAma roge bhavati| sA ca SIGrakAriNI SIGrameva svaM karma mAraNAKyaM karoti|

	 kaNThetyAdi rukparyantaM vAtajarohiNIlakSaNam| jvarAdikaM sparSanAsahAntaM pittarohiNyAH| kaPena rohiNI picCilA paicCilyayuktA pANDuH pANDUravarNA ca bhavati| asRjA doSaduSTena rohiNI sPoTakAcitatvAdiguNA pittajAkRtiH pittarohiNIsamAnalakSaNA ca| nicayAt sannipAtAdrohiNI gambhIrapAkA~avagADhapAkA sarvairvAtAdirohiNIliGgaiH samanvitA ca bhavati|| 45||

 doSaiH kapholbaNaiH SophaH kolavat grathitonnataH||46||  SUkakaNTakavat kaNThe SAlUko mArgarodhanaH||46||

kaPolbhaNaistribhirdoSairbhadaravat grathitaSconnataSca SUkavat kaNTakavacca srotorodhano yaH SvayathuH kaNThe bhavati sa nAmnA SAlUkaH|| 46||

 vRndo vRttonnato dAhajvarakRdgalapArCvagaH||47||

taireva doSairgalasya pArCvago vRttonnato dAhajvarakRcca yaH CvayathuH sa nAmnA vRndaH| ( anuktakAraNaviCeSatvAt pUrvoktaireva doSaiH kRto galapArCvagaH galamArgasya vAmadakSiNAnyatarapArCvagataH vRttaCconnataCca vRttonnataH| vRtto vartulaH| dAhaM jvaraM ca karotIti dAhajvarakRt dAhAdijvaraM karotIti vA ya evaMvidhaH CophaH sa vRndAkhyo rogaH )||47||

 hanusandhyACritaH kaNThe kArpasIphalasannibhaH||48||  picchalo mandarukCophaH kaThinastuNDikerikA||48||

taireva yaH CvayathuH kaNThe hanusandhimACritya jAtaH kArpAsIphalasadRCaH picchilatvAdiguNaCca bhavati sa nAmnA tuNDikerikA||48||

 bAhyAntaHCvayathurghoro galamArgArgalopamaH||49||  galaugho mUrddhagurutAtandrAlAlAjvarapradaH||49||

taireva yaH CvayathuH kaNThe bAhyAntaH bahirbhAge~antarbhAge ca ghoro bhayaGkaraH galasrotaso~argalopamo dvArabandhanasadRCo mUrdhagurutAdipradaCca sa nAmnA galaughaH|
 (taptAGgAranibhA taptAGgArasadRCI tApadvinAGgArasyAsambhavAdaGgAraCabdenaiva tApe siddhe punarapi taptAGgAranibhetyuktatvAdasya tAparAgAdyatiCayo dhvanyate)|| 49||

 valayaM nAtirukCophastadvadevAyatonnataH||50||

taireva doSaistadvadeva bAhyAntargalamArgArgalopamo nAtirugAyatonnataCca yaH CophaH sa valayamiti nAmnA bhavati||50||

uttarasthAnam

mukharogavijJAnIyaH

 mAMsakIlo gale doSaireko~anekothavAlparuk||51||  kRcchrochvAso~abhyavahRtiH pRthumUlo gilAyukaH||51||

doSairvAtAdibhirgale eko vA~aneko vA kRcchrochvAsaH kRcchrAbhyavahRtiCca yo mAMsAGkuro bhavati sa nAmnA gilAyukaH||51||

 bhUrimAMsAGkuravRtA tIvratRDjvaramUrddharuk||52||  CataghnI nicitA vartiH CataghnIvAtirukkarI||52||

taireva doSaiH kRtA bhUribhiH prabhUtairmAsAGkuraivRtA parivRtA tIvratRDAdiyuktA gale nicitA kaNThasrotasi samantAdvyAptA yA varttiratirukkarI bhavati sa rujAyA~akRtyA ca CataghnIsAdRCyAcchataghnI| CataghnyAkhyaCcAyudhaH kaNTakAcitA yaSTirbhavati||52||

 vyAptasarvagalaH CIghrajanmapAko mahArujaH||53||  pUtipUyanibhAsrAvI CvayathurgalavidradhiH||53||

vyAptasarvagalatvAdiyuktaH CvayathurnAmnA galavidradhiH| CIghraM janmapAkau yasya sa tathoktaH| vyAptasarvagalaH gale samantAdvyAptaH| atra sarvaCabdena galasya bAhyAbhyantaraparigrahaH| pUtipUyanibhaCabdena pakvo~apyanyavidradhivat pUyaM na sravati tattulyaM kaphameva sravatItyarthaH|| 53||

 jihvAvasAne kaNThAdAvapAkaM CvayathuM malAH||54||  janayanti sthiraM raktaM nIrujaM tad galArbudam||54||

malA vAtAdayo jihvAya avasAne kaNThasyAdau prArambhe vA pAkarahitaM sthiramacalaM lohitaM rujArahitaM ca yaM CvayathuM janayanti tad galArbudaM bhavati|

	(jihvAyA avasAne ante hRdaye jihvAvasAnamiti dhanvantariH| hRdayAt pacyamAnAnAmAdhmAnAdrukmasAravat| kaphaCoNitamAMsAnAM sAro jihvA prajAyate| atra kaNTharogaprasaGgAt jatrorupari jihvAvasAnamiti mantavyam )||54||

 pavanaCleSmamedobhirgalagaNDo bhaved bahiH||55||  varddhamAnaH sa kAlena muSkavallambate niruk||55||

pavanAdibhirbahistvagbhAge galagaNDAkhyo rogo bhavet| sa ca kAlena varddhamAno niruk san muSkavad vRSaNavallambate||55||

 kRSNAruNo vA todADhyaH sa vAtAtkRSNarAjimAn||56||  vRddhastAlugale CoSaM kuryAcca virasAsyatAm||56||  sthiraH savarNaH kaNDUmAn CItasparCo guruH kaphAt||56||  vRddhastAlugale lepaM kuryAcca madhurAsyatAm||56||  medasA CleSmavRddhAnivRddhyoH so~anuvidhIyate||56||  dehaM vRddhaCca kurute gale CabdaM svare~alpatAm||56||

tatra kRSNa ityAdinA pavanahetukasya galagaNDasya liGgam| CleSmajasya sthira ityAdi| medasA hetorgalagaNDe CleSmavat kaphagalagaNDavat liGgam| sa galagaNDo hAnivRddhyoCca dehamanuvidhIyate| yadaiva deho varddhate tadaiva galagaNDo~api varddhate| yadaiva deho~apacIyate tadaiva so~apItyarthaH| sa ca medojo gale gaNDo vRddho galaCabdAdikaM kurute|| 56||

 CleSmaruddhAnilagatiH CuSkakaNTho hatasvaraH||57||  tAmyan prasaktaM Cvasiti yena sa svarahA~anilAt||57||

yena rogeNa puruSaH CleSmaruddhAnilagatiH CuSkakaNThatvAdiyukto bhavati so~anilAjjayate sa nAmnA svarahA| (CleSmaNA ruddhA anilasya prANAkhyasya maruto gatirgamanaM yasya| CuSkamanArdraM kaNThaM yasya| hatasvaraH sannasvaraH tAmyan glapitendriyaH| prasaktaM kaphAvRtakaNThamArgatvAt prakarSeNa saktam| Cvasiti CvAsamuktiM karoti )| ityaSTAdaCa galarogAH||57||

 karoti vadanasyantarvraNAn sarvasaro~anilaH||58||  saJcAriNo~aruNAn rUkSAnoSThau tAmrau calatvacau||58||  jihvA CItAsahA gurvI sphuTitA kaNTakAcitA||58||  vivRNoti ca kRcchreNa mukhaM pAko mukhasya saH||58||

sarvasaro vyAptimAnanilo~antarvadanaM saJcAryAdiguNAn vraNAn karoti| saJcAriNo~aniyatasthAnAH tataCcoSThau tAmrau tAmravarNau malatvacaH ca bhavataH| jihvA CItAsatvAdiguNA| sa cA~a~aturaH kRcchreNa mukhaM vivRNoti sa rogo nAmnA mukhapAkaH||58||

 adhaH pratihato vAyurarCogulmakaphAdibhiH||59||  yAtyUrdhvaM vaktradaurgandhyaM kurvannUrdhvagudastu saH||59||

arCogulmAsibhirvAyuradhaHpratihato vaktradaurgandhyaM kurvan UrdhvaM yAti| sa rogo nAmnA UrdhvagudaH||59||

 mukhasya pittaje pAke dAhoSe tiktavaktratA||60||  kSArokSitakSatasamA vraNAstadvacca raktaje||60||

pittajamukhapAke dAhAdikaM liGgam| kSAreNokSitaM siktaM yat kSataM vraNastatsamA dAhavedanAdiguNA vraNaH| tadvadeva raktaje||60||

uttarasthAnam

mukharogapratiSedhaH

 athAta mukharogapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

uktakrameNaiva mukharogANAM cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 snigdhasvinnasya khaNDauSThasyauSThAntau vilikhya suCliSTau kSaumasUtreNa sIvyet||2||  CatadhautaghRtAbhyaktAM cAsmai kavalikAM vraNasyopari dadyAt||2||  praklinnaM ca vraNaM vraNacikitsayA sAdhayet||2||

tailanasyAntaM khaNDauSThasAdhanam| snigdhasvinnasya puMsaH khaNDauSThasyoSThAntau sadvaidyo vilikhya suCliSTau kRtvA sUtreNa sIvyet| subodham||2||

 jyotiSmatIlodhramadhukapaTolotpalakAkamAcICrAvaNIsArivAbhistailaM vipakvamabhyaJjanAcchodhanaropaNam||3||  tathA vAtaharamadhurauSadhasiddhaM tailaM nasyam||3||

jyotiSmatyAdibhirvipakvaM tailamabhyaGgAt khaNDauSThavraNasya CodhanaM ropaNaM ca| jyotiSmatI kaGguNikA| vAtaharairbhadradArvAdibhirmadhuravargeNa ca sUtroktena siddhaM tailaM nasyaM tathA CodhanaM ropaNaM ca||3||

 vAtaja oSThakope devadAruguggulusarjarasamadhUcchiSTasiddhena mahAsnehenAbhyaGgaH||4||  tenaiva samadhukacUrNena pratisAraNam||4||  tasabhyaktena picunA pracchadanam||4||  eraNDapallavaiH kSIrakvathitairnADIsvedaH||4||  khaNDauSThoktaM nAvanaM Ciro~abhyaGgaCca||4||

Ciro~abhyaGgaCcetyevamantaM vAtauSThakope| mahAsnehaH catuSTayam| tenaiveti devadArvAdisiddhamahAsnehena madhuyaSTIcUrNayuktena pratisAraNam| rasakriyA kalkaCcUrNaCceti trividhaM pratisAraNaM pUrvamuktam| picuH kArpAsaculukam||4||

 pittotthe~abhighAtaje ca jalaukobhirvisrAvaNam||5||  pattaGgayaSTIcchinnaruhAvipakvaM sarpirabhyaGgaH||5||  madhumadhUkalodhrasarjarasaiH pratisAraNam||5||  pittavidradhivacca cikitsA||5||

pittaja oSThakope tathA~abhighAtaje kSataje ca pittavidradhicikitsAntam| subodham||5||

 raktaje~apyacirotthite paittikavat pratikuryAt||6||

raktaje paittikavat raktauSThakopasyAsAdhyatvokteracirotthita iti viCeSaNam||6||

 kaphaje jalaukobhiH CAkAdipatrairvA raktaM visrAvya vyoSapAThAyavakSArasvarjikAkSAraiH sakSaudraiH pratisArayet||6||  kuSThatagaradantICyAmAbiDaharitAlaviDaGgairvA||6||  svedanasya dhUmakavalAMCca kaphaghnAnavacArayet||6||

kaphaghnasvedAdyupacAraNAntaM kaphauSThakope| tatra prathamaM jalaukobhiH CAkAkhyatarUpatreNa vA raktavisrAvaNam| tato vyoSAdibhiH sakSaudraiH pratisAraNamiti sambandhaH||6||

 medoje dantacchadaM svedayitvA vRddhipatreNa vipATya Cuddhamedasamagnimupacaret||7||  kaphajoktaiCca pratisAraNam||7||  jalArbudoktaM ropaNam||7||

ropaNAntaM medoSThkope| dantaCchada oSThaH| CuddhamedasaM samagninAmupacaret| kaphajoktairvyoSAdibhiH pratisAraNam| jalArbudoktaM haridrAdivipakvaM tailaM vraNaropaNam||7||

 jalArbudaM bhitvA viCodhya trikaTukaTukAtejovatIyavakSArasvarjikAsaindhavakAsIsacUrNaiH sakSaudraiH pratisArayet||8||  avagADhamativRddhaM vA kSAreNAgninA vA daheddharidrAlodhramadhukamAlatIhareNutagarairvipakvaM tailaM ropaNam||8||

jalArbudaM bhitvA RjvavagADhaJca CastraM nyasya viCodhya antarmalApanayanaprakSAlanAdinA sakSaudraistrikaTukAdibhiH pratisAraNaM kuryAt| avagADhaM kSAreNAtivRddhamagninA vA dahet| subodham| sannipAtamAMsauSThakopauSThArbudAnyasAdhyAnyuktAni| ityoSThrogAH||8||

 gaNDAlajImapakvAM CophavadvidagdhAmupanAhya pakvAM vidArya vraNavat sAdhayet||9||

vraNavat sAdhayedityantaM gaNDAlajyAm| iti gaNDarogaH|| 9||

 CItadantasyoSNAmbusvinnasya vrIhimukhena pAlIM likhitvA picutailena dahet||10||  pratisArayecca priyaGgujambvasthidADimatvaktriphalArasAJjanasaindhavaCuNThImustacUrNaiH samadhughRtaiH||10||  kSIrivRkSakaSAyo gaNDUSaH||10||  aNutailaM nasyam||10||

aNutailanasyAntaM CItAkhye dantaroge| CIto dAlana iti paryAyau| pratisArayecca| kenetyAha ----
priyaGgvAdInAM cUrNeH samadhughRtaiH||10||

 dantaharSe bhede ca vAtaharasiddhaM tailamelAkuSThapATalItvagvipakvo majjA vA gaNDUSaH||11||  snigdhACca nasyAdayaH||11||

CravaNabalakaramityevamantaM dantacAle| daCamUlakvAthena vA tailAdibhirvA kavalagrahaH| pippalyAdibhiH pratisAraNam| atra cAla Aturo niyataM sadA snaihikAkhyadhUmapAyI syAt| snigdhamadhurAhAro visrAvaNaparaCca| visrAvaNaM virecanam| candanAdinA tailaM nasyagaNDUSayoriti|| 12||

 adhidantakaM kSAreNAlipya jarjaraM vijJAya kRmidantakavidhinotpATya tadvadevopacaret||13||  anavasthitaCoNitaJca dagdhvA vraNavadupakrameta||13||

vraNavadupakrametetyevamantamadhidante| jarjaraM tyaktasthairyam| kRmidantasyotpATanavidhinopacaraNaM cAtraiva vakSyate| anavasthitaCoNitamanavaruddhaCoNitam||13||

 dantaCarkarAM dantamUlAnyapIDayan dantalekhanena vilikhya kSAratailenAvasecayet||14||  mUSAkUrpapATalItvakcUrNena pratisAraNam||14||  sadA ca dantadhAvanAdIn seveta||14||  dantaharSoktaM ca kuryAt||14||

dantaharSoktaM ca kuryAdityevamantaM dantaCarkarAyAm| dantamUlAnyapIDayan rakSan| dantalekhanaM nAma CastraM Castravidhyuktam| kSAratailaM kSArapakvaM tailam| mUSA suvarNAdyAvarttanI| kUrpaM prastaracUrNam| dantaharSotaM vAtaharasiddhamityAdikam||14||

 kapAlikAyAmetadeva viCeSataH CIlayet||15||

 kRmidantake suSiraM guDena madhUcchiSTena sarpiSA vA pUrayitvA taptayA kubjaCalAkayA dahet||16||  saptacchadArkakSIraM vA pUraNam||16||  sarSapakaraJjatailam||16||

CItopacAraCca sutarAmityevamantaM kRmidantAkhye| suSiramantaHCUnyaM kRmidantasthaM guDAdyanyatamena pUrayitvA kubjayA CalAkayA dahet| saptacchadakSIrAdyanyatamapUraNaM rujamapaharatItyurrareNa sambadhyate||16||

 hiGguviDaGgasvarjikAkaTphalakAsIsakuSThacUrNastAntavabaddho dantasyopari tiSThan rujamapaharati||17||  kunduruSkacUrNo vA||17||  ebhireva ca siddhaM tailaM gaNDUSaH||17||  dRDhagUDhamUlamAMse saruje visrAvaNam||17||  bhagnasphuTitavivarNasuptacalasya sarujasya ca||17||
