 dantanADImeSayitvA saMvRtAM CastreNa vivRtayitvA tadACritaM dantamaCeSamuddhRtya CalAkayA dahet||30||  kubjAmavagADhAmanekagatiM vA guDamadhusikthAnyatamapUrNAm||30||  tataH kSIrivRkSakaSAyeNa gaNDUSaM dhArayet||30||  tatsiddhena vA tailena||30||  dantIkhadirasAramadanasvAdukaNTakakvAthe lodhravAlakoCIradevadArumaJjiSThAmadhukalkavipakvaM tailaM sarSapatailaM vA nADICodhanaropaNam||31||  prapauNDarIkaharidrAdvayamadhukamadhUcchiSTalodhrakaTukICarkarApadmakacandanamUrvopodakAvAstukataNDulIyakamaJjiSThAmlIkAkapitthapatrairvA||32||  nasyaM ca viDaGgamadhukamustanirguNDIkhadiramaJjiSThoCIrasuratarusiddhaM tailam||33||  dhUmAsRksrAvaNanAvanAni CIlayet||33||  nADIsAdhanaM cekSeta||33||

nADIsAdhanaM cekSetetyantaM dantanADyAm| saMvRtAM dantanADImeSiNyA eSayitvA~anantaraM CastreNa vivRtAM kRtvA tadACritaM dantaM sandaMCakadantanirghAtayoranyatareNACeSamuddhRtyA~agnitaptayA CalAkayA dahet| kubjAM vakrAmavagADhAmantaratipraviSTAmanekagatiM vA nADIM guDAdyanyatamapUrNAM kRtvA dahet| anantaraM kSIrivRkSANAM vaTACvatthaplakSasadAphalAnAM kaSAyeNa tatsiddhena tailena vA gaNDUSaM dhArayet|

	 dantyAdibhiH sAdhitaM tailaM nADICodhanaM ropaNaM ca| athavA kevalaM sarSaSatailam|

	 prapauNDarIkAdibhirvA siddhaM tailaM pUrvaguNam| patraCabdasyopodakAdibhiH sambandhaH|

	 viDaGgAdibhiH siddhaM tailaM nasyam| dhUmAdIni ca CIlayet| nIDIvraNacikitsitaM cekSeta taduktopakramavidhAnAya| mahAsuCiro nicayAnnADI cAsAdhye| iti dantamUlarogAH|| 30-33||

 vAtajeSu jihvAkaNTakeSu vAtauSThakopokto vidhiH||34||  pittajeSu vighRSTasrutarudhireSu svAdubhirdravyairavagharSaNagaNDUSanAvanAni kuryAt||34||  tadvat kaphajeSu tIkSNaiH||34||

vAtajeSu jihvAkaNTakeSu vAtauSThakope yo vidhirmahAsnehAbhyaGgapratisAraNAdiruktassa kAryaH| pittajeSu vigharSaNena duSTaraktavisrAvaNaM tataCca svAdubhirdravyairavagharSaNAdIni kuryAditi| tadvat kaphajeSu| tIkSNairityanenaitaduktaM kaphajeSu jihvAkaNTakeSvavagharSaNena srutaduSTarudhireSu tIkSNairdravyairavagharSaNAdIni kuryAditi||34||

 jihvAlase navotthite tIkSNAH pratisAraNAdayaH||35||  na cAtra CastramavacArayet||35||  sirAM tu vidhyet||35||

sirAM tu vidhyedityevamantamalase| tasya cAsAdhyatvokternava iti viCeSaNam||35||

 adhijihvAmunnamya baDiCena gRhItvA maNDalAgreNa chindyAt||36||  tIkSNACca nasyAdayaH||36||  upajihvAM CAkapatreNAGguliCastreNa vA visrAvya yavakSAreNa pratisArayet||36||

adhijihvAyAmupajihvAyAM ca chedanavisrAvaNAdi| subodham| iti jihvArogAH||36||

 galaCuNDikA kaphaghnairupAcaret||37||  vRddhAyAM tUrvArubIjanibhamasirAtatamagramuparijihvayA niviSTaM baDiCena mucuTyA vA vastraveSTitAbhyAM vAmAGguSThapradeCinIbhyAM gRhItvA maNDalAgreNa nAtyagre nAtimUle chindyAt||37||  agracchedAdanupaCamaH Copho lAlAdivRddhirvA||37||  aticchedAcchoNitakSayeNa maraNam||37||  samyak cchinnAyAM pUrvavat pratisAraNAdayaH||37||

galaCuNDikA kaphaghnaiH kaphaharairdravyairupAcaret cikitset| vRddhAyAmiti galaCuNDikAyAM urvAroH karkaTikAyAH bIjena sadRCaM sirArahitaM pradeCaM baDiCAdinA grAhyam| nAtyagre~atimUle ca chindyAdityatra hetumAha-agra ityAdi|

	 pUrvavaditi tIkSNairupajihvAt||37||

 tAlusaGghAte puppuTe kacchape ca nave vidhirayam||38||  CastrakarmaNi tu viCeSaH||38||  atra hi vilekhanam||38||

tAlusaGghAte tathA puppuTe tathA nave kacchape cAyameva galaCuNDikokto vidhiH| atra tAlusaGghAtAdike CastrakarmaNyeva viCeSaH| atra hi traye CastreNa vilekhanaM galaCuNDikAyAM tu chedanamiti||38||

 tAlupAke tvapakvasya CvayathoH kAsIsarasAJjanakSaudraH pratisAraNam||39||  madhurakaSAyaiH CItairgaNDUSaH||39||  pakvasya maNDalAgreNASTApadavat bhedanam||39||  tIkSNairavagharSaNam||39||  paTolAriSTajAtIkaravIraguDUcIvRSakaTukAharidrAdvayavetrAgrakaNTakArikAkvAthaH kavalo madhu tailaM ca||39||

tAlupAke tu apakvasya pAkAvasthAmaprAptasya CvayathoH Cophasya kAsIsAdibhiH pratisAraNaM kuryAt| rasAJjanaM tArkSayam| CItaiH sparCato vIryataCca madhurAdibhirauSadhairgaNDUSo dhAryaH| aSTApadavaditi aSTApadaM caturaGgapITham| tat koSThAkRtichedanamaSTApadavat bhedanam| tIkSNairmaricAdibhiravagharSaNam| paTolAdikvAthe madhutailaM ca kavalaH||39||

 tAluCoSe madhukapippalInAgarasiddhaM sarpiruttarabhaktikaM satRSNaH pibet||40||  amlaiCcAsya gaNDUSaH||40||  payasyA madhukamadhUlikAvipakvaM kSIrasarpirnasyam||40||  snigdho dhUmaH||40||  tRSNAghnamannapAnam||40||

tAluCoSe satRSNastRSNAsahito madhukAdisiddhaM sarpirghRtamuttarabhaktikaM pibet| uttaraM bhaktaM yasya taduttarabhaktikaM bhaktAtpUrvamityarthaH| asya tAluCoSavato~amlairamladravyairgaNDUSaH payasyAdisiddhaM kSIrAd gRhItaM sarpirnasyaM snigdhadhUmAdi ca hitam| iti tAlurogAH|| 40||

 kaNTharogeSu tu jvarAdyanupadruteSu kaTutIkSNairnasyAvagharSaNagaNDUSAdayaH sirAvyadho rasAJjanendrayavadArvInimbakvAthaM pAnam||41||  vyoSayavakSAradArvIrasAJjanatejovatIpAThAnimbatvaktriphalAcitrakaiH CuktagomUtrakvathitaiH kavalo guTikA vA pratisAraNam||41||  tAlIsapatragRhadhUmapaJcakolakailamaricapalACamuSkakakSArayavakSArairyavakvAthena guTikAH kRtAH sarvakaNTharogeSvamRtopamAH||41||

kaNTharogeSu jvarAdyupadravarahiteSu kaTutIkSNairauSadhairnasyAdayaH| sirAvyadhenAsRGmokSaH| rasAJjanAdikvAthaH pAnam| rasAJjanaM tArkSyam| indrayavaH kaliGgaH| CuktagomUtrasAdhitairvyoSAdibhiH kavalaH pratisAraNaM vA| tAlIsAdibhiryavakSArAntairyavakvAthena kRtA guTikAH sarvakaNTharogeSvamRtopamAH| iti sAdhAraNacikitsA||41||

 atha vAtarohiNIkAmAntarbahiH svinnAmaGguliCastrakeNa madhulavaNagarbheNa vA nakhena visrAvya tIkSNaiH pratisArayet||42||  mahApaJcamUlakvatho ganDuSaH||42||  elApunarnavasiMhIkapitthakalkapayovipakvaM tailaM gaNDUSo nAvanaM ca||42||

atheti maGgale duSkarapratikriyatvAnmaGgalapUrvakaM vAtarohiNikAmupakramet| antarabhyantare bahirbahirbhAge ca svinnAmaGguliCastreNa madhvAdigarbheNa nakhena vA vistrAvya tIkSNairmaricaCuNThyAdibhi pratisArayet| mahApaJcamUlaM bilvAdi tatkvAtho gaNDUSaH| elAdikalkena payasA ca vipakvaM tailaM gaNDUSo nAvanaM ca||42||

uttarasthAnam

mukharogapratiSedhaH

 pittajAmapyevaM visrAvya pataGgaCarkarAlodhrapriyaGgubhiH pratisArayet||43||  eSAmeva kaSAyo gaNDUSaH||43||  drAkSAparUSakoCIramadhukacandanakvAtho vA||43||  triphalAtilvakaCyAmACrIparNItvaGmadhuyaSTikAbhirdaCaguNe payasi siddhaM sarpirnasyakavalabhojaneSu||43||

pittajAM rohiNImapyevamaGgulisastreNa nakhena vA visrAvya pataGgAdibhiH pratisArayet| eSAM pataGgAdInAmeva vA kvAthe drAkSAdikvAtho vA gaNDUSaH| triphalAdibhirghRtAddaCaguNe kSIre siddhaM sarpirnasyAdiSu hitam|| 43||

 raktajAmapyevaM pratyAkhyAyopakramet||44||

raktajA~asAdhyoktA tAM pratyAkhyAya na setsyatIti pratyAkhyAya cikitsedeva na tUpekSeta| evamiti pittarohiNIcikitsayA||44||

 ClaiSmikIM svedayitvA vilikhya kaTukavargeNAgAradhUmatriphalAsaindhavayuktena pratisArayet||45||  tadvidhACca gaNDUSAH||45||  nimbajAtyapAmArgaviDaGgavipakvaM tailaM nasyam||45||

ClaiSmikIM svedayitvA vilikhya cAgAradhUmAdiyuktena kaTukavargeNa pratisArayet| agAradhUmaM dhUmamalam| kaTukavargaH sUtroktaH| tadvidhA agAradhUmAdiyuktakaTukavargakRtAH| nimbAdisiddhaM tailaM nasyam||45||

 CAlUkavRndatuNDikerIgilAyuSveSa eva vidhiH||46||

CAlUkAdicatuSTayeSvapi eSa eva kapharohiNyukto vidhiH||46||

 galavidradhau visrAvitAyAM lodhravarArasAJjanapataGgagairikarocanApippalIsaindhavacUrNairavagharSaNam||47||  ebhireva kvathitairgaNDUSaH||47||  kirAtatiktalodhradArvICatapuSpAnimbapatrakuSThailAguDUcIcitrakatagaramustAkvAthakalkavipakvaM tailaM nAvanam||47||

tailaM nAvanamityevamantaM galavidradhau| visrAvitAyAM CastreNa viCodhitAyAM satyAM lodhrAdicUrNairavagharSaNam| ebhireva lodhrAdibhirjale kvathitairgaNDUSaCca hitaH| varA CreSThA| rasAJjanaM tArkSyam| kirAtatiktakAdikvAthakalkapakvaM tailaM nAvanam
||47||

 galagaNDamanilajaM svedayitvA visrAvayet rUDhavraNaJca tilapriyAlalaTvAmUlakaCaNAtasIbIjairupanAhayet||48||  tilvakAgnimanthapunarnavakAlAmRtAsau bhAJjanakagajapippalyekaiSikArkamUlakaraghATakapuSpaiH surAmlapiSTaiH punaH punarlepayet||48||  nimbaguDUcIkuTajahaMsapAdIkRSNAvalAdvayadevadArusiddhaM ca tailaM pAyayet||48||

tailaM pAyayedityevamantamanilaje galagaNDe| vAtajaM galagaNDaM tApAdyanyatamasvedena svedayitvA jalUkAdyanyatamena raktaM visrAvayet| rUDhavraNaM cAnubandhaparihArArthaM tilAdibhirupanAhayet| laTvA lambA, atasI  umA, upanAhaH piNDabandhaH| surAmlapiSTaustilvakAdibhiH punaH punarlepayet| agnimanthastarkArI, kAlA nIlinI, (ni) `nIlinyuktA nIlikA nIlapatrI nIlA nIlI nIlayaSTI viSaghnI| caNDAlyAnyArAjanI bhAravAhI kAlA kAlI cAspRCA CodhanI ca|' saubhAJjanakaH CigruH| ekaiSIkA mahAdUrvA trivRddhA| karaghATo madanaH| (ni) madanaM rADhaH piNDI karaghATaH CalyakaH phalaM jagaduH| nimbAdisiddhaM tailaM pAyayecca| haMsapAdI tripAdI||48||

 ClaiSmike~apyayameva vidhiH tIkSNatarACca svedapralepAdayaH||49||  viCalyAtiviSAviSANikACukanAsAjagandhAguJjAphalakaTukAlAbubhiH palACakSArAmbupiSTaiH sukhoSNo lepaH||49||  vatsakAdinA paJcalavaNayuktena siddhaM tailaM pAnam||49||  tIkSNAMCca vamanAdIna CIlayet||49||  paryAyataCca svedaM CoNitAvasecanaM ca||49||  tathAnupaCame pAcayitvA vraNAvadubhAvapyupAcaret||49||  yavAnnamudgAdiyUhAMCa vyoSotkaTAn pAnabhojanayorvidadhyAt||49||

kaphaje galagaNDe~apyayameva vAtagalagaNDokto vidhiH kartavyaH| vAtaje svedAdayo~alpA atra tvadhikAH| palACakSArAmbupiSTA viCalyAdyA lepaH| viCalyA lAGgalIviSANikA RSabhakaH, CukanAsA CukAkhyA, kaTukAlAbustumbI, paJcalavaNayuktena vatsakAdinA pakvaM tailaM pibet| tIkSNAn kaphaghnAnityarthaH| tathAnupaCame evamapyaCAntau| ubhAvapIti vAtajaM kaphajaM ca| yavAnnAdIMCca vyoSotkaTAn pAne bhojane ca dadyAt||49||

 medoje svinnasya sirAM vidhyet||50||  pUrvoktAH pralepAH prAtaH prAtaCcAsanAdisArarajo gomUtreNa pibet||50||  evamapyaCAntau CastreNa vidArya medo viCodhya sIvyet||50||  dAhayogyaM vA vasAghRtakSaudrAnyatamena yathAvaddahet||50||  rocanAkAsIsatutthakacUrNAvacUrNitaM tailaM vraNaCodhanaropaNam||50||  asanAdisAragopurISabhasmayuktaM vA||50||

gopurISabhasmayuktaM vetyantaM medoje| medobhave galagaNDe sveditasya sUtroditAmUrugAM sirAM vidhyet| pUrvoktAH pralepA vAtaje kaphaje ca galagaNDe uktAH| asanAdigaNacUrNaM prAtaH prAtargomUtreNa pibet| evamapyaCAntau tathAnupaCame dAhayogyaM vasAdyanyatamena yathAvidvidhivaddahet| rocanAdicUrNAvacUrNitaM tailaM vraNaCodhanaM ropaNaM ca bhavati| asanAdisArAdiyuktaM tailaM vA
||50||

 mukhapAkeSu sAmAnyatastriphalAkvAtho madhumAnanye ca||51||  tiktakaTukakaSAyA mukhadhAvanAH||51||  mRdvIkApAThAjAtImAtuluGgArjunaputrajIvakapallavAnAmanabhyavaharatA cavarNam||51||

mukhapAkeSu sAdhAraNaM cikitsitamAha| mukhapAkeSu sakSaudrA mukhadhAvanAH prayojyAH| ke ta ityAha-triphalAkvAthaCcAnye tiktakaTukakaSAyACca| athavA mRdvIkAdijIvakapallavAntAnAM carvaNam, teSAM nigiraNaM na kartavyam| pallavobhinavotpannaM patram||51||

 dAruharidrArdhatulAM viMCatiguNe~ambhasi CrapayitvA taM kvAthaM sagairikamAdarvIpralepAt sAdhitaM kSaudrayuktaM ghRtabhAjane nidadhyAt||52||  etanniSThIvanaM sarvamukhAmayanADIghnam||52||  ayameva ca pRthakkalpo yaSTImadhukapaTolinimbATarUSakajAtIlodhrArimedatriphalAjambUkhadiratvacAm||52||

dAruharidrAyA ardhatulAM paJcACat palAni tebhyo viMCatiguNamambhaHpalasahasraM tasmin kvAthayitvA taM kvAthaM gairikasahitamAdarvIpralepAt darvIpralepaM yAvat sAdhitaM pakvaM madhunA yuktaM ghRtaliptabhAjane sthApayet| subodham| yaSTImadhukAdInAmayameva dAruharidrAvihita eva pRthak kalpaH kAryaH||52||

uttarasthAnam

mukharogapratiSedhaH

 yavakSArabhAgAH sapta suvarNagairikAd bhAgadvayaM mUrvAkaTukAtiviSA~a~amalakAnAmeko bhAgastat sarvaM kutalakSArodakapiSTaM guTikAH kRtvA khAdenniSThIvecca||53||

yavakSArasya bhAgA aMCAH sapta| suvarNagairikAt gairikaviCeSAt bhAgadvayaM mUrvAdInAM pratyekameko bhAgastat sarvaM kutalakSArodakapiSTaM kRtvA guTikAH kAryAstAH khAdenniSThIvecca| tAH pUrvaguNAH| kutakastilakANDaH dagdhasya tasya kSAraH||53||

 khadirasAratulAmarimedatulAdvayaM ca toyavahe~aSTabhAgAvaCeSaM kvAthayedavatAritaM parisrutaM ca punarAghanIbhAvAt||54||  ghanIbhUteCIte ca kArSikANi ClakSNIkRtAni prakSipeccandanapadmakoCIravAlakamaJjiSThAdhAtakImustaprapauNDarIkamadhukatriphalAcAturjAtakalAkSAnaladatArkSyaCailalodhradvirajanIsamaGgApAThAkaTphalaileyapattaGgAgarugairikAJjanAni||54||  pAlikAMCca jAtIphalalavaGgakaGkolakabukAn||54||  karppUrArddhakuDavaM ca||54||  tA guTikA vadanasthAH sarvAn mukharogAn jayanti||54||  saurabhaM saumanasyaM ruciM ca janayanti||54||

khadiretyAdi| khadirasya tulA palaCatamarimedaso~ahimArasya tulAdvayaM dve palaCate ca toyavahe~apAM ghaTacatuSTake| ghaTodvAdaCAdhikAni paJcapalaCatAni| aSTabhAgavaCeSamaSTAMCAvaCeSaM kvAthayet| avataritaM cullItaparisrutaM gAlitaJca taM punarAghanIbhAvAt ghanIbhAvAvadhi kvAthayet|  ghanIbhUte CIte ca sati kArSikANi karSapramANaani ClakSNacUrNIkRtAni candanAdInyauSadhAni prakSipet| pAlikAn palapramANAn jAtIphalAdIn karpUrasyArddhakuDavaM dve pale ca| tato guTikAH kuryAt| vadanasthAstAH sakalAn mukharogAn jayanti saurabhAdIMCca janayanti||54||

 eSAmeva ca kalakakaSAyaistailaM sAdhitaM kavale niyuJjyAt||55||

eSAmeva khadirasArAdInAM kalkaiH kaSAyeNa ca sAdhitaM pakvaM tailaM kavale kavaladhAraNe niyuJjyAdyojayet||55||

 tatra vAtaje mukhapAke daCamUlakAkolIrAsnAmadhukasArivAkvAthena kuSThakalkena ca siddhaM tailaM nasyaM gaNDUSaCca||56||  snaihiko dhUmaH||56||  pippalyelAlavaNottamaiH pratisArayet||56||

vAtAdijeSu mukhapAkeSu viCeSopakramamAha-tatretyAdi| vAtaje mukhapAke daCamUlAdikvAthena kuSThakalkena ca siddhaM pakvaM tailaM nasyaM hitaM gaNDUSaCca| snaihiko dhUmaH sUtroditaH| pippalyAdibhiH pratisAraNaM rasakriyAdibhedena vividham||56||

 paittike kSIrekSurasadrAkSACarkarodakairgaNDUSaH||57||  madhuradravyasiddhaM payaH pAnaM kavalo nasyaM ca||57||  padmakasamaGgAmaJjiSThAlodhradhAtakIvipakvaH sarpirmaNDo nAvanam||57||  madayanti kApatrairniSThIvanaM ca||57||

pittaje mUkhapAke kSIrAdibhirgaNDUSaH| asaJcAryA tu yA mAtrA sa gaNDUSa iti sUtroktalakSaNaH| madhuradravyANi madhuradravyaskandhanirdiSTAni ghRtamadhvAdIni taiH siddhaM kSIraM pAnAdiSu hitam| padmakAdisiddho ghRtamaNDo nAvanaM nasyam| subodham| madayantikA dhAtakI||57||

 kaphaje kaTukakSAralavaNaiH pratisAraNam||58||  sthirAsu tu piTakAsu prAkCAkAdipatreNa lekhanam||58||  muSkakapalACAmalakIkSAragomUtrairgaNDUSaH||58||  tadvipakvaM ca tailam||58||  nirguNDIphaNijjakArjakasurasapatrairniSThIvanam||58||  devadArupAThAtiviSAdantIndrayavakaTukAgomUtreNa kalkitAH kvathitA vA pItAH sarvakaphAmayAn nighnanti||58||

kaphaje mukhapAke kaTukAdibhiH pratisAraNam| sthirAsu piTakAsu tu lekhanAdikaM karma subodham| devadArvAdayo gomUtreNa pItAH sarvakaphAmayaghnAH||58||

 raktaje pittavat siddhiH||59||  sarvaje yathAdoSodayam||59||  rocanAkAsIsasaurASTrikArasAJjanAni mocaraso madhu caikato vipakvaM lohabhAjanasthaM kalkaM viCuSkaM cUrNIkRtaM madhunA vraNalepaM kuryAt||59||

raktaje mukhapAke pittamukhapAkavat siddhiH sAdhanam| sarvaje sannipAtaje mukhapAke yathAdoSodayamutkRSTadoSAnatikrameNa cikitsA| rasAJjanAdi caikato vipakvamekasmin pAtre kRtvA pakvaM lohapAtrasthAM kalkaM viCuhkaM kRtvA cUrNIkRtaM madhunA saha vraNe lepaM kuryAt| rocanA gorocanA||59||

 atha sarvasaramarbudamacirotthitamavRddhaM maNDalAgreNa chitvA muSkakabhasmanA madhumiCreNa pratisArayet svarjikACuNThIcUrNena vA||60||  madhu tailaM nimbaguDUcIkvAthaCca gaNDUSaH||60||  yavAnnabhojI tIkSNAni kavalAbhyaGganasyayAcaret||60||

athetyAdinA~arbudacikitsA| acirotthitamityasAdhyatvAdviCeSaNam| maNDalAgreNa CastreNa chitvA madhumiCreNa muSkakabhasmanA svarjikAdicUrNena vA pratisArayediti sambandhaH| madhvAdigaNDUSaH subodhaH| yavAnnaM bhuJjAnaH tIkSNAni kavalAdInyAcaret||60||

 pUtimukhaM snigdhasvinnaM vAmayitvA CirovirekairupAcaret||61||  tataH svarjikAhiGgugRhadhUmamanaCCilailACuNThIviDaGgatejovatIbhirguTikAH kRtvrA madhudrutA mukhapariCodhanArthaM dadyAt||61||  samaGgAdhAtakIpadmalodhrapriyaGgucUrNaiH salilamavacUrNitaM mukhadhAvanam||61||  CItAdopakuCoktaM ca kuryAt||61||  nasyadhUmakavalAMCca CIlayet||61||

CilayedityantaM pUtyAsyAkhye| pUtimukhaM pUrvaM snigdhaM paCcAt sivannamanantaraM vAmayitvA CirovirekairvirecananasyairupAcaredupakramet| tata iti Cirovirecanasya paCcAt svarjikAdibhirguTikAH kRtvA madhunA dravIkRtA mukhapariCodhanAya dadyAt| samaGgAdicUrNairavacUrNitaM salilaM mukhasya dhAvanaM kSAlanam| CItAdopakuCayoryatkiJciduktaM tadapi kuryAt||61||

 bhavati cAtra ----
	
	mukhadantamUlagalajAH prAyo rogAH kaphastrabhUyiSThAH||62||  tasmAtteSAmasakRdrudhiraM visrAvayed duSTam||62||

mukhAdijA rogAH prAyo bAhulyena yataH kaphAsrabhUyiSThAH bhavanti tasmAtteSAM mukhAdirogANAM duSTaM rudhiramasakRtsrAvayet
||62||

uttarasthAnam

CirorogavijJAnIyaH

 athAtaH CirorogavijJAnIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

UrdhvAGge Cirasi keCAnte ye rogAsteSAM hetvAdikaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 dhUmAtapatuSArAmbukrIDAtisvapanajAgaraiH||2||  utsvedAdhipurovAtabASpanigraharodanaiH||2||  atyambumadyapAnena kRmibhirvegadhAraNaiH||2||  upadhAnamRjAbhyaGgadveSAdhaH pratatekSaNaiH||2||  asAtmyagandhaduSTAmabhASyAdyaiCca CirogatAH||2||  janayantyAmayAn doSAH........................||2||

dhUmAtapetyAdi| CirorogANAM sAmAnyahetubhirdhUmAtapAdibhiH Cirasi gatA doSAH vAtAdayaH AmayAn janayantIti sambandhaH| tuSAro himam| ambukrIDA jalakrIDA| atiCabdaH svapnajAgarAbhyAM sambadhyate| utsveda UrdhvasvedaH| vAtaCabdaH adhipurobhyAM sambadhyate| adhivAto~adhikavAtaH| bASpanigraho~aCruvegavidhAraNam| rodanamatyarthenetyarthAt| atiCabdo~ambumadyAbhyAm| dveSaCabdaH upadhAnAdibhiH| upadhAnaM CiroviCramaNaM CayyAyAm| mRjA CuddhirubhayataH| adhaH pratataM santataM kRtvekSaNam| adigrahaNenAnyeSAM srotolepanavAtakSobhaNAdInAM grahaNam||2||

 .........................tatra mArutakopataH||3||  nistudyate bhRCaM CaGkhau ghATA sambhidyate tathA||3||  bhruvormadhyaM lalATaM ca patatIvAtivedanam||3||  bAdhyete svanataH Crotre niSkRSyeta ivAkSiNI||3||  ghUrNatIva CiraH sarvaM sandhibhya iva mucyate||3||  sphuratyati sirAjAlaM kandharAhanusaGgrahaH||3||  prakACAsahatA ghrANasrAvo~akasmAdvyathACramau||3||  mArdavaM mardanasnehasvedabandhaiCca jAyate||3||  CirastApo~ayam...............................||3||

tatretyAdinA rogaviCeSA ucyante| vAtaddhetoH Cirasi CaGghanistodAdikaM bhavati| CaGkho bhrUkarNamadhyam| nistodo vyathAnam| ghATA CaGkhasyopari| svanataH CabdAcchrotre bAdhyete| kandharAyA grIvAyA hanvoCca saGgrahaH stabdhatvam| akasmAdakAraNenaiva vyathA ca CamaCca| asya CaGkhanistodAdikasya mardanAdibhirmArdavaM jAyate| ayamevaMrUpo rogo nAmnA CirastApaH||3||

 ........ardhe tu mUrdhnaH so~ardhAvabhedakaH||4||  pakSAt kupyati mAsAdvA svayamevopaCAmyati||4||  ativRddhastu nayanaM CravaNaM vA vinACayet||4||

eSa evArdhe bhavannArdhAvabhedaka ucyate| ubhayarUpo~api ca svayameva CAmyati| pakSAdvA mAsAdvA punaH punaH kupyati| yadA tvativRddho bhavati tadA nayanaM vA CravaNaM vA vinACayet
||4||

 Ciro~abhitApe pittotthe CirodhUmAyanaM jvaraH||5||  svedo~akSidahanaM mUrcchA niCi CItaiCca mArdavam||5||

pittahetuke Ciro~abhitApAkhye roge CirodhUmAyanAdikaM liGgam| dhUmAyanaM dhUmasyevAnubhavaH| atra ca vyathAyA niCi mArdavaM CItaiCcAnyadapi||5||

 aruciH kaphaje mUrdhno gurustimitaCItatA||6||  sirA~aniSpandatAlasyaM ruDmandAhnyadhikA niCi||6||  tandrA CUnAkSikUTatvaM karNakaNDUyanaM vamiH||6||

arucyAdikaM kaphaje Ciro~abhitApe liGgam| mUrdhnaH Ciraso gurutA stimitatA CItatA ca| ahni mandA rugbhavati niCi cAdhikaM bhavati| akSikUTamakSiCiviram||6||

 raktAt pittAdhikarujaH...................||7||

raktAttu Ciro~abhitApaH pittaCiro~abhitApAdhikarujo bhavati||7||

 ...............sarvaiH syAt sarvalakSaNaH||8||

sarvaiH sannipAtena sarvalakSaNo vAtAdisarvalakSaNayuktaH CirastApaH syAt||8||

 saGkIrNairbhojanairmUrdhni kledite rudhirAmiSe||9||  kopite sannipAte ca jAyante mUrdhni jantavaH||9||  Cirasaste pibanto~asraM ghorAH kurvanti vedanAH||9||  cittavibhraMCajananIrjvaraH kAso balakSayaH||9||  raukSyaCophavyathacchedadAhasphuraNapUtitAH||9||  kapAle tAluCirasoH kaNDUH CophaH pramIlakaH||9||  tAmrAcchasiGghANakato karNanAdaCca jantuje||9||

saGkIrNairityAdi| jantuje kRmije Ciro~abhitApa iti vijJeyam| saGkhIrNairnAnArUpairmiCrairbhojanairmUrdhni Cirasi rudhira AmiSe ca kledite tatraiva ca sannipAte kopite~asmin mUrdhni jantavaH kRmayo jAyante| te ca jantavaH Ciraso~asraM pibanto ghorA vedanA rujaH kurvanti| kimbhUtA vedanA Aha-cittasya vibhraMCajanajIH| atra ca jvarAdikaM bhavati kapAle raukSyAdikaM kaNDvAdikaM tAluCirasoH| pramIlakaH staimityam||9||

 vAtolbaNAH CiraHkampaM tatsaMjJaM kurvate malAH||10||

malAstraye vAtAdayo vAtolbaNAH CiraHkampaM kurvate tatsaMjJaM nAmnA CiraHkampaH||10||

 pittapradhAnairvAtAdyaiH CaGkhe CophaH saCoNitaiH||11||  tIvradAharujArAgapralApajvaratRDbhramAH||11||  tiktAsyaH pItavadanaH kSiprakArI sa CaGkhakaH||11||  trirAtrAjjIvitaM hanti sidhyatyapyACu sAdhitaH||11||

vAtAdyaistribhiH saraktaiH pittapradhAnaiCca tIvradAhAdirUpaH CaGkhe Copho bhavati| kSiprakArI CIghramupadravakRt| sa Copho nAmnA CaGkhakaH trirAtreNa mArayatyACu ca trirAtrasya purataH sAdhitaH sidhyatyapi na tu mArayatyeva||11||

 pittAnubandhaH CaGkhAkSibhrUlalATeSu mArutaH||12||  rujAM saspandanAM kuryAdanusUryodayodayAm||12||  AmadhyAhnaM vivardhiSNuH kSudvataH sA viCeSataH||12||  avyavasthitaCItoSNasukhA CAmyatyataH param||12||  sUryAvartaH sa..............................||12||

pradhAno vAtaH pittena gRhItAnubandhaH CaGkhAdiSu spandanena saha rujAM kuryAt| sUryodayasya paCcAdudayo yasyA rujAyAstAm| eSA ca rugAmadhyAhnakAle vivardhiSNuH krameNa vRddhiCIlA bhavati| kSudvatastu viCeSeNa bhavati| ato madhyAhnAt paramavyavasthitaCItoCNasukhA satI ruk CAmyati| avyaMvasthitamaniyataM CItenoSNena ca sukhaM yasyAH sA tathoktA| kadAcidatra CItenApi sukhaM kadAciduSNenApi| ayamevaMrUpo rogo nAmnA sUryAvartaH||12||

 ............ityuktA daCa rogAH CirogatAH||13||

iti daCa rogA vAtaCirobhitApa-arddhAvabhedaka-pittaCirobhitApa-kaphaCirobhitApa-raktaCirobhitApa-sarvaCirobhitApa-kRmiCirobhitApa-CiraHkampa-CaGkhaka-sUryAvartAkhyAH CirasyuktA bhavanti vyApakA ityarthAt||13||

 Cirasyeva ca vakSyante kapAle vyAdhayo nava||14||

anantaraM Cirasyeva ca kapAle nava vyAdhayo vakSyante||14||

 kapAle pavane duSTe garbhasthasyApi jAyate||15||  savarNo nIrujaH CophastaM vidyAdupaCIrSakam||15||

kapAle pavane duSTe sati savarNo dehasamAnavarNo rujA rahitaCca CophaH syAt garbhasthasyApi CabdAjjAtasyApi| taM rogamupaCIrSakaM nAmnA vidyAt||15||

 yathAdoSodayaM brUyAt piTakArbudavidradhIn||16||

kapAle ca piTakA arbudaM vidradhiM ca doSodayAnatikrameNa liGgairbrUyAt| piTakAdInAM prasiddhatvAdya evoditAsteSAmeva liGgAni bhavantItyarthaH||16||

 kapAle kledabahulAH pittAsRkCleSmajantubhiH||17||  kaGgusiddhArthakanibhAH piTakAH syurarUMSikAH||17||

pittAdibhirhetubhiH kapAle kledabahulatvAdiguNAH piTakAH syuH tA nAmnA~arUMSikAH|| 17||

 kaNDUkeCacyutisvAparaukSyakRt sphuTanaM tvacaH||18||  susUkSmaM kaphavAtAbhyAM vidyAddAraNakaM tu tat||18||

kaphavAtAbhyAM hetubhyAM kaNDvAdikRdyattvacaH sphuTanaM tannAmnA dAraNakaM vidyAt| susukSmamatisUkSmaM sphuTanaM chedanam| svApaH tvacaH suptatA prakaraNAcchirasi||18||

 romakUpAnugaM pittaM vAtena saha mUrcchitam||19||  pracyAvayati romANi tataH CleSmA saCoNitaH||19||  romakUpAn ruNaddhyasya tenAnyeSAmasambhavaH||19||  tadindraluptaM rujjA ca prAhuCcAceti cApare||19||

romakUpAnuge romakUpeSvanugataM pittaM kartR vAtena saha mUrcchitaM miCrIbhUtaM tatra sthitAni romANi pracyAvayati| tataH kAraNaviCeSavaCAt saCoNitaH CleSmA~asyAturasya romakUpAn ruNaddhi tena hetunA~anyeSAM romNAmasambhavaH| tadindraluptaM nAmnA bhavati| apara AcAryA indraluptoktahetukA rujjeti cAceti ca nAmnA~a~ahuH
||19||

 khalaterapi janmaivaM CAtanaM tatra tu kramAt||20||

uttarasthAnam

CirorogapratiSedhaH

 athAtaH CirorogapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

uktakrameNaiva CirorogANAM cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 vAtaje CirobhitApe vAtavyAdhivihitaM kuryAt||2||  nivAtasthaM ca naktamabhyaktaCirasaM sarpiH payonupAnaM tailaM vA pAyayet||2||  mASAn vA sasarpiSkAnuSNapayonupAnAn bhakSayet||2||  tadvadvA mudgAn||2||  AnUpapiCitaveCavAreNa yavatilamudgamASakulatthakuSThadAruharidrAtasIsaindhavairvA mahAsnehavatImutkArikAM datvA Ciro veSTayet||2||  tataH pratyUSe daCamUlasiddhena payasA kavoCgNena pariSekaM kuryAt||2||  tatsiddhaiCca pAyasaiH piNDasvedaM lepaM vA||2||  kUrmamahiSavarAhakukkuTaCallakInAM vasA sasaindhavA nasyaM CiraHkarNapUraNaM ca||2||  tathaiva ca paJcamUlabalAsArivAdvayakvAthe madhukajIvakarSabhakapunarnavagarbhaM sapayaM sarpistailaM caikato vipakvam||2||  kArpAsamajjatvaGmustAsumanaHkorakANyuSNAmbupiSTAni nAvanaM sarvaCirorujAghnam||2||  tadvat tvakpatraCarkarACigrukaraJjabIjAni||2||  tathA candanotpalatagarakuSThaiH saghRtairlepaH||2||  devadArukuSThacorakayaSTImadhukakamalanIlotpalailAprapauNDarIkaiCca||2||  kuGkumaCarkarAsaMskRtamAjyaM raktapittAnubandhe marCaH||2||  na cAtra raktamavasecayedvAtodrekabhayAt||2||  snaihikaM dhUmaM pibet||2||  CirobastiCca CIlayet||2||  bastikarma cAcaret||2||  evamasiddhau vAtaje CleSmaje ca yathokto dAhaH||2||

yathokto dAha ityevamantaM vAtaje CirobhitApe| vAtavyAdhivihitaM cikitsitam| sarpistailaM vA yathAyogyaM naktaM payo~anupAnaM pAyayediti sambandhaH| tadvanmudgAn sasarpiSkAn uSNapayo~anupAnAMCca|

	 AnUpapiCitAdinA CiroveSTanAyotkArikA svinnapiNDI| veSTayediti vastreNa| tata iti dvitIyadinapratyUSe| tatsiddhairiti daCamUlasiddhapayasA siddhaiH pAyasairannaiH|

	 kUrmAdivasA saindhavayuktA nasyaM CiraHpUraNaM karNapUraNaJca| CiraHpUraNaM CirobastiH| paJcamUlAdikvAthe madhukAdigarbhaM tailaM sarpiCca miCrIkRtya vipakvaM tathaiveti nasyaM CiraHpUraNaM karNapUraNaJca|

	 kArpAsamajjAdyuSNAmbupiSTaM nAvanaM sarvaCirorujAghnam tvagAdIni tadvaduSNAmbupiSTAni nAvanam| candanAdibhirlepastathA| tatheti samuccaye| devadArvAdibhiCca saghRtairlepa iti sambandhaH|

	 vAtaja eva yadi raktapittAbhyAmanubandho bhavati| tataH kuGkumaCarkarAbhyAM saMskRtamAjyaM marCo daCASTaSaDbinduH kartavyaH| atra ca vAtaCirobhitApe raktapittAnubandhe~api raktaM nAvasecayet| kuta ityAha-vAtodrekabhayAt| snaihikaM dhUmaM sUtra uktam| CirobastiM ca CIlayedityanena CirobasteH punaH punaryojanamuktaM siddham|

	 evamityanantaroktakriyayA~asiddhau vAtaje CirobhitApe yathokto dAha iti sUtranirdiSTastvagdAhaH| CleSmaje ceti lAghavArthaM prakaraNe||2||

 ardhAvabhedake~apyayameva vidhiH||3||  nirguNDIpatrarasaCca saghRtasaindhavo nasyam||3||  CirISamUlaphalAni vA||3||  sArivotpalakuSThavacAmadhukapippalIbhiH satailAmlo lepaH||3||  aCAmyati doSAnubandhamavekSya pratikurvIta||3||

pratikurvItetyevamantamarddhvAvabhedake| ayameveti vAtaCirastApoktaH| atra tu nirguNDyAH patrarasassaghRtasaindhavo nasyaM hitam| CirISamUlaphalAni vA nasyamiti sambaddhyate| sArivAdibhistailenAmlena kAJjikAdinA yuktairlepaH| aCAmyati tvardhAvabhedake kasya doSasyAnubandha iti samIkSya tadapekSayA pratIkAraM kuryAt||3||

 sUryAvarte tvayameva vidhiH viCeSatastu CirAmokSaH||4||

ayameva cAnAntaroktadvayavidhiH sUryAvarte| lAghavArthaM kramabhaGgaH| sirAmokSastu viCeSataH sUryAvarte|| 4||

 pittaje raktaje ca CirobhitApe snigdhasya sirAM viddhyet||5||  kAyaM ca virecayet||5||  suCItaiH CatadhautaghRtAnvitaiH CirovaktraM siJcet pradihyAcca||5||  candanasArivAmadhukadUrvotpalaprapauNDarIkamaJjiSThAvidArIbhiH sakSIraM sarpirvipAcitaM nAvanaM CirobastiCca||5||  jIvanIyavipakvAt payaso avanItamuddhRtya jIvanIyakvAthakalkAbhyAM pAcitaM pAnabhojananasyAbhyaGgavastiSu praNItaM pittaraktajAn sarvAn vikArAn sAdhayati||5||  jIvanIyagarbhaSoDaCaguNe payasi siddhamAjyaM vA||5||  kSIrekSujAGgalarasakharjUradrAkSAkaCerUkamRNAlasiddhaH sarpirmaNDo~anuvAsanam||5||  aJjanAdivargaCrRtaM kSIramAsthApanam||5||

kSIramAsthApanamityevamantaM raktapittAbhitApayoH| pittaje CirobhitApe raktaje ca ghRtapAnAdinA snigdhaCarIrasya sataH sirAM viddhyet| lAlATyAmityarthAd gamyate| kAyaM CarIraM virecayet Codhayecca| suCItairatiCItairdravyaiH CatadhautaghRtayuktaiH Ciro vaktraM siJcet pradihyAcceti yathAsaGkhyaM sambandhaH|

	 candanAdibhirghRtaM samAnakSIraM vipakvaM nAvane Cirobastau ca yojyam| jIvanIyavipakvAdityAdi vyAkhyAsamam|

	 kSIrAdibhiH siddhaH saMskRtaH sarpiSo ghRtasya maNDoccha anuvAsane yojyaH| aJjanAdigaNo vividhagaNasaGgrahoktastena CrRtaM kSIramAsthApanam||5||

 CaGkhakaM pratyAkhyAyaivamevopacaret||6||  visarpavacca||6||  viCeSatastu kRSNatilaCatAvarInIlotpalamUrvApunarnavairlepaH||6||

CaGkhakAkhyaM rogaM pratyAkhyAya na setsyatItyuktvA evameveti pittaraktAbhitApaprakAreNa cikitsitoktapittaraktavisarpavaccopacaret cikitset| CaGkhake tu kRSNatilAdibhiH viCeSeNa lepaH kAryaH||6||

 kaphaje CirobhitApe laGghayet||7||  purANasarpisnigdhaM vA vAmayet||7||  svedaH piNDena rUkSeNa||7||  CigrunimbairaNDakvAthena vA nADIsvedaH||7||  devakASThakuSThaCArGgeSTAsaralarohiSaiH salavaNaiH sukhoSNaurAlepaH||7||  yavacUrNamadhukacandanaharidrAkuSThapriyaGguCatapuSpAsuradArubhistailAjakSIrayuktaiH sasaindhavairupanAhaH||7||  viDaGgatailaM nasyaM sArSapaM vA tadeva vA vyoSasiddham||7||  madhUkasArakalko vA madhuyutastvagvA meSa CrRGgyA iGgudasya vA||7||  ebhireva ca dhUmavarttiH||7||  CirovirecanadravyairvA sUtrasthAnoktaiH pradhamanam||7||  taireva ca pakvaM tailaM marCaH pratimarCo vA||7||  CirovirecanAnte karNanAdoktaM snehanasyam||7||  tIkSNAH kavalAH manaCCilAnaladatutthakAsIsacUrNaH sasarpiSko dhUmaH||7||  naladacUrNasya ca muhurmuhurAghrANanam||7||

muhurmuhurAghrANanamityevamanantaM kaphaje CirobhitApe| sUtroktaprakAreNa rUkSeNa piNDena svedo hitaH| athavA CigrvAdikvAthena nADIsvedaH kAryaH|

	 salavaNairlavaNayuktaiH sukhoSNairdevakASThAdibhirAlepo hitaH| surakASThaM devadAru| tailenAjakSIreNa ca yuktaiH saindhavena mANimanthena sahitairyavacUrNAdibhirupanAhaH piNDabandhaH|

	 viDaGgajaM viDaGgasAdhitaM vA tailaM viDaGgatailaM vA nasyaM yojyam| tadeva veti viDaGgatailaM vA vyoCeNa trikaTukena siddhaM pakvam| madhUkasArakalkAdinA madhuyuktena nasyamiti sambandhaH| meSaCrRGgyA iGgudasya ca tvak| ebhirevetyanantaroktairnasyauSadhaiH|

	 CirovirecanadravyaiH sUtrasthAne CodhanAdigaNasaMgrahoktaiH pradhamanaM nAsAyAM hitam| pradhamanaM sUtroktalakSaNam| taireva ceti CirovirecanadravyaiH| marCapratimarCau sUtroktalakSaNau|

	 eSAM ca CirovirecanAnAmante prayogAnte karNanAdoktaM tilAn navapralUnAnityAdinA paThitaM snehanasyaM yojayet| tIkSNAH kavalAstIkSNadravyairmaricaCuNThyAdibhiH kRtAH| subodham||7||

 sannipAte vyAmiCro vidhiH||8||

sannipAtAbhitApe pRthagdoSokto vidhirmiCrIkRtya doSabalAdyapekSayA yojyaH||8||

 kRmije durAlabhAsuradArurohihapUtIkatriphalAkaTphalavacAtrikaTukairajAmUtrayuktaM sarpiH pakvaM pAnam||9||  upasnigdhasvinnasya devadArupUtIkakaTabhIsarSapaviDaGgatilakaNTakavipakvena tailena CiraH karNau cAbhyajya svedayet||9||  tataH kRmimUrcchanArthamasRGnastovasecayet||9||  tato rudhiragandhamadena pravisRtAH saptacchadasya tkgrasena puSparasena vAnantaraniSiktena kRmayaH patanti||9||  saraladevadArukaTphalasarSapApAmArgakSavakakaTukA~alAbusurasabIjapippalItaNDulacUrNastatpakvaM vA tailaM sadyaH kRmIn nirasyati||9||  viDaGgataNDulA vAjimUtrapiSTAH CirISabIjAni vA chAgamUtrapiSTAni||9||  puSkaramadhyabIjAni vA||9||  gomAMsena chAgamAMsena vA vasApiSTena yavAgUM kRtvA Ciro vilepayet||9||  tato nimbArkavaMCasurasakuTajakaraJjakaravIrapatrakvAthena secayet ajAmUtreNa vA kavoSNena||9||  pUtimatsyayutACca dhUmAH||9||  evaM kRmiSvapagateSu tejovatIpUtIkavimbIsurasanaktamAlAviDaGgaharItakIsarSapArkakaravIramUlamAlatIdevadArukSavakamustaphaNijjakapippalICatapuSpAmadhUkaCaNanimbasArakalkairajAmUtrayutaiH sArSapaM tailamaiGgudaM pailukaM vA vipakvaM yuktyA nAvanam||9||  na tu jAtu rudhiramavasecayet||9||  jantubhiH pItaCoNite hi Cirasi punarasrAvasekAdakANDe mRtyuH syAt||9||  kRmicikitsitaM cekSeta||9||

kRmicikitsitaM cekSetetyantaM kRmije CirobhitApe| durAlabhAdibhirdravyairajAmUtrayuktaM pakvaM sarpiH pAnAya| anenopasnigdhasya svinnasya ca devadArvyAdivipakvena tailena CiraH karNau cAbyajya punaH svedayet| kaNTako gokaNTakaH|

	 tataH svedAnantaraM kRmINAM mUrcchanArthaM yena kRmayastyaktabandhanA mattA iva sarvato~antaH saranti tadarthamasRgraktaM nasto~avasecayet| anantaraniSiktena raktaniSecanasya paCcAt siktena| puSparasaH saptacchadapuSpANAM rasastena| patanti nAsikAto bahirnissaranti|

	 saralAdInAM cUrNastatpakvaM tailaM vA nasyaprayogAtsadyaH kRmIn bahirnirasyati| kSavako rAjakSavakaH| athavA vAjimUtrapiSTA viDaGgataNDulA viDaGgaphalAni kRmIn nirasyanti athavA chAgamUtrapiSTAni CirISabIjAni| athavA piSkarabIjAnAM tvakparihAreNa prayogo darCitaH|

	 goMAMsenetyAdinA CirolepaH subodhaH| tata iti yavAgUlepAnantaraM nimbAdikvAthenAjAmUtreNa vA koSNena sekaH| pUtimatsyaH klinnamatsyaH|

	 evamityanantaroktakriyayA krimiSvapagateSu tejovatyAdiH kalkairajAmUtrayutaiH sArSapAdyanyatamaM tailaM vipakvaM yuktyA balAdyapekSayA mAtrAdikRtayA nAvanaM kuryAt|

	 jantvabhitApe tu kadAcidapi raktaM nAvasecayet| kuta ityAha-jantubhirityAdi| akANDe akAle| kRmicikitsite ca yaduktaM taM vidhiM prayogAyekSeta||9||

 CiraHkampamakSINasyAnnavyAdhyanupadrutasya dAhavarjyaM mArutavidhAnenopakrameta||10||

CiraHkampAkhyamakSINatvAdiyuktasya puMso vAtAbhitApavadupakrameta| vAtAbhitApe cAgninA dAha uktaH| atra tu dAhavarjyamiti viCeSaH||10||

uttarasthAnam

CirorogapratiSedhaH

 athAtaH CirorogapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

uktakrameNaiva CirorogANAM cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 vAtaje CirobhitApe vAtavyAdhivihitaM kuryAt||2||  nivAtasthaM ca naktamabhyaktaCirasaM sarpiH payonupAnaM tailaM vA pAyayet||2||  mASAn vA sasarpiSkAnuSNapayonupAnAn bhakSayet||2||  tadvadvA mudgAn||2||  AnUpapiCitaveCavAreNa yavatilamudgamASakulatthakuSThadAruharidrAtasIsaindhavairvA mahAsnehavatImutkArikAM datvA Ciro veSTayet||2||  tataH pratyUSe daCamUlasiddhena payasA kavoCgNena pariSekaM kuryAt||2||  tatsiddhaiCca pAyasaiH piNDasvedaM lepaM vA||2||  kUrmamahiSavarAhakukkuTaCallakInAM vasA sasaindhavA nasyaM CiraHkarNapUraNaM ca||2||  tathaiva ca paJcamUlabalAsArivAdvayakvAthe madhukajIvakarSabhakapunarnavagarbhaM sapayaM sarpistailaM caikato vipakvam||2||  kArpAsamajjatvaGmustAsumanaHkorakANyuSNAmbupiSTAni nAvanaM sarvaCirorujAghnam||2||  tadvat tvakpatraCarkarACigrukaraJjabIjAni||2||  tathA candanotpalatagarakuSThaiH saghRtairlepaH||2||  devadArukuSThacorakayaSTImadhukakamalanIlotpalailAprapauNDarIkaiCca||2||  kuGkumaCarkarAsaMskRtamAjyaM raktapittAnubandhe marCaH||2||  na cAtra raktamavasecayedvAtodrekabhayAt||2||  snaihikaM dhUmaM pibet||2||  CirobastiCca CIlayet||2||  bastikarma cAcaret||2||  evamasiddhau vAtaje CleSmaje ca yathokto dAhaH||2||

yathokto dAha ityevamantaM vAtaje CirobhitApe| vAtavyAdhivihitaM cikitsitam| sarpistailaM vA yathAyogyaM naktaM payo~anupAnaM pAyayediti sambandhaH| tadvanmudgAn sasarpiSkAn uSNapayo~anupAnAMCca|

	 AnUpapiCitAdinA CiroveSTanAyotkArikA svinnapiNDI| veSTayediti vastreNa| tata iti dvitIyadinapratyUSe| tatsiddhairiti daCamUlasiddhapayasA siddhaiH pAyasairannaiH|

	 kUrmAdivasA saindhavayuktA nasyaM CiraHpUraNaM karNapUraNaJca| CiraHpUraNaM CirobastiH| paJcamUlAdikvAthe madhukAdigarbhaM tailaM sarpiCca miCrIkRtya vipakvaM tathaiveti nasyaM CiraHpUraNaM karNapUraNaJca|

	 kArpAsamajjAdyuSNAmbupiSTaM nAvanaM sarvaCirorujAghnam tvagAdIni tadvaduSNAmbupiSTAni nAvanam| candanAdibhirlepastathA| tatheti samuccaye| devadArvAdibhiCca saghRtairlepa iti sambandhaH|

	 vAtaja eva yadi raktapittAbhyAmanubandho bhavati| tataH kuGkumaCarkarAbhyAM saMskRtamAjyaM marCo daCASTaSaDbinduH kartavyaH| atra ca vAtaCirobhitApe raktapittAnubandhe~api raktaM nAvasecayet| kuta ityAha-vAtodrekabhayAt| snaihikaM dhUmaM sUtra uktam| CirobastiM ca CIlayedityanena CirobasteH punaH punaryojanamuktaM siddham|

	 evamityanantaroktakriyayA~asiddhau vAtaje CirobhitApe yathokto dAha iti sUtranirdiSTastvagdAhaH| CleSmaje ceti lAghavArthaM prakaraNe||2||

 ardhAvabhedake~apyayameva vidhiH||3||  nirguNDIpatrarasaCca saghRtasaindhavo nasyam||3||  CirISamUlaphalAni vA||3||  sArivotpalakuSThavacAmadhukapippalIbhiH satailAmlo lepaH||3||  aCAmyati doSAnubandhamavekSya pratikurvIta||3||

pratikurvItetyevamantamarddhvAvabhedake| ayameveti vAtaCirastApoktaH| atra tu nirguNDyAH patrarasassaghRtasaindhavo nasyaM hitam| CirISamUlaphalAni vA nasyamiti sambaddhyate| sArivAdibhistailenAmlena kAJjikAdinA yuktairlepaH| aCAmyati tvardhAvabhedake kasya doSasyAnubandha iti samIkSya tadapekSayA pratIkAraM kuryAt||3||

 sUryAvarte tvayameva vidhiH viCeSatastu CirAmokSaH||4||

ayameva cAnAntaroktadvayavidhiH sUryAvarte| lAghavArthaM kramabhaGgaH| sirAmokSastu viCeSataH sUryAvarte|| 4||

 pittaje raktaje ca CirobhitApe snigdhasya sirAM viddhyet||5||  kAyaM ca virecayet||5||  suCItaiH CatadhautaghRtAnvitaiH CirovaktraM siJcet pradihyAcca||5||  candanasArivAmadhukadUrvotpalaprapauNDarIkamaJjiSThAvidArIbhiH sakSIraM sarpirvipAcitaM nAvanaM CirobastiCca||5||  jIvanIyavipakvAt payaso avanItamuddhRtya jIvanIyakvAthakalkAbhyAM pAcitaM pAnabhojananasyAbhyaGgavastiSu praNItaM pittaraktajAn sarvAn vikArAn sAdhayati||5||  jIvanIyagarbhaSoDaCaguNe payasi siddhamAjyaM vA||5||  kSIrekSujAGgalarasakharjUradrAkSAkaCerUkamRNAlasiddhaH sarpirmaNDo~anuvAsanam||5||  aJjanAdivargaCrRtaM kSIramAsthApanam||5||

kSIramAsthApanamityevamantaM raktapittAbhitApayoH| pittaje CirobhitApe raktaje ca ghRtapAnAdinA snigdhaCarIrasya sataH sirAM viddhyet| lAlATyAmityarthAd gamyate| kAyaM CarIraM virecayet Codhayecca| suCItairatiCItairdravyaiH CatadhautaghRtayuktaiH Ciro vaktraM siJcet pradihyAcceti yathAsaGkhyaM sambandhaH|

	 candanAdibhirghRtaM samAnakSIraM vipakvaM nAvane Cirobastau ca yojyam| jIvanIyavipakvAdityAdi vyAkhyAsamam|

	 kSIrAdibhiH siddhaH saMskRtaH sarpiSo ghRtasya maNDoccha anuvAsane yojyaH| aJjanAdigaNo vividhagaNasaGgrahoktastena CrRtaM kSIramAsthApanam||5||

 CaGkhakaM pratyAkhyAyaivamevopacaret||6||  visarpavacca||6||  viCeSatastu kRSNatilaCatAvarInIlotpalamUrvApunarnavairlepaH||6||

CaGkhakAkhyaM rogaM pratyAkhyAya na setsyatItyuktvA evameveti pittaraktAbhitApaprakAreNa cikitsitoktapittaraktavisarpavaccopacaret cikitset| CaGkhake tu kRSNatilAdibhiH viCeSeNa lepaH kAryaH||6||

 kaphaje CirobhitApe laGghayet||7||  purANasarpisnigdhaM vA vAmayet||7||  svedaH piNDena rUkSeNa||7||  CigrunimbairaNDakvAthena vA nADIsvedaH||7||  devakASThakuSThaCArGgeSTAsaralarohiSaiH salavaNaiH sukhoSNaurAlepaH||7||  yavacUrNamadhukacandanaharidrAkuSThapriyaGguCatapuSpAsuradArubhistailAjakSIrayuktaiH sasaindhavairupanAhaH||7||  viDaGgatailaM nasyaM sArSapaM vA tadeva vA vyoSasiddham||7||  madhUkasArakalko vA madhuyutastvagvA meSa CrRGgyA iGgudasya vA||7||  ebhireva ca dhUmavarttiH||7||  CirovirecanadravyairvA sUtrasthAnoktaiH pradhamanam||7||  taireva ca pakvaM tailaM marCaH pratimarCo vA||7||  CirovirecanAnte karNanAdoktaM snehanasyam||7||  tIkSNAH kavalAH manaCCilAnaladatutthakAsIsacUrNaH sasarpiSko dhUmaH||7||  naladacUrNasya ca muhurmuhurAghrANanam||7||

muhurmuhurAghrANanamityevamanantaM kaphaje CirobhitApe| sUtroktaprakAreNa rUkSeNa piNDena svedo hitaH| athavA CigrvAdikvAthena nADIsvedaH kAryaH|

	 salavaNairlavaNayuktaiH sukhoSNairdevakASThAdibhirAlepo hitaH| surakASThaM devadAru| tailenAjakSIreNa ca yuktaiH saindhavena mANimanthena sahitairyavacUrNAdibhirupanAhaH piNDabandhaH|

	 viDaGgajaM viDaGgasAdhitaM vA tailaM viDaGgatailaM vA nasyaM yojyam| tadeva veti viDaGgatailaM vA vyoCeNa trikaTukena siddhaM pakvam| madhUkasArakalkAdinA madhuyuktena nasyamiti sambandhaH| meSaCrRGgyA iGgudasya ca tvak| ebhirevetyanantaroktairnasyauSadhaiH|

	 CirovirecanadravyaiH sUtrasthAne CodhanAdigaNasaMgrahoktaiH pradhamanaM nAsAyAM hitam| pradhamanaM sUtroktalakSaNam| taireva ceti CirovirecanadravyaiH| marCapratimarCau sUtroktalakSaNau|

	 eSAM ca CirovirecanAnAmante prayogAnte karNanAdoktaM tilAn navapralUnAnityAdinA paThitaM snehanasyaM yojayet| tIkSNAH kavalAstIkSNadravyairmaricaCuNThyAdibhiH kRtAH| subodham||7||

 sannipAte vyAmiCro vidhiH||8||

sannipAtAbhitApe pRthagdoSokto vidhirmiCrIkRtya doSabalAdyapekSayA yojyaH||8||

 kRmije durAlabhAsuradArurohihapUtIkatriphalAkaTphalavacAtrikaTukairajAmUtrayuktaM sarpiH pakvaM pAnam||9||  upasnigdhasvinnasya devadArupUtIkakaTabhIsarSapaviDaGgatilakaNTakavipakvena tailena CiraH karNau cAbhyajya svedayet||9||  tataH kRmimUrcchanArthamasRGnastovasecayet||9||  tato rudhiragandhamadena pravisRtAH saptacchadasya tkgrasena puSparasena vAnantaraniSiktena kRmayaH patanti||9||  saraladevadArukaTphalasarSapApAmArgakSavakakaTukA~alAbusurasabIjapippalItaNDulacUrNastatpakvaM vA tailaM sadyaH kRmIn nirasyati||9||  viDaGgataNDulA vAjimUtrapiSTAH CirISabIjAni vA chAgamUtrapiSTAni||9||  puSkaramadhyabIjAni vA||9||  gomAMsena chAgamAMsena vA vasApiSTena yavAgUM kRtvA Ciro vilepayet||9||  tato nimbArkavaMCasurasakuTajakaraJjakaravIrapatrakvAthena secayet ajAmUtreNa vA kavoSNena||9||  pUtimatsyayutACca dhUmAH||9||  evaM kRmiSvapagateSu tejovatIpUtIkavimbIsurasanaktamAlAviDaGgaharItakIsarSapArkakaravIramUlamAlatIdevadArukSavakamustaphaNijjakapippalICatapuSpAmadhUkaCaNanimbasArakalkairajAmUtrayutaiH sArSapaM tailamaiGgudaM pailukaM vA vipakvaM yuktyA nAvanam||9||  na tu jAtu rudhiramavasecayet||9||  jantubhiH pItaCoNite hi Cirasi punarasrAvasekAdakANDe mRtyuH syAt||9||  kRmicikitsitaM cekSeta||9||

kRmicikitsitaM cekSetetyantaM kRmije CirobhitApe| durAlabhAdibhirdravyairajAmUtrayuktaM pakvaM sarpiH pAnAya| anenopasnigdhasya svinnasya ca devadArvyAdivipakvena tailena CiraH karNau cAbyajya punaH svedayet| kaNTako gokaNTakaH|

uttarasthAnam

CirorogapratiSedhaH

 upaCIrSake janmottarakAlajAte navotthite vAtavyAdhivihitAn snehAn pAnanAvanAbhyaJjaneSu yojayet||11||  abhyaktaJca svedayitvopanAhayedyathA vidAho na bhavati||11||  vidAhe vidradhivat karma||11||

vidradhivat karmetyevamantamupaCIrSake| janmottarakAlajAta ityanena sahajasyAcikitsyatvamuktam| vidAhaH pAkAvasthA
||11||

 piTakArbudavidradhiSu yathAsvamAcaret||12||  vraNIbhUtAsu piTakAsu nimbaniCAmadhukadhAtrIphalairvipakvaM tailaM CodhanaropaNam||12||  mUrvAcandanasArivAdhAtakIkAntAlodhramadhukasamaGgApadmakesaraCataparvakamUlairvidradhiSu||12||  ebhireva ca siddhaM sarpirnasyam||12||  rUDhe tu vidradhau yasi tvak supteva bhavati tato vAmayet||12||  uapasnigdhaM ca virecayet||12||

piTakAdiSu yathAsvamiti doSAdyapekSayA cikitsitAdi nirdiSTamAcaret| vraNIbhUtAsviti pAkAt| subodham|

	 mUrvAdibhirvipakvaM tailaM vidradhiSu vraNIbhUtAsu CodhanaM ropaNaM ca| ebhiriti mUrvAdibhiH| upasnigdhaM kiJcit snigdham|| 12||

 arUMSikAsu jalaukopahRtaCoNitaM CiraH kSurAmRSTaM vA nimbodakena pariSicyACvavaCakRdrasena lavaNapragADhena lepayet||13||  kiJhcit kAlaM sthitaM coSNodakAmlakAJjikAnyataradhautaM viDaGgavyoSalAkSAgAradhUmamanohvAlavacArasAJjanaharidrAdvayairAlimpet||13||  tilamaSyA vA snuhIkSIrayuktayA||13||  madhukotpalatilairaNDamArkavapatrairvA||13||  CigrumUlakasarSapabIjairvA gomUtrapiSTaiH||13||  bAlakAmalakanAgaramUlakasarSapabIjairvA kSIrapiSTaiH||13||  CirISatvagyaSTImadhukAbhyAM vA||13||  purANapiNyAkakukkuTapurISAbhyAM vA||13||  kapAlabhRSTakuSThacUrNaM tailayuktaM kaNDUkledadAhasvedavedanAghnam||13||  tathA cAcoktaM citrakAditailamabhyaJjanam||13||  dantIpAThAkoCAtakIcitrakAtIviSAmahAlAGgalakIsiddhaM tailaM vraNAbhyaGgaH||13||  manaCCilailAharitAlapippalIkuSThakAsIsaharidrAkaraJjamustAtagaraviDaGgaM citrakAsiddhArthakakaravIramUlacUrNagarbhaM tailamAdityapAkaM vraNaropaNam||13||  evamanupaCame vamanadhUmakAyaCirovirekAn kuryAt||13||

CiraHkAyavirekAn kuryAdityevamantamarUMSikAsu| kiJcitkAlasthitamityaCvaCakRdrasaliptamiti vijJeyam| dhautaM ca viDaGgAdibhirAlimpet| tilamaSyA vA snuhIkSIrayuktayA limpediti sambandhaH| madhukAdipatrairvA kevalairAlimpet| CigrvAdibIjairvA gomUtrapiSTaiH| bAlakAdibhirvA kSIrapiSTaiH| CeSayoH kSIrameva| subodham|

	 kapAle mRnmaye~agninA bhRSTasya kuSThasya cUrNaM tailayuktaM prakaraNAllepAt kaNDvAghnam| cAcA indralupta ityekArthaH| subodham|

	 manaCCilAdikalkaM tailamAdityapAkaM yadAtapenaiva pacyate| evamiti pUrvoktenAnupaCame vamanAdIn kuryAt|| 13||

 dAraNake lalATe sirAM vidhyet||14||  abhyaGgasnAnanAvanAni ca CIlayet priyAlabIjamadhukakuSThamASasarSapaiH sakSaudrairlepaH||14||  kodravatRNakSArAmbhaH prakSAlanam||14||

uttarasthAnam

vraNavibhaktiparijJAnIyaH

 athAto vraNavibhaktiparijJAnIyannAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

nijapradhAnAnAM cikitsitamuktamAgantupradhAnAnAmavasaro~ataH CalyatantramArabhyate| sarvasya ca Calyasya vraNaphalatvAd vraNa evAdau vicAryate| vraNsya tu svarUpajJAne hetvAdikaM vaktuM na pAryate| tacca svarUpaM sAmAnyataH prasiddhyaiva jJAyate| viCeSe tvAgamo~apekSyate| ato vraNavibhAgaparijJAnArthamadhyAya Arabhyate| athetyAdi pUrvavad vyAkhyeyam| vraNanaM jJAtuM nirUpyate||1||

 yAvadAyurvRNIte vivRNoti vA CarIramiti vraNaH||2||

yAvadityAdi| yAvadAyurAyuSo~antaM yAvaccharIraM vRNIte vivRNoti vA~ato vraNaH| vRNIta iti vRG sambhaktAvityasya rUpam| sambhaktiH prArthanA| vivRNoti prakaTayati sACayatvAtprArthayate||2||

 sa ca dvividho nija AgantuCca||3||  tatra nijo doSasamutthaH||3||  AgantuH CastrAnuCastropalalaguDanakhadaCanaviSANaviSAruSkarAdinimittaH||3||  so~api punarvAtAdibhiradhiSThito nijatAM labhate||3||

sa ca vraNo nijAgantubhedena dvividhaH| tatra yo doSanimitto vAtAdikopahetuH sa nijaH| AgantuH CastrAdinimittaH| AdigrahaNenACeSANAM kSatakarANAM grahaNam| so~apyAgantuvraNo yadA vAtAdyadhiSThAnatAM prApnoti tadA nijasaMjJAmeva labhate||3||

 punaCca dvedhA vraNo duSTaH CuddhaCca||4||  tatra doSadUSito duSTaH||4||

punaranyena prakAreNa dvedhA dvAbhyAM prakArAbhyAM vraNo bhavati| eko duSTavraNo dvitIyaH CuddhavraNaH pUrvokte ca dvaye~apyetad dvayaM sambhavati| nanu duSTaH ka ucyata ityAha-tatreti| tatra dvayormadhye sa duSTo vijJeyo yo doSairadhiSThitaH||4||

 tasya sAmAnyaliGgamatisaMvRtavivRtatvamatimRdukaThinatA~atyutsAdAvasAdAvatiCItoSNabhAvo~atiraktakRSNapANDutA pUtImAMsasirAsnAyupraticchannatvaM pUtIpUyAsrAvaH sotsaGgitA dAhapAkakaNDUCvayathuvedanAsaMrambhapiTakopadravopadrutatvaM dIrghakAlAnubandhaCca||5||

athaM sa jJAyata ityAha-tasyeti| tasya duSTasya sAmAnyaliGgaM vAtAdidoSAnapekSaM lakSaNam| kimityAha-atisaMvRtamityAdi| atisaMvRtatvaM vA~ativivRtatvaM vA atimRdutA vA~atikaThinatA vA atyutsannatvaM vA~atyavasannatvaM vA atiCItatA vA~atyuSNatA vA atiraktavarNatA vA~atikArSNyaM vA~atipANDutvaM vA pUtIbhiH klinnairmAMsAdibhirvraNasya praticchannatvamAvRtatvaM pUteH pUyasya pakvadoSasyA~a~asrAva sotsaGgitA baddhapIvatvaM dAhadyupadravopadrutatvaM vraNasya dIrghakAlAnubandhaCceti duSTavraNasya sAmAnyalakSaNam| (utsaGgitA sACayatvaM dUrvAvatpAkasyAntardUragatirityarthaH )||5||

 viCeSatastu paJcadaCadhA bhidyate||6||

viCeSatastu vAtAdibhiH saraktaiH paJcadaCadhA duSTavraNo bhidyate| raktaM vAtAdiduSTameva viCeSAntareNa rogakartRtvAdadoSo~api vAtAdisamakakSyatA gRhyate| tatra vAtena pittena kaphena raktena vAtapittAbhyAM vAtakaphAbhyAM pittakaphAbhyAM vAtaraktAbhyAM pittaraktAbhyAM kapharaktAbhyAM vAtapittakaphairvAtapittaraktairvAtakapharaktaH pittakapharaktairvAtapittakapharaktairiti paJcadaCa bhedAH||6||

 tatra CyAvo~aruNaH kRSNo bhasmAsthikapotagalAnyatamavarNo vA dadhimastukSArAmbumAMsadhAvanapulAkodakanibhAlpasrAvo rUkSaCcaTacaTAyamAnaCIlo~akasmAdvividhaCUlasphuraNAyAmatodabhedasvApabahulo nirmAMsaCca vAtAt||7||

tatra CyAvAdisvarUpo vraNo vAtAd bhavati| varNAdivastudharmo vraNasya| CUlAdi sambhavAdACraye vijJeyaH| CyAvo~aruNo vA kRSNo vA bhasmAdicatuSTyAnyatamavarNo vA dadhimastvAdyanyatamavarNo~alpasrAvAdimAMCca
||7||

 kSiprajaH pItanIlaharitakRSNakapilapiGgalo gomUtrabhasmaCaGkhakiMCukodakamArdvIkatailAbhoSNabhUrikledo dAhoSAjvararAgapAkAvadaraNadhUmAyanAnvitaH kSArokSitakSatopamavedanaH piTakAjuSTaCca pittAt||8||

kSiprajatvAdirUpo vraNaH pittAd bhavati| gomUtrAdyanyatamasadRCoSNabhUrikledo dAhAdyanvitaH kSArasiktakSatasamavedanaH piTakAnvitaCca||8||

 snigdhaH sthUlauSThaH pANDuCcaNDakaNDUrnavanItavasAmajjapiSTatilanArikelAmbusadRCaCvetaCItabahalapicchilakledaH svApastambhastaimityagauravopadehayuktaH sirAsnAyujAlAvatato mandavedanaH kaThinaCca kaphAt||9||

snigdhatvAdirUpo vraNaH kaphAd bhavati| snigdhau sthUlau coSThau pAlI yasya vraNasyaH sa yathoktaH caNDAtitIkSNA kaNDUryasmin vraNe sa tathoktaH| navanItAdisadRCaH CvetAdiguNaH kledaH srAvo yasmin vraNe sa tathoktaH| svApAdiyuktaH sirAdyavatato mandavedanaH kaThinaCca| avatato vyAptaH||9||

 pravAlaraktaH kRSNasphoTapiTakAjAlopacito vAjisthAnagandhiH||10||  saraktapUyasrAvI pittaliGgaCca raktAt||10||

pravAlaraktatvAdiguNo raktAd bhavati| pravAlavadvidrumavadrakto lohitaH| kRSNaiH sphoTaiH piTakAjAlairupacito vyAptaH vAjisthAnamaCvaCAlA tatsamagandhaH pittaliGgaH pittavraNalakSaNaH||10||

uttarasthAnam

vraNavibhaktiparijJAnIyaH

 athAto vraNavibhaktiparijJAnIyannAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

nijapradhAnAnAM cikitsitamuktamAgantupradhAnAnAmavasaro~ataH CalyatantramArabhyate| sarvasya ca Calyasya vraNaphalatvAd vraNa evAdau vicAryate| vraNsya tu svarUpajJAne hetvAdikaM vaktuM na pAryate| tacca svarUpaM sAmAnyataH prasiddhyaiva jJAyate| viCeSe tvAgamo~apekSyate| ato vraNavibhAgaparijJAnArthamadhyAya Arabhyate| athetyAdi pUrvavad vyAkhyeyam| vraNanaM jJAtuM nirUpyate||1||

 yAvadAyurvRNIte vivRNoti vA CarIramiti vraNaH||2||

yAvadityAdi| yAvadAyurAyuSo~antaM yAvaccharIraM vRNIte vivRNoti vA~ato vraNaH| vRNIta iti vRG sambhaktAvityasya rUpam| sambhaktiH prArthanA| vivRNoti prakaTayati sACayatvAtprArthayate||2||

 sa ca dvividho nija AgantuCca||3||  tatra nijo doSasamutthaH||3||  AgantuH CastrAnuCastropalalaguDanakhadaCanaviSANaviSAruSkarAdinimittaH||3||  so~api punarvAtAdibhiradhiSThito nijatAM labhate||3||

sa ca vraNo nijAgantubhedena dvividhaH| tatra yo doSanimitto vAtAdikopahetuH sa nijaH| AgantuH CastrAdinimittaH| AdigrahaNenACeSANAM kSatakarANAM grahaNam| so~apyAgantuvraNo yadA vAtAdyadhiSThAnatAM prApnoti tadA nijasaMjJAmeva labhate||3||

 punaCca dvedhA vraNo duSTaH CuddhaCca||4||  tatra doSadUSito duSTaH||4||

punaranyena prakAreNa dvedhA dvAbhyAM prakArAbhyAM vraNo bhavati| eko duSTavraNo dvitIyaH CuddhavraNaH pUrvokte ca dvaye~apyetad dvayaM sambhavati| nanu duSTaH ka ucyata ityAha-tatreti| tatra dvayormadhye sa duSTo vijJeyo yo doSairadhiSThitaH||4||

 tasya sAmAnyaliGgamatisaMvRtavivRtatvamatimRdukaThinatA~atyutsAdAvasAdAvatiCItoSNabhAvo~atiraktakRSNapANDutA pUtImAMsasirAsnAyupraticchannatvaM pUtIpUyAsrAvaH sotsaGgitA dAhapAkakaNDUCvayathuvedanAsaMrambhapiTakopadravopadrutatvaM dIrghakAlAnubandhaCca||5||

athaM sa jJAyata ityAha-tasyeti| tasya duSTasya sAmAnyaliGgaM vAtAdidoSAnapekSaM lakSaNam| kimityAha-atisaMvRtamityAdi| atisaMvRtatvaM vA~ativivRtatvaM vA atimRdutA vA~atikaThinatA vA atyutsannatvaM vA~atyavasannatvaM vA atiCItatA vA~atyuSNatA vA atiraktavarNatA vA~atikArSNyaM vA~atipANDutvaM vA pUtIbhiH klinnairmAMsAdibhirvraNasya praticchannatvamAvRtatvaM pUteH pUyasya pakvadoSasyA~a~asrAva sotsaGgitA baddhapIvatvaM dAhadyupadravopadrutatvaM vraNasya dIrghakAlAnubandhaCceti duSTavraNasya sAmAnyalakSaNam| (utsaGgitA sACayatvaM dUrvAvatpAkasyAntardUragatirityarthaH )||5||

 viCeSatastu paJcadaCadhA bhidyate||6||

viCeSatastu vAtAdibhiH saraktaiH paJcadaCadhA duSTavraNo bhidyate| raktaM vAtAdiduSTameva viCeSAntareNa rogakartRtvAdadoSo~api vAtAdisamakakSyatA gRhyate| tatra vAtena pittena kaphena raktena vAtapittAbhyAM vAtakaphAbhyAM pittakaphAbhyAM vAtaraktAbhyAM pittaraktAbhyAM kapharaktAbhyAM vAtapittakaphairvAtapittaraktairvAtakapharaktaH pittakapharaktairvAtapittakapharaktairiti paJcadaCa bhedAH||6||

 tatra CyAvo~aruNaH kRSNo bhasmAsthikapotagalAnyatamavarNo vA dadhimastukSArAmbumAMsadhAvanapulAkodakanibhAlpasrAvo rUkSaCcaTacaTAyamAnaCIlo~akasmAdvividhaCUlasphuraNAyAmatodabhedasvApabahulo nirmAMsaCca vAtAt||7||

tatra CyAvAdisvarUpo vraNo vAtAd bhavati| varNAdivastudharmo vraNasya| CUlAdi sambhavAdACraye vijJeyaH| CyAvo~aruNo vA kRSNo vA bhasmAdicatuSTyAnyatamavarNo vA dadhimastvAdyanyatamavarNo~alpasrAvAdimAMCca
||7||

 kSiprajaH pItanIlaharitakRSNakapilapiGgalo gomUtrabhasmaCaGkhakiMCukodakamArdvIkatailAbhoSNabhUrikledo dAhoSAjvararAgapAkAvadaraNadhUmAyanAnvitaH kSArokSitakSatopamavedanaH piTakAjuSTaCca pittAt||8||

kSiprajatvAdirUpo vraNaH pittAd bhavati| gomUtrAdyanyatamasadRCoSNabhUrikledo dAhAdyanvitaH kSArasiktakSatasamavedanaH piTakAnvitaCca||8||

 snigdhaH sthUlauSThaH pANDuCcaNDakaNDUrnavanItavasAmajjapiSTatilanArikelAmbusadRCaCvetaCItabahalapicchilakledaH svApastambhastaimityagauravopadehayuktaH sirAsnAyujAlAvatato mandavedanaH kaThinaCca kaphAt||9||

snigdhatvAdirUpo vraNaH kaphAd bhavati| snigdhau sthUlau coSThau pAlI yasya vraNasyaH sa yathoktaH caNDAtitIkSNA kaNDUryasmin vraNe sa tathoktaH| navanItAdisadRCaH CvetAdiguNaH kledaH srAvo yasmin vraNe sa tathoktaH| svApAdiyuktaH sirAdyavatato mandavedanaH kaThinaCca| avatato vyAptaH||9||

 pravAlaraktaH kRSNasphoTapiTakAjAlopacito vAjisthAnagandhiH||10||  saraktapUyasrAvI pittaliGgaCca raktAt||10||

pravAlaraktatvAdiguNo raktAd bhavati| pravAlavadvidrumavadrakto lohitaH| kRSNaiH sphoTaiH piTakAjAlairupacito vyAptaH vAjisthAnamaCvaCAlA tatsamagandhaH pittaliGgaH pittavraNalakSaNaH||10||

uttarasthAnam

vraNavibhaktiparijJAnIyaH

 yathAsvaliGgasaGkare dvAbhyAM tribhiH sarvaiCca duSTaM vidyAt||11||  api ca-ghRtamaNDAbho matsyadhAvanagandhirmRduvisarpI kRSNoSNapUyaCca pittaraktAbhyAm||11||

yathAsvaliGgasaGkare lakSaNasaGkare saMsargajo vraNaH| api ceti pittaraktAyAM dvisaMyoga ukto~apyadhikasamuccaye| ghRtamaNDAbhatvAdiyukto vraNaH pittaraktAbhyAM bhavati| ghRtamaNDAbho varNasnigdhatvAbhyAmiti paJcadaCabhedasya duSTavraNasya lakSaNamuktam||11||

 vAtAdibhireva ca vraNasyAnadhiSThAnaM CuddhiH||12||  tatra yathoktaduSTaliGgAbhAvAt saMrambharahitatvaM jihvAvarNatA ClakSNatvaM nIrujatvaM nirAsrAvatA CyAvaparyantatvaM samauSThamadhyatA kiJcidunnatamadhyatA vA||12||

vraNasya vAtAdibhiranadhiSThAnaM CuddhiH| tatra viCuddhe vraNe yathoktAnAM sAmAnyena viCeSeNa coktAnAM duSTavraNaliGgAnAmabhAvAddhetoH svAbhAvikaM saMrambharahitatvAdikaM bhavati| saMrambho vedanAviCeSaH||12||

 tvaDmAMsasirAsnAyusandhyasthikoSThamarmANyaSTau vraNACayaH||13||  ACayaviCeSAccA~a~asrAvaviCeSaH||13||

tasya ca vraNasya tvagAdInyaSTAvACayAH| ACayaviCeSAcca vraNasyA~a~asrAvaviCeSAH
||13||

 tatra ghRSTAsu vA tvakSu sphoTeSu vA bhinneSu salilaprakACo bhavatyAsrAvaH||14||  kiJcidvisraH pItAvabhAsaCca||14||

tatretyAdinA AsrAvaviCeSA ucyante| ghRSTAsu bhinnAsu vA CastrAdyAgantunA| sphoTeSu vA bhinneSviti nije||14||

 mAMsagataH sarpiHprakACo bahalaH picchilaCca||15||

mAMsagatavraNAsrAvaH sarpiHpratIkACo bahalo ghanaH picchilaCca||15||

 sirAgatastu sadyaCchinnAsu sirAsu raktAtipravRttiH||16||  pakvAsu ca toyanADIbhirivAmbhasaH pUyasyAgamanam||16||  sa ca tanurvicchinnaH picchilo~avalambI CyAvaCca||16||

sirAgatastu sadyaCchinnAsu pakvAsu ca sirAsu raktAtipravRttyAdilakSaNo bhavatyAsrAvaH||16||

 snAvagataH snigdho ghanaH siGghANakapratimaH saraktaCca||17||

snAvagata AsrAvaH snigdhatvAdiguNaH| siGghANakapratimo nAsAsrAvasadRCaH||17||

 sandhigataH samantAt prapIDyamAno na pravartate tathA~a~akuJcanaprasAraNonnamananamanapravAhaNeSu sravati picchilo~avalambI sa phenarudhironmiCraCca||18||

sandhigataH samantAt prapIDyamAno na pravartate tathA~a~akuJcanaprasAraNonnamananamanapravAhaNeSu sravati picchilo~avalambI sa phenarudhironmiCraCca||18||

 sandhigatastvAsrAvaH samantAt prapIDyamAno na pravartate tathA yathA~a~akuJjanaadiSu sravati||19||  picchilAdiguNaCca bhavati||19||  sandhigatasrAvaH samantAt prapIDyamAno na pravartate tathA yathA~a~akuJcanAdiSu sravati||19||  picchilAdi guNaCca bhavati||19||  asthigata srAvaH viCeSaH -asthi tvabhihataM sphuTitaM bhinnaM doSAvadAritaM vA doSabhakSitatvAnnissAraM bhavati||19||  AsrAvaCcAtra majjamiCraH saru-dhiraH snigdhaCca||19||

asthi tvabhihataM sphuTitAdiguNaM bhavati| athavA doSAvadAritamasthi doSabhakSitatvAnnissAraM sArarahitaM bhavati| sAro majjA| atretyasthyabhihate doSAvadArite ca| AsrAvaCca majjamiCritatvAdiguNaH|| 19||

 koSThACritastu vraNo mUtrapurISarudhirapayodakAni sravati||20||

koSThACrito vraNastu mUtrapurISAdIni sravati
||20||

uttarasthAnam

vraNapratiSedhaH

 athAto vraNapratiCedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

vraNasya vibhAgaM darCayitvA sAdhyasya cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|

	 nijasya prAdhAnyAt prathamanirNayaH| sa ca yataH CophapUrvako bhavatyata ucyate||1||

 vraNasya CophAvasthAyAM Castrakarmavidhau Cvayathucikitsite ca sAdhanamuddiSTam||2||

vraNasya CophAvasthAyAmityAdi subodham||2||

 tatrApatarpaNamevAdau pradhAnatamam||3||  api ca-doSocchrAyopaCAntyarthamupadiSTaM yathAyatham||3||  avekSya dehaprANAdIn karttavyamapatarpaNam||3||

apatarpaNaM sarvaM laGghanam| api cetyapatarpaNavibhAgasamuccayAya| doSANAmucchrAyasyopaCAntyarthaM yadapatarpaNamupadiSTaM taddehAdInavekSya yathAyathaM kartavyam||3||

 rAgasaMrambharahitAH parimlAnA hRtACrayAH||4||  sadyaH CAmyanti CuddhAnAM vraNAH CophACca dehinAm||4||

rAga ityAdinA CodhanAkhyasyApatarpaNasya phaladvAreNa guNakIrtanam| CuddhAnAM dehinAM vraNAH CophACca sadyaH CAmyanti||4||

 lepAbhyaGgapariSekAn yathoktAMCca prayojayet||5||  yathAmbubhiH sicyamAnaH CAntimagnirniyacchati||5||  doSAgnirevaM sahasA pralepAdyaiH prayojitaiH||5||

tatra ca vraNe lepAdIn yathoktAn sAmAnyaviCeSata uktAn prayojayet| yathetyAdinA dRSTAntapUrvakaM lepAdInAM prabhAvakIrtanam||5||

 pratilomameva cAnulimpennAnulomam||6||  tathA hyauSadhaM samyagavatiSThate||6||  anupraviCati ca romakUpAn||6||  na tu CuSyadupekSitavyamanyatra pIDayitavyAt||6||  CuSkaM hi dAhoSArAgaCyAvatvaCUlAni vardhayati||6||

pratilomamityAdi subodham| tathApIti pratilomalepane| pIDayitavye vraNe CuSyadupekSitavyameva| anyatra kuto hetoH CuSyadauSadhaM nopekSitavyamityAha-CuSkaM hItyAdi||6||

 yastu CItastanurmuhurmuhuCca prayujyate sa pradeho raktapittatvacAM prasAdakRt||7||  pralepastUSNaH CIto vA bahalaCca tathA vAtaCleSmapraCamanastasyopayogaH kSatAkSateSu||7||  yastu kSateSUpayujyate sa bhUyaH kalka iti saMjJA labhate||7||

yastu CItAdiguNaH punaH punaCca prayujyate sa raktAdiprasAdakRt evambhUtasya pradeha ityAkhyA| yastUSNAdiguNastatheti punaH punaryujyate sa pralepAkhyo vAtaCleSmapraCamanaH| tasya pralepasya kSate cAkSate copayogaH| subodham| bhUya iti punaH pralepasaMjJAyAM sthitAyAm||7||

 daCavidhaCca samAsAdAlepaH||8||  tadyathA-snaihiko nirvApaNaH prasAdanaH stambhano vilAyanaH pAcanaH pIDanaH Codhano ropaNaH savarNIkaraNaCca||8||

samAsAt saGkSepataH snaihikAdibhedena daCavidha Alepo nAmabhireva vyAkhyAtArthaH||8||

 tatra vAte snigdhadravyaiH snehADhyaiH snehenaiva snaihikaH||9||  pitte pittaprAye va Cophe viSAgnikSAradagdhe ca CitairnirvApaNaH||9||  sa eva cAntarduSTe rakte prasAdanaH||9||  sa eva ca punarasrAtipravRttau stambhanasajJH||9||  CleSmamedobhUyiSThe CItaiCcAvidagdhe piSTalabdhe grathite vA rUkSairvilAyanaH||9||  taireva ca vidagdhe pAcanaH||9||  sUkSmAsye vraNe rUkSaiH picchilaiCca pIDanaH||9||  aCuddhe yathAsvamupadiSTaiH CodhanaH||9||  Cuddhe ropaNaH||9||  rUDhe ca savarNIkaraNaH||9||  nAmabhireva caiSAM svarUpamAkhyAtam||9||

tatretyAdinA daCavidhAnAmAlepAnAM viSayo dravyaM cAkhyAyate| sa eva sa eveti yathoktalakSaNo nirvApaNaH| avidagdhaH parivAsenA~aprAptapAkAvasthaH| taireveti CItAdiguNaiH| aCuddha ityAdinA CodhanAdInAM krameNa prayogakathanam||9||

 na ca pradehaM rAtrau prayuJjIta||10||  mA bhUcchaityapihitasyoSmaNo bahiranissaraNAdvikAraparivRddhiH||10||

rAtrau pradehaM na prayuJjIta| kA yuktirityAha-mA bhUcchaitya ityAdi| rAtriCaityena CarIroSmaNaH kRtapidhAnasya sutarAM bahiranissaraNAdvikAraparivRddhirmA bhUditi|| 10||

vraNapratiSedhaH

 puSkalAvatastu paThati-

	tamasA pihitA hyUSmA romakUpairanAvRtaiH||11||  lepAdvinaiva niryAti rAtrau nAlepayedataH||11||

puSkalAvatanAmA RSistu paThatItyanena rAtrau lepapratiSedhe yuktyantarapradarCanaM karoti| yadrAtrau tamasA pihitaH CarIroSmA~anAvRtai romakUpairlepAdvinaiva niryAtyato nAlepayet||11||

 na ca paryuSitaM lepaM dadyAt bhUyastameva vA||12||  vyamlaH paryuSito hi syAd bhraSTavIryastathetaraH||12||

na cetyAdi subodham| paryUSitaM hyaniSTham| bhUyastameveti yo dattaH||12||

 Cophe vraNe ca kaThine vivarNe vedanAnvite||13||  saviSe ca viCeSeNa jalajAdyairharedasRk||13||  vedanAyAH praCAntyarthaM pAkasyA~aprAptaye~api ca||13||

Cophe vraNe vA kaThinAdiguNe jalajAdyairasrAharaNe kimprayojanamityAha-vedanAyA ityAdi|

	 (atra viCeSa Cabdena sarvadhAtudUSakasyApi viSasya viCeSAdraktadUSakatvaM sUcitam)||13||

 nirvApaNAn punaCcAtra nyagrodhAdyaiH suCItalAn||14||  kuryAt pradehasekAdIn saghRtakSIraCarkarAn||14||  nyagrodhodumbarACvatthaplakSavetasavalkalaiH||14||  pradeho bhUrisarpirbhiH CophanirvApaNaH param||14||  pradehaH sasitastadvat saktavo madhukaM ghRtam||14||

atra punaCca visrAvite rakte nirvApaNAn pUrvoktalakSaNAn suCItalAn pradehAdIn ghrutAdiyuktAn kuryAt| kairauCadhairityAha-nyagrodhAdyairnyagrodhodumbaretyAdibhiH| tAnyeva paThati-nyagrodhAdInAM valkalaistvagbhirbhUrisarpirbhiH pradehaH paraM CophanirvApaNaH| subodham| 
(saktvAdibhiH sitAsahitaH pradehastadvat pUrvaguNaH)||14||

 vAtolbaNAnAM stabdhAnAM kaThinAnAM mahArujAm||15||  srutAsRjAM ca CophAnAM vraNAnAmapi cedRCAm||15||  grAmyAnUpaudakAmiSaveCavArakRsarApAyasotkArikAbhiH svedo yojyaH||15||

vAtolbaNAdInAM CophAnAM vA vraNAnAM vA grAmyAdimAMsaveCavArAdibhirutkArikAbhiH svedo yojyaH||15||

 sadAhaCUlAMstu tilAnatasIMCca bhRSTvA payasi nirvApya tenaiva kSIreNa piSTvA pralepayet||16||  valAmadhukapRCniparNIcchinnaruhAbhIrujIvantICarkarAmadanakSIramahAsnehasiddhotkArikA kavoSNA CUladAhaharA||16||  tadvanmadhukayavacUrNatailasarpirbhiH koSNa AlepaH||16||  tathA satilo mudgapAyasamupanAhaH||16||  daCamUlasiddhena sukhoSNenAmbhasA payasA vA ghRtatailAbhyAM vA pariSekaH Cophe vraNe vA dAhaCUlaghnaH||16||

sadAhaCUlAniti CophAn vA vraNAn vA| subodham| nirvApya payasi kSiptvA| valAdisiddhotkArikA kavoSNA satI CUladAhaharA| utkArikA svinnapiNDI| madhukAdibhiH koSNa Alepastadvaditi CUladAhaharaH| tathaiva tilamudgAbhyAm pAyasenopanAhaH|

	 daCamUlasiddhena sukhoSNenAmbhasA pariSekaH| payasA vA daCamUlasiddhena sukhoSNena, ghRtenam tailena vA, dvAbhyAM vA, pariSekaH Cophe dAhaCUlaghno vraNe vA||16||

 sthirANAM mandavedanAnAM CophAnAM vimlApanaM kAryam||17||  abhyajya svedayitvA ca veNunADyA tataH CanaiH||17||  vimlApanArthaM mRdnIyAttalenAGguSThakena vA||17||  tathA~a~asphotapatramasUrakalkenA~a~alepaH||17||  susiddhapiSTaiH saghRtairmudgayavagodhUmairvA||17||

sthirAdiguNAnAM CophAnAM vimlApanaM kAryam| vimlApanaM vilayanam| abhyajyetyAdinA tadevocyate| subodham| talo hastatalaH| (abhyajya vAtakaphaghnaiH snehairabhyaGgaM kRtvA piNDadravanADyAdyanyatamena svedena svedayitvA| caCabdaH samuccaye| tataH svedAnantaraM vimlApanArthaM vilayanArthaM veNunADyAdyanyatamena mandaM mandaM vimRdnIyAnmardayedityarthaH)| subodham| Asphoto~arkaH mudgAdibhiH usiddhAdiguNaiH pralepaH||17||

 vilIyate sa cennaiva tatastamupanAhayet||18||  avidagdhastathA CAntiM vidagdhaH pAkamaCnute||18||  CigruCaNaphalacitrakakiNvaniSpAvasarSapatilAtasIsaktukolagRhadhUmairamlapiSTaiH sukhoSNaiH snigdhaiH salavaNairutkArikAM kRtvA tathA pralipyairaNDapatreNAvacchAdya badhnIyAt||18||

sa cet sthiratvAdiguNaH Copho na vilIyate tatastamupanAhayet badhnIyAt tathetyupanAhena avidagdho~abhinavaH CophaH CAntimaCnute vidagdhaH pAkAbhimukhaH pAkamaCnute|  CigrvAdibhirutkArikayA pralipyairaNDapatreNAcchAdya vadhnIyAt||18||

 pAkAbhimukhe ca Cophe yatheSTamAturaM bhojayet pAcanArthaM pAkavedanACastrakarmasahanArthaM ca||19||

pAkAbhimukhe sophe pAcanAdyarthaM vaidya AturaM yatheSTaM bhojayet||19||

 pakve tu yathoktena vidhinA CastramavacArayet||20||

vraNapratiSedhaH

 supakve piNDite Cophe pIDanairupapIDite||21||  dAraNaM dAraNArhasya doSapAkoddhate hitam||21||

yastu CophaH pakvaH san piNDito na svayameva dIryate tasmin Cophe pIDanairlepaH pIDite doSe ca pAkenoddhate dAraNArhasya puMso dAraNaH hitaM yenAvadIryate| dAraNArhaH sUtra uktaH||21||

 citrakacirabilvadantIkaravIramUlakapotapaGkagRdhrapurISairguggulvatasIsnuhIkSIrapalACakSArasuvarNakSIrIdakSaCakRnmukUlakairvA kSArauSadhairvA kSAreNa vA||22||

pUyagarbhatvAdiyuktAn CophAn vakSyamANaiH pIDanadravyaiH snehavarjitaiH samantAn pratipIDayet|

	 (pUyagarbhAnantaHpUyasahitAn| aNudvArAn aNumukhatayA~antarAntarAvaruddhapUyAsrAvAn| sotsaGgAnutsaGgasahitAn| utsaGgAnutsaGgasahitAn| utsaGgA unnatiH| CuSkasya pUyasya saMCleSa iti kecit| marmagAn pAkAdinA samprAptamarmAn| apiCabdaH samuccaye)|

	 pIDanArthaM ca CuSyantaM pralepaM samupekSeta| tathA hi pIDayet| enaM ca pIDanIyaM CophaM mukhe naivA~a~alimpet| tena hi doSaH prasicyate sravati|

	 (pIDanaM prati pralepaM CuSyantaM samupekSeta pIDanaviSayaM pralepaM CuSyantaM CoSaM gacchantaM samupekSeta nApanayedityarthaH| CuSyantamityuktatvAdeva CuSkasyAnupekSaNIyatvamapyarthAt gamyate| enaM pIDanIyaM CophaM mukhe vraNamukhe naivAlimpet na pralepayet| tathA evaMvidhe sati doSaH antargataH pUyAkhyo malaH prasicyate prasravati| 'AlepaH CuSko~avapIDya pUyaM bahirniSkAsayati yatastadavapIDanaM' iti jejjaTaH)|

	 atha kiM tat prapIDanamityAha-kalAyetyAdi| picchilAnAM CAlmalyAdInAM dravyANAM tvaco mUlAni ca|| 23||

 vivarNAn picchilAn pUtigandhIn kledarujAvataH||24||  vraNAnaCuddhAn vijJAya CodhanairebhirAcaret||24||  CaGkhinyaGkolasumanaH karavIrasuvarcalAH||24||  triphalA khadiro dArvI kolapatraM palaGkaSA||24||  prakSAlane kaSAyANi vargaCcAragvadhAdikaH||24||

vivarNAdiguNAn vraNAnata eva cACuddhaniti vijJAya ebhirvakSyamANaiH CodhanairupAcaret| CaGkhinItyAdi| CaGkhinyAdIni kaSAyarasAni ca dravyANyAragvadhAdiko vargaCcA~aCuddhAnAM vraNAnAM prakSAlane yojyaH||24||

 paTolItilayaSTyAhvatrivRddantIniCAdvayam||25||  nimbapatrANi cAlepaH sapaTurvraNaCodhanaH||25||

paTolyAdInAM salavaNa Alepo vraNaCodhanaH| 
(paTolyAdikaM nimbapatrANi ca AlepaH etat sarvamAlepanadravyamityarthaH| sapaTuH saindhavopeto vraNaCodhano bhavati)||25||

 ajagandhAjaCrRGgI ca gavAkSI lAGgalI niCA||26||  pUtIkaCcitrakaH pAThA paTolIvellareNukAH||26||  kaTutrayaM yavakSAro lavaNAni surASTrajA||26||  nikumbhakumbhakAsIsaharitAlamanaCCilAH||26||  kalkAjyatailarasajAcUrNavartiSu bheSajam||26||

ajagandhAdIni kalkAdiSu prayogeNa CophAnAM vraNAnAJca bheSajam| rasajA rasakriyA| vartirvraNanidheyA cailamayI||26||

 tatra gambhIreSu pittAtmakeSu dAhapAkavatsu vraNeSvatIkSNoSNairebhiH kArpAsIphalamiCraM kalkaM ghRtaM ca sAdhayitvA yojayet||27||

tatretyAdinA kalkAdaya ucyante| gambhIratvAdiyukteSu vraNeSvebhirityajagandhAdibhiH pUtIkAditIkSNoSNadravyarahitaiH kRtaM kArpAsIphalamiCraM kalkaM ghRtaM ca sAdhayitvA yojayet||27||

 utsannamAMseSvalpasrAveSu rUkSeSu tilApAmArgabRhatIdvayayuktaiH pUrvoktaiH pUtIkAdibhiH sArSapaM tailaM ca||28||

 pracalapradeCAjeSu kledabahuleSutsannAsthiramAseSu tailena cAsiddhyatsu rasakriyAM kuryAt||29||  yathoktAnAM saMCodhanauSadhAnAM kaSAye punaH parisrAvyAdhiCrRte manaCCilAtuvarIkAsIsacUrNapratIvApasiddhAM ca mAtuluGgarasopetAM sakSaudrAM yuJjIta||29||

pracalapradeCajatvAdiyukteSu vraNeSu ye ca tailena na Cuddhyanti teSu ca rasakriyAM kuryAt| kAmityAha-yathoktAnAmityAdi||29||

 medoyukteSu gambhIreSu klediSu kalkaiCcAsiddhyatsuvacAyAM saindhave kiNve kAsIse rajanIdvaye||30||  CodhanAgryeSu cAnyeSu cUrNaM kurvIta Codhanam||30||

 antaHCalyAnaNudvArAn gambhIrAn mAMsasaMCritAn||31||  sandhimarmaniviSTAMCca CodhayedvartibhirvraNAn||31||

 vAtAphiphUtAn sAsrAvAn dhUpayedugravedanAn||32||  SrIveSTakasarjarasasAladevadAruSiMSapAKadirAsanakaiDaryasArayavamadhUcCiSTaphUrjapatrapakSaumasarpiphiH||32||

vAtAbhibhUtatvAdiguNAn vraNAn CrIveSTakAdibhirdhUpayet| ( ni ) CrIveSTako vAyasikaH CrIvAsaCceti CabditaH| sAlAdInAM sAraH| kaiDaryaH karaJjaH| (vAtAbhibhUtAn udriktavAtAn| sAsrAvAnAsrAvayuktAn| AsrAvaH pUyavahanam| ugrA atiCayitA vedanA pIDAviCeSo yeSAM tAnugravedanAn)||32||

 nirvApayed bhRCaM CItaiH pittaraktaviSolbaNAn||33||

pittAdyulbaNAn vraNAn bhRCaM CItairnirvApayet| 
(udriktapittAn ulbaNaraktAn viSayuktAMCca vraNAn CItaiCcandanoCIrAdiCItaladravyairbhRCamatiCayena nirvApayet| lepasekAdinoSmopaCamanaM kuryAdityarthaH )||33||

 CuSkAlpamAMse gambhIre vraNa utsAdanaM hitam||34||  aCvagandhApAmArgatAlapatrIsuvarcalAbalAtibalAnantAdhAtakIkusumasamaGgAbhiH padmakAdivargeNa nyagrodhAdinA ca kalkastathA sarpIMSyabhyaJjanArthe||34||

CuSkamAMsAdike vraNe utsAdanaM mAMsavardhanaM hitam| aCvagandhAdibhiH kalko vA sarpIMSi vA utsAdanAni| (CuSkamAMse alpamAMse gambhIre ca vraNe| gambhIraM nimnam)||34||

 adyAnmAMsAdamAMsAni vidhinopahitAni ca||35||  mAMsaM mAMsAdamAMsena vardhate CuddhacetasaH||35||

utsAdanArthaM mAMsAdAnAM siMhaCyenAdInAM mAMsAni vidhAnenopahitAni saMskRtAnyadyAt| yataH CuddhacetasaH CokAdirahitasya mAMsAdamAmsenAvaCyaM vraNe mAMsaM varddhate||35||

 utsannamRdumAMsAnAM vraNAnAmavasAdanam||36||  saindhavakAsIsasumanomukulaguggulAgnicitrakAgnimanthadantICirISakaraJjaphalabhUrjagranthikukkuTANDAtvakkapotakalaviGkapurISanepAlIharitAlacUrNAni sakSaudrANi||36||

utsannamAMsAdInAM vraNAnAmavasAdanaM vraNamAMsanimnIkaraNaM hitam| kiM tadityAha - saindhavetyAdi| subodham| kalaviGko grAmacaTakaH||36||

 saruje kaThine stabdhe rUkSe CuSyati ca vraNe||37||  mArdavajananArthaM vraNAvirodhi vAtaghnasiddhasya sarpiSaH pAnam||37||  tadvidhaireva ca siddhaM tailamabhyaGgaH||37||  pUrvoktACca svedAH||37||  tathA sarpirmajjavasAbhirdhUpAH susnigdhasaktusaindhavakiNvatilapiSTakRsarapAyasAnUpaveCavArAH kiJciduSNo bahuCaH pralepAH||37||  pittavidradhivIsarpaCophakuSThaghRtAni ca||37||  sarvavraNeSu yojyAni pAnasekapralepane||37||

sarujAdike vraNe vraNAvirodhibhiH kAJcikAdirahitairvAtaharaidravyaiH siddhasya sarpiSaH pAnam| tadvidhairiti vraNAvirodhibhirvAtaharaiH pUrvoktA iti CophAvasthoktAH|

	 pittajAnAM vidradhyAdInAM yAni ghRtAnyuktAni tAni sarvavraNeSu pAnAdiSu yojyAni||37||

 atimRmAMseSu vraNeSu dAruNIkaraNArthaM triphalAlodhrAgrasarjajambUpriyaGgvaCokavalkalAni||38||  saurASTRrIkAsIsarocanAvacUrNanam||38||  sArairgandhaiCca dhUpaH||38||

atimRdumAMseSu vraNeSu dAruNatvApAdanAya triphalAdikalkalAni nAnAprayogairyojyAni| saurASTryAdyavacUrNanaM hitam| sArairagarucandanAdibhirgandhadravyaiCca mAMsyAdibhirdhUpaH||38||

 utsannamAMsAn kaThinAn kaNDUyuktAMCcirotthitAn||39||  vraNAn suduHkhaCodhyAMCca CodhayetkSArakarmaNA||39||
