 sravanto~aCmarijA mUtraM ye cAnye raktavAhinaH||40||  chinnACca sandhayo yeSAM yathoktairye ca sAdhanaiH||40||  sAdhyamAnA na sidhyanti CodhyAH syuste~agnikarmaNA||40||

ye vraNA aCmarijAH santo mUtraM sravanti anye ca ye raktavAhino yeSAM ca sandhayaCchinnAH ye ca sarvairuktaiH sAdhanairupakramairna sidhyanti te sarve agnikarmaNA CodhyAH syuriti sambhAvanAyAm||40||

uttarasthAnam

vraNapratiSedhaH

 vraNAnAmatha CuddhAnAm ropaNAni prayojayet||41||  asanAdinyagrodhAdivargadhavasallakIkuTajatvaco maJjiSThAsamaGgAmRtACvagandhA~a~aragvadhadhAtakIpuSpANi padmakAdiCca prakSAlanAdiSu saptasu prayojyA iti||41||

evamante CuddhAnAM vraNAnAM ropaNaM yojyam| kiM tadityAha-asanAdItyAdi| asanAdikaM padmakAdyantaM prakSAlanAdiSu saptasu prakSAlanA~a~alepaghRtatailarasakriyAcUrNavartiSu yojayet||41||

 bhavanti cAtra-

	utsannaduSTapiCite saMkliSTadhyAmaCoNite||42||  vraNe pracchardanaM CastaM kaphaduSTe viCeSataH||42||  virecanaM pittaduSTe dIrghakAlAnubandhini||42||  rUkSe savedane bastiradhaHkAye viCeSataH||42||

utsannatvAdiguNe vraNe pracchardanaM Castam| kaphaduSTe vraNe viCeSeNa pracchardanam| vireko bastiCca subodhaH||42||

 jatrUrdhvaje ca Cvayathau kaNDvADhye tIkSNanAvanam||43||  tajja evAnilADhye tu Cvayathau snehanAvanam||43||  tathA saCopharuksrAve dhUmo vAtakapholbaNe||43||  rujAdimiti vaktrasthe yathAsvaM kavalo hitaH||43||

jatrUrdhvaje kaNDvADhye ca Cvayathau tIkSNaM nasyaM Castam| tajja evetyUrdhvajatruja eva CvayathAvanilADhye ca snehanasyam| tathetyUrdhvajatruja eva ca vraNe vAtakapholbaNe CophAdiyukte dhUmaH| vaktrasthe rujAdimati vraNe yathAsvaM doSAdhikyena kavalo hitaH||43||

 dvAvAdyau paJcamUlAkhyau gaNau yaCcAnilApahaH||44||  te vraNe vAtike yojyAH kaSAyAdiSu saptasu||44||  nyagrodhapadmakAdyau tu paitte vargaCca pittajit||44||  AragvadhAdiH CleSmaghnaH kaphe miCrAstu miCraje||44||

dvAvAdyau paJcamUlo mahadhrasvAkhyau| anilApaho gaNaH CodhanAdyukta ityete vAtike vraNe saptasu kaSAyAdiSu yojyAH| kaSAyaH kSAlane| nyagrodhapadmakAdyau gaNau pittajidvargaCca pittavraNe saptasu kaSAyAdiSu yojyaH| AragvadhAdirgaNaH CleSmaghno vargaCca kaphaje| miCraje vraNe yathAyogaM miCrAste yogAH||44||

 piSTo~amlairvAtike lepastailasarpirvasAyutaH||45||  ghanaH koSNaCca paitte tu payaHpiSTo ghRtAnvitaH||45||  tanuvastrAntaraH CaCvaduSNo gomUtrapeSitaH||45||  rUkSastailena vA snigdho bahalaH kaphaje hitaH||45||

piSTo~amlairityAdinA vAtAdiSu lepavidhAnaM subodham| ghanaH koSNaCcetyevamantaM vAte| tanuvastrAntara ityevamantaM pitte| kaphe CaCvaduSNa ityAdi| bahalo ghanaH||45||

 apetapUtimAMsAMnAM mAMsasthAnAmarohatAm||46||  kalkaM saMrohaNaM kuryAttilAnAM madhukAnvitam||46||  snigdhoSNatiktamadhurakaSAyatvaiH sa sarvajit||46||  sa kSaudranimbapatrAbhyAM yuktaH saMCodhanaH param||46||  pUrvAbhyAM sarpiSA cAsau yuktaH syAdACu ropaNaH||46||  tilavadyavakalkaM tu kecidicchanti tadvidaH||46||

mAMsasthAnAM vraNAnAmapagatapUtimAMsAnAmarohatAM satAM tilAnAM kalkaM madhukAnvitaM saMrohaNaM kuryAt| sa hi tilakalkaH snigdhAdiguNatvAt sarvadoSajit bhavati|

	 samadhukAnvitastilakalkaH kSaudranimbapatrAbhyAM yukta: paraM saMCodhanaH| asau ca madhukAnvitastilakalkaH pUrvAbhyAmeva kSaudranimbapatrAbhyAM sarpiSA ca yukta ACu ropaNo bhavati| kecidAcAryA ropaNavidastilakalkaprakAreNa yavakalkamapIcchanti||46||

 sAsrapittaviSAgantugambhIrAn soSmaNo vraNAn||47||  kSIraropaNabhaiSajyaCrRtenAjyena ropayet||47||  ropaNauSadhasiddhena tailena kaphavAtajAn||47||

asrAdiyuktAn vraNAn kSIreNa ropaNabhaiSajyaiCca CrRtanAjyena ropayet| kaphavAtajAn vraNAn ropaNairauSadhaiH siddhena tailena ropayet||47||

 avadhyAnAM calasthAnAM CuddhAnAM vA praduSyatAm||48||  yathAsvaM ropaNaiH kuryAdrasajAM saniCAdvayaiH||48||  samAnAM sthiramAMsAnAM tvaksthAnAM cUrNa iSyate||48||  nIrujAmavagADhAnAM CuddhAnAM vartayo hitAH||48||

avadhyAdInAM vraNAnAM yathAsvaM doSAdyapekSayA ropaNauSadhairharidrAdvayayuktai rasajAM rasakriyAM kuryAt| yathAsvametaireva tvauSadhaiH samatvAdiyuktAnAM vraNAnAM cUrNa iSyate| yathAsvaM taireva nIrujAdInAM vraNAnAM vartayo hitAH||48||

 samaGgAmocasaralasomavalkAH sacandanAH||49||  padmakAdiCca kalko~ayaM paramaM ropaNo~athavA||49||  puNDrAhvatilajIvantIgojihvAdhAtakIbalAH||49||

samaGgAdibhiH padmakAdigaNAntaiH kalkaH paramaM vraNaropaNaH| somavalkaH kaTphalatvak| athavA puNDrAhvAdInAM balAntAnAM kalkaH paramaM vraNaropaNaH||49||

 prapauNDarIkamadhukakAkolIdvayacandanaiH||50||  sAdhitaM tailamAjyaM vA tadvatkampillakena vA||50||  dUrvArasena vA dArvyAstvacA vA vraNaropaNam||50||

prapauNDarIkAdibhiH sAdhitaM tailaM ghRtaM vA tadvaditi paramaM vraNaropaNam| kampillakena vA sAdhitaM tailaM vAjyaM vA| dUrvArasena vA sAdhitaM dArvItvacA vA||50||

uttarasthAnam

sadyovraNapratiSedhaH

 athAtaH sadyovraNapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

nijavraNamuktvA~a~agantuvraNaniCcayAyA~adhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 AgantorvraNasya prAgupadiSTaH sambhavaH||2||  tatra tatra yathA-
yathaM pratIkAraCca||2||

AgantorvraNasya vraNavibhaktivijJAnIye sambhava upadiSTaH CastrAdinA|  tatra ca sUtracikitsitAdau yathAyathaM pratIkAraCcopadiSTaH||2||

 vividhAbhighAtajanitaistu sabahvAkRtibhirapi sadyovraNairadhiSThitamaGgaM samAsAt trividhaM bhavati chinnaM viddhaM piccitaM ca||3||  trividhamapi caitattvagAdikSaNanAt kSatamityucyate||3||

vividhAkRtibhiraghAtairjanitatvAt suhvAkRtibhiradhiSThitamaGgaM samAsAt saMkSepatastrividhaM bhavati chinnAdibhedena|  chinnaM dvidhAbhUtam|  viddhaM chidritam|  prahAreNa pIDanena vA cUrNikRtaM piccitam|  etacca trayamapi tvagAdikSaNanAt kSatamityucyate||3||

 tatra chinnaM paJcadhA bhidyate||4||  tadyathA-tvakchede ghRSTam||4||  kiJcinmAMsasyApyavakRttam||4||  tasyaivAvagADhasya viCeSeNa viCAlamAyataM ca vicchinnam||4||  kiJcicheSeSvasthisnAyvAdiSu vilambitam||4||  aCeSAGgacchede pAtitam||4||

tatretyAdi subodham|  tadyathetyAdinA paJcAnAM bhedAnAM nAma ca lakSaNaM ca|  tvaGmAtravicchede ghRSTamucyate|  mAMsasyApi kiJcidvicchede avakRtaM bhavati|  tasyaiva mAMsasyAvagADhasyAtipraviSTasya prahAraviSeNa viCAlaM vistIrNamAyataM dIrghaM ca yadbhavati tannAmnA vicchinnam|  asthyAdiSu stokamAtrayA~avaCeSeSu yadbhavati tannAmnA vilambitam|  aCeSAGgasya vicchede sati pAtitaM bhavati|  iti paJcadhA chinnam||4||

 viddhaM tvaSTavidham||5||  tatra mAMsamanuprApte Caley~anuviddham||5||  dvitIye pArCve tvacamunnAmyottuNDitam||5||  kiJcinnissRte~atividdham||5||  sarvathA nissRte nirviddham||5||  etadeva caturvidhaM 
koSThe pRthumukhairvA praharaNaiH kuntAdibhirviddhamanu bhinnaM
bhinnottuNDitamatibhinnaM nirbhinnamiti ca saMjJA labhate||5||

viddhaM punaranuviddhamityAdinA caturvidhaM  koSThe~anubhinnamityAdinA caturvidhamityaSTavidham|  tatretyAdinASTau bhedA ucyante|  mAMsamanuprApte Calye yadviddhaM tadanuviddhamucyate|  yataH praviSTaM tato dvitIyapArCvena tvaccamunnAmyottuNDitaM tvagunnAmenAnumitamanissRtaCalyamukhaM yadviddhaM tannAmnottuNDitam|  tvacamapi vipATya kiJcinniHsRte Calye tannamnAtividdham|  ekataH praviSTe~anyataH sarvathA nirgate Calye yadviddhaM tannAmnA nirviddham|  etadevAnuviddhamityAdinA caturvidham|  koSThe vA bhUtamanyasminnaGge vA pRthumukhairvA kuntAdibhiH praharaNairbhUtaM krameNAnubhinnabhinnottuNDitAtibhinnanirbhinnAkhyaM saMjJAcatuSTayaM ca labhate|  tena pUrvacatuSTayaM koSThavarjite~aGge laghumukhaCalyakRtaM bhavatItyuktamityaSTau viddhabhedAH| (koSThAdanyatra sthUlAsyaCalyaviddhaM koSThe ubhayathA viddhaM ca bhinnAdisaMjJakam||5||

 yat punaH prahAreNa pIDanena vA gAtramasthiyuktamasRGmajjaplutaM pRthutAmApadyate tat piccitam||6||  tad dvividham||6||  savraNamavraNaJca||6||  tatra savraNamuktam||6||  avraNaM punarbhaGeSUpadekSyate||6||

yat punargAtraM mudgarAdiprahAreNa vA yantrapIDanena vA asthiyuktamasRGmajjaplutaM cAnu pRthutAM vistIrNatAmApannaM tat piccitaM gAtramucyate|  tacca piccitaM savraNAvraNabhedena dvividham|  tatra yatsavraNaM piccitaM tatsampratyeva piccitalakSaNenoktam|  avraNantu bhaGgaprakAratvAt bhaGgeSUpadekSyate||6||

 bhavati cAtra ----

sadyaH sadyovraNaM siJcedyaSTImadhukasarpiSA||7||  tIvravyathaM kavoSNena balAtailena vA punaH||7||  kSatoSmaNo nigrahArthaM tatkAlavisRtasya ca||7||  kaSAyaCItamadhurasnigdhA lepAdayo hitAH||7||  sadyovraNeSvAyateSu sandhAnArthaM viCeSataH||7||  madhusarpirprayuJjIta pittaghnIMCca himAH kriyAH||7||  sasaMrambheSu karttavyamUrdhvaM cAdhaCca Codhanam||7||  upavAso hitaM bhaktaM pratataM raktamokSaNam||7||  ghRSTapiccitayoreSa sutarAmiSyate vidhiH||7||  tayorhyalpaM sravatyasraM pAkastenACu jAyate||7||  atyarthamasraM sravati prAyaCo~anyatra vikSate||7||  tato raktakSayAdvAyau kupite~atirujAkare||7||  snehabastiJca kurvIta vAtaghnauSadhasAdhitam||7||  iti sAptAhikaH proktaH sadyovraNahito vidhiH||7||  saptAhAt gatavege tu pUrvoktaM vidhimAcaret||7||

sadyovraNaM yaSTImadhukasiddhena taccUrNayuktena vA sarpiSA sadya eva siJcet|  athavA tIvravyathaM sadyovraNaM koSNena garbhavyApaccAriroktena balAtailena siJcet|  punaH kSatoSmaNaH abhighAtajasyoSmaNastatkAlavisRtasya nigrahArthaM kaSAyAdiguNA lepAdayo hitAH|  

	AyateSu punaH sadyovraNeSu viCeSataH sandhAnArthaM madhasarpiH prayuJjIta|  sarvACca pittaghnIH kriyAH CItAH sandhAnArthaM prayujJIta|  (atra viCeSakathanAt madhusarpiSaH sarveSu vraNeSUpayojyatvaM sUcitam|  pittaghnICceti ca CabdAdraktaprasAdanaM ca )|  

	sasaMrambheSu saMrambhayukteSu vraNeSUrdhvamadhaCca vamanavirecanAbhyAM CodhanaM kartavyam|  upavAsaCca kartavyaH|  hitaM pathyaM bhaktaM bhojanaM santataM raktamokSaNaM ca kartavyam|

	eSa ca CodhanAdiko vidhirghRSTe piccite ca sutarAmiSyate|  yatastayorghRSTapiccitayoH svabhAvAdevAlpamasraM sravati tena hetunA srutaCiSTenAsreNACu pAko jAyate|  tasmAt pAkarakSaNArthaM CodhanAdikaM kuryAdityarthaH|

	punaCca ghRSTAt piccitAccAnyasmin vikSate prAyo~atyarthamasraM sravati tato heto raktakSayAdvAyau kupite~atirujAkare ca sati snehapAnAdikaM vAtaghnauSadhasAdhitaM snehabastiM ca kurvIta|

	ityanantaroktaprakAreNa sadyovraNahito vidhiH sAptAhikaH proktaH|  saptAhaM prayojanaM yasyAsau sAptAhikaH|  tataH saptAhAdanantaraM gatavege pUrvoktamanantarAdhyAyoktaM vidhimAcaret|| 7||

 kSAlanAbhyaGgalepeSu tasmin duSTe prayojayet||8||  AragvadhAdikaM vargaM surasAdiM ca Codhanam||8||  kalkasrivRttilairaNDapatrairyojyaH sasaindhavaiH||8||  vAtike paittike kumbhayaSTyAhvarajanItilaiH||8||  ClaiSmike tilatejohvAnikumbhasvarjikAgnikaiH||8||  eSa duSTavraNavidhiH kuSThamehavraNeSvapi||8||  prAyaH sAmAnyakarmedaM .......................||8||

tasminniti vraNe duSTe sAmAnyenAragvadhAdivargaM surasAdivargaM ca  kSAlanAdiSu CodhanaM yuJjyAt|  vAtike vraNe trivRdAdibhiH kalko yojyaH paittike kumbhAdibhiH|  ClaiSmike tilAdibhiH|

	eSa ca vAtAdiduSTavraNavidhiH kuSThavraNeSvapi yojyaH mehavraNeSvapi piTakAjeSu|  idaM ca karma vegAnantaramuktaM tat prAyaH sAmAnyataH sAdhAraNatayA vijJeyam||8||

 ....................... vakSyate tu pRthak pRthak||9||  ghRSTe rujaM nigRhyACu vraNe cUrNAni nikSipet||9||  kalkAdInyavakRtte tu vicchinnapravilambinoH||9||  sIvanaM vidhinoktena bandhanaM cAnupIDanam||9||

yattu viCeSeSu tadvakSyate ghRSTa ityAdinA|  ghRSTe vraNe pUrvoktena yaSTImadhukasarpiSA rujaM nigRhya yathAyathaM cUrNAni yojayet|  avakRte tu rujaM nigRhya kalkAdIni|  vicchinne pravilambini ca sIvanAdikaM yojayet sUtrasthAnoktena vidhinA||9||

 asAdhyaM sphuTitaM netramudIrNaM lambate tu yat||10||  sanniveCya yathAsthAnamavyAviddhasiraM bhiSak||10||  pIDayet pANinA padmapatravyavahitena tat||10||  tato~asya secane nasye tarpaNe ca hitaM haviH||10||  vipakvamAjaM yaSTyAhvajIvakarSabhakolpalaiH||10||  sapayaskaiH paraM taddhi sarvanetrAbhighAtajit||10||  galapIDAvasanne~akSNi vamanotkAsanakSavAH||10||  prANAyAmo~athavA kAryaH kriyA ca kSatanetravat||10||

vicchinnapravilambiprasaGgAnnayanayorvicchinnasyAsAdhyatvaM pravilambinaH sthApanopAyaM ca darCayati|

	netraM tu yatprahAreNa sphuTitaM madhyena tadasAdhyam|  yattu netramabhihatamudIrNaM sthAnAt paribhraSTaM sallambate tannetraM yathApUrvasthAnaM sanniveCyAdvyAviddhasiram kRtvA bhiSak padmapatravyavahitena pANinA pIDayet|  tataH pIDanAdanantaraM asyAbhihatAkSasya AjaM havirghRtaM yaSTyAdibhiH sakSIrairvipakvaM siddhaM secanAdiSu hitam|  taddhi yaSTyAdihaviH sarvanetrAbhighAtajit|

	galapIDanenAtyavasanne~akSNi vamanAdayo yojyAH|  prANAyAmo~atha vA kAryaH|  anantaroktakSatanetravacca kriyA kAryA|  (atra prANAyAmaCabdena CvAsanirodhamAtrameva gRhyate|  prANAyAmena ruddhontarAdhmAto vAyurbahirgantuM mArgaM mArgayan netraCrotAdisrotAMsyApUrya tatrasthAnAccalitena netrAdyavayavena ruddho nimnaM tadevonnamayet)
||10||

uttarasthAnam

sadyovraNapratiSedhaH

 athAtaH sadyovraNapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

nijavraNamuktvA~a~agantuvraNaniCcayAyA~adhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 AgantorvraNasya prAgupadiSTaH sambhavaH||2||  tatra tatra yathA-
yathaM pratIkAraCca||2||

AgantorvraNasya vraNavibhaktivijJAnIye sambhava upadiSTaH CastrAdinA|  tatra ca sUtracikitsitAdau yathAyathaM pratIkAraCcopadiSTaH||2||

 vividhAbhighAtajanitaistu sabahvAkRtibhirapi sadyovraNairadhiSThitamaGgaM samAsAt trividhaM bhavati chinnaM viddhaM piccitaM ca||3||  trividhamapi caitattvagAdikSaNanAt kSatamityucyate||3||

vividhAkRtibhiraghAtairjanitatvAt suhvAkRtibhiradhiSThitamaGgaM samAsAt saMkSepatastrividhaM bhavati chinnAdibhedena|  chinnaM dvidhAbhUtam|  viddhaM chidritam|  prahAreNa pIDanena vA cUrNikRtaM piccitam|  etacca trayamapi tvagAdikSaNanAt kSatamityucyate||3||

 tatra chinnaM paJcadhA bhidyate||4||  tadyathA-tvakchede ghRSTam||4||  kiJcinmAMsasyApyavakRttam||4||  tasyaivAvagADhasya viCeSeNa viCAlamAyataM ca vicchinnam||4||  kiJcicheSeSvasthisnAyvAdiSu vilambitam||4||  aCeSAGgacchede pAtitam||4||

tatretyAdi subodham|  tadyathetyAdinA paJcAnAM bhedAnAM nAma ca lakSaNaM ca|  tvaGmAtravicchede ghRSTamucyate|  mAMsasyApi kiJcidvicchede avakRtaM bhavati|  tasyaiva mAMsasyAvagADhasyAtipraviSTasya prahAraviSeNa viCAlaM vistIrNamAyataM dIrghaM ca yadbhavati tannAmnA vicchinnam|  asthyAdiSu stokamAtrayA~avaCeSeSu yadbhavati tannAmnA vilambitam|  aCeSAGgasya vicchede sati pAtitaM bhavati|  iti paJcadhA chinnam||4||

 viddhaM tvaSTavidham||5||  tatra mAMsamanuprApte Caley~anuviddham||5||  dvitIye pArCve tvacamunnAmyottuNDitam||5||  kiJcinnissRte~atividdham||5||  sarvathA nissRte nirviddham||5||  etadeva caturvidhaM 
koSThe pRthumukhairvA praharaNaiH kuntAdibhirviddhamanu bhinnaM
bhinnottuNDitamatibhinnaM nirbhinnamiti ca saMjJA labhate||5||

viddhaM punaranuviddhamityAdinA caturvidhaM  koSThe~anubhinnamityAdinA caturvidhamityaSTavidham|  tatretyAdinASTau bhedA ucyante|  mAMsamanuprApte Calye yadviddhaM tadanuviddhamucyate|  yataH praviSTaM tato dvitIyapArCvena tvaccamunnAmyottuNDitaM tvagunnAmenAnumitamanissRtaCalyamukhaM yadviddhaM tannAmnottuNDitam|  tvacamapi vipATya kiJcinniHsRte Calye tannamnAtividdham|  ekataH praviSTe~anyataH sarvathA nirgate Calye yadviddhaM tannAmnA nirviddham|  etadevAnuviddhamityAdinA caturvidham|  koSThe vA bhUtamanyasminnaGge vA pRthumukhairvA kuntAdibhiH praharaNairbhUtaM krameNAnubhinnabhinnottuNDitAtibhinnanirbhinnAkhyaM saMjJAcatuSTayaM ca labhate|  tena pUrvacatuSTayaM koSThavarjite~aGge laghumukhaCalyakRtaM bhavatItyuktamityaSTau viddhabhedAH| (koSThAdanyatra sthUlAsyaCalyaviddhaM koSThe ubhayathA viddhaM ca bhinnAdisaMjJakam||5||

 yat punaH prahAreNa pIDanena vA gAtramasthiyuktamasRGmajjaplutaM pRthutAmApadyate tat piccitam||6||  tad dvividham||6||  savraNamavraNaJca||6||  tatra savraNamuktam||6||  avraNaM punarbhaGeSUpadekSyate||6||

yat punargAtraM mudgarAdiprahAreNa vA yantrapIDanena vA asthiyuktamasRGmajjaplutaM cAnu pRthutAM vistIrNatAmApannaM tat piccitaM gAtramucyate|  tacca piccitaM savraNAvraNabhedena dvividham|  tatra yatsavraNaM piccitaM tatsampratyeva piccitalakSaNenoktam|  avraNantu bhaGgaprakAratvAt bhaGgeSUpadekSyate||6||

 bhavati cAtra ----

sadyaH sadyovraNaM siJcedyaSTImadhukasarpiSA||7||  tIvravyathaM kavoSNena balAtailena vA punaH||7||  kSatoSmaNo nigrahArthaM tatkAlavisRtasya ca||7||  kaSAyaCItamadhurasnigdhA lepAdayo hitAH||7||  sadyovraNeSvAyateSu sandhAnArthaM viCeSataH||7||  madhusarpirprayuJjIta pittaghnIMCca himAH kriyAH||7||  sasaMrambheSu karttavyamUrdhvaM cAdhaCca Codhanam||7||  upavAso hitaM bhaktaM pratataM raktamokSaNam||7||  ghRSTapiccitayoreSa sutarAmiSyate vidhiH||7||  tayorhyalpaM sravatyasraM pAkastenACu jAyate||7||  atyarthamasraM sravati prAyaCo~anyatra vikSate||7||  tato raktakSayAdvAyau kupite~atirujAkare||7||  snehabastiJca kurvIta vAtaghnauSadhasAdhitam||7||  iti sAptAhikaH proktaH sadyovraNahito vidhiH||7||  saptAhAt gatavege tu pUrvoktaM vidhimAcaret||7||

sadyovraNaM yaSTImadhukasiddhena taccUrNayuktena vA sarpiSA sadya eva siJcet|  athavA tIvravyathaM sadyovraNaM koSNena garbhavyApaccAriroktena balAtailena siJcet|  punaH kSatoSmaNaH abhighAtajasyoSmaNastatkAlavisRtasya nigrahArthaM kaSAyAdiguNA lepAdayo hitAH|  

	AyateSu punaH sadyovraNeSu viCeSataH sandhAnArthaM madhasarpiH prayuJjIta|  sarvACca pittaghnIH kriyAH CItAH sandhAnArthaM prayujJIta|  (atra viCeSakathanAt madhusarpiSaH sarveSu vraNeSUpayojyatvaM sUcitam|  pittaghnICceti ca CabdAdraktaprasAdanaM ca )|  

	sasaMrambheSu saMrambhayukteSu vraNeSUrdhvamadhaCca vamanavirecanAbhyAM CodhanaM kartavyam|  upavAsaCca kartavyaH|  hitaM pathyaM bhaktaM bhojanaM santataM raktamokSaNaM ca kartavyam|

	eSa ca CodhanAdiko vidhirghRSTe piccite ca sutarAmiSyate|  yatastayorghRSTapiccitayoH svabhAvAdevAlpamasraM sravati tena hetunA srutaCiSTenAsreNACu pAko jAyate|  tasmAt pAkarakSaNArthaM CodhanAdikaM kuryAdityarthaH|

	punaCca ghRSTAt piccitAccAnyasmin vikSate prAyo~atyarthamasraM sravati tato heto raktakSayAdvAyau kupite~atirujAkare ca sati snehapAnAdikaM vAtaghnauSadhasAdhitaM snehabastiM ca kurvIta|

	ityanantaroktaprakAreNa sadyovraNahito vidhiH sAptAhikaH proktaH|  saptAhaM prayojanaM yasyAsau sAptAhikaH|  tataH saptAhAdanantaraM gatavege pUrvoktamanantarAdhyAyoktaM vidhimAcaret|| 7||

 kSAlanAbhyaGgalepeSu tasmin duSTe prayojayet||8||  AragvadhAdikaM vargaM surasAdiM ca Codhanam||8||  kalkasrivRttilairaNDapatrairyojyaH sasaindhavaiH||8||  vAtike paittike kumbhayaSTyAhvarajanItilaiH||8||  ClaiSmike tilatejohvAnikumbhasvarjikAgnikaiH||8||  eSa duSTavraNavidhiH kuSThamehavraNeSvapi||8||  prAyaH sAmAnyakarmedaM .......................||8||

tasminniti vraNe duSTe sAmAnyenAragvadhAdivargaM surasAdivargaM ca  kSAlanAdiSu CodhanaM yuJjyAt|  vAtike vraNe trivRdAdibhiH kalko yojyaH paittike kumbhAdibhiH|  ClaiSmike tilAdibhiH|

	eSa ca vAtAdiduSTavraNavidhiH kuSThavraNeSvapi yojyaH mehavraNeSvapi piTakAjeSu|  idaM ca karma vegAnantaramuktaM tat prAyaH sAmAnyataH sAdhAraNatayA vijJeyam||8||

 ....................... vakSyate tu pRthak pRthak||9||  ghRSTe rujaM nigRhyACu vraNe cUrNAni nikSipet||9||  kalkAdInyavakRtte tu vicchinnapravilambinoH||9||  sIvanaM vidhinoktena bandhanaM cAnupIDanam||9||

yattu viCeSeSu tadvakSyate ghRSTa ityAdinA|  ghRSTe vraNe pUrvoktena yaSTImadhukasarpiSA rujaM nigRhya yathAyathaM cUrNAni yojayet|  avakRte tu rujaM nigRhya kalkAdIni|  vicchinne pravilambini ca sIvanAdikaM yojayet sUtrasthAnoktena vidhinA||9||

 asAdhyaM sphuTitaM netramudIrNaM lambate tu yat||10||  sanniveCya yathAsthAnamavyAviddhasiraM bhiSak||10||  pIDayet pANinA padmapatravyavahitena tat||10||  tato~asya secane nasye tarpaNe ca hitaM haviH||10||  vipakvamAjaM yaSTyAhvajIvakarSabhakolpalaiH||10||  sapayaskaiH paraM taddhi sarvanetrAbhighAtajit||10||  galapIDAvasanne~akSNi vamanotkAsanakSavAH||10||  prANAyAmo~athavA kAryaH kriyA ca kSatanetravat||10||

vicchinnapravilambiprasaGgAnnayanayorvicchinnasyAsAdhyatvaM pravilambinaH sthApanopAyaM ca darCayati|

uttarasthAnam

sadyovraNapratiSedhaH

 karNe sthAnAccyute syUte srotastailena pUrayet||11||

karNau yadA prahArAdinA bandhanasthAnAccyuto bhavati tadA tasmin yathAsthAnaM niveCya syUte sati karNasrotastailena pUrayet||11||

 kRkATikAyAM chinnAyAM nirgacchatyapi mArute||12||  samaM niveCya badhnIyAtsyUtvA CIghraM nirantaram||12||  Ajena sarpiSA cAtra pariSekaH praCasyate||12||  uttAnonnAni bhuJjIta CayIta ca suyantritaH||12||

kukATikA tu yadA chinnA bhavati tadA mArute~api nirgacchatyavaCyaM CIghraM samaM niveCya nirantaraM ca syUtvA badhnIyAt|  AjenetyAdi subodham| 

	(pUrvaM Castrakarmavidhau vAyunirvAmiNaH CalyagarbhAdinA sAmAnyena niSiddhasIvanasyAtra sIvanakathanaM sthAnaviCeSeNa viCeSavidhistena na pUrvAparavyAghAta iti pradarCayitumapiCabdaH|  CIghramACveva samaM yathAsthAnaM niveCya mArutanirgamananirodhArthaM nirantaraM syUtvA sUtroditavidhAnena badhnIyAt)||12||

 ghAtaM CAkhAsu tiryaksthaM gAtre samyaG niveCite||13||  syUtvA vellitabandhena badhnIyAt ghanavAsasA||13||  carmaNA goSphaNAbandhaH kAryaCcAsaGgate vraNe||13||

CAkhAsu ghAtaM tiryaksthaM na karAdyabhimukhasthaM tasmin gAtre samyaG niveCite syUte ca sUtroktalakSaNena vellitAkhyena ,bandhena ghAnavAsasA badhnIyAt|  asaGgate vraNa uktalakSaNe goSphaNAbandhaH kAryaH||13||

 pAdau vilambimuSkasya prekSya netre ca vAriNA||14||  praveCya vRSaNau sIvyet sIvanyA tunnasaMjJayA||14||  kAryaCca goSphaNAbandhaH kaTyAmAveCya paTTakam||14||  snehasekaM na kurvIta tena klidyati hi vraNaH||14||  kAlAnusAryagurvelAjAtIcandanaparpaTaiH||14||  CilAdArvyamRtAtutthaiH siddhaM tailaM ca ropaNam||14||

vilambimuSkasya puMsaH pAdau netre ca vAriNA prekSyAnuvRSaNau ca sthAne praveCyoktalakSaNen tunnanAmnA sIvanaprakAreNa sIvyet|   tatra ca kaTyAM paTTakamAveCya tenaiva goSphaNAbandhaH kAryaH|  tatra ca  muSkavraNe snehasekaN na kurvIta|  tena hi vraNaH klidyati|  kAlAnusAryAdibhiH siddhaM tailaM ropaNam|  kAlAnusArI tagaram|  agaru prasiddham|  elA sUkSmailA|  CilA manaCCilA||14||

 chinnAM niCCeSataH CAkhAM dagdhvA tailena yuktitaH||15||  badhnIyAt koCabandhena tato vraNavadAcaret||15||

niCCeSataH chinnAyAM CAkhAyAm|  subodham|  (chinnakriyAmAha- chinna iti|  niCCeSataH chinnAM patitAmityarthaH| 

	CAkhAM CAkhACabdenAtra pAdapANiparigrahaH|  tailena yuktitato dagdhvA tailasyAtra dAhasAdhanabhUtatvAttaptena tailenatyarthaH|  yuktitaH AsirAmukhasaGkucanAddagdhvA koCabandhena badhnIyAt|  tato bandhanAdanantaraM vraNavadAcaredropayedityarthaH)||15||

 kAryaH CalyAhRte viddhe kramo bhaGgAttu piccite||16||

sarvasmiMCca viddhe Calya AhRte kramo vraNakramaH kAryaH na  tvantaHCalye|  piccite vidalitAkhye tu bhAGgoktakramaH||16||

 Ciraso~apahRte Calye bAlavartiM praveCayet||17||  mastuluGgasruteH kruddho hanyAdenaM calo~anyathA||17||  vraNe rohati caikaikaM Canairapanayet kacam||17||  mastuluGgasrutau khAdenmastiSkAnanyajIvajAn||17||  Calye hRte~aGgAdanyasmAt snehavarti nidhApayet||17||  dUrAvagADhAH sUkSmAsyA ye vraNAH srutaCoNitAH||17||  secayeccakratailena sUkSmanetrArpitena tAn||17||

 bhinne koSThe~asRjA pUrNa mUrcchA hRtpArCvavedanAH||18||  jvaro dAhastRDAdhmAnaM bhaktasyAnabhinandanam||18||  saGgo viNmUtramarutAM CvAsaH svedo~akSiraktatA||18||  lohagandhitvAmAsye~asya syAdgAtre ca vigandhitA||18||  AmACayasthe rudhire rudhiraM chardayatyapi||18||  AdhmAnenAtimAtreNa CUlena ca viCasyate||18||  pakvACayasthe rudhire saCUlaM gauravaM bhavet||18||  nAbheradhastAcchItatvaM khebhyo raktasya cAgamaH||18||  abhinno~apyACayaH sUkSmaiH srotobhirabhipUryate||18||  asRjA syandamAnena pArCvairmUtreNa bastivat||18||  tatrAntarlohitaM CItapAdocchvAsakarAnanam||18||  raktAkSaM pANDuvadanamAnaddhaM ca vivarjayet||18||  AmACayasthe vamanaM hitaM pakvACayACrite||18||  virecanaM nirUhaCca niHsnehoSNairviCodhanaiH||18||  yavakolakulatthAnAM rasaiH snehavivarjitaiH||18||  bhuJjItAnnaM yavAgUM vA pibetsaindhavasaMyutAm||18||  atinissRtaraktastu bhinnakoSThaH pibedasRk||18||

koSThe bhinne raktena pUrNe mUrcchAdikaM gAtravigandhitAntaM syAt|  iti sAmAnyena koSThe bhinne|  (asRjA pUrNa ityanena koSThabhede~api sthAnaviCeSavaCAt sarvatrApyasRkpUrNatA na syAditi ca dhvanitam)|

 athAto bhaGgapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

prahAraprasaGgena bhaGgAnAM svarUpaM cikitsAM ca pradarCayutumadhyAya ARrabhyate||1||

vedanA ca||6||

 asandhibhagnaM punardvAdaCavidham||7||  tadyathA-karkaTakaM vakraM

dAritaM cUrNitamatipAtitaM CeSitaM majjAnugatamiti||7||

asandhibhagnaM tu karkaTakAdibhedena dvAdaCavidham||7||

 CvayathubAhulyaM spandanaM vivartanaM sparCAsahiSNutA ca pIDyamAne CabdaH srastAGgatA vedanAtipravRttiH sarvAsu cAvasthAsu Carma na labhata iti sAdhAraNamasandhibhagnarUpam||8||

 athAto bhagandarapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 hastyaCvapRSThagamanakaThinotkaTakAsanaiH||2||  arConidAnAbhihitairaparaiCca niSevitaiH||2||  aniSTadiSTapAkena sadyo vA sAdhugarhaNaiH||2||  prAyeNa piTakApUrvo yo~aGgule dvyaGgule~api vA||2||  pAyorvraNo~antarbAhyo vA duSTAsRGmAMsago bhavet||2||  bastimUtrACayAbhyACagatatvAt syandanAtmakaH||2||  bhagandaraH sa sarvAMCca dArayatyakriyAvataH||2||  bhagabastigudAnteSu dIryamANeSu bhUribhiH||2||  vAtaM mUtraM CakRcchukraM khaiH sUkSmairvahati kramAt||2||

hastyaCvapRSThagamanAdibhiH pAyoraGgule dvyaGgule vA nikaTe yo vraNo bhavetsa bhagandaraH|  arCasAM ca nidAne ye hetavo~abhihitAstairapyaparairniSevitairiti sambandhaH|  yacca kiJciddinacaryAdAvaniSTamiti diSTamuktaM tasya pAkena phalapariNAmena|  sadyaH sAdhugarhaNairacirakRtasajjananindAbhiH|  prAyeNa piTakApUrvamArambho yasya sa tathoktaH|  sa ca vraNaH pAyorantarmukho vA bhavet bahirmukho vA|  sa ca vraNo bastyAdInAmabhyACagatatvAnnikaTavartitvAt syandanAtmakaH sravaNAtmako bhavati|  sa bhagandaro~akriyAvato~apathya CIlinaH sarvAn sakalAn bhagAdIn dArayati ca|  teSu bhagAdiSu dIrghamANeSu khaiH srotobhirbahubhiH sUkSmairvAtAdicatuSTayaM kramAdvahati|  (niSevitairnitarAM sevitairhastyaCvapRSThagamanAdibhiH hastipRSThagamanamaCvapRSThagamanaM kaThinAsanamutkaTakAsanaM ca|  arConidAne~abhihitAnyuktAni yAnyaparANyativyavAyAdIni taiH arConidAnAbhihitatvenaiva hastyaCvapRSThagamanAdike siddhe punarapyatra kathanAdeteSAM bhagandarasya viCeSakAraNatvaM sUcitam|  athavA evaMvidhairapAnamarutkopakAraNairanyaiH|  caCabdaH samuccaye|  aniSTadiSTapAkena purAkRtACubhakarmaphalaparipAkena|  athavA~aniSTadiSTasya dinacaryAnirdiSTasya pApakarmaNaH pAkena phalapariNAmena|  sadyaH sAdhugarhaNairacirakRtAbhiH sajjananindAbhiH pAyorgudasyaikAGgulapramANe vA nikaTe|  vACabdAdarddhAGgulatryaGgulayorapi grahaNam|   uktaJca CAstrAntare-

	piTikAM janayejjantorgudanADyAM sudAruNAm|
	gudasyArddhAGgule vA~api dvyaGgule tryaGgule~api vA|| iti|


	antarantarbhAge bAhyaH bahirbhAge vA|  duSTAsRGmAMsago duSTaraktamAMsACritaH|  bastimUtrACayAbhyACagatatvAdbastermUtrACayasya ca samIpagatatvAt|  bastimUtrACayayoravayavACayaviCeSatvamaGgavibhAgAcchArIrAdavagantavyam|  syandanAtmakaH sadAsrAvayuktaH|  prAyeNa bAhulyena piTakApUrvaH piTakApUrvamArambho yasya sa tathoktaH|  pUrvaM piTakA jAyate tataH pAkAd vraNaH syAdityarthaH|  prAyaH Cabdena kSatajasya bhagandarasya piTakAyA vinA sambhavaH sUcitaH|  ya evaMvidho vraNaH sa bhagandarAkhyo roga akriyAvataH pramAdAccikitsAmakurvato narasya sarvAn bhagavastigudAn dArayati|  atra sarvaCabdena sAkalyagrahaNaM bhagAdIn sAkalyena dArayatItyarthaH|  bhagAdideCadaraNAt bhagandarAkhyAsya|  gudapradeCadaraNAt gudantarAkhyA bastipradeCadaraNAt bastindarAkhyA kathaM na yujyata iti cedatra brUmaH|  viCeSeNa bhagasya daraNAdanyatrApi bhagavadadaraNAcca bhagandara ityevAkhyA na gudandaro na bastindara iti|  uktaM ca bhoje-

	bhagaM parisamantAcca gudaM bastiM tathaiva ca|

bhagandare bahucchidre chedAnAlocya yojayet||28||  gotIrthaM sarvatobhadramardhalAGgalalAGgalau||28||  pArCvAgatena CastreNa chedo gotIrthako mataH||28||  sarvataH sarvatobhadraH pArCvacchedo~ardhalAGgalaH||28||  pArCvadvaye lAGgalakaH samastAMCcAgninA dahet||28||  AsrAvamArgAn niCCeSaM naivaM vikurute punaH||28||

bahucchidre sarvasmin bhagandare ca gotIrthAdibhedena chedAnAlocya nirUpya gotIrthAdIn yojayet|  (bahucchidre anekasuSire sarvasmin bhagandare gotIrthAdIn chedanaviCeSAn olocya avalokanaiSaNIpraNayanAdibhiratrAyaM yojya iti yathAvadavagamya gotIrthAdyanyatamaM yojayet)| 

	(gotIrthAdInAM caturNAM krameNa lakSaNaM darCayati)|  pArCvAgatenetyAdinA gotIrthAdInAM caturNAM krameNa lakSaNam|  pArCvena yatrAgacchati CastraM sa gotIrthako nAma chedaH  yatra tu sarvadiCamAgacchati Castram sa sarvatobhadraH|  ekasya pArCvasya yaH chedaH so~ardhalAGgalaH|  pArCvadvaye tu chedaH lAGgalako bhavati|  (pArCvAgatena nADIpArCvaprAptena CastreNa chedo gotIrthAkhyaH|  gotIrtho nAma gavAM jalapAnAttatkhurAGkitA bhUmiH tadvacchasranipAto gotIrtha itIryate kaiCcit|  yatra CastraM sarvadiCamAgacchati sa sarvatobhadrAkhyaH|  ekasya pArCvasya chedo~ardhalAGgalAkhyaH|  pArCvadvaye ubhayoH pArCvayoryaCchedaH sa lAGgalakAkhyaH)|  

	bhagandare sarvAnAsrAvamARrgAn nisCeSamagninA dahet|  evaM hi kRte bhagandaraH punarna vikurute|  (agninA agnitaptayA CalAkayA samastAn AsrAvamArgAn nisCeSAn kRtvA dahet sAkalyenetyarthaH|  niCCeSasamastaCabdayorekatrakathanena bhagandaravraNasuSirasya dUragatistasyAmUladAhaCca sUcitaH|  evaMkRte sati sa bhagandaraH punarna vikurute vikArakaraNasamartho na bhavati punarnotpadyata ityarthaH)||28||

 yateta koSThaCuddhyai ca bhiSak tasyAntarAntarA||29||

tasya ca bhagandariNaH koSThaCuddhyarthaM bhiSagandarAntarA yateta|  (vaidyastasyAturasya koSThaCuddhyartha koSThaCuddhervamanavirecanAdyekatve~apyatra bhagandaravraNasya pakvACayanikaTavartitvAdyathAsannaM viCodhanamiti vraNapratiSedhoktyA vraNasya virekasAdhyatvAcca virecanameva gRhyate|  antarAntarA vraNaropaNakriyAkaraNasya madhye madhya ityarthaH|  yateta prayatnavAn bhavenna pramAdAdupekSetetyarthaH)||29||

 ardrakasya rase siddhaM kalke vA pAyayed ghRtam||30||  bhagandare mArutaje pakvApakve virecayet||30||

Ardrakasya rase vA kalke vA siddhaM ghRtaM pAyayet|  kasminnityAha mArutaje bhagandare|  pakve cA~apyapakve ca virecayet||30||

kSudrarogavijJAnIyaH

 athAtaH kSudrarogavijJAnIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

CastrakarmArharogaprasaGgena kSudrarogANAM hetvAdikaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|  kSudrAH rogAH kSudrarogAH|  (kSudraCabdaH svalpAdhamakrUraparyAyavAcI|  'kSudraH svalpe~adhame krUraH' iti vaijayantI|  uktadharmayuktA rogA kSudrarogAH|  uktaJca-

	mandavegA mahAvegA vyAdhayo~alparujo~arujaH|

	ye mahAnto~alpakACcaiva kSudrarogAstu te smRtAH|| iti|

	atrA~api svalpA maCavyaGgatilakAlakAdayaH|  adhamA ruddhagudaCarkarArbudakunakhAdayaH|  krUrA masUrikAvisphoTAgnirohiNyAdayaH|  kraurye kSudraCabdaprayogaH purANAdiSvapi dRCyate-

	api kSudramRgA yatra CAntACceruH samA mRgaiH| iti|

	ayurvedasya tasyASTau prAhuraGgAni tadvidaH|

	sarvebhyaH prAyaCastebhyaH kSudrarogAH samucchritAH||

	iti CreSThatve~api|| 1||

 snigdhAH savarNA grathitA nIrujA mudgasannibhAH||2||  piTakAH kaphavAtAbhyAM bAlAnAmajagallikA||2||

kSudrarogANAmanekavidhatvena sAmAnyalakSaNAbhAvAtpratyekaM vyAdhigauravAnurUpeNa hetvAdikaM pradarCayiSyati|  bAlAnAM kaphavAtAbhyAM  snigdhAdiguNAH piTakA bhavanti sA nAmnA~ajagallikA|  bAlAnAM prAya iti boddhavyam|  (kerale pAluNNItyucyate)|| 2||

 yavaprakhyA yavaprakhyA tAbhyAM mAMsACritA ghanA||3||  avaktrA tvalajI..............................||3||

 karNasyordhvaM samantAdvA piTakA kaThinograruk||5||  CAlUkAbhA panasikA..............................||5||

	piTakAM kurute rAjan CAlUkasadRCAM sthirAm|| iti|

	kaThinA kaThinasparCA|  ugrarugadhikatarapIDAyuktA|  CAlUkAbhA CAlUkakandasadRCA|  (CAlUkaM nIrcemp|) piTikA panasikAsaMjJaH  kSudrarogaH)|| 5||

 ........................CophastvalparujaH sthiraH||6||  hanusandhisamudbhUtastAbhyAM pASANagardabhaH||6||

 CAlmalIkaNTakAkArAH piTakAH sarujo ghanAH||7||  medogarbhA mukheCUnAM tAbhyAM ca mukhadUSikA||7||

tAbhyAM ceti kaphavAtAbhyAmeva CAlmalIkaNTakAkAratvAdiguNA yUnAM yauvanavatAM mukhe yAH piTakA bhavanti tA nAmnA mukhadUSikA, medo garbhe pUraNe yAsAM tAstathoktAH|  caCabdo medaH samuccayati|  (tAbhyAM kaphavAtAbhyAM yUnAM pratyagravayasAM mukhe vadanasya bahirbhAge kapolalATanAsikAcibukAdipradeCe|  CAlmalI kaNTakAkArAH CAlmalIkaNTakasadRCAH AkRtimAtreNaiva sAdRCyam|  sarujaH ISadrujAyuktAH|  ghanA niviDAH|  medogarbhAH medaH garbhe~antarbhAge yAsAm|  yAstvevaMvidhAstAH piTakAH mukhadUSikA saMjJaH kSudrarogaH)|| 7||

 te padmakaNTakA jJeyA yaiH padmamiva kaNTakaiH||8||  cIyate nIrujaiH CvetaiH CarIraM kaphavAtajaiH||8||

te padmakaNTakA nAmnA jJeyAH yaiH kaphavAtajaiH padmaM kaNTakairiva CarIre nIrujaiH CvetaiCcIyate saJcIyate|  (kaphavAtanimittaiH nIrujaiH  rujArahitaiH CvetaiH CvetavarNaiH yaiH piTakaiH kaNTakaiH padmaM padma nAlamiva CarIraM cIyate samantAdvyApyate te piTakAH padmakaNTakasaMjJAH jJeyAH munibhiriti CeSaH|  ya evaMvidhaH sa padmakaNTakAkhyaH kSudrarogaH)|| 8||

 pittena piTakA vRttA pakvodumbarasannibhA||9||  mahAdAhajvarakarI vivRtA vivRtAnanA||9||

pittena hetunA vivRtamukhI vRttatvAdiguNA piTakA bhavati sA nAmnA vivRtA|  (pittena hetunA vRttA vartulA pakvodumbarasannibhA pakvenodumbaraphalena sadRCI mahAdAhajvarakarI mahAntamatidussahaM dAhaM sarvAGgINaM tIvrasantApaM tathAvidhaM jvaraJca karotIti mahAdAhajvarakarI|  vivRtAnanA asaMvRtamukhI anenArambhasamaya eva pAkapUyasravaNAdikaM dyotyate|  yA evaMvidhA sA piTakA vivRtAsaMjJaH kSudrarogaH)|| 9||

 gAtreSvantaCca vaktrasya dAhajvararujAnvitAH||10||  masUramAtrAstadvarNAstatsaMjJAH piTakA ghanAH||10||

gAtreSu bahirantarmukhaJca yAH prakaraNAtpittena piTakA masUrapramANAH tadvarNA iti masUravarNA lohitAH ghanACca bhavanti tAstatsaMjJAH nAmnA masUrikAH|  (gAtreSu pAdapANyAdyavayaveSu|  anena pAdatalaM mastakaM ca gRhyate|  vaktrasyAntarmukha ityarthaH|  caCabdAnnetraCrotrAdyanyasrotAMsi ca gRhyante|  dAhajvarAnvitAH|  dAhajvararujAnvitAH, dAhena jvareNa rujayA cAnvitA yuktAH, dAhaH sarvAGgINasantApaH|  athavA dAhajvaro dAhAdijvaraH masUramAtrAH masUrapramANAH tadvarNA masUratulyavarNAH lohitA ityarthaH|  ghanA nibiDatayA nirantaraprasRtAH piTakAstatsaMjJAH masUrikAsaMjJAH|  masUrikAyA raktapittatvamAha bhojaH|  uktaJca-

	pittaM CoNitasaMsRSTaM tvacaM dUSayate yadA|
	karoti piTakAM ghorAM sarvagAtreSu dehinAm||
	tilasarSapamASANaM niSpAvAnAM tathaiva ca| 
	tulyapramANasaMsthAnAM dAhajvarasamanvitAm||
	vidyAnmasUrikAmetAM piTakAM raktapittajAm|| iti|

	urabhrastu nAmAnugatarUpabhedenAsyA aSTavidhatvamAha|  uktaJca-
	
	masUrikA sarSapikA ajakA kodravastathA|
	kaGgurvisphoTako~apAkI visarpI cASTamI smRtA|| 
	soSakaNDUjvarAM tAmrAM sUkSmAmAhurmasUrikAm|
	sarSapAkRtitadvarNAM dAhapAkarujAvatIm||
	raktAbhamUtrAM dussAdhAM pittAt sarSapikAM jaguH|
	kalAyasadRCAM gADhAM CAkhAparvAsyaCophinIm||
	dAhakledavraNAmUcu rajakAM CleSmapittajAm|
	kodravaM kodravAkAraM raktapittasamudbhavam||
	kaGgostaNDulasaGkACairnirantaravisarpibhiH|
	sphoTaiH CleSmasamudbhUtairApUrNaM kaGguriSyate||
	agnidagdhairiva sphoTairAkIrNaH kapharaktajaH|
	nirvipAko visarpastu visphoTaka iti smRtaH|| 
	apAkaM viralaM CuSkaM jAyate mRtyusannibham|
	visarpavat sarpati sarvagAtre CophAnvitA ca jvaradAhayuktA|
	visarpiNI kAyasamAnavarNA kAlopakalpA kapharaktajA tu||
	vidAhakampAtirujAtisAraistRSNArtihikkArucikAsamohaiH|
	yuktAni hantyACu masUrikAntarmukhA ca bAhye kiNasannibhA ca||
	jvarAsyaCoSAGgavimarddakAsasandhiClathatvAruciromaharSAH|
	CirorttinetrAmayapInasACca masUrikANAM prabhavanti cAgre|| 
	tvagakSirogApasmArarAjayakSmamasUrikAH|
	darCanAt sparCanAddAnAt saGkrAmanti narAnnaram|| iti|

	pRthagdoSasaMsargasannipAtaviSadrumaprasavAghrANajatvabhedenAsyA navavidhatvamAkhyAtavAn bharadvAjaH|  pRthagdoSasannipAtaraktAgantujatvabhedena SaDvidhatvamAha vRddhakACyapaH|  tatsarvaM granthagauravabhayAdatra na likhyate|| 10||

uttarasthAnam

kSudrarogavijJAnIyaH

 athAtaH kSudrarogavijJAnIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

CastrakarmArharogaprasaGgena kSudrarogANAM hetvAdikaM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|  kSudrAH rogAH kSudrarogAH|  (kSudraCabdaH svalpAdhamakrUraparyAyavAcI|  'kSudraH svalpe~adhame krUraH' iti vaijayantI|  uktadharmayuktA rogA kSudrarogAH|  uktaJca-

	mandavegA mahAvegA vyAdhayo~alparujo~arujaH|

	ye mahAnto~alpakACcaiva kSudrarogAstu te smRtAH|| iti|

	atrA~api svalpA maCavyaGgatilakAlakAdayaH|  adhamA ruddhagudaCarkarArbudakunakhAdayaH|  krUrA masUrikAvisphoTAgnirohiNyAdayaH|  kraurye kSudraCabdaprayogaH purANAdiSvapi dRCyate-

	api kSudramRgA yatra CAntACceruH samA mRgaiH| iti|

	ayurvedasya tasyASTau prAhuraGgAni tadvidaH|

	sarvebhyaH prAyaCastebhyaH kSudrarogAH samucchritAH||

	iti CreSThatve~api|| 1||

 snigdhAH savarNA grathitA nIrujA mudgasannibhAH||2||  piTakAH kaphavAtAbhyAM bAlAnAmajagallikA||2||

kSudrarogANAmanekavidhatvena sAmAnyalakSaNAbhAvAtpratyekaM vyAdhigauravAnurUpeNa hetvAdikaM pradarCayiSyati|  bAlAnAM kaphavAtAbhyAM  snigdhAdiguNAH piTakA bhavanti sA nAmnA~ajagallikA|  bAlAnAM prAya iti boddhavyam|  (kerale pAluNNItyucyate)|| 2||

 yavaprakhyA yavaprakhyA tAbhyAM mAMsACritA ghanA||3||  avaktrA tvalajI..............................||3||

tAbhyAmiti kaphavAtAbhyAM mAMsACritA ghanA yavasadRCA yA piTakA bhavati sA nAmnA yavaprakhyA|  saivAvaktrA satyalajItyucyate|  (tAbhyAmeva avaktrA amukhatayA pUyodgamanadvArarahitA)||3||

 ....................vRttAH stokapUyA GanonnatAH||4||  granthayaH paJca vA SaDvA kacCapI kacCaponnatAH||4||

vRttatvAdiguNAH paJca vA SaD vA vA kacCapavadunnatA granthayo nAmnA kacCapI|  (kaPavAtAbhyAM kacCaponnatAH kacCapapRSThavadaunnatyayuktAH)|| 4||

 karNasyordhvaM samantAdvA piTakA kaThinograruk||5||  CAlUkAbhA panasikA..............................||5||

karNasyopari bhAge samantAdvA karNamACritya kaThinatvAdiguNA CAlUkena jalakusumakandena sadRCA piTakA nAmnA panasikA|  (karNasyordhvamupariSTAt samantAtparitaH vACabdo vikalpArthaH|  'ubhayoH pArCvayoH samaM jAyate naikasminneva karNe' iti bhojaH|  uktaJca-

	karNayorupadiSTAcca karNayoCca samantataH|

	piTakAM kurute rAjan CAlUkasadRCAM sthirAm|| iti|

	kaThinA kaThinasparCA|  ugrarugadhikatarapIDAyuktA|  CAlUkAbhA CAlUkakandasadRCA|  (CAlUkaM nIrcemp|) piTikA panasikAsaMjJaH  kSudrarogaH)|| 5||

 ........................CophastvalparujaH sthiraH||6||  hanusandhisamudbhUtastAbhyAM pASANagardabhaH||6||

tAbhyAmiti kaphavAtAbhyAM hanusandhau samutpannaH alparujAdikaH Copho nAmnA pASANagardabhaH|| 6||

 CAlmalIkaNTakAkArAH piTakAH sarujo ghanAH||7||  medogarbhA mukheCUnAM tAbhyAM ca mukhadUSikA||7||

tAbhyAM ceti kaphavAtAbhyAmeva CAlmalIkaNTakAkAratvAdiguNA yUnAM yauvanavatAM mukhe yAH piTakA bhavanti tA nAmnA mukhadUSikA, medo garbhe pUraNe yAsAM tAstathoktAH|  caCabdo medaH samuccayati|  (tAbhyAM kaphavAtAbhyAM yUnAM pratyagravayasAM mukhe vadanasya bahirbhAge kapolalATanAsikAcibukAdipradeCe|  CAlmalI kaNTakAkArAH CAlmalIkaNTakasadRCAH AkRtimAtreNaiva sAdRCyam|  sarujaH ISadrujAyuktAH|  ghanA niviDAH|  medogarbhAH medaH garbhe~antarbhAge yAsAm|  yAstvevaMvidhAstAH piTakAH mukhadUSikA saMjJaH kSudrarogaH)|| 7||

 te padmakaNTakA jJeyA yaiH padmamiva kaNTakaiH||8||  cIyate nIrujaiH CvetaiH CarIraM kaphavAtajaiH||8||

te padmakaNTakA nAmnA jJeyAH yaiH kaphavAtajaiH padmaM kaNTakairiva CarIre nIrujaiH CvetaiCcIyate saJcIyate|  (kaphavAtanimittaiH nIrujaiH  rujArahitaiH CvetaiH CvetavarNaiH yaiH piTakaiH kaNTakaiH padmaM padma nAlamiva CarIraM cIyate samantAdvyApyate te piTakAH padmakaNTakasaMjJAH jJeyAH munibhiriti CeSaH|  ya evaMvidhaH sa padmakaNTakAkhyaH kSudrarogaH)|| 8||

 pittena piTakA vRttA pakvodumbarasannibhA||9||  mahAdAhajvarakarI vivRtA vivRtAnanA||9||

pittena hetunA vivRtamukhI vRttatvAdiguNA piTakA bhavati sA nAmnA vivRtA|  (pittena hetunA vRttA vartulA pakvodumbarasannibhA pakvenodumbaraphalena sadRCI mahAdAhajvarakarI mahAntamatidussahaM dAhaM sarvAGgINaM tIvrasantApaM tathAvidhaM jvaraJca karotIti mahAdAhajvarakarI|  vivRtAnanA asaMvRtamukhI anenArambhasamaya eva pAkapUyasravaNAdikaM dyotyate|  yA evaMvidhA sA piTakA vivRtAsaMjJaH kSudrarogaH)|| 9||

 gAtreSvantaCca vaktrasya dAhajvararujAnvitAH||10||  masUramAtrAstadvarNAstatsaMjJAH piTakA ghanAH||10||

gAtreSu bahirantarmukhaJca yAH prakaraNAtpittena piTakA masUrapramANAH tadvarNA iti masUravarNA lohitAH ghanACca bhavanti tAstatsaMjJAH nAmnA masUrikAH|  (gAtreSu pAdapANyAdyavayaveSu|  anena pAdatalaM mastakaM ca gRhyate|  vaktrasyAntarmukha ityarthaH|  caCabdAnnetraCrotrAdyanyasrotAMsi ca gRhyante|  dAhajvarAnvitAH|  dAhajvararujAnvitAH, dAhena jvareNa rujayA cAnvitA yuktAH, dAhaH sarvAGgINasantApaH|  athavA dAhajvaro dAhAdijvaraH masUramAtrAH masUrapramANAH tadvarNA masUratulyavarNAH lohitA ityarthaH|  ghanA nibiDatayA nirantaraprasRtAH piTakAstatsaMjJAH masUrikAsaMjJAH|  masUrikAyA raktapittatvamAha bhojaH|  uktaJca-

	pittaM CoNitasaMsRSTaM tvacaM dUSayate yadA|
	karoti piTakAM ghorAM sarvagAtreSu dehinAm||
	tilasarSapamASANaM niSpAvAnAM tathaiva ca| 
	tulyapramANasaMsthAnAM dAhajvarasamanvitAm||
	vidyAnmasUrikAmetAM piTakAM raktapittajAm|| iti|

	urabhrastu nAmAnugatarUpabhedenAsyA aSTavidhatvamAha|  uktaJca-
	
	masUrikA sarSapikA ajakA kodravastathA|
	kaGgurvisphoTako~apAkI visarpI cASTamI smRtA|| 
	soSakaNDUjvarAM tAmrAM sUkSmAmAhurmasUrikAm|
	sarSapAkRtitadvarNAM dAhapAkarujAvatIm||
	raktAbhamUtrAM dussAdhAM pittAt sarSapikAM jaguH|
	kalAyasadRCAM gADhAM CAkhAparvAsyaCophinIm||
	dAhakledavraNAmUcu rajakAM CleSmapittajAm|
	kodravaM kodravAkAraM raktapittasamudbhavam||
	kaGgostaNDulasaGkACairnirantaravisarpibhiH|
	sphoTaiH CleSmasamudbhUtairApUrNaM kaGguriSyate||
	agnidagdhairiva sphoTairAkIrNaH kapharaktajaH|
	nirvipAko visarpastu visphoTaka iti smRtaH|| 
	apAkaM viralaM CuSkaM jAyate mRtyusannibham|
	visarpavat sarpati sarvagAtre CophAnvitA ca jvaradAhayuktA|
	visarpiNI kAyasamAnavarNA kAlopakalpA kapharaktajA tu||
	vidAhakampAtirujAtisAraistRSNArtihikkArucikAsamohaiH|
	yuktAni hantyACu masUrikAntarmukhA ca bAhye kiNasannibhA ca||
	jvarAsyaCoSAGgavimarddakAsasandhiClathatvAruciromaharSAH|
	CirorttinetrAmayapInasACca masUrikANAM prabhavanti cAgre|| 
	tvagakSirogApasmArarAjayakSmamasUrikAH|
	darCanAt sparCanAddAnAt saGkrAmanti narAnnaram|| iti|

	pRthagdoSasaMsargasannipAtaviSadrumaprasavAghrANajatvabhedenAsyA navavidhatvamAkhyAtavAn bharadvAjaH|  pRthagdoSasannipAtaraktAgantujatvabhedena SaDvidhatvamAha vRddhakACyapaH|  tatsarvaM granthagauravabhayAdatra na likhyate|| 10||

uttarasthAnam

kSudrarogavijJAnIyaH

 tataH kaSTatarAH sphoTA visphoTAkhyA mahArujAH||11||

tato masUrikAtaH sarveNa prakAreNa kaSTatarA mahArujAH sphoTAsta AkhyayA visphoTAH|  (kaSTatarAH atiCayitapIDAyuktAH nirantaracitasphoTasarvAGgatayA~asanaCayanAdyeSu kathaJcidalabdhaCarmatayA~analpavedanA yuktA ityarthaH|  visphoTasya pittajatvamAha bhojaH- 

	pittaM prakupitaM sthAnAttvacaM bAhyAM samACritam|  

	karoti tvaggatAn sphoTAnagnidagdhopamAn bahUn|| 

	sarvadehACrayaM jantorjvaradAhasamanvitAn|

	nAnAprakArasaMsthAnAn vidyAdvisphoTakAnnRpa|| iti| 

	jAtUkarNe~api-

	uSAcoSaparIdAha jvarAGgasadanAnvitAH|

	jAyante pittavaiSamyAdvisphoTAH sarvadehagAH|| iti|| 11||

 yA padmakarNikAkArA piTakA piTakAcitA||12||  sA viddhA vAtapittAbhyAM tAbhyAmeva ca gardabhI||12||

vAtapittAbhyAM yA padmakarNikAkArA agre mahatI tanumUlA piTakAbhiranyAbhirAcitA piTakA sA nAmnA viddhA bhavati|  tAbhyAmeveti vAtapittAbhyAmeva gardabhI nAma piTakA bhavati|  asyAH padmakarNikAkAratvaM na bhavatItyarthAt|| 12||

 maNDalA vipulotsannA sarAgapiTakAcitA||13||

prakaraNAdvAtapittAbhyAmeva yA vipulA vistRtA utsannA prAptotsedhA sarAgAbhiranyAbhiH piTakAbhiCcAcitA sA nAmnA maNDalA||13||

 kakSyeti kakSAsanneSu prAyo deCeSu sAnilAt||14||  pittAdbhavanti piTakAH sUkSmA lAjopamA ghanAH||14||  tAdRCI mahatI tvekA gandhanAmeti kIrtitA||14||

sAnilAt pradhAnAt pittAt prAyaH kakSAsanneSu pradeCeSu sUkSmA lAjasadRCA ghanACca piTakA bhavanti sa rogo nAmnA kakSyA|  tAdRCIti kakSAsanneSu sAnilAt|  pittAt yA mahatyekA piTakA sA nAmnA gandhanAmA iti kIrtitA|  (prAyaH CabdenAsyopekSayA sakalaCarIrakhyApakatvaM sUcitam|  kakSAsanneSu pradeCeSu bAhupArCvAdiSvityarthaH|  uktaM ca sauCrute-

	bAhupArCvAMsakakSeSu kRSNAH sphoTAH sudAruNAH|  

	pittaprakopasambhUtAH kakSyAmiti vinirdiCet|| iti|

	tAdRCIti|  AkRtyA kakSyAsadRCI|  mahatI sthUlA|  ekA advitIyA|  ekA tu mahatI iti yojanAyAmanekapiTakAmadhye ekasyA mahattvamiti ca pratIyate|  etamarthaM pittakAraNatvaM cAha dhanvantariH-

	ekAmetAdRCI dRSTvA piTakAM sphoTakAcitAm|  

	tvaggatAM pittakopena gandhanAmAM pracakSata|| iti|| 14||

 gharmasvedaparIte~aGge piTakAH sarujo ghanAH||15||  rAjikAvarNasaMsthAnapramANA rAjikAhvayAH||15||

gharmeNAtapena svedena vA parIte samAyukte cAGge dehe sarujatvAdiguNA yAH piTakAstA nAmnA rAjikAhvayAH rAjikAsaMjJAH|  rAjikA raktasarSapAstAbhistulyaM varNAdi yAsAM piTakAnAM tAstathoktAH|  (svedaH svedavidhyuktatApopanAhAdijanitaH|  saMsthAnenaiva pramANasiddheH punarapi pramANakathanaM pramANAdhikye etad bhrAntinirAsArtham|  anuktakAraNatvAdatrApyanilapittajatvamUhyam)||15||

 doSaiH pittolbaNairmandairvisarpati visarpavat||16||  Copho pAkastanustAmro jvarakRjjAlagardabhaH||16||

pittolbaNaistribhirdoSairmandaiCcirakAribhiH krameNa visarpavattanutvAdiguNaH pAkarahitaCca yaH Copho visarpati vyApnoti sa nAmnA jAlagardabhaH|| 16||

 malaiH pittolbaNaiH sphoTA jvariNo mAMsadAraNAH||17||  kakSyAbhAgeSu jAyante ye~agnyAbhAH sA~agnirohiNI||17||  paJcAhAt saptarAtrAdvA pakSAdvA hanti jIvitam||17||

pittolbaNaistribhirdoSairye jvarAdiyutA mAMsadAraNAH sphoTA varNadAhavyAptyAdikenAgnisadRCAH kakSyAsanneSu pradeCeSu jAyante sAgnirohiNItyucyate|  sA cAgnirohiNI doSakopavaCAt paJcAhena saptarAtreNa pakSeNa vA jIvitaM hanti|  (pittolbaNairudriktapittairmalairvAtAdibhiH jvariNaH sajvarasya puruSasya|  jvariNa iti sphoTaviCeSaNaM vA AmaraNAntaM jvarakAriNa ityarthaH|  kakSyAbhAgeSu|  atra bhAgaCabdasya bahuvacanoktyA na kevalaM kakSyaiva tatsamIpavartino~anye~api pradeCA gRhyante|  uktaM ca sauCrute-

	sphoTAH kakSaMsapArCveSu jAyante mAMsadAraNAH|

	antardAhajvarAkArA dIptapAvakasannibhAH||

	saptAhAdvA daCAhAdvA pakSAdvA ghnanti mAnavam|

	tAmagnirohiNI vidyAdasAdhyAM sannipAtataH|| iti|

	mAMsadAriNaH mAMsadaraNaCIlAH|  anenaiCAmantarmUlatvaM dhvanyate|  AgnyAbhAH varNauSNyAdibhiragnisadRCAH|  ya evaMvidhA visphoTA jAyante sA nAmnA agnirohiNIti prasiddhA|  sA paJcAhAt paJcadivasAt pUrvamiti CeSaH|  saptarAtrAt saptadivasAt pakSAtpaJcadaCadivasAdvA jIvitaM nACayati|  asAdhyaprakaraNAtpaJccAhAdeH paramiti vA|  sannipAtajAyA apyasyA asAdhyamaryAdAyAstraividhyakathanamekaikadoSodrekAt|  tatrACukAriNaH pittasyodrekakathanAtpittavAtakaphajasthitikramo~api boddhavyaH )|| 17||

 triliGgA piTakA vRttA jatrUrdhvamirigallikA||18||

jatruNa UrdhvaM triliGgA tridoSalakSaNA vRttA yA piTakA sA irigalliketyucyate|  (asyA api sannipAtajatvAdugrarugjvarAdisahitatvaM dyotyate|  uktaJca dhanvantariNA _

	piTakAmuttamAGgasthAM vRttAmugrarujAM jvarAm|

	sarvAtmikAM sarvaliGgAM jAnIyAdirigallikAm|| iti|| 18||

 vidArIkandakaThinA vidArI kakSavaGkSaNe||19||

kakSe vaGkSaNe vA yA vidArIkandavat kaThinA piTakA sA vidArI nAmnA|  atrApi triliGgatvamUhyam|  uktaJca dhanvantariNA

	vidArIkandavaddhRttA kakSavaGkSaNasandhiSu|

	vidArikA sA vijJeyA sarujA sarvalakSaNA|| iti|| 19||

 medo~anilakarphargranthiH snAyumAMsasirACrayaiH||20||  bhinno vasAjyamadhvAbhaM sravettatrolbaNo~anilaH||20||  mAMsaM viCoSya grathitAM CarkarAmupapAdayet||20||  durgandhirudhiraM klinnaM nAnAvarNaMtato malAH||20||  tAM srAvayanti nicitAM vidyAttaccharkarArbudam||20||

snAyvAdyACrayaiH medaHprabhRtibhiH prathamaM granthirbhavati|  tataH sa eva svayaM bhinno vasAdisadRCaM sravet|  tatra srAvayukte granthAvanilo vAyurulbaNaH prAptabalo mAMsaM viCoSya grathitAM kaThinAM CarkarAmupapAdayet|  tato~anantaraM malA vAtAdayo nicitA vRddhAH santaH tAM CarkarAM durgandhatvAdiyuktaM rudhiraM srAvayanti|  tasya rogasya CarkarArbudamiti saMjJA|  (snAyumAMsasirACrayaiH snAyurmAMsaM sirACca ACrayo yeSAM taiH medo~anilakaphaiH kRto yo granthiH sa svayaM bhinnaH vasAjyamadhvAbhaM vasAghrutamadhunibhaM yatkiJcit sravet|  tatra tasmin kAle anila ulbaNaH AsrAvAllabdhAvakACatayA vRddhiM gataH mAMsaM viCoSya CoSayitvA grathitAM grathanAt kAThinyayuktAM CarkarAM CarkarAtulyatvAccharkarAm (CarkarA caratkall) upapAdayet pariNAmayet|  tato~anantaraM malA vAtAdayo (nicitAmiti pAThaH)|   nicitAM vRddhAM tAM CarkarAM durgandhi durgandhayuktaM klinnaM kledayuktaM nAnAvarNaM sannipAtajatvAt saGkIrNavarNaM rudhiraM raktaM srAvayanti CarkarAtaH sirAmukhena srAvayantItyarthaH|  uktaJca

	durgandhaM klinnamatyarthaM nAnAvarNaM tataH sirAH|

	sravanti sahasA raktaM vidyAttaccharkarArbudam|| iti|

	yadevaMvidhaM taccharkarArbudaM vidyAt)|| 20||

uttarasthAnam

kSudrarogavijJAnIyaH

 pANipAdatale sandhau jatrUrdhvaM vopacIyate||21||  valmIkavacchanairgranthistadvadbahvaNubhirmukhaiH||21||  rugdAhakaNDUkledADyairvalmIko~asau samastajaH||21||

pANipAdatalAdike granthirupacayaM prApnoti|  tadvaditi CarkarArbudagranthyuktahetunA|  valmIkavatpipIlikAsthANuvatkramavRddhyA ca  bahubhiraNubhiCca rugdAhAdyADhyairmukhairupalakSitaH|  asau rogo nAmnA valmIkaH|  

	asya pUrvasmAdviCeSaH samastajatvaM sannipAtajatvam|  (pANitale pAdatale sandhau kakSAdike jatrUrdhvaM jatrorupari bhAge vA valmIkavat valmIkasadRCaM granthirgrathitaH CophaH tadvadvalmIkavat bahvaNubhiH bahubhirasaGkhyairaNubhiH sUkSmaiH rugdAhakaNDUkledADhyaiH rugAdi paripUrNairmukhaiH pUyodgamanadvAraiH CanairmandaM mandaM upacIyate upacayaM prApnoti|  upacayo vRddhiH|  samastajaH sannipAtajaH|  asau valmIkaH valmIkAkhyaH kSudrarogaH)|| 21||

 Carkaronmathite pAde kSate vA kaNTakAdibhiH||22||  granthiH kIlavadutsanno jAyate kadaraM tu tat||22||

CarkarayA CilAkhaNDikayA pAda unmathite athavA kaNTakAdibhiH kSate kIlavat sotsedho granthirjAyate, tattu kadaraM nAmnA bhavati|  (CarkarAbhirunmathite kRttonmathane nirantaranicitaCarkarApradeCATanAdityarthaH|  kaNTakAdibhiH, AdiCabdena niCitAgradAruCakalAdiparigrahaH|  kSate vraNite vA Cabda unmathanakSatayorvikalpArthaH|  pAde pAdatale kIlavat utsanna unnataH granthirjAyate|   kIlasAmyena nikhAtakIlavadatyantavedanAkaratvaM ca dyotyate|  tattu viCeSe kadaraM kadarAkhyaH kSudrarogaH)|| 22||

 vegasandhAraNAdvAyurapAnopAnasaMCrayam||23||  aNUkaroti bAhyantarmArgamasya tataH CakRt||23||  kRcchrAnnirgacchati vyAdhirayaM ruddhagudo mataH||23||

apAnAkhyo vAyurvegarodhAddhetorapAnasaMCrayaM gudasaMCrayaM mArgaM bAhyAntaraNUkaroti saGkocayati|  tataH aNUkaraNAddhetorasya puMsaH CakRt purISaM kRcchrAnnirgacchati|  ayaM vyAdhirnAmnA ruddhagudo mata AcAryANAm (vegassandhAraNAt adho vAtapurISAdivegadhAraNAtkupitaH apAno vAyurgudACrayaH|  asya gudasya bAhyAntarmArgaM valItritayamityarthaH|  apAnasaMCrayaH iti ca pAThaH)|| 23||

 kuryAt pittAnilaM pAkaM nakhamAMse sarugjvaram||24||  cippamakSatarogaM ca vidyAdupanakhaM ca tam||24||

pittAnilaM kartRnakhamAMse sarugjvaraM pAkaM kuryAt|  tasya rogasya cippamityakSataromityupanakhamiti ca nAmatrayam|  (pittaM cAnilaCca pittAnilam|  atra sarvo~api dvandvaH samAhArArtha ekavat syAditi dvandvasyaikavadbhAvaH, sa napuMsakamiti napuMsakatvaJca|  nakhamAMse nakhasambandhinyantarbahimAMse sarugjvaraM rugjvaropetaM pAkaM kuryAt|  taM rogaM cippAkhyamakSatarogAkhyamupanakhAkhyaJca vidyAjjAnIyAt)||24||

 kRSNo~abhighAtAdrUkSaCca kharaCca kunakho nakhaH||25||

lAJchanAditrayANAmapi raktadoSajatvasAmyAccikitsAmekIkRtyAha-lAJchanAditraye AsannAyAH apratiSiddhAyAH sirAyAH vyadhanam|  paJca lepayogAH subodhAH|  payasyA kSIrikA|  kAlIyakaM kRSNacandanam|  taruNakapittho~ajIrNakapitthataruH|  amlikA cukrikAH, tasyA mUlam|  iti lAJchanAditrayasAdhAraNam|  (pUrvoktaM vyaGganIlikayorapRthaktvaM tu saGkhyAnAM SaTtriMCatvApAdanAyaiva|  atra nIlikAgrahaNaM sthAnabhedajanitasaMjJAntaratayA cikitsAntarabhrAntiparihArArtham)|| 18||

lAJchanAditrayasya sAmAnyacikitsAmuktvA teSu vyaGgasya viCeSacikitsAmAha-viCeSatastu vyaGgeSu raktasrAvaM kRtvA arjunataroH paripoTaiH svayaM jIrNatvagbharlepaH|  subodham|  maJjiSThA kSaudreNa|  ARdrAdADImatvagajAkSIreNa|  kimbhUtamAmalakamAha-

puSkarasya padmasya karNikeva yA piTakA anyAbhirvahnIbhiH  piTakAbhirAcitA sA nAmnA puSkariketi jJeyA|  (pittaraktAbhyAmeva padmakarNikA tulyA tathA piTakairAcitA svayamapyaNubhiH piTakAbhirvyAptetyarthaH)|| 16||

 pANibhyAM bhRCasaMvyUDhe saMvyUDhapiTakA bhavet||17||

saMvyUDhakhye rAge meDhre bhRCasaMvyUDhe vimardite piTakA bhavet|  (hastAbhyAmatiCayena saMvyUDhe saMvAhite mardita iti yAvat meDhra ityarthAt|  saMvyUDhapiTakA tatsaMjJo guhyarogo bhavet|  atrApi pittaraktAbhyAmityUhyam)|| 17||

 mRditaM mRditaM vastu saMrabdhaM vAtakopataH||18||

vastu meDhrAkhyaM mRditaM sadvAtakopAt saMrabdhaM bhavati sa nAmnA mRditam|  (harSaNArthaM hastAbhyAM marditaM yadvastu meDhrAkhyaM tadvAtakopataH mardanasyaivAtiyogAt kAraNAntarAdvA kupitAdvAtAtsaMrabdhaM hRSTameva sadA vartate cenmRditaM mRditAkhyo guhyarogaH|| 18||

 viSamA kaThinA bhugnA vAyunASThIlikA smRtA||19||

yA viSamatvAdiguNA piTakA vAyunA bhavati sA nAmnA~aSThIlikA smRtA|  (kupitena vAyunA viSamA kvacinnimnA kvacidunnatA kaThinA prAyeNa kAThinyuktA bhugnA kuTilAkArA strIliGga sAmarthyAt piTa-ketyUhyaM iyamaSThIlikAkhyo guhyarogaH|| 19||

 vimardanAdiduSTena vAyunA carma meDhrajam||20||  nivarttate sarugdAhaM kvacitpAkaJca gacchati||20||  piNDitaM kuthitaM carma tatpralambamadhomaNeH||20||  nivRttasaMjJaM sakaphaM kaNDUkAThinyavattu tat||20||

vimardanAdinA duSTena vAyunA meDhrajaM carma sarugdAhaM sannivartate parAvRtya tiSThati|  kvacittu pAkamapi gacchati|  tataCcarmapiNDitaM saGkucitaM kuthitaM klinnaM maNermeDhrAgrabhAgasyAdhaH pralambaM bhavati tasya nivRttamiti saMjJA|  tacca nivRttaM kaphasaMyogAt kaNDUkAThinyavacca bhavati na tu sarvatra|  (vimardanAddhi duSTeneti pAThaH|  piNDitaM grathitamiti ca|  vimardanAdvividhAnmardanAt duSTena vAyunA meDhrajaM carma meDhrasya tvak nivartate parAvRtya tiSThati|  hi prasiddhau|   kvacit keSucit puruSeSu doSabhedavaCAt sarugdAhaM rujayA USmAtiCayena ca yuktaM satpAkaM gacchati ca|  tattathAbhUtaM carmapiNDitaM grathitaM piNDAkAratayA granthibhAvamApannaM maNermeDhrAgrabhAgasyAdhaHpralambaM lambamAnaM nivRttasaMjJaM nivRttAkhyo rogaH|  sakaphaM kaphasambaddhaM tattu nivRttaM kaNDvA kAThinyena ca yuktaM bhavati)|| 20||

uttarasthAnam

guhyarogavijJAnIyaH

 dArUDhaM sphuTitaM carma nirdiSTamavapATikA||21||

meDhrabhavaM carma duSTaM kRtvoDhaM marditaM sphuTitaM sadavapATiketi nAmnA nirdiSTam|  (duruDhaM duSTaM kRtvoDhaM ayathAvat gRhItamarditamityarthaH|  ata eva sphuTitaM bhinnaM yaccarmatvak tadavapATikA tatsaMjJo guhyarogaH)|| 21||

 vAtena dUSitaM carma maNau saktaM ruNaddhi cet||22||  sroto mUtraM tato~abhyeti mandadhAramavedanam||22||  maNervikAsarodhaCca sa niruddhamaNirgadaH||22||

vAtena dUSitaM carma meDhramaNau saktaM CliSTaM yadi meDhrasrotoruNAddhi tato mUtraM mandadhAramavedanaM cAbhyeti maNeCca harSaNe vikAsarodho bhavati sa gado nAmnA niruddhamaNiH|  (vAtena kRtadUSaNaM carma maNau liGgAgre saktaM saMCliSTaM sroto mUtramArgaM ruNaddhi yadi tatastasmAddhetoH mUtraH mandadhAraM srotorodhAdantarAntarA vicchinnaM avedanaM vedanArahitam|

	arCmaryAdau hi nirodhasyAbhyantaratvAdvedanAsambhavaH iha tu bAhyatvAttadabhAvaH|  abhyeti nirgacchati|  maNeH karNikAyAstvakparivartanACakyatayA vikAsayitumaCakyatvaJca syAt|  ya evaM vidhaH sa gado niruddhamaNisaMjJo guhyarogaH)|| 22||

 liGgaM CUkairivAkIrNaM grathitAkhyaM kaphodbhavam||23||

kaphena hetunA liGgaM meDhramantaH CUkaiH kiMCArubhirivAvRtaM bhavati tasya grathita ityAkhyA|  (CUkAcitapratItiyuktaM meDhraM grathitAkhyaM tacca kaphodbhavaM kaphena jAyata ityarthaH|  (kiMCArurdhAnyaCUkam)|| 23||

 CUkadUSitaraktotthA sparCahAnistadAhvayA||24||

CUkena dUSitaM yanmeDhre raktaM tadutthA meDhre sparCasya hAniracetanatvaM bhavati|  tattadAhvayaM nAmnA sparCahAniH|  (liGgavRddhyarthaM pralipta CUkadUSitAdraktAdutpannA sparCahAniH svApaprayuktaM sparCAjJAnaM tadAhvayo sparCahAnyAkhyo rogaH|| 24||

 chidrairaNumukhairyattu mehanaM sarvataCcitam||25||  vAtaCoNitakopena te vidyAcchataponakam||25||

yattu mehanaM meDhraM sarvatra aNumukhaiH sUkSmAsyaiCchidraiCcitaM vAtaCoNitakopena hetunA bhavati taM nAmnA CataponakaM vidyAt|  (yattu liGgaM vAtaraktayoH kopAdaNumukhaiH sUkSmAsyairmukhasyANutvoktyA mUlasya sthUlatvamapi vyaktitam|  atra eva hi tebhyo mUtrAdiparisrutiH|  chidraiH sUSiraiH sarvataCcitaM vyAptaM taM CataponakAkhyaM vidyAt|  bhagandaroktaCataponakavat bahucchidratvAt)|| 25||

 pittAsRgbhyAM tvacaH pAkastvakpAko jvaradAhavAn||26||

pittAsRgbhyAM hetubhyAM jvaradAhavAn yastvacaH pAkaH sa nAmnA tvakpAkaH|  (pittenAsRjA ca hetunA jvaradAhavAn jvareNa dAhena ca yukto meDhrA tvacaH pAko tvakpAkAkhyo guhyarogaH)|| 26||

 mAMsapAkaH sarvajaH sarvavedano mAMsaCAtanaH||27||

sarvajaH sannipAtajo mAMsapAkaH sarvAbhirvedanAbhiryukto mAMsaCAtano bhavati|  (sarvajaH sannipAtajaH sarvavedanaH chedabhedatodasphuraNavyAsavyadhasraMsasvApAdyakhilavedanAnvitaH mAMsaCAtanaH mAMsaM paktvA meDhrAdaNuCaH pAtayan mAMsapAkaH mAMsapAkAkhyo rogaH)||27||

 sarAgairasitaiH sphoTairvedanAbhiCca pIDitam||28||  mehanaM vedanA cogrA taM vidyAdasRgarbudam||28||

sarAgatvAdiyuktaiH sphoTaistadvidhAbhiCca sUkSmAbhiH piTakAbhiryatra mehanaM pIDitaM bhavatyugrA ca vedanA tasya rogasyAsRgarbudamiti nAma vidyAt| 

	(meDhraM sarAgairISadraktavarNairasitaiH kRSNavarNairvA sphoTairathAttAdRCIbhireva piTakAbhiCca pIDitaM vyAptaM tathA ugrA atyarthamasahanIyA vedanA ca syAdya evaMvidho rogastamasRgarbudaM vidyAt)||28||

 mAMsArbudaM prAguditaM vidradhiCca tridoSajaH||29||

guhye tu yanmAMsArbudaM tat lakSaNaiH prAk granthyAdyadhyAya uditam|  guhye ca tribhirdoSairvidradhirbhavati|  (arbudAnAM madhye mAMsArbudaM vidradhInAM madhye sannipAtajo vidradhiCcAtrApi bhavataH|  tau ca svasva nidAnena boddhavyAvityarthaH)|| 29||

 kRSNAni bhUtvA mAMsAni viCIryante samantataH||30||  pakvAni sannipAtena tAn vidyAttilakAlakAn||30||

sannipAtena hetunA guhye pakvAni mAMsAni kRSNAni bhutvA samantAdviCIryante tAMstilakAlakAn vidyAt|  (sannipAtakopena pakvAni meDhramAMsAni kRSNAni kRSNavarNAni bhUtvA samantataH AbastiparyantaM viCIryante CakalIbhUya nipatanti bahuvacanaM CakalApekSayA|  ya evaMvidhAstAn tilakAlakasMjJAn jAnIyAt)|  ityapadaMCArCaHsarSapikA~avamanthakumbhIkAlajyuttamApuSkarikAsaMvyUDhAmRditA~aSThIlikA- nivRttA~avapATikAniruddhamaNigrathitasparCahAniCataponakatvakpAkamAMsapAkA~asRgarbuda- mAMsArbudavidradhitilakAlakAkhyAsrayoviMCatiH puMguhyarogAH uktAH|| 30||

uttarasthAnam

guhyarogavijJAnIyaH

 mAMsotthamarbudaM pAkaM vidradhiM tilakAlakAn||31||  caturo varjayedeSAM CeSAn CIghramupAcaret||31||

eSAM ca madhyAnmAMsotthamarbudaM mAMsotthameva ca pAkaM vidradhiM tilakAlakAMCceti caturo varjayet na cikitset|  CeSAMstu CIghramevopacaret|  (apadaMCAnAM sAdhyAsAdhyavibhAgasyoktatvAdeSAmanantaroktAnAmarCaHprabhRtInAM madhye mAMsotthamarbudaM mAMsArbudaM pAkaM mAMsapAkaM vidradhiM tilakAlakAniti caturaH varjayet|  uddeCata evaiSAM catuSTve siddhe~api caturaiti catura iti punaruktiH sukhaniCcayArthA bahuvacanoktAnAM tilakAlakAnAM bahutvaCaGkAnirAsArthaM ca|  CeSAnarCaH sarSapikAdIn CIghramACvevopAcaret teSAmapi kAlAtipAte mahAna pratyavAyaH syAditi bhAvaH)|| 31||

 viMCatirvyApado yonerjAyante duSTabhojanAt||32||  viSamasthAGgaCayanabhRCamaithunasevanaiH||32||  duSTArtavAdapadravyairbIjadoSeNa daivataH||32||

evaM puMguhyarogAnuktvA strIguhyarogAnAha-yoneH strIguhyasya duSTabhojanAdihetorviMCatirvyApado jAyante|  viSamasthairaGgaiH CayanaM tathoktam|  duSTArtavena sravatA|  apadravyANi lohAdimayAni dAkSiNAtyAsu prasiddhAni|  bIjadoSaH striyo janmakAle yonyArambhakasya bIjasyopahatatvam|  daivamanyajanmakRtaM karma|  iti yonivyApadA maviCeSeNa heturuktaH|  (duSTabhojanAt paryuSitAdyanyabhojanAt|  uktaM ca-

	bhavet paryuSitaM pUtiklinnamuSNIkRtaM punaH|
	duSTaM kRmyAdijuSTaM ca CoSitaM cAnnamAtape|| iti|

	viSamasthAGgaCayanabhRCamaithunasevanaiH ayathAvadvinyastairaGgaiH Cayanasya bhRCamaithunasya ca CIlanaiH|  duSTArtavAdvAtAdidUSitAdRtujaraktAt|  upadravyairiti pAThaH|  upadravyairlohAdikRtairupaliGgaiH|  upaliGgasurataM deCAntareSu prasiddham|  uktaJca ratirahasye-

	vimRdyamAnAH kRtakadhvajena dravanti hRSyanti dRDhaprahAraiH|
	
	strIrAjyajAH kosalajACca nAryaH pracaNDakaNDUtibhagA bhavanti|| iti|| 

	bIjadoSeNa yonyArambhakasyAkACAdikasya bIjasyopahatatvena daivato janmAntarakRtapApaphalapariNAmAcca hetoH yonerviMCatirvyApado bhavanti|  iyatA granthajAlena yonivyApadAM sAmAnyakAraNamuktam)||32||

 yonau kruddho~anilaH kuryAdruktodAyAmasuptatAH||33||  pipIlikAsRptimiva stambhaM karkaCatAM svanam||33||  phenilAruNakRSNAlpatanurUkSArttavasrutim||33||  bhraMCaM vaGkSaNapArCvAdau vyathAM gulmaM krameNa ca||33||  tAMstAMCca svAn gadAn vyApadvAtikI nAma sA smRtA||33||

yonAvityAdinA liGgAnyucyante|  yonau kruddho vAyuH rugAdIn kuryAt|  pheniletyAdyArttavaviCeSaNaM tasya srutyA sambandhaH|  bhraMCo yonibhraMCaH|  vaGkSaNAdau vyathAM krameNa gulmamapi kuryAt|  tAMstAMCca svAn vAtajAn stambhAdIn gadAn|   iyaM vAtikI nAma yonivyApat smRtA|  (duSTabhojanAdinA kupito vAyuryonau rugAdIn kuryAt|  pipI-likAsRptimiva tAsAM saJcaraNapratItimityarthaH|  karkaCatA kAThinyam|  phenilaM phenayuktamaruNavarNaM kRSNaM kRSNavarNaM vA alpamabahu tanu svacchaM rUkSamasnigdhaM evambhUtasyArttavasya srutiH sravaNam|  sraMsamiti pAThaH|  sraMso vedanAviCeSaH (kalattunokka)|  vaGkSaNapArCvAdau vyathAM vaGkSaNyoH pARCvayoCca kaTIpRSThaparigrahaH|  krameNa upekSayA kAlAtipAtAt gulmaM gulmAkhyaM rogaM tAMstAnAyAmAkSepakastambhAdIn svAn vAtavyAdhisambandhino gadAMCca karoti|  yaivaMvidhA sA vAtikI nAma yonivyApat smRtA)|| 33||

 saivAticaraNA CophasaMyuktAtivyavAyataH||34||

saiva vAtikI ativyavAyAcchophasaMyuktA satyaticaraNetyucyate|  (sA vAtikyeva ativyavAyataH bhRSamaithunAddhetoH Copha saMyuktA yonipradeCe CvayathumatI saJjAtA cedaticaraNA aticaraNeti saMjJAntaraM labhate)|| 34||

 maithunAdatibAlAyAH pRSThajaGghoruvaGkSaNam||35||  rujan sandUSayedyoniM vAyuH prAkcaraNeti sA||35||

atibAlAyA striyA maithunAdvAyuH pRSThAdikaM rujan yoniM sandUSayet|  sA vyApannAmnA prAkcaraNA|

	(bAlAyA asampUrNaSoDaCavayaskAyA atimaithunAdanalpavyavAyAt pRSThajaGghoruvaGkSaNaM pRSThaM jaGghe Uru vaGkSaNau ca rujan yoniM sandUSayet|  ruktodAdiyuktAM karoti sA prAkcaraNeti yonivyApat)||35||

 vegodArvattanAdyoniM prapIDayati mArutaH||36||  sA phenilaM rajaHkRcchrAdudAvRttaM vimuJcati||36||  iyaM vyApadudAvRttA..........................||36||

vegodAvarttanAdadhovAtAdivegadhAraNanimittAdUrdhvamudgamAdvAyuryoniM prapIDayati sA pIDatA satyudAvRttaM baddhaM phenilaM phenayuktaM rajo raktaM kRcchrAdvimuJcati|  iyaM vyApannamnA~apyudAvRttA|  (prapIDayatyativyathAM karoti|  sA anilapIDitA yoniH RtukAle prApte rajo raktaM phenilaM phenayuktaM kRcchrAdalpAlpamudAvRttaM madhye madhye UrdhvamAvartamAnaM visRjati)|| 36||

 .............................jAtaghnI tu yadAnilaH||37||  jAtaM jAtaM sutaM hanti raukSyAdduSTArttavodbhavam||37||

yadA tu duSTArttavodbhavaM sutaM jAtaM tatkAla eva vAyU raukSyAddhanti tadA jAtaghnI nAma vyApadbhavati|  (yadA yasmin kAle vAyU raukSyAt snehakSayodbhUtarUkSaguNAdhikyAt kruddho duSTAvarttavodbhavaM duSTaCoNitasambhUtaM jAtaM jAtaM saJjAtAn sarvAnityarthaH|  jAtaCabdaCaktyA janmAnantarata eveti ca dyotyate|  hanti mArayati tadA tu jAtaghnI|  jAtaghnI nAma yonivyApat|  duSTaCoNitasyApi garbhAdhAnasAmarthyamastItyuktaM CArIre)|| 37||

 atyACitAyA viSamaM sthitAyAH surate marut||38||  annenotpIDito yoneH sthitaH srotasi vakrayet||38||  sasthimAMsaM mukhaM tIvrarujamantarmukhIti sA||38||

yA tu strI atyACitA satI surate puMyoge viSamaM kRtvA tiSThati tadA tasyA marudvAyurannenotpIDito yoneH srotasi sthitaH san tasyA mukhaM tIvrarujaM sAsthimAMsaM vakrayet sA vyApannAmnA~antarmukhI|  (atyACitAyA atibhuktAyAH surate karaNavaicitryAdaGgaM viSamaM kRtvA sthitAyA nAryAH vAyUrannena niravakACaM niSpIDito viSamasthityA sAvakACe yonisrotasyeva sthitastasyA mukhamasthnA mAMsena ca saha tIvrarujamatyarthaM vedanaM vakreyet|  sA antarmukhIti nAma yonivyApat)|| 38||

 vAtalAhArasevinyA jananyAM kupito~anilaH||39||  striyA yonimaNudvArAM kuryAt sUcImukhIti sA||39||

jananyAM mAtari vAtalAhArasevinyAmanilaH kupito yoSAyA yoniM saMvRtamukhIM kuryAt sA vyApannAmnA sUcImukhI|| 39||

 vegarodhAdRtau vAyurduSTo viNmUtrasaMgraham||40||  karoti yoniCoSaJca CuSkAkhyA sAtivedanA||40||

RtukAle vegarodhAddRSTo vAyurviNmUtrasaMgrahaM yoniCoSaM ca karoti|  sA vyApacchuSkAkhyA|  sA cAtivedanA bhavati|  (RtukAle vegarodhAt adhovAtAdivegadhAraNAt duSTaH kruddho vAyurviNmUtrasaMgrahaM malamUtrayornirodhaM yoniCoSaM yonidvAre dravAbhAvaM ca karoti|  ativedanA adhikavedanAyuktA yA evaMvidhA sA CuSkAkhyA CuSkA saMjJA yonivyApat)|| 40||

guhyarogavijJAnIyaH

 SaDahAt saptarAtrAdvA CukraM garbhACayAnmarut||41||  vametsaruGnIrujo vA yasyAM sA vAminI matA||41||

yasyAM vyApadi niSiktaM CukraM garbhACayAnmarut sarujo vA nIrujo vA SaDahAt saptarAtrAdvA bahiH kSipet sA vyApadvAminI matA|  (yasyAM vyApadi vAyuH SaDahAt SaNNAmahnAM samAhArAt hetvarthaM paJcAmyAH karaNArthe pariNAmAt SaDbhirahobhirityarthaH|  saptAhAt saptabhirahobhirvA|  atra saptAhaCabdasya maryAdAtvenAbhividhitvena ceSTatvAdatra SadahAt saptarAtrAdveti pakSadvayaM parigRhItam|  saruk rujA sahitaH nIrujo rujA rahitaH vACabdo vikalpe kvacit sarujaH kvacinnIrujaCcetyarthaH|  CukraM puMsA niSiktaM garbhACayAt garbhakoSThaM praviSTamapIti bhAvaH|  vameta bahirnirasyet|  nudediti vaktavye vamedityuktirvAminICabdasya niruktidyotanAya|  evaMvidhA sA vyApadvAminIsaMjJA)|| 41||

 yonau vAtopataptAyAM strIgarbhe bIjadoSataH||42||  nRdveSiNyastanI ca syAt SaNDasaMjJAnupakramA||42||

stryAkhyagarbhe bIjadoSAdvAtopataptAyAM yonau puruSadveSiNI stanarahitA ca strI syAt sA vyApat SaNDasaMjJAnupakramA tyAjyA|  (yonau kutaCcit kAraNAt kruddhena vAyunA pIDitAyAM satyAM mAturityarthAt|  garbhe garbhAdhAnasamaye bIjadoSataH ArttavaduSTyA strI jAyamAnA putrI nRdveSiNI puMsambhogaviraktA astanI yauvane~atyalpastanI ca syAt sA vyApatSaNDAkhyA anupakramA asAdhyatvAccikitsArahitA ca )|| 42||

 duSTo viSTabhya yonyAsyaM garbhakoSThaM ca mArutaH||43||  kurute vivRtAM srastAM vAtikImiva duHkhitAm||43||  utsannamAMsAM tAmAhurmahAyoniM mahArujam||43||

duSTo vAyuryonyAsyaM garbhakoSThaJcA viSTabhya yoniM vivRtAM sthAnAcca srastAM vAtikyAkhyavyApadamiva ca duHkhitAM vyathitAmutsannamAMsAM mahArujaJca kurute tAM nAmnA mahAyonimAhuH|  (yathAsvaiH guhyarogakAraNAbhUtairdUSaNairduSTo vAyuryonimukhaM garbhACayaJca viSTabhya stambhayitvA vivRtAM na kadAcidapi saMvaraNayuktAM srastAM sthAnAccalitAM bahirnissRtAmityarthaH|  vAtikImiva vAtikyAkhyAM vyApadamiva duHkhitAM ruktodAyAmAdivividhopadravayuktAmityarthaH|  utsannamAMsAM udvAntamukhatvAdutsannamAMsAM mahArujAM atyarthavedanAyuktAM kurute yoniriti mahAyoniCabdasAnnidhyAhAryaM tAM vyApadaM mahayoniM mahAyonyAkhyAmAhuH)|| 43||

 yathAsvairdUSaNairduSTaM pittaM yonisamACritam||44||  karoti dAhapAkoSA pUtigandhajvarAnvitAm||44||  bhRCoSNabhUrikuNapanIlapItAsitArttavAm||44||  sA vyApat paittikI...............................||44||

yathAsvairdUSaNairnidAnakathitairduSTaM pittaM yonimACritya tAmeva dAhAdyanvitAM bhRCoSNAdiguNAM ca karoti sA vyApannAmnA paittikI|  (yathAsvaiH sarvaroganidAnoktaiH kaTvamlAdibhirduSTaM prAptadUSaNaM yoniM prAptaM pittaM tAM yoniM dAhAdyanvitAM bhRCoSNAdiguNayuktArttavAM ca karoti|  dAhaH sarvAGgINaH dAhaH|  USA prAdeCikA dAhaH|  pUtigandho durgandhaH|  kuNapARttavaM raktadoSajaM prAk putrakAmIyAdhyAya uktam|  evaMvidhA vyApatsA paittikI nAma bhavati)|| 44||

 ...........................raktayonyAkhyAsRgatisruteH||45||

eSaivAtiraktasruteH raktayonyAkhyA bhavati|  (sA paittikI vyApadevAtyasRksrAvAddhetoH raktayonisaMjJA syAt)|| 45||

 kapho~abhiSyandibhiH kruddhaH kuryAdyonimavedanAm||46||  CItalAM kaNDulAM pANDuM picchilAM tadvidhasrutim||46||  sA vyApacchlaiSmikI..............................||46||

abhiSyandibhiH srotomAlinyakarairAhAraiH kaphaH kruddho vedanArahitAM CItalAdiguNAM ca yoniM kuryAt|  tadvidhasrutiM CItalAdi guNasrutiM sA vyApannAmnA ClaiSmikI|  (yoniM avedanAmISadvedanAyuktAM CItalAM CItasparCAM kaNDUlAM kaNDuyuktAM pANDu picchilAM pANDuravarNAM paicchilyayuktAM ca tadvidhasrutiM pANDupicchilAmbu sravaNayuktAM ca karoti)|| 46||

 ..................vAtapittAbhyAM kSIyate rajaH||47||  sadAhakARCyavaivarNya yasyAM sA lohitakSayA||47||

yasyAM vyApadi vAtapittAbhyAM rajaH kSIyate dAhAdikRcca bhavati sA vyApannAmnA lohitakSayA|  (yasyAM yonivyApadyanilapittAbhyAM kAraNAbhyAM rajo raktaM dAhAdyanvitaM kSIyate kSayaM yAti sA lohitakSyAkhyA vyApat)|| 47||

 pittalAyA nRsaMvAse kSavathUdgAradhAraNAt||48||  pittayuktena marutA yonirbhavati dUSitA||48||  CUnA sparCAsahA sArttirnIlapItAsravAhinI||48||  bastikukSigurutvAtisArArocakakAriNI||48||  CroNivaGkSaNaruktodajvarakRtsA pariplutA||48||

mubhayatodvAraM snehAbhyaktAM srotasi praNidhAya sUkaraCiM
CumArayorvasayA majjJA vA pariSecayet||20||  cakratailena vA||20||  vAtaharasiddhena vA trivRtena||20||  tRtIye tRtIye cAhani nADIM
pInatarAM vidadhyAt||20||  evamasya srotodvAraM vivardhayet snigdhaM
cAhAraM bhojayet||20||  evamanupaCAntau CastreNa sevanIM parihRtya
dArayitvA sadyaH kSatavadupAcaret||20||

niruddhamaNau nADIvidhAnam|  pariSekaCca subodhaH|  CiMCumAro matsyaviCeSaH|  vAtaharairdravyaiH siddhena trivRtena snehatrayeNa|  subodham|  sadyaHkSatavatsadyovraNavidhAnataH|| 20||

uttarasthAnam

guhyarogapratiSedhaH

 grathitaM nADIsvedena svedayitvA snigdhoSNairupanAhayet||21||  CataponakaM likhitvA kaSAyarcUrNaiH sakSaurdrairlepayet||21||  vidAryAdisiddhena ca tailena ropayet||21||  CarkarArbude rakta
vidradhivat sAdhanam||21||

grathitaM grathitAkhyam|  vyAkhyAsamaM CataponakamarbudaJca|| 21||

 sarveSu ca yathAsvamantaH CuddhiM kaSAyalepaghRtatailarasakriyA

sarveSviti puruSaguhyarogeSu|  yathAsvamiti doSAdyapekSayA antaH-CuddhyAdIn vidadhyAt|  ityuktA meDhravyApadaH|  (kaSAyarasadravyakRto lepaH kaSAyalepaH)|| 22||

 yonivyApadi tu vAtikyAM lavaNatailAktAM yoniM piNDa
nADIkumbhIprabhRtibhiH svedayet||23||  tataH sukhoSNAmbupariSi
ktasarvagAtrAM jAGgalarasairbhojayet||23||  balAdroNadvayaniryUhe payasyAsAlaparNImAgadhikaCatA

siddhaH pIto vAtajAn yonirogAnapohati garbhajananaCca||23||  saindhavavacopakuJcikApippalIvRSakayavakSArAjamodAjAjI
sitopalAcitrakacUrNo madirAlulitaH sarpiSA saMyAvIkRtya
bhakSito yonipArCvavastivedanArCogulmahRdrogaharaH||23||  CUle vRSakarAsnAgokSuraka CRtaM payaH pibet||23||  vRSaka
mAtuluGgamUlamadayantikAsaindhavapippalIkRSNajIrakakalkaM
vA madyena||23||  tenaiva cArjakamUlaM bilvayuktaM vA pippalI

somena vA||23||  dantItriphalAguDUcIkvAthaH sukhoSNo yoneH pariSekaH||23||  kuSThatagaradevadAruvArtAkinIsaindhavaiH sAdhitaM tailaM picunA
dhArayet||23||  rAsnAmAlatIcchinnaruhAmadhukabalAvyAghrIdevadArucitrakayU
thikAmUlaiH karSAMCaistailaprasthaH samUtro dviguNapayasA vipa

sukumArabalAtailaCirISatailaiH CatapAkasahasrapAkaiCcA
nuvAsanamuttaravastiJca||23||  eSa kramo viCeSeNa yonirvedanA
kArkaCyastambhasraMsasparCahAnighnaCca||23||

evaM puMguhyarogANAM cikitsAmuktvA~anantaraM strIguhyarogacikitsAmAha-vAtikAbhidhAnAyAM yonivyApadi yoniM lavaNatailenAbhyajya piNDAdisvedaiH svedayet|  sarvagAtrAmiti sambhavAtstriyam|

	balAkaSAye payasyAdigarbhaM ghRtatailayormiCrIbhUtayorADhakaM sAdhayet pacet|  droNadvayaniryUho droNadvayakvAthaH|  subodham|

	CatAvaryAdibhirghRtaprasthaH subodhaH|  (kArSikaiH karSapramANaiH CatAvaryAdibhiH siddhaH pakvo ghRtaprasthaH pIto vAtajanitAn yonirogAnapohati nACayati)| 

	saindhavAdicUrNo madirAdilulitaH sarpiSA saMyAvIkRtya yavadhAnyavat sAdhayitvA bhAkSito yonyAdivedanAdiharaH|  (saMyAva utkArikA iti jejjaTaH)|  

	yoniCUle vRSakAdisiddhaM payaH pibet|  vRSako vAsakaH|  vRSakamAtuluGgAdikaM vA madyena pibet|  tenaiveti madyenArjakasya sUkSmakuTherasya mUlaM bilvayuktaM vA pippalIyuktaM vA athavA sauvarcalAdikaM madyenAvantisomena vA| (avantisomaM kAJjikam)|  


	dantyAdikvAthena yoneH pariSekaH|

	kuSThAdibhiH sAdhitaM tailaM picunA kArpAsaculukena yonau dhArayet|  vArtAkinI bRhatI|

	rAsnAdivipakvatailapicuprayogaH subodhaH|

	vyAkhyAsamam| CatapAkasahasrapAkau vAtavyAdhyuktau|  eSa ityanantaroktaH sarvaH kramaH|| 23||

 aticaraNAdiSu sarvAsvanilajAsvayameva kramaH||24||

 dhArayeccAticaraNAyAM yavagodhUmakiNvakuSThaCatapuSpA

 prAkcaraNACuSkAviplutAkarNinISu tailamuttarabastiM dadyAt||26||

prAkcaraNAdiSu caturSu subodham|| 26||

 dhArayecca viplutAyAM gomatsyAnyatarapittenaikaviMCati

phACca nivartante||27||

gorvA matsyAnAM vA pittenaikaviMCativArAn bhAvitAn kSaumanaktakAn viplutAyAM dhArayet|  subodham|  asyA viplutAyAH||27||

 udAvRttAyAmAnUpamAMsarasAH kSIraM svedo daCamUlatrivRtA

uttarasthAnam

guhyarogapratiSedhaH

 bhavati cAtra-

snehena vedabastyAdi vAtalAsvanilApaham||31||  kArayedraktapittaghnaM CItaM pittakRtAsu ca||31||  CleSmalAsu ca rUkSoSNaM karma kuryAdyathAyatham||31||  sannipAte vimiCraM tu saMsRSTAsu ca kArayet||31||

bhavati cAtreti tantrarItiH|  vAtalAsu yonivyApatsu snehanAdikamanilApahaM sarvaM karma kArayet|  pittakRtAsu sarvaM raktapittaghnaM CItaJca|  CleSmalAsu tu sarvaM karma rUkSoSNam|  yathAyathamiti doSAdyapekSayA vimiCraM karma sannipAte saMsRSTAsu ca kArayet|| 31||

 snigdhasvinnAM tathA yoniM duHsthitAM sthApayetsamAm||32||  pANinA namayet jihyAM saMvRtAM prathayet punaH||32||  praveCayennissRtAM ca vivRtAM parivartayet||32||  sthApanApavRtA yonirhi CalyabhUtA sriyAmatA||32||

subodham| samasthApanAdau hetuH sthApanAvRttetyAdi (doSavaiparItyenAbhidhAya vyAdhivaiparItyena bheSajanirdeCaH| snigdhasvinnAM duHsthitAM sthApayedyathApUrvam| pANinA namayejjihyAM snigdhasvinnAmityanuvartanIyam| jihyAM kuTilamityarthaH| saMvRtAM vyAsayet punaH krameNa vistArayet| anekArthatvAddhAtUnAm| praveCayennisRtAM tu vivRtAM parivartayet,tiryagvyavasthitAmityarthaH| yasmAt sthApanApavRtyA yoniH CalyabhUtA sriyA matA- iti jejjaTaH)| tathA tadvat duHsthitAM sthAnabhraMCAdviSamAM yoniM samAM yathAsthAnaM sthApayet| jihyAM kuTilAM yonyantargatatulyAgreNa hastena namayet| atra namanakathanenonnamanasyA~aCakyatvAdunnatapradeCasya namanenaiva nimnasyaunnatyajananaM dyotyate| saMvRtAM saMvaraNAdaNUbhUtAM punaH prathayet aGgulyagreNa prasArayet| nissRtAM bahirnirgatAM praveCayet hastAgreNa mandaM mandaM prapIDyAntarAveCayet| vivRtAM vicitrakarmaNo~anilasya vaiguNyena vivaNAdveNunADyAkAreNa sthitAM parivartayet paritaH CanairgRhItvA saMvRNuyAt| caCabdaH samuccaye| sthAnAd bhraSTA yoniH striyA nAryAH CalyabhUtA CalyatvaM prAptA matA| CalyaCabdenaikAvayavajatve~apyeSAmavayavAnAmakarmaNyatAkaratvaM dyotyate| hi prasiddhau) ||32||

 sarvAM vyApannayoniM ca karmabhirvamanAdibhiH||33||  mRdubhiH paJcabhirnArIM snigdhasvinnAmupAcaret||33||

sarvAM vyApannayoniM yonivyApadyuktAM nArIM saMsnehya svedayitvA vamanAdibhiH paJcabhiH karmabhirmRdubhirevopacaret| mRdubhiratIkSNairvamanAdibhirvamanavirecanAsthApanAsrasAvanasyaiH paJcabhiH karmabhiH||33||

 sarvataH suviCuddhAyAH CeSaM karma vidhIyate||34||  bastyabhyaGgaparISekapralepapicudhAraNam||34||

snigdhasvinnAM tathA yoniM duHsthitAM sthApayetsamAm|  karmANi yatholbaNadoSapraCamanAya vidhIyante dvitrANi sarvANi vA yathAsambhavam|  

	sarvataH CuddhAnAM yadyat karma vakSyAmANaM tat sarvaM kArmukaM sampadyate yata Aha sarvataH suviCuddhAyAH samyagUrdhvamadhaCca CeSaM karma vidhIyate-iti jejjaTaH|| 34||

 hiMsrAkalkaM samIrArttau koSNamabhyajya dhArayet||35||  paJcavalkasya pittArtttau CyAmAdInAM kaphAturA||35||  vaminyAplutayoCcaiva svedayitvA prayojayet||35||  tarpaNaM snehapicubhirbhojanaM cAnilApaham||35||  sallakIjiGgiNIjambudhavatvakpaJcavalkalaiH||35||  kaSAyaiH sAdhitAtsnehAtparyupaplutayoH picum||35||  kulIrasUkaravasA sarpirbhirmadhuraiH CRtaiH||35||  pUrayitvA mahAyoniM badhnIyAt kSaumanaktakaH||35||  prasrastAM sarpiSAbhyajya kSIrasvinnAM praveCayet||35||  badhnIyAdveCavArasya piNDenAmUtrakAlataH||35||

hiMsretyAdibhisrayaH kalkA vAtArtyAdiSu yonidhAraNe|  subodham|  paJcavalkalo nyagrodhodumbarACvatthaplakSavetasatvacaH|  mahAyoniM kulIrAdivasAsarpirbhirmadhuradravyasiddhaiH pUrayitvA kSaumanaktakairbadhnIyAt|  prasrastetyAdi subodham|  AmUtrakAlata iti vegadhAraNpratiSedhArtham|| 35||

 yacca vAtavikArANAM karmoktaM tacca kArayet||36||  sarvavyApatsu matimAn mahAyonyAM viCeSataH||36||  na hi vAtAdRte yonirvanitAnAM praduSyati||36||  ato jitvA tamanyasya kuryAddoSasya bheSajam||36||

yacca cikitsite vAtavikArANAM karmoktaM tat sarvaM sarvAsu yonivyApatsvapi kArayet|  tadvAtaharaM karma mahAyonyAM viCeSataH kArayet|  

	yasmAdvAtAdRte vanitAnAM yonirna duSyati ato hetostaM vAtaM jitvA~anyasya doSasya bheSajaM kuryAt|  (vanitAnAM strINAM yoniH vAtAdRte vAtamantareNa na praduSyati duSTiM na prApnoti|  hiryasmAdarthe ato~asmAddhetostaM vAtaM jitvA anyasya doSasya pittaCleSmAderbheSajaM cikitsitaM kuryAt|| 36||

 pittalAnAM tu yoninAM sekAbhyaGgapicukriyAH||37||  CItAH pittajitaH kAryAH snehanArthaM ghRtAni ca||37||  CatAvarImUlatulAcatuSkAt kSuNNapIDitAt||37||  rasena kSIratulyena pAcayeta ghRtADhakam||37||  jIvanIyaiH CatAvaryA mRdvIkAbhiH parUSakaiH||37||  piSTaiH priyAlaiCcAkSAMCairmadhukARddhapalAnvitaiH||37||  siddhaCIte tu madhunaH pippalyACca palASTakam||37||  CarkarAyA daCapalaM kSipellihyAt picuM tataH||37||  yonyasRkCukradoSaghnaM vRSyaM puMsavanaM param||37||  kSataM kSayamasRkpittaM kAsaM CvAsaM halImakam||37||  kAmilAM vAtarudhiraM visarpaM hRcchirograham||37||  apasmArArditAyAmamadonmAdAMCca nACayet||37||  evameva payassarpirjIvanIyopasAdhitam||37||  garbhadaM pittajAnAJca rogANAM paramaM hitam||37||

pittalAyAM yonInAM sekAdayaH CItAH pittajitaCca kAryAH|  snehanArthaM ghRtAnyeva kAryANi|  (pittalAnAm bahupittAnAm|  pittajAnAmiti vaktavye pittalAnAmityuktirnna hi vAtadRta ityAdipUrvoktagranthasya virodhanirAsArtham|  yonInAM yonivyApadAmityarthaH|  CItAH sparCavIryayoH CItAH pittajitaH pittaghnAH CItaCabdenaiva pittaharatve siddhe punarapi pittaghnakathanaM pittaghnAnAM mandaCItagurvAdInAM madhye~atra CItasya viCeSopayojyatvadyotanArtham|  sekAbhyaGgapicukriyAH sekaH pariSekaH|  abhyaGgaH snehapralepaH|  picukriyA picunaktakanikSepaNam|  kriyACabdaH pratyekaM sambadhyate|  kAryAH karttavyAH|  snehanArthaM CodhyaviSaye snehayituM ghRtAni pittaghnauSadhairbahudhA siddhAni caCabdAt kAryANItyarthaH|  

	CatAvarItyAdinA tAnyeva ghRtAnyucyante-CatAvarImUlAni paripUrNasArANyanupahatAni ca gRhyante|  subodham|  (dviyaSTimadhukairbhiSagiti carakapAThaH|  CatAvarIghRte dviyaSTimadhukairiti dvigrahaNaM bhAgAdviguNapratipAdanArtham|  yaSTimadhukadvayapratipAdanArthaM vA|  sthalajaM jalajaM ceti madhukaM dvividhaM smRtamityAmnAyAt|  brAhmaNAn prACayetpUrvamiti adRSTavRddhyarthameSA paribhASA~anyatrApi draSTavyA|  iti jejjaTaH)|  dvibalAmadhukAnvitairiti hRdayapAThaH|  kSuNNapIDitAn|  CatAvarImUlasya tulAcatuSkAt kSIratulyena rasena|  etAvanmAtrasya CatAvarImUlasya yAvAn raso jAyate tattulyena payasetyarthaH|  akSAMCairakSapramANaiH piSTairjIvanIyAdibhirghRtADhakaM vipacet|  siddhaCIte cAsmin ghRte madhunaH pippalIcUrNasya ca palASTakaM sitAyA daCapalaJca kSipet tatastasmAt picuM karSapramANaM lihyAdAtura iti CeSaH|  tad ghRtaM yonyasRkCukradoSaghnaM vRSyaM Cukravardhanam||  paramatiCayena puMsavanaM garbhadam|  kSatAdIMCca nACayet|  mRdvIkAdInAM bahuvacanoktiH chando~anurodhAt )|  

	evameveti CatAvarIvidhAnena payassarpiHkSIrodbhavaM ghRtaM jIvanIyopasAdhitaM garbhadatvAdiguNam|  ('garbhadaM pittalAnAM ca yonInAM syAdbhiSagjitam'-iti carakapAThaH|  evameveti kSIrasarpiH kSIrAdutthitaM evameva pUrvavidhimatidiCati siddhaCIte ca madhuna ityAdi yAvat brAhmaNAn prACayet pUrvamityAdi-iti jejjaTaH)||37||

 raktayonyAmasRgvarNairanubandhamavekSya ca||38||  yathAdoSodayaM yuJjyAdraktasthApanamauSadham||38||

raktayonyAmasRjo varNaiH sirAvyadhoktaprakAreNa vAtAdInAmanyatamasya doSasyAnubandhamavekSya doSodayAnatikrameNa raktasthApanaM raktasrAvaharamauSadhaM yuJjyAt|  (raktayonyAmasRgvarNairanubandhaM kRSNAruNanIlapItapANDUtvAdibhirvAtAdInAmAdhikyamalpatvaM ca samIkSya tato yathAdoSaM yo yo doSo yathAdoSaM raktasthApanamauSadhaM kAryamiti jejjaTaH)|| 38||

 tilacUrNaM dadhighRtaM phANitaM saukarI vasA||39||  kSaudrayuktaM jayetpItaM vAtottaramasRgdaram||39||  varAhasya raso medhyaH sakaulatthaCca tadguNaH||39||  patrakalko ghRte bhRSTo rAjAdanakapitthayoH||39||  CarkarAkSaudrayaSTyAhvanAgaraiCca yutaM dadhi||39||

tilAdikaM kSaudrayuktaM pItaM vAtAdikaM raktasrAvaM jayet|  uttaro balavAn|  varAhamAMsarasaH kaulatthena rasena yuktastadguNo vAtottaramasRgdaraM jayedityarthaH|  rAjAdanakapitthayostu bAlapatrakalko ghRte bhRSTastadguNa eva|  tathA CarkarAdibhIryuktaM dadhi|| 39||

 payasyotpalaCAlUkabisakAlIyavArijam||40||  sapayaCCarkarAkSaudraM rakte pittottare pibet||40||  taNDulIyakamUlaM vA sakSaudraM taNDulAmbhasA||40||  satArkSyaCailaM lAkSAM vA chAgena payasA pibet||40||  vAsAghRtaM mahAtiktaM raktapittahitaJca yat||40||

payasyAdikaM kSaudrAntaM pittAdhike rakte~asRgdare pibet|  payasyA kSIrikA|  CAlUkaM jalajakandam|  bisaM padmAdijam|  kAlIyaM pItacandanam|  athavA pittottare rakte taNDulIyakamUlaM kSaudrayuktaM tARkSyaCailayuktaJca taNDulAmbhasA pibet|  athavA kevalAmeva lAkSAM chAgena payasA pibet|  vAsAghRtaJca raktapittoktaM pibet|  tathA mahAtikta-manyacca yat kiJcidraktapittahitaM tat sarvamatreSyate|  

	(paittike~asRgdare pibediti carakapAThaH|  payasyAdInekaCa ekaikaCaH payaHCarkarAkSaudrasahitaM paittike~asRgdare pibediti jejjaTaH)|| 40||
