 madhukaM triphalAM lodhraM mustaM saurASTrikAM madhu||41||  madyairnimbaguDUcyau ca kaphaje~asRgdare pibet||41||

kaphAsRgdare madhukAdikaM guDUcyantaM madyaiH pibet|| 41||

 pAThAM jambvAmrayorasthiCilodbhedaM rasAJjanam||42||  ambaSThAM CAlmalIpicchAM samaGgAM vatsakatvacam||42||  vAhnIkabilvAtiviSAlodhratoyadagairikam||42||  CuNThImadhukamAcIkaraktacandanakaTphalam||42||  kaTvaGgavatsakAnantA dhAtakImadhukArjunam||42||  puSye gRhItvA saJccUrNya sakSaudraM taNDulAmbunA||42||  pibedarCasvatIsAre raktaM yaccopaveCyate||42||  doSA jantukRtA ye ca bAlAnAM tAMCca nACayet||42||  yonidoSaM rajodoSaM CyAvaCvetAruNAsitam||42||  cUrNaM puSyAnugaM nAma hitamAtreyapUjitam||42||

pAThAdikamarjunAntaM puSye gRhItvA saMyojya paCcAcca saJcUrNya kSaudreNa yuktaM taNDulodakenArCaHprabhRtiSu pibet|  etacca bAlAnAM yekRmikRtA doSAstAn yonidoSaM ca CyAvAdyanyatamavarNaM rajodoSaM ca nACayet|  etaccUrNaM nAmnA puSyAnugam|  hitaM pathyamAtreyeNa punarvasUnAM pUjitam|  jambUphalasyAmraphalasya cAsthi|  CilodbhedaM CilAjatu|  ambaSThA sAhasrI, saiva bahumUlikA|  CAlmalyAH sambandhinI picchA|  samaGgA maJjiSThA|  vAhnIkaM kuGkumam|  toyado mustaH|  mAcIkaM kuTajaphalam|  kaTvaGgaH syonAkaH|  anantA yavAsakaH|  (pAThAmityAdi|  CilodbhedaH pASANabhedakaH|  ambaSThA dakSiNApathe prasiddhaiva|  dvitIyAM pAThAmapare CAlmalIveSTaMkhapuramityarthaH|  mAcIkamuttarApathe prasiddhameva|  kaTvaGgoraluH|  vatsaka indrayavo~abhipretaH phalaCabdalopAt|  anantA utpalasArivA|  madhukaM dviyaSTimadhukaM sthalajalajabhedena dvidhetyuktam|  puSye gRhItvetyAdRSTAnugrahArtham|  yonidoSaM rajodoSaM rajodoSA rajoviCeSAH CvetAdayaH pradarabhedAH yonivyApalliGgA eva|  iti jejjaTaH)|| 42||

 sarveSu garbhasrAvoktaM pradareSu praCasyate||43||

CArIre yadgarbhasrAva uktaM cikitsitaM tatsarvaM pradare~api Casyate|  pradaramasRgdaramatiraja iti paryAyAH|| 43||

 raktakSayAyAM kSIraJca jIvanIya CRtaM pibet||44||

uttarasthAnam

viSapratiSedhaH

 athAto viSapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

AgantuprasaGgAduktaCiSTatvAdviSacikitsAyA avasarastasyACcAnekaprakAratvena vakSyamANAtvAt sAmAnyena cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate (-athAta ityAdi| viSapratiSedhaM sthAvarajaGgamAdibhedenAnekavidhasya viSasya pratiSedhaM cikitsitaM nidAnAdvinA pratiSedhasya duSkaratvAtsa nidAnamityarthaH|  CeSaM pUrvavat)||1||

 purA khalvamRtArthaM surAsuraiH salilanidhervimadhyamAnAt krodha
iva rUpavAn sattvaM samudbabhUva kRSNamanalanayanamurdhva-
pradIptakeSaM daMSTrAkarAlaM bhairavArAvarUpam||2||  taddarCanAdeva yato
devadAnavACca viSaNNAstasmAttadviSasaMjJAmavApa||2||

(tatra pUrvaM viSasyotpattiM darCayati|) iha hi viSacikitsA prastutA|  viSasya ca svarUpe jJAte  tadvyAdhInAM hetvAdikaM jJeyamataH  svarUpameva prathamamitihAsarUpeNocyate-purA khalvityAdi|  purA kasmiMCcitkAle suraiCcAsuraiCcA~amRtArthaM vimathyamAnAjjalanidhe rUpavAniva krodhaH kRSNatvAdiguNaM sattvaM samudbabhUva|  tasya sattvasya darCanamAtrAdeva devA dAnavACca yato viSAdaM prAptAstasmAt sattvaM viSasaMjJAmanvarthatAM cAvApa prApa|| 2||

 tat sahasaiva sarvabhUtAni nirdagdhukAmamupayogaviCeSairviSa
mamRtatAM vinayamAno brahyAnunIyauSadhISu nyastavAn||3||  tatastat sthAvarAsu mUrtiSvadhivasanAt sthAvaramityucyate||3||

udbhUtaM tadviSaM sahasaiva sarvabhUtAni nirdagdhukAmaM yadA tadaitadamRtatAM prApnotItyupayogaviCeSayogyatAM tasya kurvan brahmA tadviSamauSadhiSu viCiSTAsveva nyastavAn tatastadviSaM sthAvarAsvauSadhyAkhyAsu mUrtiSvadhivasanAtsthAvaramityucyate|  iti sthAvarasya viSasya sambhavaH|| 3||

 jaGgamaM punaH pRthivyA bhArAvatArArthamuragAdirUpeNa viSNU-
rnirmame||4||

jaGgamaM tu viSaM bhagavAn viSNurnirmame nirmitavAn|  kimarthamityAha|  pRthivyA bhArAvatArArthaM pRthivIto bhAro~avaratatviti kRtvA|  atra bhagavAneva pramANam|| 4||

 tayoH sthAvaraM mUlapatrapuSpaphalatvaksAraniryAsakSIra

nakACvamArakaguJjAsugandhakagargarakakarkarakaraghATakA
dIni||5||  patraviSaM kAlapatrikA lambAvaradakarambhArkAdi
nAm||5||  puSpaviSaM vallIreNukakarambhamahAkarambhAdInAm||5||  phalaM kumudvatIreNukAkarambhamahAkarambhamadanakatuvarakA
dInAm||5||  tvaksAraniryAsAH karakakaraghATakakarambhama
hAkarambhanArAcakAdInAm||5||  kSIraM kumudvatI dantIsnuhya
rkajAlinIvyAlAdInAm||5||  dhAtavo haritAlaphenACmabhasma
raktaprabhRtayaH||5||  kandajAni tu hAlAhalakAlakUTavatsa
nAbhaCRGgIsArSapajAlakakardamakavairATakamustakamuSkaka
sAktukakrauJcakavAlakamahAviSapuNDarIkagAlavamUlaka
markaTakarkaTakakaravIrakendrAyudhasaGkocakalAGgalakataila
peyakuCapuSpake tu puSpakarohiSAJjanAbhakAdIni||5||

tayoH sthAvarajaGgamaviSayormadhye sthAvaraM mUlAdibhedena daCACrayam|  tatra klItanakAdIni mUlaviSANi|  subodham|  sarvANi paThitA~apaThitAni viSACrayANi prasiddhyaiva bhAratadeSeSu jJAyante|  asmAbhistulyavyAptibandhanabhayAnna likhyante|  CAstrakRtA tu mUlAdimudrayaiva teSAM jAtisaMgrahaH kRtaH|  (mUlAdiviSANAM yatnaparairapi jJAtumaCakyatvAttAni himavatpradeCe kirAtaCabarAdibhyo jJeyAnIti nibandhasaMgrahAkhyAyAM suCrutaTIkAyAm)|| 5||

 tatra mUlaviSairupayuktairudveSTanapralApamohAH prajAyante||6||  patra
viSairjRmbhodveSTanaCvAsAH||6||  puSpaviSaiCchardyAdhmAnamohAH||6||  phalaviSairdAhamuSkaCophau||6||  tvaksAraniryAsaviSaiH prase

tatra mUlaviSairityAdinA  daCAnAmupayogakrameNa vyAdhikIrttinam|  subodham|  udveSTanaM veSTanamivAGgAnAm|  muSkaCopho vRSaNaCophaH|  dhAtavastu raktAdayaH prANiviCeSeNa viSaM bhavanti|  sarvamapi ca daCavidhamapi sthAvaraM viSaM jvarAdikaM karoti|    vyAkhyAsamam|  itarattu kandajAtAdanyannavavidham|  (upayogadivasAdanyo divasapakSamAsAdi kAlAntaramiti nibandhasaMgrahaH)|| 6||

 sarvamapi caitanmaulamityucyate mUlACrayatvAtpatrAdInAm||7||

sarvamapi caitat sthAvaraM viSaM maulamityucyate, patrAdInAM mUlACrayatvAt|  na hi yanmUle na CritaM tatpatrAdiSu bhavati|  ityuktaM sthAvaram|| 7||

 jaGgamasya tvACrayAH SoDaCadRSTiniCvAsasparCadaMSTrAmukhana

 dvividhamapi caitadviSaM tIkSNoSNarUkSaviCadasUkSmavyavA

dvividhaM sthAvaraM jaGgamaM ca viSaM tIkSNAdibhirdaCabhirguNairyuktamapAki ca bhavati|  (anekarasasambhavAdekasyApi rasasyAvyaktatvamasyA~avyaktarasatve hetuH|  apAkitvantu mantratantrAbhyAmantareNa pAkAbhAvAt|  pAko vIryahAniH|  pakve~apyanne viSasyApakvasyaivopalabdheH|  mantratantrAbhyAmapAka evAsya kAraNAntare punaH kopahetuH)| 

	ebhiCca guNairyat karoti dehe tattaikSNyauSNyAt pittamityAdinA krameNocyate|  tatretyAdi subodham|  annasyApi duSTyA tairdehena tathA vedanAttathA guNatvam|  apAkitvAdeva ca mantrAdibalenopaCamitamapi pratyayaM vakSyamANaM kAraNasAmAnyamAsAdya prApya punaH prakupyatIti||9||

 bhavati cAtra-

sthAvaraM jaGgamaM ceti viSaM proktamakRtrimam||10||  kRtrimaM garasaMjJaM tu kriyate vividhauSadhaiH||10||  hanti yogavaCenACu cirAcciratarAcca tat||10||  CophapANDUdaronmAdadurnAmAdIn karoti vA||10||

gatAnugatikA|  viSasya kRtrimAkRtrimabhedaM darCayati|  sthAvarajaGgamaM ceti dvividhamapi viSamAcAryairakRtrimamiti proktam|  (akRtrimaM kenApyanirmitaM svataH saJjAtaM viSamityarthaH)|  

	kRtrimaM tu viSaM garasaMjJitaM nAnAvidhairauSadhaiH saMyuktaiH kriyate yattena tacca kRtrimaM samyogavaCAdACu vA hanti cirAdvA ciratarAdvA|   athavA tatra hanti, apitu CophAdIn karoti|  (yadvividhauSadhaiH kriyate tattu kRtrimaM kRtrimaviSaM garasaMjJaJca|  tat yogavaCena tathAvidhadravyayogavaCAdACu sadya eva cirAt cirakAlena ciratarAdaticirakAlena ca hanti mArayati|  CophAdIn karoti vA)|| 10||

 athAto viSapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 viSaM yaddoSabhUyiSThaM taM doSaM prAk prapadyate||13||  ACaye yasya yasyaiva tatastadavatiSThate||13||  tajjAn vikArAn kurute yAn sarvaiSUpadekSyati||13||  vAtACayasthaM kurute tathA CleSmAmayAnapi||13||  pittaCleSmACayagataM tadvatpittakaphodbhavAn||13||  tatrApi cottamAGgasthe sakoThaM CUyate CiraH||13||  viCeSAdakSikUTauSThanAsAsyaM hRSTadantatA||13||  tAluCoSo rujA mUrdhni vaktre cimicimAyanam||13||  artheSu cakSurAdInAmapravRttirhanugrahaH||13||  ityanyatrApi ca viSaM sthitamaGge~abhilakSayet||13||  vyApyaivaM sakalaM dehamuparudhya ca vAhinIH||13||  viSaM viSamiva kSipraM prANAnasya nirasyati||13||

candanakuGkumAdibhiH puSpadine samAhRtaiH saJjIvano nAmAgadaH saMyojyaH|  ayamagado~amRtAtpUrvamutpanno~amRtatulyakAryakaraH svayambhuvA brahmaNA vihitaH|  sthauNeyaH kRtabarhAkhyaH|  plvaM paripelavam|  surasasya prasavamaGkuraH|  puSpaM pravAlaCca jAtyAH|  pravAlaH kisalayam|  CyAmA priyaGguH|  naladaM mAMsI|  nataM tagaram|  CamyAka AragvadhaH|  maYurako~apAmArgaH|  eSa ca saJjIvanaH pAnAdibhirjjIvanAdiguNo dhAnyAdipradaCca|  gRhe sthito viSAdIn hanti|  dhanyo maGgalyaH|  mantro~anyenAbhicAraprayuktaH|  kRtyA abhicAradevatA|  kARmaNaM vaCIkaraNam|  kAkhorddo nAma bhUtaviCeSaH|  jantavaH kRmayaH|  sarIsRpaH sarpAdayaH|  svapnopaghAtaH svapne bhayaGkarairabhibhavaH|  duHsvapnaM CArIroktam|  vigraho dvandvaH|| 46||

candanAdibhiH paJcabhiH ClokairyApanAkhya agadaH pUrveNa saJjIvanena guNaiH sadRCaH|  dhyAmakaM CyAmakam|  kattRNamiti kecit|  vatsakAtphalamindrayavaH|  dalaM gandhapatram|  ahicchatraM kavakam|  tadeva bhUsphoTam|  chatrAkArametat (kUNNa-iti bhASA)|  CyAmA pippalI|  CaGkhapuSpI vIraTiH|  kuraNDakaM pItAmlAyanakam|  vaya-sthA Amalakam|  kAyasthA harItakI|  cAraTI sthoNeyam|  karkaTI bilvam|  pUtanA mAMsI|  keCI nirguNDI|  golomI  dUrvA|  vAsaka iti ca|  siMhalomI (ni) surasA ca supatrA ca  bahuputrI ca takralA|  varSAbhUH punarnavA|| 47||

 Cveta vacA hiGvamRtA sugandhA kuSThasaindhavam||55||  CirISapuSpadviniCAvyoSaTuNTukasarSapAH||55||  kapitthamadhyaM laCunaM karaJjo vaMCalekhanam||55||  piSTvA gobastamUtreNa tatpittenaiva bhAvayet||55||  dinAni sapta vyatyAsAdvinihanti tato~aJjanAt||55||  viSaM CirasthaM mUrddhArttijvarAjIrNAviSUcikAH||55||  apasmAragrahonmAdapANDumehamadAtyayAn||55||  CuSkanetrAmayaCirorogapaillagaNArbudAn||55||  kAcAndhakArapaTalakaNDUdaurbalyapakSmaNaH||55||  lepAt pItakSatAlIDhadaSTadighdaviSaM jayet||55||  CvitraM kRcchrANi kuSThAni duSTanADImahAvraNAn||55||  AnAhArCo gude lepAllalATe duSTapInasam||55||  yonilepena nArINAM mUDhagarbhAnulomanaH||55||  unmUlayatyeSa viSaM gandhahastIva kAnanam||55||

CvetAdikaM gobastamUtreNa piSTaM saMCoSya saptadinAni tatpittena gobastapittena vyatyAsAt paryAyeNa bhAvayet|  punargopittena punarbastapittenetyarthaH|  tato~anantaramaJjanena CiraHsthaM viSaM mUrddhArtyAdIMCca vinihanti|  CuSkanetrAmayaH CuSkAkSipAkaH|  andhakAraM timiram|  lepAt pItaviSaM kSataviSamAlIDhaviSaM daSTaviSaM digdhaviSaM ca jayet|  kSataviSAdInAM lakSaNaM vakSyati|  CvitrapIDAdIMCca lepAt jayet|  gude lepAdAnAhamarCaCca|  lalATalepAdduSTapInasam|  eSa cAgado nArINAM yonilepanena mUDhagarbhAnulomanaH|  eSa ca viSamunmUlayati yathA gandhahastI vanam|  (CvetA CvetavacA|  sugandhA gandhanAkulI|  TuNTukaH syonAkaH|  vaMCalekhanaM vaMCatvak)||55||

 viDaGgapAThA triphalAjamodA

manohvAdibhiH kalkito~agado nAmnA bAlasUryo viSaghnaH CryAdipradaCca|  manohvA manaCCilA|  caNDA corakam|  kACmIraM kuGkumam|  kAntA priyaGguH|| 57||

 viSadigdhena viddhastu pratAmyati muhurmuhuH||59||  vivarNabhAvaM bhajate viSAdaM cACu gacchati||59||  kITairivAvRtaM cAsya gAtraM cimicimAyate||59||  CroNipRSThaCiraH skandhasandhayaH syuH savedanAH||59||  kRSNaduSTAsravisrAvI tRNmUrcchAjvaradAhavAn||59||  duSTikAluSyavamathuCvAsakAsakaraH kSaNAt||59||  AraktapItaparyantaH CyAvamadhyo~atirugvraNaH||59||  CUyate pacyate sadyo gatvA mAMsaM ca kRSNatAm||59||  praklinnaM CIryate~abhIkSNaM sapicchilaparisravam||59||

viSadigdhAstraviddhasya lakSaNamAha-pratAmyati muhurmuhurityAdikaM viSadigdhena viddhasya lakSaNam|  tatra vraNaH kSaNAt dRSTikAluSyAdikara iti sambandhaH|  AraktA ISallohitAH paryantA yasmin vraNe sa tathoktaH|  CUyata iti vraNaviCeSaNam|  (viSadigdhena CastreNa viddho narastu muhurmuhuH punaH punaH pratAmyati glAniM prApnoti vivarNabhAvaMm vaivarNyaM bhajate|  ACveva viSAdaM gacchati|  caCabdaH samuccaye|  asya viSadigdhAhatasya CarIraM kITaiH kRmibhirAcitaM vyAptamiva cimicimAyate cimicimAvadAcarati|  aNuprANi parisarpaNapratItiCcimicimA|  asya CroNyAdi nAnA vedanA~anvitA bhavanti|  vraNaH kRSNaM duSTaM cAsraM sadA sravati|  tRDAdiyuktaCca bhavati|  mUrcchA vaicityam|  kSaNena dRSTikAluSyAdikaro bhavati|  vedhavraNa ISadraktapItavarNaparyantaH CyAvarNamadhyaH CophaM prApnoti|  sahasA pAkaM ca prApnoti|  tadgataM mAMsaM kARrSNyamAsAdya atiCayena klinnaM sat paicchilyayuktapUyasrAvopetamanavarataM CIryate|  caCabdaH samuccayArthaH)|| 59||

 kuryAdamarmaviddhasya hRdayAvaraNaM drutam||60||  CalyamAkRSya taptena lohenAnu dahed vraNam||60||  athavA muSkakaCvetAsomatvaktAmravallitaH||60||  CirISAdgRdhranakhyACca kSAreNa pratisArayet||60||  CukanAsAprativiSAvyAghRImUlaiCca lepayet||60||  pItadaSTacikitsAM ca kuryAttasya yathArhataH||60||  vraNe tu pUtipiCite kriyA pittavisarpavat||60||

kiryAdityAdinA digdhaviddhasya cikitsA-amarmaNi viddhasyACu hRdayavaraNaM kuryAt|  hRdayAvaraNaM tat yena pItena hRdaya prAptena viSamabhibhavituM na Caknoti tacca vakSyate|  vraNAcca viSadigdhaM CalyamAkRSyAnu paCcAttaptena CastreNa vraNaM dahet|  (amarmaviddhasya marmavedhasyAsAdhyatvAnmarmarahitapradeCe viddhasya drutamACveva hRdayAvaraNaM ghRtapAnena hRdayAcchAdanaM kuryAt bhiSagiti CeSaH)|  hRdayasya sarvadhAtumUlatvAdAhAramArgatvAt  pradhAnamarmatvAcca tasmin viSaghnaghRtAdibhiH pracchAdite sati viSaM sahasA nAtivisarpati|  uktaM cAlambAyanena-


	yAH sirAH sarvagAtreSu hRdaye sampratiSThitAH|
	tAbhirasya viSaM sarvaM hRdayaM sampradhAvati||
	ghRtena tu praticchannaM viSaM nAti prapIDayet|
	nirvANajananaM sarpiH prANinAM prANavarddhanam|| 
	hRdayAvaraNAstadvadbhakSyA bhojyACca sAgadAH|| iti|

	anu hRdayAvaraNAdanantaraM CalyaM viSadigdhaCilImukhAdikaM sUtroditena vidhinA~ahRtya agninA taptena lohamayena jAmbvoSThAdinA vedhavraNaM dahet|  

	athavA naiva dahedapi tu muSkakAdInAM kSAreNa pratisArayet|  CukanAsAdibhirvraNaM lepayet|  (athavA adAhe yasya cet muSkakAdibhavena kSAreNa vraNaM pratisArayet|  muSkakaH kAlamuSkakaH|  CvetA  CvetavacA|  somAtvak kaTphalatvak|  tAmravallI (combullirkoDi) CirISaM prasiddhaM loke|  gRdhranakhI (kArtoTTi) viraleti pAThyakAraH|  piSTaiH CukanAsAdibhirvedhavraNaM lepayecca|  CukanAsA syonAkaH|  prativiSA~ativiSA|  vyAghrI bRhatI)|  

	tasya viSadigdhaCastraviddhasya pItadaSTaviSAdyapekSayA yojayet|  subodham|  pUtipiCite klinnamAMse|  (tasya viSadigdhaCastraviddhasya pItadaSTacikitsAM pItacikitsAM viSapItAya sUtroditAM vamanAdikAM daSTacikitsAmupari vakSyamANAM sarpAdiduSTakriyAM ca kuryAt|  vraNe viddhavraNe pUtipiCite durgandhayuktAmiSe sati tuCabdena duSTIbhUte~api kAraNaviCeSAt CItopacAra eva karttavya iti dyotyate|  pittavisarpavat pittavisarpa iva CatadhautaghRtAplutanyagrodhagaNAdyAlepanAdikA kriyA cikitsA kAryeti CeSaH)|| 60||

 saubhAgyArthaM striyo bhartre rAjJe vArAticoditAH||61||  garamAhArasampRktaM yacchantyAsannavartinaH||61||

ityakRtrimamuktvA kramaprAptaM kRtrimaM nirNetumAha-saubhAgyArthaM bhartrerAhArasamprayuktaM garaM striyo yacchanti dadati|  rAjJe cAsannavartino yacchanti kimbhUtA arAticoditAH rAjaCatruprayuktAH|  (striyaH saubhAgyArthaM bhartre AsannavartinaH arAticoditAH vairijanapreritAH rAjJe nRpAya vACabdo vikalpArthaH|  garaM vakSyamANaviCeSaviSaM AhAra sampRktaM AhoreNa saMyuktaM AhAraCabdenAdyamAnaM sakalamapi vastujAtaM gRhyate|  yacchanti prayacchanti)|| 61||

 nAnAprANyaGgaCamalaviruddhauSadhibhasmanAm||62||  viSANAJcAlpavIryANAM yogo gara iti smRtaH||62||

nanu garaCabdena kimucyata ityAha-nAnAvidhaprANyaGgaCamalAnAM dehaviruddhauSadhibhasmanAmalpavIryANAM viSANAM ca ya ekatra yogaH sa gara iti smRtaH|  (nAnAprANyaGgaCamalaviruddhauSadhibhasmanAM nAnAvidhaprANinAmaGgAnAmavayavAnAM CamalAnAM mUtrapurISAdimalAnAM ca athavA nAnAprANInAM aGgamalAnAM manuSyadehamalAnAM ca prANInAmevAGgamalAnAM vA|  viruddhauSadhibhasmanAM viruddhavIryadravyabhasmanAM alpavIryANAM vatsanAbhAdi mandavIryANAM viSadravyANAM ca yogaH ekIkaraNaM gara iti garasaMjJaH smRtaH munibhiriti CeSaH)|| 62||

 tena pANDuH kRCo~alpAghniH kAsaCvAsajvarArditaH||63||  vAyunA pratilomena svapnacintAparAyaNaH||63||  mahodarayakRtplIho dInavAgdurbalo~alasaH||63||  CophavAn satatAdhmAtaH CuSkapAdakaraH kSayI||63||  prAyaH paCyati CuSkAMCca vanaspatijalACayAn||63||  manyate kRSNamAtmAnaM gauro gauraM ca kAlakaH||63||  vikarNanAsAnayanaM paCyettadvihatendriyaH||63||  etairanyaiCca bahubhiH kliSTo ghorairupadravaiH||63||  garArtto nACamApnoti kaCcitsadyo~acikitsitaH||63||

uttarasthAnam

sarpaviSavijJAnIyaH

 athAtaH sarpaviSavijJAnIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

sthAvaraM viSamuktvA jaGgamamucyate| tatrApi sarpANAM prAdhAnyAt tadvijJAnArthamadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 divyabhaumavibhAgena dvividhAH pannagAH smRtAH||2||  vAsukistakSako~anantaH sagaraH sAgarAlayaH||2||  tathA nandopanandAdyAH samiddhAgninasamaprabhAH||2||  divyA garjanti varSanti dyotante dyotayanti te||2||  dhArayanti jagatkRtsnaM kuryuH kruddhACca bhasmasAt||2||  dRGniCvAsairnamastebhyo na teSvasti cikitsitam||2||

dvividhAH pannagAH sarpAH keciddivyAH kecidbhaumAH| subodham| tebhyo divyebhyo namo~astu| teSu kruddheSu cikitsA nAsti||2||

 darvIkarA maNDalino rAjImantaCca pannagAH||3||  tridhA samAsato bhaumA bhidyante te tvanekadhA||3||  vyAsato yonibhedena nocyante~anupayogataH||3||

bhaumAnAM sarpANAM traividhyaM darCayati-bhaumAstu pannagA darvIkarAdibhedAt tridhA samAsataH saGkSepeNa|  te tu darvIkarAdayo vyAsato  vistarato yonibhedena jAtiviCeSeNAnekadhA bahuprakAreNa bhidyante bhinnA bhavanti tathA nocyante~anupayogataH prayojanAbhAvAt|| 3||

 viCeSAdrUkSakaTukamamloSNaM svAdu CItalam||4||  viSaM darvIkarAdInAM kramAdvAtAdikopanam||4||

 daMCo rAjImatAM snigdhaH sthipicchilaCophakRt||38||  sAndrAsraH CiCiraH pANDustadvikArAH CirovyathA||38||  aruciCchardirAlasyaM hRllAso madhurAsyatA||38||  kaNThe ghuraghuraH pAko kaNDUrakSNorhimo jvaraH||38||  mRcchrAducchvasanaM nidrA kAsaH CvetanakhAditA||38||  stambho gurutvaM cAGgAnAM nAsikAkSimukhasrutiH||38||  romaharSastamaCvAso rogACcA~anye kaphodbhavAH||38||

 vyantare miCraliGgatvaM.......................||39||

uttarasthAnam

sarpaviSavijJAnIyaH

 napuMsakena tiryagdRgadhIraH priyamaithunaH||41||  bahuvAdI ca vRddhena cirAnmandACca vedanAH||41||  bAlena CIghraM tIkSNACca kumAreNAkSNi dakSiNe||41||  rogI kumAryA vAme tu garbhiNyA kRSNajihvadRk||41||  jRmbhA krodhopajihvArttaH sa CUnoSThaH sitAnanaH||41||  gurUdaraH CirorogI sUtA daSTastu mehati||41||  CoNitaM kRcchraCUlArttaH sUcIbhiriva bhidyate||41||

tiryagdRgAdirUpo napuMsakena daSTaH syAt|  vRddhena daSTe cirAdvedanA bhavanti tACca mandAH|  bAlena daSTe CIghraM vedanA bhavanti tACca vedanAstIkSNAH|  kumAreNa tvadRSTasarpiNIsambandhena daSTo dakSiNAkSirogI syAt|  kumAryA tvanAsAditasarpasaMyogayA tu yo daSTaH sa vAme~akSiNa rogI syAt|  

	garbhiNyA tu daSTaH kRSNayA jihvayA dRCA ca yukto jRmbhAdiyuktaCca syAt|  yaH sUtayA daSTaH sa kRcchreNa CUlenArttaH san CoNitaM mehati raktaM mUtrayati sUcIbhiriva bhidyate ca|| 41||

 vegAnAM raktamAMsAdyAH saptoktAH pUrvamACrayAH||42||

sarpasya viSaM yAnACritya krameNa vegAn kurute te raktamAMsAdyAH pUrvaM dhanvantarimate vegAnAM sapta AMCrayA uktAH|| 42||

 darvIkRtAtha daSTasya duSTaM CyAvI bhavatyasRk||43||  CyAvatA tena vaktrAdau sarpantIva ca kITakAH||43||  dvitIye granthayo vege tRtIye mUrddhagauravam||43||  dRgrodho daMCavikledaCcaturthe SThIvanaM vamiH||43||  sandhiviCleSaNaM tandrA paJcame parvabhedanam||43||  dAho hidhmA ca SaSThe tu hRtpIDA gAtragauravam||43||  mUrcchA~avipAko~atIsAraH prApya Cukrantu saptame||43||  skandhapRSThakaTIbhaGgaH sarvaceSTAnivarttanam||43||

darvIkarAdInAM krameNa sapta vegA ucyante-darvIkRtetyAdi|  sarpantIva ca kITakA ityantaM prathame vege lakSaNam|  vaktrAdAvityAdiCabdena nakhaviNmUtranetratvacAM parigrahaH|  dvitIye vege granthayaH syuH daMCavikledAntaM tRtIye|  tandrAntaM caturthe|  hidhmAntaM paJcame|  atIsArAntaM SaSThe|  saptame vege viSaM CukraM prApya skandhAdibhaGgaH sarvaceSTAnivarttanaM ca bhavati|  iti darvIkareSu|| 43||

 atha maNDalidaSTasya duSTaM pItIbhavatyasRk||44||  tena pItAGgatA dAho dvitIye CvayathUdbhavaH||44||  tRtIye daMCavikledaH svedastRSNA ca jAyate||44||  caturthe jvaryate dAhaH paJcame sarvagAtragaH||44||

athetyAdinA maNDalinAM vegAH|  dAhAntaM prathame vege|  CvayathUdbhavo dvitIye|  tRSNAntaM tRtIye|  caturthe jvaraH|  paJcame sarvagAtragodAhaH|  CeSayoH pUrvavadvadediti rAjImata uktamapekSyata iti maNDaliSu|| 44||

 daSTasya rAjilairduSTaM pANDutAM yAti CoNitam||45||  pANDutA tena gAtrANAM dvitIye gurutAti ca||45||  tRtIye daMCavikledanAsikAkSimukhasravAH||45||  caturthe garimA mUrdhno manyAstambhaCca paJcame||45||  vAksaGgo jvaraH CItaH CeSayoH pUrvavadvadet||45||

daSTasyetyAdinA rAjImatAM vegakIrtanam|  prathame vege raktasya pANDutvAt gAtrANAM pANDutA|  dvitIye gAtrANAmatigurutA|  mukhasrAvAntaM tRtIye|  manyAstambhAntaM caturthe|  CItajvarAntaM paJcame|  CeSayoH SaSThasaptamayoH pUrvavaddarvIkaravadvadet|  iti rAjImatsu||45||

 kuryAt paJcasu vegeSu cikitsAM na tataH param||46||

sarvasarpaviCeSu ca pUrveSu paJcasveva vegeSu cikitsAM kuryAt||46||

 jalAplutA ratikSINA bhItA nakulanirjitAH||47||  CItavAtAtapavyAdhikSuttRSNA CramapIDitAH||47||  tUrNaM deCAntarAyAtA vimuktaviSakaJcukAH||47||  kuCauSadhIkaNTakavadye caranti ca kAnanam||47||  deCaM ca vidyAdhyuSitaM sarpAste~alpaviSA matAH||47||

jalAplutAdisvarUpAH sarpA alpaviSA matA AcAryANAm|  ratiH strIsaMyogastayA kSINAstathoktAH|  aciraM vimuktaviSakaJcukAH|  vidyAdhyuSitaM ca deCaM ca ye caranti te ca|  vidyAdhyuSitaM deCaM yatra viSaghnI vidyA yantrAdistathA prativasati|| 47||

 CmaCAnacaityavalmIkayajJACramasurAlaye||48||  catuSpathe jalasthAne jIrNodyAneSu koTare||48||  kSIridrume nimbatarau nirjjhare girigahvare||48||  cakravajragadAkuntatriCUlAGkajaTAdharAH||48||  raktAsyanayanA ye ca te syurACIviSopamAH||48||  na teSAM kAlaniyamo na ca vegeSvanukramaH||48||  mantratantrabalAnnApi prasahya vinivarttanam||48||  upahAranamaskArajapaCAntiparAyaNaH||48||  kaCcijjIvati tairdaSTo virUpo vikalo~api vA||48||

CmaCAnAdiSu sarpA ye vasanti cakrAdyaGgA jaTACca ye dhArayanti, te ACIviSopamAH syuH|  ACIviSaM mUlaviSam|  (darvIkaraviCeSa iti suCrute|  ACIviSA divyAH|  ACIviSA bhujaGgasya paramACAsanena vA|  icchAmAtreNa vA nACAditthamACIviSA matAH|  iti jejjaTaH)|  teSAM ca kAlaniyamAdikaM na vidyate|  taiCca daSTa upahArAdiparAyaNaH san yadi kaCcideva jIvati|  prAyeNa tatra na jIvati ityarthaH|  yaCca jIvetsa virUpo vA vikalo vA bhUtvA|| 48||

 CamaCAnaciticaityAdau paJcamI pakSasandhiSu||49||  aSTamInavamIsandhyAmadhyarAtridineSu ca||49||  yAmyAgneyamaghACleSAviCAkhApurvanairRte||49||  naiRtAkhye muhurtte ca daSTaM marmasu ca tyajet||49||

CmaCAnAdiSu deCakAleSu daSTaM marmasu daSTaJca aparityajet|  citiryAjJikAnAmagnicayanasthAnam|  pakSasandhI amAvAsyApaurNamAsyau|  madhyaCabdo rAtridinaCabdAbhyAM sambadhyate|  yAmyAdikaM nakSatraM gRhyate|  yAmyA bharaNI|  AgneyaM kRttikA|  naiRtaM mUlam|  naiRtAkhyo dvAdaComuhUrttaH|| 49||

 daSTamAtre sitAsyAkSaH CIryamANaCiroruhaH||50||  stabdhajihvo muhurmUrcchan CItocchvAso na jIvati||50||  hidhmA CvAso vamiH kAso daSTamAtrasya dehinaH||50||  jAyate yugapadyasya sa hRcchUlI na jIvati||50||  vepathurvedanAstIvrA grIvAbhaGgo~akSiraktatA||50||  mUrcchA galagrahaCchardiH pretarAjasya kiGkarAH||50||  jAmbavapratimo daMCaH kUrmapRSThvadunnataH||50||  raktaM khebhyaH samastebhyo varttate na tu daMCataH||50||  romNAM na CItalairharSaH CvayathurlohitAsitaH 
hRSTamehanatA vakravaktratvaM yasya taM tyajet||50||  phenaM vamati nissaMjJaH CyAvapAdakarAnanaH||50||  nAsAvasAdo bhaGgo~aGge viDbhedaH ClathasandhitA||50||  viSapItasya daSTasya digdhenAbhihatasya ca||50||  bhavantyetani rUpANi samprApte jIvitakSaye||50||  na nasyaiCcetanA tIkSNairna kSatAt kSatajAgamaH||50||  daNDAhatasya no rAjiH prayAtasya yamAntikam||50||

daSTamAtra eva yaH sitAsyAkSatvAdiyuktaH saH na jIvati|  

	yasya dehino daSTamAtrasya yugapaddhidhmAdayo jAyante sa hRcchUlena yuktaH san na jIvati|

	daMSTriNA yena daSTaCca tadrUpaM yastu paCyati|

	apsu vAdarCabimbe vA tasya riSTaM vinirdiCet|  iti jejjaTa|

	vepathvAdayaH pretarAjasya kiGkarA AjJAkAriNaH|  maraNakAla ete bhavantItyarthaH|  

	jAmbavapratimatvAdikaM yasya bhavati taM tyajet|  daMCato raktaM naiva pravartate|  sarvebhyaCca sUkSmasUkSmebhyaH srotobhyaH pravartate|

	phenaM vamatItyAdIni rUpANi viSapItAderjIvitakSaye samprApte bhavanti|  

	tathA yamAntikaM vaivasvatanikaTaM prAptasya mRtasya sutIkSNairapi nasyaiCcetanA na bhavati|  tatkAlaM ca CastrAdinA kSatadaGgAt kSatajasya raktasyAgamo na bhavati|  daNDena cAbhihatasya dehe rAjI na dRCyate|| 50||

uttarasthAnam

sarpaviSapratiSedhaH

 athAtaH sarpaviSapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti has smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

uktakrameNa sarpANAM viSahetUpacAreNa cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 mAtrACataM viSaM sthitvA daMCe daSTasya dehinaH||2||  dehaM prakramate dhAtUn rudhirAdIn pradUSayat||2||  etasminnantare karma daMCasyotkarttanAdikam||2||  kuryAcchIghraM yathA dehe viSavallI na rohati||2||

CIghraM cikitsAkaraNe heturucyate-mAtrACatamityAdi|  daSTasya dehano viSaM daMCe mAtrACataM sthitvA rudhirAdIn dhAtUn pradUSayaddehe prakrameta|  etasmin mAtrACatAkhye~antare~avasare daMCasyotkarttanaprakSAlanAlepanabandhanAdikaM karma CIghraM kuryAdyathA dehe viSavallI na rohati|  vallirhi rUDhA satyasaMCayaM saphalA sudUravistArA bhavati|| 2||

 daSTamAtro daCedACu tameva pavanACinam||3||  loSThaM mahIM vA daCanaiCchitvA vAnu sasambhramam||3||  niSThIvena samAlimpeddaMCaM karNamalena vA||3||  daMCasyopari badhnIyAdariSTAM caturaGgule||3||  kSaumAdibhirveNikayA siddhairmantraiCca mantravit||3||

daSTamAtrastu puruSo hInakAlameva pavanACinaM yena sarpeNAsau daSTastaM dantairdaCet|  tadaprAptau tu loSThaM daCet bhUmiM vA|  vyAkhyAsamam|  ariSTeti mantrasUtraveNikAyA nAma|  (daMCAdviSaM yAvanna krAmati CarIraM tAvadityarthaH|  iti jejjaTaH)|| 3||

 bandho deCAnusAreNa nAtigADhaClatho hitaH||4||  daMCapUtitvaCophAdIn kurute hyatipIDitaH||4||  aCaktaH Cithilo roddhuM viSaM deCAntaraM vrajan||4||

bandhaCca dehadeCAnusAreNa hito yo nAtigADhaClathaH|  deCAnusAragrahaNaM vinA aCakto bhavati|| 4||

 ambuvat setubandhena bandhena stabhyate viSam||5||  na vahanti sirACcAsya viSaM bandhAbhipIDitAH||5||

bandhena ca viSaM tathA stabhyate yathA setubandhena salilam|  asya ca daSTasya bandhenAbhipIDitAH satyaH sirA viSaM na vahanti|| 5||

 niSpIDya coddhareddaMCaM marmasandhyagataM tathA||6||  na jAyate viSAvego bIjanACAdivAGkuraH||6||  marmage prApnuyAnmRtyuM sandhisthe vikalAGgatAm||6||

evaJca bandhayitvA sarvataH pArimANDalyena daMCaM niSpIDya CastreNa daMCamuddharet|  taccoddharedyanmarmaNi sandhau vA na gatam|  tathA daMCoddharaNena prathama eva viSavego na jAyate yathA bIjanACAdaGkuraH|  marmage daMCa uddhRte Aturo mRtyuM prApnuyAt|  sandhisthe tUddhRte vikalAGgatAM prApnuyAt| (yatra pradeCe bandho na yujyate tatra chindyAditi jejjaTaH)|| 6||

 daMCaM maNDalinAM muktvA pittalatvAdathAparam||7||  prataptairhemalohAdyairddahedACUlmukena vA||7||  karoti bhasmasAtsadyo vahniH kinnAma na kSaNAt||7||

athavotkarttanasya cirasAdhyatvAddaMCaM pratapterhemAdibhirddahedulmukena vA jvalatkASThena dahet|  kiM sarvaM daMCaM dahennetyAha|  api tu maNDalinAM sambandhitaM daMCaM muktvA varjayitvA|  tadvarjane hetuH pittalatvam|  pittaM hyagninA viruddhyate|  athAparaM CeSaM dahet|  karotItyAdinA agninA daMCadAhasyAtiCayapradarCanam|| 7||

 AcUSet pUrNavaktro vA mRdbhasmAgadagomayaiH||8||  pracchAyAntarariSTAyAM mAMsalaM tu viCeSataH||8||

athavA daMCaM noddharennApi dahedapi tu mRdAdibhi pUrNamukhaH san vaidya AcUSet|  kathamityAha-ariSTAyA antarbandhasyAntarato daMCabhAge pracchAya CastreNa pracchAnaM kRtvA|  mAMsalaM tu daMCaM viCeSeNa pracchAyAcUSet|| 8||

 aGgaM sahaiva daMCena lepayedagadairmuhuH||9||  candanoCIrayuktena salilena ca secayet||9||

sarvaM cAGgaM sahaiva daMCena muhuragadairAlepayet|  candanAdiyuktena jalena secayecca|| 9||

 viSe pravisRte vidhyetsirAM sA paramA kriyA||10||  rakte nihriyamANe hi kRtsnaM nihriyate viSam||10||  duSTe hi vyApnuyAdaGgaM dhruvaM mRtyurbhavatyataH||10||  sirAvyadhoditairasramapravRttaM pravarttayet||10||  stambhayedativRttaM ca taireva prANarakSayA||10||

arakSayA deCAntaraM pravisRte viSe sirAM vidhyet sA paramA kriyA|  sirAvedhakriyotkRSTA cikitsetyarthaH|  rakta ityAdi|  yasmAd duSTe rakte nihriyamANe kRtsnaM sarvaM viSaM nihriyate|  rakte duSTe viSamaGgaM vyApnuyAdato dhruvamavaCyaM mRtyurbhavati|  viSaduSTasya raktasyAnirharaNe viSasya dehavyAptyA mRtyurbhavatItyarthaH|  sirAvyadhoditairityAdi subodham|  (siretyAdi|  apravRttaM raktaM sirAvyadhoditaistagarAdibhiH)|| 10||

 sinduvArakamUlAni rasena svena peSayet||18||  madhuyukto~ayamagadaH pAnaM darvIkRtAM viSe||18||  sinduvArakamUlAni CvetA ca girikarNikA||18||  pAnaM darvIkarairdaSTe nasyaM madhu sapAkalam||18||  kRSNasarpeNa daSTasya limpeddaMCaM hRte~asRji||18||  cAraTInAkulIbhyAM vA tIkSNamUlaviSeNa vA||18||  pAnaM ca kSaudramaJjiSThAgRhadhUmayutaM ghRtam||18||

darvIkarAdInAM pratyekaM cikitsAmAha-sinduvArakasya mUlAni svena rasena sinduvArakarasena peSayet| madhunA yukto~ayamagado darvIkRtAM darvIkarasarpANAM viSe pAnaM hitam|  
	
	sinduvArako nirguNDI|  CvetA CvetavacA|  madhu mAkSikam|  pAkalaM kuSTham|  (darvIkarasarpaiH daSTe sati sinduvArakamUlAdikaM pAnaM hitam|  anuktadravatvAjjalAloDitam|  kuSThasahitaM mAkSikaM nasyaJca).  

	cAraTI padmacAriNI|  nAkulI sarpasugandhA|  tIkSNamUlaviSeNa vA tIkSNaM yanmUlaviSaM vatsanAbhAdi tenetyarthaH|  (kRSNasarpo darvIkaraviCeSastena daSTasya daMCaM daMCavraNam asRji rakte jalUkAdinA hRte~apanIte cAraTInAkulIbhyAM vAthava tIkSNamUlaviSeNa vA limpet|  cAraTI guJjA|  nAkulI cavikA rAsnA vA|  tIkSNamUlaviSaM vajranAkAdi)|  

	kSaudrAdyanvitaM ghRtaM pAnaM ca pAnaviSaye hitamityarthaH|| 18||

 taNDulIyakakACmaryakiNihIgirikarNikAH||19||  mAtuluGgI sitA CeluH pAnanasyAJjane hitaH||19||  agadaH phaNinAM ghore viSe rAjImatAmapi||19||

 samAH sugandhAmRdvIkACvetAkhyAgajakarNikAH||20||  arddhACaM saurasaM patraM kapitthaM bilvadADimam||20||  sakSaudro maNDaliviSe viCeSAdagado hitaH||20||  paJcavalkavarAyaSTI nAgapuSpailavAlukam||20||  jIvakarSabhakau CItaM sitA padmakamutpalam||20||  sakSaudro himavAnnAma hanti maNDalinAM viSam||20||  lepAcchvayathuvIsarpavisphoTajvaradAhahA||20||  kACmaryaM vaTaCRGgANi jIvakarSabhakau sitAm||20||  maJjiSThAM madhukaM ceti daSTo maNDalinA pibet||20||

 vaMCatvagbIjakaTukA pATalIbIjanAgaram||21||  CirISabIjAtiviSe mUlaM gAvedhukaM vacAm||21||  piSTo govAriNASTAGgo hanti gonasajaM viSam||21||

 nikhanetkANDacitrAyA daMCaM yAmadvayaM bhuvi||23||  uddhRtya pracchitaM sarpirddhAnyamRdbhyAM pralepayet||23||  pibet purANaM ca ghRtaM varAcUrNAvacUrNitam||23||  jIrNe virakte bhuJjIta yavAnnaM sUpasaMskRtam||23||

athetyAdinA vegakrameNocyate|  vyAkhyAsamam|  avagADhamantaH-praviSTam| (atha vegalakSaNadarCanAnAntaraM darvIkarasarpANAM prathame vege jalUkAdinA raktamapanIya madhughRtopetaM viSaghnamauSadhaM CIghraM pibet|  dvitIye vege kRtavamanaH san sarpirmadhUpetamevAgadaM pibet|  tRtIye vege taNDulIyakAdi viSaharadravyairaJjananAvane yuJjyAt|  caturthe vege vamanAnantaraM pUrvoktAM koCAtaketyAdinA kRtAM yavAgUM pibet|  SaSThapaJcamavegayoH CItaiCcandanoCIrAdiCItadravyairdigdhaM punaH punaH praliptaM dUrvAgojihvAdisvarasaCItodakAdibhistadvadeva siktaM ca tIkSNaM tIkSNadravyakRtaM vamanauSadhaM taNDulIyakakoCAtakyAdibhiH siddhAM yavAgUM ca pAyayet|  saptame vege aJjananasyayostIkSNamagadaM yuJjyAt|  mUrdhni CastreNAvagADhaM kAkapadaM kRtva kAkapadAkRtyA~avagADhaM chitvA~anantaraM tasya daSTasya tatra kAkapade saraktaM mAMsaM carma vA nikSipet|  nikSipya viSaM tasmin saGkrAmayedityarthaH)|| 42||

 tRtIye vAmitaH peyAM vege maNDalinAM pibet||43||  atIkSNamagadaM SaSThe gaNaM vA padmakAdikam||43||

tRtIyAt SaSThAcca CeSeSu maNDalinAM sAmarthyAt pUrvavat|  (maNDalisarpANAM tRtIye vege kRtavamanaH san viSaghnIM peyAM pibet|  SaSThe vege atIkSNaM mRdudravyakRtamagadamauSadhayogaM CodhanAdigaNoktaM padmakAdigaNaM vA pibet)|| 43||

 Adye~avagADhaM pracchAya vege daSTasya rAjilaiH||44||  alAbunA haredraktaM purvavaccAgadaM pibet||44||  SaSThe vege~aJjanaM tIkSNamavapIDaM ca yojayet||44||  anukteSu ca vegeSu kriyAM darvIkaroditAm||44||

avagADhaM ghanam|  rAjImatAM CeSeSu vegeSu pUrvavat darvIkaravat|  etadevocyate anukteSvityAdinA|  (Adya iti|  rAjilasarpairdaSTasya Adye prathame vege avagADhaM samyagraktApanayanArthamAmAMsamityarthaH|  

	pracchAya pracchAnaM kRtvA alAbunA raktaM haret|  pUrvavat madhusarpiH saMyuktaM viSaghnamauSadhaM pibecca|  SaSThe vege tIkSNatamamatiCayena tIkSNamaJjanamavapIDananasyaM ca yojayet|  atrAnukteSu maNDalinAM prathama-dvitIya-caturtha-paJcama-saptamavegeSu|  rAjImatAM dvitIya-tRtIya-caturtha-paJcama-saptamavegeSu ca darvIkaravegoktacikitsAmeva yojayet)|| 44||

 garbhiNIbAlavRddheSu mRdu vidhyet sirAJca na||45||

garbhiNyAdiSu sarvaM mRdu Casyate|  sirAH ca na vidhyet|  (garbhiNyAdiSu mRdvatIkSNamaJjanAdikaM yuJjyAt sirAvedhaM tu na kuryAt)||45||

 tvaGmanohvA niCe vakraM rasaH CArdUlajo nakhaH||46||  tamAlaH kesaraM CItaM pItaM taNDulavAriNA||46||  hanti sarvaviSANyetadvajraM vajramivAsurAn||46||

sarvaviSANAM sAmAnyacikitsAmAha-tvagAdicUrNaM nAmnA vajram|  subodham|  vakraM tagaram|  CItaM candanam|  (tvagAdiCItAntamauSadhaM piSTaM taNDulavAriNyAloDya pItaM vajrasaMjJitametadauSadhaM sarvasarpaviSANi nACayati|  CakreNa preritaM kuliCamasurAniva)||46||

 prapauNDarIkaM kaTukA devadArusuvarcikA||47||  kAlAnusArI sthauNeyaCaileyadhanapadmakam||47||  kuTannaTailApunnAganatakuSThapriyaGgukam||47||  lodhraguggulutAlIsapippalIsvarNagairikam||47||  sinduvAraH sitaH CuNThI dhyAmakaM lavaNottamam||47||  ClakSNacUrNIkRtaM CRGge nidadhyAnmAkSikadrutam||47||  tArkSyastArkSyopamaH pAnanAvanAbhyaJjanAJjanaiH||47||  agadastakSakasyApi viSavegaM nivarttayet||47||

prapauNDarIkAdibhistArkSyanAmAgadaH subodhaH|  CRGgaM goH|  (prapauNDarIkamityAdi|  kAlAnusArI kAlAnusAri vA|  kuTannaTaH syonAkaH|  sitaH sinduvAraH CvetanirguNDI|  dhyAmakaM kattRNam| iti suCRtaTIkA)|| 47||

 athAtaH kITaviSapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti has smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

 kaTabhImUlatagarasamaGgAdevadArubhiH||42||  bRhatIdvayagAGgeyIrocanAcandanairghRtam||42||  siddhaM caturguNakSIraM pAnAbhyaJjanayorhitam||42||  lUtAkaNabhakITanAM viSe paramadAruNe||42||

 nivRtte dAhaCophAdau karNikAM pAtayed vraNAt||43||  kusumbhapuSpaM godantaH svarNakSIrI kapotaviT||43||  trivRtA saindhavaM dantI karNikApAtanaM tathA||43||  haridrA gugguluH kiNvaM vaMCalekhaH kapotaviT||43||  tadvacca saindhavaM kuSThaM dantIkaTukadaugdhikam||43||  rAjakoCAtakImUlaM kiNvo vA mathitodbhavaH||43||

evaM dAhaCophAdau nivRtte sati vraNAt pUrvoktAM karNikAM pAtayet|  AdigrahaNena rugrAgAdiparigrahaH|   nivRtte upaCAnte|  vraNAd vraNamukhAt karNikAM daMCasthAne karNikAvadutpannaM mAMsAGkuraM pAtayedapanayet|  

	kusumbhapuSpAdi dantIparyantaM karNikAyAH pAtanam|  haridrAkapotaviDantaM tatheti karNikApAtanam|  vaMCalekhaH vaMCatanuvalkaH|  saindhavAdi rAjakoCAtakImUlAntaM ca tadvat pUrvavat|  (kaTukadaugdhikaM peccuraH rAjakoCAtakI valiyapuTTalapIram) athavA mathitodbhavaH kiNvastakramalaH|| 43||

 karNikApAtasamaye bRMhayeta viSApahaiH||44||

yadA tu karNikA pAtyete tadA ye viSApahA bhavanti tairyathAyathaM ca bRMhayet|  anantaroktairoSadhaiH karNikApAtanakAle viSaharadravyairlUtAdaSTaM naraM poSayet|| 44||

 RtukAle ca lUtAnAM yAvantaH CukravindavaH||45||  dehe patanti tAvatyo jAyante karNikAH samam||45||

lUtAnAM ca yadA garbhagrahaNayoga RtukAlo bhavati tadA yAvantaH CuklabindavaH puMso dehe~aGgeSu patanti tAvatya eva karNikAH samamekakAlaM jAyante|| 45||

 godantadantI trivRtA haridre saindhavaM tilAH||46||  madhukaM nimbapatrANi ghRtaM ca vraNaCodhanam||46||  kAntAviDaGgakhadiranimbakAmpilyakAmbudaiH||46||  sarjailAdhAtakIlohaiH siddhaM sarpirvraNApaham||46||

godantAdikaM vraNAnAM Codhanam|  kAntAdibhiH siddhaM sarpirvraNApaham|| 46||

 CirISakaTabhICelukSIrivRkSArjunatvacaH||47||  kalkacUrNaparISekaiH kITalUtAvraNApahAH||47||

CirISAdikaM kalkAdibhiH prayuktam kITAnAM lUtAnAJca vraNApaham|| 47||

 CatAhvAlodhrakAsIsadArvIjambvasthirocanAH||48||  harItakI pUgaphalaM cUrNo~ayaM vraNaropaNam||48||

CatAhvAdInAM cUrNo vraNaropaNaH|| 48||

 lAkSA rajanyau maJjiSThA haritAlaM manaCCilA||49||  sarpirmadhu ca lepo~ayaM tvagviCuddhikaraH param||49||

rUDhe ca lAkSAdibhirlepaH paraM tvaco viCuddhatvaM karoti|| 49||

 romasaJjananaM kuryAdyaduktaM vraNasAdhane||50||

vraNasAdhane vraNapratiSedhe yat kiJcidromasaJjananamuktaM tadatrApi kuryAt|| 50||

uttarasthAnam

pratyekalUtApratiSedhaH

 athAtaH pratyeka lUtApratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

sAmAnyena lUtAnAM cikitsAvidhAnumuktvA yathApradhAnaM pratyekaM cikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 AdaMCe piTakA tAmrA bhavetkapilayA sthirA||2||  lasIkA romakUpeSu dAhoSNau mUrdhni gauravam||2||  pAnanasyAJjanAlepasekeSvatra prayojayet||2||  niCApadmakakuSThailAkaraJcakakubhatvacaH||2||  sthirArkaparNyapAmArgabrAhmIjvalananAkulIH||2||  athavA kuSThapattaGganakhajo~aGgakakuGkumama||2||

kapilAkhyayA lUtAyA AdaMCe tAmrA sthirA ca piTakA bhavenmUrdhagauravAntaM ca|  atra niCAdikaM nAkulyantaM pAnAdiSu yojayedathavA kuSThAdikaM kuGkumAntam|  kakubho~arjunaH|  arkaparNyalarkaH|| 2||

 agnimukhyAtiruksphoTaH sambhavatyagnidagdhavat||3||  agnijvAlAsamAnena prasvidyati viSoSmaNA||3||  tRDdAhakampamUrcchAvAn pittAsramatisAryate||3||  yojayetpUrvavattatra pratyAkhyAya tvarAnvitaH||3||  kuSThalAmajjakoCIramadhukaM madhukaM madhu||3||  lAbhataH CItavIryANi tAlIsaM gopakanyakAm||3||

agnimukhyAkhyayA lUtayA AdaMCe atiruksphoTaH sambhavati yathA~agnidagdhe|  agnijvAlAsadRCena ca viSoSmaNA puruSaH prasvidyati|  tRDAdimAMCca raktapittamatisAryate|  tatrAgnimukhyAM pratyAkhyAnaM kRtvA tvarayA pUrvavat kapilAvat pAnAdikaM yojayet|  CItavIryANi candanoCIrAdIni ca lAbhato yathAlAbham|  tAlIsAdikaM ca|| 3||

 pItayA pItaviNmUtradaMCakledAkSidarCanaH||4||  mUrcchAcchardiCiroduHkhajvarArocakaCUlavAn||4||  tatreSTAH kaTabhoCIramuJjAvaJjulapAvakAH||4||  vaMCakACArjunakuCAH CirISakiNihItvacaH||4||  athavA vanyabAhlIkakuSThakesarajoGgakam||4||

pItAkhyayA lUtayA AdaMCe sati puruSa pItavarNairviDAdibhirmUcchAdibhiCca yukto bhavati|  tatra kaTabhAdikaM pAnAdiSu yojayet|  athavA vanyAdikam|  kaTabhA kaTabhI|  joGgakaM kRSNAgaru|| 4||

 padmAbhaH padmayA sphoTo bhinno~abhinnaH punarbhavet||5||  klidyatyACu sravatyuSNaM kledasparCe~atirukkaraH||5||  tatra padmotpalAnnAlo himavetasavaJjulAH||5||  samRNAlAH sakumudAH sakSaudraghRtaCarkarAH||5||

padmAkhyayA AdaMCe padmAbhaH sphoTo bhavati|  bhinno~api san punarabhinno bhavati|  sa ca sphoTa ACu klidyatyuSNaM ca kledaM sravati|  sparCe cAtirukkaro bhavati|  tatra padmotpalAdikaM CarkarAntaM pAnAdiSu|| 5||

 pUtirmUtraviSAdaMCo visarpI kRSNaCoNitaH||6||  CvAsakAsajvaracchardimUrcchAdAhbhramAnvitaH||6||  manaCCilAlamadhukamadhukotpalacandanam||6||  kuSThalAmajjakoCIrapadmakaM tatra bheSajam||6||

mUtraviSAyAH pUtirdaMCo bhavati visarpAdyanvitaCca|  tatra manaCCilAdikaM pAnAdiSu bheSajam|| 6||

 AdaMCe CvetayA CvetA piTakA bhRCakaNDulA||7||  dAhamUrcchAjvararujAvisarpakledakAriNI||7||  tatreSTAH CItarAsnailAhareNunalavaJjulAH||7||  kuSThamAMsI natoCIrakAntAdhyAmakapadmakAH||7||

CvetAkhyayA AdaMCe CvetA kaNDUlA dAhAdikAriNI ca piTakA bhavati|  tatra CItAdikaM pAnAdiSviSTam|  CItaM candanam|| 7||

 AdaMCaH kRSNayA kRSNo viDgandhiH kaledaCophavAn||8||  utthApyate kRSNamasRgduSTam tatra ca bheSajam||8||  mahAsugandhA sarpAkSI vakrailA gandhanAkulI||8||

kRSNAkhyayA AdaMCaH kRSNavarNaH purISagandhiH kladaCophayuktaCca bhavati|  duSTam kRSNaM cAsRgutthApyate virecyate|  tatra mahAsugandhAdikaM bheSajam|  mahAsugandhA rAsnA|  vakraM tagaram|  gandhanAkulI(ni) sUkSmapatrA parA jJeyA sarpAkSI gandhanAkulI|| 8||

 CUnaH pANDurayA daMCaH Copho vaktrasya gauravam||9||  jvaro vighUrNanaM jRmbhA Ciroruk tatra bheSajam||9||  mUlaM vAruNapuSpAyA rocanA goCakRdrasaH||9||

pANDurayA daMCaH CUno bhavati|  vaktraCopho gauravAdikaM ca|  tatra vAruNapuSpAmUlAdi bheSajam|  vAruNapuSpA viCAlA|| 9||

 ApANDupiTako daMCaH CophavAn raktapAdayA||10||  asrasruttatra naladasevyodIcyahimaM madhu||10||

raktapAdAkhyayA daMCa ApANDubhiH piTakAbhiryuktaH CophavAMCca bhavati asrasrucca|  tatra naladAdikaM bheSajam|  naladaM mAMsI|  sevyamuCIram|  udIcyaM bAlakam|  himaM candanam|| 10||

 bhRGgAbho bhRGgayA daMCaH piTakA dAharukkarI||11||  koThaiCca cIyate gAtraM tatra CastaM bhiSagjitam||11||  aGkolasAraM phalinI gavAM pittaM misirgadaH||11||

bhRGgAkhyayo daMCo bhRGgAbho bhramaravarNaH piTakA ca dAharukkarI bhavati|  gAtraM ca koThaiCcIyate|  tatrAGkolasAradikaM bhiSagjitamauSadhaM Castam|  phalinI priyaGguH|  misiH CatapuSpA|  gadaH kuSTham|  aGkolavRkSAH prasiddhastasya sAraH|| 11||

 piGgayA vahnidagdhAbho daMCaH sphoTo bahusrutiH||12||  tIvraCophajvararujAhRtpIDAdAhatRDyutaH||12||  tatrA~agadaH sitA gundrA mallikA madhukotpalam||12||  jIvakaH kSIriNAM CuGgA dvihimaM nAgakesaram||12||

piGgAkhyayA daMCo~agnidagdhAbho bhavati|  sphoTaCca bahusrutistIvraCophAdibhiryukto bhavati|  tatra sitAdikamagadaH|| 12||

 trimaNDalAyA bahalo daMCaH kRSNaM sravatyasRk||13||  arucirnetrayordAhaH kaluSasrutidRSTitA||13||  vividhairmaNDalaiCcAsya CarIramupacIyate||13||  tatrArkamUladviniCAsurAlApRCniparNikAH||13||  dadhitthanAkulabrAhmIjyotiSmatyo hito~agadaH||13||

trimaNDalAkhyAyA daMCo bahalo ghano bhavati|  kRSNavarNaJca raktaM kSarati sravati|  arucyAdikaM ca bhavati|  asya cAturasya CarIraM vividhairnAnAvidhairmaNDalairupacIyate|  tatrArkamUlAdikamagadaH|| 13||

 AdaMCaH pUtigandhAyA visarpakledadAhavAn||14||  alajIsannibho rugvAn vibaddhapiTakAcitaH||14||  bhArGgInidigdhikAnimbapATalIsinduvArakam||14||  dUrvA haridre vAsA ca pUtigandhA viSApaham||14||

pUtigandhAkhyAyA AdaMCo visarpAdimAnalajIsadRCatvAdiyuktaCca bhavati|  bhArGgyAdikaM tu pUtigandhA viSApaham|| 14||

 citramaNDalavAn daMCaH piTakAjAlakAvRtaH||15||  vIrAyA murdharuk CItajvarAnnadveSasaMyutaH||15||  haridre naladaM kuSThamelA surasamaJjarI||15||  tagaraJca Cvapittena piSTaM vIrAviSApaham||15||

 bhavantyalaviSAdaMCe pItalohitamaNDalAH||17||  piTakAH sarSapaprakhyAstAluCoSo rujA jvaraH||17||  chardirdAhaH CiraH kampastatra sevyaH samAkSikaH||17||  sakAsIsakahnIberaH sapippalivaTAGkuraH||17||

mUSikAlarkapratiSedhaH

 athAto mUSikalarkapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAsurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

jaGgamaviSaprakrameNa mUSikAlarkaviSayoCcikitsAM pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|  (lAlanAdibhedenASsTAdaCavidhasya mUSikasyAlarkasya CunaCca viSasya pratiSedhaCcikitsAsminnadhyAya ucyata iti mUSikAlarkapratiSedhastam|  vijJAnAdvinA pratiSedhasya duSkaratvAtsavijJAnaM pratiSedhamityarthaH|  CeSaM pUrvavat)|| 1||

 lAlanaCcapalaH putro hasiraCcikiro~ajinaH||2||  kaSAyadantaH kulakaH kokilaH kapilo~asitaH||2||  aruNaH CavalaH CvetaH kapotaH palitonduruH||2||  cucchundaro rasAlAkhyo daCASTau ceti mUSikAH||2||

tatra pUrvaM mUSikANAM nAmaviCeSaM saMkhyAJca darCayati|  (lAlanAdayo~aSTAdaCa mUSikAH|  mUSikasya prasiddhatvAt bhedakIrtanameva|  alarkasya tu lakSaNaM vakSyate)|| 2||

 yasminnaGge patatyeSAM CuklamaGgaiH spRCanti vA||3||  yacchukladigdhaistatrAsre dUSite pANDutAM gate||3||  granthayaH CvayathuH koTho maNDalAni bhramo~aruciH||3||  CItajvaro~atiruksAdo vepathuH parvabhedanam||3||  romaharSaH srutirmUrcchA dIrghakAlAnubandham||3||  CleSmAnuviddhabahvAkhupotakacchardanaM sakRt||3||

mUSikaviSasya vraNena vinApi raktAdidUSakatvAttatsaMkrAnterhetumAha|  eSAM mUSikANAM sambandhi CukraM yasminnaGge patati yadvA yadaGgaM mUSikaCukladigdhairaGgaiH spRCanti tatrosre rakte dUSite pANDutvaM ca gate granthyAdikaM bhavati|  CleSmaNAnuviddhAnAM bahUnAmAkhupotakAnAM chardanaM vamanam|  (tatprabhAvAt sakRdekavArameva CleSmaNAnubaddhanAM bahUnAmA~anupotAnAM mUSikAbAlAkAramAMsakhaNDAnAM chardanaM ca syAt|  CItajvaraH CItAdijvaraH|  parvabhedanaM sandhiSu bhedanapratItiH|  srutirvraNamukhAdraktapUyAdisrAvaH|  dIghakAlaM cirakAlamanubandhanamanuvarttanam)|| 3||

 vyavAyyAkhuviSaM kRcchraM bhUyo bhUyaCca kupyati||4||

sarvaM cAkhuviSaM vyavAyi vyApakaguNasvabhAvaM kRcchraM kRcchRasAdhyaM bhavati|  bhUyo bhUyaCca kupyati|  (vyavAyiguNasya sarvaviSasAdhAraNatve~apyatra viCeSakathanamatiCayadyotanArtham|  bhUyo bhUyaCca kupyati Santamapi punaH punaH kAlAntareNa kopaM yAti)|| 4||

 mUrcchAGgaCophavaivarNyakledaCabdACrutijvarAH||5||  CirogurutvaM lAlAsRkcchardiCcAsAdhyalakSaNam||5||

mUrcchAdikamasAdhyamUSikaviSalakSaNam| (aGgaCabdaH CophAdiSutriSu sambadhyate)|| 5||

 CUnabastiM vivarNauSThamAkhvAbhairgranthibhiCcitam||6||  cucchundurusagandhaM ca varjayedAkhudUSitam||6||

CUnabastimityAdikaM cAkhudUSitaM varjayet|  cucchundurusamAnagandhaM ca|  cucchundururjAtyA dIrghamukho mUSikaH|  (asAdhyalakSaNAnyuktvA punarapi varjayedityuktatvAt pUrvoktasya yApyatvamasya parityAjyatvaM ca sUcitam)|| 6||

 CunaH CleSmolbaNA doSAH saMjJAM saMjJAvahACritAH||7||  muSNantaH kurvate kSobhaM dhAtUnAmatidAruNam||7||  lAlAvanandhabadhiraH sarvataH so~abhidhAvati||7||  srastapucchahanuskandhaH Ciro duHkhI natAnanaH||7||

Cuna ityAdinA alarkasya lakSaNamucyate|  anantaramalarkaviSalakSaNaM vivakSuH pUrvaM tasyonmAdahetumAha|  CunaH sArameyasya CleSmolbaNA doSAH saMjJAvahAH sirA ACritya saMjJA cetanAM muSNanto dhAtUnAM Cuno rasaraktAdInAM dAruNamatighoraM kSobhaM kurvate|  tataH sa lAlavatvAdiyuktaH srastapucchAdikaCca sarvato vinA prayojanamabhidhAvati|| 7||

 daMCastena vidaSTasya suptaH kRSNaM kSaratyasRk||8||  hRcchirorugjvarastambhatRSNAmUrcchodbhavo~anu ca||8||

unmAdalakSaNamuktvA alarkasya daMCalakSaNamAha|  tena tathA vidhenAlarkAkhyena CunA daSTasya puMso daMCaH supta acetanaH san kRSNamasRk kSarati|  tataCca tRSNAdyudbhavo bhavati|| 8||

 anenAnye~api boddhvyA vyAlA daMSTrAprahAriNaH||9||  sRgAlACvatarACvarkSadvIpivyAghravRkAdayaH||9||

alarkaviSaprasaGgAtsRgAlAdiviSalakSaNamAha|  anena ca  CvadaMCaprakAreNAnye~api vyAlA kSudrA daMSTrAprahAriNaH sRgAlAdayo boddhavyA jJeyAH|  sRgAlAdaya ityAdiCabdena viDAlAdayo gRhyante|  vyAlA duSTasattvAH|| 9||

 kaNDUnistodavaivarNyasuptikledajvarabhramAH||10||  vidAharAgarukpAkaCophagranthivikuJcanam||10||  daMCAvadaraNaM sphoTAH karNikA maNDalAni ca||10||  sarvatra saviSe liGgaM viparItaM tu nirviSe||10||

sarvatra saviSe daMCe kaNDUvAdikaM liGgam|  etadviparIte nirviSam||10||

mUSikAlarkapratiSedhaH

 daSTo yena tu tacceSTarutaM kurvan vinaCyati||11||  paCyaMstameva cAkasmAdAdarCasalilAdiSu||11||

alarkaprasaGgAttadvidhAnAM sRgAlAdInAM lakSaNamuktvA sAmAnyenAsAdhyalakSaNamAha|  yenaiva praNinA daSTastasyaiva sambandhinICceSTAstasyaiva rutaM kurvan puruSo vinaCyati|  tameva ca prANinamaka smAdAdArCAdiSu paCyannapi vinaCyati|| 11||

 jaladarCanasaMsparCaCabdebhyo yaCca santraset||12||  adaSTamapi taM jahyAjjalasantrAsarogiNam||12||

adaSTo~api yaH puruSo jalasya darCanena vA sparCanena vA Cabdena vA santrasyettaM jalasantrAsanAmnA rogeNa yuktaM jahyAt|| 12||

 AkhunA daSTamAtrasya daMCaM kANDena dAhayet||13||  darpaNenAthavA tIvrarujA syAtkarNikAnyathA||13||

mUSikAlarkayorlakSaNamuktvA~anantaraM mUSikacikitsAmAha-AkhunetyAdinA|  mUSikANAM sAdhAraNI cikitsa|  subodham|  daMCadAhena vinA karNikA sambhavati|  (AkhunA mUSikeNa daSTamAtrasya mAtrayA~apyanatilaGghitadaSTasamayasya daMCaM daMCavraNaM kANDena CarakANDAdinA athavA darpaNenAdarCena dAhayet anyathA dAhAbhave tlIvrarujA ativedanAyuktA karNikA syAt)|| 13||

 dagdhaM visrAvayeddaMCaM pracchitaM ca pralepayet||14||  CirISarajanI vakrakuGkumAmRtavallibhiH||14||

anantarakaraNIyamAha-dagdhaM daMCaM daMCavraNaM visrAvayet|  pracchitaM ceti vakSyamANatvAdvisrAvaNaM pracchAnena|  tataH CirISAcibhiramRtavalyantaiH pralepayet|  'CirISarajanIkuSThami'ti suCrutapAThaH||14||

 agAradhUmamaJjiSThArajanIlavaNottamaiH||15||  lepo jayatyAkhuviSaM karNikAyACca pAtanaH||15||

agAradhUmAdibhiCca AkhuviSaM jayati|  karNikAyAH pAtanaCca||15||

 tato~amlaiH kSAlayitvA tu toyairanu ca lepayet||16||  pAlindI CvetakaTabhI bilvamUlaguDUcibhiH||16||  anyaiCca viSaCophaghnaiH sirAM vA mokSayed drutam||16||

tato lepAdanantaramamlaiH kAJjikAdibhiH kSAlayitvAnu paCcAcca toyaiH kSAlayitva pAlindyAdibhirlepayet|  pAlindI CyAmA trivRt|  anyaiCca viSaghnaiH CophaghnaiCca haridrAdibhirlepayet|  anyaiCca viSaghnaiH CophaghnaiCca haridrAdibhirlepayet|  athava drutaM CIghraM sirAM mokCayet|  (viSaghnaiH CirISAdibhiH CophaghnaiH CigrumUlAdibhiranyairaparairoSadhaiCca lepaM kuryAt)|| 16||

 chardanaM jAlinIkvAthaiH CukAkhyAGkolayorapi||17||  koCavatyAH CukAkhyAyAH phalaM jImUtakasya ca||17||  madanasya ca saJcUrNya dadhnA pItvA viSaM vamet||17||  vacAmadanajImUtakuSThaM vA mUtrapeSitam||17||  pUrvakalpena pAtavyaM sarvonduruviSApaham||17||  niSpAvAH kadalImUlaM bandhujIvaphalAni ca||17||  suvarcalArAmaThakaM svarjikAtiviSAdvayam||17||  CyAmAdrikarNikAmUlamardharcairvamanatrayam||17||

nIlinIkvAthena chardanaM CukAkhyAGkolayoCca kvAthena|  koCavatyAdiphalAnAM cUrNaM dadhnA phitvA viSaM vamet|  CukAkhyA CirISaH|  koCavatI koCAtakI|  jImUtaH kRtavedhanaH|

	vacAdikaM gomUtreNa piSTvA pUrvakalpeneti dadhnA pAtavyam|  tatsarveSAmunduruNAM viSaM hanti|

	niSpAvasuvarcalACyAmAdibhirardharcairardhaClokairvamanatrayaM bhavati|  CamaThaM hiGguH|| 17||

 vAntasya Cuddhe hRdaye CUlaM hidhmArucirvamiH||18||  uSNodgArAnubandho vA syAccettatraitadauSadham||18||  jIrakaM tryUSaNaM kuSThaM tuGgAkhyaM nAgakesaram||18||  rajanyau saindhavaM sevyaM yaSTImadhusuvarcalAm||18||  madhuraM ca gaNaM piSTvA bIjapurakapitthayoH||18||  rasena SADavaM kuryAnmadhumatsyaNDikAnvitam||18||  gandhavarNarasopetaH sa pIto viSadoSajit||18||  dvipippalIdvayaMCumati kvAthe peyA ca tadguNA||18||

vAntasya sato hRdaye Cuddhe CUlAdikaM yadi syAttatraitadauSadham|  kimityAha-jIrakamityAdi|  vyAkhyAsamam|  tuGgAkhyaM nAgakesaram|  madhurogaNaH sUtroktaH|

	dvipippalyAdikvAthe kRtA peyA ca tadugNA jIrakAdiSADavaguNA|| 18||

 virecane trivRnnIlI triphalA kalka iSyate||19||  Cirovirecane sAraH CirISasya phalAni ca||19||

trivRdAkalko virecana iSyate|  CirISasya sAraH phalAni ca Cirovirecane|| 19||

 aJjane gomayaraso vyoSasUkSmarajo~anvitaH||20||  kapitthagomayaraso madhumAnavalehane||20||

vyoSasUkSmarajo~anvito gomayaraso~aJjana iSyate|  kapitthagomayaraso mAkSikayukto~avalehane|| 20||

 taNDulIyakamUlena siddhaM pAne hitaM ghRtam||21||  dviniCA kaTabhI raktA yaSTyAhvairvAmRtAnvitaiH||21||  AsphotamUlasiddhaM vA pa~ccakApitthameva vA||21||

taNDulIyakasya mUlena siddhaM ghRtaM pAne hitam|  amRtAnvitairdviniCAdibhirvA siddhaM ghRtam|  raktA maJjiSThA|  subodham|  Asphoto~arkaH|  paJcakApitthaM kapitthasya tvakpatrapuSpaphalamalAni taiH paJcabhiH siddhaM ghrutaM vA|| 21||

 adhobhAge viCuddhasya CUlaM nAbhyAM bhavedyadi||22||  purISaM va vibadhyeta gude syAdvA vikartika||22||  tatra peyAM pibecchItAM CarkarAmadhusaMyutAm||22||  pippalIpippalImUlaCArivAkaTukAhvayaiH||22||  CRtaiH siddhAM sahabalAsamaGgAviCvabheSajaiH||22||

viraktasya yadi nAbhiCUlaM purISaM vA vibaddhaM gude va vikartikA syAttatra pippalyAdibhirviCvabheCajAntaiH CRtaiH siddhAM CItAM CarkarAmadhuyuktAM peyAM pibet|  samaGgA maJjiSThA|| 22||

 naladadhyAmakavyoSalodhracitrakadIpyakam||23||  kutalakSAratoyena piSTaM mAkSikasarpiSA||23||  dadhnA vA prACayetkSaudram yavakSArapayodadhi||23||  phANitaM tailamAjyaM viSaghnaM pItamekataH||23||

naladAdidIpyakAntaM kutalakSAratoyena piSTaM madhusarpiSA dadhnA vA prACayet|  kutalastilakANDam|  kSaudrAdikamAjyAntamekatomiCrIbhAvena pItaM viSaghnaM bhavati|| 23||

 sinduvAraM nataM Cigru bilvamUlaM punarnavam||24||  vacACvadaMSTrA jImUtameCAM kvAthaM samAkSikam||24||  pibecchAlyodanaM dadhnA bhuJjAno mUSikArditaH||24||

mUSikairArdito hiMsitaH dadhnA CAlyodanaM bhuJjAnaH sinduvArAdInAM kvAthaM samAkSikaM pibet|  CvadaMSTRA kaNDUkarI|| 24||

 takreNa CarapuGkhAyAH bIjaM saJcUrNya vA pibet||25||  aGkolamUlakalko va bastamUtreNa kalkitaH||25||  pAnalepanayoryuktaH sarvonduruviSApahaH||25||

athavA CarapuGkAyAH prasiddhAyACcUrNaM takreNa pibet|  aGkolamUlatvakprayogaH subodhaH|  (avimUtreNa piSTaH pAnaviSaye lepanaviSaye ca prayuktaH aGkolamUlasya valkaCca mUSikaviSasya nACanaH)||25||

 payaH payasyayA yuktaM sitayA madhukena ca||26||

payasyayA CarkarayA madhukena ca yuktaM payaH prakaraNAt sarvonduruviSApaham|  payasyA kSIrikA|| 26||

 kirAtatiktamamRtAM samaGgAM kakubhatvacam||27||  bANaM palACaM kACmaryaM payasyAM taNDulIyakam||27||  AkhuvinnAM mahAnimbaM saptaparNaM madhUlikAm||27||  kapitthaM rAjavRkSaM vA pibedanyatamaM jvarI||27||

yaCca mUSikaviSe jvaravAn bhavati sa kirAtatiktakAdInAmanyatamaM pibet|  AkhuvinnA mUSikaparNI|| 27||

 sthirAM mandarujAM pracchet karNikAM pAtayeta vA||28||  CyAmA lAGgalikA dantI kiNihI girikarNikA||28||  AkhuvRkSo mahAvRkSastrivRdaJjanakI snuhI||28||  karNikApAtanaM kalkamekaikaM tilakalkavat||28||

karNikAM sthirAM mandarujAM ca satIM pracchet pAtayeta vA|  CyAmAdInyekaikaM tilakalkayogAt karNikACAtanAni|  lAGgalikA viSalyA|  kiNihI girikarNikA|  AkhuvRkSo jImUtakaH|  aJjanakI nIlinI|| 28||

 kSIripravAlamaJjiSThA balAdArvI hayAhvayAH||29||  ropaNyaH kalkitAstailaM ghRtaM va sAdhitaM tathA||29||  dviniCA tilayaSTyAhvatagaroCIrapadmakaiH||29||

kSIripravAlAdikaM kalkitaM ropaNam|  athavA taiH sAdhitaM tailaM vA ghRtaM vA tathAguNam|  dviniCAdibhiH sAdhitaM tailaM vA ghRtaM vA||29||

 sAmAnyeneti nirdiSTA kriyAkhUnAM viCeSataH||30||

ityAkhunAM kriyA sAmAnyena nirdiSTA|| 30||

uttarasthAnam

 lAlanena vamirmUrcchA lAlAsrAvaCca jAyate||31||  lihyAtsamAkSikaM tatra cUrNitaM taNDulIyakam||31||

viCeSatastUcyate lAlanenetyAdinA|  lAlAsrAvAntaM lAlanena jAyate|  tatra samAkSikaM taNDulIyakacUrNaM lihyAt|| 31||

 capalena varmirmUrcchA tRDvA tatrAvalehayet||32||  sadArumustAM triphalAM.......................||32||

capalAkhyena vamirmUrcchA tRDvA jAyate|  tatra devadArumustasahitAM triphalAM lehayet|| 32||

 .............................putrakeNa tu pANDutA||33||  sAdo~aGge sarvaCcAkhusadRCagranthisambhavaH||33||  CirISabIjaM kuSThaM ca madhunA tatra lehayet||33||

putrakAkhyena granthisambhavAntam|  tatra CirISabIjaM  kuSThaJca madhunA lehayet|| 33||

 hasireNAnnavidveSo jRmphaNam romaharCaNam||34||  AragvadhAdiniryuhaM suvAntaM tatra pAyayet||34||

hasirAkhyena romaharSaNAntam | tatra suSThu vamanaM kRtvA AragvadhAdikvAthaM pAyayet ||34||

 cikireNa CiroduHkhaM Copho hidhmA vamirbhramaH
vAnto~atra jAlinIkvAthaiH sAramaGkolajaM pibet||35||

cikirAkhyena bhramAntam|  atra jAlinIkvAthena vamanaM kRtvA aGkolasAraM pibet|| 35||

 ajinenAGgakRSNatvaM mUrccha chardiCca hRdgrahaH||36||  madhunA tatra maJjiSThAM lihyAtsnukkSIrakalkitAm||36||

ajinAkhyena hRdgrahAntam|  tatra sudhAkSIreNa kalkitAM maJjiSThAM madhunA lihyAt|| 36||

 nidrA kaSAyadantena hRcchoSaH kRCatAti ca||37||  CirISasAratvagbIjaM tatra kSaudreNa lehayet||37||

kaSAyadantAkhyena nidrA hRcchoSaH atikRCatA ca|  tatra CirISasya sArAdikaM kSaudreNa lehayet|| 37||

 kulakena rujAsrAvau rAjayo daMCamaNDale||38||  sadinduvArakau tatra sahau lihyAnmadhuplutau||38||

 granthayaH kokilenogrA jvaro dAhaCca dAruNaH||39||  nIlIpunarnavAkvAthe siddhaM tatra pibed ghRtam||39||

kokilAkhyenogrA granthayo dAruNau ca dAhajvarau|  tatra nIlyAdikvAthasiddhaM ghRtaM pibet|| 39||

 kapilena vraNe kothe jvaro granthirbhramaH satRT||40||  lehayenmadhunA CvetAM CvetAM cAtra punarnavAm||40||

 raktaM kRSNena vamati viCeSAd durdine pibet||41||  tatra kiMCukabhasmAmbu CirISaphalavAlakam||41||

 aruNAdyAH pRthagdoSasannipAtAsrasambhavAn||42||  janayanti kramAdrAgAn sarve ca granthikarNikAH||42||  karaJjAragvadhavyoSabRhatyaMCumatIdvayAt||42||  kvAthe dadhipayaHsarpiH pRthakprasthonmitaM pacet||42||  kapitthadADimavarIviCAlAtrisugandhikAH||42||  trivRtAmRttikAvakraguDUcICcAtra kalkitAH||42||  kSipettadaruNAdInAM paJcAnAM viSanACanam||42||  kAkAdanI kAkAmAcI svarasens CRtaM ghRtam||42||

aruNAdyAH paJca pRthagdoSAdisambhavAn kramAdrogAn janayanti|  sarve ca granthikarNikAyuktA bhavanti|  aruNo vAtasambhavAn rogAn janayati|  CabalaH pittasambhavAn|  svetaH kaphasambhavAn|  paitondurosrasambhavAniti kramArthaH|

 klamaCrucCundareNogro grIvAstampho viSacikA||43||  yavanAlarSaphakSAram phRhatyau vA~atra pAyayet||43||

cacchundarAkhyena klamAdiviSUcikAntam|  tatra yavanAlakSArAdikaM pAyayet|  yavanAlakSAro yavakSAraH|| 43||

 grIvAstambho rasAlena vedanA daMCamaNDale||44||  lihyAnmahAgadaM tatra ghRtamAkSikasaMyutam||44||

rasAlAkhyena grIvAyAH stambo daMCamaNDale vedanA ca|  tatra mahAgadAkhyamagadaM ghRtamAkSikasaMyutaM lihyAt|  mahAgadAkhyo~agadaH sarpaviSapratiSedhoktaH|| 44||

 saCeSaM mUSikaviSaM prakupyatyabhradarCane||45||  yathAyathaM vA kAleSu doSANAM vRddhihetuSu||45||  tatra sarve yathAvasthaM prayojyAH syurupakramAH||45||  yathAsvaM ye ca nirdiSTAstathA dUSIviSApahAH||45||

yanmUSikaviSaM cikitsayA niCCeSaM na nirastaM tadabhradarCane prakupyati|  athavA yenaiva doSeNAdhikaM yanmUSikaviCaM tattasya vRddhihetuSu koloSvAyuSkAmIyokteCu prakupyati|  

	tatra saCeSaviSavRddhau avasthAnatikrameNa yathAdoSaJca nirdiSTA upakramA prayojyAH syuH| tathA dUSIviSApahACcopakramAH|  iti mUSikaviSopakramaH|| 45||

 daMCantvalarkadaSTasya dagdhamuSNena sarpiSA||46||  pradihyAdagadaistaistaiH purANaM ca ghRtaM pibet||46||

alarkadaSTasya daMCaM daMCavraNaM uSNena sarpiSA dagdhvA taistairnAnAvidhairagadaiH pradihyAt|

 tilagugguludUrvANAM dADimasya guDasya ca||47||  kalko muhurmuhurlepaH CvadaMCaviSajitparam||47||

 nalamUlaM jale piSTaM pAnalepanayorhitam||48||  mAtuluGgacchadairdaMCaM badhnIyAddantacarvitaiH||48||

 pibet punarnavAM CvetAM dhurdhUrakaphalAnvitam||50||

uttarasthAnam

 phalaM dhurdhUrakAnmUlaM kAkodumbarikodbhavam||51||  CIdhunA CvaviSaM hanti pItaM vA taNDulAmbunA||51||

 yavamASakulatthAnAM paJcamUlasya cAmbhasi||55||  kSIradviguNite sarpiH sAdhyecchlakSNakalkitaiH||55||  aCvagandhAsahAkuSThabRhatIrajanIdvayaiH||55||  vidArInatakaTvaGgapayasyAsinduvArakaiH||55||  sarpagandhAnakhAbhIruCarkarAraktacandanaiH||55||  CvadaMSTropadravAn sarvAn pAnAbhyaGgairnnihanti tat||55||

 hRdvidAhe praseke ca virekavamane bhRCam||56||  viSadoSahare yojye Cuddhe saMsarjanakramaH||56||

 dadyAt saMCodhanaM tIkSNamavaCyaM viSanACanam||57||  aCuddhasya nirUDhe~api vraNe kupyati tadviSam||57||

tatra yadA saMCodhanaM dadyAttadAvaCyameva tIkSNaireva nAtikSNairyasmAdasamyak Cuddhasya nirUDhe~api vraNe tadviSaM kupyati|| 57||

 saratnabIjauSadhibhiH kumbhaiH CItAmbupUritaiH||58||  aStottaraCataM vArAn siddhamantrAbhimintritaiH||58||  aSTottaraCatonmAnaiH puSpamAlAvaguNThitaiH||58||  gocarmamAtrake lipte jvalitAgnau kuCAstRte||58||  sthaNDile saritastIre snAnaM vAsya catuSpathe||58||

asya cAlarkadaSTasy saritastIre vA catuSpathe vA sthaNDile bhUpradeCe gocarmamAtrasthAne lipte jvalitAgnau kuCaiCcAstRte saratnabIjAdibhiH kumbhairghaTaiH snAnaM syAt|  ratnairbIjairddhAnyaiCcauSadhaiCca saha ye vartante te tathoktaH|  ye ca kumbhAH siddhamantreNASTattaraM CataM vArAnabhimantritAstaiH|  ye jalena pUrNAH santaste|  ye aSTottaraM CatamunmAnena bhavanti, taiH kalaCaiH|| 58||

 alarkAdhipate yakSa sArameyagaNAdhipa||59||  alarkajuSTametaM me nirviSaM kuru mAcirAt||59||  svAheti mantro~alarkArtte sarvakarmasu Casyate||59||

alarkAdhipata ityAdi svAhAnto mantrolarkArtte puruSe sarvakarmasu Casyate|  he alarkAbhidhAna, adhipate svAmin, he yakSagaNAnAM sArameyagaNAnAM cAdhipa|  enamalarkajuSTaM me nirviSaM kuru mAciCat CIghraM svAheti mantrapadam|| 59||

 catuSpAdbhirdvipArdbhirvA nakhadantaparikSatam||60||  CUyate pacyate rAgajvarastrAvarujAnvitam||60||

 athAto viSopadravapratiSedhaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

viSANAM tadrogANAJca nirNayaM kRtvA viSe ya upadravAstAMstaccikitsAJca pradarCayitumadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 tRNmUrcchayorACiraso lepasekA himA hitAH||10||  ambhojanAlakusumacandanoCIramauktikaiH||10||  vaihAyasasitAtoyakSIrAjyekSurasAplutaiH||10||  vIjanaM tAlavRntena CIte sikatile sthitiH||10||  kamalotpalakiJjalkapaTalAvRtavAriSu||10||  viSatRDdAhamUrcchAghnaM sarasISvavagAhanam||10||

atisArasya cikitsAmAha-bhUnimbetyAdi|  bhUnimbAdIni paJca samAni citrakasya dvau bhAgAvayavadravyApekSayA|  tathaiva kuTajAdaSTau bhAgAH|  etadvAriNA pibedviSahetvatIsArAdyapaham|  

	lodhrAdikaM samAkSikaM taNDulAmbunA pibet|  nAgarAdyaJjanAntaM tadvaditi samAkSikaM taNDulAmbunA pibet|  athavA pAThAdicUrNaM samAkSikaM dadhnA yuktaM pibet|  iti viSajAtisAre|| 12||

 bastirugvartanAheSu phalavartiM prayojayet||13||  sAragvadhAM satrivRtAM sopakulyAM harItakIm||13||  pibed ghRtena sakSaudrAM bastiCUlAdinACinIm||13||  gRhadhUmanataCyAmAnIlinItaNDulIyakaiH||13||  siddhaM vAjyaM tathA~asiddhaM varAkvAthatrivRdyutam||13||

bastirugAdiSu udAvartacikitsitoktAM phalavartiM prayojayet|  varta udAvartaH (viCo~atikAThinyam) nAha AnAhaH|  AragvadhAditrayeNa pRthagyuktAM harItakIM sakSaudrAM ghRtena pibed bastiCUlAdinACinIm|  

	gRhadhUmAdibhiH siddhamAjyaM pibet|  asiddhameva vA ghRtaM triphalAkvAthena trivRtA ca saMyuktaM pibet|  iti bastirugAdiSu|| 13||

 kAkolIkSIrivRdvAtvagdrAkSAyaSTyAhvaCarkarAH||14||  nasyaM viSaCirorugghnaM saMyojyaM CItavAriNA||14||

kAkolyAdinasyaM viSaCirorugghnam|  subodham|  iti mUrddharuji||

 Cvayathau CuddhakoSThasya payaHpAne hitaM CRtam||15||  viCvabheSajavaidehIkaTukAdevadArubhiH||15||  surasAmUlakalkairvA chAgaM vA pippalICRtam||15||  triphalAyAH kaSAyeNa trivRtA bhAvitA tryaham||15||  AloDya sarpiSA pItA viSaCvayathunACinI||15||  madhuvellavarAvyoSasurAhvoCIrapadmakaiH||15||  viSaCvayathujillepastathA svAdukaSAyakaiH||15||  CirISapuSpA~ahiCironatakuSThairghRtAnvitaH||15||  dhUpo~agadaH CvayathujitsamastaviSanACanaH||15||

viSaje Cvayathau vamanavirecanAbhyAM CuddhakoSThasya viCvabheSajAdibhiH CRtaM payaH kSIraM pAne hitam|  athavA surasAmUlakalkaiH CRtaM payaH pAne hitam|  athavA pippalICRtaM chAgaM payaH|  

	triphalAkvAthena tryahaM bhAvitA yA trivRtA sA ghRtenAloDya pItA CvayathunACinI| 

	madhvAdibhiH padmakAntairlepo viSaCvayathujit|  tathA madhuraiH kaSAyaiCca dravyaiH|  

	CirISapuSpAdibhirghRtAnvito dhUpaH CvayathujidagadaH sarvaviSANAM nACanaH|  ahiCiraH sarpottamAGgam|  iti Cvayathau|| 15||

 alpenApyapacAreNa daMCaH pUtitvamaCnute||16||  prAyo na sahate tIkSNamuSNaM vA bheSajaM viSam||16||  madhurasnigdhaCItAni yuJjyAttasmAdviSavraNe||16||  sekAlepAMCca sakSIraiH kaSAyaiH kSIrivRkSajaiH||16||  nyagrodhaCRGgamadhukatilasarSapasaindhavam||16||  sAbhayA nimbapatrAjyaM daMCapUtitvanACanam||16||  karNikApAtanaM CreSThaM viSavraNavinACanam||16||

viSavraNe madhurAdiprayogAya alpenetyAdihetuH|  kSIrivRkSANAM kaSAyairdravaiH kSIrasaMyuktaiH sekAnAlepAMCca yuJjyAt|  

	nyagrodhaCRGgAdikaM daMCapUtitvanACanAdiguNatrayayuktam|  iti pUtidaMCatve|| 16||

 rakte sravatyatibhRCaM ghRtaM samaricaM pibet||17||  taNDulIyakamUlena sitayA vA samanvitam||17||  daMCaM pralepayeccAsya dArvyAsu ClakSNapiSTayA||17||  sitopalAkSaudrakRtacchAgadugdhAni nAvanam||17||  CamIkalkaM pibecchlakSNamaGgaM limpedviCAlayA||17||  nAvane hemaCuklA ca tataH CAmyati CoNitam||17||

vraNAccAtibhRCaM rakte sravati samaricaM ghRtaM pibet|  athavA ghRtaM taNDulIyakasya mUlena samanvitaM pibet|  CarkarayA vA|  

	asya cAsrasrutau suClakSNapiSTayA dArvyA daMCavraNaM limpet|  sitopaletyAdi subodham|  viCAlA gavAkSI|  CuklA kSIravidArI|  kSIrakakolI vA|  iti raktasrAve|| 17||

 kRCasyAtisrute rakte rUkSairatyarthasevitaiH||18||  viSasya ca svabhAvena mAtariCvA prakupyati||18||  unmAdAkSepakamanobhraMCApasmRtayastataH||18||  tatreSTaM snehanaM bastinasyapradhamanAJjanam||18||  nAgadantyabhayAkuSThapippalIvRSakaTphalam||18||  bhallAtakAsthitrikaTukAbilvaprativiSAgnikAH||18||  sakSIraM tairghRtaM siddhaM viSavAtavikArajit||18||  pibederaNDatailaM vA chAgamAMsarasAnvitam||18||  aikadhyaM ghRtatailaM vA medhyamAsarasACanaNaH||18||  kArpAsamUlaM maricaM haridre naladaM nalam||18||  pippalIM svarjikAM kuSThaM jalenAloDya pAyayet||18||  unmattaM viSavAtena tathA~apasmAriNaM naram||18||  vacAhaMsapadIvyoSadadhitthaM hastipippalIm||18||  devadArubalAbilvakRmijitkuSThaTuNTukam||18||  lodhrAkhukarNyativiSAH kSIraM sarpiCca pAyayet||18||  nihanti pAnAbhyaGgAbhyAM ghRtaM sarvaviSANi tat||18||

kRCasya rakte~atisrute rUkSasevanAdviSasvabhAvAcca vAyuH prakupyati|  tato hetorunmAdAdayo bhavanti|  tatra snehanaM bastyAdikamiSTam|

	nAgadantyAdibhiH sakSIraM siddhaM ghRtaM viSahetUn vAtavikArAnunmAdAdIn jayati|

	chAgamAMsarasenAnvitameraNDatailaM vA athavA medhyamAMsarasACanaH sannaikadhyaM ghRtatailaM vA pibet|  

	kArpAsamUlAdikaM subodham|  viSavAteneti viSahetunA vAtena unmattamunmAdayuktam|  

	vacAdibhiH sarpirvipAcayet|  tatpAnenAbhyaGgena ca sarvaviSANi nihanti|  haMsapadI madhusravA|  dadhitthaM kapittham|  TuNTukaH syonAkaH|  AkhukarNI dravantI|  iti viSAnile|| 18||

 pratikuryAdyathAsvaM ca rogeSvenaM pareSu ca||19||  doSAnubandhamAlocya viSatantrAvirodhataH||19||

evaM pareSu cAnukteSvapi viSahetuSu rogeSu yathAsvamAtmIyacikitsayA pratikuryAt|  kathamityAha-doSANAM vAtAdInAmanubandhamAlocya yathA ca viSatantre tIkSNAdirUpeNa virodho na bhavati||19||

 dRCyaCabdAgadairasya viSaCeSaM nivartayet||20||  alpamapyavaCiSTaM hi vyAdhaye maraNAya vA||20||

asya cAturasya dRCyaCabdAgadairviSaCeSaM Camayet|  dRCyAgadA ye darCanamAtreNa viSaghnAH|  CabdAgadA ye Cabdena|  alpamityAdi niCCeSanivartanatve hetuH|| 20||

uttarasthAnam

viSopayogIyaH

 athAto viSopayogIyaM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

sarvakriyAbhirasidhyato jaGgamaviSasya prasaGgenAnyeSAmapi rogaviCeSANAmasidhyatAM sthAvaraviSaikasAdhyatvAt sthAvaraviSasya jaGgamaviSaikasAdhyatvAcca tadupayogamadhikRtyAdhyAya Arabhyate||1||

 viSe prativiSaM yojyaM mantratantrairasidhyati||2||  atIte paJcame vege saptamasyAnatikrame||2||  prabhornivedya prayato naiva vAkhyAya kasyacit||2||

mantrairviSaharaistantraiCcauSadhAdibhirasidhyati viSe prativiSaM vijAtIyaM yojyam|  sthAvarasya jaGgamaM jaGgamasya sthAvaramityarthaH|  kadetyAha-paJcamaM vege~atIte atikrAnte saptame anatikrAnte ca sati|  prabho rAjJo nivedya uktvA|  yathA-ahamasya viSeNa mumUrSostRNIkRtabhUrimantratantrasya jIvitanirACabandhuvargasya atistokamapyanACaGkyamAnaprANapratyAgamanasya viSeNa jIvitaM prArthayiSya iti|  evamayamasyAyuHkSaye~api varAko~ayaCasA na yujyate|  siddhe tu sumahadyaCa AsAdayati|  athavA naiva kasyacidevamAkhyAya yadyayamasmai viSaM yokSyati tarhyauSadhamAtravyAjenApi siddhau yaCa eva asiddhau tvayaCasaH pUrvasmAdiva viSAtprasaGgo neti|| 2||

 siddhamantradharaH kRtvA dharaNIbandhamAditaH||3||  nahi mantrasahAyasya viSaM yAtyavidheyatAm||3||

siddhamantradharaH sannAdito dharaNIbandhaM pradeCarakSAM kRtvA viSaM yojayet|  dharaNIbandhaheturna hi mantrasahAyasya bhiSajo viSamavidheyatAM yAtIti|| 3||

 CleSmatulyaguNaM prAyaH sthiramUrdhvagamaM viSam||4||  prAyaH pittaguNairyuktamadhogAmi ca jaGgamam||4||  guNairiti viparyastairnihataste parasparam||4||  yuJjyAnmUlaviSaM tasmAddaSTAnAM pAnalepayoH||4||

sthiraM sthAvaraM viSaM guNaiH CleSmaNastulyamUrdhvagamaJca|  jaGgamaM viSaM pittena guNaistulyamadhogAmi ca|  prAyograhaNaM viSayavyabhicArasUcanArtham ityanena prakAreNa sthAvarajaGgame viSe yato guNairviparyastaiH parasparaM viparIte ataste viSaM parasparaM nihataH sthAvareNa jaGgamaM hanyate jaGgamena ca sthAvaramiti|  tasmAddhetordaSTAnAM pAne lepe ca mUlaviSaM yuJjyAt|| 4||

 viSapItaM ca kuCalo daMCayet pavanACibhiH||5||  na viSapratimaM kiJcinnirviSIkaraNaM viSe||5||

kuCalaCca vaidyaH pavanACibhiH sarpairviSapItaM daMCayet|  viSe~anyatare dehasthite tadviparItaM viSapratimaM na kiJcidanyannirviSIkaraNaM vidyate|| 5||

 caturbhiH SaDbhiraSTAbhirhInamadhyottamAM yavaiH||6||  mAtrAM viSasya maulasya prayuJjIta yathAyatham||6||

yadA ca jaGgame viSe maulaM viSaM prayujyate tadA yathAyathaM jaGgamApekSayA hInamadhyAdhikAM trividhAM mAtrAM prayuJjIta|  caturbhiryavairhInamAtrA, SaDbhirmadhyamA, aSTAbhiruttamA iti sarpadaSTe|| 6||

 daSTasya dvau yavau kITaistilamAtraM tu vRCcikaiH||7||  naiva tvaksRksthe....................................||7||

kITairdaSTe tu dvau yavau mUlaviSasya yuJjyAt|  vRCcikairdaSTe tilamAtram|  asRksthite viSe naiva viSAntaraM yuJjyAt|| 7||

 ....................................pAne tu lUtAdaSTasya neSyate||8||  pracchAya lepayeddaMCaM tasya jJAtvA suniCcitam||8||  saviSe yuktamamRtaM viSamevA~aviSe viSam||8||  abale cAtibalavadvyApannaM ca prayogataH||8||

lUtAdaSTasya pAna eva viSaM neSyate apitu suniCcitaM lUtAdaMCaM jJAtvA pracchAya lepayet|  suniCcitatvajJAnAya hetuH saviSe yuktaM viSamamRtaM bhavati nirviSe tu viSaM viSameveti|  tasmAdyadi lUtAdaMCaH sAviSastato viSalepaH|  anyahetukACcet sphoTAdayo na viSalepaH kAryaH|  yathAyathaM mAtrAmiti yaduktaM tadevopabRhyate|  abale ca viSe atibalaM viSaM viSameva na tvauSadham|  prayogavaCAttu vyApannaM viSaM viSameva na tvamRtam|| 8||

 saviSAviSaCaGkAyAmagadAnupayojayet||9||  aviruddhAn prayukto hi nirviSasyAgado~agadaH||9||  tadvacca saviSasyApi kriyAkAlAtipAtataH||9||  jAnIyAdviSasadbhAvaM bhiSaktasmAtprayatnataH||9||

yatra tu saviSo vA syAdaviSo vetyACaGkA tatrAviruddhAnagadAnupayojayet na tu viSam|  yato niCcitaM nirviSasyA~agado gado vyAdhiH|  tadvat saviSasyApi kriyAkAlAtipAte prayukta agado vyAdhiH|  tasmAt bhAvAbhAvAbhyAM mAtrAdibhiCca yatnato viSasadbhAvaM jAnIyAt|| 9||

 sAktukaM mustakaM CRGgI vAlakaM sarSapAhvayam||10||  vatsanAbhaM ca karmaNyaM viSaM snigdhaM ghanaM guru||10||  na jAtvanyatprayoktavyaM kAlakUTaM viCeSataH||10||

sAktukAdikaM viSaM karmaNyaM karmaNi sAdhu snigdhAdiguNaJca ebhyonyanna jAtu prayoktavyam|  kAlakUTaM viCeSato na prayoktavyam|| 10||

 kSIrakSaudraghRtairyuktaM pItaM hanti viSaM viSam||12||  sasinduvAratagaraM mRtasaJjIvanaM viSam||12||  CirISakusumaM vakraM viSamAkhuviSApaham||12||  devadAru nataM mAMsI drAmilIbAkucI viSam||12||  kuSThaM ca pAnalepAbhyAM samastaviSanACanam||12||  manaCCilAJjanAlailA sinduvArAmarAhvayam||12||  saraktA kuGkumaviSaM dhmAnaM nissaMjJabodhanam||12||

kSIretyAdinA viSaprayogaH|  viSasya mAtrA tUktA|  viSaM kSIrAdibhiryuktaM pItaM viSaM hanti|  sinduvAratagarAbhyAM yuktaM pItaM viSaM mRtasaJjIvanam|  CirISapuSpatagarAbhyAM yuktaM pItaM viSamAkhu viSApahaM bhavati|  devadArvyAdibhiryuktaM pItaM viSaM samastaviSANAM nACanam|  manaCCilAdikaM nAsAdhmAnaM nissaMjJAnAM bodhanam|  alaM haritAlam|  amarAhvayaM devadAru|  raktA maJjiSThA|| 12||

 abhyaste~api viSe yatnAdvarjanIyAn vivarjayet||18||  kaTvamlatailalavaNadivAsvapnAtapAnalAn||18||  rUkSamannaM viCeSeNa bhayaM vA~ajIrNataH sadAH||18||  dRgvibhramaM karNarujAmanyAMCcAnilajAn gadAn||18||  viSaM rUkSACinaH kuryAnmRtyumeva tvajIrNataH||18||

viSe abhyaste api sAtmyIbhUte~api varjanIyAn yatnAdvivarjayet|  viCeSeNa tu rUkSamannam|  kiM tadityAha-kaTvamletyAdi|  ajIrNato viCeSeNa bhayaM gRhItavyam|  

	rUkSACino narasya viSaM dRgvibhramAdIn kuryAt|  ajIrNAttu mRtyumeva|| 18||

 alaM gomUtrasaMyuktamAtape CoSayettryaham||19||  viSaM bRMhaNametaddhi viSasyAdau praCasyate||19||  tatpibenmastunA vAtajvare kSIreNa paittike||19||  yuktaM mUtreNa kaphaje sarvaje triphalAmbhasA||19||

haritAlasya bhAvanAprayogaCca subodhaH|  taditi bhAvitaM haritAlam|  sarvaje sannipAtaje|| 19||

 lodhracandanaSaDgranthACarkarAghRtamAkSikaiH||20||  kSIreNa ca viSaM yuktaM jIrNajvaraharaM param||20||  nikumbhakumbhatriphalAsarpirmadhuviSaiH kRtaH||20||  nihanti modako jIrNajvaramehatvagAmayAn||20||  CikhikarkirasopetaM viSamajvarajidviSam||20||

lodhrAdibhiryuktaM viSaM paraM jIrNajvaraharam|  nikumbhAdibhiH kRto modako jIrNajvarAdikaM hanti|  CikhikarkirasayuktaM viSaM viSamajvaraM jayati|  CikhI citrakaH|  karkI karkaTaCRGgI|| 20||

 lAkSAsurAhvAmaJjiSThAkuSThapadmakaCArivAH||35||  guJjAphalaM kuravako lAGgalI vajrakandakaH||35||  vArAhIkandakAsphotA saptAhvagirikarNikAH||35||  arkACvamArayormUlaM nAgapuSpaM nataM niCe||35||  dantI viSaM sAtiviSaM pippalI maricAni ca||35||  taistailaM kaTutailaM vA CvitrasyAbhyaJjanaM pacet||35||  savarNIkaraNaM CreSThamAstikasya vaco yathA||35||

uttarasthAnam

rasAyanavidhiH

 athato rasAyanavidhiM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

iti nijAgantUnAM rogANAM nirAkAGkSaM cikitsitamuktvA svarUpAtiCayaprAptyarthaM rasAyanAnAmavasaro tatastadvijJAnArthamadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 dIrghamAyuH smRtiM medhAmArogyaM taruNaM vayaH||2||  prabhA varNasvaraudAryaM dehendriyabalodayam||2||  vAksiddhiM vRSatAM kAntimavApnoti rasAyanAt||2||  lAbhopAyo hi CastAnAM rasAdInAM rasAyanam||2||

dIrghamAyurityAdinA rasAyanAnAM prayojanamucyate|  yasmAcchastAnAM praCastAnAM rasAdInAmAtmano yo lAbhopAyastadrasAyanamiti nirvacanam||2||

 pUrve vayasi madhye vA tatprayojyaM jitAtmanaH||3||  snigdhasya srutaraktasya viCuddhasya ca sarvathA||3||

etacca rasAyanaM bhiSajA jitAtmanaH jitendriyasya puMsaH vayasi madhye vA snigdhasya srutaraktasya sarveNa ca prakAreNa viCuddhasya nihatadoSasya prayojyam|| 3||

 aviCuddhe CarIre hi yukto rAsAyano vidhiH||4||  na bhAti malasaMsRSTe vastre rAga ivArpitaH||4||  yuktaM saMskArahInasya samyagapyapramAdinaH||4||  yathaiva pauruSaM tadvanna sidhyati rasAyanam||4||

aviCuddha iti|  yasmAdaviCuddhe CarIre yuktaH prayojito rAsAyano vidhirmalasaMsRSTe vastre arpito rAga iva na bhAti|  

	snehAdisaMskArahInasya samyagapi prayuktam apramAdino~api prayuktaM rasAyanaM na sidhyati|  yathA saMskArahInasya prayuktamapramAdino~api pauruSaM vIryaM na sidhyati|| 4||

 sarve ca doSA bhavanti grAmyAdAhArAdamlalavaNakaTukakSAra
viruddhAsAtmyarUkSAbhiSyandiklinnagurupUtiparyuSitanavadhAnya
CuSkaCAkA~amamAMsatilakulatthadadhiCuktakAJjikapiSTA
nnavirUDhakaniSeviNAM divAsvapnastrImadyanityAnAM viSamA
timAtravyAyAmAyAmasaGkSobhiravapuSAM krodhalobhabhayaCo
kAyAsabahulAnAM pApakarmaNAmasamaJjasAhAravihAranirhAra
niratAnAm||5||  ato nimittaM hyaviCuddhaH saJjAyate raso vidahyate raktaM
CithilIbhavanti mAMsAni viSyandate medo dUSyante doSA
vimucyante sandhayo na sandhIyante~asthiSu majjAno nApyA
yate CukraM naujo na balaM na vIryam||5||  tataH sa evambhUto glAyati sIdati nidrAtandrAlasya
samanvitaH khidyate nirvidyate nirutsAho~asamarthaH CArIra
mAnasAnAM viCiSTAnAM ceSTAnAM bhraSTacchAyo naSTasmRtiralpa
buddhirasampAdyamAnAbhilaSitArtho~aharniCamaniCamaniCaM niH
CvaCvasannadhiSThAnabhUto rogANAM nopAttamapi sarvamAyura
vApnoti||5||

na kevalaM caitadeva yAvad grAmyAdaCAstradRSTAdAhArAt|  sarve ca doSA bhavanti|  keSAmityAhaamlalavaNaprabhRtiniSeviNAmityAdInAm|  viruddhAsAtmye sUtrasthAna ukte|  virUDhakamaGkuritaM sasyam|  viSameNAnekarUpeNa vyAyAmena saGkSobhitaM vapuryeSAM te tathoktAsteSAm|  asamaJjasamaniyatarUpaM yadAhArAdikaM tasmin ratA ye teSAm|  

	ato nimittamasmAt kAraNAdaviCuddho rasaH saJjAyate|  vidahyata ityAdi vyAkhyAsamam|  																																						
	tato~anantaraM saduSTAhArAdikaM evambhUta iti duSTarasAdidhAtuH glAyati harSakSayamAsAdayati sIdati gAtrANi vinAmayati|  vyAkhyAsamam|  tathAvidha upAttamapyanyajanmasaJcitamapyAyurna prApnoti kimutAdhikaM prApsyati|| 5||

 tasmAd buddhimAnapAsya yathoktAnAhArAdidoSAn nirvAhya
ca pUrvopacitAn rasAyanaM vidhivihitamupaseveta||6||

tasmAditi|  yata evaM tasmAt buddhimAn naro yathoktAn grAmyAhArAdidoSAnapAsya tyaktvA pUrvopacitAn pUrvasaJcitAn doSAn snehAdinA nirvAhya nissArya ca vidhivihitaM rasAyanamupaseveta||6||

 tattu dvividhaM kuTIprAveCikaM vAtAtapikaM ca||7||  tatra vIrya
prabhAvaprayogaparihAragurutvAt kuTIprAveCikaM mahAphala
taram||7||

taditi rasAyanaviSevaNaM dvividhaM dviprakAram| katham?  kuTIprAveCikaM vAtAtapikaM ceti|  tatra tayormadhye kuTIprAveCikaM vIryAdigurutvAnmahAphalataraM bhavati|| 7||

 tasya vidhiH kSemasubhikSadhArmikaCraddadhAnajananRpavaidyavipre
sulabhamahauSadhighRtakSIrapathyabhojanopakaraNe grAme nagare vA
pUrvottarasyAM diCi prAgudakpravaNe suvibhaktavihAroddeCe deCe
dRDhaghanasumRSTabhittimutsedhavistArasampannAM sUkSmalocanAM tri
garbhAmRtusukhAM nirvAtAM pravAtaikadeCAM prAgdvArAmudagdvArAM vA
CamIbilvakSIrivRkSaparigRhItAmaniSTendriyArthavAtAtaparajo

tasyeti kuTIpraveCasya vidhirbhavati|  prathamameva kSemasubhikSAdiguNe grAme nagare vA dRDhabhittyAdiguNAM kuTIM kArayet|  dhArmikAH CraddadhAnA janA nRpAdayaCca yasmin|  tathA sulabhA mahauSadhyAdayo yatra|  prAcyAmudIcyAM vA diCi|  prAgudakpravaNe abhimukhe (pravaNaH kramanimnaH) suvibhakto vihAroddeCaH parisaryApradeCo yatra deCe  utsedha aunnatyam|  sUkSmaNi locanAni gavAkSANi yasyAm|  CAmyAdivRkSaiH parigRhItAmACritAm|  aniSTendriyArthAdInAmagamyAm|  aniSTA indriyArthA dviSTAH CabdAdayo viSayAH|  sarIsRpAH sarpAdayaH|  vyAlAH siMhavyAghrAdayaH antAvasAyinaCcaNDAlAdayaH|  tathA sannihitaM sadvai-dyAdikaM yasyAm|| 8||

 tasyAM rasAyanArthI Caradi vasante vA CuklapakSe praCaste
ahani pUjayitvA yathArhaM devaguruviprAn praNamya brahmadakSA
CviprabhRtIn parimRCya suvarNaghRtamadhusiddhArthakapriyaGguro

tasyAmiti kuTyAM rasAyanArthI puruSaH praCaste~ahani sadvAsare yathArhaM devapUjAdikaM kRtvA~anupraviCet|| 9||

 tatra saMCodhanaiH CuddhaH sukhI jAtabalaH punaH||10||  brahmacArI dhRtiyutaH CraddadhAno jitendriyaH||10||  dAnaCIladayAsatyavratadharmaparAyaNaH||10||  devatAnu smRtau yukto yuktasvapnaprajAgaraH||10||  priyauSadhaH peCalavAgArabheta rasAyanam||10||

tatra kuTyaM saMCodhanairvamanAdibhiH CuddhasukhitvAdiyuktaCca rasAyanamArabheta|  punariti Codhane kRte|  dhRtirdhairyam|  CraddadhAnaH CraddhAvAn|  dAnAdiparAyaNo dAnAdipravaNaH|  yuktaM prAptaM svapnAdi ca yasya| priyauSadhaH na tvauSadhe dveSyasvabhAvaH| peCalavAk priyaMvadaH||10||

uttarasthAnam

rasAyanavidhiH

 athato rasAyanavidhiM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

iti nijAgantUnAM rogANAM nirAkAGkSaM cikitsitamuktvA svarUpAtiCayaprAptyarthaM rasAyanAnAmavasaro tatastadvijJAnArthamadhyAya Arabhyate|| 1||

 dIrghamAyuH smRtiM medhAmArogyaM taruNaM vayaH||2||  prabhA varNasvaraudAryaM dehendriyabalodayam||2||  vAksiddhiM vRSatAM kAntimavApnoti rasAyanAt||2||  lAbhopAyo hi CastAnAM rasAdInAM rasAyanam||2||

dIrghamAyurityAdinA rasAyanAnAM prayojanamucyate|  yasmAcchastAnAM praCastAnAM rasAdInAmAtmano yo lAbhopAyastadrasAyanamiti nirvacanam||2||

 pUrve vayasi madhye vA tatprayojyaM jitAtmanaH||3||  snigdhasya srutaraktasya viCuddhasya ca sarvathA||3||

etacca rasAyanaM bhiSajA jitAtmanaH jitendriyasya puMsaH vayasi madhye vA snigdhasya srutaraktasya sarveNa ca prakAreNa viCuddhasya nihatadoSasya prayojyam|| 3||

 aviCuddhe CarIre hi yukto rAsAyano vidhiH||4||  na bhAti malasaMsRSTe vastre rAga ivArpitaH||4||  yuktaM saMskArahInasya samyagapyapramAdinaH||4||  yathaiva pauruSaM tadvanna sidhyati rasAyanam||4||

aviCuddha iti|  yasmAdaviCuddhe CarIre yuktaH prayojito rAsAyano vidhirmalasaMsRSTe vastre arpito rAga iva na bhAti|  

	snehAdisaMskArahInasya samyagapi prayuktam apramAdino~api prayuktaM rasAyanaM na sidhyati|  yathA saMskArahInasya prayuktamapramAdino~api pauruSaM vIryaM na sidhyati|| 4||
