 bhallAtakatailapAtraM sapayaskaM madhukAkSamAtreNa CatapAka
mupayuJjIta||56||  triguNaJca kAla ityAdi samAnaM pUrveNa||56||

bhallAtakatailasya pAtraM kSIreNa saha CataM vArAn paktva madhuyaSTIkarSamAtreNa saMyojyopayuJjIta pUrvatulyaguNam|| 56||

 bhallAtakatailaM kRSNatilatailaM sarpirAmalakaraso~asa
nAdisArakaSAya ityeSAM droNaM droNaM triphalAtrikaTuka
viDaGgasAracitrakaharidrAdvayatrivRddantIndrayavayaSTImadhukavi
SAtiviSArasAJjanapriyaGgUnAM pAlikAbhAgAstadaikadhyaM sneha
pAkavidhinA vipAcyAvatArya paripUya cAnuguptaM nidadhyAt||57||  tata upaskRtaCarIraH prAtaH prAtaH pANiCuktimAtrakSaudreNa
pratisaMsRjyopayuJjIta||57||  jIrNe mudgAmalakayUSeNAlavaNena
sarpiSmatA khadirodakasiddhaM mRdumodanamaCnIyAt||57||  khadi
rodakenodakakAryANItyevamato droNamupayujya vigataku
SThadurnAmetyAdi samAnaM pUrveNa||57||

bhallAtakatailAdInAM droNaM droNamiti pratyekaM droNaH|  paJcAnAJca| triphalAdInAM pAlikA bhAgA ityAdi vyAkhyAsamam|  paripUya parisrAvya|  upaskRtadeCe yathoktena CItasnigdhAdinA kRtasaMskAraH|  pANiCuktirhastapuTaM na tu mAnasaGkhyoktA CuktiH|  udakakAryANi snAnapAnAdIni|  ato rasAyanAd droNamavaCyamupayoktavyam||57||

 puSTAni pAkena paricyutAni bhallAtakAnyADhakasammitAni||58||  ghRSTveSTikAcUrNakaNairjalena prakSAlya saMCoSya ca mArutena||58||  jarjarANi vipacejjalakumbhe pAdaCeSaghRtagAlitaCItam||58||  tadrasaM punarapi Crapayeta kSIrakumbhasahitaM caraNasthe||58||  sarpiH pakvaM tena tulyapramANaM
yuJjyAt svecchaM CarkarAyA rajobhiH||58||  ekIbhUtaM tatkhajakSobhaNena
sthApyaM dhAnye saptarAtraM suguptam||58||  tamamRtarasapAkaM yaH prage prACamaCna
nnanupibati yatheSTaM vAdi dugdhaM rasaM vA||58||  smRtimatibalamedhAsattvasArairupetaH 
kanakanikaSagauraH so~aCnute dIrghamAyuH||58||

puSTAnItyAdinA bhallAtakaghRtaprACo vyAkhyAsamaH|  saMCoSya ca mArutenetyAtapaparihArAya|  teneti kSIreNa tulyaM sarpiH CarkarAyA rajobhiCcUrNena yathecchaM prakRtyanusAreNa|  prACo lehaH| (bhallAtakAnAM dvidhA bhinnAnAM iSTikAcUrNakaNairgharSaNaM kAryamityapare)|| 58||

 droNe~ambhaso vraNakRtAM triCatAdvipakvAt
kvAthADhake palasamaistilatailapAtram||50||  tiktAviSAdvayavarAgirijanmatArkSyaiH 
siddhaM paraM nikhilakuSThaniSUdanAya||50||

droNe~ambhasA ityAdi subodham|  vraNakRto bhallAtakAni|  tilatailayormiCritayoH pAtramADhakamaSTAviMCatyadhikaM palaCatam|  tiktA kaTukarohiNI, viSAdvayaM viSAtiviSA ca|  girijanma CilAjatu, tArkSyaM vaTTamAkSikam|| 58||

 sahAmalakaCuktibhirdadhisareNa tailena vA
guDena payasA ghRtena yavasaktubhirvA saha||59||  tilena saha mAkSikeNa palalena sUpena vA
vapuSkaramaruSkaraM paramamedhyamAyuSkaram||59||

AmalakaCuktyAdibhiH pRthagyutamaruSkaraM bhallAtakaM medhyaM paramamAyuSkaraM ca| AmalakaCuktaya AmalakadalAni|| 59||

 bhallAtakAni tIkSNAni pAkInyagnisamAni ca||60||  bhavantyamRtakalpAni prayuktAni yathAvidhi||60||  kaphajo na sa rogo~asti na vibandho~asti kaCcana||60||  yaM na bhallAtakaM hanyAcchIghramagnibalapradam||60||  vAtAtapavidhAne~api viCeSeNa vivarjayet||60||  kulatthadadhiCuktAni tailAbhyaGgAgnisevanam||60||

bhallAtakAnItyAdayo ye bhallAtakaniSeviNasteSAmapAyarakSA vidheyeti pradarCayate-ekAdaCabhallAtakaprayogANi vAtAtapavidhAne~apyevaGguNAni kimu prakRte kuTIprayoge|  eSAmupayoge viCeSeNa kulatthAdikaM varjayet|  iti bhallAtakakalpaH|| 60||

uttarasthAnam

rasAyanavidhiH

 paJcASTau sapta daCa vA pippalIrmadhusarpiSA||61||  rasAyanaguNAnveSI samAmekAM prayojayet||61||

atha pippalyaH-yo naro rasAyanaguNAna dIrghAyusmRtimedhAdIn anviSyati sa saMvatsaramekaM paJca paJca vA aSTAvaSTau vA sapta sapta vA daCa daCa vA pippalIrmAkSikasarpiSA yuktAH prayojayedityekaH pippalInAM prayogaH|  (idamatra cintyate-paJcASTau saptadaCa vA iti kiM kramabhedataH saprayojanaM Ahosvit ClokabandhAnurodhata iti|  asti cet prayojanaM tadvAcyam, ucyate|  yadyevamapyatra paJca saptASTau daCa veti niyata eva kramaH syAttathApi kramaM tu bhindannetat jJApayati tricaturA apyupayoktavyAH|  SaD vA nava vA daCakAt paraM nApyupayojyA doSAdInapekSyollekhyA~apyabhihitamutkarSApakarSau vidheyau doSAnumAnAyattatvAt kriyAyAH|  na hayamAnajJo bhiSak doSA dInAM vyAdhipratikriyAyAM kaM vidadhyAditi|  ityekaH prayogaH|  iti jejjaTaH)|| 61||

 tisrastisrastu pUrvAhne bhuktvA~agre bhojanasya ca||62||  pippalyaH kiMCukakSArabhAvitA ghRtabharjitAH||62||  prayojyA madhusammiCrA rasAyanaguNaiSiNA||62||

dvitIyastu rasAyanaguNaiSiNA puruSeNa palACakSArodakabhAvitAH pippalyaH tisraH pUrvAhNe tisro bhojanArambhe tisraCca bhojanAnte madhunA saha prayojyA iti dvitIyaH prayogaH|  (tisrastisrastu pUrvAhNa ityatra na hyekasya prayokturayaM kramaH kiM tarhi prayoktRn bhinnAnapekSya doSAdivaCAtkenacitpUrvAhNe kenacidbhuktvA kenacidbhojanasyAgra iti|  atra kaphaprakRtinA pUrvAhNe utkRSTadoSAdiSu vyAdhiSu madhyeSvagre bhojanasya|  alpeSu bhaktveti jejjaTaH)|| 62||

 kramavRCyA daCAhAni daCapaippalikaM dinam||63||  varddhayet payasA sArddha tathaivApanayet punaH||63||  jIrNauSadhaCca bhuJjIta SaSTikaM kSIrasarpiSA||63||  pippalInAM sahasrasya prayogo~ayaM rasAyanam||63||  piSTAstA balibhiH peyAH CRtA madhyabalairnaraiH||63||  CItIkRtA hrasvabalairyojyA doSAmayAn prati||63||

tRtIyastu prathame~ahni daCa pippalyo yathocitena kSIreNaM saha|  dvitIye~ahni viMCatirdviguNaJca kSIram|  tRtIye triMCat triguNaM kSIramevaM kSIreNa saha daCAbhivRddhyA daCame~ahni CataM pippalInAM daCaguNaM ca kSIrametAvatA sArddhAni paJcaCatAni pippalInAmupayuktaM bhavanti|  tatraikAdaCe navatirnavaguNaM kSIramiti|  punardaCApakarSakrameNaikonaviMCahobhiH sahasraM pUryate|  yadA ca pippalyaH prayujyante tadA piSTAH tA ityAdi krameNa prayojyAH|  vyAkhyAsamam|  iti tRtIyaH prayogaH|  (varddhayetpayasA sArddhamityasyAyamabhiprAyaH|  yAvatA kSIreNa CatamAloDyate tAvatA yAvatA ca daCa tAvatA kSIreNeti kSIrasyApi vRddhihAniM varddhayet payasA sArddhamityata evAha|  CItIkRtAhInabalaiH CItakaSAyakalpanayetyarthaH|  iti jejjaTaH)|| 63||

 tadvacca chAgadugdhena dve sahasre prayojayet||64||

tadvaditi|  chAgasya dugdhena kSIreNa daCAbhivRddhayapakarSAbhyAm|  tenAtra paJcadaCabhirahobhiH sapaJcACatsahasraM bhavati|  punaCcaturdaCabhirevaM kSIreNa saha daCApakarSakrameNa dvitIyaM sahasraM bhavati|  iti caturthaH prayogaH|| 64||

 ebhiH prayogaiH pippalyaH kAsaCvAsagalagrahAn||65||  yakSmamehagrahaNyarCaH pANDutvaviSamajvarAn||65||  ghnanti CophaM vamiM hidhmAM plIhAnaM vAtaCoNitam||65||

ebhiriti caturbhiH prayogaiH pippalyaH kAsAdIn ghnanti|  iti pippalIkalpaH|| 65||

 viDaGgacUrNaM yaSTImadhukacUrNayuktaM CItatoyena samAMCamupa
yuJjIta||66||  jIrNaM mudgayUSeNAlavaNena saghRtamodanamaCnIyAt||66||  tena viCeSAdvigatakRmidurnAmakuSThapramehamedodoSo varSaCata
majara ityAdi samAnaM pUrveNa||66||  viDaGgacurNaM kSaudrabhallA
takakvAthAbhyAM madhvAmalakarasAbhyAM guDUcIkvAthena ca||66||  etAMCcaturo yogAn mAsamupayuJjIteti samAnaM pUrveNa||66||  sarveSu
ca mAsi mAsi varSaCatamAyuSo~abhivRddhiH||66||

ito viDaGgAni|  viDaGgAnAM madhuyaSTiCItatoyAbhyAmeko yogaH|  dvitIyaH kSaudrabhallAtakakvAthAbhyAm|  tRtIyo mAkSikAmalakarasAbhyAm|  caturtho guDUcIkvAthena|  eSAmanyatamaH prayogo yatsaGkhyAn mAsAnupayujyate tatsaGkhyAni varSaCatAnyAyurabhivarddhayati|  iti viDaGgakalpaH|| 66||

 alambasAM svena rasena bhAvitAM
pRthagghRtakSIramadhUSNavAribhiH||67||  pibettathA kAJjikatakramastubhi
rbhagandarorugrahagulmakAsavAn||67||  uSNA vipAke kaTukA kaSAyamadhurA rase||67||  atyantadIpanI medhyA vAtaCleSmaharA ca sA||67||  varSopayogAt kurute naraM varSaCatAyuSam||67||  dRDhendriyAnalabalaM nirvalIpalitAmayam||67||

alambusAyAH svarasabhAvitAyA ghRtAdibhiH sapta prayogAH| sA cAlambusoSNAdiguNA|  varSamupayuktA varSaCatAyuSaM naraM kurute|  dRDhendriyaM dRDhAnalaM valyAditrayarahitaJca|  ityalambusAkalpaH||67||

 CvetAvalgujaphalAnyAtapaCuSkANi cUrNayitvA tattulyaguDena
saGkSudya ghRtakumbhe dhAnyarACau saptarAtraM nidadhyAt||68||  tato~a
nudite bhAsvati yathAbalaM mAtrAM sukhodakAnupAnAmupayoja
yet||68||  jIrNe sukhAmbupariSiktAH CAliSaSTikaudanaM saCa
rkareNa payasA~aCnIyAt||68||  tasya mAsaprayogAdviCeSeNa viga
takuSTho grahaNadhAraNavAn varSaCatamajara ityAdi samAnaM

CvetAvalgujaphalAnItyAdi subodham|  saGhkSudyeti guDenAloDya|  anudite bhAsvatItyatiprabhAte|  vAkucikA somarAjyavalguja iti paryAyAH|| 68||

 vAkucikA karSacUrNaM sukhAmbunA pibet||69||  pItvA cAtape
nirvAtoSNe vA garbhagRhe tiSThedaparAhNe tadvadeva snAnamaCanaM
ca||69||  yUSarasAbhyAM vA||69||  tasya trisaptarAtraprayogAdvigatakuSTha
ityAdi samAnaM pUrveNa||69||  tvagromakeCadaCanAn nakhAMCca muktvA punarnavAn labhate||69||  svaravarNabalotsAhaM navaM vayo naSTapalitaM ca||69||

vAkucIcUrNaM prAtaH pItvA snAnaM tathaiva snAnamaCanaM ca|  yUSarasAbhyAM vACanamupayuJjIta|  evaM trisaptarAtramasyAH prayogaH|  anena ca pUrvasthitAn tvagAdIMstyaktvA navAn labhate svarAdikaJca naSTapalitaM navaM vayaCca labhate|| 69||

 palAni daCa bAkucyA daCaiva ca phalatrayAt||70||  sapta krimighnAdayasastrINi dve girisambhavAt||70||  purupuSkaramUlAbhyAmAhareta palaM palam||70||  sUkSmailArddhapalaM vyoSaghanakesarakuGkumam||70||  lodhratvakpatrayaSTyAhvacitrakaM kArSikaM pRthak||70||  CataM bhallAtakAnAM ca sarvaM khaNDasamAMCakam||70||  cUrNayedatha tanmAtrAM bhakSayet pAlikIM parAm||70||  yatheSTaceSTo labhate varSAdrAsAyanAn guNAn||70||  sarvarogAn vijayate tvagvikArAn viCeSataH||70||  arCobhagandaraCvAsakAsapANDvAmayakrimIn||70||  gulmaplIhACmarIvardhmapramehArucipInasAn||70||  mandAnalatvaM kRCatAM CophagranthyarbudAnapi||70||

palAnItyAdinA khaNDasamaH subodhaH|  asya mAtrA pAlikI parA utkRSTA|  palAdUrdhvaM naivopayojyA|  athavA tridoSAdyapekSam|  yatheSTaceSTo niryantraNaH| rasAyanaguNAH dIrghAyusmRtyAdaya ihaivoktAH|  granthyarbudAntAn vijayata iti sambandhaH|| 70||

uttarasthAnam

rasAyanavidhiH

 vAkucikAphalAni gomUtre saptarAtraM vAsayet||71||  tato nistu
SIkRtya chAyAyAM viCoSayitvA susUkSmaM ca saJcUrNya tryahaM
tryahaM kramaCo bhAvayet triphalAkvAthena kAravallIvAsA
guDUcIbhRGgarAjasvarasaiH pRthak pRthak khadirAsanarAjavRkSa
picumandakvAthaiH||71||  tasya pItaH pratidinaM dhAtrIphalarasAplutaH||71||  karSaH sarvAmayAn hanti tvagvikArAnviCeSataH||71||

vAkucyA gomUtrAdhyuSitAyACcUrNaM tryahaM triphalAkvAthena bhAvayet|  tataH kAravellAdInAM paJcAnAM svarasaiH krameNa tryahaM tryaham|  tataH khadirAdInAM caturNAM pRthakkvAthaistryaham|  tasyaivaM bhAvitasya vAkucIcUrNasya karSo dhAtrIrasenAplutaH san pItaH sarvAmayAn hanti viCeSatastvagvikArAn|| 71||

 asanakhadirayUSairbhAvitAM somarAjIM
madhughRtaCikhipathyAlohacUrNairupetAm||72||  CaradamavalihAnaH pAriNAmAn vikArAM
styajati mitahitACI tadvadAhArajAtAn||72||

asanetyAdi|  yUSaCabdo niryUhavAcako~asanakhadirAbhyAM sambadhyate|  tairbhAvitAmanantaraJca madhvAdirupetAM somarajIM CaradaM saMvatsaraM lihAnaH pariNAme vArddhake bhavAn vikArAMstyajati  tathaiva cAhArajAtAn|  tena pariNAmAnAhArajAtAnabhayAnapi tyajatItyarthaH|  CikhIcitrakaH|| 72||

 tIvreNa kuSThena parItamUrti
ryaH somarAjIM niyamena khAdet||73||  saMvatsaraM kRSNatiladvitIyAM
sa somarAjIM vapuSA~atiCete||73||

tIvreNetyAdinA kRSNatilaiH saha somarAjyAH prayogaH subodhaH|  ya evaM somarAjIM khAdetsa somarAjIM vapuSA kAntyA~atiCete|| 73||

 ye somarAjyA vituSIkRtAyA
CcUrNairupetAt payasaH sujAtAt||74||  uddhRtya sAraM madhunA lihanti 
takraM tadevAnu pibanti cAnte||74||  te kuSThinaH pakSmadaridranetrA
viCIrNakarNAGgalinAsikA vA||74||  vihAya vairUpyamapAsya rUpaM
punaH prarUDhA iva bhAnti vRkSAH||74||

ye somarAjyA ityAdinA somarAjIcUrNayuktasujAtakSIrodbhavasya navanItasya tattakrAnupAnasya prayogaH subodhaH|| 74||

 khadirAmbhasA pibedvA ravisevI tAM tayA yavAgUM vA||75||  gAyatrIjalasiddhAM kuSThI tattoyakAryakaraH||75||

athavA tAM somarAjIM khadirodakena kuSThI pibet|  ravisevI sUryatApasevI|  athavA gAyatrIjalasiddhAM khadirakvAthasiddhAM yavAgUM tayeti somarAjya saha pibet kuSThI tattoyakAryakaraH khadirodakakriyaH san|| 75||

 gajaliNDakSArayutA tatkSArapAyino vilepi bhujaH||76||  CvitrANi somarAjI prasahya hanyAta pralepAcca||76||

gajapurISakSAreNa yutA somarAjI tatkSArapAyino hastipurISakSArodakapAnaCIlasya puMso vilepikAbhujaCca CvitrANI prasahyAkramya hanyAt|  na kevalamevaM mukhena prayogAdyAvatpralepAcca|| 76||

 gomUtre saptarAtraM CaCiCakalaphalaM vAsitaM loDayitvA
kuryAcchAyAviCuSkaM pRthagiti ca phalaM prapunnATaJca CuSkam||77||  aMCastAbhyAM tathAMCaH krimiripudahanasphoTakRdbhayaH sacUrNau gomUtreNopayuktaH pramitahitabhujaH CvitramACveva hanti||77||

CaCiCakalasya somarAjyAH phalaM saptarAtraM gomUtre bhAvitaM loDayitvA niSkulIkRtya chAyACuSkaM kuryAt|  anenaiva ca  vidhAnena gomUtre saptarAtraM vAsitaM prapunnATaphalaM kuryAdetadubhayaM samamekoM~aCa eSa cUrNo gomUtreNopayukto yaH pramitaM hitaM ca bhuGkte tasyACveva CvitraM hanti|  prapunnATa eDagajaH|  kRmiripurviDaGgam|  dahanaCcitrakaH|  sphoTaheturbhallAtakaH|| 77||

 ikSuragokSurasiMhI vyAghrIpaJcAGgulAmbunA pItA||78||  upalamaghanaM ghanaM vA rasACinAM hanti bAkucikA||78||

ikSurAdyambunA somarAjI pItA upalamaCmaryAkhyaM ghanaM kaThinamaghanaM vA CarkarArUpaM mAMsarasACino hanti|  ikSuraH kANDekSurakaH|  siMhI bRhatI|  vyAghrI kaNTakArikA|| 78||

 uSNodakena piSTA pItA ca ghRtAnvitA jayedgulmam||79||  laghupaJcamUlasiddhAM peyAmupayojayejjIrNe||79||

uSNodakena piSTA vAkucI ghRtAnvitA satI pItA gulmaJjayet|  asmiMCca prayoge jIrNe laghupaJcamUlasiddhAM peyAmupayojayet|| 79||

 kaTvaGgakuTajayUSairarCAsi bhagandaraJca nACayati||80||  mehAn madyairnigadairniSevitA bAkucI prabalAn||80||

arCobhagandarayoH kaTvaGgakuTajakaSAyaiH sevitA vAkucI tau nACayati|  kaTvaGgaH syonAkaH|  kuTajo vRkSakaH|  madyairnigadairnirdoSairniSevitA vAkucI prabalAn mehAn jayet|| 80||

uttarasthAnam

rasAyanavidhiH

 viSkirarasena pItA daCamUlarasena vA guDUcyA vA||81||  apatantrakaM nihanyAdAyAmaM vA rasAnnabhujaH||81||

viSkirarasAdInAM trayANAmanyatamena pItA vAkucIrasAnnabhujaH puMso~apatantrakamAyAmaJca nihanyAt|| 81||

 jaThareSu pibenmUtrairjalodare traivRtena yUSeNa||82||  Cophe pANDuvyAdhAvavalgujaM sIdhvariSTAbhyAm||82||

 ikSukAdikvAthairvardhmani mUtreNa vA gavAM CastaH||83||  dhAroSNena tu payasA yuktaH Cophajvarau hanti||83||  uSNAmbunA prayojyo lUtAkITAkhusarpadaSTeSu||83||  kRmiharacaturaGgulayoH kvAthaH koSNaiH krimiNakoSTheSu||83||

anantaroktairikSurakAdikvAthaiH gomUtreNa vA~avalgujo vardhmani CastaH|  vyAkhyAsamam|  kRmiNa iti matvarthIyo naH|| 83||

 lekhAmindo saghRtAM sukhAmbunA putriNI bhavati pItvA||84||  puSpodaye~aCvagandhA CRtena payasA ca bhuJjAnA||84||

indorlekhAM somarAjIM puSpodaye RtukAle sukhAmbunA pItvA yoSit sAmarthyAt pUrvamaputrA putriNI bhavatyaCvagandhACRtakSIreNa bhojanaM kurvANA|| 84||

 vandhyApi saptAhamimaM prayogaM

 snigdhairuSNairmadhurairharati gadAn vAtajAn yutA paittAn||86||  tiktakamadhurakaSAyaiH kaphajAstriphalArasamadhubhyAJca||86||

snigdhAdibhiryutA  somarAjI vAtajAn gadAn harati|  tiktakAdibhiryutA paittAn gadAn triphalArasamadhubhyAM yuktAn kaphajAn gadAn|| 86||

 iti CamanI dhanyeyaM viSagarabhUtopasargapApmaghnI||87||  gehe sthitApi rekhA cAndramasI kimuta koSThasthA||87||  manuSyamapyAgatamRtyuCAsanaM
praNaSTabuddhIndriyamalpacetasam||87||  avalgujo mokSayate mahAbhayA
cchriyaJca medhAJca dadAti puSkalAm||87||

candramasI rekhA somarAjI gehe bhavane sthitApi iti CamanItyAdiguNA kimucyate koSThasthA na syAdityupasRSTiH|

	manuSyamapi CabdAdyoSitamapyAgatamRtyuCAsanatvAdiguNaM mahAbhayAdavalgujo mokSayate|  subodham|  iti somarAjIkalpaH|| 87||

 haimavatyA vacAyAH piNDamAmalakamAtraM payasA~a~aloDya
pibejjIrNe payassarpirodana ityAhAraH||88||  evaM saptarAtreNa
medhAvI bhavati||88||  saptabhiH saptarAtraiH Crutadharo varSaCatamajara
ityAdi samAnaM purveNa||88||

ito vacA haimavatyA ityAdi|  haimavatIti CvetavacAyA nAma|  CeSaM vyAkhyAsamama|| 88||

 itarasyA api vacAyA dvipalakvAthaM pibet||89||  jIrNe payaH
sarpirityAdi samAnaM pUrveNa||89||  taccUrNaM vA kSaudrasarpirbhyAM

 vacA kalkaCatapAkaM ghRtadroNamupayujya viCeSAt grahonmA
dApasmAragalagaNDamAlAClIpadasvarabhedavimuktaH sarvArtheSu
siddhimAn varSaCatAyurbhavati||90||

ghRtadroNapAke kalkaparibhASayA vacA yojyA yAvacchataM pAkAnAm|  iti vacAkalpaH|| 90||

uttarasthAnam

rasAyanavidhiH

 CItavAtahimadagdhatanUnAM
stabdhabhagnakuTilavyathitAsthnAm||91||  bheSajasya pavanopahatAnAM
vakSyate vidhirato laCunasya||91||

ito laCunam|  CItetyAdi|  ato~anantaraM CItAdidagdhatanUnAM stabdhAsthyAdInAJca puMsAM bheSajasya laCunasya vidhirvakSyate|| 91||

 rAhoramRtacauryeNa lUnAdye patitA galAt||92||  amRtasya kaNA bhUmau te rasonatvamAgatAH||92||  dvijA nACnanti tamato daityadehasamudbhavam||92||  sAkSAdamRtasambhUtergrAmaNIH sa rasAyanam||92||

rAhorgalAdamRtacauryeNa hetunA lUnAt bhagavatA viSNunA chinnAt amRtasya kaNA ye bhUmau patitAste rasonatvaM prAptAH|  ata eva hetostaM laCunaM daityadehasamudbhavaM dvijA nACnanti|  sa ca laCunaH sAkSAdamRtasambandhAddhetargrAmaNIH CreSThaH rasAyanam|| 92||

 CIlayellaCunaM CIte vasante ca kapholbaNaH||93||  ghanodaye~api vAtArttaH sadA vA grISmalIlayA||93||  raktapittabhavA rogA jAyante raktapittinaH||93||

vyAkhyAsamam|  grISmalIlA RtucaryoktaH CItopacAraH|| 93||

 mAsaH paro~asya rasakalkaniSevaNAya
svacchandamapyupadiCanti vimardakaistu||94||  SaNmAsamanyavidhinA na tu CastamAhuH 
pakSaprayogamapi hInataraM rasone||94||

asya laCunasya rasasya vA kalkasya vA niSevaNAya para utkarSo mAsa iti vadanti|  mAsAdUrdhvaM raso vA kalko vA na yojya ityarthaH|  apare tu doSAdyapekSaM svacchandaM yathecchaM vimardakaiH  saha SaNmAsamapyupadiCanti|  ato~anyena vidhAnena naiva laCunaM CastamityAhurAcAryAH|  rasone pakSaprayogaM hInataramAhuH|  pakSa eva hInataraH prayogaH|  pakSAdavarastvakiJcitkaraH|| 94||

 snigdhaCuddhatanuH CItamadhuropaskRtACayaH||95||  taduttaMsAvataMsAbhyAM carcitAnucarAjiraH||95||  tasya kandAnvasantAnte himavacchakadeCajAn||95||  apanItatvaco rAtrau nimayenmadirAbhiH||95||  tatkalkasvarasaM prAtaH CucitAntavapIDitam||95||  madirAyAH surUDhAyAstribhAgena samanvitam||95||  madyasyAnyasya takrasya mastunaH kAJjikasya vA||95||  tatkAla eva vA yukta yuktayAlocya mAtrayA||95||  tailasarpirvasAmajjakSIramAMsarasaiH pRthak||95||  kvAthena vA yathAvyAdhi rasaM kevalameva vA||95||  pibed gaNDUSamAtraM prAkkaNThanADIviCuddhaye||95||  pratataM svedanaM cAnu vedanAyAM praCasyate||95||  CItAmbusekaH sahasA vamimUrcchAyayormukhe||95||  CeSaM pibet klamApAye sthiratAM gata ojasi||95||  vidAhaparihArAya paraM CItAnulepanaH||95||  dhArayetsAmbukaNikA muktAkarpUramAlikAH||95||  sahimasalilagarbhACcandraCubhrAmRNAlIH 
kuvalayadalamAlAhArayaSTICca lolAH
stanataTaviniviSTACcArugAtryo dadhAnA

pragaladvArilavairjalArdrayA ca||95||  dayitAkarapallavaiCca CItai
rlaCunasvedakRtaM klamaM hareyuH||95||

snigdha ityAdi snigdhAdiguNaH sannidamidaM kuryAt|  CItAdibhirupaskRtACayaH saMskRtakoSThaH|  tasya laCunasyottaMsaiH CekharairavataMsaiH karNapUraiCcarcitAH kalpitA maNDitA anucarA ajiraJca yasya prayoktuH sa tathoktaH|  tasya laCunasya himavad deCajAn CakradeCajAMCca vasantagRhItAn kandAnapanItatvacaH kRtvA madirAdibhistimayedabhiSuNuyAt|  subodham|  surUDhA sujAtA|  anyasyeti madirACiSTasya|  tribhageneti sambadhyate|  tatkAla eva vA yuktaM na tu rAtrau timitam|  yuktayA mAtrayA Alocya tailAdibhiH pRthagyuktam|  kevalameva vA rasaM svarasam|  gaNDUSamAtraM sUtroktalakSaNam|  CeSamiti pRthaksthApitAn|  vidAharakSArthaM ca CItA~anulepanaH san muktAkarpUtamAlikAH sAmbukaNikA ambukaNikAbhiyuktA dhArayet|  

	enaM ca laCunopayoginaM cArugAtryo manoharAGgalatikA striyo gADhaM niviDaM pariSvajeran|  kimbhUtA ityAha-mRNAlIrdadhAnAH|  kimbhUtA mRNAlIH ?  sahimaM tuSArayuktaM yat salilaM tat garbhe yAsAM tAstathoktAH|  anyacca candravat CubhrAH CaCidhavalAH evambhUtA mRNAlIrdadhatyaH kuvalayamAlACca dadhatyaH lolACcaJcalA hArayaSTIrmuktAlatAstanataTaniviSTA dadhatyaH|

	dayitAH kAntA nalinIdalavAtAdinA laCunasvedakRtaM klamaM hareyuH|  jalArdrA sajalapaTaH|| 96||

 snigdhaCuddhatanuH CItamadhuropaskRtACayaH||95||  taduttaMsAvataMsAbhyAM carcitAnucarAjiraH||95||  tasya kandAnvasantAnte himavacchakadeCajAn||95||  apanItatvaco rAtrau nimayenmadirAbhiH||95||  tatkalkasvarasaM prAtaH CucitAntavapIDitam||95||  madirAyAH surUDhAyAstribhAgena samanvitam||95||  madyasyAnyasya takrasya mastunaH kAJjikasya vA||95||  tatkAla eva vA yukta yuktayAlocya mAtrayA||95||  tailasarpirvasAmajjakSIramAMsarasaiH pRthak||95||  kvAthena vA yathAvyAdhi rasaM kevalameva vA||95||  pibed gaNDUSamAtraM prAkkaNThanADIviCuddhaye||95||  pratataM svedanaM cAnu vedanAyAM praCasyate||95||  CItAmbusekaH sahasA vamimUrcchAyayormukhe||95||  CeSaM pibet klamApAye sthiratAM gata ojasi||95||  vidAhaparihArAya paraM CItAnulepanaH||95||  dhArayetsAmbukaNikA muktAkarpUramAlikAH||95||  sahimasalilagarbhACcandraCubhrAmRNAlIH 
kuvalayadalamAlAhArayaSTICca lolAH

snigdha ityAdi snigdhAdiguNaH sannidamidaM kuryAt|  CItAdibhirupaskRtACayaH saMskRtakoSThaH|  tasya laCunasyottaMsaiH CekharairavataMsaiH karNapUraiCcarcitAH kalpitA maNDitA anucarA ajiraJca yasya prayoktuH sa tathoktaH|  tasya laCunasya himavad deCajAn CakradeCajAMCca vasantagRhItAn kandAnapanItatvacaH kRtvA madirAdibhistimayedabhiSuNuyAt|  subodham|  surUDhA sujAtA|  anyasyeti madirACiSTasya|  tribhageneti sambadhyate|  tatkAla eva vA yuktaM na tu rAtrau timitam|  yuktayA mAtrayA Alocya tailAdibhiH pRthagyuktam|  kevalameva vA rasaM svarasam|  gaNDUSamAtraM sUtroktalakSaNam|  CeSamiti pRthaksthApitAn|  vidAharakSArthaM ca CItA~anulepanaH san muktAkarpUtamAlikAH sAmbukaNikA ambukaNikAbhiyuktA dhArayet|  

	enaM ca laCunopayoginaM cArugAtryo manoharAGgalatikA striyo gADhaM niviDaM pariSvajeran|  kimbhUtA ityAha-mRNAlIrdadhAnAH|  kimbhUtA mRNAlIH ?  sahimaM tuSArayuktaM yat salilaM tat garbhe yAsAM tAstathoktAH|  anyacca candravat CubhrAH CaCidhavalAH evambhUtA mRNAlIrdadhatyaH kuvalayamAlACca dadhatyaH lolACcaJcalA hArayaSTIrmuktAlatAstanataTaniviSTA dadhatyaH|

	dayitAH kAntA nalinIdalavAtAdinA laCunasvedakRtaM klamaM hareyuH|  jalArdrA sajalapaTaH|| 96||

 raso~agnikalpo mRdunaujasA hi
saMyujyamAnaH sahasaiva tasya||98||  dAhAtisArAraticittanACAn
kuryAdatastaM tvarito na yuJjyAt||98||

atastaM rasaM tvarito na yuJjyAdyatastasya laCunasya raso~agnikalpastIkSNaH mRdunA caujasA sahasaiva yujyamAnastadguNAnupamardayan dAhAdIn kuryAt|| 98||

 jIrNaCAlyodanaM jIrNe CaGkhakundendupANDuram||99||  bhuJjIta yUSaiH payasA rasairvA dhanvacAriNAm||99||  dIptAgnirmaNDakAn khAdet sarpirmaNDopasecanAn||99||  akhaNDamaNDalendvAbhAniNDarIkhaNDamaNDitAn||99||  rAjikACuktasamparkavinivartitagauravaiH||99||  piSTakAcUrNadhavalairvadhraiH saukarakairyutAn||99||

tasmiMCca jIrNe purANaCAlyodanaM CaGkhAdivacchUklaM yUSAdInAmanyatamena bhuJjIta|  dhanvacAriNo jAGgalAH|

	yaCca dIptAgniH sarpirmaNDopasecanAdiguNAn maNDakAn khAdet  upasecanaM CuSkatvanACanam|  akhaNDamaNDalaH paripUrNo yo~asAvindustadAbhAMstatsadRCAn iNDarINAM khaNDaiCCakalairmaNDitAn bhUSitAn tathA saukarakairvardhrairyutAn|  kimbhUtairvadhrairityAha-kaNDanIkRtena piSTakAcUrNena dhavalaiH rAjikAdisamparkeNa vinivarttitagauravaiCca|| 99||

 madyamekaM pibettattu tRTprabandhe jalAnvitam||100||  gandhamattakvaNadalipriyAvaktrendubodhitam||100||  amadyapo yastu phalAmabutakra
mavantisomaM ca sugandhi CItam||100||  sauvIrakaM jAGgalajaM rasaM vA 
tuSodakaM vA parisikthikAM vA||100||

atra caikameva madyaM pibennAnekam|  tattu madyaM tRTprabandhe sati jalAnvitaM pibet|  kimbhUtaM madyamityAha-gandhena saurabheNamattA, raNanto layo yasmiMstattathoktam, priyAvaktrendunA ca pratibimbitena bodhitaM paripUritaCakti|

	yastvamadyapaH sa evaGguNameva phalAmbvAdikaM pibet|  parisikthikA tanu peyA|| 100||

 tatkalkaM vA samaghRtaM ghRtapAtre khajAhatam||101||  sthitaM daCAhAdaCnIyAttadvadvA vasayA samam||101||

uttarasthAnam

vAjIkaraNavidhiH

 athAto vAjIkaraNavidhiM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

ubhayalokahitatvAdekAntasvasthopayogitvAnmaGgalatvAcca tantre vAjIkaraNAkhyasyASTamasyAGgasya nirdeCaH|  tatprayogadarCanArthamadhyAya
Arabhyate|  vAjIkaraNamityAdinA bhaGgyA prayojanamucyate|| 1||

 vAjIkaraNamanvicchetsatataM viSayI pumAn||2||  tuSTiH puSTirapatyaM ca guNavattatra saMCritam||2||  apatyasantAnakaraM yatsadyaH sampraharSaNam||2||

yaH pumAn viSayI viSayeCu CabdAdiSu dehacittopayogiSu heteSu saktaH sa vAjIkaraNalakSaNamupAyamanvicchet|  tatra hi vAjIkaraNe puSTyAdikaM saMCritam|  (vAjIkaraNamityAdi| vAjIvACvasadharmA yena kriyate taM anvicchet kuto~anurasAyanAt|  tasya hi samupa-citadhAtoH pradhAnadhAtuparikSayo mA bhUditi|  puruSagrahaNaM bAlA-tyantavRddhanirAsArthaM na punaH strISaNDavyudAsArthaM teSAM vAjIkara-NAprApteH|  satatagrahaNaM sadA sevanaM jJApayati|    yathA rasAyanaM prayuktaM sarvadhAtUnAM puSTimAdadhAti naivaM vAjIkaraNaM taddhi satatamupayujyamAnamAhAravacchukradhAtuvRddhimAdadhAtIti|   pravarttakaJca dharmaM svargaprAptilakSaNamACrityaitaducyate|  yannivRttikRte hi sa upadeCaH|  koCakAro yathA hyaMCUnupAdatte vadhapradAn|    tathA~agnikalpAnarthAn jJo jJAtvA tebhyo nivarttata iti|  naiHCreyasikaM dharmamACritya brahmacaryopadeCaH|  ayaJcAbhyudayikamiti na parasparavirodhACaGketi jejjaTaH)|| 2||

 vAjIvAtibalo yena yAtyapratihato~aGganAH||3||  bhavatyatipriyaH strINAM yena yenopacIyate||3||  tadvAjIkaraNaM taddhi dehasyaujaskaraM param||3||

vAjIkaraNaM kimucyata ityAha-yena hetubhUtena puruSo vAjIvACva ivApratihato~aGganA yAti|  yena ca strINAmatipriyo bhavati yena ca dhAturupayacaM prApnoti, tadvastu vAjIkaraNamityucyate|  taddhi paraM dehasyaujaskaram|| 3||

 sAro hi jIvalokasya strI strIguNasamanvitA||4||  striyaH sAdhvyaH prasuvate narAn guNamayAniva||4||  gotravRddhikarA hyetA gRhiNyo gRhadevatAH||4||  gRhaM hi hInametAbhirna CrImadapi Cobhate||4||

sAro hItyAdinA striyAH priyatvaM prayojanavatItyucyate tasmAdapriye bharttari kulajA~api strI kadAcchIlaM kalaGkayati|  jIva lokasyaiSa sAro yat strI strIguNasamanvitA bhavatIta|  sAdhvyaH striyo guNairiva kRtAn narAn prasuvate|  etA iti sAdhvyaH striyaH|  gRhiNyo bhAryAH|| 4||

 na tu tA api Cobhante jarasA~anugatA iva||5||  puMyogena vinA strINAM sa hi saMvananaM param||5||

tA api striyaH puMyogena vinA tu tathA na Cobhante yathA jarasA~anugatAH|  sa hi puMyogaH strINAM paraM saMvananaM vaCIkaraNam ( puruSarahitAH striyaH svatantratvAnna ityarthaH)|| 5||

 vAjIkaraNanityasya kAmaM kAmaM siSeviSoH||6||  na CarIramavApnoti na vA ratiratiH kSayam||6||  acchAyaH pUtikusumaH phalena rahito drumaH||6||  yathaikaCcaikaCAkhaCca nirapatyastathA naraH||6||  adRSTaputrapautrasya kulatantvantavarttinaH||6||  saMsArasukhabAhyasya kIdRCaM nAma jIvitam||6||  asambandho hyaputrasya nityameva paraH paraH||6||  sIdatyasyAvasAne ca gRhaM susthe~apyanAyakam||6||  ato vAjIkarA yogAH niSevyAH CukravarddhanAH||6||  kalyasyodagravayaso vAjIkaraNasevinaH||6||  sarveSvRtuSvaharaharvyavAyo na nivAryate||6||

yaH puruSo vAjIkaraNanityastasya kAmamicchayA kAmaM strIsaGgamaM siSeviSorapi CarIraM kSayaM na prApnoti|  ratiratiCca kSayaM na nAvApnoti|  

	drumo yathA acchAyatvAdiyuktaH parihAryo nirupakAraCca bhavati tathaiva nirapatyo naraH|  

	athavA yena putrapautramadRSTaM vaH kulatantorante varttate ata eva ca samsArasukhAd bahirbhUtasyedRCasya kIdRCaM nAma jIvitam|  tajjIvitameva na bhavatItyarthaH|  

	aputrasya hi paro~anyo viCiSTena sambandhena rahito nityameva paraH na tadvittasyACrayo~asAdhAraNasambandhAbhAvAdityarthaH|    asya cAputrasyAvasAne vayo~ante susthe~api|  dhanAdisadbhAve~apyanAyakaM gRhamavasIdati|  yata evamataH Cukrasya varddhanA vAjIkarA yogA niSevyAH|  

	kalyasya nIrogasya pratyagravayaso vAjIkaraNasevinaCca puMsaH sarveSu RtuSu SaTsvapi aharahardine dine vyavAyo maithunaM na nivAryate na niSidhyate|| 6||

 cintAjarAbhyAM CukraM tu vyAdhibhiH karmakarCanAt||7||  kSayaM gacchatyanaCanAt strINAM cAtiniSevaNAt||7||  CukrakSayAt bhayAcchokAdavisrambhAdasevanAt||7||  atiharSAdatisthaulyAnmalopacayataH CramAt||7||  strINAmakauCalAddoSadarCanAdabhicArataH||7||  meDhrAmayAtsumahataH krodhato~ardharmakIrtanAt||7||  tRptasyApi striyo gantuM na CaktirupajAyate||7||

cintAdibhiH CukraM kSayaM yAti saJcitamapyapacIyate|  karmakarCanAdvamanAdikarmakRtena karCanena|  CukrakSayAddhAtustrotasthitasya Cukrasya kSayAt CukrACayasthitaM CukramupakSIyate|  asevA strINAm|  strINAmakauCalaM rahasyavyutpattiH|  doSapradarCanaM strINAmeva|  akSINe~api Cukre tRptasyApi puMsaH striYo gantuM CaktinnopajAyate|| 7||

 na hi jAtabalAH sarve narACcApatyabhAginaH||8||  bRhaccharIrA balinaH kecinnArISu durbalAH||8||  santi cAlpACrayAH strISu balavanto bahuprajAH||8||  narACcaTakavatkecid vrajanti bahuCaH striyaH||8||  gajavacca prasiJcanti kecinna bahugAminaH||8||  kecitprayatnairvAhyante vRSAH kecitsvabhAvataH||8||

na hItyAdinA strIgamanaCakteraniyamaM darCayati|  subodham|  prayatnena ratirvAjIkaraNAdibhiH|  (sabalA evApatyabhAgino jAtabalA api nApatyabhAginaH, ajAtabalA apyapatyabhAgina iti pratipAdayan sarvAn balaviCeSAnAha-nahi jAtabalA ityAdi|  bRhaccharIrA ye medasvinaste~apyalpavyavAyAH|  alpACrayA api ye CukrasArA balavanto bahuprajAH|  kecitprayatnairvAhyante aupaniSadAdikoktaiH|  vRSAH kecit svabhAvataH prakRtyaivetyarthaH iti jejjaTaH)|| 8||

 tasmAtpayogAn vakSyAmi durbalAnAM balapradAn||9||  sukhopabhogAn balinAM bhUyaCca balavarddhanAn||9||

tasmAdye durbalAsteSAM balapradAdiguNAn prayogAn vakSyAmi|  balinAM ca bhUyo balavarddhanAn sukhopabhogAMCca|  (idamatra cintyate- CleSma-prakRtergurusnigdhamadhuraCItAni sAmAnyAt kaphavRddhimAdadhati kathaM teSAM sukhopabhogateti|  atra vidhAsyatyatraiva|  srotassu CuddheSvityAdi yAvat kliSTe yathA vAsasi rAgayogA iti|   etaduktaM bhavati-kRtasaMCodhanasyApahRtakaphapittasyaidhitAgne doSAya vAjIkaraNayogA iti|  uktaM ca-'kSINadoSasya cApathyaM nAvaCyaM doSakRdbhavedi'ti|  atimandAgnestvanirvAhitadoSasyApariNatAni doSaM prakRti nAnyathA|  yo~api tatra sAmAnyAt kaphalavaH so~api vyavAyAdapacIyate|  yathoktAdadhikaM nissRtaM vyAdhaye sampadyata eva-iti jejjaTaH)|| 9||

 atha snigdhaviCuddhAnAM nirUhAn sAnuvAsanAn||10||  ghRtatailarasakSIraCarkarAkSaudrasaMyutAn||10||  yogavidyojayet pUrvaM kSIramAMsarasACinAm||10||  tato vAjIkarAn yogAn CukrApatyabalapradAn||10||

athetyAdi|  prayogAtpUrvameva snigdhasyAnantaraM vamanavirecanAbhyAM Cuddhasya nirUhAnanuvAsanayuktAn ghRtAdiyuktAMCca kSIramAMsarasACinAM yojayet tato~anantaraM CukrAdipradAn vAjIkarAn yogAn|  (atha snigdhaviCuddhAnAmityAdinaitaduktaM bhavati-CuddhAnAmedhitAgnInAM yathAbalaM prayuktaM vAjIkaraNaM yathAvat siddhyatyanyathA~anarthAya|  bastayo ghRtAdisahitAH kSIramAMsarasACinAM vidheyAH-iti jejjaTaH)|| 10||

uttarasthAnam

vAjIkaraNavidhiH

 athAto vAjIkaraNavidhiM nAmAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

ubhayalokahitatvAdekAntasvasthopayogitvAnmaGgalatvAcca tantre vAjIkaraNAkhyasyASTamasyAGgasya nirdeCaH|  tatprayogadarCanArthamadhyAya
Arabhyate|  vAjIkaraNamityAdinA bhaGgyA prayojanamucyate|| 1||

 vAjIkaraNamanvicchetsatataM viSayI pumAn||2||  tuSTiH puSTirapatyaM ca guNavattatra saMCritam||2||  apatyasantAnakaraM yatsadyaH sampraharSaNam||2||

yaH pumAn viSayI viSayeCu CabdAdiSu dehacittopayogiSu heteSu saktaH sa vAjIkaraNalakSaNamupAyamanvicchet|  tatra hi vAjIkaraNe puSTyAdikaM saMCritam|  (vAjIkaraNamityAdi| vAjIvACvasadharmA yena kriyate taM anvicchet kuto~anurasAyanAt|  tasya hi samupa-citadhAtoH pradhAnadhAtuparikSayo mA bhUditi|  puruSagrahaNaM bAlA-tyantavRddhanirAsArthaM na punaH strISaNDavyudAsArthaM teSAM vAjIkara-NAprApteH|  satatagrahaNaM sadA sevanaM jJApayati|    yathA rasAyanaM prayuktaM sarvadhAtUnAM puSTimAdadhAti naivaM vAjIkaraNaM taddhi satatamupayujyamAnamAhAravacchukradhAtuvRddhimAdadhAtIti|   pravarttakaJca dharmaM svargaprAptilakSaNamACrityaitaducyate|  yannivRttikRte hi sa upadeCaH|  koCakAro yathA hyaMCUnupAdatte vadhapradAn|    tathA~agnikalpAnarthAn jJo jJAtvA tebhyo nivarttata iti|  naiHCreyasikaM dharmamACritya brahmacaryopadeCaH|  ayaJcAbhyudayikamiti na parasparavirodhACaGketi jejjaTaH)|| 2||

 vAjIvAtibalo yena yAtyapratihato~aGganAH||3||  bhavatyatipriyaH strINAM yena yenopacIyate||3||  tadvAjIkaraNaM taddhi dehasyaujaskaraM param||3||

vAjIkaraNaM kimucyata ityAha-yena hetubhUtena puruSo vAjIvACva ivApratihato~aGganA yAti|  yena ca strINAmatipriyo bhavati yena ca dhAturupayacaM prApnoti, tadvastu vAjIkaraNamityucyate|  taddhi paraM dehasyaujaskaram|| 3||

 sAro hi jIvalokasya strI strIguNasamanvitA||4||  striyaH sAdhvyaH prasuvate narAn guNamayAniva||4||  gotravRddhikarA hyetA gRhiNyo gRhadevatAH||4||  gRhaM hi hInametAbhirna CrImadapi Cobhate||4||

sAro hItyAdinA striyAH priyatvaM prayojanavatItyucyate tasmAdapriye bharttari kulajA~api strI kadAcchIlaM kalaGkayati|  jIva lokasyaiSa sAro yat strI strIguNasamanvitA bhavatIta|  sAdhvyaH striyo guNairiva kRtAn narAn prasuvate|  etA iti sAdhvyaH striyaH|  gRhiNyo bhAryAH|| 4||

 na tu tA api Cobhante jarasA~anugatA iva||5||  puMyogena vinA strINAM sa hi saMvananaM param||5||

tA api striyaH puMyogena vinA tu tathA na Cobhante yathA jarasA~anugatAH|  sa hi puMyogaH strINAM paraM saMvananaM vaCIkaraNam ( puruSarahitAH striyaH svatantratvAnna ityarthaH)|| 5||

 vAjIkaraNanityasya kAmaM kAmaM siSeviSoH||6||  na CarIramavApnoti na vA ratiratiH kSayam||6||  acchAyaH pUtikusumaH phalena rahito drumaH||6||  yathaikaCcaikaCAkhaCca nirapatyastathA naraH||6||  adRSTaputrapautrasya kulatantvantavarttinaH||6||  saMsArasukhabAhyasya kIdRCaM nAma jIvitam||6||  asambandho hyaputrasya nityameva paraH paraH||6||  sIdatyasyAvasAne ca gRhaM susthe~apyanAyakam||6||  ato vAjIkarA yogAH niSevyAH CukravarddhanAH||6||  kalyasyodagravayaso vAjIkaraNasevinaH||6||  sarveSvRtuSvaharaharvyavAyo na nivAryate||6||

yaH puruSo vAjIkaraNanityastasya kAmamicchayA kAmaM strIsaGgamaM siSeviSorapi CarIraM kSayaM na prApnoti|  ratiratiCca kSayaM na nAvApnoti|  

	drumo yathA acchAyatvAdiyuktaH parihAryo nirupakAraCca bhavati tathaiva nirapatyo naraH|  

	athavA yena putrapautramadRSTaM vaH kulatantorante varttate ata eva ca samsArasukhAd bahirbhUtasyedRCasya kIdRCaM nAma jIvitam|  tajjIvitameva na bhavatItyarthaH|  

	aputrasya hi paro~anyo viCiSTena sambandhena rahito nityameva paraH na tadvittasyACrayo~asAdhAraNasambandhAbhAvAdityarthaH|    asya cAputrasyAvasAne vayo~ante susthe~api|  dhanAdisadbhAve~apyanAyakaM gRhamavasIdati|  yata evamataH Cukrasya varddhanA vAjIkarA yogA niSevyAH|  

	kalyasya nIrogasya pratyagravayaso vAjIkaraNasevinaCca puMsaH sarveSu RtuSu SaTsvapi aharahardine dine vyavAyo maithunaM na nivAryate na niSidhyate|| 6||

 cintAjarAbhyAM CukraM tu vyAdhibhiH karmakarCanAt||7||  kSayaM gacchatyanaCanAt strINAM cAtiniSevaNAt||7||  CukrakSayAt bhayAcchokAdavisrambhAdasevanAt||7||  atiharSAdatisthaulyAnmalopacayataH CramAt||7||  strINAmakauCalAddoSadarCanAdabhicArataH||7||  meDhrAmayAtsumahataH krodhato~ardharmakIrtanAt||7||  tRptasyApi striyo gantuM na CaktirupajAyate||7||

cintAdibhiH CukraM kSayaM yAti saJcitamapyapacIyate|  karmakarCanAdvamanAdikarmakRtena karCanena|  CukrakSayAddhAtustrotasthitasya Cukrasya kSayAt CukrACayasthitaM CukramupakSIyate|  asevA strINAm|  strINAmakauCalaM rahasyavyutpattiH|  doSapradarCanaM strINAmeva|  akSINe~api Cukre tRptasyApi puMsaH striYo gantuM CaktinnopajAyate|| 7||

 na hi jAtabalAH sarve narACcApatyabhAginaH||8||  bRhaccharIrA balinaH kecinnArISu durbalAH||8||  santi cAlpACrayAH strISu balavanto bahuprajAH||8||  narACcaTakavatkecid vrajanti bahuCaH striyaH||8||  gajavacca prasiJcanti kecinna bahugAminaH||8||  kecitprayatnairvAhyante vRSAH kecitsvabhAvataH||8||

na hItyAdinA strIgamanaCakteraniyamaM darCayati|  subodham|  prayatnena ratirvAjIkaraNAdibhiH|  (sabalA evApatyabhAgino jAtabalA api nApatyabhAginaH, ajAtabalA apyapatyabhAgina iti pratipAdayan sarvAn balaviCeSAnAha-nahi jAtabalA ityAdi|  bRhaccharIrA ye medasvinaste~apyalpavyavAyAH|  alpACrayA api ye CukrasArA balavanto bahuprajAH|  kecitprayatnairvAhyante aupaniSadAdikoktaiH|  vRSAH kecit svabhAvataH prakRtyaivetyarthaH iti jejjaTaH)|| 8||

 tasmAtpayogAn vakSyAmi durbalAnAM balapradAn||9||  sukhopabhogAn balinAM bhUyaCca balavarddhanAn||9||

tasmAdye durbalAsteSAM balapradAdiguNAn prayogAn vakSyAmi|  balinAM ca bhUyo balavarddhanAn sukhopabhogAMCca|  (idamatra cintyate- CleSma-prakRtergurusnigdhamadhuraCItAni sAmAnyAt kaphavRddhimAdadhati kathaM teSAM sukhopabhogateti|  atra vidhAsyatyatraiva|  srotassu CuddheSvityAdi yAvat kliSTe yathA vAsasi rAgayogA iti|   etaduktaM bhavati-kRtasaMCodhanasyApahRtakaphapittasyaidhitAgne doSAya vAjIkaraNayogA iti|  uktaM ca-'kSINadoSasya cApathyaM nAvaCyaM doSakRdbhavedi'ti|  atimandAgnestvanirvAhitadoSasyApariNatAni doSaM prakRti nAnyathA|  yo~api tatra sAmAnyAt kaphalavaH so~api vyavAyAdapacIyate|  yathoktAdadhikaM nissRtaM vyAdhaye sampadyata eva-iti jejjaTaH)|| 9||

 atha snigdhaviCuddhAnAM nirUhAn sAnuvAsanAn||10||  ghRtatailarasakSIraCarkarAkSaudrasaMyutAn||10||  yogavidyojayet pUrvaM kSIramAMsarasACinAm||10||  tato vAjIkarAn yogAn CukrApatyabalapradAn||10||

athetyAdi|  prayogAtpUrvameva snigdhasyAnantaraM vamanavirecanAbhyAM Cuddhasya nirUhAnanuvAsanayuktAn ghRtAdiyuktAMCca kSIramAMsarasACinAM yojayet tato~anantaraM CukrAdipradAn vAjIkarAn yogAn|  (atha snigdhaviCuddhAnAmityAdinaitaduktaM bhavati-CuddhAnAmedhitAgnInAM yathAbalaM prayuktaM vAjIkaraNaM yathAvat siddhyatyanyathA~anarthAya|  bastayo ghRtAdisahitAH kSIramAMsarasACinAM vidheyAH-iti jejjaTaH)|| 10||

CarAdInAM kaNTakAryantAnAM mUlAni|  vyAkhyAsamam|  CaraH kANDekSuH, vIraNamuCIram|  vIrA kSIravidArI|  payasyA kSIrikA|  trikaNTako gokSurakaH|  phalgu kAkodumbarikAphalam|  kSaudrasya dvikuDava SoDaCapalAni|  kuliGgaCcaTakaH|| 11||

mASAtmaguptAbIjAnAM miCrIkRtAnAmADhakam|  mandAdikaM prasRtonmitamiti|  sarvairiti kvAthavidArIkSurasaiH sadRCena samena kSIreNa|  subodham|  asya yogasya bhaktAtpUrvaM prayogaH|  palapUrvakaM lihaMstad ghRtaM puruSo yAH puruSe atRptAstaruNyastAsu rAsabhAyate rAsabha ivAcarati|| 12||

madhUlikAdayaH priyAlAntAH samastaiCcUrNaM pRthagiti madhunA SaDguNenAjyenApi SaDguNena yuktamataH paraM picuM karSaM kAlyaM prabhAte lihan pAdAbhyAM bhUmimaspRCan puruSo balamutsAhaM ca labhate|  kuliGgaCcaTakaH|| 16||

 prasRtaM mASacUrNasya dhAtrIsvarasabhAvitam||18||  vidArIrajaso vApi lihan madhughRtadgutam||18||  kSIrAnupaCcaTakavaddaCakRtvo vrajet striyaH||18||

 piSTvA varAhamAMsAni dattvA maricasaindhave||39||  kolavadgulikAH kRtvA tapte sarpiSi varttayet||39||  varttanastambhitAstACca prakSepyAH kaukkuTe rase||39||  ghRtADhye gandhapiCune dadhidADimasArike||39||  yathA na bhindyAdgulikAstathA taM sAdhayedrasam||39||  taM pibanbhakSayaMstACca balI bAleyavad vrajet||39||  mAMsAni balayuktAni tathA~anyAnyapi kalpayet||39||

piSTvetyAdi|  sUkaramAMsena piSTena maricasaindhavayuktena kRtA gulikAstapte ghRte vartayet manAgagnisantApaM nayet|  tastena varttanena stambhitA gRhItakAThinyAH kaukkuTe rase prakSepyAH|  tatastA rakSayan sAdhayet|  ghRtADhya ityAdi rasaviCeSaNam|  bAleyo rAsabhaH|  kukkuTavaccAnyAnyapi balayuktAni mAMsAni kalpayet|  (tapte sarpiSi bharjayet| 'bharjanastambhitAstACca' iti carakapAThaH|  vyAkhyA-tapte sarpiSi bharjjayet|  bharjjanastambhitACca prakSepyAHkaukkuTe rase ityasyAyamabhiprAyaH|  sarpiSA taptena navanItAvasthAmatikrAntena|  navanItAvasthAyAM hi sAvaCeSakAlaCeyAvayavatvAdamlAnugataM prayoge neSyate|  nanu sarpiSItyukte tadeva gamyate kathaM punarnavanItACaGketi|  ucyate-AcAryA navanItaM ghRtaM jAtamityasti navanIte ghRtavyapadeCaH|  tasmAttadapanayanArthamiti vyAkhyAnayanti|  tena ca taptena tAH saMhatimAsAdayanti|  tathA na bhidyante drave kSiptAH|  dadhidADimasArika iti sArike sAndrIbhUta ityarthaH|  dadhi dADimAmlamiSyate nAnyacchuktAdi tasya CukrakSayahetutvenAmnAnAt|  amlo~amlaM pacyate amlaCca pAkaH CukranACanaH-iti jejjaTaH)|| 39||

 mASAnaGkuritAn CuddhAn nistuSAn sAjahAphalAn||40||  ghRtADhye mAhirase dadhidADimasArike||40||  prakSipya sAdhayedyuktyA dhAnyajIrakanAgaraiH||40||  pIto bhuktaCca sa rasaH kurute CukramakSayam||40||

aGkuritatvAdiyuktAn mASAnajahAphalasaMyuktAn mAhiSamAMsarase ghRtabhUyiSThe dadhidADimapradhAne prakSipya sAdhayet|  sa siddho rasaH pIto bhuktaCcAkSayaM CukraM kurute|  ajahA AtmaguptA|  (kurute, CukramakSayamiti santAnapravRttyA akSayamityupacaryate- iti jejjaTaH)|| 40||

uttarasthAnam

vAjIkaraNavidhiH

 haMsabarhiNadakSANDAn bhRSTAMstaptena sarpiSA||41||  surAnupAnAn yaH khAdetsa tRptastarpayetstriyaH||41||

haMsAdInAM prayekasyANDAn taptena sarpiSA bhRSTAn surAnupAnAn khAdet|| 41||

 ArdrANi matsyamAMsAni CapharIrvA subharjitAH||42||  tapte sarpiSi yaH khAdetsa gacchetstrISu na kSayam||42||

ArdrANAM matsyamAMsAnAM CapharImAMsAnAM ca ghRtabhRSTAnAM prayogaH subodhaH|  CapharI rohitaH|  (matsyaCabdasya sAmAnyavAcitve~api rohitasya grahaNaM pradhAnakalpanACrayaNAt rohito matsyAnAmiti|  iti jejjaTaH)|| 42||

 ghRtabhRSTAn rase chAge rohitAn phalasArike||43||  anupItarasAn siddhAnapatyArthI prayojayet||43||

rohitAn dADimAdiphalapradhAne chAge rase siddhAn ghRtabhRSTAn rasAnupAnayuktAnapatyArthI prayojayet|| 43||

 ghRtaM mASAn sabastANDAn phalAmle mAhiSe rase||44||  svAdau vA sAdhayet pUtaM tadrasaM bharjayed ghRte||44||  ISallavaNitaM yuktaM dhAnyajIrakanAgaraiH||44||  pItaH sa vRSyo balyaCca bRMhaNaCca paraM rasaH||44||

ghRtaM mASAn bastAnAmaNDAMCca mAhiSe dADimAdiphalAmle vA rase svAdAveva vA na tvamle sAdhayet|  taM tathAvidhaM rasaM pUtamISallavaNaM dhAnyAmlAdibhiryuktaM ghRte bharjayet|  pItaH sa rasaH paraM vRSyAdiguNaH|| 44||

 caTakAMstaittire tadvattittirIn kaukkuTe rase||45||  kalpyecchikhino haMse haMsAn vA Cikhije rase||45||  tRptiM caTakamAMsAnAM gatvA yo~anu payaH pibet||45||  prabhUtakAlasaMruddhAH santarpayati yoSitaH||45||

taittire rase caTakAMstadvaditi mAhiSarasavidhAnena kalpayet|  tadvadeveti tittirINAM prayogaH kaukkuTe rase|  vyAkhyAsamam| prabhUta kAlasaMruddhAH bahukAlaM puruSasaMsargeNa vinAbhUtAH|| 45||

 ghRTADhyaM kukkuTaM CUlyaM CItaM khAdet samAkSikam||46||  pibeccAnantaraM kSIraM ya icchecchukramakSayam||46||

CUle kukkuTaM bahunA ghRtena saMskRtya CItIkRtya kSaudreNa yuktaM khAdet|  anantaraJca kSIraM pibet|  sa evaM kuryAdyaH CukramakSayamicchet|| 46||

 pippalIlavaNairyukto bastANDau kSIrasarpiSA||47||  sAdhitau bhakSayedyastu sa gacchet pramadACatam||47||  bastANDasiddhe godugdhe bhAvitAnasakRttilAn||47||  yaH khAdetsasitAn gacchet sa strICatamapUrvavat||47||

pippalyAdinA chagalANDavidhAnaM subodham|  tathaiva chagalANDasiddhagokSIrabhAvitAnAM tilAnAM prayogaH|| 47||

 bhuktvA yo mASasUpena ghRtADhyaM SaSTikaudanam||48||  payaH pibati jAgartti kRtsnAM rAtriM sa vegavAn||48||

bhuktvetyAdi|  yo ghRtADhyaM ghRtabhUyiSThaM SaSTikAnnaM mASasUpena saha bhuktvA payaH pibati sa vegavAn sakalAM rAtriM jAgartti||48||

 AtmaguptAphalaM mASAn kharjUrANi CatAvarIm||49||  CRGgATakAni mRdvIkAM pacettat prasRtonmitam||49||  kSIraprasthaM jalaprasthametat kSIrAvaCeSitam||49||  CucinA vAsasA pUtaM yojayet prasRtaistribhiH||49||  CarkarAyAstugAkSIryAH sarpiSo~abhinavasya ca||49||  tatpibetkSaudrasaMyuktaM bhuJjAnaH SaSTikaudanam||49||  tathA jarAparIto~api putraiH sa parivAryate||49||

AtmaguptAphalAdibhiH kSIravidhAnaM subodham|  CarkarAdAdInAM  pratyekaM trayaH prasRtAH|| 49||

 drAkSAkharjUrakharjUrImastakAnyajahAphalam||50||  payasyAbhIrumASAMCca madhukAni ca sAdhayet||50||  toyADhake palAMCAni pAdaCeSeNa tena ca||50||  kSIraprasthaM pacetkSIraCeSeNAdyAd ghRtAnvitam||50||  SaSTikAnnaM sitAjyena yogo~ayaM CukrakRtparam||50||

drAkSAdInAM kvAthena kSIraprasthaM pacet|  kSIraCeSam|  sitAjyasahitena tena kSIreNa SaSTikAnnamadyAt|  ajahA AtmaguptA||50||

uttarasthAnam

vAjIkaraNavidhiH

 jIvakarSabhakau medA jIvantI CrAvaNIdvayam||51||  khArjUraM madhukaM drAkSAM vidArIM viCvabheSajam||51||  CRGgATakAni capalA navaM sarpiH payojalam||51||  ghRtAvaCeSitaM siddhaM CarkarAmAkSikAnvitam||51||  SaSTikaudanasaMyuktamupayojyaM yathAbalam||51||  taddRSyaM balakRdvarNyaM kaNDyaM dehasya bRMhaNam||51||

jIvakAdisiddhaM ghRtaM CarkarAmAkSikasahitaM yathAbalaM SaSTikAnnamupayojyaM vRSyAdiguNam|| 51||

 gRSTirbaSkayaNI nIrugUrdhvaCRGgI catustanI||52||  sAndrasvAdubahukSIrA rUpaCIlasamanvitA||52||  ikSubhirmASaparNena yA supuSTArjunena vA||52||  tatkSIraM sasitAkSaudraghRtaM putryaM ratipradam||52||

guSTitvAdiguNayuktAyA ikSvAdinA supuSTAyAH goH kSIraM sitAdisahitaM pItaM putrIyaM ratipradaM ca|  gRSTiH prathamaprasavA|  baSkayaNyanavaprasUtA|  (gRSTirekavAraprasUtA tasyA upacitadhAtutvAt payo~api kAraNAnuvidhAnAt tadvadeva bhavati|  puSTaghNaM caitat jJApayati|  sAtmyenopacitAyAH kSIramapi jyAyastAmAvahati|  catustanyAdibhirviCeSaNaiH kSIramapi tristanatvaviCAlatvaviCaGkaTatvAdayo gavAM doSA iti|  evaMvidhA maGgalyA catustanyAdiyukteti|  evaMvidhAyAH payaHprabhAvAd vRSyatAmAsAdayati|  mASaparNenetyatra parNagrahaNenaitajjJApayati|  CuSkAH stambavanto na phalAnIti|  tAnyasAtmyAni  prAyaCo gavAM tRNaparNocitatvAt|  tasmAt mASaparNenetyucyate|  anyatRNaparNapuSTAyA api kSIraM vRSyamucyate|  mASAparNAdibhirvRSyaiH puSTAyA nitarAM vRSatvamApAdayati|  anye tvanyathA kSIratrayamiti varNayanti|  ikSvAdAyA mASaparNAdAyA arjunAdAyACceti-iti jejjaTaH)|| 52||

 CukralairjIvanIyAkhyairbRhaNairbalavarddhanaH||53||  vayasaH sthApanaiCcaitatpayaHsiddhaM pRthakpRthak||53||  yuktaM godhUmacUrNena saghRtakSaudraCarkaram||53||  paryAyeNopayoktavyamicchatA CukramakSayam||53||

gorggRSTyAdiguNayuktAyACcaitat payaH CukralaiH CukravarddhanairmahAkaSAyasaMgrahAdhyAyapaThitairmedAkAkolIdvayAdibhiH jIvanIyAkhyairjIvantIkAkolyAdibhiH|  bRMhaNairvATyAbalAdibhiH|  vayasaH sthApanaismRtApathyAdibhiCca pRthakpRthaksiddhamanantaraJca godhUmacUrNena ghRtAdibhiCca yuktaM paryAyeNeti krameNOpayoktavyamakSayaM CukramicchatA puMsA||53||

 medAM payasyAM jIvantIM vidArIM kaNTakArikAm||54||  mASAn CvadaMSTrAM kSIrikAM godhUmAn CAliSaSTikAn||54||  tatkSIre~arddhodake siddhAn kArSikAnADhakonmite||54||  visarjayetpayaCCeSaM tatpUtaM kSaudrasarpiSA||54||  sitayA ca yutaM pItvA vRddho~api taruNAyate||54||

tatkSIre tasyA gRSTyAdiguNayuktAyA goH kSIre ADhakonmite arddhodake udakasyArddhena yukte medAdIn karSACAn datvA siddhAn payaCCeSaM kRtvA tAn visarjayet|  tataH pUtaM tatkSIraM kSaudrAdiyuktaM pItvA vRddho~atItasaptativarSo~api taruNAyate taruNa ivAcarati||54||

 maNDalairjAtarUpasya sutaptaistatpayaH CRtam||55||  siddhaM puMsavanaM vRSyaM sasitAghRtamAkSikam||55||  rUpyAyastAmrasIsAnAmayameva pRthagvidhiH||55||

tatpayastasyA gRSTyAdiguNayuktAyA goH payaH sutaptaiH suvarNasya patraiH CRtam|  siddhamityAdi subodham|  suvarNavadrUpyAnAnAmapi caturNAmanyatamasya vidhiH|  (jAtarUpasya suvarNasya CuddhasyetyarthaH|  maNDalaiH patraiH CRtasya payaso viCiSTaCaktyutpAdaH|  tatpayastasyA evekSvAdipuSTAyAH-iti jejjaTaH)|| 55||

 cUrNitAH pippalIstriMCat prakuJce tailasarpiSoH||56||  bhRSTAH saCarkarAkSaudrAH kSIreNAloDitAH pibet||56||  aCnaMCca SaSTikaM kSIrasarpibhyAM vAjivadbhavet||56||

tailaghRtayoH prakuJce bhRSTAsya triMCat pippalIcUrNasya CarkarAkSaudrasahitasya kSIreNa pAnaM SaSTikAnnasya ca kSIrasarpirbhyAmaCanaM vAjIkaraNam|| 56||

 candrAMCuCubhram payasA  ghRtADhyaM SaSTikaudanam||57||  CarkarAmadhusaMyuktaM bhuJjAno nA vRSAyate||57||

candrAMCuvacchubhraM SaSTikasyaudanaM ghRtabhUyiSThaM CarkarAmadhuyuktaM kSIreNa bhuJjAno vRSAyate|  nA puruSaH|  ('candrAMCukalapami'ti carakapAThaH)  SaSTikaudanasya candrAMCukalpatvaM tasyApyapetakaNamalasyAkhaNDitadhautasya jJApanArtham|  anye tu gauraSaSTikasya pravaratvAttadviCeSaNArthaM candrAMCukalapamiti sAdRCyAnna kalpaneneti-iti jejjaTaH)|| 57||

 dadhnaH sareNa saghRto bhakSitaH SaSTikaudanaH||58||  sailAtugoSaNakSaudraH CarkarADhyena CukrakRt||58||

CarkarAbhUyiSThena dadhnaH sareNailAdiyuktaH SaSTikaudano bhakSitaH CukrakRdbhavati|  USaNaM maricam|  

	dadhnaH saraM CaraccandrasannibhaM doSavarjitam|  

	CarkarAkSaudramaricaistugAkSIryA ca buddhimAn||

	yuktyA yuktaM susUkSmailaM nAve kumbhe Cucau paTe|

	mArjitaM prakSipecchIte ghRtADhye SaSTikaudanaM||

	pibenmAtrAM rasAlAyAstaM bhuktvA SaSTikaudanam|

	varNasvarabalopetaH pumAMstena vRSAyate|| iti carake|  

	dadhnaH saramityAdi|  SaSTikaudanaM bhuktvA rasAlAyA mAtrAM pibet|  rasAlAnAma dadhiCarkarayA saha paTamRditaM ca caturjAtakakarpUramAtrayA yuktaM loke rasAletyucyate-iti jejjaTaH|| 58||

 adhyaNDAmArSabhIM caiva svayaGguptAphalAni ca||59||  pAdalepaM naraH kRtvA niCi vegairna hIyate||59||  varSAbhUmUlamRdvIkAsvayaGguptAphalAni ca||59||  siddhaCcaraNalepo~ayaM bhuvaM padbhyAM tu na spRCet||59||

adhyaNDAdibhiH pAdalepo vAjIkaraNaH|  (ni) adhyaNDekSurakastailakaNTakaH kokilAkSakaH|  ArSabhI RSabhakAkhyA|  svayaGguptA AtmaguptA|  saiva kapikacchUH|  

	varSAbhvAdibhiCcaraNalepaH siddho~apratihataH|  asmin kRte padbhayAM bhuvaM na spRCet|| 59||

 ghRtakSIrACano nityaM nirvyAdhirnityago yuvA||60||  saGkalpapravaNo nityaM naraH strISu vRSAyate||60||

ghRtakSIrACana iti|  nityaM ghRtakSIrACanatvAdiyukto naraH strISu nityaM vRSAyate|  nityago yaH sadaiva striyaM yAti|  (saGkalpapravaNaH kAlAnudhyAnAbhimukhaH saGkalpapravaNastannityaH|  naragrahaNaM kiM strISu vRSAyata ityukte gamyata eva|  tathA strIgrahaNaJca tatraiva vRSAyate nAnyatreti strIgrahaNamapi vyartham|  ucyate naragrahaNaM napuMsakamityetajjJApayati|  strIgrahaNaJca sAmAnyenaiva strIti pravartate-iti jejjaTaH)|| 60||

uttarasthAnam

vAjIkaraNavidhiH

 AtmaguptAphalaMmASA godhUmaH CAliSaSTikam||61||  ikSurikSurakaH kSIraM kSaudraM drAkSA sitopalA||61||  uccaTA CaramUlAni vidArI saCatAvarI||61||  jIvanIyAni kharjUraM mocacocaphalAni ca||61||  ebhirbhakSyANi peyAni lehyAni ca ghRtAni ca||61||  nityamAsevamAnasya strISu harSo vivarddhate||61||

AtmaguptAphalAdibhiH kRtAni bhakSyAdIni sadA sevamAnasya strISu viSaye harSo vivarddhate|  ikSurakaH kokilAkSakaH, uccaTA prasiddhA mahAmustA, CvetadurvArikA svalpaviTapaH 'prAyaCo nadItIre dRSyate' iti suCrutaTIkA|  'cUDAlA cakraloccaTA' ityamaraH||61||

 jIvanIyaghRtakSIramadhutailasitArasaiH||62||  rasakSIrACinaH kSipraM vRSaM kurvanti bastayaH||62||

jIvanIyAdibhiH kRtA bastayo rasakSIrACinaM naraM kSipraM vRSaM kurvanti|| 62||

 siddhabastivikalpoktAn balaCuklasutapradAn||63||  yuJjIta bastIn putrArthI putrakAmoditaM ca yat||63||

yastu putrArthI sa siddhabastikalpAdhyAyoktAn balAdipradAn bastIn yuJjIta|  tathA yadapi kiJcit putrakAmIye CArIra uktaM tadapi yuJjIta|| 63||

 yatkiJcinmadhuraM snigdhaM bRMhaNaM balavarddhanam||64||  manaso harSaNaM yacca tatsarvaM vRSyamucyate||64||  dravyairevaZMvidhaistasmAd bhAvitaH pramadAM vrajet||64||  Atmavegena codIrNaH strIguNaiCca praharSitaH||64||

idAnImuktAnuktavAjIkaraNasaMgrahAyAha-yadityAdi|  yacca kiJcinmAdhuryAdiguNaM vastu yacca manaso harSaNaM tatsarvaM vRSyamucyate|  (nanu dadhyAdInyamlatve~api CukrajananAni madhvAdIni rUkSANyapi|  ato yatkiJcinmadhurAdyetadvirodhIti|  ucyate-prabhAvAt|  dadhimadhvAdInyimlarUkSANyapi vAjIkaraNAni|  na kevalaM guNaprabhAvAdeva dravyANi kAraNAni, kintu prabhAvAdapi|  dravyaprabhAvaCcAnityaH CAstraikasamadhigamya eveti na kaCcidvirodha iti-jejjaTaH)|   

	tasmAdevaMvidhairmadhurAdiguNairdravyairbhAvita utpannasaMskAraH sannAtmavegena ca puruSasadbhAvakRtenodIrNa utsiktaH strIguNaiCca rUpaceSTAdibhiH praharSitaH pramadAM vrajet|  (dravyairityAdi|  atra bhAvitagrahaNenaitat jJApayati yAvat sarvAtmanAnvitaM dehe dravyaM syAttAvat gantavyaM na prayogAntarameveti|  nanu cAtmavegena codIrNa iti vyarthaH|    na hi paravegenodIrNatA sambhavati|  ucyate|  ayamabhiprAyaH yAvadicchayodbhUtavegaH parAM harSakASThAmAruDhastAvat pramadAM vrajet|  uktaM ca nAnudbhUtavega iti|  strIguNaiCca praharSito hAvabhAvasaMvAhanAdibhirityarthaH-iti jejjaTaH)|| 64||

 iSTA hyekaikaCo~apyarthA harSaprItikarAH param||65||  kiM punaH strICarIre ye saGghAtena pratiSThitAH||65||

arthAH CabdAdayo viSayA ya iSTAste niyatamekaikaCaH pRthagbhAvenApi sthitAH paraM harSaprItikarA bhavanti|  kiM punarye strICarIre saGghAtena yugapatpatpratiSThitAH|  (sarvavAjIkaraNebhyo~api stryaiva vAjIkaraNamutkRSTAmAnandahetutvAdityAha-iSTA hyekaikaCa ityAdi|  ekaikaCo~apyarthA viSayAH CabdAdaya iSTAH, paraM harSaprItikarA bhavanti|  evamarthAnAM pratyekaM harSaprItikaraNe sAmarthyaM kiM punaH strICarIre ye saGghAtena pratiSThitAH|  nanu strIgrahaNena paryAptatvAt CarIragrahaNaM kim ?  ucyate|  ekadeCAnAmAtmamanasAJca vyAvarttanArtham|  Atmanyapi kecidvyayavasthitA manasyapi kecit|  tasmAccharIre ye pratiSThitA ityarthaH|  kiJca guNaguNinoranyatvaM cAnena prakACitaM bhavati-iti jejjaTaH)|| 65||

 rucibhedena lokasya daivayogAcca yoSitAm||66||  taM taM prApya vivarddhante naraM rUpAdayo guNAH||66||

rucibhedenetyAdi|  tathA rUpAdayo yoSitAM ye guNAste taM taM viCiSTaM naraM prApya vivarddhante|  ya evaikasya na kiJcidapyanurUpAsta evAparasyAparimeyA iti bhavanti|  asya ca rAgavirAgasya heturlokAnAM rucibhedena bhinnarucitvam|  tacca svabhAvAt|  tathA daivayogataH yasya tathAvidhamadRSTaM bhavatyetadAhitamanobhiH sutarAM vicAryam|  na kiJcit kalpitaM taditi kiJcidapi pratibhAti|| 66||

 tasmAdyA yasya hRdayaM viCatIva varAGganA||67||  tulyasvabhAvA yA hArimRjArUpaguNAnvitA||67||  pACabhUtairvahantyaGgairlAvaNyamiva murtimat||67||  AlapantyamRteneva yA gAtrANi niSiJcati||67||  pibantIva ca paCyantI spRCantI limpatIva yA||67||  nityamutsavabhUtA yA yA samAnamanaHCayA||67||  nayatyutsukatAM ceto nityaM sannihitApi yA||67||  yayA viyukto nistrIkamaratirmanyate jagat||67||  pragalbhA ratisaMgrAme svasthA lajjAmayI ca yA||67||  bahuCo~api ca yAM gatvA tatpUrvamiva gacchati||67||  caritairnirvikArAyA vikArairiva nirmitA||67||  kAntAnuvRtti paramA sA strI vRSyatamA matA||67||

yata evaM tasmAdyA varAGganA yasya hRdayaM svaCarIrAntaHpriyatayA viCatIva sA vRSyatamA mateti sambandhaH|  tulyasvabhAvetyAdereSa eva sambandhaH|  yA tulyasvabhAvA hArimRjAdyanvitA ca hArimRjA manoharA snAnAdibhiH|  pACabhUtaissarvAkarSaNayogyairaGgairyuktA mUrtimadivalAvaNyaM vahantI|  yA cAlapantI gAtrANyamRtena niSiJcatIva|    yA ca paCyantI pibantIva spRCantI limpantIva|  yA ca nityamutsavabhUtA sadA hRdayAnandakarI|  yA samAnamanaHCayA tulyakAlodbhavasuratAvasAnA (sadaiva tulyakAmA-iti jejjaTaH)|    yA nityaM sannihitA samIpasthitApi ceta utsukatAM nayati|  utsukatA sotkaNThatvam|  yayA viyukto viprayukto~aratiH san sarvaM jaggannistrIkameva manyate|  yA ratisaMgrAme pragalbhA samarthA|  svasthA nivRttaratisaMgrAmA lajjAmayIva|  yAM ca bahuCo~api gatvA puruSo~atRptaH san prathamamiva gacchati|  yA ca caritairvyavahAraceSTAdibhirnirvikArA|  CRGgAraceSsTAsu punarvikArairiva nirmitA|  kAntasyacintAnuvRttipradhAnA|  saivambhUtA vRSyatamA matAbhipretA|  (yA yasya hRdayamityAdau bahuCo yAyeti bahutvam|  ucyate-pRthagapi vRSyA, dvitrAdibhirvRSyatarA, sarvairvRSyatametyasyArthasya prApaNArthaM yAyeti bahutvam|  saurupyamekameva paryApto guNaH prathamaM yauvanamatra dvitIyaCca parigRhyate|  lakSaNairbAhyairAntarairvidyAvinayAdibhiCca yAnvitA sA matAbhipretA vRSyatameti|  iti jejjaTaH)|| 67||

apare amI bhAvAH paraM vRSatvaM kurvantItyAha-abhyaJjanetyAdi|  abhyaJjanAdayo nAnAvidhAH prakArAH|  tathA mRdvAdiguNA CayyA, kimbhUtA Cobhanasya puSpaprakarasya reNubhiH kIrNA|  tathA vayasyAH|  prAjJatvAdiguNAH|  kalACcatuHSaSTiH kAmatantraprasiddhAH tajjJAH visrambhAdInAmaikyAcchArIramAtreNa pRthagbhUtAH|  tathA vanAntAH kAntA manoramAH|  tathA sravantyo nadyaH satatamavicchedena sravantyo vahantyaH|  tathA tanmadyaM yanmadaM karotyAmodaJca|  AmodaH saurabham|  madyebhyaCca viCeSAt prasannA surA|  kimbhUtA hRdyA hRdayaprItidAyinI|  surabhiH saurabhyayuktA prasannA svacchA ca|  tathA tAmbUlapatram|  kiMbhUtam|  CakAGganAnAM yadgaNDatalaM gaNDapradeCaM tadvadabhipANDu tathA yattAmbUlapatraM parivAreNa pUgakSArakarpUrAdinA Cobhate|  anyacca kimbhUtaM strINAM yAni mukhapaGkajAni teSAM prasAdhanaM maNDanaM yatparivAraCobhi tadAtmajasya kAmasya mUrttimadivAyudhaM vijayahetutvAt|

 sarvArthasiddhiH prathamo~anurAgaH CRGgAragAndharvakathAviCeSAH||72||  sItkAragarbham hasitaM sahAvaM chinnAkSaram vibhramavacca gItam||72||  savyAjasandarCitacArugAtraM vRttaM priyANAmavalokitaJca||72||  cUtAGkuraM puSpaphalaM yathartuvidyutvadudyotitagarjitAni||72||  vihaGgabhRGgastanitAnuyAtaM strIkUjitaM bhUSaNaCiJjitAni||72||  kAle yathAsvaM vapuSaCca CuddhiH saGkalpayonerdhuramudvahanti||72||

sarvArthasiddhyAdIni saGkalpayoneH kAmasya dhuramudvahanti|  sarveSAmarthAnAmiSTAnAM siddhiH sItkAragarbhaM hasitamityadeH priyANAmiti sambadhyate|  tathA sahAvaM hAvena yuktaM anurAgabhAvasUcako dRSTyAdivikAro hAvaH|  tathA gItaM chinnAkSaraM dhvaniprayogabAhulyAt|  tathA vibhramavat vibhramo~atra vilAsa eva tasya lakSaNam-sthAnAsanaCayanAnAM hastabhrUnetrakarmaNAM caiva|  utpadyate viCeSo yaH CliSTaH sa tu vilAsaH syAditi|  tathA tAsAmeva vRttam|  kimbhUtamAha-savyAjaM kRtvA sandarCitaM cArugAtraM yasmin|  tathA tAsAmevAvalokitam|  yathartu cUtAGkurAdIn|  vidyutvAn balAhakaH tadudyotitAni garjitAni|  strINAM ratisamaye kUjitaM pArAvatAdivihaGgamastanitena bhramarastanitena cAnugatam|  yathAsvam kAla iti CrAvaNa ityAdinA sUtroktaprakAreNa|  vapuSo vamanAdinA CuddhiCca||

 srotassu CuddheSvamale CarIre
vRSyaM yadAdyaM mitamatti kAle||73||  vRSAyate tena paraM manuSya
stad bRMhaNaM dehabalapradaM ca||73||  tasmAt purA Codhanameva kAryaM
