kliSTe yathA vAsasi rAgayogAH||73||

srotassu vamanAdikarmaNA CuddheSu satsu CarIre ca nirmale kAle cAhArayogye manuSyo yadAdyaM bhojyaM vRSyaM mitaM parimitaM cAtti bhuGkte tenAdyena sa paraM vRSAyate|  tadAdyaM bRMhaNaM dehabalapradaM ceti nirvyUDhastantrakarturabhimato~arthaH|  

	tasmAdityAdi|  yasmAdevaM tasmAtpurA pUrvaM balAnurUpaM Codhanameva kAryam|  kliSTe vAsasi yathA rAgayogA na sidhyanti tathA kaluSe dehe vRSyayogAH|| 73||

 upadiSTe vicitre~asmin vaktavyArthAnurodhataH||74||  karttavyameva karttavyaM prANAbAdhe~api netarat||74||

upadiSTe ityAdinA tantrArtho nirAkArAkAGkSI kriyate asmin viSaye nAnArUpe strIsaMyogavaCIkaraNavadhopAyAdike vaktavyArthAnurodhAdupadiSTe sati yadAgamAdibhiH karttavyaM karaNIyamityAbhAti tadeva karttavyaM kAryaM|| 74||

 etatsvarUpaM CAstrasya yadvyApitvena varNyate||75||  spRCati nyUnatAdoSo mahAnavyApini dhruvam||75||  vIryahInairasampUrNaiH prayogairapi bhUSitam||75||  arthAnatantrayattantraM tantratAmApnuyAtkatham||75||  haMsabarhiNadakSANDA yadyapyatyarthaCukralAH||75||  munayaH sadayA brUyustAnyogeSvanyathA katham||75||  kathaM vA sarva evaite yogA rAgAgnidIpanAH||75||  kliSTasaGkalpajananAH proktAH saMsAravarddhanAH||75||  trikAladarCibhirdirvyaiH sattvadoSavivarjitaiH||75||  pUrvAcAryaiH kRtaM vartma ko laGghayitumarhati||75||  prakAnte sarvathA sarvamuktaM bhavati sUditam||75||  na hi leCAbhidhAnena labhyaH sarvArthasaMgrahaH||75||  tathA ca garddabhIkSIraM mAMsamaCvaCvahastinAm||75||  mahAsAgaratoyaM ca proktaM nirupayogyapi||75||

akarttavyasyopadeCe vaktavyArthAnurodho yo heturuktaH sa evaitat svarUpamityAdinA vyavasthApyate|  CAstrasya hyetat svarUpaM yacchAsraM vyApitvena varNyate|  avyApini tu CAstre dhRvamavaCyaM nyUnatAdoSo mahAn spRCati|  

	vIryahInairasampUrNaiCca prayogairarthAttantravibhUSaNe hetubhUtairvibhUSitairapi tantramarthAnayattantratAmApnuyAt|  eSA hi tantrasya tantratA yA tantritAnAmarthAnAmananyApekSitA|  

	anyatheti yadyapi kaCcitryUnatAdoSaH parihAryo na syAttataH sadayAH sudUraM tyaktaprANihiMsAH kathamiva haMsAdyaNDAn prayogeSu brUyuH|

	yadi ca nyUnatAdoSaH parihAryo na syAttataH kathaM vaite yogA rAgAgnerdIpanA uttejanAnanirvApaNaH sarva eva kAmasyoddIpanAH prayojitAH kliSTasya ca saGkalpasya jananAH yatnajeyasya ca saMsArasya varddhanAH proktAH|  

	etacca vartma trikAladarCibhiH pUrvAcAryaiH kRtaM ko~asmAdirlaGghayitumatikramitumarhati|  darCanaM darCaH trikAle bhUtabhaviSyadvarttamAnAkhye kAle darCo yeSAM taiH|  divi bhavA divyaistaiH|  yathA sattvadoSA rAgadveSAdayaH tadvirjitairAcAryaiH|  

	sarvathA prakrAnte sarvaprakAraM vaktumArabdhe sati sarvamevoktaM sUditaM bhavati|  na tu leCoktam|  etadevocyate-na hItyAdinA|  leCAbhidhAnena stokoktyA sarveSAmarthAnAM saMgraho na labhyo bhavati|  tathA ca garddabhIkSIrAdikaM nirupayogyapi prayoktavyameva|| 75||

 adyatve~api viCeSeNa bhUritantrArthasaMgrahAt||76||  saMgrahAdyanna budhyeta tajjJAnamatidurlabham||76||  yathA pratijJAtamitikrameNa vedo~ayamaSTAGganidhernnibaddhaH||76||  abhyasyato mArgamivAryasatyaM saJjAyate svarthaparArthasiddhiH||76||

tasmAt nyUnatAdoSaM parihRtyAsya tantrasya vyApitvamucyate-adyatve sAmpratikatve~api saMgrahAdasmAttantrAdyanna budhyeta tajjJAnamatidurlabham|  evaMvidhasyAnyasyopAyasyAbhAvAt|  kimbhUtAt saMgrahAdityAha-bhUritantrArthasaMgrahAt|  prabhUtAnAM tantrANAM sambandhino~arthasya saMgrahAdekatrAvasthApanAt|  

	yatheti|  pUrvaM yathA pratijJAtaM tathA krameNASTAGganidhervedo~ayamiti nibaddhaH|  yaM nibandhamabhyasyataH puMsastathA svArthaparArthayoH siddhiH saJjAyate yathA mArgAkhyamAryasatyamabhyasyataCcatvAryapatyAni duHkhaM samudAyo nirodho mArgaCceti saugataprasiddhalakSaNAni|  evaJca pUrvaM pratijJAtam

	sarvatantrANyataH prAyaH saMhRtyASTAGgasaMgrahaH|  
	asthAnavistarAkSepa punaruktAdivarjitaH|| 
	hetuliGgauSadhaskandhatrayamAtranibandhanaH|
	vinigUDhArthatattvAnAM pradeCAnAM prakACakaH|| 
	svAnyatantravirodhAnAM bhUyiSThaM vinivarttakaH|
	yugAnurUpasandarbho vibhAgena kariSyate|| iti|| 76||

 pitAmahamukhodgIrNamityAyurvedavAGmayam||77||  jIvitArogyadharmArthasukhagauravakIrtikRt||77||  alaMkRtaM yuktipadaiH sadratnairiva kAJcanam||77||  SaTtriMCatArthadurgeSu bhiSajAM saMkramairiva||77||

pitAmaha ityAdi|  ityanena prakAreNAyurvedavAGmayaM pitAmahasya brahmaNo mukhAdudgIrNaM jIvitAdikRtsvarUpaM SaTtriMCatA yuktipadairyuktisthAnairalaMkRtaM tathA yathA sadratnaiH kAJcanaM suvarNamalaMkriyate|  SaTtriMCatA yuktipadairiti saMkhyAsaMkhyeyayoravyatirekApekSayA nirdeCaH|  kimbhUtairyuktipadairityAha-bhiSajAmarthadurgeSu saMkramairiva sthitaiH|  yathA hi durgA gajAdiguptAH parairadhigantumaCakyAH saMkramaiH setubhiH CakyA bhavanti tadvadye~arthA bhiSajAmagamyAste yuktipadairjJAtairgamyA bhavanti|| 77||

 tatrAdhikaraNaM yogo hetvartho~arthaH padasya ca||78||  pradeCoddeCanirdeCavAkyaCeSAH prayojanam||78||  upadeCApadeCAtideCArthApattinirNayAH||78||  prasaGgaikAntanaikAntAH sApavargo viparyayaH||78||  pUrvapakSavidhAnAnumatavyAkhyAnasaMCayAH||78||  nidarCanaM nirvacanaM niyogo~atha vikalpanam||78||  pratyutsArastathoddhAraH sambhavastantrayuktayaH||78||

tatretyAdinA yuktayaH ucyante|  vAkyArthAnAM yojanaM yuktiH yAbhiryojanAbhirvinA  tantramasambaddhaM bhavati|  kA yuktayaH ?  tatra teSvadhikaraNaM nAma adhikaraNaM prastAvaH sAmAnyenoktamapyarthajAtaM yadbalAdviCeSe~avAsthApyate tadadhikaraNam|    yathA saptAhAdauSadhaM kecidAhuranye daCAhata iti vAkyArthaH sAmAnyena pravRtto~adhikaraNavaCAjjvarAkhye viCeSe~avasthApyate|| 1|| 

	yogo nAma yogaH sambandhaH|  sa ca padArthayorvAkyArthayorvA|  tatra padArthayoH sAdhyasAdhanabhAvena|  yathA rAgAdirogA ityAdau samUlA ityasyApAstA ityanena|  vAkyArthayoryathA 'jIrNAjIrNaviCaGkAyAM punaruSNodakaM pibedi'tyasya 'tenodgAraviCuddhiH syAttataCca laghutA ruciri'tyanena|| 2||

	hetvartho nAma yadekatrocyamAnamanyatrApi tathaivopayujyate|  yathA tatraikaikatra CAkhAyAmityAdyavedhyoktyACeSA vedhyA iti gamyate|  

	padArtho nAma padenArtho~avagamyate|  yathA gurvAdayo guNaCabdAdavagamyante|| 4||

	pradeCo nAma yatraikadeCasyocyamAnasyArthasya prasAdAdanucyamAno~api taccheSa Apadyate saH pradeCaH|  yathA kukUlAdipAkakrameNa lAghavAtiCayo~apUpAnAmucyamAnAnAM prasAdAnanucyamAnAnyapi kRtAnnAni tathAvagamyante|| 5||

	uddeCo nAma yatrArthanAM CabdamAtreNaiva kIrtanamuddeCaH|  hrasvadIrghA ityAdayo~aSTau netradoSA iti CabdamAtreNASTau kIrtitAH|| 6|| 

	nirdeCo nAma yacchabdamAtreNa nirdiSTAnAM svarUpaviCeSapradarCanAya punaH kIrtanaM nirdeCaH|  yathA bastivyApadi drutotkSipta ityAdikamuddiCya teSu doSaM pradarCayitumanucchvAsya tu baddha ityucyate|| 7||

	vAkyaCeSo nAma yasmin vAkye ekadeCaH CiSyate vyAkhyAkAle tvanucyamAno~apyApatati sa vAkyaCeSaH|  yathA rogastu doSavaiSamyaM doSasAmyamarogatA ityatra ucyata iti vAkyaCeSaH|| 8|| 

	prayojanaM nAma yatsampAdayituM kriyA hyArabhate tatprayojanam|  yathA sadoSeSu doSaCeSapAcanamagnisandhukSaNaM ca sampAdayitumauSadhapAnamArabhyate|| 9|| 

	upadeCo nAma CuddhasyAptavacanasya kIrttanamupadeCaH|  yathA garbhastu mAtuH pRSThAbhimukho lalATe kRtAJjaliH saGkucitAGga ityevamAdiH|| 

	apadeCo nAma pratijJAnasya sAdhanaheturapadeCaH|  yathA ahitAyottarottaraM duSTA vAtAdaya ityasyAM pratijJAyAM duSpariharatvAditi hetuH|| 

	atideCo nAma anyasambandhinAM dharmANAmanyatrAvasthApanamatideCaH|  yathA pAlakyAsambandhinAM dharmANAM cuccAvasthApanam|| 12|| 

	arthApattirnAma yadekasminnarthaM ucyamAne anuktasyApyarthasya balAdAgamanaM sArthApattiH|  yathA pakve jale jIrNe~apyAmaM na peyamityucyamAne AbhojanAdityanucyamAnasyApi sAmarthyAdAgamanam|  

	nirNayo nAma uddiSTAnAmarthAnAmanuddiSTena nirAkAGkSatvApAdanaM nirNayaH|  yathA vartmarogavijJAnIyoktAnAM rogANAM vartmarogapratiSedhanirAkAtvApAdanam|| 14||

	prasaGgo nAma yadaprAkariNakasyApi vastunaH kiJcit sambandhena yatkIrtanaM sa hi prasaGgaH|  yathA vamanaprastAve dhUmAntaiH prAyaH sarvairityAderaprAkaraNikasya kIrttanam|| 15|| 

	ekAnto nAma yatpakSAntaravyAvarttakaM tadekAntaH|  yathA doSahetujatvokternijatvaM na kadAcidapi bAhyahetujaM vyApnoti|| 16|| 

	naikAnto nAma yaducyamAnamapyavaCyambhAvitvenAniyataM sa naikAntaH|  yathA jvarastu jAtaH SaDrAtrAdaCvinISu nivarttata ityetaduktamapyavaCyambhAvitvenAniyatam|| 17||

	apavargo nAma sAmAnyoktyanupraviSTasya viCeSeNAkarSaNaM so~apavargaH|  yathA madhuraM CleSmalamityuktAvanupraviSTeSu jIrNaCAlyAdiSu CabdenAkarSaNam|| 18|| 

	viparyayo nAma uktasyAnyathAbhAvo viparyayaH|  yathA nidAnoktAnAmanupaCayo bhavati tadviparItAnAM copaCayaH|| 19||

	pUrvapakSo nAma parapratijJAtAnupapattipradarCanaparo vAkyasamudAyaH pUrvapakSaH yathA SaDrasavAdinaM pratyanekarasapratipAdakAni vAkyAni|| 

	vidhAnaM nAma tantrasya kartrA viCiSTA yA padAdiracanA kRtA tadvidhAnam|  yathA sarvavirodhaparijJAnAdvyavahArocchittirmA bhUdityabhiprAyeNoktaM na ca tadvijJAnamekAntabhadrakamiti|| 21|| 

	anumataM nAma parapakSasya bhinnasyApyaGgIkaraNamanumatam|  yathA bastividhAne kalpanAyA mateSu doSauSadhAdi balataH sarvametatpramANayedityaGgIkaraNam|| 22|| 

	vyAkhyAnaM nAma saGkSepeNoktasyA vistareNAkhyAnaM vyAkhyAnam|  yathA sarvaroganidAne tasyopalabdhirnidAnAdibhiriti saGkSepeNoktasya tasyetyAdinA vistareNAkhyAnam|  athavA sphuTaiH CabdairanabhihitaM gurupAramparyakramAgatam|| 23||

	saMCayo nAma viruddhAnAM pakSANAmaniCcayaH saMCayaH|  yathA viSavegasambhavapakSeSu|| 24|| 

	atItApekSA nAma yatrAtItaM padamapekSya sambandhArthatA bhavati sA~atItApekSA|  yathA svedyAdayaH snehyA ityuktena tvatimandAgnirityAdeH snehyA ityapekSate|  yathA ca jvare laGghanaM kurvIteti  sUtroktaM laGghanamapekSate|| 25|| 

	anAgatApekSA nAma yatrAnAgatenA~arthena sambandhitA bhavati sAnAgatApekSA|  yathA tato nAvanagaNDUSetyAdinA dinacaryAyAM nasyAdi vidhayo~apekSyante|| 26|| 

	svasaMjJA nAma yA svatantre evamanyasmiJchAstre na CrUyate sA  svasaMjJA|  yathA 'ApAno' 'jentAka' ityevamAdi|| 27|| 

	UhyaM nAma yad bhiSajA svaprajJayA CabdenAnuktamapi vyavathApyate tadhyam|  yathA dravyaM jahyAdayaugikamiti yanna yaugikaM tacchabdena noktamapi prajJayA vyavasthApyate|| 28|| 

	samuccayo nAma ekasmin vihite tadavirodhena tatraiva dvitIyasya vidhAnaM samuccayaH|  yathA vAtasyopakramaH snehaH sveda ityAdi|  

	nidarCanaM nAma sAdhyasyaikadeCo dRSTAnto nidarCanam|  yathA AmadoSeSu trividheSu laGghanapAcanaCodhanAni druSTAntaH| (evamanyAnapi vyAdhIn svanidanaviparyayAt cikitsedityAdiH)|| 30|| 

	nirvacanaM nAma saMjJayoktasya tadarthena yojanaM nirvacanam|  yathA sUcIbhiriva gAtrANi bhidyatIti visUcikA|| 31||

	niyogo nAma kriyANAM vyApArANAM niyogaH|  yathA bhavatA svedamUrcchAparItenApi naiSA piNDikA vimoktavyeti|| 32|| 
vikalpo nAma krameNa yaugapadyena vA sambhavinAM pakSANAM kIrttanam| yathA kurvIta laGghanaM prAgrUpeSu jvarAdau vA||33||

	pratyutsAro nAma yatropapattiM darCayantaH parasparamatAni nivArayanti|  yathA garbhiNI aSTame mAsi kSIrayavAgUM sarpiSmatIM pibet|  neti khaNDakApyaH garbhasya paiGgalyAbAdhabhayAt|  astu paiGgalyAbAdhastathApyevaM kurvatI nIrujaM balavarNAyupetamapatyaM janayatIti bhagavAnAtreyaH||34||

	uddhAro nAma yacchAstre codyasya samAdhAnam|  yathA citrakarmaguNakRt guruNokto bastirityAdi yAvat sarvataH kathamapohati doSAniti codyasya stimitamArutavaCyametadityAdi samAdhAnam|| 35|| 

	sambhavo nAma kimapyanyatrAdarCanAdyena niyamena sthApyate sa sambhavaH|  yathA sarvarogeSu hetuliGgauSadhAdInAM sAmAnyenoktau vAtAdiviCeSeNAvasthApanaM sambhavaprasAdAllabhyam|| 36||

	evaM tantrayuktayaH|  yadyapi bhaTTArakaprasthAnena ca paripraCnavyAkaraNavyukrAntAbhidhAnahetvAkhyACcatasro~avaCiSyante tathApi AcAryeNa tantreNAnibaddhA ityatra nocyante|  athavA uktAsvevAntarbhAvyAH|  athavA tantrayuktitatvameva tAsAM nAGgIkriyate|  tatra cAgnyatiyogoktau vAtAdiviCeSeNAvasthApanaM sambhavaprasAdAllabhyamevamAdyuktam|| 78||

 sarasaH suptapadmasya ravidIdhitayo yathA||79||  yathA gRhasya dIpAphAstathA tantrasya yuktayaH||79||  adhIyAno~api tantrANi tantrayuktyavicakSaNaH||79||  nAdhigacCati tantrArthamarthaM phAgyakSaye yathA||79||  vAkyArthayojanAdetA yuktayastviSTasiddhidAH||79||  asadvAdiprayuktAnAM vAkyAnAM pratiSedhakAH||79||  lInavyatyAsaleCoktigaditAnAM prakACakAH||79||  vAkyanyAyodadheH sAraM gRhItvaivaM vyavasthitAH||79||

sarasa ityAdi subhodham|  tantrayuktyavicakSaNaH etAsu SaTtriMCattantrayuktiSvasamarthastantrArthaM nAdhigacCati na prApnoti yathA bhAgyakSaye dhanam|  

	etA yuktayo vAkyArthayojanAddhetoH sveSTasiddhiM dadati|  yAni cAsadvAdinAmarthAsambhandhapradarCaparANi vAkyAni teSAM pratiSedhakAH|  lInagaditAnAM vyatyAsagaditAnAM leCagaditAnAmuktigaditAnAJca prakACakAH|  lInaM tadyatsPuTaM vaktuM na pAryate|  vyatyAsaH parasparavivarttanam|  leCo~aCena sparCaH|  uktirvacanabhaGgiH|  etACca yuktayo vAkyanyAyodadherasaMKyaprakArasambhavino geyasyeva jAtayaH sAraM gRhItvA evaM vyavasthitAH|  padArthayojanAstu vyutpannAnAM prasiddhA evetyata AcAryeNa noktAH|  tAsu ca tatra bhavato hareH Clokau-
	
	saMsargo viprayogaCca sAhacaryaM virodhitA|  

	arthaH prakaraNaM liGgaM CabhdasyAnyasya sannidhiH||

	sAmarthyamaucitiH deCaH kAlo vyaktiH svarAdayaH|  

	CabhdArthasyAnavacCede viCeSasmRtihetavaH|| iti|  

	anayorarthaH yeSAM pakSe aneko goCabhdo vAgAdiviSayasteSAM viCeSAvacCede saMsargAdIni hetavaH|  yeSAmapyeka eva goCabhdo vAgAdyanekaviSayAbhidhAno~anekaCaktiyuktasteSAmapi CakyanavacCede viCeSasmRtihetavaH|  

	tatra saMsargo yathA-dhenurAnIyatAmityatra sarvatra pratyagraprasavAbhidhAyitvAddhAtvArthasandehe saMvatsataretyAdinoktaH kiCoratarAdyanyatamasaMsargaH sandehavicCede hetuH|  

	kvacidviprayogaH, yathA karabharahitA dhenurAnIyatAmityukte yaiva nirjAtakarasambhandhA dhenuH saiva karabharahitA~anIyate anyasyAstu karabharahitatvAvyabhicArAdviCeSaNaM nopapadyate|  

	kvacitsAhacaryam, yathA CilA AnIyatAM gandhadravyANi cetyatra peSaNaCilaivAnIyate|  yathA rAmalakSmaNAvityatra rAmo dACarathirevocyate|  

	kvacidvirodhaH, yathA rAmArjunAvityatrArjunaH kArtavIrya eva|  

	kvacidartham, yathA gopAlakamAnayetyadhyApayetyatrArthAdyasyAdhyApanaM sambhavati sa nAmnA gopAlaka AnIyate na gavAM  pAtA|  

	kvacitprakaraNam, yathA bhojyAGgeSvamlAdiCabhdakeSUpasaMhnimANeSvetAvaducyed saindhavamAnayeti ukte ca pradIyate lavaNaM na cACvAdikam|  

	kvacilliGgam yathA aktAH CarkarA upanayetyasmin vAkye kasyApyaJjanadravyasya sambhave tejo vai GRtamityasmin vAkyAntare dRSTAt liGgAt GRtasAdhitatvaM CarkarAdyuTikAyA ajikriyayA nirddhAryate|  

	kvacicCabhdAntarasannidhiH; yathA~arjunaH kArtavIryaH rAmo jAmadagnya iti|  

	kvacit sAmarthyam, yathA anudarA kanyetyudaraviCeSapratiSedho gamyate|  abhirUpAya kanyA dIyatAmityatra cAbhirUpatamAyeti gamyate|  

	kvacidaucitI; tathA ca keSAJcit prayoktRNAmaucityAcCabhdasya nindApraCaMsAdyabhidhAyitvaM gamyate|  yathA bhadramuKeti dasyurAkSasAdau|  yathA vaNijo vArANasIjitvarA iti ca vadanti|  

	kvaciddeCaH, yasyaiva Cabhdasya kvaciddeCe ninditavAcitvaM tasyaivAnyatra praCaMsAvAcitvaM prasiddhyaivaM rUpam|  

	kvacit kAlaH; yathA pUrvAhNe pacyatAmityukte viCiSTasAdhanaiCca viklittirgamyate sA ca viCiSTasAdhanAdivAcamagRhItvA pacanaviCeSavagatiH|  rAtrau tu nidrAkSayo gamyate|  

	kvacidvyaktiH; yathA pu~MliGgo dharmaCabhda AtmaguNaM vakti napuMsakastu yajJam|  

	kvacit svarAdayaH; yathA asthaNDileSvityatra pUrvapadaprakRtisAdhAraNatatpuruSAvagatirasthaNDileSvityatra cAntodAttena bhahuvrIhiH|  

	AdigrahaNAt kvacidvibhaktiH; yathA arddhamarddhaH arddhamiti dvitIyayA karma pratIyate|  arddha iti prAtipadikArthamAtram|  

	kvacittaddhitaH;, yathA dAttaH kUpa ityatra taddhite na vipACAta uttarakUlabhavatvam|  dakSiNakUlabhavatvaM na kUpasyeti spaSTam|  

	kvacidvyaJjanam, yathA susiktamityatra Satvasya bhAvAbhAvAbhyAM suCabhdasyopasargatvaM karmapravacanIyatvaM ca gamyate|  evamanekamapyUhyamiti ClokArthaH|| 79||

 etadAgamasiddhatvAt pratyakSaphaladarCanAt||80||  prayojyaM mantravattantraM tantrajJAnaviCAradaiH||80||

etaditi|  etacca tantraM tantrajJAnaviCAradairmantravat samprayoktavyaM nAtra phalAbhAvaCaGkA kAryetyarthaH|  kuta ityAha-AgamasiddhatvAt|  Agama evAsmin pramANam|  pratyakSaphaladarCanamadhikaM pramANam|| 80||

uttarasthAnam

vAjIkaraNavidhiH

 pitAmahena lokasya smRtvA tadidamavyayam||81||  akAlamRtyurakSArthamalauhaM varma nirmitam||81||  sujJAtametadamRtaM svasthAsvasthasukhAspadam||81||  yathepsitaphalACeSapuruSArthaprasAdhanam||81||  idaM CAstramadRSTInAmevamAlokakAryapi||81||  maNDalaM bhAskarasyeva na prakACAya jAyate||81||

pitAmahenetyAdi|  vyAkhyAsamam|  pitAmahena brahmaNA alauhaM varma nirmitaM CastreNa vinA kAritam|

	sujJAtaM sAkalyena jJAtametattantramRtaM svasthAnAmasvasthAnAM ca sukhasyAspadaM sthAnam|  IpsitaphalAvAptikrameNACeSasya puruSArthasya prasAdhanam|

	idaJca CAstramevamAlokakAryapi adRSTInAmabuddhimatAM prakACAya na jAyate|  yathA adRSTInAmacakSuSAM bhAskarasyAdityamaNdalam||81||

 dhruvaM vaidyeSu kalyANamAyurvedAnusAriSu||82||  itareSvitaracchAtraviSajvalanakarmasu||82||

AyurvedAnusAriSu vaidyeSu dhruvamavaCyaM kalyANamubhayalokaCreyaH|  itareSvityAyurvedAnanusAriSu itaradityavaCyamakalyANam|  kimbhUteSvityAha-CastraviSajvalanakarmasu CAstraviSAgnirUpaM mAraNAtmakatvAt karma yeSAmiti|| 82||

 kuryAt prayuktaM CastrAdi saCeSamapi rogiNam||83||  na tvevaM bheSajaM mohAdanAlocitayojitam||83||

kuryAdityAdi|  CastrAdi CatruNA prayuktakM saCeSamapi rogiNaM kuryAt|  yat punarbheSajamanAlocitayojitamanAlocitameva mohAdyojitaM tanna tvevaM saCeSaM kuryAt|| 83||

 sadA doSauSadhAdIni vIkSya dvAdaCatattvataH||84||  kuryAccikitsitaM prAjJo na yogaireva kevalaiH||84||

tasmAd dvAdaCa doSauSadhAdIni doSadUSyabalakAlAnalaprakRtivayaHsattvasAtmyAhArAvasthauSadhAni tattvataH parIkSya prAjJaCcikitsitaM kuryAt|  na tu kevalaireva yogaiH|| 84||

 mAtrAdisamyagajJAtvA yadRcchApratipAditaH||85||  hinasti vyAdhitaM yogo ghRtamAkSikayoriva||85||

mAtretyAdi|  yogaCca mAtrAkAlasaMyogasaMskArAdikaM samyagajJAtvA yadRcchayaiva pratipAdito vyAdhitaM hinasti|  yathA ghRtamAkSikayoH samayogaH|| 85||

 dRSTvA viSe~apyamRtatAM ghRtAdau mAraNAtmatAm||86||  CAstratattvaM na vijJAya sa durAtmA cikitsati||86||

yaCca durAtmA bhavati so~avaCyaM CAstratattvaM vijJAya na cikitsati|  viSe mAraNAtmake~api saMyogAdivaCAdamRtatAM dRSTvA ghRtAdau ca rasAyane mAraNAtmakatAM dRSTvA|| 86||

 sugItaCcaiSa kasyApi mahACloko mahAtmanaH||87||  vaidyACcACrutaCAstrArthAM mUrKACca praphaviSNavaH||87||  akAlamRtyavo hyete vicaranti mahItale||87||  lophayantyAturaM mUDhA ye citraiH karmakauCalaiH||87||  tephyo rakSetsadAtmAnamAtmA yasmAt sudurlaphaH||87||  te GuNAkSaravatkaJciduttArya niyatAyuSam||87||  Gnanti vaidyAphimAnena CatAnyaniyatAyuSAm||87||  rogArttasya viSaNNasya yatnalaphyasuKAyuSaH||87||  avaidyo nirGRNaH krUro yaH karoti phiSagjitam||87||  pApasya mRtyudUtasya durmatestyaktadharmaNaH||87||  naro narakapAtI syAttasya samphASaNAdapi||87||  atantrIkRtatantrArthAH CAstramAtropajIvinaH||87||  rAjJAM pramAdAdrASTrANi caranti vyAdhavRttayaH||87||  tAn kAlapACasadRCAn varjayecCAstradUSakAn||87||  seveta CamavijJAnajJAnapUrNAn phiSaktamAn||87||

sugIta ityAdi|  vyAKyAsamam|

	ye mUDhA nAnAvidhaiH karmakauCalairAturaM lobhayanti tebhya AtmAnaM sadA rakSet yasmAdAtmA sudurlabhaH|  

	te mUDhAH kaJcinniyatAyuSaM GuNAkSaravatkAkatAlIyaduttArya bhiSajamAtmAnaM manyamAnA aniyatAyuSAM CatAni Gnanti hiMsanti|  GuNaiH kRmibhirbhakSite kASThe yAnyakSarANi dRCyante tAni tairbhuddhipUrvaM na  kriyante|  

	viSaNNatvAdiyuktasya rogArttasya avaidya yo nirGuNaH krUratvAt bheSajaM karoti tasya pApAdirUpasya sambhASaNAdapi naro narakapAtI syAt|  

	yaistantrArtho na tantrIkRtaH samyak tantrayitvA bhuddhau na niveCitaH te vyAdhavRttayo mRgamArakA rAjJAM prAmAdAdrASTrANi caranti|  yadi punA rAjanaH pramattA na bhavanti tataH kathamiva carituM labhante|  tAn kAlapACasadRCatvAdiyuktAn varjayet prAjJaH|  CamAdipUrNAMCca bhiSaktamAn seveta|| 87||

 annapAnAni pathyAni vyAdhinirghAtamauSadham||88||  rasAyanAni vRSYANi prApyante vaidyasaMCrayAt||88||  arAjakA yathA deCA bharttRhInA yathA gRhAH||88||  AturAdyAstathA pAdAH CocyA vaidyAnadhiSThitAH||88||  prANAcAryaM budhastasmAddayAluM vijitendriyam||88||  aCvinAviva devendraH pUjayedAdRtaH sadA||88||

pathyAnyannapAnAdIni sAdhuvaidyasaMCrayAt prApyante|  arAjakA ityAdi vyAkhyAsamam|  yata evaM tasmAt budhaH prAjJo dayAlutvAdiyuktaM prANAcAryamAdRtaH san sadA pUjayedyathA devendra aCvinau pUjayatIti|| 88||

 yajJasya hi CiraschinnamaCvibhyAM sandhitaM punaH||89||  pAtitA daCanAH pUSNo bhagasya ca vilocane||89||  rAjayakSmArdditaCcandrastAbhyAmeva cikitsitaH||89||  somAnnipatito vajrI bhujastambhe ca dAruNe||89||  bhArgavaCcyavanaH kAmI vRddhaH san vikRtiM gataH||89||  vIryavarNabalopetaH kRtastAbhyAM punaryuvA||89||  ebhiCcAnyaiCca bahubhiH karmabhirbhiSaguttamau||89||  babhUvaturbhRCaM pUjyAvindrAdInAM  mahAtmanAm||89||  aCvibhyAM sahitaH somaM prAtaH pibati vAsavaH||89||  sautrAmaNyAM ca bhagavAnaCvibhyAM saha modate||89||  aCvinoH kalpyate bhAgo yajJeSu brAhmaNairapi||89||  aCvinAvagnirindraCca vedeSu sutarAM stutAH||89||  vaidyAvityaCvinau tasmAt pUjyete vibudhairapi||89||  ajarairamarairnityaM sukhitairevamAdRtaiH||89||  vyAdhimRtyujarAgrastairduHkhaprAyaiH sukhArthibhiH||89||  kiM punarbhiSajo martyaiH pUjyAH syurnAtiCaktitaH||89||

yajJasyetyAdinetihAsenACvinoH prabhAvakIrtanam|  vyAkhyAsamam|    bhiSaguttamAvaCvinau mahAtmAnAvindrAdInAM bhRCaM pUjyau babhUvatuH|   tasmAdvibudhairddaivairapyaCvinau vaidyaviti pUjyete|  kimbhUtaivibudhairityAha ajarairityAdi evaGguNairapi|  kiM punarmatyairmAnuSaistatrApi vyAdhyAdigrastairbhiSajo yathACaktito na pUjyAH syuH|  (yajJasyetyAdi|  yajJo brahmA|  indraH somAnnipatitaH somamatIva pItvA~ativirecita ityarthaH|  etairanyaiCca karmabhirbhiSaguttamAvaCvinau mahAtmanAvindrAdInAM bhRCaM pUjyau babhUvatuH|  prAtaH prAtassavane Cakra aCvibhyAM sahitaH somaM pibati|  sautrAmaNyAM  ca sahACvibhyAM Cakro modate|  devairapyaCvainau pUjyete bhiSaguttamAviti|  kiM punarmattyairvyAdhyAdigrastairbhiSajo nAtiCaktitaH pUjyAH syuryathACaktipUjyAH-iti jejjaTaH)||89||

 CIlavAn matimAn yukto dvijAtirvedapAragaH||90||  prANibhiH pitRvatpUjyaH prANAcAryaH sa hi smRtaH||90||

CIlavatvAdimAn vaidyaH prANibhiH pitRvat pUjyaH, sa hi prANAcAryaH smRto nAnyaH|  (sa ca bhiSak CIlavatvAdiyukto vedapAraGgato guruvatprANibhiH pUjyaH prANAcAryo yato~asAviti-iti jejjaTaH)|| 90||

uttarasthAnam

vAjIkaraNavidhiH

 vidyAsamAptau bhiSajAM dvitIyA jAtirucyate||91||  na vaidyo vaidyaCabdaM hi labhate pUrvajanmanA||91||  vidyAsamAptAvArSam vA brAhmaM vA bhiSajAM dhruvam||91||  sattvamAviCati jJAnAttena vaidyo dvijaH smRtaH||91||

vidyAsamaptAvityadi vyAkhyAsamam|  ArSaM vA brAhmaM vA sattvaM karttR vidyAsamAptau bhiSajaM karmabhUtamAviCati|  (idaM cAparamapacitikAraNam|  vidyAsamAptAvityAdi|  etaduktaM bhavati|  vaidyo na dvijaH; api tu vidyAsamAptau vaidyaCabdAVbhiniSpattiH|  tasyAM ca satyAM jJAnodayaH|  tato brAhmaM  sattvamArSaM vA dhruvamavaCyaM jJAnAdAviCati|  tasmAdvaidyo dvitIya iva jAto bhavati vaidyaCabdalAbhAt|   uktaJca-yasyAM yasyAmavasthAyAM varttate tasyAM tasyAM jAta ityupacaryate|  tena dvijAtIya vaidyajAtirbhavatIti|  nanu ca vidyAsamAptAvityanenaiva ca paryAptatvAt jJAnagrahaNaM kim?  ucyate|  ya eva vidyAsamAptau jJAnavAn na pustakasthAnIyaH taM brAhmasattvamArSaM vA viCati|  nanu ca brAhmaM vArSaM veti kasmAdvikalpaH ekasyaiva kasmAtra niyamaH kRtaH ?  ucyate|  brAhmaNasya vedArthaparijJAnAdAyurvedArthaparijJAnAt brahmasattvAnupraveCasAMsiddhikatvAcca brahmasattvamAviCati vaiCyamArSamiti yathAsaGkhyena pratyetavyamiti|  manunA~apyuktam-

	'vaidyastu vaiCyo vA brAhmaNO~api vA ucyate~asyApyanyasattva prApaNArthamathApi vA' iti-iti jejjaTaH)|| 91||

 nAvadhyAyenna cAkroCedahitaM na samAcaret||92||  prANAcAryaM budhaH kaCcidicchennAyuranaCvaram||92||

taM ca budhaH AyuranaCvaramicchan nAvadhyAyet|  avadhyAnamahitakalpanam|  na cAkroCet prANAcAryam|  (abhidhyAnamahitacintanamiti jejjaTaH)|| 92||

 bhiSagapyAturAnsarvAn svasutAniva yatnavAn
AbAdhebhyo~abhisaMrakSet jJAnaM dharmamanusmaran||93||  kurvate ye tu vRttyarthaM cikitsApaNyavikrayam||93||  te hitvA kAJcanaM rACiM pAMsurACimupAsate||93||  rogAkhyAndAruNAnpACAnantakAntikakarSiNaH||93||  yaCchitvA yacchati prANAndAtA nAstyeva tatsamaH||93||  na jIvitapradAnAddhi dAnamanyadviCiSyate||93||  tasmAdupAcaret svena svena niHsvatapasvinaH||93||

bhiSajApi sarva AturAH svasutA iva pAlyAH|  ye manuSyA vRtyarthaM cikitsApaNyasya vikrayaM kurvate te svarNarACiM tyaktvA pAMsurACimupAsate sevante|  

	kiJca, vaidyena samo dAtA nAsti|  yo rogAkhyAn dAruNAn pACAn chittvA prANAn yacchati dadAti| kimbhUtAn pACAn ?  antakasya mRtyorantikaM nikaTaM ye karSanti tAn|  

	na jIvitapradAnAdityAdi vyAkhyAsamam|  jIvitapradAnAdanyaddAnaM na viCiSTam|  yasmAdevaM tasmAnniHsvAn tapasvinaCca svena svakIyena svena dhanena vaidya upAcaret|  

	paro bhUtadayA dharma iti mattvA cikitsite|  

	vartate yaH sa siddhArthaH sukhamatyantamaCnute|| iti carakaH|

	bhUtadayA ca paro dharma evaM jJAtvA cikitsite yo vartate siddhArthaH so~atyantaM sukhamaCnute-iti jejjaTaH|| 93||

 sattvArthamIhamAnasya vaidyasyaivaM mahAmateH||94||  varttate sannidhAnena niyataM siddhidevatAH||94||  kvaciddharmaH kvacinmitraM kvacidarthaH kvacidyaCaH||94||  karmAbhyAsaH kvacicceti cikitsA nAsti niSphalA||94||  nityamAdaravAn vaidyastasmAdArttAnupAcaret||94||  prANAn sahAtmanaH kIrttyA nihantyeSAmanAdarAt||94||

evaM sattvArthaM na tvAtmArthamIhamAnasya ceSTamAnasya mahAmatervaidyasya siddhyAkhyA devatAH niyataM sannidhAnena varttante|

	kvaciddharma ityAdi vyAkhyAsamam|  eSAmarttAnAM prANAn nihantIti sambandhaH|| 94||

 sarvatra maitrI karuNAtureSu nirAmadeheSu nRSu pramodaH||95||  manasyupekSApakRtiM vrajatsu vaidyasya saddRttamalaM tanoti||95||

sarvatra maitryAdikaM vaidyasya sAdhuvRttaM paryAptaM vistArayati|  AturaviSaye karuNA|  nirAmadeheSu svastheSu pramodaH|| 95||

 sAmiSeNApi cittena jIvitocchedakAriNaH||95||  yo nihantyAmayAn vaidyaH so~api kenopamIyatAm||95||  kimuta nirAmiSeNa manasA karuNAmRdunA
kRpaNaviCiSTayoH sadRCamAdaramudvahatA||95||  atigurubodhisattvacaritaM satataM vidadha
cchamayati rogajAlamapi yo~ativirodhamithaH||95||

yo vaidyaH sAmiSeNa salobhenApi cittena jIvitasyocchedakAriNa AmayAn nihanti so~api kenopamIyatAm ?  

	yo vaidyaH karuNAmRdutvAdiguNena manasA mithaH parasparamativirodhi rogajAlaM Camayati saH kimuta?  AmiSaM bhogyavastu, kRpaNaH kSudraH, viCiSTaH kRpaNAdanyaH|  tayorubhayorapi samamAdaramudvahatA|  kimbhUto vaidyaH?  yaH sadaivAtigurubodhisattvAnAM caritaM vidadhat|| 96||

 dAhaH CUlaM tRDAdhmAnaM kSutkSAmatvamarocakam||97||  kaH prAkRto jayedrogAn nityamanyo~anyarodhinaH||97||

ativirodha rogajAlamityetadeva dAhaH CUlamityAdinA pradarCyate-dAhetiCItA kriyA CUle sA svalpApi mahAvikArakarI|    evaM tRDAdiSvapi yathAyathaM virodho vAcyaH|| 97||

 mArutAmagrahonmAdamadAn susadRCAkRtIn||98||  ko jAnIyAccikitsedvA dUrabhinnakriyAkramAn||98||

mArutAdIMCca susadRCalakSaNAn sudUravibhinnakriyAkramAMCca ko vAliCo yathAvastu jAnIyAt|  jJAtvA vA kaCcikitsituM CaknuyAt|| 98||

 prANAcAryaM vedapAraM prayAtaM
buddhyA yuktaM pUjayennityamasmAt||99||  yasminyasya prANayAtrAnibaddhA
tasmai yacchan ko dhanAnAM dhanAyet||99||

prANAcAryamiti|  asmAt kAraNAdAyurvedapAraGgataM budhyA yuktaM ca prANAcAryaM nityameva dhanadAnAdinA pUjayet|  yasya dhanino prANAcArye sarvA prANayAtrA nibaddhA sthitA tasminyacchan dhanAni ko mUDho dhanAnAM dhanAyed dhanACAM kuryAt|  dhanAyedityaCanAyAdisUtre nipAtyate|| 99||

 AyurvedaM ClokalakSeNa pUrvaM
brahmA~a~amnAsIdagniveCAdayastu||100||  kRtsnajJeyaprAptasArAH svatantrA
stasyaikaikaM naikadhA~aGgaM vitenuH||100||

pUrvaM brahmA ClokAnAM lakSeNAyurvedamA~a~amnAsIt|  tasmAdagniveCAdayaH kRtsnajJeyaprAptasArAH svatantrACca santastasyAyurvedasya kAyabAlAdyaGgamekaikamanekadhA vitenuriti sthitam|| 100||
